40001001	Ade Yesu Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ Dawid ɔwa, kĩ Dawid lɛmɛ nyɛ Abraham ɔwa a bawanyɔ kasinu buĩ nɛ awĩ a.
40001002	Kito Abraham akũ kɛyawo Lɛgã Dawid akũ bawanyɔ a kama kamɛ nyɛ Abraham ma Isak, Isak ma Yakob,
40001003	ade Yakob ma Yuda mɔ bawaɛ̃nyole a. Yuda mɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Tamai ma Perez mɔ Zera. Perez ma Hezron, Hezron lɛmɛ ma Aram.
40001004	Aram ma Aminadab, Aminadab ma Naheson,
40001005	ade Naheson ma Salmon a. Salmon mɔ Rahab ma Boaz, ade Boaz mɔ Rut ma Obed a. Obed ma Isai,
40001006	ade Isai lɛmɛ ma Lɛgã Dawid a. Kito Dawid akũ kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ bipili Israelfɔ ndom bɛnamɛna Babilonia tite akũ a ni, ade bawanyɔ a kasinu buĩ nɛ awĩ a. Dawid mɔ otsole a kĩ kufɛ ɛnyɛ Uria ɔtsɔ̃ a ma Salomo.
40001007	Salomo ma Rehoboam, Rehoboam ma Abiya, Abyia ma Asa.
40001008	Asa ma Yosafat, Yosafat ma Yoram, Yoram ma Uziya.
40001009	Uziya ma Yotan, Yotan ma Ahaz, Ahaz lɛmɛ ma Hezekiya.
40001010	Hezekiya ma Manase, Manase ma Amon, Amon ma Yosiya,
40001011	ade Yosiya ma Yekoniya mɔ ye bawaɛ̃nyole a.
40001012	Kito Israelfɔ kamuniki kato Babilonia kɛyawo Yesu kama lɔkɔ a, bawanyɔ a kasinu buĩ nyɛ Yekoniya ma Sealtiel, Sealtiel ma Zerubabel,
40001013	Zerubabel lɛmɛ ma Abihud. Abihud ma Elyakim, Elyakim ma Azur,
40001014	ade Azur ma Zadok, Zadok ma Akim, Akim lɛmɛ ma Elihud.
40001015	Elihud ma Eleazar, Eleazar ma Matan, ade Matan ma Yakob.
40001016	Yakob ma Yosef a kĩ ɛkɔã Maria a, kĩ ɛma Yesu a kĩ bavɛ Kristo a.
40001017	Foesũ kito Abraham akũ kɛyawo Dawid akũ ni, bawanyɔ ewua-ana lɛna nɛ kasinu a kamɛ. Ade kĩ kito Dawid akũ kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Babiloniafɔ pili Israelfɔ ndom bɛnamɛna be tite akũ a, bawanyɔ ewua-ana lɛna nɛ kasinu a kamɛ. Kĩ kito lɔkɔ a na kɛyawo Kristo kama ni, bawanyɔ ewua-ana lɛna nɛ kasinu a na lɛmɛ kamɛ.
40001018	Ade ayekĩ Yesu Kristo kama fɔlɛtsa a ya nɛ foe kamɛ a nɛ awĩ a. Bitinya ɔma Maria bɛkpa Yosef, lɛmɛ fɔmɔ baapi ye a, Maria mɔ́ eyi ɔsũ kĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ kɔma kĩ kuto Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ.
40001019	Ayekĩ Yosef nyɛ oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, ade ɛtáwɛ kĩ yado Maria kɔnyɔã nɛ bati anɛ sũ ni, ɛwɛ kĩ yasĩ ye nɛ kabɛla kamɛ.
40001020	Kĩ ɛkakɔna fukĩĩ akũ a, boe Ɔlate a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye nɛ kɔda kamɛ, ebi ye kĩ, “Yosef, Dawid obi, tavila Maria kakɔã, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kɔma a to.
40001021	Yaama obinyole, ote ye dĩ kĩ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ ye aanyɛ ye bati etomɛna tɔkpa kamɛ.”
40001022	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ, ayekĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ akũ a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
40001023	“Oyitsɔ̃ kĩ enyína onyole aatsãmɔ kɔma, ɛma obinyole. Baavɛ ye Imanuel,” kĩ de kayɔ nyɛ, “Baguma deĩ mɔ boe.”
40001024	Foesũ kĩ Yosef nyinya a, ɛkɔã Maria ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bi ye a.
40001025	Lɛmɛ Yosef mɔ Maria táta mɔ akũ ndɛ ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ɔnyɔ aye, kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛma ye obinyole a. Ade Yosef te ye dĩ kĩ Yesu a.
40002001	Bɛma Yesu nɛ Betlehem nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Herodes kanya lɛgã nɛ Yudea tite akũ a. Owi tábuna mɔ banyole badi kĩ bɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa nɛ fusibii kadã akũ to suwa kadekɔ̃ bɛya nɛ Yerusalem,
40002002	ade bɛyavia kĩ, “Ndia bɛma obisɛ̃ a kĩ yaanya Yudafɔ lɛgã a? Bɔmɔ́ ye lisibii kĩ lide nɛ suwa kadekɔ̃, ade bɔya kĩ bɔ́asum ye a.”
40002003	Kĩ Lɛgã Herodes nu fukĩĩ a, ɔwɔlɛ bɔlɛ ye mɔ odi nyɛ odi nɛ Yerusalem a.
40002004	Foesũ ɛvɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a flee ɛkpɔta evia be kĩ, “Nɛ ndia baama Kristo a?”
40002005	Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɛ Betlehem nɛ Yudea tite akũ, kitonɛkĩ ade lɛtsa kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ tsɛlɛ eyi kĩ,
40002006	‘Nɔ Betlehem nɛ Yuda tite akũ, nnɛ́ ɔmatɔ kabii kɔlaa anɛ nɛ Yuda tɛmatɔ tɛkpale tɛkpale a kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ nɔ kamɛ mɔ ɔkpãnɛ a kĩ, yaakpã yĩ bati Israelfɔ a aanɛ eto.’ ”
40002007	Foesũ Herodes vɛ anyansãfɔ a kĩ bito suwa kadekɔ̃ a ɛnamɛna kabɛlakɔ̃, ade evia be lɔkɔ paa a kĩ lisibii a nɛ a.
40002008	Ke liti a, ɛnyɛ be osi kĩ bɛnaa Betlehem mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, “Minaawɛ obisɛ̃ a kawɛ wĩ. Ntɛ mimɔ́ ye ni, mifɔ̃ ĩnyi lɔkɔa yĩ malo nnaasum ye.”
40002009	-
40002010	Foesũ bɛdzakũ, ade kĩ banaa nɛ osi a, bɛmɔ́ lisibii mɔapɛ a kĩ bɛmɔ́ nɛ suwa kadekɔ̃ a. Kĩ bɛmɔ́ de lɔmɔ a, kawɔlɛ de be paa. Lɛnya be lɔtɔ tĩĩ lɛnafɔ̃ lɛdza nɛ kakɔ a kĩ obisɛ̃ a deĩ a lɔlɔ nyangɛ.
40002011	Kĩ biwo nɛ kɔla a kamɛ a, bɛmɔ́ obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma Maria, ade bike aduli bisum ye a. Bibinya be futetsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ sika ngbã, lifii mɔ klubɔũ bɛkpa ye.
40002012	Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa be nɛ kɔda kamɛ kĩ bɛtabuki bɛnaa Herodes sɛkɛ̃, foesũ bimuniki bɛtsã osi bɛbã bɛdzakũ bɛnaa ɔtɔ.
40002013	Kĩ anyansãfɔ a dzakũ a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Yosef nɛ kɔda kamɛ ebi ye kĩ, “Herodes aatsã ɛwɛ obisɛ̃ a kĩ yakɔ ye, foesũ yidza kakpã obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma milo minaa Egipte tite akũ. Mina nɛ awã kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ maabi nɔ kĩ mimuniki miya.”
40002014	Lɛnyɛ lɛnyɛ a na, Yosef yidza ɛkpã obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma bilo bɛnaa Egipte tite akũ.
40002015	Edzi nɛ awã kɛnawo kĩ Herodes ku. Fukĩĩ ya lɔmɔ ayekĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛ eyi a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Nvɛ yĩ obi ntomɛna Egipte tite akũ.”
40002016	Kĩ Herodes mɔ́ eyi ɔsũ kĩ anyansãfɔ a kĩ bito suwa kadekɔ̃ a bu ye tɛkɔasia a ni, ɛna kalɔkpa paa. Foesũ edo bati kĩ bɛnaakɔ kubisɛ̃ɛ̃nyole a kĩ kɔtɛ futeli nviã kɛka, kɛyawo akɔkɔa amɛ akũ a flee nɛ Betlehem, mɔ ye tɛmatɔ kĩ tifuã a flee kamɛ. Herodes vɛ futeli nviã kĩ fuketimɔ lɔkɔ a kĩ bibi ye kĩ lisibii a nɛ a.
40002017	Adeke fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yeremia lɛ eyi a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
40002018	“Fɔwɔla nɛ́ nɛ Rama, kabe mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ fɔwɔla fɔanɛ. Rahel kabe ye babi, ade yaátunɔ kĩ bɛdɔla ye ɔwɔlɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ye babi ku.”
40002019	Kĩ Herodes ku a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Yosef nɛ kɔda kamɛ nɛ Egipte,
40002020	ade ebi ye kĩ, “Yidza, kakpã obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma mimuniki minaa Israelfɔ tite akũ, kitonɛkĩ bikĩ bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ obisɛ̃ a ku.”
40002021	Foesũ Yosef kpã obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma bimuniki bɛya nɛ Israel tite akũ.
40002022	Lɛmɛ kĩ Yosef nu kĩ bidzina Arkelao lɛgã nɛ ɔlɛga Herodes kadzakɔ̃ nɛ Yudea a, evila awã kanaa. Baguma buki ɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa ye nɛ kɔda kamɛ kĩ ɛtanaa awã, foesũ ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Galilea amantam kamɛ,
40002023	ade ɛnadzi nɛ ɔmatɔ a kĩ bavɛ Nazaret a kamɛ a. Foesũ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a lɛ biyi a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Baavɛ ye kĩ Nazaretni.”
40003001	Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ a, Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a ya nɛ Yudea kɔsa a kamɛ, ade eyi lɛtsã kade kayɔ nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a akũ a.
40003002	Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Midani mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a fuã!”
40003003	Yohanes nyɛ́ oti a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ ye akũ eyi kĩ, “Odi lamɛna fɔwɔla kabɔa nɛ kɔsa kamɛ kĩ, ‘Milɔla boe Ɔlate a osi. Mifɔ̃ ye akũ eyo kpĩĩ!’ ”
40003004	Yohanes do tɛtadiɛ kĩ bɛkɔa ɔpɔnkɔpoku tɛtsã bɛnɔ, ade ɛkɔa ɔyaɛ ovoli abɔsɔ eboomu kate a. Ye funitsã nyɛ koolo mɔ kɔsã.
40003005	Bati kato Yerusalem, Yudea tite flee mɔ tite a kĩ tifuã Yordan ɔwɔ a flee akũ kaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
40003006	Bɛnyɛ be tɔkpa bɛtsa ade Yohanes wɔla be mui nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ a kamɛ a.
40003007	Kĩ Yohanes mɔ́ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ beblebee kĩ baya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛwɔla be mui a, ebi be kĩ, “Mi bati kĩ mila ndɛ bɔɛ kpa! Owei lɛkpa mi kɔdɛ kĩ milo nɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ Baguma aayamɛna a kamɛ?
40003008	Mikɛna fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatsa kĩ midani mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
40003009	Mitakɔna kĩ minyɛ Abraham bawa sũ, míapuli milo sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a. Mabi mi kĩ Baguma aapuli ɛfɔ̃ boe kĩĩ lɛdani babi mɔ bawa ɛkpa Abraham.
40003010	Bike kasɔã kɔkɔɛ nɛ futse tɔbɔlɛ akũ kĩ baatsua. Kutse nyɛ kutse kĩ kɔáwũ babi wĩ ni, baakpeli koe bɛta bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ.
40003011	“Yĩ kɔ̃ ni, nkɔa mui mawɔla mi mui fɔtsa kĩ midani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ yaaya nɛ yĩ liti a, aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔ fi ɛwɔla mi mui. Edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kɔlaa ɛbɛ̃ yĩ, ade ntáfɛta kĩ mawũnya mpabua nɛ ye abɔa malo a.
40003012	Ɛnɛɛ ye kɔvɛla nɛ awɛ kĩ yaakɔa ɛwɛ ye kamɔnɛ. Yaafila ye kamɔnɛ eko nɛ oli kamɛ, lɛmɛ yaapila afafa a nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ da a kamɛ.”
40003013	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yesu to Galilea ɛya nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ a abuĩ kĩ ɛwɔla ye mui.
40003014	Lɛmɛ Yohanes wɛ kĩ Yesu ɛdani adzuni. Ebi Yesu kĩ, “Nɔ a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ awɔla yĩ mui a ni, nɔ mbom lɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃?”
40003015	Lɛmɛ Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Finyaakɔ̃ fɔ̃ fɔna lɔmɔ, kitonɛkĩ ade osi kĩĩ akũ bɔ́atsã bɔkɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ a.” Foesũ Yohanes tunɔ nɛ foe akũ.
40003016	Kĩ Yohanes wɔla Yesu mui eyua a, ɛnɛ nɛ mui a kamɛ lɛtalɛta, ade ode binya ɛkpa Yesu, ɛmɔ Baguma Hũhũ kĩ yaka ndɛ mblɔduma aye ɛyadzi nɛ ye akũ.
40003017	Ade odo odi nɛ eto ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ mɔawɛ Obi kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ nɛ awĩ a, yawo yĩ anɛ.”
40004001	Ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kpã Yesu ɛnamɛna kɔsa kamɛ kĩ Abonsam ɛsɔ ye ɛdã a.
40004002	Kĩ Yesu dzi katanya, lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa fuwi tɛna flee a, kɔlɛ kɔ ye.
40004003	Ade Abonsam ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ebi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma obi anɛ ni, kekɔ̃ bi boe kĩĩ bɛdani bɛkɛna abodoo.”
40004004	Lɛmɛ Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Nnɛ́ funitsã odi sũ oti adzi nkpã, mbom edzi nkpã nɛ kalɛ nyɛ kalɛ kĩ kanɛ kato Baguma onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a akũ.’ ”
40004005	Ade Abonsam kpã Yesu ɛnamɛna Yerusalem, Ɔmatɔ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a. Ɛkɔa ye ɛnadzɛla nɛ Asɔli Kɔla ode kakɔ geĩ a,
40004006	ebi Yesu kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma obi anɛ ni, vɛnya kaka kanaadza nɛ tite, kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma aakpa ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ɔlɛdo nɛ nɔ akũ, kĩ baakaɛ nɔ nɛ be awɛ kamɛ, ayekĩ ɔláatula nɛ de akũ.’ ”
40004007	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛmɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a buki kɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Tasɔ boe Ɔlate nɔ Baguma a ɔdã.’ ”
40004008	Ade Abonsam buki ɛkpã Yesu ɛnamɛna ɔtɔ geĩ odi kalete, ade ɛnyɛ katinya kamɛ fɔgã kanyakɔ̃ flee, mɔ foe akũ obu ɛtsa ye a.
40004009	Abonsam bi ye kĩ, “Maakɔa fukĩĩ flee nkpa nɔ, ntɛ aake aduli osum yĩ.”
40004010	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Satana, dzakũ nɛ yĩ akũ! Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ Ɔlate Baguma odi kɛnɛ kĩ akɛna nɔ akũ ɔkpa lɔkɔa osum ye lɛmɛ.’ ”
40004011	Ade Abonsam dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ Yesu mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ yabumɔ ye a.
40004012	Kĩ Yesu nu kĩ bipi Yohanes bido nɛ kɔla a, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ.
40004013	Ɛtánaadzi nɛ Nazaret ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, mbom ɛnadzi nɛ Kapernaum, ɔmatɔ nɛ Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a ɔwɛ̃. Awã deĩ nɛ Zebulon mɔ Naftali amantam a kamɛ.
40004014	Fɔya lɔmɔ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ eyi a kĩ,
40004015	“Zebulon tite mɔ Naftali tite, osi kĩ ɛnaa mpo abuĩ mɔ Yordan ɔwɔ liti Galilea, bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ tite!
40004016	Bati a kĩ bidzi nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a mɔ́ ɔhaĩ kpale. Ade bikĩ bidzi nɛ tite kĩ wuda nya te akũ a, ɔhaĩ a nɛ́ ɛkpa be.”
40004017	Kito lɔkɔ a na, Yesu yi lɛtsã kade kayɔ kĩ, “Midani mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a fuã!”
40004018	Kĩ Yesu tsɛ̃ Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ abuĩ yanaa a, ɛmɔ́ bawaɛ̃nyole nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ kɔfɔabi banyɛnɛ. Ade be nyɛ Simon kĩ bavɛ Petro mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Andrea, kĩ bɛkata tɛsau nɛ lutubu baũ a kamɛ.
40004019	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyatomɔ yĩ lɔkɔa maakɛna mi bati banyɛnɛ.”
40004020	Nɛ awã naa, bɛfɔnɛ be tɛsau awɛ bitomɔ ye.
40004021	Yesu naa lɔtɔ ade ɛmɔ bawaɛ̃nyole nviã bɛbã, Yakobo mɔ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi. Bɛna nɛ be ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bɛmɔ ɔlɛga Zebedeo bɛkalɔla be tɛsau. Yesu vɛ be,
40004022	ade lɛtalɛta bɛfɔnɛ ɔkɔlɔ a mɔ be ɔlɛga awɛ biyi, bitomɔ ye a.
40004023	Yesu tsã emini nɛ Galilea tite flee akũ ɛkatsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a. Ede lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ akũ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ, ade ɛtsa fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ flee a.
40004024	Ye akũ fɔlɛtsa gba nɛ Siria tite flee akũ, foesũ bati kpã be a kĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ a bɛma ye, bati kĩ bideĩ nɛ fɔsɔ mɔ ɔhau kamɛ, bikĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ, bikĩ odetɔ fɔsɔ kaha be, mɔ abafã amɛ, ade Yesu tsa be flee a.
40004025	Bati kɔdabu baũ kĩ bito Galilea tite akũ, mɔ Tɛmatɔ Ewua kamɛ, Yerusalem ɔmatɔ, Yudea tite akũ mɔ Yordan ɔwɔ liti tite akũ a yatomɔ ye.
40005001	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ bati kɔdabu a, ede ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ ɛnakɛna akũ edzi. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yakpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
40005002	Ade edo be fɔtsa katsa awɛ kĩ,
40005003	“Baguma hila bikĩ binyina kĩ bɛnyɛ ahiãfɔ nɛ Baguma anɛ a, kitonɛkĩ be la Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
40005004	Baguma hila bikĩ babe kɔnya a, kitonɛkĩ Baguma aadɔla be tɔwɔlɛ.
40005005	Baguma hila bikĩ bɛdɔla be akũ a, kitonɛkĩ ade be aanya tite akũ adzapadiɛ a.
40005006	Baguma hila bikĩ Baguma kawɛ akũ kakɛna kɔlɛ mɔ ɔmɔado akɔ be a, kitonɛkĩ Baguma aafɔ̃ biwĩ!
40005007	Baguma hila bikĩ bamɔ bati kɔnya a, kitonɛkĩ ade be Baguma aamɔ kɔnya a!
40005008	Baguma hila bikĩ be tɔwɔlɛ teĩ nɛ ye odi akũ, kitonɛkĩ ade be aamɔ Baguma a!
40005009	Baguma hila bikĩ bakɛna lukudɔ nɛ bati kayite, kitonɛkĩ Baguma aavɛ be kĩ ye babi!
40005010	Baguma hila bikĩ batomɔ be liti, nɛ ye kawɛ akũ kakɛna sũ a, kitonɛkĩ be la Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a!
40005011	“Baguma hila mi ntɛ bati avũna mi, katomɔ mi liti, kalɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ mi akũ, nɛ yĩ sũ.
40005012	Mimɔ kawɔlɛ, mitu osee, kitonɛkĩ mideĩ kɔtɔkase kpale nɛ ode. Ade ayea bitomɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ bɛnya mi lɔtɔ a liti a.
40005013	“Mila ndɛ lɛdɛmɛ mikpa batidziwa flee. Lɛmɛ ntɛ lɛdɛmɛ yɛla de ɔmɛnɛ ni, osi odima lɛláa kĩ baatsã bibuki bido de ɔmɛnɛ. Lɛdani fɔtsa pupulidza foesũ bata de kawula lɔkɔa bati asumini de.
40005014	“Mila ndɛ ɔhaĩ mikpa batidziwa flee. Bɛláapuli bɛkɔla ɔmatɔ kĩ bitsua nɛ ɔtɔ akũ.
40005015	Odima látɛna ɔsɛdza kakɔa lɔɔda katsa ye, mbom yakɔa ye kate nɛ ɔsɛdza otse akũ nɛ awã kĩ yaakpalɛ fɔkɔ ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ.
40005016	Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ mi ɔsɛdza ɛtɛ̃ nɛ bati anɛ, ayekĩ baamɔ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ miakɛna a, lɔkɔa bimu mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a.”
40005017	Ade Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitakɔna kĩ ĩya kĩ mayaafɔnɛ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔtsa katsa a awɛ. Ntáya kĩ mayaafɔnɛ foe awɛ, mbom ĩya kĩ mayaakɛna foe fɔkpɔla.
40005018	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ayekĩ tite mɔ ode táwɔ tɔ̃ kĩĩ ni, bɛláafɔnɛ katsɛlɛ kabii ĩye ke akũ lɛtsa kabii nɛ mbla a kamɛ awɛ, mbɔɛntɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ya nɛ foe kamɛ.
40005019	Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaafum mbla kabii adi, ɛtsa bati bɛbã lɛmɛ bɛkɛna lɔmɔ ni, yaanya obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a akũ, mɔ ɛtsa bati bɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ bɛkɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, yaanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
40005020	Foesũ mabi mi kĩ míapuli miwo nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a, ntɛ miakɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ kaba mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ a.
40005021	“Minu kĩ kɔkɔɛ a, bibi bati kĩ, ‘Takɔ oti, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ edi awu ni, baadzɛmɔ ye.’
40005022	Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛna kalɔkpa nɛ ɔwaɛ̃ akũ ni, baadzɛmɔ ye. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛvɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔasia’ ni, baakpã ye bɛnamɛna nɛ Ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ bɛdzɛmɔ ye, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛvɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘ɔyaɛ’ ni, ɛfɛta ɛkpa ode fi luwotu a kamɛ kanaa.
40005023	Foesũ ntɛ ɔwɛ kĩ akɔa nɔ afɔlibɔ fɔtsa ɔnaate nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ akũ ɔkpa Baguma, mɔ ote anɛ kĩ awaɛ̃ nɛɛ nɔ kalɔɛ ni,
40005024	fɔnɛ nɔ afɔliɛ fɔtsa a awɛ kayi nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a lɔtɔ nɛ awã, kamuniki kanaalɔla mi mɔ ye kayite tɔ̃ fɔmɔ ayakɔa nɔ afɔliɛ fɔtsa ɔkpa Baguma.
40005025	“Ntɛ odi sama nɔ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ ni, bɔa mbɔdi milɔla mi kayite nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ lideĩ fɔmɔ baavɛ kalɛ a. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye mɔ miwo fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a, oti a aakɔa nɔ edo nɛ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ awɛ. Fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ a lɛmɛ aakɔa nɔ ɛkpa polisifɔ ade baado nɔ nɛ kɔla a.
40005026	Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ade awã aana flee kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ose kɔtɔ a flee oyua a.
40005027	“Minu kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Batsɔ̃ mɔ banyɔ bɛtanɛ bakɔba liti.’
40005028	Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔ́ otsole, mɔ ɛkɔ ye odo ni, ɛwɛ ye kɔkɔɛ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
40005029	Foesũ ntɛ nɔ sɔmɔna linebi afɔ̃ akɛna tɔkpa ni, bɔlɛ de kata kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ ayɛla nɔ sukɛna kakɔ kadi kɛba kĩ baata nɔ oti mɔa bido nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ kamɛ.
40005030	Ntɛ nɔ sɔmɔna kɔkpɔ afɔ̃ akɛna tɔkpa ni, tsua koe kata kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ ayɛla nɔ kɔkpɔ mɔa kɛba kĩ bɛta nɔ oti mɔa a flee bido nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ a kamɛ.
40005031	“Bɛlɛ lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaasĩ ɔtsɔ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkpa ye kɔtsɔ̃ kasĩ ovoli.’
40005032	Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ ntɛ onyole odi sĩ ɔtsɔ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa bɛbã akũ kɛba kĩ nnɛ́ ye liti kanɛ sũ ni, onyole a fɔ̃ otsole a bɔa adɔpaa ntɛ ebuki ɛnadzi kɔnyɔ bɛbã. Ade ayea onyole bɛbã a kĩ yaakɔã ye a lɛmɛ bɔa adɔpaa a.
40005033	“Minu lɛmɛ kĩ bibi kɔkɔɛ bati a kĩ, ‘Mitatu mi fubo, mbom mikɛna nɛ fubo a kĩ milɔ mikpa boe Ɔlate a akũ.’
40005034	Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ mitalɔ fubo ntɛ miakɛna nhihiɛ adi. Mitatani ode, kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkpo yanɛ.
40005035	Mitatani tite kitonɛkĩ Baguma abɔa kakekɔ̃ tanɛ ĩye mitani Yerusalem, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ Lɛgã Kpale a ɔmatɔ.
40005036	Tatani nɔ lɔlɔ malo, kitonɛkĩ ɔláapuli ɔdani sɔlɔ mɔapɛ malo sɛkɛna suwovoe ĩye sɔwɔwa.
40005037	Mikɔ̃ milɛ kĩ, ‘Oo,’ ĩye ‘Oowo.’ Kalɛ bɛbã kĩ mialɛ nɛ kakĩĩ liti to Oti Kpa a sɛkɛ̃.
40005038	“Minu kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Linebi nɛ linebi kadokɔ̃, lɔdɔ̃ nɛ lɔdɔ̃ kadokɔ̃.’
40005039	Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ mitakɛna tɔkpa mise tɔkpa kɔtɔ. Ntɛ odi balɛ nɔ awɛ nɛ sɔmɔna ɔlɔtɔ ni, fɔ̃ ɛbalɛ nɔ nɛ sɛba ɔlɔtɔ lɛmɛ.
40005040	Ade ntɛ odi sama nɔ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ kĩ yatɛ nɔ atadiɛ anyanglede ni, fɔ̃ ɛtɛ nɔ atadiɛ wulaa a lɛmɛ.
40005041	Ntɛ oti kĩ edeĩ otumi hɛ nɔ kĩ lɔ ye fɔtsa mɔ kuvũ mitsã lisikũ mɔa ni, lɔ foe mitsã fusikũ nviã.
40005042	Ntɛ odi wã nɔ litsedi ni, kpa ye, ntɛ odi wɛ kĩ yavɛ litsedi nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ ni, kpa ye ɛvɛ.
40005043	“Minu kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ, kakesĩ nɔ bakesĩnɛ.’
40005044	Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ miwɛ mi bakesĩnɛ kalɛ ade mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ bikĩ bitomɔ mi liti a lɔlɔ,
40005045	ayekĩ míadani boe Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a babi. Kitonɛkĩ ye afɔ̃ suwa ata kakpa bati wĩ mɔ bati kpa flee, ade yafɔ̃ oni ako kakpa bati kĩ badã kpĩĩ mɔ bikĩ baádã kpĩĩ a flee a.
40005046	Ntɛ miawɛ bikĩ bawɛ mi kalɛ odi a, kɔtɔkase kɔɔdabe míana? Tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ malo akɛna foe lɔmɔ!
40005047	Ade ntɛ mi bakɔba odi miado onukpɛ̃ ni, litsa mitɛnɛ kakɛna? Amamufɔ malo akɛna foe lɔmɔ!
40005048	Foesũ midã kĩ mikpɔla ndɛ ayekĩ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ kpɔla a.
40006001	“Midã kadã wĩ kĩ miláakɛna mi ɔsum fɔtsa a nɛ kanade anɛ ayekĩ bati aamɔ lɛtsa a kĩ miakɛna a. Ntɛ mikɛna foe nɛ bati anɛ ni, miláana kɔtɔkase mitomɛna mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a sɛkɛ̃.
40006002	Foesũ ntɛ ote ohiãni fɔtsa ni, tade lɛtsã nɛ foe akũ ndɛ ayekĩ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ a akɛna nɛ be fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ mɔ tɔblɔnu anɛ a. Bakɛna foe ayekĩ bati aamu be. Mabi mi pefee kĩ bɛtɛ be kɔtɔkase a flee kɔkɔɛ.
40006003	Foesũ nɔ kɔ̃ ntɛ akɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɔkpa ohiãni ni, tafɔ̃ nɔ ɔkɔba paa malo linyi lɛtsama nɛ foe akũ.
40006004	Foesũ nɔ futetsa a fɔna nɛ kabɛla kamɛ, lɔkɔa nɔ Ɔlɛga a kĩ yamɔ fɔtsa nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a, aase nɔ foe kɔtɔ.
40006005	“Ntɛ miabɔa mpaɛ ni, mitakɛna ndɛ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ a aye. Bawɛ kayidza kadza kabɔa mpaɛ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ mɔ tɔblɔnu fɔbalikɔ̃ ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi aamɔ be. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ bɛtɛ be kɔtɔkase a lodo kɔkɔɛ.
40006006	Lɛmɛ ntɛ abɔa mpaɛ ni, wo nɛ nɔ kɔla kamɛ, kabalɛ kɔla a lɔkɔa kabɔa mpaɛ kakpa nɔ Ɔlɛga a kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a, lɔkɔa Aga a kĩ yamɔ fɔtsa a kĩ akɛna nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a aase nɔ kɔtɔ.
40006007	“Ntɛ miabɔa mpaɛ ni, mitalɛ fɔlɛtsa beblebee kĩ fɔlá kayɔ ndɛ ayekĩ amamufɔ akɛna a. Be bakɔna kĩ ntɛ be mpaɛbɔ deĩ lugo a mɔ Baguma aatse be.
40006008	Mitakɛna mi akũ ndɛ be, kitonɛkĩ mi Ɔlɛga nyina lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ mi kɔkɔɛ fɔmɔ miavia ye malo.
40006009	Foesũ mibɔa mpaɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlɛga kĩ edeĩ nɛ ode, nɔ dĩ akũ lɛkpalɛ.
40006010	Nɔ lɛgãkanya lɛya. Bɛkɛna nɔ kawɛ nɛ tite akũ, ndɛ ayekĩ bakɛna nɛ ode a.
40006011	Kpa boe daa funitsã a kĩ busĩ nviã a.
40006012	Kɔa boe tɔkpa a kĩ bɔkɛna a kate boe, ndɛ ayekĩ bɔakɔa kate bikĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa nɛ boe akũ a.
40006013	Takpã boe ɔnamɛna sɔhuiɛ kamɛ, mbom nyɛ boe katomɛna Oti kpa a awɛ. Fɔya lɔmɔ.’
40006014	“Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mikɔa bati tɔkpa a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ mi akũ mite be ni, mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ aakɔa mi tide a ete mi.
40006015	Lɛmɛ ntɛ mitákɔa bati tɔkpa mite be ni, mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ lɛláakɔa mi tɔkpa a ete mi.
40006016	“Ntɛ miasui onukpɛ̃ ni, mitakɛna anɛ kamɛ kusuu ndɛ ayekĩ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ akɛna a. Bakɛna anɛ kamɛ kusuu ayekĩ bati aamɔ kĩ basui onukpɛ̃. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ bɛtɛ be kɔtɔkase a flee kɔkɔɛ.
40006017	Ntɛ asui onukpɛ̃ ni, vɔlɛ anɛ, do kugua nɛ lɔlɔ kamɛ kasɛla tɔlɔ,
40006018	ayekĩ bati bɛbã lɛláanyi kĩ asui onukpɛ̃. Nɔ Ɔlɛga a, kĩ baámɔ mɔ anɛ a odi aanyi, ade Ɔlɛga a kĩ yamɔ fɔtsa nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a aase nɔ foe kɔtɔ a.
40006019	“Mitawɛ akũ kana fɔtsa miyi akũ nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ, awã kĩ fupuka mɔ nkandɔlɔ aabula foe kade, ade bayekpanɛ lɛmɛ abubuli kɔla kawo kaye foe a.
40006020	Mbom miwɛ akũ kana fɔtsa miyi akũ nɛ ode, awã kĩ fupuka mɔ nkandɔlɔ lɛláabula foe kade, ade bayekpanɛ lɛmɛ lɛláapuli bubuli biwo biye foe a.
40006021	Kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ nɔ fɔtsa mɔ kɔya deĩ ni, ade awã nɔ ɔwɔlɛ lɛmɛ deĩ a.
40006022	“Otidziwa banebi nyɛ ye ɔsɛdza. Ntɛ nɔ banebi amɔ kamɔ wĩ ni, nɔ oti mɔawɛ a flee aana nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ.
40006023	Lɛmɛ ntɛ nɔ banebi lɛnɛ́nɛ ni, nɔ oti mɔawɛ a aana nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ. Foesũ ntɛ ɔhaĩ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a nyɛ ɔtũ ni, nɔ oti mɔawɛ kamɛ aake ɔtũ paa.
40006024	“Odima lɛláapuli esum balate nviã, kitonɛkĩ yaakesĩ ɔmɔa lɔkɔa ɛwɛ ɔyade a kalɛ, ĩye yaakɔa akũ ɛmɛnamɔ ɔmɔa esupa ɔyade a. Ɔnɔkɔali nyɛ kĩ ɔláapuli osum Baguma mɔ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa.
40006025	Ade foesũ mabi mi kĩ mitaha akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míanya, mimɔa midzi nkpã akũ, ĩye tilima a kĩ míasua akũ ĩye midzi a akũ. Mbɔɛɛ nkpã tátɛ kɔya ɛba funitsã, ĩye mbɔɛɛ oti mɔawɛ a tátɛ kɔya ɛba tilima mɔ tɛtadiɛ?
40006026	Midã kɔvɔlabi, kɔádu funitsã, kɔákpɔta funitsã kako nɛ tili kamɛ, lɛmɛ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a adɔɔla koe! Mbɔɛɛ mitátɛ kɔya miba kɔvɔlabi?
40006027	Mi kamɛ owei aapuli ɛkɔa luwi mɔa ete nɛ ye nkpã fuwi akũ ntɛ eti ɛha ye akũ bo aye malo?
40006028	“Lɔkɔa nde sũ miaha akũ nɛ tilima mɔ tɛtadiɛ akũ? Midã ayekĩ lupo kamɛ futse ako nhuilɛ kabo anɛ, fɔákɛna adzuma, fɔátaɛ tileti kanɔ tilima kakpa akũ.
40006029	Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ Lɛgã Salomo mɔ ye akũ kana fɔtsa a flee malo táhɛhɛ fɔlɛ kadã ndɛ nhuilɛ kĩĩ kamɛ amɔa.
40006030	Ntɛ Baguma kɛɛlɛ lupo kamɛ tuwĩ lɔmɔ, kĩ tideĩ nkpã nviã, ade kunya tiku, bipila te nɛ luwotu kamɛ a ni, ɛláakɛɛlɛ mi ɛba te? Mi katɛkado adã kabii paa!
40006031	“Foesũ mitakaha akũ mikalɛ kĩ, ‘Litsa bɔ́anya, litsa bɔ́amɔa ĩye litsa bɔ́asua akũ?’
40006032	Ade fukĩĩ bamɛ liti amamufɔ atomɛna a. Mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a nyina kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee sĩ mi.
40006033	Mifɔ̃ anɛ ɛyɔɔlɛ mi ɛba nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a liti katomɛna mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛwɛ etomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩ mikɛna a akũ, lɔkɔa yaakɔa fɔtsa bɛbã kĩĩ flee ebu ɛkpa mi.
40006034	Foesũ mitaha akũ nɛ kunya akũ, kunya luwi a aana de mɔawɛ ɔhau. Luwi nyɛ luwi kamɛ ɔhau pɔnɛ ɛkpa de.
40007001	“Mitadzɛmɔ bati bɛbã fɔfɔ̃ Baguma lɛmɛ lɛdzɛmɔ mi,
40007002	kitonɛkĩ ayekĩ midzɛmɔ bati bɛbã a, ade aye Baguma lɛmɛ aadzɛmɔ mi a, ade mbla a kĩ mikɔa midzɛmɔ bati bɛbã a, ye mɔapɛ a yakɔa ɛdzɛmɔ mi malo a.
40007003	“Nde sũ adã sukuluku kĩ sideĩ nɛ awaɛ̃ linebi kamɛ lɛmɛ aámɔ luvokũ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ linebi kamɛ a?
40007004	Nde aapuli obi awaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘Make nɔ aduli, fɔ̃ ĩnyɛ sukuluku nɛ nɔ linebi kamɛ’ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ luvokũ deĩ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ linebi kamɛ a?
40007005	Nɔ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa ɔkɛnanɛ! Nya lɔtɔ kanyɛ luvokũ a nɛ nɔ linebi kamɛ lɔkɔa aapuli ɔmɔ́ yededeede ɔnyɛ sukuluku nɛ awaɛ̃ linebi kamɛ a.
40007006	“Mitakɔa fɔtsa a kĩ foe akũ kpalɛ mikpa bakpete, baadani bɛyaadɔ̃ mi. Mitata mi fulitsa kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya miko baplakuo, kitonɛkĩ baasumini foe bibula kade.
40007007	“Mivia fɔtsa lɔkɔa baakpa mi, miwɛ fɔtsa lɔkɔa míamɔ foe, mibɔa opunu lɔkɔa baabinya bɛkpa mi.
40007008	Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwã fɔtsa ni, yana foe. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwɛ litsedi ni, yaamɔ de, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yabɔa opunu ni, baabinya bɛkpa ye.
40007009	“Mi kamɛ obilɛga ɔɔdabe deĩ kĩ ntɛ obi via ye abodoo ni, yaabɔɛ de edo nɛ ye awɛ?
40007010	Ĩye ntɛ evia ye kafɔabi kĩ yaakɔa kɔɛ ɛkpa ye?
40007011	Ntɛ mi a kĩ minyɛ bati kpa a, minyina ayekĩ miate mi babi fɔtsa wĩ a ni, titi eni mɔ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode lɛláakɔa ye fɔtsa wĩ pii ɛkpa bikĩ bavia ye a?
40007012	Foesũ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ kĩ bati bɛbã bɛkɛna bɛkpa mi ni, mi malo mikɛna foe lɔmɔ mikpa be. Ade fukĩĩ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a atsa a.
40007013	“Mitsã onyukpɛ̃ manɛwa a kamɛ miwo, kitonɛkĩ onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ ɛsa a mɔ osi a kĩ ɛdzɛlɛ a anaa kawɔ kamɛ, ye akũ katsã lɛlá ɔsĩ, ade bati pii lɛmɛ tsɛ̃ ye akũ a.
40007014	Lɛmɛ onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ yanaa nkpã kamɛ a manɛ, ade osi a kĩ ɛwaa ɛnaa a awã akũ katsã deĩ ɔsĩ, ade bati sukuloo lɛmɔ ye a.
40007015	“Midã mi akũ kadã wĩ nɛ fɔvã tunukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ. Baya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ miamɔ ndɛ baveli aye, lɛmɛ nɛ be kamɛkamɛ ni, bɛla ndɛ kulikii kĩ kude adɔ̃.
40007016	Míakɔa be fɔkɛnatsa minyi be. Ɔgɔabi láwũ akutu, ade ɔtatsuɛ láwũ asãã babi a.
40007017	Kutse wĩ awũ babi wĩ, ade kutse kpa lɛmɛ awũ babi kpa a.
40007018	Kutse wĩ lɛláapuli kuwũ babi kpa, ade ayea kutse kpa lɛmɛ lɛláapuli kuwũ babi wĩ a.
40007019	Lɛmɛ kutse nyɛ kutse kĩ kɔáwũ babi wĩ ni, batsua koe kata kado nɛ fi kamɛ.
40007020	Foesũ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a fɔkɛlatsa míakɔa minyi be.
40007021	“Nnɛ́ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yavɛ yĩ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate! Boe Ɔlate!’ aanaa ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ, mbɔɛntɛ bikĩ bakɛna nɛ Nda kawɛ akũ a odi aanaa awã.
40007022	Ntɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a wo ɔtɔ a, bati pii aavɛ yĩ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate! Boe Ɔlate! Nnɛ́ nɔ dĩ akũ bɔlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa, bɔblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa butomɛna bati kamɛ, ade bɔkɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii lɛmɛ a?’
40007023	Ade awã mɔ maabi be kĩ, ‘Ĩnyína mi koũ. Midzakũ nɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ, mi tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ!’
40007024	“Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse yĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mɔ ɛkɛna nɛ foe akũ ni, ɛla ndɛ ɔnyansãni kĩ eke ye kɔla nɛ de mɔ ɔsĩ akũ.
40007025	Oni kpale ko, ade tɔwɔ yili, ɔwɛ vũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ɛyabɔa kɔla a, lɛmɛ kɔtáveli, kitonɛkĩ bike koe nɛ de mɔ ɔsĩ akũ.
40007026	Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse yĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mɔ yaákɛna nɛ foe akũ ni, ɛla ndɛ odzimbifɔ kĩ eke ye kɔla nɛ dã kamɛ.
40007027	Oni kpale ko, tɔwɔ yili ade ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ vũ ɛyabɔa kɔla ade kuveli, kɔtɔ gbloo, kububuli a!”
40007028	Kĩ Yesu yua fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kalɛ a, akũ dzuli bati kɔdabu a nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
40007029	Kitonɛkĩ ɛtsa fɔtsa ndɛ oti kĩ edeĩ otumi, kĩ fɔtána ndɛ mbla batsanɛ a fude.
40008001	Kĩ Yesu ka eto katɔbii a akũ yaya a, bati kɔdabu kɔdabu pii tomɔ ye.
40008002	Ade awã mɔ onyole odi kĩ yasɔ fɔsɔ ngbã, kĩ bati avila a, yake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ, ebi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ fɔnyɛ nɔ kawɛ ni, aapuli ɔfɔ̃ fɔsɔ kĩĩ lɛwɔ nɛ yĩ akũ.”
40008003	Yesu yo awɛ ɛta ye ade ebi ye kĩ, “Mawɛ lɔmɔ. Nɔ akũ ɛkpalɛ.” Ade lɛtalɛta fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ ye akũ a.
40008004	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tse! Tabi odima kadima, mbom dã osi kpĩĩ kanaa ɔsɔfɔ sɛkɛ̃, kafɔ̃ ɛsɛla nɔ akũ ɛdã, lɔkɔa kabɔa afɔliɛ a kĩ Mose mbla tsa a, fɔfɔ̃ odi nyɛ odi enyi kĩ ɔsaɛ.”
40008005	Ke liti a, kĩ Yesu wo nɛ Kapernaum ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, Roma sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi yake ye aduli kĩ,
40008006	“Boe Ɔlate, yĩ ɔsumunɛ waa nɛ kɔla yasɔ, yaápuli ekuna akũ, ade ɛlamɔ lubo kamɔ paa a.”
40008007	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Maaya ĩyaatsa ye.”
40008008	Lɛmɛ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntákpɔla kĩ awo nɛ yĩ tɔtɔ kamɛ. Nɔ kɔ̃ lɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ lɔkɔa yĩ ɔsumunɛ a aasaɛ.
40008009	Yĩ malo ĩnyɛ oti kĩ ndeĩ nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ kayɔ, ade ndeĩ sodzafɔ nɛ yĩ malo kayɔ a. Ntɛ mbi be kamɛ odi kĩ, ‘Naa’ ni, yanaa, ade ntɛ mbi ɔbɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Ya’ ni, yaya. Ntɛ mbi yĩ ɔsumunɛ lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Kɛna fukĩĩ’ ni, yakɛna foe.”
40008010	Kĩ Yesu nu fukĩĩ a, fɔkɛna ye wãwã, ade ebi bati a kĩ bitomɔ ye a kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali mabi mi kĩ ntámɔ odima nɛ Israel kĩ edeĩ katɛkado kĩĩ odu.
40008011	Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ bati pii aato suwa kadekɔ̃ mɔ suwa katomukɔ̃ bɛyaadzi nɛ opunu akũ mɔ Abraham, mɔ Isak mɔ Yakob nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
40008012	Lɛmɛ Baguma aata bikĩ be mbom la lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ewula nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, awã kĩ baabe, bɛba adɔ̃.”
40008013	Ke liti a, Yesu bi sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ, “Naa kɔla! Fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔtɛ odo a.” Ade ye ɔsumunɛ a saɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a na pɛpɛɛpɛ kamɛ a.
40008014	Kĩ Yesu naa Petro tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ɛmɔ kĩ Petro nyina waa nɛ ɔkɛna akũ yasɔ atilili.
40008015	Yesu pi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ ade lɛtalɛta atilili a dɔ ye, eyidza ete opunu ɛkpa ye a.
40008016	Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, bati kpã bikĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a bɛma Yesu. Ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a etomɛna be kamɛ mɔ kalɛ mɔapɛ, ade ɛtsa basɔnɛ a flee lɛmɛ a.
40008017	Fukĩ ɛkɛna kĩĩ ya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ eyi kĩ, “Ye mɔawɛ lɛkɔa boe lubo kamɔ, mɔ fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ ete nɛ ye akũ!”
40008018	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ bati kɔdabu pii a kĩ kusinya ye a, ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛfɔ̃ binyina bɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a liti.
40008019	Ade mbla batsanɛ a kamɛ odi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛyabi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, maatomɔ nɔ nnaa kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ aanaa.”
40008020	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kulikii deĩ fudzikɔ̃, kɔvɔlabi lɛmɛ deĩ fɔtsɔɛ, lɛmɛ Otidziwa Obi a lɛlá awã kĩ yate lɔlɔ malo.”
40008021	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa lɛmɛ bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, maatomɔ nɔ, lɛmɛ fɔ̃ nnaabila nda tɔ̃.”
40008022	Ade Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ. Fɔnɛ bikĩ bidzi nkpã ndɛ kaku biku a awɛ bibila be mɔawɛ banɔkpa.”
40008023	Yesu wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ odi kamɛ ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tomɔ ye a.
40008024	Lɛtalɛta ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ odi do kavũ awɛ nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a akũ, kabɔa mui kako nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, kĩ fɔfɔ̃ kite sukuloo ɔkɔlɔ a adoomu, lɛmɛ Yesu kɔ̃ waa tida.
40008025	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nadzɛla ye, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tɛ boe o-o! Buku buyua!”
40008026	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nde sũ libe wo mi lɔmɔ? Mi katɛkado lɛpɔ́nɛ kɔlaa!” Adeke eyidza ɛdza, ewũni nɛ mui mɔ ɔwɛ a akũ kĩ bɛkɛna dĩĩ, ade awã flee kɛna dĩĩ a.
40008027	Odi nyɛ odi kɛna saa, ade bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Oti ɔdabe odu nyɛ okĩĩ? Ɔwɛ mɔ mui malo atse ye ɔlɛdo!”
40008028	Kĩ Yesu nawo Gadara tite akũ nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ liti a, bati nviã kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ be kamɛ nɛ́ bito fɔkɛ kĩ babila banɔkpa kamɛ bɛyatsɛlamɔ ye. Ayekĩ be akũ deĩ libe sũ ni, odima lapuli katsã awã osi a katɛ̃.
40008029	Ade lɛtalɛta bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Nɔ Baguma Obi, litsa deĩ nɛ bɔmɔ nɔ kayite? Kaya ɔya kĩ ayaakɛna boe tɛnya fɔmɔ lɔkɔ wĩ a aawo ɔtɔ mbɔɛɛ?”
40008030	Awã fuã kakɔ a kĩ baplakuo kɔdabu baũ kudi dza kɔkadɛ a.
40008031	Hũhũ kpa a ke Yesu aduli kĩ, “Ntɛ aablɔmɛna boe ni, fɔ̃ bɔnaawo nɛ baplakuo kɔdabu nɛ akĩĩ a kamɛ.”
40008032	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minɛ minaa.” Foesũ bɛnɛ bɛnawo nɛ baplakuo a kamɛ. Ade baplakuo kɔdabu a flee wula atsɛ kliklikli bɛka lɔwɔtuni geĩ a biwo nɛ lutubu a kamɛ, bɛmɔa mui biku a.
40008033	Bayaɛ akũ badãmɛnanɛ a lo bɛnaa ɔmatɔ kamɛ bɛnalɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya a flee nɛ banyole nviã a kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ be kamɛ a akũ.
40008034	Foesũ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bati flee nɛ́ kĩ banaadã Yesu, ade kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a, bike ye aduli kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be tite akũ ɛnaa.
40009001	Yesu de ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ emuniki ɛtsã mui a anɛ ɛnaa ye awɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ.
40009002	Nɛ awã a, bati badi bɔɛ oti odi kĩ eveliveli bɛwɔla nɛ ɔkɛna akũ bɛma ye. Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ be katɛkado a, ebi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ, “Yĩ obi, nɔ ɔwɔlɛ ɛka edzi! Nkɔa nɔ titikpa nte nɔ.”
40009003	Adeke Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi bi be akũ kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ alɛ fubusuotsa!”
40009004	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkakɔna a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ miakɔna tɔkpa nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ?
40009005	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ fɔɔdabe lɛ́la ɔsĩ mɔ kalɛ, ‘Nkɔa nɔ titikpa nte nɔ,’ mbɔɛɛ kĩ, ‘Yidza katsã’?
40009006	Lɛmɛ kĩ míanyi kĩ yĩ Otidziwa Obi, ndeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ makɔa bati titikpa kate nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ sũ ni, midã o-o!” Foesũ ebi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ, “Yidza kadza, bɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna kanaa nɔ awã!”
40009007	Onyole a yidza ɛdza, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa ye awã.
40009008	Kĩ bati a mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, libe wo be ade bimu Baguma nɛ ayekĩ ɛkɔa kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ odu ɛkpa batidziwa.
40009009	Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã, ade kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yanaa a, ɛmɔ́ ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Mateo kĩ edzi nɛ ye ɔgɔlɛ katekɔ̃. Ebi ye kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.” Ade Mateo yidza etomɔ Yesu a.
40009010	Kĩ Yesu kanya nɛ Mateo awã a, tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ pii mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bɛbã yadzi nɛ opunu akũ, bibumɔ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛnya.
40009011	Farisifɔ a badi mɔ́ foe ade bivia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nde sũ mianya kamɔa mɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ?”
40009012	Yesu nu lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ a, ade ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Basɔnɛ lisĩ bɛkpa tutsonu ɔkɛnanɛ, nnɛ́ bikĩ bideĩ akũ ɔsĩ.
40009013	Minaawɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kalɛ kĩĩ kayɔ, ‘Sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna mawɛ, nnɛ́ bayaɛ afɔliɛ kabɔa mawɛ.’ Ntáya kĩ mayaavɛ bikĩ badã kpĩĩ, mbom ĩya kĩ maavɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ.”
40009014	Ke liti a, Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ bɔmɔ Farisifɔ bɔawɛ onukpɛ̃ kasui, lɛmɛ nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɔ̃ lásui onukpɛ̃ koũ?”
40009015	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kakɔna miakɔna kĩ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ bakɔba aadzi nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ be kamɛ a? Fɔláanya lɔmɔ. Lɛmɛ luwi a aaya kĩ baakpã obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a bɛdzakũmɛna nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ mɔ́ baasui onukpɛ̃ a.
40009016	“Odima lákɔa limakũ vɔɛ̃ kataɛ atadiɛ kɔɛ, kitonɛkĩ limakũ vɔɛ̃ a aavɛlɛ lɔkɔɛ a lɛbɛ̃, lɔkɔa ɔkɛ baũ aawa ɛba ɔkɔɛ a.
40009017	“Ade ayea odima láko waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ kɔɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ɔyaɛ kuvũ a aayili kɔbɛ̃, waĩ a liwula, ade ɔyaɛ kuvũ a lɛmɛ aabu kade a. Mbom bako waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔyaɛ kuvũ vɔɛ̃ kamɛ lɔkɔa foe atsu nviã a flee lɛláabu kade.”
40009018	Kĩ Yesu kalɛ kɔdzɛla a, Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade eke aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ, ebi ye kĩ, “Yĩ obitsole ku finyaakĩĩ, lɛmɛ yaate awɛ nɛ ye akũ ayekĩ yaanyinya.”
40009019	Ade Yesu yidza bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bitomɔ ye bɛnaa a.
40009020	Otsole odi kĩ babɔanɛ kawula ye futeli ewua-nviã flee natsã Yesu liti, ɛta ye atadiɛ sɔtɔbi.
40009021	Ɛlɛ nɛ ye lɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nsila nta ye atadiɛ odi pɛ, maasaɛ.”
40009022	Kĩ Yesu dani ɛmɔ́ otsole a, ebi ye kĩ, “Yĩ obi, nɔ ɔwɔlɛ ɛka edzi. Nɔ katɛkado tsa nɔ.” Otsole a akũ de ɔsĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na pɛpɛɛpɛ kamɛ.
40009023	Ke liti a, Yesu tomɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a biwo nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ. Kĩ ɛmɔ́ tukutɔnɔ basãnɛ mɔ bati beblebee a kĩ bɛlamɛna kabe yoo a,
40009024	ebi be kĩ, “Mi flee minɛ, kabisɛ̃ɛ̃tsole a táku, mbom tida kɛwaa!” Ade bati a flee mɛmɛ ye a.
40009025	Kĩ bɛblɔmɛna bati a bɛnɛmɛna a, Yesu wo nɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Epi ke nɛ kɔkpɔ ade kinyinya kiyidza kɛdza a.
40009026	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ tite a na akũ flee.
40009027	Kĩ Yesu to awã yanaa a, banɛkunɛ nviã badi tomɔ ye nɛ liti bɛkabɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Dawid obi, mɔ boe kɔnya!”
40009028	Kĩ Yesu wo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ a, banɛkunɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade evia be kĩ, “Mitɛ mido kĩ maapuli ntsa mi?” Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, boe Ɔlate!”
40009029	Foesũ Yesu kɔa awɛ ɛta be banebi ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ mitɛ mido a.”
40009030	Ade be anɛ binya bɛmɔ́ fɔkɔ a. Yesu si be mbla mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ, “Mitabi odima fukĩĩ!”
40009031	Lɛmɛ bɛdzakũ nɛ awã bɛnagbamɛna fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Yesu akũ nɛ tite a amantam a flee kamɛ.
40009032	Kĩ banyole a nɛ banaa a, bati badi kpã oti bɛbã kĩ yaápuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla, kitonɛkĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a bɛma Yesu.
40009033	Kĩ Yesu sila ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a nɛ ye kamɛ a, epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla. Fɔkɛna bati kɔdabu a wãwã, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔtámɔ tɔ̃ fukĩĩ odu nɛ Israel.”
40009034	Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ a lɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa a lɛgã lɛkpa ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛnɛɛ yablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa.”
40009035	Yesu mini nɛ tɛmatɔ mɔ tukula a kamɛ. Ɛtsa fɔtsa nɛ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a, ɛlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ ode lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a akũ, ade ɛtsa fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ lɛmɛ a.
40009036	Kĩ ɛmɔ́ bati kɔdabu a, be akũ kɔ ye kɔnya, kitonɛkĩ kipiã be, bɛlá obumɛnanɛ ade bɛgba biko ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛlá ɔkpãnɛ a.
40009037	Foesũ ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Fudutsa a kĩ baaveli a pɔnɛ, lɛmɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a lɛpɔ́nɛ.
40009038	Foesũ mike kɔba ɔlate a kĩ ye fudutsa baaveli a aduli, kĩ edo adzuma bakɛnanɛ bɛyaakpɔta foe.”
40010001	Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛkpɔta, ade ɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa bitomɛna bati kamɛ, bɛtsa fɔsɔ fudi nyɛ fudi a.
40010002	Fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a buĩ nyɛ. Ɔtɔnyade, Simon kĩ bibuki bavɛ Petro, mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Andrea, Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi,
40010003	Filipo mɔ Bartolomeo mɔ Toma, Mateo ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ a, mɔ Alfeo obi Yakobo mɔ Tadeo,
40010004	Simon kĩ epili ye kade lɔlɔ, mɔ Yuda Iskariot kĩ ye lɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa a.
40010005	Yesu do bati ewua-nviã kĩĩ fɔtɔ mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, “Mitanaa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a tite akũ ĩye miwo nɛ Samariafɔ tɛmatɔ kamɛ.
40010006	Mbom minaa Israelfɔ a kĩ bɛla ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛyɛla osi a sɛkɛ̃.
40010007	Minaade lɛtsã kĩ, ‘Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a fuã!’
40010008	Mitsa basɔnɛ, midzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã, mitsa bikĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ngbã, miblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa mitomɛna bati kamɛ. Mitɛ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ kɔa, foesũ mikɔa mikpa faa.
40010009	Mitabɔɛ sika sidima milɛ nɛ mi fuvũ kamɛ.
40010010	Odima ɛtabɔɛ ositsãnɛ kuvũ, atadiɛ ayade, mpabua ayade ĩye otse kĩ bake katsã ɛlɛ nɛ osi a akũ. Kɛfɛta kĩ bɛkpa adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ lɛtsa a kĩ esĩ a.
40010011	“Ntɛ miwo ɔmatɔ ĩye akula adi kamɛ ni, miwɛ oti odi kĩ yaatunɔ ɛtɛ mi, lɔkɔa mise nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, mina nɛ awã kɛnaawo kĩ míadzakũ.
40010012	Ntɛ miwo nɛ tɔtɔ tidi kamɛ ni, miwɔ̃na te kamɛ bati a kĩ, ‘Lukudɔ lɛna nɛ mi akũ.’
40010013	Ntɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ bati a tɛ mi mɔ kawɔlɛ ni, mifɔ̃ mi lukudɔ kawɔ̃na a kɛkahɔ nɛ be akũ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛtátɛ mi ni, mifɔ̃ mi lukudɔ kawɔ̃na a kimuniki kɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
40010014	Awã kĩ bati tátɛ mi ni, minɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔa miyɔ mi abɔa akũ kudu miko be.
40010015	Mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ a, Baguma aamɔ Sodom mɔ Gomora bati kɔnya ɛba ɔmatɔ a na kamɛ bati.
40010016	“Midã, mado mi ndɛ baveli aye nɛ kulikii kamɛ, foesũ minyi kadi ndɛ bɔɛ aye, midɔla akũ bɔɛɛ ndɛ mblɔduma aye.
40010017	Midã mi akũ kadã wĩ, kitonɛkĩ bati aakɔa mi bido nɛ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ awɛ, ade baabo mi nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a.
40010018	Ade nɛ yĩ sũ baakpã mi bɛnamɛna ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ fɔgã anɛ, lɔkɔa fɔnya adansiɛ kĩ míadi nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ mikpa be mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
40010019	Ntɛ bɛkpã mi bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ ni, mitaha akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ mɔ ayekĩ míadzɛla a akũ. Ntɛ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ a, Baguma aakpa mi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a,
40010020	kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ mi aalɛ kɔdzɛla, mbom mi Ɔlɛga Hũhũ a aalɛ kɔdzɛla ɛtsãmɛna mi akũ.
40010021	“Bati aakɔa be mɔawɛ bawaɛ̃ bɛkpa kĩ bɛkɔ, ade balɛga lɛmɛ aakɛna foe lɔmɔ nɛ be mɔawɛ babi akũ, ade babi aayidza bɛdza nɛ be bamanɛ akũ bɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ be a.
40010022	Bati flee aakesĩ mi nɛ yĩ sũ, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ yaadza pintii kɛnaawo kawũna ni, Baguma aakpa ye nkpã.
40010023	Ntɛ bitomɔ mi liti nɛ ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ ni, milo minaa ɔbɛbã kamɛ. Mawɛ kĩ minyi kĩ miláayua adzuma kakɛna nɛ Israel tɛmatɔ a kamɛ fɔmɔ Otidziwa Obi a aaya.
40010024	“Fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ odima lɛbɛ́ ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ, ade ɔsumunɛ lɛmɛ lɛbɛ́ ye ɔlate a.
40010025	Kɛnɛ kĩ fuwĩ ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩ yayaakɛna ndɛ ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ, ade ɔsumunɛ lɛmɛ kĩ yayaakɛna ndɛ ye ɔlate a. Ntɛ bɛvɛ kɔla ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi kĩ hũhũ kpa flee lɛgã a, buĩ kpa badabe bɛláavɛ kɔla babi?
40010026	“Nɛ foe sũ mitavila bati. Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla finyaa ni, baanyɛ de kanya, ade kalɛ a kĩ bɛkɔla ni, kaanɛ binu ke.
40010027	Lɛtsa a kĩ mabi mi nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a, milɛ de nɛ suwa ketee, ade lɛtsa a kĩ minu nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a, mide ke lɛtsã nɛ kanade.
40010028	Mitavila bati a kĩ bakɔ oti sukɛna lɛmɛ bɛláapuli bɛkɔ ɔkla a, mbom mivila Baguma a kĩ yaapuli ɛwɔla oti sukɛna mɔ ye ɔkla flee nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ a.
40010029	Kaplɛ mɔapɛ miakɔa kaya funitataɛ nviã, lɛmɛ koe kamɛ kamɔapɛ malo látɔ nɛ tite kĩ fɔnyɛ́ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a kawɛ.
40010030	Mi kɔ̃ Baguma kã mi lɔlɔ tɔlɔ malo flee.
40010031	Foesũ mitavila, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ kɔya miba funitataɛ beblebee.
40010032	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaabɔa yĩ dĩ nɛ bati anɛ kĩ ye ode manɛ ni, yĩ malo maakɛna foe lɔmɔ nkpa ye nɛ Nda nɛ ode a anɛ.
40010033	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi sĩ yĩ nɛ bati anɛ ni, yĩ malo maasĩ ye nɛ Nda nɛ ode a anɛ.
40010034	“Mitakɔna kĩ lukudɔ nkɔa ĩyamɛna nɛ katinya kamɛ. Oowo, ntáya mɔ lukudɔ, mbom kɔpã nkɔa ĩyamɛna.
40010035	Ĩya kĩ makɛna ‘babinyole biyidza bɛdza nɛ balɛga akũ, babitsole liyidza bɛdza nɛ bama akũ, babi batsɔ̃ biyidza bɛdza nɛ be nyina amɛ akũ.
40010036	Oti bakesĩnɛ aanya ye mɔawɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ bati.’
40010037	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma kalɛ kaba yĩ ni, ɛtákpɔla kĩ yanya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ, ade ayea odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ ye obinyole ĩye obitsole kalɛ kaba yĩ ni, ɛtákpɔla kĩ yanya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.
40010038	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtábɔɛ ye asendua etomɔ yĩ nɛ liti ni, ɛtákpɔla kĩ yanya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.
40010039	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaayɛla ye nkpã nɛ yĩ sũ ni, yaana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
40010040	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ mi ni, ɛtɛ yĩ malo, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ ni, ɛtɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a.
40010041	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ nɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ sũ ni, yaana kɔtɔkase a kĩ Baguma aakpa ye a kamɛ. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ oti wĩ nɛ ayekĩ ɛnyɛ oti wĩ sũ ni, yaana tsɛfã nɛ kɔtɔkase a kĩ Baguma aakpa oti wĩ a odu.
40010042	Mitɛ mido kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaakpa bikĩ bitomɔ yĩ kĩĩ kamɛ obisɛ̃de mɔa mui dɔwa kɔɔpu mɔapɛ malo ni, yaana foe kɔtɔkase.”
40011001	Kĩ Yesu do ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a fɔtɔ eyua a, ɛdzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa tɛmatɔ a kĩ tifuã a kamɛ kĩ yanaatsa fɔtsa, ede lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a lɛmɛ akũ.
40011002	Kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a, kĩ ɛwaa kɔla a nu lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lamɛna kakɛna a, edo ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a badi nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃,
40011003	kĩ bɛnaavia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ oti a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaaya a, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔdã oti bɛbã anɛ?”
40011004	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mimuniki minaabi Yohanes lɛtsa a kĩ mimɔ́ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ minu a.
40011005	Banɛkunɛ mɔ́ fɔkɔ, bikĩ biveliveli yidza bɛtsɛ̃, bikĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ngbã akũ kpalɛ, batɔsĩnɛ anu fɔkɔ, bɛdzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã, ade bɛlamɛna ahiãfɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kabi a.
40011006	Baguma hila oti a kĩ ɛtámɔ nfumusu adima nɛ yĩ akũ!”
40011007	Kĩ Yohanes batɔ a dzakũ a, Yesu yi kayɔ mɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ Yohanes akũ kabi bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Kĩ minɛ minaa Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a, litsa minaadã? Kɔɔkaɛ kĩ ɔwɛ abɔa katomɛna katɛ̃mɛna mbɔɛɛ?
40011008	Litsa koũ minɛ minaadã? Oti kĩ ɛkɛɛlɛ ye akũ mɔ fɔtsa mɔ kalɛ yanɛ? Bikĩ bado tɛtadiɛ mɔ kɔya ni, fɔgã tɔtɔ kamɛ bana.
40011009	Mibi yĩ lɛtsa a sũ koũ miti minɛ a? Kĩ míamɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ mbɔɛɛ? Nuwĩ mifɔ̃ nti mbi mi, mimɔ́ oti a kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ malo.
40011010	Kitonɛkĩ Yohanes akũ mɔ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Dã, maado yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ĩnyamɛna nɔ lɔtɔ, yaalɔla osi nɛ nɔ lɔtɔ.’
40011011	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a bɛ̃ otidziwa odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi nkpã tɔ̃. Lɛmɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a bɛ̃ Yohanes.
40011012	Kito Yohanes lɛtsã kade lɔkɔ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ ni, bati yidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, bɛlamɔ mbɔdi kabɔa lɛmɛ kĩ basua de kaya osi.
40011013	Kɛyawo Yohanes kaya lɔkɔ a, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a flee mɔ Mose mbla a lɛ fɔlɛtsa biyi nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ.
40011014	Ntɛ miawɛ kĩ miatɛ be fɔlɛtsa mido kɔ̃ ni, minyi kĩ Yohanes nyɛ Eliya a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ yaanya lɔtɔ ɛya a.
40011015	Oti a kĩ edeĩ sɔtɔ kĩ sanu tuwuli ni, etse!
40011016	“Finyaa, litsa maakɔa nviã bati nkɔnamɔ? Bɛla ndɛ babisɛ̃ kĩ bikoni nɛ kɔyaatɔ bagulo. Babɔa fɔwɔla kabi be bakɔba kĩ,
40011017	‘Bɔsã obolitsɔ̃ tɔnɔ bɔkpa mi, lɛmɛ mitáto. Bɔsã tukutɔnɔ bɔkpa mi, lɛmɛ mitábe.’
40011018	Kĩ Yohanes ya a, ɛtánya ɛtámɔa waĩ, lɛmɛ bati lɛ kĩ, ‘Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ!’
40011019	Kĩ Otidziwa Obi a ya a, yanya, yamɔa, ade bati lɛ kĩ, ‘Midã ɔnyakpanɛ mɔ bavɛ ɔmɔanɛ, tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ ɔkɔba.’ Lɛmɛ oti fɔkɛlatsa kamɛ bamɔ ye nyansã.”
40011020	Tɛmatɔ a kĩ te kamɛ Yesu kɛna ye awãwã fɔtsa pii a kamɛ bati tádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, foesũ ɛkã tɛmatɔ a anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ,
40011021	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa nɔ Korasin! Bɔbɔɛ makpa nɔ Betsaida! Ntɛ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna nɛ mi kamɛ a mɔ Tiro mɔ Sidon tɛmatɔ kamɛ nkɛna foe ni, kufɛ te kamɛ bati dani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔkɔɛ bidzi tikpekpe, bɛtsɛla batɔ.
40011022	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, Baguma aamɔ Tiro mɔ Sidon bati kɔnya ɛba mi!
40011023	Ade nɔ Kapernaum! Ɔwɛ kĩ abɔɛ nɔ akũ ɔdɛla ɔnaatamɔ ode? Baakɛna nɔ nɛ kayɔ flee ɔnaawo kanɔkpade! Kitonɛkĩ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ nɔ kamɛ a mɔ Sodom bɛkɛna foe ni, kufɛ ɔmatɔ a buki edeĩ mɔ nviã kĩĩ!
40011024	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, Baguma aamɔ Sodom ɔmatɔ a kɔnya ɛba nɔ.”
40011025	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Nda, tite mɔ ode Ɔlate, manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ kĩ ɔnyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla tuvoli banyinɛ mɔ anyansãfɔ a ɔtsa babisɛ̃.
40011026	Oo! Nda, ade foe awo nɔ anɛ a.
40011027	“Nda kɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa edo nɛ yĩ awɛ. Odima linyína Obi a mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga a odi, ade odima lɛmɛ linyína Ɔlɛga a mbɔɛntɛ Obi a odi, mɔ bikĩ Obi a awɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye ɛtsa a.
40011028	“Miya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mi flee a kĩ mikɛna adzuma, minɔnɛ fɔtsa mɔ ɔlɔmɛ kĩ kipiã mi a, lɔkɔa maakpa mi kawɛya.
40011029	Mibɔɛ yĩ sɔmɔ akũ otse a mite nɛ mi akũ, mikɔlɛ fɔtsa mitomɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa mina kawɛya, kitonɛkĩ yĩ fɔlɛtsa dɔ, ade ndɔla yĩ akũ nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.
40011030	Kitonɛkĩ yĩ sɔmɔ akũ otse a kalɔ lɛlá ɔsĩ, ade yĩ fɔtsa a kĩ maalɔla mi a adã faafaa a.”
40012001	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yesu natsã fugbanɔ kɔba kudi kamɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ. Kɔlɛ kakɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, foesũ biveli fudi bɛtsɛ̃ bɛba.
40012002	Kĩ Farisifɔ mɔ́ foe a, bibi Yesu kĩ, “Dã, nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ akɛna lɛtsa a kĩ boe mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ!”
40012003	Ade Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ mitakã tɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ Dawid kɛna nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ kɔlɛ kɔ bɛmɔ bati a kĩ bitomɔ ye a?
40012004	Ewo nɛ Baguma kɔla a kamɛ ade bɛmɔ ye bati a bɛnya abodoo a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma a, titɔ kĩ mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛnya ye malo. Basɔfɔ odi bɛkpa osi kĩ bɛnya abodoo a na.
40012005	Mbɔɛɛ mitákã nɛ Mose mbla ovoli a kamɛ kĩ nɛ Kawɛya luwi nyɛ luwi akũ ni, basɔfɔ a kĩ basum nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a afum Kawɛya Luwi mbla a, lɛmɛ baákɔ be foe kɔtɔ?
40012006	Mabi mi kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛtɛ kɔya lɛba Asɔli Kɔla a deĩ nɛ awĩ.
40012007	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Sɛmɛ kalɛ mawɛ, nnɛ́ bayaɛ afɔliɛ.’ Ntɛ kanu minu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kayɔ ni, kufɛ miláakɔ bikĩ bɛtáfum a kɔtɔ,
40012008	kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi a Ɔlate.”
40012009	Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ kadi, awã kĩ
40012010	onyole odi kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku lɛmɛ na. Bati badi kĩ bɛwɛ kĩ babɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ Yesu akũ na nɛ awã, foesũ bivia ye kĩ, “Boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛtsa fɔsɔ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ?”
40012011	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi deĩ kuveli mɔa mɔ kɔka kuwo nɛ lɛkɛ kamɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a, ɛláado awɛ epi koe ɛnyɛ?
40012012	Ade oti deĩ kɔya ɛbɛ̃ kuveli a! Foesũ boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna tuwĩ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.”
40012013	Adeke ebi onyole a kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku a kĩ, “Yo nɔ kɔkpɔ.” Eyo kɔkpɔ a ade kubuki kɔna ɔsĩ ndɛ kɔyade a.
40012014	Ade Farisifɔ a dzakũ bɛnapi adzuni kĩ baakɔ Yesu a.
40012015	Kĩ Yesu nu kĩ bisui nɛ ye akũ a, ɛdzakũ nɛ lɔpɔ a na kamɛ, lɛmɛ bati kɔdabu baũ tomɔ ye. Ɛtsa basɔnɛ a flee,
40012016	ade esi be mbla kĩ bɛtabi bati kadima nɛ ye akũ.
40012017	Ɛlɛ fukĩĩ ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya akũ a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
40012018	“Ade yĩ osumunɛ a kĩ mpau nɛ awĩ a. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ mawɛ kalɛ, ade yawo yĩ anɛ a. Maakɔa yĩ Hũhũ nko nɛ ye akũ, lɔkɔa ede lɛtsã nɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ akũ ɛkpa fude fude.
40012019	Ɛláavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa, ĩye ɛbɔa fɔwɔla, ĩye binu ye odo nɛ tɔblɔnu anɛ.
40012020	Yaana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɛkpa bikĩ bɛlá kɔbɛ̃ a, ade yaakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa bikĩ bɛlá kabumɛna a. Yaadza pintii kɛnaawo kĩ ɛfɔ̃ kadzɛ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ anya akũ,
40012021	ade bati flee aakɔa anɛ bite nɛ ye akũ a.”
40012022	Ke liti a, bati badi kpã oti odi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ, kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɛkunɛ mɔ omumu bɛma Yesu. Yesu tsa oti a, epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla ɛmɔ fɔkɔ lɛmɛ.
40012023	Lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna a, kɛna bati kɔdabu a flee a saa, ade bivia kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Dawid Obi a nɛ awĩ a?”
40012024	Kĩ Farisifɔ nu fukĩĩ a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Yablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa kitonɛkĩ hũhũ kpa lɛgã Beelzebul akpa ye kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ɛkɛna foe.”
40012025	Yesu nyi lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkakɔna a, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Ɔmaĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛsɛ̃ ye akũ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ, mɔ tɛdzɛ deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ ni, ɛláadzi gɛlɛɛlɛ. Ade aye a ntɛ ɔmatɔ ĩye kɔla kudi bati sɛ̃ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ mɔ tɛdzɛ deĩ nɛ be kamɛ ni, kaku ɔmatɔ a ĩye kɔla a aaku.
40012026	Foesũ ntɛ katsu mɔa kadi nɛ Abonsam lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ anɔ mɔ kabɛbã ni, fɔatsa kĩ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sɛ̃ kutsu kutsu kɔkɔɛ, ade kɔ́ayalɛ a.
40012027	Ntɛ mialɛ kĩ Beelzebul lɛkpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ nnɛɛ mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a ni, owei lɛkpa bati a kĩ bitomɔ mi a kɔbɛ̃ bɛnɛɛ bablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa? Lɛtsa a kĩ mi mɔawɛ bati a kĩ bitomɔ mi akɛna a, aakɔ mi kɔtɔ.
40012028	Oowo! Nnɛ́ Beelzebul kɔbɛ̃ nnɛɛ, mbom Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ nnɛɛ mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a ya nɛ mi akũ kɔkɔɛ.
40012029	“Odima lɛláapuli ewo nɛ ɔbɛlɛbɛ kɔla kamɛ efila ye akũ fɔtsa, mbɔɛntɛ ɛnya lɔtɔ esuli oti a edo nɛ tɔwɛ̃ kamɛ fɔmɔ yaapuli ɛpasa tɔtɔ a kamɛ efila ye fɔtsa.
40012030	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzɛ́ nɛ yĩ liti ni, eyidza nɛ yĩ akũ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaábumɔ yĩ bɔakpɔta ni, kayalɛ yayalɛ kawula.
40012031	Ade foesũ mabi mi kĩ baakɔa tɔkpa nyɛ tɔkpa mɔ fubusuotsa fudi nyɛ fudi kĩ bati alɛ a bite be, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔ̃ akũ ni, bɛláakɔa bite ye.
40012032	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ kɔdzɛla etia Otidziwa Obi a ni, baakɔa bite ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ kɔdzɛla etia Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ni, bɛláakɔa bite ye finyaa ĩye nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ laya a kamɛ.
40012033	“Fɔmɔ aana kutse libi wĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ana kutse wĩ, ade ntɛ odeĩ kutse kpa ni, kutse libi kpa aana. Babi a kĩ kutse awũ a bakɔa kanyi kutse a odu.
40012034	Mi bati ndɛ bɔɛ babi! Nde míapuli milɛ fɔlɛtsa wĩ kĩ minyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ? Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ liyi oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, ade foe anɛ nɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a.
40012035	Oti wĩ anyɛ fɔtsa wĩ kanya katomɛna ye fɔtsa wĩ kakɔlakɔ̃, ade oti kpa lɛmɛ anyɛ fɔtsa kpa kanya katomɛna ye fɔtsa kpa kakɔlakɔ̃ a.
40012036	Mitɛ mido kĩ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, odi nyɛ odi aanyɛ ye akũ onukpɛ̃ nɛ kalɛ pupulidza kadi nyɛ kadi kĩ ɛlɛ tɔ̃ a akũ.
40012037	Nɔ mɔawɛ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa baakɔa bɛdzɛmɔ nɔ bɛkpa nɔ ɔtɔbɛ ĩye bɛkɔ nɔ kɔtɔ.”
40012038	Ade mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ badi bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ kɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni adi bɔdã.”
40012039	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nviã babi kpa mɔ bati kĩ binyína Baguma! Miavia yĩ kĩ nkɛna awãwã fɔtsa midã? Oowo! Awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ baanyɛ bɛtsa mi nyɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yona fude a.
40012040	Ndɛ ayekĩ Yona dzi fuwi ɛlalɛ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa nɛ kafɔabi kpale lupu kamɛ a, ade aye Otidziwa Obi a lɛmɛ aatɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa nɛ tite kamɛ a.
40012041	Nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, Ninivefɔ aayidza mɔ mi bidzi bɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kĩ binu Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yona lɛ a. Midã, litsedi deĩ nɛ awĩ kĩ lɛbɛ̃ Yona.
40012042	Nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ a, Seba Lɛgãtsole aayidza ɛdza ɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ ɛtsã osi gɛlɛɛlɛ eto ye ɔmaĩ kamɛ ɛyatse Lɛgã Salomo nyansã fɔtsa katsa, ade mitɛ yĩ mido kĩ odi deĩ nɛ awĩ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Salomo.
40012043	“Ntɛ hũhũ kpa nɛ́ nɛ oti kamɛ a, yanaatsã kamini nɛ fɔkɔ wɛlɛwa kawɛ kadzikɔ̃. Ntɛ ɛtána kadzikɔ̃ ni,
40012044	yabi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Maamuniki nnaa yĩ kɔla kɔɛ a kamɛ.’ Foesũ ntɛ ɛyamɔ kĩ bɛyɔ koe kamɛ bɛlɔla koe kamɛ yededeede a,
40012045	yanaa kanaakpã hũhũ kpa bɛbã evũkɔnɔ kĩ bideĩ ɔsĩ bɛbɛ̃ ye kayamɛna. Bawo nɛ oti a kamɛ kadzi nɛ awã, ade oti a kadzi kamɛ abu kade kaba ayekĩ fɔna nɛ kayɔkayi a. Ade aye fɔ́aya fɔkpa nviã bati kpa kĩĩ a.”
40012046	Kĩ Yesu kalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ bati a, ɔma mɔ bawaɛ̃nyole yawo awã. Bɛdza nɛ kanya bɛwɛ kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ ye.
40012047	Foesũ bati a kamɛ odi bi ye kĩ, “Dã, ama mɔ awaɛ̃nyole amɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ kanya bawɛ kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ nɔ.”
40012048	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Owei nyɛ mma? Bawei nyɛ nwaɛ̃ amɛ?”
40012049	Ade eyo awɛ ɛtsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ɛlɛ kĩ, “Midã, ade mma mɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ nɛ awĩ a!
40012050	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ Nda nɛ ode kawɛ akũ ni, ade ye nyɛ nwaɛ̃nyole, mɔ nwaɛ̃tsole mɔ mma a.”
40013001	Luwi mɔapɛ a, Yesu nɛ́ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, ɛnadzi nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ ɛkatsa fɔtsa.
40013002	Ayekĩ bati kɔdabu a kĩ kɔtsɛna nɛ ye akũ a tɛ́nɛ kapɔ sũ ni, ewo edzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ade kɔdabu a dza nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ a.
40013003	Ɛtsa be fɔtsa pii nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Luwi a onyole odi naasã kamɔnɛ.
40013004	Kĩ ɛkasã babi a nɛ kɔba kamɛ a, badi tɔ nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ ade kɔvɔlabi yafila be bɛmɛna a.
40013005	Babi a badi tɔ nɛ apibɔ akũ awã kĩ tite lɛpɔ́nɛ nɛ boe a anɛ. Babi a mɛ mɔatsɛ kitonɛkĩ tite a kamɛ tádzũ.
40013006	Foesũ kĩ suwa yata a, sipila te tɛvɛ ade tivio mɔatsɛ a, kitonɛkĩ te tunu a tanaa kamɛ dzununu.
40013007	Babi a badi tɔ nɛ fu tuwĩ kamɛ ade kĩ bɛmɛ bade a tuwĩ a bo anɛ tɛmɛna be.
40013008	Lɛmɛ babɛbã tɔ nɛ tite wĩ akũ ade biwũ babi a, badi wũ babi ɔha, badi wũ babi aduesia, ade babɛbã lɛmɛ wũ babi taalɛ a.”
40013009	Yesu wũna kĩ, “Oti a kĩ edeĩ sɔtɔ ni, etse!”
40013010	Ade fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ abi bati a fɔlɛtsa nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ?”
40013011	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi kɔ̃ bɛnyɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa kamɛ bɛtsa mi, lɛmɛ, bɛtányɛ foe kamɛ bɛtsa be.
40013012	Kitonɛkĩ oti a kĩ edeĩ fɔtsa ni, baakpa ye fudi bibu lɔkɔa fɔpɔ fubu, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ ɛlá lɛtsama ni, baatɛ foe kabii a kĩ edeĩ a malo nɛ ye awɛ.
40013013	Lɛtsa sũ a kĩ malɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ mɔ be nyɛ kĩ bamɔ mɔ anɛ lɛmɛ baámɔ kayi ɔsũ, batse lɛmɛ baánu foe kayɔ.
40013014	Foesũ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, ‘Bati kĩĩ aanu bibuki binu lɛmɛ bɛláanu foe kayɔ. Ade baamɔ bibuki bɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ bɛláamɔ biyi ɔsũ.
40013015	Kitonɛkĩ be adzuni adã yududu, ade be atɔ lánu kanu wĩ a, ade bisua be anɛ a. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, be anɛ aamɔ fɔkɔ, be atɔ aanu, be adzuni aanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ! Ade baadani bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa ntsa be fɔsɔ!’
40013016	Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ Baguma hila mi! Mi anɛ amɔ ade mi atɔ lɛmɛ anu fɔkɔ a.
40013017	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ mɔ bati kpĩĩ pii wɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bamɔ lɛtsa a kĩ miamɔ a, lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bɛmɔ́ foe, ade bɛwɛ lɛmɛ kĩ banu lɛtsa a kĩ mianu a lɛmɛ bɛtánu foe.
40013018	“Foesũ finyaa mitse ĩnyɛ lɛgbã nɛ kamɔnɛ odunɛ akũ a kayɔ minu.
40013019	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yanu ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa lɛmɛ yaánu foe kayɔ a, la ndɛ babi a kĩ biwula nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ a. Oti Kpa a ayawãnɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bidu nɛ ye kamɛ a.
40013020	Babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ apibɔ akũ a nyɛ oti a kĩ ntɛ esila enu fɔlɛtsa a, yatɛ foe mɔatsɛ mɔ kawɔlɛ,
40013021	lɛmɛ fɔáwo kanaa ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ dzununu, ade fɔábuna owi nɛ ye kamɛ a. Foesũ ntɛ ɔhau ĩye bati liti katomɛna ya nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ sũ ni, yamuniki liti mɔatsɛ.
40013022	Babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ fu tuwĩ kamɛ a nyɛ oti a kĩ yanu fɔlɛtsa a, lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhau mɔ akũ kana fɔtsa liti katomɛna anya fɔlɛtsa a akũ, foesũ fɔáwũ babi.
40013023	Ade babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ tite wĩ akũ a nyɛ oti a kĩ yanu fɔlɛtsa a, kanu foe kayɔ lɛmɛ. Bawũ babi, badi ɔha, badi aduesia babɛbã lɛmɛ be taalɛ.”
40013024	Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã bɛbã kĩ, “Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ oti odi kĩ ɛsã kamɔnɛ babi wĩ nɛ ye kɔba kamɛ.
40013025	Nɛ lɛnyɛ mɔa lidi, kĩ odi nyɛ odi wa tida a, ye okesĩnɛ nasã tuwĩ wuluwulu nɛ kamɔnɛ a kamɛ ɛdzakũ.
40013026	Kĩ kamɔnɛ a bo anɛ kido kayɛlɛ awɛ a, tuwĩ a lɛmɛ nɛ́ tɛdza nɛ ke kamɛ.
40013027	“Oti a basumunɛ ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bibi ye kĩ, ‘Boe ɔlate, nnɛ́ funitsã wĩ odu nɛ kɔba a kamɛ, mɔ ndia tuwĩ kpa to tɛyamɛ nɛ ke kamɛ?’
40013028	“Ɔlate a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Okesĩnɛ odi lɛkɛna fukĩna.’ “Adeke bivia ye kĩ, ‘Awɛ kĩ bɔnaabɔlɛ tuwĩ a nɛ ke kamɛ?’
40013029	“Ebi be kĩ, ‘Oowo! Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ minaabɔlɛ tuwĩ a ni, míabɔlɛ kamɔnɛ a kadi mɔ te.
40013030	Mifɔ̃ kamɔnɛ a mɔ tuwĩ a flee fɔdza fubo anɛ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ baanɛna kamɔnɛ a. Ade lɔkɔ a na maabi kamɔnɛ banɛnanɛ a kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛbɔlɛ tuwĩ a bisui te fudzu fudzu lɔkɔa bipila te, ke liti bɛkpɔta kamɔnɛ a bifila bɛnaako nɛ yĩ oli kamɛ.’ ”
40013031	Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã bɛbã kĩ, “Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ kutse libi kabii kĩ oti odi nadu nɛ ye kɔba kamɛ.
40013032	Lɛnyɛ kutse libi kabii flee nɛ kutse babi kamɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ libo anɛ ni, kɔapɔ lububu kaba futse flee, ade kɔvɔlabi ayakɛna fɔtsɔɛ nɛ koe tɛnanɛ kamɛ a.”
40013033	Yesu buki ɛbɔa be lɛgbã bɛbã kĩ, “Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ oyila fɔtsa kĩ otsole odi pɔtɔ edo nɛ mawɛ fɔwɔda kakɔna ɛlalɛ kamɛ kɛnawo kĩ mawɛ a flee vuya.”
40013034	Yesu bi bati kɔdabu a fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ, ade yaálɛ fɔlɛtsa fudima ntɛ nnɛ́ nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ.
40013035	Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Maalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ, ade maanyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla kito anɛ katinya kayɔkayi a ntsa a.”
40013036	Kĩ Yesu nyɛ bati kɔdabu a osi a, ɛya nɛ kɔla kamɛ ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛyavia ye kĩ, “Nyɛ lɛgbã a kĩ ɔbɔa nɛ tuwĩ wuluwulu nɛ kamɔnɛ kamɛ a kayɔ katsa boe.”
40013037	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ edu fudutsa wĩ a nyɛ Otidziwa Obi a.
40013038	Kɔba a nyɛ katinya kamɛ, fudutsa wĩ a nyɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a bade, ade tuwĩ a lɛmɛ nyɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ Okesĩnɛ a bade a.
40013039	Okesĩnɛ a kĩ ɛsã tuwĩ a nyɛ Abonsam. Fudutsa kakpɔta a nyɛ katinya kamɛ kawũna lɔkɔ, ade fudutsa bakpɔtanɛ a nyɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
40013040	“Ndɛ ayekĩ bakpɔta tuwĩ kapila te a, ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ katinya kawũna lɔkɔ a.
40013041	Otidziwa Obi a aado ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛyaakpɔta be a kĩ bɛfɔ̃ bati kɛna tɔkpa mɔ be a kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa a flee bɛnɛmɛna nɛ Baguma lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
40013042	Baata be bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ, ade awã baabe bɛba adɔ̃ a.
40013043	Baguma bade a kɔ̃ akũ aakpalɛ ndɛ suwa aye nɛ be Ɔlɛga lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ. Oti a kĩ edeĩ sɔtɔ ni, etse!
40013044	“Ode lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ akũ kana fɔtsa fudi kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla nɛ kɔba kamɛ. Oti odi nake foe, ɛdani ɛkɔla foe. Ɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa, foesũ ɛnanɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ a emuniki ɛnaya kɔba a.”
40013045	Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ kɔyaatɔ ɔnyanɛ odi kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yawɛ fulitsa babi wĩ.
40013046	Kĩ ɛnatsɛlamɔ lidi kĩ lideĩ kɔya paa a, ɛnanɔ fɔtsa a kĩ edeĩ a flee ɛkɔa ɛya fulitsa libi a.
40013047	“Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a buki lɛla ndɛ asau kĩ bɛta bido nɛ mpo kamɛ bɛnyɛ kɔfɔabi ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ pii.
40013048	Kĩ asau a yi mɔ kɔfɔabi a, bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛyamɛna nɛ mpo abuĩ, bidzi bɛsa kɔfɔabi a kamɛ. Bɛkɔa kɔfɔabi wĩ a biko nɛ fɔwɔda kamɛ ade bɛtalɛ kɔkpa a biwula a.
40013049	Ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ katinya kawũna lɔkɔ a. Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a aayasa bati kpa bɛnyɛ nɛ bati wĩ kamɛ,
40013050	ade baata be bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ, awã kĩ baabe bɛba adɔ̃ a.”
40013051	Yesu via be kĩ, “Minu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee kayɔ?” Bitunɔ kĩ, “Oo.”
40013052	Foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ mbla ɔtsanɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdani ɛkɛna fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ la ndɛ ɔtɔlate odi kĩ yanyɛ fɔtsa vɔɛ̃ mɔ fɔkɔɛ kanya katomɛna ye fɔtsa kakɔlakɔ̃.”
40013053	Kĩ Yesu bɔa fɔgbã kĩĩ eyua a, ɛdzakũ nɛ awã,
40013054	ɛnaa ye mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ, ɛnatsa fɔtsa nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a. Bati a kĩ binu ye fɔtsa katsa a kɛna saa, ade bivia akũ kĩ, “Ndia ɛkɔlɛ kadikanyi kĩĩ etomɛna? Ndia awãwã fɔtsa a lɛmɛ to?
40013055	Nnɛ́ ye nyɛ titse fɔtsa ɔmɛnɛ obi a mbɔɛɛ? Nnɛ́ ɔma nyɛ Maria, ade nnɛ́ bawaɛ̃nyole nyɛ Yakobo, Yosef, Simon mɔ Yuda a?
40013056	Nnɛ́ bawaɛ̃tsole lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ nɛ awĩ a? Ndia etomɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee?”
40013057	Ade ɛdani oti kĩ ye akũ ado be kalɔkpa a. Yesu bi be kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ deĩ obu nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ mbɔɛntɛ nɛ ye mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ mɔ ye kɔla bati kamɛ mɔ ɛlá obu.”
40013058	Ayekĩ bɛtátɛ bido sũ ni, Yesu tákɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii nɛ awã.
40014001	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Herodes, Galilea tite akũ ɔnyanɛ a, nu Yesu nkã.
40014002	Ebi ye banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ, “Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a liyidza eto kanɔkpa edzi nkpã, ade foesũ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ ɛnɛɛ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa a.”
40014003	Herodes nya lɔtɔ ɛfɔ̃ bipi Yohanes bisui ye bɛkɔa bido nɛ kɔla. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ nɛ Herodia, ɔwaɛ̃ Filipo ɔtsɔ̃ sũ.
40014004	Lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nyɛ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a bi Herodes kĩ, “Mose mbla a tákpa osi kĩ akɔã Herodia.”
40014005	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ sũ Herodes wɛ kĩ yakɔ Yohanes, lɛmɛ evila Yudafɔ a kitonɛkĩ babu ye ndɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ aye.
40014006	Nɛ luwi a kĩ Herodes anya ye lɛmawi a, Herodia obitsole yato nɛ bati a flee anɛ. Ye kuto a lɛ Herodes kadã paa,
40014007	foesũ ɛlɔ fubo ɛkpa oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ, “Maakpa nɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ aavia yĩ!”
40014008	Oyitsɔ̃ a ɔma fɔ̃ ebi Herodes kĩ, “Kɔa Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a lɔlɔ kate nɛ tsensi akũ kakpa yĩ finyaakĩĩ!”
40014009	Kalɛ a wo lɛgã a kalɔɛ, lɛmɛ nɛ fubo a kĩ ɛlɔ nɛ obu bati a kĩ ɛvɛ a anɛ sũ ni, ɛkpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ oyitsɔ̃ a kawɛ akũ.
40014010	Foesũ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnatsua Yohanes lɔlɔ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ.
40014011	Bite oti lɔlɔ a nɛ tsensi akũ bɛyamɛna, ade bɛkɔa bɛkpa oyitsɔ̃ a, ade ye malo ɛkɔa de ɛma ɔma a.
40014012	Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nabɔɛ ɔnɔkpa a bɛnabila, ade bɛnabɔa Yesu amandiɛ a.
40014013	Kĩ Yesu nu Yohanes fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ɛdzaku ɛnaa kakɔ kadi kĩ bati lɛláa. Lɛmɛ bati nu ye nkã, foesũ bɛtsã abɔa bito be tɛmatɔ kamɛ bitomɔ ye liti.
40014014	Yesu nɛ́ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ade kĩ ɛmɔ bati kɔdabu a, be akũ kɔ ye kɔnya, ade ɛtsa be kamɛ basɔnɛ a.
40014015	Ke olobe a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fuã ye, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Kade dɔ kiyua ade awĩ táfuã ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, foesũ fɔnɛ bati a awɛ bɛdzakũ bɛnaa tukula kamɛ bɛnaaya funitsã bɛnya.”
40014016	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtásĩ kĩ badzakũ. Mi mɔawɛ a mikpa be litsedi bɛnya!”
40014017	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Abodoo fɔbɔ elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã pɛ bɔnɛɛ nɛ awĩ.”
40014018	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mikɔa foe mima yĩ nɛ awĩ.”
40014019	Ɛfɔ̃ bati a flee dzi nɛ tuwĩ akũ nɛ awã, ade ɛbɔɛ abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã a, ɛdã ode, ehila foe. Ke liti a, ɛyɛlɛ abodoo a, ɛkɔa ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ade be bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa bati a.
40014020	Odi nyɛ odi nya ewĩ. Ke liti a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila fuwuliwa a kĩ fute a biyula tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã.
40014021	Bati a kĩ bɛnya funitsã a lidede aawo banyole mpim elo, kĩ bɛtákã batsole mɔ babisɛ̃ bido nɛ be kamɛ.
40014022	Yesu fɔ̃ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ binyina bɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ sɛkɛ sitide a, lɔkɔa ɛnyɛ bati a osi.
40014023	Kĩ ɛnyɛ bati a osi eyua a, ede ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ ye odi kĩ yanaabɔa mpaɛ. Kĩ kade dɔ a Yesu odi lite nɛ awã.
40014024	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, ɔkɔlɔ a naa mɔ lugo flee ade mpo akũ ɔwɛ kabɔa ye kato katɛ̃mɛna, kitonɛkĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kavũ katsɛlamɔ ye.
40014025	Odenyinawi tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, Yesu tsɛ̃ nɛ mui anɛ yaya nɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a sɛkɛ̃.
40014026	Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ mui anɛ a, fute bɔɛ be bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkpa yanɛ!” ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba mɔ libe a.
40014027	Deedimɔapɛ Yesu lɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla kĩ, “Mi ɔwɔlɛ ɛka edzi. Yĩ manɛ. Mitavila!”
40014028	Ade Petro lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ nuwĩ nɔ anɛ ni, fɔ̃ ntsã mui a anɛ ĩya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃.”
40014029	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ya!” Ade Petro nɛ́ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ ɛtsã mui anɛ yanaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a.
40014030	Lɛmɛ kĩ ɛmɔ́ ayekĩ ɔwɛ lamɔ kavũ kɔɔba a, libe wo ye ade edo kayɛla awɛ nɛ mui a kamɛ a. Adeke ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tɛ yĩ!”
40014031	Deedimɔapɛ Yesu yo awɛ epi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ katɛkado adã kabii. Nde sũ ɔtɛ atsindze?”
40014032	Kĩ be nviã a biwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a ɔwɛ a fɔ̃ kavũ.
40014033	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a ke aduli bisum Yesu, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Nuwĩnuwĩ Baguma Obi anɛ!”
40014034	Kĩ binyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a, bɛyaduma nɛ Genezaret tite akũ.
40014035	Awã bati mɔ́ Yesu biyi ɔsũ, foesũ bɛnakpã basɔnɛ nɛ kayite a flee bɛyamɛna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
40014036	Bike ye aduli kĩ efɔ̃ basɔnɛ a bɛta ye atadiɛ atɔ odi pɛ. Ade bati a kĩ bɛta ye a flee akũ de ɔsĩ a.
40015001	Ade Farisifɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ badi to Yerusalem bɛya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ,
40015002	“Nde sũ nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lákɛna nɛ fɔtsa katsa a kĩ boe bawanyɔ kɔa biyi boe a akũ? Baávɔlɛ awɛ nɛ osi wĩ akũ fɔmɔ banya!”
40015003	Yesu lɛmɛ via be kĩ, “Nde sũ mi malo miafum Baguma mbla mɔ miakɛna nɛ miawɛ fɔtsa katsa a akũ?
40015004	Mbɔɛɛ Baguma tálɛ kĩ, ‘Bu aga mɔ ama,’ ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edumu ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ ye’?
40015005	Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ miatsa fɔtsa kĩ ntɛ odi deĩ fɔtsa fudi kĩ yaapuli ɛkɔa ebumɔ ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma, mɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Nkɔa foe nkpa Baguma’ ni,
40015006	fɔtábuki fusĩ kĩ oti a abu ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma. Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ mitábu Baguma mbla ayekĩ míatomɔ mi bawanyɔ fɔtsa katsa a sũ.
40015007	Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ nɛ mi akũ a ya nɛ foe kamɛ nuwĩ.
40015008	Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔmaĩ kĩĩ asum yĩ mɔ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mɛnɛmɛnɛ, lɛmɛ be tɔwɔlɛ deĩ mɔ lugo nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.
40015009	Pupulidza basum yĩ, kitonɛkĩ batidziwa mbla batsa nɛ Baguma mbla a kadokɔ̃!’ ”
40015010	Ade Yesu vɛ bati kɔdabu a ɛkpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ebi be kĩ, “Mitse lɔkɔa minu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ!
40015011	Nnɛ́ lɛtsa kĩ lawo nɛ oti onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a ado ye efĩĩ, mbom lɛtsa a kĩ lanɛ kato ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a, ado ye efĩĩ.”
40015012	Adeke ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Onyina kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɔlɛ a wo Farisifɔ a kalɔɛ?”
40015013	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kutse nyɛ kutse kĩ nnɛ́ Nda nɛ ode lidu ni, baabɔlɛ koe bimuni.
40015014	Foesũ mifɔnɛ be awɛ. Bɛnyɛ banɛkunɛ kĩ bakpã banɛkunɛ, ade ntɛ ɔnɛkunɛ akpã ɔnɛkunɛ ni, be nviã a flee baatɔ nɛ lɛkɛ kamɛ.”
40015015	Petro bi ye kĩ, “Nyɛ lɛgbã kĩĩ kayɔ katsa boe.”
40015016	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ mi malo bati kĩ baánu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ mibuki mianɛ?
40015017	Mitánu foe kayɔ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lawo nɛ oti onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a kanaa ye lupu kamɛ, ke liti yanaanyɛ nɛ kɔbɔa kayo kamɛ?
40015018	Lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔanɛ kato oti onukpɛ̃ a, ato ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ade foe ado oti efĩĩ a.
40015019	Kitonɛkĩ oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ adzuni kpa, oti kakɔ, adɔpaa kabɔa, bayitsɔ̃ mɔ bapopo kawa katɛ̃, kaye, fɔvã adansiɛ kadi, mɔ bati buĩ kanyɛ anɛ kato.
40015020	Ade fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ ado oti efĩĩ a, lɛmɛ kĩ ɔkɔa awɛ kĩ ɔtávɔlɛ anya ndɛ ayekĩ Farisifɔ atsa a, ládo oti efĩĩ.”
40015021	Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa kayite a kĩ kifuã Tiro mɔ Sidon tɛmatɔ kpale a kamɛ.
40015022	Awã naa, Kanan otsole odi kĩ edzi nɛ kayite a na ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ mɔ fɔwɔla kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, Dawid Obi, mɔ yĩ kɔnya! Yĩ obitsole lamɛna lubo kamɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ hũhũ kpa awɛ kamɛ!”
40015023	Lɛmɛ Yesu tálɛ kadima. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nake ye aduli bɛlɛ kĩ, “Blɔmɛna ye ɛdzakũ, kitonɛkĩ etomɔ boe mɔ fɔwɔla!”
40015024	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Baveli a kĩ bɛyɛla nɛ Israelfɔ kamɛ odi sɛkɛ̃ bido yĩ.”
40015025	Lɛmɛ otsole a yatɔ nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, bumɔ yĩ!”
40015026	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ bata babisɛ̃ funitsã biko bakpete.”
40015027	Otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fudeĩ lɔmɔ kɔ̃, lɛmɛ bakpete a malo anya funitsã wuliwa a kĩ futo be ɔlate opunu akũ fɔtɔ a.”
40015028	Kĩ Yesu nu foe a, ɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “O, boe ɔma, nɔ katɛkado pɔnɛ! Lɛtsa a kĩ awɛ a lɛya lɛkpa nɔ.” Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ a obitsole a akũ de ɔsĩ.
40015029	Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛtsã Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ. Ede ɛnaa katɔbii kadi akũ ade ɛkɛna akũ edzi a.
40015030	Ade bati kɔdabu baũ kpã abafã amɛ, banɛkunɛ, bamumu, mɔ basɔnɛ bɛbã pii bɛyamɛna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a. Bɛkɔa be biko nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ ade ɛtsa be a.
40015031	Kĩ bati kɔdabu a mɔ́ kĩ bamumu kalɛ kɔdzɛla, abafã amɛ kayidza katsã, bikĩ bɛnɛ lɛkpɛ̃ akũ dani fuyo, banɛkunɛ kamɔ fɔkɔ a, fɔkɛna be wãwã, ade bimu Israel Baguma a.
40015032	Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ebi be kĩ, “Bati kĩĩ akũ akɔ yĩ kɔnya, kitonɛkĩ bɛna nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ fuwi ɛlalɛ flee, lɛmɛ bɛlá lɛtsama kĩ banya. Ntáwɛ kĩ manyɛ be osi bɛnaa mɔ kɔlɛ, anɛ lɛnaasinya be nɛ osi.”
40015033	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Nɛ ndia bɔ́ana funitsã nɛ kɔsa kamɛ nɛ awĩ kĩ fɔ́ato bati kɔdabu kĩĩ odu bɛnya?”
40015034	Yesu via be kĩ, “Abodoo eni minɛɛ?” Bibi ye kĩ, “Abodoo evũkɔnɔ mɔ kɔfɔabi wuluwulu sukuloo deĩ.”
40015035	Ade Yesu fɔ̃ bati kɔdabu a kɛna akũ bidzi nɛ tite a.
40015036	Ade kĩ ɛbɔɛ abodoo evũkɔnɔ mɔ kɔfɔabi a ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ a, ebulibuli ye mɔ koe ɛkɔa ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ade be malo bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa bati a.
40015037	Be flee bɛnya biwĩ. Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila fuwuliwa a kĩ fute a, fuyi tɛtsɛtsɛ evũkɔnɔ.
40015038	Bati a kĩ bɛnya funitsã a nyɛ banyole mpim ɛna, kĩ bɛtákã batsole mɔ babisɛ̃ bibu.
40015039	Ke liti a, Yesu nyɛ bati a osi ade edzi ɔkɔlɔ ɛnaa Magadan amantam kamɛ a.
40016001	Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ badi kĩ bɛya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a wɛ kĩ basɔ ye bɛdã, foesũ bivia ye kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa kĩ futo ode ɛtsa be.
40016002	Lɛmɛ Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ suwa anaa katomukɔ̃ a, mialɛ kĩ, ‘Fɔkɔ aakpalɛ kunya, kitonɛkĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ yɔɔlɛ.’
40016003	Ade ayea ɔnɔnɛ lɛmɛ mialɛ kĩ, ‘Nviã oni aako kitonɛkĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ yɔɔlɛ fɔkɔ lɛmɛ kɛna tũũ.’ Miayi anɛ kadã odetɔ́ kamɛ kapuli kalɛ ayekĩ fɔkɔ aana, lɛmɛ miápuli minyi nviã nsɛntsɛlɛni a kĩ yaaya a kayɔ.
40016004	Nviã babi kpa kĩ binyína Baguma! Miavia yĩ awãwã fɔtsa? Oowo! Bɛláakpa mi awãwã fɔtsa fudima kɛba Yona fude a.” Ade ke ɛdzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be a.
40016005	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ bɛnaa sɛkɛ sitide a, bɛyate anɛ kĩ bɛtábɔɛ abodoo adima bɛlɛ.
40016006	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mite anɛ, midã kadã wĩ nɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ fuyilatsa a akũ.”
40016007	Ade bido kalɛ nɛ be nɛɛnɛɛ kamɛ kĩ, “Ayekĩ bɔtábɔɛ abodoo adima bɔlɛ sũ mɔ ɛlɛ foe.”
40016008	Yesu nyi lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ a foesũ evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ mialɔmɛna nɛ abodoo katabɔɛ akũ? Mi katɛkado adã kabii!
40016009	Foesũ mitámɔ miyi ɔsũ tɔ̃? Mitáte anɛ kĩ nsɛ̃ abodoo elo nkpa bati mpim elo bɛnya a? Tɛtsɛtsɛ eni kamɛ mifila fuwuliwa a miyula?
40016010	Litsa mialɛ nɛ abodoo evũkɔnɔ a kĩ nsɛ̃ nkpa banyole mpim ɛna bɛnya a akũ? Tɛtsɛtsɛ eni kamɛ miko fukĩ fute a?
40016011	Nde sũ mɔ miámɔ kĩ nnɛ́ abodoo fɔlɛtsa nlamɛna mi kabi? Midã kadã wĩ nɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ fuyilatsa akũ!”
40016012	Ade finyaa fɔmɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yanu foe kayɔ kĩ nnɛ́ fuyilatsa a kĩ bakɔa kado nɛ mawɛ kamɛ a akũ yadɛ be, mbom kadɛ ɛdɛ be nɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
40016013	Kĩ Yesu wo kakɔ a kĩ kifuã Kaisarea Filipi ɔmatɔ a, evia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Owei bati alɛ kĩ Otidziwa Obi a anɛ?”
40016014	Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Badi alɛ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a anɛ. Babɛbã alɛ kĩ Eliya, ade badi lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ Yeremia ĩye Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa anɛ.”
40016015	Yesu via be kĩ, “Adeke mi malo, owei mialɛ kĩ ye manɛ?”
40016016	Ade Simon Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Kristo a, Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a Obi.”
40016017	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Simon, Yona obi, Baguma hila nɔ, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ otidziwa odima lɛtsa nɔ foe, mbom Nda nɛ ode a lɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa nɔ.
40016018	Nɛ foesũ, Petro, mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ nɔ dĩ kayɔ nyɛ de mɔ ɔsĩ a, ade de kĩĩ akũ maayi yĩ asɔli a. Wuda malo lɛláapuli ɛnya ye akũ da.
40016019	Maakɔa ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a tɛsafi ndo nɔ nɛ awɛ. Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ osĩ nɛ tite akũ ni, baasĩ foe nɛ ode, ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ɔkpa osi nɛ tite akũ ni, baakpa de osi nɛ ode.”
40016020	Adeke Yesu si ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mbla kĩ bɛtabi odima kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo a.
40016021	Kito luwi a, Yesu do ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kabi awɛ pefee kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ nnaa Yerusalem, nnaamɔ lubo paa nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ. Baakɔ yĩ, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, Baguma aadzɛla yĩ ndzi nkpã.”
40016022	Petro kpã Yesu bɛnaadza nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃, ade edo ye anɛ kakã awɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, Baguma esua foe osi. Fukĩnaa lɛláaya nɛ nɔ akũ da!”
40016023	Yesu dani ɛtsɛlamɔ Petro ebi ye kĩ, “Satana, dzakũ nɛ yĩ akũ! Ɔnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lasua yĩ osi kitonɛkĩ nɔ kakɔna táto Baguma sɛkɛ̃ mbom futo otidziwa sɛkɛ̃.”
40016024	Ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Ntɛ odi wɛ kĩ yatomɔ yĩ ni, ɛtatsɛla ye mɔawɛ akũ lɔkɔa ɛbɔɛ ye asendua etomɔ yĩ.
40016025	Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛyɛla ye nkpã nɛ yĩ sũ ni, yaana ye.
40016026	Ntɛ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee dani odi fude mɔ ɛyɛla ye nkpã ni, litsa nfasɔ yaana? Mbɔɛɛ litsedi deĩ kĩ oti aakɔa ɛvɛmɛna mɔ ye nkpã?
40016027	Kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a aaya nɛ Ɔlɛga kukũkpalɛ kamɛ mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ, lɔkɔa yaase odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ ayekĩ edzi nkpã a onukpɛ̃.
40016028	Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awĩ kĩ bɛláaku kɛnaawo kĩ bɛmɔ́ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ ɛya ndɛ Lɛgã aye.”
40017001	Nɛ fuwi evũ liti a, Yesu kpã Petro, Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes bide bɛnaa ɔtɔ geĩ odi kalete, awã kĩ be odi bɛnadzi.
40017002	Kĩ bɛkadã ye a, Yesu akũ dani nɛ be anɛ kamɛ. Ye anɛ kamɛ kata ndɛ suwa aye, ade ye tɛtadiɛ lɛmɛ kɛna fitaa ndɛ ɔhaĩ aye a.
40017003	Adeke fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a mɔ́ Mose mɔ Eliya kĩ bɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ Yesu a.
40017004	Foesũ Petro dzɛla odo ebi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fɔnɛnɛ paa kĩ budeĩ nɛ awĩ! Ntɛ awɛ ni, maabɔa fɔpɛ ɛlalɛ nɛ awĩ, nɔ lide lɔmɔa, Mose lide lɔmɔa lɔkɔa Eliya lɛmɛ lide lɔmɔa.”
40017005	Kĩ ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a, luflututu fitaa ka lɛtsa be, ade odo nɛ́ eto de kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ Obi kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ a, yawo yĩ anɛ. Mitse ye!”
40017006	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu odo a libe wo be paa, foesũ bɛka bɛtsa anɛ nɛ tite.
40017007	Yesu ya nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛkɔa awɛ ɛta be, ade ebi be kĩ, “Miyidza! Mitavila!”
40017008	Foesũ bɛdzɛla anɛ nɛ ode, lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ odima nɛ awã kɛba Yesu.
40017009	Kĩ bɛka ɔtɔ a baya a, Yesu si be mbla kĩ, “Mitabi odima lɛtsa a kĩ bɛnyɛ bɛtsa mi nɛ awĩ a, kɛnaawo kĩ bɛdzɛla Otidziwa Obi a bitomɛna kanɔkpa.”
40017010	Adeke fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via Yesu kĩ, “Nde sũ mbla batsanɛ a alɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ Eliya ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya?”
40017011	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ Eliya ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya, ɛyaalɔla lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa eyi.
40017012	Mabi mi kĩ Eliya ya kɔkɔɛ lɛmɛ bati támɔ ye biyi ɔsũ, foesũ bɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ bawɛ nɛ ye akũ. Ade ayea baakɛna Otidziwa Obi a lɛmɛ awɔda a.”
40017013	Ade awã mɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu foe kayɔ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a akũ kɔdzɛla ɛkalɛ.
40017014	Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a muniki bɛya nɛ bati kɔdabu a sɛkɛ̃ a, onyole odi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ɛyake aduli nɛ ye anɛ,
40017015	ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, mɔ yĩ obinyole kɔnya! Odetɔ́ fɔsɔ deĩ nɛ ye akũ fɔamɔna ye lubo mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Fɔfɔ̃ yawɛ katɔ nɛ fi ĩye mui kamɛ.
40017016	Nkpã ye mma nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bɛtsa ye.”
40017017	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “O mi nviã babi kpa kĩ milá katɛkado. Mbɔɛɛ maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ daa? Lɔkɔ lɔɔdabe kamɛ maana ɔwɔlɛ nvɛlɛ mi nnaawo? Mikpã kanyolebi a mima yĩ nɛ awĩ!”
40017018	Adeke Yesu wũni nɛ hũhũ kpa a akũ mɔ ɛnɛ nɛ kanyolebi a kamɛ, ade kɛna akũ ɔsĩ nɛ lɔkɔ mɔapɛ a na kamɛ a.
40017019	Ke liti a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kabɛla kamɛ bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ boe kɔ̃ bɔtápuli bɔblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a bɔnɛmɛna?”
40017020	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kitonɛkĩ mi katɛkado lɛpɔ́nɛ. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ mideĩ katɛkado ndɛ kutse libi kabii ni, míapuli mibi ɔtɔ kĩĩ kĩ, ‘Bɔlɛ nɛ awĩ kanaa akĩĩ,’ ade yaabɔlɛ a. Lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ miláapuli mikɛna.
40017021	Lɛmɛ hũhũ kpa kĩĩ odu lɛláanɛ mbɔɛntɛ fɔtsɛ̃ mpaɛbɔ mɔ, onukpɛ̃ kasui kamɛ.”
40017022	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee yakpɔta nɛ Galilea a, Yesu bi be kĩ, “Baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ bati awɛ.
40017023	Baakɔ ye, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ a, Baguma aadzɛla ye edzi nkpã.” Nɛ foesũ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo ɔblɔ paa.
40017024	Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo Kapernaum a, bikĩ batɛ Asɔli Kɔla ɔgɔlɛ a ya nɛ Petro sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Mi fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ a ase Asɔli Kɔla ɔgɔlɛ?”
40017025	Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, yase.” Kĩ Petro wo ɛnaa tɔtɔ kamɛ a, Yesu nya lɔtɔ evia ye kĩ, “Simon, litsa nyɛ nɔ adzuni? Baáde ase dutɛ ĩye tɔgɔlɛ kakpa katinya kamɛ fɔgã? Kade a bati ase mbɔɛɛ kĩ banɔvɔɛ̃?”
40017026	Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Banɔvɔɛ̃ a.” Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ fɔatsa kĩ kade bati a wɛya.
40017027	Lɛmɛ bɔáwɛ kĩ bɔafum bati kĩĩ, foesũ naata dalɛwa nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a kamɛ. Kafɔabi katɔnyade a kĩ aanyɛ a ni, daɛ ke onukpɛ̃, aamɔ sika ovoe kĩ saato bɔmɔ nɔ Asɔli Kɔla ɔgɔlɛ kase. Kɔa se kanaase be bɔmɔ nɔ tɔgɔlɛ.”
40018001	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, bivia ye kĩ, “Owei bɛ̃ flee nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ?”
40018002	Nɛ foesũ Yesu vɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kadi ɛyadzɛla nɛ be kayite,
40018003	ade ebi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ mitádani mikɛna ndɛ babisɛ̃ aye ni, miláapuli miwo nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ da.
40018004	Oti kĩ ɛbɛ̃ flee nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ, ɛdani ɛkɛna ndɛ obisɛ̃ kĩĩ aye.
40018005	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa obisɛ̃ kĩĩ odu nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, yĩ ɛkɛna ɛkpa.
40018006	“Ntɛ oti odi aakpã babisɛ̃ kĩĩ, kĩ bɛtɛ yĩ bido a kamɛ ɔmɔa edo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa ye fɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa kɔwɔlɛ kpale bɛvɛla nɛ ye sɔmɔ bɛta bido nɛ mpo kamɛ ɛmɔa mui eku.
40018007	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa katinya kamɛ bati nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ foe avɛlɛ oti kado nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ a akũ. Kɛnɛ kĩ sɔhuiɛ kĩĩ odu ɛya kokooko, lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa oti a kĩ ye akũ fɔ́atsã fɔya!
40018008	“Foesũ ntɛ nɔ awɛ ĩye nɔ kɔbɔa aafɔ̃ ɔkɛna tɔkpa ni, tsua koe kata kamuni! Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ aana nkpã mɔ awɛ mɔa ĩye kɔbɔa mɔa, kɛba kĩ aana akpɔ mɔ abɔa lɛmɛ bɛta nɔ bido nɛ fi a kĩ fɔádĩ da a kamɛ.
40018009	Ade ayea ntɛ nɔ linebi aafɔ̃ ɔkɛna tɔkpa ni, bɔlɛ de kanyɛ kata kamuni! Fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ aana linebi mɔa odzi nkpã, kɛba kĩ aana banebi nviã lɛmɛ bɛta nɔ bido nɛ fi a kĩ fɔádĩ da a kamɛ a.
40018010	“Midã kadã wĩ, ayekĩ miláasupa babisɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ odima. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ be ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ nɛ ode adza nɛ Nda anɛ kamɛ luwi daa,
40018011	kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a ya kĩ yaatɛ bikĩ bɛyɛla a bɛna nkpã.
40018012	“Mikɔna fukĩĩ akũ midã. Ntɛ odi deĩ baveli ɔha mɔ kɔmɔa yɛla nɛ be kamɛ a, yaáfɔnɛ be aduekrɔũ-evedi a nɛ katɔbii akũ bɛkadɛ, ɛnaatsã ɛwɛ kɔmɔa a kĩ kɔyɛla a?
40018013	Ntɛ ɛmɔ́ koe ni, yamɔ kawɔlɛ paa nɛ kɔmɔa a akũ kaba be aduekrɔũ evedi a kĩ bɛtáyɛla a.
40018014	Ade ayea mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a láwɛ kĩ babisɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ odima ɛyɛla a.
40018015	“Ntɛ awaɛ̃ fum nɔ ni, naa ye sɛkɛ̃ kanaanyɛ ye mfumsu katsa ye, lɛmɛ kɛna foe nɛ kabɛla kamɛ nɛ mimɔ ye odi kayite. Ntɛ enu foe kayɔ ɛkpa nɔ ni, ɔdani ɔtɛ awaɛ̃.
40018016	Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛtánu ye akũ kayɔ ni, kpã oti mɔa ĩye bati nviã kabumɔ nɔ akũ minaa ye sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a flee aanɛ fɔwa nɛ adansifɔ anɛ.
40018017	Lɛmɛ ntɛ esĩ ɛtátse be malo ni, kɔa fɔlɛtsa a kama asɔli a, ade ntɛ ɛtátse asɔli bati a lɛmɛ ni, bu ye ndɛ ɔmamuni ĩye ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ aye.
40018018	“Foesũ mabi mi flee kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mitákpa osi nɛ tite akũ ni, bɛláakpa de osi nɛ ode, ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míakpa osi nɛ tite akũ ni, baakpa de osi nɛ ode.
40018019	“Mabi mi mbu kĩ ntɛ mi kamɛ bati nviã mikɛna ɔmɔa nɛ litsedi akũ nɛ tite akũ, mɔ mibɔa mpaɛ mivia de ni, Nda nɛ ode a aakɛna foe ɛkpa mi.
40018020	Kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ bati nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ tsɛna nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, ndeĩ nɛ be kayite.”
40018021	Ke liti a, Petro yavia Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ nwaɛ̃ dzɛmɛna tɔkpa kakɛna nɛ yĩ akũ ni, titi eni kɛnɛ kĩ nkɔa nte ye? Titi evũkɔnɔ mbɔɛɛ?”
40018022	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nnɛ́ titi evũkɔnɔ, mbom aduesɔũ titi evũkɔnɔ.
40018023	“Kitonɛkĩ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ lɛgã lidi kĩ lɛwɛ kĩ lakɛna akunta mɔ de basumunɛ.
40018024	Kĩ esila eyi kayɔ a, bɛkpã be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ edzimɔ ye sika mpim mpim kɔtɔ bɛyamɛna.
40018025	Ɔsumunɛ a lɛlá sika kĩ yaase kɔtɔ a, foesũ lɛgã a kpa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛnɔ ye mɔawɛ a ndɛ ɔsate, ye ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ babi, mɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ a bɛkɔa bise kɔtɔ a.
40018026	“Ɔsumunɛ a ke aduli nɛ lɛgã a anɛ eke ye aduli kĩ, ‘Na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kakpa yĩ. Maase nɔ se flee.’
