40018027	Ye akũ kɔ lɛgã a kɔnya foesũ ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ ade ɛkɔa kɔtɔ a kĩ edzimɛna a flee ete ye a.
40018028	“Ade kĩ ɔsumunɛ kĩĩ nɛ́ ɛdzakũ a, ɛnamɔ ɔkɔba ɔsumunɛ bɛbã odi kĩ edzimɔ ye sika ovoe ɔha mɔa kɔtɔ. Epi ɔkɔba a nɛ sɔmɔ ɛmɛnana ye odomɛna kɔɔba, ebi ye kĩ, ‘Se yĩ kɔtɔ a kĩ odzimɔ yĩ a!’
40018029	“Ɔkɔba a tɔ nɛ ye abɔa kamɛ eke ye aduli ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kakpa yĩ! Maase nɔ kɔtɔ a!’
40018030	“Lɛmɛ ɛtátunɔ, mbom ɛfɔ̃ bido ye nɛ kɔla kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ yaase kɔtɔ a.
40018031	Kĩ basumunɛ bɛbã a mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, fuwo be kalɔɛ ade bɛnabi lɛgã a lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a flee a.
40018032	“Foesũ lɛgã a vɛ ɔsumunɛ a ɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ebi ye kĩ, ‘Nɔ ɔsumunɛ kpa! Nkɔa kɔtɔ beblebee a kĩ odzimɔ yĩ a nte nɔ nɛ kĩ oke yĩ aduli sũ.
40018033	Kɛtáfɛta kĩ amɔ nɔ ɔkɔba ɔsumunɛ kɔnya ndɛ ayekĩ mmɔ́ nɔ kɔnya a?’
40018034	Ade lɛgã a na kalɔkpa mɔ ɔsĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnado ye nɛ kɔla kĩ bɛmɔna ye lubo kɛnaawo kĩ ese kɔtɔ a flee.”
40018035	Yesu wũna kĩ, “Ade aye Nda nɛ ode a aakɛna mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtákɔa ete ɔwaɛ̃ etomɛna ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.”
40019001	Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ɛdzakũ nɛ Galilea ɛnaa Yudea amantam nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ liti a.
40019002	Bati kɔdabu pii tomɔ ye bɛnaa ade ɛtsa be fɔtsa nɛ awã a.
40019003	Farisifɔ a badi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade bɛwɛ kĩ basɔ ye bɛdã, foesũ bivia ye kĩ, “Boe mbla kpa onyole osi kĩ esĩ ɔtsɔ̃ nɛ kalɛ nyɛ kalɛ kĩ yawɛ a akũ?”
40019004	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mitákã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ nɛ kayɔkayi a, otsole mɔ onyole Ɔbɔanɛ bɔa?
40019005	Ade Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ onyole aafɔnɛ ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma eyi ɛkɔa akũ ɛmɛna mɔ ɔtsɔ̃, lɔkɔa be nviã a baakɛna oti mɔa.’
40019006	Foesũ bibuki bɛnyɛ́ bati nviã mbom bɛkɛna oti mɔa. Nɛ foesũ otidziwa ɛtasɛ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma boomu a kamɛ.”
40019007	Ade Farisifɔ a via ye kĩ, “Mɔ nde sũ Mose kpa osi kĩ onyole ɛkpa ye ɔtsɔ̃ kasĩ ovoli lɔkɔa ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ?”
40019008	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ade mi atɔ ɔsĩ sũ mɔ Mose kpa mi osi kĩ misĩ mi batsɔ̃ a, lɛmɛ fɔtána lɔmɔ nɛ kayɔkayi a.
40019009	Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ ntɛ onyole odi sĩ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ nnɛ́ kanɛ ɛnɛ ye liti sũ, mɔ ɛnakɔã otsole bɛbã ni, ɛbɔa adɔpaa.”
40019010	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ aye onyole mɔ otsole kayite fɔlɛtsa la kɔ̃ ni, fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ bɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃.”
40019011	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ odi nyɛ odi aapuli enu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kayɔ, mbɔɛntɛ bikĩ Baguma kpa be foe a.
40019012	Kitonɛkĩ kayɔkanyɛ futefute deĩ kĩ foe sũ banyole lɛláapuli bɛkɔã batsɔ̃. Badi bɛma be basaɛ, babɛbã bati lɛkɛna be basaɛ, ade badi lɛmɛ lákɔã batsɔ̃ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sũ. Oti a kĩ yaapuli ɛtɛ fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ ni, ɛtɛ foe.”
40019013	Bati badi kpã babisɛ̃ bɛma Yesu kĩ ete awɛ nɛ be akũ, ɛbɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa be, lɛmɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wũni nɛ be akũ.
40019014	Lɛmɛ Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ babisɛ̃ a bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mitasua be osi, kitonɛkĩ ade bikĩĩ bamɛ odu lá ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
40019015	Adeke Yesu te awɛ nɛ be akũ ehila be, ade ɛdzakũ nɛ awã a.
40019016	Luwi a onyole odi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ɛvia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, lɛtsa wĩ lɔɔdabe kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna mɔ maana daa nkpã a?”
40019017	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ avia yĩ kalɛ nɛ fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna akũ? Oti mɔapɛ nyɛ owĩ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ awɛ kĩ awo nɛ nkpã kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, kɛna nɛ tɛbla a akũ.”
40019018	Oti a via ye kĩ, “Tɛbla tɛwɔdabe?” Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Takɔ oti, tabɔa adɔpaa, taye, tadi adansiɛ klumu,
40019019	bu aga mɔ ama, kawɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ kalɛ a.”
40019020	Ade opopo a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nkɛna nɛ tɛbla kĩĩ flee akũ. Litsa libuki lisĩ kĩ nkɛna?”
40019021	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ awɛ kĩ akpɔla ni, naa kanaanɔ nɔ akũ fɔtsa flee, kakɔa sika a kate ahiãfɔ, lɔkɔa aana akũ kana fɔtsa nɛ ode. Ke liti muniki kayaatomɔ yĩ.”
40019022	Kĩ opopo a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛdzakũ mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ, kitonɛkĩ edeĩ akũ fɔtsa beblebee.
40019023	Adeke Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ fɔ́ana ɔsĩ paa fɔkpa osikani kĩ yaawo nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
40019024	Mbuki mabi mi kĩ fɔadã bɔɛɛ fɔkpa ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kanɛ mɔ lɔpɔ kĩ yaatsã ɔnɔbɔ̃ ɔkɛ kamɛ ɛnɛ́ kɛba kĩ osikani aawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
40019025	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu kalɛ kĩĩ a, akũ dzuli be, ade bivia kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ owei aapuli ɛna katɛ?”
40019026	Yesu dã be kɛnanaana ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Otidziwa lɛláapuli ɛkɛna fukĩĩ, lɛmɛ Baguma kɔ̃ apuli kakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.”
40019027	Ade Petro dzɛla odo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Dã kĩ bɔfɔnɛ boe fɔtsa flee awɛ bɔya butomɔ nɔ, litsa koũ aanya boe fude?”
40019028	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ Otidziwa Obi a kɛna akũ edzi nɛ ye lɛgãkpo kpalɛwa a akũ nɛ katinya vɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ni, mi bati ewua-nviã a kĩ mitomɔ yĩ a lɛmɛ míadzi nɛ fɔgãkpo ewua-nviã akũ midzɛmɔ Israel futete ewua-nviã a.
40019029	Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛfɔnɛ fɔla, bawaɛ̃nyole, ĩye bawaɛ̃tsole, balɛga ĩye bama ĩye babi, ĩye fɔba biyi nɛ yĩ sũ ni, Baguma aakpa ye foe titi ɔha mɔ nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
40019030	Lɛmɛ bati pii kĩ bɛnyɛ batɔnyade finyaa a, aakɛna liti bade, ade liti bade a aakɛna batɔnyade a.”
40020001	“Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ okuani odi kĩ eyidza mɔ ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu ɛnabɔɛ apaafɔ badi kĩ bɛyaakɛna adzuma bɛkpa ye nɛ ye waĩ kɔba kamɛ.
40020002	Bɛmɔ apaafɔ a bɛnya kɔya, etunɔ kĩ yaase be sika ovoe sɔmɔa sɔmɔa kĩ fɔnyɛ luwi mɔa kɔtɔkase, ade edo be nɛ ye waĩ kɔba a kamɛ a.
40020003	“Kĩ ɔnɔnɛ tɔdɔũ evedi bɔa a, onyole a buki ɛnɛ ɛnaa kɔya ade ɛnamɔ banyole badi kĩ bɛdzɛ̃, kĩ bɛlá adzuma kɛnawa adima.
40020004	Foesũ ebi be kĩ, ‘Mi malo minaakɛna adzuma nɛ yĩ waĩ kɔba kamɛ, maase mi kɔtɔ kĩ kɛfɛta a.’
40020005	Ade bɛnaa kɔba a. “Ebuki ɛnɛ nɛ tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã mɔ olobe tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ ɛnakɛna ndɛ fɔtɔnyade a.
40020006	Kĩ tɔdɔũ elo anaa kabɔakɔ̃ a, ɛnaa kɔya ɛnamɔ banyole bɛbã kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ pupulidza. Evia be kĩ, ‘Nde sũ midzɛ̃ nɛ awĩ luwi a flee kĩ miákɛna lɛtsama?’
40020007	“Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Odima tábɔɛ boe kĩ bɔkɛna adzuma bɔkpa ye.’ “Foesũ ebi be kĩ, ‘Ntɛ aye ni, mi malo minaakɛna adzuma nɛ yĩ kɔba a kamɛ.’
40020008	“Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, kɔba ɔlate a bi ye adzuma akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a kĩ, ‘Vɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a kase be kɔtɔ, kayi kayɔ katomɛna bikĩ bɛya nkaɛ a akũ kanaawũna nɛ batɔnyade a akũ.’
40020009	“Bikĩ biyi adzuma kayɔ nɛ olobe tɔdɔũ elo kamɛ a kamɛ odi nyɛ odi tɛ sika ovoe sɔmɔa sɔmɔa.
40020010	Foesũ kĩ bati batɔnyade a yaatɛ be kɔtɔkase a, bɛkɔna kĩ baase be bɛba lɔmɔ, lɛmɛ be malo bɛtɛ sika ovoe sɔmɔa sɔmɔa.
40020011	Kĩ bɛtɛ be sika a biyua a, bɛna kalɔkpa bɛkakɛna hũhũhũhũ nɛ ɔlate a akũ.
40020012	Ade bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Bati a kĩ ɔbɔɛ nkaɛ a kɛna adzuma dɔũhuilɛ mɔapɛ, ade boe kɔ̃ bɔdza nɛ suwa kpaa kamɛ luwi a flee bɔkɛna adzuma a, lɛmɛ ose boe flee kɔtɔ tsɛtsɛɛ!’
40020013	“Kɔba ɔlate a kpa be kamɛ ɔmɔa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔba, dã ntásisi nɔ. Nnɛ́ sika ovoe sɔmɔa akũ bɔnya kɔya?
40020014	Kɔa nɔ kɔtɔkase kanaa kɔla. Yĩ lɛwɛ kĩ mase bati nkaɛ kĩĩ kɔtɔ ndɛ ayekĩ nse nɔ a.
40020015	Ndeĩ osi kĩ makɛna yĩ sika akũ adzuma ndɛ ayekĩ mawɛ. Mbɔɛɛ ayekĩ nkɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ a sũ anɛ abɛɛlɛ nɔ?’ ”
40020016	Ade Yesu wũna kĩ, “Foesũ bati a kĩ bɛkpa liti a, aadani batɔnyade, ade bikĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ a aadani batide a.”
40020017	Kĩ Yesu yɛlɛ yanaa Yerusalem a, ɛvɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃,
40020018	ade ebi be kĩ, “Mitse lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a! Bɔanaa Yerusalem, awã kĩ baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ. Baakɔ ye kɔtɔ bɛkpa wuda,
40020019	bɛkɔa ye bido bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a nɛ awɛ kĩ bidi ye nsekuo. Baabo ye, ke liti baabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ a, Baguma aadzɛla ye edzi nkpã.”
40020020	Adeke Zebedeo ɔtsɔ̃ kpã ye babinyole nviã ɛyamɛna nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, ɛyake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ evia kabumɛna a.
40020021	Yesu via ye kĩ, “Litsa awɛ?” Otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kpa yĩ bɔhɛ kĩ aafɔ̃ yĩ babinyole nviã kĩĩ kamɛ ɔmɔa lidzi nɛ nɔ sɔmɔna, ɔyade a lɛmɛ lidzi nɛ nɔ sɛba, nɛ nɔ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
40020022	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Minyína lɛtsa a kĩ de milamɛna kavia a. Míapuli mimɔa lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu a kĩ maamɔa a?” Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, bɔ́apuli.”
40020023	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ míapuli mimɔa foe, lɛmɛ nlá osi kĩ manyɛ oti a kĩ ye aadzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna ĩye yĩ sɛba. Fudzikɔ̃ a na nyɛ bikĩ Nda manɛ foe eyi a fude.”
40020024	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nkaɛ ewua a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bɛna kalɔkpa nɛ bawaɛ̃ nviã a akũ.
40020025	Foesũ Yesu vɛ be flee ɛkpɔta ade ebi be kĩ, “Minyina kĩ fɔgã a kĩ fɔanya amamufɔ akũ a deĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ be akũ, ade be banɔkɔɛ̃ lɛmɛ deĩ otumi baũ a nɛ be akũ a.
40020026	Lɛmɛ kɛtánɛ kĩ fɔana lɔmɔ nɛ mi kamɛ. Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi awɛ kĩ yanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya mi ɔsumunɛ.
40020027	Ade ayea ntɛ mi kamɛ odi awɛ kĩ yanya ɔtɔnyade ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya mi ɔsumunɛ,
40020028	ndɛ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ ɛtáya kĩ bisum ye, mbom kĩ yaasum ɛkɔa ye nkpã ɛkpa ɛnyɛ bati pii.”
40020029	Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nɛ́ bito Yeriko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ banaa ni, bati kɔdabu baũ tomɔ be.
40020030	Banɛkunɛ nviã kĩ bidzi nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ nu kĩ Yesu yaatɛ̃, foesũ biyi fɔwɔla kabɔa kayɔ kĩ, “Lɛgã Dawid Obi, mɔ́ boe kɔnya!”
40020031	Bati kɔdabu a wũni nɛ be akũ kĩ bɛfɔ̃ fɔwɔla kabɔa, lɛmɛ bɛbɔa fɔwɔla a kɔɔba bɛba bɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, Dawid Obi, mɔ́ boe kɔnya ni!”
40020032	Yesu fɔ̃ ɛdza ɛvɛ be kĩ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃. Evia be kĩ, “Litsa miawɛ kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi?”
40020033	Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, fɔ̃ boe anɛ ebinya.”
40020034	Be akũ kɔ Yesu kɔnya, ade ɛkɔa awɛ ɛta be banebi a. Deedimɔapɛ be anɛ binya bɛmɔ́ fɔkɔ ade bitomɔ ye a.
40021001	Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fuã Yerusalem, biwo Betfage kĩ ɛwaa nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ a, edo ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ.
40021002	Ebi be kĩ, “Minaa akula a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ mi lɔtɔ a kamɛ. Ntɛ misila miwo awã a, míamɔ kĩ bido aflimu mɔ obi ɔwɛ̃ bɛdzɛla. Miwũnya be mikpã mima yĩ.
40021003	Ntɛ odi via mi kadi ni, milɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate a sĩ be,’ lɔkɔa yaafɔnɛ be awɛ ɛkpa mi lɛtalɛta.”
40021004	Bɛkɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛ eyi a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
40021005	“Bi Zion ɔmatɔ a kĩ, ‘Dã kĩ nɔ lɛgã aya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃! Ɛdɔla ye akũ, edzi nɛ aflimu mɔ obi akũ yaya.’ ”
40021006	Ade fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa bɛnakɛna ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be kĩ bɛkɛna a.
40021007	Bɛkpã aflimu mɔ obi a bɛyamɛna, bɛkɔa be tilima bɛtɛɛtɛɛ nɛ be akũ ade Yesu de edzi a.
40021008	Bati kɔdabu a dzɛlɛ be tɛtadiɛ wulaa biko nɛ osi a akũ, ade badi lɛmɛ pãã pãã futse tɛnanɛ biko nɛ osi a akũ a.
40021009	Bati kɔdabu a kĩ bɛnya Yesu lɔtɔ mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye nɛ liti a kabɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Mitu osee nɛ Lɛgã Dawid Obinyole a akũ! Baguma ehila oti a kĩ yaya nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a! Mimu Baguma nɛ ode!”
40021010	Kĩ Yesu wo nɛ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, ɔmatɔ a flee bɔa obũ, ade bati via kĩ, “Owei nɛ awĩ a?”
40021011	Bati kɔdabu a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ade Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesu kĩ eto Nazaret nɛ Galilea tite akũ a.”
40021012	Ade Yesu nawo nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ɛblɔmɛna bati a kĩ bɛkanɔ fɔtsa mɔ bikĩ bɛkaya fɔtsa a nɛ awã ɛnɛmɛna. Edu bikĩ babɛ̃ sika a tupunu mɔ bikĩ banɔ mblɔduma a fukpo ewula,
40021013	ade ebi be kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Baavɛ Yĩ Asɔli Kɔla a kĩ mpaɛ kabɔakɔ̃’ lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ mikɔa koe mikɛna bayekpanɛ kabɛlakɔ̃!”
40021014	Ade banɛkunɛ mɔ abafã amɛ ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ade ɛtsa be fɔsɔ a.
40021015	Kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a mɔ́ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a, mɔ ayekĩ babisɛ̃ kabɔa fɔwɔla nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ kĩ, “Mitu osee nɛ Lɛgã Dawid Obinyole a akũ!” a ni, bɛna kalɔkpa paa.
40021016	Foesũ bivia Yesu nɛ kalɔkpa kamɛ kĩ, “Anu lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɛna kalɛ a?” Ade Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, manu. Mbɔɛɛ mitákã tɔ̃ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, ‘Babisɛ̃ mɔ bakɔkɔa onukpɛ̃ kamɛ kamu kĩ kɛkpɔla anɛ kato’ a?”
40021017	Ke liti a, Yesu dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be, ɛnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ade ɛnaa Betania ɛnawa nɛ awã a.
40021018	Nɛ kadekanyina ɔnɔnɛ a, kĩ emuniki yanaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, kɔlɛ kɔ ye.
40021019	Ɛmɔ́ kutse kĩ kɔawũ babi kĩ kɔdzɛ̃ nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ ade ɛbɛlɛ ɛnaa koe kayɔ a, lɛmɛ ɛtámɔ babi badima nɛ koe akũ kɛba tɔɔta nɛnɛ. Foesũ ebi kutse a kĩ, “Ɔláabuki owũ babi dadaada.” Deedimɔapɛ kutse a tɔɔta vɛ.
40021020	Kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, fɔkɛna be wãwã, foesũ bivia ye kĩ, “Nde fɔya mɔ kutse a tɔɔta vɛ mɔatsɛ lɔmɔ?”
40021021	Ade Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ ntɛ mitɛ mido, mɔ mitátɛ atsindze ni, míapuli mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ nkɛna kutse kĩĩ. Nnɛ́ fukĩĩ odi malo, míapuli mibi ɔtɔ kĩĩ kĩ, ‘Bɔlɛ kanaatɔ nɛ mpo kamɛ,’ ade yaabɔlɛ a.
40021022	Ntɛ mideĩ katɛkado ni, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ ni, míana foe.”
40021023	Kĩ Yesu muniki ɛya nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ ɛkatsa fɔtsa a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Otumi ɔdabe ɔnɛɛ akɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ? Owei lɛkpa nɔ osi a?”
40021024	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Maavia mi kalɛ mɔapɛ ade ntɛ mikpa yĩ ke mbuayɛ ni, maabi mi otumi a kĩ nnɛɛ nkɔa makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ.
40021025	Owei sɛkɛ̃ Yohanes tɛ otumi etomɛna mɔ ɛwɔla bati mui? Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ɛtɛ ye etomɛna mbɔɛɛ kĩ batidziwa sɛkɛ̃?” Ade bido foe kamɛ kasa awɛ nɛ be kamɛ kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́alɛ? Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ, ‘Eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃’ ni, yaavia boe kĩ, ‘Mɔ nde sũ mitátɛ Yohanes mido?’
40021026	Ade ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ, ‘Eto bati sɛkɛ̃’ ni, bɔavila lɛtsa a kĩ bati a aakɛna, kitonɛkĩ be flee bɛtɛ bido kĩ Yohanes nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ.”
40021027	Foesũ bɛkpa Yesu mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bunyína.” Ade Yesu lɛmɛ bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ yĩ malo nláabi mi awã kĩ ntomɛna otumi nnɛɛ makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ.”
40021028	“Nde mikɔna nɛ kalɛ kĩĩ akũ? Onyole odi deĩ babinyole nviã. Ɛnaa ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a sɛkɛ̃ ebi ye kĩ, ‘Yĩ obi, naa yĩ waĩ kɔba kamɛ nviã kanaakɛna adzuma kakpa yĩ.’
40021029	“Ye obi a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Nláanaa,’ lɛmɛ ke liti a, fuwo ye kalɔɛ ade ɛnaa kɔba a.
40021030	“Ɔlɛga a naa obi ɔyade a sɛkɛ̃ ebi ye kalɛ mɔapɛ a. Ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Awoo, papa maanaa,’ lɛmɛ ɛtánaa.
40021031	“Bati nviã kĩĩ kamɛ ɔɔdabe lɛkɛna nɛ ɔlɛga a kawɛ akũ?” Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a.” Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ adɔpaafɔ nya mi lɔtɔ bɛnaa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
40021032	Kitonɛkĩ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a ya kĩ yatsa mi osi wĩ a kĩ míatsã midzi nkpã a, mitátɛ ye mido. Mbom tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ adɔpaafɔ kɔ̃ tɛ ye bido. Ade titɔ kĩ mimɔ́ fukĩĩ malo ni, ke liti a mitádani adzuni mitɛ ye mido.”
40021033	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitse lɛgbã bɛbã lidi lɛmɛ. Kɔba ɔnɛnɛ odi nɛ́ waĩ kɔba, ade edzi kɔbã emini koe a. Ɛnyɛ lɛkɛ ɛkpa waĩ mui a kakã kako, ade eke kɔla geĩ kĩ oti aana nɛ awã ɛkadã kɔba a akũ. Ke liti ɛkɔa kɔba a edo nɛ waĩ kɔba banɛnɛ awɛ ɛdzakũ ɛnaa osi akũ.
40021034	Kĩ kutse babi a kana a wo ɔtɔ a, edo ye basumunɛ nɛ waĩ kɔba banɛnɛ a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bɛnaatɛ ye kanyakɔ̃ bɛma ye.
40021035	“Kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ a pi ye basumunɛ a, bibo ɔmɔa, bɛkɔ ɔbɛbã ade bɛtalɛ ɔlalɛde a boe a.
40021036	Ke liti a, kɔba ɔlate a buki edo basumunɛ bɛbã kĩ bɛpɔnɛ bɛbɛ̃ batɔnyade a, lɛmɛ kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ a kɛna be lɛtsa mɔapɛ a.
40021037	Nɛ foe kawũna kamɛ a, edo ye obi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Matɛ kado kĩ baanyɔã yĩ obi.’
40021038	“Lɛmɛ kĩ kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ a mɔ́ obi a, bibi akũ kĩ, ‘Ade fɔtsa ɔnyanɛ a nɛ awĩ a. Miya bɔkɔ ye, ye adzapadiɛ a ɛdani boe ade.’
40021039	Foesũ bipi ye bɛvɛlɛ bɛnɛmɛna nɛ kɔba a kamɛ, ade bɛkɔ ye a.”
40021040	Yesu via kĩ, “Finyaa, ntɛ waĩ kɔba ɔlate a ya ni, litsa yaakɛna kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ kĩĩ a?”
40021041	Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, yaawɔla bati kpa a na, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa kɔba a edo nɛ kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ bɛbã awɛ, bikĩ baakɔa ye kanyakɔ̃ bɛma ye nɛ fudutsa kakpɔta lɔkɔ kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.”
40021042	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitákã tɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a? ‘De a kĩ fɔla bakenɛ sĩ a, ade de lɛdani kɔla akũ de titiliwu a. Boe Ɔlate a lɛkɛna fukĩĩ. Fɔkɛna boe wãwã!’ ”
40021043	Yesu lɛ ebu kĩ, “Foesũ mabi mi kĩ, baatɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a nɛ mi awɛ bɛkɔa bɛkpa kade a kĩ kaawũ babi wĩ a.
40021044	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaanɛ ɛtɔ nɛ de kĩĩ akũ ni, yaaveli gblɛgblɛgblɛ, lɛmɛ owula kĩ ye akũ laaatɔ ni, laabubuli ye kpɛtɛkpɛtɛkpɛtɛ.”
40021045	Kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ a nu Yesu fɔgbã kĩĩ a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ be akũ fɔlɛtsa ɛkalɛ,
40021046	foesũ bɛwɛ kĩ bapi ye. Lɛmɛ bivila bati kɔdabu a, kitonɛkĩ bati a bu Yesu ndɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ aye.
40022001	Yesu buki ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ be nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ kĩ,
40022002	“Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ fukĩĩ. Lɛgã lidi te opunu ɛkpa obinyole nɛ ye obolitsɔ̃ kapi luwi akũ.
40022003	Lɛmɛ kĩ edo ye basumunɛ kĩ bɛnaavɛ bati a kĩ ɛkpa kanyi a kĩ bɛya nɛ kanyakɔ̃, bisĩ kaya.
40022004	“Foesũ ebuki edo basumunɛ bɛbã nɛ bikĩ bɛvɛ a sɛkɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, ‘Bɛtɔ yĩ funitsã a biyua, bɛkɔ yĩ banantsuenyole mɔ banantsue babi dɔliwa, bɛmanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa biyua. Miya nɛ obolitsɔ̃ luwi kanyakɔ̃ a!’
40022005	“Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ bɛvɛ a tákpeti ye kavɛ a, mbom bɛdzakũ bɛnaa be tudzuma kamɛ. Oti mɔa naa ye kɔba, ɔbɛbã naa kɔyaatɔ,
40022006	bati nkaɛ a pili basumunɛ a bɛkɛna be tɛnya ade bɛkɔ be a.
40022007	Lɛgã a na kalɔkpa paa, foesũ edo ye sodzafɔ bɛnakɔ awudifɔ a, bipila be ɔmatɔ a lɛmɛ.
40022008	“Ke liti a, ɛvɛ ye basumunɛ ebi be kĩ, ‘Biyua obolitsɔ̃ kapi funitsã a katɔ, lɛmɛ bati a kĩ nvɛ a táfɛta obu a kĩ nkpa be a.
40022009	Foesũ finyaa minaa ɔmatɔ a tɔblɔnu kpale akũ minaavɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ míamɔ ɛya nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a.’
40022010	Ade basumunɛ a nɛ bɛnaa tɔblɔnu akũ bɛnakpã odi nyɛ odi kĩ bɛmɔ́, bati wĩ mɔ bati kpa flee, ade obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ a yi mɔ bati a.
40022011	“Kĩ lɛgã a nawo kĩ yadã bikĩ bɛvɛ a, ɛmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ ɛtádo obolitsɔ̃ kapi atadiɛ nɛ awã.
40022012	Ade lɛgã a via ye kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔba, nde ɔkɛna owo nɛ awĩ kĩ ɔtádo obolitsɔ̃ kapi atadiɛ?’ Lɛmɛ onyole a tɔ lumumu.
40022013	“Foesũ lɛgã a bi ye basumunɛ a kĩ, ‘Misui ye akpɔ mɔ abɔa mita ye mimuni nɛ kanya nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, awã kĩ yaabe ɛba adɔ̃.’ ”
40022014	Yesu wũna kĩ, “Bati beblebee bavɛ, lɛmɛ be sukuloomɛ bapau.”
40022015	Farisifɔ a nanaa adzina ayekĩ banaĩ Yesu bɛtsãmɛna fɔlɛtsa kavia kamɛ, bɛna ye nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ.
40022016	Foesũ bido be fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ Herodes a kamɛ badi nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bunyina kĩ odeĩ ɔnɔkɔali, atsa Baguma osi a nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ, ade ɔtsɛ́la odima akũ, kitonɛkĩ aádã oti anɛ.
40022017	Foesũ bi boe nɔ adzuni. Boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bute tɔgɔlɛ bɔkpa Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃, mbɔɛɛ kĩ ɛtákpa osi?”
40022018	Lɛmɛ Yesu mɔ́ be adzuni kpa a kĩ bɛbɔɛ a eyi ɔsũ, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Nde sũ miasɔ yĩ midã?
40022019	Mikɔa sika a kĩ miakɔa kase ɔgɔlɛ a mitsa yĩ.” Bɛkɔa sika a bɛma ye,
40022020	ade evia be kĩ, “Owei lɔlɔ kata mɔ dĩ teĩ nɛ se akũ?”
40022021	Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ fude fɔanɛ.” Foesũ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mikɔa lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ lide mikpa ye, ade mikɔa lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ Baguma lide lɛmɛ mikpa Baguma.”
40022022	Kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a fɔkɛna be saa, ade bɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ bɛdzakũ a.
40022023	Luwi mɔapɛ a, Zadukifɔ kĩ balɛ kĩ banɔkpa kayidza lɛláa kamɛ badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bɛyavia ye
40022024	kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, Mose bi boe kĩ ntɛ onyole odi kĩ ɛtáma ku ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɔwaɛ̃nyole ɛkɔã okunawa a lɔkɔa bɛma bido ye lɔlɔ.
40022025	Finyaa bawaɛ̃nyole evũkɔnɔ badi dzi nɛ boe kamɛ tɔ̃ nɛ awĩ. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a kɔã ɔtsɔ̃ lɛmɛ bɛmɔ ye bɛtáma fɔmɔ eku, foesũ ɛfɔnɛ ye okunawa a eyi ɛkpa ɔwaɛ̃nyole a.
40022026	Ade lɛtsa mɔapɛ a lɛya nɛ ɔyade a, mɔ ɔlalɛde a, kɛnawo ovũkɔnɔde a akũ a.
40022027	Nɛ foe kawũna kamɛ a, otsole a lɛmɛ ku.
40022028	Finyaa, nɛ luwi a kĩ banɔkpa aayidza bidzi nkpã akũ a, be kamɛ ɔɔdabe ɔtsɔ̃ yaanya, kitonɛkĩ banyole evũkɔnɔ a flee kɔã ye tɔ̃ a?”
40022029	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mikɛna mfumsu, kitonɛkĩ minyína Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a fɔlɛtsa mɔ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a.
40022030	Kitonɛkĩ nɛ banɔkpa kayidza kadzi nkpã kamɛ ni, bɛláakɔã batsɔ̃ ĩye bidzi fɔnyɔ, mbom baana ndɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ aye.
40022031	Mbɔɛɛ mitákã tɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ banɔkpa kayidza kadzi nkpã akũ a? Ɛlɛ kĩ,
40022032	‘Yĩ nyɛ Abraham Baguma, mɔ Isak Baguma mɔ Yakob Baguma.’ Nnɛ́ banɔkpa Baguma yanɛ, mbom batidziwa ade yanɛ.”
40022033	Kĩ bati kɔdabu a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, akũ dzuli be nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
40022034	Kĩ Farisifɔ a nu kĩ Zadukifɔ a tápuli bɛdza nɛ Yesu anɛ a, bɛnakpɔta nɛ kakɔ mɔa,
40022035	ade be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ ɛnyɛ mbla ɔtsanɛ sɔ Yesu ɛdã nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavia kamɛ kĩ,
40022036	“Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, Mose mbla aádabe bɛ̃ nɛ te kamɛ?”
40022037	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Wɛ boe Ɔlate, nɔ Baguma a kalɛ mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ flee, mɔ nɔ ɔkla flee, mɔ nɔ adzuni flee.
40022038	Ade mbla kĩĩ nyɛ atɔnyade mɔ ekĩ ɛbɛ̃ flefle a.
40022039	Mbla ayade a la ndɛ ye, ‘Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ mɔawɛ akũ kalɛ.’
40022040	Ade tɛbla nviã kĩĩ akũ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔtsa katsa a flee dzɛ̃ a.”
40022041	Kĩ Farisifɔ a yakpɔta a, Yesu via be kĩ,
40022042	“Litsa nyɛ mi adzuni nɛ Kristo akũ? Owei obinyole yanɛ?” Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛgã Dawid kasinu kamɛ ɔwa yanɛ.”
40022043	Ade Yesu via be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ nde sũ Dawid tsã Hũhũ kamɛ ɛvɛ ye kĩ, ‘Ɔlate’? Kitonɛkĩ Dawid lɛ kĩ,
40022044	‘Boe Ɔlate bi yĩ Ɔlate a kĩ, “Dzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna kɛnaawo kĩ maakɔa nɔ bakesĩnɛ ndo nɛ nɔ abɔa kayɔ.” ’
40022045	Ntɛ Dawid vɛ Kristo kĩ Ɔlate a ni, nde Kristo aapuli ɛnya Dawid obinyole?”
40022046	Be kamɛ odima tápuli ɛkpa Yesu mbuayɛ, ade kito luwi a kanaa a, odima tádo ɔwɔlɛ ebuki evia ye kalɛ kadima.
40023001	Ke liti a, Yesu bi bati kɔdabu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fɔlɛtsa kĩ,
40023002	“Mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ a bɛkpa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ banyɛ Mose mbla a kayɔ.
40023003	Foesũ mikɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bibi mi kĩ mikɛna a mipi foe midomɔ akũ. Lɛmɛ mitadã be fɔkɛlatsa mikɛna, kitonɛkĩ baákɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ balɛ a akũ.
40023004	“Bisuli fɔtsa mɔ ɔlɔmɛ kĩ fudeĩ ɔsĩ mɔ kalɔ bɛlɔla bati, lɛmɛ be mɔawɛ a kɔ̃ baáwɛ kĩ bayo lawobi malo bibumɛna bati foe kalɔ.
40023005	Bakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ayekĩ bati bɛmɔ be kɛkɛ. Bakɔa fumakɛ kĩ fɔsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa bite kabɔa nɛ nnyɛ mɔ akpɔ. Ade bakɛna be tɛtadiɛ wulaa atɔ tɛsa, tɛvanɛ mɔ mpɛsɛmpɛsɛ gɛlɛɛlɛgɛlɛɛlɛ a!
40023006	Bawɛ kĩ badzi nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ nɛ kanyakɔ̃, mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃.
40023007	Bawɛ kĩ bati bɛwɔ̃na be mɔ obu nɛ kɔyaatɔ, bɛvɛ be kĩ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ mɔ obu.
40023008	“Kɛtánɛ kĩ bavɛ mi kɔ̃ kĩ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, kitonɛkĩ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ mɔapɛ mideĩ, ade mi flee minyɛ bawaɛ̃ a.
40023009	Ade ayea mitavɛ odima nɛ tite akũ kĩ mi Ɔlɛga, kitonɛkĩ Ɔlɛga mɔapɛ mideĩ nɛ ode.
40023010	Mitafɔ̃ odima lɛvɛ mi kĩ Ɔkpãnɛ malo, kitonɛkĩ ɔkpãnɛ mɔapɛ mideĩ, kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo.
40023011	Oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ mi kamɛ ni, ɛnya mi ɔsumunɛ.
40023012	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yadɛla ye akũ nɛ ode ni, baakɛna ye nɛ kayɔ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ni, baadɛla ye nɛ ode.
40023013	“Lɛmɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ bɔbɔɛ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Mibalɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a onyukpɛ̃ a mido bati. Mi mɔawɛ a miáwo, ade miákpa bikĩ bɛbɔa mbɔdi kĩ bawo a osi biwo a.
40023014	“Makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ bɔbɔɛ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Miatɛ bakunawa tɔtɔ nɛ be awɛ ade miabɔa mpaɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ kakɔa tsa akũ a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ míana sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ mɔ ɔsĩ sɛba!
40023015	“Makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ bɔbɔɛ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Mitsã mpo akũ minyina minaa fude fude kĩ miawɛ oti mɔapɛ ɛdani Yudani, lɛmɛ ntɛ midani ye a, miakɛna ye titi nviã ɛkpɔla ɛkpa fi luwotu kamɛ kanaa ndɛ mi aye!
40023016	“Makpa mi banɛkunɛ a kĩ bakpã bati a bɔbɔɛ! Mialɛ kĩ, ‘Ntɛ odi tani Asɔli Kɔla ni, fɔnyɛ́ lɛtsama, lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛtani sika ngbã nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, fubo a pi ye.’
40023017	Banɛkunɛ bakɔasia! Fɔɔdabe bɛ̃ kɔya? Sika ngbã a mbɔɛɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kĩ kɔfɔ̃ sika a akũ kpalɛ a?
40023018	Miatsa fɔtsa lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Ntɛ odi tani Baguma afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a ni, fɔnyɛ́ lɛtsama, lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛtani afɔliɛ fɔtsa a nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a akũ kɔ̃ ni, ɛlɔ fubo.’
40023019	Banɛkunɛ mianɛ nuwĩ! Fɔɔdabe bɛ̃ kɔya? Futetsa a mbɔɛɛ kĩ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a kĩ ye lɛkpalɛ futetsa a akũ a?
40023020	Foesũ ntɛ odi tani afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a ni, ɛtani ye mɔ futetsa a kĩ futeĩ nɛ atɛnyɛ a akũ a flee.
40023021	Ade ntɛ odi tani Asɔli Kɔla a ni, ɛtani koe mɔ Baguma a kĩ edzi nɛ koe kamɛ a.
40023022	Ade ayea ntɛ odi tani ode ni, ɛtani Baguma lɛgãkpo mɔ Baguma a kĩ edzi nɛ de akũ a.
40023023	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ mianɛ! Miakpa Baguma tuwĩ kĩ bakɔa kado funitsã ɔlɛ̃ te kamɛ kasɛ̃ katsu kawuade a pɛpɛɛpɛ, lɛmɛ mifɔnɛ mbla fɔtsa katsa sĩwa, kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ nɛ osi kpĩĩ, kɔnyakamɔ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kadi awɛ. Ade fukĩĩ kufɛ kɛfɛta kĩ miakɛna lɔkɔa mikɛna fɔbɛbã a mibu a.
40023024	Banɛkunɛ bati bakpãnɛ! Miasɔni kɔyabi kanyɛ nɛ bavɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ miamɛna ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kanɛ mɔ lɔpɔ!
40023025	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Miavɔlɛ mi kuyei mɔ titsensi liti yededeede, lɛmɛ foe kamɛ yi mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ mikɔa kɔbɛ̃ mɔ anɛngbã mitɛ a.
40023026	Nɔ Farisini ɔnɛkunɛ, nya lɔtɔ kavɔlɛ kayei a kamɛ, lɔkɔa ke liti lɛmɛ aakpalɛ!
40023027	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Mila ndɛ funikɛ kĩ bikputa mɔ tite ovoe kĩ fɔalɛ kadã, lɛmɛ foe kamɛ yi mɔ banɔkpa fɔtsɔ̃ mɔ sukɛna vɔ̃wa.
40023028	Ade ayea miatsa akũ nɛ bati anɛ ndɛ bati wĩ, lɛmɛ mi kamɛ kɔ̃ yi mɔ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa kakɛna mɔ tɔkpa.
40023029	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Mike funi mɔ kalɛ mikpa Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a ade mihɛhɛ bikĩ bidzi nkpã wĩ a anɛ kate fɔtsa a.
40023030	Ade mialɛ kĩ, ‘Ntɛ budzi nkpã nɛ boe bawanyɔ lɔkɔ a ni, kufɛ bɔtákɛna ɔmɔa mɔ be bɔkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a.’
40023031	Ade fukĩĩ mikɔa midi adansiɛ nɛ mi akũ kĩ minyɛ bati a kĩ bɛkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a bawa!
40023032	Nɛ foesũ mikɛna minaa lɔtɔ, lɔkɔa miyula lɛtsa a kĩ mi bawanyɔ yi kayɔ a!
40023033	“Mi bati kĩ bɛla ndɛ bɔɛ babi! Kakɔna mikɔna kĩ míapuli milo, kĩ bɛláakɔ mi kɔtɔ bɛkpa fi luwotu kamɛ kanaa?
40023034	Foesũ mabi mi kĩ maado Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, anyansãfɔ, mɔ fɔtsa batsanɛ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Míakɔ badi, mibɔa babɛbã nɛ asendua akũ, míabo badi mɔ mple nɛ mi fɔtsɛnakɔ̃, mitomɔ be liti kito ɔmatɔ kɛnaa ɔmatɔ.
40023035	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bati wĩ babɔanɛ a kĩ biwula a flee aaya nɛ mi akũ. Fɔ́ayi kayɔ futo oti kpĩĩ Abel babɔanɛ akũ kɛnaawo Zakaria, Barakiya obi a kĩ mikɔ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla mɔ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a kayite a akũ.
40023036	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ nɛ wuda kĩĩ flee akũ aaya nɛ mi nviã babi akũ!
40023037	“Yerusalem, Yerusalem, nɔ a kĩ ɔkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, ade ɔnɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ Baguma do nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ a boe a! Titi eni nwɛ kufɛ kĩ makpɔta nɔ babi ndɛ ayekĩ ɔkɔkɔ bima akpɔta ye babi kado nɛ fupoki kayɔ, lɛmɛ ɔtátunɔ!
40023038	Dã, baafɔnɛ nɔ tɔtɔ awɛ biyi tɛdza luto.
40023039	Mabi nɔ kĩ kito finyaa kanaa ni, ɔláabuki ɔmɔ́ yĩ kɛnaawo kĩ aalɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma hila oti a kĩ yaya nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a.’ ”
40024001	Kĩ Yesu nɛ́ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ yanaa a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ kĩ batsa ye ayekĩ bike kɔla a flee a.
40024002	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Midã fukĩĩ flee kadã wĩ. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ bɛláatina de lidima nɛ lɔkɔba akũ kĩ bɛláadu bimuni.”
40024003	Kĩ Yesu nɛ edzi nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛla bɔɛɛ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe fɔtsa kĩĩ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ. Bi boe lɛtsa a kĩ laanya nɔ kaya mɔ katinya kamɛ kawũna a nsɛntsɛlɛni.”
40024004	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ ayekĩ odima lɛláakɛ mi.
40024005	Kitonɛkĩ bati pii aaya nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Kristo a.’ Baakɛ bati pii.
40024006	Míanu kawũ kanɔ mɔ kawũ akũ fɔlɛtsa mɔ lugo. Lɛmɛ mitafɔ̃ fɔtsa kĩĩ lɛbɔlɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ, lɛmɛ fɔátsa kĩ katinya kamɛ kawũna a wo ɔtɔ.
40024007	Ɔmaĩ aanɔ mɔ akũ, ade fɔgã kanyakɔ̃ aayidza bɛnɔ mɔ fɔgã kanyakɔ̃ a. Kɔlɛ aana, ade tite aakuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ fɔkɔ pii a.
40024008	Fukĩĩ flee la ndɛ ɔmatsɔ̃ sɛmɛ kapi kawo a kayɔkayi aye.
40024009	“Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, baanyɛ mi bɛkpa kĩ bɛkɛna mi awɔda, bɛkɔ mi malo. Batidziwa flee aakesĩ mi nɛ yĩ sũ.
40024010	Bati pii aamuniki nɛ be katɛkado liti. Baanyɛ be akũ akũ abɔa, bikesĩ akũ lɛmɛ.
40024011	Fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ aanɛ bɛkpã bati pii bɛyɛla osi.
40024012	Tɔkpa kakɛna aade nɛ ode paa kĩ bati pii ɔdɔ onukpɛ̃ aadɔ.
40024013	Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaadza pintii ɛnawo kawũna ni, Baguma aatɛ ye.
40024014	Baalɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ fɔlɛtsa nɛ katinya kamɛ flee fɔnya adansiɛ fɔkpa batidziwa flee. Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a, katinya kawũna a aaya.
40024015	“Ntɛ mimɔ́ Fɔtsa mɔ libe kĩ fɔakɔ Ɔmaĩ, kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Daniel lɛ foe akũ fɔlɛtsa eyi a kĩ fɔdzɛ̃ nɛ kakɔ kpalɛwa a, nɔ ovoli kĩĩ ɔkãnɛ, nu foe kayɔ dzununuunu,
40024016	lɔkɔa bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea, bilo bɛnaa tɔtɔ a akũ.
40024017	Oti a kĩ edeĩ nɛ kɔla ode ni, ɛtaduma ɛka kĩ yanaabɔɛ ye akũ fɔtsa ɛnɛmɛna nɛ kɔla kamɛ.
40024018	Ade ayea oti a kĩ edeĩ nɛ kɔba lɛmɛ, ɛtamuniki ɛya kĩ yanaabɔɛ ye atadiɛ.
40024019	Lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa bamatsɔ̃ mɔ bikĩ babi amɛmɛ nɛ awɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ.
40024020	Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa Baguma kĩ mi kalo lɔkɔ lɛtana nɛ osili lɔkɔ ĩye Kawɛya Luwi akũ!
40024021	Kitonɛkĩ lubo kamɔ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ aana ɔsĩ lɛba lidi nyɛ lidi kĩ lɛya tɔ̃, kito katinya kayɔkayi kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ, ade de odu lɛmɛ lɛláabuki lɛya dadaada a.
40024022	Ntɛ Baguma ɛtatinya lubokamɔ fuwi a na akũ kɔkɔɛ ni, kufɛ otidziwa odima lɛláana nkpã. Lɛmɛ nɛ bati a kĩ ɛpau eyi a sũ ni, Baguma aatinya fuwi a akũ.
40024023	“Foesũ ntɛ odi bi mi kĩ, ‘Dã, Kristo deĩ nɛ awĩ,’ ĩye ‘Amɔ ye nɛ akĩĩ’ ni, mitatɛ foe mido.
40024024	Kitonɛkĩ fɔvã kristofɔ mɔ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ aanɛ, ade baakɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni mɔ awãwã fɔtsa kĩ ntɛ baapuli bɛkɛ bikĩ Baguma pau a malo.
40024025	Midã, mbi mi fukĩĩ ĩnyamɛna lɔtɔ fɔmɔ lɔkɔ a aawo ɔtɔ.
40024026	“Foesũ ntɛ bati bi mi kĩ, ‘Dã, edeĩ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ’ ni, mitanaa awã. Ade ayea ntɛ bati lɛ kĩ, ‘Dã, edeĩ nɛ kɔla kamɛ’ ni, mitatɛ foe mido.
40024027	Kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a kaya aana ndɛ ayekĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ amɔanɛ kato suwa kadekɔ̃ kanaa suwa katomukɔ̃ a.
40024028	“Awã kĩ fɔtsa kuwa deĩ ni, ade awã fɔpɛtɛ akpɔta a.
40024029	“Ntɛ lubo kamɔ fuwi a na yatɛ̃ pɛ, suwa aake ɔtũ, odetɔ lɛmɛ lɛláabuki ɛvɔlɛ. Fusibii aato ode fɔtɔ ade kɔbɛ̃ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ a aakuna akũ, fɔdzakũ nɛ foe kadzakɔ̃ a.
40024030	“Ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ mɔ Otidziwa Obi a nsɛntsɛlɛni aanɛ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ, ade tite akũ bati flee aabe, ade baamɔ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ yaya nɛ luflututu akũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ kukũkpalɛ kpale kamɛ.
40024031	Baavɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ kpale a, lɔkɔa yaado ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛnaa katinya tukonto ɛna a akũ, bɛnaakpɔta ye bati a kĩ ɛpau a kito katinya sɛkɛ kĩĩ kɛnaa sɛkɛ kĩĩ akũ.
40024032	“Mikɔlɛ fɔtsa nɛ atɔ kutse a akũ. Ntɛ kɔnɛ tɛbabi vɔɛ̃ mɔ kudo tɔɔta blɔblɔ kanɛ awɛ ni, minyina kĩ ovio lɔkɔ fuã.
40024033	Ade ayea ntɛ mimɔ́ fɔtsa a kĩ nlɛ flee a ni, minyi kĩ katinya kawũna a lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ fuyua.
40024034	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aaya nɛ foe kamɛ, fɔmɔ nviã babi kasinu kĩĩ flee aaku.
40024035	Tite mɔ ode aayatɛ̃, lɛmɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a kɔ̃ onukpɛ̃ lɛláatɛ̃ da.
40024036	“Odima linyína luwi ĩye dɔũhuilɛ a kĩ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ. Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ĩye Obi mɔawɛ a malo linyína, mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga odi keĩ nyina.
40024037	Otidziwa Obi a kaya aana ndɛ ayekĩ fɔya nɛ Noa lɔkɔ a.
40024038	Nɛ fuwi a kĩ fɔnya mui kayili nɛ tite akũ lɔtɔ kamɛ a, bati kanya bɛkamɔa, bɛkakɔã batsɔ̃, bɛkakɔã banyole kɛnawo luwi a kĩ Noa wo nɛ adaka ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ,
40024039	lɛmɛ bɛtányi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛkaya kɛnawo kĩ mui kayili a yalɔ be flee ɛnamɛna. Ade aye lɛmɛ Otidziwa Obi a kaya aana a.
40024040	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, banyole nviã aakakɛna adzuma nɛ kɔba, baabɔɛ ɔmɔa bɛnamɛna, bɛfɔnɛ ɔmɔa awɛ biyi.
40024041	Batsole nviã aakawɔlɛ onuvoe nɛ kɔwɔlɛ akũ, baabɔɛ ɔmɔa bɛfɔnɛ ɔyade a biyi.
40024042	“Foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyína luwi a kĩ de akũ mi Ɔlate a aaya.
40024043	Ntɛ kanyi tɔtɔ ɔlate nyina lɔkɔ a kĩ oyekpanɛ aawo nɛ ye akũ ni, kufɛ esi lipe kĩ ɛtákpa oyekpanɛ a osi ewo nɛ ye kɔla kamɛ.
40024044	Nɛ foesũ mi malo mimanɛ akũ miyi, kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a aaya nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ miádã ye anɛ a akũ.
40024045	“Foesũ owei nyɛ ɔsumunɛ ɔnɔkɔalini mɔ kadi onyinɛ? Ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ ye ɔlate kɔa ɛdzɛla nɛ ye basumunɛ bɛbã onukpɛ̃ kĩ ɛkpa be funitsã nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ akũ.
40024046	Bihila ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ye Ɔlate aato osi akũ ɛyaamɔ kĩ ɛlamɛna adzuma a kĩ ɛkpa ye a kakɛna!
40024047	Ɔnɔkɔali mabi mi kĩ, ɔlate a aakɔa ye ɛdzɛla nɛ ye fɔtsa flee onukpɛ̃.
40024048	Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛnyɛ ɔsumunɛ kpa ni, yaabi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Yĩ ɔlate a lɛláaya mɔatsɛ!’
40024049	mɔ edo ye bakɔba basumunɛ a kabo awɛ, yanya kamɔa mɔ bavɛ bawuganɛ ni,
40024050	ye ɔlate a aamuniki ɛya nɛ luwi a kĩ ɛtáte anɛ mɔ lɔkɔ kĩ enyína akũ.
40024051	Ye ɔlate a aablɔmɛna ye, ɛvɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ ɛfɔ̃ ɛna tsɛfã mɔ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ. Ade awã yaabe ɛba adɔ̃ a.
40025001	“Lɔkɔ a kĩ Otidziwa Obi a aaya a, Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a aana ndɛ bayitsɔ̃ ewua kĩ bɛbɔɛ be tɛsɛdza kĩ banaatsɛlamɔ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ.
40025002	Be elo nyɛ bakɔasia, be elo lɛmɛ nyɛ anyansãfɔ.
40025003	Kĩ badzimbifɔ a bɔɛ be tɛsɛdza a, bɛtábɔɛ kugua bibu.
40025004	Anyansãfɔ a kɔ̃ ko kugua nɛ titontolowa kamɛ bɛlɛ bibu mɔ be tɛsɛdza a.
40025005	Obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a táya mɔatsɛ, foesũ tida bɔɛ bayitsɔ̃ a, ade bɛwa tida a.
40025006	“Nɛ lɛnyɛ kayite a, binu fɔwɔla kĩ, ‘Amɔ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a nɛ awĩ tsoo! Minɛ miyaatsɛla mɔ ye!’
40025007	“Ade bayitsɔ̃ ewua a yidza bɛtɛna be tɛsɛdza a.
40025008	Badzimbifɔ a bi anyansãfɔ a kĩ, ‘Mikpa boe mi kugua a kudi, kitonɛkĩ boe tɛsɛdza lamɔ kadĩ.’
40025009	“Lɛmɛ anyansãfɔ a kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Oowo, kukĩ bɔnɛɛ a lɛláato bɔmɔ mi. Minaa bikĩ banɔ a sɛkɛ̃ minaaya mi kude.’
40025010	“Lɛmɛ kĩ bayitsɔ̃ badzimbifɔ a dzakũ bɛnaaya kugua a, obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a yaya. Bayitsɔ̃ elo a kĩ bɛmanɛ akũ a, tomɔ ye bɛnaa obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ a, ade bɛbalɛ opunu a.
40025011	“Ke liti a, bayitsɔ̃ nkaɛ a muniki bɛya, ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, boe Ɔlate, binya opunu kakpa boe!’
40025012	“Obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Oowo! Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ĩnyína mi!’ ”
40025013	Yesu lɛ ewũna kĩ, “Nɛ foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyína luwi ĩye dɔũhuilɛ a.
40025014	“Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ. Onyole odi manɛ akũ kĩ yanaa osi akũ. Ɛvɛ ye basumunɛ ɛkpɔta ade ɛkɔa ye fɔtsa kĩ edeĩ a edo nɛ be awɛ a.
40025015	Ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye mbɔdibɔ onukpɛ̃. Foesũ ɛkpa oti mɔa sika ovoe mpim elo, ɛkpa ɔbɛbã mpim nviã, ade ɛkpa ɔlalɛde a apim mɔa, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa osi akũ a.
40025016	Ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ sika mpim elo a, nadani awɛ nɛ se akũ ɛna mpim elo nfasɔ ete nɛ se akũ.
40025017	Ade ayea oti a kĩ ɛtɛ sika mpim nviã lɛmɛ nadani awɛ nɛ se akũ ɛna mpim nviã ete nɛ se akũ a.
40025018	Lɛmɛ ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ apim mɔa a, natu lɛkɛ ɛkɔa ye ɔlate sika a ɛkɔla nɛ de kamɛ.
40025019	“Nɛ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ liti a, be ɔlate a muniki ɛya, ade ɛkɛna akunta mɔ be a.
40025020	Ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ sika mpim elo a kɔa se mɔ mpim elo kute a ɛyamɛna ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, sika mpim elo a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a, dã nna mpim elo bɛbã nte nɛ se akũ.’
40025021	“Ye ɔlate a bi ye kĩ, ‘Mbo, ɔsumunɛ wĩ mɔ ɔnɔkɔalini! Odi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ, foesũ maakɔa nɔ ndzɛla nɛ fɔtsa pii onukpɛ̃. Yaawo nɛ yĩ kawɔlɛkamɔ kamɛ!’
40025022	“Ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ sika mpim nviã a lɛmɛ yalɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, ɔkpa yĩ sika mpim nviã. Dã, nna mpim nviã bɛbã kute nte nɛ se akũ.’
40025023	“Ye ɔlate bi ye kĩ, ‘Mbo, ɔsumunɛ wĩ mɔ ɔnɔkɔalini! Odi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ foesũ maakɔa nɔ ndzɛla nɛ fɔtsa pii onukpɛ̃. Yaawo nɛ yĩ kawɔlɛkamɔ kamɛ!’
40025024	“Ade oti a kĩ ɛtɛ sika apim mɔa a yabi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ĩnyina nɔ kĩ oti mɔ ɔsĩ anɛ. Ana fɔtsa nɛ awã kĩ ɔtádu foe, ade akpɔta funitsã nɛ awã kĩ ɔtádu foe a.
40025025	Nɛ foesũ nvila, ade nnakɔa nɔ sika a nnabila nɛ tite kamɛ a. Amɔ nɔ fɔtsa nɛ awĩ.’
40025026	“Ye ɔlate kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ ɔsumunɛ kpa mɔ ɔnyɔnɛpo! Ntɛ onyina kĩ mana fɔtsa nɛ awã kĩ ntádu foe, ade makpɔta fɔtsa nɛ awã kĩ ntásã foe a ni,
40025027	kufɛ kakɔa akɔa sika a ɔnaado nɛ sika kakɔlakɔ̃ ayekĩ ntɛ mmuniki ĩya, maatɛ se mɔ se akũ kute a.
40025028	“ ‘Mitɛ sika a nɛ ye awɛ, mikɔa se mikpa oti a kĩ edeĩ sika mpim ewua a.
40025029	Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ fɔtsa ni, baakɔa fɔtsa pii bibu ye, ade yaana foe fublusu a. Lɛmɛ oti a kĩ ɛlá lɛtsama ni, foe kabii a kĩ edeĩ a malo baatɛ foe nɛ ye awɛ.
40025030	Ɔsumunɛ kĩ ye akũ lɛlá nfasɔ kĩĩ lɛnɛ́nɛ ɛkpa lɛtsama kakɛna. Foesũ mita ye mimuni nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ. Ade awã yaana ebe ɛba adɔ̃ a.’
40025031	“Ntɛ Otidziwa Obi a to ode ɛya nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ kamɛ, kĩ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ flee a tomɔ ye a, yaadzi nɛ ye lɛgãkpo a akũ.
40025032	Ade baakpɔta katinya kamɛ bati flee nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ a. Adeke, yaasɛ̃ be nɛ kutsu nviã kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ baveli ɔkpãnɛ asɛ̃ baveli mɔ kutukpabi kamɛ a.
40025033	Yaakɔa bati wĩ a ɛdzala nɛ ye sɔmɔna, lɔkɔa bati kpa a anna nɛ ye sɛba.
40025034	“Lɛgã a aabi bati nɛ ye sɔmɔna a kĩ, ‘Miya, mi a kĩ Nda hila a. Miyaawo nɛ lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a kĩ bɛmanɛ biyi bɛkpa mi a kamɛ, kito anɛ kĩ bɛbɔa katinya kamɛ a,
40025035	kitonɛkĩ kĩ kɔlɛ kɔ yĩ a, mikpa yĩ litsedi ĩnya. Kĩ ɔmɔado kɔ̃ yĩ a, mikpa yĩ mui mmɔa, ade kĩ ĩnyɛ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ a, mitɛ yĩ nɛ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ.
40025036	Kĩ ndzi ɔdzɔ a, mido yĩ atadiɛ, kĩ masɔ a midã yĩ akũ, ade kĩ nwaa kɔla a, miyasɛla yĩ.’
40025037	“Ade bati wĩ a aavia ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, luwei bɔmɔ́ nɔ kĩ kɔlɛ kɔ nɔ mɔ bɔkpa nɔ funitsã, ĩye kĩ ɔmɔado kɔ nɔ mɔ bɔkpa nɔ mui ɔmɔa?
40025038	Luwei bɔmɔ́ nɔ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ mɔ bɔtɛ nɔ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, ĩye luwei ɔtsã ɔdzɔ mɔ bɔkpa nɔ atadiɛ odo?
40025039	Luwei ɔsɔ mɔ bɔdã nɔ akũ, ĩye luwei ɔwa kɔla mɔ bɔyasɛla nɔ?’
40025040	“Lɛgã a aakpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mikɛna mikpa nwaɛ̃ amɛ babisɛ̃ kĩĩ kĩ bɛlá obu a kamɛ odi ni, yĩ mikɛna foe mikpa!’
40025041	“Adeke mɔ Lɛgã a aabi bikĩ nɛ ye sɛba a kĩ, ‘Minɛ liti nɛ yĩ akũ, mi bati kĩ Baguma dumu! Mitɔ minaa fi kĩ fɔádĩ da a kĩ bɛmanɛ bɛkpa Abonsam mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ!
40025042	Kɔlɛ kɔ yĩ lɛmɛ mitákpa yĩ ĩnya, ɔmɔado kɔ yĩ lɛmɛ mitákpa yĩ mui mmɔa.
40025043	Ĩnya ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ lɛmɛ mitátɛ yĩ nɛ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ. Ndzi ɔdzɔ lɛmɛ mitádo yĩ atadiɛ. Nsɔ mitádã yĩ akũ, ade nwa kɔla lɛmɛ mitáyaasɛla yĩ a.’
40025044	“Ade be malo baakpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, luwei tɔ̃ kɔlɛ kɔ nɔ, ĩye ɔmɔado kɔnɔ, ĩye ɔnya ɔnɔvɔɛ̃, ĩye odzi ɔdzɔ, ĩye ɔsɔ, ĩye kĩ ɔwa kɔla mɔ bɔtákɛna lɛtsama bɔkpa nɔ?’
40025045	“Lɛgã a aakpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mitákɛna mikpa nwaɛ̃ amɛ babisɛ̃ kĩ bɛlá obu kĩĩ kamɛ odi ni, yĩ mitákɛna foe mikpa.’
40025046	“Foesũ baanamɔ bati kĩĩ lubokamɔ a kĩ lɛlá kawũna a kamɛ, lɛmɛ bati wĩ a aanaa nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a kamɛ.”
40026001	Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee eyua a, ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ,
40026002	“Minyina kĩ kite fuwi nviã kĩ banya Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi a. Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ, baanyɛ Otidziwa Obi a bɛkpa kĩ bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.”
40026003	Ade basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a tsɛna nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Kaiafa tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
40026004	Bɛkɛna nhihiɛ kĩ baapi Yesu nɛ kabɛla kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛkɔ ye.
40026005	Bɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔakɛna foe nɛ fuwi kanya a kamɛ, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, bati a aado ɔtutũ nɛ ɔmaĩ a kamɛ.”
40026006	Yesu naa Simon kĩ ɛsɔ tɔ̃ fɔsɔ ngbã a awã nɛ Betania.
40026007	Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu dzi nɛ opunu akũ ɛkanya a, otsole odi kĩ ɛnɛɛ tumpã mɔ kalɛ, kĩ eyi mɔ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ yatsokui kugua eko nɛ Yesu lɔlɔ kamɛ.
40026008	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, bɛna kalɔkpa ade bivia kĩ, “Nde sũ yabula kugua a kade lɔmɔ?
40026009	Baapuli bɛnɔ koe mɔ kɔya baũ lɔkɔa bɛkɔa se bite ahiãfɔ!”
40026010	Yesu nu lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ a, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Nde sũ miaha otsole kĩĩ? Ɛkɛna fɔtsa wĩ ɛkpa yĩ.
40026011	Ahiãfɔ deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ daa, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ miláana yĩ nɛ mi kamɛ daa.
40026012	Lɛtsa a kĩ otsole kĩĩ kɛna nyɛ kĩ eko kugua nɛ yĩ akũ ɛkɔa ɛmanɛ yĩ ɛkpa kabila.
40026013	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ baade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ni, baalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ otsole a kɛna a lɛmɛ, bɛkɔa bɛkai ye.”
40026014	Adeke fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ewua-nviã kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Yuda Iskariot a naa basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃ a.
40026015	Ɛnavia be kĩ, “Litsa míakpa yĩ ntɛ ntsa ye liti osi?” Bɛkã sika ovoe fɔbɔ taalɛ bido nɛ ye awɛ.
40026016	Kito lɔkɔ a naa, ɛkawɛ osi wĩ a kĩ yaatsã ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa.
40026017	Nɛ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Luwi kanya lɔtɔnyade akũ a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Nɛ ndia awɛ kĩ bɔnaamanɛ bɔkpa nɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a kanya?”
40026018	Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Minaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ nɛ onyole odi sɛkɛ̃, mibi ye kĩ, ‘Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ bo yĩ lɔkɔ fuã, foesũ bɔmɔ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɔ́ayanya Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a nɛ nɔ awã.’ ”
40026019	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɛna ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a, ade bɛtɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a.
40026020	Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, Yesu mɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nadzi kĩ banya.
40026021	Nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a, Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa aanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa.”
40026022	Fɔha fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a paa, ade bivia ye ɔmɔa ɔmɔa kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, yĩ manɛ mbɔɛɛ?”
40026023	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ bɔmɔ ye awɛ kpɔta nɛ sɔɔdaɛ kamɛ a, ade ye aanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa a.
40026024	Otidziwa Obi a aaku ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ, lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa oti a kĩ ye aanyɛ Otidziwa Obi a ɛkpa! Ntɛ bɛtama oti a na malo, kufɛ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa ye fɔbɛ̃!”
40026025	Ade Yuda a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a lɛmɛ via kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, yĩ manɛ mbɔɛɛ?” Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ mɔawɛ lɛlɛ.”
40026026	Kĩ bɛkanya a, Yesu bɔɛ abodoo, ade kĩ ɛbɔa mpaɛ nɛ ye akũ a, ebulibuli ye ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ebi be kĩ, “Mitɛ minya, ade yĩ sukɛna nɛ awĩ a.”
40026027	Ke liti a, ɛbɔɛ okuluwa mɔ waĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ɛkɔa ɛkpa be a. Ebi be kĩ, “Mi flee mitɛ mimɔa.
40026028	Fukĩĩ nyɛ yĩ babɔanɛ kĩ bɛkɔa bisipi Baguma apam mɔ bati a. Fɔnyɛ yĩ babɔanɛ kĩ biko nɛ tite nɛ bati pii lɔlɔ kĩ Baguma ɛkɔa be tɔkpa ete be.
40026029	Mabi mi kĩ nláabuki mmɔa waĩ kĩĩ kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ bɔmɔ mi bɔmɔa waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ Nda Lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
40026030	Kĩ bɛsã kɔlɛkanyɛ ɔnɔ biyua a, bɛnɛ bɛnaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ.
40026031	Ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nviã lɛnyɛ, mi flee míalo mifɔnɛ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma aakɔ baveli ɔkpãnɛ a ade baveli a aagba bɛsã a.’
40026032	Lɛmɛ ntɛ Baguma dzɛla yĩ ndzi nkpã ni, maanya mi lɔtɔ nnaa Galilea.”
40026033	Petro bi Yesu kĩ, “Ntɛ be flee aalo bɛfɔnɛ nɔ malo ni, yĩ kɔ̃ nláalo nfɔnɛ nɔ da!”
40026034	Ade Yesu bi Petro kĩ, “Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɛnyɛ kĩĩ fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
40026035	Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nláalo nfɔnɛ nɔ da ntɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔmɔ nɔ aaku malo!” Ade ayea fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nkaɛ a flee lɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ a.
40026036	Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa kakɔ kadi kĩ bavɛ Getsemane. Ebi be kĩ, “Midzi nɛ awĩ nnaa lɔtɔ nnaabɔa mpaɛ tɔ̃.”
40026037	Ɛkpã Petro mɔ Zebedeo babi nviã ebumɔ ye akũ. Nɛ awã naa, ayɔlɔhɔ pi ye edo ɛkatila bliblibli awɛ,
40026038	ade ebi be kĩ, “Ayɔlɔhɔ tɛ yĩ kamɛ flee ndɛ maku. Midzi nɛ awĩ bɔmɔ mi bɔkaadzɔlɛ fɔkɔ.”
40026039	Kĩ ɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, ɛtsa anɛ nɛ tite ɛbɔa mpaɛ kĩ, “Nda, ntɛ fɔ́adã bɔɛɛ fɔ̃ lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu kĩĩ ɛtɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ! Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ ayekĩ mawɛ, mbom ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ.”
40026040	Emuniki ɛya nɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a sɛkɛ̃ ɛyamɔ kĩ bɛwaa tida, ade ebi Petro kĩ, “Nde sũ mi ɛlalɛ a miápuli midzi midzɔlɛ dɔũhuilɛ mɔapɛ malo mibumɔ yĩ?
40026041	Mikaadzɔlɛ akũ, mikaabɔa mpaɛ ayekĩ miláawo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ. Hũhũ a awɛ lɛmɛ sukɛna a kɔ̃ kɛna kpɛtɛɛ.”
40026042	Yesu buki ɛnaa lɛyade ɛnabɔa mpaɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, ntɛ fɔnyɛ kĩ lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu kĩĩ lɛláapuli ɛtɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ mbɔɛntɛ mmɔa ye ni, kekɔ̃ kɛna nɛ nɔ kawɛ akũ.”
40026043	Ebuki ɛya ɛyamɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ kĩ bɛwa tida, kĩ bɛtápuli bibinya anɛ.
40026044	Yesu dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be ɛnabɔa mpaɛ lɛlade, ɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔapɛ a.
40026045	Ke liti a, emuniki ɛyabi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Tida miwaa miawɛya? Midã, lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ kĩ baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kɔbɛ̃ awɛ.
40026046	Miyidza, mifɔ̃ bɔnaa. Midã, oti a kĩ yaanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa a, fuã.”
40026047	Kĩ Yesu buki ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a, Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa a yawo awã. Bati kɔdabu baũ a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ do a tomɔ ye, bɛnɛɛ fɔpamɛ mɔ futsekpa nɛ awɛ.
40026048	Oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a, kpa be nsɛntsɛlɛni kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ye onukpɛ̃ maadzɛmɛ a, ade ye nɛ awã a. Mipi ye.”
40026049	Yuda yɛlɛ tĩĩ ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, lukudɔ litomɔ nɔ,” ade ɛdzɛmɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a.
40026050	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔkɔba, wɛ sɔwa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔyaakɛna a akũ.” Adeke bati a fuã bipi Yesu, bitimtim ye kɔɔba a.
40026051	Bati a kĩ bitomɔ Yesu a kamɛ ɔmɔa vɛlɛ kɔpã ɛnyɛ nɛ sɛpapo kamɛ, etsua Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a ɔsumunɛ sɔtɔ emuni.
40026052	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kɔa nɔ kɔpã a kado nɛ koe kadokɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛbɔɛ kɔpã nɛ oti akũ ni, kɔpã onukpɛ̃ yaatɔ.
40026053	Mbɔɛɛ onyína kĩ kufɛ maapuli nwã Nda kĩ ɛyaabumɔ yĩ, kĩ lɛtalɛta yaado ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ sodzafɔ kĩ bɛbɛ̃ kutsu ewua-nviã bɛya?
40026054	Lɛmɛ ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ ni, nde fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ fɔya a, aaya nɛ foe kamɛ?”
40026055	Ke liti a, Yesu via bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Nde sũ minɛɛ apã mɔ futsekpa kĩ miayaapi yĩ ndɛ oyekpanɛ aye? Luwi daa madzi nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ katsa fɔtsa, lɛmɛ mitápi yĩ.
40026056	Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ, ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a tsɛlɛ biyi a, aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.” Ade awã naa mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee lo bɛfɔnɛ ye a.
40026057	Bati a kĩ bipi Yesu a, kɔa ye bɛnamɛna Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Kaiafa sɛkɛ̃, awã kĩ mbla batsanɛ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a natsɛna.
40026058	Petro tomɔ be nɛ liti kɔlaa ɛnawo nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a tɔtɔ kamɛ. Ewo ɛnadzi kĩ yadã fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya a kawũna.
40026059	Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Fɔlɛtsa Badzɛnɛ a flee wɛ kĩ bama fɔvã bite nɛ Yesu akũ ayekĩ baakɔ ye.
40026060	Titɔ kĩ bati pii nɛ bɛyama fɔvã nɛ ye akũ malo ni, bɛtámɔ lɛtsama nɛ ye akũ. Nɛ ke kawũna kamɛ a, bati nviã nɛ bɛyadza,
40026061	ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ lɛ kĩ, ‘Maapuli nveli Asɔli Kɔla a, mbuki nke koe nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti.’ ”
40026062	Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a yidza ɛdza, evia Yesu kĩ, “Ɔláanyɛ onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛbɔɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a akũ?”
40026063	Lɛmɛ Yesu tábinya onukpɛ̃. Ade Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a buki ebi ye kĩ, “Ntani Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a kĩ, bi boe ntɛ nɔ nyɛ Kristo, Baguma Obi a.”
40026064	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ade aye ɔlɛ a. Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ kito finyaa kanaa ni, míamɔ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ edzi nɛ Baguma Kpale sɔmɔna, ade yaya nɛ ode luflututu akũ a!”
40026065	Mɔ ye onukpɛ̃ katɔ pɛ, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a yɛlɛ ye atadiɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ lɛ fubusuotsa! Bɔtábuki busĩ adansifɔ badima! Minu fubusuotsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a!
40026066	Litsa nyɛ mi kakɔna?” Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Eku kɔtɔ, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ ye.”
40026067	Adeke bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ, bɛtalɛ ye fukpeni, ade badi lɛmɛ balɛ balɛ ye tɔlɔtɔ,
40026068	ade bivia ye kĩ, “Kristo, ntɛ ɔnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ ni, bi boe oti a kĩ ɛbɔa nɔ!”
40026069	Kĩ Petro dzi nɛ lɔwabe a, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a ɔsumunɛtsole mɔa ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ malo otomɔ Yesu Galileani a.”
40026070	Lɛmɛ Petro sĩ nɛ bati a flee anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyina lɛtsama nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ alɛ a akũ.”
40026071	Kĩ eyidza ɛtsã onyukpɛ̃ yanɛ nɛ kanya a, katsolebi ɔsumunɛ bɛbã mɔ ye, ade ebi bikĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ lɛmɛ na nɛ Yesu Galileani a sɛkɛ̃ tɔ̃.”
40026072	Petro buki esĩ ɛlɔ fubo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyína onyole a na!”
40026073	Owi tábuna mɔ banyole a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã ya nɛ Petro sɛkɛ̃ bibi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ nɔ malo ɔnyɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa, kitonɛkĩ nɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ nyɛ nɔ kanya!”
40026074	Awã naa, Petro do kadumu awɛ, katani fɔtsa kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali malɛ. Baguma ɛvɛlɛ yĩ sɔtɔ ntɛ fɔvã mama. Ĩnyina oti a na!” Deedimɔapɛ ɔkɔkɔ be.
40026075	Adeke mɔ Petro kai fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu bi ye a kĩ, “Fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.” Ade ɛnɛ ɛnaa kanya ɛnabe a.
40027001	Nɛ odenyinawi a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a flee tsa fɔlɔ bipi adzuni kĩ baaakɔ Yesu.
40027002	Bisui ye bɛkpã ye bɛnakɔa bido nɛ Roma Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, Pilato awɛ.
40027003	Kĩ Yuda, kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa a, mɔ́ kĩ bɛkɔ Yesu kɔtɔ a, fuwo ye kalɔɛ ade ɛkɔa sika ovoe fɔbɔ taalɛ a ɛma basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a.
40027004	Ebi be kĩ, “Nkɛna tɔkpa, kĩ ĩnyɛ oti kĩ mfumsu adima lɛláa ye akũ nkpa kĩ bɛkɔ.” Ade bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fukĩnaa lɛtsɛ́la boe. Nɔ kalɛ kanɛ!”
40027005	Ade Yuda talɛ sika fɔbɔ taalɛ a eko nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ɛdzakũ ɛnado ye akũ ɔwɛ̃ a.
40027006	Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a nafila sika a bɛlɛ kĩ, “Sika kĩĩ nyɛ babɔanɛ kaya sika, boe mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛkɔa se bido nɛ Asɔli Kɔla sika adakã kamɛ.”
40027007	foesũ bipi adzuni nɛ se akũ, ade bɛnaya Fubui Ɔmɛnɛ Tite kĩ tɛnya banɔvɔɛ̃ kabilakɔ̃.
40027008	Nɛ foesũ kɛyawo nviã bavɛ awã kĩ, Babɔanɛ Tite.
40027009	Ade Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yeremia fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Bɛkɔa sika ovoe fɔbɔ taalɛ a kĩ Israel tunɔ baase nɛ ye lɔlɔ a,
40027010	bɛya fubui ɔmɛnɛ tite ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate wɛ kĩ nkɛna a.”
40027011	Bɛfɔ̃ Yesu dza nɛ Romafɔ Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a anɛ. Ade Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ lɛgã a mbɔɛɛ?” Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ lamɔ kalɛ.”
40027012	Kĩ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a katsua ye onukpɛ̃ malo ni, Yesu tálɛ kadima.
40027013	Adeke Pilato via ye kĩ, “Aánu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɔ kate nɛ nɔ akũ flee a?”
40027014	Lɛmɛ Yesu sĩ ɛtákpa kalɛ mɔapɛ malo mbuayɛ, foesũ fɔkɛna Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a wãwã paa.
40027015	Nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi lidi nyɛ lidi kanya kamɛ ni, Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a awɛ kɔla bawanɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa, kĩ bati kɔdabu a awɛ a, awɛ kafɔnɛ kakpa be.
40027016	Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Baraba, kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ nɛ fɔtsa kpa kakɛna kamɛ waa kɔla.
40027017	Foesũ kĩ bati kɔdabu a kpɔta a, Pilato via be kĩ, “Owei miawɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ awɛ nkpa mi? Yesu Baraba mbɔɛɛ kĩ Yesu a kĩ bavɛ Kristo a?”
40027018	Kitonɛkĩ Pilato nyina pefee kĩ lineke kanɔ sũ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kpã Yesu bɛyado nɛ ye awɛ.
40027019	Kĩ Pilato dzi nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ lukpo kamɛ a, ɔtsɔ̃ do lɔtɔ bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Takɛna oti kpĩĩ a na lɛtsama, kitonɛkĩ kadzɔ lɛnyɛ mmɔ́ lubo paa nɛ kɔda kamɛ nɛ ye sũ.”
40027020	Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a fɔ̃ bati kɔdabu a wã Pilato kĩ ɛfɔnɛ Baraba awɛ lɔkɔa bɛkɔ Yesu.
40027021	Ade Pilato via bati a kĩ, “Bati nviã a kamɛ ɔwɔdabe miawɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ awɛ nkpa mi?” Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Baraba!”
40027022	Pilato via be kĩ, “Lɔkɔa litsa nkamɔ Yesu kĩ bavɛ Kristo a?” Be flee bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
40027023	Ade Pilato via be kĩ, “Litsa tɔkpa ɛkɛna?” Ade bido fɔwɔla kabɔa kɔɔba awɛ kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
40027024	Kĩ Pilato mɔ́ kĩ lɛtsama kakɛna buki lɛláa, mbom ɔtutũ aaya sũ ni, ɛbɔɛ mui ɛvɔlɛ awɛ nɛ bati kɔdabu a anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yĩ akpɔ mɔ abɔa lɛláa onyole kĩĩ wuda kamɛ!”
40027025	Bati kɔdabu a flee kpa mbuayɛ yoo kĩ, “Ye babɔanɛ a bɛya nɛ boe mɔ boe babi akũ!”
40027026	Adeke Pilato fɔnɛ Baraba awɛ ɛkpa be a, ade kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bibo Yesu mɔ mple biyua a ɛkɔa ye ɛkpa kĩ bɛnaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.
40027027	Ade abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a sodzafɔ kpã Yesu bɛnamɛna Pilato lɔwabe ade sodzafɔ katsu a flee yadza bisinya Yesu a.
40027028	Bɛnyɛ ye tɛtadiɛ nɛ ye akũ ade bɛkɔa atadiɛ wulaa ngbã bido ye a.
40027029	Bɛkɔa fɔtsɔlɛwɛ bɛnɔ lɛgãbɔɛ bɛtsa ye, ade bɛkɔa otse bido nɛ ye sɔmɔna awɛ a. Bɛkake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kadi ye nsekuo kĩ, “Yiiduu! Yudafɔ lɛgã a edzi nkpã daa!”
40027030	Bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye akũ, bɛtɛ otse a nɛ ye awɛ biwula ye nɛ lɔlɔ.
40027031	Kĩ bidi ye nsekuo lɔmɔ biyua a, bɛnyɛ atadiɛ wulaa a nɛ ye akũ bɛbɔɛ ye mɔawɛ tide a bibuki bido ye. Ke liti bɛkpã ye bɛnɛmɛna kĩ banaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.
40027032	Kĩ bɛnɛ banaa a, bɛtsɛlamɛna onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon, kĩ eto Kirene. Sodzafɔ a hɛ ye kĩ ɛlɔ Yesu asendua a.
40027033	Ade bɛyawo kakɔ kadi kĩ bavɛ Golgata, kĩ foe kayɔ nyɛ Oti Lɔlɔ Fɔtsɔ̃.
40027034	Ade awã bɛkpa ye waĩ kĩ bɛtsɛka mɔ otsonu mɔ ɔnyɛ kĩ ɛmɔa a, lɛmɛ kĩ ɛta be onukpɛ̃ ɛdã a, esĩ be kamɔa.
40027035	Kĩ sodzafɔ a bɔa ye bɛmɛna nɛ asendua akũ biyua a, bɛta bavulibi nɛ ye tɛtadiɛ akũ, bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa akũ.
40027036	Ke liti a, bɛkɛna akũ bidzi nɛ awã bɛkadzɔlɛ ye akũ.
40027037	Ade bɛtsɛlɛ ye onukpɛ̃ katsua fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye lɔlɔ nyangɛ kĩ, “Ade Yesu Yudafɔ Lɛgã a nɛ awĩ a.”
40027038	Bɛbɔa bayekpanɛ nviã lɛmɛ bɛmɛna nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ Yesu, ɔmɔa nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ɔyade nɛ ye sɛba.
40027039	Bati a kĩ bɛtsã awã batɛ̃ a, kakpɔkpa fɔlɔ, kata fuvũnatsa kamɛna Yesu,
40027040	ade bɛkalɛ kĩ, “Nɔ a kĩ ɔlɛ kĩ aaveli Asɔli Kɔla a, lɔkɔa obuki oke koe nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, tɛ nɔ akũ! Ntɛ Baguma Obi anɛ ni, duma nɛ asendua a akũ!”
40027041	Ade ayea lɛmɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a di Yesu nsekuo kĩ,
40027042	“Ɛtɛ bati bɛbã nkpã, lɛmɛ yaápuli ɛtɛ ye akũ. Nnɛ́ ye nyɛ Israel lɛgã a? Kekɔ̃ eduma nɛ asendua a akũ finyaa, lɔkɔa bɔ́atɛ ye budo!
40027043	Yatɛ Baguma kado ade yalɛ kĩ Baguma Obi yanɛ. Ntɛ Baguma awɛ ye kalɛ nuwĩ ni, ɛyaatɛ ye finyaa!”
40027044	Ade ayea bayekpanɛ nviã a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a malo vũna Yesu a.
40027045	Kĩ kito suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã a, katinya kamɛ flee ke ɔtũ kɛnawo olobe tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ.
40027046	Ndɛ tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, Yesu bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ, “Yĩ Baguma, yĩ Baguma, nde sũ ɔfɔnɛ yĩ awɛ?”
40027047	Kĩ bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a kamɛ badi nu lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ avɛ Eliya!”
40027048	Ade deedimɔapɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa wula atsɛ ɛnabɔɛ ɔsapɔ edo nɛ waĩ yilawa kamɛ ɛkɔa ɛvɛla nɛ otse onukpɛ̃, ɛdɛla ete ye nɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ ɛmɔa.
40027049	Lɛmɛ bati bɛbã a lɛ kĩ, “Dza tɔ̃. Mifɔ̃ bɔdã ntɛ Eliya aayanyɛ ye mbɔɛɛ?”
40027050	Yesu buki ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba, ade ɛmɛna onukpɛ̃ a.
40027051	Adeke lima kpale a kĩ bɛvɛla nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a bɛ̃ fɔkɛ nviã, kito nyangɛ kɛyawo kayɔ. Tite kuna boe bakpale bakpale yɛlɛ,
40027052	funikɛ binya ade bɛdzɛla bati kpalɛwa pii kĩ biku a bidzi nkpã a.
40027053	Kĩ Yesu yidza eto kanɔkpa liti a, bati kpalɛwa a nɛ́ nɛ funikɛ a kamɛ bɛnaa Yerusalem, ɔmatɔ kpalɛwa a kamɛ, awã kĩ bati pii mɔ be.
40027054	Kĩ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ bikĩ bibumɔ ye bɛkadzɔlɛ Yesu akũ a mɔ́ tite kakuna mɔ fɔtsa bɛbã kĩ fɔya a, libe wo be paa ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali obi kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma Obi!”
40027055	Batsole pii kĩ bito Galilea, kĩ bitómɔ Yesu bɛkabumɔ ye a, dza mɔ lugo bɛkadã.
40027056	Be kamɛ badi nyɛ Maria Magdalani, Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Yakobo mɔ Yosef ɔma, mɔ Zebedeo ɔtsɔ̃.
40027057	Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, onyole osikani odi kĩ bavɛ Yosef, kĩ eto Arimatia, kĩ ye malo ɛnya Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa a yanɛ ɛta.
40027058	Ɛnaa Pilato sɛkɛ̃ ɛnawã ye kĩ ɛkɔa Yesu ɔnɔkpa a ɛkpa ye. Ade Pilato kpa osi kĩ bɛfɔnɛ ɔnɔkpa a awɛ bɛkpa ye a.
40027059	Foesũ Yosef bɔɛ ɔnɔkpa a, ade ɛkɔa aklala fitaa vɔɛ̃ esuli ye,
40027060	ɛkɔa ɛnado nɛ ye mɔawɛ linikɛ vɔɛ̃ kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnyɛ nɛ de kpale ɔkɛ kamɛ a. Emininya de kpale esua linikɛ a onukpɛ̃ ade ɛdzakũ a.
40027061	Maria Magdalani mɔ Maria kĩ a dzi nɛ awã bɛtsɛlamɔ linikɛ a bɛkadã.
40027062	Nɛ luwi lɛyade, kĩ lɛnyɛ Kawɛya Luwi ɔnɔnɛ a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ yatsɛna nɛ Pilato sɛkɛ̃,
40027063	bibi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, bute anɛ kĩ, kĩ ɔvãlɛvã a na dzi nkpã a, ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Maayidza ndzi nkpã nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti.’
40027064	Foesũ kpa mbla kĩ bɛdzɔlɛ ye kuni a akũ kadzɔlɛ wĩ kɛnaawo luwi lɛlalɛde a akũ. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a aapuli bɛnaaye ɔnɔkpa a lɔkɔa bibi bati kĩ bɛdzɛla ye bitomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ. Ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ ni, liti fɔvã a aaba fɔtɔnyade a.”
40027065	Pilato bi be kĩ, “Mikpã badzɔlɛnɛ minamɛna, midzɔlɛ kuni a akũ ayekĩ míapuli.”
40027066	Foesũ bɛdzakũ bɛnatim de a nɛ kuni a onukpɛ̃ kɔɔba, ade bɛdzɛla de akũ badzɔlɛnɛ nɛ awã a.
40028001	Kĩ Kawɛya Luwi a tɛ̃, nɛ ɛkwansieda a luwi lɔtɔnyade kĩ lɛnyɛ Ɛkwansieda odenyinawi a, Maria Magdalani mɔ Maria kĩ a naa kĩ banaadã Yesu kuni a.
40028002	Lɛtalɛta tite kuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, kitonɛkĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ to ode ɛka ɛyamininya de nɛ linikɛ a onukpɛ̃ a eyi, ɛkɛna akũ edzi nɛ de akũ.
40028003	Ye akũ flee la ndɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ kamɔanɛ aye, ade ye tɛtadiɛ voe fitaa ndɛ aklala aye a.
40028004	Libe wo bikĩ badzɔlɛ fɔkɔ a paa, bɛkatila bliblibli, bɛkɛna ndɛ banɔkpa.
40028005	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi batsole a kĩ, “Mitavila! Ĩnyina kĩ Yesu a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a miawɛ.
40028006	Ɛláa awĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɛdzɛla ye edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi a. Mifuã miyaadã awã kĩ ɛwa a.
40028007	Miwɛ sɔwa minaabi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, ‘Eyidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ. Ɛnyaa mi lɔtɔ yanaa Galilea. Ade awã míamɔ ye a!’ Mite anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi a akũ.”
40028008	Foesũ batsole a dzakũ mɔatsɛ nɛ linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃, ade bɛkɔa libe mɔ kawɔlɛ, biwula atsɛ kĩ banaabi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a.
40028009	Lɛtalɛta Yesu tsɛlamɔ be ade ebi be kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi.” Bifuã bɛyapili ye nɛ fɔnɛta, bike aduli bisum ye.
40028010	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitavila, mbom minaabi nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ bɛnaa Galilea, lɔkɔa baamɔ yĩ nɛ awã.”
40028011	Kĩ batsole a dzakũ banaa a, kuni a akũ badzɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ badi naa ɔmatɔ kamɛ bɛnabi basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a flee.
40028012	Kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a tsa fɔlɔ a, bipi adzuni ade bɛkpa badzɔlɛnɛ a sika baũ,
40028013	bibi be kĩ, “Milɛ kĩ, ‘Lɛnyɛ a kĩ bɔwa tida a ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yaye ɔnɔkpa a bɛdzakũmɛna a.’
40028014	Adeke mɔ ntɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ wo Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ sɔtɔ kamɛ ni, bɔ́api foe onukpɛ̃ kĩ fɔláanya ɔhau fɔkpa mi.”
40028015	Badzɔlɛnɛ a tɛ sika a, bɛnakɛna ndɛ ayekĩ bibi be a. Foesũ ade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɛgba nɛ Yudafɔ kamɛ bɛnɛɛ balɛ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a.
40028016	Nɛ foe kamɛ a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-odi a naa Galilea nɛ ɔtɔ a kĩ Yesu tsa be kĩ bɛnaa a akũ.
40028017	Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a, bike aduli bisum ye, lɛmɛ be kamɛ badi tɛ atsindze.
40028018	Yesu fuã be ɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma kɔa tite mɔ ode otumi flee edo nɛ yĩ awɛ.
40028019	Foesũ minaa fude flee kamɛ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, minaakɛna bati a bɛdani yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ. Miwɔla be mui nɛ Ɔlɛga a, Obi a mɔ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a dĩ akũ.
40028020	Mitsa be kĩ bidi nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ nhɛ mi a akũ. Midã, ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ luwi daa kɛnaawo katinya kawũna.”
41001001	Ade Kalɛ Wĩ nɛ Yesu Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma obi akũ kayɔkayi a.
41001002	Anɛ kɔkɔɛ a mɔ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya tsɛlɛ eyi kĩ Baguma bi ye obi kĩ, “Maado yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɛnya nɔ lɔtɔ, ɛyaalɔla osi eyi ɛkpa nɔ.
41001003	Aanu kĩ oti kĩĩ tsɛ̃ yade lɛtsã nɛ kɔsa kamɛ kalɛ kĩ, ‘Mimanɛ osi mikpa Ɔlate a kaya. Mikɛna osi a eyo kpĩĩ.’ ”
41001004	Fɔtɔ Ɔnyanɛ kĩĩ nyɛ Yohanes kĩ ɛna nɛ kɔsa kamɛ ɛkawɔla bati mui nɛ ɔwɔ kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Yudafɔ akɛna a. Emini ede lɛtsã kĩ bati bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a, lɔkɔa Baguma aakɔa be titikpa ete be.
41001005	Bati pii to Yudea tite a akũ mɔ be ɔmatɔ kpale kĩ bavɛ Yerusalem, bɛnaa kɔsa a kamɛ, kĩ banaatse Yohanes ɔlɛdo. Bibinya be tɔkpa kamɛ bɛtsa Baguma, ade Yohanes wɔla be mui nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ kamɛ a.
41001006	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, Yohanes do ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kanɛ mɔ lɔpɔ tɔlɔ tɛtadiɛ, ɛkɔa ɔyaɛ ovoli ɔwɛ̃ ɛbɔa kate. Ye funitsã nyɛ kɔsã mɔ koolo.
41001007	Ede lɛtsã kĩ, “Oti a kĩ yaaya nɛ yĩ liti a, ɛbɛ̃ yĩ kɔlaa kĩ ntáfɛta kĩ makɛna akũ nwũnya mpabua nɛ ye abɔa malo.
41001008	Yĩ kɔ̃ mui nkɔa makɛna mui kawɔla amaniɛ, lɛmɛ ye kɔ̃ yaakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛwɔla mi mui.”
41001009	Owi tábuna mɔ Yesu to Nazaret ɔmatɔ nɛ Galilea tite akũ, ɛyatɛ Yohanes mui kawɔla amaniɛ a nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ kamɛ.
41001010	Kĩ Yesu sila ɛnɛ́ eto mui a kamɛ a, ɛmɔ kĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ binya ade Hũhũ a ka eko nɛ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ mblɔduma aka a.
41001011	Ade ɔlɛdo nɛ eto ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ yĩ obi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, kawɔlɛ ade yĩ nɛ nɔ akũ.”
41001012	Lɛtalɛta Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kpã Yesu ɛnamɛna kɔsa kamɛ nɛ awã kĩ tuwĩ kamɛ bayaɛ deĩ.
41001013	Ye odi ɛna nɛ awã fuwi tɛna. Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Abonsam sɔ Yesu ɛdã, ade ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ yasum ye a.
41001014	Lɔkɔ a kĩ bipi Yohanes bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ a, Yesu dzakũ ɛnaa Galilea ɛnalɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ awã.
41001015	Ɛkalɛ nɛ awã kĩ, “Lɔkɔ wĩ a wo ɔtɔ ade Baguma lɛgãkanya lɔkɔ a fuã. Mimuniki nɛ mi tɔkpa liti lɔkɔa mitɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a mido!”
41001016	Kĩ Yesu kamini nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ ɔwɛ̃ nɛ Galilea tite akũ a, ɛmɔ kɔfɔabi banyɛnɛ nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ Simon mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Andrea, bɛkata be tɛsau.
41001017	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyaatomɔ yĩ, lɔkɔa maakɛna mi bati banyɛnɛ.”
41001018	Nɛ awã naa, bɛfɔnɛ be tɛsau awɛ biyidza bitomɔ ye.
41001019	Kĩ bɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, ɛmɔ bawaɛ̃ nviã Yakobo mɔ Yohanes. Bɛna nɛ be ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bɛkalɔla be tɛsau.
41001020	Kĩ Yesu mɔ be a, ɛvɛ be deedimɔapɛ kĩ bitomɔ ye. Be malo biyidza lɛtalɛta, bɛfɔnɛ be ɔlɛga Zebedeo mɔ ye adzuma bakɛnanɛ a odi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ade bitomɔ Yesu a.
41001021	Yesu mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a nawo ɔmatɔ kĩ bavɛ Kapernaum. Nɛ Yudafɔ Kawɛya Luwi a kĩ litomɔ be awã kawo luwi a, Yesu naa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ɛnatsa fɔtsa.
41001022	Bati a kĩ binu ye fɔtsa katsa a kɛna saa, kitonɛkĩ fɔvɛmɛna nɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a fude akũ, mbom ye ɛtsa fɔtsa mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃.
41001023	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ na nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a,
41001024	ade ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Yesu Nazaretni, litsa deĩ nɛ bɔmɔ nɔ kayite? Ɔya kĩ ayaawɔla boe mbɔɛɛ? Ĩnyina oti a kĩ anɛ. Nɔ nyɛ Baguma Oti Kpalɛwa Kĩ Bido a.”
41001025	Yesu wũni nɛ hũhũ a akũ kĩ, “Sua onukpɛ̃, kanɛ nɛ oti a kamɛ.”
41001026	Hũhũ a fufulinya oti a mɔ ɔsĩ, ɛfɔ̃ ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ade ɛnɛ nɛ ye kamɛ a.
41001027	Fɔkɛna bati a flee kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã saa, ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Litsa nɛ awĩ a? Ei! Fɔtsa katsa vɔɛ̃ ɔdabe nɛ awĩ a? Oti kĩĩ deĩ kɔbɛ̃ yawũni nɛ hũhũ kpa akũ ade yatse ye ɔlɛdo a!”
41001028	Foesũ Yesu dĩ gba nɛ Galilea tite akũ flee.
41001029	Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ, Yakobo mɔ Yohanes dzakũ nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade bɛnaa Simon mɔ Andrea tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
41001030	Kĩ biwo awã a, badi bi Yesu kĩ Simon nyina waa yasɔ, ye akũ bo hlihlihli.
41001031	Foesũ Yesu wo nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade epi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ ɛdzɛla ye kĩ eyidza. Deedimɔapɛ fɔsɔ a dɔ ye, ade eyidza esum be a.
41001032	Kĩ suwa tomu a, bati kpã basɔnɛ pii mɔ bikĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a bɛyamɛna kĩ Yesu ɛtsa be.
41001033	Bati nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ yabɔa obũ nɛ onyukpɛ̃.
41001034	Yesu tsa bati pii kĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ, ade ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa etomɛna bati pii lɛmɛ kamɛ a. Yesu tákpa hũhũ a osi bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla kitonɛkĩ binyina ye.
41001035	Odenyinawi a, Yesu yidza nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ, ɛnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛnaa awã kĩ oti odima táfuã, ɛnabɔa mpaɛ.
41001036	Lɛmɛ Simon mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a nɛ bɛtsɛ̃ bawɛ Yesu.
41001037	Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a, bibi ye kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi lamɛna nɔ kawɛ!”
41001038	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bɔnaa tukula bɛbã kĩ tifuã a lɛmɛ kamɛ. Kɛfɛta kĩ mabi be malo Baguma fɔlɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ ade foesũ ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ a.”
41001039	Foesũ ɛnamini nɛ Galilea flee. Ɛtsã ɛkalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃, ade ɛkablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa kanɛmɛna nɛ bati kamɛ a.
41001040	Oti odi kĩ yasɔ fɔsɔ ngbã kĩ bati avila ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃. Ɛkɛna akũ ade eke Yesu aduli kĩ ebumɔ ye a. Onyole a bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ awɛ ni, aapuli ɔfɔ̃ fɔsɔ kĩĩ lɛwɔ nɛ yĩ akũ.”
41001041	Ye fɔlɛtsa kɔ Yesu kɔnya, foesũ eyo awɛ ɛta ye. Ebi ye kĩ, “Mawɛ lɔmɔ. Nɔ akũ ɛkpalɛ.”
41001042	Deedimɔapɛ fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ ye akũ.
41001043	Awã naa, Yesu bi ye kĩ ɛdzakũ mɔatsɛ ɛnaa, lɛmɛ esi ye mbla mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ,
41001044	“Tafɔ̃ ɔdza nɛ osi ɔkabi bati lɛtsa a kĩ de lɛya, mbom naa kpĩĩ, kakɔa nɔ akũ kanaatsa ɔsɔfɔ. Bɔa afɔliɛ a kĩ Mose mbla tsa a, ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi aanyi kĩ nɔ akũ kpalɛ.”
41001045	Lɛmɛ kĩ oti kĩĩ dzakũ a, ɛnado fɔlɛtsa a kagbamɛna awɛ, ɛkabi bati flee ayekĩ Yesu tsa ye a. Nɛ foesũ, Yesu tápuli ebuki ewo nɛ ɔmatɔ odima kamɛ, ade ɛkana nɛ tuwĩ kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ bati buki bɛkato kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
41002001	Fuwi fudi liti a, Yesu muniki ɛnaa Kapernaum, ade owi tábuna mɔ bati nu ye nkã kĩ ɛya nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
41002002	Foesũ bati yayi tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ edeĩ a mɔ kanya flee, ade ɛkatsa be Baguma fɔlɛtsa a.
41002003	Ade awã naa mɔ bati ɛna lɔ oti odi kĩ eveliveli bɛma ye a.
41002004	Kĩ bɛtápuli bɛtsã onyukpɛ̃ nɛ bati lidede sũ ni, bide nɛ kɔla ode bɛnyɛ ɔkɛ nɛ kakɔ kadi, ade bɛkɛna ɔsɔnɛ a mɔ ɔkɛna biyi nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ a.
41002005	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ be katɛkado sũ ni, ebi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ, “Obi, bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ.”
41002006	Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã kakɔna nɛ be kamɛ kĩ,
41002007	“Nde sũ yalɛ fubusuotsa lɔmɔ? Baguma odi aapuli ɛkɔa titikpa ete.”
41002008	Yesu nyi be kakɔna a foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Litsa sũ fukĩĩ aha mi nɛ mi kamɛ?
41002009	Fɔɔdabe deĩ ɔsĩ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ baabi oti kĩ eveliveli kĩ, ‘Bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ,’ ĩye kĩ, ‘Yidza, bɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna katsã?’
41002010	Kĩ míanyi kĩ Otidziwa Obi a deĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kĩ yakɔa bati titikpa kate sũ ni,” Yesu bi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ,
41002011	“Yidza, bɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna kanaa kɔla.”
41002012	Lɛtalɛta oti a yidza ɛbɔɛ ye ɔkɛna ɛnɛ nɛ bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã anɛ. Fɔtsa a kɛna bati a flee wãwã, ade bimu Baguma, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔtámɔ fɔtsa kĩĩ odu tɔ̃.”
41002013	Yesu buki ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ abuĩ a. Bati pii ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awã ade ɛtsa be Baguma fɔlɛtsa a.
41002014	Kĩ ɛdzakũ yanaa a ɛmɔ́ ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ Levi, Alfeo obi kĩ edzi nɛ ɔgɔlɛ katɛkɔ̃. Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.” Adeke Levi yidza ade etomɔ ye a.
41002015	Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ bati pii kĩ bitomɔ ye a naanya nɛ Levi awã. Tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ pii lɛmɛ na nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a mɔ be.
41002016	Ade Farisifɔ kĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi lɛmɛ na nɛ awã a. Kĩ Farisifɔ mbla batsanɛ a mɔ́ kĩ Yesu anya mɔ titikpa bakɛnanɛ mɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ a, bivia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Litsa sũ yanya kamɔa mɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bɛbã bakɛnanɛ?”
41002017	Kĩ Yesu nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ebi be kĩ, “Bati kĩ bideĩ akũ ɔsĩ tásĩ tutsonu ɔkɛnanɛ, mbom basɔnɛ lisĩ ye. Ntáya kĩ mayaavɛ bati kpĩĩ, mbom tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kavɛ ĩya.”
41002018	Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ, kĩ Yohanes mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ Farisifɔ kasui onukpɛ̃ a, bati badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lásui onukpɛ̃ ndɛ Yohanes bade mɔ Farisifɔ a aye?”
41002019	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ bakɔba aapuli bidzi kɔlɛ nɛ obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a deĩ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a?
41002020	Lɛmɛ luwi lidi aaya kĩ baakpã ye nɛ ye bakɔba a sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa baasui onukpɛ̃ nɛ fuwi a kamɛ.
41002021	Odima lákɔa limakũ vɔɛ̃ kataɛ ɔkɛ nɛ lima kɔɛ akũ. Limakũ vɔɛ̃ a aabɛ̃ lɔkɔɛ lidomɔ akũ ntɛ bɛvɔlɛ de, ade fɔ́afɔ̃ ɔkɛ baũ lɛwa ɛba ayekĩ fɔna kɔkɔɛ a.
41002022	Bio, odima lákɔa waĩ vɔɛ̃ kako nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ kɔɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ waĩ vɔɛ̃ aabɛ̃ kuvũ kɔɛ a, lɔkɔa waĩ a aawula, kuvũ a lɛmɛ aabu kade. Mbom bakɔa waĩ vɔɛ̃ kako nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ vɔɛ̃ kamɛ.”
41002023	Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi akũ a, kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ tsɛ̃ batɛ̃ nɛ fugbanɔ kɔba kudi kamɛ a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kave fudi.
41002024	Foesũ Farisifɔ a bi Yesu kĩ, “Dã! Boe mbla tákpa osi kĩ bakɛna fukĩnaa nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.”
41002025	-
41002026	Awã naa Yesu via be kĩ, “Mitákã lɛtsa a kĩ Lɛgã Dawid kɛna a? Lɔkɔ a kĩ kɔlɛ kɔ ye mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a, Dawid wo nɛ Baguma kɔla a kamɛ a, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Abiata anya Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a. Ɛnanyɛ afɔlibɔ abodoo kĩ Yudafɔ basɔfɔ odi deĩ osi kĩ banya a ɛnya, ade ɛkɔa adi ɛkpa bikĩ bitomɛna ye a lɛmɛ bɛnya a.”
41002027	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Otidziwa sũ bɛbɔa Kawɛya Luwi a, nnɛ́ Kawɛya Luwi a sũ bɛbɔa otidziwa.
41002028	Foesũ Otidziwa Obi a nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi a Ɔlate.”
41003001	Ke liti a, Yesu buki ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ kadi. Oti odi kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku na nɛ awã.
41003002	Lɔkɔ a na Yesu bakesĩnɛ badi na nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, bɛkadã ntɛ yaatsa oti a nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ, ayekĩ baabɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye akũ.
41003003	Yesu vɛ oti a kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku a kĩ ɛnɛ ɛyaadza nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ.
41003004	Ade ɛdani ɛtsɛlamɔ bati a evia be kĩ, “Mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna tuwĩ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ, mbɔɛɛ bɛkɛna tɔkpa? Fɔnyɛ luwi kĩ batɛ oti nkpã, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ eku” Lɛmɛ bɛtálɛ kadima.
41003005	Yesu dã be ɛtɛ̃mɛna nɛ kalɔkpa kamɛ, ade fɔha ye paa nɛ be lɔlɔ kamɛ ɔsĩ sũ a. Ade ebi ɔsɔnɛ a kĩ, “Yo nɔ awɛ.” Eyo awɛ a ade ye awɛ a de ɔsĩ a.
41003006	Adeke Farisifɔ a dzakũ bɛnamɔ Lɛgã Herodes batomɛnanɛ a, ade bipi adzuni nɛ Yesu kakɔ akũ a.
41003007	-
41003008	Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ, ade bati beblebee tomɔ be bɛya a. Bito Galilea tite, Yudea tite, Yerusalem ɔmatɔ mɔ Idumea kamɛkamɛ a, bikĩ bito Yordan Ɔwɔ liti a, mɔ be a kĩ bito Tiro mɔ Sidon tɛmatɔ kamɛkamɛ a bɛya. Bati kĩĩ flee ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ binu ye awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yakɛna a.
41003009	-
41003010	Yesu tsa bati pii ade basɔnɛ pii kapili kĩ bata ye lɔkɔa bɛna akũ ɔsĩ a. Bati a lidede sũ ni, Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛwɛ ɔkɔlɔ odi bɛdzɛla ye, ayekĩ bati a lɛláamɛnana ye.
41003011	Ntɛ bati a kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ be kamɛ sila bɛmɔ́ Yesu pɛ, batɔ nɛ ye abɔa kayɔ kabɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Baguma Obi.”
41003012	Lɛmɛ Yesu sua be osi kĩ bɛtafɔ̃ bati linyi oti a kĩ ye yanɛ.
41003013	Ke liti a, Yesu de ɛnaa ɔtɔ kalete. Ade awã ɛvɛ bikĩ yawɛ kĩ bɛnya ye bade a.
41003014	Bati kĩĩ yakpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ɛpau be kamɛ bati ewua-nviã, ete be dĩ kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ. Ebi be kĩ, “Mpau mi kĩ mina nɛ yĩ akũ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ. Maado mi lɛmɛ kĩ minaalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a,
41003015	ade míana kɔbɛ̃ kĩ míablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa mitomɛna bati kamɛ a.”
41003016	-
41003019	Bati ewua-nviã a kĩ ɛnyɛ a buĩ nyɛ Simon, ade ye Yesu te dĩ kĩ Petro, Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi. Yesu vɛ be kĩ Boanerges, foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔplala akpɛ̃nɛ a. Babɛbã nyɛ Andrea, Filipo, Bartolomeo, Mateo mɔ Toma, Yakobo kĩ ɛnyɛ Alfeo obi, Tadeo, Simon kĩ eto Kana kĩ epili ye kade lɔlɔ a. Yuda Iskariot, oti kĩ ye lɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa.
41003020	Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa tɔtɔ kamɛ, ade bati pii buki bɛya nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awã. Nɛ foesũ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lána aya bɛnya malo.
41003021	Kĩ Yesu akũ bati nu foe a, bɛnaa kĩ banaakpã ye, kitonɛkĩ bati kalɛ kĩ, “Ye lɔlɔ kamɛ lamɔ kade kabu.”
41003022	Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kĩ bito Yerusalem bɛya a lɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ. Hũhũ kpa lɛgã a lɛkpa ye kɔbɛ̃ yablɔmɛna hũhũ a katomɛna bati kamɛ.”
41003023	Ade Yesu vɛ bati a ɛyamɛna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ be nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ kĩ, “Nde fɔ́aya kĩ Abonsam aapuli ɛblɔmɛna ye mɔawɛ akũ etomɛna oti kamɛ?
41003024	Foe nfantuhũ nyɛ kĩ ntɛ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ kadi sɛ̃ ke akũ kutsu kutsu kĩ kɔanɔ akũ ni, kanyakɔ̃ a na lɛláapuli kitim.
41003025	Ade ayea ntɛ kɔla kudi sɛ̃ koe akũ kutsu kutsu mɔ tɛdzɛ nɛ́ nɛ be kamɛ ni, kɔla na lɛláapuli kɔdza.
41003026	Foesũ ntɛ Abonsam yidza ɛdza nɛ ye mɔawɛ akũ, mɔ ye kanyakɔ̃ a sɛ̃ kutsu kutsu ni, ye kanyakɔ̃ a aayalɛ lɔkɔa ade ye lɛgã kanya a kawũna nɛ awã a.
41003027	“Odima lɛláapuli ewo nɛ oti kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kɔla kamɛ ɛnaafila ye fɔtsa, mbɔɛntɛ ɛnya lɔtɔ esuli ɔbɛlɛbɛ a fɔmɔ yaawo efila ye fɔtsa a.
41003028	“Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ Baguma aakɔa bati tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi kĩ bɛkɛna mɔ fubusuotsa fudi nyɛ fudi kĩ bɛlɛ ete be.
41003029	Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a akũ ni, Baguma lɛláakɔa ete ye da. Kitonɛkĩ ɛkɛna tɔkpa kĩ taawa daa.”
41003030	Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a badi lɛ kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ.
41003031	Ke liti a, Yesu ɔma mɔ bawaɛ̃nyole ya bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ kanya ade bido lɔtɔ kĩ bɛvɛ ye ɛya.
41003032	Bati a kĩ bidzi bɛtsɛna Yesu a bi ye kĩ, “Dã, ama mɔ awaɛ̃ amɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ kanya bawɛ nɔ!”
41003033	Ade Yesu via be kĩ, “Owei nyɛ mma? Bawei nyɛ nwaɛ̃ amɛ?”
41003034	Kĩ ɛdã bati a kĩ bidzi bisinya ye ɛnake a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Midã, ade mma mɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ nɛ awĩ a!
41003035	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ ni, ade ye nyɛ nwaɛ̃nyole mɔ nwaɛ̃tsole, mɔ mma a.”
41004001	Yesu buki ɛnaa Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a ɔwɛ̃, ade ɛkatsa Baguma fɔlɛtsa a. Ayekĩ bati pii fɔli nɛ ye akũ sũ ni, ewo edzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kĩ eteĩ nɛ mui anɛ kamɛ. Bati dza nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ ade Yesu katsa be fɔtsa nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ a.
41004002	Lɔkɔ pii nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa kamɛ a, ɛkɔa fɔgbã ɛtsa fɔtsa a kĩ yawɛ kĩ ɛtsa be a. Fɔtsa a kĩ ɛtsa be a nyɛ fukĩĩ.
41004003	Ebi be kĩ, “Mitse! Luwi a onyole odi naa kɔba ɛnaasã funitsã babi.
41004004	Kĩ ɛkasã foe a fudi tɔ nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃, ade kɔvɔlabi yafila be bɛmɛna a.
41004005	Badi tɔ nɛ lɛkpakpalabode akũ, kĩ tite lɛláa pii. Foesũ babi a mɛ mɔatsɛ.
41004006	Lɛmɛ kĩ suwa ta kpaa pɛ bɛvɛ biku, kitonɛkĩ be tunu tána funitsã, nɛ boe a sũ.
41004007	Badi tɔ nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu ndɛ ɔgɔabi kamɛ. Tuwĩ mɔ fu mɛ fusuli be, kĩ bɛtápuli bibo anɛ. Nɛ foesũ bɛtáwũ babi.
41004008	Babi badi tɔ nɛ tite wĩ akũ. Bɛmɛ bibo anɛ, ade biwũ bido babi a. Badi do babi taalɛ, badi aduesia, badi ɔha.”
41004009	Nɛ kawũnakɔ̃ a Yesu bi be kĩ, “Oti kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse katse wĩ!”
41004010	Kĩ Yesu odi na nɛ kakɔ mɔa a, bati a kĩ binu ye lɛgbã a mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ya kĩ ɛnyɛ de kayɔ ɛtsa be.
41004011	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Baguma nyɛ ye lɛgãkanya kamɛ fɔtsa kɔlawa a ɛtsa mi. Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ bite a ni, mbɔɛntɛ fɔgbã kamɛ baakanu fɔlɛtsa a.
41004012	Foesũ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kamɛ odi tsɛlɛ eyi kĩ, ‘Baakadã, lɛmɛ bɛláamɔ biyi ɔsũ. Baakatse lɛmɛ bɛláanu foe kayɔ. Kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ banu ĩye bamɔ malo ni, bɛláanu kayɔ mɔ baadani bɛdã Baguma, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa be titikpa ete be.’ ”
41004013	Ade Yesu via be kĩ, “Ntɛ mitánu lɛgbã kĩĩ kayɔ a, nde míakɛna fɔmɔ míanu fɔgbã bɛbã kayɔ?
41004014	Fɔtsa odunɛ a nyɛ oti kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yalɛ Baguma kalɛ.
41004015	Bati badi la ndɛ babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ osi ɔwɛ̃ a. Ntɛ binu pɛ lɔkɔa Abonsam yanyɛ foe nɛ be fɔlɔ kamɛ.
41004016	Bati badi lɛmɛ la ndɛ babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ boe kamɛ. Ntɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ binu pɛ lɔkɔa kawɔlɛ de be.
41004017	Lɛmɛ kalɛ a ke tunu láwo nɛ tite kamɛ kawo wĩ. Be katɛkado adã lukũ. Ntɛ bati liti katomɛna yawo nɛ kalɛ kĩĩ akũ pɛ, baamuniki nɛ ke liti.
41004018	“Ade bati badi lɛmɛ la ndɛ babi kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu kamɛ a. Be bɛnyɛ bati kĩ binu Baguma fɔlɛtsa a,
41004019	lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhau, sika kawɛ mɔ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa yi be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Fɔtsa kĩĩ mɛna Baguma fɔlɛtsa a, foesũ fɔáwũ babi.
41004020	“Bati badi lɛmɛ atɛ Baguma Kalɛ a ndɛ babi kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ tite wĩ akũ. Bati kĩĩ tɛ ke mɔ be ɔwɔlɛ flee. Luwi nyɛ luwi, babo anɛ kanɛ lɔlɔ kawũ babi beblebee. Bɛkɛna ndɛ fudutsa a kĩ fɔawũ babi taalɛ, ĩye aduesia, ĩye ɔha mɔa.”
41004021	Yesu buki evia be kĩ, “Owei atɛna ɔsɛdza kakɔa lɔɔda katsa ye ĩye kakɔa ye kado nɛ mpa kayɔ? Nnɛ́ ɔsɛdza otse akũ bakɔa ye kate?
41004022	Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla a baanyɛ de kanya, ade Baguma aabinya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bisua a.
41004023	Foesũ ntɛ mideĩ atɔ ni, mitse foe katse wĩ!”
41004024	Bio, Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyi atɔ yededeede mitse lɛtsa a kĩ mianu a. Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa kakɔna odu a kĩ mikɔa mikɔna mikpa bati bɛbã a, ade foe odu Baguma lɛmɛ aakɔa ɛkɔna ɛkpa mi a.
41004025	Bikĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa yĩ fɔtsa katsa a baakpa be kayɔkanu dzununuunu. Lɛmɛ bikĩ baátse a ni, baatɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bideĩ a malo nɛ be awɛ.”
41004026	Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ oti kĩ yasã kamɔnɛ.
41004027	Luwi daa kĩ yawa kayidza, ade babi a amɛ kabo anɛ. Lɛmɛ enyína ayekĩ fɔtsa a akɛna kabo anɛ.
41004028	Tite afɔ̃ fudutsa alɛ nɛ foe akũ akũ. Lanya lɔtɔ lɔkɔa lɛnyɛ tɔɔta fɔmɔ kutse a anɛ. Ntɛ kubo anɛ kɔawũ babi beblebee.
41004029	Ntɛ babi a yɔɔlɛ a banɛna be, kitonɛkĩ kɔba funitsã kakpɔta lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ.”
41004030	Yesu via kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́akɔa bɔkɔnamɔ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a? Lɛgbã lɛwɔdabe makɔa ĩnyɛ kayɔ ntsa?
41004031	Fɔla ndɛ kutse libi kabii nɛ katinya kamɛ flee kĩ oti bɔɛ ɛnadu.
41004032	Kutse kĩĩ yapɔ kɔkɛna futse baũ a kamɛ kɔmɔa nɛ kɔba kamɛ. Kɔanɛ tɛnanɛ pii ade kɔakpa ɔna a. Kɔvɔlabi akɛna fɔtsɔɛ nɛ koe kamɛ.”
41004033	Yesu bi be Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ nɛ be kapuli kanu kayɔ onukpɛ̃.
41004034	Yaábi be kadima kɛba fɔgbã kamɛ. Ntɛ bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a odi bidzi a, lɔkɔa yanyɛ foe kayɔ katsa be.
41004035	Luwi a ke olobe a, Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bunyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a bɔnaa de abuĩ atide a.”
41004036	Foesũ bɛfɔnɛ bati a biwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ. Yesu nawo ɛkɛna akũ edzi, ade biyi ɔwɔ a kanyina kayɔ a. Tɔkɔlɔ bɛbã lɛmɛ na nɛ mui a akũ.
41004037	Owi tábuna ɔwɛ kpale odi do kavũ awɛ, ɛbɔa mui eko nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ. Ɔkɔlɔ a ka kɔlaa kĩ kite sukuloo kufɛ yayi mɔ mui ɛyɛla.
41004038	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yesu wa nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a liti. Ɛkɔa sumuyɛ ete lɔlɔ ɛlamɛna tida kawa. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nadzɛla ye ade bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, fɔtsɛ́la nɔ kĩ bɔwɔ buyua?”
41004039	Kĩ Yesu yidza ɛdza a, ade ewũni kĩ, “Ɔwɛ, fɔ̃ kavũ!” Ebi mui a lɛmɛ kĩ, “Mui, kɛna dĩĩ.” Ɔwɛ a fɔ̃ kavũ ade mui a anɛ flee kɛna dĩĩ a.
41004040	Yesu via ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nde sũ libe wo mi lɔmɔ? Mitátɛ yĩ mido?”
41004041	Nɛ libe a kĩ libuki liwo be a sũ ni, bɛkavia be akũ kĩ, “Owei koũ nyɛ oti kĩĩ? Mui mɔ ɔwɛ malo atse ye kalɛ!”
41005001	Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa Galilea lutubu baũ sɛkɛ kĩ a nɛ Gerasefɔ tite akũ.
41005002	Kĩ Yesu nɛ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ nɛ eto asie ɛyatsɛlamɔ ye.
41005003	Onyole kĩ kadzikɔ̃ nyɛ asie a kĩ efuã nɛ awã. Bati a flee lápuli kapi ye kado nɛ nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ kamɛ.
41005004	Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ basuli ye akpɔ mɔ abɔa ni, yaveli nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ a kĩ tipini ye a. Oti kĩ deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kudi odu kĩ odima lápuli kapi ye.
41005005	Lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee yamini nɛ asie mɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ. Ɛtsɛ̃ yabɔa fɔwɔla lɔkɔa yakɔa boe kakpeli ye akũ.
41005006	Onyole kĩĩ dzɛ̃ mɔ lugo fɔmɔ ɛmɔ Yesu. Foesũ ewula atsɛ ɛnake aduli nɛ Yesu nnyɛ.
41005007	Ade ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yesu, Baguma Nɛ Ode Flee Obi! Bɔake nɔ aduli, nɛ Baguma sũ, tunɔ kĩ ɔláavɛlɛ yĩ sɔtɔ!”
41005008	Ɛlɛ foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ enu kĩ Yesu kalɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa, nɛ́ nɛ oti kĩĩ kamɛ!”
41005009	Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nde bavɛ nɔ?” Awã naa ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bavɛ yĩ lidede, kitonɛkĩ boe a kĩ budeĩ nɛ onyole kĩĩ kamɛ a bɔpɔnɛ!”
41005010	Ade awã ebuki eke Yesu aduli mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ɛtablɔmɛna be ɛnɛmɛna nɛ tite a na kamɛ a.
41005011	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, baplakuo pii dzɛ̃ badɛ nɛ katɔbii kayɔ.
41005012	Ade bike Yesu aduli kĩ, “Blɔmɛna boe bɔnaawo nɛ baplakuo a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ akĩĩ a kamɛ.”
41005013	Ɛkpa be osi ade hũhũ a nɛ́ nɛ onyole a kamɛ bɛnawo nɛ baplakuo kamɛ a. Baplakuo a flee kĩ baawo ndɛ mpim nviã, lo atsɛ kplikplikpli bɛka kakpenii a, bɛnawo nɛ ɔwɔ a kamɛ ade be flee bɛmɔa mui biku a.
41005014	Bati a kĩ badãmɛna be akũ a wula atsɛ bɛnaa ɔmatɔ a mɔ tikĩ tifuã a kamɛ, bɛnalɛ lɛtsa flee a kĩ lɛya a. Bati wula atsɛ bɛnaa awã kĩ banaadã lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a.
41005015	Kĩ biwo Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a, bɛmɔ́ oti a kĩ hũhũ kpa beblebee na nɛ ye kamɛ a nɛ awã. Ɛkɛna akũ edzi ade edo atadiɛ a, ye anɛ kamɛ lɛmɛ kpalɛ. Libe wo bati a flee!
41005016	Bikĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛmɔ foe a, lɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ onyole a mɔ baplakuo a akũ.
41005017	Foesũ bike Yesu aduli kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be tite akũ.
41005018	Kĩ Yesu awo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ a, onyole a kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ ye kamɛ a ke ye aduli kĩ, “Fɔ̃ ntomɔ nɔ bɔnaa!”
41005019	Lɛmɛ Yesu tátunɔ. Mbom ebi ye kĩ, “Naa kɔla nɛ nɔ bati sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa kabi be lɛtsa a kĩ Ɔlate a kɛna ɛkpa nɔ, mɔ ayekĩ ɛmɔ nɔ kɔnya a.”
41005020	Foesũ onyole kĩĩ naa ɛnamini nɛ tɛmatɔ ewua kamɛkamɛ a, ade ebi be fɔlɛtsa flee a kĩ Yesu kɛna ɛkpa ye a. Fɔkɛna bikĩ binu foe a saa.
41005021	Yesu buki ɛdani ɛnaa lutubu baũ a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ a. Kĩ ewo de abuĩ a, bati pii yayi ye akũ.
41005022	Onyole odi nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Yairo ya nɛ awã. Kĩ ɛmɔ Yesu a, ɛkɛna akũ ɛkpa ye.
