41005023	Ade ebi ye mɔ kudulike kĩ, “Yĩ obitsole kabii kĩ kɛtɛ futeli ewua-nviã asɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Foesũ ya kayate awɛ nɛ ye akũ lɔkɔa yaana akũ ɔsĩ edzi nkpã.”
41005024	Ade Yesu yidza etomɔ ye a. Nɛ ayekĩ bati a kĩ bitomɔ Yesu pɔnɛ sũ, ɛna nɛ be kayite kĩ banaa.
41005025	-
41005026	Otsole odi kĩ babɔanɛ kawula nɛ ye akũ futeli ewua-nviã flee mɔ lubo kamɔ paa, titɔ kĩ bawanɛ kadã ye a malo na nɛ be kamɛ. Ebula sika flee kade nɛ fɔsɔ kĩĩ katsa akũ, lɛmɛ fɔsɔ a tádɔ ye, mbom kade fɔkade nɛ ode.
41005027	Enu Yesu nkã foesũ ɛna nɛ bati a kĩ bitomɔ Yesu nɛ liti a kamɛ.
41005028	Ade ebi ye akũ kĩ, “Ntɛ maapuli nta titɔ ye atadiɛ malo ni, kufɛ maasaɛ.”
41005029	Kĩ ɛta Yesu atadiɛ a, ade akũ fɔ̃ ye kawula deedimɔapɛ a. Ɛmɔ́ eyi ɔsũ nɛ ye kamɛ kĩ ɛsaɛ ade ɛnɛ nɛ ye lubo kamɔ kamɛ a.
41005030	Lɛtalɛta Yesu nyi kĩ kɔbɛ̃ kudi nɛ́ nɛ ye kamɛ. Foesũ ɛfɔ̃ ɛdza, ɛdani evia bati a kĩ bitomɔ ye a kĩ, “Owei nyɛ ekĩ ɛta yĩ atadiɛ?”
41005031	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Dã ayekĩ bati beblebee sinya nɔ. Nde sũ avia kĩ owei lɛta nɔ?”
41005032	Lɛmɛ Yesu dzɛmɛna anɛ kako kadã kĩ yaamɔ oti a kĩ ye lɛta ye a.
41005033	Otsole a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ ye akũ. Foesũ nɛ libe mɔ kukũtila kamɛ ni, ɛnɛ ɛyake aduli nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ. Ebi ye lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a yededeede.
41005034	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ obitsole, nɔ katɛkado fɔ̃ ɔsaɛ. Naa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ. Nɔ lubo kamɔ a lɛláabuki lɛya nɛ nɔ akũ dadaada.”
41005035	Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu kalɛ fukĩĩ a, batɔ to Yairo awã bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Nɔ obi a ku kɔkɔɛ. Nde sũ obuki aha fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ kĩĩ?”
41005036	Yesu tátse be kalɛ a, mbom ebi Yairo kĩ, “Tavila, nɔ kɔ̃ tɛ kado.”
41005037	Yesu kpã Petro, Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes be odi bɛnaa Yairo awã.
41005038	Kĩ biwo tɔtɔ a kamɛ a, ade kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ayekĩ bati dzɛ̃ mɔ kɔnya mɔ fɔwɔla a,
41005039	ewo nɛ be kamɛ, evia be kĩ, “Litsa tsɛ̃mɔ fɔwɔla kĩĩ odu? Nde sũ miabe? Kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kĩĩ táku. Tida kawa!”
41005040	Kĩ ɛlɛ foe lɔmɔ pɛ, bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã támɔ ye kamɛmɛ. Ade Yesu fɔ̃ bɛnyɛ bati a flee bɛnaa kanya, ade ɛfɔ̃ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a biwo nɛ awã kĩ ɔnɔkpa a waa a.
41005041	Yesu pi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ ade ebi ye kĩ, “Talita koumu!” Foe kayɔ nɛ tide a kamɛ nyɛ kĩ, “Kayitsɔ̃bi kabii, mabi nɔ kĩ yidza!”
41005042	Deedimɔapɛ katsolebi kĩĩ yidza kɛdza ade kido kato katɛ̃ awɛ a. Kĩ fɔya lɔmɔ a, fɔkɛna be a flee wãwã.
41005043	Lɛmɛ Yesu si be mbla mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɛtabi odima kadimanɔ. Ebuki ebi be kĩ, “Mikpa ke litsedi kɛnya.”
41006001	Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ade bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛnaa ɔmatɔ a kĩ ye kamɛ bɛdɔɔla ye a.
41006002	Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a akũ a, ɛnatsa Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a. Ye ɔmatɔ bati pii yatse ye fɔtsa katsa, ade fɔkɛna be saa a. Bivia be akũ kĩ, “Ndia oti kĩĩ kɔlɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ odu etomɛna? Kadikanyi mɔ kɔbɛ̃ wɔdabe bɛkpa ye sũ mɔ epuli yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa kĩĩ odu?
41006003	Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Maria obi kĩ yamɛ fɔtsa a yanɛ? Ĩye nnɛ́ bawaɛ̃nyole nyɛ Yakobo, Yose, Yuda mɔ Simon? Miádã! Nnɛ́ bawaɛ̃tsole lɛmɛ nɛ awĩ a?” Foesũ bati kĩĩ sĩ ye katɛ kado.
41006004	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ tɛ dĩ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, lɛmɛ nɛ ye mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ, mɔ ye mɔawɛ bati kamɛ ni, ɛlá dĩ wĩ lidima.”
41006005	-
41006006	Nɛ ayekĩ ye ɔtɔ bati tátɛ ye bido sũ ni, fɔlɛtsa a nyɛnɛ Yesu akũ. Fɔtsɛ̃ foe akũ sũ ɛtápuli ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii nɛ awã, kɛba kĩ ete awɛ nɛ basɔnɛ badi akũ, ade be fɔsɔ a dɔ be a.
41006007	Ɛvɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛkpɔta, ade edo be nviã nviã a. Ɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kɔnya hũhũ kpa flee akũ.
41006008	Esi be mbla kĩ, “Odima ɛtabɔɛ lɛtsama ɛlɛ nɛ ye osi akũ, mbɔɛntɛ otse kĩ bake katsã odi. Mitalɛ funitsã ĩye kuvũ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔtsa bawãnɛ alɛ a. Mitabɔɛ sika milɛ nɛ mi fuvũ kamɛ.
41006009	Mido mi tɛpambua, lɛmɛ mitabɔɛ tilima bɛbã mibumɛna lɛtsa a kĩ mido a.”
41006010	Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Awã kĩ míase a ni, mina nɛ awã kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ míadzakũ.
41006011	Awã kĩ bati tátɛ mi ni, minɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔa mikpa mi abɔa kudu miko nɛ be akũ, fɔnya nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔkpa be kĩ Baguma aavɛlɛ be sɔtɔ.”
41006012	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã kĩĩ mini bɛtsa Baguma fɔlɛtsa wĩ a kĩ odi nyɛ odi ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
41006013	Bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa pii bitomɛna bati kamɛ. Bɛtsɛla basɔnɛ kugua ade bɛtsa be a.
41006014	Lɔkɔ kĩĩ, Lɛgã Herodes kanu lɛkɛnawa wĩ a flee kitonɛkĩ Yesu dĩ gba nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ. Bati badi kalɛ kĩ, “Yohanes, Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a, liyidza ebuki eto kanɔkpa ɛya! Ade foesũ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa a!”
41006015	Badi lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya yanɛ.” Babɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a kamɛ odi yanɛ.”
41006016	Lɛmɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Lɛgã Herodes nu fɔlɛtsa kĩ a ye malo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yohanes a kĩ nfɔ̃ bitsua ye lɔlɔ a, ade ye liyidza ebuki edzi nkpã a.”
41006017	Lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, Lɛgã Herodes mɔawɛ lɛfɔ̃ bipi Yohanes ade ke ɛfɔ̃ bisuli ye mɔ tɔwɛ̃ bɛkɔa bido nɛ kɔla kĩ bado tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a kamɛ a. Lɛgã Herodes kɛna fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ Herodia kĩ ɛkɔã a nya ɔwaɛ̃ Filipo ɔtsɔ̃.
41006018	Yohanes kabi Herodes kĩ, “Kɛtáfɛta kĩ atɛ awaɛ̃ ɔtsɔ̃ ɔkɔã.”
41006019	Foesũ Yohanes fɔlɛtsa a wo Herodia kalɔɛ, ade ɛbɔɛ ye likesĩ a. Ɛwɛ kĩ yakɔ ye lɛmɛ ɛláapuli ɛkɛna fukĩĩ nɛ Lɛgã Herodes liti.
41006020	Kitonɛkĩ Lɛgã Herodes avila Yohanes, ade enyina kĩ Yohanes nyɛ oti wĩ kĩ ye akũ kpalɛ. Ɛkana kɔnɛyi nɛ ye akũ. Yawɛ katse ye fɔtsa katsa a katse fɔkɔ fudi, titɔ kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa awɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kaha ntɛ enu foe.
41006021	Ke kawũna a, osi yabinya ɛkpa Herodia. Luwi a nya Lɛgã Herodes lɛmawi. Lɛgã Herodes vɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃, sodzafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Galilea tite akũ bɛya nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a.
41006022	Herodia obi oyitsɔ̃ ya ɛyato edo Lɛgã Herodes mɔ ye bakɔba a kawɔlɛ paa nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a. Foesũ Lɛgã Herodes via oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ, “Litsa awɛ kĩ nkpa nɔ?”
41006023	Ɛlɔ fubo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ aavia yĩ ni, maakpa nɔ, ntɛ fɔ́anya yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sɛkɛ malo!”
41006024	Foesũ oyitsɔ̃ kĩĩ nɛ ɛnavia ɔma kĩ, “Litsa nvia?” Ade ɔma bi ye kĩ, “Via Yohanes, mui ɔwɔlanɛ a, lɔlɔ.”
41006025	Oyitsɔ̃ a wɛ sɔwa ɛnaa kɔla a kamɛ, ade ebi Lɛgã Herodes kĩ, “Mawɛ kĩ tsua Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a lɔlɔ kate nɛ tsensi akũ kakpa yĩ finyaa finyaakĩĩ.”
41006026	Fukĩĩ wo Lɛgã Herodes kalɔɛ paa lɛmɛ ɛláapuli ɛdani ye sɛmɛ nɛ fubo a kĩ ɛlɔ nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ sũ.
41006027	Foesũ awã naa edo ye ɔblafɔ kĩ ɛnaatsua Yohanes lɔlɔ ɛyamɛna. Ɔblafɔ a natsua naa kɔla kĩ bado bati a ɛnatsua Yohanes lɔlɔ.
41006028	Ɛkɔa lɔlɔ a ete nɛ tsensi akũ ade ɛkɔa ɛma oyitsɔ̃ a. Ye malo ɛtɛ ɛkɔa de ɛma ɔma.
41006029	Kĩ Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu fɔlɛtsa a, bɛnaa bɛnabɔɛ ye ɔnɔkpa a bɛnabila.
41006030	Fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ Yesu do kĩ mini nɛ fɔkɔ a kĩ fufuã buki bimuniki, ade bibi ye fɔtsa flee a kĩ bɛkɛna, fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsa mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔya nɛ be osi akũ a.
41006031	Awã kĩ Yesu mɔ be bɛna a bati a yapɔ lidede, bikĩĩ anaa ni bikĩĩ aya, foesũ bɛtána osi mɔ banya malo. Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ boe odi bɔnaa awã kĩ kadã dĩĩ bɔnaawɛya sukuloo.”
41006032	Biwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ banaa awã kĩ bati lɛláa.
41006033	Lɛmɛ kĩ banaa a, bati pii mɔ be biyi ɔsũ, ade ke biwula atsɛ bɛnya be lɔtɔ biwo awã fɔmɔ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nawo awã.
41006034	Kĩ Yesu nɛ́ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a, ɛmɔ bati beblebee. Be akũ kɔ ye kɔnya kitonɛkĩ bɛkɛna ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛlá ɔkpãnɛ. Foesũ eyi kayɔ mɔ be Baguma fɔlɛtsa katsa.
41006035	Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Kade dɔ kiyua. Ayekĩ awĩ la a bɛláana lɛtsama bɛnya.
41006036	Foesũ kpa be osi bɛdzakũ, lɔkɔa ntɛ biwo tɛmatɔ a mɔ tukula kamɛ a, baana litsedi bɛya bɛnya.”
41006037	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mi mɔawɛ a miwɛ litsedi mikpa be bɛnya.” Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Be kanya aatɛ ndɛ oti mɔa tidetɔ ɛlɛ̃ kɔtɔkase. Awɛ kĩ bubula sika kade nɛ be kanya odi sũ?”
41006038	Ade ke Yesu via be kĩ, “Abodoo eni minɛɛ? Minaa minaadã.” Kĩ bɛnadã a bibi ye kĩ, “Abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã pɛ deĩ.”
41006039	Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛfɔ̃ bati a flee bidzi nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ nɛ tuwĩ blɔblɔ akũ.
41006040	Bati a flee sɛ̃ bidzi nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ. Kutsu kudi aawo ndɛ bati ɔha, kudi lɛmɛ aawo ndɛ aduenum.
41006041	Yesu bɔɛ abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã a ade kĩ ɛdã odetɔ́ kamɛ fɛɛ a, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ɛyɛlɛ abodoo a. Ɛkɔa foe ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa kutsu a flee. Ade ɛkɛna kɔfɔabi a lɛmɛ lɔmɔ a.
41006042	Bati a flee nya biwĩ.
41006043	Kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila funitsã a kĩ fute bɛkpɔta a, fuyi kɔba tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã.
41006044	Ade bati a kĩ bɛnya funitsã a banyole nɛnɛ odi lidede wo mpim elo.
41006045	Awã naa Yesu fɔ̃ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ bɛnaa ɔmatɔ kĩ bavɛ Betsaida nɛ lutubu baũ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ a. Ɛfɔ̃ bati beblebee a lɛmɛ pansam.
41006046	Ke liti a, ye malo ede ɛnaa ɔtɔ kalete ɛnabɔa mpaɛ.
41006047	Ke lɛnyɛ a, ɔkɔlɔ a wo ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a kayite, ade kite Yesu odi nɛ awã a.
41006048	Ɛmɔ́ kĩ kɛkapiã ye bati a mɔ ɔkɔlɔ a kahali, kitonɛkĩ ɔwɛ kavũ katsɛlamɔ be. Foesũ fɔmɔ ɔnɔnɛ tɔdɔũ elo aabɔa a, Yesu tsã mui anɛ ɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃. Kĩ efuã be a, ɛkɛna ndɛ yatɛ̃ be,
41006049	ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Ɔnɔkpa yanɛ!”
41006050	Libe wo be flee. Lɛmɛ lɛtalɛta Yesu lɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla kĩ, “Mitavila! Yĩ manɛ. Mina ɔwɔlɛ!”
41006051	Ewo nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ade ɔwɛ a fɔ̃ kavũ a. Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɛna saa,
41006052	kitonɛkĩ bɛtányi ayekĩ fɔkɛna fɔmɔ ɛkpa bati mpim elo funitsã bɛnya bitina. Be kakɔna nɛ fukĩĩ akũ malo tákpalɛ, foesũ bɛtátɛ bido.
41006053	Kĩ biwo ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a sɛkɛ sitide a, biduma nɛ Genezaret. Ade awã bɛbla be ɔkɔlɔ bɛdzɛla a.
41006054	Mɔ be kanɛ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ pɛ bati mɔ Yesu biyi ɔsũ.
41006055	Foesũ biwula atsɛ bɛnakpa kanyi nɛ be tite flee akũ. Awã kĩ binu kĩ Yesu na a, bɛlɔ basɔnɛ bɛma ye.
41006056	Ade kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ Yesu tsã, ntɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ o-o, ĩye akula kamɛ o-o, bati kayamɛna basɔnɛ nɛ kɔyaatɔ ade bɛkawã ye kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛta ye atadiɛ atɔ. Bikĩ bɛta ye a na akũ ɔsĩ.
41007001	Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi to Yerusalem bɛyatsɛna nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃.
41007002	Bɛmɔ́ kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzi banya, ade badi távɔlɛ awɛ ndɛ ayekĩ be Farisifɔ bɛtsa bati kĩ bɛkaakɛna a.
41007003	Biyi foe ɔsũ kitonɛkĩ Farisifɔ a mɔ Yudafɔ a flee tomɔ be bawanyɔ amaniɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa biyi be a. Foesũ ntɛ bɛtávɔlɛ awɛ kavɔlɛ wĩ ni, baánya.
41007004	Ntɛ bɛya litsedi bitomɛna kɔyaatɔ malo, kɛnɛ kĩ bavɔlɛ awɛ fɔmɔ banya. Bitomɛna mbla kumɛkumɛ lɛmɛ kĩ bibo anɛ bɛyamɔ a, ndɛ kuyei, fɔtɔtsa mɔ fugumi kavɔlɛ.
41007005	Foesũ Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a via Yesu kĩ, “Nde sũ bikĩ bitomɛna nɔ a lákɛna nɛ boe bawanyɔ amaniɛ akũ? Ade ntɛ banya malo baávɔlɛ awɛ!”
41007006	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ nɛ mi akũ a ya nɛ foe kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ. Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Bati kĩĩ asum yĩ mɔ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mɛnɛmɛnɛ odi, lɛmɛ be tɔwɔlɛ deĩ lugo nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.
41007007	Pupulidza basum yĩ, kitonɛkĩ batsa batidziwa mbla nɛ Baguma mbla a kadokɔ̃.’
41007008	Fɔatsa kĩ bɛkɔa yĩ mbla biyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ ade bɛkɔa batidziwa amaniɛ a batsa a!”
41007009	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mideĩ tɛdake tidi kĩ mitomɛna ade mikɔa Baguma mbla miyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ nɛ ayekĩ míakɛna nɛ mi bawanyɔ amaniɛ akũ sũ.
41007010	Foesũ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Mose tsɛlɛ eyi kĩ, ‘Bu aga mɔ ama.’ Ade ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edumu ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ ye.’
41007011	Lɛmɛ miatsa kĩ ntɛ odi deĩ litsedi kĩ yaakɔa ebumɔ ye bamanɛ ni, yaapuli ɛlɛ kĩ ɛkɔa foe eyi lite ndɛ fɔtsa kpalɛwa ɛkpa Baguma lɔkɔa fɔatsa kĩ owula kɔa fɔtsa tewa a eyi kĩ yaabɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma.
41007012	Ade ke mitákpa ye osi malo kĩ yabumɛna ye bamanɛ a mɔ fɔtsa tewa a!
41007013	Ade aye mikɔa mi bawanyɔ amaniɛ mibula Baguma mbla kade a. Miakɛna fɔtsa bɛbã ndɛ fukĩĩ odu.”
41007014	Ke liti a, Yesu buki ɛvɛ bati a flee ɛkpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃. Ebi be kĩ,
41007015	“Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ oti nya mɔ fuwo nɛ ye kamɛ ni, fɔádo ye efĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ. Mbom lɛtsa kĩ lato oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a, ade foe ado ye efĩĩ a.
41007016	Mi flee miyi atɔ mitse katse wĩ.”
41007017	Kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛnaa kɔla a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ ɛnyɛ lɛgbã a kayɔ ɛtsa be.
41007018	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ntɛ mitánu kalɛ kĩĩ kayɔ kekɔ̃ mi adzuni lɛláapuli epi lɛtsama. Fɔwaa yedede kĩ lɛtsa kĩ lawo nɛ oti kamɛ ni, fɔádo ye efĩĩ.
41007019	Kitonɛkĩ fɔtáwo nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Mbom fɔnaa ye sɛmɛ kamɛ, ade fɔtsa ye kamɛ fɔnɛ ndɛ fɔtsa kpa a.” Lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ nɛ awĩ tsa kĩ funitsã fudi nyɛ fudi nɛnɛ fɔkpa kanya.
41007020	Ebuki ɛlɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ lanɛ kato oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, ade foe ado ye efĩĩ a.
41007021	Kitonɛkĩ oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ tɔkpa kakɔna ato, tɔkpa a tidi nyɛ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, kaye, oti kakɔ, kɔnyɔ mɔ kɔtsɔ̃ liti kanɛ,
41007022	anɛ ngbã, ablɔ kakɛna, fɔvã kama, sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔnɛnɛ, likesĩ, fɔvã kama kate nɛ bati akũ, lukũta mɔ kadzi nɛ tidzimbi kamɛ.
41007023	Fɔtsa kĩĩ flee to oti kamɛ ade foe ado ye efĩĩ a.”
41007024	Yesu dzakũ ɛnaa tite a kĩ tifuã ɔmatɔ kĩ bavɛ Tiro a kamɛ. Ɛwo nɛ tɔtɔ tidi kamɛ. Ɛtáwɛ kĩ odima enyi kĩ edeĩ nɛ awã, lɛmɛ ɛtápuli ɛkɔla ye akũ.
41007025	Otsole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye obi kamɛ nu kĩ Yesu na nɛ awã, ade ɛya ɛyake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ a.
41007026	Otsole kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛmɔ Yudafɔ baákã. Ɛnyɛ Foenikeni kĩ eto Siria tite akũ. Eke Yesu aduli kĩ ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a etomɛna obitsole kamɛ.
41007027	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Fɔ̃ bɛkpa babisɛ̃ funitsã tɔ̃. Fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ bakɔa babisɛ̃ funitsã bɛkpa bakpete.”
41007028	Awã naa otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awoo, boe Ɔlɛga, lɛmɛ bakpete a kĩ bikoni nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a ana osi kanya babisɛ̃ funitsã a kĩ fuwuli fuko nɛ tite a.”
41007029	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔlɛ nɛ awĩ sũ ni, kaanaa kɔla. Aamɔ kĩ hũhũ kpa a nɛ́ nɛ nɔ obitsole a kamɛ.”
41007030	Otsole kĩĩ naa kɔla, ade ɛmɔ kĩ obi a waa nɛ ɔkɛna akũ, lɔkɔa hũhũ kpa a nɛ nɛ ye kamɛ.
41007031	Kĩ Yesu dzakũ nɛ Tiro kayite a ade ɛtsã Sidon ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, ɛtsã Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ abuĩ, ɛnaa tɛmatɔ ewua a kamɛkamɛ a.
41007032	Nɛ awã a, bati badi yamɛna odi kĩ esĩ atɔ ade ɛnyɛ omumu lɛmɛ a. Bike ye aduli kĩ ete awɛ nɛ ye akũ.
41007033	Foesũ Yesu kpã ye ɛnamɛna ɔɔwɛ̃, ade ɛkɔa bawobi edo nɛ ye atɔ kamɛ a, ade etua tanɛ lɛmɛ ete nɛ lawobi akũ ɛkɔa ekputa onyole a sɛmɛ a.
41007034	Ade Yesu dzɛla anɛ ɛdã ode, ɛwɛya eke fɛɛ ade ebi onyole a kĩ, “Hefata,” foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ, “Binya!”
41007035	Deedimɔapɛ onyole a atɔ binya ade ye sɛmɛ tɔwɛ̃ wũnya, epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a.
41007036	Yesu sua bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã osi kĩ bɛtabi odima lɛtsama nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛmɔ́ a akũ. Lɛmɛ pupulidza esi be mbla, kitonɛkĩ be flee bɛnaa bɛnalɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛya a.
41007037	Bati a flee kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩ a, fɔkɛna be saa! Ade bibi akũ kĩ, “Yakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kakɛna wĩ. Ɛfɔ̃ omumu alɛ kɔdzɛla, ade ɔtɔsĩnɛ lɛmɛ anu fɔkɔ a!”
41008001	Owi tábuna fɔmɔ bati pii yatsɛna nɛ awã. Kĩ lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ baanya sũ ni, Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a efuãmɔ ye ade ebi be kĩ,
41008002	“Bati kĩĩ fɔlɛtsa akɔ yĩ kɔnya kitonɛkĩ bɛna nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ fuwi ɛlalɛ flee. Ade finyaakĩĩ bɛlá lɛtsama kĩ baanya.
41008003	Ntɛ nfɔnɛ be awɛ mɔ bɛdzakũ mɔ kɔlɛ ni, baanaa lɔkɔa anɛ aasinya be nɛ osi, kitonɛkĩ badi to mɔ lugo.”
41008004	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Nɛ kɔsa kĩĩ kamɛ, ndia oti odi aana funitsã ɛkpa bati kĩ bɛnya biwĩ?”
41008005	Awã na Yesu via be kĩ, “Abodoo eni minɛɛ?” Bibi ye kĩ, “Bɔnɛɛ abodoo evũkɔnɔ.”
41008006	Yesu bi bati a kĩ bɛkɛna akũ bidzi. Ade ɛbɔɛ abodoo evũkɔnɔ a. Ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ɛyɛlɛ ye fɔkɛfɔkɛ a, ɛkɔa ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkpa bati a flee. Be malo bɛtɛ, ade bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa be a.
41008007	Bɛnɛɛ kɔfɔabi kubii kudi lɛmɛ nɛ awã, ade Yesu bɔɛ koe lɛmɛ ɛnyɛ kɔlɛ a. Ɛkɔa koe ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛsɛ̃ koe lɛmɛ bɛkpa be.
41008008	-
41008009	Bati a flee nya biwĩ. Bati a lidede aawo mpim ɛna. Kĩ bɛnya biyua a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila fuwuliwa a kĩ fute a bɛkpɔta ade fuyi kɔba tɛtsɛtsɛ kpale kpale evũkɔnɔ a. Ke liti a, Yesu nyɛ bati a flee osi ade bɛdzakũ a.
41008010	Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ binyina bɛnaa Dalmanuta tite akũ.
41008011	Farisifɔ badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade bɛkavia ye fɔlɛtsa kĩ basɔ ye bɛdã. Foesũ bibi ye kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa fudi lɔkɔa bɛmɔ kĩ eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
41008012	Lɛmɛ Yesu wɛya eke ade evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ koũ nviã babi awɛ kĩ bamɔ awãwã fɔtsa? Oowo, mabi mi kĩ nláayakɛna awãwã fɔtsa a odu kĩ miawɛ nɛ awĩ!”
41008013	Ɛdzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ade ebuki ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ enyina ɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a sɛkɛ̃ sitide a.
41008014	Kĩ banaa a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛla abodoo kabɔɛ kabu, foesũ abodoo a amɔapɛ bɛna nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ.
41008015	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ nɛ Lɛgã Herodes mɔ Farisifɔ oyila a akũ.”
41008016	Bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Ade ayekĩ bɔnɛ́ɛ abodoo adima sũ mɔ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ a.”
41008017	Lɛmɛ Yesu nyi lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ a, ade evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ mialɛ abodoo katabɔɛ fɔlɛtsa? Foesũ kɛyawo lɔkɔ kĩĩ a mitáyi ɔsũ ĩye mitánu foe kayɔ tɔ̃? Mi atɔ deĩ ɔsĩ paa! Miáte lɛtsama anɛ?
41008018	Mideĩ anɛ lɛmɛ miámɔ! Mideĩ atɔ lɛmɛ miánu!
41008019	Mitámɔ lɔkɔ a kĩ nsɛ̃ abodoo elo nkpa bati mpim elo bɛba a? Tɛtsɛtsɛ eni fɔkɛfɔkɛ kubii a kĩ fute a yi?” Bibi ye kĩ, “Kɔba tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã.”
41008020	Yesu buki evia be kĩ, “Mɔ lɔkɔ a kĩ nsɛ̃ abodoo evũkɔnɔ nkpa bati mpim ɛna a, awuliwa a kĩ ete a, tɛtsɛtsɛ eni eyi?” Bibi ye kĩ, “Te kpale kpale evũkɔnɔ.”
41008021	Ade evia be kĩ, “Kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a, nde sũ mɔ miányi oti a odu kĩ ye manɛ?”
41008022	Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo Betsaida a, bati badi kpã ɔnɛkunɛ bɛma ye ade bike ye aduli kĩ ɛkɔa awɛ ɛta ɔnɛkunɛ a.
41008023	Yesu pi oti a nɛ kɔkpɔ ade ɛkpã ye ɛnamɛna ɔmatɔ a ɔbaɛ̃ a. Kĩ evũma tanɛ eko nɛ oti a anɛ kamɛ a, ɛkɔa awɛ ete nɛ ye akũ ade evia ye kĩ, “Amɔ litsedi?”
41008024	Ade oti a dzɛla anɛ ɛdã ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Oo! Mamɔ bati, lɛmɛ badã ndɛ futse. Lɛmɛ bɛtsɛ̃ bamini.”
41008025	Ade Yesu buki ɛta ye anɛ a. Lɛyade kĩ kɔ̃ oti a binya ye anɛ yededeede, ye anɛ kamɛ kpalɛ ade ɛmɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɔ wĩ a.
41008026	Yesu nyɛ ye osi ebi ye kĩ ɛtabuki ɛtsã ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛnaa kɔla.
41008027	Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ nɛ awã bɛnaa tukula kĩ tifuã Kaisarea nɛ Filipi kamɛkamɛ a. Kĩ banaa nɛ osi a, Yesu via be kĩ, “Mibi yĩ oti a odu kĩ bati alɛ kĩ ye manɛ.”
41008028	Bibi ye kĩ, “Badi alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a. Ade badi lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya. Badi bɛbã lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa.”
41008029	Ade ke Yesu buki evia be kĩ, “Nde nyɛ mi lɛmɛ? Owei mialɛ kĩ ye manɛ?” Petro bi ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Kristo a Kĩ Bɛbɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a.”
41008030	Yesu sua be osi kĩ bɛtabi odima lɛtsa a kĩ binyi nɛ ye akũ nɛ awĩ a.
41008031	Ade Yesu yi kayɔ mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fɔtsa fudi katsa a. Ebi be kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ fɔya kĩ Otidziwa Obi a ɛmɔ lubo etomɛna ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃, Yudafɔ basɔfɔ banɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ kamɛ. Ade baasĩ ye, bɛkɔ ye, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, yaayidza edzi nkpã.”
41008032	Ebi be fukĩĩ yededeede binu. Petro kpã ye ɛnamɛna ɔɔwɛ̃, ade ɛtsa kĩ bɛmɔ ye bɛtákɛna ɔmɔa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a akũ.
41008033	Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu dani ɛdã ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ɛkã Petro anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Dzakũ nɛ yĩ akũ Satana! Aáwɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ a, mbom awɛ lɛtsa a kĩ batidziwa awɛ a odi!”
41008034	Foesũ Yesu vɛ bati kɔdabu a mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ebi be kĩ, “Ntɛ odi awɛ kĩ yatomɔ yĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ yafɔnɛ ye apɛdiɛ awɛ, ɛbɔɛ ye lubo kamɔ fɔlɔtsa luwi nyɛ luwi lɔkɔa etomɔ yĩ nɛ liti.
41008035	Kitonɛkĩ oti kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye. Lɛmɛ oti kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa nɛ yĩ mɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ ni, yaana nkpã daa.
41008036	Litsa nfasɔ oti aana ntɛ ɛna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee mɔ ɛyɛla ye nkpã mɔawɛ a?
41008037	Ĩye litsa oti aakɔa ɛvɛmɛna mɔ nkpã mɔawɛ a?
41008038	Foesũ ntɛ yĩ mɔ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a flee nyɛ fɔnyɔãtsa fɔkpa odi nɛ ablɔ katinya kpa kĩĩ kamɛ ni, ye malo yaanya fɔnyɔãtsa ɛkpa Yĩ Otidziwa Obi, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔmɔ́ Baguma fɔtɔ banyanɛ kpalɛwa a bɔ́aya nɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a flee kamɛ.”
41009001	Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awĩ kĩ bɛláaku kɛnaawo kĩ bɛmɔ́ Baguma lɛgãkanya a ya mɔ kɔbɛ̃.”
41009002	Fuwi evũ liti a, Yesu kpã Petro, mɔ Yakobo, mɔ Yohanes bɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ, awã kĩ be bɛna. Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kadã a, Yesu akũ dani nɛ be anɛ kamɛ,
41009003	ade ye tɛtadiɛ dani tivoe kɛba ayekĩ otidziwa aapuli ɛvɔlɛ te tɛnɛ́ lɔmɔ.
41009004	Adeke fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a mɔ́ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ Mose mɔ Eliya kĩ bɛnyɛ be akũ bɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ Yesu a.
41009005	Ade Petro bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ bɔya nɛ awĩ! Fɔ̃ bɔkɛna tɛpatampa ɛlalɛ, nɔ ade amɔa, Mose ade amɔa, lɔkɔa Eliya lɛmɛ ade amɔa.”
41009006	Lɛmɛ enyína lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkalɛ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛtɛ́nɛ kavila.
41009007	Lufulututu lidi ka lɛyasua be akũ, ade odo nɛ́ eto de kamɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ obi kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ a, mitse ye kalɛ!”
41009008	Lɛtalɛta bɛdã fɔkɔ bisinya lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ odima kɛba Yesu kĩ ɛdzɛ nɛ be ɔwɛ̃.
41009009	Kĩ bito ɔtɔ akũ baka a, Yesu si be mbla kĩ, “Mitabi odima lɛtsa a kĩ mimɔ́ a kɛnaawo lɔkɔ kĩ Otidziwa Obi a yidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ.”
41009010	Bɛfɔ̃ kalɛ kĩĩ kahɔ nɛ be lɔlɔ kamɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ be odi bidzi a balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ foe akũ kavia akũ kĩ, “Kayidza kato kanɔkpa a kayɔ nyɛ litsa?”
41009011	Adeke bivia Yesu kĩ, “Litsa sũ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a alɛ kĩ, kɛnɛ kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya?”
41009012	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nuwĩ, kɛnɛ kĩ Eliya ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya ayekĩ yaamanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa eyi. Litsa sũ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ Otidziwa Obi a aayamɔ lubo pii, bisupa ye lɛmɛ a?
41009013	Mabi mi kĩ Eliya ya kɔkɔɛ ade bɛkɛna ye lɛtsa a kĩ bɛwɛ a, ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi nɛ ye akũ a.”
41009014	Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a muniki bɛya nɛ be nkaɛ a sɛkɛ̃ a, bɛmɔ́ bati kɔdabu baũ kĩ bisinya be, ade mbla batsanɛ a badi kavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ be a.
41009015	Kĩ bati a kɔdabu a mɔ́ Yesu a, akũ dzuli be, ade biwula atsɛ bɛnawɔ̃na ye a.
41009016	Yesu via ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa milamɔ kavɛlɛ mɔ be?”
41009017	Onyole odi nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, nkpã yĩ obi mma nɔ, kitonɛkĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ ade yaapuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a.
41009018	Kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ hũhũ a api ye ni, yabɔɛ ye kamuni nɛ tite, ade kuvũ anɛ nɛ ye onukpɛ̃, yaba adɔ̃ lɔkɔa ye akũ flee asinsĩ. Nkpã ye mma nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ a, lɛmɛ bɛtápuli.”
41009019	Yesu bi be kĩ, “O! Nviã babi kĩ milá katɛkado! Maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ daa? Lɔkɔ lɔɔdabe mado ɔwɔlɛ nvɛlɛ mi nnaawo? Mikpã kanyolebi a mima yĩ!”
41009020	Bɛkpã ke bɛma Yesu. Kĩ hũhũ a sila ɛmɔ Yesu a, efufulinya kanyolebi a kɛka kɛtɔ, kɛkamilinya nɛ tite kanɛ kuvũ nɛ onukpɛ̃.
41009021	Ade Yesu via ɔlɛga kĩ, “Lɔkɔ ɔdabe fuyi ye kayɔ?” Ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kito anɛ ye tibisɛ̃ kamɛ.
41009022	Lɔkɔ pii hũhũ kpa a awɛ kĩ yakɔ ye, foesũ yabɔɛ ye kamuni nɛ fi ĩye mui kamɛ. Ntɛ aapuli ɔkɛna litsedi ni, mɔ́ boe kɔnya lɔkɔa kabumɔ boe.”
41009023	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kalɛ ɔlɛ kĩ ntɛ maapuli? Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa aapuli lɛya lɛkpa oti kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo.”
41009024	Deedimɔapɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a ɔlɛga bɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Ndeĩ katɛkado, lɛmɛ kɛpɔ́nɛ, bumɔ yĩ nna katɛkado mbu!”
41009025	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ kĩ bati kɔdabu a kadu kafuã be a, ewũni nɛ hũhũ kpa a akũ kĩ, “Nɔ hũhũ kpa ɔtɔsĩnɛ mɔ omumu, mabi nɔ kĩ nɛ nɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a kamɛ, tabuki ɔyaawo nɛ ke kamɛ dadaada!”
41009026	Hũhũ kpa a bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba, efufulinya kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a mɔ ɔsĩ, ɛbɔɛ ke emuni nɛ tite, ade ɛnɛ́ nɛ ke kamɛ a. Kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a kɛna ndɛ kaku kiku, foesũ bati a pii lɛ kĩ, “Eku!”
41009027	Lɛmɛ Yesu pi kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a nɛ kɔkpɔ ade kiyidza kɛdza a.
41009028	Ke liti a, kĩ Yesu naa tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye pɛtɛɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ boe kɔ̃ bɔtápuli bɔblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a ɛnɛ́ nɛ ye kamɛ?”
41009029	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Bɛláapuli bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kĩĩ odu, mbɔɛntɛ bɛtsãmɛna foe mpaɛbɔ kamɛ.”
41009030	Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ nɛ awã bɛnatsã Galilea. Yesu táwɛ kĩ odima anyi awã kĩ ɛnaa,
41009031	kitonɛkĩ ɛkatsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fɔtsa. Ebi be kĩ, “Baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ bati awɛ ade baakɔ ye a, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde liti a, yaayidza edzi nkpã.”
41009032	Lɛmɛ bɛtánu lɛtsa kĩ ebi be a kayɔ, ade bivila kĩ bavia ye a.
41009033	Bɛyawo Kapernaum ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, ade kĩ biwo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ a, Yesu via ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Litsa kalɛ mivɛlɛ nɛ osi a?”
41009034	Lɛmɛ bɛtákpa ye mbuayɛ, kitonɛkĩ nɛ osi akũ a, bɛkavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ owula kĩ ɛbɛ̃ flee nɛ be kamɛ.
41009035	Yesu kɛna akũ edzi ɛvɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a, ebi be kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ lɔtɔ ɛnya ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya bati a flee nkaɛ mɔ ɔsumunɛ.”
41009036	Ke liti a, ɛkpã kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kadi kɛyadza nɛ be anɛ kamɛ, ade kĩ etu eboomu ke a, ebi be kĩ,
41009037	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaatɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ ɔmɔa nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, yĩ ɛtɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ ni, nnɛ́ yi odi ɛtɛ, mbom ɛtɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a lɛmɛ.”
41009038	Ade Yohanes bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bɔmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ ɛkablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa nɛ nɔ dĩ akũ, ade bubi ye kĩ ɛfɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ ɛláa boe kamɛ.”
41009039	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitasua ye osi, kitonɛkĩ oti kĩ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, ɛláadani ɛlɛ kalɛ kpa nɛ yĩ akũ.
41009040	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaákɛna lɛtsama katia boe ni, ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ boe liti.
41009041	“Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaakpa mi mui mimɔa kĩ minyɛ yĩ bade sũ ni, yaana ye kɔtɔkase kokooko.”
41009042	“Ntɛ oti odi aafɔ̃ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo lɛyɛla ye katɛkado ni, fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ fɔkpa oti a ntɛ bɛkɔa kɔwɔlɛ bɛvɛla nɛ ye sɔmɔ, bɛta ye bido nɛ mpo kamɛ.
41009043	-
41009044	“Foesũ ntɛ nɔ awɛ afɔ̃ akɛna tɔkpa ni, tsua ye kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ aakɔa awɛ mɔa owo nɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna kamɛ, kɛba kĩ odeĩ awɛ nviã lɔkɔa bɛkɔa nɔ bido nɛ fi luwotu kĩ laádĩ a kamɛ.
41009045	-
41009046	Ade ntɛ nɔ kɔbɔa akpã nɔ kado nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, tsua koe kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ odeĩ kɔbɔa mɔa ɔna nkpã mɔawɛ a, kɛba kĩ odeĩ abɔa nviã ade baata nɔ bido nɛ fi kamɛ a.
41009047	Ntɛ nɔ linebi akpã nɔ kado nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, bɔlɛ de kanyɛ. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ aakɔa linebi mɔa owo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a, kɛba kĩ odeĩ banebi nviã lɛmɛ baata nɔ bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ.
41009048	‘Awã kĩ batebi a kĩ bawo be a láku dadaada, ade fi a kĩ fɔapila be a lɛmɛ ládĩ da a.’
41009049	Kitonɛkĩ baakɔa fi bɛkpalɛ odi nyɛ odi akũ ndɛ ayekĩ bakɔa lɛdɛmɛ kakpalɛ afɔliɛ akũ a.
41009050	“Lɛdɛmɛ nɛnɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ de ɔmɛnɛ nɛ́ nɛ de kamɛ ni, nde aakɛna obuki ɔkɔa ɔmɛnɛ odo nɛ de kamɛ? Foesũ mina tɔkɔba kakɛna lɛdɛmɛ nɛ mi kamɛ, lɔkɔa midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ mɔ akũ akũ.”
41010001	Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa Yudea amantam kamɛ mɔ Yordan Ɔwɔ liti. Bati kɔdabu buki bɛyatsɛna nɛ ye akũ nɛ awã, ade ɛtsa be fɔtsa ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ kakɛna a.
41010002	Farisifɔ badi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛwɛ kĩ basɔ ye bɛdã, foesũ bivia Yesu kĩ, “Boe mbla a kpa osi kĩ onyole esĩ ɔtsɔ̃?”
41010003	Yesu kɔa kavia ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbla adabe Mose kpa mi?”
41010004	Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mose kpa osi kĩ onyole ɛtsɛlɛ kasĩ ovoli ɛkpa ye kanyi lɔkɔa esĩ ye.”
41010005	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mose tsɛlɛ mbla kĩĩ nɛ mi atɔ ɔsĩ sũ.
41010006	Kito katinya kayɔkayi a, onyole mɔ otsole Baguma kɛna.
41010007	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ onyole aafɔnɛ ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma awɛ ɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ɔtsɔ̃,
41010008	lɔkɔa be nviã a baakɛna oti ɔmɔa. Foesũ bibuki bɛnyɛ́ bati nviã, mbom bɛkɛna oti mɔa.
41010009	Foesũ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma boomu ni, otidziwa ɛtasɛ̃ foe kamɛ!”
41010010	Ke liti a, kĩ bɛya nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye fɔlɛtsa nɛ fukĩ ɛlɛ a akũ.
41010011	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Onyole kĩ esĩ ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ebuki ɛkɔã ɔbɛbã ni, ɛbɔa adɔpaa nɛ ɔtsɔ̃ akũ.
41010012	Ade ayea ntɛ otsole fɔnɛ ɔnyɔ awɛ mɔ ɛnadzi mɔ onyole bɛbã ni, ye malo ɛbɔa adɔpaa.”
41010013	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, bati badi kpã babisɛ̃ bɛma Yesu kĩ ete awɛ nɛ be akũ, lɛmɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kã be anɛ.
41010014	Kĩ Yesu mɔ fukĩĩ a ni, ɛna kalɔkpa ade ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ babisɛ̃ bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mitasua be osi, kitonɛkĩ ade bati kĩĩ odu lá Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
41010015	Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ndɛ obisɛ̃ aye ni, ɛláawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ da.”
41010016	Ke liti a, etu eboomu babisɛ̃ a, ade ete awɛ nɛ be akũ ehila be a.
41010017	Kĩ Yesu yidza epi osi a, onyole odi wula atsɛ ɛyake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ evia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ Wĩ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna fɔmɔ maana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a?”
41010018	Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nde sũ avɛ yĩ oti wĩ? Odima lɛnyɛ́ oti wĩ mbɔɛntɛ Baguma odi.
41010019	Onyina Baguma mbla a. Takɔ oti, tanɛ kɔnyɔ ĩye kɔtsɔ̃ liti, taye, tama fɔvã ote nɛ oti akũ, tasisi oti, mɔ bu aga mɔ ama.”
41010020	Onyole a bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, kito nɛ yĩ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ kĩ makɛna nɛ tɛbla a flee akũ.”
41010021	Yesu dã ye kɛnaana nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ, ade ebi ye kĩ, “Kite nɔ lɛtsa mɔa. Naa kanaafila fɔtsa a kĩ odeĩ a flee kanɔ, kakɔa sika a kakpa ahiãfɔ, lɔkɔa aadani ɔkɛna osikani nɛ ode. Ke liti a, ya kayaatomɔ yĩ!”
41010022	Kĩ onyole a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, emuna anɛ ade ɛdzakũ mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ a, kitonɛkĩ ɛna akũ.
41010023	Yesu dã ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ɛtsɛna ade ebi be kĩ, “Fɔ́ana ɔsĩ paa fɔkpa osikafɔ kĩ baawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
41010024	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ dzuli ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a akũ. Lɛmɛ Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Yĩ babi, Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ kawo deĩ ɔsĩ paa fɔkpa asikafɔ.
41010025	Fɔ́adã bɔɛɛ fɔkpa ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kapu kĩ yaatsã ɔnɔbɔ̃ ɔkɛ kamɛ ɛnɛ kɛba kĩ osikani aawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
41010026	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a kɛna fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wãwã paa. Ade bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Lɔkɔa owei koũ aapuli ɛna nkpã katɛ?”
41010027	Yesu dã be kɛnanaana ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Batidziwa sɛkɛ̃ mɔ fɔláapuli fɔya, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ mɔ Baguma, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa adã bɔɛɛ lɛkpa Baguma.”
41010028	Ade Petro lɛ kĩ, “Dã, bɔfɔnɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa awɛ buyi bɔya butomɛna nɔ.”
41010029	Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi ɛfɔnɛ ye tɔtɔ eyi, ĩye bawaɛ̃nyole mɔ bawaɛ̃tsole, ĩye ɔma, ĩye ɔlɛga, ĩye ye babi, ĩye fɔba eyi nɛ yĩ mɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ ni,
41010030	yaana fɔtsa pii ɛba nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ. Yaana fɔla titi ɔha, bawaɛ̃nyole mɔ bawaɛ̃tsole, bama mɔ babi, mɔ fɔba, mɔ bati liti katomɛna. Ade nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ laya kamɛ a, yaana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna da a.
41010031	Lɛmɛ bati pii kĩ bɛnyɛ batɔnyade a finyaa aakpa liti, ade bati batide finyaa aakɛna lɔtɔ banyanɛ.”
41010032	Finyaa Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yɛlɛ banaa Yerusalem. Yesu nyaa be lɔtɔ ade fɔkɛna ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a saa a, bati a kĩ bitomɔ be nɛ liti a kavila. Yesu buki ɛvɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛnamɛna ɔɔwɛ̃ ade ɛkabi be lɛtsa a kĩ laaya nɛ ye akũ a.
41010033	Ebi be kĩ, “Mitse! Bɔanaa Yerusalem awã kĩ baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ. Baakɔ ye kɔtɔ bɛkpa wuda lɔkɔa bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ awɛ.
41010034	Baadi ye nsekuo, bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye akũ, baabo ye mɔ mple ade baakɔ ye a, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ a, yaayidza edzi nkpã.”
41010035	Ke liti a, Zebedeo babi kĩ bɛnyɛ Yakobo mɔ Yohanes ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ kɛna lɛtsa a kĩ bɔavia nɔ a kakpa boe.”
41010036	Yesu via be kĩ, “Litsa fɔanɛ?”
41010037	Bibi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔnɛ odzi nɛ nɔ lɛgãkpo akũ nɛ nɔ kukũkpalɛ kamɛ ni, bɔawɛ kĩ budzi nɛ nɔ ɔwɛ̃, boe kamɛ ɔmɔa nɛ nɔ sɔmɔna, ɔmɔa lɛmɛ nɛ nɔ sɛbã.”
41010038	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minyína lɛtsa kĩ de milamɛna kavia a! Mitɛ mido kĩ míapuli mimɔa lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ mmɔa? Ĩye míapuli mitɛ mui kawɔla a kĩ maatɛ a?”
41010039	Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɔ́apuli.” Yesu bi be kĩ, “Oo, míapuli mimɔa kɔɔpu a kĩ maamɔa a, mɔ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a kĩ maatɛ a.
41010040	Lɛmɛ nlá osi kĩ mapau oti a kĩ ye aadzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna ĩye sɛbã. Baguma nyɛ oti a kĩ yaakɔa foe ɛkpa bati a kĩ ɛmanɛ foe eyi a.”
41010041	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua nkaɛ nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bɛna kalɔkpa nɛ Yakobo mɔ Yohanes akũ.
41010042	Foesũ Yesu vɛ be ɛkpɔta ebi be kĩ, “Minyina kĩ bati a kĩ babu kĩ bɛnya tɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ amamufɔ akũ a, deĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ be akũ, ade banɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ deĩ otumi nɛ be akũ a.
41010043	Lɛmɛ kɛtánɛ kĩ fɔana lɔmɔ nɛ mi kamɛ. Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi awɛ kĩ yanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya mi ɔsumunɛ.
41010044	Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi wɛ kĩ yanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya be nkaɛ a ɔsumunɛ.
41010045	Kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a malo táya kĩ bisum ye, mbom ɛya kĩ yasum bati ɛkɔa ye nkpã ɛkpa lɔkɔa ɛtɛ bati pii nkpã.”
41010046	Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yawo Yeriko. Kĩ banɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, bati kɔdabu baũ tomɔ be. Kĩ banaa nɛ osi a, bɛmɔ́ ɔnɛkunɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Bartimeo, Timeo obi kĩ edzi nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ yawã fɔtsa.
41010047	Kĩ enu kĩ Yesu Nazaretni a lɛyaatɛ̃ a, edo fɔwɔla kabɔa awɛ kĩ, “Yesu! Dawid obi! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya!”
41010048	Bati pii wũni nɛ ye akũ kĩ esua onukpɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛba kĩ, “Dawid obi! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya!”
41010049	Yesu fɔ̃ ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mivɛ ye mikpa yĩ.” Foesũ bɛvɛ ɔnɛkunɛ kĩĩ bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔ̃ ɔwɔlɛ ɛka edzi nɔ! Yidza mɔ atsɛ, yavɛ nɔ.”
41010050	Awã naa ɛta ye atadiɛ wulaa eyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ eyidza ɛdza, ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃.
41010051	Yesu via ye kĩ, “Litsa awɛ kĩ nkɛna nkpa nɔ?” Ɔnɛkunɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, fɔ̃ mbuki mmɔ́ fɔkɔ!”
41010052	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Naa. Nɔ katɛkado tsa nɔ.” Deedimɔapɛ ye anɛ binya ɛmɔ́ fɔkɔ, ade etomɔ Yesu nɛ osi a akũ a.
41011001	Kĩ bifuã Yerusalem a, bɛkɔa bawo Betfage mɔ Betania tɛmatɔ a, bɛyawo Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ. Nɛ awã Yesu do ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ,
41011002	mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, “Minaa akula a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ lɔtɔ a kamɛ. Ntɛ miwo ye kamɛ pɛ, míamɔ aflim obi kĩ bido ɔwɛ̃ bɛdzɛla kĩ odima tádzi tɔ̃ nɛ ye akũ. Miwũnya ye nɛ ɔwɛ̃ kamɛ mikɔa miyamɛna.
41011003	Ntɛ odi via mi kĩ, ‘Nde sũ miawũnya ye’ ni, mibi ye kĩ mi Ɔlate sĩ ye, ade yaakɔa ye ɛmɛna mɔatsɛ a.”
41011004	Foesũ bati a naa, ade bɛnamɔ kĩ bido aflim obi ɔwɛ̃ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ɔblɔnu akũ nɛ kɔla onyukpɛ̃. Ade kĩ bɛkawũnya ye nɛ ɔwɛ̃ kamɛ a,
41011005	bati badi kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã a via be kĩ, “Litsa miakɛna nɛ awã? Litsa sũ miawũnya aflim obi a?”
41011006	Bɛkpa mbuayɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a, ade bati a kpa be osi bɛnyɛ ye a.
41011007	Kĩ bɛkɔa ɔyaɛ a bɛma Yesu a, bɛdzɛlɛ be tilima biko nɛ ye akũ, ade Yesu de edzi nɛ ye akũ a.
41011008	Bati pii dzɛlɛ be tilima biko nɛ osi akũ, ade badi lɛmɛ veli tɛnanɛ mɔ tɔɔta biko nɛ osi akũ a.
41011009	Bati a kĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ mɔ bikĩ bitomɛna ye a do fɔwɔla kabɔa kalɛ kĩ, “Hosiana! Mimu Baguma! Baguma hila oti a kĩ yaya nɛ Ɔlate a dĩ akũ!
41011010	Baguma hila Boe Ɔlɛga Dawid lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ kaya a! Hosiana deĩ nɛ ode flee flee!”
41011011	Kĩ Yesu wo Yerusalem a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ade eko anɛ ɛdã lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ɛtɛ̃mɛna a. Lɛmɛ kĩ kade lamɛna kadɔ sũ ni, bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ewua-nviã dzakũ bɛnaa Betania.
41011012	Kĩ kade nyina bimuniki bito Betania baya a, kɔlɛ kɔ Yesu.
41011013	Ɛmɔ́ kutse kudi kĩ kɔawũ babi kĩ bavɛ figi mɔ lugo, kɔtalɛ mɔ tɔɔta beblebee nɛ koe akũ. Foesũ ɛnadã ntɛ yaana babi badi nɛ koe akũ. Lɛmɛ kĩ ewo kutse a kayɔ a, ɛtámɔ babi badimanɔ, mbɔɛntɛ tɔɔta nɛnɛ teĩ, kitonɛkĩ kutse a kawũ lɔkɔ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.
41011014	Ade Yesu bi kutse a kĩ, “Odimanɔ lɛláabuki ɛnya nɔ babi dadaada!” Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu foe.
41011015	Kĩ biwo Yerusalem a, Yesu naa Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ade edo bati a kĩ bɛkanɔ fɔtsa, mɔ bikĩ bɛkaya fɔtsa a kablɔmɛna kanɛmɛna awɛ a. Edu sika babɛ̃nɛ a tupunu ewula, ade edu bikĩ bidzi banɔ mblɔduma a lɛmɛ fukpo ewula a.
41011016	Ade ɛtákpa osi malo kĩ odima abɔɛ lɛtsama ɛtsã kɔla kamɛ ɛtɛ̃mɛna a.
41011017	Ke liti a, ɛtsa bati a fɔtsa ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Baavɛ yĩ Asɔli Kɔla kĩ kamɛ katinya kamɛ bati flee mpaɛ kabɔakɔ̃.’ Lɛmɛ midani koe mikɛna bayekpanɛ kabɛlakɔ̃!”
41011018	Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a, foesũ bɛwɛ osi a kĩ baatsã bɛkɔ ye. Lɛmɛ bivila ye kitonɛkĩ ye fɔtsa katsa a nyɛnɛ bati kɔdabu a flee akũ.
41011019	Kĩ kiwo olobe lɔkɔ a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
41011020	Luwi lɛyade ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ osi banaa a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ kutse a kĩ kɔawũ babi a ku kito lɔlɔ kɛnawo tunu akũ.
41011021	Petro te anɛ nɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛya a akũ, ade ebi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, dã! Kutse a kĩ odumu a ku!”
41011022	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitɛ Baguma mido.
41011023	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaabi ɔtɔ kĩĩ kĩ ɛbɔlɛ ɛnaatɔ nɛ mpo kamɛ, mɔ ɛtátɛ atsindze nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ mbom ɛtɛ edo kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ ni, fɔ́aya lɔmɔ.
41011024	Foesũ mabi mi kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia Baguma nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ ni, mitɛ mido kĩ mina foe, ade Baguma aakpa mi foe a.
41011025	Ade ntɛ midzɛ̃ miabɔa mpaɛ mɔ mimɔ́ kĩ oti odi fum mi ni, mikɔa mite ye ayekĩ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ aakɔa mi tɔkpa ete mi.
41011026	Lɛmɛ ntɛ mitákɔa bati tɔkpa mite be, mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ lɛláakɔa mi tɔkpa a ete mi!”
41011027	Ade Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a buki bɛnaa Yerusalem a. Kĩ Yesu nɛ ɛtsɛ̃ yamini nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mbla batsanɛ a mɔ ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃,
41011028	ade bivia ye kĩ, “Kɔbɛ̃ ɔdabe ɔnɛɛ akɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ? Owei lɛkpa nɔ osi kĩ kɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ?”
41011029	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Maanya lɔtɔ nvia mi kalɛ mɔapɛ. Ntɛ mikpa ke mbuayɛ ni, maabi mi kɔbɛ̃ a odu kĩ nnɛɛ makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ.
41011030	Mibi yĩ Yohanes bati mui kawɔla a ni, Baguma sɛkɛ̃ futo mbɔɛɛ kĩ batidziwa sɛkɛ̃ futo? Mikpa yĩ mbuayɛ.”
41011031	Biyi fukĩĩ kavɛlɛ nɛ be kamɛ awɛ ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́alɛ? Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ kɔbɛ̃ a to Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, yaavia boe kĩ, ‘Kekɔ̃ litsa sũ mitátɛ Yohanes mido?’
41011032	Mbɔɛɛ bɔ́alɛ kĩ futo batidziwa sɛkɛ̃?” Lɛmɛ bavila bati kɔdabu a, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi abu Yohanes kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ.
41011033	Foesũ bɛkpa Yesu mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bunyína.” Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Yĩ malo nláabi mi awã kĩ kɔbɛ̃ a to nnɛɛ makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ!”
41012001	Ke liti a, Yesu tsa be fɔtsa nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Onyole odi nɛ waĩ futse kɔba, edzi kɔbã esinya koe. Ɛnyɛ lɛkɛ nɛ kɔba a kayite, awã kĩ yaana kutse babi a ɛkpɔta, ɛkakã mui a kako. Ade eke kɔla geĩ kudi, ayekĩ koe akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a aadzi ɛkadã kɔba a akũ. Ɛkɔa kɔba a edo nɛ apaafɔ awɛ kĩ bɛkaadã koe akũ, ade ɛdzakũ ɛnaa osi akũ a.
41012002	Kĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ baana babi a, onyole a do ye ɔsumunɛ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛnaatɛ ye kanyakɔ̃ ɛma ye.
41012003	Lɛmɛ ye apaafɔ a pi fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bibo ye ade bɛblɔmɔ ye mɔ awɛ pupulidza a.
41012004	Onyole kĩĩ buki edo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã. Kĩ ɛnaa a, apaafɔ a bo ye, bipila ye nɛ lɔlɔ, bido ye kɔnyɔã lɛmɛ.
41012005	Kɔba ɔlate a buki edo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã, adeke bɛkɔ ye a. Ade aye bɛkɛna babɛbã pii a. Bibo badi, bɛkɔ babɛbã lɛmɛ.
41012006	“Oti kĩ ete kĩ yaado nyɛ ye mɔawɛ obi kĩ yaátunɔ kalɛ. Nɛ kawũna kamɛ a, edo ye obi a kĩ yawɛ kalɛ paa a, ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Matɛ kado kĩ baakpa yĩ obi kĩĩ kɔ̃ obu.’
41012007	“Lɛmɛ kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ kĩĩ bi be akũ kĩ, ‘Ade adzapadiɛ ɔnyanɛ a nɛ awĩ a. Miya bɔkɔ ye ayekĩ ye adzapadiɛ a aakɛna boe ade!’
41012008	Foesũ, bipi obi a bɛkɔ ye, bɛta bimuni nɛ waĩ kɔbã a liti.”
41012009	Nɛ awã a, Yesu via bati a kĩ, “Litsa waĩ kɔba ɔlate a aakɛna? Yaaya ɛyaakɔ apaafɔ a ɛkɔa waĩ kɔba a edo nɛ bati bɛbã awɛ.
41012010	Mbɔɛɛ mitákã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, ‘De a kĩ fɔla bakenɛ sĩ a, ade de lɛyadani kɔla okonto akũ de a.
41012011	Baguma lɛkɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ, ade fɔnyɛ awãwã fɔtsa nɛ boe anɛ a!’ ”
41012012	Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a wɛ kĩ bapi Yesu, kitonɛkĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ ɛbɔa lɛgbã a etia be, lɛmɛ bivila bati kɔdabu a, foesũ bɛfɔnɛ ye ade bɛdzakũ a.
41012013	Ke liti a, bido Farisifɔ badi mɔ bikĩ bitomɛna Herodes a kĩ bɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃, bɛnaanaĩ ye nɛ tɛdake kamɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa kavia bɛkɔa bipi ye.
41012014	Kĩ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a, bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bunyina kĩ alɛ ɔnɔkɔali daa, ade ɔtsɛ́la lɛtsa a kĩ bati akɔna nɛ nɔ akũ a. Aádã oti anɛ, mbom atsa Baguma akũ ɔnɔkɔali osi a. Bi boe ntɛ boe Mbla kpa osi kĩ bute ɔgɔlɛ bɔkpa Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃. Bute mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔtate?”
41012015	Lɛmɛ Yesu mɔ́ be tɛdake a, foesũ evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miasɔ yĩ midã? Mikɔa sika a miyamɛna ndã!”
41012016	Bɛkɔa sɔmɔa bɛma ye, ade evia be kĩ, “Owei lɔlɔ mɔ dĩ teĩ nɛ se akũ?” Awã naa bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare.”
41012017	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mikɔa lɛtsa kĩ lɛnyɛ Kaisare lide a mikpa ye, ade lɛtsa kĩ lɛnyɛ Baguma lide a lɛmɛ ni, mikɔa mikpa Baguma.” Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ akũ nyɛnɛ be nɛ Yesu akũ.
41012018	Ade Zadukifɔ kĩ balɛ kĩ bati kayidza kato kanɔkpa lɛláa a kamɛ badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, bɛyavia ye kĩ,
41012019	“Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, Mose tsɛlɛ mbla kĩĩ eyi ɛkpa boe kĩ ntɛ onyole odi ku ɛfɔnɛ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ bɛmɔ ye bɛtáma ni, ɔwaɛ̃nyole ɛkɔã okunawa a, lɔkɔa bɛma babi bɛkpa ɔtɔnyade a.
41012020	Fɔya kĩ bawaɛ̃ evũkɔnɔ badi dzi nkpã. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a kɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ade eku a, kĩ bɛtáma obi odima.
41012021	Ade ɔyade a kɔã otsole a, ade ye malo eku, kĩ bɛtáma obi odima. Ɔwaɛ̃ ɔlalɛde a lɛmɛ kɔã otsole a, ade ye malo ɛyaku kĩ bɛtáma obi odima.
41012022	Ade aye a be evũkɔnɔ a kɔã otsole a, lɛmɛ be flee a biku kĩ bɛmɔ otsole a bɛtáma babi. Nɛ foe kawũna a otsole a lɛmɛ yaku.
41012023	Nɛ kayidza kadzi nkpã kamɛ mɔ ntɛ biyidza a ni, be kamɛ ɔwɔdabe ɔtsɔ̃ otsole a aanya? Be evũkɔnɔ a flee bɛkɔã ye tɔ̃?”
41012024	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mikɛna mfumsu, kitonɛkĩ minyína Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a fɔlɛtsa ĩye Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a.
41012025	Ntɛ banɔkpa yidza bidzi nkpã ni, baana ndɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ade bɛláakɔã batsɔ̃ a ĩye bidzi fɔnyɔ a.
41012026	Lɛmɛ nɛ banɔkpa kayidza akũ ni, mitákã nɛ Mose ovoli a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ kutse a kĩ kɔkatɛ̃ a akũ? Baguma bi Mose kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Abraham Baguma, Isak Baguma mɔ Yakob Baguma.’
41012027	Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ ɛnyɛ bati kĩ bidzi nkpã Baguma, nnɛ́ banɔkpa Baguma yanɛ. Mikɛna mfumsu paa!”
41012028	Ade Yudani mbla ɔtsanɛ odi kĩ ɛna nɛ awã a, nu fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kasa a. Ɛmɔ́ kĩ Yesu kpa Zadukifɔ a mbuayɛ wĩ, foesũ efuã Yesu evia ye kĩ, “Mbla wɔdabe nyaa Baguma tɛbla a flee lɔtɔ?”
41012029	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ mbla a kĩ ɛbɛ̃ a bɛtsa kĩ, ‘Israelfɔ, mitse! Ɔlate a nyɛ boe Baguma, ade ye odi lɛmɛ deĩ a.
41012030	Foesũ awɛ Ɔlate, nɔ Baguma a, mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ flee, mɔ nɔ ɔkla flee, mɔ nɔ adzuni flee mɔ nɔ kɔbɛ̃ flee.’
41012031	Ade mbla sĩwa ayade nyɛ kĩ, ‘Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ a.’ Mbla adima buki ɛbɛ́ tɛbla kĩĩ.”
41012032	Adeke mbla ɔtsanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, ɔlɛ foe kalɛ wĩ. Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔlɛ kĩ Ɔlate a odi nyɛ Baguma, ade Baguma adima buki ɛláa kɛba ye odi a.
41012033	Foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ oti ɛwɛ Baguma kalɛ mɔ ye ɔwɔlɛ flee, ye adzuni flee mɔ ye kɔbɛ̃ flee. Ade kɛnɛ kĩ ɛwɛ ye ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ ye akũ kalɛ a. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ oti ɛkɛna nɛ tɛbla nviã kĩĩ akũ kɛba kĩ yaabɔa bayaɛ mɔ afɔliɛ bɛbã ɛkpa Baguma.”
41012034	Kĩ Yesu mɔ kĩ onyole a kpa ye mbuayɛ nɛ nyansã kamɛ a ni, ebi ye kĩ, “Mimɔ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kayite lɛlá lugo.” Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a, odimanɔ tápuli edo ɔwɔlɛ evia Yesu kalɛ kadima.
41012035	Kĩ Yesu katsa fɔtsa nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ a, evia be kalɛ kĩ, “Nde fɔla sũ mbla batsanɛ a aapuli bɛlɛ kĩ Kristo a aanya Lɛgã Dawid kasinu obi?
41012036	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛfɔ̃ Dawid lɛ eyi kĩ, ‘Baguma bi yĩ Ɔlate kĩ, “Kɛna akũ kadzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna nɛ awĩ, kɛnawo kĩ maakɔa nɔ bakesĩnɛ ndo nɛ nɔ abɔa kayɔ.” ’
41012037	Kĩ Lɛgã Dawid mɔawɛ vɛ ye kĩ Ɔlate a ni, nde fɔ́apuli fɔya kĩ Kristo a aanya Dawid kasinu obi?” Bati kɔdabu baũ dza nɛ awã bɛkatse Yesu fɔlɛtsa a mɔ kawɔlɛ.
41012038	Kĩ Yesu katsa bati a fɔtsa a ebi be kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ nɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a akũ. Bado tɛtadiɛ wulaa katsã kawɛ kĩ bati bɛwɔ̃na be nɛ obu kamɛ nɛ kɔyaatɔ.
41012039	Bawɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ kadzi nɛ be fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ mɔ obu fudzikɔ̃ kadzi nɛ kanyakɔ̃.
41012040	Basisi bakunawa katɛ be tɔtɔ nɛ be awɛ. Babɔa mpaɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ kakɔa kapia be akũ. Be sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aana ɔsĩ sɛba bati bɛbã fude.”
41012041	Ade Yesu nadzi nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ efuã ɔgɔlɛ kate adakã a, ɛkadã ayekĩ bati lamɔ sika kata kado a. Asikafɔ pii ta sika baũ baũ bido nɛ ye kamɛ.
41012042	Adeke okunawa ohiãni odi lɛmɛ ya ade ɛkɔa kaplɛ nviã edo nɛ adakã a kamɛ a.
41012043	Nɛ awã a Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ɛkpɔta ebi be kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali mabi mi kĩ okunawa ohiãni kĩĩ lɛtsa a kĩ edo nɛ ɔgɔlɛ adakã kamɛ a pɔnɛ fɔbɛ̃ bati a flee fude.
41012044	Kitonɛkĩ bati bɛbã a kɔa akũ kana fɔtsa a kĩ fute a fudi bɛyate ɔgɔlɛ, lɛmɛ otsole ohiãni kosokoso kĩĩ kɔ̃, lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ a flee ɛkɔa ete. Ɛkɔa lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ yaadzi nkpã a ɛyate ɔgɔlɛ.”
41013001	Kĩ Yesu nɛ eto Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ yanaa a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, dã fɔla mɔ kalɛ mɔ boe kpale kĩĩ!”
41013002	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Amɔ fɔla kpale kpale kĩĩ. Bɛlátina de a kamɛ lidima nɛ lɔkɔba akũ kĩ bɛláadu biwula! Baatinya de lidi nyɛ lidi biwula.”
41013003	Kĩ Yesu nɛ edzi nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ, ɛtsɛlamɔ Asɔli Kɔla a, Petro, mɔ Yakobo, mɔ Yohanes mɔ Andrea ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛyavia ye pɛtɛɛ kĩ,
41013004	“Boe Ɔlate, lɔkɔ wɔdabe fukĩĩ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ? Bi boe fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya fɔkɔa fɔtsa kĩ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
41013005	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ, ade mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛ mi a.
41013006	Bati pii aaya nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ bibi mi kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Kristo a!’ ade baakɛ bati pii a.
41013007	Ɔwɔlɛ ɛtabɔlɛ mi ntɛ minu kawũkanɔ nkã nɛ mi ɔwɛ̃ ĩye kawũkanɔ akũ fɔlɛtsa mɔ lugo. Kɛnɛ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ odu fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ, lɛmɛ fɔátsa kĩ katinya kamɛ kawũna a wo ɔtɔ.
41013008	Ɔmaĩ mɔ ɔmaĩ aanɔ akũ. Lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ aayidza nɛ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ. Tite aakuna nɛ fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ, ade kɔlɛ aaya a. Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ flee la ndɛ sɛmɛ kapi kayɔkayi lubo kamɔ a aye.
41013009	“Kɛnɛ kĩ mi mɔawɛ a miana nɛ kɔnɛte kamɛ. Baapili mi lɔkɔa bɛkɔa mi bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃. Baabo mi nɛ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃. Baafɔ̃ midza nɛ fɔgã mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ nɛ yĩ sũ, lɔkɔa mibi be Kalɛ Wĩ a.
41013010	Lɛmɛ fɔmɔ katinya kawũna a aaya ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bide lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ wĩ a akũ bɛkpa fude fude a flee.
41013011	Ntɛ bipi mi bɛkɔa mi bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ ni, mitanya lɔtɔ mibo akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a akũ. Ntɛ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ ni, milɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ baakpa mi kĩ milɛ a. Kitonɛkĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a lɛláanya mi fude, mbom fɔ́ato Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sɛkɛ̃.
41013012	“Bati aakɔa be mɔawɛ bawaɛ̃ bɛkpa kĩ bɛkɔ, ade balɛga lɛmɛ aakɛna foe mɔapɛ a nɛ babi akũ. Babi aayidza bɛdza nɛ be bamanɛ akũ, bɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ be.
41013013	Odi nyɛ odi aakesĩ mi nɛ yĩ sũ. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaadza pintii kɛnaawo ye nkpã kawũna ni, Baguma aakpa ye nkpã.”
41013014	Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mimɔ́ fukesĩtsa mɔ libe kĩ fɔakɔ ɔmaĩ kĩ fɔdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ kɛtánɛ kĩ fɔna a ni, ovoli ɔkãnɛ a enu foe kayɔ kanu wĩ, lɔkɔa bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea a bilo bɛnaa tɔtɔ akũ.
41013015	Oti kĩ edzi nɛ ye kɔla lɛtsã a, ɛtaduma ɛya nɛ tite kĩ yaabɔɛ litsedi etomɛna ye kɔla kamɛ ɛkpa ye akũ.
41013016	Oti kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kɔba kamɛ ɛtamuniki ɛnaa kɔla kĩ yanaabɔɛ ye lima.
41013017	Bɔbɔɛ makpa batsole a kĩ bɛtsɛmɔ fɔma mɔ bikĩ bɛnɛɛ babi kĩ bamɛmɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ.
41013018	Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa Baguma kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ fɔtaya nɛ osili lɔkɔ!
41013019	Kitonɛkĩ lubo kamɔ a kĩ laaya nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ aana ɔsĩ lɛba lidi nyɛ lidi kĩ lɛya tɔ nɛ katinya kamɛ, kito nɛ kayɔkayi kĩ Baguma bɔa katinya a kɛyawo finyaa. Adeke lubo kamɔ kĩĩ odu lɛláabuki lɛya dadaada a.
41013020	Lɛmɛ Ɔlate a tinya lubo kamɔ fuwi a akũ. Ntɛ nɛ aye ni, kufɛ odima lɛláana nkpã. Lɛmɛ nɛ ye bati a kĩ ɛpau a sũ ni, etinya fuwi a akũ.
41013021	“Foesũ ntɛ odi bi mi kĩ, ‘Dã! Kristo a deĩ nɛ awĩ,’ ĩye ‘Edeĩ nɛ akĩĩ,’ mitatɛ ye mido!
41013022	Kitonɛkĩ fɔvã Kristo amɛ, mɔ fɔvã Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ aanɛ. Baakɛna awãwã fɔtsa mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni pii kĩ ntɛ baapuli ni, baakɔa bɛkɛ bati a kĩ Baguma pau a malo.
41013023	Mi kɔ̃ midã kadã wĩ! Mbi mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ĩnyamɛna lɔtɔ fɔmɔ lɔkɔ a aawo ɔtɔ.”
41013024	Yesu lɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Nɛ fuwi a kĩ fɔ́aya nɛ lubo kamɔ fuwi liti a, ‘suwa aadĩ sɛkɛna tũũ, odetɔ lɛmɛ lɛláabuki ɛvɔlɛ.
41013025	Fusibii aato ode fɔtɔ, ade odetɔ́ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kupini ode a aakuna akũ.’
41013026	“Ke liti a, baamɔ Otidziwa Obi a, kĩ ɛnɛ yaya nɛ liflututu kamɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ mɔ kukũkpalɛ baũ.
41013027	Adeke yaado ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛnaakpɔta bati a kĩ ɛpau eyi a, bitomɛna katinya kamɛ tukonto ɛna a kamɛ kito tite kakpulakɔ̃ kɛnaawo ode kakpulakɔ̃.
41013028	“Mikɔlɛ fɔtsa nɛ kutse kĩ kɔawũ babi a akũ. Ntɛ fɔya kĩ mimɔ́ kĩ kutse a na nɛ́ tɛnanɛ kɔnyɛ tɔɔta vɔɛ̃ ni, minyi kĩ ovio lɔkɔ fuã.
41013029	Ade aye ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ fɔtsa a kĩĩ do kaya awɛ pɛ, minyi kĩ lɔkɔ a fuã, ade liti liwo onyukpɛ̃ malo a.
41013030	Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ mi lɛtsã babi a flee lɛláaku fɔmɔ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
41013031	Tite mɔ ode flee aayatɛ̃, lɛmɛ yĩ kalɛ a kɔ̃ lɛláatɛ̃ da.
41013032	“Lɛmɛ luwi a ĩye ɔdɔũ a, odima linyína de. Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ Baguma Obi mɔawɛ a malo linyína, mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga a odi keĩ nyina.
41013033	Midã kadã wĩ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyína luwi a kĩ de akũ lɔkɔ a aawo ɔtɔ.
41013034	Fɔ́ana ndɛ ayekĩ onyole odi naa osi akũ, ade ɛfɔnɛ ye tɔtɔ eyi ye basumunɛ a. Ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi ye kɔbɛ̃ mɔ adzuma kĩ ɛkɛna. Ke liti a, esi onyukpɛ̃ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a mbla kĩ ɛna nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ.
41013035	“Nɛ foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyína lɔkɔ a kĩ tɔtɔ ɔlate a aaya. Fɔ́apuli fɔnya olobe lɔkɔ ĩye lɛnyɛ kayite ĩye odenyinawi ĩye ɔnɔnɛ.
41013036	Ntɛ ɛyafuta mi ni, ɛtayaamɔ mi kĩ miwaa tida.
41013037	Lɛtsa a kĩ mabi mi a, ade foe mɔapɛ a mabi bati flee kĩ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ.”
41014001	Kite fuwi nviã kĩ Yudafɔ aanya Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi, kĩ bate anɛ nɛ be kadzakũ nɛ Egipte akũ a, mɔ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Luwi. Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ mbla batsanɛ kawɛ osi a kĩ baatsã nɛ kabɛla kamɛ bipi Yesu bɛkɔ ye.
41014002	Bɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔkɛna foe nɛ fuwi kanya a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bati aado ɔtutũ nɛ ɔmaĩ a kamɛ.”
41014003	Yesu na nɛ Betania ɔmatɔ kamɛ nɛ Simon kĩ ɛsɔ tɔ̃ fɔsɔ ngbã a awã. Kĩ Yesu dzi ɛkanya a, otsole odi kĩ ɛnɛɛ tumpã kĩ eyi mɔ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ kɔtɛ kɔya paa a wo nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Otsole a binya tumpã a ade etsokui kugua a flee eko nɛ Yesu lɔlɔ kamɛ a.
41014004	Ade bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a badi na kalɔkpa bɛlɛ kĩ, “Litsa sũ yabula kugua mɔ kɔya kĩĩ kade?
41014005	Baapuli bɛnɔ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩĩ fɔba sika ovoe fɔbɔ ɔha ɛlalɛ, lɔkɔa bɛkɔa se bɛkpa ahiãfɔ.” Nɛ foe sũ, bɛkã ye anɛ mɔ ɔsĩ.
41014006	Lɛmɛ Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mifɔnɛ ye awɛ. Litsa sũ miaha ye? Ɛkɛna lɛtsa wĩ ɛkpa yĩ.
41014007	Ahiãfɔ aana nɛ mi kamɛ daa, ade míapuli mibumɛna be lɔkɔ kĩ miawɛ a. Yĩ kɔ̃ nláana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ daa.
41014008	Otsole a kɛna lɛtsa kĩ yaapuli. Ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛtsɛla yĩ sukɛna kugua kĩ yamanɛ yĩ eyi ɛkpa yĩ kabila.
41014009	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ baade Kalɛ Wĩ a lɛtsã nɛ katinya kamɛ flee ni, baalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ lɛtsa kĩ otsole kĩĩ kɛna a akũ bɛkɔa bite ye anɛ.”
41014010	Ke liti a, Yuda Iskariot kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa naa Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ yaanyɛ Yesu ɛkpa be.
41014011	Kawɔlɛ de be nɛ fɔlɛtsa a akũ, ade be malo bike otse kĩ baakpa ye sika a. Foesũ Yuda kawɛ osi a kĩ yaatsã ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa be.
41014012	Nɛ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Kanya Luwi lɛtɔnyade a kĩ bakɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ Kavelibi a akũ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Ndia awɛ kĩ bɔlɔla bɔkpa nɔ luwi a funitsã kanya?”
41014013	Ade Yesu do be kamɛ bati nviã, mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, “Minaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, oti odi kĩ ɛnɔnɛ kugumi aatsɛlamɔ mi. Mitomɔ ye miwo nɛ tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ yaawo a,
41014014	lɔkɔa mibi tɔtɔ ɔlate a kĩ, ‘Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ a bo, “Ndia banɔvɔɛ̃ kɔla a kĩ bɔmɔ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a aanya Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a deĩ?” ’
41014015	Ade yaatsa mi abansulu kɔla baũ awã kĩ bɛhɛhɛ biyi kɔkɔɛ. Milɔla awã mikpa boe funitsã a kanya.”
41014016	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ bɛnaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, ade bɛnamɔ fɔtsa flee ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a. Ade bɛtɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a nɛ awã a.
41014017	Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã ya nɛ awã.
41014018	Ade kĩ bidzi banya a Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa, kĩ bɔmɔ ye budzi bɔanya aanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa.”
41014019	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ha be, ade bɛkavia ye ɔmɔa ɔmɔa kĩ, “Yĩ manɛ mbɔɛɛ?”
41014020	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɛnyɛ mi ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa, oti a kĩ ye awɛ deĩ nɛ sɔɔdaɛ kamɛ mɔ yĩ a.
41014021	Otidziwa Obi a anaaku ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ nɛ ye akũ a. Lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa oti a kĩ yaanyɛ Otidziwa Obi a ɛkpa a. Ntɛ bɛtama oti a na ni, kufɛ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa ye.”
41014022	Ade kĩ bɛkanya a, Yesu bɔɛ abodoo, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ ye akũ, ade ebuli ye ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitɛ minya, ade yĩ sukɛna a.”
41014023	Ke liti a, ɛbɔɛ kɔɔpu mɔ waĩ, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ɛkɔa ɛkpa be flee bɛkate kamɔa.
41014024	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ yĩ apam babɔanɛ a kĩ biwula nɛ bati pii lɔlɔ a.
41014025	Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ nláabuki mmɔa waĩ adima kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ maamɔa waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
41014026	Ke liti a, bɛsã tɔnɔ bimu Baguma, ade bɛnɛ bɛnaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ a.
41014027	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mi a flee míalo mifɔnɛ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, ‘Maakɔ baveli akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a, ade ye baveli a flee aapansam a.’
41014028	Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛdzɛla yĩ ndzi nkpã ni, maanya mi lɔtɔ nɛ Galilea.”
41014029	Ade Petro bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃, nláalo nfɔnɛ nɔ da, ntɛ be nkaɛ a flee lo malo!”
41014030	Yesu bi Petro kĩ, “Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe titi nviã lɛnyɛ kĩĩ ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
41014031	Lɛmɛ Petro buki ebi ye mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ, “Ntɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔmɔ nɔ buku malo ni, nláalɛ kĩ ĩnyína nɔ!” Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee lɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ a.
41014032	Bɛyawo kakɔ kadi kĩ bavɛ Getsemane, ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Midzi nɛ awĩ lɔkɔa nnaabɔa mpaɛ.”
41014033	Ade ɛkpã Petro, Yakobo mɔ Yohanes ebumɔ ye akũ a. Kalɔɛ mɔ libe wo nɛ ye kamɛ, ɛkatila bliblibli,
41014034	ade ɛdani ebi be kĩ, “Ayɔlɔhɔ tɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ paa ndɛ maku. Midzi nɛ awĩ, mikaadã fɔkɔ.”
41014035	Kĩ ɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, ɛka ɛtsa nɛ tite ɛbɔa mpaɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ fɔ́adã bɔɛɛ ni, lubo kamɔ lɔkɔ kĩĩ lɛtɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ.”
41014036	Ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, yĩ Ɔlɛga, apuli kakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa. Nyɛ lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu kĩĩ nɛ yĩ akũ. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ, mbom lɛtsa a kĩ nɔ awɛ.”
41014037	Ke liti a, emuniki ɛyamɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a kĩ bɛwa tida. Ebi Simon Petro kĩ, “Simon, tida ɔwaa? Ɔtápuli odzi ɔdã fɔkɔ dɔũhuilɛ mɔapɛ malo?”
41014038	Ade ebi be kĩ, “Mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa mikaabɔa mpaɛ ayekĩ miláawo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ. Hũhũ a awɛ lɛmɛ sukɛna a kɔ̃ lɛlá kɔbɛ̃.”
41014039	Yesu buki emuniki ɛnabɔa mpaɛ ɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔapɛ a.
41014040	Ebuki emuniki ɛnaa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a sɛkɛ̃ ɛnamɔ kĩ bɛwa tida. Bɛtápuli bibinya anɛ, tida deĩ nɛ be anɛ ade bɛtányi lɛtsa kĩ balɛ bɛnyɛ be akũ onukpɛ̃ a.
41014041	Kĩ ebuki emuniki ɛya lɛlalɛde a, evia be kĩ, “Tida mibuki miwaa miawɛya? Fɔlɛ! Ɔdɔũ a wo ɔtɔ! Midã, bɛkɔa Otidziwa Obi a, bado nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ awɛ.
41014042	Miyidza mifɔ̃ bɔnaa. Midã oti a kĩ yaanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa a fuã.”
41014043	Yesu buki ɛlamɔ kɔdzɛla fɔmɔ Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ be ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa yanɛ ɛta. Bati kɔdabu a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ mɔ ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nyɛ bibu a tomɔ ye, ade bɛnɛɛ fɔpamɛ glɛlɛ glɛlɛ mɔ titse fukũ a.
41014044	Oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a kpa be nsɛntsɛlɛni eyi kĩ, “Oti a kĩ míamɔ kĩ ndzɛmɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a ni, ade ye nɛ awã a. Mipi ye mikpã minamɛna, lɔkɔa mi anɛ ɛna nɛ ye akũ.”
41014045	Kĩ Yuda sila ewo awã a, ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ɛvɛ ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ!” ade ɛdzɛmɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a.
41014046	Foesũ bipi Yesu, ade bipini ye kɔɔba a.
41014047	Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kamɛ ɔmɔa vɛlɛ ye kɔpã ɛnyɛ ɛbaa Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a ɔsumunɛ sɔtɔ emuni.
41014048	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Fusĩ kĩ mialɛ apã mɔ titse fukũ miya kĩ miaayapi yĩ ndɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ manɛ?
41014049	Luwi daa mana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, katsa fɔtsa, lɛmɛ mitápi yĩ. Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
41014050	Ade ke ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee lo bɛfɔnɛ ye a.
41014051	Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, opopobi odi kĩ esua aklala lima odi akũ tomɛna Yesu. Bati a wɛ kĩ bapi ye,
41014052	lɛmɛ ɛwɔlɔ ye lima edo be nɛ awɛ, ade elo mɔ ɔdzɔ a.
41014053	Ade bɛkpã Yesu bɛnamɛna Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a tɔtɔ kamɛ, awã kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kpɔta a.
41014054	Petro tomɛna nɛ liti flee, ɛyawo nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a lɔwabe. Ɛkɛna akũ edzi nɛ basumunɛ a ɔwɛ̃ bɛkawa fi.
41014055	Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a kĩ bidzi nɛ awã wɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ batsua bite nɛ Yesu akũ bɛkɔa bɛkɔ ye wuda kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ bɛtána fudima nɛ ye akũ.
41014056	Adansifɔ pii yama fɔvã bite nɛ ye akũ, lɛmɛ be adansiɛ kadi táketi mɔ akũ.
41014057	Ade bati badi yidza bɛdza bɛma fɔvã kĩ,
41014058	“Bunu kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Maabubuli Asɔli Kɔla kĩĩ kĩ bike mɔ awɛ a, ade nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti ni, maake kɔbɛbã kĩ nnɛ́ awɛ bɛkɔa bike.’ ”
41014059	Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ adansiɛ malo táketi mɔ akũ.
41014060	Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a yidza ɛdza nɛ bati a flee anɛ, ade evia Yesu kĩ, “Ɔláanyɛ onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɔ kalɛ katia nɔ a?”
41014061	Lɛmɛ Yesu sua onukpɛ̃ ɛtálɛ kadima. Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a buki evia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Kristo, Nhila Ɔlate a Obi a?”
41014062	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ye manɛ, ade míamɔ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ edzi nɛ Baguma Kpale a sɔmɔna, ade yaato ode ɛya nɛ luflututu kamɛ a!”
41014063	Nɛ awã a, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a bɛ̃ ye atadiɛ kamɛ nɛ kalɔkpa kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔtábuki busĩ ɔdansini odima!
41014064	Minu ye mbusuo fɔlɛtsa a. Litsa nyɛ mi adzuni?” Adeke be flee bitunɔ yɔ kĩ eku kɔtɔ ade ɛfɛta ɛkpa wuda a.
41014065	Be kamɛ badi yi kayɔ mɔ tanɛ katua kako nɛ Yesu akũ, badi sua ye anɛ, bɛkake ye fukpeni kavia ye kĩ, “Bi boe owula kĩ ɛbɔa nɔ!” Ade badãmɛnanɛ a kpã Yesu bɛbalɛbalɛ ye awɛ nɛ tɔlɔtɔ a.
41014066	Kĩ Petro buki edzi nɛ lɔwabe a, abawa adi nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a tɔtɔ kamɛ a ya nɛ awã.
41014067	Kĩ ɛmɔ Petro kĩ edzi yawa fi a, ɛbɛ̃ anɛ ɛdã ye ade ebi ye kĩ, “Nɔ malo otomɛna Yesu Nazaretni a!”
41014068	Ade Petro sĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyína lɛtsama, ade maánu lɛtsa a kĩ alɛ a malo a!” Ade ɛnɛ ɛnaa onyukpɛ̃ a. Mɔ ye awã kawo pɛ mɔ ɔkɔkɔ nyɛ onukpɛ̃.
41014069	Abawa a buki ɛmɔ́ ye nɛ awã, ade edo bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kabi awɛ kĩ, “Ɛnyɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa!”
41014070	Lɛmɛ Petro buki esĩ. Owi tábuna mɔ bikĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã bi ye kĩ, “Ɔláapuli osi kĩ ɔnyɛ́ be kamɛ ɔmɔa, kitonɛkĩ nɔ malo Galileani anɛ.”
41014071	Ade Petro do kadum mɔ katani awɛ kĩ, “Ntani kĩ ɔnɔkɔali malɛ, Baguma ɛvɛlɛ yĩ sɔtɔ ntɛ fɔvã mama. Ĩnyína oti a kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa milamɛna kalɛ a.”
41014072	Deedimɔapɛ ɔkɔkɔ be lɛyade, ade Petro te anɛ nɛ kalɛ a kĩ Yesu bi ye a akũ kĩ, “Fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe titi nviã ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.” Kĩ ɛmɔ ye akũ eyi ɔsũ a, ebe blobloblo.
41015001	Ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a, ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a, mbla batsanɛ a mɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a tsɛna mɔatsɛ bɛnaa adzina nɛ Yesu akũ. Bisui Yesu nɛ tɔwɛ̃ kamɛ, bɛkpã ye bɛnado nɛ Pilato awɛ.
41015002	Awã naa, Pilato via Yesu kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a?” Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Oo, fɔla ndɛ ayekĩ ɔlɛ a.”
41015003	Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛ fɔlɛtsa pii bitsua Yesu onukpɛ̃.
41015004	Foesũ Pilato buki evia ye kĩ, “Ɔláakpa kalɛ a mbuayɛ? Tse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɛna katsua kate nɛ nɔ akũ a.”
41015005	Lɛmɛ Yesu tábuki ebinya onukpɛ̃ ade Pilato kɛna saa a.
41015006	Kateli nyɛ kateli, nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi kanya kamɛ a, Pilato afɔnɛ oti mɔa nɛ abãã kɔla bawanɛ a kamɛ, kĩ Yudafɔ via a awɛ kakpa be.
41015007	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Baraba waa kɔla mɔ bati bɛbã badi. Bati a yidza bɛdza nɛ Roma Abãã akũ ade bɛkɔ bati nɛ foe kamɛ a.
41015008	Kĩ bati kɔdabu a kpɔta a, bivia Pilato kĩ ɛkɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ kĩ yawɛ kakɛna kateli nyɛ kateli a ɛkpa be.
41015009	Evia be kĩ, “Miáwɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a awɛ nkpa mi?”
41015010	Pilato via fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ enyina yededeede kĩ lineke sũ mɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kɔa Yesu bido nɛ ye awɛ.
41015011	Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kɔa bido nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ kĩ bivia Pilato ɛfɔnɛ Baraba mbom awɛ ɛkpa be.
41015012	Pilato buki evia bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ litsa miawɛ kĩ nkɛna oti a kĩ miavɛ kĩ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a?”
41015013	Ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla bibi ye kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
41015014	Pilato via be kĩ, “Litsa tɔkpa ɛkɛna?” Ade be flee bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
41015015	Pilato wɛ kĩ yakɛna nɛ bati kɔdabu a kawɛ akũ ɛkpa be, foesũ ɛfɔnɛ Baraba awɛ ɛkpa be, ade kĩ ɛfɔ̃ sodzafɔ bo Yesu paa mɔ mpile biyu a, ɛkɔa ye ɛkpa sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛnaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.
41015016	Sodzafɔ a kpã Yesu biwomɛna nɛ abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tɔtɔ a lɔwabe, ade bɛvɛ sodzafɔ nkaɛ a bɛyakpɔta a.
41015017	Ade bɛkɔa lima ngbã atadiɛ wulaa bido ye, bɛnɔ fɔtsɔlɛwɛ lɔbɔɛ bɛtsa ye a.
41015018	Adeke bɛkawɔ̃na ye kĩ, “Yiiduu! Yudafɔ Lɛgã, lidzi nkpã gɛlɛɛlɛ!”
41015019	Bibo ye nɛ lɔlɔ mɔ otse, bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye akũ, ade bike aduli bɛkɛna fɔlɔ bɛkpa ye a.
41015020	Kĩ bidi ye nsekuo biyua a, bɛnyɛ atadiɛ ngbã a nɛ ye akũ, bimuniki mɔ ye mɔawɛ tide bido ye. Ke liti a, bɛkpã ye bɛnɛmɛna kĩ banaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.
41015021	Kĩ banaa a, bɛtsɛlamɛna onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon kĩ eto akula adi kamɛ yanaa ɔmatɔ kamɛ. Ade sodzafɔ a hɛ ye kĩ ɛtɛ Yesu asendua a ɛlɔ a. Simon kĩĩ to Kireneni ɔmatɔ a, ade ɛnyɛ Aleksandro mɔ Rufo ɔlɛga a.
41015022	Bɛkpã Yesu bɛnamɛna kakɔ kadi kĩ bavɛ Golgata, kĩ foe kayɔ nyɛ oti lɔlɔ fɔtsɔ̃.
41015023	Ade awã bɛkpa ye waĩ kĩ bɛtsɛkamɔ otsonu kĩ yadina akũ kawo kĩ ɛmɔa a, lɛmɛ Yesu támɔa be.
41015024	Sodzafɔ a bɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ ade bɛta bavulibi nɛ ye tɛtadiɛ akũ bɛmɔ́ ekĩ yaanya odi nyɛ odi ade a.
41015025	Bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ nɛ ɔnɔnɛ tɔdɔũ evedi kamɛ.
41015026	Ade bɛtsɛlɛ ye onukpɛ̃ katsua fɔlɛtsa bɛbɔa nɛ ye lɔlɔ nyangɛ kĩ, “Yudafɔ Lɛgã a.”
41015027	Bɛbɔa bayekpanɛ nviã lɛmɛ nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ Yesu, ɔmɔa nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ɔyade nɛ ye sɛbã.
41015028	Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ, lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Bibu ye bido nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kamɛ.”
41015029	Bati a kĩ bɛkatɛ̃ a kpɔkpa fɔlɔ ade bivũna Yesu kĩ, “Ao! Nɔ a kĩ ɔlɛ kĩ aaveli Asɔli Kɔla a obuki oke kɔbɛbã nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti a nɛ awĩ a?
41015030	Duma nɛ asendua akũ, kanyɛ nɔ akũ!”
41015031	Ade ayea Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a lɛmɛ di ye nsekuo bɛkabi akũ kĩ, “Ɛtɛ bati bɛbã nkpã, lɛmɛ yaápuli ɛtɛ ye mɔawɛ akũ.
41015032	Mifɔ̃ Kristo, Israelfɔ Lɛgã a eduma nɛ asendua akũ finyaa bɔmɔ lɔkɔa bɔtɛ ye budo” Ade bati nviã a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ Yesu a, lɛmɛ vũna ye a.
41015033	Kĩ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã bɔa a, katinya kamɛ flee ke ɔtũ, kɛnawo tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ.
41015034	Nɛ tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, Yesu bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” Foe kayɔ nyɛ, “Yĩ Baguma! Yĩ Baguma! Litsa sũ ɔfɔnɛ yĩ awɛ?”
41015035	Bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a badi nu lɛtsa kĩ ɛlɛ a, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitse! Yavɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya.”
41015036	Be kamɛ ɔmɔa wula atsɛ ɛnabɔɛ kanyinya butubu ɔsapɔ kĩ edo nɛ waĩ mɔ ɔnyɛ kamɛ ade ɛdɛla mɔ otse ɛkpa Yesu kĩ ɛmɔa a. Ade oti a kalɛ kĩ, “Midza, mifɔ̃ bɔdã ntɛ Eliya aaka ɛyaanyɛ ye nɛ asendua a akũ!”
41015037	Yesu buki ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ade ɛmɛna onukpɛ̃ a.
41015038	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛ, Asɔli Kɔla lima kpale a kĩ litsua koe kamɛ a bɛ̃ nɛ kayite, kito nyangɛ kɛyawo kayɔ.
41015039	Ade kĩ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ ɛdza ɛtsɛlamɛna asendua a nu Yesu fɔwɔla kabɔa mɔ ayekĩ eku a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nuwĩ fɔanɛ kĩ oti kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma Obi.”
41015040	Batsole badi lɛmɛ dza mɔ lugo bɛkadã. Be kamɛ badi nyɛ Maria Magdalani, Salome mɔ Maria kĩ ye babi nyɛ Yakobo obisɛ̃de a mɔ Yose.
41015041	Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu na nɛ Galilea, ade be lɛkatomɔ ye bɛkabumɔ ye a. Batsole bɛbã pii kĩ bitomɔ ye bɛya nɛ Yerusalem a lɛmɛ na nɛ awã.
41015042	Fɔtsa kĩĩ flee ya nɛ luwi kĩ lɛnya Kawɛya Luwi a lɔtɔ. Nɛ olobe lɔkɔ a,
41015043	Yosef kĩ eto Arimatia ɔmatɔ a ya. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ edeĩ obu nɛ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a kamɛ, ade edzi yadã Baguma Lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kaya anɛ a. Yosef do ɔwɔlɛ ɛnaa Pilato sɛkɛ̃ eke ye aduli evia kĩ ɛfɔnɛ Yesu ɔnɔkpa a awɛ ɛkpa ye.
41015044	Fɔkɛna Pilato wãwã kĩ enu kĩ Yesu ku kɔkɔɛ. Foesũ ɛvɛ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ evia ye kĩ nuwĩ Yesu ku kɔkɔɛ.
41015045	Ade kĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye ɔnɔkɔali a, Pilato kpa Yosef osi kĩ ɛnaavɛnya ɔnɔkpa a.
41015046	Ade Yosef naya aklala, ade kĩ ɛnavɛnya Yesu ɔnɔkpa a, esuli ye nɛ lima a kamɛ. Ɛkɔa ye ɛwɔla nɛ linikɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ nɛ de ɔkɛ kamɛ, ade emilinya de kpale ɛbalɛ linikɛ a onukpɛ̃ a.
41015047	Maria Magdalani mɔ Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Yose ɔma a dza bɛkadã, ade bɛmɔ́ awã kĩ bɛkɔa Yesu ɔnɔkpa a bibila a.
41016001	Kĩ Kawɛya Luwi a wũna a, Maria Magdalani, Maria Yakobo ɔma mɔ Salome bɛnaya klubɔũ kĩ banaatsɛla Yesu ɔnɔkpa a.
41016002	Nɛ Ɛkwansieda ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, kĩ suwa de a, biyidza bɛnaa linikɛ a akũ.
41016003	-
41016004	Kĩ banaa a, bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Owei aamilinya de kpale a nɛ linikɛ a onukpɛ̃ ɛkpa boe?” De a pɔnɛ lububu paa. Kĩ bɛdzɛla anɛ bɛdã a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ bimilinya de a biyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ kɔkɔɛ.
41016005	Foesũ biwo nɛ linikɛ a kamɛ. Adeke bɛmɔ́ opopo odi kĩ edo atadiɛ wulaa fitaa edzi nɛ sɔmɔna sɛmakɛ, ade bɛbɔa oblia.
41016006	Opopo a bi be kĩ, “Mitavila. Yesu Nazaretni a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a, miawɛ. Ɛláa awĩ kĩĩ. Eyidza edzi nkpã! Midã, ade awĩ bɛkɔa ye bɛwɔla a.
41016007	Minaabi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ Petro lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Yesu nyaa mi lɔtɔ yanaa Galilea, ade awã míamɔ ye ndɛ ayekĩ ebi mi eyi a.’ ”
41016008	Foesũ batsole a nɛ bilo atsɛ bɛdzakũ nɛ linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ nɛ libe mɔ kukũtila kamɛ. Bɛtábi odima kadima kitonɛkĩ bɛkavila.
41016009	Kĩ Yesu yidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ nɛ Ɛkwansieda ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Maria Magdalani, kĩ ye kamɛ ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa evũkɔnɔ etomɛna a.
41016010	Ade ye lɛnabi bikĩ bitomɔ Yesu tɔ̃ a fɔlɛtsa a. Bati kĩĩ dzi bɛkabe ayɔlɔhɔ nɛ ye wuda a akũ.
41016011	Lɛmɛ kĩ Maria bi be kĩ Yesu yidza edzi nkpã, ade kĩ ɛmɔ́ ye malo ni, bɛtátɛ ye bido.
41016012	Fukĩĩ liti a, Yesu nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã kĩ Bito Yerusalem banaa akula, lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ ye biyi ɔsũ nɛ kayɔkayi a.
41016013	Bimuniki bɛnabi be nkaɛ a, lɛmɛ be malo bɛtátɛ bido.
41016014	Ke liti a, Yesu nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-odi a kĩ bidzi banya. Lɛmɛ ɛkã be anɛ kĩ bɛtána katɛkado, mɔ kĩ bɛna atɔ ɔsĩ, bɛtátɛ bati a kĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ ye edzi nkpã a lɛmɛ bido a.
41016015	Ebi be kĩ, “Minaa katinya kamɛ flee minaalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a mikpa batidziwa flee.
41016016	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ edo, ɛtɛ mui kawɔla lɛmɛ ni, baatɛ ye nkpã, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ edo ni, baakɔ ye kɔtɔ.
41016017	Baguma aakpa batɛ badonɛ a kɔbɛ̃ bɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa. Baablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa bɛnɛmɛna nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ, baalɛ tide vɔɛ̃.
41016018	Ade ntɛ bipi kɔɛ ĩye bɛmɔa otsonu kpa ni, fɔláakɛna be lɛtsama. Ntɛ bite awɛ nɛ basɔnɛ akũ ni, baana akũ ɔsĩ.”
41016019	Ke liti a, kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ be eyua a, bɛbɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna nɛ ode ade ɛnadzi nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna a.
41016020	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ. Boe Ɔlate a kɛna adzuma mɔ be, ɛkɔa awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkakɛna a ete de kĩ be fɔlɛtsa a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
42001001	Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Tiofilo, bati pii bɔa mbɔdi ayekĩ baapuli, bɛtsɛlɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ boe kamɛ a biyi.
42001002	Bɛtsɛlɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bibi boe a, ndɛ ayekĩ binu bitomɛna bikĩ bɛmɔ́ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bamɛ kito anɛ kayɔkayi a, ade bide lɛtsã nɛ foe akũ a.
42001003	Foesũ, Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Tiofilo, nɛ ayekĩ yĩ mɔawɛ a ntsã fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee kamɛ kito kayɔkayi a sũ ni, nkɔna kĩ fɔnɛnɛ kĩ matsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a pɛpɛɛpɛ mma nɔ.
42001004	Nkɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ aanyi ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɔ a flee kamɛ.
42001005	Nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Herodes kanya lɛgã nɛ Yudea tite akũ a, Yudafɔ ɔsɔfɔ odi na kĩ bavɛ Zakaria. Eto ɔsɔfɔ katsu a kĩ bavɛ Abiya a kamɛ. Ɔtsɔ̃ dĩ nyɛ Elizabet kĩ ye malo eto ɔsɔfɔ Aaron kasinu a kamɛ.
42001006	Ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ɔnyɔ kĩĩ dzi nkpã wĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, ade bɛkadi ye tɛbla mɔ nhihiɛ akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ a.
42001007	Bati kĩĩ táma obi odima kitonɛkĩ Elizabet nya oduko, ade bati nviã a lɛmɛ dɛ a.
42001008	Luwi a Zakaria kakɛna ye tɔsɔfɔ adzuma nɛ Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ be katsu a akũ fuke.
42001009	Nɛ be basɔfɔ adzuma kakɛna onukpɛ̃ a, biwole ade fɔyake nɛ Zakaria akũ, kĩ ɛnaate ɔnyɔ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ ɛkpa Baguma nɛ ye afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a akũ. Foesũ ewo ɛnaa Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a.
42001010	Lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkate ɔnyɔ a, bati nkaɛ a ko nɛ kanya bɛkabɔa mpaɛ.
42001011	Boe Ɔlate ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye nɛ ɔnyɔ katekɔ̃ a sɔmɔna sɛmakɛ.
42001012	Kĩ Zakaria mɔ́ ye a, ɛbɔa obili ade libe wo ye paa a.
42001013	Lɛmɛ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Zakaria, tavila! Baguma nu nɔ mpaɛbɔ, nɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Elizabet aama obinyole ɛkpa nɔ. Aate ye dĩ kĩ Yohanes.
42001014	Kawɔlɛ aade nɔ paa, ade ayea kawɔlɛ aade bati pii lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛma ye a.
42001015	Yaanya oti kpale nɛ Baguma anɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ yamɔa waĩ ĩye bavɛ mɔ ɔsĩ. Ade kito ye kama kamɛ ni, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa aatɛ ye kamɛ.
42001016	Ade ye aanya oti kĩ yaamunikimɔ Israelfɔ bati pii ɛyamɛna nɛ be Ɔlate Baguma a sɛkɛ̃ a.
42001017	Yaanya boe Ɔlate kaya a lɔtɔ ɛna hũhũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya na a. Yaalɔla babi mɔ balɛga kayite. Yaadani bikĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ bɛna adzuni ndɛ bikĩ bakɛna tuwĩ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ boe Ɔlate bati lɛna nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ bɛkpa ye.”
42001018	Ade Zakaria via ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, “Nde maakɛna ĩnyi kĩ fukĩĩ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ? Kitonɛkĩ ndɛ, ade yĩ ɔtsɔ̃ lɛmɛ dɛ a.”
42001019	Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ Gabriel kĩ madza nɛ Baguma anɛ. Ade ye lido yĩ kĩ ĩyaabi nɔ ɔlɛdo wĩ kĩĩ a.
42001020	Lɛmɛ ɔtátɛ yĩ ɔlɛdo odo, kĩ yaaya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma hihiɛ eyi a. Nɛ foesũ aatɔ lumumu, ɔláapuli ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi kĩĩ a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
42001021	Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ kanya bɛkadzɔlɛ Zakaria kɛna saa, ade bɛkabu lɔlɔ kamɛ nɛ lɛtsa a sũ kĩ ebuna owi beblebee nɛ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a.
42001022	Kĩ Zakaria nɛ ɛya a, ɛtábuki epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ be. Foesũ bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ ɛmɔ kanyɛkatsa kadi nɛ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a. Kĩ ɛtɔ lumumu sũ ni awɛ ɛkɔa ɛkakɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni katsa be.
42001023	Kĩ Zakaria yua ye adzuma nɛ Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa ɔtɔ.
42001024	Ke liti a, Elizabet yatsãmɔ kɔma ade ɛtábuki ɛnɛ kanya a. Ɛkɔla ye akũ tidetɔ elo flee.
42001025	Adeke Elizabet lɛ kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ ni, Baguma bumɔ yĩ ade ɛnyɛ yĩ kɔnyɔã nɛ bati anɛ a.”
42001026	Nɛ tidetɔ evũ liti a, Baguma do ye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ Gabriel ɛnaa Galilea ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Nazaret kamɛ.
42001027	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩĩ kɔa ɔlɛdo ɛma oyitsɔ̃ kĩ bitinya bɛkpa onyole kĩ bavɛ Yosef, kĩ ɛnyɛ Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ obi. Oyitsɔ̃ a dĩ nyɛ Maria.
42001028	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a ya nɛ Maria sɛkɛ̃ ade ebi ye kĩ, “Oyitsɔ̃, mawɔ̃na nɔ nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ! Nɔ oti kĩ bɛmɔ́ kɔnya, boe Ɔlate tomɔ nɔ!”
42001029	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔlɛdo a fɔ̃ Maria kɛna basaa, ade evia ye akũ kĩ, “Litsa kawɔ̃na nɛ awĩ a?”
42001030	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Maria, tavila. Baguma mɔ́ nɔ kɔnya.
42001031	Aatsãmɔ kɔma ɔma obinyole, lɔkɔa aate ye dĩ kĩ Yesu.
42001032	Yaatɛ dĩ paa kĩ bati aavɛ ye kĩ Baguma Nɛ Ode Flee Obi. Boe Ɔlate aadzina ye lɛgã ndɛ ɔwanyɔ Dawid aye.
42001033	Ade yaanya lɛgã nɛ Yakob babi mɔ bawa akũ daa a. Ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a lɛláawũna dadaada.”
42001034	Awã naa Maria bi Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, “Nde fukĩĩ aapuli fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ ĩnyína onyole a?”
42001035	Ade ke ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ayako nɛ nɔ akũ ade Baguma kɔbɛ̃ aatɛ nɔ kamɛ a. Foesũ obi kpalɛwa a kĩ aama a ni, baavɛ ye kĩ Baguma Obinyole.
42001036	Mawɛ kĩ kai nɔ akũ oti kĩ bavɛ Elizabet. Bati alɛ kĩ ɛláama, lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ kɔma. Edeĩ nɛ odetɔ ovũde kamɛ, titɔ kĩ ɛdɛ posoposo malo.
42001037	Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ Baguma lɛláapuli ɛkɛna.”
42001038	Ade Maria bi ye kĩ, “Dã, boe Ɔlate ɔsumunɛ manɛ. Fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ fɔkpa yĩ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔlɛ a.” Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ ye a.
42001039	-
42001040	Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ a, Maria manɛ akũ, ɛwɛ sɔwa ɛnaa Zakaria awã nɛ Yudea ɔmatɔ odi kĩ edeĩ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, ade ɛnawɔ̃na Elizabet a.
42001041	Kĩ Elizabet nu Maria kawɔ̃na a, ye obi nɛ sɛmɛ kamɛ a kuna akũ, ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tɛ Elizabet kamɛ a.
42001042	Ade awã na ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bihila nɔ nɛ batsole flee kamɛ, ade bihila nɔ sɛmɛ kamɛ obi a lɛmɛ a!
42001043	Yĩ nyɛ owei kĩ boe Ɔlate ɔma ya kĩ yayaawɔ̃na yĩ?
42001044	Lɔkɔ a kĩ nsila nnu nɔ kawɔ̃na pɛ, obi nɛ yĩ sɛmɛ kamɛ a kuna akũ mɔ kawɔlɛ.
42001045	Bihila nɔ paa kitonɛkĩ ɔtɛ odo kĩ Baguma ɔlɛdo a kĩ ɛlɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
42001046	Awã naa Maria lɛ kĩ, “Yĩ ɔwɔlɛ amu Baguma.
42001047	Ade kawɔlɛ ade yĩ hũhũ a, nɛ Baguma yĩ Ɔtɛnɛ a sũ,
42001048	kitonɛkĩ ete anɛ nɛ, yĩ ye ɔsumunɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ́ lɛtsama akũ. Kito finyaa kanaa ni, babi mɔ bawa flee aavɛ yĩ oti kĩ bihila ye,
42001049	kitonɛkĩ Baguma Otumifɔ kɛna fɔtsa kpale ɛkpa yĩ. Ye dĩ akũ kpalɛ.
42001050	Ye kɔnyakamɔ waa, kɛkpa babi mɔ bawa kĩ bavila ye a.
42001051	Ɛkɛna fɔtsa kpale, ade ɛyalɛ bati a kĩ bɛdɛla be akũ nɛ ode mɔ be kakɔna flee a.
42001052	Ɛdzɛla fɔgã kĩ fudeĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ be fɔgãkpo akũ, ade ɛdɛla bikĩ bɛdɔla be akũ a nɛ ode a.
42001053	Ɛkpa bikĩ kɔlɛ akɔ be a fɔtsa wĩ pii, ade ɛfɔ̃ bikĩ bideĩ akũ a dzakũ mɔ awɛ pupulidza a.
42001054	-
42001055	Ete anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa boe bawanyɔ a akũ, ade ɛyaabumɔ ye ɔsumunɛ Israel a. Ete anɛ, ɛmɔ Abraham kɔnya, mɔ ye babi mɔ bawa kito finyaa flee kanaa!”
42001056	Maria dzi nɛ Elizabet sɛkɛ̃ ndɛ tidetɔ ɛlalɛ fɔmɔ emuniki ɛnaa ɔtɔ.
42001057	Kĩ Elizabet aama a, ɛma obinyole.
42001058	Ye akũ bati mɔ banunɛ flee nu ayekĩ Baguma kɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa ye, foesũ be flee bɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa mɔ ye.
42001059	Kĩ akɔkɔa a tɛ fuwi ɛlɛ̃ a, ye akũ bati ya kĩ batsua ye lɛkpati, ade bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔa ye ɔlɛga dĩ Zakaria bite ye a.
42001060	Lɛmɛ ɔma tátunɔ mɔ be, ade ebi be kĩ, “Ye dĩ aanya Yohanes.”
42001061	Ade awã mɔ bibi ye kĩ, “Odima táto nɔ kɔla kamɛ kĩ yanya dĩ a na.”
42001062	Nɛ foesũ bɛkɔa awɛ bɛkɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni bivia ɔlɛga kĩ ɛtsa dĩ a kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yate obi.
42001063	Awã naa Zakaria via sileti ade ɛtsɛlɛ ete kĩ, “Ye dĩ nyɛ Yohanes.” Fɔkɛna be a flee saa.
42001064	Deedimɔapɛ Zakaria buki edo kɔdzɛla kalɛ awɛ ade emu Baguma a.
42001065	Libe wo ye banunɛ a flee ade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ tɛmatɔ a kĩ tideĩ nɛ Yudea tɔtɔ kamɛ a flee a.
42001066	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kpa bati a kĩ binu foe a lɔlɔ kamɛ kabu, ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Litsa odu obisɛ̃ kĩĩ aadani ɛkɛna?” Bivia foe kitonɛkĩ fɔwaa yedede kĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ tomɔ ye.
42001067	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa tɛ obisɛ̃ a ɔlɛga Zakaria kamɛ ade ɛlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa eyi kĩ,
42001068	“Mifɔ̃ bumu boe Ɔlate, Israel Baguma, kitonɛkĩ ɛyabumɔ ye kade bati, ade ɛnyɛ be nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ a.
42001069	Ɛkpa boe Ɔtɛnɛ kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃, oti kĩ ɛnyɛ ye osumunɛ Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ obi.
42001070	Nɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kpalɛwa a akũ,
42001071	kĩ yaanyɛ boe etomɛna bikĩ bapi boe osumbɔ mɔ boe bakesĩnɛ flee awɛ kamɛ.
42001072	Ɛlɛ kĩ yaamɔ boe bawanyɔ kɔnya, ade ete anɛ nɛ ye nhihiɛ kpalɛwa a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi a akũ a.
42001073	-
42001074	Yaakɛna nɛ fubo a kĩ ɛlɔ ɛkpa boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham, kĩ yaanyɛ boe etomɛna boe bakesĩnɛ awɛ kamɛ a akũ, ayekĩ bɔ́apuli busum Baguma nɛ katavila kamɛ,
42001075	boe akũ lɛkpalɛ, budzi kadzi wĩ nɛ ye anɛ, nɛ boe nkpã fuwi flee kamɛ.
42001076	Nɔ, yĩ obi, bati aavɛ nɔ Baguma Nɛ Ode Flee Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ. Ade nɔ aanya boe Ɔlate lɔtɔ lɔkɔa ɔlɔla osi ɔkpa ye kaya a.
42001077	Aabi ye bati kĩ baana katɛ nɛ be titikpa kakɔakate kamɛ.
42001078	Boe Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, foesũ yaafɔ̃ katɛ ɔhaĩ a lide ɛkpa boe.
42001079	Yaafɔ̃ ɔhaĩ kĩĩ lɛyaako nɛ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, mɔ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ wuda kuyo kamɛ a akũ, lɔkɔa ɛkpã boe ɛtsãmɛna lukudɔ osi akũ.”
42001080	Obisɛ̃ a bo anɛ nɛ sukɛna mɔ hũhũ kamɛ. Edzi nɛ kɔsa kamɛ, kɛnawo luwi a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Israel kanade a.
42002001	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare Augusto si mbla kĩ bɛkã, bɛtsɛlɛ bati flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Roma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ tite akũ a buĩ.
42002002	Nɛ bati buĩ katsɛlɛ katɔnyade kĩĩ kamɛ a, abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bavɛ Kirenio lɛnya Siria tite akũ.
42002003	Nɛ mbla a sũ odi nyɛ odi naa ye ɔtɔ kĩ yanaatsɛlɛ dĩ.
42002004	Ade ke Yosef to Nazaret ɔmatɔ nɛ Galilea ɛnaa Betlehem ɔmatɔ nɛ Yudea tite akũ, awã kĩ bɛma Lɛgã Dawid lɛmɛ a. Yosef naa awã kitonɛkĩ ɛnya Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ obi.
42002005	Bɛmɔ Maria kĩ bitinya bɛkpa ye a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ kɔma lɛmɛ a lɛnaa kĩ banaatsɛlɛ buĩ.
42002006	Kĩ bɛna nɛ Betlehem a, lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ Maria ama.
42002007	Ɛma ye obinyole ɔtɔnyade, ade esuli obi a edo nɛ fumakũ kamɛ, ɛkɔa ɛwɔla nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de kamɛ bayaɛ anya a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɛtána kawakɔ̃ kadima nɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ kasekɔ̃ a.
42002008	Baveli bakpãnɛ badi na nɛ tite a kakɔ kadi lɛnyɛ a flee bɛkadã be bayaɛ akũ.
42002009	Deedimɔapɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nɛ ɛta nɛ be kayite ade Baguma kukũkpalɛ ko nɛ be akũ a. Nɛ foesũ bivila paa,
42002010	lɛmɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi be kĩ, “Mitavila! Mma mi fɔlɛtsa wĩ kĩ fɔ́ayamɛna kawɔlɛ mɔ lukudɔ pii fɔkpa bati flee.
42002011	Nɛ nviã luwi kĩĩ akũ, bɛma Ɔtɛnɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo bɛkpa mi nɛ Lɛgã Dawid ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
42002012	Lɛtsa a kĩ míakɔa mimɔ́ miyi ɔsũ nyɛ kĩ míamɔ waawa a kĩ busuli ye bido nɛ fumakũ kamɛ ɛwaa nɛ bayaɛ kanyakɔ̃.”
42002013	Deedimɔapɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ kɔdza baũ kudi to ode kɔka kɔyabumɔ ɔtɔnyade a, ade be a flee bɛkamu Baguma mɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ,
42002014	“Obu mɔ kamu kɛkpa Baguma nɛ ode flefle, lɔkɔa lukudɔ litomɛna katinya kamɛ bati flee a kĩ Baguma awɛ a!”
42002015	Kĩ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a dzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ bɛdani bɛnaa ode a, baveli bakpãnɛ a bi be akũ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bɔnaa Betlehem bɔnaadã lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a kĩ boe Ɔlate bi boe a.”
42002016	Ade bɛwɛ sɔwa bɛnaa bɛnamɔ Maria, Yosef mɔ waawa a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ bayaɛ kanyakɔ̃ a.
42002017	Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a, bɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a flee kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi be nɛ obisɛ̃ a akũ.
42002018	Bati flee a kĩ binu baveli bakpãnɛ fɔlɛtsa a kɛna saa.
42002019	Lɛmɛ Maria pi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee edo nɛ lɔlɔ kamɛ, ɛkakɔna foe akũ dzununuunu.
42002020	Baveli bakpãnɛ a muniki bɛnaa mɔ Baguma kamu nɛ fɔlɛtsa flee a kĩ binu, bɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ a akũ, kitonɛkĩ foe flee fɔya pɛpɛɛpɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi be a.
42002021	Nɛ luwi lɛlɛ̃de akũ kĩ batsua obisɛ̃ a lɛkpati a, bite ye dĩ kĩ Yesu ndɛ ayekĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a lɛ eyi fɔmɔ bɛyatsãmɔ ye kɔma a.
42002022	Lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ Yosef mɔ Maria bɛkɛna akũ kakpalɛ yedede amaniɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Mose mbla tsa a. Foesũ bɛkɔa waawa a bɛnamɛna Yerusalem kĩ banaakɔa ye bido nɛ boe Ɔlate awɛ,
42002023	ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ bido nɛ boe Ɔlate mbla ovoli a kamɛ kĩ, “Obinyole ɔtɔnyade odi nyɛ odi ni kɛnɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ ye biyi bɛkpa boe Ɔlate.”
42002024	Ade bɛnaa bɛnakɛna afɔlibɔ fɔtsa a nɛ boe Ɔlate mbla a onukpɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa mblɔduma nviã ĩye fɔblɔblɔm nviã bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa ye.
42002025	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simeon dzi nɛ Yerusalem. Ɛnyɛ oti wĩ kĩ yavila Baguma ade edzi ɛkadã osi kakpa Israel katɛ a. Hũhũ Kpalɛwa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ,
42002026	ade ɛnyɛ ɛtsa ye lɛmɛ kĩ ɛláaku kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛmɔ boe Ɔlate, Kristo a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a.
42002027	Ade ke Hũhũ a kpã Simeon ɛnamɛna Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a. Kĩ bamanɛ a kɔa waawa Yesu a bɛyamɛna kĩ bayaakɛna amaniɛ nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ a,
42002028	Simeon tɛ waawa a ɛlɛ nɛ awɛ, ade ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ,
42002029	“Boe Ɔlate, finyaa, ɔkɛna nɛ nɔ kalɛ onukpɛ̃ akũ, aapuli ɔnyɛ yĩ, nɔ ɔsumunɛ, osi nnaa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
42002030	Yĩ mɔawɛ banebi mɔ́ Ɔtɛnɛ a,
42002031	kĩ ɔkɔa ɔma bati flee a.
42002032	Ɛnyɛ ɔhaĩ a kĩ yaanyɛ nɔ fɔwɛtsa ɛtsa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ, ade yaanya obu fɔtsa ɛkpa nɔ bati Israelfɔ a.”
42002033	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Simeon lɛ nɛ obisɛ̃ a akũ kɛna Yosef mɔ Maria saa.
