42002034	Simeon hila be ade ebi Maria kĩ, “Baguma nyɛ obisɛ̃ kĩĩ kĩ fɔtsã ye akũ Israelfɔ pii bɛna katɛ ĩye kawɔ. Yaanya nsɛntsɛlɛni kĩ eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ade bati pii aayidza bɛdza nɛ ye akũ a.
42002035	Ade yaanyɛ bati kakɔna a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla a kanya a. Fɔtsɛ̃ fukĩĩ akũ sũ ni, aatɛ kalɔɛ ndɛ ayekĩ lɛpamɛ atsɔɛ nɔ du.”
42002036	-
42002037	Otsolenɔkɔɛ̃ odi kĩ ɛnya Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ na nɛ awã, ɛnyɛ okunawa kĩ bavɛ Hana. Ɔlɛga nyɛ Fanuel kĩ eto Aser kasinu kamɛ. Futeli evũkɔnɔ pɛ edzi kɔnyɔ fɔmɔ ɔnyɔ ku, ade finyaakĩĩ ɛtɛ futeli aduewɔtsi-ɛna. Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a ɛkana lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, ɛkasum Baguma lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa, ade ɛkasui onukpɛ̃, kabɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ a.
42002038	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ ye malo ɛyawo awã ade ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ obisɛ̃ a akũ ɛkpa bati flee a kĩ bidzi badã Baguma anɛ kĩ yaanyɛ Yerusalem a.
42002039	Kĩ Yosef mɔ Maria yua be amaniɛ kakɛna ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate mbla tsa a, bimuniki bɛnaa be ɔtɔ Nazaret nɛ Galilea tite akũ.
42002040	Obisɛ̃ a bo anɛ, ɛna akũ ɔsĩ, ade enyi kadi paa a. Baguma nhila lɛmɛ tomɔ ye.
42002041	Kateli nyɛ kateli, Yesu bamanɛ kanaa Yerusalem kanaanya luwi kĩ bavɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi.
42002042	Kĩ Yesu tɛ futeli ewua-nviã a, bibuki bɛnaa luwi a kanyakɔ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛkakɛna kɔkɔɛ a.
42002043	Kĩ luwi a kanya wũna a, bimuniki banaa ɔtɔ, lɛmɛ Yesu kɔ̃ kahɔ nɛ liti nɛ Yerusalem nɛ ye bamanɛ katanyi kamɛ.
42002044	Bibu kĩ ɛna nɛ bati kamɛ, foesũ bɛtsã luwi mɔa flee fɔmɔ bido ye kawɛ awɛ nɛ ye akũ bati mɔ bakɔba kamɛ.
42002045	Kĩ bɛtámɔ ye sũ ni, bimuniki bɛnaa Yerusalem bɛnɛ bɛtsɛ̃ bawɛ ye.
42002046	Nɛ luwi lɛlade a bɛnamɔ ye nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a kĩ ye mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi bidzi, ɛkatse be fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ, ade ɛkavia be fɔlɛtsa nɛ foe akũ a.
42002047	Be flee a kĩ binu ye fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kakpalɛ a, kɛna saa nɛ kadi kanyi baũ odu a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛkpa mbuayɛ a.
42002048	Kĩ ye bamanɛ mɔ ye a, akũ yɛla be, ade ɔma via ye kĩ, “Obi, litsa sũ ɔkɛna boe fukĩĩ odu? Bɔmɔ aga flee bɔkɔa kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ bɔtsã bɔwɛ nɔ.”
42002049	Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ mitsã miwɛ yĩ? Minyína kĩ yĩ Ɔlɛga awa kɛnɛ kĩ nna mbɔɛɛ?”
42002050	Lɛmɛ bɛtánu lɛtsa a kĩ de ebi be a kayɔ.
42002051	Yesu tomɔ be bɛdzakũ bɛnaa Nazaret, ade ɛdɔla ye akũ ɛkpa be a. Ɔma kɔa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee edo nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ dzununuunu.
42002052	Ade Yesu bo anɛ nɛ sukɛna mɔ kadikanyi kamɛ, ade Baguma mɔ bati flee mɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ ye akũ a.
42003001	Nɛ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare Tiberio lɛgãkanya kateli kawualode kamɛ a, Pontio Pilato nya abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Yudea tite akũ. Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Herodes lɛnya Galilea tite akũ, ade ɔwaɛ̃ Filipo nyá Iturea mɔ Trakoniti tite akũ a. Lisania nya Abilene tite akũ.
42003002	Hana mɔ Kayafa lɛmɛ nya Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ flefle a. Ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ lɛmɛ mɔ Baguma ɔlɛdo ya ɛkpa Yohanes kĩ ɛnyɛ Zakaria obi a kĩ ɛna nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a.
42003003	Foesũ Yohanes tsã emini nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ abuĩ mɔ ye fuyite a ɛkade lɛtsã kĩ, “Midani mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa mitɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ ayekĩ Baguma aakɔa mi tɔkpa ete mi.”
42003004	Ade aye bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya ovoli a kamɛ kĩ, “Oti odi tsɛ̃ yabɔa fɔwɔla nɛ kɔsa kamɛ kalɛ kĩ, ‘Milɔla osi mikpa boe Ɔlate kaya. Mikɛna osi kpĩĩ miyi ye.
42003005	Miyula fɔkɔ a kĩ fɔpɛlɛ pɛlɛ fuwo a, ade mibubuli tɔtɔ mɔ kɔtɔbii a flee fɔtɛɛ a. Miyo tisi balibaliwa a, ade mitɛɛtɛɛ fɔkɔ a kĩ fude fute a.
42003006	Katinya kamɛ bati flee aamɔ Ɔtɔnɛ a kĩ Baguma do a!’ ”
42003007	Bati kɔdabu kɔdabu pii ya nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ, ade ebi be kĩ, “Mi bati kĩ mila ndɛ bɔɛ kpa! Owei lɛkpa mi kɔdɛ kĩ míapuli milo nɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ Baguma aayamɛna a kamɛ?
42003008	Minyɛ mitsa nɛ mi fɔtsakɛlawa kamɛ bɛmɔ kĩ midani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ade mitakalɛ kĩ minyɛ Abraham babi mɔ bawa sũ ni, Baguma lɛláavɛlɛ mi sɔtɔ. Kitonɛkĩ mabi mi kĩ Baguma aapuli ɛkɔa boe kĩĩ ɛkɛna babi mɔ bawa ɛkpa Abraham.
42003009	Bike kasɔã kɔkɔɛ nɛ futse tɔbɔlɛ akũ kĩ baatsua. Kutse nyɛ kutse kĩ kɔáwũ babi wĩ ni, baakpeli koe bɛta bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ.”
42003010	Awã naa bati a via Yohanes kĩ, “Foesũ litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna?”
42003011	Ade ke ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ a kĩ odeĩ tɛtadiɛ tiwo te nviã ni, kɔa amɔa kakpa odi kĩ ɛlá adima. Ade ke nɔ a kĩ odeĩ funitsã ni sɛ̃ foe mɔ bikĩ bidzi kɔlɛ a.”
42003012	Tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ badi malo ya kĩ ɛwɔla be mui, ade bivia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna?”
42003013	Yohanes bi be kĩ, “Mitatɛ ɔgɔlɛ fɔba fukĩ abãã tsua eyi kĩ mitɛ a.”
42003014	Sodzafɔ badi lɛmɛ yavia ye kĩ, “Boe malo litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna?” Yohanes bi be kĩ “Mitakɔa kɔbɛ̃ mitɛ sika nɛ bati awɛ, ade mitatsua odima onukpɛ̃ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ minyina kĩ ɛtákɛna a akũ. Mifɔ̃ mi kɔtɔkase kuwo mi anɛ.”
42003015	Ayekĩ bati anɛ teĩ nɛ boe Ɔtɛnɛ a kaya mɔatsɛ akũ sũ ni, bɛkakɔna kĩ ɔsa Yohanes nyɛ oti a kĩ badzɔlɛ a.
42003016	Foesũ Yohanes bi be kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃ nkɔa mui mawɔla mi mui, lɛmɛ oti odi kĩ ɛbɛ̃ yĩ aya nɛ liti. Ntáfɛta kĩ manyɛ ye mpabua nɛ ye abɔa malo. Oti kĩĩ aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔ fi ɛwɔla mi mui.
42003017	Ɛnɛɛ ye kɔvɛla kĩ yaakɔa ɛwɛ ɛnyɛ ye babi wĩ a lɔkɔa efila be eko nɛ oli kamɛ. Lɛmɛ yaapila afafa a nɛ fi kĩ fɔlá kadi a kamɛ!”
42003018	Ade Yohanes tsã kɔdɛ tisi futefute pii akũ ede lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ kĩ bati bɛdani be kadzi kamɛ a.
42003019	Yohanes kã abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Herodes anɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛtɛ ɔwaɛ̃ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ bavɛ Herodia ɛkɔã, ade Herodes kɛna fɔtsa kpa bɛbã pii lɛmɛ a.
42003020	Ade ebuki ɛkɛna tɔkpa kĩ tɛbɛ̃ kɔlaa kĩ epi Yohanes edo nɛ abãã kɔla kamɛ a.
42003021	Kĩ Yohanes wɔla bati a flee mui eyua a, ɛwɔla Yesu lɛmɛ mui. Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu kabɔa mpaɛ a, odetɔ́ kamɛ binya,
42003022	ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ka ndɛ mblɔduma aye ɛyadzi nɛ ye akũ a. Awã naa odo odi to ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ yĩ obi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ. Kawɔlɛ ade yĩ nɛ nɔ akũ.”
42003023	Yesu tɛ ndɛ futeli taalɛ fɔmɔ eyi ye kanade adzuma kayɔ. Bati kɔna kĩ ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosef. Kĩ ye ɔlɛga nyɛ Eli,
42003024	Eli ɔlɛga nyɛ Mata. Mata ɔlɛga nyɛ Levi, Levi ɔlɛga nyɛ Melki. Melki ɔlɛga nyɛ Yanai, Yanai ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosef.
42003025	Yosef ɔlɛga nyɛ Matatia, Matatia ɔlɛga nyɛ Amos. Amos ɔlɛga nyɛ Nahum, Nahum ɔlɛga nyɛ Esli. Esli ɔlɛga nyɛ Nagae,
42003026	Nagae ɔlɛga nyɛ Mahat. Mahat ɔlɛga nyɛ Matatia, Matatia ɔlɛga nyɛ Semei. Semei ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosek, Yosek ɔlɛga nyɛ Yuda.
42003027	Yuda ɔlɛga nyɛ Yohanan, Yohanan ɔlɛga nyɛ Resa. Resa ɔlɛga nyɛ Zerubabel, Zerubabel ɔlɛga nyɛ Sealtiel. Sealtiel ɔlɛga nyɛ Neri,
42003028	Neri ɔlɛga nyɛ Melki. Melki ɔlɛga nyɛ Adi, Adi ɔlɛga nyɛ Kosam. Kosam ɔlɛga nyɛ Elmadam, Elmadam ɔlɛga nyɛ Er.
42003029	Er ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosua, Yosua ɔlɛga nyɛ Eliezer. Eliezer ɔlɛga nyɛ Yorim, Yorim ɔlɛga nyɛ Matat. Matat ɔlɛga nyɛ Levi,
42003030	Levi ɔlɛga nyɛ Simeon. Simeon ɔlɛga nyɛ Yuda, Yuda ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosef. Yosef ɔlɛga nyɛ Yonam, Yonam ɔlɛga nyɛ Eliakim.
42003031	Eliakim ɔlɛga nyɛ Melea, Melea ɔlɛga nyɛ Mena. Mena ɔlɛga nyɛ Matata, Matata ɔlɛga nyɛ Natan. Natan ɔlɛga nyɛ Dawid,
42003032	Dawid ɔlɛga nyɛ Isai. Isai ɔlɛga nyɛ Obed, Obed ɔlɛga nyɛ Boaz. Boaz ɔlɛga nyɛ Salmon, Salmon ɔlɛga nyɛ Nahason.
42003033	Nahason ɔlɛga nyɛ Aminadab, Aminadab ɔlɛga nyɛ Admin. Admin ɔlɛga nyɛ Arni, Arni ɔlɛga nyɛ Ezron. Ezron ɔlɛga nyɛ Perez, Perez ɔlɛga nyɛ Yuda.
42003034	Yuda ɔlɛga nyɛ Yakob, Yakob ɔlɛga nyɛ Isak. Isak ɔlɛga nyɛ Abraham, Abraham ɔlɛga nyɛ Tara. Tara ɔlɛga nyɛ Nahor,
42003035	Nahor ɔlɛga nyɛ Seruk. Seruk ɔlɛga nyɛ Regu, Regu ɔlɛga nyɛ Pelek. Pelek ɔlɛga nyɛ Eber, Eber ɔlɛga nyɛ Sala.
42003036	Sala ɔlɛga nyɛ Kainan, Kainan ɔlɛga nyɛ Arfaksad. Arfaksad ɔlɛga nyɛ Sem, Sem ɔlɛga nyɛ Noa. Noa ɔlɛga nyɛ Lamek,
42003037	Lamek ɔlɛga nyɛ Metusala. Metusala ɔlɛga nyɛ Henok, Henok ɔlɛga nyɛ Yared. Yared ɔlɛga nyɛ Mahaleel, Mahaleel ɔlɛga nyɛ Kainan.
42003038	Kainan ɔlɛga nyɛ Enok, Enok ɔlɛga nyɛ Set. Set ɔlɛga nyɛ Adam, ade Adam ɔlɛga nyɛ Baguma a.
42004001	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tɛ Yesu kamɛ flee ade ɛdzakũ nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ a abuĩ a. Hũhũ a kpã ye ɛnamɛna kɔsa kamɛ, awã kĩ bati lɛláa.
42004002	Ade awã mɔ Abonsam sɔ ye ɛdã fuwi tɛna flee a. Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ flee a, Yesu tánya lɛtsama foesũ kɔlɛ kakɔ ye mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
42004003	Ade ke Abonsam bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma obi anɛ ni, kekɔ̃ bi de kĩĩ lɛdani lɛkɛna abodoo.”
42004004	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Oowo! Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ nnɛ́ funitsã odi sũ oti adzi nkpã.”
42004005	Ke liti a, Abonsam kpã ye ɛnamɛna kakɔ kadi nɛ ode, ade nɛ sinepo mɔa kabɔa kamɛ ni, ɛnyɛ katinya kamɛ mɔ ke fɔgãtsa a flee ɛtsa Yesu.
42004006	Ebi Yesu kĩ, “Maakɔa katinya kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ mɔ ke kɔbɛ̃ mɔ anunyam flee nkpã nɔ, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔa foe flee bido nɛ yĩ awɛ, ade ke maapuli nkɔa foe nte owula a kĩ mawɛ a.
42004007	Foesũ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aanya nɔ fude ntɛ ɔkɛna akũ ɔkpa yĩ.”
42004008	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ Ɔlate Baguma odi kɛnɛ kĩ akɛna nɔ akũ ɔkpa lɔkɔa osum ye lɛmɛ.’ ”
42004009	Ke liti a, Abonsam kpã Yesu ɛnamɛna Yerusalem nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a ode flee, ade ebi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma obi anɛ ni, kekɔ̃ vɛnya kaka kanaadza nɛ tite.
42004010	Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma aakpa ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ɔlɛdo nɛ nɔ akũ,
42004011	kĩ baakaɛ nɔ nɛ be awɛ kamɛ, ayekĩ nɔ abɔa lɛláasãmɔ de.’ ”
42004012	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, ‘Tasɔ boe Ɔlate nɔ Baguma a ɔdã.’ ”
42004013	Kĩ Abonsam yua Yesu kasɔkadã nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ a, ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ ɛdzakũ tɔ̃ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ bɛbã kĩ yaana osi.
42004014	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tɛ Yesu kamɛ ade emuniki ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ a. Ye dĩ gba nɛ kamɛ kamɛ nɛ awã flee.
42004015	Ɛtsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade odi nyɛ odi mu ye fɔtsa katsa a.
42004016	Ke liti a, Yesu naa Nazaret awã kĩ bɛdɔla ye a. Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ kakɛna a. Eyidza ɛdza kĩ yakã Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa,
42004017	ade bɛkɔa Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya ovoli a bɛkpa ye a. Ebinya ovoli a nɛ awã kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ kĩ,
42004018	“Boe Ɔlate Hũhũ a tɛ yĩ kamɛ flee, kitonɛkĩ ɛpau yĩ, kĩ nlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a ntsa ahiãfɔ. Ade edo yĩ kĩ nde lɛtsã kĩ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ awɔba kamɛ aana be akũ akũ kadzi, kĩ banɛkunɛ aamɔ fɔkɔ, bikĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔhau mɔ lubo kamɔ kamɛ a, aana kawɛya.
42004019	Ade nkpa kanyi kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aamɔ ye bati kɔnya a wo ɔtɔ.”
42004020	Yesu sua ovoli a emunikimɔ ye ɛkpa fɔtsa akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a, ade ɛkɛna akũ edzi a. Bati a flee ke anɛ nɛ ye akũ, bɛkadã ye kɛnanaana.
42004021	Ade ebi be kĩ, “Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a kĩ minu kĩ nkã kĩĩ a, ya nɛ foe kamɛ nviã kĩĩ nɛ mi mɔawɛ anɛ kamɛ.”
42004022	Bati a flee kĩ bɛna nɛ awã a mu ye paa mɔ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ, ade ye kɔnyakamɔ fɔlɛtsa a kɛna be saa lɛmɛ a. Ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Yosef obi a nɛ awĩ a?”
42004023	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nti ĩnyina kĩ míabɔa yĩ lɛgbã kĩĩ kĩ, ‘Ɔwanɛ tsa nɔ akũ,’ ade míabi yĩ lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Fɔtsa a kĩ bunu kĩ ɔkɛna nɛ Kapernaum a ni, kɛna foe odu nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ lɛmɛ.’ ”
42004024	Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ odima látɛ dĩ wĩ nɛ ye mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ.
42004025	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ bakunawa pii na nɛ Israel tite akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Eliya dzi nkpã a, kĩ oni fɔ̃ kako futeli ɛlalɛ mɔ sɛkɛ, ade kɔlɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ya nɛ tite a na akũ a.
42004026	Lɛmɛ Baguma tádo Eliya nɛ Israelfɔ bakunawa a kamɛ odima sɛkɛ̃. Mbom okunawa odi kĩ ɛna nɛ Zarepta ɔmatɔ kĩ edeĩ nɛ Sidon tite akũ a sɛkɛ̃ edo ye.
42004027	Bati pii lɛmɛ kasɔ fɔsɔ ngbã nɛ Israel, nɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Elisa lɔkɔ, lɛmɛ bɛtátsa be kamɛ odima, kɛba Naeman kĩ eto Siria tite akũ.”
42004028	Kĩ bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a nu fukĩĩ a bɛna kalɔkpa paa.
42004029	Ade ke bɛta biyidza bipi Yesu bɛvɛlɛ, bidu ye bɛnɛmɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a. Bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna ɔtɔ a kĩ ye akũ bitsua ɔmatɔ a kalete nɛ kakɔ pɛlɛpɛlɛ a, mɔ kakɔna kĩ badu ye ɛnaatɔ nɛ kayɔ,
42004030	lɛmɛ Yesu tsã bati a kayite ɛdzakũ.
42004031	Ke liti a, Yesu dzakũ ɛnaa Kapernaum ɔmatɔ kamɛ nɛ Galilea tite akũ, ade ɛkatsa bati fɔtsa nɛ Kawɛya Fuwi akũ a.
42004032	Ye fɔtsa katsa kɛna bati a saa, kitonɛkĩ kɔbɛ̃ na nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ.
42004033	Luwi a, odi kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ ye kamɛ na nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ,
42004034	“Ao! Yesu Nazaretni, litsa akamɔ boe? Ɔya kĩ ayaawɔla boe mbɔɛɛ? Ĩnyina owula a kĩ ye anɛ. Nɔ nyɛ Baguma Oti Kpalɛwa Kĩ Bido a!”
42004035	Awã naa, Yesu do hũhũ a onukpɛ̃ kĩ, “Tse kɔdzɛla kanɛ nɛ oti a kamɛ!” Hũhũ a bɔɛ oti a emuni nɛ tite nɛ bati a anɛ kamɛ na, ɛnɛ nɛ ye kamɛ, ade lɛtsama tákɛna ye a.
42004036	Fɔtsa a kɛna bati a flee wãwã ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa odu nɛ awĩ a? Oti kĩĩ deĩ otumi mɔ kɔbɛ̃ yawũni nɛ hũhũ kpa akũ ade batse a.”
42004037	Yesu akũ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ kayite a na flee.
42004038	Yesu to Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɛnaa Simon awã. Lɔkɔ a na Simon nyina waa yasɔ atilili mɔ ɔsĩ, foesũ bɛkpa Yesu kanyi kĩ ɛyaadã ye.
42004039	Ade ke Yesu nadza nɛ ye mpa ɔwɛ̃, ewũni nɛ fɔsɔ a akũ, ade fɔnɛ nɛ ye kamɛ eyidza mɔatsɛ ɛkɛna fɔdɛtsa ɛkpa be a.
42004040	Kĩ fɔkɔ ka a, bati kpã be bakɔba a kĩ basɔ fɔsɔ kumɛkumɛ a bɛma Yesu. Ete awɛ nɛ be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi akũ ɛtsa be flee.
42004041	Hũhũ kpa nɛ́ nɛ bati pii kamɛ mɔ fɔwɔla kabɔa kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Baguma obi a!” Lɛmɛ Yesu bɔa hũhũ kpa a onukpɛ̃ ade ɛtákpa be osi kĩ bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo a.
42004042	Odenyinawi a, Yesu dzakũ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛnaa kakɔ dĩĩ kadi, ade bati a do ye kawɛ awɛ a. Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a bike ye aduli kĩ ɛtadzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃.
42004043	Lɛmɛ ebi be kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ nnaalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ a nɛ tɛmatɔ bɛbã lɛmɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade foe Baguma do yĩ kĩ ĩyaakɛna a.”
42004044	Foesũ ɛkalɛ Baguma kalɛ a nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a nɛ tite a na akũ flee.
42005001	Luwi a, kĩ Yesu dza nɛ Genezaret ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ a, bati kapili kĩ bafuã ye bitse Baguma fɔlɛtsa a.
42005002	Yesu mɔ́ tɔkɔlɔ nviã nɛ lutubu a abuĩ ade kɔfɔabi banyɛnɛ a nɛ́ bɛlamɛna be tɛsau kavɔlɛ a.
42005003	Yesu wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kĩ ɛnya Simon ode a kamɛ ebi ye kĩ edu ɔkɔlɔ a ɛnamɛna mui anɛ sukuloo. Ɛkɛna akũ edzi nɛ ye kamɛ ɛtsa bati a fɔtsa.
42005004	Kĩ Yesu tsa fɔtsa eyua a, ebi Simon kĩ, “Ta ɔkɔlɔ a kanamɛna awã kĩ kidzũ, lɔkɔa mimɔ nɔ babumɛnanɛ mita mi tɛsau minyɛ kɔfɔabi.”
42005005	Ade Simon kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, bɔkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kadzɔ lɛnyɛ flee lɛmɛ bɔtána lɛtsama. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔlɛ lɔmɔ ni maafɔ̃ bɔta tɛsau a.”
42005006	Kĩ bɛta tɛsau a bɛnyɛ kɔfɔabi beblebee kĩ fɔfɔ̃ be tɛsau a do kakpeli awɛ.
42005007	Foesũ bɛbɔa awɛ bɛvɛ be bakɔba nɛ ɔkɔlɔ ɔyade a kamɛ kĩ bɛyaabumɔ be. Bɛya bɛyanyɛ kɔfɔabi biyula tɔkɔlɔ nviã a tiyi limii kĩ tido kayɛla awɛ.
42005008	Kĩ Simon Petro mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, eke aduli nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ ebi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɛ liti nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ manɛ.”
42005009	Simon mɔ ye bade a kɛna saa nɛ kɔfɔabi beblebee a kĩ bɛnyɛ a sũ.
42005010	Ade ayea fɔkɛna ye adzuma bakɔba Yakobo mɔ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi a lɛmɛ wãwã a. Ade Yesu bi Simon kĩ, “Tavila. Kito finyaakĩĩ kanaa ni, bati aakanyɛ.”
42005011	Ke liti a, bɛta be tɔkɔlɔ bɛnadzɛla nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ, bɛfɔnɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa awɛ biyi ade bitomɔ Yesu nɛ liti a.
42005012	Lɔkɔ lidi, Yesu na nɛ ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ awã kĩ onyole odi kĩ ɛkasɔ fɔsɔ ngbã na. Kĩ onyole kĩĩ mɔ́ Yesu a, ɛnatɔ nɛ ye abɔa kamɛ eke ye aduli kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ fɔnyɛ nɔ kawɛ ni, aapuli ɔfɔ̃ fɔsɔ kĩĩ lɛwɔ nɛ yĩ akũ.”
42005013	Yesu yo awɛ ɛta ye ade ebi ye kĩ, “Mawɛ lɔmɔ. Nɔ akũ ɛkpalɛ.” Deedimɔapɛ fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ ye akũ.
42005014	Ade Yesu si ye mbla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Tabi odima kadima mbom naa tĩĩ kanaakɔa nɔ akũ katsa ɔsɔfɔ, kafɔ̃ ɛsɛla nɔ akũ ɛdã, lɔkɔa edi adansiɛ ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi kĩ nuwĩnuwĩ fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ nɔ akũ. Kpa afɔlibɔ fɔtsa a kĩ Mose mbla tsa a lɛmɛ.”
42005015	Lɛmɛ Yesu akũ fɔlɛtsa gba fɔnaa mɔ lugo, ade bati pii kaya kĩ bayaatse ye fɔtsa katsa, bɛna fɔsɔ katsa lɛmɛ a.
42005016	Lɛmɛ fɔkɔ fudi Yesu adzakũ kanaa kakɔ kĩ kɛkɛna dĩĩ kanaabɔa mpaɛ.
42005017	Luwi a, kĩ Yesu katsa fɔtsa a, Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kĩ bito tɛmatɔ kumɛkumɛ nɛ Galilea mɔ Yudea tite akũ, mɔ Yerusalem na nɛ awã. Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a na nɛ Yesu kamɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ɛtsa fɔsɔ.
42005018	Ade bati badi lɔ oti odi kĩ eveliveli nɛ ɔkɛna akũ bɛyamɛna a. Bɛbɔa mbɔdi bɛwɛ osi kĩ batsã biwo nɛ kɔla a kamɛ bɛkɔa oti a biyi nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ.
42005019	Lɛmɛ nɛ bati lidede sũ ni, bɛtána osi biwomɔ ye. Foesũ bɛbɔɛ oti a bide nɛ lɛtsã. Ade bitinya fɔkpã bɛnyɛ ɔkɛ bɛkamɛna ɔsɔnɛ a mɔ ye ɔkɛna biyi nɛ Yesu mɔ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ a.
42005020	Kĩ Yesu mɔ be katɛkado a, ebi onyole a kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃, bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ!”
42005021	Ade Farisifɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a do akũ kavia awɛ kĩ, “Owei nyɛ oti kĩĩ kĩ yalɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Baguma akũ? Baguma odi keĩ aapuli ɛkɔa titikpa ete!”
42005022	Yesu nyi be kakɔna, foesũ evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ miakɔna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ odu?
42005023	Fɔɔdabe kalɛ deĩ ɔsĩ fɔbɛ̃, ‘Bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ’ mbɔɛɛ kĩ, ‘Yidza kadza, katsã’?
42005024	Lɛmɛ kĩ míamɔ miyi ɔsũ kĩ yĩ a kĩ ĩnyɛ Otidziwa Obi a ndeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ makɔa bati titikpa kate nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ sũ ni, midã o-o!” Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ɛdani ebi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ, “Mabi nɔ kĩ yidza kabɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna kanaa kɔla!”
42005025	Lɛtalɛta onyole kĩĩ ta eyidza nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ, ɛbɔɛ ye ɔkɛna a kĩ ye akũ ɛwa a, ɛnaa kɔla mɔ Baguma kamu.
42005026	Fukĩĩ kɛna bati a flee wãwã. Akũ nyɛnɛ be flee, ade bimu Baguma, bɛkalɛ kĩ, “Litsa awãwã fɔtsa bɔmɔ́ nviã kĩĩ a!”
42005027	Ke liti a, kĩ Yesu anɛ nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ a, ɛmɔ́ ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Levi edzi nɛ ye adzumamu. Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.”
42005028	Levi yidza ɛfɔnɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa eyi ade etomɔ ye a.
42005029	Owi tábuna mɔ Levi te opunu kpale ɛkpa Yesu nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ. Tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ pii mɔ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ na nɛ awã.
42005030	Farisifɔ mɔ be bakɔba Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a badi kɛna hũhũhũhũ bivia Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nde sũ mianya kamɔa mɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ?”
42005031	Ade ke Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Basɔnɛ lisĩ bɛkpa tutsonu ɔkɛnanɛ, nnɛ́ bikĩ bideĩ akũ ɔsĩ.
42005032	Ntáya kĩ mayaavɛ bati kĩ bidzi kpĩĩ, mbom ĩya kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.”
42005033	Bati badi bi Yesu kĩ, “Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a awɛ onukpɛ̃ kasui mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ kabɔa mpaɛ ade ayea Farisifɔ bade a lɛmɛ akɛna a. Nde sũ nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ anya, kamɔa?”
42005034	Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Miakɔna kĩ bati a kĩ bɛvɛ nɛ obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ a adzi kɔlɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a deĩ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ!
42005035	Lɛmɛ luwi aaya kĩ baakpã obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a nɛ be sɛkɛ̃. Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, baasui onukpɛ̃.”
42005036	Yesu buki ɛbɔa be lɛgbã kĩ, “Odima lábɛ̃ lima vɔɛ̃ kakɔa katalɛ lima kɔɛ ɔkɛ. Ntɛ ɛkɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, yaabɛ̃ lima vɔɛ̃ a, lɛmɛ lɔvɔɛ̃ mɔ lɔkɔɛ a lɛláaketimɔ akũ.
42005037	Ade ayea baáko waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ kɔɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ waĩ vɔɛ̃ a aafɔ̃ kuvũ a lɛbɛ̃ lɔkɔa waĩ a lɛmɛ aawula.
42005038	Nɛ foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ biko waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ vɔɛ̃ kamɛ.
42005039	Finyaa, ntɛ odi mɔa waĩ kɔɛ ni, ɛláawɛ kĩ yamɔa bavɔɛ̃. Lɛtsa a kĩ yaalɛ nyɛ kĩ, ‘Waĩ kɔɛ a nɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃.’ ”
42006001	Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi mɔa lidi akũ ni, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ tsã fugbanɔ kɔba kudi kayite batɛ̃. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ve fudi bɛtsɛ̃ foe bɛkaba.
42006002	Ade ke Farisifɔ a badi via be kĩ, “Nde sũ miakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ boe mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ?”
42006003	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mitákã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ, mimɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ Lɛgã Dawid kɛna nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ kɔlɛ kakɔ bɛmɔ ye bade a?
42006004	Lɛgã Dawid nawo nɛ Baguma kɔla kamɛ ɛbɔɛ abodoo a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma a ɛnya, ade ɛkɔa adi ɛkpa ye bakɔba a lɛmɛ bɛnya a. Fɔnyɛ boe mbla kĩ odima lɛlá osi kĩ yanya foe, mbɔɛntɛ basɔfɔ odi keĩ.”
42006005	Yesu wũna kĩ, “Otidziwa Obi a nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi a Ɔlate.”
42006006	Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi bɛbã akũ ni, Yesu naa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɛnaatsa fɔtsa. Onyole odi kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku na nɛ awã.
42006007	Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ badi kawɛ osi a kĩ ye akũ baatsã bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa bite nɛ Yesu akũ. Foesũ biko anɛ bɛdã flee ntɛ yaatsa fɔsɔ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.
42006008	Lɛmɛ Yesu nyi be kakɔna ade ebi onyole a kĩ, “Yidza kayaadza nɛ bati anɛ kamɛ nɛ awĩ.” Onyole a nɛ ɛyadza nɛ awã.
42006009	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mavia mi ntse ni, litsa boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ? Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɛna tuwĩ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa? Fɔnyɛ luwi kĩ de akũ bɛtɛ oti nkpã, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ eku?”
42006010	Yesu dã be flee ɛtɛ̃mɛna ade ebi onyole a kĩ, “Yo awɛ.” Eyo awɛ ade ye awɛ a lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ a.
42006011	Yudafɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a na kalɔkpa mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade bɛkapi adzuni nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ baakɛna ye akũ a.
42006012	Luwi a Yesu de ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ kĩ yanaabɔa mpaɛ, ade ɛbɔa mpaɛ lɛnyɛ flee ɛkpa Baguma a.
42006013	Kĩ kade nyina a, ɛvɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee ɛkpɔta ade ɛnyɛ be kamɛ bati ewua-nviã ɛvɛ be kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
42006014	Ade be nyɛ Simon kĩ ete dĩ kĩ Petro mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Andrea, Yakobo mɔ Yohanes, Filipo mɔ Bartolomeo.
42006015	Babɛbã nyɛ Mateo mɔ Toma, Yakobo kĩ ɛnyɛ Alfeo obi mɔ Simon a kĩ epili ye kade lɔlɔ.
42006016	Be nkaɛ nyɛ Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ Yakobo obi mɔ Yuda Iskariot kĩ ye lɛyatsa Yesu liti osi.
42006017	Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ka bito ɔtɔ akũ a, bɛyadza nɛ kakɔ tɛɛwa kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ pii mɔ bati kɔdabu baũ kudi na. Bati pii to Yudea tite akũ, Yerusalem ɔmatɔ mɔ tɛmatɔ a kĩ tɛwaa nɛ Tiro mɔ Sidon mpo abuĩ a kamɛ bɛya.
42006018	Bɛya kĩ bayaatse Yesu fɔtsa katsa bɛna fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ katsa. Bikĩ hũhũ kpa kaha be a lɛmɛ ya ade ɛtsa be a.
42006019	Bati a flee kabɔa mbɔdi kĩ bata Yesu kitonɛkĩ kɔbɛ̃ kudi kanɛ kato ye kamɛ katsa be flee.
42006020	Yesu dzɛla anɛ ɛdã ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ade ebi be kĩ, “Baguma aahila mi a kĩ minyɛ ahiãfɔ a, kitonɛkĩ mi kade nyɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a
42006021	Baguma aahila mi a kĩ kɔlɛ akɔ mi finyaakĩĩ a, kitonɛkĩ míawĩ! Baguma aahila mi a kĩ miabe finyaa a, kitonɛkĩ miaya kamɛmɛ kɔ̃!
42006022	Baguma aahila mi ntɛ bati akesĩ mi, bisĩ mi, bavũna mi, ĩye balɛ kĩ minyɛ bati kpa nɛ Otidziwa Obi a sũ!
42006023	“Mimɔ kawɔlɛ, ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ a, mito, mimɔ kawɔlɛ kitonɛkĩ mideĩ kɔtɔkase kpale nɛ ode. Mite anɛ lɛmɛ kĩ ade fukĩĩ odu be bawanyɔ kɛna Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a.
42006024	Lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa mi a kĩ mideĩ akũ a, kitonɛkĩ mimɔ́ mi kawɔlɛ kɔkɔɛ nɛ awĩ!
42006025	Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi a kĩ miwĩ finyaakĩĩ a, kitonɛkĩ kɔlɛ aakɔ mi! Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi a kĩ miamɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ a, kitonɛkĩ míawo ɔblɔ, mibe.
42006026	Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi ntɛ bati flee abɔa mi buĩ wĩ, kitonɛkĩ ade aye be bawanyɔ mu fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a.
42006027	“Lɛmɛ mabi mi a kĩ miatse yĩ kalɛ a kĩ miwɛ mi bakesĩnɛ kalɛ, mikɛna tuwĩ mikpa be.
42006028	Mikpa bikĩ badumu mi a nhila. Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa bikĩ bakɛna mi tɛnya a.
42006029	Ntɛ odi balɛ nɔ awɛ nɛ ɔlɔtɔ mɔa ni, fɔ̃ ɛbalɛ nɔ nɛ ɔyade a lɛmɛ. Ntɛ odi tɛ nɔ atadiɛ wulaa ni kɔa nɔ atadiɛ anyanglede a lɛmɛ kakpa ye.
42006030	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaawã nɔ fɔtsa ni, kpa ye, ade ntɛ odi bɔɛ nɔ litsedi ni, tabuki ɔlɛ kĩ atɛ foe.
42006031	Lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ kĩ bati bɛbã bɛkɛna bɛkpa mi ni, mikɛna foe lɔmɔ mikpa be.
42006032	“Ntɛ miawɛ bati a kĩ bawɛ mi kalɛ odi ni, nde sũ kɛnɛ kĩ bihila mi? Tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ malo awɛ bikĩ bawɛ be kalɛ a.
42006033	Ade ntɛ bati a kĩ bakɛna mi sɛmɛ kalɛ odi mɔ miakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ kakpa a ni, nde sũ kɛnɛ kĩ bihila mi? Tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ malo akɛna lɔmɔ.
42006034	Ade ntɛ bikĩ baapuli bise mi kɔtɔ odi mɔ miakpa tɛvɛ ni, nde sũ kɛnɛ kĩ bihila mi? Tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ malo akpa be akũ tɛvɛ, nɛ ayekĩ baase foe flee bɛkpa be sũ!
42006035	Oowo! Miwɛ mi bakesĩnɛ kalɛ mikɛna be tuwĩ. Mikpa be tɛvɛ lɛmɛ mitate anɛ kĩ baase bɛkpa mi. Ntɛ mikɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, míana kɔtɔkase kpale lɔkɔa míanya Baguma Kpale Nɛ Ode a babi. Kitonɛkĩ Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa bikĩ baáyi bati ayɛ mɔ bati kpa malo.
42006036	Mimɔ bati kɔnya ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma amɔ kɔnya.
42006037	“Mitadzɛmɔ bati bɛbã ayekĩ Baguma lɛmɛ lɛláadzɛmɔ mi. Mitakɔ bati bɛbã kɔtɔ lɔkɔa Baguma lɛmɛ lɛláakɔ mi kɔtɔ. Mikɔa bati tɔkpa mite be, lɔkɔa Baguma lɛmɛ aakɔa ete mi.
42006038	Mikpa bati fɔtsa lɔkɔa Baguma lɛmɛ aakpa mi. Nuwĩnuwĩ Baguma aakɔna, edo ɛmɛnana fuyi tsɔnɔnɔɔnɔ fuwula nɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ onukpɛ̃. Fɔtsa kakɔna odu a kĩ mikɔa mikɔna mikpa bati bɛbã a, ade foe odu Baguma lɛmɛ aakɔa ɛkɔna ɛkpa mi a.”
42006039	Ade Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã kĩ, “Ɔnɛkunɛ lɛláapuli ɛkpã ɔkɔba ɔnɛkunɛ. Ntɛ ɛkɛna foe ni be nviã a flee baatɔ lɛkɛ.
42006040	Fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ lɛbɛ́ ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa eyua ni, yaana ndɛ ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ aye.
42006041	“Nde sũ adã sukuluku kĩ sideĩ nɛ awaɛ̃ linebi kamɛ lɛmɛ ɔtsɛ́la luvokũ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ linebi kamɛ a?
42006042	Nde aapuli obi awaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘Make nɔ aduli, fɔ̃ ĩnyɛ sukuluku nɛ nɔ linebi kamɛ’ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ luvokũ deĩ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ linebi kamɛ a? Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa ɔkɛnanɛ anɛ! Nya lɔtɔ kanyɛ luvokũ a nɛ nɔ linebi kamɛ lɔkɔa aapuli ɔmɔ́ yededeede ɔnyɛ sukuluku nɛ awaɛ̃ linebi kamɛ.
42006043	“Kutse wĩ láwũ babi kpa, ade kutse kĩ kɔnɛ́nɛ lɛmɛ láwũ babi wĩ a.
42006044	Babi a kĩ kutse nyɛ kutse awũ a bakɔa kamɔ koe kayi ɔsũ. Baána figi babi nɛ fu kutse kamɛ ade baána akutu nɛ ɔgɔabi akũ a.
42006045	Oti wĩ anyɛ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a kanya, ade aye oti kpa lɛmɛ anyɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a kanya a. Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ lideĩ nɛ oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a, ade de anɛ nɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a.
42006046	“Nde sũ miavɛ yĩ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, boe Ɔlate’ lɛmɛ miákɛna nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ matsa mi a akũ?
42006047	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ katse yĩ fɔlɛtsa, kakɛna nɛ foe akũ ni, maatsa mi oti a odu kĩ yanɛ.
42006048	Ɛla ndɛ oti kĩ ntɛ eyi kɔla kake kayɔ etu ɔkã dzununuunu eke litekũ lɛyɔde nɛ boe akũ. Ntɛ ɔwɔ yili mɔ mui yalɔmɔ kɔla a ni, lɛtsama lɛláakɛna kɔla a, kitonɛkĩ bike koe kake wĩ.
42006049	Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaátse yĩ fɔlɛtsa, ade yaákɛna nɛ foe akũ lɛmɛ ni, ɛla ndɛ oti kĩ eke kɔla kĩ koe kayɔ litekũ a lɛla ɔsĩ. Ntɛ ɔwɔ yili ɛyalɔmɔ kɔla a na ni, kɔ́aveli kɔtɔ gbloo!”
42007001	Kĩ Yesu bi bati fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee eyua a, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Kapernaum.
42007002	Awã naa, Romafɔ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi nɛ awã na ɔsumunɛ kĩ yaátunɔ kalɛ. Ɔsumunɛ kĩĩ kasɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ewo wuda onukpɛ̃.
42007003	Kĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ nu Yesu nkã a, edo Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ badi kĩ bɛnaabi ye ɛyaatsa ye ɔsumunɛ a.
42007004	Bɛya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade bike ye aduli mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ fɛta ɛkpa nɔ kabumɛna paa,
42007005	kitonɛkĩ yawɛ boe kade bati kalɛ, ade ye like boe katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɛkpa boe a.”
42007006	Nɛ foe sũ Yesu tomɔ be ɛnaa. Ki kite sukuloo kĩ Yesu awo nɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a do ye bakɔba kĩ bibi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tabuki ɔha nɔ akũ. Ntákpɔla nkpa kĩ awo nɛ yĩ tɔtɔ kamɛ,
42007007	ade ke ntákpɔla lɛmɛ kĩ maya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ a. Foesũ lɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ lɔkɔa yĩ ɔsumunɛ a aasaɛ.
42007008	Yĩ malo ĩnyɛ oti kĩ ndeĩ nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛbɛ̃ yĩ lɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kayɔ, ade ndeĩ sodzafɔ nɛ yĩ kayɔ a. Ntɛ mbi odi kĩ, ‘Naa ni’ yanaa, ntɛ mbi ɔbɛbã kĩ, ‘Ya ni’ yaya, ade ntɛ mbi yĩ ɔsate lɛmɛ kĩ ‘Kɛna fukĩĩ ni’ yakɛna foe.”
42007009	Kĩ Yesu nu fukĩĩ a fɔkɛna ye saa. Ɛdani ebi bati kɔdabu a kĩ bitomɔ ye a kĩ, “Mabi mi kĩ ntámɔ tɔ̃ katɛkado kĩĩ odu nɛ Israelfɔ malo kamɛ da!”
42007010	Batɔ a kĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a do a muniki bɛnaa tɔtɔ a kamɛ, ade bɛnamɔ kĩ ɔsumunɛ a saɛ a.
42007011	Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ bati pii naa Nain ɔmatɔ kamɛ.
42007012	Kĩ ewo nɛ ɔmatɔ a koletia a, ɛtsɛlamɔ bati kɔdza kĩ bɛnɔnɛ ɔnɔkpa banaabila. Ɔnɔkpa a nyɛ otsole odi kĩ ɛnyɛ okunawa obinyole mɔapɛ, ade ke ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bati pii lɛmɛ tomɔ okunawa a.
42007013	Kĩ boe Ɔlate mɔ́ otsole a, ye fɔlɛtsa kɔ ye kɔnya ade ke ebi ye kĩ, “Fɔ̃ kabe.”
42007014	Awã naa Yesu fuã ɛnata ɔnɔkpa apaka a ade bikĩ bɛnɔnɛ ye a fɔ̃ bɛdza a. Ade Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Opopo! Mabi nɔ kĩ yidza!”
42007015	Ɔnɔkpa a yidza edzi edo kɔdzɛla kalɛ awɛ, ade Yesu kɔa ye edo nɛ ɔma awɛ a.
42007016	Libe wo bati a flee ade bimu Baguma bɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ kpale odi nɛ́ ɛta nɛ boe kamɛ! Baguma ka ɛya kĩ yayaanyɛ ye bati!”
42007017	Yesu akũ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ Yudea tite mɔ fɔkɔ a kĩ fufuã a flee kamɛ.
42007018	Kĩ Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye fɔtsa kĩ Yesu lamɛna kakɛna flee a, ɛvɛ be kamɛ bati nviã,
42007019	ade edo be nɛ boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bɛnaavia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ oti a kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ yaaya a, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔdã oti bɛbã anɛ?”
42007020	Kĩ biwo Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a bibi ye kĩ, “Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a do boe kĩ bɔyaavia nɔ kĩ, ‘Nɔ nyɛ oti a kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ yaaya mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔdã oti bɛbã anɛ?’ ”
42007021	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ a, Yesu tsa bati beblebee fɔsɔ, ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa etomɛna bati kamɛ ade ɛfɔ̃ banɛkunɛ pii lɛmɛ mɔ́ fɔkɔ a.
42007022	Ade ɛkpa Yohanes batɔ a mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mimuniki minaabi Yohanes lɛtsa a kĩ mimɔ́ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ minu a, banɛkunɛ mɔ́ fɔkɔ, bikĩ biveliveli yidza bɛtsɛ̃, bikĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ngbã akũ kpalɛ, batɔsĩnɛ anu fɔkɔ, bɛdzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã, ade bɛlamɛna ahiãfɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kabi a.
42007023	Baguma hila oti a kĩ ɛtamɔ́ nfumusu adima nɛ yĩ akũ.”
42007024	Kĩ Yohanes batɔ a dzakũ a, Yesu yi kayɔ mɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ Yohanes akũ kabi bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Kĩ minaa Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a, litsa mikɔna kĩ míamɔ? Mimɔ́ ye ndɛ kɔkaɛ sɔɔta kĩ ɔwɛ abɔa katomɛna katɛ̃mɛna?
42007025	Litsa koũ minɛ minaadã? Oti kĩ ɛkɛɛlɛ ye akũ mɔ fɔtsa mɔ kalɛ yanɛ? Bikĩ bɛkɛɛlɛ be akũ mɔ fɔtsa mɔkalɛ bidzi nɛ ɔmɛnɛ kamɛ ni, fɔgã tɔtɔ kamɛ bamɔ be.
42007026	Mibi yĩ lɛtsa a koũ sũ miti mina a? Kĩ míamɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ mbɔɛɛ? Mifɔ̃ nti mbi mi kĩ mimɔ́ oti kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ kɔlaa.
42007027	Ade Yohanes akũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Maado yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɛnya nɔ lɔtɔ, ɛyaalɔla osi eyi ɛkpa nɔ.’ ”
42007028	Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Yohanes bɛ̃ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi tɔ̃ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ bɛ̃ Yohanes.”
42007029	Fɔmɔ fukĩĩ aayanɛ a, bati a flee nu Yohanes fɔlɛtsa a, bɛmɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ a titiliwu nyɛ bikĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ, ade bɛfɔ̃ Yohanes kɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ a.
42007030	Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a sĩ Baguma nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi ɛkpa be a, ade bɛtátunɔ kĩ Yohanes ɛwɔla be mui a.
42007031	Yesu lɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ litsa maakɔa nviã babi nkɔna mɔ?
42007032	Bɛla ndɛ babisɛ̃ kĩ bikoni nɛ kɔya bagulo. Babɔa fɔwɔla kabi bakɔba kĩ, ‘Bɔsã obolitsɔ̃ kapi tɔnɔ bɔkpa mi, lɛmɛ mitáto! Bɔsã tukutɔnɔ bɔkpa mi, lɛmɛ mitábe.’
42007033	Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a ya, ɛkasui onukpɛ̃, ɛtámɔa waĩ, lɛmɛ milɛ kĩ, ‘Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ!’
42007034	Otidziwa Obi a lɛmɛ ya, ɛnya, ɛmɔa lɛmɛ, ade mialɛ kĩ, ‘Midã ɔnyakpanɛ mɔ bavɛ ɔmɔanɛ kĩĩ! Ɛnyɛ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ ɔkɔba!’
42007035	Lɛmɛ bati flee a kĩ bɛtɛ Baguma kadikanyi ni, be fɔkɛlatsa atsa kĩ fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa.”
42007036	Farisini odi vɛ Yesu kĩ ɛyaanya nɛ ye awã. Yesu tunɔ ɛnaa ɛnadzi bɛkanya.
42007037	Otsole odi kĩ ɛtábɔa ɔbla wĩ na nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Kĩ enu kĩ Yesu na nɛ Farisini a tɔtɔ kamɛ ɛkanya a, ɛbɔɛ tumpã mɔkalɛ mɔ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔlɛ̃ ɛyamɛna nɛ awã.
42007038	Ɛdza nɛ Yesu liti nɛ ye abɔa ɔwɛ̃ ade ɛkabe kako nɛ ye fɔnɛta akũ a. Otsole kĩĩ kɔa ye lɔlɔ tɔlɔ ɛyɔ babe a nɛ Yesu fɔnɛta, ade efifi foe akũ, ɛkɔa kugua a lɛmɛ eko nɛ foe akũ a.
42007039	Kĩ Farisini a mɔ fukĩĩ a, ɛlɛ nɛ ye lɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ obi kĩĩ mɔ nuwĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ yanɛ ni, kufɛ yaanyi kĩ otsole a odu kĩ ɛlamɛna ye katalɛ a nyɛ titikpa ɔkɛnanɛ!”
42007040	Ade Yesu bi Farisini a kĩ, “Simon, ndeĩ kalɛ kĩ mabi nɔ.” Simon kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bi yĩ lɛtsa a.”
42007041	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Banyole nviã badi dzimɔ sika ɔvɛ ɔkpanɛ odi kɔtɔ. Ɔmɔa dzimɔ ye sika kĩ siwo tidetɔ ewua kɔtɔkase, ade ɔyade a lɛmɛ dzimɔ ye odetɔ mɔa kɔtɔkase a.
42007042	Bati kĩĩ tápuli bise ye fɔtɔ kĩĩ, foesũ ɛkɔa ete be. Bati nviã kĩĩ kamɛ ɔwɔdabe aawɛ sika ɔvɛ ɔkpanɛ a kalɛ ɛba?”
42007043	Ade Simon kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Matɛ kado kĩ oti a kĩ bɛkɔa kɔtɔ kpale bite ye a.” Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔlɛ ɔnɔkɔali.”
42007044	Ade Yesu dani ɛdã otsole a ebi Simon kĩ, “Amɔ otsole kĩĩ? Kĩ nwo nɛ nɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ɔtákpa yĩ mui kĩ nvɔlɛ fɔnɛta, lɛmɛ otsole kĩĩ kɔa ye babe ɛvɔlɛ yĩ fɔnɛta, ɛkɔa ye tɔlɔ lɛmɛ ɛyɔ be.
42007045	Ɔtákɛna yĩ atuu, lɛmɛ kito lɔkɔ a kĩ ĩya nɛ awĩ a, otsole kĩĩ táfɔ̃ yĩ fɔnɛta kafifi.
42007046	Ɔtákpa yĩ kugua ntsɛla nɛ lɔlɔ kamɛ, lɛmɛ ɛkɔa kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ ɛtsɛla yĩ fɔnɛta.
42007047	Foesũ mabi nɔ kĩ nɛ ɔdɔ a kĩ ɛnyɛ ɛtsa kĩĩ a sũ ni, bɛkɔa ye titikpa beblebee a bite ye. Lɛmɛ oti kĩ bɛkɔa fɔtsa kabii bite ni, ɔdɔ kabii yanyɛ katsa.”
42007048	Yesu bi otsole a kĩ, “Bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ.”
42007049	Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a kavia be akũ kĩ, “Owei nɛ awĩ a kĩ yakɔa bati tɔkpa malo kate?”
42007050	Ade Yesu bi otsole a kĩ, “Nɔ katɛkado tɛ nɔ. Naa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.”
42008001	Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a, Yesu tsã emini nɛ tɛmatɔ mɔ tukula a kĩ tifuã a kamɛ ɛkalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a lɛmɛ tomɔ ye.
42008002	Batsole badi kĩ Yesu blɔmɛna hũhũ kpa nɛ be kamɛ, mɔ bikĩ ɛtsa be fɔsɔ lɛmɛ tomɔ ye. Be kamɛ ɔmɔa nyɛ Maria Magdalani kĩ ye kamɛ ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa evũkɔnɔ etomɛna a.
42008003	Otsole a odi lɛmɛ nyɛ Yohana, kĩ bavɛ ɔnyɔ kĩ Kusa kĩ ɛnya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Lɛgã Herodes fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃, Susana mɔ batsole bɛbã pii kĩ bɛkɔa be mɔawɛ akũ fɔtsa bɛkadãmɛna Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ akũ a.
42008004	Bati kato tɛmatɔ pii kamɛ kaya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, ade kĩ bati beblebee yakpɔta a, ɛbɔa be lɛgbã kĩĩ kĩ,
42008005	“Luwi a okuani odi naasã funitsã babi. Kĩ ɛkasã be a badi wula nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ ade ke bati sumini be, kɔvɔlabi lɛmɛ tsuli be a.
42008006	Badi wula nɛ apibɔ akũ, ade kĩ bɛmɛ a bɛvɛ biku, kitonɛkĩ apibɔ a kamɛ lɛla mui.
42008007	Badi wula nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu kamɛ. Tuwĩ mɔ fu a mɛ tipi be.
42008008	Badi lɛmɛ wula nɛ tite wĩ akũ, bɛmɛ bibo anɛ, kutse nyɛ kutse wũ babi kpasaa.” Ade Yesu wũna kĩ, “Oti kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse katse wĩ!”
42008009	Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye lɛgbã a kayɔ.
42008010	Ade ebi be kĩ, “Bɛnyɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ fɔtsa kɔlawa a bɛtsa mi, lɛmɛ bati bɛbã a kɔ̃ ni, fɔgbã kamɛ fɔaya kakpa be ayekĩ, ‘Baadã lɛmɛ bɛláamɔ biyi ɔsũ, baanu lɛmɛ bɛláa nu foe kayɔ.’
42008011	“Lɛgbã a kayɔ nyɛ fukĩĩ. Funitsã babi a nyɛ Baguma kalɛ a.
42008012	Babi a kĩ biwula nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ nyɛ bati a kĩ binu kalɛ a, lɛmɛ Abonsam yanyɛ kalɛ a nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ayekĩ bɛláatɛ bido bɛna katɛ
42008013	Bikĩ biwula nɛ apibɔ akũ a nyɛ bati a kĩ binu kalɛ a, bɛtɛ ke mɔ kawɔlɛ, lɛmɛ kɛtáwo nɛ be kamɛ dzununuunu. Bɛtɛ bido nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ odi kamɛ, ade ntɛ sɔhuiɛ adi ya ni, bamuniki liti.
42008014	Babi a kĩ biwula nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu kamɛ a nyɛ bati a kĩ binu kalɛ a bɛtɛ ke lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhau, akũ fɔtsa kawɛ mɔ katinya kamɛ kawɔlɛkamɔ anya be akũ, kafɔ̃ baábo anɛ kawũ babi kayɔɔlɛ.
42008015	Lɛmɛ babi a kĩ biwula nɛ tite wĩ akũ a nyɛ bati a kĩ binu kalɛ a, bɛtɛ ke nɛ tɔwɔlɛ wĩ mɔ obu kamɛ ade bipini ke mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kɛnawo kĩ biwũ babi a.
42008016	“Odima látɛna ɔsɛdza kakɔa lɔɔda kasua ye, ĩye kakɔa ye kado nɛ mpa kayɔ. Mbom yadɛla ye kate nɛ ɔsɛdza otse akũ ayekĩ bati aamɔ fɔkɔ ntɛ bawo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.
42008017	“Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla ni, baanyɛ de kanya. Ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bisua de ni, baamɔ de bɛnyɛ bɛyamɛna nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ.
42008018	Mitse lɛtsa a kĩ mianu a katse wĩ, kitonɛkĩ okĩ edeĩ fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu ni, baakpa ye kayɔkanu bibu, lɛmɛ okĩ ɛla kayɔkanu kadima ni, baatɛ sukuloo a kĩ ɛkɔna kĩ edeĩ a malo nɛ ye awɛ.”
42008019	Luwi a, Yesu ɔma mɔ bawaɛ̃ ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bifuã ye nɛ bati lidede sũ.
42008020	Ade ke odi bi Yesu kĩ, “Ama mɔ awaɛ̃ amɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ kanya kĩ bawɛ bɛmɔ́ nɔ.”
42008021	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mma mɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ nyɛ bikĩ batse Baguma kalɛ, bakɛna nɛ ke akũ.”
42008022	Luwi a Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ade ebi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bunyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a bɔnaa abuĩ atide a.” Ade biyi ɔwɔ a kanyina kayɔ a.
42008023	Kĩ biteĩ nɛ mui anɛ banaa a, Yesu wa tida. Deedimɔapɛ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ odi vũ nɛ lutubu baũ a akũ, ade ɛkabɔa mui kako nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, fɔfɔ̃ bɛna nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite a.
42008024	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nadzɛla Yesu bibi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate! Boe Ɔlate! Buku buyua!” Awã naa Yesu yidza ɛdza ewũni nɛ ɔwɛ mɔ mui a akũ. Ɔwɛ mɔ mui a onukpɛ̃ dɔ, ade awã flee kɛna dĩĩ a.
42008025	Ade evia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nde mi katɛkado?” Bɛkɛna saa, libe wo be lɛmɛ, ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Owei nyɛ oti kĩĩ? Yado ɔwɛ mɔ mui onukpɛ̃ ade batse ye a!”
42008026	Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a bito Galilea tite akũ bɛyawo Gadara nɛ tite a sɛkɛ sitide a.
42008027	Kĩ Yesu nɛ́ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ ye kamɛ nɛ eto ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛyatsɛlamɔ ye. Owi buna kĩ onyole kĩĩ tsã ɔdzɔ, ade yaádzi nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, mbom asie mɔ funikɛ kamɛ yadzi.
42008028	Kĩ ɛmɔ Yesu a, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ade ɛbɔɛ ye akũ emuni nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ mɔ fɔwɔla kĩ, “Yesu Baguma Kpale Nɛ Ode Obi! Litsa akamɔ yĩ? Make nɔ aduli, takɛna yĩ awɔda!”
42008029	Onyole a lɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ Yesu wũni nɛ hũhũ kpa a akũ kĩ ɛnɛ nɛ oti a kamɛ. Lɔkɔ pii hũhũ kpa a adzi nɛ ye akũ ade ntɛ bido ye nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ nɛ akpɔ mɔ abɔa malo a, yaveliveli ye lɔkɔa hũhũ kpa a akpã ye kanamɛna kɔsa kamɛ.
42008030	Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nde bavɛ nɔ?” Ade ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bavɛ yĩ Lidede,” kitonɛkĩ hũhũ kpa beblebee wo nɛ ye kamɛ.
42008031	Hũhũ kpa a ke Yesu aduli kĩ ɛtablɔmɛna be bɛnaawo nɛ lɛkɛ dzununuunu a kĩ lɛlá kakpulakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
42008032	Baplakuo beblebee na nɛ ɔtɔ odi akũ bɛkadɛ. Foesũ hũhũ kpa a ke Yesu aduli kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnɛ bɛnawo nɛ be kamɛ, ade Yesu lɛmɛ kpa osi a.
42008033	Ade bɛnɛ nɛ onyole a kamɛ bɛnawo nɛ baplakuo a kamɛ a. Be kɔdabu a flee wula atsɛ bɛka ɔtɔ sɛkɛ geĩ a biwo nɛ mui kamɛ, bɛmɔa mui biku.
42008034	Kĩ bikĩ badãmɛna baplakuo akũ a mɔ́ lɛtsa kĩ lɛya a, bilo bɛnaa ɔmatɔ mɔ tukula kamɛ bɛkabi bati lɛtsa kĩ lɛya a.
42008035	Bati nɛ bɛyaadã lɛtsa kĩ lɛya. Ade kĩ biwo Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a bɛmɔ́ onyole a kĩ ye kamɛ hũhũ kpa a nɛ a kĩ edzi nɛ ye abɔa kayɔ. Edo atadiɛ ade ye anɛ kamɛ lɛmɛ kpalɛ. Libe wo bati a flee.
42008036	Bikĩ bɛmɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a bi bati ayekĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa nɛ oti a kamɛ.
42008037	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bati a flee nɛ Gadara kayite a na ke Yesu aduli kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be tite akũ, kitonɛkĩ libe wo be paa. Nɛ foesũ ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ ɛdzakũ.
42008038	Onyole a kĩ ye kamɛ hũhũ kpa a nɛ a ke Yesu aduli kĩ, “Fɔ̃ ntomɔ nɔ bɔnaa.” Lɛmɛ Yesu nyɛ ye osi, ebi ye kĩ,
42008039	“Muniki kanaa ɔtɔ kanaalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna ɛkpa nɔ a.” Onyole a tsã nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛkalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna ɛkpa ye a.
42008040	Kĩ Yesu muniki ɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ sɛkɛ sitide a, bati a tɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ kitonɛkĩ be flee bidzi bɛkadzɔlɛ ye.
42008041	Ade ke onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yairo kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ɔmɔa nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ya nɛ awã a. Ɛyake aduli nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ ɛwã ye kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnaa ye tɔtɔ kamɛ,
42008042	kitonɛkĩ ye obitsole mɔapɛ kĩ ɛtɛ futeli ewua-nviã waa nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite. Kĩ Yesu kanaa a, bati pii yi ye akũ.
42008043	Otsole odi kĩ akũ awula ye futeli ewua-nviã flee lɛmɛ na nɛ bati a kamɛ. Otsole kĩĩ bula ye sika flee kade nɛ fɔsɔ batsanɛ sɛkɛ̃ lɛmɛ odima tápuli ɛtsa ye.
42008044	Ɛkɛna bɔɛɛ ɛtsã bati a kamɛ nɛ Yesu liti ɛta ye atadiɛ sɔtɔ. Deedimɔapɛ babɔanɛ a fɔ̃ kawula.
42008045	Ade ke Yesu via kĩ, “Owei lɛta yĩ?” Lɛmɛ odima tákpeti. Foesũ Petro bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, dã ayekĩ bati beblebee yi nɔ akũ!”
42008046	Lɛmɛ Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mmɔ́ nɛ yĩ kamɛ kĩ odi ta yĩ ni, kitonɛkĩ kɔbɛ̃ kudi nɛ kuto yĩ kamɛ.”
42008047	Kĩ otsole a mɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye sũ ni, ɛna nɛ kukũtila kamɛ ɛnɛ ɛyake aduli nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ. Nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ na, ebi ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa. Ebi ye lɛtsa a kĩ de sũ ɛta ye, mɔ ayekĩ ɛsaɛ lɛtalɛta a.
42008048	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ obitsole, nɔ katɛkado kpa nɔ akũ ɔsĩ. Naa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.”
42008049	Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu kalɛ fukĩĩ a, ɔtɔ to Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a awã ɛyabi Yairo kĩ, “Nɔ obitsole a ku, fɔtábuki fusĩ kĩ aha fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ a.”
42008050	Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu nu fɔlɛtsa a ebi Yairo kĩ, “Tavila. Nɔ kɔ̃ tɛ kado, obisɛ̃ a aasaɛ.”
42008051	Kĩ Yesu wo Yairo tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ɛtákpa odima osi ewo nɛ kɔla a kamɛ, mbɔɛntɛ Petro mɔ Yohanes mɔ Yakobo mɔ obisɛ̃ a ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma odi.
42008052	Bati pii dza nɛ awã bɛkabe mɔ kɔnya nɛ obisɛ̃ a wuda sũ. Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ kabe. Obisɛ̃ a táku. Tida kɛkɛ ɛwaa.”
42008053	Lɛmɛ bati a flee mɛmɛ ye kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ obisɛ̃ a ku.
42008054	Ade Yesu pi obisɛ̃ a nɛ kɔkpɔ ɛvɛ ye kɔɔba kĩ, “Yĩ obi, yidza kadza!”
42008055	Ade ke katsolebi a nyinya kiyidza kɛdza deedimɔapɛ a. Yesu bi be kĩ bɛkpa ke funitsã kɛnya.
42008056	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nyɛnɛ bamanɛ a akũ, lɛmɛ Yesu si be mbla kĩ bɛtabi odima lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a.
42009001	Luwi a, Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛkpɔta, ade ɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi kĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa flee, bɛtsa fɔsɔ kumɛkumɛ lɛmɛ.
42009002	Edo be kĩ bɛnaalɛ kalɛ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ, lɔkɔa bɛtsa basɔnɛ.
42009003	Fɔmɔ baanaa ni, Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitabɔɛ lɛtsama ndɛ otse kĩ bake katsã, fɔtsa bawãnɛ kuvũ, funitsã ĩye sika milɛ. Mitabɔɛ atadiɛ ayade malo mibu.
42009004	Kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ mise ni, mina nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ míadzakũ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
42009005	Awã kĩ bati tátɛ mi ni, minɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔa mikpa mi abɔa kudu miko nɛ be akũ, fɔnya nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔkpa be kĩ Baguma aavɛlɛ be sɔtɔ.”
42009006	Ade fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a namini nɛ tukula a flee kamɛ bɛkalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a, bɛkatsa basɔnɛ a nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ a.
42009007	Kĩ Lɛgã Herodes, Galilea tite akũ ɔnyanɛ a nu fɔtsa kĩ fɔlamɛna kaya a, ɛkɛna basaa, kitonɛkĩ bati badi kalɛ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a libuki eyidza edzi nkpã.
42009008	Bati bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ Eliya libuki ɛya, ade babɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a kamɛ odi liyidza edzi nkpã.
42009009	Lɛgã Herodes lɛ kĩ, “Nfɔ̃ bitsua Yohanes lɔlɔ, mɔ owei nyɛ oti a kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa manu a?” Foesũ Lɛgã Herodes kabɔa mbɔdi kĩ yamɔ Yesu.
42009010	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a muniki bɛya a, bibi Yesu lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna. Ade ɛkpã be odi bɛnɛ bɔɛɛ bɛnaa Betsaida ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a.
42009011	Lɛmɛ kĩ bati kɔdabu a nu foe a, bitomɔ ye bɛnaa awã. Yesu tɛ be ade ebi be fɔlɛtsa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ, ɛtsa bikĩ bisĩ fɔsɔ katsa lɛmɛ a.
42009012	Kĩ suwa anaa katomukɔ̃ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã yabi ye kĩ, “Fɔ̃ bati a bɛdzakũ bɛnaa tukula mɔ fɔpɛ a kĩ fufuã a kamɛ bɛnaawɛ funitsã mɔ fɔwakɔ̃ kitonɛkĩ awĩ lɛnyɛ́ bati kadzikɔ̃.”
42009013	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mi mɔawɛ a miwɛ litsedi mikpa be bɛnya.” Ade bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Funitsã flee kĩ bɔnɛɛ nyɛ abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi tɔlɛwa nviã. Awɛ kĩ bɔnaaya funitsã bɔma bati beblebee kĩĩ?”
42009014	Banyole ndɛ be mpim elo na nɛ awã. Ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bati a bidzi nɛ kutsukutsu kamɛ. Katsu nyɛ katsu kiwo ndɛ bati aduenum.”
42009015	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɛna foe lɔmɔ biyua a,
42009016	Yesu bɔɛ abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã a, ɛdɛla anɛ ɛdã odetɔ́ kamɛ, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ade ebulibuli ye ɛkɔa ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa bati a.
42009017	Bati a flee nya biwĩ, ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila fukĩ fute a biyula tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã a.
42009018	Luwi a, kĩ Yesu odi na ɛkabɔa mpaɛ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade evia be kĩ, “Owei bati alɛ kĩ ye manɛ?”
42009019	Bɛlɛ kĩ, “Badi alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a. Badi alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya, ade babɛbã lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a kamɛ odi liyidza edzi nkpã.”
42009020	Ade evia be kĩ, “Nde nyɛ mi lɛmɛ? Owei mialɛ kĩ ye manɛ?” Awã naa, Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Baguma Kristo a.”
42009021	Ade Yesu si be mbla mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɛtabi odima fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ.
42009022	Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ Otidziwa Obi a ɛmɔ lubo paa nɛ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃, Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ. Baasĩ ye lɔkɔa bɛkɔ ye, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, Baguma aadzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ edzi nkpã.”
42009023	Ade ebi bati a flee kĩ, “Ntɛ odi awɛ kĩ yatomɔ yĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ yafɔnɛ ye apɛdiɛ awɛ, ɛbɔɛ ye lubo kamɔ fɔlɔtsa luwi nyɛ luwi lɔkɔa etomɔ yĩ nɛ liti.
42009024	Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛfɔnɛ ye nkpã awɛ ɛkpa nɛ yĩ katomɛna sũ ni, yaana nkpã wĩ a kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
42009025	Litsa nfasɔ oti aana ntɛ ɛna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee lɛmɛ ɛyɛla ye mɔawɛ nkpã?
42009026	Ntɛ yĩ mɔ yĩ fɔtsa a kĩ matsa a nyɛ fɔnyɔãtsa fɔkpa odi ni, ye malo yaanya fɔnyɔãtsa ɛkpa Yĩ Otidziwa Obi a, ntɛ ĩya nɛ yĩ kukũkpalɛ mɔ Nda mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ kpalɛwa kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.
42009027	Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awĩ kĩ bɛláaku kɛnaawo kĩ Baguma aanyɛ ye lɛgãkanya a ɛtsa be.”
42009028	Ndɛ ɛkwansieda mɔa liti kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛkpã Petro, Yohanes mɔ Yakobo bide bɛnaa ɔtɔ odi akũ kĩ banaabɔa mpaɛ.
42009029	Kĩ ɛkabɔa mpaɛ a ye anɛ kamɛ dani, ade ye tɛtadiɛ kɛna fita fita, tɛkata muamua a.
42009030	Ade banyole nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ Mose mɔ Eliya nɛ bɛdza bɛmɔ Yesu bɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a.
42009031	Bɛna nɛ ode kukũkpalɛ kamɛ ade bɛkalɔmɛna mɔ Yesu nɛ osi a kĩ ye akũ yaatsã ɛkɛna nɛ Baguma nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi kĩ yaaku nɛ Yerusalem akũ a.
42009032	Titɔ kĩ Petro mɔ ye bade a wa tida kɔlaa malo ni, binyinya bɛmɔ́ Yesu kukũkpalɛ mɔ bati nviã a kĩ bɛdza nɛ ye ɔwɛ̃ a.
42009033	Kĩ bati a adzakũ a, Petro bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fɔnɛnɛ paa kĩ bɔya nɛ awĩ. Bɔ́abɔa fɔpɛ ɛlalɛ, nɔ lide lɔmɔa, Mose lide lɔmɔa, Eliya lɛmɛ lide lɔmɔa.” Lɛmɛ ɛtáti enyi lɛtsa a kĩ de ɛkalɛ a malo.
42009034	Kĩ ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a, luflututu ka ade de kuyo ko nɛ be akũ a. Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a vila nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ luflututu a ka lisua be akũ a.
42009035	Ade odo odi nɛ eto luflututu a kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ obi a kĩ mpau a. Mitse ye kalɛ.”
42009036	Kĩ odo a tsua a, Yesu odi lite nɛ awã. Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a sua onukpɛ̃ nɛ fukĩĩ flee akũ ade bɛtábi odima kadima nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛmɔ́ a akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a.
42009037	Kĩ kade nyina a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a ka ɔtɔ a, ade bati kɔdabu baũ kudi yatsɛlamɔ ye a.
42009038	Onyole odi nɛ bati a kamɛ bɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ! Make nɔ aduli dã yĩ obi kakpa yĩ, yĩ obi mɔapɛ!
42009039	Hũhũ kpa adi adzi nɛ ye akũ lɔkɔa yabɔa fɔwɔla. Odetɔ́ fɔsɔ ade kadzi nɛ ye akũ, kabɔɛ ye kamuni, lɔkɔa kuvũ anɛ nɛ ye onukpɛ̃. Fɔafɔ̃ yapila ade hũhũ a lɛvá ye awɛ kafɔnɛ lɛmɛ a.
42009040	Nke nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a aduli kĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a, lɛmɛ bɛtápuli.”
42009041	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “O nviã babi mɔ atɔ ɔsĩ kĩ milá katɛkado! Lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, nna ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ lɛmɛ nkpa mi?” Ade ebi onyole a kĩ, “Kpã nɔ obi a kayamɛna nɛ awĩ.”
42009042	Kĩ kanyolebi a yɛlɛ kaya a, hũhũ kpa a bɔɛ ye emuni nɛ tite ade ke odetɔ́ fɔsɔ de fudzi nɛ ke akũ a. Awã naa Yesu do hũhũ kpa a onukpɛ̃, ade ɛtsa kanyolebi a ɛkɔa ke ɛkpa ɔlɛga a.
42009043	Baguma kɔbɛ̃ baũ lɛkɛnana kĩĩ kɛna bati a flee saa.
42009044	“Mitalɛla lɛtsa a kĩ maabi mi a! Baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ bati awɛ.”
42009045	Lɛmɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tánu foe kayɔ. Bɛkɔa foe bɛkɔla be kĩ bɛtanu foe kayɔ ade bivila kĩ bavia ye foe kayɔ a.
42009046	Fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ ya nɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ nɛ owula a kĩ ye bɛ̃ flee nɛ be kamɛ.
42009047	Kĩ Yesu nyi lɛtsa kĩ bɛkakɔna a, ɛvɛ obisɛ̃ odi ɛyadzɛla nɛ ye ɔwɛ̃.
42009048	Ade ebi be kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ obisɛ̃ kĩĩ nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, ade yĩ ɛtɛ a, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ ni, ɛtɛ owula a kĩ edo yĩ fɔtɔ a. Kitonɛkĩ owula kĩ ɛnyɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ mi kamɛ a, ade ye lɛtɛ kɔya ɛbɛ̃ a.”
42009049	Yohanes bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, bɔmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ ɛkablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa nɛ nɔ dĩ akũ, lɛmɛ busua ye osi, kitonɛkĩ ɛláa boe kamɛ.”
42009050	Yesu bi ye mɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ bɛbã a kĩ, “Mitasua ye osi, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdzɛ́ nɛ mi akũ ni, mi etomɛna.”
42009051	Kĩ lɔkɔ kawo ɔtɔ kĩ Baguma aabɔɛ Yesu ɛnamɛna ode a, esipi kĩ yanaa Yerusalem.
42009052	Edo fɔtɔ banyanɛ badi bɛnya ye lɔtɔ bɛnaa Samaria akula adi kamɛ kĩ bɛnaamanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa bɛkpa ye kaya.
42009053	Lɛmɛ akula a kamɛ bati sĩ kĩ baátɛ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ ɛtɛ̃ yanaa Yerusalem.
42009054	Kĩ Yohanes mɔ Yakobo nu fɔlɛtsa a, bivia Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, awɛ kĩ bɔvɛ fi butomɛna ode fɔyaawɔla be?”
42009055	Lɛmɛ Yesu dani ɛkã be anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Minyína Hũhũ a kĩ ye bade mianɛ! Yĩ Otidziwa Obi a ntáya kĩ mayaawɔla bati, mbom ĩya kĩ maatɛ be nkpã.”
42009056	Foesũ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tɛ̃ bɛnaa akula bɛbã kamɛ.
42009057	Kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ banaa a, onyole odi bi Yesu kĩ, “Maatomɔ nɔ nnaa kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ aanaa.”
42009058	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kulikii deĩ fudzikɔ̃, kɔvɔlabi lɛmɛ deĩ fɔtsɔɛ, lɛmɛ Otidziwa Obi a lɛlá awã kĩ yate lɔlɔ malo.”
42009059	Ebi oti bɛbã kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.” Lɛmɛ oti a lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, maatomɔ nɔ, lɛmɛ fɔ̃ nnaabila nda tɔ̃.”
42009060	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Fɔnɛ bikĩ bɛlá Baguma nkpã mɔawɛ a bibila be banɔkpa. Nɔ kɔ̃ naa kanaade lɛtsã nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ.”
42009061	Oti bɛbã kɔ̃ lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, maatomɔ nɔ, lɛmɛ fɔ̃ nnaakla yĩ kɔla bati tɔ̃.”
42009062	Ade ke Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Oti kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ yapupu, mɔ yadani kadã liti ni, ɛtáfɛta ɛkpa Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ adzuma a.”
42010001	Fukĩĩ liti a, boe Ɔlate pau bati aduesɔũ-nviã bɛbã, ade edo be nviã nviã kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛnaa tɛmatɔ mɔ tukula a kĩ ye mɔawɛ yaatsã te kamɛ a kamɛ.
42010002	Ade ebi be kĩ, “Fudutsa a kĩ míave a pɔnɛ lɛmɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a lɛpɔ́nɛ. Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa kɔba ɔlate a kĩ edo adzuma bakɛnanɛ pii bɛyaave fudutsa a.
42010003	Minaa! Mado mi fɔtɔ ndɛ bavelibi nɛ kulikii kamɛ.
42010004	Mitabɔɛ sika kuvũ, ĩye osi katsã fuvũ, ĩye mpabua milɛ, ade mitafɔ̃ midza nɛ osi kĩ miawɔ̃na odima a.
42010005	“Ntɛ miwo tɔtɔ tidi kamɛ ni, minya lɔtɔ milɛ kĩ, ‘Lukudɔ lɛya nɛ tɔtɔ kĩĩ kamɛ.’
42010006	Ntɛ oti kĩ yawɛ lukudɔ deĩ nɛ awã ni, mifɔ̃ mi lukudɔ a litomɔ ye. Lɛmɛ ntɛ odima lɛláa ni, mi nhila a aamuniki ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
42010007	Mina nɛ tɔtɔ mɔapɛ a kamɛ, minya mimɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkpa mi. Kitonɛkĩ adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ odi nyɛ odi sĩ kɔtɔkase. Mitatu nɛ tɔtɔ mɔa kamɛ minaa tɔtɔ bɛbã kamɛ.
42010008	“Ntɛ miwo ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ mɔ bɛtɛ mi ni, minya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkpa mi.
42010009	Mitsa basɔnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔa mibi bati a kĩ, ‘Baguma lɛgãkanya lɔkɔ a fuã mi.’
42010010	Lɛmɛ ntɛ miwo ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ mɔ bɛtátɛ mi ni, midzakũ minaa ye tɔblɔnu akũ lɔkɔa milɛ kĩ,
42010011	‘Bɔkpa mi ɔmatɔ kudu a nɛ boe abɔa buko nɛ mi akũ. Lɛmɛ mite anɛ kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya lɔkɔ a fuã mi!’
42010012	Ade mabi mi pipiipi kĩ nɛ bati kadzɛmɛna luwi a akũ ni, Baguma aamɔ Sodom ɔmatɔ a kɔnya ɛba ɔmatɔ a na!
42010013	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa nɔ Korasin ɔmatɔ, bɔbɔɛ makpa nɔ Betsaida ɔmatɔ a lɛmɛ! Ntɛ Tiro mɔ Sidon tɛmatɔ a kamɛ nkɛna awãwã fɔtsa ni, kufɛ bidzi nɛ tite, bisua fumakũ akũ, bɛtsɛla batɔ kɔkɔɛ, bɛkɔa bɛtsa kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
42010014	Baguma aamɔ Tiro mɔ Sidon kɔnya nɛ kadzɛmɛna luwi a akũ ɛba mi.
42010015	Ade nɔ Kapernaum ɔmatɔ! Kawɛ ɔwɛ kĩ adɛla nɔ akũ nɛ ode? Baakɛna nɔ nɛ kayɔ ɔnaa kanɔkpade!”
42010016	Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse mi kalɛ ni, ade yĩ yatse a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ mi ni, ade yĩ esĩ a. Ade ke odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ yĩ ni, esĩ Baguma a kĩ edo yĩ fɔtɔ a lɛmɛ.”
42010017	Bati aduesɔũ-nviã a muniki bɛya mɔ kawɔlɛ bɛyalɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, hũhũ kpa malo tse boe ntɛ buwũni nɛ be akũ nɛ nɔ dĩ akũ.”
42010018	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mmɔ́ Abonsam ndɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ kamɔanɛ aye kĩ eto ode ɛyatɔ.
42010019	Mitse! Nkpa mi kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ míapuli misuma bɔɛ mɔ kɔkpɔ̃na, ade míanya Okesĩnɛ a kɔbɛ̃ akũ kĩ lɛtsama lɛláakɛna mi a.
42010020	Lɛmɛ kawɔlɛ kɛtade mi kĩ hũhũ kpa tse mi kalɛ, mbom mimɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ mi buĩ biyi nɛ ode.”
42010021	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kawɔlɛ wo nɛ Yesu kamɛ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yĩ Ɔlɛga, tite mɔ ode Ɔlate, manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla kadi banyinɛ mɔ tuvoli banyinɛ a, ɔnyɛ foe ɔtsa bikĩ binyína tuvoli ndɛ babisɛ̃ aye. Oo, Nda, ade aye koũ ɔwɛ kĩ fɔna a.”
42010022	Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda kɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa edo nɛ yĩ awɛ. Odima linyína oti a kĩ Baguma Obi a anɛ mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga a odi keĩ. Ade aye odima lɛmɛ linyína oti a kĩ Ɔlɛga a anɛ, mbɔɛntɛ Obi odi mɔ bikĩ Obi aawɛ kĩ yanyɛ Ɔlɛga ɛtsa a.”
42010023	Ade Yesu dani ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a odi bɔɛɛ kĩ, “Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ Baguma hila mi! Mi anɛ amɔ ade mi atɔ lɛmɛ anu fɔkɔ a.
42010024	Mabi mi kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ pii mɔ fɔgã wɛ kĩ bamɔ lɛtsa a kĩ mimɔ́ finyaa, lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bɛmɔ́, ade bɛwɛ kĩ banu lɛtsa a kĩ mianu a, lɛmɛ bɛtánu foe.”
42010025	Luwi a, Yudani mbla ɔtsanɛ a odi ya kĩ yasɔ Yesu ɛdã. Evia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna nna nkpã a kĩ ɛlá kawũna a?”
42010026	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Litsa Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ? Nde onu foe kayɔ?”
42010027	Onyole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Wɛ nɔ Ɔlate, nɔ Baguma kalɛ mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ flee, nɔ ɔkla flee nɔ kɔbɛ̃ flee mɔ nɔ kakɔna flee, kawɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ mɔawɛ akũ a.”
42010028	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔlɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Kɛna fukĩĩ lɔkɔa aana nkpã.”
42010029	Lɛmɛ mbla ɔtsanɛ kĩĩ wɛ kĩ yakpa ye akũ ɔtɔbɛ, foesũ evia Yesu kĩ, “Owei nyɛ yĩ ɔkɔba?”
42010030	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Luwi a, onyole odi to Yerusalem yanaa Yeriko ɔmatɔ kamɛ, ade bayekpanɛ napi ye nɛ osi a. Bibo ye bɛyɛlɛ ye akũ tɛtadiɛ, ade bɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ biyi nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite a.
42010031	Fɔyaya kĩ ɔsɔfɔ odi yatsã nɛ osi a na akũ yatɛ̃, lɛmɛ kĩ ɛmɔ oti kĩĩ a ɛtsã ɔɔwɛ̃ ɛtɛ̃.
42010032	Ade ayea Levini lɛmɛ yatɛ̃ a. Efuã ɛnadã onyole a, ade ye malo ɛtsã ɔɔwɛ̃ ɛtɛ̃ a.
42010033	Lɛmɛ Samariani odi kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ osi a akũ yamɔ oti a. Kĩ ɛmɔ oti a, ye akũ kɔ ye kɔnya.
42010034	Efuã ye ade ɛkɔa kugua mɔ bavɛ eko nɛ ye fɔɔkpa kamɛ esui foe a. Ade ɛbɔɛ onyole a ete nɛ ye mɔawɛ ɔyaɛ akũ, ɛkɔa ye ɛnamɛna banɔvɔɛ̃ kasɛkɔ̃ ade ɛdã ye akũ a.
42010035	Kĩ kade nyina a, ɛnyɛ sika ɛkpa kasɛkɔ̃ a akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a ebi ye kĩ, ‘Dã ye akũ. Ntɛ mmuniki matɛ̃ ni maase nɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ aabuki obula kade nɛ ye akũ a kɔtɔ.’ ”
42010036	Ade Yesu wũna evia ye kĩ, “Nɛ nɔ kakɔna onukpɛ̃ ni, bati ɛlalɛ kĩĩ kamɛ a, ɔwɔdabe lɛnyɛ ye tɔkɔba kakɛna ɛtsa oti a kĩ ewo nɛ bayekpanɛ awɛ kamɛ a?”
42010037	Ade mbla ɔtsanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛmɔ ye kɔnya a.” Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ nɔ malo naa kanaakɛna foe lɔmɔ.”
42010038	Luwi a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tsɛ̃ nɛ osi ade bɛnawo akula adi kamɛ a. Otsole odi kĩ bavɛ Marta tɛ ye nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ.
42010039	Marta deĩ ɔwaɛ̃tsole kĩ bavɛ Maria. Edzi nɛ boe Ɔlate ɔwɛ̃ ɛkatse ye fɔtsa katsa.
42010040	Fɔha Marta kĩ tɔtɔ kamɛ adzuma ko nɛ ye odi akũ, foesũ ɛnabi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fɔtsɛ́la nɔ akũ kĩ nwaɛ̃ kɔa tɔtɔ kamɛ tudzuma a flee eko nɛ yĩ odi akũ? Bi ye ɛyaabumɛna yĩ!”
42010041	Ade boe Ɔlate kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “O Marta! Dã, aha nɔ akũ nɛ fɔtsa pii akũ,
42010042	lɛmɛ lɛtsa mɔapɛ lisĩ. Maria nyɛ lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ bɛláatɛ nɛ ye awɛ.”
42011001	Luwi a, Yesu kabɔa mpaɛ nɛ kakɔ kadi. Kĩ eyua a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tsa boe mpaɛ kabɔa ndɛ ayekĩ Yohanes tsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a.”
42011002	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ntɛ miabɔa mpaɛ ni, milɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlɛga, fɔ̃ bɛkpalɛ nɔ dĩ akũ. Nɔ lɛgãkanya a kɛya. Bɛkɛna nɛ nɔ kawɛ akũ, nɛ tite akũ ndɛ ayekĩ bakɛna nɛ ode a.
42011003	Kpa boe luwi nyɛ luwi funitsã a kĩ fusĩ boe a
42011004	Kɔa boe tɔkpa kate boe kitonɛkĩ boe malo bɔakɔa odi nyɛ odi tɔkpa kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ boe akũ a kate. Tafɔ̃ buwo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ, mbom nyɛ boe katomɛna tɔkpa kamɛ.’ ”
42011005	Ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mibɔɛ foe kĩ mi kamɛ odi naa ɔkɔba sɛkɛ̃ mɔ lɛnyɛ kayite ɛnabi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔba, vɛ abodoo fɔbɔ ɛlalɛ kakpa yĩ,
42011006	kitonɛkĩ yĩ ɔkɔba odi to osi mɔ lugo akũ ɛyase yĩ finyaakĩĩ, ade nlá funitsã fudima kĩ makpa ye a!’
42011007	“Bɔɛ foe kĩ nɔ ɔkɔba a nɛ́ nɛ kɔla kamɛ ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Taha yĩ kɔlaa! Ndo kɔla safi ade bɔmɔ yĩ babi bɔwa kɔkɔɛ. Nláapuli mbuki ĩyidza mbɔɛ lɛtsama nkpa nɔ finyaa.’
42011008	Mabi mi kĩ ntɛ nɛ be tɔkɔba kakɛna sũ ni, ɛláayidza. Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ ɛdzɛ̃mɛna opunu kabɔa sũ ni, yaayidza ɛkpa ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lisĩ ye a.
42011009	“Foesũ mabi mi kĩ mivia fɔtsa lɔkɔa baakpa mi, miwɛ lɔkɔa míamɔ foe, mibɔa opunu lɔkɔa baabinya bɛkpa mi.
42011010	Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwã fɔtsa ni, yaana foe. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwɛ litsedi ni, yaamɔ de, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yabɔa opunu ni, baabinya bɛkpa ye.
42011011	“Mi kamɛ ɔwɔdabe kĩ ɛnyɛ obilɛga, aakɔa kɔɛ ɛkpa obi ntɛ evia ye kafɔabi?
42011012	Ĩye ɛkɔa kakpɔ̃na ɛkpa ye ntɛ evia ye ɔkɔkɔ lige?
42011013	Titɔ kĩ minyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ malo ni, minyina ayekĩ miate mi babi fɔtsa wĩ. Nde fɔ́aya mɔ boe Ɔlɛga nɛ ode lɛláakɔa ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ɛkpa bikĩ baavia ye a!”
42011014	Luwi a, Yesu kablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa kĩ yaálɛ kɔdzɛla etomɛna odi kamɛ. Kĩ hũhũ kpa a nɛ a, oti a yi kɔdzɛla kalɛ kayɔ. Fukĩĩ kɛna bati a kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã a wãwã.
42011015	Lɛmɛ bati a badi lɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa lɛgã a kĩ bavɛ Beelzebul a lɛkpa ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛkɔa ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a.”
42011016	Ade badi lɛmɛ wɛ kĩ basɔ Yesu bɛdã, foesũ bibi ye kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa ɛkɔa ɛtsa kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ eto.
42011017	Lɛmɛ Yesu nyi lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkakɔna a, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Ɔmaĩ kĩ ɛsɛ̃ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ, mɔ lɛma nɛ́ nɛ ye kamɛ ni, ɔmaĩ a na aawɔ. Ade aye tɔtɔ nyɛ tɔtɔ kĩ te kamɛ bati sɛ̃ be akũ ni, tayalɛ.
42011018	Foesũ ntɛ Abonsam lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sɛ̃ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ mɔ banɔ akũ lɛma ni, nde kanyakɔ̃ a na aapuli kɛdza? Mialɛ kĩ mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa kitonɛkĩ Beelzebul lɛkpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ sũ.
42011019	Ntɛ aye mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a ni, nde bikĩ bitomɔ mi a ablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa? Mi mɔawɛ bati a nyɛ mi kayɔ bɛtsa kĩ fɔvã miama.
42011020	Oowo! Mbom Baguma kɔbɛ̃ akũ fɔtsɛ̃ mɔ mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa, foesũ fukĩĩ atsa yededeede kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a wo mi sɛkɛ̃ kɔkɔɛ.
42011021	“Ntɛ odi kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ dzi akpadza, edzi yadzɔlɛ ye tɔtɔ ni, enyina kĩ ye akũ fɔtsa waa pɛpɛɛpɛ.
42011022	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ ɛbɛ̃ ye yanɔ mɔ ye ɛnya ye akũ ni, yafila ye kawũkanɔ fɔtsa a kĩ ete anɛ nɛ foe akũ a ɛsɛ̃ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛtɛ a.
42011023	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ́ yĩ ode ni, ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ paa, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaábumɔ yĩ bɔkpɔta ni, fɔtsa ɛlamɛna kayalɛ paa.”
42011024	“Ntɛ hũhũ kpa nɛ́ nɛ oti kamɛ ni yanaatsã kamini nɛ fɔkɔ wɔlɛwa kawɛ kasekɔ̃. Ntɛ ɛtána kasekɔ̃ ni, yabi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Maamuniki nnaa yĩ tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ nnɛ́ nto a kamɛ.’
42011025	Foesũ yamuniki kanaamɔ kĩ bɛyɔ tɔtɔ a kamɛ bɛmanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa pɛpɛɛpɛ.
42011026	Lɔkɔa yamuniki kanaawɛ hũhũ kpa evũkɔnɔ kĩ bideĩ ablɔ bɛbɛ̃ ye kabumɔ ye akũ bayaadzi nɛ awã. Ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ a, oti a kadzi kamɛ abu kade kaba ayekĩ fɔna nɛ kayɔkayi a.”
42011027	Kĩ Yesu kalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, otsole odi bɔa fɔwɔla nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma hila otsole a kĩ ɛma nɔ, mɔ lɛmɛ a kĩ de ɔmɛmɛ a!”
42011028	Lɛmɛ Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbom bihila bikĩ batse Baguma kalɛ, kĩ bakɛna nɛ ke akũ lɛmɛ a!”
42011029	Kĩ bati kɔdabu a bɔa opim nɛ Yesu akũ a, ɛlɛ ɛnaa lɔtɔ kĩ, “Nviã babi nyɛ bati kpa paa! Bawɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa bɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ bɛláamɔ fudima kɛba Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yona fude a.
42011030	Ndɛ ayekĩ Yona nya nsɛntsɛlɛni ɛkpa Ninivefɔ a, ade aye Otidziwa Obi a lɛmɛ aanya nsɛntsɛlɛni nkpa nviã babi a.
42011031	Nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, Seba Lɛgãtsole a aayidza ɛdza ɛkɔ nviã babi kɔtɔ kitonɛkĩ eto ye tite akũ nɛ kakɔ mɔ lugo ɛnatse Lɛgã Salomo kadikanyi fɔtsa katsa a, lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ odi kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Salomo deĩ nɛ awĩ.
42011032	Ninivefɔ lɛmɛ aayidza bɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ, kitonɛkĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Yona bi be Baguma kalɛ a. Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ odi kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Yona deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awĩ.
42011033	“Odima látɛna ɔsɛdza kakɔla ye ĩye kakɔa lɔɔda kasua ye. Mbom bakɔa ye kate nɛ ɔsɛdza otse akũ ayekĩ ntɛ bati awo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ ni, baamɔ fɔkɔ yededeede.
42011034	Oti banebi kɛna ndɛ ɔsɛdza ɛkpa ye kutitse. Ntɛ nɔ anɛ amɔ kamɔ wĩ ni, nɔ kutitse a flee deĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ nɔ anɛ lɛnɛ́nɛ ni, nɔ kutitse a flee aana nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ.
42011035	Foesũ dã kadã wĩ lɔkɔa ɔhaĩ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a ɛtadani ɛkɛna ɔtũ.
42011036	Ntɛ nɔ akũ flee kɛna haĩ mɔ nɔ kakɔma lɛláa ɔtũ kamɛ ni, nɔ akũ flee aakpalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔsɛdza ako nɛ fɔtsa akũ kakpalɛ foe a.”
42011037	Kĩ Yesu yua kɔdzɛla a, Farisini odi tsɛlamɔ ye kĩ ɛyaanya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃. Foesũ ɛnaa awã ɛnɛ edzi kĩ yanya.
42011038	Fɔkɛna Farisini a wãwã kĩ ɛmɔ kĩ Yesu távɔlɛ awɛ ndɛ ayekĩ mbla tsa a fɔmɔ eyi kanya kayɔ.
42011039	Foesũ boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Finyaa ni, mi Farisifɔ miavɔlɛ mi tɔkɔɔpu mɔ fɔɔdaɛ liti, lɛmɛ anɛngbã mɔ ablɔ yi mi kamɛ tɛtɛɛtɛ.
42011040	Bakɔasia! Nnɛ́ Baguma a kĩ ɛkɛna fɔtsa fɔmɛde a lɛkɛna kanya fude a lɛmɛ mbɔɛɛ?
42011041	Mikɔa fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ tɔkɔɔpu mɔ fɔɔdaɛ kamɛ a mikpa ahiãfɔ lɔkɔa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ aakpalɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
42011042	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi Farisifɔ! Miakɔa tɛnyɛ kumɛkumɛ kĩ tabɔa mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ a te katsu kawuade kakpa Baguma, lɛmɛ misĩ ɔtɔbɛ kakpa bati ade miáwɛ Baguma kalɛ lɛmɛ a. Ade fukĩĩ bamɛ kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna mibumɔ foe nkaɛ a.
42011043	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi Farisifɔ! Miawɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ nɛ mi katsɛnakɔ̃ ade miawɛ kĩ bati bɛwɔ̃na mi mɔ obu nɛ kɔya a.
42011044	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi! Mila ndɛ funi kĩ bɛtáyi foe ɔsũ, kĩ bati tsɛ̃ nɛ foe akũ nɛ katanyi kamɛ.”
42011045	Nɛ awã naa Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, ntɛ ɔlɛ fukĩĩ ni, ovũna boe malo.”
42011046	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ a lɛmɛ. Milɔ́la bati fɔlɔtsa kĩ foe kalɔ deĩ ɔlɔmɛ, lɛmɛ mi mɔawɛ miáyo awɛ kĩ míabumɔ be fɔtsa a kalɔ.
42011047	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi paa kitonɛkĩ mike funi mɔkalɛ mikpa Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a. Ade Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ mi bawanyɔ kɔ a.
42011048	Mi mɔawɛ a mitunɔ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ mi bawanyɔ kɛna a nɛnɛ. Bɛkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a ade mi mike be funi a.
42011049	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Baguma nɛ ye kadikanyi kamɛ lɛ kĩ, ‘Maado Yĩ onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃. Baakɔ badi, bitomɔ babɛbã lɛmɛ liti.’
42011050	Foesũ baavɛlɛ nviã bati sɔtɔ nɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee a kĩ bɛkɔ, kito anɛ katinya kayɔkayi a.
42011051	Kito Abel kakɔ kɛnawo Zakaria kĩ bɛkɔ nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ mɔ kakɔ kpalɛwa kayite a. Nuwĩ paa kĩ, baavɛlɛ nviã babi sɔtɔ nɛ fukĩĩ flee sũ!
42011052	“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ a. Kitonɛkĩ mikɔla safi a kĩ sabinya kadikanyi kɔla a. Mi mɔawɛ misĩ kĩ miáwo nɛ koe kamɛ ade miasua bikĩ babɔa mbɔdi kĩ bawo a lɛmɛ osi a!”
42011053	Kĩ Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã a, Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ yi fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ kayɔ mɔ Yesu mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ade bɛkavia ye fɔlɛtsa nɛ fɔtsa pii akũ,
42011054	bɛkabɔa mbɔdi kanaĩ kĩ bapi ye nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ a.
42012001	Bati mpim mpim yakpɔta limii kĩ bɛkasumini akũ malo. Yesu nya lɔtɔ ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ paa nɛ Farisifɔ oyila fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
42012002	Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bisua bido ni, baanyɛ de kanya, ade fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa fudi nyɛ fudi ni, bati aanu foe.
42012003	Foesũ kalɛ nyɛ kalɛ kĩ bɛlɛ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ ni, baanu ke mɔ suwa ketee ade kalɛ kĩ biwusa mido nɛ odi sɔtɔ kamɛ ni, baade lɛtsã nɛ ke akũ.
42012004	“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mabi mi kĩ mitavila bikĩ baakɔ sukɛna lɛmɛ ke liti bɛláapuli bɛkɛna lɛtsama fɔba foe.
42012005	Maatsa mi oti a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ miavila. Mivila Baguma a kĩ ntɛ ɛkɔ bati eyua edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yaata be edo nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ kamɛ. Mitɛ yĩ mido, ade ye nyɛ oti kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ miavila a.
42012006	Nnɛ́ kaplɛ nviã banɔ funitataɛ elo? Lɛmɛ Baguma lálɛla kamɔapɛ malo.
42012007	Mi lɔlɔ tɔlɔ malo bɛkã te flee, foesũ mitavila, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ kɔya mibɛ̃ funitataɛ beblebee.
42012008	“Mabi mi yededeede kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛlɛ nɛ bati anɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ yĩ ode ni, Otidziwa Obi lɛmɛ aakɛna lɔmɔ ɛkpa ye nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a anɛ.
42012009	Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ yĩ nɛ bati anɛ ni, Otidziwa Obi lɛmɛ aasĩ ye nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a anɛ.
42012010	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ kalɛ kadi etia Otidziwa Obi ni, baakɔa bite ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa akũ ni, bɛláakɔa bite ye da.
42012011	“Foesũ ntɛ bɛkpã mi banaadzɛmɔ mi nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃, ĩye abãã banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ ĩye fɔgã anɛ ni, mitaha akũ nɛ ayekĩ míapili mi lɔlɔ ĩye lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a akũ.
42012012	Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa aatsa mi lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ.”
42012013	Onyole odi nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bi nwaɛ̃nyole ɛfɔ̃ bɔsɛ̃ boe ɔlɛga adzapadiɛ a kĩ ɛkɔa eyi boe a.”
42012014	Ade ke Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃, owei lɛkpa yĩ osi kĩ ndzɛ mi fɔlɛtsa ĩye nsɛ̃ adzapadiɛ nkpa mi bati nviã kĩĩ?”
42012015	Ade ebi be flee kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ, lɔkɔa mipi mi akũ nɛ anɛngbã akũ, kitonɛkĩ oti nkpã lɛláa akũ fɔtsa kamɛ.”
42012016	Ade Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã ɛlɛ kĩ, “Luwi a, osikani odi kĩ edzi tɔ̃ na tite kĩ yanyɛ funitsã wĩ nɛ te kamɛ.
42012017	Ɛlɛ nɛ ye kamɛ kĩ, ‘Nlá awã kĩ mako yĩ funitsã kĩĩ flee. Litsa maapuli nkɛna?’
42012018	“Ebi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Ade fukĩĩ maakɛna a. Maapansam yĩ tɛpata lɔkɔa nke tɛbaũbaũ awã kĩ maatɛɛ yĩ fugbanɔ mɔ yĩ fɔtsa bɛbã flee.
42012019	Lɔkɔa maabi yĩ ɔkla kĩ, “Ɔna lɔlɔ wĩ paa. Odeĩ fɔtsa wĩ kĩĩ flee kĩ fɔ́akpã nɔ nɛ futeli pii kamɛ. Dzi kawɛya, kanya, kamɔa, kamɔ kawɔlɛ.” ’
42012020	“Lɛmɛ Baguma bi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔasia! Lɛnyɛ mɔapɛ kĩĩ baatɛ nɔ nkpã nɛ nɔ awɛ, lɔkɔa owei aanya fɔtsa a kĩ ɔmanɛ oyi ɔkpa nɔ akũ a?’ ”
42012021	Ade Yesu wũna ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade aye fɔla fɔkpa bikĩ a kĩ bɛmanɛ fɔtsa pii bɛkpa be akũ lɛmɛ bɛtátɛ kɔya nɛ Baguma anɛ a.”
42012022	Ke liti a, Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Foesũ mabi mi kĩ mitaha akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míanya midzi nkpã, ĩye lɛtsa a kĩ míasua akũ a akũ.
42012023	Minyi kĩ nkpã tɛ kɔya ɛba funitsã, ade kutitse lɛmɛ tɛ kɔya kɔba tilima a.
42012024	Midã anande, yaádu funitsã ade yaákpɔta funitsã lɛmɛ a. Ɛlá oli ĩye funitsã kakokɔ̃ lɛmɛ Baguma adɔɔla ye. Mi kɔ̃ mitɛ kɔya kɔlaa miba kɔvɔlabi.
42012025	Mi kamɛ owei aapuli ɛkɔa luwi mɔa ete nɛ ye nkpã fuwi akũ ntɛ eti ɛha ye akũ bo aye malo?
42012026	Ntɛ ɔláapuli ɔkɛna lɛtsama nɛ fɔtsa kabii kĩĩ akũ ni, nde sũ aha nɔ akũ nɛ fɔtsa bɛbã akũ?
42012027	“Midã ayekĩ flawasi abo anɛ. Fɔákɛna adzuma ade fɔánɔ tilima kakpa foe akũ a. Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ Lɛgã Salomo mɔ ye akũ kana fɔtsa a flee malo táhɛhɛ fɔlɛ kadã ndɛ nhuilɛ kĩĩ kamɛ fɔmɔa.
42012028	Baguma akɛɛlɛ lupo kamɛ tuwĩ. Tuwĩ adza nviã, kunya tiku, lɔkɔa bipila te. Nde sũ Baguma lɛláadã kĩ ɛkpa mi lɛtsa a kĩ míasua akũ ɛba tuwĩ a? Mi katɛkado adã kabii koũ!
42012029	Foesũ mitakaha akũ kɔlaa, mitakabu lɔlɔ kamɛ luwi daa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míanya mɔ likĩ míamɔa akũ.
42012030	Kitonɛkĩ bikĩ bɛtátɛ Baguma bido a, ade be adzi kabu lɔlɔ kamɛ nɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ odu akũ a. Mi Ɔlɛga nyina kĩ misĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee.
42012031	Mbom miwɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ osi lɔkɔa yaakpa mi fɔtsa kĩĩ flee lɛmɛ.
42012032	“Mi sukuloo a kĩ mitomɔ yĩ a, mitavila, kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ kĩ yaakpa mi fudzikɔ̃ nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
42012033	Minɔ mi akũ kana fɔtsa mikɔa foe sika a mite ahiãfɔ. Minɔ sika fuvulumi a kĩ fɔláakpeli a mikpa mi akũ, lɔkɔa mikɔla mi akũ kana fɔtsa nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a. Awã naa, foe akũ lɛláatinya kitonɛkĩ oyekpanɛ lɛláapuli ɛta foe ade lupuka lidima lɛmɛ lɛláapuli libula foe kade a.
42012034	Kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ nɔ akũ kana fɔtsa sĩwa deĩ ni, ade awã nɔ ɔwɔlɛ lɛmɛ aana a.
42012035	“Mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ mikpa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ laaya, mido tɛtadiɛ mikpa adzuma kakɛna lɔkɔa mifɔ̃ mi tɛsɛdza tɛkaatɛ̃,
42012036	ndɛ basumunɛ kĩ bidzi badzɔlɛ be Ɔlate kamuniki kato obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ kaya. Ntɛ ɛyabɔa opunu ni baabinya bɛkpa ye mɔatsɛ.
42012037	Kawɔlɛ aade basumunɛ ntɛ be Ɔlate a yamɔ kĩ bɛmanɛ akũ bidzi badzɔlɛ ye kaya. Mabi mi kĩ yaakɔa ye lima efili nɛ kate, ɛfɔ̃ bidzi lɔkɔa ɛsɛ̃ funitsã ɛkpa be bɛnya.
42012038	Kawɔlɛ aade bikĩ baana nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ titiliwu ntɛ ɛya nɛ lɛnyɛ kayite ĩye odenyinawi.
42012039	Ade minyina kĩ ntɛ tɔtɔ ɔlate a enyi lɔkɔ a kĩ oyekpanɛ aya ni, kufɛ ɛláakpa ye osi ebubuli ye kɔla ewo.
42012040	Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ mi malo mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi aaya nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ miláate anɛ a kamɛ.”
42012041	Ade Petro via Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, boe odi ɔbɔa lɛgbã kĩĩ ɔkpa mbɔɛɛ kĩ latamɔ odi nyɛ odi?”
42012042	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Owei nyɛ osumunɛ ɔnɔkɔalini mɔ kadi onyinɛ? Ade ye nyɛ ekĩ ye ɔlate kɔa ɛdzɛla kĩ ɛkaadã tɔtɔ akũ, ɛkpa basumunɛ bɛbã a funitsã nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ akũ.
42012043	Kawɔlɛ aade osumunɛ a kĩ ye ɔlate ayamɔ ye kĩ ɛlamɛna fukĩĩ kakɛna!
42012044	Ɔnɔkɔali, mabi mi kĩ Ɔlate a aakɔa osumunɛ kĩĩ ɛdzɛla nɛ ye fɔtsa a kĩ edeĩ flee a onukpɛ̃.
42012045	Lɛmɛ ntɛ osumunɛ a bi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Yĩ ɔlate buna owi nɛ osi akũ.’ mɔ eyi ye bakɔba basumunɛ batsole mɔ banyole kabo kayɔ, kanya pɔtɔɔ, kamɔa bavɛ kawuga lɛmɛ ni,
42012046	ye ɔlate ayafuta ye luwi mɔa nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛtáte anɛ ĩye ɛláanyi kamɛ. Ɔlate a aavɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ndɛ bikĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ aye.
42012047	“Osumunɛ a kĩ enyina ye adzuma kĩ ye ɔlate kpa ye lɛmɛ ɛtámanɛ akũ ɛkpa foe kakɛna ni, yaatɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ mɔ ɔsĩ paa.
42012048	Lɛmɛ osumunɛ kĩ enyína lɛtsa kĩ ye ɔlate awɛ, lɛmɛ ɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ a lɛfɛta sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ ni, baavɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ sukuloo. Oti kĩ bɛkɔa fɔtsa pii bido nɛ ye awɛ ni, baavia foe pii bitomɛna ye awɛ. Ade oti kĩ bɛkɔa fɔtsa pii kĩ fublusu bido nɛ ye awɛ ni, baavia foe pii kĩ fublusu bitomɛna ye awɛ.
42012049	“Nkɔa kadani vɔɛ̃ kĩ fɔnyɛ fi ĩyaatɛna nɛ katinya kamɛ ade nwɛ kĩ kufɛ fi a fuyi katɛ̃ kayɔ kɔkɔɛ a.
42012050	Ndeĩ mui kawɔla lubo kamɔ adi kĩ maatɛ ade ke fɔ́akaha yĩ ɔwɔlɛ flee kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ lubo kamɔ a atɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ a.
42012051	Miakɔna kĩ lukudɔ nkɔa ĩyamɛna nɛ katinya kamɛ mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Nnɛ́ lukudɔ mbom ɔdzɛ mɔ kasɛ̃ ĩyamɛna.
42012052	Kito finyaa kanaa a, tɔtɔ kĩ bati elo deĩ nɛ te kamɛ ni, kasɛ̃ aaya nɛ be kamɛ. Be ɛlalɛ ayidza bɛdza nɛ be nviã akũ ade be nviã aayidza bɛdza nɛ be ɛlalɛ akũ a.
42012053	Babilɛga aayidza bɛdza nɛ be babinyole akũ, ade babinyole aayidza bɛdza nɛ be balɛga akũ a. Babima aayidza bɛdza nɛ be babitsole akũ ade babitsole aayidza bɛdza nɛ be bama akũ a. Nyina amɛ aayidza bɛdza nɛ be babi batsɔ̃ akũ ade babi batsɔ̃ aayidza bɛdza nɛ be nyina amɛ akũ a.”
42012054	Yesu buki ebi bati a kĩ, “Ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ oni dza nɛ suwa katomukɔ̃ ni mialɛ kĩ oni aako, ade yako lɛmɛ a.
42012055	Ade ke ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ ɔwɛ bɔa eto kayɔ sɛmakɛ ni, mialɛ kĩ ovio ya, ade fɔaya lɔmɔ a.
42012056	Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ, miapuli kadã tite mɔ odetɔ́ kamɛ kamɔ kalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ laaya. Nde sũ miápuli minyɛ nviã lɔkɔ kĩĩ kayɔ?
42012057	“Nde sũ miápuli mike otse mikpa mi akũ nɛ lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ mikɛna akũ?
42012058	Ntɛ odi bɔɛ kalɛ nɛ nɔ akũ ni, tsã osi nyɛ osi akũ mimɔ ye milɛ foe fɔmɔ yanaadza nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni yaavɛlɛ nɔ ɛma fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ ade ye malo yaakɔa nɔ ɛkpa polisifɔ bɛnaado nɔ nɛ kɔla a.
42012059	Mabi nɔ kĩ ade awã aana flee kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ose kɔtɔ a flee oyua a.”
42013001	1 Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, bati badi yakpa Yesu kanyi kĩ Pilato kɔ Galileafɔ badi nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkabɔa afɔliɛ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ nɛ Yerusalem.
42013002	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mikɔna kĩ Galileafɔ a kĩ bɛkɔ a tɛnɛ titikpa kakɛna kaba Galileafɔ bɛbã flee a sũ?
42013003	Oowo, nnɛ́ aye kɔlaa! Mabi mi kĩ ntɛ mitádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, mi a flee míaku ndɛ be aye.
42013004	Nde nyɛ bati ewua-alɛ̃ a kĩ Siloam kɔla gɛlɛɛlɛ veli kɔkɔ be a? Mikɔna kĩ be nyɛ titikpa bakɛnanɛ bɛba bikĩ nɛ Yerusalem flee a?
42013005	Oowo! Nnɛ́ aye fɔla kɔlaa! Mabi mi kĩ ntɛ mitádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, míaku ndɛ be aye.”
42013006	Ade Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lɔkɔ lidi onyole odi du atɔ kutse nɛ ye kɔba kamɛ. Ɛkasɛla kadã ntɛ yaana atɔ babi nɛ koe akũ lɛmɛ ɛtána badima.
42013007	Ade ke ebi ekĩ yadãmɛna kɔba akũ kĩ, ‘Dã! Ade futeli ɛlalɛ mɔa flee kĩ maya nɛ awĩ kayaawɛ kutse kĩĩ babi lɛmɛ maámɔ badima. Tsua koe kamuni. Nde sũ kɔadza kɔkabula tite a kade?’
42013008	“Lɛmɛ kɔba akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, fɔ̃ kɔdza, kpa yĩ kateli mɔa kabu. Maatu nsinya koe lɔkɔa nko fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́akpa koe tite kanɔ.
42013009	Ntɛ kuwũ atɔ babi kateliva ni, kekɔ̃ fɔnɛnɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ kɔtáwũ babi ni, aapuli ɔfɔ̃ bitsua koe bimuni.’ ”
42013010	Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi akũ ni, Yesu katsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ kadi.
42013011	Otsole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa do ye fɔsɔ mɔ akũ futeli ewua-alɛ̃ flee na nɛ awã. Fɔsɔ a fɔ̃ ekũũkũ ebuki yaápuli eyo akũ kpĩĩ.
42013012	Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye a ɛvɛ ye ebi ye kĩ, “Boe ɔma, bɛnyɛ nɔ nɛ fɔsɔ kamɛ!”
42013013	Yesu kɔa awɛ ete nɛ ye akũ. Lɛtalɛta otsole a puli eyo akũ kpĩĩ ade ke emu Baguma a.
42013014	Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ yadãmɛna Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a na kalɔkpa paa kĩ Yesu tsa ɔsɔnɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ, foesũ ebi bati a kĩ, “Fuwi evũ deĩ kĩ foe kamɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna adzuma. Foesũ miya nɛ fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ bɛtsa mi fɔsɔ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a akũ!”
42013015	Boe Ɔlate kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ, mianyɛ mi bayaɛ tɔwɛ̃ banaamɔa mui nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.
42013016	Finyaakĩĩ amɔ Abraham kasinu kamɛ obi kĩ Abonsam do ye fɔsɔ mɔ akũ futeli ewua-alɛ̃ flee. Fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ banyɛ ye nɛ tɔwɛ̃ kamɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a akũ?”
42013017	Mbuayɛ a kĩ Yesu kpa a fɔ̃ kɔnyɔã wo ye bakesĩnɛ a, lɛmɛ kawɔlɛ de bati a nɛ awãwã fɔtsa flee a kĩ ɛkɛna a sũ.
42013018	Ade Yesu via kĩ, “Nde Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la? Litsa maakɔa nkɔnamɔ de?
42013019	Fɔla ndɛ fudutsa libi kabii ki onyole odi bɔɛ ɛnadu nɛ ye kɔba. Libi a mɛ libo anɛ lɛkɛna kutse, ade kɔvɔlabi yakɛna fɔtsɔɛ nɛ koe tɛnanɛ kamɛ a.”
42013020	Yesu buki evia kĩ, “Litsa maakɔa Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a nkɔnamɔ?
42013021	Fɔla ndɛ ayekĩ otsole kɔa oyila fɔtsa ɛtsɛka nɛ bodobodo onuvoe baũ kamɛ, fɔna flee kɛnawo kĩ evuya puu.”
42013022	Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu anaa Yerusalem a, ɛnatsã tɛmatɔ mɔ tukula kamɛ ɛkatsa bati fɔtsa.
42013023	Ade odi via ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, mbɔɛɛ bati sukuloo aana katɛ?” Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ,
42013024	“Bɔa mbɔdi katsã onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ ɛtása a kamɛ kawo, kitonɛkĩ bati pii abɔa mbɔdi kĩ bawo lɛmɛ bɛláapuli.
42013025	Kɔla ɔlate a aayidza ɛyaabalɛ kɔla a, ade ntɛ midza nɛ kanya mikabɔa opunu kalɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, binya kakpa boe ni.’ “Ɔlate a aakpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Ĩnyína mi mɔ awã kĩ mito!’
42013026	“Ade ke míalɛ kĩ, ‘Bɔmɔ nɔ lɛnya bɔmɔa ade ɔtsa fɔtsa nɛ boe ɔmatɔ kamɛ lɛmɛ a!’
42013027	“Lɛmɛ yaakpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Ĩnyína awã kĩ mito! Midzakũ nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃, mi tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ.’
42013028	“Awã naa, kabe kadi kĩ míabe, miba adɔ̃ ntɛ mimɔ́ Abraham, Isak mɔ Yakob mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a flee nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ bɛblɔmɛna mi kĩ mitawo.
42013029	Bati aato suwa kadekɔ̃ mɔ suwa katomukɔ̃, kayɔ mɔ nyangɛ bɛyaanya bɛmɔa nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
42013030	Ade bati a kĩ bɛkpa liti finyaa a, badi aadani batɔnyade, ade bikĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ finyaa a, badi aadani liti bakpanɛ.”
42013031	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Farisifɔ badi yabi Yesu kĩ, “Wɛ sɔwa kadzakũ nɛ awĩ kĩĩ kanaa kakɔ bɛbã, kitonɛkĩ lɛgã Herodes wɛ kĩ yaakɔ nɔ.”
42013032	Ade ke Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minaabi kalikii a kĩ, ‘Nviã mɔ kunya flee maakablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa, maatsa fɔsɔ lɛmɛ, ade nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde a akũ ni, maayua yĩ adzuma.’
42013033	Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ mpi osi, nviã, kunya mɔ kukunya, kitonɛkĩ fɔtáfɛta kĩ bakɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ nɛ kakɔma kɛba Yerusalem.
42013034	“Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Nɔ bati kɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a ade bɛtalɛ bikĩ Baguma do nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ a boe bɛkɔ be a. Titi eni ntáwɛ kĩ makpɔta nɔ babi ndɛ ayekĩ ɔkɔkɔbima api ye babi kado nɛ ye fupoki kayɔ, lɛmɛ ɔtákpa yĩ osi.
42013035	Nɛ foesũ finyaa nɔ Asɔli Kɔla aawaa luto. Ade mabi mi kĩ miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ míalɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma hila ekĩ yaya nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a!’ ”
42014001	Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi akũ ni, kĩ Yesu naanya nɛ Farisifɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi awã a, bati a ko anɛ bɛkadã ye.
42014002	Onyole odi kĩ ye akpɔ mɔ abɔa wumi dzi nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ.
42014003	Ade ke Yesu via Farisifɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a kĩ, “Boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛtsa oti nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ mbɔɛɛ kĩ ɛtákpa osi?”
42014004	Lɛmɛ bisĩ bɛtákpa ye mbuayɛ. Ade Yesu ta oti a ɛtsa ye, ɛnyɛ ye osi ɛdzakũ a.
42014005	Ade ɛdani ebi be kĩ, “Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi obi ĩye ɔnantsue tɔ mui lɛkɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ ni, miáwɛ sɔwa kanaanyɛ ye nɛ lɛkɛ a kamɛ?”
42014006	Lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bɛkpa ye foe mbuayɛ.
42014007	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ayekĩ bati a kĩ bɛvɛ nɛ kanyakɔ̃ kawãnɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ a, ɛbɔa be lɛgbã kĩĩ kĩ,
42014008	“Ntɛ odi vɛ nɔ nɛ obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ ni, tanaadzi nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ kadzikɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ fɔ́apuli fɔya kĩ ɛvɛ odi kĩ edeĩ obu ɛbɛ̃ nɔ,
42014009	lɔkɔa oti a kĩ ɛvɛ mi bati nviã ayabi nɔ kĩ, ‘Kɔa nɔ lukpo kakpa oti kĩĩ’ ade ke aakɔa kɔnyɔã oyidza ɔnaadzi nɛ kakɔ nkaɛ a.
42014010	Mbom ntɛ bɛvɛ nɔ nɛ kakɔ kadi ni, naadzi nɛ kakɔ a kĩ kɛtátɛ kɔya, ayekĩ ntɛ ekĩ ɛvɛ nɔ a yamɔ nɔ ni, yaabi nɔ kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔba, yidza kanaadzi nɛ awã kĩ kɛtɛ kɔya a.’ Awã naa bati bɛbã flee a kĩ bɛvɛ a aakɔa obu bɛkpa nɔ,
42014011	kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɛla ye akũ nɛ ode ni, baakɛna ye nɛ kayɔ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ni, baadɛla ye nɛ ode!”
42014012	Ade Yesu bi oti a kĩ ɛtsɛlamɔ ye nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a kĩ, “Ntɛ ote opunu ɔkpa bati ni, tavɛ nɔ bakɔba, awaɛ̃ amɛ, nɔ kɔla babi ĩye nɔ badzi kɔba a kĩ bideĩ akũ a, ayekĩ baavɛ nɔ malo ɔnaanya nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ bise kɔtɔ.
42014013	Mbom ntɛ ate opunu ni, vɛ ahiãfɔ, bikĩ bɛnɛ lɛkpɛ̃, bikĩ biveliveli mɔ banɛkunɛ.
42014014	Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ Baguma lihila nɔ kusɛkusɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɛláapuli bise nɔ foe kɔtɔ. Lɛmɛ Baguma aase nɔ kɔtɔ nɛ luwi a kĩ bati wĩ aayidza bito kanɔkpa a.”
42014015	Kĩ bati a kĩ bidzi nɛ opunu akũ bɛkanya kamɛ ɔmɔa nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a, ebi ye kĩ, “Kawɔlɛ aade bati a kĩ baadzi nɛ opunu akũ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
42014016	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Luwi a onyole odi te opunu ɛvɛ bati beblebee.
42014017	Kĩ kanya lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ a edo ye osumunɛ kĩ ɛnaavɛ bikĩ ɛtsɛlamɛna a kĩ, ‘Miya. Buyua Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa!’ ”
42014018	“Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ ɛtsɛlamɛna a flee kamɛ odi nyɛ odi nyɛ onukpɛ̃. Oti ɔtɔnyade bi osumunɛ a kĩ, ‘Nnaya tite finyaa, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ nnaadã te, make nɔ aduli nláapuli ĩya.’
42014019	“Oti bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, ‘Ĩya banantsue ewua, kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ nkpã be nnaasɔ be ndã ntɛ baapuli bɛkɛna adzuma kakɛna wĩ. Makɛ nɔ aduli, nláapuli ĩya.’
42014020	“Oti bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, ‘Wɔadzɔ nkɔã ɔtsɔ̃, foesũ nláapuli ĩya.’
42014021	“Osumunɛ a muniki ɛnabi ye ɔlate lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a flee. Awã naa ɔlate a na kalɔkpa paa ade ebi ye osumunɛ a kĩ, ‘Wɛ sɔwa kanaa tɔblɔnu mɔ fɔla fuyite nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, kakpã ahiãfɔ, lɛkpɛ̃ banɛnɛ, banɛkunɛ mɔ bikĩ biveliveli a kayamɛna.’
42014022	“Owi tábuna mɔ osumunɛ a yabi ye kĩ, ‘Yĩ ɔlate nkɛna nɛ nɔ ɔlɛdo akũ, lɛmɛ fudzikɔ̃ buki fute.’
42014023	“Ade ke ɔlate a bi ye kĩ, ‘Naa tɔblɔnu mɔ fusikũ akũ nɛ tukula kamɛ, kabi be kĩ bɛya ayekĩ kɔla a kamɛ aayi.
42014024	Mabi mi a flee kĩ, bikĩ be ĩnya lɔtɔ nvɛ a kamɛ odima lɛláata yĩ funitsã a onukpɛ̃!’ ”
42014025	Luwi a, kĩ bati kɔdabu tomɔ Yesu a, ɛdani ebi be kĩ,
42014026	“Ntɛ odi ya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mɔ yawɛ ye ɔlɛga, ɔma, ɔtsɔ̃, babi, bawaɛ̃nyole mɔ bawaɛ̃tsole, mɔ ye mɔawɛ akũ kalɛ kaba yĩ ni, ɛláapuli ɛnya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.
42014027	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtábɔɛ ye asendua ɛlɔ etomɔ yĩ ni, ɛláapuli ɛnya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.
42014028	“Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi awɛ kĩ yake kɔla baũ kudi ni, yaánya lɔtɔ kadzi kabu kɔla a kake akũ akunta kadã, kamɔ ntɛ yaana sika epuli eke kɔla a ewũna?
42014029	Ntɛ ɛtákɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, ɛláapuli eyua kɔla a titɔ kĩ eke kayɔkayi futekũ malo. Ade ke bati flee a kĩ bamɔ foe a aadi ye nsekuo bɛlɛ kĩ,
42014030	‘Oti kĩĩ yi kɔla kake kayɔ lɛmɛ ɛtápuli eke koe ewũna.’
42014031	“Ntɛ lɛgã lidi aabɔɛ kawũ nɛ lɛgã bɛbã akũ ni, yaanya lɔtɔ edzi ɛkɔna foe akũ ɛdã ntɛ yaapuli ɛkɔa sodzafɔ mpim ewua ɛnya lɛgã bɛbã a kĩ lideĩ sodzafɔ mpim tɛya a akũ.
42014032	Ntɛ ɛláapuli ni, yaanya lɔtɔ edo batɔ nɛ lɛgã kĩ a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛtáfuã akũ lɔkɔa ɛkpa lɔlɔ.”
