42014033	Yesu lɛ ewũna kĩ, “Ade aye mi kamɛ odima lɛláapuli ɛnya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ ntɛ ɛtáfɔnɛ ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ awɛ a.
42014034	“Lɛdɛmɛ nɛnɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ lɛyɛla de ɔmɛnɛ ni, osi odima lɛláa kĩ aatsã ye akũ obuki odo de ɔmɛnɛ.
42014035	Lɛnɛ́nɛ lɛkpa ndɛ tite kanɔ, ĩye lɛkpa fukluku kawulakɔ̃ malo. Kata bata de kawula. “Okĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse katse wĩ!”
42015001	Luwi a, tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bɛbã ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bɛyaatse ye fɔlɛtsa.
42015002	Nɛ awã naa, Farisifɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a kakɛna hũhũhũhũ kalɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ atɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ ade yado awɛ kanya mɔ be malo a!”
42015003	Foesũ Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã kĩĩ kĩ,
42015004	“Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi ɔmɔa deĩ baveli ɔha mɔ kɔmɔa yɛla nɛ be kamɛ a, litsa yaakɛna? Yaafɔnɛ baveli aduekrɔũ-evedi a nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a ɛnaatsã ɛwɛ kukĩ kɔyɛla a kɛnaawo kĩ ɛmɔ koe.
42015005	Ntɛ ɛmɔ koe a, yaamɔ kawɔlɛ paa lɔkɔa ɛbɔɛ koe ete nɛ lɔbɔtɛɛ ɛyamɛna nɛ kɔla.
42015006	Ade yaavɛ ye bakɔba mɔ banunɛ ebi be kĩ, ‘Kawɔlɛ de yĩ kĩ mmɔ́ yĩ kuveli a kĩ kɔyɛla a, foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ!’
42015007	Mabi mi kĩ ade aye baamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a nɛ oti mɔa kĩ ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ akũ, kɛba bati aduekrɔũ-evedi kĩ be akũ kpalɛ kĩ bɛtásĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kadani.
42015008	“Ntɛ otsole odi deĩ sika ovoe babi ewua mɔ ɛyɛla libi mɔa ni, litsa yaakɛna? Yaatɛna ɔsɛdza ɛyɔ kɔla kamɛ ɛdã kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ yededeede kɛnawo kĩ ɛmɔ sika libi a.
42015009	Ntɛ ɛmɔ de a, yaavɛ ye bakɔba mɔ banunɛ ɛkpɔta ebi be kĩ, ‘Kawɔlɛ de yĩ paa kitonɛkĩ mmɔ́ yĩ sika libi a kĩ lɛyɛla a. Mifɔ̃ bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ!’
42015010	Mabi mi kĩ ade aye Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ aamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ mɔa kĩ ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ akũ a.”
42015011	Yesu lɛ ɛnaa lɔtɔ kĩ, “Onyole odi na babinyole nviã.
42015012	Ade obisɛ̃de a bi ɔlɛga kĩ, ‘Papa, kɔa adzapadiɛ a kĩ yaanya yĩ kanyakɔ̃ a kakpa yĩ finyaa.’ Foesũ onyole a sɛ̃ ye adzapadiɛ kamɛ ɛkpa ye babinyole nviã a.
42015013	“Nɛ fuwi fudi liti ni, obisɛ̃de a nɔ ye kanyakɔ̃ fɔtsa a flee ade ɛdzakũ mɔ foe sika a. Ɛnaa katide mɔ lugo ɛnabula sika a kade nɛ nkpã basabasa kadzi kamɛ.
42015014	Ebula lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ a kade. Ke liti a kɔlɛ kudi nɛ nɛ tite a na flee akũ ade ohiã pi ye a.
42015015	Nɛ foesũ ɛnaa onyole odi nɛ tite a akũ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ yanaakɛna adzuma ɛkpa ye. Onyole a kpa ye baplakuo akũ kadãmɛna nɛ ye kɔba.
42015016	Nɛ kɔlɛ sũ ɛwɛ kĩ yanya funitsã a kĩ bɛkako baplakuo a fudi lɛmɛ odima tákpa ye lɛtsama.
42015017	“Nɛ ke kawũna a, ɛyamɔ ye akũ eyi ɔsũ, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Bati a kĩ nda bɔɛ bakɛna tudzuma a ana kanya kawĩ pɔtɔɔ fɔate malo. Amɔ yĩ dzi nɛ awĩ kɔlɛ ayua yĩ kakɔ.
42015018	Maayidza nnaa nda sɛkɛ̃ nnaabi ye kĩ, “Papa, nkɛna tɔkpa nɛ Baguma mɔ nɔ akũ.
42015019	Ntáfɛta kĩ abuki ɔvɛ yĩ kĩ nɔ obi, mbom kɔa yĩ kakɛna ndɛ nɔ tudzuma bakɛnanɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa.” ’
42015020	Foesũ eyidza epi osi yanaa ɔlɛga sɛkɛ̃. “Ɔlɛga mɔ́ ye mɔ lugo kĩ yaya. Obi akũ kɔ ye kɔnya ade ewula atsɛ ɛnatu eboomu ye a.
42015021	“Ade ke obi a bi ye kĩ, ‘Papa, nkɛna tɔkpa nɛ Baguma mɔ nɔ akũ. Ntáfɛta kĩ abuki ɔvɛ yĩ kĩ nɔ obi.’
42015022	“Lɛmɛ ɔlɛga a vɛ ye basumunɛ a ebi be kĩ, ‘Miwɛ sɔwa mibɔɛ tɛtadiɛ kĩ tɛnɛnɛ paa mido ye. Mido ye lipetia nɛ lawobi mɔ mpabua nɛ abɔa.
42015023	Ke liti ni, minaanyɛ ɔnantsue kĩ ɛdɔli paa mikɔ, lɔkɔa bɔnya bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ.
42015024	Kitonɛkĩ bɔbɔɛ foe kĩ yĩ obi kĩĩ ku lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ edzi nkpã. Ɛyɛla lɛmɛ bɛmɔ́ ye.’ Foesũ biyi luwi a kanya kayɔ.
42015025	“Nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ a, obinyolenɔkɔɛ̃ a na nɛ kɔba. Kĩ eto yade, efuã tɔtɔ kamɛ a, enu tɔnɔ mɔ kuto nkã.
42015026	Foesũ ɛvɛ basumunɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa evia ye kĩ, ‘Litsa lámɔ kaya nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ?’
42015027	“Osumunɛ a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Awaɛ̃ muniki ɛya nɛ ɔtɔ ade ke aga fɔ̃ bɛkɔ ɔnantsue dɔliwa a, kitonɛkĩ emuniki ɛya mɔ akũ ɔsĩ.’
42015028	“Tuwũna ba ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a, ade esĩ kĩ yaáwo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, foesũ ɔlɛga naa ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛnake ye aduli kĩ ewo ɛya nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.
42015029	Lɛmɛ obi bi ɔlɛga kĩ, ‘Dã, nkɛna adzuma ndɛ ɔsate nɛ futeli pii kĩĩ kamɛ nkpa nɔ, kĩ ntáyidza ndza nɛ nɔ akũ da. Ade ɔtákpa tɔ̃ yĩ midi katukpabi malo kĩ nkɔ bɔmɔ yĩ bakɔba bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ a.
42015030	Lɛmɛ nɔ obi kĩĩ nabula nɔ akũ kana fɔtsa flee kade nɛ adɔpaafɔ akũ ade kĩ emuniki ɛya ni, ɔkɔ ɔnantsue dɔliwa akpa ye!’
42015031	“Awã naa, ɔlɛga bi ye kĩ, ‘Yĩ obi, odeĩ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ luwi daa, ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ndeĩ a, nɔ lide lanɛ.
42015032	Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔanya luwi bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɔbɔɛ foe kĩ awaɛ̃ kĩĩ ku lɛmɛ finyaa edzi nkpã, ɛyɛla lɛmɛ bɔmɔ́ ye.’ ”
42016001	Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Osikani odi na adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kĩ edzi nɛ ye tudzuma onukpɛ̃. Bati yabi osikani a kĩ ye tudzuma onukpɛ̃ ɔdzanɛ a abula ye sika kade.
42016002	Foesũ osikani a vɛ tudzuma onukpɛ̃ ɔdzanɛ a evia ye kĩ, ‘Litsa fɔlɛtsa manu kĩ balɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a? Kɛna akunta yededeede nɛ ayekĩ ɔnɛɛ yĩ tudzuma akũ, kitonɛkĩ ɔláapuli obuki ɔnya yĩ fɔtsa akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ.’
42016003	“Ade ke tudzuma akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a bi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Yĩ ɔlate aablɔmɛna yĩ nɛ adzuma kamɛ. Litsa maakɛna? Nlá kɔbɛ̃ kĩ maatu tɔbɔnkam ade ke kɔnyɔã akɔ yĩ mɔ fɔtsa kawã lɛmɛ a.
42016004	Ahãã! Ĩnyina lɛtsa a kĩ maakɛna. Ntɛ adzuma nɛ́ nɛ yĩ awɛ ni, maana bakɔba kĩ baatɛ yĩ mɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ be awã!’
42016005	“Foesũ ɛvɛ bati a kĩ bidzimɔ ye ɔlate fɔtɔ a. Evia ɔtɔnyade a kĩ, ‘Ani odzimɔ yĩ ɔlate?’
42016006	“Ekĩ edzimɔ kɔtɔ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Bɔ̃ tɛkantsi ɔha.’ “Ade tudzuma akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a bi ye kĩ, ‘Amɔ nɔ akunta nɛ awĩ. Kɛna akũ kadzi katsɛlɛ aduenum.’
42016007	“Ade evia ɔbɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ malo ani odzimɛna?’ “Kɔtɔ odzimɛnanɛ a lɛ kĩ, ‘Fugbanɔ fuvũ baũbaũ ɔha mɔa.’ “Oti a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ tudzuma onukpɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, ‘Amɔ nɔ akunta nɛ awĩ. Tsɛlɛ aduesɔũ kayi.’
42016008	“Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ɔlate a mu ye tudzuma ɔdãmɛnanɛ a nɛ nyansã tɛdake tisi a kĩ ɛbɔɛ a sũ. Ɔnɔkɔali ni, katinya kamɛ bati deĩ nyansã tisi nɛ be fɔtsakɛlawa kamɛ bɛbɛ̃ bikĩ batse Baguma kalɛ a.”
42016009	Ade Yesu lɛ ɛnaa lɔtɔ kĩ, “Mikɔa katinya kamɛ akũ kana fɔtsa mikɛna tɔkɔba, ayekĩ ntɛ fuwoli ni, baatɛ mi nɛ daa nkpã ɔtɔ a kamɛ.
42016010	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edi oni nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ ni, yaadi fɔtsa baũ akũ oni. Ade ayea odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtádi oni nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ ni, ɛláadi fɔtsa baũ akũ oni lɛmɛ.
42016011	Ade ntɛ mitádi katinya kamɛ fɔtsa akũ oni a, nde baapuli bɛkɔa fɔtsa kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya fɔba katinya kamɛ fɔtsa bido nɛ mi awɛ?
42016012	Ntɛ mitádi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ oti bɛbã fude kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya akũ oni ni, owei aakɔa litsedi kĩ laanya mi fude ɛkpa mi?
42016013	“Osumunɛ odima lɛláapuli esum balate nviã. Yaakesĩ ɔmɔa lɔkɔa ɛwɛ ɔyade a kalɛ. Ĩye yaakɔa ye akũ ɛkpa ɔmɔa lɔkɔa ɛvɛlɛ akũ nɛ ɔyade a akũ. Ɔnɔkɔali nyɛ kĩ, ɔláapuli osum Baguma mɔ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa.”
42016014	Kĩ Farisifɔ a nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a, bɛnyɛ ye ahĩsɛm kitonɛkĩ sika bawɛnɛ banɛ.
42016015	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minyɛ bati kĩ bakɛna be akũ ndɛ badã yedede nɛ bati bɛbã anɛ, lɛmɛ Baguma nyina mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya nɛ otidziwa anɛ a, fɔnyɛ kɔwɛ̃ fɔtsa nɛ Baguma anɛ.
42016016	“Mose mbla mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi a kɛna adzuma kɛyawo Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a lɔkɔ. Kito ke a, balɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ, ade odi nyɛ odi lamɛna kapili kĩ yawo nɛ de kamɛ.
42016017	Lɛmɛ fɔadã bɔɛɛ kĩ tite mɔ ode aawɔ kɛba kĩ baafɔnɛ fɔlɛtsa kabiiwɛ awɛ nɛ mbla a kamɛ.
42016018	“Onyole nyɛ onyole kĩ esĩ ɔtsɔ̃, mɔ ɛnakɔã ɔbɛbã ni, ɛbɔa adɔpaa. Ade onyole kĩ ɛkɔã otsole kĩ bisĩ ni, ye malo ɛbɔa adɔpaa.
42016019	“Osikani odi dzi nkpã. Ɛkahihiɛ ye akũ nɛ tilima kĩ tɛtɛ kɔya kamɛ, ade ɛkanya nkpã mɛnɛmɛnɛ luwi daa a.
42016020	Ohiãni odi lɛmɛ kĩ bavɛ Lazaro lɛmɛ dzi nkpã tɔ̃. Fɔɔkpa nɛ́ nɛ ye akũ flee ade bɛkabɔɛ ye kanaadzina nɛ osikani a kɔla onyukpɛ̃ a.
42016021	Ɛkakɔna kĩ yaana funitsã wuliwa a kĩ fɔato osikani opunu akũ katɔ nɛ tite a ɛnya. Bakpete malo kayadzɛmɛ ye fɔɔkpa a kamɛ.
42016022	“Ohiãni a ku, ade ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ yabɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna ode bɛnadzina nɛ Abraham ɔwɛ̃ a. Osikani a lɛmɛ yaku, ade ke bibila ye a.
42016023	Nɛ kanɔkpade awã kĩ ɛkamɔ lubo paa a, ɛdzɛla anɛ ɛmɔ Abraham mɔ lugo nɛ ode, mɔ Lazaro lɛmɛ kĩ edzi nɛ ye ɔwɛ̃.
42016024	Ade osikani a bɔa fɔwɔla ɛvɛ ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlɛga Abraham! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya kafɔ̃ Lazaro edo lawobi nɛ mui kamɛ ɛta nɛ yĩ sɛmɛ akũ, ayekĩ fɔ́adɔla yĩ ɔmɔado, kitonɛkĩ nlamɛna lubo kamɔ nɛ fi kĩĩ kamɛ!’
42016025	“Lɛmɛ Abraham bi ye kĩ, ‘Yĩ obi, te anɛ kĩ bɛkpa nɔ fɔtsa wĩ flee nɛ nɔ nkpã kamɛ, lɛmɛ Lazaro kɔ̃ ni, fɔtsa kpa nɛnɛ ɛna. Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ a, ɛlamɛna kawɔlɛ kamɔ, ade nɔ malo ɔlamɛna lubo kamɔ a.
42016026	Ade lɛtsa kĩ lɛbɛ̃ kɔlaa nyɛ kĩ, lɛkɛ dzununuunu waa nɛ boe kayite, kĩ ntɛ odi wɛ kĩ yato awĩ ɛnyina ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, ɛláapuli. Ade ayea ntɛ odi lɛmɛ wɛ kĩ yato awã ɛnyina ɛya nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃, ɛláapuli a.’
42016027	“Awã naa, osikani a bi ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlɛga Abraham, make nɔ aduli kĩ do Lazaro ɛnaa nda tɔtɔ kamɛ,
42016028	awã kĩ ndeĩ bawaɛ̃nyole elo. Fɔ̃ ɛnaabɔa be kɔkɔ ayekĩ be malo bɛláayawo nɛ lubo kamɔ kĩĩ kamɛ.’
42016029	“Ade Abraham bi ye kĩ, ‘Awaɛ̃ amɛ deĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Mose mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a tsɛlɛ biyi a. Kɛnɛ kĩ bitse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ a lɔkɔa bɛkɛna nɛ foe akũ.’
42016030	“Osikani a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlɛga Abraham, fɔláawĩ be! Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi aayidza eto kanɔkpa ɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ ni, baadani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.’
42016031	“Lɛmɛ Abraham bi ye kĩ, ‘Ntɛ bɛláatse Mose mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a fɔlɛtsa ni, ntɛ odi to kanɔkpa ɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ malo a, bɛláatɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a bido.’ ”
42017001	Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Fɔtsa a kĩ foe aafɔ̃ bati liwo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ a aaya kokooko, lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa oti a kĩ ye akũ fɔ́atsã fɔya a!
42017002	Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa ye ntɛ bɛkɔa kɔwɔlɛ kpale bɛvɛla ye nɛ sɔmɔ bɛta bido nɛ mpo kamɛ, kɛba kĩ yaafɔ̃ babisɛ̃ kamɛ ɔmɔa liwo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ.
42017003	Foesũ midã kadã wĩ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ miakɛna a akũ. “Ntɛ awaɛ̃ kɛna nɔ tɔkpa ni, kã ye anɛ. Ntɛ etunɔ kĩ eku kɔtɔ ni, kɔa kate ye.
42017004	Ntɛ ɛkɛna tɔkpa nɛ nɔ akũ titi evũkɔnɔ nɛ luwi mɔa kamɛ mɔ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ɛyabi nɔ kĩ eku kɔtɔ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ akɔa ote ye.”
42017005	Fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fɔ̃ boe katɛkado kide nɛ ode kibu.”
42017006	Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ odeĩ katɛkado kĩ kɛpɔnɛ lububu ndɛ kutse libi kabiiwɛ flee ni, aapuli obi kutse kĩĩ kĩ, ‘Bɔlɛ mɔ tunu kanaadza nɛ mpo kamɛ’ ade kɔ́atse nɔ a.
42017007	“Mibɔɛ foe kĩ mi kamɛ odi deĩ ɔpaani kĩ yadã nɔ kɔba akũ, ĩye ekĩ yadãmɛna nɔ baveli akũ, ntɛ eto ede a, aabi ye kĩ ɛwɛ sɔwa ɛyadzi ɛnya?
42017008	Oowo! Mbom aabi ye kĩ, ‘Manɛ akũ katɔ funitsã, kadza kasum yĩ, ĩnya, mmɔa ĩyua tɔ̃ fɔmɔ nɔ malo aanya.’
42017009	Osumunɛ tásĩ ɛkpa kɔlɛkanyɛ ntɛ ɛkɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna akũ. Mbɔɛɛ esĩ?
42017010	Ade ayea fɔla fɔkpa mi a. Ntɛ mikɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi kĩ mikɛna ni, milɛ kĩ, ‘Basumunɛ odi bɔanɛ, lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ de bɔakɛna a, ade de bɔkɛna a.’ ”
42017011	Kĩ Yesu anaa Yerusalem a, ɛnatsã Samaria mɔ Galilea ɔbɛ̃ akũ.
42017012	Kĩ ɛkɔa yawo akula adi kamɛ a, banyole ewua kĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ngbã yatsɛlamɔ ye.
42017013	Bɛdza mɔ lugo ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Boe Ɔlɛga Yesu, mɔ boe kɔnya!”
42017014	Yesu dã be ade ebi be kĩ, “Minaa, minaakɔa mi akũ mitsa basɔfɔ bɛsɛla mi akũ bɛdã.” Kĩ bɛyɛlɛ banaa nɛ osi a, fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ be akũ.
42017015	Kĩ be kamɛ ɔmɔa mɔ kĩ fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ ye akũ a, emuniki ɛya mɔ Baguma kamu mɔ fɔwɔla kɔɔba.
42017016	Ɛyatɔ nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ ɛnyɛ ye kɔlɛ. Onyole kĩĩ nyɛ Samariani.
42017017	Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nnɛ́ banyole ewua ntsa fɔsɔ a? Nde be evedi nkaɛ a?
42017018	Nde sũ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ kĩĩ odi limuniki ɛyaanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ?”
42017019	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yidza kanaa. Nɔ katɛkado fɔ̃ ɔsaɛ.”
42017020	Farisifɔ badi via Yesu lɔkɔ a kĩ de kamɛ Baguma lɛgãkanya a aaya. Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Baguma lɛgãkanya a lɛlaaya nɛ osi a kĩ bati amɔ mɔ anɛ a.
42017021	Odima lɛláalɛ kĩ, ‘Dã, amɔ foe nɛ awĩ’ ĩye ‘amɔ foe nɛ akĩĩ,’ kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ.”
42017022	Ke liti a ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Lɔkɔ lidi aaya kĩ míawɛ kĩ miamɔ Yĩ Otidziwa Obi fuwi a kamɛ lɔmɔa lɛmɛ miláamɔ de.
42017023	Bati badi aana, ade baabi mi kĩ, ‘Midã ye nɛ akĩĩ!’ ĩye ‘Midã ye nɛ awĩ!’ Lɛmɛ mitatomɔ foe liti.
42017024	Kitonɛkĩ ayekĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ amɔanɛ kato sɛkɛ kĩĩ kanaa sikĩĩ a, ade aye Otidziwa Obi a kaya aana a.
42017025	Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛmɔ lubo pii, ade nviã bati lɛmɛ aasĩ ye a.
42017026	“Ayekĩ fɔna nɛ Noa lɔkɔ a, ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ Otidziwa Obi a kabuki kaya fuwi a kamɛ a.
42017027	Bati flee kanya bɛkamɔa, banyole mɔ batsole kakɔã akũ, kɛnawo luwi a kĩ Noa de ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ade oni ko eyili fɔkɔ ɛwɔla bati flee a.
42017028	“Ade ayea fɔ́ana ndɛ ayekĩ fɔna nɛ Lot lɔkɔ lɛmɛ a. Bati kanya, bɛkamɔa, bɛkanya kɔyaatɔ, kadu fɔtsa ade badi lɛmɛ kake fɔla a.
42017029	Ade luwi a kĩ Lot nɛ́ nɛ Sodom ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, fi mɔ fukpokpo kĩ fudeĩ nfiã kpitii wula futo ode fɔyawɔla be a flee.
42017030	“Ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ luwi a kĩ Otidziwa Obi a aanɛ ɛta a.
42017031	Nɛ luwi a na, oti kĩ edeĩ nɛ kɔla ode ɛtabuki eduma kĩ yanaafila ye akũ fɔtsa nɛ kɔla kamɛ. Ade ayea odi kĩ edeĩ nɛ kɔba kamɛ ni, ɛtabuki emuniki ɛnaa tɔtɔ kamɛ kĩ yanaabɔɛ litsedi.
42017032	Mite anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ Lot ɔtsɔ̃ akũ a!
42017033	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛbɔa mbɔdi kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛyɛla ye nkpã ni yaana nkpã a bio.
42017034	Luwi a lɛnyɛ ni, mabi mi kĩ bati nviã aawa nɛ ɔkɛna mɔa akũ, baabɔɛ ɔmɔa bɛdzakũmɛna lɔkɔa bɛfɔnɛ ɔyade a biyi.
42017035	Batsole nviã aakawɔlɛ onuvoe nɛ kɔwɔlɛ akũ, baabɔɛ ɔmɔa lɔkɔa bɛfɔnɛ ɔyade a awɛ biyi.
42017036	Banyole nviã aakakɛna adzuma nɛ kɔba. Baabɔɛ ɔmɔa bɛnamɛna, bɛfɔnɛ ɔmɔa biyi.”
42017037	Ade fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɛ ndia?” Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awã kĩ fɔtsa kuwa waa ni, ade awã fɔpɛtɛ akpɔta a.”
42018001	Yesu bɔa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛgbã lidi, ɛkɔa yatsa be kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkaabɔa mpaɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kĩ akpɔ ɛtaveli be da.
42018002	Ebi be kĩ, “Fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ odi na nɛ ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ kĩ ɛtávila Baguma ĩye ɛkɔa obu ɛkpa odima lɛmɛ.
42018003	Okunawa odi lɛmɛ na nɛ ɔmatɔ mɔapɛ a kamɛ, ade ɛkayake ye aduli kĩ, ‘Bumɔ yĩ kanyɛ yĩ nɛ yĩ okesĩnɛ awɛ kamɛ.’
42018004	“Fɔtɛ lɔkɔ pii kĩ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ a sĩ ɛtákɛna lɛtsama nɛ foe akũ. Lɛmɛ nɛ ke kawũna kamɛ a, ebi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Titɔ kĩ maávila Baguma ade maákɔa obu kakpa otidziwa malo ni,
42018005	nɛ ɔhau beblebee kĩ okunawa kĩĩ akpa yĩ sũ ni, maadã kĩ ɛna ye ɔtɔbɛ. Ntɛ ntákɛna lɔmɔ ni, yaakaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔa ɛláafɔ̃ nna kawɛya.’ ”
42018006	Ade boe Ɔlate lɛ ɛnaa lɔtɔ kĩ, “Mitse lɛtsa a kĩ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ kĩ yaádi ɔnɔkɔali kĩĩ lɛ.
42018007	Finyaakĩĩ a, miatɛ kado kĩ Baguma lɛláadzɛ ɛkpa ye bati a kĩ babe kavɛ ye lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa, kavia kabumɛna a ɔtɔbɛ? Mbɔɛɛ miatɛ kado kĩ ɛláabumɛna be mɔatsɛ?
42018008	Mabi mi kĩ yaadzɛ ɛkpa be ɔtɔbɛ mɔatsɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ Otidziwa Obi a ya nɛ katinya kamɛ ni, yaamɔ kĩ bati deĩ katɛkado?”
42018009	Yesu bɔa lɛgbã kĩĩ ɛkpa bati a kĩ bɛtɛ bido kĩ bɛkpalɛ yedede ade basupa bati nkaɛ a.
42018010	Ebi be kĩ, “Luwi a, bati nviã badi naa Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ kĩ banaabɔa mpaɛ. Ɔmɔa nyɛ Farisini, ɔyade a nyɛ tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ.
42018011	Farisini a kpɛ̃ ye akũ ɛnadza ɛbɔa mpaɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma, manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ nlá anɛngbã. Maádi bati ablɔ ade maákɛna adɔpaa ndɛ ayekĩ bati bɛbã akɛna a. Manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ lɛmɛ kĩ nlá ndɛ tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ a kĩ ɛdzɛ nɛ akĩĩ a aye.
42018012	Masui onukpɛ̃ fuwi nviã nɛ ɛkwansieda mɔa kamɛ, ade makɔa lɛtsa a kĩ mana a foe katsu kawuade a kakpa nɔ a.’
42018013	“Lɛmɛ tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ a dza mɔ lugo, ade ɛtáwɛ kĩ yadzɛla anɛ ɛdã ode malo a. Lɛmɛ ɛkɔa awɛ ɛbɔamɔ ɔwɔlɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma, titikpa ɔkɛnanɛ manɛ, mɔ yĩ kɔnya!’ ”
42018014	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi kĩ tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ a akũ lɛkpalɛ yedede nɛ Baguma anɛ kĩ emuniki ɛnaa kɔla a, nnɛ́ Farisini a. Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɛla ye akũ nɛ ode ni, baakɛna ye nɛ kayɔ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ni, baadɛla ye nɛ ode.”
42018015	Bati badi kɔa be babi bɛyamɛna kĩ Yesu ete awɛ nɛ be akũ. Kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, bɛkã be anɛ.
42018016	Lɛmɛ Yesu vɛ babisɛ̃ a ɛyamɛna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ babisɛ̃ bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mitasua be osi. Kitonɛkĩ bikĩĩ bamɛ odu lá Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
42018017	Mite fukĩĩ anɛ! Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ndɛ obisɛ̃ aye ni ɛláapuli ewo nɛ de kamɛ dadaada.”
42018018	Yudafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi via Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ wĩ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna fɔmɔ maana nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna dadaada a?”
42018019	Ade Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nde sũ avɛ yĩ oti wĩ? Odima lɛnyɛ́ oti wĩ, mbɔɛntɛ Baguma mɔapɛ.
42018020	Onyina mbla a kĩ ɛtsa kĩ, ‘Tabɔa adɔpaa, takɔ oti, taye, tama fɔvã ote nɛ odima akũ, bu aga mɔ ama.’ ”
42018021	Oti a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kito anɛ yĩ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ a, nkɛna nɛ tɛbla kĩĩ flee akũ.”
42018022	Kĩ Yesu nu foe a, ebi ye kĩ, “Lɛtsa mɔa te nɔ kakɛna. Naanɔ nɔ fɔtsa flee a kĩ odeĩ a kakɔa foe sika a kakpa ahiãfɔ, lɔkɔa aana akũ kana fɔtsa nɛ ode. Ke liti muniki kayaatomɔ yĩ.”
42018023	Lɛmɛ kĩ onyole a nu fɔlɛtsa a ewo ɔblɔ paa, kitonɛkĩ ɛna akũ kana fɔtsa beblebee.
42018024	Yesu mɔ ayekĩ ewo ɔblɔ a, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔ́ana ɔsĩ fɔkpa asikafɔ kĩ baapuli biwo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ!
42018025	Fɔadã bɔɛɛ kĩ ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kapu aatsã ɔnɔbɔ̃ ɔkɛ kamɛ ɛnɛ, kɛba kĩ osikani aawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
42018026	Ade bati a kĩ binu kalɛ kĩĩ a via Yesu kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ owei koũ aana katɛ?”
42018027	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ otidziwa lɛláapuli ɛkɛna dadaada ni, Baguma kɔ̃ aapuli ɛkɛna.”
42018028	Awã naa Petro bi Yesu kĩ, “Dã, bɔfɔnɛ boe tɔtɔ awɛ buyi bɔya butomɔ nɔ.”
42018029	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mafɔ̃ minyi yededeede kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛfɔnɛ ye tɔtɔ, ɔtsɔ̃ ĩye bawaɛ̃, ĩye bamanɛ ĩye babi eyi nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sũ ni,
42018030	baase ye fɔtsa kĩĩ fublusu nɛ nviã katinya kĩĩ kamɛ mɔ nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a nɛ kikĩ kaaya a kamɛ.”
42018031	Yesu kpã ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛnamɛna ɔɔwɛ̃ ade ebi be kĩ, “Mitse! Bɔanaa Yerusalem, awã kĩ fɔtsa flee a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tsɛlɛ nɛ Otidziwa Obi akũ biyi a, aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
42018032	Baakɔa ye bido nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ awɛ, bidi ye nsekuo, bivũna ye, bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye akũ.
42018033	Baabo ye lɔkɔa bɛkɔ ye, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, yaabuki eyidza edzi nkpã.”
42018034	Lɛmɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ tánu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ fudima kayɔ. Bɛkɔa foe kayɔkanu bɛkɔla be, ade ke bɛtányi lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ Yesu kalɛ kɔdzɛla a.
42018035	Kĩ Yesu fuã Yeriko ɔmatɔ a, ɔnɛkunɛ odi dzi nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ ɛkawã fɔtsa.
42018036	Kĩ enu bati kɔdabu nkã kĩ batɛ̃ a, evia kĩ, “Litsa lamɔ kaya?”
42018037	Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Yesu Nazaretni a lɛyaatɛ̃.”
42018038	Awã naa, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Yesu, Lɛgã Dawid Obi! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya!”
42018039	Bati a kĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ a wũni nɛ ye akũ kĩ esua onukpɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ɛdanɛ fɔwɔla kabɔa kɔɔba kalɛ kĩ, “Lɛgã Dawid Obi! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya!”
42018040	Foesũ Yesu fɔ̃ ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ bɛkpã ɔnɛkunɛ a bɛma ye a. Kĩ ewo Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a, evia ye kĩ,
42018041	“Litsa awɛ kĩ nkɛna nkpa nɔ?” Ɔnɛkunɛ a akpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, mawɛ kĩ mbuki mmɔ́ fɔkɔ.”
42018042	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mɔ fɔkɔ. Nɔ katɛkado fɔ̃ ɔsaɛ.”
42018043	Deedimɔapɛ epuli ɛmɔ fɔkɔ ade ke etomɔ Yesu mɔ Baguma kɔlɛ kanyɛ a. Kĩ bati kɔdabu a mɔ fukĩĩ a, be flee bimu Baguma.
42019001	Yesu nawo nɛ Yeriko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, ɛtsã ye kamɛ ɛtɛ̃.
42019002	Tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛnɔkɔɛ̃ osikani paa odi kĩ bavɛ Zakeo dzi nɛ awã.
42019003	Ɛkabɔa mbɔdi kĩ yamɔ Yesu enyi ye, lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti lukũ sũ, bati lidede fɔ̃ ɛtápuli ɛmɔ ye.
42019004	Foesũ ewula atsɛ ɛnya bati kɔdabu a lɔtɔ ɛnade nɛ kutse gɛlɛɛlɛ kudi kamɛ ayekĩ yaamɔ Yesu kitonɛkĩ enyina kĩ yaatsã awã ɛtɛ̃.
42019005	Kĩ Yesu wo kutse a kayɔ a, ɛdzɛla anɛ ɛmɔ Zakeo ade ɛvɛ ye kĩ, “Zakeo, duma mɔatsɛ, kɛnɛ kĩ mase nɛ nɔ awã nviã.”
42019006	Zakeo wɛ sɔwa eduma ade ɛyatɛ Yesu mɔ kawɔlɛ a.
42019007	Bati a flee kĩ bɛmɔ́ fukĩĩ a kɛna hũhũhũhũ nɛ Yesu akũ bɛlɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ nase nɛ titikpa ɔkɛnanɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.”
42019008	Zakeo yidza ɛdza ebi boe Ɔlate a kĩ, “Boe Ɔlɛga, dã! Maakɔa yĩ akũ fɔtsa sɛkɛ mɔa nte ahiãfɔ, ade ntɛ nsisi odi ni, maase ye foe titi ɛna kɔtɔ.”
42019009	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Nkpã katɛ ya nɛ tɔtɔ kĩĩ kamɛ nviã, kitonɛkĩ oti kĩĩ lɛmɛ nyɛ Abraham kasinu a kamɛ obi.
42019010	Otidziwa Obi a ya kĩ yawɛ bikĩ bɛyɛla ɛnyɛ be lɛmɛ.”
42019011	Ade kĩ bati katse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kabi be a, ɛlɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ, ɛbɔa be lɛgbã lidi. Lɔkɔ kĩĩ a, efuã Yerusalem ade bati a kɔna kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a do kanɛ kata awɛ a.
42019012	Foesũ ebi be kĩ “Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi yidza kĩ yanaa tite tidi akũ mɔlugo mɔlugo bɛnaadzina ye lɛgã. Ehihiɛ eyi kĩ yaamuniki ɛya nɛ ɔtɔ nɛ foe liti.
42019013	Fɔmɔ yaapi osi a, ɛvɛ ye basumunɛ ewua ɛkpɔta ade ɛkpa be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi sika ngbã sɔmɔa sɔmɔa ebi be kĩ, ‘Mikɔa sika a minya kɔyaatɔ mina kute nɛ yĩ liti.’
42019014	“Lɛmɛ ye ɔtɔ bati akesĩ ye foesũ bido batɔ bitomɔ ye liti kĩ bɛnaalɛ kĩ, ‘Bɔáwɛ onyole kĩĩ kĩ ɛnya boe lɛgã.’
42019015	“Bidzina onyole a lɛgã ade emuniki ɛya nɛ ɔtɔ a. Kĩ ɛya a, ɛfɔ̃ bɛvɛ ye basumunɛ a bɛyadzɛla nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ kĩ yawɛ enyi kute a kĩ bɛna.
42019016	“Osumunɛ ɔtɔnyade a bi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, nna sika a sɔmɔa sɔmɔa foe ewua nte nɛ sikĩ ɔkpa yĩ a akũ.’
42019017	“Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa ye mbo ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔkɛna foe kakɛna wĩ! Ɔnyɛ osumunɛ kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali! Nɛ ayekĩ odi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ sũ ni, maakɛna nɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ tɛmatɔ ewua akũ.’
42019018	“Osumunɛ ɔyade a lɛmɛ yalɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, nna sika sɔmɔa sɔmɔa foe elo nte nɛ sikĩ ɔkpa yĩ a akũ!’
42019019	“Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, ‘Mbo, ɔkɛna foe kakɛna wĩ! Aanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ tɛmatɔ elo akũ!’
42019020	“Osumunɛ ɔlalɛde a yalɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, amɔ nɔ sika sɔmɔa kĩ ɔkɔa ɔkpa yĩ a. Nsui se nɛ limakũ kamɛ nkɔa nkɔla.
42019021	Nvila nɔ kitonɛkĩ oti mɔ ɔsĩ odi anɛ. Abɔɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ́ nɔ fude, ade ana fɔtsa a kĩ ɔtádu lɛmɛ a.’
42019022	“Ade Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, ‘Nɔ osumunɛ kpa, maakɔa nɔ mɔawɛ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ kɔdzɛla kalɛ nkɔ nɔ kɔtɔ. Onyina kĩ oti mɔ ɔsĩ manɛ kĩ mabɔɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ́ yĩ fude, ade mana fɔtsa kĩ ntádu a.
42019023	Kĩ onyina lɔmɔ a, nde sũ ɔtákɔa yĩ sika ɔnaado nɛ sika kakɔlakɔ̃ kĩ ntɛ mmuniki ĩya ni, maatɛ se mɔ se akũ kute?’
42019024	“Ade ebi bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ, ‘Mitɛ sika sɔmɔa nɛ ye awɛ mikɔa mikpa osumunɛ a kĩ ɛna sika sɔmɔa sɔmɔa ewua a.’
42019025	“Lɛmɛ bati a bi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, oti a na deĩ sika sɔmɔa sɔmɔa se ewua kɔkɔɛ!’
42019026	“Ade Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ litsedi ni, ade ye baakɔa foe pii bibu a, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛlá lɛtsama a ni, foe kabii a kĩ edeĩ a malo baatɛ foe nɛ ye awɛ.
42019027	Finyaa ni, mivɛlɛ yĩ bakesĩnɛ a kĩ bɛtáwɛ kĩ ĩnya be lɛgã a miyamɛna nɛ awĩ, lɔkɔa mikɔ be nɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ.’ ”
42019028	Kĩ Yesu bi be fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ɛnya ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɔtɔ epi osi yanaa Yerusalem.
42019029	Kĩ efuã Betfage mɔ Betania tɛmatɔ a nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ ɔwɛ̃ a, edo ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã ɛnyamɛna lɔtɔ, ebi be kĩ,
42019030	“Minaa ɔmatɔ kabii a kĩ ɛwa nɛ mi lɔtɔ a kamɛ. Ntɛ miawo nɛ ye kamɛ ni, míamɔ aflim obi kĩ odima tádzi nɛ ye akũ tɔ̃ kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔwɛ̃ kamɛ. Miwũnya ye lɔkɔa mikɔa miyamɛna nɛ awĩ.
42019031	Ntɛ odi via mi kĩ litsa sũ miawũnya ye ni, mibi ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate sĩ ye.’ ”
42019032	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa ade bɛmɔ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a.
42019033	Kĩ bɛkawũnya aflim obi a, ye balate via be kĩ, “Nde sũ miawũnya ye?”
42019034	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate sĩ ye.”
42019035	Bɛkɔa aflim obi a bɛma Yesu ade bɛdzɛlɛ be tɛtadiɛ wulaa biko nɛ ye akũ bibumɛna Yesu ede edzi nɛ ye akũ a.
42019036	Kĩ edzi nɛ ye akũ banaa a, bati dzɛlɛ be tɛtadiɛ biko nɛ tite.
42019037	Kĩ Yesu fuã Yerusalem nɛ awã kĩ osi a ka eto Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ kɔdabu flee a yi kayɔ mɔ Baguma kɔlɛ kanyɛ, mɔ ye kahulu mɔ fɔwɔla kɔɔba nɛ awãwã fɔtsa flee a kĩ bɛmɔ́ a sũ.
42019038	Ade ke bɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma ehila Lɛgã a kĩ laya nɛ Boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ! Lukudɔ lɛna nɛ ode, obu ɛnya Baguma nɛ ode flefle fude!”
42019039	Farisifɔ badi kĩ bideĩ nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bi nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bisua onukpɛ̃!”
42019040	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi kĩ ntɛ bisua onukpɛ̃ ni, boe nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ a mɔawɛ aayi fɔwɔla kabɔa kayɔ.”
42019041	Kĩ Yesu fuã Yerusalem ɛkɔa anɛ ɛmɔ ɔmatɔ kĩĩ a, ewula babe nɛ ye lɔlɔ.
42019042	Ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mawɛ kĩ nviã kĩĩ malo ni, aanyi lɛtsa a kĩ laakpa nɔ lukudɔ. Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩĩ a, ɔláapuli ɔmɔ́ de!
42019043	Lɔkɔ lidi aya kĩ nɔ bakesĩnɛ aatsua bisinya nɔ nɛ sɛkɛ nyɛ sɛkɛ.
42019044	Baawɔla nɔ mɔ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a, ade bɛláafɔnɛ de lidima lɛwa nɛ de kawakɔ̃ malo a, kitonɛkĩ ɔtámɔ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma yatɛ nɔ a oyi ɔsũ!”
42019045	Kĩ Yesu nawo nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, eyi kayɔ mɔ fɔtsa banɔnɛ kablɔmɛna awɛ nɛ awã.
42019046	Ebi be kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Baavɛ yĩ asɔli kɔla kĩ mpaɛ kabɔakɔ̃.’ Lɛmɛ mikɔa koe mikɛna bayekpanɛ kabɛlakɔ̃!”
42019047	Luwi nyɛ luwi ni, Yesu katsa fɔtsa nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mbla batsanɛ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ wɛ kĩ bakɔ ye.
42019048	Lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ osi a kĩ ye akũ baatsã, kitonɛkĩ bati a flee dzɛmɛna ye fɔlɛtsa kayaatse, ade bɛtáwɛ kĩ ye kalɛ kadima kɛtɛ̃ nɛ be akũ a.
42020001	Luwi a, kĩ Yesu na nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ ɛkatsa fɔtsa, ɛkalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a, Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mbla batsanɛ mɔ ɔmatɔ a banɔkɔɛ̃ ya nɛ awã.
42020002	Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Bi boe osi a kĩ odeĩ fɔmɔ akɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ a. Owei lɛkpa nɔ osi?”
42020003	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ ĩnya lɔtɔ nvia mi kalɛ mɔa. Mibi yĩ,
42020004	Yohanes bati mui kawɔla amaniɛ a ni, Baguma sɛkɛ̃ futo mbɔɛɛ kĩ bati sɛkɛ̃ futo?”
42020005	Nɛ awã a, biyi fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ mɔ be akũ kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́alɛ? Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ futo Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, yaavia kĩ, ‘Nde sũ mitátɛ Yohanes mido?’
42020006	Ade ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ bati sɛkɛ̃ futo ni, bati kɔdabu a flee aanɔ boe boe, kitonɛkĩ be flee bɛtɛ bido kĩ Yohanes nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ.”
42020007	Nɛ foesũ bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bunyína awã kĩ futo.”
42020008	Ade Yesu lɛmɛ bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ yĩ malo nláabi mi awã kĩ ntomɛna kɔbɛ̃ nnɛɛ makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ.”
42020009	Ade Yesu bɔa bati a lɛgbã kĩ, “Lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, onyole odi nɛ waĩ kɔba. Ɛkɔa koe edo nɛ apaafɔ awɛ ɛnaa osi akũ, ɛnadzi nɛ awã ebuna owi.
42020010	Kĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ bana waĩ babi a, edo ye osumunɛ odi kĩ ɛnaatɛ ye kanyakɔ̃ nɛ apaafɔ a sɛkɛ̃ ɛma ye. Lɛmɛ apaafɔ a bo osumunɛ a, bɛlɔla ye mɔ awɛ pupulidza.
42020011	Nɛ foesũ edo osumunɛ bɛbã, lɛmɛ apaafɔ a bo ye malo, bido ye kɔnyɔã, ade bɛnyɛ ye osi mɔ awɛ pupulidza a.
42020012	Ade edo osumunɛ ɔlalɛde a. Apaafɔ a bo ye malo bipila ye ade bɛblɔmɛna ye a.
42020013	“Kɔba ɔlate a via ye akũ kĩ, ‘Litsa maakɛna? Maado yĩ obi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ ade matɛ kado kĩ baabu ye.’
42020014	“Lɛmɛ kĩ apaafɔ a mɔ́ obi a, bibi akũ kĩ, ‘Ade kɔba ɔlate a obi nɛ awĩ a. Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔ ye lɔkɔa ye adzapadiɛ ɛkɛna boe ade.’
42020015	Foesũ bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛnɛmɛna nɛ kɔbã a kamɛ ade bɛkɔ ye a.” Ade Yesu via be kĩ “Litsa mikɔna kĩ kɔba ɔlate a aakɛna apaafɔ a?
42020016	Mabi mi kĩ yaayakɔ apaafɔ a na flee lɔkɔa ɛkɔa kɔba a edo nɛ apaafɔ bɛbã awɛ.” Kĩ bati a nu fukĩĩ a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Kusɛ! Baguma lɛláakpa osi fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔmɔ da!”
42020017	Yesu ko anɛ ɛdã be ade evia be kĩ, “Litsa Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa atsa? ‘De a kĩ fɔla bakenɛ sĩ a, ade de lɛdani kɔla akũ de titiliwu a!’
42020018	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaatula ɛtɔ nɛ de a na akũ ni, yaaveliveli gblɛgblɛgblɛ, ade ke odi nyɛ odi kĩ de a na aatɔ nɛ ye akũ ni, laanuna ye kpɛtɛkpɛtɛkpɛtɛ.”
42020019	Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a mɔ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bɔa mbɔdi kĩ bapi Yesu nɛ awã, kitonɛkĩ bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ be sũ mɔ ɛbɔa lɛgbã a, lɛmɛ bivila bati a.
42020020	Nɛ foesũ bɛwɛ osi bɛbã kĩ ye akũ baatsã bipi ye. Bɛkpa banyole badi sika kĩ bɛkɛna be akũ ndɛ bati kĩ badi ɔnɔkɔali. Bido be kĩ bɛnaanaĩ Yesu nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavia katse kamɛ, lɔkɔa bɛna osi bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ Roma abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ awɛ.
42020021	Bikĩ banaĩ Yesu a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bunyina kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ alɛ mɔ fukĩ atsa a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Bunyina lɛmɛ kĩ aádã oti anɛ, mbom atsa Baguma tisi a nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ.
42020022	Finyaakĩĩ ni, bi boe ntɛ boe mbla kpa osi kĩ buse ɔgɔlɛ bɔkpa Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃, mbɔɛɛ kĩ ɛtákpa osi?”
42020023	Lɛmɛ Yesu mɔ́ be tɛdake a eyi ɔsũ ade ebi be kĩ,
42020024	“Miyamɛna sika ovoe a sidi ndã. Owei lɔlɔ mɔ dĩ teĩ nɛ se akũ?”
42020025	Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare fude fɔanɛ.” Yesu bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mikɔa fukĩ fɔnyɛ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ fude a mikpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃, ade mikɔa fukĩ fɔnyɛ Baguma fude lɛmɛ mikpa Baguma a.”
42020026	Nɛ bati kɔdabu a anɛ kamɛ na a, bɛtápuli bipi ye nɛ osi odima akũ, foesũ bisua be tunukpɛ̃ nɛ Yesu mbuayɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna be wãwã sũ.
42020027	Ade Zadukifɔ kĩ balɛ kĩ kayidza kato kanɔkpa lɛláa a, ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, bibi ye kĩ,
42020028	“Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, Mose tsɛlɛ mbla ɛkpa boe kĩ, ‘Ntɛ onyole odi ku ɛfɔnɛ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ bɛmɔ ye bɛtáma ni, onyole a ɔwaɛ̃ ɛkɔã otsole a lɔkɔa bɛmɔ ye bɛma babi bɛnya ekĩ eku a bade.’
42020029	Lɔkɔ lidi ni, bawaɛ̃nyole evũkɔnɔ badi dzi nkpã. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a kɔã ɔtsɔ̃ lɛmɛ eku, kĩ bɛtáma obi odima.
42020030	Ɔwaɛ̃ ɔyade a mɔ ɔlalɛde a lɛmɛ kɔã okunawa, ade be malo biku kĩ bɛtáma babi badima a.
42020031	Ade lɛtsa mɔapɛ a lɛkɛna bawaɛ̃nyole evũkɔnɔ a flee a. Be flee biku nɛ kĩ otsole a táma obi ɛkpa be kamɛ odima.
42020032	Nɛ foe kawũna kamɛ a, otsole a mɔawɛ yaku.
42020033	Lɔkɔa nɛ luwi a kĩ banɔkpa aabuki biyidza bidzi nkpã a ni, be kamɛ owei ɔtsɔ̃ yaanya, nɛ kĩ be evũkɔnɔ a flee bɛkɔã tɔ̃ ye a?”
42020034	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Katinya kĩĩ kamɛ mɔ́ otsole mɔ onyole akɔã akũ,
42020035	lɛmɛ banyole mɔ batsole a kĩ bɛkpɔla kĩ baayidza bito kanɔkpa bidzi nkpã nɛ katinya kĩ kaaya a kamɛ a ni, bɛláakɔã batsɔ̃ ĩye bidzi fɔnyɔ.
42020036	Baana ndɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ, ade bɛláabuki biku da a. Bɛnyɛ Baguma babi kitonɛkĩ biyidza bito kanɔkpa.
42020037	Mose nyɛ ɛtsa yededeede nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ badzɛla banɔkpa babuki kadzi nkpã, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛdza nɛ kutse a kĩ kɔkatɛ̃ anɛ kamɛ a, ɛvɛ Baguma kĩ Abraham Baguma Isak Baguma mɔ Yakob lɛmɛ Baguma.
42020038	Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ ɛnyɛ bikĩ bidzi nkpã a Baguma, nnɛ́ banɔkpa Baguma yanɛ. Kitonɛkĩ nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, be flee bidzi nkpã.”
42020039	Nɛ awã a Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi lɛ kĩ. “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, ɔkpa mbuayɛ kakpa wĩ paa!”
42020040	Ke liti odima tábuki edo ɔwɔlɛ evia ye kadima.
42020041	Yesu via be kĩ, “Nde sũ bati alɛ kĩ Kristo a aanya Lɛgã Dawid kasinu kamɛ obi?
42020042	Ade Dawid mɔawɛ a lɛ nɛ Tɔnɔ Ovoli a kamɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate bi yĩ Ɔlate kĩ, “Dzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna
42020043	kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ nkɔa nɔ bakesĩnɛ nkɛna nɔ abɔa katekɔ̃.” ’
42020044	Ade ntɛ Dawid vɛ ye kĩ boe Ɔlate a, nde fɔya mɔ Kristo a aanya Dawid kasinu kamɛ obi?”
42020045	Kĩ bati a flee dza bɛkatse Yesu fɔlɛtsa a, ɛdani ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ,
42020046	“Midã kadã wĩ nɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a akũ. Bati kĩĩ ado tɛtadiɛ wulaa katsã kamini, ade bawɛ kĩ bati bɛwɔ̃na be nɛ obu kamɛ nɛ kɔya a. Bawɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃, mɔ fudzikɔ̃ wĩ nɛ fuwi kanyakɔ̃.
42020047	Bakɔa tɛdake kasisi bakunawa katɛ be tɔtɔ ade babɔa mpaɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ kakɔa kamu akũ a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ be sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aaba bati flee fude!”
42021001	Nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, Yesu ko anɛ ɛmɔ asikafɔ kĩ bɛkɔa be futetsa bɛkado nɛ ɔgɔlɛ adakã kamɛ.
42021002	Ade ɛmɔ okunawa ohiãni odi kĩ ɛyakɔa kaplɛ nviã edo nɛ adakã a kamɛ a.
42021003	Ade ebi be kĩ, “Mabi mi kĩ okunawa ohiãni kĩĩ te fɔtsa ɛba bati bɛbã a flee.
42021004	Kitonɛkĩ bati bɛbã a kɔ̃ ni, be akũ kana fɔtsa a kĩ fublusu a kamɛ fudi sukuloo bite, lɛmɛ otsole ohiãni kĩĩ kɔa lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ yaadzi nkpã a flee ɛyate nɛ awĩ.”
42021005	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ badi kalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a akũ, mɔ boe mɔ kalɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa bike koe, mɔ ayekĩ bɛkɛɛlɛ kɔla foebi a, mɔ fɔtsatewa a kĩ bakpa Baguma a. Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ,
42021006	“Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ miamɔ nɛ awĩ a, lɔkɔ aaya kĩ de lidima lɛláabuki lite nɛ lɔkɔba akũ. Baadzuli be flee biwula.”
42021007	Ade ke bivia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe fukĩĩ aaya? Ade litsa bɔ́akɔa buyi ɔsũ kĩ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ?”
42021008	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ, mitafɔ̃ bɛkɛ mi. Bati pii aaya nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Ɔtɛnɛ a,’ mɔ ‘Lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ.’ Lɛmɛ mitatomɔ be.
42021009	Mitafɔ̃ libe liwo mi ntɛ minu kawũkanɔ mɔ bati kayidza kadza nɛ bati akũ nkã. Kɛnɛ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee fɔnya lɔtɔ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ, lɛmɛ fɔátsa kĩ katinya kawũna a fuã kiyua.”
42021010	Yesu lɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Ɔmaĩ mɔ ɔmaĩ aanɔ akũ, fɔgã mɔ fɔgã lɛmɛ aanɔ akũ.
42021011	Tite kakuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, kɔlɛ mɔ fɔsɔ kpa kumɛkumɛ lɛmɛ aaya nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, ade libe mɔ awãwã fɔtsa aanɛ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ a.
42021012	“Fɔmɔ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee aaya ni, baatomɔ mi liti, bipili mi bɛnamɛna Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ bɛdzɛ̃mɔ mi, bibo mi lɔkɔa bido mi nɛ kɔla. Ade baakpã mi bɛnaadzɛla nɛ fɔgã mɔ abãã banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ nɛ yĩ sũ.
42021013	Fukĩĩ aakpa mi osi kĩ milɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a.
42021014	Mipi miyi kĩ miláaha akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ minyɛ mi akũ a akũ.
42021015	Kitonɛkĩ maakpa mi fɔlɛtsa mɔ kadikanyi ayekĩ mi bakesĩnɛ kamɛ odima lɛláapuli esĩ ĩye ɛlɛ kalɛ etia lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a.
42021016	Mi bamanɛ, bawaɛ̃, akũ bati mɔ bakɔba aanyɛ mi bɛkpa ade baakɔ mi kamɛ badi a.
42021017	Odi nyɛ odi aakesĩ mi nɛ yĩ sũ.
42021018	Lɛmɛ mi lɔlɔ sɔlɔ mɔapɛ malo lɛláayɛla.
42021019	Midza pintii lɔkɔa míana katɛ.
42021020	“Ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ sodzafɔ dza bisinya Yerusalem ni, minyi kĩ ɔmatɔ a kawɔla wo ɔtɔ.
42021021	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea bilo bɛnaa tɔtɔ akũ. Bikĩ bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bilo bɛnɛ, ade bikĩ bɛláa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɛtabuki bimuniki bɛya nɛ ye kamɛ.
42021022	Kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a na aanya Sɔtɔ Kavɛlɛ fuwi fɔkpa bati, ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
42021023	Fɔ́ana ɔsĩ paa fɔkpa bamatsɔ̃ mɔ babima a kĩ babi amɛmɛ be a. Lubokamɔ baũ aaya nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ, ade Baguma sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aaya nɛ bati kĩĩ akũ a.
42021024	Bati badi aatɔ nɛ lɛpamɛ onukpɛ̃, ade baapili badi ndom bɛnamɛna tite bɛbã akũ a. Ade bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ aade bidzi nɛ Yerusalem bati akũ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma yi ɛkpa be a wũna.
42021025	“Awãwã fɔtsa aanɛ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ fɔkatsa nsɛntsɛlɛni nɛ suwa, odetɔ mɔ fusibii anɛ. Katinya kamɛ tɛmaĩ akũ aayɛla be, libe liwo be nɛ mpo kayili mɔ kavũ basabasa sũ.
42021026	Libe aafɔ̃ anɛ lisinya bati nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ baakadã anɛ kakpa lɛtsa a kĩ de aaya nɛ katinya kamɛ flee akũ a, kitonɛkĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ fɔtsa lɛláabuki fɔdza nɛ foe kadzakɔ̃.
42021027	Ke liti a Otidziwa Obi a aanɛ ɛta, ɛya nɛ luflututu kamɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kpale mɔ ɔhaĩ.
42021028	Ntɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ flee do kaya awɛ ni, midzɛla fɔlɔ midã ode kitonɛkĩ mi katɛ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ.”
42021029	Ade Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã kĩ, “Midã atɔ kutse mɔ futse bɛbã a.
42021030	Ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ kɔnyɛ tɔɔta vɔɛ̃ ni, minyina kĩ kanɔde lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ.
42021031	Ade ayea ntɛ mimɔ́ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ kĩ fɔlamɛna kaya ni, míanyi kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a fuã.
42021032	“Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ bati a kĩ bidzi finyaa lɛláaku biwoli fɔmɔ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
42021033	Tite mɔ ode flee onukpɛ̃ aatɛ̃ lɛmɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a kɔ̃ aana daa.
42021034	“Midã akũ kadã wĩ. Mitakɔa mi akũ mikpa kanya mɔ kamɔa pɔtɔɔ, mɔ katinya kamɛ ɔhau. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, Luwi a aayafuta mi,
42021035	ndɛ ayekĩ ɔyaɛ atɔ kpeĩ, kitonɛkĩ Luwi a aaketimɔ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi nkpã.
42021036	Foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, mikaabɔa mpaɛ luwi nyɛ luwi ayekĩ míana kɔbɛ̃ mitsã yedede nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya a flee kamɛ, lɔkɔa miyaadza nɛ Otidziwa Obi a anɛ kamɛ.”
42021037	Yesu kanaatsa bati fɔtsa luwi nyɛ luwi nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ade ntɛ olobe wo ɔtɔ lɔkɔa yadzakũ kanaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ kawa nɛ awã.
42021038	Ɔnɔnɛ nyɛ ɔnɔnɛ ni, bati kɔdabu atsɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ katse ye fɔtsa katsa.
42022001	Yudafɔ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Luwi a kĩ bavɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi a kanya wo ɔtɔ.
42022002	Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a kavila bati a, foesũ bɛkabɔa mbɔdi kawɛ osi kĩ baatsã bɛna Yesu bɛkɔ nɛ kabɛla kamɛ.
42022003	Ade Abonsam wo nɛ Yuda kĩ bavɛ Iskariot, kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa kamɛ a.
42022004	Foesũ Yuda naa Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Yudafɔ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ badãmɛna Asɔli Kɔla akũ a sɛkɛ̃, ade bipi adzuni nɛ osi wĩ a kĩ ye akũ yaatsã ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa a.
42022005	Kawɔlɛ de be ade bike otse kĩ baakpa ye sika.
42022006	Yuda tunɔ nɛ foe akũ, foesũ ɛkawɛ lɔkɔ wĩ kĩ yaanyɛ Yesu ɛkpa nɛ bati kɔdabu a katanyi kamɛ.
42022007	Luwi a kĩ bakɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ kavelibi nɛ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Luwi Kanya kamɛ a wo ɔtɔ.
42022008	Ade ke Yesu do Petro mɔ Yohanes kĩ, “Minaa lɔkɔa minaamanɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a miyi mikpa boe kanya.”
42022009	Nɛ awã a bivia ye kĩ, “Nɛ ndia awɛ kĩ bɔnaamanɛ foe buyi?”
42022010	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ miawo nɛ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ni, onyole odi kĩ ɛnɔnɛ kugumi mɔ mui aatsɛlamɔ mi. Mitomɔ ye miwo nɛ tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ yaawo a.
42022011	Mibi tɔtɔ ɔlate a kĩ, ‘Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ bo buvia nɔ kĩ, “Nde kɔla kĩ koe kamɛ bɔmɔ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɔ́anya Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a?” ’
42022012	Yaatsa mi kɔla kpale kudi nɛ abansulu ode kĩ bike opunu mɔ fukpo nɛ koe kamɛ. Mifɔ̃ bɛmanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa biyi nɛ awã.”
42022013	Bipi osi ade bɛnamɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa pɛpɛɛpɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a, ade bɛtɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a nɛ awã a.
42022014	Yesu mɔ ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a nadzi nɛ opunu akũ kĩ banya.
42022015	Ade ebi be kĩ, “Fɔnyɛ yĩ kawɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ bɔmɔ mi bɔnya Wuda Katɛ̃ Funitsã kĩĩ fɔmɔ maamɔ lubo.
42022016	Mabi mi kĩ nláabuki ĩnya funitsã kĩĩ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ foe kayɔkanu flee a ya nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanya a kamɛ.”
42022017	Ke liti a, Yesu bɔɛ kɔɔpu, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitɛ fukĩĩ misɛ̃ mikpa akũ.
42022018	Mabi mi kĩ kito finyaa kanaa ni, nláabuki mmɔa waĩ kɛnaawo kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ya.”
42022019	Ade ɛbɔɛ abodoo, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ebulibuli ye ɛkpa be ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ sukɛna kĩ bɛkɔa bakpa nɛ mi lɔlɔ a. Mikɛna fukĩĩ mikɔa mikai yĩ.”
42022020	Ade ayea kĩ bɛnya biyua a, ɛbɔɛ kɔɔpu mɔ waĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɔɔpu kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma nhihiɛ vɔɛ̃ kĩ esipi nɛ foe akũ mɔ yĩ babɔanɛ a kĩ maako nɛ tite nɛ mi lɔlɔ.
42022021	Lɛmɛ midã, oti a kĩ yaanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa a, bɔmɔ ye budzi nɛ kanyakɔ̃ nɛ awĩ.
42022022	Otidziwa Obi a kɔ̃, aaku ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma hihiɛ eyi a. Lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ bakpa owula a kĩ yaanyɛ ye ɛkpa a.”
42022023	Nɛ awã a biyi akũ kavia kayɔ kĩ be kamɛ owei aakɛna fukĩĩ odu.
42022024	Fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ fudi yawo nɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ kĩ be kamɛ owei baabu kĩ ɛbɛ̃ flee.
42022025	Ade ke Yesu bi be kĩ, “Bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, be fɔgã deĩ otumi mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ be akũ, ade fɔgã kĩĩ te be akũ buĩ kĩ, Bati Bakɔba.
42022026	Lɛmɛ fɔtana lɔmɔ nɛ mi kamɛ. Mbom oti a kĩ ɛbɛ̃ flee nɛ mi kamɛ ni, ɛkɛna ye akũ ndɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa. Ade kɛnɛ kĩ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ mi kamɛ ɛna ndɛ osumunɛ ayea.
42022027	Owei bɛ̃ ɔkɔba, ekĩ edzi yanya mbɔɛɛ ekĩ yasum ye a? Fɔwaa yededeede kĩ ekĩ edzi yanya a bɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ndeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ ndɛ osumunɛ aye.
42022028	Mina nɛ yĩ akũ nɛ yĩ sɔhuiɛ flee kamɛ.
42022029	Ndɛ ayekĩ Nda kpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ĩnya bati akũ a, ade ayea maakpa mi kɔbɛ̃ a na odu a.
42022030	Míanya mimɔa mɔ yĩ nɛ opunu akũ nɛ yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ, ade míadzi nɛ fɔgãkpo akũ minya Israel futete ewua-nviã a akũ a.”
42022031	Yesu vɛ Simon Petro ɛlɛ kĩ, “Simon, Simon! Tse katse wĩ! Bɛkpa Abonsam osi kĩ ɛsɔ mi ɛdã lɔkɔa ɛsa bati wĩ a nɛ bakpa kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ okuani awɛ afafa kanyɛ nɛ kamɔnɛ kamɛ a.
42022032	Lɛmɛ Simon, mbɔa mpaɛ nkpa nɔ kĩ nɔ katɛkado kɛtadĩ. Ade ntɛ ɔyamuniki ɔya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ni, do awaɛ̃ amɛ kɔbɛ̃.”
42022033	Awã naa Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe ɔlate, mmanɛ akũ nkpa kĩ bɔmɔ nɔ aawa kɔla ĩye kĩ bɔmɔ nɔ aaku!”
42022034	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Petro, mabi nɔ kĩ fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ nviã lɛnyɛ kĩĩ ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
42022035	Yesu via ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Lɔkɔ a kĩ ndo mi fɔtɔ kĩ ntáfɔ̃ mibɔɛ sika kuvũ, ĩye kuvũ kĩ babɛla ĩye mpabua a ni, litsedi nasĩ mi?” Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsama tásĩ boe.”
42022036	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ kɔ̃ ni, odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ sika kuvũ ĩye osi akũ kanaa kuvũ ni, ɛbɔɛ ɛlɛ, ade oti kĩ ɛlá lɛpamɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnɔ ye atadiɛ wulaa lɔkɔa ɛya lɔmɔa.
42022037	Mabi mi kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔlɛ kĩ, ‘Bibu ye bido nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kamɛ,’ a kɛnɛ kĩ fɔya nɛ yĩ akũ. Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a lamɛna kaya nɛ foe kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.”
42022038	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, amɔ, fɔpamɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ nviã nɛ awĩ!” Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Fɔlɛ!”
42022039	Yesu dzakũ ɛnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛnaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ kakɛna a, ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ lɛmɛ to mɔ ye a.
42022040	Kĩ ewo awã a, ebi be kĩ, “Mibɔa mpaɛ ayekĩ sɔhuiɛ lɛláanya nɛ mi akũ.”
42022041	Ɛvɛlɛ akũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo, ade ɛnake aduli ɛbɔa mpaɛ a.
42022042	Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, ntɛ fɔnyɛ nɔ kawɛ ni, tinya lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu kĩĩ nɛ yĩ akũ. Lɛmɛ takɛna nɛ yĩ kawɛ akũ, mbom kɛna nɛ nɔ kawɛ akũ.”
42022043	Nɛ awã naa, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi to ode ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye, edo ye kɔbɛ̃.
42022044	Ɛna nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ mɔ kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ kamɛ, ɛbɔa mpaɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ebu ade ye olulu na ndɛ babɔanɛ fɔbɔ, kako nɛ tite a.
42022045	Kĩ Yesu yidza nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ a, emuniki ɛnaa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a sɛkɛ̃, ɛnamɔ be kĩ bɛwaa tida nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ a kĩ epi be a sũ.
42022046	Ebi be kĩ, “Nde sũ miawa tida? Miyidza mibɔa mpaɛ ayekĩ miláawo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ.”
42022047	Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu lamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ a, bati kɔdabu kudi de kɔnɛ. Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa nyaa be lɔtɔ. Efuã Yesu, etu eboomu ye.
42022048	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yuda, ɔkɔa onukpɛ̃ kadzɛmɛ anyɛ Otidziwa Obi a ɔkpa bati?”
42022049	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛna nɛ ye akũ a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ laya nɛ Yesu akũ a, bivia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, bɔkɛna boe fɔpamɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ a akũ adzuma?”
42022050	Lɛtalɛta be kamɛ ɔmɔa tsua Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a osumunɛ sɔmɔna sɔtɔ emuni.
42022051	Lɛmɛ Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Oowo! Fukpula nɛ awã!” Ade ke ɛta awã kĩ bitsua sɔtɔ a ɛtsa ye a.
42022052	Ke liti a, Yesu bi basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ badãmɛna Asɔli Kɔla akũ a mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bɛyaapi ye a kĩ, “Nde sũ minɛɛ futsekpa mɔ fɔpamɛ miyaapi yĩ ndɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ aye?
42022053	Nna nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ luwi nyɛ luwi, ade ke mitádo ɔwɔlɛ mipi yĩ a. Lɛmɛ mi lɔkɔ liwo ɔtɔ kĩ mikɛna mi adzuma a, nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ Abonsam ɔtũ kɔbɛ̃ a anya akũ finyaa.”
42022054	Foesũ bipi Yesu ade bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a awã a. Petro lɛmɛ tomɔ be ɛna nɛ liti flee.
42022055	Bɛkpɔta fi nɛ tɔtɔ a lɔwabe ade Petro lɛmɛ nadzi nɛ bati a kamɛ a.
42022056	Kĩ bikĩ banya abawa kamɛ adi yamɔ Petro kĩ edzi yawa fi a, eke anɛ nɛ ye akũ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Obi kĩĩ malo tomɔ Yesu.”
42022057	Lɛmɛ Petro sĩ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Otsole dã, ĩnyina ye kɔlaa!”
42022058	Owi tábuna mɔ onyole odi mɔ́ Petro eyi ɔsũ a ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ malo ɔnyɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa!” Lɛmɛ Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Onyole dã, nnɛ́ yĩ manɛ!”
42022059	Ndɛ ndɔũhuilɛ mɔa liti a, onyole bɛbã yalɛ pipiipi kĩ, “Atsindze katɛ lɛláa nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ oti kĩĩ tomɔ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ Galileani!”
42022060	Lɛmɛ Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ “Onyole dã, ĩnyína lɛtsa a kĩ de ɔlamɛna kalɛ!” Mɔ Petro onukpɛ̃ katɔ pɛ, ɔkɔkɔ nyɛ onukpɛ̃.
42022061	Boe Ɔlate dani ɛdã Petro, ade Petro te anɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ lɛnyɛ kĩĩ ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
42022062	Ade ke Petro nɛ ɛnaa kanya ɛnabe blobloblo a.
42022063	Bati a kĩ bɛdãmɛna Yesu akũ a di ye nsekuo bibo ye lɛmɛ.
42022064	Bisui ye anɛ ade bivia ye kĩ, “Bi boe owula a kĩ ɛbɔa nɔ.”
42022065	Ade bibi ye fuvũnatsa pii lɛmɛ a.
42022066	Kĩ kade nyina a, ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a yakpɔta ade bɛkpã Yesu bɛyadzɛla nɛ be anɛ kamɛ a.
42022067	Nɛ awã a, bivia Yesu kĩ, “Bi boe ntɛ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a.” Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nlɛ kadi malo miláatɛ yĩ mido.
42022068	Ade ntɛ nvia mi kadi malo ni, miláakpa mbuayɛ.
42022069	Lɛmɛ kito nviã kĩĩ kanaa ni, baadzina Otidziwa Obi a nɛ Baguma Kpale Nɛ Ode a sɔmɔna.”
42022070	Ade ke be a flee bivia ye kĩ, “Foesũ Baguma obi anɛ?” Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi lamɛna kalɛ kĩ ye manɛ.”
42022071	Ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔtásĩ adansifɔ badima. Boe mɔawɛ a bunu lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a.”
42023001	Ade bati kɔdabu a flee yidza bɛkpã Yesu bɛnamɛna Pilato sɛkɛ̃ a.
42023002	Ade bido ye onukpɛ̃ katsua awɛ kalɛ kĩ, “Bupi obi kĩĩ kĩ ɛlamɔ boe kade bati adzuni kadani. Yabi be kĩ bɛtate ɔgɔlɛ bɛkpa Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃. Ɛbɔɛ ye akũ kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo, lɛgã a.”
42023003	Pilato via ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a?” Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, fɔla ndɛ aye kĩ ɔlɛ a.”
42023004	Ade Pilato bi Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Ntámɔ lɛtsama nɛ ye akũ kĩ madza nɛ foe akũ nkɔ oti kĩĩ kɔtɔ.”
42023005	Lɛmɛ bɛdzɛmɛna kalɛ kabuli kĩ, “Ɛnɛɛ ye fɔtsa katsa yado ɔtutũ nɛ bati kamɛ nɛ Yudea tite flee akũ. Eyi fukĩĩ kayɔ nɛ Galilea ade finyaa ɛkɔa foe ɛyamɛna nɛ awĩ lɛmɛ a.”
42023006	Kĩ Pilato nu fukĩĩ a, evia be kĩ, “Galileani yanɛ?”
42023007	Foesũ kĩ enyi kĩ Yesu to Galilea nɛ awã kĩ Lɛgã Herodes anya akũ a, ɛkɔa ye ɛma Herodes, kĩ ɛna nɛ Yerusalem nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ.
42023008	Kawɔlɛ de Herodes paa kĩ ɛmɔ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ enu ye nkã ade ɛkawɛ kĩ yamɔ ye anɛ kɔkɔkɔɛ a. Ɛkadã anɛ kĩ Yesu aakɛna awãwã fɔtsa fudi ɛtsa ye.
42023009	Foesũ Herodes via Yesu fɔlɛtsa pii lɛmɛ Yesu tábinya onukpɛ̃.
42023010	Awã naa Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a nɛ bɛyadza nɛ lɔtɔ bitsua fɔlɛtsa mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ bite nɛ Yesu akũ.
42023011	Lɛgã Herodes mɔ ye sodzafɔ a di Yesu nsekuo bisupa ye. Bido ye atadiɛ wulaa mɔ kalɛ ndɛ lɛgã aye, bimuniki mɔ ye bɛma Pilato.
42023012	Luwi a na, Herodes mɔ Pilato dani bɛkɛna bakɔba, kufɛ kɔkɔɛ a bakesĩ akũ.
42023013	Pilato vɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ bati a ɛkpɔta.
42023014	Ade ebi be kĩ, “Mikpã oti kĩĩ mima yĩ ade milɛ kĩ ɛlamɔ bati adzuni kadani a. Finyaa nɛ mi anɛ kamɛ nɛ awĩ a, nvia ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ tuwuli, ade fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mibɔɛ nɛ ye akũ a, ntámɔ tɔkpa tidima nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ makɔ ye kɔtɔ.
42023015	Lɛgã Herodes lɛmɛ támɔ tɔkpa tidima nɛ ye akũ foesũ emunikimɔ ye ɛma boe. Oti kĩĩ tákɛna tɔkpa tidima kĩ ɛfɛta ɛkpa wuda.
42023016	Foesũ maafɔ̃ bibo ye nfɔnɛ ye awɛ ɛdzakũ ɛnaa.”
42023017	Nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanya kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ Pilato ɛfɔnɛ bati a kĩ bɛwaa kɔla a kamɛ ɔmɔa awɛ ɛkpa be.
42023018	Bati kɔdabu a flee bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Kɔ ye! Fɔnɛ Baraba awɛ kakpa boe!”
42023019	Bido Baraba nɛ kɔla kĩ edo ɔtutũ nɛ ɔmatɔ kpale kamɛ, ɛkɔ bati lɛmɛ.
42023020	Pilato wɛ kĩ yafɔnɛ Yesu awɛ foesũ ebuki ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa bati kɔdabu a.
42023021	Lɛmɛ bɛbɔa fɔwɔla biko nɛ ye akũ kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ! Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
42023022	Pilato buki ebi be lɛlalɛde kĩ, “Mɔ litsa tɔkpa oti kĩĩ kɛna? Ntámɔ lɛtsa kĩ ɛkɛna kĩ yana foe akũ wuda! Maafɔ̃ bibo ye lɔkɔa nfɔnɛ ye awɛ.”
42023023	Lɛmɛ bati a dzɛmɛna fɔwɔla kabɔa kɔɔba kĩ bɛbɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ. Nɛ foe kawũna kamɛ a, bati a fɔwɔla kabɔa nya Pilato akũ.
42023024	Foesũ Pilato kɔ Yesu kɔtɔ ndɛ ayekĩ bati a wɛ a.
42023025	Ade ɛfɔnɛ oti a kĩ bawɛ a awɛ ɛkpa be a, oti kĩ bido nɛ kɔla nɛ ɔtutũ mɔ bati kakɔ sũ, ade ɛkɔa Yesu edo nɛ be awɛ kĩ bɛkɛna ye ndɛ ayekĩ bɛwɛ a.
42023026	Sodzafɔ a kpã Yesu bɛnamɛna. Ade kĩ banaa nɛ osi a, bɛtsɛlamɛna Kireneni onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon, kĩ eto akula adi kamɛ yanna Yerusalem. Bipi ye bɛhɛ ye kĩ ɛlɔ asendua a etomɔ Yesu nɛ liti.
42023027	Bati kɔdabu baũ a tomɔ Yesu nɛ liti, ade batsole nɛ be kamɛ kabe kakpa ye a.
42023028	Yesu dani ɛtsɛlamɔ be ebi be kĩ, “Yerusalem batsole, mitabe mikpa yĩ mbom mibe mikpa mi babi mɔ mi akũ.
42023029	Kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ aaya kĩ bati aalɛ kĩ, ‘Be a kĩ bɛnyɛ baduko, be a kĩ bɛtátsãmɔ kɔma bɛma tɔ̃, mɔ be a kĩ bɛtámɛmɛ be tɛmɛ tɔ̃ a na lɔlɔ wĩ!’
42023030	Ade lɔkɔ a na mɔ bati aabi tɔtɔ kĩ, ‘Midzuli miko nɛ boe akũ!’ Ade baabi kɔtɔbii kĩ, ‘Mikɔla boe!’
42023031	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bɛkɛna fukĩĩ nɛ kutse gɔ̃ akũ ni, nde fɔána fɔkpa kutse wɔlɛwa?”
42023032	Bɛkpã banyole bɛbã nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bibumɔ Yesu kĩ bɛnaakɔ be.
42023033	Kĩ biwo awã kĩ bavɛ kĩ Oti Lɔlɔ Fɔtsɔ̃ a, bɛbɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ. Bɛbɔa banyole nviã a lɛmɛ nɛ asendua akũ, ɔmɔa nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ɔyade a nɛ ye sɛbã.
42023034	Ade Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Nda, kɔa kate be, kitonɛkĩ binyína lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɛna kakɛna.” Ke liti a sodzafɔ a wole ade bɛsɛ̃ Yesu tɛtadiɛ bɛkpa be akũ a.
42023035	Bati a flee dza nɛ awã bɛkadã foe. Ade Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a di Yesu nsekuo bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɛtɛ bati bɛbã nkpã foesũ ntɛ ye nyɛ Kristo a kĩ Baguma pau a ni, ɛnyɛ ye akũ!”
42023036	Ade ayea sodzafɔ a lɛmɛ di Yesu nsekuo a. Bifuã ye bɛkɔa waĩ mɔ ɔnyɛ mɔ ɔnyɛ bɛkpa ye kĩ ɛmɔa.
42023037	Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ lɛgã a ni, tɛ nɔ akũ!”
42023038	Bɛtsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nɛ ye lɔlɔ nyangɛ kĩ, “Ade Yudafɔ Lɛgã nɛ awĩ a.”
42023039	Tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a kamɛ ɔmɔa vũna Yesu kĩ, “Nnɛ́ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a? Tɛ nɔ akũ katɛ boe malo!”
42023040	Lɛmɛ ɔyade a wũni nɛ ye akũ kĩ, “Aávila Baguma mbɔɛɛ? Ɔtɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ mɔapɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ a.
42023041	Lɛmɛ boe sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a fɛta boe, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔkɛna a, ade de sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ bɔtɛ a. Lɛmɛ ɛtákɛna tɔkpa tidima.”
42023042	Ade ebi Yesu kĩ, “Yesu, te anɛ nɛ yĩ akũ ntɛ owo nɔ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
42023043	Awã naa Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ nviã kĩĩ aana nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Paradiso kamɛ.”
42023044	Kĩ kite sukuloo suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã abɔa a, suwa fɔ̃ kata, ade ɔtũ ke nɛ katinya flee kamɛ kɛnawo tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a.
42023045	Ade lima a kĩ lɛvanɛ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a bɛ̃ nɛ kayite a.
42023046	Yesu bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Nda, nkɔa yĩ kawɛya ndo nɛ nɔ awɛ.” Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ a, eku.
42023047	Sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya, ade emu Baguma ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ oti wĩ yanɛ.”
42023048	Kĩ bati a kĩ bɛkpɔta nɛ awã bɛkadã foe flee a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, bɛdzakũ bɛnaa kɔla mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ mɔ akpɔ kako nɛ lɔlɔ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ.
42023049	Bati a kĩ binyina Yesu kanyina wĩ a, mɔ batsole a kĩ bitomɔ ye bito Galilea a, dza mɔ lugo bɛkadã fɔtsa kĩĩ.
42023050	Onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yosef kĩ edzi nɛ Arimatia ɔmatɔ a kamɛ nɛ Yudea tite akũ na nɛ awã. Ɛnya oti wĩ kĩ ye akũ deĩ obu, ade ɛkadã anɛ kakpa lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a aaya.
42023051	Titɔ kĩ ɛna nɛ Yudafɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ katsɛna a kamɛ malo ni, ɛtátunɔ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ bike otse, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna a akũ.
42023052	Ɛnaa Pilato anɛ kamɛ ade ɛnawã Yesu ɔnɔkpa a.
42023053	Ade ke ɛvɛnya ɔnɔkpa a ɛkɔa lima ovoe esuli ye a. Ɛkɔa ye ɛwɔla nɛ linikɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ nɛ de kamɛ, kĩ bɛtábila odima nɛ de kamɛ tɔ̃ a kamɛ.
42023054	Luwi a nya Efieda ade Kawɛya Luwi a lamɔ ɔtɔ kawo a.
42023055	Batsole a kĩ bitómɔ Yesu bito Galilea tomɔ Yosef bɛnadã linikɛ a, mɔ ayekĩ bɛkɔa Yesu ɔnɔkpa bɛwɔla nɛ de kamɛ.
42023056	Ke liti a, bimuniki bɛnaa kɔla bɛnamanɛ tutsonu mɔ fugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ baakɔa bɛtsɛla ɔnɔkpa a biyi. Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a, bidzi bɛwɛya nɛ be mbla a onukpɛ̃.
42024001	Ɛkwansieda ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, batsole a naa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃, bɛnɛɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛmanɛ biyi a.
42024002	Awã naa bɛmɔ́ kĩ bimininya de kpale a kĩ bɛkɔa bisua linikɛ onukpɛ̃ a biyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃.
42024003	Foesũ biwo nɛ de kamɛ lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu ɔnɔkpa a.
42024004	Bɛkɛna saa bɛdzɛ̃ bakɔna foe akũ, ade lɛtalɛta bati nviã kĩ bɛna nɛ tɛtadiɛ kĩ tata muamua kamɛ nɛ bɛta nɛ be akũ a.
42024005	Libe wo be paa foesũ bɛkɛna akũ nɛ kayɔ bɛkpa be, ade banyole a bi be kĩ, “Nde sũ miawɛ oti kĩ edzi nkpã nɛ banɔkpa kamɛ?
42024006	Ɛláa awĩ. Eyidza eto kanɔkpa! Mite anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ebi mi nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛna nɛ Galilea kĩ,
42024007	kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ bati kpa awɛ, baabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ, lɔkɔa nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti a, eyidza edzi nkpã.”
42024008	Ade batsole a te anɛ nɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a akũ a.
42024009	Bimuniki bito linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ bɛnabi fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-odi a mɔ bati bɛbã fɔlɛtsa a flee.
42024010	Batsole a nyɛ Maria Magdalani, Yohana mɔ Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Yakobo ɔma. Bɛmɔ batsole bɛbã a bɛnabi fɔtɔ banyanɛ a fɔlɛtsa a flee.
42024011	Lɛmɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kɔna kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bibi be a nyɛ fɔkɔasiatsa, foesũ bɛtátɛ be bido.
42024012	Lɛmɛ Petro ta eyidza ewula atsɛ ɛnaa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃. Ɛkɛna akũ ɛdã de kamɛ ade ɛmɔ ɔnɔkpa tilima odi a. Ɛkɛna saa emuniki ɛnaa kɔla nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a sũ.
42024013	Nɛ luwi mɔapɛ a akũ a, bikĩ bitómɔ Yesu a be kamɛ bati nviã tsɛ̃ osi banaa akula adi kĩ bavɛ Emaus kamɛ. Osi a lugo aana ndɛ fusikũ evũkɔnɔ kito awã kɛnaa Yerusalem.
42024014	Bati a kalɔmɛna nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya a flee akũ.
42024015	Kĩ bɛkalɔmɛna kanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ a, Yesu yapi be ade bɛtsã bɛnaa a.
42024016	Bɛmɔ́ ye lɛmɛ bɛtáyi ɔsũ kĩ ye yanɛ.
42024017	Yesu via be kĩ, “Litsa akũ milamɛna kalɔmɛna nɛ osi a?” Bɛfɔ̃ bɛdza dĩĩ mɔ anɛ kamɛ mɔ kɔnya.
42024018	Ade be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Kleopa via ye kĩ, “Nɔ odi nyɛ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ Yerusalem kĩ ɔtánu lɛtsa a kĩ de lɛya nɛ fuwi lukũ kĩĩ kamɛ a mbɔɛɛ?”
42024019	Yesu via be kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa lɛya?” Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya nɛ Yesu Nazaretni akũ a. Oti kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii, ɛnyɛ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ kpale kĩ Baguma mɔ bati flee akpa ye obu.
42024020	Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ pi ye bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ Roma abãã awɛ, kĩ bɛkɔ ye kɔtɔ bɛkpa wuda, bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.
42024021	Bɔna kɔnɛte nɛ ye akũ kĩ ye aanya oti a kĩ yaanyɛ Israel. Ade nviã nyɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ kĩ fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ a.
42024022	Boe katsu a kĩ kitomɔ ye a kamɛ batsole badi fɔ̃ akũ nyɛnɛ boe, kitonɛkĩ ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu kĩĩ bɛnaa ye linikɛ ɔwɛ̃,
42024023	lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ ɔnɔkpa a. Bimuniki bɛyabi boe kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ nyɛ be akũ bɛtsa be, bibi be kĩ Yesu dzi nkpã.
42024024	Boe katsu a kamɛ banyole badi naa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ bɛnamɔ foe pɛpɛɛpɛ ndɛ ayekĩ batsole a lɛ a, lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ Yesu.”
42024025	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitɛnɛ kadzimbi! Mi adzuni lɛlá sɔwa kĩ miatɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a fɔlɛtsa a flee mido!
42024026	Mitányi tɔ̃ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ Kristo a ɛmɔ lubo kĩĩ bamɛ flee fɔmɔ yaaawo nɛ ye lɛgãkanya kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ?”
42024027	Ade ke Yesu kpalɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa be nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a tsɛlɛ nɛ ye akũ, kito Mose tuvoli akũ kɛyake nɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee katsɛlɛ a akũ a.
42024028	Kĩ bifuã akula a kĩ ye kamɛ banaa biyua a, Yesu kɛna ndɛ yatɛ̃ ɛnaa lɔtɔ.
42024029	Lɛmɛ biwũnya ye ade bibi ye kĩ, “Dzi nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃. Kade dɔ kiyua ade ɔtũ do kake awɛ a.” Foesũ ɛnase nɛ be sɛkɛ̃.
42024030	Kĩ bɛmɔ be bidzi kĩ banya a, ɛbɔɛ abodoo ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ɛsɛ̃ ɛkpa be.
42024031	Nɛ awã naa, be anɛ binya ade bɛmɔ́ ye biyi ɔsũ a, lɛmɛ ɛyɛla nɛ be anɛ kamɛ.
42024032	Ade ke bibi be akũ kĩ, “Fɔtákɛna ndɛ fi fudi lɛkatɛ̃ nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kĩ ɛkanyɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a kamɛ katsa boe nɛ osi a?”
42024033	Ade biyidza bimuniki mɔatsɛ bɛnaa Yerusalem, bɛnamɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-odi a mɔ bati bɛbã a kĩ bɛkpɔta a.
42024034	Bɛnabi be kĩ, “Nuwĩ boe Ɔlate yidza eto kanɔkpa ade ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Simon a.”
42024035	Bati nviã a bi be lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ osi akũ a, mɔ ayekĩ bɛmɔ́ boe Ɔlate a biyi ɔsũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛyɛlɛ abodoo ɛkpa be a.
42024036	Kĩ bati nviã kĩĩ kabi be fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, deedimɔapɛ Yesu mɔawɛ nɛ ɛdza nɛ be kayite, ade ebi be kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi.”
42024037	Libe wo be paa ade bɛkakɔna kĩ ɔnɔkpa bɛmɔ.
42024038	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nde sũ mibɔa obili lɔmɔ? Nde sũ miatɛ atsindze nɛ mi kamɛ?
42024039	Midã yĩ awɛ mɔ yĩ fɔnɛta. Mita yĩ midã mimɔ kĩ nnɛ́ ɔnɔkpa manɛ, kitonɛkĩ hũhũ lɛlá sukɛna mɔ fɔtsɔ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ miamɔ kĩ ndeĩ a.”
42024040	Kĩ ɛlɛ foe a, ɛkɔa ye awɛ mɔ fɔnɛta ɛtsa be.
42024041	Kawɔlɛ de be paa, lɛmɛ fɔkɛna be wãwã, foesũ biti bɛtátɛ bido. Ade ke Yesu via be kĩ, “Mideĩ funitsã fudi nɛ awĩ?”
42024042	Bɛkpa ye kafɔabi tɔlɛwa kadi,
42024043	ɛtɛ ke ɛba nɛ be anɛ kamɛ.
42024044	Ke liti a ebi be kĩ, “Ade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bamɛ mbi mi nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ mi kamɛ a. Kɛnɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi nɛ Mose mbla, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tuvoli mɔ Tɔnɔ Ovoli a kamɛ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔmɔ.”
42024045	Ebinya be adzuni ayekĩ baanu Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a kayɔ.
42024046	Ebi be kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ biyi kĩ Kristo a aamɔ lubo, lɔkɔa eyidza eto kanɔkpa nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde a akũ.
42024047	Nɛ ye dĩ akũ ni, bikĩ bitomɔ ye a aade lɛtsã nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kadani mɔ tɔkpa kakɔakate akũ bɛkpa katinya kamɛ bati flee. Baayi lɛtsã kĩĩ kade kayɔ bitomɛna Yerusalem.
42024048	Mi nyɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ flee adansifɔ.
42024049	Yĩ mɔawɛ a maakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mma mi ndɛ ayekĩ Nda lɛ eyi a. Lɛmɛ midzi nɛ Yerusalem nɛ awĩ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ kɔbɛ̃ a aato ode kɔyaatɛ mi kamɛ.”
42024050	Ade ɛkpã be bɛnɛ nɛ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɛnaa Betania, awã kĩ ɛdzɛla awɛ nɛ ode ehila be a.
42024051	Kĩ ɛkahila be a, ɛdzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be ade bɛbɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna ode a.
42024052	Ade ke bisum ye bimuniki bɛnaa Yerusalem nɛ kawɔlɛ kpale kamɛ a.
42024053	Bidzi nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ daa, bɛkamu Baguma.
43001001	Fɔmɔ baabɔa katinya ni, Baguma Kalɛ a deĩ kɔkɔɛ. Kalɛ a mɔ Baguma deĩ, ade Kalɛ a nyɛ Baguma a.
43001002	Kalɛ a mɔ Baguma deĩ anɛ kayɔkayi a fɔmɔ bɛbɔa katinya.
43001003	Baguma bɔa fɔtsa flee ɛtsãmɛna ye akũ, ade lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ ɛnɛ ye liti ɛbɔa.
43001004	Kalɛ a kamɛ nkpã deĩ, ade nkpã kĩĩ lɛma batidziwa ɔhaĩ a.
43001005	Ɔhaĩ a avɔlɛ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, ade ɔtũ tápuli edina ye da a.
43001006	Baguma do onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yohanes.
43001007	Ɛya kĩ yayaadi adansiɛ nɛ ɔhaĩ a akũ ayekĩ bati flee aatsã ye akũ bɛtɛ bido.
43001008	Nnɛ́ Yohanes nyɛ ɔhaĩ a, mbom adansiɛ ɛyadi nɛ ɔhaĩ a akũ.
43001009	Ɔhaĩ wĩ a kĩ yatɛ̃ kakpa odi nyɛ odi a, aya nɛ katinya kamɛ.
43001010	Kalɛ a na nɛ katinya kamɛ, lɛmɛ titɔ kĩ Baguma bɔa katinya ɛtsãmɛna ye akũ malo ni, batidziwa támɔ ye biyi ɔsũ.
43001011	Ɛya nɛ ye mɔawɛ bati sɛkɛ̃, lɛmɛ ye bati a tátɛ ye.
43001012	Lɛmɛ bati flee a kĩ bɛtɛ ye, ade bɛtɛ ye bido lɛmɛ a, ɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛdani Baguma babi.
43001013	Bɛtádani Baguma babi nɛ batidziwa kama onukpɛ̃, ĩye ndɛ ayekĩ otinyole ama babi aye, mbom Baguma mɔawɛ lɛwɛ kĩ yakɛna be ye babi.
43001014	Kalɛ a dani kɛkɛna otidziwa, edzi nɛ boe kamɛ, ade kɔnyakamɔ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali yi ye kamɛ a. Bɔmɔ́ ye kukũkpalɛ a, kukũkpalɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ ndɛ Ɔlɛga a Obi mɔapɛ a aye.
43001015	Yohanes di adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade oti kĩĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa mbi mi kĩ, ‘Oti odi aya nɛ yĩ liti, lɛmɛ ɛbɛ̃ yĩ kitonɛkĩ edzi nkpã kɔkɔɛ fɔmɔ bɛma yĩ.’ ”
43001016	Nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ beblebee sũ ni, ehila boe flee ɛkpa boe nhila ete nɛ nhila akũ.
43001017	Mose akũ Baguma mbla a tsã ɛya, lɛmɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali a tsã Yesu Kristo akũ fɔya.
43001018	Odima támɔ tɔ̃ Baguma. Ye Obi mɔapɛ a kĩ eketimɔ Baguma a, kĩ edeĩ nɛ Ɔlɛga sɛkɛ̃ a, ade ye lɛnyɛ ayekĩ Baguma la a ɛtsa boe a.
43001019	Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Yerusalem do be basɔfɔ mɔ Levifɔ nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bɛnaavia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ owei?”
43001020	Yohanes tásĩ be mbuayɛ kakpa, mbom ɛkpalɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ yededeede ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ yĩ nyɛ Kristo a.”
43001021	Ade bivia ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ nɔ nyɛ owei? Mbɔɛɛ nɔ nyɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya a?” Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nnɛ́ ye manɛ.” Bibuki bivia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ yaaya a?” Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo.”
43001022	Adeke bibi ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ bi boe oti a kĩ anɛ, kitonɛkĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɔa mbuayɛ bɔma bikĩ bido boe fɔtɔ a. Owei koũ anɛ?”
43001023	Yohanes kpa be mbuayɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya tsɛlɛ eyi a kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ yabɔa fɔwɔla a odo kĩ bɛkɛna osi kpĩĩ bɛkpa Ɔlate a.”
43001024	Batɔ a kĩ bido bito Farisifɔ sɛkɛ̃ a,
43001025	via Yohanes kĩ, “Ntɛ nnɛ́ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a, ĩye Eliya, ĩye Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a ni, nde sũ akɛna mui kawɔla amaniɛ?”
43001026	Ade Yohanes kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃ ni, mawɔla bati mui, lɛmɛ odi kĩ minyína ye dzɛ̃ nɛ mi kamɛ.
43001027	Ade ye tomɔ yĩ nɛ liti yaya a, lɛmɛ ntáfɛta kĩ mawũnya ye mpabua tɔwɛ̃ malo.”
43001028	Fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ Betania ɔmatɔ kamɛ, nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ liti, awã kĩ Yohanes kawɔla bati mui a.
43001029	Kĩ kade nyina a, Yohanes mɔ́ Yesu kĩ yaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Midã Baguma Kavelibi a kĩ yaakɔa katinya kamɛ bati tɔkpa ɛnamɛna a!
43001030	Ade oti kĩĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa mbi mi kĩ, ‘Oti odi aya nɛ yĩ liti, kĩ ɛbɛ̃ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ edzi nkpã kɔkɔɛ fɔmɔ bɛma yĩ.’
43001031	Yĩ mɔawɛ a ntányi oti a kĩ ye yanɛ, lɛmɛ ĩyaawɔla bati mui, ayekĩ maanyɛ ye ntsa Israel kade a.”
43001032	Ade Yohanes lɛ nɛ Yesu akũ kĩ, “Mmɔ́ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ ɛka eto ode ndɛ mblɔduma aye ɛyadzi nɛ ye akũ.
43001033	Nɛ kayɔkayi a, ntányi ye, lɛmɛ Baguma kĩ edo yĩ kĩ nwɔla bati mui a bi yĩ kĩ, ‘Oti a kĩ aamɔ kĩ yĩ Hũhũ a ka ɛyadzi nɛ ye akũ a ni, ade ye aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛwɔla bati mui a.’
43001034	Mmɔ́ foe lɔmɔ, ndi adansiɛ kĩ ade oti kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma Obi a.”
43001035	Luwi lɛyade a, kĩ Yohanes mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã dzɛ̃ nɛ awã a,
43001036	bɛmɔ́ Yesu kĩ yatɛ̃ a, Yohanes lɛ kĩ, “Midã Baguma Kavelibi a!”
43001037	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã a nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a, foesũ bitomɔ Yesu bɛnaa.
43001038	Yesu dani, ɛmɔ́ be kĩ bitomɔ ye, ade evia be kĩ, “Litsa miawɛ?” Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Rabi,” foe kayɔ nyɛ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, “ndia odzi?”
43001039	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyaadã.” Lɔkɔ a aana ndɛ olobe tɔdɔũ ɛna kamɛ, foesũ bitomɔ ye bɛnamɔ awã kĩ edzi a, ade bidzi nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ olobe a flee a.
43001040	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa nyɛ Andrea, Simon Petro ɔwaɛ̃nyole.
43001041	Lɛtsa a kĩ Andrea nya lɔtɔ ɛkɛna nyɛ kĩ ɛnawɛ ɔwaɛ̃ Petro ebi ye kĩ, “Bɔmɔ́ Mesia a!” De kayɔ nyɛ Kristo.
43001042	Ke liti a, Andrea kpã Simon ɛnamɛna Yesu sɛkɛ̃. Yesu dã Simon kɛnanaana ade ebi ye kĩ, “Nɔ dĩ nyɛ Simon kĩ ɛnyɛ Yohanes obi a, lɛmɛ kito finyaa baavɛ nɔ Kefas,” ĩye Petro. Buĩ nviã a kayɔ nyɛ de.
43001043	Kĩ kade nyina a, Yesu wɛ kĩ yadzakũ ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ, ade ɛmɔ Filipo ebi ye kĩ, “Yaatomɔ yĩ.”
43001044	Filipo lɛmɛ to Betsaida, ɔmatɔ a kĩ Andrea mɔ Simon dzi a kamɛ.
43001045	Filipo mɔ Nataniel ade ebi ye kĩ, “Bɔmɔ́ oti a kĩ Mose mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye akũ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa kamɛ a. Ade ye nyɛ Yosef obi Yesu, kĩ eto Nazaret a!”
43001046	Nataniel via kĩ, “Fɔtsa wĩ fudi aapuli fɔnɛ futo Nazaret lɛmɛ kamɛ?” Filipo kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yaadã!”
43001047	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ Nataniel yaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a, ɛlɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ, “Ade Israelni kpanunuunu nɛ awĩ a, ɛnyɛ́ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa ɔkɛnanɛ!”
43001048	Nataniel via Yesu kĩ, “Nde ɔkɛna onyi yĩ?” Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mmɔ́ nɔ kɔkɔɛ nɛ kɔya kutse a kayɔ fɔmɔ Filipo yavɛ nɔ.”
43001049	Ade Nataniel lɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, nɔ nyɛ Baguma Obi a. Nɔ nyɛ Israel Lɛgã a!”
43001050	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ayekĩ mbi nɔ kĩ mmɔ́ nɔ nɛ kɔya kutse a kayɔ sũ mɔ ɔtɛ odo a? Aamɔ fɔtsa baũ kĩ fɔbɛ̃ fukĩĩ!”
43001051	Ade ke ebi be kĩ, “Mabi mi flee nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ míamɔ ode kĩ ebinya, ade míamɔ kĩ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ aakade bɛkaka nɛ yĩ, Otidziwa Obi a, akũ.”
43002001	Nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ a, bipi obolitsɔ̃ nɛ Kana ɔmatɔ kĩ edeĩ nɛ Galilea tite akũ. Yesu ɔma na nɛ awã,
43002002	ade bɛvɛ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛmɛ bɛya nɛ obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ a.
43002003	Kĩ waĩ woli a, Yesu ɔma fuã Yesu ebi ye kĩ, “Be waĩ a woli.”
43002004	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Otsole, nnɛ́ nɔ aabi yĩ lɛtsa a kĩ nkɛna. Yĩ lɔkɔ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.”
43002005	Yesu ɔma nabi basumunɛ a kĩ, “Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ yaabi mi ni, mikɛna.”
43002006	Ayekĩ fɔnyɛ Yudafɔ amaniɛ kĩ bavɔlɛ akũ fɔmɔ bawo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ sũ ni, bake boe tɔpɔɔlɔ evũ nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ. Mui fugumi tsɛtsɛɛ ɛna ĩye foe elo awo nɛ lɔmɔa kamɛ.
43002007	Yesu bi basumunɛ a kĩ, “Minu mui miyula tɔpɔɔlɔ a.” Foesũ binu mui biyula foe tsɔnɔnɔɔnɔ.
43002008	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minu mui a badi mima oti a kĩ yadãmɛna funitsã akũ a.” Ade binu badi bɛma ye a.
43002009	Funitsã akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a tá mui a kĩ bɛdani bavɛ a onukpɛ̃ ɛdã. Ɛtányi awã kĩ bitomɛna be, lɛmɛ basumunɛ a kɔ̃ nyina. Foesũ ɛvɛ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a,
43002010	evia ye kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi akpa bati a bavɛ vɔɛ̃ kanyamɛna lɔtɔ, lɔkɔa ntɛ bɛmɔa be biwĩ a, yabɔɛ bakɔɛ a kayamɛna. Nde fɔya mɔ nɔ kɔ̃ ɔkɔa bavɛ vɔɛ̃ a oke kɛyawo lɔkɔ kĩĩ?”
43002011	Yesu kɛna ye awãwã fɔtsa fɔtɔnyade kĩĩ nɛ Kana nɛ Galilea tite akũ, ɛkɔa ɛnyɛ ye kukũkpalɛ ɛtsa, ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tɛ ye bido a.
43002012	Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ɔma, mɔ bawaɛ̃nyole mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ bɛnaa Kapernaum, bɛnadzi nɛ awã fuwi sukuloo.
43002013	Kĩ Yudafɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi kanya a wo ɔtɔ liyua a, Yesu naa Yerusalem.
43002014	Nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, ɛmɔ kĩ bati dzi banɔ banantsue, baveli mɔ mblɔduma. Ɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ kĩ sika babɛ̃nɛ dzi nɛ be tupunu akũ nɛ awã.
43002015	Foesũ ɛnɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɛkɛna mple ɛkɔa ɛblɔmɛna bayaɛ a flee, banantsue mɔ baveli a nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Edu be tupunu lɛmɛ ewula, ɛpansam sika babɛ̃nɛ a sika ɛsã.
43002016	Ade ebi bikĩ banɔ mblɔduma a kĩ, “Mifila fɔtsa kĩĩ minɛmɛna nɛ awĩ, mitakɔa Nda kɔla mikɛna kɔyaatɔ.”
43002017	Ade ke ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a te anɛ kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “O Baguma, nɔ kɔla akũ mbɔdibɔ atɛ̃ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ndɛ fi aye.”
43002018	Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ yavia Yesu kĩ, “Litsa nsɛntsɛlɛni aapuli ɔkɛna ɔtsa boe kĩ odeĩ osi kĩ akɛna fukĩĩ?”
43002019	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Miveli Baguma Kɔla kĩĩ, ade nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti ni, maabuki nke koe.”
43002020	Yudafɔ a bi ye kĩ, “Bɛkɔa futeli tɛna-avũ bike Asɔli Kɔla kĩĩ, ke mɔ alɛ kĩ aakɔa fuwi ɛlalɛ obuki oke koe a?”
43002021	Lɛmɛ asɔli kɔla a kĩ Yesu lamɛna kalɛ a nyɛ ye sukɛna.
43002022	Foesũ kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa liti a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a te anɛ kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyi, ade bɛtɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a bido a.
43002023	Kĩ Yesu na nɛ Yerusalem nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi kanya kamɛ a, bati pii tɛ ye bido nɛ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ ɛkɛna a sũ.
43002024	Lɛmɛ Yesu tákɔa ye akũ ɛkpa be, kitonɛkĩ enyina bati flee.
43002025	Foesũ fɔtásĩ kĩ odima abi ye kadi nɛ bati akũ, kitonɛkĩ ye mɔawɛ a enyina lɛtsa a kĩ lideĩ nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
43003001	Nɛ lɔkɔ a naa kamɛ a, Yudafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔa na kĩ ɛnyɛ Farisini, kĩ bavɛ Nikodemo.
43003002	Luwi a lɛnyɛ, ɛya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ɛyabi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bunyina kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ oto ɔya, kitonɛkĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni a kĩ akɛna a, ntɛ Baguma lítomɔ ye.”
43003003	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali mabi nɔ kĩ ntɛ bɛtábuki bɛlɔla oti kama ni, ɛláapuli ɛmɔ Baguma lɛgãkanya a.”
43003004	Nikodemo via ye kĩ, “Nde baapuli bibuki bɛma oti kĩ ebo anɛ? Ɛláapuli ewo nɛ ɔma sɛmɛ kamɛ bɛlɔla ye kama lɛyade.”
43003005	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi nɔ kĩ, ntɛ bɛtáma oti bitomɛna mui mɔ Baguma Hũhũ kamɛ ni, ɛláapuli ewo nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
43003006	Sukɛna kamɛ bama sukɛna oti katomɛna, lɛmɛ Baguma Hũhũ kamɛ bama hũhũ ode.
43003007	Foesũ fɔtakɛna nɔ wãwã kĩ nlɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛlɔla mi flee kama.
43003008	Ɔwɛ abɔa kanaa awã kĩ yawɛ, anu ye nkã, lɛmɛ onyína awã kĩ eto ĩye awã kĩ yanaa. Ade aye fɔla fɔkpa odi nyɛ odi kĩ bɛma ye nɛ Hũhũ a kamɛ a.”
43003009	Ade Nikodemo via ye kĩ, “Nde fukĩĩ aapuli fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ?”
43003010	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛnɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ nɛ Israel, mɔ onyína fukĩĩ a?
43003011	Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ bɔalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bunyina a akũ, ade bɔadi adansiɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔmɔ́ akũ a, lɛmɛ mi kamɛ odima láwɛ kĩ yatɛ boe fɔlɛtsa a.
43003012	Ntɛ mbi nɔ tite akũ fɔlɛtsa mɔ́ ɔtátɛ foe odo a, lɔkɔa ntɛ mbi nɔ ode fɔlɛtsa a ni, aapuli ɔtɛ foe odo?
43003013	Ade odima táde tɔ̃ ɛnaa ode, mbɔɛntɛ yĩ, Otidziwa Obi a, kĩ nto ode ĩya a odi.
43003014	“Ndɛ ayekĩ Mose dɛla kɔɛ kĩ bɛkɔa kɔɔble bɛkɛna a nɛ otse akũ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a, ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ baadɛla yĩ, Otidziwa Obi a, lɛmɛ nɛ asendua akũ a,
43003015	ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo aana nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
43003016	“Kitonɛkĩ Baguma ti ɛwɛ katinya kalɛ paa kĩ ɛkɔa ye Obi mɔapɛ a ɛkpa kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo lɛláaku ɛwɔ, mbom yaana nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
43003017	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tádo ye Obi kĩ ɛyaakɔ katinya kamɛ bati kɔtɔ, mbom kĩ fɔtsã ye akũ bati bɛna katɛ.
43003018	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Obi a edo ni, bɛtákɔ ye kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ edo ni, bɛkɔ ye kɔtɔ kɔkɔɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛtátɛ Baguma Obi mɔapɛ a edo.
43003019	Ayekĩ badzɛmɔ katinya kakɔ bati kɔtɔ a nyɛ kĩ ɔhaĩ a ya nɛ katinya kamɛ lɛmɛ bati wɛ ɔtũ kalɛ bɛba ɔhaĩ a, kitonɛkĩ be fɔtsakɛlawa nyɛ tɔkpa.
43003020	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa akesĩ ɔhaĩ a, ade ɛláaya nɛ ɔhaĩ a sɛkɛ̃ a, kitonɛkĩ yaáwɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye tɔkpa kanya.
43003021	Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, yaya nɛ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ ayekĩ ɔhaĩ a aafɔ̃ bɛmɔ́ kĩ yakɛna fɔtsa nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ.”
43003022	Fukĩĩ liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa Yudea amantam a kamɛ a. Edzi nɛ awã fuwi sukuloo ɛwɔla bati mui.
43003023	Yohanes lɛmɛ kawɔla bati mui nɛ Ainon kĩ efuã Salim, kitonɛkĩ mui bɔ nɛ awã. Bati kaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛwɔla be mui.
43003024	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, bɛtápi tɔ̃ Yohanes bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ.
43003025	Luwi a, fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ ya nɛ Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ Yudani odi kayite nɛ Yudafɔ akũ mui kawɔla amaniɛ akũ.
43003026	Foesũ bɛya nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, ate anɛ nɛ onyole a kĩ ɛna nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ liti, kĩ odi adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ a? Ɛlamɛna bati mui kawɔla ade bati flee lamɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ kanaa a!”
43003027	Yohanes kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Odima lɛláapuli ɛna litsedi mbɔɛntɛ Baguma lɛkpa ye de.
43003028	Mi mɔawɛ a nyɛ yĩ adansifɔ kĩ nlɛ kĩ, ‘Nnɛ́ yĩ nyɛ Kristo a, mbom Baguma do yĩ kĩ ĩnya ye lɔtɔ.’
43003029	Obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛla obolitsɔ̃ a, lɛmɛ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ ɔkɔba kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ yatse a kɔ̃, kawɔlɛ ade ye pii ntɛ enu obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a odo. Ade ayea kĩ nnu ye odo a, yĩ kawɔlɛkamɔ akpɔla a.
43003030	Kɛnɛ kĩ ye dĩ lide nɛ ode lɔkɔa yĩ lide lɛka nɛ kayɔ.
43003031	“Oti a kĩ eto ode ɛya a bɛ̃ be flee. Oti a kĩ eto tite akũ a nyɛ tite akũ oti, ade tite akũ fɔlɛtsa yalɛ a, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ eto ode a bɛ̃ be flee.
43003032	Yalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛmɔ́, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ enu, lɛmɛ odima látɛ ye adansiɛ kadi a.
43003033	Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a, asipi kĩ Baguma adi ɔnɔkɔali.
43003034	Oti a kĩ Baguma do a alɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔa Hũhũ eyula ye kamɛ.
43003035	Ɔlɛga a awɛ ye Obi kalɛ, ade foesũ ɛkɔa fɔtsa flee edo nɛ ye awɛ a.
43003036	“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Obi a edo ni, edeĩ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaátse Obi a ni, ɛláana nkpã, mbom Baguma kalɔkpa aana nɛ ye akũ.”
43004001	Farisifɔ a nu kĩ Yesu kawɔla bati mui, kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kapɔ kaba Yohanes bade.
43004002	Lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Yesu mɔawɛ táwɔla odima mui, mbom ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a odi lɛwɔla bati mui.
43004003	Foesũ kĩ Yesu nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛdzakũ nɛ Yudea emuniki ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ.
43004004	Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛtsã Samaria tite kamɛ ɛnaa awã.
43004005	Yesu yawo Samaria ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Sikar. Ɔmatɔ a fuã mɔ tite a kĩ be ɔwanyɔ Yakob kɔa ɛkpa ye obi Yosef.
43004006	Yakob lɔwɔkɛ deĩ nɛ awã. Yesu yawo awã ndɛ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã kamɛ, ade kĩ osi katsã piã ye sũ ni, ɛkɛna akũ edzi nɛ lɔwɔkɛ a ɔwɛ̃.
43004007	Owi tábuna mɔ Samaria otsole odi ya kĩ yaanu mui. Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kpa yĩ mui badi mmɔa.”
43004008	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa ɔmatɔ kamɛ bɛnaaya funitsã.
43004009	Otsole a bi Yesu kĩ, “Nde fɔya mɔ nɔ Yudani avia yĩ Samaria otsole kĩ nkpa nɔ mui kamɔa?” Ɛlɛ lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ mɔ Samariafɔ lákã.
43004010	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ kanyina onyina lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma akpa, mɔ oti a kĩ ye lamɛna nɔ mui mɔawa kavia ni, kufɛ nɔ aavia ye lɔkɔa ɛkpa nɔ mui kĩ bakpa nkpã a.”
43004011	Otsole a bi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ɔnɛ́ɛ bokiti kĩ bakɔa kanu mui, ade lɔwɔkɛ a lɛmɛ dzũ a. Ndia aatomɛna mui a kĩ bakpa nkpã a?
43004012	Boe ɔwanyɔ Yakob lɛnyɛ lɔwɔkɛ kĩĩ ɛkpa boe, ade ye mɔawɛ, ye babi mɔ ye bayaɛ flee mɔa mui bitomɛna de kamɛ a. Mbɔɛɛ katsa atsa kĩ ɔbɛ̃ Yakob?”
43004013	Ade Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔa mui kĩĩ ni, ɔmɔado aabuki ɛkɔ ye,
43004014	lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yamɔa mui a kĩ maakpa ye a ni, ɔmɔado lɛláabuki ɛkɔ ye da. Kitonɛkĩ mui a kĩ maakpa oti a aadani mui katokɔ̃ kĩ nkpã mui deĩ a nɛ ye kamɛ, bɛkpa ye nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.”
43004015	Otsole a bi Yesu kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, kpa yĩ mui a na badi ayekĩ ɔmɔado lɛláabuki ɛkɔ yĩ da, ĩye mbuki ĩya nɛ awĩ kĩ maanu mui.”
43004016	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Naakpã nɔ ɔnyɔ miya.”
43004017	Otsole a bi ye kĩ, “Nlá ɔnyɔ.” Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔlɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ ɔlá ɔnyɔ.
43004018	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, odzimɔ banyole elo tɔ̃, ade onyole a kĩ mimɔ ye midzi finyaakĩĩ malo liti ɛnyɛ́ nɔ ɔnyɔ a.”
43004019	Ade otsole a bi Yesu kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mmɔ́ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ anɛ.
43004020	Boe Samariafɔ bawanyɔ sum Baguma nɛ ɔtɔ kĩĩ akũ, lɛmɛ mi Yudafɔ mibo Yerusalem nyɛ awã kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bati bisum Baguma.”
43004021	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Boe ɔma, tɛ yĩ kado kĩ lɔkɔ aaya kĩ bati lɛláabuki bisum Ɔlɛga a nɛ ɔtɔ kĩĩ akũ ĩye nɛ Yerusalem.
43004022	Mi Samariafɔ miti minyína oti a kĩ ye miasum. Lɛmɛ boe Yudafɔ kɔ̃ bunyina oti a kĩ bɔasum, kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ akũ nkpã katɛ a tsã kɛya.
43004023	Lɛmɛ lɔkɔ aya, ade lɛya kɔkɔɛ malo kĩ bati a kĩ basum Baguma nɛ osi wĩ akũ a, aasum Ɔlɛga a nɛ Baguma Hũhũ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ. Ade bati a kĩ basum ye lɔmɔ a Baguma awɛ a.
43004024	Baguma ni, Hũhũ yanɛ, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ bati a kĩ basum ye a, bisum ye nɛ Hũhũ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ.”
43004025	Ade otsole a bi ye kĩ, “Ĩnyina kĩ Mesia kĩ bavɛ Kristo a aaya, ade ntɛ ɛya ni, yaabi boe lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.”
43004026	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ ye, yĩ a kĩ nlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ nɔ a.”
43004027	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ mɔ Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a muniki bɛya. Fɔkɛna be wãwã paa kĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ ye mɔ otsole bɛlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ. Lɛmɛ be kamɛ odima távia otsole a kĩ, “Litsa awɛ?” ĩye bivia Yesu kĩ, “Nde sũ mimɔ ye mialɔmɛna?”
43004028	Ade otsole a fɔnɛ ye kugumi awɛ eyi nɛ awã, ɛnaa ɔmatɔ kamɛ ɛnabi bati kĩ,
43004029	“Miyaadã onyole odi kĩ ebi yĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ nkɛna tɔ̃. Mbɔɛɛ ye nyɛ Kristo a?”
43004030	Foesũ bati nɛ́ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃.
43004031	Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kake ye aduli kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, yaanya litsedi.”
43004032	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ndeĩ funitsã kĩ maanya, kĩ minyína foe akũ lɛtsama.”
43004033	Foesũ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kavia be akũ kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ odi ma ye funitsã?”
43004034	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Yĩ funitsã nyɛ kĩ makɛna nɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a kawɛ akũ, lɔkɔa nwũna ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ a.
43004035	Nnɛ́ mi alɛ kĩ kite tidetɔ ɛna sɔũ kĩ funitsã kakpɔta lɔkɔ awo ɔtɔ? Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ miko anɛ midã fɔba a! Funitsã a bo kĩ bakpɔta.
43004036	Oti a kĩ yakpɔta funitsã a atɛ kɔtɔkase, ade ɔkpɔtanɛ akpɔta foe kakpa nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Foesũ funitsã odunɛ a mɔ ɔkpɔtanɛ a flee aamɔ kawɔlɛ bɛkpɔta.
43004037	Foesũ kalɛ a kĩ balɛ kĩ, ‘Oti mɔa adu fɔtsa, oti bɛbã akpɔta foe’ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
43004038	Ndo mi kĩ minaakpɔta funitsã nɛ fɔba a kĩ mitákɛna adzuma nɛ foe kamɛ a. Bati bɛbã lɛkɛna adzuma nɛ awã, lɛmɛ mi mina nfasɔ mitomɛna be adzuma kakɛna kamɛ.”
43004039	Samariafɔ pii kĩ bito ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a tɛ Yesu bido nɛ otsole a adansiɛ a kĩ edi kĩ, “Ebi yĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ nkɛna tɔ̃ nɛ yĩ nkpã kamɛ,” a sũ.
43004040	Foesũ kĩ bɛyamɔ Yesu a, bike ye aduli kĩ edzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, ade Yesu dzi nɛ awã fuwi nviã fudi a.
43004041	Bati bɛbã pii lɛmɛ tɛ Yesu bido nɛ ye mɔawɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a sũ.
43004042	Ade bibi otsole a kĩ, “Finyaa kɔ̃, nnɛ́ nɔ fɔlɛtsa a sũ bɔtɛ budo, kitonɛkĩ boe mɔawɛ a bunu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a, ade bunyi kĩ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ye nyɛ katinya kamɛ Ɔtɛnɛ a.”
43004043	Nɛ fuwi nviã a liti a, Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ.
43004044	Ye mɔawɛ a ɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛ́la obu nɛ ye mɔawɛ kade bati kamɛ.”
43004045	Lɛmɛ kĩ ewo Galilea tite akũ a, bati a tɛ ye katɛ wĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɛnaa Yerusalem nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanya a kamɛ, ade bɛmɔ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a nɛ luwi kanya a kamɛ.
43004046	Ke liti a, Yesu muniki ɛnaa Kana nɛ Galilea tite akũ, awã kĩ ɛdani mui bɛkɛna bavɛ a. Abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi deĩ nɛ awã, ye obinyole asɔ nɛ Kapernaum.
43004047	Kĩ enu kĩ Yesu to Yudea ɛya nɛ Galilea a, ɛnaa ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛnake ye aduli kĩ ɛyatsa ye obi kĩ edeĩ nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite a ɛkpa ye.
43004048	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ mitámɔ awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa ni, miátɛ kado.”
43004049	Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a ke ye aduli kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ ɔtáya mɔatsɛ ni, yĩ obi aaku.”
43004050	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Naa, nɔ obi aana nkpã.” Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tɛ Yesu fɔlɛtsa a edo ade epi ɔtɔsi a.
43004051	Kĩ yanaa a, ye basumunɛ yatsɛlamɔ ye bibi ye kĩ ye obinyole a saɛ.
43004052	Evia be lɔkɔ a kĩ de kamɛ obinyole a saɛ, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Kadzɔ suwa ɔdɔũ mɔa kamɛ mɔ atilili a fɔnɛ ye awɛ.”
43004053	Ade ɔlɛga a te anɛ kĩ ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Nɔ obi aana nkpã.” Nɛ foesũ ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee tɛ Yesu bido.
43004054	Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni ayade kĩ Yesu kɛna nɛ Galilea, kĩ emuniki eto Yudea ɛya a.
43005001	Ke liti a, kĩ Yudafɔ luwi lidi kanya wo ɔtɔ a, Yesu muniki ɛnaa Yerusalem.
43005002	Lutubu lidi deĩ nɛ Yerusalem kakɔ a kĩ bavɛ Baveli Onyukpɛ̃ a ɔwɛ̃, kĩ bavɛ nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ Betesda. Bike tɛpata elo nɛ de atɔ.
43005003	Basɔnɛ beblebee awa nɛ tɛpata a kamɛ, be badi nyɛ banɛkunɛ, babɛbã nyɛ lɛkpɛ̃ banɛnɛ mɔ abafã amɛ. Bawa nɛ awã kadzɔlɛ kĩ bɛyaakputua mui a.
43005004	(Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ kideĩ kideĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi ato ode kayaakputua mui a. Ɔsɔnɛ ɔtɔnyade kĩ yawo nɛ mui a kamɛ nɛ be kakputua liti a, asaɛ nɛ fɔsɔ nyɛ fɔsɔ kĩ yasɔ a kamɛ.)
43005005	Onyole odi kĩ ɛkasɔ futeli taalɛ-alɛ̃ flee na nɛ awã.
43005006	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ye kĩ ɛwaa nɛ awã a, enyi kĩ ɛkasɔ owi buna, foesũ evia ye kĩ, “Awɛ kĩ asaɛ?”
43005007	Ɔsɔnɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ntɛ bikputua mui a ni, nlá odima kĩ yabɔɛ yĩ ɛnaado nɛ lutubu a kamɛ. Ntɛ mbɔa mbɔdi ĩyidza manaa a, lɔkɔa oti bɛbã tɛ̃ ɛnya yĩ lɔtɔ.”
43005008	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yidza kadza, kabɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna katsã!”
43005009	Lɛtalɛta ɔsɔnɛ a na akũ ɔsĩ, ɛbɔɛ ye ɔkɛna edo katsã awɛ. Luwi a kĩ fukĩĩ ya a nyɛ Yudafɔ Kawɛya Luwi,
43005010	foesũ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a bi oti a kĩ Yesu tsa a kĩ ɛnɔnɛ ye ɔkɛna a kĩ, “Nviã nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi. Boe mbla a tákpa osi kĩ alɔ nɔ ɔkɛna.”
43005011	Onyole a kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛtsa yĩ a libi yĩ kĩ, ‘Yidza kadza, kabɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna katsã!’ ”
43005012	Ade ke bivia ye kĩ, “Owei nyɛ oti a kĩ ebi nɔ kĩ bɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna katsã?”
43005013	Lɛmɛ oti a kĩ bɛtsa a linyína Yesu, kitonɛkĩ bati yi awã, ade Yesu lɛmɛ vɛlɛ akũ ɛnɛ nɛ bati a kamɛ a.
43005014	Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ́ ye nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ade ebi ye kĩ, “Dã! Finyaa ɔna akũ ɔsĩ, foesũ fɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, lɛtsa kpa bɛbã kĩ lɛbɛ̃ fukĩĩ aaya nɛ nɔ akũ.”
43005015	Ade ke onyole a dzakũ ɛnabi Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ Yesu lɛtsa ye.
43005016	Foesũ bido Yesu liti katomɛna awɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛtsa oti nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.
43005017	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nda akɛna adzuma luwi nyɛ luwi, ade yĩ malo kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna adzuma a.”
43005018	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ fɔ̃ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a buki bɛwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bakɔ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ Kawɛya Luwi mbla a odi efum, mbom ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ Baguma nyɛ Ɔlɛga, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ eketimɔ Baguma.
43005019	Foesũ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ Obi a lɛláapuli ɛkɛna lɛtsama nɛ ye mɔawɛ akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ Obi a amɔ kĩ Ɔlɛga akɛna a, ade de odi ye malo yakɛna a.
43005020	Kitonɛkĩ Ɔlɛga a awɛ Obi a kalɛ, ade yatsa ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ye mɔawɛ yakɛna a. Yaatsa Obi fɔtsa kpale kɔlaa kĩ fɔbɛ̃ fukĩĩ kĩ ɛkɛna, kĩ fɔ́akɛna mi wãwã.
43005021	Ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a adzɛla banɔkpa badzi nkpã a, ade aye Obi a lɛmɛ aakpa bikĩ ɛpau a nkpã a.
