43005022	Ɔlɛga mɔawɛ a ládzɛmɔ odima, mbom ɛkɔa kɔbɛ̃ flee edo nɛ Obi a awɛ kĩ ɛdzɛmɔ bati flee,
43005023	ayekĩ be flee baakɔa obu bɛkpa Obi a ndɛ ayekĩ bakɔa kakpa Ɔlɛga a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaábu Obi a ni, yaábu Ɔlɛga a kĩ ye lido ye a lɛmɛ.
43005024	“Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse yĩ fɔlɛtsa, mɔ yatɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a kado ni, edeĩ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Bɛláadzɛmɔ ye, mbom ɛtsã wuda kamɛ ɛtɛ̃, ɛna nkpã kɔkɔɛ.
43005025	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɔkɔ lidi aya, ade lɛya kɔkɔɛ malo, kĩ banɔkpa aanu Baguma Obi a odo, ade bikĩ binu ye odo a aadzi nkpã a.
43005026	Ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a mɔawɛ kamɛ nkpã deĩ a, ade ayea ɛfɔ̃ nkpã deĩ nɛ Obi a lɛmɛ kamɛ a.
43005027	Ɛkpa ye kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ɛdzɛ ɛkɔ kɔtɔ lɛmɛ, kitonɛkĩ ye nyɛ Otidziwa Obi a.
43005028	“Fukĩĩ fɔtakɛna mi wãwã, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ lidi aya kĩ banɔkpa flee aanu ye odo,
43005029	lɔkɔa baanɛ nɛ be funikɛ kamɛ. Bikĩ bɛkɛna tuwĩ a aayidza bidzi nkpã, ade bikĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa a aayidza bɛkpa kɔtɔkaku.”
43005030	Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nláapuli nkɛna lɛtsama nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ otumi akũ. Madzɛ fɔlɛtsa ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma abi yĩ, foesũ madzɛ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ, kitonɛkĩ maákɛna nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kawɛ akũ, mbom makɛna nɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a kawɛ akũ.
43005031	“Ntɛ ndi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ akũ ni, yĩ adansiɛ a tákpɔla.
43005032	Lɛmɛ oti bɛbã deĩ kĩ yadi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ, ade ĩnyina kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ yalɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a kpɔla.
43005033	“Mido batɔ nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃, ade ebi mi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ yĩ akũ a.
43005034	Ntásĩ otidziwa adansiɛ kadi nɛ yĩ akũ, mbom nlɛ fukĩĩ ayekĩ míana nkpã katɛ.
43005035	Yohanes la ndɛ ɔsɛdza kĩ yatɛ̃ kakpalɛ fɔkɔ, ade miawɛ kĩ miamɔ kawɔlɛ sukuloo nɛ ye ɔhaĩ a kamɛ a.
43005036	“Lɛmɛ ndeĩ adansiɛ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Yohanes ade a. Fɔtsa a kĩ makɛna a kĩ fɔnyɛ tudzuma kĩ Nda kpa yĩ kĩ nkɛna nwũna a, ade foe adi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ, katsa lɛmɛ kĩ Ɔlɛga a lido yĩ a.
43005037	Ɔlɛga a kĩ edo yĩ a, ade ye adi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a. Mitánu tɔ̃ ye odo ĩye mimɔ́ tɔ̃ ayekĩ ɛla a.
43005038	Mitátɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ mitátɛ oti a kĩ edo a mido.
43005039	Miatsã Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a fɔlɛtsa kamɛ fininiini, kitonɛkĩ miakɔna kĩ foe kamɛ míatsã mina nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Ade ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔapɛ a adi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a,
43005040	lɛmɛ miáwɛ kĩ miaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ayekĩ míana nkpã.
43005041	“Maáwɛ kamu ntomɛna batidziwa sɛkɛ̃,
43005042	kitonɛkĩ ĩnyina bati a odu kĩ be mianɛ, ade ĩnyina lɛmɛ kĩ milá ɔdɔ mikpa Baguma nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.
43005043	Ĩya nɛ Nda dĩ akũ lɛmɛ mitátɛ yĩ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti bɛbã lɛya nɛ ye mɔawɛ dĩ akũ ni, míatɛ ye.
43005044	Miawɛ kĩ miatɛ mi akũ akũ kamu, lɛmɛ miáwɛ kamu a kĩ kito oti a kĩ ye odi nyɛ Baguma a sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa nde míapuli mitɛ yĩ mido?
43005045	“Lɛmɛ mitakɔna kĩ yĩ aatsua mi onukpɛ̃ nkpa Nda. Mose a kĩ ye akũ mikɔa anɛ mite a, ade ye nyɛ oti kĩ yaatsua mi onukpɛ̃ a.
43005046	Ntɛ miti mitɛ Mose mido ni, kufɛ míatɛ yĩ malo mido, kitonɛkĩ ɛtsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa eyi nɛ yĩ akũ.
43005047	Lɛmɛ ntɛ mitátɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ eyi a mido ni, nde míakɛna mitɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a mido?”
43006001	Ke liti a, Yesu nyina Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a kĩ bavɛ lɛmɛ kĩ Tiberia ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a, ɛnaa sɛkɛ sitide a.
43006002	Bati kɔdabu kpale tomɔ ye kitonɛkĩ bɛmɔ́ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna, nɛ basɔnɛ katsa kamɛ a.
43006003	Ade Yesu de ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ ɛnakɛna akũ edzi mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ.
43006004	Finyaa, Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanya lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ liyua.
43006005	Kĩ Yesu dzɛla anɛ ɛdã fɔkɔ a, ɛmɔ́ kĩ bati kɔdabu baũ kudi lamɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ kaya, foesũ evia Filipo kĩ, “Ndia bɔ́ana funitsã bɔya bɔkpa bati kĩĩ flee?”
43006006	Yesu mɔawɛ nyina lɛtsa a kĩ yaakɛna, lɛmɛ evia Filipo kalɛ kĩĩ kĩ yasɔ ye ɛdã.
43006007	Ade Filipo kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ bɔya funitsã sika ovoe ɔha nviã malo ni, fɔláawĩ be ntɛ odi nyɛ odi tɛ sukuloo sukuloo malo.”
43006008	Awã naa, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa, Andrea, kĩ ɛnyɛ Simon Petro ɔwaɛ̃ bi ye kĩ,
43006009	“Opopo odi nɛɛ abodoo fɔbɔ elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã nɛ awĩ. Lɛmɛ futi fɔláato bati beblebee kĩĩ?”
43006010	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bati a flee bɛkɛna akũ bidzi.” Tuwĩ blɔblɔ deĩ nɛ awã ade bati a flee kɛna akũ bidzi nɛ te akũ a. Banyole a lidede aana ndɛ mpim elo.
43006011	Ade ke Yesu tɛ abodoo a ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ade ɛsɛ̃ ye ɛkpa bati a. Ɛkɛna kɔfɔabi a lɛmɛ lɔmɔ, ade be flee bɛna funitsã ndɛ ayekĩ bawɛ a.
43006012	Kĩ bɛnya biwĩ a, Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mikpɔta fukĩ fute a. Mitafɔ̃ bubula fudima kade.”
43006013	Foesũ bifila fukĩ bati a nya bitina nɛ abodoo elo a kamɛ a biyula tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã.
43006014	Kĩ bati a mɔ́ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna nɛ awã a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali, ade Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a kĩ yaya nɛ katinya kamɛ a!”
43006015	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ kĩ baayatimtim ye bipi bidzina lɛgã a, foesũ ɛnɛ́ nɛ be kamɛ ebuki ede ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ ye odi.
43006016	Kĩ olobe lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ka bɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ.
43006017	Biwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bimuniki binyina banaa Kapernaum. Nɛ lɔkɔ a, kade dɔ lɛmɛ Yesu táyawo tɔ̃ be sɛkɛ̃.
43006018	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, ɔwɛ kpale odi kavũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kabɔa mui kadɛla kakamɛna.
43006019	Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tá ɔkɔlɔ a banaa lɔtɔ ndɛ fusikũ ɛlalɛ ĩye foe ɛna a, bɛmɔ́ Yesu kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ mui anɛ yaya nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a sɛkɛ̃, ade libe wo be a.
43006020	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitavila. Yĩ manɛ!”
43006021	Ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi be ade bɛfɔ̃ Yesu wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a. Lɛtalɛta ɔkɔlɔ a wo lɔwɔtuni nɛ awã kĩ banaa a.
43006022	Kĩ kade nyina a, bati kɔdabu a kĩ bɛkahɔ nɛ ɔwɔ lutuni litide kadzɔ a mɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ ɔkɔlɔ mɔapɛ lɛna nɛ awã. Bɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu táwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ ebumɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, mbom bɛdzakũ bɛfɔnɛ ye.
43006023	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, tɔkɔlɔ bɛbã tidi kĩ tito Tiberia ɔmatɔ a yadza tifuã awã kĩ bati nya abodoo a kĩ boe Ɔlate bɔa mpaɛ nɛ ye akũ a.
43006024	Kĩ bati kɔdabu a mɔ́ kĩ Yesu ĩye ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ odima lɛláa awã a, biwo nɛ tɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ bɛnaa Kapernaum bɛnaawɛ ye.
43006025	Kĩ bati a mɔ́ Yesu nɛ lɔwɔtuni litide a ni, bivia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe ɔyawo awĩ?”
43006026	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, nnɛ́ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna mimɔ́ a sũ mitsɛ̃ miawɛ yĩ, mbom abodoo a kĩ mina minya miwĩ a sũ.
43006027	Mitaha akũ nɛ funitsã kĩ fɔ́abu kade akũ, mbom miha akũ miwɛ funitsã a kĩ fɔ́awa fɔkpa daa nkpã a kĩ Otidziwa Obi a aakpa mi a, kitonɛkĩ ade ye akũ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga a te awɛ a.”
43006028	Foesũ bati a via Yesu kĩ, “Litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna fɔtsa kĩ bɔakɛna Baguma adzuma?”
43006029	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ mikɛna nyɛ kĩ mitɛ oti a kĩ edo a mido.”
43006030	Ade bivia ye kĩ, “Nsɛntsɛlɛni awɔdabe aakɛna bɔmɔ́ lɔkɔa bɔtɛ nɔ budo? Litsa aakɛna?
43006031	Boe bawanyɔ nya funitsã a kĩ bavɛ mana a nɛ kɔsa kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, ‘Ɛkpa be abodoo etomɛna ode kĩ bɛnya.’ ”
43006032	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ, nnɛ́ Mose lɛkpa mi abodoo a etomɛna ode, mbom Nda akpa abodoo wĩ katomɛna ode.
43006033	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma abodoo a nyɛ́ oti a kĩ eto ode ɛya kĩ yakpa katinya nkpã.”
43006034	Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, kpa boe abodoo kĩĩ daa.”
43006035	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ abodoo a kĩ yakpa nkpã. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ni, kɔlɛ lɛláakɔ ye da, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, ɔmɔado lɛláakɔ ye da.
43006036	Finyaa mbi mi kĩ, mimɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ miátɛ mido.
43006037	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ Nda kɔa ɛkpa yĩ ni, yaaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ni, nláablɔmɛna ye da,
43006038	kitonɛkĩ nto ode ĩya, nnɛ́ kĩ mayaakɛna nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kawɛ akũ, mbom kĩ makɛna oti a kĩ edo yĩ a odi kawɛ akũ.
43006039	Ade oti a kĩ edo yĩ a kawɛ nyɛ kĩ bati a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛkpa yĩ a kamɛ odima ɛtayɛla, mbom kĩ ndzɛla be flee bidzi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ.
43006040	Kitonɛkĩ Nda kawɛ nyɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔ́ Obi a mɔ ɛtɛ ye edo lɛmɛ ni, ɛna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Ade maadzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ a.”
43006041	Yudafɔ a do hũhũhũhũ kakɛna awɛ nɛ Yesu akũ, kitonɛkĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ abodoo a kĩ eto ode ɛya a.”
43006042	Foesũ bɛlɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ Yesu, Yosef obinyole a kĩ bunyina ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma flee a nɛ awĩ a? Nde fɔya mɔ finyaa yalɛ kĩ ode eto ɛya?”
43006043	Ade Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ hũhũhũhũ kakɛna nɛ mi kamɛ.
43006044	Odima lɛláapuli ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ mbɔɛntɛ Nda a kĩ edo yĩ a vɛlɛ ye ɛma yĩ, ade maadzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ a.
43006045	Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a tsɛlɛ biyi kĩ, ‘Baguma aatsa bati flee fɔtsa!’ Odi nyɛ odi kĩ etse Ɔlɛga a, ɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa etomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ ni, aya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.
43006046	Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ látsa kĩ odi mɔ́ tɔ̃ Ɔlɛga a, mbɔɛntɛ oti a kĩ eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a odi lɛmɔ Ɔlɛga a.
43006047	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ edo ni, edeĩ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
43006048	Yĩ nyɛ abodoo a kĩ yakpa nkpã.
43006049	Mi bawanyɔ nya mana nɛ kɔsa kamɛ, lɛmɛ biku.
43006050	Lɛmɛ abodoo a kĩ eto ode ɛya a aafɔ̃ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yanya ye a lɛláaku.
43006051	Yĩ nyɛ abodoo a kĩ yakpa nkpã, kĩ eto ode ɛya a. Ntɛ odi nya abodoo kĩĩ ni, yaadzi nkpã daa, ade ke abodoo a kĩ maakpa ye a nyɛ yĩ sukɛna, kĩ makpa katinya kamɛ bati bɛna nkpã.”
43006052	Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ Yudafɔ a yi fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ kayɔ nɛ kalɔkpa kamɛ nɛ be kamɛ ade bivia kĩ, “Nde oti kĩĩ aapuli ɛkɔa ye sukɛna ɛkpa boe kĩ bɔba?”
43006053	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ mitába Otidziwa Obi a sukɛna, mimɔa ye babɔanɛ a ni, miláana nkpã nɛ mi kamɛ.
43006054	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛba yĩ sukɛna ɛmɔa yĩ babɔanɛ lɛmɛ ni, yaana daa nkpã a, ade maadzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ a.
43006055	Kitonɛkĩ yĩ sukɛna nyɛ funitsã wĩ a, ade yĩ babɔanɛ lɛmɛ nyɛ bavɛ wĩ a.
43006056	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaba yĩ sukɛna, kĩ yamɔa yĩ babɔanɛ lɛmɛ ni, edeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ade yĩ malo ndeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a.
43006057	Ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a kĩ edzi nkpã do yĩ a, kĩ ndzi nkpã nɛ ye sũ a, ade ayea odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛba yĩ sukɛna lɛmɛ aadzi nkpã nɛ yĩ sũ a.
43006058	Ade abodoo a kĩ eto ode a nɛ awĩ a. Ɛlá ndɛ mana a kĩ mi bawanyɔ nya lɛmɛ ke liti, biku a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnya abodoo kĩĩ aadzi nkpã daa.”
43006059	Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkatsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ nɛ Kapernaum.
43006060	Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a pii nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ tɛnɛ́ ɔsĩ! Owei aapuli ɛtɛ foe?”
43006061	Yesu mɔ́ eyi ɔsũ kĩ bɛkakɛna hũhũhũhũ, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ fukĩĩ fɔ̃ miawɛ kĩ miakpa lɔlɔ?
43006062	Kekɔ̃ nde fɔ́ana ntɛ mimɔ́ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ emuniki ede yanaa ode, awã kĩ ɛna tɔ̃ a?
43006063	Baguma Hũhũ a akpa nkpã, otidziwa kɔbɛ̃ lɛláa lɛtsama kamɛ. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi a nyɛ Hũhũ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ foe kamɛ nkpã deĩ.
43006064	Lɛmɛ mi kamɛ badi tátɛ bido.” Kitonɛkĩ Yesu nyi kito anɛ kayɔkayi a bati a kĩ bɛláatɛ bido mɔ oti a kĩ ye aanyɛ ye ɛkpa a.
43006065	Ɛlɛ ebu kĩ, “Ade fukĩĩ sũ mbi mi kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga a kpa ye osi.”
43006066	Kito fukĩĩ akũ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a badi pii muniki nɛ ye liti, ade bɛtábuki bitomɔ ye a.
43006067	Foesũ evia fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a kĩ, “Mi malo miawɛ kĩ miadzakũ mbɔɛɛ?”
43006068	Ade Simon Petro kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, owei sɛkɛ̃ bɔ́adzakũ bɔnaa? Nɔ deĩ daa nkpã a fɔlɛtsa.
43006069	Finyaa kɔ̃ bɔtɛ budo ade bunyina kĩ nɔ nyɛ Oti Kpalɛwa a kĩ eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a.”
43006070	Ade ke Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ mi bati ewua-nviã mpau? Lɛmɛ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa nyɛ Abonsam!”
43006071	Yuda, Simon Iskariot obi a akũ fɔlɛtsa ɛkalɛ, kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ ɛnyɛ be ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa malo ni, ade ye aanyɛ ye ɛkpa a.
43007001	Ke liti a, Yesu natsã emini nɛ Galilea tite akũ, ɛtáwɛ kĩ yamini nɛ Yudea tite kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ awã kawɛ kĩ bakɔ ye.
43007002	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yudafɔ Tɛpatampa Kayɔ Kadzi Luwi kanya a fuã,
43007003	foesũ Yesu bawaɛ̃nyole bi ye kĩ, “Dzakũ nɛ awĩ kanaa Yudea tite akũ, lɔkɔa nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛmɛ bɛmɔ adzuma a kĩ ɔlamɛna kakɛna a.
43007004	Odima lákɔla ye adzuma ntɛ yawɛ kĩ bati binyi ye kanyi wĩ. Ntɛ nuwĩ ɔlamɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee kakɛna ni, nyɛ nɔ akũ katsa katinya kamɛ bati flee!”
43007005	Yesu bawaɛ̃nyole a lɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ be malo bɛtátɛ ye bido.
43007006	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Yĩ lɔkɔ wĩ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ nɛnɛ lɛkpa mi.
43007007	Katinya kamɛ bati lɛláapuli bikesĩ mi, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ bakesĩ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ ndzɛmɔ be kabi kĩ be tudzuma nyɛ tɔkpa.
43007008	Minaa luwi a kanyakɔ̃. Yĩ kɔ̃ nláanaa luwi kĩĩ kanyakɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ yĩ lɔkɔ wĩ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.”
43007009	Kĩ Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ebuki ɛkahɔ nɛ Galilea.
43007010	Kĩ Yesu bawaɛ̃nyole a dzakũ bɛnaa luwi kanyakɔ̃ a, ye malo ɛyanaa awã, lɛmɛ ɛtányɛ ye akũ ɛtsa, mbom ɛbɛla ye akũ.
43007011	Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kawɛ ye nɛ luwi a kanyakɔ̃, bɛkavia kĩ, “Nde oti a?”
43007012	Bati kɔdabu a kalɛ kɔdzɛla pɛtɛɛ pɛtɛɛ nɛ Yesu akũ. Be kamɛ badi lɛ kĩ, “Oti wĩ yanɛ.” Ade babɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Oowo, ɛtsɛ̃ yakɛ bati.”
43007013	Lɛmɛ odima tápuli ɛlɛ foe kɔɔba, kitonɛkĩ bivila Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a.
43007014	Kĩ kite sukuloo luwi kanya a atɛ̃ de kayite a, Yesu naa Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ɛnado bati fɔtsa katsa awɛ.
43007015	Ye fɔtsa katsa a kɛna Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a wãwã paa, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Nde oti kĩĩ kɛna enyina ovoli lɔmɔ, kĩ ɛtána fɔtsa kakɔlɛ kadima?”
43007016	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa a kĩ matsa a lɛnyɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ fude, mbom futo Baguma kĩ edo yĩ a sɛkɛ̃.
43007017	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yakɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ akũ a, aanyi ntɛ fɔtsa a kĩ matsa a to Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ĩye malɛ foe nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ.
43007018	Oti kĩ yatsa fɔtsa nɛ ye mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ ni, obu yawɛ ɛkpa ye akũ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti awɛ obu ɛkpa oti a kĩ edo ye a ni, ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔalini, ade tɔkpa tidima lɛláa ye kamɛ a.
43007019	Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Mose lɛkpa mi mbla a? Lɛmɛ mi kamɛ odima lákɛna nɛ mbla a akũ. Nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miakɔ yĩ?”
43007020	Ade bati kɔdabu a bi ye kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ! Owei awɛ kĩ yakɔ nɔ?”
43007021	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awãwã fɔtsa mɔa kĩĩ nkɛna, ade mi flee mikɛna saa a.
43007022	Mose kpa mi mbla kĩ mitsua mi babinyole fɔkpati, ade titɔ kĩ nnɛ́ Mose sɛkɛ̃ futo, mbom mi bawanyɔ liyi foe kayɔ malo ni, miatsua onyole lɛkpati nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.
43007023	Ntɛ bitsua obi lɛkpati nɛ Kawɛya luwi akũ ayekĩ bɛláafum Mose mbla a ni, nde sũ mina kalɔkpa nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ ntsa oti fɔsɔ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a akũ?
43007024	Mitadã bati anɛ midzɛ mikɔ kɔtɔ, mbom midzɛ kalɛ nɛ ke osi kpĩĩ akũ.”
43007025	Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bati badi via kĩ, “Nnɛ́ oti kĩĩ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a lamɛna kawɛ kĩ bakɔ a nɛ awĩ a?
43007026	Midã kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ kanade yalɛ kɔdzɛla, kĩ bɛtávia ye kadima. Mbɔɛɛ fɔ́anya kĩ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a nyina nuwĩ kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo a?
43007027	Boe flee bunyina awã kĩ oti kĩĩ kɔ̃ to, lɛmɛ ntɛ Kristo a ya ni, odima lɛláanyi awã kĩ eto.”
43007028	Kĩ Yesu katsa fɔtsa nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Kalɛ mialɛ kĩ miti minyina yĩ mɔ awã kĩ nto a? Ntáya nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ. Oti a kĩ edo yĩ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔalini kĩ mi minyína ye,
43007029	lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ĩnyina ye, kitonɛkĩ ye sɛkɛ̃ nto ĩya ade ye lido yĩ a.”
43007030	Nɛ foesũ bɛwɛ kĩ bapi Yesu, lɛmɛ odima tákɔa awɛ ɛta ye, kitonɛkĩ ye lɔkɔ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.
43007031	Lɛmɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ bati pii tɛ ye bido ade bivia kĩ, “Ntɛ Kristo a ya ni, yaakɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii fɔba fukĩ oti kĩĩ lamɛna kakɛna a?”
43007032	Farisifɔ nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bati kɔdabu a lamɛna kalɛ pɛtɛɛ pɛtɛɛ nɛ Yesu akũ a, foesũ bɛmɔ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bido Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a kĩ bɛnaapi ye.
43007033	Ade Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ fubuna owi sukuloo, lɔkɔa maadzakũ nnaa oti a kĩ edo yĩ a sɛkɛ̃.
43007034	Míawɛ yĩ lɛmɛ miláamɔ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ miláapuli miya nɛ awã kĩ maana a.”
43007035	Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a via akũ kĩ, “Nɛ ndia ɛwɛ kĩ yanaa kĩ bɔláapuli bɔmɔ́ ye? Mbɔɛɛ kĩ yanaa Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛgba biko nɛ Helafɔ kamɛ a ɛnaatsa Helafɔ a fɔtsa?
43007036	Ɛlɛ kĩ bɔ́awɛ ye lɛmɛ bɔláamɔ ye, ade bɔláapuli bɔnaa awã kĩ yaana a. Foe kayɔ nyɛ litsa?”
43007037	Nɛ luwi nkaɛ a kĩ lɛnyɛ luwi titiliwu nɛ fuwi kanya kamɛ akũ a, Yesu yidza ɛdza ade ɛbɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɔmɔado akɔ ye ni, ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ɛyaamɔa mui.
43007038	Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, nkpã tɔwɔ aatini bito ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.’ ”
43007039	Yesu kalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ Hũhũ a kĩ bikĩ bɛtɛ ye bido a aayatɛ a akũ. Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, bɛtákpa tɔ̃ Hũhũ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛtádzɛla Yesu ewo nɛ kukũkpalɛ kamɛ.
43007040	Kĩ bati a badi nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali, Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ a nyɛ oti kĩĩ.”
43007041	Babɛbã lɛ kĩ, “Ade Kristo a nɛ awĩ a.” Lɛmɛ bati bɛbã kɔ̃ via kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ Galilea tite akũ Kristo a aato ɛya?
43007042	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a tálɛ kĩ Kristo aato Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ, ade baama ye nɛ Betlehem, ɔmatɔ a kĩ Dawid dzi a kamɛ?”
43007043	Foesũ kasɛ̃ wo nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ nɛ Yesu sũ.
43007044	Badi wɛ kĩ bapi ye, lɛmɛ odima tákɔa awɛ ɛta ye.
43007045	Kĩ Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a muniki bɛya nɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ a sɛkɛ̃ a, bivia be kĩ, “Nde sũ mitápi ye miyamɛna?”
43007046	Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Odima tálɛ tɔ̃ kɔdzɛla ndɛ ayekĩ oti kĩĩ alɛ a!”
43007047	Ade Farisifɔ a via be kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ ɛnakɛ mi malo?
43007048	Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ĩye Farisini ɔdabe lɛtɛ ye edo kĩ minyina?
43007049	Ade bati kɔdabu kĩĩ, kĩ binyína Mose mbla a sũ ni, Baguma dumu be!”
43007050	Nikodemo kĩ ɛnyɛ Farisifɔ a kamɛ ɔmɔa, kĩ ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ tɔ̃ a na nɛ awã. Edo onukpɛ̃ ebi be kĩ,
43007051	“Boe mbla tákpa boe osi kĩ bɔakɔ oti kɔtɔ, mbɔɛntɛ bɔdzɛmɔ ye butse ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa bunyi lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a.”
43007052	Bibi ye kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ Galilea nɔ malo oto? Tsã Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kadã, lɔkɔa aamɔ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ odima láto Galilea.”
43007053	(Ke liti a, odi nyɛ odi dzakũ ɛnaa kɔla.)
43008001	Lɛmɛ Yesu de ɛnaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ.
43008002	Kĩ kade nyina ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, Yesu muniki ɛya nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Bati pii yakpɔta nɛ ye akũ, ade ɛkɛna akũ edzi eyi be fɔtsa katsa kayɔ a.
43008003	Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ a kpã otsole odi nɛ adɔpaa kabɔa kamɛ bɛyadzɛla nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ.
43008004	Ade bibi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bipi otsole kĩĩ kĩ onyole bɛbã awa mɔ ye.
43008005	Nɛ boe mbla a kamɛ ni, Mose kpa otumi kĩ bɛtalɛ otsole kĩĩ odu boe bɛkɔ. Litsa nɔ kɔ̃ alɛ nɛ foe akũ?”
43008006	Bivia fukĩĩ kĩ bakɔa banaĩ ye, ayekĩ baana kalɛ kadi bɛkɔa bitsua ye onukpɛ̃. Lɛmɛ Yesu kɛna akũ ɛkɔa lawobi ɛtsɛlɛ fɔtsa nɛ tite.
43008007	Kĩ bɛdza bɛkavia ye fɔlɛtsa a, ɛdzɛla akũ ade ebi be kĩ, “Mi kamɛ owula a kĩ ɛtákɛna tɔkpa tidima tɔ̃ ni, ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛta de ɛbɔa otsole a.”
43008008	Ade ke ebuki ɛkɛna akũ ɛtsɛlɛ fɔtsa nɛ tite a.
43008009	Kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, be flee bɛdzakũ ɔmɔa ɔmɔa, kito banɔkɔɛ̃ a akũ kɛnawo kĩ kite Yesu mɔ otsole a odi nɛ awã.
43008010	Yesu dzɛla akũ evia otsole a kĩ, “Boe ɔma, nde bati a? Be kamɛ odima táte kĩ yakɔ nɔ kɔtɔ?”
43008011	Otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, oowo.” Ade ke Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ yĩ malo ntákɔ nɔ kɔtɔ. Dzakũ kanaa, lɛmɛ tabuki ɔkɛna tɔkpa.”
43008012	Yesu buki ebi bati a kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhaĩ, odi nyɛ odi kĩ etomɔ yĩ ni, yaana nkpã ɔhaĩ a, ade ɛláatsã nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ da a.”
43008013	Farisifɔ a bi ye kĩ, “Adi adansiɛ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ akũ, foesũ nɔ adansiɛ a tákpɔla.”
43008014	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ madi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ akũ malo ni, lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a kpɔla, kitonɛkĩ ĩnyina awã kĩ nto mɔ awã kĩ manaa a. Mi linyína awã kĩ nto ĩye awã kĩ manaa a.
43008015	Miadzɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ batidziwa kamɔ onukpɛ̃, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ maádzɛmɔ odima.
43008016	Lɛmɛ ntɛ maadzɛ mɔ bati ni, yĩ kadzɛ a aakpɔla, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ yĩ odi adzɛ kalɛ, mbom bɔmɔ Nda a kĩ edo yĩ a adzɛ fɔlɛtsa.
43008017	Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ mi mbla a kamɛ kĩ ntɛ adansifɔ nviã onukpɛ̃ kɛna ɔmɔa ni, lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ a kpɔla.
43008018	Madi adansiɛ kakpa yĩ akũ, ade Nda a kĩ edo yĩ a lɛmɛ adi yĩ akũ adansiɛ a.”
43008019	Bati a via Yesu kĩ, “Ndia aga deĩ?” Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Minyína yĩ, ĩye Nda. Ntɛ kanyina minyina yĩ ni, kufɛ míanyi Nda lɛmɛ.”
43008020	Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ tɔgɔlɛ katekɔ̃ a, kĩ ɛkatsa fɔtsa nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, lɛmɛ odima tápi ye, kitonɛkĩ ye lɔkɔ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.
43008021	Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Maadzakũ, ade míawɛ yĩ, lɛmɛ míaku nɛ mi tɔkpa kamɛ. Miláapuli minaa awã kĩ manaa a.”
43008022	Ade ke Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a via kĩ, “Ye akũ yanaakɔ sũ mɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Miláapuli miya nɛ awã kĩ manaa a’?”
43008023	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Tite kĩĩ akũ mito, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ode nto ĩya. Katinya kĩĩ kamɛ bati mianɛ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ oti manɛ.
43008024	Ade foesũ mbi mi kĩ míaku nɛ mi tɔkpa kamɛ a. Míaku nɛ mi tɔkpa kamɛ ntɛ mitátɛ mido kĩ yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ ye manɛ a.”
43008025	Bɛdani bivia ye kĩ, “Owei anɛ?” Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi kito anɛ kayɔkayi a, ade foe mɔapɛ a.
43008026	Ndeĩ fɔlɛtsa pii kĩ maalɛ nɛ mi akũ nkɔa nkɔ mi kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a adi ɔnɔkɔali, ade lɛtsa a kĩ nnu ntomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ a odi mabi katinya kamɛ bati a.”
43008027	Bati a tánu foe kayɔ kĩ Ɔlɛga akũ fɔlɛtsa Yesu kabi be.
43008028	Foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Ntɛ midɛla Otidziwa Obi a nɛ ode a fɔmɔ míanyi kĩ yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ ye manɛ a. Ade ke míanyi kĩ maákɛna lɛtsama nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ, mbom lɛtsa a kĩ Nda tsa yĩ kĩ nlɛ a odi malɛ.
43008029	Oti a kĩ edo yĩ a deĩ nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃. Ɛtáfɔnɛ yĩ odi eyi, kitonɛkĩ makɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lawo ye anɛ a daa.”
43008030	Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bati pii tɛ ye bido.
43008031	Yesu bi Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛtɛ ye bido a kĩ, “Ntɛ mitɛ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a midomɔ akũ ni, kekɔ̃ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ wĩ mianɛ.
43008032	Míanyi ɔnɔkɔali a, ade ɔnɔkɔali a aakpa mi akũ akũ kadzi a.”
43008033	Bati a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Abraham babi mɔ bawa bɔanɛ, ade bɔtánya tɔ̃ odima basate a. Nde sũ alɛ kĩ, ‘Míana akũ akũ kadzi’?”
43008034	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa ni, ɛnyɛ tɔkpa ɔsate.
43008035	Ɔsate lánya kɔla obi daa, lɛmɛ obinyole kɔ̃ nyɛ kɔla obi daa.
43008036	Foesũ ntɛ Obi a kpa mi akũ akũ kadzi ni, lɔkɔa mina akũ akũ kadzi wĩ.
43008037	Ĩnyina kĩ Abraham babi mɔ bawa mianɛ, lɛmɛ miawɛ kĩ miakɔ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a táwo nɛ mi kamɛ.
43008038	Fɔtsa a kĩ mmɔ́ nɛ Nda sɛkɛ̃ a, ade foe akũ malɛ kɔdzɛla a, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ miakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ mi ɔlɛga bi mi a.”
43008039	Bibi ye kĩ, “Boe ɔlɛga nyɛ Abraham.” Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ Abraham babi mɔ bawa paa mianɛ ni, kufɛ míakɛna fɔtsa ndɛ ayekĩ ɛkɛna a.
43008040	Lɛmɛ miawɛ kĩ miakɔ yĩ oti a kĩ mbi mi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ntɛ ntomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a. Abraham tákɛna fukĩĩ odu.
43008041	Mi miakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ mi ɔlɛga a kɛna a.” Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔlɛga mɔapɛ budeĩ, ade ye nyɛ Baguma a. Bɔnyɛ́ adɔpaa kamɛ babi.”
43008042	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma liti ɛnyɛ mi Ɔlɛga ni, kufɛ míawɛ yĩ kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ nto ĩya. Ntáya nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ, mbom Baguma lido yĩ.
43008043	Nde sũ miánu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a kayɔ? Kitonɛkĩ miáwɛ kĩ miatse yĩ fɔlɛtsa a.
43008044	Mi ɔlɛga Abonsam bade mianɛ, ade miawɛ kĩ miakɛna nɛ mi ɔlɛga a fɔwɛtsa akũ a. Owudini yanɛ kito anɛ kayɔkayi, ade yaátomɔ ɔnɔkɔali liti a, kitonɛkĩ ɔnɔkɔali lɛláa ye kamɛ da. Ntɛ ɛma fɔvã ni, ye kutitse ɛnyɛ yatsa, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ ɔvãlɛvã mɔ fɔvã ɔlɛga.
43008045	Lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi, ade foesũ miátɛ yĩ mido a.
43008046	Mi kamɛ owei aapuli ɛkɔ yĩ kɔtɔ kĩ nkɛna tɔkpa? Ntɛ nlɛ ɔnɔkɔali a ni, nde sũ mitátɛ yĩ mido?
43008047	Oti kĩ eto Baguma kamɛ a, atse Baguma fɔlɛtsa. Lɛmɛ ayekĩ mitáto Baguma kamɛ sũ ni, miátɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa.”
43008048	Yudafɔ a via Yesu kĩ, “Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ Samariani anɛ, ade hũhũ kpa lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a ni, bɔtálɛ ɔnɔkɔali?”
43008049	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa adima lɛláa yĩ kamɛ. Makpa Nda obu lɛmɛ mi miasupa yĩ.
43008050	Maáwɛ kĩ mado yĩ akũ obu, lɛmɛ odi deĩ kĩ yawɛ foe ade ye adzɛ kakpa yĩ a.
43008051	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a akũ a, lɛláaku da.”
43008052	Yudafɔ a bi ye kĩ, “Ade owi bɔmɔ́ pefee kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a! Abraham ku, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a lɛmɛ ku. Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ alɛ kĩ, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a akũ a, lɛláaku da.’
43008053	Mbɔɛɛ nɔ bɛ̃ boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham kĩ eku a? Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a lɛmɛ ku. Owei abu kĩ ye anɛ?”
43008054	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mado yĩ mɔawɛ akũ obu ni, yĩ obu a lɛláana nfasɔ. Oti a kĩ ye ado yĩ obu a nyɛ Nda, oti kĩ mialɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ mi Baguma a.
43008055	Minyína Nda a, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ĩnyina ye. Ntɛ nlɛ kĩ ĩnyína ye ni, maakɛna ɔvãlɛvã ndɛ mi aye. Lɛmɛ nti ĩnyina ye ade makɛna nɛ ye kalɛ a akũ a.
43008056	Mi ɔwanyɔ Abraham mɔ́ kawɔlɛ kĩ yaamɔ yĩ kaya. Ɛmɔ́ ke lɛmɛ ade kawɔlɛ de ye a.”
43008057	Ade ke Yudafɔ a bi ye kĩ, “Ɔtátɛ tɔ̃ futeli aduenum malo, ke mɔ alɛ kĩ ɔmɔ́ Abraham a?”
43008058	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, yĩ ndeĩ fɔmɔ bɛma Abraham.”
43008059	Ade ke bati a fila boe kĩ bata bɛbɔa ye a, lɛmɛ Yesu bɛla, ade ɛnɛ́ nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ a.
43009001	Kĩ Yesu anaa a, ɛmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ bɛma ye ɔnɛkunɛ.
43009002	Ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, owei tɔkpa sũ bɛma onyole kĩĩ ɔnɛkunɛ? Ye mɔawɛ tɔkpa mbɔɛɛ ye bamanɛ tɔkpa sũ?”
43009003	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ onyole kĩĩ ĩye ye bamanɛ lɛkɛna tɔkpa, mbom bɛma ye ɔnɛkunɛ, ayekĩ baanyɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ adzuma bɛtsãmɛna ye akũ.
43009004	Ntɛ budeĩ nɛ kade kanyina kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔakɛna adzuma bɔkpa oti a kĩ edo yĩ a. Kade aya kadɔkɔ̃ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkɛna adzuma.
43009005	Kĩ ndeĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ kĩĩ ni, yĩ nyɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhaĩ a.”
43009006	Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, etua tanɛ eyi nɛ tite, ɛfɔnɛ te ɛkɔa ɛtsɛla onyole a nɛ banebi.
43009007	Ade ebi ye kĩ, “Naavɔlɛ anɛ nɛ Siloam Lutubu a kamɛ.” Dĩ Siloam kayɔ nyɛ, bido ye. Ade onyole a navɔlɛ anɛ, ade ɛmɔ́ fɔkɔ kĩ emuniki yaya a.
43009008	Ye badzikɔba mɔ bikĩ bɛkamɔ ye kĩ ɛkawã fɔtsa a via kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ oti kĩĩ adzi kawã fɔtsa a?”
43009009	Badi lɛ kĩ, “Ade ye a.” Lɛmɛ babɛbã lɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nnɛ́ ye yanɛ, kanɛ ɛnɛ́ ye.” Nɛ foesũ oti a mɔawɛ lɛ kĩ, “Ye manɛ.”
43009010	Bivia ye kĩ, “Nde fɔya mɔ finyaa kɔ̃ mɔ amɔ fɔkɔ?”
43009011	Ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Onyole a kĩ bavɛ Yesu lɛfɔnɛ tite ekputa yĩ banebi ade ebi yĩ kĩ naavɔlɛ anɛ nɛ Siloam Lutubu a kamɛ. Foesũ nnaa adeke, kĩ nsila nvɔlɛ anɛ pɛ, mpuli mmɔ́ fɔkɔ.”
43009012	Bivia ye kĩ, “Nɛ ndia edeĩ?” Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyína.”
43009013	Ade ke bati a kpã onyole a kĩ eku tɔ̃ anɛ a bɛma Farisifɔ a.
43009014	Luwi a kĩ de akũ Yesu fɔnɛ tite ɛkɔa ebinya ye anɛ a nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi.
43009015	Foesũ Farisifɔ a lɛmɛ via ye ayekĩ fɔkɛna fɔmɔ bibinya ye anɛ. Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɛkɔa tite fɔnɛwa ekputa yĩ banebi. Ɛfɔ̃ nnavɔlɛ anɛ, ade finyaakĩĩ mpuli mamɔ fɔkɔ a.”
43009016	Farisifɔ a badi lɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛkɛna fukĩĩ táto Baguma sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ yaákɛna nɛ Kawɛya Luwi mbla a akũ.” Ade babɛbã lɛmɛ via kĩ, “Nde fɔ́aya kĩ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ aapuli ɛkɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni kĩĩ odu?” Nɛ foesũ kasɛ̃ wo nɛ be kamɛ.
43009017	Farisifɔ a buki bivia onyole a kĩ, “Kĩ ɔlɛ kĩ ye libinya nɔ anɛ a ni, nɔ malo litsa odeĩ kĩ alɛ nɛ ye akũ?” Onyole a kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ yanɛ.”
43009018	Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ a táwɛ kĩ batɛ bido kĩ onyole a nya tɔ̃ ɔnɛkunɛ fɔmɔ ye anɛ binya, kɛnawo kĩ bɛvɛ ye bamanɛ bɛyamɛna.
43009019	Ade bivia be kĩ, “Mi obi a kĩ milɛ kĩ mima ye ɔnɛkunɛ a nɛ awĩ a? Nde fɔya mɔ finyaa kɔ̃ yamɔ fɔkɔ?”
43009020	Ye bamanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bunyina kĩ boe obi yanɛ, ade bunyina kĩ bɔma ye ɔnɛkunɛ a.
43009021	Lɛmɛ ayekĩ fɔkɛna fɔmɔ yamɔ fɔkɔ a ni, bunyína foe kɔ̃, ade bunyína oti a kĩ ye libinya ye anɛ a lɛmɛ a. Mivia ye mɔawɛ a, ebo anɛ, yaapuli ɛnyɛ ye akũ onukpɛ̃.”
43009022	Ye bamanɛ lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ayekĩ bɛkavila Yudafɔ a sũ. Kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛ biyi kɔkɔɛ kĩ ntɛ odi tɛ edo kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a ni, baablɔmɛna ye nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
43009023	Ade foesũ ye bamanɛ a lɛ kĩ, “Ebo anɛ, mivia ye mɔawɛ a!”
43009024	Banɔkɔɛ̃ a vɛ onyole a kĩ bɛma ɔnɛkunɛ a lɛyade ade bibi ye kĩ, “Lɛ ɔnɔkɔali a nɛ Baguma anɛ! Bunyina kĩ onyole a kĩ ɛtsa nɔ a nyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ.”
43009025	Onyole a lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ o-o, ĩye ɛnyɛ́ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ o-o, ĩnyína. Lɛtsa mɔapɛ kĩ ĩnyina nyɛ kĩ ĩnya tɔ̃ ɔnɛkunɛ, lɛmɛ finyaa mamɔ fɔkɔ.”
43009026	Banɔkɔɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Litsa ɛkɛna nɔ? Nde ɛkɛna ebinya nɔ anɛ?”
43009027	Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbi mi foe kɔkɔɛ lɛmɛ miáwɛ kĩ miatse foe. Nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miabuki mitse foe? Mbɔɛɛ mi malo miawɛ kĩ minya ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ?”
43009028	Bivũna ye bɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ odi nyɛ ye fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ, lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ Mose fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ bɔanɛ.
43009029	Bunyina kĩ Baguma bi Mose fɔlɛtsa, lɛmɛ oti a naa kɔ̃ bunyína awã kĩ eto malo!”
43009030	Ade onyole a bi be kĩ, “Litsa awãwã fɔlɛtsa a? Minyína awã kĩ eto, lɛmɛ ade ye libinya yĩ anɛ a!
43009031	Bunyina kĩ Baguma látse tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ, lɛmɛ yatse bati a kĩ bakpa ye obu, kakɛna nɛ ye yawɛ akũ a.
43009032	Kito anɛ katinya kayɔkayi a, bɔtánu tɔ̃ kĩ odi puli ebinya oti kĩ bɛma ɔnɛkunɛ anɛ.
43009033	Ntɛ ɛtato Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, kufɛ ɛláapuli ɛkɛna lɛtsama.”
43009034	Banɔkɔɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Katsa atsa kĩ nɔ a kĩ bɛma bɛdɔɔla nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ a, nɔ mbom awɛ kĩ atsa boe fɔtsa?” Ade bɛblɔmɛna ye nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
43009035	Yesu nu kĩ bɛblɔmɛna onyole a nɛ be kamɛ, foesũ kĩ ɛmɔ́ onyole a, evia ye kĩ, “Ɔtɛ Otidziwa Obi a odo?”
43009036	Onyole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, bi yĩ oti a kĩ yanɛ, ayekĩ maapuli ntɛ ye ndo!”
43009037	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔmɔ́ ye kɔkɔɛ, ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ nɔ finyaakĩĩ a.”
43009038	Onyole a lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ ndo!” Ade ke eke aduli nɛ Yesu anɛ a.
43009039	Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Ĩya nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kĩ mayaadzɛmɔ bati, ayekĩ banɛkunɛ aamɔ fɔkɔ, ade bikĩ bamɔ fɔkɔ a aadani banɛkunɛ.”
43009040	Farisifɔ a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a badi nu lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a, ade bivia ye kĩ, “Katsa atsa kĩ boe malo banɛkunɛ bɔanɛ mbɔɛɛ?”
43009041	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ kaku mi anɛ eku ni, kufɛ bɛláakɔ mi kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ kĩ mialɛ kĩ miamɔ fɔkɔ sũ ni, tɔkpa deĩ nɛ mi akũ.”
43010001	Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, oti kĩ ɛtátsã onyukpɛ̃ a ewo nɛ baveli kɔbã kamɛ, mbom ede ɛtsã kɔbã a akũ ewo ni, ɛnyɛ oyekpanɛ mɔ ɔblɔfɔ.
43010002	Oti a kĩ ɛtsã kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ ewo a nyɛ baveli ɔkpãnɛ a.
43010003	Ade ye mɔ kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ ɔdzɔlɛnɛ a abinya kakpa ye, ade baveli a anu ye odo a. Yavɛ ye bade a buĩ a kĩ ete be a, kakpã be kanɛmɛna kanya.
43010004	Ntɛ ɛkpã be ɛnɛmɛna a, yanya be lɔtɔ, ade baveli a atomɔ ye, kitonɛkĩ binyina ye odo.
43010005	Bɛláatomɔ oti bɛbã, mbom baalo nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ binyína ye odo.”
43010006	Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã kĩĩ, lɛmɛ bɛtánu lɛtsa a kĩ yatsa a kayɔ.
43010007	Nɛ foesũ Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ yĩ nyɛ baveli a kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ a.
43010008	Bati bɛbã a kĩ bɛnya yĩ lɔtɔ bɛya flee a nyɛ bayekpanɛ mɔ bablɔfɔ, foesũ baveli a tátse be fɔlɛtsa.
43010009	Yĩ nyɛ kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtsã yĩ akũ ewo ni, yaana katɛ. Yaawo ɛnɛ, ade yaana funitsã kanyakɔ̃ a.
43010010	Oyekpanɛ aya kĩ yayaaye, edi awu, ebula fɔtsa kade. Yĩ kɔ̃ ĩya ayekĩ bati aana nkpã kĩ ɛkpɔla nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ.
43010011	“Yĩ nyɛ baveli ɔkpãnɛ wĩ a, baveli ɔkpãnɛ wĩ a akɔa ye nkpã kakpa nɛ baveli a lɔlɔ.
43010012	Ntɛ ɔpaani kĩ ɛnyɛ́ baveli ɔkpãnɛ, ade ɛnyɛ́ baveli a ɔlate lɛmɛ mɔ́ kalikii kaya ni, yalo kafɔnɛ baveli a. Foesũ kalikii a apili baveli a kapansam be.
43010013	Ɔpaani a alo kadzakũ kitonɛkĩ kabɔɛ bɛbɔɛ ye kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma a, ade ɛtsɛ́la baveli a lɛtsama akũ a.
43010014	-
43010015	“Yĩ nyɛ baveli ɔkpãnɛ wĩ a. Ndɛ ayekĩ Nda nyina yĩ, yĩ malo ĩnyina Nda a ni, ade aye ĩnyina yĩ mɔawɛ baveli ade be malo binyina yĩ a. Nkɔa yĩ nkpã nkpa nɛ be lɔlɔ.
43010016	Ndeĩ baveli bɛbã kĩ bɛláa baveli kɔbã kĩĩ kamɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ nkpã be malo ĩyamɛna, bitse yĩ odo lɔkɔa be flee baanya baveli katsu mɔa, bɛna nɛ baveli ɔkpãnɛ mɔa kayɔ.
43010017	“Nda awɛ yĩ kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ nkɔa yĩ nkpã nkpa, kĩ maabuki ntɛ ye.
43010018	Odima lɛláatɛ ye nɛ yĩ awɛ, mbom yĩ mɔawɛ lɛkɔa ye nkpa. Ndeĩ osi kĩ makɔa ye nkpa, ade ndeĩ osi kĩ mabuki ntɛ ye a. Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Nda do yĩ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna a.”
43010019	Nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ sũ kasɛ̃ buki kiwo nɛ Yudafɔ a kamɛ.
43010020	Be pii, bɛkalɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ! Ye lɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade! Nde sũ koũ miatse ye?”
43010021	Lɛmɛ babɛbã lɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ lɛláapuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla lɔmɔ! Nde koũ hũhũ kpa aapuli ebinya banɛkunɛ anɛ?”
43010022	Osili lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ, ade Yudafɔ kanya Baguma Asɔli Kɔla Akũ kakpalɛ Luwi nɛ Yerusalem a.
43010023	Yesu kamini nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kakɔ a kĩ bavɛ Salomo Ablanda a kamɛ.
43010024	Ade Yudafɔ a nakpɔta nɛ ye akũ, ade bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ ɔfɔ̃ bɔlamɛna anɛ kadã kavia? Ntɛ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a ni, bi boe ɔnɔkɔali a faa.”
43010025	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbi mi kɔkɔɛ, lɛmɛ miátɛ yĩ mido. Fɔtsa a kĩ makɛna nɛ Nda kɔbɛ̃ akũ a, adi yĩ akũ adansiɛ.
43010026	Lɛmɛ miátɛ kado kitonɛkĩ minyɛ́ yĩ baveli.
43010027	Yĩ baveli atse yĩ ɔlɛdo, ĩnyina be ade batomɔ yĩ a.
43010028	Makpa be nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, ade bɛláaku bɛwɔ da. Odima lɛláapuli ɛwãnɛ be ɛtɛ nɛ yĩ awɛ.
43010029	Fɔtsa a kĩ Nda kɔa edo nɛ yĩ awɛ a deĩ kɔbɛ̃ fɔbɛ̃ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade odima lɛláapuli ɛwãnɛ foe ɛtɛ nɛ Nda awɛ a.
43010030	Bɔmɔ́ Nda ni, ɔmɔa bɔanɛ.”
43010031	Foesũ Yudafɔ a buki bifila boe kĩ batalɛ Yesu.
43010032	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nkɛna fɔtsa wĩ pii kĩ Nda do yĩ kĩ nkɛna nɛ mi anɛ. Foe kamɛ fɔɔdabe sũ miawɛ kĩ miatalɛ yĩ boe?”
43010033	Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ ɔkɛna a sũ bɔawɛ kĩ bɔatalɛ nɔ boe, mbom nɛ mbusuo fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɔlɛ a sũ! Otidziwa kɛkɛ anɛ, lɛmɛ awɛ kĩ akɛna nɔ akũ Baguma!”
43010034	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ mi mbla ovoli a kamɛ kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Minyɛ baguma amɛ.’
43010035	Bunyina kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa lɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali daa. Baguma vɛ bati a kĩ ɛkpa be ye ɔlɛdo a kĩ baguma amɛ.
43010036	Yĩ kɔ̃, Ɔlɛga a lɛpau yĩ edo yĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ. Lɔkɔa nde sũ miti mialɛ kĩ nlɛ fubusuotsa nɛ ayekĩ nlɛ kĩ Baguma Obi manɛ a sũ?
43010037	Foesũ ntɛ nlámɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Nda do yĩ kĩ nkɛna a kakɛna ni, mitatɛ yĩ mido.
43010038	Lɛmɛ ntɛ makɛna foe, titɔ kĩ miátɛ yĩ kado malo ni, mitɛ fɔtsa a kĩ makɛna a mido, ayekĩ míanyi, minu foe kayɔ yededeede kĩ Ɔlɛga a deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ade yĩ malo ndeĩ nɛ Ɔlɛga a kamɛ a.”
43010039	Yudafɔ a buki bɛwɛ kĩ bapi Yesu, lɛmɛ ɛnɛ́ nɛ be kamɛ ɛdzakũ.
43010040	Ade Yesu muniki enyina Yordan Ɔwɔ a ɛnaa awã kĩ Yohanes wɔla bati mui tɔ̃ a, ɛnadzi nɛ awã.
43010041	Bati pii ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Yohanes tákɛna awãwã fɔtsa fudima, lɛmɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ nɛ oti kĩĩ akũ a flee nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.”
43010042	Bati pii nɛ awã tɛ ye bido.
43011001	Onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Lazaro kasɔ. Eto Betania, ɔmatɔ a kĩ bawaɛ̃tsole nviã Maria mɔ Marta dzi a kamɛ.
43011002	Ade Maria kĩĩ lɛkɔa kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ eko nɛ boe Ɔlate fɔnɛta, ɛkɔa ye lɔlɔ tɔlɔ ɛyɔ foe a. Ye ɔwaɛ̃nyole nyɛ Lazaro kĩ yasɔ a.
43011003	Bawaɛ̃tsole a do lɔtɔ nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ ɔkɔba a kĩ aátunɔ ye kalɛ a asɔ.”
43011004	Kĩ Yesu nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔsɔ kĩĩ lɛnyɛ wuda fɔsɔ, mbom fɔnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ baatsã foe akũ bɛdɛla Baguma dĩ nɛ ode, ade baadɛla Baguma Obi a lɛmɛ dĩ nɛ ode a.”
43011005	Yesu awɛ Marta, mɔ ɔwaɛ̃tsole mɔ Lazaro kalɛ.
43011006	Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu nu Lazaro fɔsɔ a, ebuki ɛkahɔ nɛ awã kĩ edeĩ a fuwi nviã.
43011007	Ke liti a, ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bumuniki bɔnaa Yudea.”
43011008	Ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ, wádzɔ nɛ awĩ mɔ Yudafɔ a wɛ kĩ batalɛ nɔ boe, mɔ obuki anaa awã a?”
43011009	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ dɔũhuilɛ ewua-nviã deĩ nɛ kade kanyina kamɛ? Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ suwa ni, ɛláatula kitonɛkĩ katinya kamɛ ɔhaĩ a afɔ̃ yamɔ fɔkɔ.
43011010	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi tsɛ̃ nɛ lɛnyɛ ni, yatula kitonɛkĩ ɔhaĩ lɛláa.”
43011011	Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe ɔkɔba Lazaro wa tida, lɛmɛ maanaadzɛla ye.”
43011012	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ tida ɛwaa kɔ̃ ni, yaasaɛ.”
43011013	Lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu atsa a nyɛ kĩ Lazaro ku, lɛmɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɔ̃ kɔna kĩ tida pupulidza kawa ɛlɛ.
43011014	Foesũ Yesu binya ebi be pefee kĩ, “Lazaro ku.
43011015	Lɛmɛ nɛ mi sũ ni, kawɔlɛ de yĩ kĩ ntána nɛ awã ayekĩ míatɛ mido. Mifɔ̃ bɔnaa ye sɛkɛ̃.”
43011016	Ade Toma kĩ bavɛ Ata a bi ye bakɔba fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ boe malo butomɔ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ a bɔnaa, bɔnaaku mɔ ye!”
43011017	Kĩ Yesu wo awã a, ɛmɔ́ kĩ fɔtɛ fuwi ɛna kĩ bibila Lazaro.
43011018	Kito Betania kɛnaa Yerusalem aana ndɛ fusikũ nviã,
43011019	ade Yudafɔ pii ya kĩ bayaadzam Maria mɔ Marta nɛ be ɔwaɛ̃nyole wuda a sũ.
43011020	Kĩ Marta nu kĩ Yesu aya a, ɛnɛ́ ɛnaatsɛlamɔ ye, lɛmɛ Maria kɔ̃ kahɔ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.
43011021	Ade Marta bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ kana ɔna nɛ awĩ kufɛ nwaɛ̃nyole táku!
43011022	Lɛmɛ ĩnyina kĩ finyaa malo Baguma aakpa nɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ovia ye.”
43011023	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awaɛ̃nyole a aabuki eyidza edzi nkpã.”
43011024	Ade Marta bi ye kĩ, “Ĩnyina kĩ yaabuki eyidza edzi nkpã nɛ Luwi Nkaɛ a kĩ banɔkpa aayidza a akũ.”
43011025	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ kayidza kadzi nkpã mɔ nkpã a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo, ntɛ eku malo ni, yaayidza edzi nkpã.
43011026	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi nkpã mɔ́ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, ɛláaku da. Ɔtɛ fukĩĩ odo?”
43011027	Marta kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, boe Ɔlate! Ntɛ ndo kĩ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a, Baguma Obi a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ yaaya nɛ katinya kamɛ a.”
43011028	Kĩ Marta lɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, emuniki ɛnaa kɔla ɛnavɛ ɔwaɛ̃tsole Maria pɛtɛɛ. Ebi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ a ya nɛ awĩ, ade evia nɔ akũ a.”
43011029	Kĩ Maria nu foe pɛ, ɛta eyidza ewula atsɛ ɛnaatsɛlamɔ ye.
43011030	Nɛ lɔkɔ a naa Yesu táwo tɔ̃ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, mbom ebuki ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ Marta yatsɛlamɔ ye a.
43011031	Kĩ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ bɛkadzam Maria a mɔ́ kĩ ɛta eyidza ɛnɛ a, bitomɔ ye, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔna kĩ yanaa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ ɛnaabe.
43011032	Maria yawo awã kĩ Yesu dzɛ̃ a, ade kĩ esila ɛmɔ́ ye pɛ ɛtɔ nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ ɔna nɛ awĩ kufɛ nwaɛ̃nyole a táku.”
43011033	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ayekĩ ɛkabe, mɔ ayekĩ bati a kĩ bitomɔ ye kabe a, fɔkɛna adzuma nɛ ye kamɛ ade ɛwɛya eke hũũ a.
43011034	Evia be kĩ, “Nɛ ndia mibila ye?” Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, yaadã.”
43011035	Nɛ awã naa, Yesu be.
43011036	Ade Yudafɔ a lɛ kĩ, “Midã tɔ̃ ayekĩ yawɛ ye kalɛ!”
43011037	Lɛmɛ badi lɛ kĩ, “Ebinya ɔnɛkunɛ anɛ. Kapuli ɛláapuli ɛfɔ̃ kĩ onyole kĩĩ ɛtaku?”
43011038	Kalɔɛ a buki kɛna nɛ Yesu kamɛ ade ɛnaa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ a. Linikɛ a nyɛ de ɔkɛ kĩ bɛkɔa de bisua de onukpɛ̃.
43011039	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mibɔɛ de a nɛ lɛkɛ a onukpɛ̃.” Ade Marta, ɔnɔkpa a ɔwaɛ̃tsole, bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, finyaa kɔ̃ edo kakũ awɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade fuwi ɛna kĩ bibila ye a.”
43011040	Yesu bi Marta kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ ntábi nɔ kĩ ntɛ ɔtɛ odo ni, aamɔ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a?”
43011041	Bati a bɔɛ de a bɛnyɛ. Yesu dɛla anɛ nɛ ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ kĩ atse yĩ.
43011042	Ĩnyina kĩ atse yĩ daa, lɛmɛ bikĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awĩ a sũ malɛ fukĩĩ, ayekĩ baatɛ bido kĩ nɔ lido yĩ.”
43011043	Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Lazaro, nɛ́ kaya!”
43011044	Ade ɔnɔkpa a nɛ́ ɛya a. Lima a kĩ bɛkɔa bisuli ye akpɔ mɔ abɔa a buki lɛna nɛ ye akũ, ade duku a kĩ bɛkɔa bisuli ye anɛ a lɛmɛ na nɛ ye akũ a. Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miwũnya tilima a nɛ ye akũ mifɔ̃ ɛnaa.”
43011045	Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛya nɛ Maria sɛkɛ̃ mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna a, ade be pii tɛ ye bido a.
43011046	Lɛmɛ be kamɛ badi muniki bɛnaa Farisifɔ a sɛkɛ̃ bɛnabi be lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna a.
43011047	Foesũ Farisifɔ a mɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a natsa fɔlɔ mɔ Yudafɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́akɛna? Kitonɛkĩ oti kĩĩ lamɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii kakɛna!
43011048	Ntɛ bɔkpa ye osi lɔmɔ ni, odi nyɛ odi aayatɛ ye edo, ade Roma abãã ayabubuli boe Asɔli Kɔla a, ɛwɔla boe ɔmaĩ lɛmɛ.”
43011049	Be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Kaiafa, kĩ ɛnyɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ kateli a na kamɛ a bi be kĩ, “Minyína lɛtsama kɔlaa!
43011050	Minyína kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa mi kĩ oti mɔa aaku nɛ bati a flee lɔlɔ kɛba kĩ baawɔla ɔmaĩ a flee a?”
43011051	Nnɛ́ ye mɔawɛ kakɔna ɛkɔa ɛlɛ fukĩĩ, mbom ndɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ kateli a kamɛ ni, ɛlɛ eyi kĩ Yesu aaku nɛ Yudafɔ a lɔlɔ.
43011052	Nnɛ́ Yudafɔ a odi yaku ɛkpa, mbom kĩ yaakpɔta Baguma bade a kĩ bɛgba biko nɛ katinya kamɛ a bɛkɛna ɔmɔa.
43011053	Kito luwi a kanaa a, Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ kapi adzuni kĩ baakɔ Yesu.
43011054	Nɛ foesũ Yesu tábuki ɛkanɛ kanya Yudafɔ a lɛmɔ ye. Ɛdzakũ ɛnaa ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Efrayim kamɛ nɛ kɔsa kudi kamɛ, ade awã bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bidzi nɛ awã a.
43011055	Finyaa Yudafɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi kanya a fuã, ade bati pii to ɔmaĩ a fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ bɛya nɛ Yerusalem, kĩ bayaakpalɛ be akũ fɔmɔ luwi a aawo ɔtɔ.
43011056	Kĩ bɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, bɛkawɛ Yesu, ade bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Nde akɔna? Mbɔɛɛ ɛláaya nɛ luwi a kanyakɔ̃?”
43011057	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ a si mbla kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ enyina awã kĩ Yesu deĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛyaakpa kanyi lɔkɔa bɛnaapi ye.
43012001	Kĩ kite fuwi evũ kĩ banya Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi a, Yesu naa Betania, Lazaro ɔtɔ, awã kĩ ɛdzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa a.
43012002	Bɛtɔ olobe funitsã bɛkpa ye nɛ awã. Marta sum nɛ opunu akũ, ade Lazaro lɛmɛ na nɛ bati a kĩ bidzi bɛkanya mɔ Yesu a kamɛ a.
43012003	Ade Maria bɔɛ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ baũ, kĩ bavɛ koe nard, kĩ kudeĩ kɔya paa lita sɛkɛ ɛyatsɛla Yesu fɔnɛta, ade ɛkɔa ye lɔlɔ tɔlɔ ɛyɔ foe akũ a. Kugua a ɔlɛ̃ tɛ tɔtɔ a flee kamɛ.
43012004	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa, Yuda Iskariot, kĩ ye aanyɛ Yesu ɛkpa a lɛ kĩ,
43012005	“Nde sũ bɛtánɔ kugua kĩĩ sika ovoe ɔha ɛlalɛ lɔkɔa bɛkɔa sɛ bɛkpa ahiãfɔ?”
43012006	Nnɛ́ kĩ ɛtsɛla ahiãfɔ akũ sũ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ, mbom oyekpanɛ yanɛ. Ye nɛɛ sika kuvũ a ade yado awɛ nɛ koe kamɛ a.
43012007	Ade Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mifɔnɛ ye awɛ! Mifɔ̃ ɛmanɛ koe eyi ɛkpa yĩ kabila.
43012008	Ahiãfɔ deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ luwi nyɛ luwi, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ nláana nɛ mi kamɛ daa.”
43012009	Yudafɔ pii nu kĩ Yesu deĩ nɛ Betania, foesũ bɛya nɛ awã. Nnɛ́ Yesu odi sũ bɛya, mbom kĩ bayaadã Lazaro a kĩ Yesu dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa a.
43012010	Nɛ foesũ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a pi adzuni kĩ baakɔ Lazaro lɛmɛ,
43012011	kitonɛkĩ ye sũ Yudafɔ a pii kasĩ be kanaatɛ Yesu kado.
43012012	Kĩ kade nyina a, bati kɔdabu a kĩ bɛya nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanyakɔ̃ a nu kĩ Yesu aya nɛ Yerusalem.
43012013	Foesũ bɛbɔɛ tuko bɛnɛ kĩ banaatsɛlamɔ ye, ade bɛkabɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Mimu Baguma! Baguma hila oti a kĩ yaya nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a! Baguma hila Israel Lɛgã a!”
43012014	Yesu mɔ́ aflimu adi, ade ede edzi nɛ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
43012015	“Zion ɔmatɔ, tavila! Amɔ nɔ Lɛgã kĩ laya! Edzi nɛ aflimu obi akũ.”
43012016	Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tánu fukĩĩ kayɔ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma dzɛla Yesu ɛkpalɛ ye akũ a, bɛyate anɛ kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna bɛkpa ye a nɛ ye akũ.
43012017	Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛvɛ Lazaro etomɛna linikɛ kamɛ edzi nkpã a, di adansiɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a akũ.
43012018	Ade fukĩĩ sũ bati kɔdabu a natsɛlɛmɔ Yesu a, kitonɛkĩ binu kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa kĩĩ.
43012019	Foesũ Farisifɔ a bi akũ kĩ, “Midã kĩ bɔlámɔ kadzakɔ̃ kana kɔlaa. Midã, katinya kamɛ bati a flee nɛ́ bitomɔ ye!”
43012020	Helafɔ badi na nɛ bati a kĩ bɛnaa Yerusalem kĩ baasum Baguma nɛ luwi a kanya kamɛ a kamɛ.
43012021	Ade bɛnaa Filipo, kĩ eto Betsaida a nɛ Galilea sɛkɛ̃, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, bɔawɛ kĩ bɔamɔ Yesu.”
43012022	Filipo nabi Andrea, ade be nviã a bɛnabi Yesu a.
43012023	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Finyaa kɔ̃ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ kĩ baadɛla Otidziwa Obi a nɛ ode.
43012024	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ ligbanɔbi táwo nɛ tite kamɛ lɛvɔ̃ ni, libi mɔapɛ keĩ a lanɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ lɛvɔ̃ ni, lado babi beblebee.
43012025	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ ye nkpã kalɛ ni, yaayɛla ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ekesĩ ye nkpã nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ni, ɛkɔla ye ɛkpa nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
43012026	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yasum yĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ etomɔ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ ndeĩ a, ade awã yĩ ɔsumunɛ lɛmɛ ana a. Ade Nda aado obu nɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yasum yĩ akũ.
43012027	“Yĩ ɔwɔlɛ aha yĩ finyaa. Lɛmɛ litsa maalɛ? Kalɛ maalɛ kĩ, ‘Nda, nyɛ yĩ katomɛna lubo kamɔ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ mbɔɛɛ’? Oowo, ade foesũ ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ a, ayekĩ maatsã lubo kamɔ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ.
43012028	Nda, do nɔ dĩ akũ obu.” Adeke odo odi to ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ndo de obu kɔkɔɛ, ade maabuki ndo de a.”
43012029	Bati kɔdabu a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã nu odo a, ade be kamɛ badi lɛ kĩ, ɔplala lɛnyɛ onukpɛ̃, lɛmɛ badi lɛ kĩ, “Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi lɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ ye!”
43012030	Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nnɛ́ yĩ sũ odo a lɛ́ kɔdzɛla, mbom mi sũ.
43012031	“Finyaa nyɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ. Finyaa mɔ baablɔmɛna katinya kĩĩ kamɛ akũ ɔnyanɛ a.
43012032	Ntɛ bɛdɛla yĩ nɛ ode nɛ asendua akũ ni, maavɛlɛ bati flee ĩyamɛna nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.”
43012033	Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ yakɔa ɛtsa wuda odu a kĩ yaaku.
43012034	Adeke bati kɔdabu a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Mbla Ovoli a atsa boe kĩ Kristo a aadzi nkpã daa. Nde fɔya mɔ alɛ kĩ baadɛla Otidziwa Obi a nɛ ode nɛ asendua akũ? Owei nyɛ Otidziwa Obi kĩĩ a?”
43012035	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔhaĩ a aabuki ɛna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔ lukũ lidi pɛ. Lɔkɔ kĩ ɔhaĩ a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ ni, mitsã nɛ ye kamɛ ayekĩ ɔtũ lɛláake edo mi, kitonɛkĩ oti kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ linyína awã kĩ yanaa.
43012036	Kĩ ɔhaĩ a deĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩĩ ni, mitɛ ɔhaĩ mido ayekĩ míakɛna ɔhaĩ a kamɛ bati.”
43012037	Titɔ kĩ Yesu kɛna awãwã fɔtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ be anɛ kamɛ malo ni, bɛtátɛ ye bido.
43012038	Ayekĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ eyi a, aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, owei lɛtɛ nɔ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔlɛ a edo? Owei ɛnyɛ ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛtsa?”
43012039	Nɛ foesũ bɛtápuli bɛtɛ bido, kitonɛkĩ Yesaya buki ɛlɛ kĩ,
43012040	“Baguma kɔ be anɛ ade esua be adzuni ayekĩ be anɛ lɛláamɔ fɔkɔ, ade be adzuni lɛláanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ a. Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Bɛláamuniki bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔa ntsa be.’ ”
43012041	Yesaya lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kitonɛkĩ ɛmɔ́ Yesu kukũkpalɛ a, ade ɛlɛ kalɛ nɛ foe akũ eyi a.
43012042	Titɔ kĩ fɔla lɔmɔ malo a, Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a pii tɛ Yesu bido, lɛmɛ nɛ Farisifɔ a sũ bɛtálɛ foe akũ kɔdzɛla nɛ kanade, ayekĩ bɛláablɔmɛna be nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
43012043	Kitonɛkĩ bawɛ kĩ batidziwa bimu be kɛba kĩ Baguma aamu be.
43012044	Ade Yesu bɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, nnɛ́ yĩ odi ɛtɛ edo, mbom mɔ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a ɛtɛ edo.
43012045	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yamɔ yĩ ni, yamɔ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a lɛmɛ.
43012046	Ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ ɔhaĩ aye, ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, ɛláana nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ.
43012047	“Ntɛ odi nu yĩ fɔlɛtsa a mɔ́ ɛtákɛna nɛ foe akũ ni, nláadzɛmɔ ye. Ntáya kĩ mayaadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ bati, mbom ĩya kĩ mayaanyɛ be.
43012048	Oti a kĩ esĩ yĩ, kĩ ɛtátɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a deĩ oti kĩ yaadzɛmɔ ye. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a aadzɛmɔ ye nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ!
43012049	Fukĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, kitonɛkĩ ntálɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ otumi akũ, mbom Nda a kĩ edo yĩ a lɛkpa yĩ otumi kĩ nlɛ kɔdzɛla, nlɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a.
43012050	Ade ĩnyina kĩ ye mbla a akpa nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Nɛ foesũ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a nyɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ Nda bi yĩ kĩ nlɛ.”
43013001	Luwi a kĩ lɛnyaa Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi lɔtɔ a, Yesu nyi kĩ lɔkɔ kpɔla ye kĩ yaadzakũ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ɛnaa Ɔlɛga sɛkɛ̃. Ɛwɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade nɛ katinya kamɛ a kalɛ, ade ɛwɛ be kalɛ kɛnawo kawũnakɔ̃ a.
43013002	Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzi nɛ opunu akũ bɛkanya olobe funitsã. Abonsam kɔa edo nɛ Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ Simon Iskariot obi a adzuni kamɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa.
43013003	Yesu nyina kĩ Ɔlɛga kpa ye kɔbɛ̃ flee. Enyina kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ eto ɛya, ade Baguma sɛkɛ̃ yaabuki ɛnaa a.
43013004	Foesũ eyidza nɛ opunu a akũ, ɛnyɛ ye atadiɛ wulaa eyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃, ade ɛkɔa ɔsa efili nɛ kate a.
43013005	Ke liti a, eko mui nɛ lɔɔda kamɛ, eyi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a abɔa kavɔlɛ kayɔ, ade ɛkɔa ɔsa a kĩ efili nɛ kate a ɛyɔ mui a.
43013006	Kĩ ewo Petro sɛkɛ̃ a, Petro bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ayaavɔlɛ yĩ abɔa?”
43013007	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Finyaa ɔláanu lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna a kayɔ, lɛmɛ ke liti aanu foe kayɔ.”
43013008	Petro bi ye kĩ, “Owoo, ɔláavɔlɛ yĩ abɔa da.” Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ ntávɔlɛ nɔ abɔa ni, ke kɔ̃ ɔláabuki ɔnya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.”
43013009	Petro kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ aye kɔ̃ ni, tavɔlɛ yĩ abɔa odi, mbom vɔlɛ yĩ awɛ mɔ lɔlɔ lɛmɛ!”
43013010	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Oti kĩ ewo mui ɛnɛ́ yededeede tábuki esĩ ɛkpa mui kawo, kɛba abɔa odi kavɔlɛ. Mi kɔ̃ mi flee akũ nɛ́, mbɔɛntɛ oti mɔapɛ.”
43013011	Yesu nyina oti a kĩ yaanyɛ ye ɛkpa a kɔkɔɛ, ade foesũ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mi a flee akũ nɛ́, mbɔɛntɛ oti mɔapɛ a.”
43013012	Kĩ Yesu vɔlɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a abɔa eyua a, ɛbɔɛ ye atadiɛ wulaa a edo, emuniki ɛnadzi nɛ ye kadzikɔ̃ nɛ opunu akũ. Evia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Minu lɛtsa a kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi a finyaa kayɔ mbɔɛɛ?
43013013	Miavɛ yĩ kĩ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ mɔ Ɔlate. Ade aye fɔla pɛpɛɛpɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ade lɛtsa a kĩ manɛ a.
43013014	Yĩ a kĩ ĩnyɛ mi Ɔlate mɔ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ a, lɛvɔlɛ mi abɔa finyaa, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ miavɔlɛ akũ akũ abɔa.
43013015	Nfantuhũ fɔanɛ nkpa mi kĩ mi malo mikɛna lɛtsa mɔapɛ a kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi a.
43013016	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ɔsumunɛ lɛbɛ́ ye ɔlate, ade ayea fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ lɛbɛ́ oti a kĩ edo ye fɔtɔ a.
43013017	Finyaa, kĩ minyi ɔnɔkɔali kĩĩ a, Baguma aahila mi ntɛ mikɛna nɛ ke akũ.
43013018	“Nnɛ́ mi flee malɛ, ĩnyina bati a kĩ mpau a. Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, ‘Oti a kĩ bɔmɔ ye budo awɛ bɔanya a yidza ɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ.’
43013019	“Mabi mi fukĩĩ ĩyi finyaa, fɔmɔ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔkɔa míatɛ mido kĩ yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ ye manɛ a.
43013020	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ oti odi kĩ ndo fɔtɔ ni, yĩ ɛtɛ. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ ni, ɛtɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a.”
43013021	Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, fɔha ye ɔwɔlɛ paa ade ɛlɛ yededeede kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ mi kamɛ odi aanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa.”
43013022	Awã naa, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dã akũ anɛ, ade bɛkɛna saa kitonɛkĩ binyína be kamɛ oti a kĩ Yesu alɛ a.
43013023	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ Yesu awɛ kalɛ a dzi ɛmɛnamɔ Yesu.
43013024	Adeke Simon Petro baa ye sɛnɛ kĩ, “Via ye owula a kĩ yalɛ a.”
43013025	Foesũ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a fuã Yesu tsɛmɛtsɛmɛ evia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, owei yanɛ?”
43013026	Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ maabuli abodoo ntamɔ kutu nkpa a ni, ade ye a.” Ade ebuli abodoo sɛkɛ̃, ɛta kutu ɛkɔa ɛkpa Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ Simon Iskariot obi a.
43013027	Kĩ Yuda sila ɛtɛ funitsã a pɛ, Satana wo nɛ ye kamɛ. Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Wɛ sɔwa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ awɛ kĩ akɛna a akũ.”
43013028	Lɛmɛ be a kĩ bidzi nɛ opunu akũ mɔ ye a kamɛ odima tánu lɛtsa a sũ kĩ Yesu bi ye tuwuli kayɔ.
43013029	Ayekĩ Yuda nɛɛ be sika kuvũ sũ ni, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a badi kɔna kĩ kabi Yesu bi ye kĩ ɛnaaya fɔtsa a kĩ baakɔa bɛnya luwi a, ĩye kĩ ɛnaakɔa litsedi ete ahiãfɔ.
43013030	Kĩ Yuda tɛ funitsã a, deedimɔapɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛdzakũ. Kade dɔ paa.
43013031	Kĩ Yuda nɛ ɛdzakũ a, Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Finyaa bɛdɛla Otidziwa Obi a dĩ nɛ ode, ade finyaa bɛdɛla Baguma dĩ lɛmɛ nɛ ode bɛtsãmɛna ye akũ a.
43013032	Ntɛ bɛdɛla Baguma dĩ nɛ ode bɛtsãmɛna Otidziwa Obi a akũ ni, lɔkɔa Baguma aadɛla Otidziwa Obi a dĩ nɛ ode nɛ ye mɔawɛ kamɛ lɛtalɛta.
43013033	“Yĩ babi, nláabuki nna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ owi libuna pii. Míawɛ yĩ, lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mbi Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ, ‘Miláapuli minaa awã kĩ manaa a.’
43013034	“Finyaa makpa mi mbla vɔɛ̃. Miwɛ mi akũ kalɛ. Ayekĩ nwɛ mi kalɛ a ni, mi malo miwɛ mi akũ kalɛ lɔmɔ.
43013035	Ntɛ miawɛ mi akũ kalɛ ni, odi nyɛ odi aamɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mianɛ.”
43013036	Ade Simon Petro via kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɛ ndia akpa?” Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awã kĩ manaa, ɔláapuli otomɔ yĩ finyaa bɔnaa, lɛmɛ ke liti ni, aatomɔ yĩ liti.”
43013037	Petro via ye kĩ, “Nde sũ nláapuli ntomɔ nɔ finyaa? Mmanɛ akũ kĩ maaku nɛ nɔ lɔlɔ!”
43013038	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kalɛ alɛ kĩ ɔmanɛ akũ kĩ aaku nɛ yĩ lɔlɔ? Mabi nɔ ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
43014001	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitafɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɛha mi. Mitɛ Baguma mido, mitɛ yĩ malo mido.
43014002	Fɔla beblebee deĩ nɛ Nda tɔtɔ kamɛ. Manaamanɛ kakɔ kadi ĩyi mi. Ntɛ fɔlá lɔmɔ ni, kufɛ nláabi mi kĩ manaamanɛ kadzikɔ̃ ĩyi mi.
43014003	Ade ntɛ nnaa nnamanɛ kadzikɔ̃ ĩyi mi ĩyua ni, maamuniki ĩyaakpã mi nnamɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ awã kĩ ndeĩ a mi malo míana nɛ awã.
43014004	Minyina osi a kĩ ɛwaa ɛnaa awã kĩ manaa a.”
43014005	Ade Toma bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, bunyína awã kĩ anaa, foesũ nde bɔ́akɛna bɔmɔ́ osi a kĩ yanaa awã a?”
43014006	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ osi a, ɔnɔkɔali a mɔ nkpã a. Odima láya nɛ Nda sɛkɛ̃ mbɔɛntɛ ɛtsã yĩ akũ.
43014007	Ntɛ kanyina minyina yĩ ni, kufɛ minyina Nda lɛmɛ. Lɛmɛ kito finyaa kanaa ni, minyina ye ade mimɔ́ ye lɛmɛ a.”
43014008	Ade Filipo bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tsa boe Ɔlɛga a, ade lɛtsa a kĩ liti lisĩ boe a.”
43014009	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Filipo, owi buna kĩ ndeĩ nɛ mi flee sɛkɛ̃, lɛmɛ onyína yĩ? Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔ́ yĩ ni, ɛmɔ́ Nda lɛmɛ. Nde sũ obuki avia kĩ, ‘Tsa boe Ɔlɛga a’?
43014010	Filipo, mbɔɛɛ ɔtátɛ odo kĩ ndeĩ nɛ Nda kamɛ ade kĩ ye malo edeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ? Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi a flee táto yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mbom Nda a kĩ edeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a lamɛna ye adzuma kakɛna.
43014011	Mitɛ yĩ mido ntɛ nlɛ kĩ ndeĩ nɛ Nda kamɛ, ade Nda lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a. Ntɛ mitátɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mido ni, ke kɔ̃ mitɛ mido nɛ adzuma a kĩ makɛna a sũ.
43014012	Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, yaakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna a. Nuwĩ yaapuli ɛkɛna fɔtsa ɛba yĩ fude a, kitonɛkĩ manaa Nda sɛkɛ̃.
43014013	Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, maakɛna foe nkpa mi ayekĩ baatsã Obi a akũ bɛdɛla Nda dĩ nɛ ode.
43014014	Ntɛ mivia litsedi nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, maakɛna foe.”
43014015	Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ miawɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, míakɛna nɛ yĩ tɛbla a akũ.
43014016	Maake Nda aduli ɛkpa mi Obumɛnanɛ bɛbã kĩ yaana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ daa.
43014017	Ade ye nyɛ Hũhũ a kĩ yanyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ nɛ Baguma akũ a katsa a. Katinya kamɛ bati kɔ̃ lɛláapuli bɛtɛ ye, kitonɛkĩ bɛláapuli bɛmɔ́ ye mɔ baanyi ye. Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ minyina ye kitonɛkĩ yaana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ade edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a.
43014018	“Nláafɔnɛ mi awɛ ĩyi ndɛ banɔkpabi aye. Maamuniki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
43014019	Kite sukuloo katinya kamɛ bati lɛláabuki bɛmɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ míamɔ yĩ. Ayekĩ ndzi nkpã sũ ni, mi malo míadzi nkpã.
43014020	Ntɛ luwi a wo ɔtɔ ni, míanyi kĩ ndeĩ nɛ Nda kamɛ ade mi mideĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ade yĩ malo ndeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a.
43014021	“Oti a kĩ epini yĩ tɛbla, yakɛna nɛ te akũ ni, ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ yawɛ yĩ kalɛ a. Oti a kĩ yawɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, Nda aawɛ ye kalɛ. Yĩ malo maawɛ ye kalɛ ade maanyɛ yĩ akũ ntsa ye a.”
43014022	Ade Yuda, nnɛ́ ekĩ ɛnyɛ Iskariot a, via kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nde sũ aanyɛ nɔ akũ ɔtsa boe, mɔ nnɛ́ katinya kamɛ bati a?”
43014023	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, yaapi yĩ fɔlɛtsa edomɔ akũ. Nda aawɛ ye kalɛ ade bɔmɔ Nda bɔ́aya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɔkɛna kadzikɔ̃ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
43014024	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, yaápi yĩ fɔlɛtsa kadomɔ akũ. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ minu a lɛnyɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ fude, mbom futo Ɔlɛga a kĩ edo yĩ a fude fɔanɛ.
43014025	“Mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ mbuki ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
43014026	Lɛmɛ Obumɛnanɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kĩ Baguma aado nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ a, aatsa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade yaate mi anɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mbi mi a akũ a.
43014027	“Lukudɔ nkɔa mayi mi. Yĩ lukudɔ nkɔa makpa mi, nnɛ́ ndɛ ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati akpa a aye. Mitafɔ̃ mi ɔwɔlɛ lɛha mi ĩye mifɔ̃ libe liwo mi.
43014028	Minu ayekĩ mbi mi kĩ, ‘Madzakũ, lɛmɛ maamuniki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.’ Ntɛ miwɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, kufɛ kawɔlɛ de mi kĩ manaa Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ ye ɛbɛ̃ yĩ.
43014029	Finyaa mbi mi fukĩĩ ĩnyamɛna lɔtɔ fɔmɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa aaya nɛ foe kamɛ, ayekĩ ntɛ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ ni, míatɛ mido.
43014030	Nláabuki nlɛ mɔ mi kɔdzɛla nnamɛna lɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ katinya kamɛ akũ ɔnyanɛ a aya, ade ɛlá kɔbɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ a.
43014031	Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ katinya kamɛ bati binyi kĩ mawɛ Ɔlɛga a kalɛ, ade makɛna nɛ ye ɔlɛdo akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ a. “Finyaa, miyidza bɔdzakũ nɛ awĩ.
43015001	“Yĩ nyɛ kutse wĩ a, ade Nda nyɛ futse kɔba ɔnɛnɛ a.
43015002	Ɔnanɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ yaáwũ babi ni, yatsua ye kamuni, ade ɔnanɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawũ babi ni, yanyɛ ye akũ tɔɔta, ayekĩ yaawũ babi pii.
43015003	Finyaa yĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi a kpalɛ mi akũ kɔkɔɛ.
43015004	Mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ, yĩ malo nkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ mi. Ndɛ ayekĩ kutse ɔnanɛ lɛláapuli kuwũ nɛ koe akũ, mbɔɛntɛ kɔmanɛ nɛ kutse ɔma akũ a, ade aye mi malo miláapuli miwũ babi ntɛ mitákɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ a.
43015005	“Yĩ nyɛ kutse a, ade mi minyɛ tɛnanɛ a. Oti a kĩ ɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ, mɔ yĩ malo nkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye ni, ade ye aawũ babi pii, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ nláa mi kamɛ ni, miláapuli mikɛna lɛtsama.
43015006	Oti a kĩ ɛláa yĩ kamɛ ni, ɛla ndɛ ɔnanɛ kĩ bitsua bɛta bimuni ade yawɔlɛ a. Bakpɔta tɛnanɛ a kafila kado nɛ fi kamɛ tavio.
43015007	Ntɛ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ, mɔ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ ni, míavia lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ ade baakɛna foe bɛkpa mi a.
43015008	Ntɛ miwũ babi beblebee ni, foe fɔnyɛ Nda kukũkpalɛ fɔtsa, ade fusipi kĩ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mianɛ.
43015009	Ayekĩ Nda awɛ yĩ kalɛ a ni, ade aye yĩ malo mawɛ mi kalɛ a. Foesũ mifɔ̃ yĩ ɔdɔ a ɛna nkɔsu nɛ mi kamɛ lɔmɔ.
43015010	Ntɛ mipi yĩ tɛbla a midomɔ akũ ni, míana nɛ yĩ ɔdɔ a kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo mpi Nda mbla ndomɔ akũ fɔfɔ̃ ye ɔdɔ deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a.
43015011	“Mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ayekĩ kawɔlɛ a kĩ kideĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a odu kɛna nɛ mi kamɛ, lɔkɔa mi kawɔlɛ a kɛkpɔla.
43015012	Ade yĩ mbla kĩ makpa mi nyɛ kĩ, miwɛ mi akũ akũ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ nwɛ mi kalɛ a.
43015013	Ɔdɔ titiliwu adima lɛláa kĩ oti akɔa ye nkpã ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ bakɔba lɔlɔ.
43015014	Ntɛ mikɛna nɛ yĩ mbla a kĩ nkpa mi a akũ a ni, lɔkɔa minyɛ yĩ bakɔba.
43015015	Nláabuki nvɛ mi kĩ basumunɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɔsumunɛ linyína lɛtsa a kĩ ye ɔlate akɛna. Lɛmɛ mavɛ mi kĩ bakɔba kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ nnu ntomɛna Nda sɛkɛ̃ ni, nfɔ̃ minyi foe.
43015016	Nnɛ́ mi lɛpau yĩ, mbom yĩ lɛpau mi ndzina mi kĩ minaawũ babi beblebee kĩ baawa daa. Nɛ foesũ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia Ɔlɛga a nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, yaakpa mi foe.
43015017	Foesũ ade mbla kĩ makpa mi kĩ miwɛ mi akũ kalɛ.”
43015018	Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ katinya kamɛ bati akesĩ mi ni, minyi kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bikesĩ yĩ.
43015019	Ntɛ katinya kamɛ bade mianɛ ni, kufɛ baawɛ mi kalɛ ndɛ be bade aye. Lɛmɛ kĩ mpau mi ntomɛna katinya bati kamɛ ade mibuki minyɛ́ be bade a sũ ni, katinya kamɛ bati akesĩ mi.
43015020	Mite anɛ nɛ kalɛ a kĩ mbi mi akũ a kĩ, ‘Ɔsumunɛ lɛbɛ́ ye ɔlate.’ Ntɛ bati yidza bɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ ni, baayidza bɛdza nɛ mi malo akũ. Ntɛ bipi yĩ fɔlɛtsa bidomɔ akũ ni, baapi mi fude lɛmɛ bidomɔ akũ.
43015021	Lɛmɛ baakɛna fukĩĩ flee nɛ mi akũ nɛ yĩ dĩ sũ, kitonɛkĩ binyína oti a kĩ edo yĩ a.
43015022	Ntɛ ntayaabi be fɔlɛtsa ni, kufɛ bɛtáku tɔkpa kɔtɔ. Lɛmɛ finyaa bɛkɛna tɔkpa ade bɛlá onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ kadima a.
43015023	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakesĩ yĩ ni, yakesĩ Nda lɛmɛ.
43015024	Ntɛ ntakɛna fɔtsa kĩ odima tákɛna tɔ̃ nɛ be kamɛ ni, kufɛ bɛtákɛna tɔkpa, lɛmɛ kĩ finyaa bɛmɔ́ fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna a malo ni, bakesĩ bɔmɔ Nda.
43015025	Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ be mbla ovoli kamɛ a, fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, ‘Bikesĩ yĩ pupulidza.’
43015026	“Maado Obumɛnanɛ eto Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃ ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Ade ye nyɛ Hũhũ a kĩ yaanyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a nɛ Baguma akũ ɛtsa a. Ntɛ eto Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃ ɛya ni, yaadi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ.
43015027	Mi malo míadi adansiɛ, kitonɛkĩ mina nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ kito kayɔkayi a.
43016001	“Mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee ayekĩ bati lɛláafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ.
43016002	Baablɔmɛna mi nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃. Lɔkɔ aya kĩ ntɛ oti odi kɔ mi ni, yaakɔna kĩ Baguma adzuma ɛkɛna.
43016003	Bati aakɛna fukĩĩ nɛ mi akũ kitonɛkĩ bɛtányi Ɔlɛga a ĩye yĩ.
43016004	Lɛmɛ mabi mi fukĩĩ ayekĩ ntɛ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ ni, míate anɛ kĩ mbi mi foe.
43016005	Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ madzakũ nnaa oti a kĩ edo yĩ a sɛkɛ̃ a, mi kamɛ odima távia yĩ awã kĩ manaa a.
43016006	Finyaa, kĩ mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, mi flee miwo ɔblɔ.
43016007	Lɛmɛ mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa mi kĩ ndzakũ, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ntánaa ni, Obumɛnanɛ a lɛláaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ndzakũ nnaa ni, maado ye ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
43016008	Ade ntɛ ɛya ni, yaakɔ katinya kamɛ bati kɔtɔ ɛfɔ̃ binyi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ tɔkpa, mɔ kadzi kpĩĩ, mɔ Baguma kɔtɔkakɔ.
43016009	Yaakɔ be kɔtɔ nɛ tɔkpa sũ, kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ yĩ bido.
43016010	Yaakɔ be kɔtɔ bɛkɔa binyi kadzi kpĩĩ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ manaa Nda sɛkɛ̃, kĩ miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ,
43016011	ade baanyi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ kɔtɔkaku, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ akũ ɔnyanɛ a kɔtɔ kɔkɔɛ.
43016012	“Ndeĩ fɔlɛtsa pii kĩ maabi mi, lɛmɛ fɔ́aba mi kalɔ finyaa.
43016013	Lɛmɛ ntɛ Hũhũ a kĩ yanyɛ ɔnɔkɔali nɛ Baguma akũ katsa a ya ni, yaafɔ̃ minyi Baguma akũ ɔnɔkɔali a flee a. Ɛláalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ ye mɔawɛ otumi akũ, mbom lɛtsa a kĩ enu a odi mɔ yaalɛ, ade yaafɔ̃ minyi fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́ayaya a.
43016014	Yaado yĩ obu ɛnyɛ yĩ kukũkpalɛ ɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ yaabi mi lɛtsa a kĩ ɛtɛ etomɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃ a.
43016015	Fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ Nda fude a flee, yĩ fude fɔanɛ. Ade foesũ nlɛ kĩ Hũhũ a aanu etomɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ɛyaabi mi a.”
43016016	Yesu lɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Kite sukuloo kĩ miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ owi lɛláabuna kĩ míabuki mimɔ́ yĩ.”
43016017	Adeke ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a badi via akũ kĩ, “Foe kayɔ nyɛ litsa kĩ yabi boe kĩ, ‘Kite sukuloo miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ owi lɛláabuna kĩ míabuki mimɔ́ yĩ.’ Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Kitonɛkĩ manaa Nda sɛkɛ̃.’
43016018	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Kite sukuloo’ a kayɔ nyɛ litsa? Bɔánu lɛtsa a kĩ yalɛ a kayɔ!”
43016019	Yesu mɔ́ kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wɛ kĩ bavia ye kalɛ kadi, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Nlɛ kĩ kite sukuloo miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ owi lɛláabuna kĩ míabuki mimɔ́ yĩ. Mbɔɛɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ milamɛna kasa mɔ akũ a?
43016020	Mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ míabe miwo ɔblɔ, lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ bati aamɔ kawɔlɛ. Míadi ayɔlɔhɔ lɛmɛ mi ayɔlɔhɔ a aadani kawɔlɛkamɔ.
43016021	Ntɛ sɛmɛ pi otsole ni, yawo ɔblɔ kitonɛkĩ ye lubo kamɔ ɔdɔũ a bɔa. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛma eyua a, yalɛla ye lubo kamɔ a, kitonɛkĩ yamɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ ɛma obi edo nɛ katinya kamɛ.
43016022	Ade aye fɔla fɔkpa mi a. Finyaa miwo ɔblɔ, lɛmɛ maabuki mmɔ́ mi, lɔkɔa mi tɔwɔlɛ lɛka tidzi mi mɔ kawɔlɛ paa a kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛtɛ nɛ mi awɛ a.
43016023	“Ntɛ luwi a wo ɔtɔ ni, miláabuki mivia yĩ lɛtsama. Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ, Nda aakpa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia ye nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ.
43016024	Kito kɛyawo finyaa kĩĩ a, mitávia tɔ̃ lɛtsama nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ. Mivia, lɔkɔa míatɛ, ayekĩ mi kawɔlɛkamɔ aakpɔla.
43016025	“Mabi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ. Lɛmɛ lɔkɔ aaya kĩ nláabuki mbi mi fɔlɛtsa nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ, mbom maabi mi Nda akũ fɔlɛtsa pefee.
43016026	Ntɛ luwi a wo ɔtɔ ni, mivia ye fɔtsa nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ. Maátsa kĩ yĩ maavia ye nkpa mi,
43016027	kitonɛkĩ Nda mɔawɛ a awɛ mi kalɛ. Yawɛ mi kalɛ kitonɛkĩ miawɛ yĩ kalɛ ade mitɛ mido kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ nto ĩya.
43016028	Nuwĩ, Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃ nto ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ, ade finyaa madzakũ nɛ katinya kamɛ nnaa Nda sɛkɛ̃ a.”
43016029	Ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Dã, finyaa kɔ̃ alɛ kɔdzɛla pefee, kĩ obuki aábɔa fɔgbã.
43016030	Finyaa kɔ̃ bunyina kĩ onyina lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade fɔtásĩ kĩ odi abuki evia nɔ kalɛ kadima a. Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ bɔtɛ budo kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ oto.”
43016031	Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Finyaa kɔ̃ mitɛ mido?
43016032	Lɔkɔ aya ade liwo ɔtɔ kɔkɔɛ malo, kĩ baapasam mi flee odi nyɛ odi lɛnaa ye tɔtɔ kamɛ kite yĩ odi. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ yĩ odi aate, kitonɛkĩ Nda deĩ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.
43016033	Mbi mi fukĩĩ kĩĩ flee ayekĩ míakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ bɔna lukudɔ. Katinya kamɛ bati aafɔ̃ mimɔ́ lubo. Lɛmɛ mido ɔwɔlɛ! Ĩnya katinya kamɛ akũ!”
43017001	Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ɛdɛla anɛ ɛdã ode, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, ɔdɔũ a bɔa. Dɛla nɔ Obi dĩ nɛ ode lɔkɔa nɔ Obi lɛmɛ ɛdɛla nɔ dĩ nɛ ode.
43017002	Kitonɛkĩ ɔkpa ye otumi nɛ batidziwa flee akũ ayekĩ yaakpa bati a kĩ ɔkɔa odo nɛ ye awɛ a nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
43017003	Nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a nyɛ kĩ baanyi nɔ ɔnɔkɔali Baguma keĩ a mɔ Yesu Kristo a kĩ odo fɔtɔ a.
43017004	Ndɛla nɔ dĩ nɛ ode nɛ tite akũ, ade ĩyua adzuma a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ kĩ nkɛna a.
43017005	Foesũ Nda, dɛla yĩ dĩ nɛ ode nɛ nɔ anɛ kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ nna nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ fɔmɔ bɛbɔa katinya a.
43017006	“Ĩnyɛ nɔ ntsa bati a kĩ ɔnyɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ ɔkpa yĩ a. Nɔ bade banɛ, lɛmɛ ɔkɔa ɔkpa yĩ. Bɛkɛna nɛ nɔ kalɛ akũ.
43017007	Finyaa kɔ̃ binyina kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ɔkɔa ɔkpa yĩ a flee to nɔ sɛkɛ̃.
43017008	Nkɔa ɔlɛdo a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a nkpa be, ade bɛtɛ ye a. Binyina kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ nto, ade bɛtɛ bido kĩ nɔ lido yĩ a.
43017009	“Make aduli nɛ be lɔlɔ. Nlámɛna aduli kake nɛ katinya kamɛ bati lɔlɔ, mbom nɛ bati a kĩ ɔkɔa odo nɛ yĩ awɛ a lɔlɔ, kitonɛkĩ nɔ bade banɛ.
43017010	Yĩ bati a flee nɔ bade banɛ, ade ayea nɔ bade flee lɛmɛ nyɛ yĩ bade a, ade bɛdɛla yĩ dĩ nɛ ode bɛtsãmɛna be akũ a.
43017011	Ade finyaa maya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃, mbuki nláa katinya kamɛ, lɛmɛ be kɔ̃ bideĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ. Ɔlɛga Kpalɛwa, kɔa nɔ dĩ akũ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a kadãmɛna be akũ ayekĩ baakɛna ɔmɔa ndɛ ayekĩ bɔmɔ nɔ bɔnyɛ ɔmɔa a.
43017012	Kĩ nna nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a, nkɔa nɔ dĩ akũ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a ndãmɛna be akũ. Ndã be akũ kĩ be kamɛ odima táyɛla, mbɔɛntɛ oti a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛyɛla a, ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
43017013	Lɛmɛ finyaa maya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃, ade malɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ ayekĩ baamɔ kawɔlɛ kɛkpɔla nɛ be kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo mamɔ ke a.
43017014	“Nkɔa nɔ ɔlɛdo a nkpa be lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ bati kesĩ be, kitonɛkĩ bɛtáto katinya kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo ntáto katinya kamɛ a.
43017015	Ntávia nɔ kĩ nyɛ be nɛ katinya kamɛ, mbom mawã nɔ kĩ nyɛ be nɛ Okesĩnɛ a awɛ kamɛ.
43017016	Ndɛ ayekĩ ntáto katinya kamɛ sũ ni, be malo bɛnyɛ́ katinya kamɛ bade.
43017017	Kɛna be bati kpalɛwa kakpa nɔ akũ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ, nɔ kalɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
43017018	Ndo be nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ nɔ malo odo yĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ a.
43017019	Ade nɛ be sũ ni, nkpalɛ yĩ akũ nkpa nɔ ayekĩ be malo baakpalɛ be malo akũ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ bɛkpa nɔ.
43017020	“Nnɛ́ bati kĩĩ odi lɔlɔ mabɔa mpaɛ, mbom mabɔa nkpa bati a kĩ baatɛ yĩ bido nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ baabi be a sũ.
43017021	Make nɔ aduli kĩ fɔ̃ be flee bɛkɛna ɔmɔa. Nda, fɔ̃ be malo bɛna nɛ boe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ odeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ, ade yĩ malo ndeĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a. Fɔ̃ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati aatɛ bido kĩ nɔ lido yĩ.
43017022	“Ndɛla be buĩ nɛ ode ndɛ ayekĩ ɔdɛla yĩ dĩ nɛ ode, ayekĩ baakɛna ɔmɔa ndɛ ayekĩ bɔmɔ nɔ bɔnyɛ ɔmɔa a.
43017023	Yĩ ndeĩ nɛ be kamɛ ade nɔ malo odeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ, kĩ baakɛna ɔmɔa bɛkpɔla, ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati aanyi kĩ nɔ lido yĩ. Ade baanyi kĩ awɛ be kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ yĩ kalɛ a.
43017024	“Nda, mawɛ kĩ bati a kĩ ɔkɔa ɔkpa yĩ a bɛna nɛ awã kĩ ndeĩ a, ayekĩ baamɔ yĩ kukũkpalɛ a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a, kitonɛkĩ ɔwɛ yĩ kalɛ fɔmɔ biyi katinya kayɔ.
43017025	“Nda, Oti Kpĩĩ, katinya kamɛ bati linyína nɔ lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ĩnyina nɔ, ade bati kĩĩ lɛmɛ nyina kĩ nɔ lido yĩ a.
43017026	Ĩnyɛ nɔ ntsa be yededeede, ade maakanyɛ nɔ nkatsa be, ayekĩ ɔdɔ a kĩ odeĩ ɔkpa yĩ a aana nɛ be kamɛ, lɔkɔa yĩ malo maana nɛ be kamɛ.”
43018001	Kĩ Yesu bɔa mpaɛ kĩĩ eyua a, bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛdzakũ nɛ awã, bɛnanyina Kidron kawɔbi a ade bɛnawo nɛ kugua futse kɔba kudi kamɛ a.
43018002	Yuda a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a, nyina awã, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔlɔkɔ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a awɛ katsɛna nɛ awã.
43018003	Foesũ Yuda kpã Roma sodzafɔ mɔ Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ do a ɛnamɛna kɔba a kamɛ. Bɛnɛɛ kawũkanɔ fɔtsa, tɛsɛdza mɔ tibia tɛnawa.
43018004	Ayekĩ Yesu nyina fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya nɛ ye akũ a flee sũ ni, ɛnɛ ɛya nɛ lɔtɔ evia be kĩ, “Owei miawɛ?”
43018005	Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yesu Nazaretni a.” Yesu bi be kĩ, “Amɔ yĩ.” Yuda a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a lɛmɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ awã.
43018006	Kĩ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Amɔ yĩ” a, be flee bɛnaa litiliti bɛnatɔ nɛ tite.
43018007	Ade Yesu buki evia be kĩ, “Owei miawɛ?” Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yesu Nazaretni a.”
43018008	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mbi mi kɔkɔɛ kĩ yĩ nyɛ ye, foesũ ntɛ yĩ miawɛ kɔ̃ ni, mifɔ̃ bati kĩĩ bɛdzakũ.”
43018009	Ɛlɛ fukĩĩ ayekĩ kalɛ a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ kĩ, “Nda, bati a kĩ ɔkɔa odo nɛ yĩ awɛ a kamɛ odima táyɛla.”
43018010	Ade Simon Petro nyɛ kɔpã a kĩ ɛnɛɛ a ɛbaa Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a ɔsumunɛ sɔmɔna sɔtɔ emuni a. Ɔsumunɛ a dĩ nyɛ Malko.
43018011	Ade Yesu bi Petro kĩ, “Kɔa nɔ kɔpã a kado nɛ kuvũ kamɛ! Ɔkɔna kĩ nláamɔa lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu a kĩ Nda kɔa ɛkpa yĩ a mbɔɛɛ?”
43018012	Ke liti a, Roma sodzafɔ mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a pi Yesu ade bisui ye a.
43018013	Bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna Hana sɛkɛ̃. Hana kĩĩ nyɛ Kayafa, kĩ yanya Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ kateli a kamɛ a otse.
43018014	Ade Kayafa kĩĩ lɛmɛ lɛkpa Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a adzuni kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ oti mɔa aku nɛ ɔmaĩ a lɔlɔ.
43018015	Simon Petro mɔ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ bɛbã odi tomɔ Yesu nɛ liti. Fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ bɛbã kĩĩ a nyɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a oti nyiwa, foesũ etomɔ Yesu ewo nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃.
43018016	Lɛmɛ Petro fɔ̃ ɛdza nɛ kanya nɛ onyukpɛ̃. Ade fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ bɛbã a nɛ́, ɛnaa kanya ɛnalɛmɔ oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ yadã onyukpɛ̃ akũ a kɔdzɛla, ade ɛkpã Petro ewomɛna nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ a.
43018017	Oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ yadã onyukpɛ̃ akũ a via Petro kĩ, “Nɔ malo nnɛ́ onyole kĩĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa anɛ?” Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo, ĩnyɛ́ ye fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.”
43018018	Osili na, foesũ basumunɛ mɔ bikĩ badzɔlɛ awã akũ a tɛna futuã fi bɛdza bisinya bawa foe. Petro lɛmɛ nadza nɛ be ɔwɛ̃ ɛkawa fi a.
43018019	Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a via Yesu fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ ye fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
43018020	Ade Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Malɛ kɔdzɛla daa nɛ kanade kakpa odi nyɛ odi. Matsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ mɔ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, awã kĩ bati a flee atsɛna, ade maálɛ lɛtsama nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a.
43018021	Mɔ nde sũ avia yĩ fɔlɛtsa? Via bikĩ binu yĩ fɔlɛtsa a. Ade be nyina lɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a.”
43018022	Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bikĩ badzɔlɛ awã akũ a kamɛ ɔmɔa balɛ ye awɛ nɛ ɔlɔtɔ ade ebi ye kĩ, “Nde mɔ odo ɔwɔlɛ ɔkpa Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a mbuayɛ lɔmɔ?”
43018023	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nlɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa ni, bi odi nyɛ odi nɛ awĩ kĩĩ lɛtsa a kĩ fɔanɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali ni, litsa sũ ɔbalɛ yĩ awɛ?”
43018024	Ade Hana fɔ̃ bɛkpã Yesu kĩ ebuki edeĩ nɛ tɔwɛ̃ kamɛ a bɛma Kayafa, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a.
43018025	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Petro buki ɛdzɛ̃ yawa fi. Ade bati bɛbã a via ye kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ nɔ malo ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa anɛ?” Lɛmɛ Petro nunya kĩ, “Oowo, ĩnyɛ́ ye fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.”
43018026	Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a basumunɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ ye akũ oti sɔtɔ Petro baa emuni a via ye kĩ, “Ntámɔ nɔ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kɔbã a kamɛ?”
43018027	Petro buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Oowo!” Deedimɔapɛ ɔkɔkɔ be.
43018028	Ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, bɛkpã Yesu bitomɛna Kayafa sɛkɛ̃ bɛnamɛna abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tɔtɔ kamɛ. Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔawɛ táwo nɛ abãã tɔtɔ a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɛwɛ kĩ be akũ ɛkpalɛ nɛ be amaniɛ onukpɛ̃ ɛkpa Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a kanya.
43018029	Foesũ Pilato nɛ́ ɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ evia be kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa mibɔɛ nɛ oti kĩĩ akũ?”
43018030	Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nnɛ́ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ yanɛ ni, kufɛ bɔtákpã ye bɔma nɔ.”
43018031	Ade Pilato bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mi mɔawɛ mikpã ye minaadzɛmɔ ye nɛ mi mbla onukpɛ̃.” Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɛtákpa boe osi kĩ bɔakɔ oti odima.”
43018032	Fukĩĩ ya lɔmɔ ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ eyi nɛ wuda odu kĩ yaaku a akũ a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.
43018033	Pilato dani ewo nɛ abãã tɔtɔ kamɛ ade ɛvɛ Yesu evia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ lɛgã a mbɔɛɛ?”
43018034	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ mɔawɛ avia yĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bati bɛbã libi nɔ yĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa?”
43018035	Pilato kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Akɔna kĩ Yudani manɛ? Nɔ mɔawɛ kade bati mɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛkpã nɔ bɛmɛ yĩ. Litsa ɔkɛna?”
43018036	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ táto katinya kĩĩ kamɛ. Ntɛ yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ kito katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ni, kufɛ yĩ basumunɛ a pili yĩ lɔlɔ, mɔ baakɔa yĩ bido nɛ Yudafɔ awɛ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a táto katinya kĩĩ kamɛ.”
43018037	Pilato via ye kĩ, “Foesũ lɛgã anɛ kɔ̃?” Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ lɛlɛ kĩ lɛgã manɛ. Yĩ kɔ̃ ni, ade fukĩĩ sũ bɛma yĩ a, ade foesũ ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ kĩ mayaalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a akũ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ eto ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ ni, yatse yĩ.”
43018038	Pilato via ye kĩ, “Litsa nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a?”
43018039	Lɛmɛ nɛ mi amaniɛ onukpɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ kɔla bawanɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa nkpa mi nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanya kamɛ. Miawɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ Yudafɔ lɛgã a awɛ nkpa mi mbɔɛɛ?”
43018040	Ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla bɛlɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nnɛ́ ye bɔawɛ! Baraba bɔawɛ!” Baraba nyɛ oti kĩ eyidza ɛdza nɛ abãã akũ.
43019001	Ade Pilato fɔ̃ bɛkpã Yesu bɛdzakũmɛna bɛnabo ye mɔ mple.
43019002	Sodzafɔ kɔa fɔtsɔlɛwɛ bɛnɔ lɛgãbɔɛ bɛtsa ye. Kĩ bido ye atadiɛ ngbã biyua a,
43019003	bifuã ye bibi ye kĩ, “Yiiduu! Yudafɔ Lɛgã o-o!” Ade bɛbalɛbalɛ ye awɛ nɛ tɔlɔtɔ a.
43019004	Ke liti a, Pilato buki ɛnɛ́ ɛnaa kanya ɛnabi bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Midã, maakpã ye nnɛmɛna mma mi mimɔ́ kĩ ntámɔ́ mfumsu adima nɛ ye akũ kĩ makɔ ye kɔtɔ.”
43019005	Adeke Yesu nɛ́ ɛya nɛ kanya, fɔtsɔlɛwɛ lɔbɔɛ a tsanɛ nɛ ye lɔlɔ, edeĩ nɛ atadiɛ ngbã a kamɛ. Pilato bi bati a kĩ, “Midã! Amɔ oti a nɛ awĩ!”
43019006	Kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Asɔli Kɔla akũ badzɔlɛnɛ a mɔ́ ye a, bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ! Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!” Ade Pilato bi be kĩ “Mi mɔawɛ mikpã ye minaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ. Yĩ kɔ̃ ntámɔ kĩ ɛkɛna lɛtsa kpa lidima.”
43019007	Yudafɔ a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe kɔ̃ budeĩ mbla, ade nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ eku, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɛna ye akũ Baguma Obi.”
43019008	Kĩ Pilato nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ebuki evila ɛba kɔkɔɛ a.
43019009	Foesũ emuniki ɛnaa abãã tɔtɔ a kamɛ ade evia Yesu kĩ, “Ndia oto?” Lɛmɛ Yesu tákpa ye mbuayɛ adima.
43019010	Ade Pilato bi ye kĩ, “Hei! Aákpa yĩ kalɛ a mbuayɛ? Mbɔɛɛ onyína kĩ ndeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ mafɔnɛ nɔ awɛ, ĩye kĩ mafɔ̃ bɛbɔa nɔ nɛ asendua akũ?”
43019011	Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ bɛtakpa nɔ kɔbɛ̃ bitomɛna ode ni, kufɛ ɔláana kɔbɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ. Foesũ oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ yĩ ɛkpa nɔ a tɔkpa bɛ̃ nɔ tide.”
43019012	Kĩ Pilato nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛwɛ kĩ yatsã osi nyɛ osi akũ ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ, lɛmɛ Yudafɔ a bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔfɔnɛ ye awɛ ni, fɔatsa kĩ ɔnyɛ́ Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ ɔkɔba! Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna ye akũ Lɛgã ni, eyidza ɛdza nɛ Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ akũ!”
43019013	Kĩ Pilato nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛkpã Yesu ɛnamɛna kanya ade ye mɔawɛ ɛnadzi nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ lukpo kamɛ nɛ kakɔ a kĩ bavɛ kĩ Boe Ɔda a. Bavɛ kakɔ a nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ Gabata.
43019014	Lɔkɔ a nyɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ kukũmanɛ luwi, ade fɔ́ana ndɛ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã a. Ade Pilato bi Yudafɔ a kĩ, “Amɔ mi Lɛgã a nɛ awĩ!”
43019015	Bati a bɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Kpã ye kanamɛna! Kpã ye kanamɛna! Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!” Ade Pilato via be kĩ, “Miawɛ kĩ mbɔa mi lɛgã nɛ asendua akũ?” Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɔlá Lɛgã lidima kɛba Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃!”
43019016	Adeke Pilato fɔnɛ Yesu awɛ ɛkpa sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛnaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ a.
43019017	Ye mɔawɛ ɛlɔ ye asendua ɛnawo awã kĩ bavɛ Oti Lɔlɔ Fɔtsɔ̃. Bavɛ awã nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ Golgata.
43019018	Ade awã naa, bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ a. Bɛbɔa bati nviã bɛbã nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ ye, ɔmɔa nɛ ye sɛba, ɔyade nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ade Yesu deĩ nɛ be kayite a.
43019019	Pilato tsɛlɛ ye onukpɛ̃ katsua fɔlɛtsa bɛbɔa nɛ asendua a lɔlɔ nyangɛ. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ nyɛ, “Yesu Nazaretni, Yudafɔ Lɛgã a.”
43019020	Yudafɔ pii kã fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ a, kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ bɛbɔa Yesu a fuãmɔ ɔmatɔ kamɛ. Pilato tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Hebri, Roma mɔ Hela lɛmɛ tide kamɛ.
43019021	Ade basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a sĩ fɔlɛtsa a, ade bibi Pilato kĩ, “Tatsɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Yudafɔ Lɛgã,’ mbom ‘Oti kĩĩ lɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a.” ’ ”
43019022	Pilato kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ ntsɛlɛ ni, ntsɛlɛ de kɔkɔɛ.”
43019023	Kĩ sodzafɔ a bɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ biyua a, bɛbɔɛ ye tɛtadiɛ bɛsɛ̃ nɛ kutsu ɛna kamɛ, ade sodzafɔ a kamɛ odi nyɛ odi bɔɛ kamɔa a. Ke liti a, bɛbɔɛ ye atadiɛ amɛde a kĩ bɛtápam, mbom bɛnɔ ye kito sɔmɔ kɛnake kayɔ a.
43019024	Sodzafɔ a bi akũ kĩ, “Mitafɔ̃ bɔyɛlɛ atadiɛ a, mbom mifɔ̃ bɔta bavulibi bɔmɔ́ oti a kĩ yaatɛ ye.” Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ya ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Bɛsɛ̃ yĩ tɛtadiɛ bɛkpa akũ. Ade bɛta bavulibi nɛ yĩ atadiɛ akũ a.” Ade lɛtsa a kĩ sodzafɔ a kɛna a.
43019025	Finyaakĩiĩ a, Yesu ɔma, ɔma ɔwaɛ̃tsole, Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Clopa ɔtsɔ̃, mɔ Maria Magdalani dzɛ̃ nɛ Yesu asendua a ɔwɛ̃.
43019026	Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ɔma mɔ ye fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ yaátunɔ kalɛ a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a, ebi ɔma kĩ, “Mma, dã ade nɔ obi nɛ awĩ a!”
43019027	Ade ebi fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Dã, ade ama nɛ awĩ a!” Kito luwi a akũ a, fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kpã Maria ɛnamɛna nɛ ye mɔawɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.
43019028	Finyaa Yesu nyi kĩ biyua lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kakɛna. Ayekĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛya nɛ foe kamɛ sũ ni, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔmɔado akɔ yĩ.”
43019029	Kugumi kudi keni nɛ awã kĩ kuyi mɔ waĩ yilawa. Ade bɛkɔa ɔsapɔ bɛta waĩ a bɛkɔa bido nɛ otse akũ bɛnatamɔ Yesu onukpɛ̃.
43019030	Kĩ Yesu mɔa bavɛ a eyua a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fuwoli!” Ɛkɛna lɔlɔ ade ye kawɛya nɛ a.
43019031	Luwi a nyɛ Efieda, ade Kawɛya Luwi kĩ litomɔ de a nyɛ luwi kpalɛwa lɛkpa Yudafɔ, foesũ bɛtáwɛ kĩ banɔkpa a bɛkahɔ nɛ asendua akũ Kawɛya Luwi a liwo ɔtɔ. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a navia Pilato kĩ ɛkpa be osi bɛnaaveliveli bati a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a abɔa, lɔkɔa bɛnyɛ be banɔkpa a.
43019032	Foesũ sodzafɔ a yaveli oti ɔtɔnyade mɔ oti bɛbã a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ Yesu a abɔa.
43019033	Lɛmɛ kĩ biwo Yesu akũ a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ eku kɔkɔɛ, foesũ bɛtáveli ye abɔa.
43019034	Lɛmɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa kɔa lɔtsɔɛ ɛtsɔɛ ye sɛklabi, ade deedimɔapɛ babɔanɛ mɔ mui nɛ a.
43019035	Oti a kĩ ɛmɔ́ fɔtsa kĩĩ lidi adansiɛ nɛ foe akũ ayekĩ nɔ malo aatɛ odo. Lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, ade enyina pefee kĩ ɔnɔkɔali ɛlɛ a.
43019036	Fukĩĩ ya ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Bɛláave ye lɔtsɔ̃ lidima.”
43019037	Fɔlɛtsa bɛbã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Bati aako anɛ bɛdã oti a kĩ bɛtsɔɛ ye lɔtsɔɛ a.”
43019038	Ke liti a, Yosef kĩ eto Arimatia yavia Pilato kĩ ɛkpa ye osi ɛbɔɛ Yesu ɔnɔkpa a. Yosef kĩĩ nyɛ Yesu fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ odi nɛ kabɛla kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛkavila Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a. Pilato kpa osi, ade Yosef yabɔɛ ɔnɔkpa a ɛdzakumɛna a.
43019039	Ade Nikodemo kĩ ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ mɔ lɛnyɛ a lɛmɛ tomɔ Yosef ɛya a. Ɛnɛɛ tutsonu mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa klubɔũ mɔ odi kĩ bavɛ aloa bɛkɛna ɛyamɛna. Te ɔlɔmɛ kamɛ aana ndɛ kilo taalɛ.
43019040	Banyole nviã a kɔa tutsonu a bikputa Yesu ɔnɔkpa a, ade bɛkɔa aklala ovoe bisuli ye ndɛ ayekĩ Yudafɔ akɛna ɔnɔkpa fɔmɔ babila ye a.
43019041	Kɔbã kudi deĩ nɛ awã kĩ bɛbɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ a. Linikɛ vɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛtábila oti tɔ̃ deĩ nɛ kɔbã a kamɛ.
43019042	Ayekĩ luwi a nyɛ Kukũmanɛ luwi lɛkpa Kawɛya Luwi a, ade kĩ awã lɛmɛ fuã be sũ ni, bɛkɔa Yesu ɔnɔkpa a bibila nɛ awã.
43020001	Ɛkwansieda ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, kĩ fɔkɔ tákpalɛ tɔ̃ a, Maria Magdalani naa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃, ade ɛmɔ́ kĩ bitinya de a nɛ linikɛ a onukpɛ̃.
43020002	Foesũ ewula atsɛ ɛnaa Simon Petro mɔ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ Yesu látunɔ kalɛ a sɛkɛ̃, ebi be kĩ, “Bɛyabɔɛ boe Ɔlate nɛ linikɛ a kamɛ bɛdzakũmɛna, ade bunyína awã kĩ bɛkɔa ye biyi a.”
43020003	Ade Petro mɔ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩ a yidza bɛnaa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃.
