43020004	Be nviã a flee bɛkawula atsɛ, lɛmɛ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩ a wula atsɛ ɛtɛ̃ Petro ɛnya lɔtɔ ewo linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃.
43020005	Ɛkɛna akũ ɛdã de kamɛ ɛmɔ́ aklala a kĩ bɛkɔa bisuli ɔnɔkpa a, lɛmɛ ɛtáwo nɛ linikɛ a kamɛ.
43020006	Simon Petro kĩ etomɔ ye nɛ liti a, ya ade ye kɔ̃ ewo nɛ linikɛ a kamɛ a. Ɛmɔ́ aklala ovoe a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ awã.
43020007	Ɛmɔ́ lima a kĩ bɛkɔa bisui Yesu lɔlɔ a lɛmɛ nɛ awã, lɛmɛ lɛwáa nɛ aklala a ɔwɛ̃, mbom bibuta de biyi de lite.
43020008	Ke liti a, fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ bɛbã a kĩ ɛnya lɔtɔ ewo linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ a, lɛmɛ wo nɛ de kamɛ. Ɛmɔ́ aklala mɔ lɔlɔ kasui lima a, ade ɛtɛ edo a.
43020009	Ke malo ni, bɛtánu kayɔ kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ Yesu eyidza eto kanɔkpa.
43020010	Ke liti a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ bɛnaa be tɔtɔ kamɛ.
43020011	Lɛmɛ Maria dza nɛ linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ ɛkabe. Kĩ ɛkabe a, ɛkɛna akũ ɛdã linikɛ a kamɛ,
43020012	ade ɛmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ nviã kĩ bideĩ nɛ tɛtadiɛ fitaa kamɛ, kĩ bidzi nɛ awã kĩ bɛwɔ́la Yesu a. Ɔmɔa dzi nɛ ye lɔlɔ nyangɛ, ɔbɛbã dzi nɛ ye abɔa kayɔ.
43020013	Bivia Maria kĩ, “Boe ɔma, litsa sũ abe?” Maria kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɛbɔɛ yĩ Ɔlate bɛnamɛna, ade ĩnyína awã kĩ bɛkɔa ye bɛnamɛna a.”
43020014	Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ɛdani akũ ade ɛmɔ́ Yesu kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã, lɛmɛ ɛtányi kĩ ye yanɛ.
43020015	Yesu via ye kĩ, “Boe ɔma, nde sũ abe? Owei awɛ?” Lɛmɛ Maria kɔna kĩ oti a kĩ yadãmɛna awã a yanɛ, foesũ ebi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ntɛ nɔ lɛbɔɛ ye ni, bi yĩ awã kĩ oyi ye lɔkɔa nnaabɔɛ ye.”
43020016	Ade Yesu vɛ ye kĩ, “Maria!” Ɛdani ɛtsɛlamɔ ye ade ɛlɛ nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ, “Raboni!” Foe kayɔ nyɛ Fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ.
43020017	Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tata yĩ, kitonɛkĩ ntámuniki nnaa ode nɛ Nda sɛkɛ̃ tɔ̃. Lɛmɛ naa nwaɛ̃ amɛ sɛkɛ̃ kabi be kĩ mmuniki manaa oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ Nda mɔ mi Ɔlɛga, yĩ Baguma mɔ mi Baguma a sɛkɛ̃.”
43020018	Foesũ Maria Magdalani a nabi fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ ɛmɔ́ Ɔlate a, ade ebi be fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu bi ye a flee a.
43020019	Nɛ Ɛkwansieda a na olobe a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kpɔta nɛ kɔla kamɛ, ade bɛbalɛ onyukpɛ̃ tupunu a flee, kitonɛkĩ bɛkavila Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a. Lɛtalɛta Yesu yanɛ ɛdza nɛ be kayite, ade ebi be kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi.”
43020020	Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ɛkɔa ye awɛ mɔ sɛklabi ɛtsa be. Adeke kawɔlɛ de fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛmɔ́ Ɔlate a.
43020021	Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi! Ndɛ ayekĩ Nda do yĩ a, ade aye mado mi a.”
43020022	Adeke ɛwɛya eko nɛ be akũ, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.
43020023	Ntɛ mikɔa bati tɔkpa mite be ni, bɛkɔa bite be, lɛmɛ ntɛ mitákɔa be tɔkpa mite be a ni, bɛtákɔa te bite be.”
43020024	Kĩ Yesu ya a, Toma kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa, kĩ bibuki bavɛ Ata a, tána nɛ ye bade a kamɛ.
43020025	Foesũ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ bɛbã a bi ye kĩ, “Bɔmɔ́ boe Ɔlate a!” Ade Toma bi be kĩ, “Ntɛ ntámɔ ye awɛ kamɛ tiplego fɔɔkpa a, nkɔa lawobi nte nɛ fɔɔkpa a akũ ndo awɛ nɛ ye sɛklabi ni, nláatɛ ndo da.”
43020026	Nɛ fuwi ɛlɛ̃ liti a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a buki bɛkpɔta nɛ kɔla a kamɛ, ade Toma lɛmɛ na nɛ be kamɛ a. Bɛbalɛ tupunu a flee, lɛmɛ Yesu yadza nɛ be kayite ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi!”
43020027	Adeke ebi Toma kĩ, “Kɔa nɔ lawobi kate nɛ awĩ, kadã yĩ awɛ kamɛ. Yo kɔkpɔ kado awɛ nɛ yĩ sɛklabi kamɛ. Fɔ̃ atsindze katɛ, lɔkɔa katɛ kado!”
43020028	Toma bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ Ɔlate mɔ yĩ Baguma!”
43020029	Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ayekĩ ɔmɔ́ yĩ sũ ɔtɛ odo. Baguma hila bikĩ bɛtámɔ yĩ, lɛmɛ bɛtɛ bido a!”
43020030	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Yesu kɛna awãwã fɔtsa bɛbã pii nɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a anɛ, kĩ bɛtátsɛlɛ bido nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ.
43020031	Lɛmɛ bɛtsɛlɛ fukĩĩ biyi ayekĩ míatɛ mido kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo, Baguma Obi, ade mitɛ ye mido ni, míatsã ye akũ mina nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
43021001	Ke liti a, Yesu buki ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nɛ Tiberia Lutubu Baũ a abuĩ. Ayekĩ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa a nyɛ.
43021002	Luwi a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ badi kpɔta. Ade be nyɛ Simon Petro, Toma kĩ bavɛ Ata obi, mɔ Nataniel kĩ eto Kana nɛ Galilea tite akũ, mɔ Zebedeo babi mɔ Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ bɛbã nviã.
43021003	Ade Simon Petro bi be kĩ, “Manaata asau.” Bibi ye kĩ, “Bɔ́atomɔ nɔ bɔnaa.” Foesũ bɛnawo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bɛnaa, lɛmɛ lɛnyɛ a flee bɛtányɛ lɛtsama.
43021004	Kĩ kade aya kanyina kɔ̃ a, Yesu ya ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ, lɛmɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a linyína kĩ Yesu yanɛ.
43021005	Ade evia be kĩ, “Bapopo, mbɔɛɛ mitányɛ kɔfɔabi kudima?” Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo!”
43021006	Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mita asau nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a sɔmɔna sɛmakɛ lɔkɔa míana kɔfɔabi a kudi.” Ade bɛta asau a bɛnyɛ kɔfɔabi beblebee kĩ bɛtápuli bɛvɛlɛ bɛnɛmɛna.
43021007	Fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ Yesu látunɔ kalɛ a bi Petro kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate a yanɛ!” Kĩ Petro nu kĩ boe Ɔlate yanɛ a, ɛbɔɛ ye atadiɛ anyanglede efili nɛ kate, kitonɛkĩ edzi ɔdzɔ, ade ɛvɛnya ewo nɛ mui a kamɛ a.
43021008	Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nkaɛ a ta ɔkɔlɔ a, bɛvɛlɛ asau a kĩ eyi mɔ kɔfɔabi a bɛyamɛna nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ a. Awã kĩ bɛna a mɔ ɔwɔ abuĩ lɛlá lugo, fɔ́ana ndɛ abasam ɔha.
43021009	Kĩ biduma nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ bɛtɛna futuã fi kĩ kɔfɔabi teĩ nɛ foe akũ, ade abodoo adi lɛmɛ waa nɛ awã a.
43021010	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mikɔa kɔfɔabi a kĩ minyɛ finyaa kudi miyamɛna.”
43021011	Simon Petro wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ɛnavɛlɛ asau a ɛyamɛna nɛ lɔwɔ tuni. Kɔfɔabi baũ baũ ɔha mɔa mɔ aduenum ɛlalɛ yi asau a. Titɔ kĩ kɔfɔabi a pɔnɛ malo ni, asau a tákpeli.
43021012	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyaanya.” Lɛmɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ odima tádo ɔwɔlɛ evia ye kĩ, “Owei anɛ?” kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ Boe Ɔlate a yanɛ.
43021013	Foesũ Yesu nabɔɛ abodoo a ɛkɔa ɛkpa be, ade ayea ɛbɔɛ kɔfɔabi a lɛmɛ ɛkpa be a.
43021014	Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɛlade kĩ Yesu nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ, kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa a.
43021015	Kĩ bɛnya biyua a, Yesu via Simon Petro kĩ, “Simon, Yona obi, awɛ yĩ kalɛ kaba ayekĩ bati bɛbã kĩĩ a awɛ yĩ kalɛ a?” Ɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, Boe Ɔlate! Onyina kĩ mawɛ nɔ kalɛ.” Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Dãmɛna yĩ bavelibi akũ.”
43021016	Yesu buki evia ye lɛyade kĩ, “Simon, Yona obi, awɛ yĩ kalɛ?” Petro kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, Boe Ɔlate! Nɔ mɔawɛ onyina kĩ mawɛ nɔ kalɛ.” Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Dãmɛna yĩ baveli a akũ.”
43021017	Yesu buki evia Petro lɛlalɛde kĩ, “Simon, Yona obi, awɛ yĩ kalɛ?” Petro wo ɔblɔ kitonɛkĩ Yesu via ye lɛlade kĩ, “Awɛ yĩ kalɛ?” Foesũ ebi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ mɔawɛ onyina lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa. Nɔ mɔawɛ onyina kĩ mawɛ nɔ kalɛ!” Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Dãmɛna yĩ baveli a akũ.
43021018	Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔnyɛ opopo a, apuli kafili lima, kanaa kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ awɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔdɛ a ni, aadzɛla akpɔ, oti bɛbã lifili nɔ lima, ɛkpã nɔ ɛnamɛna awã kĩ aáwɛ kĩ anaa.”
43021019	Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ ɛkɔa ɛtsa wuda odu a kĩ Petro aaku, ɛkɔa ɛnyɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a ɛtsa. Ke liti a, Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.”
43021020	Petro dani ade ɛmɔ́ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ Yesu látunɔ kalɛ a kĩ etomɔ be nɛ liti yaya. Ade fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩĩ lidzi ɛmɛnamɔ Yesu kĩ bidzi bɛkanya, ade evia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, owei aanyɛ nɔ ɛkpa a?”
43021021	Kĩ Petro mɔ́ ye a, evia Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, litsa aaya nɛ oti kĩĩ akũ?”
43021022	Ade Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mawɛ kĩ edzi nkpã kɛnaawo kĩ maaya a ni, fɔwɔdabe tsɛla nɔ akũ? Nɔ kɔ̃, tomɔ yĩ!”
43021023	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ Yesu batomɛnanɛ a kamɛ kĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩĩ lɛláaku. Lɛmɛ Yesu tálɛ kĩ ɛláaku, mbom kalɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mawɛ kĩ edzi nkpã kɛnaawo kĩ maaya a ni, fɔɔdabe tsɛla nɔ akũ?”
43021024	Ade fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩĩ adi adansiɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ a, ade ye lɛmɛ lɛtsɛlɛ foe eyi a. Foesũ bunyina kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
43021025	Fɔtsa bɛbã pii deĩ kĩ Yesu kɛna. Ntɛ katsɛlɛ bɛtsɛlɛ foe flee biyi fɔmɔa fɔmɔa ni, nkɔna kĩ katinya kĩĩ flee kamɛ malo lɛláana kakokɔ̃ kɛkpa tuvoli a kĩ baatsɛlɛ a.
44001001	-
44001002	Nwaɛ̃ Tiofilo, nɛ yĩ ovoli ɔtɔnyade a kamɛ a, ntsɛlɛ ntsa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna mɔ fukĩ ɛtsa, kito nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ eyi ye adzuma kayɔ, kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma bɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode. Fɔmɔ Baguma bɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna ode a, Yesu tsã Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ akũ ɛtsa ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ ɛpau a fɔtsa.
44001003	Nɛ ye wuda liti a, ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa be nɛ tisi pii akũ nɛ fuwi tɛna kamɛ, kĩ atsindze katɛ lɛláa foe kamɛ kĩ edzi nkpã. Ɛlɛmɔ bikĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a kɔdzɛla nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa a akũ.
44001004	Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkpɔta a, esi be mbla kĩ, “Mitadzakũ nɛ Yerusalem, mbom midzi midzɔlɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ mbi mi kĩ yĩ Ɔlɛga lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa mi a kaya.
44001005	Yohanes kɔ̃ ni, mui ɛkɔa ɛwɔla bati. Lɛmɛ nɛ fuwi lukũ kamɛ ni, Baguma aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛwɔla mi.”
44001006	Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a buki bɛkpɔta a, bivia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, mbɔɛɛ finyaakĩĩ ɔwɛ kĩ ayaamunikimɔ Israelfɔ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ɔkpa be?”
44001007	Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Fɔtásĩ kĩ mianyi lɔkɔ ĩye fuwi a kĩ yĩ ɔlɛga lɛ eyi ɛkpa kĩ litsedi lɛya a nɛ ye kɔbɛ̃ akũ a.
44001008	Lɛmɛ ntɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a yawo nɛ mi kamɛ ni, yaado mi kɔbɛ̃ lɔkɔa milɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Yerusalem, mɔ Yudea flee mɔ Samaria, kɛnaawo katinya kamɛ tite kawũnakɔ̃.”
44001009	Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a nɛ be anɛ kamɛ naa, Baguma bɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode, ade ɛyɛla nɛ luflututu kamɛ a.
44001010	Kĩ bɛdza bɛkadã koee kĩ yanaa odetɔ́ kamɛ a, lɛtalɛta banyole nviã badi kĩ bideĩ nɛ fɔtsa ovoe kamɛ nyɛ be akũ bɛtsa be,
44001011	ade bibi be kĩ, “Galileafɔ, nde sũ midzɛ̃ miadã odetɔ́ kamɛ lɔmɔ? Yesu a kĩ Baguma bɔɛ nɛ mi ɔwɛ̃ nɛ awĩ ɛnamɛna ode a, aabuki ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ mimɔ́ kĩ yanaa ode a.”
44001012	Ke liti a, fɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩĩ dzakũ nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ a bɛnaa Yerusalem ɔmatɔ kamɛ. Kito awã kɛnawo ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ana ndɛ lisikũ sɛkɛ.
44001013	Kĩ biwo ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, bɛnaa be kadzikɔ̃ nɛ abansulu kɔla ode. Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã nyɛ Petro, Yohanes, Yakobo, Andrea, Filipo, Toma, Bartolomeo, Mateo, Yakobo kĩ ɛnyɛ Alfeo obi, mɔ Simon kĩ epili ye kade lɔlɔ, mɔ Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ Yakobo obi.
44001014	Bati kĩĩ flee katsɛna lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ mɔ kakɔna mɔa, kabɔa mpaɛ kakpa Baguma. Bati a badi lɛmɛ nyɛ batsole mɔ Yesu ɔma Maria, mɔ Yesu bawaɛ̃nyole.
44001015	Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ a, bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a tsɛna, be lidede aawo ndɛ bati ɔha mɔ be tɛya. Ade Petro yidza ɛdza ebi be kĩ,
44001016	“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kɛnɛ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ, kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛ eyi ɛtsãmɛna Lɛgã Dawid akũ nɛ Yuda kĩ ye lɛnya bati lɔtɔ bipi Yesu a, fɔya lɔmɔ.
44001017	Yuda nya boe kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ boe Ɔlate nyɛ ye kĩ ɛkɛna fɔtɔ banyanɛ adzuma.”
44001018	Lɛmɛ ɛkɛna tɔkpa kĩ ɛnatɛ sika kĩ se bɛkɔa bɛya tite a kĩ te akũ eku a. Ade awã na kĩ eto ode ɛtɔ a, ye lupu tui lɛbɛ̃, ade ke ye fɔmɛtsa flee nɛ fuko nɛ tite a.
44001019	Ye wuda a akũ fɔlɛtsa gba nɛ Yerusalem kĩ odi nyɛ odi nu foe. Foesũ awã kĩ ɛnaku ɛwa a bavɛ ke kĩ Akeldamak, foe kayɔ nyɛ Babɔanɛ Tite.
44001020	Foesũ Petro buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Dawid Tɔnɔ Ovoli a kamɛ kĩ, ‘Mifɔ̃ ye tɔtɔ tɛwa luto, odima ɛtabuki edzi nɛ te kamɛ.’ Bɛtsɛlɛ lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Mifɔ̃ oti bɛbã ɛtɛ ye kadzakɔ̃ a.’
44001021	-
44001022	Foesũ fusĩ kĩ oti bɛbã ɛyaawo nɛ boe kamɛ ndɛ ɔdansini ɛkpa boe Ɔlate Yesu kayidza kato kanɔkpa a. Ade fusĩ lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ ɛnya boe bati a kĩ bɔtsã butomɛna boe Ɔlate Yesu a kamɛ ɔmɔa, kito lɔkɔ a kĩ Yohanes de lɛtsã nɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ akũ kɛyawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma bɔɛ Yesu nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ ɛnamɛna ode a.”
44001023	Foesũ bɛnyɛ bati nviã ade be nyɛ Matias mɔ Yosef kĩ bavɛ Barsaba kĩ babuki kavɛ Yusto a.
44001024	-
44001025	Ade bɛbɔa mpaɛ bɛvɛ Baguma kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ nyina odi nyɛ odi lɔlɔ kamɛ. Tsa boe bati nviã kĩĩ kamɛ ekĩ ɔnyɛ kĩ ɛdza ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ kadzakɔ̃ a kĩ Yuda fɔnɛ awɛ eyi ɛnaa awã kĩ kɛfɛta ye a.”
44001026	Kĩ bɛta bavulibi nɛ bati nviã kĩĩ fɔlɔ a, fɔyake nɛ Matias akũ, ade bɛkɔa ye bibumɛna fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-odi a akũ a.
44002001	Kĩ Pentekoste luwi a wo ɔtɔ a, batɛ badonɛ a flee natsɛna nɛ kakɔ mɔapɛ.
44002002	Deedimɔapɛ, binu litsedi nkã ndɛ ayekĩ ɔwɛ kpale avũ a nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ, ade ɔwɛ kĩĩ tɛ tɔtɔ a flee kĩ te kamɛ bɛna a kamɛ a.
44002003	Bɛmɔ́ litsedi ndɛ fi fɔmɛ kĩ fɔka fudzi nɛ odi nyɛ odi akũ.
44002004	Ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa tɛ be kamɛ flee, ade bido kɔdzɛla kalɛ awɛ nɛ tide futefute kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Hũhũ a kpa be a.
44002005	Ade nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yudafɔ kĩ bavila Baguma kĩ bito fude kumɛkumɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ flee a ya bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem.
44002006	Foesũ kĩ binu ɔwɛ baũ kĩĩ nkã a, bati pii bɔa obũ bɛnakpɔta nɛ awã. Kĩ binu kĩ batɛ badonɛ kĩĩ kalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi tide kamɛ a, fɔkɛna be wãwã.
44002007	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ libe wo be, bɛkɛna saa, ade bido akũ kavia awɛ kĩ, “Midã, mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Galileafɔ bati kĩĩ flee anɛ?
44002008	Mɔ nde fɔya mɔ bɔanu kĩ bɛlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ boe tide kamɛ?
44002009	-
44002010	Bɔnyɛ Partiafɔ mɔ Mediafɔ mɔ Elamfɔ ade boe kamɛ badi to Mesopotamia mɔ Yudea mɔ Kapadokia mɔ Ponto mɔ Asia mɔ Frigia mɔ Pamfilia mɔ Egipte mɔ Libia kakɔ a kĩ kifuã Kirene. Boe badi buto Roma
44002011	kĩ bɔnyɛ Yudafɔ ĩye bati kĩ bɛdani akũ bɛkɛna Yudafɔ, boe badi bɔnyɛ Kretafɔ mɔ Arabiafɔ. Ade boe flee bɔanu kĩ bɛlamɛna Baguma awãwã fɔtsa kalɛ nɛ boe tide kamɛ a.”
44002012	Ade kĩ fɔkɛna be saa mɔ basaa lɔmɔ a, bɛkavia be akũ kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa nɛ awĩ a?”
44002013	Lɛmɛ bikĩ bɛdza nɛ awã badi di be nsekuo bɛlɛ kĩ, “Bavɛ lamɛna be kawugɛla.”
44002014	Ade awã mɔ Petro yidza ɛdza mɔ be ewua-odi a, ɛdzɛla odo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mi Yudafɔ mɔ mi a flee kĩ midzi nɛ Yerusalem, mawɛ kĩ manyɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ flee kayɔ ntsa mi, foesũ mitse katse wĩ.
44002015	Nnɛ́ bavɛ bati kĩĩ wuga ndɛ ayekĩ mikɔna a. Midã kĩ ade owi fɔmɔ ɔnɔnɛ tɔdɔũ evedi bɔa a.
44002016	Mbom lɛtsa a kĩ de milamɛna kamɔ nɛ awĩ a nyɛ fukĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yoel lɛ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ a kĩ,
44002017	‘Baguma lɛ kĩ, “Nɛ fuwi nkaɛ a kamɛ ni, maado yĩ Hũhũ ɛyaawo nɛ bati flee kamɛ, lɔkɔa mi babinyole mɔ babitsole aade lɛtsã nɛ yĩ kalɛ a akũ. Mi bapopo aamɔ ode fɔtsa kɛnawa nɛ hũhũ kamɛ, ade mi banɔkɔɛ̃ lɛmɛ aawa fɔda a.
44002018	Ɔnɔkɔali, nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ ni, yĩ Hũhũ aatɛ mi basumunɛ batsole mɔ banyole flee kamɛ, lɔkɔa baadɛ lɛtsã nɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa akũ.
44002019	Ade maafɔ̃ awãwã fɔtsa lɛnɛ nɛ odetɔ kamɛ mɔ tite akũ. Míamɔ babɔanɛ, mɔ fi mɔ ɔnyɔ kusuu kĩ fɔgba nɛ tite akũ.
44002020	Suwa aake ɔtũ, odetɔ anɛ aadani ngbã ndɛ babɔanɛ aye, ade owi fɔmɔ Baguma Luwi kpale mɔ kukũkpalɛ a aaya a.
44002021	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaavɛ Ɔlate a dĩ mɔ evia ye kɔnyakamɔ ni, yaana katɛ.” ’ ”
44002022	Ade Petro buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Israelfɔ, mitse fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ. Yesu Nazaretni nyɛ Oti a kĩ Baguma pau, kĩ ye deĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃. Ɛnyɛ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ ɛtsa mi nɛ ye awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa kɛnawa kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ mi mɔawɛ minyina lɛmɛ a.
44002023	Lɛmɛ nɛ Baguma kawɛ mɔ nhihiɛ onukpɛ̃ ni ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ ɛkpa mi, ade mitsã tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ akũ mikɔ ye, nɛ kĩ mibɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ a.
44002024	Lɛmɛ Baguma buki ɛdzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ ade ɛnɛ́ nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ wuda tápuli ɛfɔ̃ ɛkahɔ nɛ kanɔkpa da.
44002025	Ade lɛgã Dawid lɛ eyi nɛ ye akũ kĩ, ‘Mamɔ kĩ yĩ Ɔlate dzɛ̃ nɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ Nɛ kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna ndɛ yĩ obumɛnanɛ sũ maávila.
44002026	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ kawɔlɛ de yĩ ade fɔfɔ̃ mamu ye luwi daa. Titɔ kĩ sukɛna pupulidza manɛ malo ni, maadzi nɛ kɔnɛte kamɛ.
44002027	Kitonɛkĩ ɔláafɔ̃nɛ yĩ ɔkla oyi nɛ kanɔkpade, ade ɔláafɔ̃ nɔ Obi Kpalɛwa sukɛna lɛvɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ a.
44002028	Nɔ lɛtsa yĩ nkpã osi a, ade nɔ sɛkɛ̃ kana aafɔ̃ mmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa.’
44002029	“Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mabi mi yededeede kĩ boe ɔwanyɔ Lɛgã Dawid ku, bibila ye, ade ye kuni waa nɛ boe kamɛ kɛyawo nviã kĩ a.
44002030	Lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnya Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ sũ ni, enyi lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakɛna ɛkpa ye. Baguma lɔ fubo kĩ yaakɛna Dawid kasinu a kamɛ obi mɔa odi ɛyaadzi ɛnya lɛgã ndɛ Dawid aye.
44002031	Nɛ kĩ Dawid nyi fukĩĩ ɛnyamɛna lɔtɔ sũ ni, ɛlɛ eyi kĩ Kristo aayidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ. Ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma táfɔnɛ ye awɛ ɛkahɔ nɛ kanɔkpa, ade ye sukɛna lɛmɛ távɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ a.’
44002032	Ade Yesu kĩĩ Baguma dzɛla etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a, ade boe a flee bɔnyɛ foe akũ adansifɔ a.
44002033	Finyaakĩĩ ni, Ɔlɛga Baguma kpa ye lɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kadzikɔ̃ nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ade ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ ɛkpa ye ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi a. Foesũ ye malo ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ a, eko nɛ boe akũ. Ade foesũ mimɔ́, minu lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛlamɛna kaya nɛ awĩ a.
44002034	-
44002035	Nnɛ́ Dawid liyidza ɛnaa ode, mbom ye lɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma bi yĩ Ɔlate kĩ, “Dzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ maakɔa nɔ bakesĩnɛ nkɛna ndɛ nɔ abɔa katekɔ̃.” ’
44002036	Foesũ mawɛ kĩ mi Israelfɔ flee minyi kĩ Yesu a kĩ mibɔa nɛ asendua akũ a, ade ye Baguma kɛna Ɔlate mɔ Kristo Oti a Kĩ Bɛbɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a.”
44002037	Kĩ bati kĩĩ nu Petro fɔlɛtsa a, fɔha be paa. Foesũ bivia ye mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛbã a kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna?”
44002038	Ade Petro bi be kĩ, “Fusĩ kĩ mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ɛtɛ Baguma edo, lɔkɔa ɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ ayekĩ Baguma aakɔa ye titikpa ete ye, ɛtɛ Baguma futetsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ.
44002039	Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩĩ a waa fɔkpa mi, mɔ mi babi mɔ bikĩ bito mɔ lugo, mɔ bikĩ boe Ɔlate Baguma aavɛ kĩ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a.”
44002040	Ade Petro dɛ be pii ɛlɛ kĩ, “Minyɛ mi akũ mitomɛna sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ saaya nɛ nviã katinya bati kpa kĩĩ akũ a kamɛ.”
44002041	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bati pii nɛ be kamɛ tɛ Petro fɔlɛtsa a bido, ade bɛwɔla be mui nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ a. Be lidede aana ndɛ mpim ɛlalɛ kĩ bɛkɔa bibumɛna batɛ badonɛ a akũ nɛ luwi a.
44002042	Bɛfɔnɛ be akũ awɛ bɛkpa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bɛkatsa be fɔtsa, ade bɛkabɔa mpaɛ mɔ kanya kakpɔta mɔ ɔmɔa kakɛna a.
44002043	Nɛ kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kakɛna awãwã fɔtsa mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni pii sũ ni, fɔkɛna bati pii wãwã.
44002044	Batɛ badonɛ kĩĩ flee katsɛna luwi daa kakɛna lɛtsa mɔa, ade bɛkasɛ̃ be fɔtsa kakpa akũ a.
44002045	Ntɛ ɔsa bɛnɔ be akũ fɔtsa fudi ni, basɛ̃ sika a kakpa akũ nɛ be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kasĩ onukpɛ̃.
44002046	Bɛkanaa Baguma afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a luwi daa, ade bɛkatsɛna nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ nɛ be tɔtɔ kamɛ kanya kakpɔta nɛ kawɔlɛ mɔ akũ kadɔla kamɛ a.
44002047	Ade bɛkanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, kamu ye lɛmɛ a. Bati flee kɔa obu bɛkpa be. Luwi daa boe Ɔlate akɔa bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a kĩ ɛtɛ a kayaabumɔ be.
44003001	Luwi a Petro mɔ Yohanes naa Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Yudafɔ abɔa mpaɛ a kamɛ. Fɔ́ana ndɛ olobe tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ.
44003002	Kĩ biwo Asɔli Kɔla onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ bavɛ Onyukpɛ̃ Mɔ Kalɛ a, bɛmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ eveliveli kito ye lɛmawi, kĩ ɛwaa nɛ awã. Ye bati abɔɛ ye kanaayi nɛ awã luwi daa ayekĩ yaakawã sika katomɛna bikĩ batɛ̃ nɛ awã a sɛkɛ̃.
44003003	Kĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes atɛ̃ a, ɛwã be sika.
44003004	Bɛfɔ̃ bɛdza bɛdã ye koee ade Petro bi ye kĩ, “Dã boe anɛ kamɛ!”
44003005	Ade oti a dzɛla anɛ ɛdã be mɔ kakɔna kĩ baakpa ye litsedi.
44003006	Petro bi ye kĩ, “Nla sika sidima kĩ makpa nɔ, lɛmɛ maakpa nɔ lɛtsa a kĩ ndeĩ a! Nɛ Yesu Kristo Nazaretni dĩ akũ ni, mabi nɔ kĩ yidza kadza, katsã!”
44003007	Ade Petro pi oti a nɛ sɔmɔna kɔkpɔ ɛdzɛla ye a. Deedimɔapɛ ye abɔa mɔ anya flee de ɔsĩ,
44003008	ade ɛvɛnya ɛdza nɛ abɔa akũ, edo katokatɛ̃ awɛ a. Etomɔ be biwo nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ade ɛkavɛnya kamu Baguma lɛmɛ a.
44003009	Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã a mɔ́ ye kĩ ɛtsɛ̃, ade binu ayekĩ ɛkamu Baguma a.
44003010	Kĩ bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ ye lɛkadzi nɛ Onyukpɛ̃ Mɔ Kalɛ ɔwɛ̃ kawã fɔtsa a, fɔnyɛnɛ be flee akũ ade bɛkɛna saa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ ye akũ a.
44003011	Bati pii wula atsɛ bɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ bavɛ Lɛgã Salomo Mblada nɛ Asɔli kɔla kamɛ a. Bɛyamɔ oti a kĩ ɛmanɛmɔ Petro mɔ Yohanes tsɛmɛtsɛmɛ ade ye kasaɛ a kɛna be saa a.
44003012	Kĩ Petro mɔ́ bati kĩĩ a ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Israelfɔ, litsa koũ liti lakɛna mi wãwã nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ akũ? Nde sũ miadã boe bãã lɔmɔ ndɛ bati kpalɛwa bɔanɛ? Mitakɔna kĩ boe awɛ kɔbɛ̃ bɔkɔa bɔtsa oti kĩĩ!
44003013	Baguma a kĩ ɛnyɛ Abraham, Isak mɔ Yakob mɔ boe bawanyɔ Baguma a do ye Ɔsumunɛ Yesu obu. Ade ye obi Yesu mikɔa mikpa bɛkɔ a. Misĩ ye nɛ Pilato anɛ kamɛ, titɔ kĩ minyina ye nɛ kĩ Pilato wɛ kĩ yafɔnɛ ye awɛ kufɛ.
44003014	Misĩ oti kpĩĩ mɔ oti kpalɛwa a, ade mitunɔ kĩ ɛfɔnɛ owudini awɛ ɛkpa mi nɛ ye kadokɔ̃ a.
44003015	Mifɔ̃ bɛkɔ oti a kĩ yakpa nkpã a, lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ. Boe awɛ a bɔmɔ́ ye mɔ anɛ.
44003016	Yesu dĩ kɔbɛ̃ akũ futo mɔ oti kĩ miamɔ kĩĩ, minyina lɛmɛ a na akũ ɔsĩ. Nɛ kĩ ɛtɛ Yesu edo sũ ni, boe Ɔlate tsa ye nɛ mi anɛ kamɛ.
44003017	“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, finyaakĩĩ ĩnyina kĩ mi mɔ mi banɔkɔɛ̃ mikɛna fukĩĩ nɛ Yesu akũ nɛ katanyi kamɛ.
44003018	Lɛmɛ Baguma lɛ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee akũ kĩ ye Kristo a aatsã lubo kamɔ kamɛ. Ade foesũ ɛfɔ̃ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔmɔ a.
44003019	-
44003020	Foesũ midani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ mimuniki miyaatómɔ Baguma ayekĩ yaakɔa mi tɔkpa ete mi. Ntɛ mikɛna lɔmɔ ni, fɔ́afɔ̃ mina hũhũ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ mitomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ yaado Yesu a kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo a nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
44003021	Kɛnɛ kĩ Yesu ɛna nɛ ode kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma lɔla lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ de osi akũ ndɛ ayekĩ ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kpalɛwa a kĩ bidzi nkpã kɔkɔɛ a lɛ biyi a.
44003022	Kitonɛkĩ Mose lɛ kĩ, ‘Mi Ɔlate Baguma aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ odi ndɛ yĩ aye etomɛna mi kamɛ. Foesũ mitse lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ yaabi mi.
44003023	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛláatse ye kalɛ ni, baanyɛ ye nɛ Baguma bati a kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛwɔla ye mɔ odu mɔ odu.’
44003024	“Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee a, kito Samuel akũ kɛyawo bikĩ bitomɔ ye a, lɛ biyi bɛnyamɛna lɔtɔ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔlamɛna kaya nɛ nviã fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ a akũ.
44003025	Baguma apam a kĩ ɛkɛna mɔ mi bawanyɔ ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ a nyɛ mi fude, ade mi aanya tsɛfã nɛ apam kĩĩ fɔtsa akũ a. Ebi Abraham kĩ fɔ́atsã ye ɔwa akũ yaakɔa nhila ɛkpa katinya kamɛ bati flee.
44003026	Foesũ kĩ Baguma pau ye Ɔsumunɛ a ni, mi sɛkɛ̃ ɛnya lɔtɔ edo ye kĩ ɛkɔa nhila ɛkpa mi, lɔkɔa ɛfɔ̃ mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛfɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna.”
44004001	Nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes dza bɛkabi bati a fɔlɛtsa a, Yudafɔ basɔfɔ badi, Asɔli kɔla a akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Zadukifɔ badi ya nɛ awã.
44004002	Kĩ binu kĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes katsa fɔtsa nɛ Yesu kayidza fɔlɛtsa akũ, katsa kĩ banɔkpa aayidza bidzi nkpã a, bɛna kalɔkpa paa!
44004003	Foesũ bipi be, lɛmɛ kĩ kade dɔ sũ ni, bɛkɔa be bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ kɛnawo kĩ kade nyina.
44004004	Lɛmɛ bati pii kĩ binu be fɔlɛtsa a badi tɛ kalɛ wĩ a bido. Banyole batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛtɛ bido a pɔ biwo ndɛ mpim elo.
44004005	Ade kĩ kade nyina a, Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a yakpɔta nɛ Yerusalem.
44004006	Bɛyatsa fɔlɔ mɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Hana mɔ Kayafa, Yohanes mɔ Aleksandro mɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a akũ bati badi.
44004007	Ade bɛnyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bɛyadzɛla nɛ be anɛ kamɛ a. Bivia be kĩ, “Osi ɔwɔdabe akũ mikɛna fukĩĩ? Owei dĩ akũ ĩye ɔwa kɔbɛ̃ akũ mikɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ?”
44004008	Ade Petro kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa tɛ ye kamɛ a yidza ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe lɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃,
44004009	ntɛ miwɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kanyɛ nɛ lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ bɔkɛna bɔkpa oti kĩ eveliveli mɔ ayekĩ bɛtsa ye a akũ ni,
44004010	mitse mbi mi, lɔkɔa Israelfɔ flee binyi kĩ, Yesu Kristo Nazaretni a kĩ mibɔa nɛ asendua akũ, lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a, ye dĩ akũ fɔtsã sũ mɔ oti kĩĩ na akũ ɔsĩ.
44004011	Ade Yesu kĩĩ akũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa lɛ kĩ, ‘De a kĩ fɔla bakenɛ sĩ a, ade de lɛdani kɔla akũ de titiliwu a.’
44004012	Ye odi nyɛ bati Ɔtɛnɛ, ade otidziwa odima lɛláa tite akũ kĩ ye akũ bɔ́atsã bɔna nkpã a.”
44004013	Kĩ lɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ́ ayekĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃, titɔ kĩ bɛtánaa sukuu malo ni, fɔkɛna be saa. Ade bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ bɛtsã bitomɔ Yesu a.
44004014	Lɛmɛ kĩ bɛmɔ́ oti a kĩ bɛtsa a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ be ɔwɛ̃ sũ ni, bɛtápuli bɛlɛ kadima.
44004015	Bibi be kĩ bɛnɛ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, kite be odi bɛkapi adzuni.
44004016	Badi via kĩ, “Litsa bɔakɛna bati kĩĩ? Bɔláapuli busĩ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna a lɛnyɛ́ awãwã fɔtsa, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi nɛ Yerusalem nyina, enu kalɛ kĩĩ lɛmɛ.
44004017	Nɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtagba sũ ni, mifɔ̃ budo be libe kĩ bɛtabi odima kalɛ nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ.”
44004018	Ade bibuki bɛvɛ be bɛnamɛna katsɛnakɔ̃ a bisĩ be mbla kĩ bɛtabuki bibi odima kalɛ ĩye bɛtsa fɔtsa nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ a.
44004019	Lɛmɛ Petro mɔ Yohanes kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi awɛ mibu fukĩ fɔfɛta nɛ Baguma anɛ kĩ bɔkɛna, mi ɔlɛdo butse, mbɔɛɛ kĩ Baguma ode?
44004020	Lɛtsa a kĩ de bɔmɔ́, bunu lɛmɛ a, bɔláapuli busua onukpɛ̃ nɛ de akũ budzi kulokulo.”
44004021	Ade awã mɔ́ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kã be anɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, bɛfɔnɛ be awɛ a. Nɛ kĩ bati a flee kamu Baguma nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a akũ sũ ni, bɛtápuli bɛna osi a kĩ ye akũ baatsã bɛvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ.
44004022	Oti a kĩ ye bɛtsa a, tɛ fɔba futeli tɛna.
44004023	Kĩ bɛfɔnɛ Petro mɔ Yohanes awɛ bɛnaa be bati sɛkɛ̃ a, bɛbɔa be amandiɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a bi be a akũ.
44004024	Ade batɛ badonɛ a flee kpɔta bɛbɔa mpaɛ bɛvɛ Baguma bɛlɛ kĩ, “O boe Ɔlate, nɔ kĩ ɔkɛna tite mɔ ode, mpo mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ,
44004025	nɔ lɛtsã Hũhũ Kpalɛwa akũ ɔfɔ̃ boe ɔwanyɔ Dawid, nɔ ɔsumunɛ lɛ eyi kĩ, ‘Nde sũ katinya kamɛ bati de adɔ̃ mɔ bati tsa fɔlɔ nɛ tɔkpa akũ pupulidza?
44004026	Katinya kamɛ fɔgã flee kɛna ɔmɔa ade biyidza bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate mɔ ye Kristo akũ a.’
44004027	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ Herodes mɔ Pontio Pilato mɔ Israelfɔ, mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Israelfɔ a tsɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ kĩĩ kamɛ, ade biyidza bɛdza nɛ Yesu nɔ Ɔsumunɛ kpalɛwa a kĩ ɔbɔa tɔdɔ̃ a akũ a.
44004028	Lɛmɛ nɛ nɔ kɔbɛ̃, mɔ nɔ kawɛ, ɔkpa osi bɛkpɔta bɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ ohihiɛ oyi a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.
44004029	Finyaakĩĩ, O boe Ɔlate, dã ɔhau a kĩ ye kamɛ bido boe, lɔkɔa kado boe nɔ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a ɔwɔlɛ, ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ nɔ kalɛ wĩ a nɛ katavila kamɛ.
44004030	Te awɛ nɛ nɔ bati akũ bɛna kasaɛ, kafɔ̃ awãwã fɔtsa mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni pii fɔya nɛ nɔ Ɔsumunɛ Kpalɛwa Yesu dĩ akũ.”
44004031	Kĩ bɛbɔa mpaɛ biyua a, kɔla kĩ koe kamɛ bɛna a kuna. Hũhũ Kpalɛwa wo nɛ be flee kamɛ ade bido Baguma fɔlɛtsa kalɛ awɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ a.
44004032	Nɛ fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ a, batɛ badonɛ a flee kɛna ɔmɔa nɛ be fɔkɛnatsa mɔ adzuni kamɛ. Be kamɛ odima tákɔna kĩ ye odi la ye fɔtsa kĩ ɛna a, mbom fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ a nya be flee fude.
44004033	Fɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩĩ de lɛtsã mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu kayidza kato banɔkpa kamɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, ade Baguma lukudɔ mɔ nhila na nɛ be flee akũ a.
44004034	Odima tánya ohiãni kitonɛkĩ bikĩ bɛna fɔla mɔ tite a nɔ foe.
44004035	Bɛkɔa sika a bɛma fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ade bɛsɛ̃ se bɛkpa odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye kasĩ onukpɛ̃ a.
44004036	Onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yosef na nɛ awã. Ɛnyɛ Levini kĩ bɛma nɛ Kipro tite akũ. Fɔtɔ banyanɛ a te ye dĩ kĩ Barnaba, dĩ a kayɔ nyɛ Ekĩ yado Bati Ɔwɔlɛ.
44004037	Barnaba malo nɔ ye tite ɛkɔa sika a ɛma fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
44005001	Lɛmɛ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Anania mɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Safira na nɛ be kamɛ, be malo bɛnɔ be tite tidi.
44005002	Anania kɔa sika a sidi ɛkɔla ade ɛkɔa se nkaɛ ɛma fɔtɔ banyanɛ a. Ɔtsɔ̃ Safira nyina foe akũ litsedi ade etunɔ kĩ bakɛna lɔmɔ a.
44005003	Ade Petro via ye kĩ, “Anania, nde sũ ɔfɔ̃ Abonsam nya nɔ akũ, ɔma fɔvã ɔkpa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa, fɔfɔ̃ ɔkɔla tite a kĩ ɔnɔ a sika a sidi?
44005004	Nɔ tide nyɛ tite a fɔmɔ ɔnɔ te, sika a kĩ ɔtɛ a lɛmɛ nɔ side sanɛ. Litsa lɛfɔ̃ ɔbɔɛ adzuni kpa kĩĩ odu? Nnɛ́ boe batidziwa ɔkɛ, mbom Baguma ɔkɛ!”
44005005	Kĩ Anania sila enu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ pɛ, esinya ɛtɔ nɛ tite eku. Libe wo bati flee a kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa a paa.
44005006	Bapopo a kĩ bɛna nɛ be kamɛ a kɔa lima bisuli ye bɛbɔɛ bɛnabila.
44005007	Ɔtsɔ̃ yanɛ ɛta nɛ awã ndɛ ndɔũhuilɛ ɛlalɛ liti, kĩ enyína lɛtsa kĩ lɛya lɛtɛ̃ a.
44005008	Ade Petro via ye kĩ, “Bi yĩ. Kĩ mimɔ nɔ ɔnyɔ minɔ tite a sika a kĩ bise mi a ni, se a flee nɛ awĩ a?” Otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, ade se a flee nɛ awã a.”
44005009	Foesũ Petro bi ye kĩ, “Nde sũ mimɔ nɔ ɔnyɔ mikɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa miasɔ boe Ɔlate Hũhũ midã? Dã, bapopo a kĩ bɛbɔɛ nɔ ɔnyɔ bɛnabila a dzɛ̃ nɛ onyukpɛ̃ finyaakĩĩ. Baabɔɛ nɔ malo bɛnaabila.”
44005010	Deedimɔapɛ otsole a ka ɛtɔ nɛ tite, eku. Ade kĩ bapopo a yamɔ kĩ eku ɛwaa a, bɛbɔɛ ye malo bɛnabila nɛ ɔnyɔ ɔwɛ̃.
44005011	Foesũ libe paa wo batɛ badonɛ a flee mɔ be flee a kĩ binu lɛtsa kĩ lɛya nɛ awã a.
44005012	Nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ a fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kakɛna awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa pii nɛ bati a kamɛ. Batɛ badonɛ a flee katsɛna nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli kɔla kakɔa kĩ bavɛ Salomo Mblada a kamɛ.
44005013	Bikĩ bɛtána nɛ batɛ badonɛ a kamɛ a tádo ɔwɔlɛ kĩ bafuã be, titɔ kĩ bakɔa obu kakpa be malo.
44005014	Bati pii, batsole mɔ banyole, dani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ bɛtɛ boe Ɔlate bido.
44005015	Ade bati pii bɔɛ be basɔnɛ mɔ tɛpa mɔ tɛkɛna bɛnayi nɛ kɔya nɛ awã kĩ ntɛ Petro atɛ̃ mɔ ye kuyo ako nɛ be akũ ni, lɔkɔa bɛsaɛ.
44005016	Ade bɛkɔa basɔnɛ mɔ bikĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a bitomɛna tɛmatɔ a kĩ tisinya Yerusalem a bɛyamɛna bɛtsa be flee a.
44005017	Ade Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee mɔ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ ye akũ kĩ bito Zadukifɔ katsu kamɛ a yɔɔla anɛ nɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a akũ a. Foesũ bike otse kĩ baakɛna litsedi.
44005018	Nɛ foesũ bipi be bɛnado nɛ kɔla kamɛ.
44005019	Lɛmɛ ke lɛnyɛ a, boe Ɔlate ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi yabinya opunu a, ɛnyɛ be, ade ebi be kĩ,
44005020	“Minaa Yudafɔ Asɔli kɔla a kamɛ lɔkɔa mibi bati fɔlɛtsa a flee nɛ nkpã vɔɛ̃ kĩĩ akũ!”
44005021	Foesũ kĩ kade nyina a bɛnawo nɛ Asɔli kɔla a kamɛ ade biyi fɔtsa katsa kayɔ nɛ awã a. Lɔkɔa na kamɛ, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a, mɔ Yudafɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a tsɛna, ade bido bikĩ badã asɔli kɔla akũ kĩ bɛnaanyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a nɛ kɔla a kamɛ bɛyamɛna.
44005022	Lɛmɛ kĩ bati a naa awã a, bɛtámɔ be, foesũ bimuniki bɛyabi be kĩ,
44005023	“Kĩ bɔnaa a, bɛbalɛ kɔla a kpakplakpa ade bikĩ badã kɔla a akũ lɛmɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ onyukpɛ̃ a pɛpɛɛpɛ a. Lɛmɛ kĩ bubinya kɔla a bati a kamɛ odima lɛláa koe kamɛ.”
44005024	Kĩ asɔli kɔla akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a nu kalɛ kĩĩ a, akũ dzuli be ade bɛkakɔna lɛtsa kĩ lɛya nɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a akũ a.
44005025	Ade odi yabi be kĩ, “Bati a kĩ mipi mido nɛ kɔla kamɛ a, deĩ nɛ asɔli kɔla kamɛ ade bɛlamɛna bati fɔtsa katsa nɛ awã a.”
44005026	Nɛ awã a Asɔli Kɔla ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ye bati yidza bɛnakpã be bɛyamɛna. Nɛ kĩ bivila kĩ bati aanɔ be boe sũ ni, bɛtákpã be nɛ ɔhɛ kamɛ.
44005027	Kĩ bɛkpã fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bɛyamɛna a, bɛfɔ̃ bɛdza nɛ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a anɛ kamɛ. Ade Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a via be kĩ,
44005028	“Bɔtábi mi kĩ mitabuki milɛ kadima nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ a? Lɛmɛ migbamɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ Yerusalem, ade miawɛ kĩ miakɔa ye wuda sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a mite nɛ boe akũ a.”
44005029	Awã na Petro mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛbã a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔabu Baguma, nnɛ́ batidziwa.
44005030	Yesu a kĩ mifɔ̃ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ mikɔ ye a, boe bawanyɔ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa, edzi nkpã.
44005031	Baguma kpa ye kadzikɔ̃nɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ade ɛkɛna ye Ɔkpãnɛ mɔ Ɔtɛnɛ, ayekĩ Israelfɔ aana osi bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛna be titikpa kakɔakate.
44005032	Ade boe mɔ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a, kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma futetsa kĩ ɛkpa bikĩ babu ye a, bɔnyɛ foe akũ adansifɔ a.”
44005033	Kĩ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, fɔfɔ̃ bɛna kalɔkpa paa ade bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
44005034	Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Gamaliel sua be osi. Ɛnyɛ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ nɛ Mose mbla akũ, ade bati a flee akɔa obu baũ kakpa ye a. Eyidza ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ bɛfɔ̃ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bɛkpa be osi sukuloo bɛkɔna fɔlɛtsa a akũ.
44005035	Ade ke liti ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ Israelfɔ, midã kadã wĩ nɛ lɛtsa kĩ miawɛ kĩ miakɛna nɛ bati kĩĩ akũ a!
44005036	Míate anɛ kĩ lɔkɔ lidi kĩ lɛyatɛ̃ a, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Teuda yakɛna ye akũ kĩ oti titiliwu odi odu yanɛ. Bati ndɛ ɔha ɛna tomɔ ye nɛ liti. Ade kĩ bɛkɔ ye a bikĩ bitomɔ ye a flee pansam, ade ye fɔlɛtsa a lɛmɛ wɔ a.
44005037	Ke liti, nɛ bati kakã lɔkɔ a, Yuda, Galileani a yayidza, ɛvɛlɛ bati kɔdabu ebumɔ ye akũ. Kĩ ye malo ɛyaku a bikĩ bitomɔ ye a flee yalɛ, ade ye fɔlɛtsa a lɛmɛ wɔ a.
44005038	Foesũ lɛtsa kĩ mabi mi nyɛ kĩ mifɔnɛ bati kĩĩ awɛ bɛnaa. Ntɛ be fɔtsa katsa a mɔ bati fude fɔanɛ ni, owi lɛláabuna mɔ fɔ́awɔ.
44005039	Lɛmɛ ntɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ futo kɔ̃ ni, bɔláapuli busua foe osi. Ntɛ mitádã kadã wĩ ni, luwi lidi míamɔ kĩ Baguma awɛ akũ buyidza bɔdza.” Katsɛnakɔ̃ bati a tɛ Gamaliel kalɛ a.
44005040	Foesũ bɛvɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bimuniki bɛya ade bibo be a. Bisĩ be mbla kĩ bɛtabuki bɛlɛ kadima nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ dadaada, ade bɛfɔnɛ be awɛ a.
44005041	Kĩ bɛdzakũ banaa a, bɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ pii kitonɛkĩ Baguma bu be ndɛ bati kĩ bɛfɛta bɛkpa lubo kamɔ mɔ kɔnyɔãkado nɛ Yesu dĩ sũ.
44005042	Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a, luwi daa bɛkatsa fɔtsa nɛ Asɔli kɔla kamɛ, mɔ bati tɔtɔ kamɛ, kade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ akũ kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a.
44006001	Ke liti a, kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lidede lamɛna kapɔ kabu a, ɔdzɛ yawo nɛ Yudafɔ a kĩ balɛ Tigriki mɔ Yudafɔ mɔawɛ a kayite. Grikifɔ a tsa kĩ ntɛ bɛsɛ̃ funitsã ni, baákpa be bakunawa.
44006002	Nɛ foesũ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a vɛ batɛ badonɛ a flee bɛkpɔta ade bibi be kĩ, “Fɔtáfɛta kĩ bɔakɔa lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa bɔkɛna funitsã kasɛ̃ lɔkɔ.
44006003	-
44006004	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, midã mi kamɛ minyɛ banyole evũkɔnɔ kĩ binyina kadi, kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa lɛmɛ yi be kamɛ, lɔkɔa bɔkɔa adzuma kĩĩ budo nɛ be awɛ, ayekĩ boe mɔawɛ a bɔ́ana aya bɔkpa mpaɛ kabɔa mɔ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kalɛ.”
44006005	Fɔlɛtsa a de bati a flee kawɔlɛ ade bɛnyɛ Stefano, oti kĩ edeĩ katɛkado, kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa lɛmɛ tɛ ye kamɛ, Filipo, Prokoro, Nikanora, Timona, Parmena mɔ Nikolao, kĩ ɛdani ɛkɛna Yudani. Eto Antiokia.
44006006	Bɛnyɛ bati evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛpau a bɛtsa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ade bɛbɔa mpaɛ nɛ be lɔlɔ, bite awɛ nɛ be akũ a.
44006007	Bati pii tɛ Baguma kalɛ wĩ a. Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nɛ Yerusalem danɛ kapɔ ade Yudafɔ basɔfɔ a pii lɛmɛ dani bɛtɛ Yesu bido a.
44006008	Stefano kĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ mɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ yi ye kamɛ a, kɛna awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa pii nɛ bati a kamɛ.
44006009	Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛnyɛ be nɛ awɔba kamɛ a kĩ bito Kirene mɔ Aleksandria bibumɔ bikĩ bito Kilikia mɔ Asia yidza nɛ Stefano akũ, bɛkavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ ye.
44006010	Lɛmɛ Baguma Hũhũ kpa Stefano nyansã mɔ kadikanyi paa foesũ ntɛ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla ni, be kamɛ odima lápuli katɛ ye atsindze.
44006011	Foesũ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ badi kĩ bɛma fɔvã kĩ, “Bunu kĩ Stefano lɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Mose mɔ Baguma akũ.”
44006012	Ye onukpɛ̃ katsua kĩĩ fɔ̃ bati a, banɔkɔɛ̃ a, mɔ mbla batsanɛ a na kalɔkpa paa, ade Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a yapi Stefano bɛnamɛna Ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
44006013	Bati a kĩ bitsua Stefano onukpɛ̃ a yama fɔvã bɛlɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ alɛ kɔdzɛla katia Asɔli Kɔla Kpalɛwa mɔ Mose mbla a luwi nyɛ luwi.
44006014	Bunu lɛmɛ kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ Yesu Nazaretni a aaveli Asɔli kɔla kĩĩ lɔkɔa ɛdani tɛmaniɛ flee a kĩ Mose yi ɛkpa boe a.”
44006015	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ bati a flee kĩ bɛna nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ke anɛ nɛ Stefano akũ ade bɛmɔ́ kĩ ye anɛ kamɛ dani ndɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ade aye a.
44007001	Ade Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a via Stefano kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɛna kalɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a ni, nuwĩ fɔanɛ?”
44007002	Stefano kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nda amɛ mɔ nwãɛ amɛ, mitse katse wĩ! Fɔmɔ boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham aatu ɛnaadzi nɛ Haram tite akũ a, Baguma Kpalɛwa a nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye nɛ Mesopotamia tite akũ.
44007003	Ade awã ebi ye kĩ, ‘Yidza kafɔnɛ nɔ katete bati mɔ tite a na kanaa tite a kĩ maatsa nɔ a akũ.’
44007004	“Foesũ ɛdzakũ nɛ Kaldea tite akũ ɛnadzi nɛ Haram kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔlɛga ku. Ade ke Baguma kpã ye ɛyamɛna nɛ awã kĩ midzi nviã kĩĩ a.
44007005	Baguma tákpa Abraham tite kanyakɔ̃ sɛnɛta mɔa malo kĩ tɛnya ye tide. Lɛmɛ ɛlɛ eyi kĩ yaakɔa tite a na ɛkpa ye tɛnya ye mɔ ye babi mɔ bawa tide, titɔ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ malo ɛtáma obi odima!
44007006	Lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma bi ye nyɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ bawa aanya banɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ tite bɛbã akũ, bɛnya abawa bɛkɛna be tɛnya futeli ɔha ɛna kpɔũ.’
44007007	Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Maadzɛ mɔ bati a kĩ be baasum a. Ke liti baadzakũ nɛ tite a akũ bɛyaasum yĩ nɛ awĩ kĩĩ.’
44007008	Ade ke Baguma kɛna lɛkpati katsua ndɛ apam aye nɛ Abraham mɔ Ye Baguma kayite a. Nɛ foesũ kĩ Abraham ma Isak a etsua ye lɛkpati kĩ ɛtɛ fuwi ɛlɛ̃ a. Isak lɛmɛ ma Yakob, Yakob lɛmɛ ma babi ewua-nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ bawanyɔ ewua-nviã a.
44007009	“Yakob babi kĩĩ yɔɔlɛ anɛ nɛ be ɔwaɛ̃ Yosef akũ ade bipi ye bɛnɔ bɛkpa bati badi bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna Egipte tite akũ a. Lɛmɛ Baguma dã ye akũ,
44007010	ade ɛnyɛ ye etomɛna ye lubo kamɔ mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ kamɛ a. Baguma kpa ye nyansã mɔ kɔnyakamɔ baũ foesũ Egiptefɔ Lɛgã Farao wɛ ye kalɛ ade ɛkɔa ye ɛkɛna ye tite mɔ lɛgã tɔtɔ a akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a.
44007011	“Lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, kɔlɛ kpale ya nɛ Egipte mɔ Kanan tite flee akũ kĩ fɔyamɛna lubo kamɔ beblebee kĩ boe bawanyɔ tána funitsã.
44007012	Ade kĩ Yakob nu kĩ fugbanɔ na nɛ Egipte a, edo ye babi lɔtɔnyade a bɛnaaya funitsã bɛyamɛna.
44007013	Kĩ Yakob babi buki bɛnaa awã lɛyade kĩ banaaya funitsã a, Yosef nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa bawaɛ̃, ade ɛnyɛ be lɛmɛ ɛtsa Lɛgã Farao a.
44007014	Yosef bi be kĩ ntɛ bɛnaa ni, bɛkpã ɔlɛga Yakob mɔ ye akũ bati flee a kĩ baana ndɛ bati aduesɔũ-elo bɛyamɛna nɛ Egipte.
44007015	Foesũ Yakob mɔ ye babi dzakũ bɛnaa Egipte bɛnadzi nɛ awã kɛnawo kĩ biku.
44007016	Ke liti a, bɛkɔa be banɔkpa bɛyamɛna nɛ Sekem bɛyabila nɛ linikɛ a kĩ Abraham ya mɔ sika etomɛna Hamor babi sɛkɛ̃ a kamɛ.
44007017	“Kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma sui mɔ Abraham wo ɔtɔ kiyua a, Israelfɔ nɛ Egipte a ma bɛsa beblebee.
44007018	Fɔyaya lɛmɛ kĩ lɛgã vɔɛ̃ Farao a kĩ ɛnya Egipte akũ a tányi Yosef kɔlaa.
44007019	Farao kĩĩ tsã tɛdake kamɛ ɛkɛna boe bawanyɔ tɛnya, ɛfɔ̃ bɛnyɛ be babi bakɔkɔa nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ ayekĩ baaku.
44007020	“Ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ bɛma Mose a. Obisɛ̃ kĩĩ kalɛ kadã paa. Nɛ foesũ ye bamanɛ kɔla ye nɛ kɔla kamɛ tidetɔ ɛlalɛ.
44007021	Kĩ bɛnyɛ ye nɛ be akũ a, Farao obitsole namɔ ye ɛbɔɛ, ade ɛdɔɔla ye ndɛ ye mɔawɛ sɛmɛ kamɛ obi a.
44007022	Bɛtsa ye Egiptefɔ kadikanyi mɔ be kadzi kamɛ fɔkɛnatsa a flee, ade ɛyabo anɛ ɛkɛna oti a. Ɛna ovio nɛ kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ fɔkɛnatsa pii kamɛ.
44007023	“Kĩ Mose tɛ futeli tɛna a, kakɔna wo nɛ ye kamɛ kĩ ɛnaasɛla ye bawaɛ̃ Israelfɔ ɛdã.
44007024	Kĩ ewo awã a, ɛmɔ́ kĩ Egipteni odi lamɛna Israelni odi awɔda kakɛna foesũ ɛnabumɔ Israelni a, ade ebo Egipteni a ɛkɔ a.
44007025	Mose kɔna kĩ bawaɛ̃ a aanu foe kayɔ kĩ Baguma lɛwɛ kĩ yatsã ye akũ ɛtɛ be lɛmɛ bɛtánu foe kayɔ lɔmɔ.
44007026	Kĩ kade nyina a, ebuki ɛmɔ́ kĩ Israelfɔ bati nviã lamɛna kavũ. Ɛnaakpɔla lɛma a ade ebi be kĩ, ‘Midã, bawaɛ̃ mɔ bawaɛ̃ mianɛ, nde sũ miakɛna akũ awɔda lɔmɔ?’
44007027	“Lɛmɛ ekĩ ɛwɛ sɔwã a du Mose ɛdzɛla nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ ade evia ye kĩ, ‘Fɔɔdabe tsɛla nɔ? Owei lɛkɛna nɔ boe akũ ɔnyanɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ?
44007028	Mbɔɛ awɛ kĩ akɔ yĩ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔkɔ Egipteni a kadzɔ a?’
44007029	Kĩ Mose nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, libe wo ye paa, foesũ elo ɛnaa Midianfɔ tite akũ, awã kĩ ɛnadzi ndɛ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ aye, ɛma babinyole nviã.
44007030	“Futeli tɛna liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Mose nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu kĩ tɛkatɛ̃ nɛ kɔsa a kĩ kufuã Sinai ɔtɔ a kamɛ.
44007031	Kĩ Mose mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, fɔkɛna ye saa foesũ efuã kĩ yanaadã lɛtsa a kadã wĩ. Ade Baguma vɛ ye ebi ye kĩ,
44007032	‘Yĩ nyɛ nɔ bawanyɔ a Baguma, Abraham mɔ Isak mɔ Yakob Baguma.’ Mose katila bliblibli mɔ libe foesũ ɛtápuli ebuki ɛdã awã kadã wĩ.
44007033	“Ade Baguma bi ye kĩ, ‘Nyɛ nɔ mpabua nɛ abɔa, kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ ɔdzɛ̃ a ni, tite kpalɛwa tanɛ.
44007034	Ɔnɔkɔali mmɔ́ yĩ bati a lubo kamɔ mɔ tɛnya a kĩ bakɛna be nɛ Egipte tite akũ a. Nnu be kɔnyakabe foesũ ĩya kĩ mayaanyɛ be. Finyaakĩĩ ya, lɔkɔa ndo nɔ fɔtɔ nɛ Egipte.’
44007035	“Ade Mose a kĩ bisĩ kĩĩ bivia kĩ, ‘Owei lɛkɔa nɔ ɛdzɛla ndɛ boe akũ ɔnyanɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ?’ Ade ye Mose kĩĩ a Baguma do kĩ ɛnaanya be akũ, lɔkɔa ɛnyɛ be nɛ ɔhau kamɛ fɔtsãmɛna ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye nɛ tuwĩ a kĩ tɛkatɛ̃ a kamɛ a.
44007036	Mose kpã bati a bɛdzakũ nɛ Egipte. Ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii nɛ Egipte mɔ Mpo Ngbã a abuĩ mɔ kɔsa kamɛ nɛ be osi katsã futeli tɛna a flee kamɛ.
44007037	“Ade Mose kĩĩ mɔapɛ a libi Israelfɔ kĩ, ‘Baguma aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ odi ndɛ ayekĩ ɛnyɛ yĩ a etomɛna mimɔa a kamɛ.’
44007038	Mose nyɛ oti kĩ ɛna nɛ boe bawanyɔ a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Israelfɔ na nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a. Ade ye mɔ Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ lɛmɔ kɔdzɛla nɛ Sinai ɔtɔ akũ, ɛtɛ Baguma nkpã kalɛ a ɛma boe a.
44007039	“Lɛmɛ boe bawanyɔ táwɛ kĩ batse Mose, mbom bisĩ ye, ade bɛwɛ kĩ bamuniki bɛnaa Egipte tite akũ a.
44007040	Foesũ bibi ɔwaɛ̃ Aron kĩ, ‘Kɛna baviɔ̃ kĩ baakpã boe, kakpa boe, kitonɛkĩ bunyína lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ Mose a kĩ ɛkpã boe etomɛna Egipte a akũ.’
44007041	Ade ke bɛmɛ baviɔ̃ ndɛ ɔnantsue obi aye, bɛkabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa ye a. Bɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ bɛnya luwi bɛkpa lɛtsa a kĩ be mɔa bɛkɔa awɛ bɛkɛna a.
44007042	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Baguma muniki nɛ be liti, ɛfɔ̃ bɛkasum suwa mɔ odetɔ mɔ fusibii, ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ Ovoli a kamɛ kĩ, ‘Israelfɔ, nnɛ́ yĩ mikɔa bayaɛ mibɔa afɔliɛ mikpa nɛ futeli tɛna a kĩ mina nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a.
44007043	Mbom Molok pata mɔ Romfa fusibii baviɔ̃ a kĩ mikɛna a mikabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa. Foesũ maafɔ̃ bipili mi ndom bɛkpã mi bɛnamɛna mɔ lugo nɛ Babilonia liti flee.’
44007044	“Boe bawanyɔ na patampa kĩ ye kamɛ Baguma kanyɛ akũ katsa be nɛ kɔsa a kamɛ. Bike patampa kĩĩ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa Mose kĩ ɛkɛna pɛpɛɛpɛ a.
44007045	Patampa kĩĩ, kĩ boe bawanyɔ tɛ bitomɛna be balɛga sɛkɛ̃ a na nɛ be awɛ, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Yosua kpã be a, ade bɛtɛ bati a kĩ Baguma blɔmɛna nɛ be lɔtɔ a tite a. Patampa kĩĩ na nɛ be kamɛ kɛyawo Lɛgã Dawid lɔkɔ.
44007046	Dawid fɔkɛnatsa wo Baguma anɛ, ade evia Baguma kĩ ɛkpa ye osi eke kadzikɔ̃ wĩ ɛkpa Yakob Baguma a.
44007047	Lɛmɛ Salomo lɛyake kɔla a ɛkpa Baguma.
44007048	“Lɛmɛ Baguma Kpale ládzi nɛ fɔla kĩ batidziwa ke a kamɛ. Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛ kĩ,
44007049	‘Ode nyɛ yĩ lɛgãkpo, ade tite lɛmɛ nyɛ yĩ abɔa katekɔ̃ a. Kɔla kɔɔdabe odu míapuli mike mikpa yĩ, mbɔɛɛ kadzikɔ̃ mɔ nlá?
44007050	Nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ lɛkɛna fukĩĩ bamɛ flee a?’ ”
44007051	Ade Stefano buki ebi be kĩ, “Bati kĩ mideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ mianɛ! Misĩ kĩ míatse Baguma kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ mi balɛga kɛna a. Daa miayidza kadza nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa akũ.
44007052	Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ ɔɔdabe mɔ mi bawanyɔ tátomɔ ye liti? Bɛkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ Oti a Kĩ Bɛpau kĩ ye akũ kpalɛ a aaya. Oti Kĩ Bɛpau kĩĩ malo, minyɛ ye mikpa bɛkɔ ye.
44007053	Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ mi a kĩ mitɛ Baguma mbla mitomɛna ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ sɛkɛ̃ a, misĩ ye akũ kakɛna.”
44007054	Kĩ binu Stefano fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ nɛ be akũ a, be tɔwɔlɛ hulu, ade bɛkaba adɔ̃ dzadzadza mɔ kalɔkpa a.
44007055	Lɛmɛ Stefano kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa yi ye kamɛ, dzɛla anɛ ɛdã ode koee ade ɛmɔ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a mɔ Yesu kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna a.
44007056	Ade ebi be kĩ, “Midã! Mamɔ kĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ binya ade Otidziwa Obi a dzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna a!”
44007057	Bati a bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba, bisua atɔ ade biwula atsɛ bɛnapi ye a.
44007058	Bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛnɛmɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ade bɛtalɛ ye boe a. Bati a kĩ bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛnɛmɛna a nyɛ be tɛtadiɛ wulaa biyi nɛ opopo odi kĩ bavɛ Saulo sɛkɛ̃.
44007059	Kĩ bɛkatalɛ Stefano boe a, ɛbɔa mpaɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate Yesu, tɛ yĩ hũhũ.”
44007060	Ade ke eke aduli ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tase be tɔkpa kĩĩ akũ kɔtɔ!” Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ade eku a.
44008001	Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkɔ Stefano a, Saulo mɔ́ kawɔlɛ nɛ ye wuda akũ.
44008002	Bikĩ bavila Baguma a kamɛ badi bɔɛ Stefano ɔnɔkpa a bɛnabila, ade bibe ye paa a.
44008003	Ade Saulo kɔa ete nɛ ye akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ yakɔ batɛ badonɛ a. Foesũ ɛkawo nɛ tɔtɔ tidi nyɛ tidi kamɛ kapili batsole mɔ banyole flee kavɛlɛ be kanaado nɛ kɔla kamɛ.
44008004	Lɛmɛ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bilo nɛ Yerusalem a tsã bimini bɛkalɛ kalɛ wĩ a nɛ Yesu akũ.
44008005	Ade Filipo naa Samaria ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ ɛnabi bati a Kalɛ Wĩ nɛ Kristo akũ a.
44008006	Bati pii tse ye fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a nɛ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna bɛmɔ́ a sũ.
44008007	Ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa etomɛna bati pii kamɛ. Hũhũ kpa a kabɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ntɛ banɛ nɛ bati a kamɛ. Ɛtsa bati kĩ biveliveli mɔ bikĩ bɛnɛ lɛkpɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
44008008	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Samaria ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bati mɔ kawɔlɛ paa!
44008009	Kanɔkɔnɛ ɔdãnɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Simon na nɛ Samaria ɔmatɔ a kamɛ Ye kanɔkɔnɛ kadã a kakɛna bati wãwã kĩ fɔfɔ̃ yabu ye akũ kĩ oti mɔ kɔbɛ̃ odi odu yanɛ.
44008010	Samariafɔ batsole mɔ banyole flee abu ye nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, ade balɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ, “Ye nyɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ bavɛ Kɔbɛ̃ Kpalede a.”
44008011	Nɛ ayekĩ ye kanɔkɔnɛ kadã awo be anɛ sũ ni, bati atse ye ɔlɛdo.
44008012	Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ kɔ̃, bɛtɛ Filipo fɔtsa katsa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanya akũ a nɛ Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ bido. Nɛ foesũ batsole mɔ banyole pii tɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ.
44008013	Simon kĩĩ lɛmɛ tɛ edo ade ɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a. Ɛtsã etomɔ Filipo bɛkamini ade Filipo awãwã fɔtsa kpale a kĩ ɛkakɛna a fɔ̃ akũ dzuli ye a!
44008014	Kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ nɛ Yerusalem nu kĩ Samariafɔ tɛ Baguma kalɛ a bido a, bido Petro mɔ Yohanes kĩ bɛnaasɛla be.
44008015	Kĩ biwo awã a, bɛbɔa mpaɛ nɛ batɛ badonɛ vɔɛ̃ a lɔlɔ kĩ bɛtɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.
44008016	Titɔ kĩ bɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ a nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ malo ni, bɛtátɛ tɔ̃ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.
44008017	Foesũ Petro mɔ Yohanes te awɛ nɛ be akũ ade bɛtɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.
44008018	Kĩ Simon mɔ́ kĩ awɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ate nɛ bati akũ fɔmɔ batɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sũ ni, ɛbɔɛ sika ɛkpa,
44008019	ade ebi be kĩ, “Mikpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ odu ayekĩ ntɛ nte awɛ nɛ bati akũ ni, baana Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.”
44008020	Ade Petro bi ye kĩ, “Mimɔ nɔ sika a flee míawɔ, kitonɛkĩ ɔkɔna kĩ aapuli ɔya Baguma futetsa mɔ sika.
44008021	Ɔláapuli ɔkɛna adzuma kĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɛ́waa yededeede nɛ Baguma anɛ.
44008022	Fɔnɛ adzuni kpa a kĩ ewo nɛ nɔ kamɛ a awɛ kabɔa mpaɛ kakpa boe Ɔlate, ɔsa yaakɔa nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kakɔna kpa kĩ ete nɔ,
44008023	kitonɛkĩ mmɔ́ kĩ anɛngbã mɔ titikpa kakɛna nya nɔ kamɛ kamɛ!”
44008024	Ade Simon bi Petro mɔ Yohanes kĩ, “Mike boe Ɔlate aduli mikpa yĩ ayekĩ kadumu fɔlɛtsa kĩ milɛ kĩĩ fudima lɛlaaya nɛ yĩ akũ.”
44008025	Kĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes lɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ wĩ a, bidi adansiɛ lɛmɛ nɛ ke akũ nɛ Samaria biyua a, bimuniki bɛnaa Yerusalem. Bɛnatsã Samaria tukula pii kamɛ bɛkade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ.
44008026	Ade boe Ɔlate ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi yabi Filipo kĩ, “Yidza, kaka nɛ kayɔ, katsã kɔsa kamɛ osi a kĩ eto Yerusalem ɛnaa Gaza akũ a.”
44008027	Ade ke eyidza epi osi a. Kĩ yanaa a, ɛnatsɛlamɛna onyole odi kĩ yaya. Onyole kĩĩ nyɛ Etiopia lɛgãtsole kĩ bavɛ Kandake, sika akũ fɔtsa ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ nabɔa mpaɛ nɛ Yerusalem.
44008028	Emuniki yatsã, ade edzi nɛ ohilili kĩ bapɔnkɔ avɛlɛ kamɛ, ɛkakã Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya ovoli a.
44008029	Ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a bi Filipo kĩ, “Tsã kanaapi ohilili a.”
44008030	Foesũ Filipo wula atsɛ ɛnaa ye sɛkɛ̃ ade enu kĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kakã Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya ovoli a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ a. Ade evia ye kĩ, “Anu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɔlamɛna kakã a kayɔ?”
44008031	Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nde maakɛna nnu foe kayɔ ntɛ odima tányɛ foe kamɛ ɛtsa yĩ?” Eke Filipo aduli kĩ ede ewo nɛ ohilili a kamɛ edzi nɛ ye ɔwɛ̃.
44008032	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ foe ɛkakã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ nyɛ kĩ, “Bɛkpã ye ndɛ kuveli aye banamɛna kakɔkɔ̃. Edzɛ̃ dĩĩ ndɛ kavelibi nɛ ke tɛtsã bakpelinɛ anɛ ade ayea lɛmɛ ɛtábinya onukpɛ̃ a.
44008033	Nɛ ye akũ kadɔla sũ, bɛtádzɛ bɛkpa ye ɔtɛbɛ Owei aalɛ kadi etomɛna ye babi mɔ bawa akũ, Kitonɛkĩ bɛtɛ ye nkpã nɛ ye awɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ.”
44008034	Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a via Filipo kĩ, “Bi yĩ. Owei akũ fɔlɛtsa onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a lamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ, ye mɔa akũ mbɔɛɛ kĩ oti bɛbã?”
44008035	Filipo yi kayɔ etomɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ, ade ɛkɔa fɔbɛbã pii ebu, ebi ye Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Yesu akũ a.
44008036	-
44008037	Kĩ banaa nɛ osi a bɛnawo kakɔ kadi kĩ mui dzɛ̃ nɛ osi ɔwɛ̃. Fɔtsa akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi Filipo kĩ, “Aádã mui badi nɛ awĩ! Litsa sũ nláapuli ntɛ Baguma mui kawɔla amaniɛ a?” Ade Filipo bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔtɛ odo mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ flee kɔ̃ ni, aapuli ɔtɛ”
44008038	Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ ndo kĩ Yesu Kristo nyɛ́ Baguma Obi a.” Ade awã ɛfɔ̃ ohilili a dza a. Biduma bɛnawo nɛ mui a kamɛ ade Filipo wɔla ye mui nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ a.
44008039	Kĩ bɛnɛ nɛ mui a kamɛ a, Boe Ɔlate Hũhũ a bɔɛ Filipo ɛdzakũmɛna, ade ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tabuki ɛmɔ ye a. Ɛtɔasu ye osi ɛnaa mɔ kawɔlɛ.
44008040	Ke liti a, Filipo mɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ ɛyanɛ ɛta nɛ Asoto ɔmatɔ kamɛ. Ɛtsã emini eto awã ɛkalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ tɛmatɔ a kĩ tideĩ nɛ osi akũ a flee kɛnawo Kaisarea ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
44009001	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, Saulo kɔa kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ etomɔ batɛ badonɛ a liti kĩ yawɔla be. Ɛnaa Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a sɛkɛ̃.
44009002	ɛnavia kĩ bɛkpa ye otumi tuvoli, lɔkɔa ɛnaa Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ nɛ Damasko, ɛnaapili bikĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate osi vɔɛ̃ a akũ, batsole mɔ banyole flee, esuli be ɛyamɛna nɛ Yerusalem.
44009003	Lɔkɔ a kĩ Saulo fuã Damasko ɔmatɔ a eyua mɔ kakɔna kĩĩ a ni, deedimɔapɛ ɔhaĩ odi mɔanɛ eto ode etsua esinya ye.
44009004	Ɛka ɛtɔ ade enu ɔlɛdo odi kĩ, “Saulo, Saulo litsa sũ otomɔ yĩ liti?”
44009005	Ade Saulo via kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ owei anɛ?” Ɔlɛdo kĩĩ kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ Yesu a kĩ ye liti otomɛna a.
44009006	Yidza finyaakĩĩ kanaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, lɔkɔa baabi nɔ lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ akɛna.”
44009007	Banyole a kĩ bɛmɔ Saulo bɛtsɛ̃ a fɔ̃ bɛdza lɛmɛ baámɔ lɛtsa a kĩ de balɛ. Binu ɔlɛdo a lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ oti odima.
44009008	Ade kĩ Saulo yidza nɛ tite ebinya banebi a, ebuki yaámɔ fɔkɔ. Foesũ bipi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna Damasko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
44009009	Edzi fuwi ɛlalɛ kĩ yaámɔ fɔkɔ, yaánya, yaámɔa lɛmɛ.
44009010	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ɔtɛ odonɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Anania na nɛ Damasko. Boe Ɔlate nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye ɛvɛ ye kĩ, “Anania!” Anania tunɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, amɔ yĩ nɛ awĩ!”
44009011	Ade boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Yidza katsã ɔblɔnu a kĩ bavɛ Ɔblɔnu Kpĩĩ a akũ, lɔkɔa ntɛ owo Yuda tɔtɔ kamɛ ni, via Saulo kĩ eto Tarso a akũ.
44009012	Edeĩ nɛ awã ɛlamɛna mpaɛ kabɔa, kitonɛkĩ ĩnyɛ ntsa ye ɛmɔ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ kĩ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Anania aayate awɛ nɛ ye akũ ebuki ɛmɔ fɔkɔ.”
44009013	Ade ke Anania kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nnu fɔlɛtsa pii ntomɛna oti kĩĩ akũ nɛ ayekĩ ɛkɛna nɔ bati awɔda nɛ Yerusalem a!
44009014	Ade bunu kĩ ɛtɛ otumi tuvoli etomɛna Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ epili nɔ batɛ badonɛ flee nɛ Damasko a.”
44009015	Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Naa nɔ kɔ̃ kanaakɛna ayekĩ mbi nɔ a, kitonɛkĩ mpau ye kĩ ɛyaanya yĩ ɔsumunɛ ɛlɛ kalɛ wĩ a ɛtsa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ, fɔgã, mɔ Israelfɔ flee.
44009016	Ade yĩ mɔawɛ a maanyɛ lubo a kĩ yaamɔ nɛ yĩ sũ a ntsa ye a.”
44009017	Foesũ Anania pi osi ɛnawo nɛ tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ Saulo na, ade ete awɛ nɛ ye akũ ebi ye kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ Saulo, Boe Ɔlate Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa nɔ nɛ osi a lido yĩ nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ buki kamɔ fɔkɔ, lɔkɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛtɛ nɔ kamɛ.”
44009018	Deedimɔapɛ fɔkɛna Saulo ndɛ tupo lɛtsɛ nɛ ye anɛ tɛnɛ tɛtɔ, ade edo fɔkɔ kamɔ awɛ a. Eyidza ɛkpa osi bɛkɛna ye mui kawɔla amaniɛ.
44009019	Ade kĩ ɛnya eyua a, akũ de ye ɔsĩ.
44009020	Nɛ fuwi a kamɛ a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade ɛnalɛ kɔdzɛla ɛtsa kĩ Yesu nyɛ Baguma Obi a.
44009021	Fɔkɛna bati flee a kĩ binu ye fɔtsa katsa a saa, ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ oti kĩĩ tsɛ̃ yakɔ bikĩ bɛtɛ Yesu bido a nɛ Yerusalem a mbɔɛɛ? Nnɛ́ ye lɛmɛ lɛya nɛ awĩ mɔ botaɛ kĩ yayaapili batɛ badonɛ a ɛma basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mbɔɛɛ?”
44009022	Lɛmɛ Saulo fɔtsa katsa na kɔbɛ̃ ade ye fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kanyɛ kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a táfɔ̃ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛna nɛ Damasko a lɛtɛmɔ ye atsindze a.
44009023	Fuwi fudi liti ni, Yudafɔ a natsɛna ade bipi adzuni kĩ bakɔ ye a.
44009024	Lɛmɛ bati bɔɛ bɛyabi Saulo. Lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee bɛkadzɔlɛ ɔmatɔ a seebi a kĩ bike bisinya a tunyukpɛ̃ ayekĩ baana ye bɛkɔ.
44009025	Lɛmɛ lɛnyɛ mɔa kayite a, bikĩ bitomɔ Saulo a bɔɛ ye bido nɛ ɔtsɛtsɛ kamɛ bɛtsãmɛna seebi ɔkɛ kamɛ bɛkamɛna ye bɛdzɛla nɛ tite!
44009026	Kĩ Saulo naa Yerusalem a, ɛwɛ kĩ yanaawo nɛ batɛ badonɛ a kamɛ nɛ awã. Lɛmɛ be flee bivila ye kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ bido kĩ ɔtɛ odonɛ yanɛ.
44009027	Ade Barnaba bumɔ ye ɛkpã ye ɛnamɛna fɔtɔ banyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃ a. Ebi be ayekĩ Saulo mɔ́ boe Ɔlate a nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ yanaa Damasko, mɔ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate lɛmɔ ye kɔdzɛla lɛmɛ a. Ebi be lɛmɛ ayekĩ Saulo lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ nɛ Damasko.
44009028	Ade bɛtɛ ye ɛna nɛ be kamɛ a. Kito ke a, ɛna nɛ be kamɛ, emini nɛ Yerusalem flee ɛkalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃.
44009029	Ade Yudafɔ badi kĩ balɛ Griki, kavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ Saulo a, lɛmɛ bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ ye.
44009030	Kĩ batɛ badonɛ a badi nu fukĩĩ a bɛkpã Saulo bɛnamɛna Kaisarea ade bɛnyɛ ye osi ɛnaa ye ɔtɔ Tarso a.
44009031	Fɔyaya kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛna nɛ Yudea, Galilea mɔ Samaria na nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ. Nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ akũ sũ ni, bɛna ɔwɔlɛ kado. Bɛpɔ bibu ade bɛkɔa obu bɛkpa boe Ɔlate a.
44009032	Petro mini ɛnaa fɔkɔ pii. Nɛ foe kamɛ a, ɛnasɛla batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Lida kamɛ.
44009033	Awã na ɛmɔ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Ainea. Ade futeli ɛlɛ̃ flee kĩ eveliveli kĩ yaápuli eyidza nɛ ɔkɛna akũ a.
44009034	Kĩ Petro mɔ ye a, ebi ye kĩ, “Ainea! Yesu Kristo tsa nɔ fɔsɔ! Yidza kadza kabuta nɔ ɔkɛna.” Deedimɔapɛ Ainea yidza ɛdza, nɛ akũ ɔsĩ kamɛ.
44009035	Bati a flee kĩ bidzi nɛ Lida mɔ Saron a, mɔ́ Ainea foesũ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa boe Ɔlate.
44009036	Ke liti a, otsole odi kĩ bavɛ Tabita na nɛ Yopa. Nɛ Griki tide kamɛ ni, bavɛ ye Dorkas kĩ de kayɔ nyɛ kayisie. Ɛnyɛ ɔtɛ odonɛ kĩ yakɛna tuwĩ daa, kabumɛna ahiãfɔ lɛmɛ.
44009037	Fɔsɔ yabɔa ye ade eku a. Foesũ ye bati wɔla ye mui bihihiɛ ye bɛwɔla nɛ kɔla kamɛ nɛ abansulu ode.
44009038	Yopa mɔ Lida kayite távɛlɛ, foesũ kĩ batɛ badonɛ a nu kĩ Petro na nɛ Lida a, bido bati nviã mɔ ɔlɛdo nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ kĩ, “Wɛ sɔwa kaya nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃.”
44009039	Ade ke Petro yidza ɛmanɛ akũ etomɔ be a. Kĩ ewo awã a bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna kɔla kĩ koe kamɛ bɛwɔla Dorkas a. Bakunawa batsole dza bisinya Petro nɛ awã bɛkabe ade bɛtsa ye tɛtadie flee a kĩ Dorkas kapamu nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ edzi nkpã a.
44009040	Ade Petro nyɛ be flee nɛ kɔla a kamɛ, eke aduli ɛbɔa mpaɛ a. Ɛdani ɛtsɛlamɔ ɔnɔkpa a ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Tabita! Yidza!” Awã na ebinya anɛ ade kĩ ɛmɔ Petro a, eyidza edzi.
44009041	Ade Petro pi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ ɛdzɛla ye a. Foesũ Petro vɛ batɛ badonɛ mɔ bakunawa a, ade ɛkɔa ye nkpã ode edo nɛ be awɛ a.
44009042	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ Yopa flee ade bati pii tɛ boe Ɔlate bido a.
44009043	Ke liti a, Petro dzi nɛ Yopa fuwi pii ade ɛna nɛ Simon adi kĩ yakɔa bayaɛ tuvoli kapamu fɔtsa a sɛkɛ̃ a.
44010001	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Kornelio na nɛ Kaisarea ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Ɛnyɛ Romafɔ kawũ ɔnɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃.
44010002	Ɛnyɛ oti wĩ, ade ye mɔ ye kɔla flee basum Baguma a. Oti kĩĩ abumɔ Yudafɔ ahiãfɔ kĩ futo ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ade yabɔa mpaɛ luwi daa lɛmɛ a.
44010003	Luwi a, kĩ kanaa olobe tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, ɛna hũhũ kamɛ kanyɛkatsa, ɛmɔ́ yededeede kĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi yabi ye kĩ, “Kornelio!”
44010004	Kornelio dã ye koee mɔ libe ade evia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, litsa fɔanɛ?” Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Nɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna mɔ mpaɛbɔ a wo Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
44010005	Do bati bɛnaa Yopa bɛnaakpã onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon Petro bɛyamɛna.
44010006	Edeĩ nɛ Simon kĩ yakɛna bayaɛ tuvoli akũ adzuma nɛ mpo abuĩ a sɛkɛ̃.”
44010007	Kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a dzakũ a, Kornelio vɛ ye kɔla basumunɛ nviã mɔ kawũ ɔnɔnɛ mɔa kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ kĩ yadzɔlɛ ye akũ lɛmɛ.
44010008	Ebi be lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, ade edo be kĩ bɛnaa Yopa a.
44010009	Kĩ kade nyina a kĩ bɛkɔa bafuã Yopa a, Petro de ɛnaa lɛtsã ode nɛ awã kĩ ese a, ɛnaabɔa mpaɛ mɔ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã lɔkɔ a.
44010010	Kɔlɛ kakɔ ye ade ɛwɛ litsedi kĩ yanya a. Lɛmɛ kĩ bɛkatɔ funitsã a, ɛna kanyɛkatsa.
44010011	Awã na ɛmɔ́ kĩ odetɔ́ binya, ade ɛmɔ́ kĩ bɛkayɔna litsedi ndɛ lima kpale kĩ bipini de nɛ atɔ ɛna a.
44010012	Bayaɛ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ, bɔɛ mɔ kɔvɔlabi lɛmɛ na nɛ lima a kamɛ.
44010013	Ade ɔlɛdo odi bi ye kĩ “Petro Yidza, kɔ, kaba!”
44010014	Lɛmɛ Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo! Kusɛ! Boe Ɔlate yĩ onukpɛ̃ táta ɔyaɛ sɛkɛna kĩ boe Yudafɔ bɔakesĩ a da!”
44010015	Ɔlɛdo a buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kpalɛ de akũ ni, tabu kĩ efĩĩ deĩ nɛ de akũ!”
44010016	Ɛna kanyɛkatsa kĩĩ titi ɛlalɛ, ade bɛvɛlɛ fɔtsa a bɛnamɛna ode a.
44010017	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kakɛna Petro basa basa, ade evia ye akũ kĩ, “Litsa fukĩĩ atsa?” Ade ke kamɛ a mɔ bati a kĩ Kornelio do fɔtɔ a yawo ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a. Kĩ bɛmɔ́ tɔtɔ a kĩ bawɛ a, bɛnadza nɛ te onyukpɛ̃,
44010018	ade bɛkavia katse awã kĩ Simon Petro dzi a.
44010019	Petro buki edzimɔ lɔlɔ kamɛ kakɔna nɛ kanyɛkatsa a kayɔ kanu akũ, ade Baguma Hũhũ a bi ye kĩ, “Bati ɛlalɛ ya bɛlamɛna nɔ kawɛ.
44010020	Yidza katsɛlamɔ be. Tavila be katomɛna kanaa kitonɛkĩ yĩ lido be.”
44010021	Ade Petro duma ɛka ɛnabi be kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ milamɛna kawɛ a. Litsa sũ mitsɛ̃?”
44010022	Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kornelio kĩ ɛnyɛ Romafɔ kawũ ɔnɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ lido boe fɔtɔ. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ edzi kpĩĩ, yasum Baguma, ade Yudafɔ flee akpa ye obu a. Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi bi ye kĩ edo batɔ nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa etse nɔ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa.”
44010023	Foesũ Petro kpa be kasɛkɔ̃ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ɛtɛ be ndɛ ye banɔvɔɛ̃ aye a. Kĩ kade nyina a, ye mɔ batɛ badonɛ badi kĩ bito Yopa mɔ batɔ a bipi osi.
44010024	Luwi lɛyade a, bɛnawo Kaisarea, awã kĩ Kornelio kpɔta ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati mɔ bakɔba badi bidzi bɛkadzɔlɛ Petro kaya a.
44010025	Kĩ Petro aawo nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ a, Kornelio natsɛlamɔ ye, eke aduli nɛ ye abɔa kayɔ ade ɛkɛna lɔlɔ a.
44010026	Lɛmɛ Petro dzɛla ye ebi ye kĩ, “Yidza kadza! Yĩ malo otidziwa manɛ.”
44010027	Kĩ bɛkalɔmɛna a, Kornelio kpã ye ewomɛna nɛ awã kĩ bati nkaɛ a kpɔta bidzi badzɔlɛ be a.
44010028	Ade Petro bi be kĩ, “Minyina yededeede kĩ boe Yudafɔ mbla tákpa yĩ osi kĩ nnaa odi bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sɛkɛ̃ ĩye nkɔa akũ mbɔamɔ be. Lɛmɛ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ kĩ ntabu odima kĩ ye akũ tákpalɛ.
44010029	Nɛ foesũ kĩ batɔ a yavɛ yĩ a, ntásĩ. Litsa sũ odo bati kĩ bɛyaavɛ yĩ?”
44010030	Ade Kornelio bi ye kĩ, “Nviã fuwi ɛlalɛ, fɔ́ana ndɛ tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ, nkabɔa mpaɛ nɛ yĩ awã. Deedimɔapɛ onyole odi kĩ edeĩ nɛ tɛtadiɛ ovoe kĩ tata muamua kamɛ nɛ ɛta nɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ,
44010031	-
44010032	ade ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Kornelio, Baguma nu nɔ mpaɛbɔ, eyi nɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna lɛmɛ ɔsũ. Do bati bɛnaa Yopa bɛnaakpã odi kĩ bavɛ Simon Petro. Ɛyase nɛ Simon kĩ yakɔa bayaɛ tuvoli kapamu fɔtsa nɛ mpo abuĩ a sɛkɛ̃.’
44010033	Ade foesũ ndo batɔ nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ lɛtalɛta a, ade odi foe akũ ɔya mɔatsɛ lɛmɛ a. Foesũ boe flee budzi nɛ awĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ kamɛ kĩ yaaabi boe lɛtsa a kĩ ebi nɔ kĩ bi boe a.”
44010034	Ade Petro bi ye kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ mmɔ́ ĩyi ɔsũ kĩ Baguma ládã bati anɛ.
44010035	Mbom oti kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ɛkpa Baguma, yakɛna nɛ ye kawɛ akũ lɛmɛ ni, ade ye Baguma awɛ a.
44010036	Matɛ kado kĩ minu kalɛ a kĩ ɛma Israelfɔ kĩ fɔnyɛ lukudɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ Yesu Kristo akũ a. Ade ye lɛmɛ nyɛ katinya kamɛ bati flee Ɔlate a.
44010037	Ade minyina kalɛ kpale a kĩ fɔya nɛ Israelfɔ tite akũ, kĩ kiyi kayɔ nɛ Galilea, kito lɔkɔ a kĩ Yohanes de lɛtsã nɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ akũ a.
44010038	Minu lɛmɛ ayekĩ Baguma kɔa ye Hũhũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ eko nɛ Yesu kĩ eto Nazaret a akũ. Ɛtsã emini nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ ɛkakɛna tuwĩ, ade ɛtsa bikĩ hũhũ kpa kaha be a, kitonɛkĩ Baguma tomɔ ye.
44010039	“Boe bɔnyɛ adansifɔ bɔkpa fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ Israelfɔ tite akũ mɔ Yerusalem a. Ade ke bɛkɔ ye nɛ ye kabɔa kamɛna nɛ asendua akũ a.
44010040	Lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye eto kanɔkpa nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ, ade ɛfɔ̃ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa bati a.
44010041	Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ bati flee lɔmɔ ye, mbom boe a kĩ Baguma pau ndɛ adansifɔ a lɛmɔ́ ye. Budo awɛ bɔnya, bɔmɔa mɔ ye kĩ eyidza eto kanɔkpa liti a.
44010042	Ade boe edo kĩ bɔnaalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, budi adansiɛ lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma kɛna Yesu batidziwa mɔ banɔkpa flee fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ.
44010043	Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee lɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaatɛ ye edo ni, Baguma aakɔa ye tɔkpa ete ye nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ.”
44010044	Ade kĩ Petro kalɛ kɔdzɛla a, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ka eko nɛ bati a flee kĩ bidzi batsɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a akũ.
44010045	Fɔkɛna Yudafɔ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bitomɛna Petro nɛ Yopa bɛyaa a saa, nɛ ayekĩ Baguma Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ka eko nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ lɛmɛ a akũ.
44010046	Kitonɛkĩ binu kĩ bɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ade bɛkamu Baguma Kpale a. Ade ke Petro lɛ kĩ,
44010047	“Ayekĩ bati kĩĩ tɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔtɛ a sũ ni, bɔ́apuli busĩ kĩ bɔákɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ?”
44010048	Foesũ ɛkpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ. Ke liti a, bɛwã ye kĩ edzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ fɔtɛ fuwi fudi.
44011001	Owi tábuna mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã nɛ Yudea nu kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ tɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a.
44011002	Lɛmɛ kĩ Petro muniki ɛya nɛ Yerusalem a, Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã a tátunɔ mɔ ye, ade bibi ye kĩ,
44011003	“Ɔnakɔa nɔ akũ ɔtsɛkamɔ banɔvɔɛ̃ kĩ bitómɛna Yudafɔ fɔtsa katsa a, ade odo awɛ ɔnyamɔ be malo a!”
44011004	Ade ke Petro nyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa be kĩ,
44011005	“Lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ Yopa nkabɔa mpaɛ a, nna kanyɛkatsa. Nɛ foe kamɛ a, mmɔ́ kĩ bɛkakɛna lima dzɛlɛwa baũ lidi kĩ bipini de nɛ atɔ ɛna, ade lɛka lɛyakpula nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃ a.
44011006	Bayaɛ kumɛkumɛ na nɛ lima kpale kĩĩ kamɛ, bayaɛ kĩ bideĩ abɔa ɛna, bikĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ sɛmɛ akũ, mɔ kɔvɔlabi kĩ bɔába malo.
44011007	Ade nnu ɔlɛdo odi ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Petro! Yidza kakɔ kaba!’
44011008	“Lɛmɛ nkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Oowo! Kusɛ! Boe Ɔlate, yĩ onukpɛ̃ táta ɔyaɛ kĩ boe Yudafɔ bɔakesĩ a da.’
44011009	“Ɔlɛdo a buki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kpalɛ de akũ ni, tabu kĩ efĩĩ deĩ nɛ de akũ.’
44011010	Fɔtsa kĩĩ kɛna lɔmɔ titi ɛlalɛ flee. Ke liti a, bɛvɛlɛ lima kpale kĩĩ mɔ bayaɛ a flee bɛnamɛna ode.
44011011	“Ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ mɔ́ batɔ ɛlalɛ a kĩ bito Kaisarea bɛyaakpã yĩ a wo tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ nse a.
44011012	Baguma Hũhũ a bi yĩ kĩ ntasĩ, mbom ntomɔ be bɔnaa. Batɛ badonɛ evũ a kĩ bito Yopa a, tomɔ yĩ bɔnawo oti a kĩ ye lido batɔ a tɔtɔ kamɛ.
44011013	Ye malo ebi boe ayekĩ Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye, ebi ye kĩ, ‘Naawɛ odi kado ye nɛ Yopa ɛnaavɛ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon Petro.
44011014	Yaabi nɔ ayekĩ mimɔ nɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee míana katɛ.’
44011015	“Ke liti a, ĩyi kayɔ mɔ be Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kabi. Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ka eko nɛ be akũ ndɛ ayekĩ eko nɛ boe flee akũ nɛ kayɔkayi a.
44011016	Ade ke nte anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate lɛ eyi kĩ, ‘Nuwĩnuwĩ, Yohanes kɔa mui ɛwɔla bati mui, lɛmɛ Baguma aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛwɔla mi mui.’
44011017	Ade kĩ Baguma lɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a futetsa kĩĩ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛkpa boe kĩ bɔtɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo budo sũ ni, yĩ nyɛ owei kĩ masua Baguma osi!”
44011018	Kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a bɛfɔ̃ atsindze katɛ ade bimu Baguma bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali, Baguma binya osi ɛkpa bati bɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a!”
44011019	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ kĩ fukĩĩ bamɛ lamɛna kaya a, batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bilo tɛnya kakɛna nɛ Stefano wuda sũ a, lo bɛnaa Foenike, Kipro mɔ Antiokia tɛmatɔ a kamɛ. Bimini bɛlɛ Baguma kalɛ a bɛkpa Yudafɔ odi.
44011020	Lɛmɛ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã a kĩ bito Kipro mɔ Kirene naa Antiokia bɛnabi Grikifɔ Baguma kalɛ a nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu akũ.
44011021	Nɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate kɔbɛ̃ na nɛ be kamɛ sũ bati pii tɛ bido.
44011022	Kĩ batɛ badonɛ nɛ Yerusalem nu lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ Antiokia a, bido Barnaba kĩ ɛnaa awã.
44011023	Kĩ ewo awã a, ɛmɔ́ ayekĩ Baguma bumɔ be a, kawɔlɛ de ye paa, ade ɛkpa be kɔdɛ kĩ bɛkɔa be tɔwɔlɛ flee bite nɛ boe Ɔlate akũ a.
44011024	Barnaba nyɛ oti wĩ, edeĩ katɛkado ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ tɛ ye kamɛ. Futo ye akũ sũ ni, bati pii tɛ boe Ɔlate bido.
44011025	Ke liti a, Barnaba naa Tarso kĩ yanaawɛ Saulo nɛ awã a.
44011026	Kĩ ɛmɔ ye a, ɛkpã ye bɛnaa Antiokia. Bɛna nɛ awã kateli mɔa flee, bɛkatsɛna bati pii katsa be fɔtsa. Ade Antiokia mɔ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛvɛ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ Kristofɔ a.
44011027	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ badi to Yerusalem bɛya nɛ Antiokia a.
44011028	Ade Agabo kĩ ɛnyɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa yidza ɛdza nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃, ade nɛ Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ onukpɛ̃ ni, ɛlɛ eyi kĩ kɔlɛ kpale aanɛ nɛ katinya flee kamɛ. Fukĩĩ yaya nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Klaudio nya Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ a.
44011029	Nɛ foesũ batɛ badonɛ a yake otse kĩ baate fɔtsa fudi bɛkɔa bɛmɛna be bawaɛ̃ nɛ Yudea. Be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi te ayekĩ yaapuli.
44011030	Kĩ bɛkpɔta fɔtsa kĩĩ a, bɛkɔa foe bɛkpa Barnaba mɔ Saulo kĩ bɛkɔa bɛma batɛ badonɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a nɛ Yudea.
44012001	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, Lɛgã Herodes pi batɛ badonɛ a badi kĩ bɛkɔ be.
44012002	Ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ Yakobo kĩ ɛnyɛ Yohanes ɔwaɛ̃ a mɔ lɛpamɛ.
44012003	Kĩ ɛmɔ kĩ kawɔlɛ de Yudafɔ a sũ ni, ɛfɔ̃ bipi Petro lɛmɛ. Ɛkɛna foe nɛ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Fuwi Kanya a kamɛ.
44012004	Bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ, awã kĩ sodzafɔ ɛna ɛna na nɛ kutsu ɛna kamɛ kavɛmɛna akũ kadzɔlɛ ye akũ. Herodes nhihiɛ nyɛ kĩ yaakɔa ye ɛkpa kanade a bɛdzɛmɔ ye ntɛ bɛnya Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi a biyua.
44012005	Foesũ sodzafɔ a kadzɔlɛ ye akũ kadzɔlɛ wĩ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Lɛmɛ batɛ badonɛ a kabɔa mpaɛ nɛ ye lɔlɔ kakpa Baguma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
44012006	Lɛnyɛ a kĩ ke kade kanyina kamɛ Herodes aakɔa Petro ɛkpa bati a, Petro waa tida nɛ sodzafɔ nviã kayite. Bido ye nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ nviã ade sodzafɔ bɛbã dzɛ̃ nɛ opunu liti badzɔlɛ kɔla akũ a.
44012007	Deedimɔapɛ ɔhaĩ odi mɔanɛ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Ade ke ode Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nɛ ɛdza nɛ Petro ɔwɛ̃ a. Ɛbɔa Petro nɛ lɔbɔtɛɛ enyina ye, ade ebi ye kĩ, “Yidza mɔatsɛ!” Lɛtalɛta nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ a nɛ́ nɛ ye akpɔ ɛtɔ nɛ tite.
44012008	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Bɔɛ nɔ tɛtadiɛ, kado nɔ mpabua lɛmɛ.” Petro kɛna foe lɔmɔ, ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔɛ nɔ atadiɛ kpale katsa akũ katomɔ yĩ.”
44012009	Foesũ Petro tomɔ ye bɛnɛ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Ɛtányi ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kakɛna a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, mbom ɛkɔna kĩ kɔda kamɛ fɔanɛ.
44012010	Bɛtɛ̃ kawũ banɔnɛ katsu katɔnyade mɔ kayade a kĩ badzɔlɛ tunyukpɛ̃ akũ a. Kĩ biwo fɔbɔtsaɛ onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ babinya kawo nɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, onyukpɛ̃ a mɔawɛ binya nɛ ye akũ akũ ade bɛtɛ̃ a. Kĩ bɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ ye.
44012011	Kĩ anɛ kamɛ kpalɛ Petro a, ɛyanyi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ ye akũ, ade ebi ye akũ kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ, mmɔ́ kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ. Boe Ɔlate do ye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩ ɛyaanyɛ yĩ etomɛna Herodes awɛ kamɛ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ Yudafɔ hihiɛ kĩ baakɛna yĩ a kamɛ!”
44012012	Kĩ ɛmɔ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ ye akũ a, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Yohanes Marko ɔma awã. Bati pii tsɛna nɛ awã bɛkabɔa mpaɛ.
44012013	Ade kĩ Petro dza ɛkabɔa kanya opunu a, katsolebi abawa kĩ bavɛ Roda yabinya kɔla a.
44012014	Kĩ eyi Petro odo ɔsũ a, kawɔlɛ de ye paa, foesũ ɛtábinya opunu a, mbom ewula atsɛ ɛnakpa bati a kanyi kĩ Petro dzɛ̃ nɛ opunu liti.
44012015	Bati a tátɛ bido foesũ bibi ye kĩ, “Kamɔ aamɔ mbɔɛɛ?” Lɛmɛ kĩ ɛdzɛmɛna kalɛ kĩ nuwĩ fɔanɛ sũ ni, bibi be akũ kĩ, “Ɔsa fɔ́anya ye Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ.”
44012016	Lɔkɔa na flee Petro dzɛmɔ opunu a kabɔa. Kĩ bibinya opunu bɛmɔ́ ye a, akũ dzuli be.
44012017	Ete be awɛ kĩ bɛkɛna dĩĩ, ade ebi be ayekĩ boe Ɔlate nyɛ ye etomɛna kɔla a kamɛ a. Ebi be kĩ, “Mibi Yakobo mɔ batɛ badonɛ nkaɛ a lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a.” Ke liti a, ɛdzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa kakɔ bɛbã.
44012018	Kĩ kade nyina, kukũtila mɔ ɔtutũ kpale wo nɛ sodzafɔ a kamɛ nɛ kawakɔ̃ a, ade bɛkavia be akũ kĩ, “Ndia koũ Petro tsã?”
44012019	Kĩ Herodes wɛ Petro kayɛla evia a, ɛfɔ̃ bipi sodzafɔ a bivia be onukpɛ̃ kamɛ tuwuli. Ɛkɔ be kɔtɔ ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ be. Ke liti a, Herodes dzakũ nɛ Yudea ɛnaa Kaisarea, ɛnadzi nɛ awã fuwi fudi.
44012020	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ Herodes na kalɔkpa nɛ Tirofɔ mɔ Sidomfɔ akũ. Foesũ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃. Bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛnamɔ Blasto, kĩ ɛnyɛ Herodes tɔtɔ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ, kĩ eke Herodes aduli ɛkpa be. Bɛwɛ kĩ tɛmatɔ nviã a tɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Herodes, kitonɛkĩ ye tite akũ bana funitsã katomɛna.
44012021	Nɛ luwi a kĩ Herodes yi ɛkpa be akũ a, edo ye fɔgãtsa edzi nɛ ye lɛgãkpo akũ, ade ɛkabi ɔmaĩ a fɔlɛtsa a.
44012022	Nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kawũna kamɛ a, bati a mu ye mɔ fɔwɔla bɛlɛ kĩ, “Fukĩĩ kɔ̃ nnɛ́ otidziwa lamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ. Baguma Kpale lamɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ!”
44012023	Deedimɔapɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ yabɔa Herodes emuni, kitonɛkĩ ɛtákpa Baguma obu. Ewo batsɛ bɛba ye kamɛ kamɛ, ade ke eku a.
44012024	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ Baguma kalɛ a gba nɛ fɔkɔ pii, ade batɛ badonɛ a lɛmɛ pɔ bibu a.
44012025	Kĩ Barnaba mɔ Saulo yua be adzuma a kĩ bido be a, bɛdzakũ nɛ Yerusalem ade bɛkpã Yohanes Marko bibumɔ be akũ a.
44013001	Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ mɔ fɔtsa batsanɛ badi na nɛ batɛ badonɛ a kamɛ nɛ Antiokia. Ade be nyɛ Barnaba mɔ Simeon kĩ bavɛ Oti Ɔɔwa, Lukio kĩ eto Kirene tite akũ, Manahen kĩ bɛmɔ Lɛgã Herodes bɛdɔɔla nɛ be tibisɛ̃ kamɛ, mɔ Saulo.
44013002	Kĩ bɛna nɛ awã bɛkamu boe Ɔlate, bɛkasui onukpɛ̃ lɛmɛ a, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa bi be kĩ, “Minyɛ Barnaba mɔ Saulo miyi lite lɔkɔa bɛnaakɛna adzuma a kĩ foesũ nvɛ be a.”
44013003	Nɛ foesũ bisui onukpɛ̃ bɛbɔa mpaɛ, bite awɛ nɛ be akũ ade bɛnyɛ be osi a.
44013004	Kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa lido be sũ ni, bɛnaa ɔmatɔ a kĩ bavɛ Seleukia kamɛ. Awã na bidzi ɔkɔlɔ binyina bɛnaa Kipro tite kĩ mui tsua bisinya te a akũ.
44013005	Kĩ biwo Salami ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, bɛnalɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃. Yohanes Marko lɛmɛ tomɔ be ndɛ be obumɛnanɛ aye.
44013006	Kĩ bɛtsã mpo akũ bɛnawo Pafo ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, bɛtsɛlamɔ Yudani odi kĩ yaveli tɔɔta. Bavɛ ye kĩ Yesuobi, ade ɛbɔɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛnyɛ onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a.
44013007	Ɔwanɛ kĩĩ mɔ tite a akũ ɔdãnɛ kĩ bavɛ Sergio Paulo nyɛ bakɔba. Abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ tsua linebi. Ɛvɛ Barnaba mɔ Saulo bɛnaa ye awã kitonɛkĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yatse Baguma fɔlɛtsa a.
44013008	Lɛmɛ kĩ bɛnaa awã a, ɔwanɛ a kĩ babuki kavɛ Elima nɛ Griki tide kamɛ a, tɛ atsindze mɔ be. Ɛwɛ kĩ yadani ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a adzuni nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Saulo mɔ Barnaba lɛ a akũ.
44013009	-
44013010	Lɛmɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ tɛ Saulo kĩ babuki kavɛ Paulo kamɛ ade eke anɛ nɛ ɔwanɛ a akũ fɛɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ Abonsam obi! Ɔnyɛ okesĩnɛ ɔkpa tuwĩ tidi nyɛ tidi kakɛna. Tɛdake mɔ tɔkpa yi nɔ kamɛ flee. Luwi daa abɔa mbɔdi kĩ adani boe Ɔlate ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a liti mɔ lɔtɔ!
44013011	Dã, boe Ɔlate aavɛlɛ nɔ sɔtɔ finyaakĩĩ. Yaafɔ̃ oku anɛ, ade ɔláabuki ɔmɔ́ suwa kɛnaawo lɔkɔ lidi a.” Lɛtalɛta Elima anɛ kamɛ ke ɔtũ, ade ke ebuki yaámɔ fɔkɔ a. Ɛkatalɛ fɔkɔ kĩ yawɛ odi kĩ epi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ.
44013012	Kĩ abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, ɛtɛ edo kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa katsa nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ wĩ a akũ kɛna ye wãwã paa.
44013013	Ke liti a, Paulo mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bito Pafo bɛnaa Perge ɔmatɔ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ Pamfilia tite kamɛ. Ade awã mɔ Yohanes Marko dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be emuniki ɛnaa Yerusalem a.
44013014	Kĩ bito Perge a, bɛyawo Antiokia kĩ edeĩ nɛ Pisidia. Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a ni, bɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a bɛnadzi nɛ bati a kamɛ.
44013015	Ade kĩ bɛkã fɔlɛtsa nɛ Mose mbla, mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tuvoli kamɛ biyua a, katsɛnakɔ̃ banɔkɔɛ̃ a bi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mideĩ kadi kĩ míalɛ mido boe kɔbɛ̃ ni, osi waa, milɛ faa.”
44013016	Ade Paulo yidza ɛdza ete be awɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ Israelfɔ mɔ mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Israelfɔ lɛmɛ miasum Baguma a, mitse katse wĩ!
44013017	Israelfɔ Baguma lɛpau boe bawanyɔ, ade ɛkɛna be ɔmaĩ kpale nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛnya banɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ Egipte a. Ye mɔawɛ lɛnyɛ be etomɛna Egipte tɛsate kamɛ mɔ ye kɔbɛ̃.
44013018	Ade ɛdãmɛna be akũ futeli tɛna flee nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛna nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a.
44013019	Ɛwɔla fude evũkɔnɔ bati nɛ Kanan tite akũ, ade ɛkɔa te ɛkpa Israelfɔ kĩ tɛnya be adzapadiɛ a.
44013020	Fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ ndɛ futeli ɔha ɛna mɔ aduenum kamɛ. “Ke liti a, Baguma kpa be fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ bɛnya be akũ flee kɛyawo Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Samuel akũ.
44013021	Bivia ye kĩ edzina lɛgã ɛkpa be, ade Baguma pau Saulo, kĩ ɛnyɛ Kis obi ɛkpa be a. Eto Benyamin kasinu a kamɛ, ade ɛnya lɛgã futeli tɛna flee a.
44013022	Lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye nɛ lukpo a akũ, ade ɛkɔa Dawid ɛkɛna lɛgã a. Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ ye akũ nyɛ kĩ, ‘Yese obi Dawid nyɛ oti kĩ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ awɛ, kitonɛkĩ yaakɛna nɛ yĩ kawɛ akũ.’
44013023	“Ade Dawid kasinu a kamɛ Baguma nyɛ Ɔtɛnɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa Israelfɔ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi a.
44013024	Fɔmɔ Yesu aayi ye adzuma kayɔ a, Yohanes mui ɔwɔlanɛ a de lɛtsã ebi bati Israelfɔ flee kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ.
44013025	Kĩ Yohanes aawũna ye adzuma kakɛna a, evia bati a kĩ, ‘Mikɔna kĩ yĩ nyɛ Oti a Kĩ Bɛbɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Lɛmɛ etomɛna yĩ nɛ liti yaya, ade ntáfɛta kĩ mawũnya mpabua nɛ ye abɔa malo a.’
44013026	“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Israelfɔ, Abraham babi mɔ bawa, mɔ mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ lɛmɛ miasum Baguma, bɛkɔa katɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bɛma boe flee.
44013027	Nɛ ayekĩ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃ a tányi kĩ ye nyɛ Ɔtɛnɛ, ĩye binu Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bakã nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi nyɛ lidi akũ kayɔ sũ ni, fɔlɛtsa a ya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔmɔ, ade bɛkɔ ye kɔtɔ a.
44013028	Titɔ kĩ bɛtámɔ tɔkpa tidima nɛ ye akũ malo ni, bɛkɔ ye kɔtɔ ade bɛfɔ̃ Pilato kpa osi bɛkɔ ye a.
44013029	Ade kĩ bɛkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa biyua ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ eyi nɛ ye akũ a, bɛnyɛ ye nɛ asendua akũ bɛnabila nɛ linikɛ kamɛ.
44013030	Lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa ebuki edzi nkpã.
44013031	Nɛ fuwi pii na kamɛ ni, ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa bikĩ bɛmɔ ye bɛtsã bito Galilea bɛnaa Yerusalem. Ade be nyɛ ye adansifɔ bɛkpa Israelfɔ finyaakĩĩ a.
44013032	-
44013033	“Finyaakĩĩ bɔkɔa Kalɛ Wĩ a bɔama mi, kĩ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi nɛ boe bawanyɔ lɔkɔ a ya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ boe lɔkɔ. Baguma fɔ̃ Yesu yidza edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ Dawid tsɛlɛ nɛ ɔnɔ ɔyade a kamɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ nyɛ yĩ obi. Nviã kĩĩ nkɛna nɔ Ɔlɛga.’
44013034	Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi nɛ ye kadzɛla katomɛna kanɔkpa nyɛ kĩ ye sukɛna lɛláavɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ da. Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Maakɔa nhila kpalɛwa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi nkpa Dawid a nkpa nɔ.’
44013035	Ebuki ɛlɛ nɛ Dawid ɔnɔ bɛbã kamɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔláafɔ̃ nɔ oti kpalɛwa a lɛvɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ.’
44013036	“Kĩ Dawid kɛna nɛ Baguma fɔwɛtsa akũ lɔkɔ a kĩ edzi nkpã eyua a, eku bɛbɔɛ ye bibila nɛ ye bawanyɔ ɔwɛ̃, ade ɛvɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ lɛmɛ a.
44013037	Lɛmɛ oti a kĩ Baguma dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa a sukɛna távɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ.
44013038	“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔwɛ kĩ minyi kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ Yesu akũ mɔ bide lɛtsã nɛ Baguma tɔkpa kakɔakate a bɛkpa mi.
44013039	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaatɛ Yesu edo ni, Baguma aabɔɛ ye kĩ ɛnya ɔtɔbɛ. Ade fukĩĩ Mose mbla a tápuli ɛkɛna a.
44013040	Foesũ midã kadã wĩ ayekĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a lɛlaaya nɛ mi akũ.
44013041	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Midã mi a kĩ miadi kalɛ a nsekuo! Fɔkɛna mi saa lɔkɔa miwɔ. Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna nviã kĩĩ a ntɛ odi nyɛ foe kayɔ ɛtsa mi malo, miláatɛ foe mido!’ ”
44013042	Kĩ Paulo mɔ Barnaba adzakũ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, bati a bi be kĩ bibuki bɛya nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a kĩ laayaa akũ, lɔkɔa bɛyaaabi be fɔlɛtsa a bibu.
44013043	Kĩ bɛpansam nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, Yudafɔ pii mɔ bikĩ bɛdani bɛkɛna Yudafɔ bavila Baguma lɛmɛ a, tomɔ Paulo mɔ Barnaba. Fɔtɔ banyanɛ a dɛ be kĩ bɛdza pintii nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa be a sũ.
44013044	Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lɛyade akũ a, kite sukuloo ɔmatɔ a flee yabɔa obũ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a kĩ batse boe Ɔlate kalɛ a.
44013045	Kĩ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ́ bati lidede kĩĩ odu nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, anɛ bɛɛlɛ be. Bɛvɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ Paulo nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de ɛlɛ a akũ ade bivũna ye a.
44013046	Lɛmɛ Paulo mɔ Barnaba lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔnya lɔtɔ bubi mi Yudafɔ Baguma kalɛ kĩĩ. Lɛmɛ kĩ misĩ ke kĩ mitákpɔla mikpa nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a sũ ni, bɔkɔa ke bɔama bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
44013047	Kitonɛkĩ ade ɔlɛdo kĩ Baguma kpa boe kĩ, ‘Nkɛna nɔ ndɛ ɔsɛdza nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati flee aana katɛ.’ ”
44013048	Kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, kawɔlɛ de be, ade bimu boe Ɔlate kalɛ a. Ade bikĩ Baguma pau kĩ bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, dani bɛkɛna batɛ badonɛ a.
44013049	Baguma Kalɛ a gba nɛ tite a na flee akũ.
44013050	Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ a fɔ̃ batsole badi kĩ obu deĩ nɛ be akũ kĩ basum Baguma lɛmɛ, mɔ ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a biyidza bɛdza nɛ Paulo mɔ Barnaba akũ, ade bɛblɔmɛna be nɛ be kayite a.
44013051	Ade kĩ Paulo mɔ Barnaba anɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, bɛkpa be abɔa kudu biko ɔmatɔ a bɛkɔa batsa kĩ bisĩ be. Ke liti a, bɛdzakũ bɛnaa Ikonio.
44013052	Kawɔlɛ de batɛ badonɛ nɛ Antiokia ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ yi be kamɛ paa a.
44014001	Kĩ biwo Ikonio a, Paulo mɔ Barnaba naa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃. Ayekĩ bɛlɛ kalɛ wĩ a fɔ̃ Yudafɔ mɔ Grikifɔ pii tɛ bido.
44014002	Ade Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛtátɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ wĩ kĩĩ bido a kɔa ɔdzɛ bido nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a mɔ Paulo mɔ Barnaba kayite.
44014003	Lɛmɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩĩ kahɔ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ, bɛlɛ kalɛ boe Ɔlate akũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃. Ade ɛnyɛ ye kawɛ ɛtsa ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɛna awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa pii a.
44014004	Fɔyaya kĩ bati nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ sɛ̃ nɛ kutsu nviã kamɛ, badi tomɔ Yudafɔ a ade badi lɛmɛ tomɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
44014005	-
44014006	Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, bamatɔnɛ a badi, Yudafɔ mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃ a flee yidza kĩ bayaaha be, bɛnɔ be boe. Kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a nu foe a bilo bɛnaa Likaonia tɛmatɔ a kĩ tɛnyɛ Listra mɔ Derbe mɔ tikĩ tideĩ nɛ kayite a kamɛ.
44014007	Ade bɛnalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ awã a.
44014008	Kĩ biwo Listra a bɛmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ eveliveli. Kito nɛ ye lɛmawi ɛtápuli eyidza ɛtsã da.
44014009	Edzi nɛ awã ɛkatse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Paulo kalɛ a. Kĩ Paulo mɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ oti kĩĩ tɛ edo kĩ baapuli bɛtsa ye sũ ni,
44014010	ɛdã ɔsɔnɛ a koee ade ɛlɛ kɔɔba kĩ, “Yidza kadza ɔkpalɛ!” Onyole kĩĩ ta eyidza ade edo kato katɛ̃ awɛ a.
44014011	Kĩ bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã batse kalɛ a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ Paulo kɛna a, bɛbɔa fɔwɔla nɛ Likaonia tide kamɛ kĩ, “Baviɔ̃ banɛ, bɛka bɛya ndɛ batidziwa aye nɛ boe kayite!”
44014012	Foesũ bite Barnaba dĩ kĩ Zeus. Bite Paulo lɛmɛ kĩ Herme, kitonɛkĩ ade ye lɛdza ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a.
44014013	Adeke Zeus oviɔ̃late a kĩ ye kuviɔ̃la kpale dza nɛ ɔmatɔ ɔbaɛ̃ a, nakpã banantsue ɛbɔɛ flawasi lɛka lɛmɛ ɛyamɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ a kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ kĩ bayaabɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
44014014	Kĩ Paulo mɔ Barnaba nu lɛtsa kĩ bati a wɛ kĩ bakɛna a, bɛyɛlɛ be akũ tɛtadiɛ. Foesũ biwula atsɛ biwo nɛ bati a kamɛ, bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ,
44014015	“Nda amɛ, nde sũ miakɛna fukĩĩ odu? Boe malo batidziwa bɔanɛ ndɛ mi aye. Bɔya nɛ awĩ kĩ bɔkɔa kalɛ wĩ a bɔma mi. Mifɔ̃ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔlá kayɔ kakɛna lɔkɔa midani mimu Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a. Ade ye lɛkɛna tite mɔ ode, mpo mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ foe kamɛ a flee a!
44014016	Kɔkɔɛ a ɛnyɛ anɛ nɛ batidziwa flee akũ ɛfɔ̃ bɛkakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ bawɛ a.
44014017	Lɛmɛ ebuki yanyɛ ye fɔkɛlatsa katsa boe kĩ fɔatsa kĩ nuwĩ edzi nkpã. Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ fɔtsa deĩ kĩ fɔakai boe ye tudzuma wĩ a. Yakpa boe oni lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, fudutsa nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ akũ, funitsã mɔ kawɔlɛ lɛmɛ.”
44014018	Titɔ kĩ bɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɔmɔ malo ni, fɔna ɔsĩ fɔmɔ bati a fɔ̃ afɔliɛ kabɔa kakpa be.
44014019	Ade Yudafɔ badi to Antiokia nɛ Pisidia, mɔ Ikonio bɛyadani bati a adzuni a. Bɛfɔ̃ bɛtalɛ Paulo boe bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛnɛmɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ nɛ kĩ bɛkɔna kĩ eku sũ.
44014020	Lɛmɛ kĩ batɛ badonɛ a yatsɛna nɛ ye akũ a, eyidza ɛdza ade emuniki ɛnaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a. Kĩ kade nyina a, bɛmɔ Barnaba bɛdzakũ bɛnaa Derbe.
44014021	Paulo mɔ Barnaba de lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ Derbe, ade bɛna batɛ badonɛ pii nɛ awã a. Bimuniki bito awã bɛnaa Listra, Ikonio mɔ Antiokia nɛ Pisidia.
44014022	Awã na bɛdɛ batɛ badonɛ a, bido be kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ kĩ bidi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ. Ade bibi be lɛmɛ kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔtsã lubo kamɔ pii kamɛ fɔmɔ bɔawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
44014023	Ade ke Paulo mɔ Barnaba pau lɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛkpa asɔli adi nyɛ adi a. Bɛtsã mpaɛbɔ mɔ onukpɛ̃ kasui kamɛ bɛkɔa be bido nɛ boe Ɔlate a kĩ bɛtɛ bido a awɛ.
44014024	Ade kĩ bimini nɛ Pisidia tɛmatɔ kamɛ biyua a, bɛdani bɛnaa Pamfilia tite kamɛ.
44014025	Bɛlɛ kalɛ wĩ a nɛ Perge fɔmɔ bɛtɛ̃ bɛnaa Atalia.
44014026	Ade awã binyina mpo bɛnaa Antiokia, awã kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkɔa be bido nɛ Baguma awɛ kamɛ nɛ adzuma a kĩ bɛkɛna biyua finyaa a.
44014027	Kĩ biwo Antiokia a, bɛkpɔta batɛ badonɛ a flee nɛ awã, bɛbɔa be osi akũ amandiɛ. Ade bibi be fɔtsa flee a kĩ Baguma kɛna ɛtsãmɛna be akũ mɔ ayekĩ ebinya katɛkado osi ɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
44014028	Bidzi nɛ batɛ badonɛ nɛ Antiokia sɛkɛ̃ owi buna kɔlaa.
