44015001	Kĩ Paulo mɔ Barnaba na nɛ Antiokia a, bati badi to Yudea bɛyatsa batɛ badonɛ nɛ awã fɔtsa kĩ, “Miláana katɛ mbɔɛntɛ bitsua mi lɛkpati nɛ Mose mbla a onukpɛ̃.”
44015002	Lɛmɛ Paulo mɔ Barnaba vɛlɛ foe mɔ be mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Nɛ foesũ bɛnyɛ batɛ badonɛ a badi kĩ bito Antiokia kĩ bitomɔ be bɛnaa Yerusalem lɔkɔa bɛmɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem a bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ.
44015003	Foesũ batɛ badonɛ a yi be osi. Bɛnatsã Foenike mɔ Samaria bɛsɛla batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã, ade bibi be ayekĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kɔa be akũ bɛkpa Baguma a. Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ de be kawɔlɛ paa.
44015004	Kĩ biwo Yerusalem a, batɛ badonɛ a, fɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a flee tɛ be mɔ kawɔlɛ. Paulo mɔ Barnaba bɔa be amandiɛ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna ɛtsãmɛna be akũ a flee.
44015005	Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ batɛ badonɛ badi yidza bɛdza ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a bitsua fɔkpati lɔkɔa bɛkɛna nɛ Mose mbla a akũ.”
44015006	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ banɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a tsɛna bɛkɔna fɔlɛtsa a akũ.
44015007	Kĩ bɛsa foe kamɛ fɛɛ a, Petro yidza ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, miawɛ minyina kĩ lɔkɔ lidi Baguma pau yĩ etomɛna mi kamɛ kĩ nnaabi bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a Kalɛ Wĩ a, ayekĩ be malo baanu ke bɛtɛ bido lɛmɛ.
44015008	Ade Baguma kĩ enyina otidziwa kakɔna a nyɛ ye kawɛ ɛtsa nɛ kĩ ɛkpa be Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ndɛ ayekĩ ɛkpa boe malo a.
44015009	Ɛtátsa ntsitsemu adima nɛ bɔmɔ́ be kayite, kitonɛkĩ ɛtɛ be nɛ ayekĩ bɛtɛ bido sũ, ade ɛkɔa be tɔkpa ete be ndɛ boe aye a.
44015010	Finyaakĩĩ, nde sũ bɔasɔ Baguma bɔdã? Nde sũ bɔkɔa fɔlɔtsa a kĩ bɔmɔ́ boe bawanyɔ bɔtápuli bɔlɔ a bɔate nɛ batɛ badonɛ kĩĩ akũ?
44015011	Oowo! Ndɛ ayekĩ bɔtɛ budo kĩ boe a flee bɔna katɛ fɔtsã boe Ɔlate Yesu kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ a, ade ayea be malo bɛna katɛ a.”
44015012	Ade ke be flee bɛkɛna dĩĩ, bitse Paulo mɔ Barnaba amandiɛ kabɔa nɛ ayekĩ Baguma tsã be akũ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa ɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
44015013	Kĩ bɛbɔa amandiɛ biyua a, Yakobo lɛmɛ yidza ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitse!
44015014	Simon Petro bi boe ayekĩ Baguma nya lɔtɔ ɛnyɛ ye kawɛ ɛtsa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, ade ɛpau be badi kĩ bɛnya ye bade a.
44015015	Ade Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a ketimɔ fukĩĩ pɛpɛɛpɛ ndɛ ayekĩ katsɛlɛ kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a lɛ kĩ,
44015016	‘Nɛ fukĩĩ liti ni, maamuniki ĩya. Maayalɔla Dawid lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kadzɛla, ade maalɔla fɔtsa a kĩ fubu kade nɛ awã kake a, lɔkɔa awã libuki kɛdza pintii.
44015017	Ade bati nkaɛ a aaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ nvɛ kĩ bɛnya yĩ bade a aatomɔ yĩ liti.
44015018	Ade aye boe Ɔlate lɛ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ yaakɛna a.’
44015019	“Foesũ nɛ yĩ, Yakobo, kakɔna onukpɛ̃ ni, kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔaha bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bakpa Baguma a.
44015020	Mbom mifɔ̃ bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli bɔma be kĩ bɛfɔ̃ fukĩĩ bamɛ ndɛ bayaɛ kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ kaba, bɛfɔ̃ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ, bɛfɔ̃ ɔyaɛ kĩ bɛtátsua ye sɔmɔ kaba mɔ babɔanɛ kanya.
44015021	Kitonɛkĩ kito anɛ kɔkɔɛ a bakã Mose mbla a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ eyi a nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi nyɛ lidi akũ nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ade bade lɛtsã nɛ ye fɔlɛtsa akũ nɛ ɔmatɔ nyɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ a.”
44015022	Ade ke fɔtɔ banyanɛ, banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ batɛ badonɛ a flee kɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa kĩ bɛnyɛ be kamɛ badi bibumɔ Paulo mɔ Barnaba bɛnaa Antiokia a. Bɛpau bati nviã kĩ batɛ badonɛ a akpa be obu paa. Ade be nyɛ Yuda kĩ bibuki bavɛ Barnaba mɔ Sila a.
44015023	Ovoli a kĩ bɛnɛɛ banamɛna a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa nyɛ kĩ, Ovoli kĩĩ to boe fɔtɔ banyanɛ, banɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem sɛkɛ̃. Bɔawɔ̃na mi, boe bawaɛ̃ kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ mito Antiokia, Siria mɔ Kilikia. i
44015024	Bunu kĩ batɛ badonɛ badi to boe kamɛ nɛ awĩ bɛyabi mi fɔlɛtsa fudi kĩ fɔha mi fudo ɔtutũ lɛmɛ nɛ mi kamɛ. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ boe lido be.
44015025	-
44015026	Nɛ foesũ bɔtsa fɔlɔ buke otse kĩ bɔado batɔ nviã nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Baatomɔ boe bawaɛ̃ nviã Barnaba mɔ Paulo, kĩ bɛkɔa be nkpã bɛkpa boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɔsum a.
44015027	Budo Yuda mɔ Sila kĩ be mɔa awɛ bibi mi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ foe bɔtsɛlɛ a.
44015028	Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a mɔ boe mɔawɛ a bɔmɔ́ buyi ɔsũ kĩ kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔakɔa fɔlɔtsa kpale bɔlɔla mi kɛba tɛbla sĩwa kĩĩ.
44015029	Ade te nyɛ kĩ mitanya funitsã kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃, mitanya babɔanɛ, mitaba ɔyaɛ kĩ bɛtátsua ye sɔmɔ, mipi mi akũ nɛ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ kamɛ. Ntɛ mipi mi akũ limii ni, katinya kamɛ aalɛ kɛkpa mi. i Midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
44015030	Foesũ bɛnyɛ batɔ kĩĩ osi bɛnaa Antiokia. Bɛnakpɔta batɛ badonɛ a flee nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade bɛkɔa ovoli a bɛkpa be a.
44015031	Kawɔlɛ de bati a nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛkã nɛ ovoli a kamɛ a sũ.
44015032	Yuda mɔ Sila kĩ bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ nyɛ fɔlɛtsa pii kayɔ bɛtsa be nɛ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ kamɛ, bido be kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
44015033	Bidzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ bɛtɛ fuwi fudi, ade batɛ badonɛ a nyɛ be osi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ kĩ bimuniki bɛnaa Yerusalem a.
44015034	Lɛmɛ Sila kɔ̃ wɛ kĩ yakahɔ nɛ awã.
44015035	Paulo mɔ Barnaba dzi nɛ Antiokia sukuloo. Bɛmɔ bati bɛbã pii bɛtsa fɔtsa ade bɛkade lɛtsã nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a akũ a.
44015036	Nɛ fuwi fudi liti ni, Paulo bi Barnaba kĩ, “Fɔ̃ bumuniki bɔnaasɛla boe bawaɛ̃ nɛ tɛmatɔ a kĩ bɔtsã te kamɛ bude lɛtsã nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a akũ a, lɔkɔa bɔdã ni nde bidzi.”
44015037	Barnaba tunɔ ade ɛwɛ kĩ bakpã Yohanes Marko bibumɔ be akũ a.
44015038	Lɛmɛ Paulo tátunɔ kɔlaa kitonɛkĩ, kĩ bɛnaa Pamfilia a, Yohanes Marko dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be nɛ awã ade ɛtábumɔ be biyua adzuma a.
44015039	Bati nviã kĩĩ vɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade fɔfɔ̃ bɛyalɛ a. Barnaba kpã Marko ade binyina mpo bɛnaa Kipro a.
44015040	Paulo lɛmɛ kpã Sila ade batɛ badonɛ a kɔa be bido nɛ boe Ɔlate awɛ kĩ ɛmɔ be kɔnya fɔmɔ bɛdzakũ a.
44015041	Ɛtsã Siria mɔ Kilikia tite kamɛ ɛkado tɛsɔli nɛ awã a kɔbɛ̃.
44016001	Ade Paulo dzakũ ɛnaa ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Derbe, ade ɛtɛ̃ ɛnaa Listra lɛmɛ a. Ade awã ɛnamɔ ɔtɛ odonɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Timoteo a. Ɔma nyɛ Yudani kĩ ɛtɛ Kristo edo. Lɛmɛ ɔlɛga kɔ̃ nyɛ Grikini.
44016002	Batɛ badonɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Listra mɔ Ikonio bɔa Timoteo dĩ wĩ.
44016003	Ade ye Paulo wɛ kĩ yakpã ɛnamɛna a, foesũ etsua ye lɛkpati, kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ kayite a na nyina kĩ ɔlɛga nyɛ Grikini.
44016004	Ade kĩ bɛdzakũ a, bɛtsã bimini nɛ tɛmatɔ a kamɛ, bibi be tɛbla a kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Yerusalem ke otse nɛ te akũ a. Bɛdɛ be kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ te akũ.
44016005	Foesũ luwi daa bati a kapɔ ade be katɛkado lɛmɛ na ɔsĩ kibu a.
44016006	Ke liti a, bɛtsã Frigia mɔ Galatia tite a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tákpa be osi kĩ bɛnaade lɛtsã kalɛ wĩ a akũ nɛ Asia tite akũ.
44016007	Kĩ biwo Misia tite ɔbaɛ̃ a, bɛwɛ kĩ bawo nɛ Bitinia tite kamɛ, lɛmɛ Yesu Hũhũ a tákpa be osi.
44016008	Foesũ bimuniki bɛtsã Misia bɛnawo Troa ɔmatɔ a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ mpo abuĩ a kamɛ.
44016009	Ke lɛnyɛ a, Paulo na kanyɛkatsa nɛ kɔda kamɛ. Nɛ kɔda a kamɛ a, ɛmɔ onyole odi kĩ eto Makedonia, ɛdza ɛlamɛna ye aduli kake kĩ, “Nyina mpo kaya nɛ Makedonia kayaabumɔ boe!”
44016010	Kĩ Paulo na kanyɛkatsa kĩĩ sũ ni, bɔmanɛ akũ bupi Makedonia osi, kitonɛkĩ fɔatsa kĩ Baguma lɛvɛ boe kĩ bɔnaade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ awã.
44016011	Ade ke budzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ nɛ Troa bunyina kpĩĩ bɔnaa Samotrake a. Kĩ kade nyina a, buwo Neapoli.
44016012	Kĩ buto awã a, bɔnawo Filipi kĩ ɛnyɛ Makedonia ɔmatɔ kpale flee a kamɛ. Awã lɛmɛ nyɛ tite kĩ Romafɔ adãmɛna te akũ. Budzi nɛ awã fuwi fudi.
44016013	Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a, bɔnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɔnaa ɔwɔ abuĩ, awã kĩ bɔkɔna kĩ Yudafɔ atsɛna kabɔa mpaɛ. Ade budzi nɛ awã bɔkatsa batsole a kĩ bɛkpɔta nɛ awã Baguma kalɛ a.
44016014	Bavɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ eto Tiatira kĩ Lidia. Yanɔ tilima ngbã, ade ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yasum Baguma yededeede a. Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛna nɛ awã ɛkatse boe a, Baguma binya ye ɔwɔlɛ kĩ ɛtɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Paulo kalɛ a edo.
44016015	Ade kĩ ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a, eke boe aduli kĩ, “Ntɛ mitunɔ kĩ ntɛ boe Ɔlate ndo paa kɔ̃ ni, miyaadzi nɛ yĩ tɔtɔ kamɛ” Ɛdza nɛ boe akũ flee kɛnawo kĩ butunɔ bɔnaa ye sɛkɛ̃.
44016016	Luwi mɔa lidi kĩ bɔanaa mpaɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a, bɔtsɛlamɔ oyitsɔ̃ abawa adi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ, fɔafɔ̃ yapuli kadã kanɔkɔnɛ. Nɛ foesũ yakɛna sika baũ kakpa ye balate.
44016017	Oyitsɔ̃ kĩĩ tomɔ boe mɔ Paulo mɔ fɔwɔla kabɔa kĩ, “Baguma Kpale basumunɛ bati kĩĩ anɛ, ade bɛya nɛ awĩ kĩ bayaatsa mi nkpã kana osi a!”
44016018	Fukĩĩ na nkɔsu fuwi pii. Ade kĩ fuwo Paulo odo a, ɛdani ebi hũhũ a kĩ etomɔ oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ, “Nɛ Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ, mabi nɔ kĩ nɛ́ nɛ oti a kamɛ!” Lɛtalɛta hũhũ kpa a nɛ́ nɛ ye kamɛ.
44016019	Kĩ ye balate a mɔ́ kĩ osi a kĩ ye akũ batsã kana sika yɛla be a, bipi Paulo mɔ Sila bɛma fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a nɛ kɔya.
44016020	Bɛlɛ nɛ kɔya kĩ, “Bati kĩĩ nyɛ Yudafɔ kĩ bɛyaabula boe ɔmatɔ a kade.
44016021	Batsa bati fɔtsa kĩ boe ndɛ Romafɔ bɔláapuli bɔtɛ foe.”
44016022	Ade bati kɔdabu a yidza bɛdza bisinya Paulo mɔ Sila, bido be katsootsoo awɛ a. Fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a fɔ̃ bɛyɛlɛ tɛtadiɛ nɛ be akũ, ade bɛkpa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bibo be mɔ kutse a.
44016023	Kĩ bibo be kabo kpa biyua a, bɛnado be nɛ kɔla, ade bibi ekĩ yadãmɛna bikĩ bɛwaa kɔla akũ a kĩ ɛbalɛ Paulo mɔ Sila kabalɛ wĩ.
44016024	Kĩ bibi ye lɔmɔ sũ ni, ɛnado be nɛ kamɛ flee a, ade ɛbɔa be agba a.
44016025	Lɛnyɛ kayite a, kĩ Paulo mɔ Sila kabɔa mpaɛ mɔ tɔnɔ kasã kakpa Baguma a, kɔlabawanɛ nkaɛ a katse be.
44016026	Ade deedimɔapɛ tite kuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade kɔla a flee kuna kɔnake a. Lɛtalɛta kɔla tupunu a flee binya ade nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ a wɔlɔ nɛ kɔlabawanɛ a flee akũ tɛtɔ a.
44016027	Kĩ kɔlabawanɛ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a nyinya a, ɛmɔ kĩ kɔla a tunyukpɛ̃ flee waa luto. Ɛkɔna kĩ kɔlabawanɛ a nɛ bilo sũ ni, ɛbɔlɛ lɛpamɛ ɛnyɛ kĩ yatsɔɛ ye akũ ekɔ.
44016028	Lɛmɛ Paulo bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Takɛna nɔ akũ lɛtsama. Boe a flee budeĩ nɛ awĩ!”
44016029	Kɔla bawanɛ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a fɔ̃ bɛma ye ɔsɛdza ade nɛ kukũtila kamɛ ewula atsɛ ɛnatɔ nɛ Paulo mɔ Sila abɔa kamɛ.
44016030	Ade ke ɛnyɛ be nɛ kɔla a kamɛ, evia be kĩ, “Nda amɛ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna nna katɛ?”
44016031	Bibi ye kĩ, “Tɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu kado lɔkɔa mimɔ nɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee míana katɛ.”
44016032	Ade ke bɛnaa bɛnade lɛtsã nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ akũ bɛkpa ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a flee a.
44016033	Lɛnyɛ a na, ɛkpã be ɛnasu be fɔkpa, ade ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a.
44016034	Ɛkpã Paulo mɔ Sila ɛnamɛna ye awã, ade ɛkpa be funitsã bɛnya a. Ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a flee bɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa kitonɛkĩ bɛtɛ Baguma bido.
44016035	Kĩ kade nyina a, ɔmatɔ a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ do fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛnabi kɔlabawanɛ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a kĩ, “Fɔnɛ bati a awɛ bɛnaa.”
44016036	Kɔla bawanɛ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a bi Paulo mɔ Sila kĩ, “Fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a bo nfɔnɛ mi awɛ midzakũ. Foesũ minaa faa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.”
44016037	Lɛmɛ Paulo bi batɔ a kĩ, “Bibo boe nɛ kanade nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ bɛtádzɛmɔ boe bɛkɔ boe kɔtɔ, ade bido boe nɛ kɔla kamɛ a, titɔ kĩ Romafɔ bɔanɛ. Ade finyaa kɔ̃ bawɛ kĩ bɔdzakũ nɛ kabɛla kamɛ? Oowo! Ke kɔ̃ nviã nɛ awĩ! Fɔ̃ be mɔawɛ a bɛyaanyɛ boe!”
44016038	Ade ke fɔtɔ banyanɛ a muniki bɛnabi fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a ɔlɛdo a. Kĩ binu kĩ Paulo mɔ Sila nyɛ Romafɔ a, libe wo be paa.
44016039	Foesũ bɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ bɛnakpa be sɛmɛ bɔɛɛ, ade bɛnyɛ be nɛ kɔla a kamɛ a. Bike be aduli kĩ bɛdzakũ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɛnaa kakɔ bɛbã.
44016040	Paulo mɔ Sila dzakũ bɛnaa Lidia awã. Ade awã bɛnamɔ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã a. Bido be kɔbɛ̃ bibu ade bɛdzakũ a.
44017001	Paulo mɔ Sila tsã bito Amfipoli mɔ Apolonia bɛyawo Tesalonika, awã kĩ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ kadi na.
44017002	Ndɛ ayekĩ Paulo awɛ kakɛna a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a Kawɛya Fuwi ɛlalɛ etomɔ akũ, ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ ɛtsa bati a.
44017003	Ɛnyɛ lubo a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ Kristo aayamɔ, mɔ ayekĩ yaabuki eyidza edzi nkpã ɛtsa. Ebi be kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa nlamɔ mi kabi a nyɛ Yesu Kristo a.”
44017004	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ foe kayɔ ɛnyɛ ɛtsa nɛ awĩ fɔ̃ bati a badi dani be adzuni, ade bɛtɛ bido bitomɔ Paulo mɔ Sila a. Ade aye a nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, Grikifɔ pii kĩ bipi be akũ nɛ Baguma kavila kamɛ, mɔ batsole pii kĩ obu deĩ nɛ be akũ lɛmɛ dani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ bitomɔ Baguma.
44017005	Lɛmɛ anɛ bɛɛlɛ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a, ade ke bɛnawɛ patapaafɔ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bibumɔ be akũ bido ɔtutũ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a. Bɛbɔa obũ bɛkɛna dede bɛnawo nɛ Yason tɔtɔ kamɛ kĩ bapi Paulo mɔ Sila bɛnamɛna ɔmatɔ a katsɛnakɔ̃.
44017006	Kĩ bɛtamɔ be sũ ni, bɛvɛlɛ Yason mɔ batɛ badonɛ badi bɛnamɛna katsɛnakɔ̃ a. Awã na bɛkabɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Bati badi tsɛ̃mɔ ɔtutũ kado nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, ade bɛkɔa foe bɛyamɛna nɛ awĩ kĩĩ lɛmɛ a.
44017007	Ade Yason lɛmɛ tɛ be edo nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ a. Bati kĩĩ yidza bɛdza nɛ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare tɛbla akũ. Ade batsa kĩ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yesu nyɛ Lɛgã a.”
44017008	Kĩ kɔdabu a mɔ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a fɔha be paa.
44017009	Banɔkɔɛ̃ a fɔ̃ Yason mɔ ye bade a se be akũ liti kadza kɔtɔ ade bɛfɔnɛ be awɛ a.
44017010	Kĩ kade sila kɛdɔ pɛ, batɛ badonɛ a kpã Paulo mɔ Sila bilo bɛnaa Beroia. Kĩ biwo awã a, bɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
44017011	Beroia bati a tsua linebi bɛba bikĩ nɛ Tesalonika a. Biyi atɔ bitse kalɛ a. Luwi nyɛ luwi bɛkasa Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kadã ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Paulo kabi be a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
44017012	Foesũ be kamɛ bati pii tɛ bido. Grikifɔ batsole pii kĩ obu deĩ nɛ be akũ mɔ banyole pii lɛmɛ tɛ bido.
44017013	Lɛmɛ kĩ Yudafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Tesalonika nu kĩ Paulo ya ɛlamɛna Baguma kalɛ a katsa nɛ Beroia, bɛnaa awã bɛnado ɔtutũ nɛ bati a kamɛ.
44017014	Batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã a kpã Paulo mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ bɛnamɛna mpo abuĩ. Lɛmɛ Sila mɔ Timoteo kɔ̃ kahɔ nɛ Beroia.
44017015	Bikĩ biyi Paulo osi a naa flee bɛnawo Atene. Ade awã bimuniki a, ade Paulo kpa ɔlɛdo kĩ bibi Sila mɔ Timoteo kĩ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ.
44017016	Kĩ Paulo na nɛ Atene ɛkadzɔlɛ Sila mɔ Timoteo a, ɛtɛ kalɔɛ nɛ ayekĩ ɛmɔ kĩ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ flee yi mɔ baviɔ̃ kasum.
44017017	Foesũ ɛnanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa Yudafɔ a mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ basum Baguma a, mɔ bikĩ batɛ̃ nɛ kɔya luwi daa a.
44017018	Bati kutsu kudi kĩ bɛnyɛ Epikurofɔ mɔ Stoafɔ kĩ bideĩ katinya kamɛ kadikanyi kavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ Paulo. Badi via kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa koũ oti kĩĩ wɛ kĩ yalɛ?” Bati bɛbã lɛmɛ kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔadã ndɛ kade bɛbã baviɔ̃ akũ fɔlɛtsa ɛlamɛna kalɛ.” Bɛlɛ foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ binu kĩ Paulo de lɛtsã nɛ Yesu mɔ bati kayidza kato kanɔkpa akũ.
44017019	Nɛ foesũ bɛkpã ye bɛnɛmɛna be ɔmatɔ a banɔkɔɛ̃ katsɛnakɔ̃ nɛ Areopago, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Bɔawɛ kĩ bɔanu fɔlɛtsa vɔɛ̃ a kĩ ɔlamɛna katsa a kayɔ.
44017020	Nɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɔlamɛna kalɛ a kamɛ tákpalɛ boe sũ ni, bɔawɛ butse foe kamɛ.”
44017021	Atenefɔ mɔ banɔvɔɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã awɛ be lɔkɔ flee kakpa fɔlɛtsa vɔɛ̃ katse mɔ foe akũ kɔlɔmɛna.
44017022	Ade Paulo yidza ɛdza nɛ bati a anɛ kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Atenefɔ! Mmɔ́ kĩ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ ni, miapi mi ɔsum kadunamɔ akũ paa.
44017023	Kitonɛkĩ kĩ ntsɛ̃ nɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ ndã mi fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ a kĩ miasum a ni, mmɔ́ kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ afɔliɛ kabɔa de lidi akũ kĩ, ‘Bɔkɔa bɔakpa Baguma a kĩ bunyína a.’ Baguma a kĩ minyina, lɛmɛ miabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa ye a, ade ye akũ fɔlɛtsa nlamɛna mi kabi finyaakĩĩ a.
44017024	“Baguma kĩĩ nyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa Ɔlate, kĩ ɛbɔa tite mɔ ode mɔ fɔtsa flee a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ foe kamɛ. Yaádzi nɛ kɔla a kĩ batidziwa ke mɔ awɛ a kamɛ.
44017025	Ɛtási boe lɛtsama kĩ bɔkɔa awɛ bɔkɛna a, kitonɛkĩ ye mɔawɛ akpa oti nkpã mɔ kawɛya, mɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lisĩ oti.
44017026	Ɛnyɛ fude fude bati a a flee etomɛna otidziwa mɔapɛ kamɛ kĩ bidzi nɛ tite akũ. Ye mɔawɛ liyi lɔkɔ mɔ fudzikɔ̃ tɛbɛ̃ ɛkpa bati flee.
44017027	Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ boe batidziwa baawɛ ye liti osi bɔmɔ́ ye, titɔ kĩ ɛláa mɔ lugo nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ malo.
44017028	Kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ mi tɔnɔ bamɛnɛ badi alɛ kĩ, ‘Ade ye dzi fɔ̃ budzi, bɔtsɛ̃ budeĩ nkpã a.’ Ade bɛlɛ lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Boe malo bɔnyɛ ye kasinu a kamɛ babi.’
44017029	“Nɛ kĩ bɔnyɛ Baguma babi sũ ni, kɛtáfɛta kĩ bɔakɔna kĩ Baguma kutitse la ndɛ litsedi kĩ batidziwa kɔa awɛ bɛmɛ mɔ sika ngbã, suwovoe ĩye futse.
44017030	Kito anɛ katinya kayɔkayi kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a, Baguma távɛlɛ bati sɔtɔ kitonɛkĩ bɛtányi ye sũ. Lɛmɛ finyaakɔ̃ ɛkpa ɔlɛdo kĩ bati flee nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
44017031	Kitonɛkĩ ehihiɛ luwi eyi kĩ de akũ oti a kĩ ɛpau a, aadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ flee nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ. Kĩ yaakɛna fukĩĩ sũ ni, ɛdzɛla Oti a Kĩ Baguma bɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a etomɛna kanɔkpa ade ke ɛnyɛ ye ɛtsa bati flee a!”
44017032	Kĩ binu kĩ Paulo lɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ kayidza kato kanɔkpa akũ a, bati a badi di ye nsekuo, ade babɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Bɔawɛ kĩ bɔabuki butse fɔlɛtsa fudi nɛ oti kabu kayidza a akũ.”
44017033	Kĩ fɔya lɔmɔ a, Paulo dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be.
44017034	Lɛmɛ bati a badi tomɔ ye bɛdani bɛkɛna batɛ badonɛ. Be kamɛ badi nyɛ Dionisio, kĩ ɛnyɛ Areopago ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ otsole odi kĩ bavɛ Damari, mɔ bati bɛbã.
44018001	Fukĩĩ liti a, Paulo dzakũ nɛ Atene ɛnaa Korinto.
44018002	Nɛ awã a ɛmɔ Yudani odi kĩ bavɛ Akwila kĩ eto Ponto. Bɛmɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Priskila bito Italia bɛya nɛ awã owi tábuna, kitonɛkĩ lɛgã a kĩ bavɛ Klaudio si mbla kĩ Yudafɔ flee bɛnɛ nɛ Roma. Paulo naa ɛnamɔ be,
44018003	ade ɛna nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛkabumɔ be adzuma, nɛ kĩ bɛmɔ be bakɛna adzuma mɔa sũ. Bɛkɔa bayaɛ tuvoli bɛkapam tilima fɔla fɔtsa ndɛ ayekĩ Paulo lɛmɛ akɛna a.
44018004	Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi nyɛ lidi akũ ni, Paulo kanaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃, kanaanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ katsa Yudafɔ mɔ Grikifɔ, kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
44018005	Kĩ Sila mɔ Timoteo to Makedonia bɛya a, Paulo na aya koũ ede lɛtsã nɛ kalɛ wĩ a akũ, ade edi adansiɛ ɛtsa Yudafɔ a kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a.
44018006	Lɛmɛ kĩ Yudafɔ a yidza bɛdza nɛ ye akũ bɛlɛ fuvũnatsa nɛ ye akũ sũ ni, ɛkpa ye akũ eko be ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ miyɛla ni, mi mɔawɛ aatɛ foe sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ. Yĩ akũ kpalɛ, ntáku kɔtɔ. Kito finyaakĩĩ kanaa ni, maanaa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sɛkɛ̃ nnaabi be kalɛ wĩ kĩĩ.”
44018007	Kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a, ɛnadzi nɛ onyole odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Yudani kĩ bavɛ Tito Yusto tɔtɔ kamɛ. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yasum Baguma ade ye awã lɛmɛ fuãmɔ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
44018008	Katsɛnakɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bavɛ Krispo mɔ ye akũ bati flee tɛ boe Ɔlate bido ade bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a. Ade ayea bɛkɛna Korintofɔ pii a kĩ bɛtɛ bido a mui kawɔla amaniɛ lɛmɛ a.
44018009	Luwi a lɛnyɛ ni, Paulo na kanyɛkatsa, ade boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Tavila. Tafɔ̃ kalɛ wĩ a kalɛ.
44018010	Ntomɔ nɔ, odima lɛláapuli ɛkɛna nɔ lɛtsakpa lidima, kitonɛkĩ bati pii kĩ bɛnyɛ yĩ bade lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ɔmatɔ kĩĩ kamɛ.”
44018011	Foesũ Paulo dzi nɛ awã kateli mɔa mɔ sɛkɛ ɛkatsa bati Baguma kalɛ a.
44018012	Lɛmɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛyadzina Galio ndɛ Roma abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Akaia tite akũ a, Yudafɔ badi tsa fɔlɔ biyidza bɛdza nɛ Paulo akũ, bipi ye bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃.
44018013	Ade ke bibi ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ, “Obi kĩĩ lamɛna bati adzuni kadani kĩ bisum Baguma nɛ osi kĩ etia boe mbla akũ.”
44018014	Lɛmɛ kĩ Paulo wɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye akũ onukpɛ̃ pɛ, Galio bi Yudafɔ a kĩ, “Yudafɔ mitse! Ntɛ mi kalɛ kĩ miyamɛna kĩĩ mɔ mfumsu baũ adi yanɛ kɔ̃ ni, kufɛ maana ɔwɔlɛ ntse mi.
44018015	Lɛmɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kanyɛ nɛ buĩ mɔ mi tɛmaniɛ akũ sũ ni, mi mɔawɛ minaasa foe kamɛ mimanɛ foe. Fɔnyɛ́ fɔlɛtsa kĩ madzi ndzɛ.”
44018016	Foesũ ɛblɔmɛna be ɛnɛmɛna nɛ ye fɔlɛtsakadzɛkɔ̃ a.
44018017	Ade bati kɔdabu a napi Sostene kĩ ɛnyɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bibo nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ kɔla kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ Galio tákpeti be kɔlaa.
44018018	Paulo dzi nɛ Korinto fuwi beblebee. Ke liti a, ɛkla batɛ badonɛ a ade bɛmɔ Akwila mɔ Priskila binyina mpo bɛnaa Siria a. Fɔmɔ Paulo aadzakũ nɛ Kenkrea a, ɛfɔ̃ bɛkpa ye lɔlɔ tsɔlitsɔli nɛ fubo a kĩ ɛlɔ nɛ Yudafɔ amaniɛ osi sũ.
44018019	Kĩ biwo Efeso a, ɛdzakũ ɛfɔnɛ Priskila mɔ Akwila nɛ awã. Ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɛnanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ mɔ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã a.
44018020	Bati a ke ye aduli kĩ edzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ sukuloo a, lɛmɛ ɛtátunɔ.
44018021	Nɛ foesũ kĩ yadzakũ a, ebi be kĩ, “Ntɛ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ ni, owi lɛláabuna mɔ maabuki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.” Ade ke ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ɛdzakũ nɛ Efeso a.
44018022	Kĩ ewo Kaisarea a, ɛnaa Yerusalem ɛnawɔ̃na batɛ badonɛ a, ade ebuki ɛtɛ̃ ɛnaa Antiokia a.
44018023	Edzi nɛ awã sukuloo ɛtsã emini nɛ Galatia mɔ Frigia tite a kamɛ, ɛkado batɛ badonɛ a kɛbɛ̃.
44018024	Nɛ lɔkɔa na kamɛ ni, Yudani odi ya nɛ Efeso. Bavɛ ye Apolo ade bɛma ye nɛ Aleksandria a. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ enyina kɔdzɛla kalɛ ade enyina Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa lɛmɛ a.
44018025	Titɔ kĩ bɛtsa ye fɔtsa nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ wĩ a akũ, yalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ Yesu akũ malo ni, Yohanes mui kawɔla amaniɛ akũ fɔlɛtsa odi enyina.
44018026	Ɛkalɛ kalɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a. Kĩ Priskila mɔ Akwila tse ye fɔlɛtsa a, bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna be awã ade bɛnanyɛ Baguma osi a bɛtsa ye yededeede a.
44018027	Kĩ Apolo yake otse kĩ yaanaa Akaia, batɛ badonɛ nɛ Efeso a yado ye kɔbɛ̃. Bɛtsɛlɛ ovoli bɛkpa bikĩ nɛ Akaia kĩ bɛtɛ ye atuu. Kĩ ewo awã a ebumɔ bati pii a kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ sũ.
44018028	Ade ke ɛnya Yudafɔ a akũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa ɛtsa yededeede kĩ Yesu nyɛ Oti a kĩ Bɛbɔa tɔdɔ̃ a.
44019001	Kĩ Apolo na nɛ Korinto a, Paulo tsã abɔa, ɛtsã fuyite fuyite a ɛnanɛ nɛ Efeso. Awã naa, ɛmɔ batɛ badonɛ badi.
44019002	Ade evia be kĩ, “Kĩ mitɛ mido a ni, mitɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a?” Ade ke bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ “Oowo! Litsa nyɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a? Bɔtánu tɔ̃ foe akũ lɛtsama.”
44019003	Ebuki evia be kĩ, “Litsa mui kawɔla amaniɛ mitɛ?” Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Yohanes mui kawɔla amaniɛ a kĩ ke akũ ede lɛtsã a.”
44019004	Paulo nyɛ foe kayɔ ɛtsa be kĩ, “Yohanes kɛna bati mui kawɔla amaniɛ kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ade ebi be kĩ bɛtɛ oti a kĩ yaaya nɛ ye Yohanes liti a bido. Ade oti a nyɛ Yesu a.”
44019005	Kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bɛfɔ̃ Paulo kɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ.
44019006	Ade kĩ Paulo te awɛ nɛ be akũ a, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ka ɛyatɛ be flee kamɛ ade bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ a, bɛlɛ Baguma kalɛ a lɛmɛ a.
44019007	Be lidede aawo ndɛ banyole ewua-nviã.
44019008	Paulo kanaa katsɛnakɔ̃ a nɛ tidetɔ ɛlalɛ kamɛ, ɛkabi bati kalɛ wĩ a mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado. Ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa be, ɛbɔa mbɔdi kĩ yavɛlɛ be adzuni ɛyamɛna nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanya a akũ a.
44019009	Lɛmɛ bati a badi na atɔ ɔsĩ, bɛtátse kalɛ wĩ a, ade bɛlɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ boe Ɔlate Osi Wĩ a akũ nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ a. Foesũ Paulo dzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, ade ɛkpã bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a ɛnamɛna Tirano kadzikɔ̃. Ade awã ɛkatsa be fɔtsa luwi nyɛ luwi a.
44019010	Ɛkɔa futeli nviã ɛtsa be fɔtsa lɔmɔ, ade Yudafɔ mɔ Helafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Asia kamɛ kamɛ a lɛmɛ nu boe Ɔlate kalɛ a.
44019011	Baguma kpa Paulo kɔbɛ̃ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii.
44019012	Ntɛ bɛkɔa ye tuduku mɔ tɛtadiɛ malo bɛtamɔ basɔnɛ ni, bana akũ ɔsi, ade fɔablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa katomɛna bikĩ edeĩ nɛ be kamɛ a kamɛ a.
44019013	Ade Yudafɔ bawanɛ badi tsɛ̃ nɛ fɔkɔ kĩ be malo bablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa. Bɛkɔna kĩ baapuli bɛkɔa Yesu dĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ a. Bibi hũhũ kpa a kĩ, “Mablɔmɛna mi nɛ Yesu a kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa Paulo tsɛ̃ yalɛ a dĩ akũ!”
44019014	Bikĩ bɛkɛna fukĩĩ nyɛ bawaɛ̃nyole evũkɔnɔ kĩ bɛnyɛ Skeva, Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee babi.
44019015	Lɛmɛ kĩ bɛnabi hũhũ kpa adi tuwuli kĩĩ a, ebi be kĩ, “Ĩnyina Yesu, ĩnyina Paulo malo. Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃, ĩnyína mi! Bawei mianɛ?”
44019016	Ade oti a kĩ ye kamɛ hũhũ a deĩ a wo nɛ be akũ ebo be a! Bilomɔ mɔ ɔdzɔ mɔ akũ fɔkpa bɛnɛ nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ.
44019017	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya a gba nɛ Efeso, ade Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ flee nu foe a. Nɛ foesũ libe wo bati paa, ade boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ buki lide nɛ ode libu a.
44019018	Bati pii kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a, nɛ bɛya nɛ kanade bɛyanyɛ be tɔkpa bɛtsa.
44019019	Bikĩ bɛnyɛ bawanɛ ĩye madzikifɔ a lɛmɛ lɔ be fuwa, fɔ́bɛ mɔ foe akũ tuvoli bɛyamɛna bipila nɛ kanade. Tuvoli a kɔya aawo ndɛ sika ovoe mpim aduenum.
44019020	Fɔtsã osi kĩĩ akũ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a gba mɔ kɔbɛ̃, kɛtɛ awã lɛmɛ flee.
44019021	Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a fɔ̃ Paulo kɛna adzuni kĩ yanatsã Makedonia mɔ Akaia ɛnaa Yerusalem. Paulo lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nto awã ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ntɛ̃ nnaadã Roma lama.”
44019022	Edo ye babumɛnanɛ nviã Timoteo mɔ Erasto kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛna Makedonia, ade ye mɔa edzi nɛ Asia kamɛ kamɛ fɛɛ a.
44019023	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, ɔdzɛ kpale odi ya nɛ Efeso kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ Kristo katɛ kado osi a akũ sũ.
44019024	Fukĩĩ yi kayɔ futo odi kĩ bavɛ Demetrio kĩ yakɔa sika ovoe katu Artemis asɔli kɔla akũ fɔtsa a. Bɛmɔ ye adzuma bakɛnanɛ a banɔ foe kakpa bikĩ bayaabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa baviɔ̃ a. Adzuma kĩĩ akpa be nfasɔ baũ paa.
44019025	Luwi a, Demetrio ve sika fɔtsa batunɛ a flee ɛkpɔta ade ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, minyina kĩ boe akũ kana to adzuma kĩĩ kamɛ.
44019026	Ade mi mɔawɛ minu, mimɔ́ yededeede ayekĩ Paulo do boe adzuma kĩĩ kɔnyɔã a. Epuli ebula bati a adzuni kade kĩ baviɔ̃ fɔtsa kĩ bɔatu a lɛnɛ́nɛ, nnɛ́ nɛ Efeso odi fukĩĩ lamɛna kaya, mbom nɛ Asia tite a flee akũ.
44019027	Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ boe adzuma odi aabu kade! Boe baviɔ̃ kpale Artemis dĩ mɔ obu flee lɛmɛ aawɔ nɛ Asia mɔ katinya kamɛ flee!”
44019028	Kĩ binu Demetrio fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a kalɔkpa wo be mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade bido fɔwɔla kabɔa awɛ kɔɔba kĩ, “Boe Ɔma Artemis nyɛ Efesofɔ baviɔ̃ kpale!”
44019029	Fɔwɔla kĩĩ tɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ flee. Nɛ foesũ ɔmatɔ a bɔa obũ ade bipi Paulo batomɛnanɛ nviã a kĩ be nyɛ Gaio mɔ Aristarko kĩ bito Makedonia, bɛnamɛna ɔmatɔ a katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
44019030	Paulo lɛmɛ wɛ kufɛ kĩ yanaa awã, lɛmɛ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã sua ye osi.
44019031	Kayite a na banɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛnyɛ Paulo bakɔba lɛmɛ do lɔtɔ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, bike ye aduli kĩ ɛtasuma katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
44019032	Lɔkɔ a na ni, katsɛnakɔ̃ a flee kɛna yoo. Bati a badi lamɛna lɛtsa mɔa kalɛ, babɛbã lamɛna lɛtsa bɛbã kalɛ, ade be pii lɛmɛ ti binyína lɛtsa a kĩ de sũ bɛyatsɛna nɛ awã a.
44019033	Ade Yudafɔ a vɛlɛ Aleksandro bɛyadzɛla nɛ lɔtɔ kĩ ɛyaanyɛ lɛtsa kĩ de lɛya a onukpɛ̃. Ade Aleksandro dzɛla akpɔ nɛ ode ete be awɛ kĩ bɛfɔ̃ ebi be kadi.
44019034	Kĩ bati a mɔ biyi ɔsũ kĩ Yudani yanɛ sũ ni, bibuki bɛbɔa fɔwɔla, fɔtɛ ndɛ ndɔũhuilɛ nviã. Bɛkalɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔma Artemis nyɛ Efesofɔ baviɔ̃ kpale!”
44019035	Owi tábuna fɔmɔ abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi puli ɛyadina bati a ade ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Efesofɔ, mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi nyina kĩ Efeso nyɛ Artemis, baviɔ̃ kpale a kadzikɔ̃, ade ke de kpalɛwa a kĩ lito ode lɛka a lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ a.
44019036	Odima lɛláapuli ɛlɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɛnyɛ́ ɔnɔkɔali, foesũ mina ɔwɔlɛ lɔkɔa mitakɛna lɛtsama mɔ kalɔkpa.
44019037	Kitonɛkĩ bati a kĩ mipi miyamɛna nɛ awĩ a táye Artemis kuviɔ̃la fɔtsa fudima ĩye bɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa fudima bitia boe baviɔ̃ a.
44019038	Lɛmɛ ntɛ Demetrio mɔ ye adzuma bakɛnanɛ a deĩ kalɛ mɔ odi kɔ̃ ni, fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ deĩ. Ade budeĩ fuwi kĩ foe akũ badzɛ fɔlɛtsa, kĩ baapuli bɛkɔa bɛtsa lɛtsa kĩ litia be a bɛnamɛna awã.
44019039	Lɛmɛ ntɛ fɔlɛtsa bɛbã minɛɛ kɔ̃ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa foe bɔnaayi nɛ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a anɛ bɛdzɛ nɛ mbla onukpɛ̃.
44019040	Kitonɛkĩ nviã ɔtutũ kĩĩ kɔ̃ kɛna ndɛ kayidza kadza nɛ abãã akũ kĩ baapuli bɛbɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ boe akũ. Ade ntɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a via boe kadi ni, bɔláapuli bɔnyɛ foe onukpɛ̃. Baavɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ.”
44019041	Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua, ɛnyɛ be flee a osi, ade bɛpansam a.
44020001	Kĩ ɔtutũ a onukpɛ̃ dɔ a, Paulo vɛ batɛ badonɛ a ɛkpɔta. Kĩ ɛna kadi ebi be, edo be kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ eyua a, evia osi ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Makedonia.
44020002	Paulo tsã kamɛ kamɛ na flee ebi bati boe Ɔlate fɔlɛtsa pii ɛkado be kɔbɛ̃, ɛkɔa ɛyawo Akaia.
44020003	Edzi nɛ awã tidetɔ ɛlalɛ. Lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkamanɛ akũ kĩ yadzakũ ɛnaa Siria tite akũ, ɛyamɔ kĩ Yudafɔ a sui nɛ ye akũ. Nɛ foesũ eke otse kĩ yabuki ɛdani ɛtsã Makedonia kamɛ a.
44020004	Bɛmɔ bati pii lɛtsã bɛnaa. Ade be nyɛ Sopater, Piro obi kĩ eto Beroia, Aristarko mɔ Sekundo kĩ bito Tesalonika. Babɛbã nyɛ Gaio kĩ eto Derbe, Tihiko mɔ Trofimo kĩ bito Asia, mɔ Timoteo.
44020005	Bɛnya boe lɔtɔ bɛnadzɔlɛ boe nɛ Troa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
44020006	Kĩ bɔnya Yudafɔ Abodoo kĩ Ɛtáyila Fuwi a buyua a, budzi ɔkɔlɔ nɛ Filipi ade bunyina bɔnaa be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Troa a. Buwo awã nɛ fuwi elo liti, ade budzi nɛ awã fuwi evũkɔnɔ a.
44020007	Nɛ ɛkwansieda luwi lɛtɔnyade akũ a, bɔtsɛna kĩ bɔa nya boe Ɔlate funitsã a. Nɛ kĩ Paulo aadzakũ ntɛ kade nyina sũ ni, ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla flee kɛnawo lɛnyɛ kayite.
44020008	Bɛtɛna tɛsɛdza nɛ abansulu kɔla a kamɛ.
44020009	Kĩ Paulo lɛ kɔdzɛla gɛlɛɛlɛ sũ tida bɔɛ Eutiko, opopo kĩ ede edzi nɛ nfansili. Eto abansulu kɔla kɔlalɛde a ɛyatɔ nɛ tite. Bikĩ bɛnabɔɛ ye a mɔ́ kĩ eku.
44020010	Lɛmɛ kĩ Paulo ka ɛnaa a, ɛkɛna akũ eboomu ye, ade ebi be kĩ, “Mitavila! Edeĩ nkpã!”
44020011	Ade be flee bibuki bide bɛnaa abansulu ode a bɛnanya boe Ɔlate funitsã a. Paulo buki ɛlɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla flee kɛnawo odenyinawi ade ɛdzakũ a.
44020012	Nɛ kĩ lɛtsama tákɛna opopo a sũ ni, bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna kɔla, ade ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi be a.
44020013	Paulo tsã abɔa ɛnaa Aso a. Lɛmɛ boe a kĩ butomɔ ye a budzi ɔkɔlɔ bɔnya ye lɔtɔ kĩ bɔ́anatsɛlamɔ akũ nɛ awã, lɔkɔa bɔbɔɛ ye ndɛ ayekĩ ɛtsa a.
44020014	Kĩ ɛyamɔ boe nɛ Aso a, boe flee bɔdzakũ bɔnaa Mitilene.
44020015	Odenyinawi a buwo Kio ntintisɔ. Luwi lɛyade akũ ni bɔnawo Samo, ade nɛ luwi lɛlade a buwo Mileto a.
44020016	Paulo fɔ̃ bɔtɛ̃ Efeso, kitonɛkĩ ɛtáwɛ kĩ yabula lɔkɔ pii kade nɛ Asia tite akũ. Eke otse lɛmɛ kĩ ntɛ fɔ́ana ye sɔwa ni, yaana nɛ Yerusalem nɛ Pentekoste luwi a akũ.
44020017	Lɛmɛ kĩ buwo Mileto a Paulo do batɔ nɛ Efeso batɛ badonɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bɛyaatsɛlamɔ ye nɛ awã.
44020018	Ade kĩ bɛyaa a, ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi a flee minyina ayekĩ ndzi nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, kito lɔkɔ a kĩ ĩya nɛ Asia tite akũ a kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a.
44020019	Mimɔ́ ayekĩ ndɔla yĩ akũ nsum Boe Ɔlate, titɔ kĩ nna nɛ lubo kamɔ mɔ kabe kamɛ, nɛ ayekĩ Yudafɔ wɛ kĩ bakɔ yĩ sũ.
44020020	Lɛmɛ minyina kĩ ntákɔla mi ɔnɔkɔali a. Fɔtsa a flee kĩ ĩnyina nɛ boe Ɔlate akũ a, ade foe ntsa mi a. Ntsa foe nɛ kanade flee anɛ mɔ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ.
44020021	Ade kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ ntsã mmini ni, ndɛ Yudafɔ mɔ Helafɔ flee mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ bɛya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa bɛtɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu bido.
44020022	“Finyaakĩĩ manaa Yerusalem nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kawɛ onukpɛ̃, nɛ kĩ ĩnyína lɛtsa kĩ laaya nɛ yĩ akũ nɛ awã a.
44020023	Lɛmɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ odi nyɛ odi kamɛ kĩ ntsã ni, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a fɔ̃ ĩnyi kĩ maawa kɔla nɛ lubo kamɔ kamɛ.
44020024	Yĩ nkpã lɛla nfasɔ adima, ntɛ ntápuli nkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu do yĩ kĩ nkɛna a. Lɛtsa kĩ edo yĩ kĩ nkɛna nyɛ kĩ nkaabi bati Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a, mɔ ayekĩ edeĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa boe.
44020025	“Finyaakĩĩ ĩnyina kĩ mi a flee kĩ minu kĩ ntsa mi fɔtsa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ, bɔmɔ́ mi bɔlaabuki bɔmɔ́ akũ dadaada.
44020026	Nɛ foesũ mabi mi paa nviã kĩĩ, kĩ ntɛ odi yɛla ye nkpã ni, nnɛ́ yĩ nfumusu fɔanɛ.
44020027	Kitonɛkĩ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ntákɔla mi lɛtsama nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ.
44020028	Nɛ foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ. Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛpau mi ndɛ lɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩ mipi ye babi a kĩ edo mi nɛ awɛ a kapi wĩ. Mipi be kapi wĩ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔa ye Obi babɔanɛ eko nɛ tite ɛnyɛ be.
44020029	Ade ĩnyina yededeede kĩ ntɛ ndzakũ ni, bati kpa aayawo nɛ mi kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛyalɛ mi ndɛ ayekĩ kulikii awo nɛ baveli kamɛ a.
44020030	Nɛ mi mɔa awɛ kamɛ malo ni, bavãlɛvã aanɛ, lɔkɔa bɛkpã batɛ badonɛ pii bɛtsãmɛna fɔvã fɔtsa katsa a osi akũ.
44020031	Foesũ midã kadã wĩ, lɔkɔa mite anɛ ayekĩ nkɔa anɛ mɔ babe ntsa mi fɔtsa lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee nɛ futeli ɛlalɛ a kĩ nna nɛ mi kamɛ a.
44020032	“Finyaakĩĩ, nkɔa mi mado nɛ Baguma awɛ kĩ ɛdãmɛna mi akũ mɔ ye fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔabumɛna bati a, fudo mi katɛkado kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ fɔ́akɛna mi ode fɔtsa banyanɛ ndɛ bikĩ ɛpau ɛkpa ye akũ a aye.
44020033	Anɛ tábɛɛlɛ yĩ nɛ odima sika ngbã ĩye suwovoe ĩye tilima akũ.
44020034	Mi awɛ minyina kĩ yĩ awɛ kĩĩ nkɔa nkɛna adzuma ndãmɛna yĩ mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ yĩ a lɛmɛ akũ a.
44020035	Nkɛna fukĩĩ bamɛ flee nnɛɛ matsa mi ayekĩ mikɛna adzuma kɔɔba mibumɛna ahiãfɔ, ade mite anɛ nɛ lɛtsa kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu lɛ a kĩ, ‘Kakpa deĩ nhila kɛbɛ̃ katɛ.’ ”
44020036	Ade ke kĩ Paulo lɛ kɔdzɛla eyua a, eke aduli ade bɛmɔ be flee bɔbɔa mpaɛ a.
44020037	Lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkakla be a, bɛkɔa anɛ mɔ babe bɛkatu kaboomu ye.
44020038	Lɛtsa a kĩ de lɛfɔ̃ biwo ɔblɔ koũ a nyɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ kĩ bɛmɔ be bɛláabuki bɛmɔ akũ dadaada a. Biyi ye osi bɛnawo ɔkɔlɔ a ɔwɛ̃ nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ.
44021001	Kĩ bɔkla akũ buyua a, budzi ɔkɔlɔ bɔtsã kpĩĩ bunyina bɔnaa Kos. Kĩ kade nyina a buwo Rodo ade bɔtɛ̃ bɔnaa Patara a.
44021002	Awã naa budzi ɔkɔlɔ odi kĩ yanaa Foenike.
44021003	Bɔmɔ́ Kipro tite a nɛ lɔtɔ, ade bɔtsã te kayɔ kayɔ a bɔnaduma nɛ Tiro, nɛ Siria tite akũ, awã kĩ baanyɛ fɔtsa flee a kĩ ɔkɔlɔ a nɔnɛ a.
44021004	Bɔmɔ́ batɛ badonɛ badi nɛ awã, ade bɔna nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛkwansieda mɔa a, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tsã be akũ bibi Paulo kĩ ɛtanaa Yerusalem.
44021005	Kĩ boe kadzakũ wo ɔtɔ a, batɛ badonɛ a mɔ batsɔ̃ mɔ babi flee yi boe osi bɛnawo mpo abuĩ. Awã na boe flee buke aduli bɔbɔa mpaɛ.
44021006	Kĩ bɔkla akũ buyua a, buwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ade be malo bimuniki bɛnaa fɔla a.
44021007	Bɔbɔɛ buto Tiro ade bɔnadza nɛ Ptolemia a. Bɔnawɔ̃na batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã ade budzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ luwi mɔa a.
44021008	Kĩ kade nyina a, bɔdzakũ nɛ awã bɔnaa Kaisarea. Bɔnase nɛ Filipo, Kalɛ Wĩ a Lɛtsã odenɛ a awã. Ɛnyɛ babumɛnanɛ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛpau nɛ Yerusalem a kamɛ ɔmɔa.
44021009	Edeĩ bayitsɔ̃ ɛna kĩ bidzí fɔnyɔ, ade bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ lɛmɛ a.
44021010	Bɔna nɛ awã fuwi fudi ade foe kamɛ a Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a kĩ bavɛ Agabo to Yudea ɛya a.
44021011	Ade kĩ ɛya nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ a ɛbɔɛ Paulo ɔwɛ̃ a kĩ yakɔa kaboomu kate a esuli ye mɔa awɛ akpɔ mɔ abɔa, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a bo ni, ade aye Yudafɔ nɛ Yerusalem aasuli ɔwɛ̃ kĩĩ ɔlate bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a awɛ a.”
44021012	Kĩ boe flee bunu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bɔmɔ́ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã flee a buke Paulo aduli kĩ ɛtanaa Yerusalem.
44021013	Lɛmɛ Paulo bi boe kĩ, “Litsa nyɛ kabe a kĩ mikɔa miaveli yĩ akpɔ? Mmanɛ akũ nkpa nnɛ́ kĩ bisuli yĩ nɛ Yerusalem odi lɛmɛ kĩ maaku nɛ awã nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu sũ.”
44021014	Kĩ bɔmɔ́ kĩ bɔláapuli bɔdani ye adzuni sũ ni, bɔfɔnɛ ye awɛ ade bɔlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate kawɛ kɛya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
44021015	Fuwi fudi liti ni, bɔmanɛ akũ ade bɔdzakũ bɔnaa Yerusalem.
44021016	Batɛ badonɛ badi to Kaisarea bitomɔ boe bɔnaa. Kĩ buwo awã a, bɛkpã boe bɔnase nɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi kĩ bavɛ Mnason awã. Eto Kipro ade ɛnyɛ batɛ badonɛ batɔnyade a kamɛ ɔmɔa a.
44021017	Kĩ buwo Yerusalem a batɛ badonɛ a tɛ boe mɔ kawɔlɛ.
44021018	Kĩ kade nyina a, Paulo kpã boe bɔnamɔ Yakobo mɔ batɛ badonɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ flee a nɛ Yerusalem.
44021019	Ade kĩ bɔnawɔ̃nɔ akũ buyua a, Paulo bɔa be amandiɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna nɛ ye kamini nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kamɛ a akũ.
44021020	Kĩ bitse fɔlɛtsa a biyua a, be flee bimu Baguma ade bibi ye kĩ, “Boe ɔwaɛ̃, dã ayekĩ Yudafɔ mpim mpim tɛ bido, ade bipini Mose mbla a mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a.
44021021	Bati badi bi be kĩ ɔtsa Yudafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ fude fude a kĩ bɛtakɛna nɛ Mose mbla mɔ boe tɛmaniɛ a akũ, ade obuki ɔtsa kĩ bɛtatsua be babi fɔkpati lɛmɛ a.
44021022	Baanu kokooko kĩ ɔya nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna finyaa?”
44021023	Ade ke bɛkpa ye adzuni kĩ “Budeĩ bati ɛna kĩ bido lidetɔ.
44021024	Kpã be kanamɛna Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ kabumɔ be minyɛ lɔlɔ kakpa lidetɔ a kase foe kɔtɔ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ odi nyɛ odi lɔmɔ kĩ fɔvã bɛma bite nɛ nɔ akũ, lɔkɔa fɔtsa lɛmɛ kĩ opini Mose mbla a kapini wĩ.
44021025	Batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kɔ̃ ni, bɔtsɛlɛ be ovoli bubi be kĩ bɛtabuki bɛnya fɔtsa kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃, bɛfɔ̃ babɔanɛ kanya, bɛtaba bayaɛ kĩ bɛtátsua be fɔmɔ, lɔkɔa bɛfɔ̃ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ.”
44021026	Foesũ kĩ kade nyina a, Paulo kpã banyole a, ade bɔnakɛna lɔlɔ kakpa tsɔli tsɔli amaniɛ a. Ke liti a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a ɛnakpa basɔfɔ kanyi nɛ fuwi a kĩ tɔlɔ kakpa amaniɛ a aawũna, mɔ futetsa a lɛmɛ kĩ yaama be bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ a nɛ be lɔlɔ.
44021027	Ade kĩ kite sukuloo lɔkɔa fuwi evũkɔnɔ a aawo ɔtɔ a, Yudafɔ badi kĩ bito Asia kamɛ a yamɔ Paulo nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Bido ɔtutũ nɛ bati a badi kamɛ ade bipi Paulo a.
44021028	Bɛkabɔa fɔwɔla kalɛ kĩ, “Israelfɔ miyaatɛ mɔ boe tsoo! Ade oti kĩĩ tsɛ̃ yamini nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, yabi bati kĩ bɛtakɛna nɛ boe Yudafɔ mbla aku a. Ye lɛmɛ ɛkpã Grikifɔ ɛyawomɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ ebula boe kakɔ kpalɛwa kĩĩ.”
44021029	Bɛlɛ foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ luwi a bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛmɔ́ Paulo mɔ Trofimo kĩ eto Efeso a, kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ bamini nɛ Yerusalem. Nɛ foe sũ bɛkɔna kĩ ɛkpã ye ewomɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ.
44021030	Nɛ fɔwɔla kabɔa a sũ, akũ nyɛnɛ bati a flee ade biwula atsɛ yoo bɛnatsɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Badi vɛlɛ Paulo bɛnɛmɛna ade bɛbalɛ tunyukpɛ̃ flee a.
44021031	Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ ye a, Romafɔ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi nu kĩ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a flee deĩ nɛ ɔtutũ kamɛ mɔ fɔwɔla kabɔa.
44021032	Deedimɔapɛ ɛkpã sodzafɔ badi bɛnaa awã kĩ bɛkakɛna hũnyɛhũnyɛ a. Kĩ bati kĩĩ mɔ sodzafɔ mɔ be ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a pɛ bɛfɔ̃ Paulo katuli.
44021033	Awã naa, sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a fɔ̃ bipi Paulo ade bido ye nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ nviã a. Ade evia etse oti a odu kĩ yanɛ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ de ɛkɛna a.
44021034	Bati a flee kanyɛ tunukpɛ̃ futefute. Kĩ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a lanu lɛtsama kayɔ pɔtii etomɛna be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ fɔwɔla mɔ ɔsĩ a sũ ni, ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔa Paulo bɛnado nɛ kɔla a kamɛ.
44021035	-
44021036	Kĩ bɛkɔa bade kɔla onyukpɛ̃ kadekɔ̃ a, fɔya nɛ sodzafɔ a kamɛ kĩ bɛbɔɛ Paulo bɛdɛla nɛ ode nɛ bati kɔdabu a kalɔkpa a kĩ bɛna nɛ Paulo akũ sũ. Ade bitomɔ be mɔ fɔwɔla kpaa kabɔa kĩ, “Mikɔ ye! Mikɔ ye!”
44021037	Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkɔa ye bado nɛ kɔla kamɛ a, Paulo bi sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ. “Nwɛ kĩ malɔmɛna mɔ nɔ sukuloo.” Ade ke sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Yie! Alɛ Griki tide?”
44021038	Ade ebuki evia ye kĩ, “Nɛ nɔ nyɛ Egipteni a kĩ lɔkɔ lidi ɛkpã awudifɔ mpim ɛna biyidza bɛdza nɛ abãã akũ, kĩ bilo bɛnaa kɔsa kamɛ a?”
44021039	Ade Paulo kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yudani manɛ. Bɛma yĩ nɛ Tarso nɛ Kilikia tite akũ. Ade ɔmatɔ a na ni, nnɛ́ ɔmatɔ kabii yanɛ. Foesũ make nɔ aduli fɔ̃ nlɛmɔ bati kĩĩ kɔdzɛla.”
44021040	Adeke ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ tunɔ kĩ Paulo ɛlɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla a. Paulo nɛ ɛyadza nɛ onyukpɛ̃ kadekɔ̃ a, ade ete awɛ nɛ bati kɔdabu akũ kĩ bɛkɛna dĩĩ a. Kĩ bɛfɔ̃ fɔwɔla kabɔa a, ɛlɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla nɛ Yudafɔ tide kamɛ kĩ,
44022001	“Nda amɛ mɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, agoo! Mifɔ̃ ĩnyɛ yĩ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mitse.”
44022002	Kĩ binu kĩ Yudafɔ tide kamɛ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a, bɛkɛna fɔwɔla kabɔa nɛ kayɔ bibu. Ade ke Paulo bi be kĩ,
44022003	“Yudani manɛ ade bɛma yĩ nɛ Tarso, nɛ Kilikia tite akũ a. Lɛmɛ Yerusalem nɛ awĩ bɛdɔɔla yĩ, nkɔlɛ fɔtsa nɛ Gamaliel kayɔ. Bɛtsa yĩ boe bawanyɔ mbla a mɔ foe akũ amaniɛ a flee yededeede. Ade nkɔa yĩ ɔwɔlɛ flee nkpa Baguma ndɛ ayekĩ mi malo miakɛna nviã kĩĩ a.
44022004	Kito lɔkɔ a na, ntomɔ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ osi vɔɛ̃ a liti, nwɛ kĩ bɛkɔ be. Ade nkapi batsole mɔ banyole kado nɛ kɔla a.
44022005	Boe Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ aapuli bidi adansiɛ nɛ fukĩ malɛ kĩĩ akũ, kitonɛkĩ bɛkatsɛlɛ tuvoli kakpa yĩ kĩ nkɔa nkɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ. Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ manaa Damasko a ni, bɛkpa yĩ tuvoli kĩ nkɔa mma Yudafɔ nɛ awã ndza nɛ foe akũ mpili batɛ badonɛ a nsuli be nkɔa ĩyamɛna nɛ Yerusalem bɛvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ.
44022006	“Lɔkɔ a kĩ ntsɛ̃ manaa, kĩ kite sukuloo mawo Damasko, ndɛ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã kamɛ a ni, deedimɔapɛ ɔhaĩ mɔ ɔsĩ odi to ode ɛka eko nɛ yĩ akũ!
44022007	Adeke nka ntɔ nɛ tite, ade nnu ɔlɛdo odi kĩ ɛkavia yĩ kĩ, ‘Saulo, Saulo, nde sũ oyidza ɔdza nɛ yĩ akũ lɔmɔ?’
44022008	“Ade nvia kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, nɔ owei anɛ?’ “Ebuki ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Yesu Nazaretni a kĩ ye akũ oyidza ɔdza a.’
44022009	Bati a kĩ bɔmɔ be tsɛ̃ a mɔ́ ɔhaĩ a lɛmɛ bɛtánu oti a kĩ bɔmɔ ye lɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a odo.
44022010	“Ade nvia ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna?’ “Ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Yidza kanaa Damasko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Awã na maatsa nɔ lɛtsa a kĩ nwɛ kĩ kɛna a.’
44022011	Ɔhaĩ kĩĩ kɔ yĩ anɛ foesũ bati a kĩ bɔmɔ be tsɛ̃ a lipi yĩ nɛ kɔkpɔ bɛkpã yĩ bɔdzakũ bɔnawo Damasko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
44022012	“Onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Anania na nɛ awã. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yavila Baguma ade yakɛna nɛ boe mbla lɛmɛ akũ yededeede a. Yudafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã flee a akpa ye obu.
44022013	Oti kĩĩ yadza nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃ ade ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Nwaɛ̃ Saulo bu kamɔ fɔkɔ!’ Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ kpalɛ yededeede ade mmɔ́ ye a.
44022014	“Ade ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Boe bawanyɔ Baguma lɛpau nɔ eyi kĩ nyi ye fɔwɛtsa, kamɔ ye Obi Kpalɛwa a kĩ Bɛpau a lɔkɔa kanu ye kɔdzɛla lɛmɛ.
44022015	Kɛnɛ kĩ akɔa ɔlɛdo kĩĩ ɔnamɛna kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, obi bati flee lɛtsa a kĩ ɔmɔ́ mɔ lɛtsa kĩ onu a.
44022016	Finyaakĩĩ litsa adzɔlɛ? Yidza lɔkɔa katɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ. Bɔa mpaɛ nɛ ye dĩ akũ lɔkɔa ɛkɔa nɔ titikpa ete nɔ.’
44022017	“Fukĩĩ liti a, mmuniki nnaa Yerusalem. Ade kĩ nna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ nkabɔa mpaɛ a, fɔkɔna ndɛ tida abɔɛ yĩ, ade nna kanyɛkatsa kadi a.
44022018	Ade awã na boe Ɔlate bi yĩ kĩ, ‘Wɛ sɔwa kadzakũ nɛ Yerusalem kitonɛkĩ awĩ bati lɛláatse nɔ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ aalɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a.’
44022019	“Lɛmɛ nkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, be flee binyina kĩ yĩ lɛkapili bikĩ bɛtɛ nɔ bido a nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a kabo be.
44022020	Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkakɔ nɔ ɔdansini Stefano a, yĩ malo ntunɔ. Foesũ bɛnyɛ be tɛtadiɛ bɛkpa yĩ nlɛ ade bɛkatalɛ ye boe a.’
44022021	“Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate bi yĩ kĩ, ‘Yidza kanaa, maado nɔ mɔ lugo nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ!’ ”
44022022	Lɔkɔ kĩĩ flee a, bati a dza dĩĩ bɛkatse ye kalɛ a. Lɛmɛ mɔ ye kalɛ nkaɛ kawũna pɛ, be flee bɔbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Aa! Kɛtáfɛta kĩ yadzi nkpã! Mikpã ye minamɛna minaakɔ ye!”
44022023	Nɛ kĩ bɛna kalɔkpa paa sũ ni, bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ade bido be tɛtadiɛ kayɛlɛ, mɔ kudu kata nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ awɛ a.
44022024	Ade ke kawũ banɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a fɔ̃ bɛkpã ye biwomɛna nɛ kɔla kamɛ kĩ bɛnaabo ye lɔkɔa binyi lɛtsa a sũ kĩ Yudafɔ a kpa biko nɛ ye akũ lɔmɔ.
44022025	Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkasuli ye a, Paulo via kawũ banɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ, “Osi waa kĩ babo Romani ntɛ bɛtádzɛ ye fɔlɛtsa tɔ̃?”
44022026	Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ naa be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃ ade evia ye kĩ, “Litsa akɛna nɛ awĩ a? Onyole kĩĩ boni Romani yanɛ!”
44022027	Foesũ kawũ banɔnɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a ya nɛ Paulo sɛkɛ̃ ade evia ye kĩ, “Abo nde? Romani anɛ?” Ade ke Paulo kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Romani manɛ!”
44022028	Kawũ banɔnɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ malo Romani manɛ. Yĩ kɔ̃ nse kɔtɔ baũ fɔmɔ ndani nkɛna Romani!” Ade Paulo bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃ yĩ bamanɛ flee nyɛ Romafɔ.”
44022029	Ade ke kĩ bati a kĩ bɛdza kĩ babo ye bivia ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa nu kĩ Romani yanɛ a, bɛvɛlɛ akũ bɛnaa liti. Kĩ be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a nyi kĩ Romani yanɛ a, libe wo ye paa, kitonɛkĩ ye lɛkpa osi kĩ bisuli Paulo bibo ye.
44022030	Kĩ kade nyina, kawũ banɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a wɛ kĩ yanyi lɛtsa a kĩ de sũ bɛbɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ Paulo akũ. Ɛvɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ be fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ ɛkpɔta. Ɛfɔ̃ biwũnya tɔwɛ̃ nɛ Paulo akũ ade bɛkpã ye bɛyadzɛla nɛ be anɛ kamɛ kĩ bawɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a kamɛ a.
44023001	Ade kĩ Paulo ko anɛ ɛdã Yudafɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a kĩ bikoni dĩĩ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a, ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Israelfɔ, yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ nɛ ayekĩ ndzi nkpã nɛ Baguma anɛ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a.”
44023002	Kĩ Anania, Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a kĩ ɛna nɛ awã nu ayekĩ Paulo kpa mbuayɛ a, ebi bikĩ bɛdza bifuãmɔ Paulo kĩ bɛbɔa ye nɛ onukpɛ̃.
44023003	Ade awã mɔ Paulo bi ye kĩ, “Baguma lɛmɛ aabalɛ nɔ awɛ! Nɔ seebi kĩ bikputa se fɔtsa ovoe bɛdzɛla anɛ! Litsa fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ anɛ? Mbla akũ ɔtsɛ̃ adzɛmɔ yĩ, lɛmɛ ade ye mɔapɛ a ɔlamɛna kafum a, nɛ kĩ ɔkpa kɔbɛ̃ bɛbalɛ yĩ ɔlɔtɔ sũ!”
44023004	Ade ke bikĩ bɛdzɛ nɛ Paulo ɔwɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee ovũna lɔmɔ?”
44023005	Paulo kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ ĩnyi kĩ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee yanɛ ni, kufɛ ntádo ye onukpɛ̃ lɔmɔ. Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Talɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ bikĩ banya mi akũ a akũ.’ ”
44023006	Ade kĩ Paulo mɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ bati a kĩ bɛkpɔta nɛ awã a be kamɛ badi nyɛ Zadukifɔ ade badi lɛmɛ nyɛ Farisifɔ a sũ ni, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, Farisini manɛ! Farisifɔ lɛmɛ lɛma yĩ! Nviã kĩĩ badzɛmɔ yĩ kitonɛkĩ ntɛ banɔkpa kabuki kayidza kadzi nkpã a ndo sũ!”
44023007	Kĩ Paulo sila ɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua pɛ, kavɛlɛ ya nɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ a kayite, ade bɛsɛ̃ be akũ a.
44023008	Kitonɛkĩ Zadukifɔ alɛ kĩ banɔkpa lábuki kayidza, ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛláa, ade hũhũ lɛmɛ lɛláa a. Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ kɔ̃ tɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ flee bido.
44023009	Ɔtutũ kpale wo nɛ be kamɛ. Farisifɔ mbla batsanɛ a dza nɛ Paulo liti kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Ade ke bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Bɔtámɔ lɛtsa kpa lidima nɛ ye akũ! Ɔsa hũhũ adi ĩye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi alɛmɔ ye kɔdzɛla!”
44023010	Fɔwɔla kabɔa a buki fude nɛ ode fubu. Ade bati a flee pini Paulo bɛkavɛlɛ kadu kanamɛna kayamɛna a. Kĩ sodza ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a vila kĩ baavɛlɛ ye bɛpããpãã sũ ni, ebi ye sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛka bɛnaatɛ ye bɛnaado nɛ kɔla.
44023011	Luwi a lɛnyɛ a, boe Ɔlate yadza nɛ Paulo ɔwɛ̃ ebi ye kĩ, “Paulo do ɔwɔlɛ. Ayekĩ odi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ nɛ Yerusalem nɛ awĩ a, ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ akɛna nɛ Roma lɛmɛ a.”
44023012	Kĩ kade nyina a, Yudafɔ badi lɔ fubo bɛkpa be akũ kĩ ntɛ bɛtákɔ Paulo ni, bɛláanya ĩye bɛmɔa!
44023013	Bati kĩĩ lidede aana ndɛ be tɛna mɔ liti.
44023014	Ade ke bibuki bɛnaa basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ be lɔtɔ banyanɛ sɛkɛ̃ bibi be kĩ, “Bɔlɔ fubo kĩ bɔlaanya ĩye bɔmɔa kɛnaawo kĩ bɔkɔ Paulo.
44023015	Foesũ mimɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a mibi sodzafɔ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, ebuki ɛkɔa Paulo ɛyamɛna nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ nɛ awĩ. Mikɛna ndɛ miawɛ kĩ miavia ye fɔlɛtsa fudi mibu. Ntɛ bɛkɔa ye bayamɛna ni, bɔ́akɔ ye nɛ osi.”
44023016	Lɛmɛ Paulo ɔfanyole odi nu fɔlɛtsa a flee kĩ bɛlɛ a, ade ewula atsɛ ɛnaa kɔla kamɛ, ɛnabi Paulo lɛtsa a kĩ de bɛlɛ a.
44023017	Ade ke Paulo vɛ sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã kamɛ ɔmɔa ebi ye kĩ, “Kpã obisɛ̃ kĩĩ minaa ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ sɛkɛ̃. Ɛnɛɛ kalɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ yaabi ye.”
44023018	Foesũ sodzani a kpã kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a bɛnaa be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃, ade ebi ye kĩ, “Paulo a kĩ bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ nɛ awĩ a lɛvɛ yĩ ebi yĩ kĩ nkpã kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kĩĩ mma nɔ, lɔkɔa kibi nɔ kalɛ kadi.”
44023019	Ade sodzafɔ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a pi kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a nɛ kɔkpɔ bɛnaa ɔɔwɛ̃ ade evia ye kĩ, “Litsa awɛ kĩ abi yĩ?”
44023020	Ade ke mɔ ebi ye kĩ, “Yudafɔ badi kɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bayaake nɔ aduli lɔkɔa kunya ɔkpã Paulo ɔyamɛna nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃, mɔ kakɔna kĩ bavia ye fɔlɛtsa fudi.
44023021	Lɛmɛ tatse be kitonɛkĩ bati ndɛ be tɛna bɛla nɛ osi badzɔlɛ ye. Bati kĩĩ lɔ fubo kĩ mbɔɛntɛ bɛkɔ Paulo fɔmɔ baata funitsã onukpɛ̃. Nɛ foesũ bɛmanɛ akũ bɛnabɛla badzɔlɛ nɔ osi kakpa. Bɛnabɛla nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ kitonɛkĩ bɛtɛ bido kĩ aatunɔ ɔkpa be.”
44023022	Sodzafɔ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a si ye mbla kĩ, “Tafɔ̃ odima libuki enu lɛtsa a kĩ ɔyabi yĩ nɛ awĩ a dadaada.” Ade ke ɛnyɛ ye osi ɛdzakũ a.
44023023	Ade ke sodzafɔ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a vɛ ye banɔkɔɛ̃ nviã ade ebi be kĩ, “Miwɛ sodzafɔ ɔha nviã kĩ baanaa Kaisarea nviã lɛnyɛ. Miwɛ bikĩ balɛ fɔtsɔɛ ɔha nviã, mɔ bikĩ badzi bapɔnkɔ lɛmɛ be bati aduesɔũ.
44023024	Miwɛ ɔpɔnkɔ mikpa Paulo edzi nɛ ye akũ lɔkɔa mikpã ye bɔɛɛ, mima abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Felike.”
44023025	Ade ke ɛtsɛlɛ ovoli odi ɛkpa abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ,
44023026	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ Klaudio Lisia sɛkɛ̃. Mawɔ̃na nɔ, boe Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Felike.
44023027	Yudafɔ badi pi oti kĩĩ, ade bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ ye a. Lɛmɛ kĩ bɔmɔ sodzafɔ buwo awã a, nnu kĩ Romani yanɛ sũ ni, nfɔ̃ sodzafɔ a tɛ ye nɛ be awɛ.
44023028	Foesũ nkpã ye ĩyamɛna nɛ be fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ kĩ manyi lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a.
44023029	Ĩyamɔ kĩ lɛtsa kĩ bɛbɔɛ nɛ ye akũ a nyɛ Yudafɔ ɔsum mbla akũ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔnyɛ́ fukĩ bado ye nɛ kɔla kamɛ ĩye bɛkɔ ye.
44023030	Adeke kĩ bibi yĩ kĩ bɛlamɔ nhihiɛ kakɛna kĩ baakɔ ye sũ ni, nkɔna kĩ makɔa ye mma nɔ. Mbi bikĩ bɛbɔɛ kalɛ nɛ ye akũ a ku kĩ bɛkɔa ke bɛma nɔ.
44023031	Foesũ luwi a lɛnyɛ a sodzafɔ a kpã Paulo bɛnawo Antipatre.
44023032	Kĩ kade nyina, sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛtsã abɔa a muniki bɛnaa kɔla kamɛ, ade bɛfɔ̃ bapɔnkɔ badzinɛ a kpã Paulo bɛnamɛna Kaisarea a.
44023033	Kĩ biwo awã a, bɛkɔa Paulo mɔ ovoli a kĩ bɛnɛɛ a bɛkpa abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a.
44023034	Kĩ ɛkã ovoli a eyua a, evia Paulo amantam a kĩ eto. Ade kĩ enyi kĩ Paulo to Kilikia a, ebi ye kĩ,
44023035	“Maanaa nɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ yededeede ntɛ bikĩ mimɔ be mina kalɛ a ya nɛ awĩ.” Ade ke ɛkpa sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã a kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa Paulo bido nɛ kɔla a kĩ Lɛgã Herodes ke a kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛkaadã ye akũ.
44024001	Fuwi elo liti a, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Anania, Yudafɔ lɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ kĩ bavɛ Tertulo naa Kaisarea. Bɛya nɛ Felike sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bayaanyɛ Paulo nfumusu bɛtsa ye.
44024002	Kĩ bɛvɛ Paulo bɛyamɛna a, Tertulo yi Paulo onukpɛ̃ katsua kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɛ nɔ nyansã mɔ adzuni kĩ ɔnɛɛ akpã boe sũ ni, bɔna lukudɔ nɛ lɔkɔ pii kamɛ. Ade kavɛmɛna pii lɛmɛ ya nɛ boe tite akũ a.
44024003	Fukĩĩ nyɛ fɔtsa kĩ fuwo boe Yudafɔ flee anɛ.
44024004	Bɔake nɔ aduli kĩ tse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ maabi nɔ nɛ onyole kĩĩ akũ a.
44024005	Kitonɛkĩ bɔmɔ́ ye buyi ɔsũ kĩ ɔdzɛ odonɛ yanɛ, ade ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ yadani Yudafɔ kakɔna nɛ katinya kamɛ kĩ bɛkɛna fɔtsa basa bitia abãã a. Ɛnyɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɛkpa Nazaretfɔ katsu a.
44024006	Foe liti a bɔmɔ́ lɛmɛ kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yakɛna fɔtsa kĩ fɔado boe Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a efĩĩ, ade bupi ye a. Foesũ bɔwɛ kĩ bɔadzɛmɔ ye nɛ boe mbla onukpɛ̃.
44024007	Lɛmɛ kawũ banɔnɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ Lisia kɔa kɔbɛ̃ ɛyate ye nɛ boe awɛ.
44024008	Ntɛ ovia oti kĩĩ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa ni, aapuli onyi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔbɔɛ nɛ ye akũ a otomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃.”
44024009	Ade ke Yudafɔ a flee tunɔ mɔ onukpɛ̃ mɔa bɛlɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Tertulo lɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
44024010	Kĩ abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a vɛ Paulo kĩ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a, eyi kayɔ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlɛga, ĩnyina kĩ nɛ futeli pii kĩ fɔtɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ ni, nɔ adzɛ Yudafɔ fɔlɛtsa. Nɛ foesũ kawɔlɛ de yĩ kĩ maanyɛ yĩ onukpɛ̃ nɛ nɔ anɛ.
44024011	Aanu kĩ fɔ́ana ndɛ fuwi ewua-nviã kĩ ĩya nɛ Yerusalem ĩyaabɔa afɔliɛ nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ.
44024012	Ade odima támɔ kĩ bɔmɔ odi bɔkɛna ɔdzɛ ĩye ndo ɔtutũ nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ, be fɔtsɛnakɔ̃, ĩye kakɔ kadi nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a.
44024013	Ade bati kĩĩ kamɛ odima lɛláapuli eke otse nɛ lɛtsama akũ pɔtii kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ nɛ awĩ a ni, ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ.
44024014	Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ ntunɔ nyɛ kĩ masum boe bawanyɔ Baguma, ade ntomɛna Osi a kĩ balɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ́ osi wĩ a. Ntɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tuvoli a kamɛ a ndo.
44024015	Ndeĩ kɔnɛte nɛ Baguma akũ ndɛ ayekĩ be malo bideĩ, kĩ Baguma aadzɛla bati wĩ mɔ bati kpa flee etomɛna kanɔkpa.
44024016	Nɛ kɔnɛte kĩĩ sũ ni, mabɔa mbɔdi paa kĩ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ɛkpalɛ yededeede nɛ Baguma mɔ batidziwa anɛ.
44024017	“Ade futeli pii kĩ ndzakũ nɛ Yerusalem a. Finyaakĩĩ ĩyaate ahiãfɔ fɔtsa lɔkɔa mbɔa afɔliɛ nkpa Baguma.
44024018	Kĩ mayua lɔlɔ kakpa amaniɛ a, Yudafɔ badi yamɔ yĩ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Nnɛ́ bɔmɔ́ bati kĩ banyɛ lɛma tsɛ̃. Ade ke ntádo ɔdzɛ odima lɛmɛ a.
44024019	Yudafɔ a kĩ bito Asia tite akũ a na nɛ awã, ade be kɛnɛ kĩ bɛyaadza nɛ nɔ anɛ kamɛ a, lɔkɔa ntɛ bideĩ kalɛ kadi nɛ yĩ akũ ni, baalɛ.
44024020	Ĩye afɔ̃ bati a kĩ bidzi nɛ awĩ a bɛlɛ kɔtɔ a kĩ bɛkɔ yĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Yudafɔ ɔmaĩ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a dzɛmɔ yĩ a.
44024021	Mbɔɛ ntɛ kalɛ mɔa a kĩ ndzɛla ɔlɛdo nlɛ kĩ, ‘Miadzɛmɔ yĩ nviã kĩĩ kitonɛkĩ ntɛ banɔkpa kayidza kadzi nkpã a ndo.’ ”
44024022	Ade Felike, oti kĩ enyina katɛkado osi vɔɛ̃ kĩĩ paa a bi Yudafɔ a kĩ, “Midzɔlɛ yĩ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Lisia aaya fɔmɔ maatsua fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ.”
44024023	Adeke ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔa Paulo bɛnado nɛ kɔla a. Lɛmɛ ebi bikĩ badãmɛna ye akũ a kĩ bɛtakɛna ye tɛnya. Ntɛ ye bakɔba badi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ni, bɛkpa be osi lɔkɔa bɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ yawɛ a bɛkpa ye.
44024024	Nɛ fuwi fudi liti ni, Felike mɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Drusila kĩ ɛnyɛ Yudani ya. Ɛfɔ̃ bɛnyɛ Paulo bɛyamɛna ade ebi be kalɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo katɛkado fɔlɛtsa akũ a.
44024025	Kĩ ɛkanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ nɛ kadzi wĩ, akũ kapi, mɔ Baguma kadzɛ a kĩ kaaya nɛ kunya kamɛ a akũ ni, libe wo Felike paa. Adeke Felike bi ye kĩ, “Yidza kanaa tɔ̃. Ntɛ nna lɔkɔ wĩ ni, maafɔ̃ bɛvɛ nɔ.”
44024026	Nɛ kĩ ɛkɔna kĩ Paulo aakpa ye litsedi sũ ni, yado bavɛ ye mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ bɛmɔ ye balɔmɛna.
44024027	Nɛ futeli nviã liti a, bɛnyɛ Felike ade bɛkɔa Porkio Festo bɛyamɛna nɛ ye kadzakɔ̃ a. Lɛmɛ kĩ Felike wɛ kĩ Yudafɔ a bɛwɛ ye kalɛ sũ ni, ɛfɔ̃ Paulo buki ɛna nɛ kɔla nɛ awã.
44025001	Kĩ Festo yawo kayite a kĩ yanya lɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a, ke fuwi ɛlalɛ liti a, eto Kaisarea ɛnaa Yerusalem.
44025002	Nɛ awã naa, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a yabi ye fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛbɔɛ nɛ Paulo akũ. Ade ke bike ye aduli kĩ,
44025003	ɛmɔ be kɔnya ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔa ye bɛyamɛna nɛ Yerusalem. Be kasui nyɛ kĩ baadzi ye osi lɔkɔa ntɛ yatɛ̃ a bɛkɔ ye.
44025004	Lɛmɛ Festo bi be kĩ, “Paulo waa kɔla nɛ Kaisare. Yĩ malo maamuniki naa awã nɛ fuwi lukũ kamɛ.
44025005	Foesũ mifɔ̃ mi banɔkɔɛ̃ a bɛya nɛ awã bɛyaanyɛ ye nfumusu a bɛtsa.”
44025006	Nɛ fuwi ɛlɛ̃ ĩye foe ewua liti ni, Festo muniki ɛnaa Kaisare, ade ke luwi lɛyade a ɛvɛ Paulo fɔlɛtsa a.
44025007	Ade ke kĩ Paulo yawo fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a, Yudafɔ a kĩ bito Yerusalem a yadza bisinya ye. Bitsua fɔlɛtsa pii bite nɛ ye akũ lɛmɛ fudima tápi ye.
44025008	Paulo nyɛ onukpɛ̃ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntáfum Yudafɔ mbla ĩye Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a ĩye Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare.”
44025009	Nɛ kĩ Festo awɛ kĩ Yudafɔ a bɛwɛ ye kalɛ sũ ni, evia Paulo kĩ, “Ɔwɛ kĩ anaa Yerusalem lɔkɔa ndzɛ nɔ fɔlɛtsa a nɛ awã mbɔɛɛ?”
44025010	Ade ke Paulo bi ye kĩ, “Oowo. Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ ndzɛ̃. Ade awĩ kɛfɛta kĩ bɛdzɛmɔ yĩ a. Onyina yededeede kĩ ntákɛna tɔkpa tidima nɛ Yudafɔ akũ.
44025011	Ntɛ nkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ yĩ ni, maatunɔ kĩ bɛkɔ yĩ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ntákɛna tɔkpa ni, kɛtáfɛta kĩ nɔ ĩye oti bɛbã akɔa yĩ edo nɛ bati kĩĩ awɛ kamɛ kĩ bɛkɔ yĩ. Nɛ foesũ nkɔa yĩ fɔlɛtsa makpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare!”
44025012	Fukĩĩ liti a, Festo mɔ ye fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a tsa fɔlɔ ade bibi ye kĩ, “Kĩ ɔkɔa nɔ fɔlɛtsa akpa Kaisare sũ ni, Kaisare sɛkɛ̃ mɔ aanaa.”
44025013	Fuwi fudi liti a, Lɛgã Agripa mɔ Bernike ya nɛ Festo sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Kaisare kĩ bɛyaawɔ̃na ye.
44025014	Bidzi nɛ awã fuwi pii, ade Festo kɔa Paulo fɔlɛtsa a ebi lɛgã a kĩ, “Onyole odi waa kɔla nɛ awĩ kĩ Felike kɔa ye fɔlɛtsa ɛkpa yĩ kĩ ndzɛ.
44025015	Kĩ nnaa Yerusalem a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃ a tsua ye onukpɛ̃ bɛkpa yĩ ade bɛwɛ kĩ nkɔ ye kɔtɔ a.
44025016	“Nfɔ̃ binyi kĩ Romafɔ mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛkɔ oti fɔmɔ baadzɛmɔ ye. Kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkpa ye osi bɛmɔ bikĩ bideĩ fɔlɛtsa a bɛkpɔta anɛ mɔ anɛ fɔmɔ bɛlɛ foe.
44025017	Foesũ kĩ bɛya nɛ awĩ a, ntátɛ̃ ndzi nɛ kalɛ kĩĩ akũ. Kĩ kade sila kinyina a, nfɔ̃ bɛkpã oti kĩĩ bɛyamɛna.
44025018	Lɛmɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ bitomɛna ye akũ a vɛmɛna nɛ fukĩ nkɔna kĩ baalɛ a akũ.
44025019	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ nɛ awĩ a to be kasum mɔ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yesu kĩ eku, lɛmɛ Paulo kɔ̃ tsɛ̃ yalɛ kĩ ebuki edzi nkpã akũ!
44025020	Fɔkɛna yĩ basaa ade ĩnyína ayekĩ matsua fɔlɛtsa a kamɛ a. Foesũ nvia Paulo ntɛ ɛwɛ kĩ nkɔa ye nnamɛna Yerusalem lɔkɔa ɛnaanyɛ ye akũ onukpɛ̃ nɛ awã.
44025021	Lɛmɛ Paulo lɛ kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ bɛkɔa ye fɔlɛtsa bɛkpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare. Ade nfɔ̃ bimunikimɔ ye bɛnado nɛ kɔla kɛnawo kĩ maakɔa ye mma Kaisare a.”
44025022	Ade ke Lɛgã Agripa bi Festo kĩ “Yĩ mɔawɛ mawɛ kĩ matse ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a.” Ade Festo bi ye kĩ, “Aatse ye kunya!”
44025023	Kĩ kade nyina a, Lɛgã Agripa mɔ Bernike hɛhɛ akũ mɔ fɔgãtsa, bɛnɛ bɛya nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a. Ade kawũ banɔnɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a tomɔ be bɛya a. Festo nyɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ bɛkpã Paulo bɛyamɛna.
44025024	Ade Festo lɛ kĩ, “Lɛgã Agripa mɔ mi a flee kĩ mikpɔta nɛ awĩ a, onyole kĩĩ nyɛ oti kĩ Yudafɔ nɛ Yerusalem mɔ Kaisare wɛ kĩ bɛkɔ!
44025025	Lɛmɛ nɛ yĩ kamɔ kamɛ ni, ɛtákɛna lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ ye. Kĩ ye a lɛmɛ ɛlɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ye fɔlɛtsa yakpa boe Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ sũ ni, yĩ malo ntásĩ.
44025026	Lɛmɛ litsa koũ maatsɛlɛ nkɔa mmɛna yĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a? Kitonɛkĩ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ɛtákɛna nfumusu adima. Ade foesũ nkɔa ye ĩyamɛna nɛ mi anɛ kamɛ titiliwu nɔ Lɛgã Agripa kĩ ntɛ bɔdzɛ ye fɔlɛtsa ni lɔkɔa maana kadi ntsɛlɛ nɛ ye akũ mma ye.
44025027	Kitonɛkĩ fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ bakɔa odi kĩ ɛwaa kɔla bɛma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛtámɔ tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna a bɛtsa.”
44026001	Ade ke Agripa bi Paulo kĩ, “Osi waa kĩ apuli ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla.” Foesũ Paulo dɛla awɛ ade ɛlɛ kĩ,
44026002	“Boe Ɔlate Agripa, nna lɔlɔ wĩ kĩ maanyɛ yĩ akũ onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ foesũ Yudafɔ bɔɛ kalɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a akũ, nɛ nɔ anɛ.
44026003	Kitonɛkĩ onyina Yudafɔ tɛdzɛ mɔ be tɛmaniɛ a flee kanyina wĩ. Foesũ na ɔwɔlɛ katse yĩ fɔlɛtsa.
44026004	“Yudafɔ flee nyina ayekĩ ndzi nkpã kito yĩ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ nɛ boe ɔtɔ mɔ Yerusalem lɛmɛ.
44026005	Ade ntɛ baalɛ ɔnɔkɔali nɛ yĩ akũ ni, baanyi kĩ ĩnyɛ Farisini kĩ mabu Yudafɔ mbla mɔ tɛmaniɛ a flee kaba mbla adi nyɛ adi.
44026006	Finyaakĩĩ ndzɛ̃ badzɛmɔ yĩ nɛ ayekĩ yĩ anɛ teĩ nɛ Baguma kalɛ a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa boe bawanyɔ a sũ.
44026007	Ade foesũ Yudafɔ futete ewua-nviã bɔa mbɔdi kĩ basum Baguma lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee lɔkɔa bɛna kɔnɛte kĩĩ odu a. Boe Ɔlate, ade fukĩĩ sũ Yudafɔ a bɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ yĩ akũ a.
44026008	Nde sũ fudeĩ mi ɔsĩ kĩ miatɛ mido kĩ Baguma adzɛla banɔkpa?
44026009	“Lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, nkɔa nte nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ mayidza ndza nɛ bikĩ bitomɔ Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ Nazaretni a akũ.
44026010	Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ mpili bati kpalɛwa pii ndo nɛ kɔla kamɛ nɛ Yerusalem. Ade ke ntɛ bakɔ be lɛmɛ matunɔ nɛ foe akũ a.
44026011	Ntomɔ be nkakɛna be tɛnya flee kɛnawo tɛmatɔ bɛbã kĩ tideĩ mɔ lugo a malo kamɛ. Nfɔ̃ bɛvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ flee, ndza nɛ be akũ kĩ bɛlɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Yesu akũ.
44026012	“Ade kakɔna kĩĩ odu nnɛɛ manaa Damasko, mɔ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa yĩ a.
44026013	Boe Ɔlate, kĩ ntsɛ̃ nɛ osi manaa mɔ suwa ketee a, mmɔ́ ɔhaĩ odi kĩ ɛkpalɛ ɛba suwa, kĩ ɛmɔanɛ eto ode ɛyako nɛ bɔmɔ́ bikĩ bɔtsɛ̃ bɔanaa akũ.
44026014	Kĩ boe flee bɔka bɔtɔ a, nnu ɔlɛdo odi nɛ Yudafɔ tide kamɛ evia kĩ, ‘Saulo, Saulo nde sũ otomɔ yĩ liti? Ntɛ ɔta fu sɛnɛta ni, nɔ mɔawɛ akũ opila.’
44026015	“Ade ke nvia ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, nɔ owei anɛ?’ “Ɔlɛdo a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Yesu a kĩ ɔlamɛna ye kanɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a.
44026016	Finyaakĩĩ yidza kadza! Ĩnyɛ yĩ akũ ntsa nɔ kitonɛkĩ mawɛ kĩ nkɔa nɔ nkɛna yĩ tudzuma ɔkɛnanɛ. Aabi katinya kamɛ bati flee lɛtsa kĩ ɔmɔ́ nɛ awĩ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ maanyɛ ntsa nɔ a.
44026017	Ade kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ maado nɔ ni, maadza nɛ nɔ liti nɛ nɔ awɛ bati mɔ kade bɛbã bati lɛmɛ kamɛ.
44026018	Ade aabinya be anɛ bɛnɛ nɛ Abonsam ɔtũ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ bɛya nɛ ɔhaĩ mɔ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ a. Baguma aakɔa be titikpa ete be lɔkɔa ɛkɛna be ndɛ bati kĩ ɛnyɛ ɛkpa ye akũ, nɛ kĩ bɛtɛ ye bido sũ.’
44026019	“Foesũ, boe Ɔlate Agripa, ntátu kanyɛ katsa a kĩ mmɔ́ ntomɛna ode a atsɛlɛ.
44026020	Ĩyi kayɔ mɔ kalɛ wĩ a kabi Damaskofɔ, Yerusalemfɔ, Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ bɛya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa bɛkaakɛna fɔtsa a kĩ foe aatsa kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ yededeede a.
44026021	Ade fukĩĩ sũ Yudafɔ a yapi yĩ nɛ be Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ kĩ ndza nkalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ, ade ke bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ yĩ a.
44026022	Lɛmɛ Baguma nyɛ yĩ nɛ be awɛ kamɛ. Foesũ mbuki ndzi nkpã ade nlamɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ kanyɛ katsa mi banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ bati flee a. Lɛtsa a kĩ de nlamɛna kalɛ nɛ awĩ a nyɛ fukĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ mɔ Mose lɛ biyi kĩ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ a.
44026023	Ade foe nyɛ kĩ Kristo aayamɔ lubo. Ade ye aanya oti ɔtɔnyade kĩ yaayidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa ɔsɛdza ɛma Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a flee a.”
44026024	Deedimɔapɛ Festo bɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Paulo, nɔ lɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade! Nɔ fɔtsa beblebee kakɔlɛ fɔ̃ nɔ lɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade!”
44026025	Ade Paulo kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate Festo, yĩ lɔlɔ kamɛ tábu kade. Takɔa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ɔkɛna kagulo. Kalɛ wĩ paa nlamɛna kalɛ.
44026026	Ɔnɔkɔali ni, Lɛgã Agripa nyina fɔlɛtsa kĩ malɛ a. Foesũ maapuli nlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ ye faa. Matɛ kado paa kĩ bɛtákɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ nɛ kabɛla kamɛ.
44026027	Nda Agripa, ɔtɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a odo? Ĩnyina kĩ ɔtɛ be odo.”
44026028	Ade Agripa bi Paulo kĩ, “Ɔkɔna kĩ aapuli ɔdani yĩ nkɛna okristoni nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kĩĩ kamɛ?”
44026029	Ade ke Paulo kpaa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ lɔkɔ lukũ ĩye lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ malo ni, mabɔa mpaɛ nkpa Baguma kĩ, nviã kĩĩ mi a flee kĩ mideĩ nɛ awĩ a, midani mikɛna ndɛ ayekĩ nla. Lɛmɛ bɛtádo mi nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ ndɛ yĩ aye!”
44026030	Ade lɛgã, abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Bernike mɔ bati a flee yidza a.
44026031	Kĩ biyidza a, bɛnaa adzina ade bibi be akũ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ tákɛna lɛtsa kpa lidima kĩ bakɔ ye ĩye bido ye nɛ kɔla.”
44026032	Ade Agripa bi Festo kĩ, “Ntɛ obi kĩĩ ɛtalɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ye fɔlɛtsa yama Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, kufɛ bɔ́apuli bɔfɔnɛ ye awɛ.”
44027001	Kĩ bike otse kĩ bɔanaa Italia a, bɛkɔa Paulo mɔ kɔla bawanɛ bɛbã bido nɛ Romafɔ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bavɛ Yulio awɛ kamɛ. Ade ye adãmɛna sodzafɔ katsu a kĩ bavɛ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Sodzafɔ Katsu akũ a.
44027002	Ade ke budzi ɔkɔlɔ kĩ eto Adramitio yanaa tɔkɔlɔ fɔdzakɔ̃ nɛ Asia kamɛ a. Bɔmɔ Makedoniani kĩ bavɛ Aristarko lidzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ. Eto Tesalonika.
44027003	Kĩ kade nyina a, bɔnadza nɛ Sidon mpo abuĩ. Ade Yulio kpa Paulo osi kĩ ɛnaa ɔmatɔ kamɛ ɛnaamɔ ye bakɔba, lɔkɔa bɛkpa ye fɔtsa a kĩ yaakɔa ɛtsã osi a.
44027004	Kĩ bɔbɔɛ nɛ awã a nɛ kĩ ɔwɛ kabɔa katsɛlamɔ boe a onukpɛ̃ deĩ ɔsi sũ ni, bɔtsã Kipro kayɔ sɛmakɛ bɔbɛla ɔwɛ a.
44027005	Kĩ bɔtɛ̃ awã a, bɔtsã Kilikia mɔ Pamfilia mpo abuĩ, ade bɔnadza nɛ Mira nɛ Likia a.
44027006	Awĩ a sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ yakpã boe a mɔ́ ɔkɔlɔ odi kĩ eto Aleksandria yanaa Italia tite akũ, ade ke ɛkɔa boe flee edo nɛ ye kamɛ a.
44027007	Osi a katsã kamɛ na boe ɔsĩ nɛ fuwi pii kamɛ fɔmɔ bupuli buwo Knido ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Kĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kabɔa sũ ni, bɔtápuli bɔtɛ̃ bɔnaa kpĩĩ. Foesũ kĩ buwo Salmone a, bɔblɛ bɔtsã Kreta ɔmatɔ a ɔlɔtɔ, awã kĩ tite a sua ɔwɛ a kɔbɛ̃ onukpɛ̃.
44027008	Ɔsĩ kamɛ bɔkɔa bɔtsã mpo abuĩ a bɔnawo kakɔ a kĩ bavɛ Tɔkɔlɔ Kadzakɔ̃ Wĩ a. Awã mɔ Lasea kayite lɛlá lugo.
44027009	Bubula fuwi kade, ade kĩ mui akũ katsã lɛmɛ na ɔsĩ sũ ni, Onukpɛ̃ Kasui Lɔkɔ a tɛ̃. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Paulo kpa be kakɔna ɛlɛ kĩ,
44027010	“Nda amɛ, mmɔ́ ĩyi ɔsũ kĩ boe mui anɛ osi katsã aawo nɛ mbɛtahu kamɛ, kĩ fɔtsa pii mɔ bati malo aawɔ.”
44027011	Lɛmɛ kawũ banɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ tɛ ɔkɔlɔ ɔtanɛ mɔ ye ɔlate a kakɔna ɛba lɛtsa kĩ Paulo lɛ a.
44027012	Nɛ kĩ tɔkɔlɔ kadzakɔ̃ a lɛnɛ́nɛ kadzi gɛlɛɛlɛ nɛ osili lɔkɔ sũ ni, osi batsãnɛ a wɛ kĩ bɛdzakũ ɔsa baawo Foenike. Baapuli bidzi nɛ awã nɛ osili lɔkɔ, kitonɛkĩ Foenike nyɛ ɔmatɔ nɛ Kreta tite akũ. Edeĩ tɔkɔlɔ fɔdzakɔ̃ kĩ futsua ɔwɛ onukpɛ̃ nɛ suwa katomukɔ̃ a.
44027013	Kĩ ɔwɛ bɔɛɛ do kabɔa kademɛna awɛ a, fɔkɛna ndɛ fɔ́alɛ fɔkpa osi a akũ kanaa. Foesũ bɛmanɛ akũ ade bɛtsã Kreta mpo abuĩ a.
44027014	Lɛmɛ owi tábuna mɔ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ odi vũ eto Kreta sɛba sɛmakɛ.
44027015	Ɛvũ ɛtsɛlamɔ ɔkɔlɔ a lɔtɔ foesũ bɛtápuli bɛdani ɔkɔlɔ a anɛ bɛtsɛlamɔ mpo abuĩ. Nɛ foesũ bɛfɔnɛ ɔkɔlɔ a awɛ ade ɔwɛ a bɔa ye ɛkanamɛna a.
44027016	Ke liti kɔlaa, bɔyana kablakɔ̃ kadi nɛ Kauda tite kĩ mui tsua bisinya te liti. Kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ fɔmɔ bupuli busuli boe ɔkɔlɔ kabii a budo nɛ ɔkpale a kĩ ye kamɛ bɔna a kamɛ.
44027017	Kĩ bɛmanɛ ye biyua a, bɔkɔa tɔwɛ̃ bisuli bɔtɛ̃mɛna bupimɔ ɔkɔlɔ kpale a kitonɛkĩ bivila kĩ ɔwɛ aabɔa ye ɛnaabãã nɛ dã kamɛ nɛ Libia mpo abuĩ. Foesũ bɛkɛna tilima nɛ ɔkɔlɔ titse a akũ. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ɔwɛ a kabɔa ye kanamɛna bɔɛɛ.
44027018	Kade nyina, lɛmɛ kĩ ɔwɛ a táfɔ̃ kavũ sũ ni, bido fɔtsa a kĩ ɔkɔlɔ a nɔnɛ a kanyɛ kawula nɛ mui kamɛ awɛ.
44027019	Ade nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde a, bɛyatalɛ ɔkɔlɔ a akũ fɔtsa pii lɛmɛ biwula.
44027020	Ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩĩ vũ fuwi beblebee kĩ bɛtámɔ suwa ĩye fusibii malo. Ade bɔtátɛ budo kĩ bɔ́ana nkpã a.
44027021	Kĩ bidzi fuwi beblebee kĩ bɛtánya sũ ni, Paulo yidza ɛdza nɛ be anɛ kamɛ, ade ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mitse yĩ kalɛ ni, kufɛ bɔtábɔɛ nɛ Kreta, kufɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee taya nɛ boe akũ, bɔyɛla boe akũ fɔtsa.
44027022	Finyaakĩĩ, make mi aduli kĩ mina ɔwɔlɛ. Ade mabi mi yededeede kĩ ɔkɔlɔ kĩĩ aayɛla lɛmɛ mi kamɛ odima lɛláaku.
44027023	Kitonɛkĩ kadzɔ lɛnyɛ ni, Baguma a kĩ ye ode manɛ, mɔ ekĩ masum a, ye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ yadza nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃.
44027024	Ade ke ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Paulo, tavila. Kɛnɛ kĩ akɔa nɔ kalɛ oyi nɛ Kaisare anɛ kamɛ! Nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ sũ ni, nɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛtsɛ̃ osi a flee kamɛ odima lɛláaku.’
44027025	Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mina ɔwɔlɛ! Ntɛ Baguma ndo kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa aaya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi a.
44027026	Lɛmɛ ɔwɛ aabɔa boe ɛnamɛna tite tidi kĩ mui tsua bisinya te a akũ.”
44027027	Ade ke ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩĩ kabɔa boe kanamɛna lɔtɔ mɔ liti fuwi ewuana flee nɛ Adria mpo akũ a. Luwi luwuanade lɛnyɛ a, boe ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a kɔna kĩ bifuã tite tidi.
44027028	Awã na bɛkɔna mui a kadzũ bɛdã, ade bɛmɔ́ kĩ foe kadzũ aana ndɛ fɔnɛta ɔha mɔ foe tɛya. Ade kĩ bɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, bibuki bɛkɔna ade bɛmɔ́ kĩ mui a a kadzũ nyɛ fɔnɛta aduekrɔũ a.
44027029	Nɛ kĩ bivila kĩ ɔwɛ a aabɔa ɔkɔlɔ a ɛnaasãmɔ boe kpale kpale sũ ni, bɛkɔa fɔbɔtsaɛ mɔ ɔlɔmɛ ɛna kĩ bido ɔwɛ̃ bipimɔ ɔkɔlɔ a nɛ liti bido nɛ mui a kamɛ. Fɔbɔtsaɛ a nabãã nɛ mui ɔda fɔfɔ̃ ɔkɔlɔ a dza. Ade ke bɛkadã anɛ kĩ kade wĩ kinyina a.
44027030	Kĩ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ wɛ kĩ balo sũ ni, bɛkɛna ɔkɔlɔ kabii a, nɛ tɛdake kamɛ kĩ banaakɛna fɔbɔtsaɛ mɔ ɔlɔmɛ a nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kpale a lɔtɔ.
44027031	Lɛmɛ Paulo bi sodzafɔ a mɔ be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, “Ntɛ bati kĩĩ flee tána nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kĩĩ kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, míaku.”
44027032	Foesũ sodzafɔ a tsua ɔwɛ̃ a kĩ epini ɔkɔlɔ kabii a, ade ɛka ewo nɛ mui a kamɛ a.
44027033	Odenyinawi a, Paulo ke be flee aduli kĩ bɛnya. Ebi be kĩ, “Ade nviã nyɛ fuwi ewuana kĩ mi kamɛ odima táta lɛtsama onukpɛ̃ a.
44027034	Nɛ foesũ, make mi aduli, minya litsedi lɔkɔa mina kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ miláaku. Kitonɛkĩ odima sɔlɔ mɔapɛ malo lɛláakamu.”
44027035	Ade ke Paulo bɔɛ abodoo adi, ade kĩ ɛbɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa Baguma nɛ be flee anɛ a, ebuli adi ɛba.
44027036	Ade ke ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi odi nyɛ odi bido kanya awɛ a.
44027037	Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ lidede nyɛ ɔha nviã mɔ be aduesɔũ-evũ (276).
44027038	Kĩ bati a nya biwĩ a, bɛnyɛ funitsã mɔ fuvũ a flee nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ biko nɛ mui kamɛ ade ɔkɔlɔ a nɛ́ ɔlɔmɛ a.
44027039	Kĩ fɔkɔ kpalɛ a, ɔkɔlɔ batanɛ a támɔ awã mpo abuĩ a biyi ɔsũ. Lɛmɛ bɛmɔ́ kadzakɔ̃ kadi kĩ bɛkɔna kĩ awã aalɛ bɛdza. Foesũ bɛwɛ kĩ ntɛ fɔ́alɛ ni bata ɔkɔlɔ a bɛnamɛna awã.
44027040	Foesũ bikpeli fɔbɔtsaɛ mɔ ɔlɔmɛ kĩ fupini ɔkɔlɔ a tɔwɛ̃ bido nɛ mui kamɛ, ade biwũnya otse a kĩ ye atsa ɔkɔlɔ a osi a. Ke liti bɛdzɛla ɔkɔlɔ a tilima ayekĩ ɔwɛ aabɔa ye ɛnamɛna.
44027041	Kĩ bɛyɛlɛ banaa a, ɔkɔlɔ a nabãã nɛ dã kamɛ ade ye anɛ sɛmakɛ tábuki epuli ekuna akũ a. Ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ a lɛmɛ yabo ye nɛ liti sɛmakɛ a ɛyɛlɛ ye fɔkɛ fɔkɛ.
44027042	Sodzafɔ a ke otse kĩ bakɔ kɔla bawanɛ a flee ayekĩ bɛláato mui bilo.
44027043	Lɛmɛ be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ wɛ kĩ yatɛ Paulo nkpã, foesũ ɛtátunɔ bɛkɛna nɛ be kawɛ akũ. Ade ɛkpa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ntɛ bikĩ baapuli bito mui ni, bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛvɛnya biwo bito mui bɛnaa mpo abuĩ.
44027044	Bati a kĩ bite a lɛmɛ bɛbɔɛ titse fɔkɛ mɔ fɔtsa bɛbã kĩ fɔ́apuli fɔtsãmɔ be nɛ mui anɛ lɔkɔa biwo ɔwɔ abuĩ. Ade aye bɔkɛna buwo ɔwɔ abuĩ sɔũ a.
44028001	Ade kĩ bɔnɛ nɛ mbɛtahu kamɛ a, bɔyamɔ kĩ tite a kĩ mui tsua bisinya te a bavɛ Malta.
44028002	Bati nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ a tɛ boe mɔ kawɔlɛ paa a. Nɛ kĩ oni kako osili lɛmɛ na sũ ni, bɛkpɔta fi kpale nɛ mpo abuĩ a bɛkpa boe.
44028003	Kĩ Paulo fila tuvotsei kĩ yako nɛ fi kamɛ a, nɛ fi a ɔwɛ ɔbɔ̃ sũ kɔɛ kudi nɛ nɛ avo a kamɛ kɔyadɔ̃ ye kɔvanɛ nɛ ye kɔkpɔ.
44028004	Kĩ awã bati a mɔ kɔɛ a kĩ kɔvanɛ nɛ ye kɔkpɔ a, bibi akũ kĩ, “Owudini oti kĩĩ anɛ. Ade foesũ boe baviɔ̃ lɛláafɔ̃ edzi nkpã a, titɔ kĩ elo nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ nɛ mpo kamɛ malo.”
44028005	Ade Paulo wunya kɔɛ a edo nɛ fi a kamɛ a, lɛmɛ lɛtsama tákɛna ye.
44028006	Ade bati a dza bɛkadã anɛ kĩ yaawumi ĩye yaaka ɛtɔ deedimɔapɛ eku. Owi buna kĩ bɛdza bɛkadã, ade kĩ lɛtsama tákɛna ye a, bɛdani be adzuni nɛ ye akũ, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, baguma adi yanɛ.
44028007	Awã kĩ bɔnadza a, fuãmɔ Publio kĩ ɛnyɛ tite a lɛgã. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ lɛmɛ tɛ boe mɔ kawɔlɛ ade ɛdã boe akũ fuwi ɛlalɛ flee a.
44028008	Nɛ fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ ni, Publio ɔlɛga kasɔ atilili, ade ɛkayo kɔbɔa mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ a. Paulo naa ye sɛkɛ̃, ɛnabɔa mpaɛ ete awɛ nɛ ye akũ, ade ɛsaɛ a.
44028009	Kĩ binu fɔsɔ katsa kĩĩ a, basɔnɛ nɛ tite akũ flee nɛ bɛya, ade Paulo tsa be a.
44028010	Nɛ lɛkɛnana kĩĩ sũ bɛkpa boe fɔtsa pii. Ade kĩ boe kadzakũ wo ɔtɔ a, bɛma boe fɔtsa a kĩ bɔ́akɔa bɔtsã osi.
44028011	Bɔtɛ tidetɔ ɛlalɛ nɛ awã fɔmɔ bɔdzakũ. Kĩ bɔadzakũ a budzi ɔkɔlɔ kĩ bavɛ Nta Baviɔ̃ kĩ eto Aleksandria ɛyadza nɛ kasekɔ̃ a nɛ osili lɔkɔ.
44028012	Kĩ bɔbɔɛ buto awã a, bɔnaa Sirakuse ɔmatɔ a, ade bɔna nɛ awã fuwi ɛlalɛ a.
44028013	Ade ke luwi lɛyade buto awã bunyina bɔnaa Regio a. Ɔwɛ wĩ odi bɔa boe nɛ liti, ade bɔyawo Puteoli a.
44028014	Awã naa, bɔmɔ́ batɛ badonɛ badi, ade bike boe aduli kĩ budzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛkwansieda mɔa. Nɛ ke liti a, buto awã bɔnaa Roma.
44028015	Kĩ boe bawaɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Roma nu kĩ bɔaya a, bɛyatsɛlamɔ boe nɛ awã kĩ bavɛ Apia Kɔyaatɔ a. Badi lɛmɛ yatsɛlamɔ boe nɛ Fusekɔ̃ Ɛlalɛ a. Kĩ Paulo mɔ́ be a, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ke ebuki ɛna ɔwɔlɛ kado a.
44028016	Kĩ buwo Roma a, bɛkpa Paulo osi kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ nɛ awã kĩ ɛwɛ a, lɛmɛ bɛfɔ̃ sodzafɔ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kadãmɛna ye akũ.
44028017	Fuwi ɛlalɛ liti a, Paulo vɛ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã a ɛkpɔta. Kĩ bɛtsɛna a, ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bipi yĩ nɛ Yerusalem bɛkɔa bɛma Roma abãã kĩ ɛdzɛmɔ yĩ, titɔ kĩ ntáfum odima, ĩye nfum boe bawanyɔ amaniɛ adima malo.
44028018	Romafɔ a dzɛmɔ yĩ, ade ke bɛwɛ kĩ bafɔnɛ yĩ awɛ kufɛ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛtámɔ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ baadza bɛkɔ yĩ wuda kɔtɔ.
44028019	Kĩ Yudafɔ a tátunɔ nɛ foe akũ sũ ni, fɔyasĩ kĩ nkɔa yĩ kalɛ mma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare, titɔ kĩ ntábɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ yĩ kade bati akũ malo.
44028020	Ade fukĩĩ sũ nvɛ mi a, kitonɛkĩ Oti a kĩ Bɛbɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a, kĩ ye akũ Yudafɔ ate anɛ a, ade ye ntɛ ndo sũ nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ kĩĩ pini yĩ a.”
44028021	Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Boe kɔ̃ bɔtánu kadima butomɛna nɔ akũ. Ade bɔtátɛ ovoli ĩye ɔlɛdo kpa odima nɛ nɔ akũ butomɛna bikĩ bito Yudea bɛya nɛ awĩ a sɛkɛ̃ a.
44028022	Lɛmɛ bɔawɛ kĩ bɔatse litsedi butomɛna lɛtsa a kĩ de ɔtɛ odo a akũ. Kitonɛkĩ baálɛ kalɛ wĩ kadima nɛ katɛkado katsu a kĩ ke kamɛ odeĩ a akũ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ.”
44028023	Biyi luwi ade ke bati pii yatsɛna nɛ Paulo awã a. Awã naa, ebi be fɔlɛtsa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ. Ade ɛtsa be fɔtsa nɛ Yesu akũ etomɛna Mose mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a tuvoli kamɛ a. Ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla kito ɔnɔnɛ kɛnawo olobe.
44028024	Be kamɛ badi tɛ fɔlɛtsa a bido, badi lɛmɛ tátɛ bido.
44028025	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ dani kavɛlɛ nɛ be kamɛ, ade bɛsɛ̃ be akũ a. Paulo bi be kĩ, “Hũhũ Kpalɛwa lɛ ɔnɔkɔali ɛtsã Yesaya akũ ebi boe bawanyɔ kĩ,
44028026	‘Naa kanaabi Yudafɔ a kĩ, “Míanu yĩ fɔlɛtsa lɛmɛ miláanu foe kayɔ, míako anɛ midã lɛmɛ miláamɔ foe miyi ɔsũ.”
44028027	Kitonɛkĩ bati kĩĩ tɔwɔlɛ deĩ ɔsĩ, ade be atɔ sĩ a, ade bisua anɛ lɛmɛ a. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, kufɛ be anɛ aamɔ ade be atɔ aanu, be adzuni kamɛ lɛmɛ aakpalɛ, ade baadani bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔa ntsa be fɔsɔ.’ ”
44028028	-
44028029	Paulo wũna kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ be kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ minyi kĩ, bɛkɔa Baguma bati nkpã katɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a bɛma bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ. Be ni, baatɛ foe!”
44028030	Paulo dzi nɛ awã futeli nviã nɛ kɔla kĩ ɛwã a kamɛ. Ade awã ɛkatɛ bati a flee kĩ bɛkaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a.
44028031	Ɛkalɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ fɔlɛtsa mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ flee kakpa be, ɛtsa be fɔtsa etomɛna boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ, ade odima tásua ye osi a.
45001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, Yesu Kristo ɔsumunɛ sɛkɛ̃. Baguma lɛpau yĩ, ɛvɛ yĩ kĩ ĩyadani ye fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, nde lɛtsã nɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ.
45001002	Baguma lɛ Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ, ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a.
45001003	Bɛlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ nɛ Obi, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ. Bɛma ye ndɛ otidziwa aye nɛ Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ.
45001004	Nɛ kakpalɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ni, Baguma nyɛ ye ɛtsa mɔ kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ ye obi, lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛdzɛla ye etomɛna wuda kamɛ a.
45001005	Baguma tsã Yesu Kristo akũ ɛmɔ́ boe kɔnya bɔyadani fɔtɔ banyanɛ, ayekĩ fɔ́atsã ye dĩ akũ, bɔ́akpã fude fude bati flee bɛtɛ ye bido, bitse ye.
45001006	Mi Romafɔ lɛmɛ, mideĩ nɛ bati a kĩ Baguma vɛ kĩ bɛyaakɛna Yesu Kristo bade a kamɛ.
45001007	Ade foesũ ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mama mi flee a kĩ mideĩ nɛ Roma, kĩ Baguma awɛ mi kalɛ, ade ɛvɛ mi kĩ miyaakɛna bati kĩ ɛkpalɛ be akũ a. Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ!
45001008	Lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyaa lɔtɔ nyɛ kĩ, nkɔa Yesu Kristo manyɛ yĩ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi flee lɔlɔ, kitonɛkĩ balɛ ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo mido a fɔlɛtsa nɛ katinya kamɛ flee.
45001009	Baguma a kĩ masum mɔ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ flee, nɛ lɛtsã a kĩ made nɛ ye Obi Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ a, nyɛ yĩ adansiɛ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Baguma nyina kĩ mate anɛ nɛ mi akũ,
45001010	lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ mabɔa mpaɛ. Mawã Baguma kĩ ntɛ fɔnyɛ ye kawɛ ni, ɛkpa yĩ osi ĩyaasɛla mi finyaa.
45001011	Kitonɛkĩ mawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɔmɔ akũ, lɔkɔa nkɔa hũhũ kamɛ futetsa fudi mma mi nkɔa ndo mi kɔbɛ̃.
45001012	Lɛtsa a kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ bɔmɔ mi bɔ́ado akũ kɔbɛ̃. Yĩ katɛkado ado mi kɔbɛ̃, ade mi kade lɛmɛ aado yĩ kɔbɛ̃ a.
45001013	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mawɛ kĩ minyi kĩ nkɛna nhihiɛ lɔkɔ pii kĩ mayaasɛla mi kufɛ, lɛmɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ litsedi asua yĩ osi. Mawɛ kĩ mana bati kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido nɛ mi kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ nna nɛ bati bɛbã a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ a.
45001014	Kitonɛkĩ yĩ adzuma fɔanɛ kĩ nde lɛtsã nkpa bati flee, bikĩ binyina kadi mɔ bikĩ binyína kadi, bati kĩ binyina tuvoli mɔ bikĩ binyína tuvoli.
45001015	Ade foesũ akũ asĩ yĩ kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nkpa mi a kĩ mideĩ nɛ Roma lɛmɛ a.
45001016	Kalɛ Wĩ a lákɔ yĩ kɔnyɔã, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ kɔanɛ. Kakpa bati a kĩ bɛtɛ ke bido a nkpã, Yudafɔ nyaa lɔtɔ fɔmɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
45001017	Kitonɛkĩ Kalɛ Wĩ a kamɛ banyɛ ayekĩ Baguma abu bati kĩ bɛkpɔla a katsa. Fɔnyɛ katɛkado fɔlɛtsa kĩto kayɔkayi kɛnawo kawũna. Ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩ Baguma abu kĩ yadã kpĩĩ nɛ ye katɛkado sũ ni, yaana nkpã.”
45001018	Baguma anyɛ ye kalɔkpa katomɛna ode kako nɛ bati a kĩ bakɔa tɔkpa mɔ ablɔ fɔtsa kasua ɔnɔkɔali a kanyi osi a akũ.
45001019	Baguma avɛlɛ bati a sɔtɔ kitonɛkĩ binyina fɔtsa a kĩ otidziwa aapuli enyi nɛ ye akũ a. Baguma mɔawɛ a lɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa be yededeede.
45001020	Kito anɛ kĩ Baguma bɔa katinya a, ye kutitse kĩ baámɔ mɔ anɛ a, mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kudeĩ daa mɔ ye Baguma kutidu a, anyɛ foe akũ katsa nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛbɔa a kamɛ. Foesũ bati a lɛláapuli bɛnyɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ binyína Baguma.
45001021	Titɔ kĩ binyina Baguma malo ni, baákpa ye obu a kĩ ɛfɛta ye, ade baányɛ ye kɔlɛ a. Mbom fɔtsa a kĩ fɔlá nfasɔ akũ bakɔna, ade be adzuni kamɛ ke ɔtũ a.
45001022	Babu be akũ kĩ binyina kadi, lɛmɛ bɛdani badzimbifɔ.
45001023	Nɛ kĩ bɛkɔa obu bɛkpa Baguma a kĩ edzi nkpã daa a ni, basum fɔtsa a kĩ bɛmɛ mɔ awɛ kutidu, kĩ fɔla ndɛ oti kĩ yaku, ĩye kɔvɔlabi, ĩye bayaɛ, ĩye bayaɛ kĩ baboli nɛ sɛmɛ akũ.
45001024	Nɛ foesũ Baguma fɔnɛ be awɛ kĩ bɛkɛna efĩĩ fɔtsa kĩ be tɔwɔlɛ awɛ a, kĩ bɛkɔa be sukɛna bakɛna fɔnyɔãtsa mɔ be akũ akũ.
45001025	Bakɔa Baguma akũ ɔnɔkɔali a kavɛmɛna mɔ fɔvã. Basum fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa a kaba Baguma mɔawɛ a kĩ ɛbɔa foe a, kĩ kɛfɛta kĩ bɛkaamu daa a! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
45001026	Nɛ fukĩ bakɛna a sũ, Baguma fɔnɛ be awɛ ɛkpa sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔado akũ kɔnyɔã kakɛna. Be batsole dani bawamɔ bakɔba batsole.
45001027	Ade ayea banyole lɛmɛ fɔ̃ bɛmɔ batsole kawa ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma kɛna eyi a, mbom bakɔba banyole akɔ be odo. Foesũ banyole awamɔ akũ kĩ kɔnyɔã lɛláa foe kamɛ. Nɛ ɔbla kpa kĩ bɛbɔa kĩĩ sũ ni, Baguma vɛlɛ be sɔtɔ a kĩ sɛfɛta be a, nɛ be mɔawɛ kamɛ.
45001028	Ayekĩ bati a sĩ kĩ baátɛ kadikanyi wĩ nɛ Baguma akũ a bido nɛ be kamɛ sũ ni, Baguma fɔnɛ be awɛ ɛkpa be adzuni kĩ bibula kade a, kĩ bɛkɛna fɔtsa a kĩ fɔtáfɛta a.
45001029	Be kamɛ yi mɔ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi kakɛna, ablɔ, anɛngbã mɔ bati tɔkpa kawɛ. Fɔbɛbã kĩ fudeĩ nɛ be kamɛ nyɛ lineke kanɔ, awudi, lɛma kavũ, bati kakɛ mɔ likesĩ. Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ balɛ bati akũ kɔdzɛla,
45001030	bɛnyɛ bati buĩ banyɛnɛ, mɔ Baguma bakesĩnɛ. Bɛnyɛ bati bavũnanɛ, akũ batanɛ, akũ bapianɛ, bawɛ tɔkpa tisi bɛbã pii kayamɛna mɔ bati kĩ baábu be bamanɛ a.
45001031	Bɛnyɛ bati kĩ be tɔwɔlɛ lákɔ be kɔtɔ, baákɛna nɛ bɔhɛ a akũ a, bɛlá sɛmɛ kalɛ ade baámɔ oti kɔnya a.
45001032	Titɔ kĩ binyina pefee kĩ nɛ Baguma mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, bikĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ osi kĩĩ odu akũ a fɛta bɛkpa wuda malo ni, bɛkakɛna foe. Nnɛ́ foe odi bakɛna, mbom bɛdza nɛ bikĩ bakɛna fɔtsa kpa kĩĩ odu a liti.
45002001	Nwaɛ̃, nɔ akɔ bati bɛbã kɔtɔ? Ntɛ litsa oti anɛ malo ɔláapuli ɔnyɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ nɔ kɔ̃ oti kpĩĩ anɛ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ adzɛmɔ bati bɛbã adeke akɛna lɛtsa mɔapɛ a kĩ de bakɛna a ni, nɔ mɔawɛ akũ akɔ kɔtɔ.
45002002	Bunyina kĩ Baguma deĩ ɔtɔbɛ ntɛ ɛdzɛmɔ bati a kĩ bakɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ a.
45002003	Lɛmɛ nwaɛ̃, nɔ a kĩ akɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ a lɛmɛ akɔ bati bɛbã kɔtɔ nɛ foe akũ a ni, abu kĩ aapuli olo Baguma kɔtɔkakɔ?
45002004	Mbɔɛɛ ɔbɔɛ foe kĩ Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ, ɔwɔlɛ kado mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ sũ ɔtsɛ́la lɛtsama? Onyina kĩ nuwĩ Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ yawɛ kĩ yakpã nɔ ɔdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
45002005	Lɛmɛ nɛ nɔ atɔ ɔsĩ kĩ aádani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ sũ ni, ɔfɔ̃ nɔ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aana ɔsɛ̃ nɛ luwi a kĩ Baguma aanyɛ ye kalɔkpa mɔ ye fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ kpĩĩ akũ a kanya.
45002006	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma aase odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a onukpɛ̃.
45002007	Bati a kĩ bakɛna tuwĩ kĩ bawɛ kukũkpalɛ, obu mɔ daa nkpã a, Baguma aakpa be nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
45002008	Lɛmɛ bati bɛbã a kĩ be odi fude bawɛ, kĩ bisĩ ɔnɔkɔali a, bitomɔ tɔkpa a, Baguma aakɔa kalɔkpa ɛvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
45002009	Bati flee a kĩ bakɛna tɔkpa a, aamɔ lubo mɔ kalɔɛ, Yudafɔ aanya lɔtɔ, ke liti bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ.
45002010	Lɛmɛ Baguma aakpa bikĩ bakɛna tuwĩ a kukũkpalɛ, obu mɔ lukudɔ, Yudafɔ aanya lɔtɔ bɛna, fɔmɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ.
45002011	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma ládã oti anɛ nɛ ye fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ kamɛ.
45002012	Bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a tána Mose mbla a, lɛmɛ kĩ bɛkɛna titikpa ni, Baguma aavɛlɛ be sɔtɔ, kĩ ɛláakɔa mbla a bɛdzɛmɔ be. Yudafɔ a na Mose mbla a, lɛmɛ bɛkɛna titikpa, Baguma aakɔa mbla a ɛdzɛ mɔ be.
45002013	Kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ bati a kĩ batse mbla a nyɛ bati kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, mbom bati a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ mbla akũ a, adã kpĩĩ.
45002014	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a tána mbla a, lɛmɛ ntɛ oti kabɔa kamɛ fɔ̃ bɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ Mose mbla tsa ni, fɔatsa kĩ bɛkɛna mbla bɛkpa be akũ, titɔ kĩ bɛlá Mose mbla a malo.
45002015	Be fɔkɛlatsa atsa kĩ Baguma tsɛlɛ mbla a nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Be tɔwɔlɛ lɛmɛ atsa kĩ fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, kitonɛkĩ fɔkɔ fudi be tɔwɔlɛ akɔ be kɔtɔ ade yadza nɛ be liti a.
45002016	Nɛ foesũ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ malɛ a onukpɛ̃ ni, ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ Luwi a akũ kĩ Baguma aatsã Yesu Kristo akũ ɛdzɛmɔ bati flee fɔlɔ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa a.
45002017	Avɛ nɔ akũ kĩ Yudani, akɔa anɛ kate nɛ mbla akũ, ade apia nɛ Baguma akũ a.
45002018	Onyina lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ kɛna, ade ɔkɔlɛ otomɛna mbla a kamɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ fɔtsa wĩ a.
45002019	Atɛ kado kĩ ɔnyɛ banɛkunɛ ɔkpãnɛ, ɔnyɛ ɔhaĩ ɔkpa bikĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a.
45002020	Ɔkɔa nɔ akũ ɔkɛna bakɔasia ɔvɛlɛnɛ mɔ bikĩ bɛtábo anɛ tɔ̃ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ. Onyina yededeede lɛmɛ kĩ kadikanyi mɔ ɔnɔkɔali deĩ nɛ mbla a kamɛ.
45002021	Nɔ a kĩ atsa bati bɛbã fɔtsa a, nde sũ aátsa nɔ mɔawɛ akũ? Ade lɛtsã kĩ bati bɛtaye, lɛmɛ nɔ mɔawɛ a aáye?
45002022	Abi bati kĩ bɛtabɔa adɔpaa, lɛmɛ nɔ mɔawɛ a aábɔa adɔpaa? Aáwɛ baviɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa, lɛmɛ aáye kuviɔ̃la kamɛ fɔtsa?
45002023	Abo ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ, lɛmɛ afum ye mbla a kakɔado Baguma kɔnyɔã.
45002024	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Mi Yudafɔ ɔbla kpa sũ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a alɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa nɛ Baguma dĩ akũ.”
