45002025	Ntɛ akɛna nɛ mbla a akũ ni, kekɔ̃ nɔ lɛkpati katsua a akũ deĩ nfasɔ, lɛmɛ ntɛ aákɛna nɛ mbla a akũ kɔ̃ ni, oketimɔ bikĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati a.
45002026	Ntɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani, kĩ ɛtátsua lɛkpati akɛna nɛ mbla a akũ ni, Baguma lɛláabu ye ndɛ oti kĩ etsua lɛkpati aye?
45002027	Foesũ, mi Yudafɔ, oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani a kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a akũ aakɔ mi kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ miafum mbla a, titɔ kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ ye biyi bɛkpa mi, ade miatsua lɛkpati a.
45002028	Nnɛ́ oti kĩ bɛma Yudani ĩye oti kĩ bitsua lɛkpati nɛ Mose mbla a onukpɛ̃ nyɛ Yudani. Ade lɛkpati katsua paa ni, fɔdzɛ́ fɔkpa sukɛna katsua lɛkɛnana kĩ bamɔ nɛ oti akũ a,
45002029	mbom Yudani kpanunuunu nyɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ Yudani nɛ ye kamɛkamɛ, ade foe nyɛ kĩ bitsua ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɛkpati. Lɛkpati katsua kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma Hũhũ adzuma, fɔtáto mbla a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi a kamɛ. Baguma amu oti kĩĩ odu, nnɛ́ batidziwa.
45003001	Litsa koũ Yudani deĩ ɛbɛ̃ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani, ĩye litsa nfasɔ deĩ nɛ lɛkpati katsua kamɛ?
45003002	Ɔnɔkɔali nfasɔ a pɔnɛ nɛ tisi pii akũ. Katɔnyade nyɛ kĩ Yudafɔ awɛ Baguma kɔa ye fɔlɛtsa a edo.
45003003	Lɛmɛ nde ntɛ be kamɛ badi tátɛ bido a? Katsa fɔatsa kĩ be katatɛkado aafɔ̃ Baguma lɛláadi ɔnɔkɔali?
45003004	Oowo! Kɛnɛ kĩ Baguma adi ɔnɔkɔali, titɔ kĩ oti nyɛ oti ama fɔvã malo, ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla ni, nɔ fɔlɛtsa fɔnya ɔnɔkɔali. Ntɛ bɛdzɛmɔ nɔ ni, aanya akũ.”
45003005	Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe titikpa kakɛna anyɛ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ Baguma akɛna a katsa yededeede a ni, bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ kĩ Baguma akɛna tɔkpa ntɛ ɛvɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ? Ade kavia kĩ otidziwa aavia a.
45003006	Oowo! Ntɛ Baguma ládã kpĩĩ ni, nde yaakɛna ɛdzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ?
45003007	Ntɛ yĩ fɔvã kama anyɛ Baguma ɔnɔkɔali a katsa, kĩ bamu ye a, nde sũ bakɔ yĩ kɔtɔ ndɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ?
45003008	Nde sũ bɔálɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bɔkɛna titikpa ayekĩ tuwĩ aanɛ tito foe kamɛ?” Ɔnɔkɔali bati badi lamɛna fɔvã kama kate nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ ade aye nlɛ a. Baguma aakɔ be kɔtɔ ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta.
45003009	Mbɔɛɛ finyaa, boe Yudafɔ kadzi kamɛ nɛnɛ kɛbɛ̃ bikĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ a? Oowo! Kitonɛkĩ ĩnya lɔtɔ ntsa kɔkɔɛ kĩ tɔkpa nya Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a flee akũ,
45003010	ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Oti odima lɛláa kĩ yadã kpĩĩ. Midi oti mɔapɛ malo lɛláa.
45003011	Odima lɛláa kĩ yanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ, ĩye kĩ yawɛ Baguma liti osi.
45003012	Bati flee muniki nɛ Baguma liti, be flee bɛyɛla osi, ade odima lɛláa kĩ yakɛna tuwĩ a, oti mɔapɛ malo lɛláa.
45003013	Be tudomɛna binya tɛwaa ndɛ linikɛ kĩ lɛwaa luto aye, bakɛ bati mɛnɛmɛnɛ mɔ be fɔmɛ. Be onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa la ndɛ kɔɛ kadɔ̃ aye.
45003014	Fudumutsa mɔ fɔlɔɛwotsa yi be tunukpɛ̃ kamɛ.
45003015	Bawɛ sɔwa kĩ bapila bati bɛkɔ be.
45003016	Kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ banaa ni, kawɔla mɔ fɔtsa kade kabula ate nɛ liti.
45003017	Binyína kadzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ,
45003018	ade Baguma kavila kadima lɛláa be kamɛ a.”
45003019	Finyaa, bunyina kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ mbla a kamɛ a atamɔ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mbla a kayɔ, ayekĩ baasua batidziwa onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ osi, lɔkɔa Baguma lɛdzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ flee.
45003020	Kitonɛkĩ odima lɛnyɛ́ oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, nɛ ayekĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ mbla a akɛna nyɛ kĩ yafɔ̃ oti anyi kĩ ɛkɛna tɔkpa.
45003021	Lɛmɛ finyaa, bɛnyɛ osi a kĩ Baguma atsã kakɛna bati kpĩĩ nɛ ye anɛ a bɛtsa. Fukĩĩ lɛtsɛ́la mbla a akũ, titɔ kĩ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ di foe akũ adansiɛ malo.
45003022	Baguma akɛna bati badã kpĩĩ katsãmɛna be Yesu Kristo katɛkado kamɛ. Yakɛna fukĩĩ kakpa bati a kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido a flee, kĩ ntsitsemu adima lɛláa foe kamɛ.
45003023	Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kɛna tɔkpa, ade edeĩ mɔ lugo nɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a ɔwɛ̃ a.
45003024	Lɛmɛ nɛ kɔnya a kĩ Baguma amɔ faa sũ ni, ɛtsã Kristo Yesu a kĩ ese kɔtɔ nɛ boe lɔlɔ a akũ, ɛkɛna boe bati kpĩĩ.
45003025	Baguma kɔa ye ɛkpa ndɛ lɛma ɔkplanɛ kĩ fɔtsã ye wuda kamɛ bati bɛna tɔkpa kakɔakate ntɛ bɛtɛ ye bido. Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ ɛnɛɛ yatsa kĩ yadã kpĩĩ. Nɛ kɔkɔɛ a, Baguma na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, ɛve sinepo esua bati tɔkpa,
45003026	lɛmɛ finyaa kɔ̃ yate anɛ nɛ be tɔkpa akũ ɛkɔa yatsa kĩ yadã kpĩĩ. Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ, Baguma atsa kĩ ye mɔawɛ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ ade yakɛna odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Yesu edo oti kpĩĩ a.
45003027	Finyaa ni, litsa bɔ́akɔa bubo ɔwɔlɛ? Bɔlá lɛtsamama! Mɔ litsa sũ? Ayekĩ bɔakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Mbom ayekĩ bɔtɛ budo sũ.
45003028	Foesũ bɔ́awũna kĩ katɛkado odi akũ fɔtsã mɔ oti adã kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ mbla a akũ kakɛna sũ.
45003029	Mbɔɛɛ Baguma a ni, Yudafɔ odi ode yanɛ? Nnɛ́ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ Baguma yanɛ? Oo, be malo Baguma yanɛ!
45003030	Baguma mɔapɛ deĩ, ade yaakɛna Yudafɔ bati kpĩĩ ɛtsãmɛna be katɛkado akũ a, ɛkɛna bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ bati kpĩĩ ɛtsãmɛna be katɛkado kamɛ.
45003031	Katsa fɔatsa kĩ katɛkado sũ bɔfɔnɛ mbla a awɛ? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ kɔlaa, mbom bupini mbla a mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
45004001	Litsa bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ nɛ boe kade ɔwanyɔ Abraham akũ? Litsa ɛmɔ́ eyi ɔsũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ?
45004002	Ntɛ tudzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a akũ fɔtsã sũ Baguma bu Abraham kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ ni, kekɔ̃ yaana litsedi kĩ yakɔa ebo ɔwɔlɛ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
45004003	Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Abraham tɛ Baguma edo, ade nɛ ye katɛkado sũ Baguma tɛ ye kĩ yadã kpĩĩ.”
45004004	Oti kĩ yakɛna adzuma ni, base ye kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ baábu kɔtɔkase a ndɛ futetsa, mbom fɔnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ fɔfɛta fɔkpa ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a.
45004005	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi tátɛ dĩ nɛ adzuma kakɛna kamɛ, mɔ ɛtɛ edo kĩ Baguma akɛna bikĩ baávila ye bati kpĩĩ ni, nɛ ye katɛkado sũ Baguma aabu ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ.
45004006	Ade foe Lɛgã Dawid lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ bihila oti a kĩ Baguma bu ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ, kĩ nnɛ́ ye adzuma wĩ a kĩ ɛkɛna a sũ. Dawid lɛ kĩ,
45004007	“Baguma hila bikĩ ye mɔawɛ ɛkɔa be tɔkpa ete be a, bikĩ ɛkɔa be titikpa ɛkɔla.
45004008	Baguma hila oti a kĩ Baguma nyɛ anɛ nɛ ye tɔkpa akũ.”
45004009	Nhila fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Dawid lɛ nɛ awĩ a ni, bikĩ bitsua fɔkpati a odi fude yanɛ, mbɔɛɛ kĩ mɔ bikĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati a? Oowo! Ɛnyɛ bikĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati a lɛmɛ ade, kitonɛkĩ bɔlɛ butomɛna Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Nɛ Abraham katɛkado sũ, Baguma bu ye oti kpĩĩ.”
45004010	Lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe Baguma bu ye oti kpĩĩ? Nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bitsua Abraham lɛkpati a, mbɔɛɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛtátsua de tɔ̃ a? Fɔnyɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛtátsua tɔ̃ lɛkpati a, nnɛ́ lɔkɔ a kĩ etsua liti a.
45004011	Ke liti kɔlaa fɔmɔ bitsua Abraham lɛkpati. Ye lɛkpati katsua lɛmɛ nyɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni kĩ Baguma tɛ ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ nɛ ye katɛkado sũ, titɔ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ malo bɛtátsua tɔ̃ ye lɛkpati. Foesũ Abraham yadani bati a kĩ bɛtɛ Baguma bido a flee hũhũ kamɛ ɔlɛga. Titɔ kĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati malo ni, bɛtɛ be ndɛ bati kpĩĩ.
45004012	Ade ayea Abraham nyɛ bikĩ bitsua fɔkpati a lɛmɛ ɔlɛga a. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ ayekĩ bitsua be fɔkpati a odi sũ, mbom nɛ ayekĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ katɛkado kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ boe ɔlɛga Abraham dzi fɔmɔ bitsua ye lɛkpati a sũ.
45004013	Baguma kpa Abraham mɔ ye kasinu kamɛ babi bɔhɛ kĩ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ aanya be adzapadiɛ. Ɛkɛna foe nnɛ́ nɛ ayekĩ Abraham kɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ, mbom nɛ ayekĩ ɛtɛ edo kĩ Baguma bu ye oti kpĩĩ sũ.
45004014	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bikĩ bakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ odi aanya fɔtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a ni, kekɔ̃ katɛkado lɛnyɛ́ lɛtsama ade Baguma kalɛkayi a lɛmɛ nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza a.
45004015	Mbla a avɛlɛ Baguma kalɔkpa kayamɛna, lɛmɛ awã kĩ mbla lɛláa ni, mbla kafum lɛláa.
45004016	Foesũ bɔhɛ a dzɛ̃ nɛ katɛkado akũ, ayekĩ bɔhɛ a aatim ndɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma mɔ kɔnya ɛkɔa ete Abraham kasinu a kamɛ babi. Nnɛ́ bikĩ bakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ odi fɔwaa fɔkpa, mbom mɔ bikĩ bɛtɛ bido ndɛ ayekĩ Abraham tɛ edo a, kitonɛkĩ Abraham nyɛ boe flee hũhũ kamɛ ɔlɛga,
45004017	ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nkɔa nɔ nkɛna fude fude pii ɔlɛga.” Foesũ bɔhɛ a nɛnɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ. Ade ye nyɛ Baguma a kĩ Abraham tɛ edo kĩ yadzɛla banɔkpa bayidza kadzi nkpã, kĩ yafɔ̃ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔláa kɔkɔɛ fɔanɛ katinya.
45004018	Titɔ kĩ anɛ kate adima buki ɛláa malo ni, Abraham tɛ edo ɛkadã anɛ, ade foesũ ɛkɛna fude pii ɔlɛga, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma bi ye a kĩ, “Nɔ babi mɔ bawa aama bɛsa beblebee ndɛ fusibii aye.”
45004019	Nɛ lɔkɔ a, Abraham tɛ ndɛ futeli ɔha, lɛmɛ ye katɛkado onukpɛ̃ tádɔ, titɔ kĩ ɛmɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ kɔbɛ̃ woli nɛ ye sukɛna kamɛ, mɔ ayekĩ Sara lɛmɛ tɛ̃ kɔma kana malo a.
45004020	Ɛtátɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakɛna ɛkpa ye a akũ atsindze, ade ɛtáfɔnɛ ye katɛkado awɛ a, mbom ye katɛkado a do ye kɔbɛ̃, edo Baguma obu.
45004021	Ɛtɛ edo pipiipi kĩ Baguma aapuli ɛkɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a akũ.
45004022	Ade Abraham katɛkado sũ mɔ Baguma bu ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ a.
45004023	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma bu ye kĩ yadã kpĩĩ” a, nnɛ́ Abraham odi sũ bɛtsɛlɛ foe,
45004024	mbom bɛtsɛlɛ foe bɛkpa boe lɛmɛ. Boe a kĩ bɔ́atɛ oti a kĩ ɛdzɛla boe Ɔlate Yesu etomɛna kanɔkpa a budo a, baabu boe kĩ bɔnyɛ bati kpĩĩ.
45004025	Boe titikpa sũ Baguma fɔnɛ Kristo awɛ ɛkpa kĩ bɛkɔ, ade ɛdzɛla ye edzi nkpã, ayekĩ yaabu boe bati kpĩĩ.
45005001	Finyaa, kĩ Baguma bu boe bati kpĩĩ nɛ boe katɛkado sũ ni, bɔtsɛ̃ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ bɔna lukudɔ nɛ bɔmɔ Baguma kayite.
45005002	Ye akũ lɛmɛ bɔtsã mɔ osi binya ɛkpa boe kĩ Baguma aamɔ boe kɔnya, budzi nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ a kamɛ. Nɛ foesũ bɔapia nɛ kɔnɛte a kĩ budeĩ kĩ bɔ́ana tsɛfã nɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.
45005003	Nɛ ɔhau pii kamɛ malo bɔamɔ kawɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ ɔhau afɔ̃ bɔakɔlɛ ɔwɔlɛ kado,
45005004	ɔwɔlɛ kado afɔ̃ bɔadza pintii, ade kadza pintii afɔ̃ bɔana kɔnɛte a.
45005005	Ade kɔnɛte láfɔ̃ kɔnyɔã awo boe, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔa ye ɔdɔ edo nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ ɛkpa boe a akũ.
45005006	Kitonɛkĩ kĩ bubuki bɔlá kɔbɛ̃ kudima a, ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ Kristo ku nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ lɔlɔ, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma mɔawɛ yi ɛkpa a.
45005007	Fɔnyɛ lɛtsa mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ oti odi aku nɛ oti kpĩĩ lɔlɔ. Fɔ́apuli fɔya malo kĩ oti odi aado ɔwɔlɛ kĩ yaku nɛ oti wĩ lɔlɔ.
45005008	Lɛmɛ Baguma tsa boe ayekĩ eti yawɛ boe kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bubuki bɔnyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a, Kristo ku nɛ boe lɔlɔ.
45005009	Ɛtsã ye wuda kamɛ ɛkɛna bati boe kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ. Wuda kĩĩ sũ yaanyɛ boe etomɛna Baguma kalɔkpa a kamɛ.
45005010	Bɔnya Baguma bakesĩnɛ lɛmɛ ɛkɛna boe ye bakɔba ɛtsãmɛna ye Obi wuda a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛpata ye a kamɛ. Finyaa kĩ ɛkpɔla Baguma ɛkpa boe kĩĩ ni, yaatɛ boe ɛba, kitonɛkĩ edzi nkpã.
45005011	Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ fukĩĩ odi, mbom bɔamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma tsã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ ɛlɔla bɔmɔ ye kayite a sũ.
45005012	Tɔkpa tsã oti mɔa akũ tɛya nɛ katinya kamɛ, ade wuda tsã ye akũ ɛya a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, wuda yalɛ ewo nɛ batidziwa flee kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kɛna tɔkpa.
45005013	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, tɔkpa na nɛ katinya kamɛ fɔmɔ mbla a ya, lɛmɛ awã kĩ mbla lɛláa ni, baábu lɛtsama kĩ lɛnyɛ tɔkpa.
45005014	Lɛmɛ kito Adam lɔkɔ kɛyawo Mose lɔkɔ a ni, wuda nya batidziwa flee akũ, mɔ bikĩ bɛtákɛna tɔkpa ndɛ tikĩ Adam kɛna a malo. Adam kĩĩ dzɛ̃ ndɛ oti a kĩ yaaya a.
45005015	Lɛmɛ be bati nviã a bɛtáketi, kitonɛkĩ Baguma futetsa faa a lɛlá ndɛ Adam tɔkpa a. Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ bati pii ku nɛ oti mɔa tɔkpa sũ. Lɛmɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ bɛ̃ kɔlaa, foesũ ade ayea ye futetsa a kĩ yakpa bati pii faa katsãmɛna oti mɔa kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu Kristo akũ a la a.
45005016	Futesa a kĩ Baguma kpa faa a lɛlá ndɛ lɛtsa a kĩ oti mɔa tɔkpa vɛlɛ tɛyamɛna a, kitonɛkĩ tɔkpa a kĩ oti mɔa a kɛna a yamɔ kadzɛ mɔ kɔtɔkaku. Lɛmɛ futetsa a kĩ Baguma kpa faa a fɔ̃ bibu bati beblebee tɔkpa a kĩ bɛkɛna a kĩ badã kpĩĩ.
45005017	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ oti mɔa tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna sũ wuda yaanya akũ. Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ oti mɔa a kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu Kristo kɛna a bɛ̃ foe flee. Bikĩ bɛna Baguma kɔnyakamɔ baũ kĩĩ flee a, kĩ ɛkɛna be bati kpĩĩ lɛmɛ a, aanya akũ nɛ nkpã kamɛ bɛtsãmɛna Kristo akũ.
45005018	Foesũ ndɛ ayekĩ oti mɔa tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna fɔ̃ bɛkɔ batidziwa flee kɔtɔ a, ade ayea oti mɔa tuwĩ kĩ ɛkɛna a kpa batidziwa flee ɔtɔbɛ, bɛna nkpã lɛmɛ a.
45005019	Ade ndɛ ayekĩ oti mɔa atɔ ɔsĩ kakɛna fɔ̃ bati flee dani tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a ni, ade ayea oti mɔa Baguma ɔlɛdo akũ kakɛna aafɔ̃ bɛkɛna bati pii kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ a.
45005020	Bɛyamɛna mbla a ayekĩ tɔkpa kakɛna aapɔ ebu, lɛmɛ awã kĩ tɔkpa kakɛna pɔnɛ ni, Baguma kɔnyakamɔ lɛmɛ apɔ kabu.
45005021	Foesũ ayekĩ tɔkpa nya akũ nɛ wuda kamɛ a ni, ade ayea Baguma kɔnyakamɔ anya akũ katsãmɛna kadzi kpĩĩ kamɛ, kakpã boe kawomɛna nkpã a kĩ kɛlá kawũna a kamɛ, nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ a.
45006001	Foesũ, finyaa litsa bɔ́alɛ? Bɔ́ana nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ ayekĩ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ aapɔ kibu mbɔɛɛ?
45006002	Oowo! Kĩ buku bɔkpa tɔkpa kɔkɔɛ a, nde bɔabuki budzi nkpã bɔkakɛna tɔkpa?
45006003	Mbɔɛɛ minyína kĩ, kĩ bɛwɔla boe mui, bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Yesu Kristo a, bɛwɔla boe mui bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye wuda a lɛmɛ?
45006004	Nɛ boe mui kawɔla kĩĩ kamɛ a, bɔna tsɛfã nɛ ye wuda a kamɛ, ade bibila bɔmɔ ye a. Ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a tsã ye kukũkpalɛ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ ɛdzɛla Kristo etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a, ade aye boe malo bɔ́ayidza budzi nkpã vɔɛ̃ a.
45006005	Kitonɛkĩ ayekĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye nɛ ye wuda kamɛ a, ade ayea bɔ́abuki bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye nɛ boe kadzɛla kadzi nkpã kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛdzɛla ye a.
45006006	Bunyina kĩ, kĩ bɛbɔa boe kutitse kɔɛ a nɛ asendua akũ mɔ Kristo ayekĩ boe sukɛna kĩ sawɛ tɔkpa kakɛna a aawɔ, ayekĩ bɔláabuki bɔnya tɔkpa basate.
45006007	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ oti sila eku ni, bɛnyɛ ye nɛ tɔkpa kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ.
45006008	Ntɛ buku mɔ Kristo ni, bɔtɛ budo kĩ bɔ́adzi nkpã lɛmɛ mɔ ye.
45006009	Bunyina kĩ, kĩ Baguma dzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa sũ ni, ɛláabuki eku da. Wuda buki lɛláabuki ɛna kɔbɛ̃ kudima nɛ ye akũ.
45006010	Wuda a kĩ Kristo ku a, eku ye deedimɔapɛ ɛkpa tɔkpa, lɛmɛ nkpã a kĩ edzi finyaa, edzi ye ɛkpa Baguma.
45006011	Ade ayea mi malo mibu mi akũ kĩ miku mikpa tɔkpa, lɛmɛ Baguma nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
45006012	Kɛtánɛ kĩ tɔkpa tibuki tɛnya mi sukɛna a kĩ saku a akũ, ayekĩ míakakɛna nɛ se fɔwɛtsa akũ.
45006013	Mitafɔnɛ mi sukɛna kakɔma awɛ mikpa tɔkpa tɛkɔa tɛkɛna ablɔ adima, mbom mikɔa mi akũ mikpa Baguma ndɛ bati kĩ ɛnyɛ etomɛna wuda kamɛ ɛyamɛna nɛ nkpã kamɛ. Mifɔnɛ mi akũ flee awɛ mikpa Baguma fɔnya fɔtsa kĩ yaakɔa ɛkɛna tuwĩ.
45006014	Kɛtánɛ kĩ tɔkpa tɛnya mi akũ, kitonɛkĩ miláa mbla kayɔ, mbom mideĩ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kayɔ.
45006015	Foesũ litsa bɔalɛ? Bɔ́akɛna tɔkpa kitonɛkĩ bɔláa mbla kayɔ, mbom budeĩ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kayɔ sũ? Oowo!
45006016	Minyina pefee kĩ ntɛ mikɔa mi akũ mikɛna odi basumunɛ ni, minyɛ ɔlate a kĩ ye kayɔ mideĩ a basate. Ntɛ mikɔa akũ mikpa tɔkpa kakɛna ni, lɛtsa a kĩ laanɛ nɛ foe kamɛ nyɛ wuda, lɛmɛ ntɛ mikɛna nɛ Baguma ɔlɛdo akũ ni, foe nfasɔ nyɛ kadzi kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
45006017	Bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ paa, kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ minya tɔkpa basate miyatɛ̃ malo ni, finyaa mitɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔtsa katsa a mɔ mi tɔwɔlɛ, milamɔ foe akũ kakɛna pɛpɛɛpɛ.
45006018	Baguma nyɛ mi etomɛna tɔkpa kamɛ, midani fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna basate.
45006019	Malɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ otidziwa aye nɛ ayekĩ otidziwa adɔ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ sũ. Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kĩ lɛtɛ̃ kamɛ ni, mifɔnɛ mi akũ flee awɛ ndɛ basate mikpa efĩĩ mɔ ablɔ fɔtsa kakɛna. Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ finyaa miafɔnɛ mi akũ flee awɛ mikpa ndɛ tuwĩ kakɛna basate a.
45006020	Kĩ minya tɔkpa kakɛna basate a, tuwĩ kakɛna tánya ɔhɛ fɔkpa mi.
45006021	Litsa nfasɔ mina mitomɛna fɔtsa a kĩ mikakɛna a kĩ finyaa fɔakɔ mi kɔnyɔã a kamɛ? Fɔtsa a na bamɛ flee kawũna nyɛ wuda.
45006022	Lɛmɛ finyaa, Baguma nyɛ mi nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ midani ye basate. Nfasɔ a kĩ míana nyɛ kĩ miakɔa mi akũ flee mikpa Baguma ɛkpalɛ ye akũ, lɔkɔa nɛ foe kawũna mina nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
45006023	Kitonɛkĩ tɔkpa kɔtɔkase nyɛ wuda, lɛmɛ Baguma futetsa faa nyɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
45007001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi a kĩ minyina Mose mbla a, míanu lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ kĩ malɛ nɛ awĩ a kayɔ. Mbla anya oti akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ edzi nkpã a odi.
45007002	Foe nfantuhũ nyɛ kĩ mbla sui otsole kĩ edzi kɔnyɔ edo nɛ ɔnyɔ kayɔ nɛ onyole a nkpã kamɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ onyole a ku ni, otsole a nɛ́ nɛ mbla a kĩ esui ye ɛmɛna mɔ onyole a kamɛ.
45007003	Foesũ ntɛ otsole a naa onyole bɛbã sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔnyɔ a buki edzi nkpã ni, baavɛ ye ɔdɔpaani. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔnyɔ a ku kɔ̃ ni, mbla kĩĩ tásui ye, ade ntɛ ɛnadzi mɔ onyole bɛbã ni, ɛtábɔa adɔpaa.
45007004	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ade aye fɔla fɔkpa mi malo a. Nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, mi malo miku, kitonɛkĩ minyɛ Kristo sukɛna a sɛkɛ sidi. Ade finyaa minyɛ ye a kĩ Baguma dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa a bade, ayekĩ bɔ́anɛ libi bɔkpa Baguma.
45007005	Kitonɛkĩ kĩ budzi nkpã nɛ sukɛna kamɛ a ni, sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ mbla a dzɛla nɛ boe kamɛ a, kɛna adzuma nɛ boe kamɛ, ɛmanɛ boe ɛkpa wuda.
45007006	Lɛmɛ finyaa bɔnɛ́ nɛ mbla a kayɔ, kitonɛkĩ buku bɔkpa fɔtsa a kĩ fusuli boe ndɛ kɔla bawanɛ a. Bɔláabuki busum nɛ mbla kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ osi kɔɛ a akũ, mbom bɔ́asum nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ osi vɔɛ̃ a akũ.
45007007	Finyaa litsa bɔ́alɛ? Kalɛ bɔ́alɛ kĩ mbla nyɛ tɔkpa? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ. Lɛmɛ mbla a lɛfɔ̃ ĩnyi lɛtsa a kĩ tɔkpa anɛ. Ntɛ mbla a ɛtalɛ kĩ, “Tayɔɔla anɛ nɛ oti bɛbã fɔtsa akũ” ni, kufɛ ĩnyína anɛngbã kawɛ a na.
45007008	Lɛmɛ fɔtsã mbla a akũ, tɔkpa na osi tinyina odo kakɔ fɔtsa kpa flee nɛ yĩ kamɛ. Ntɛ mbla kalaa ɛláa ni, kufɛ tɔkpa lɛmɛ ku.
45007009	Yĩ mɔawɛ a ndzi tɔ̃ nkpã, kĩ mbla a tána, lɛmɛ kĩ mbla a ya a, tɔkpa yidza tidzi nkpã,
45007010	ade nku a. Ade mbla a kĩ kufɛ ɛma yĩ nkpã a, yĩ kɔ̃ wuda ɛkɔa ɛma yĩ.
45007011	Tɔkpa tsã mbla akũ tɛna osi tɛkɛ yĩ, ade tɛkɔ yĩ a.
45007012	Foesũ mbla mɔawɛ a akũ kpalɛ, ade ayea ye nhihiɛ a adã kpĩĩ, ɛnɛnɛ lɛmɛ a.
45007013	Lɔkɔa lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ a dani wuda lɛkpa yĩ? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ. Tɔkpa tsã tuwĩ akũ tɛkɔa wuda tɛma yĩ, ayekĩ taanyɛ te kutitse paa a tɛtsa. Foesũ fɔtsã mbla akũ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa bɛtsa ndɛ lɛtsa kpa kĩ liti lɛnɛ́nɛ koũ.
45007014	Bunyina kĩ mbla a nyɛ hũhũ kamɛ fɔtsa, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ĩnyɛ otidziwa, kĩ bɛnɔ ɔsate bɛkpa tɔkpa.
45007015	Maánu yĩ fɔtsa kɛnawa a kayɔ, kitonɛkĩ maákɛna lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ kĩ makɛna a, mbom makɛna lɛtsa a kĩ makesĩ a.
45007016	Ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ maáwɛ a makɛna kɔ̃ ni, kekɔ̃ ntunɔ kĩ mbla a nɛnɛ.
45007017	Foesũ nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ akɛna fɔtsa a, mbom tɔkpa a kĩ tideĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a akɛna foe.
45007018	Ĩnyina kĩ tuwĩ tidima lidzí nɛ yĩ kamɛ ayekĩ ĩnyɛ otidziwa sũ. Kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ kawɛ a kĩ makɛna tuwĩ deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ malo ni, maápuli nkɛna te.
45007019	Tuwĩ a kĩ mawɛ kĩ makɛna a, maákɛna te, mbom makɛna tɔkpa a kĩ maáwɛ kĩ makɛna a.
45007020	Ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ maáwɛ a makɛna ni, kekɔ̃ nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ a akɛna foe, mbom tɔkpa a kĩ tideĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a akɛna foe.
45007021	Foesũ mmɔ́ mbla kĩĩ fɔlɛtsa ĩyi ɔsũ, kĩ ntɛ mawɛ kĩ makɛna tuwĩ ni, tɔkpa mbom makɛna.
45007022	Nɛ yĩ kamɛkamɛ ni, mamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ.
45007023	Lɛmɛ mamɔ mbla bɛbã nɛ yĩ sukɛna kamɛ kĩ yanɔ lɛma mɔ yĩ lɔlɔ kamɛ tuwĩ kĩ mawɛ a. Ɛkɛna yĩ kɔla ɔwanɛ ɛkpa tɔkpa mbla a kĩ edeĩ nɛ yĩ sukɛna kamɛ.
45007024	Nkɛna oti kĩ ye akũ akɔ kɔnya. Owei aatɛ yĩ etomɛna sukɛna kĩ sɛkpã yĩ sanamɛna wuda kamɛ a awɛ?
45007025	Kɔlɛ bɔanyɛ Baguma bɔtsãmɛna boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ. Finyaa, ayekĩ nla nyɛ kĩ nɛ yĩ mɔa akũ akũ ni, nnɛɛ yĩ adzuma makɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ, lɛmɛ sukɛna a kɔ̃ ni, nnɛ masum tɔkpa mbla a.
45008001	Foesũ finyaa kɔtɔkakɔ lɛláa kɛkpa bikĩ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu a.
45008002	Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ mbla a kĩ yakpa oti nkpã nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna kamɛ mɔ Kristo Yesu a, nyɛ yĩ etomɛna tɔkpa mɔ wuda mbla a kamɛ.
45008003	Lɛtsa a kĩ mbla a tápuli ɛkɛna a, ayekĩ sukɛna a tɛ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ ye awɛ sũ ni, Baguma kɔ̃ kɛna foe. Edo ye mɔawɛ obi ɛya nɛ otidziwa sukɛna kĩ sakɛna tɔkpa kamɛ, ade ɛyakɔ tɔkpa kɔtɔ, ɛnyɛ te a.
45008004	Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ boe a kĩ budzi nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ a, bɔ́apuli budzi nɛ tuwĩ kakɛna a kĩ ye mbla awɛ a onukpɛ̃.
45008005	Bati kĩ bidzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ be sukɛna awɛ a onukpɛ̃ ni, fɔtsa a kĩ be sukɛna awɛ a akũ bakɔna. Lɛmɛ bikĩ bidzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ Hũhũ a awɛ a onukpɛ̃ ni, fɔtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a awɛ a akũ be adzuni ana.
45008006	Oti kadzi nɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa tsɛ̃mɔ wuda, lɛmɛ oti kĩ Hũhũ a akpã ye a, ana nkpã mɔ lukudɔ.
45008007	Nɛ foesũ oti a kĩ ye sukɛna fɔwɛtsa nya ye akũ a adani Baguma okesĩnɛ, kitonɛkĩ yaákɛna nɛ Baguma mbla akũ, ade nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ɛláapuli ɛkɛna nɛ ye akũ.
45008008	Bikĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ be sukɛna kawɛ onukpɛ̃ a fɔkɛlatsa lɛláapuli fuwo Baguma anɛ.
45008009	Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ midzí nɛ sukɛna kawɛ onukpɛ̃, mbom midzi ndɛ ayekĩ Hũhũ a awɛ kĩ midzi a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ Kristo Hũhũ lɛláa ye kamɛ lɛnyɛ́ Kristo ode.
45008010	Lɛmɛ ntɛ Kristo deĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a, Hũhũ a nyɛ nkpã ɛkpa nɔ, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɛna nɔ oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, titɔ kĩ nɔ sukɛna ayaku malo nɛ tɔkpa sũ.
45008011	Ntɛ Baguma Hũhũ a kĩ ɛdzɛla Yesu etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ oti a kĩ ɛdzɛla Kristo etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a lɛmɛ aakpa mi sukɛna kĩ saku a nkpã, nɛ ye Hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a sũ.
45008012	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, budeĩ adzuma adi kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna lɛmɛ fɔnyɛ́ kĩ bɔadzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ boe sukɛna awɛ kĩ budzi a.
45008013	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ midzi nkpã nɛ sukɛna kawɛ onukpɛ̃ ni, míaku. Lɛmɛ ntɛ mitsã Hũhũ kamɛ mikɔ mi fɔkɛlatsa kpa a, míana nkpã.
45008014	Bati a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ akpã a flee nyɛ Baguma babi.
45008015	Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma kpa mi a tákɛna mi basate mikavila, mbom Hũhũ a akɛna mi Baguma babi. Ade Hũhũ a kɔbɛ̃ afɔ̃ bɔbɔa fɔwɔla kavɛ Baguma kĩ, “Abba!” kĩ foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ “Ao Nda!”
45008016	Baguma Hũhũ a mɔawɛ lɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe hũhũ yadi adansiɛ kĩ Baguma babi bɔanɛ.
45008017	Ntɛ bɔnyɛ ye babi ni, bɔnyɛ ye adzapadiɛ lɛmɛ banyanɛ, ade bɔmɔ Kristo bɔ́anya adzapadiɛ a kĩ Baguma kɔa eyi ye a. Foesũ ntɛ bɔna tsɛfã nɛ Kristo lubo kamɔ a kamɛ ni, bɔ́ana tsɛfã lɛmɛ nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ a.
45008018	Makɔna kĩ bɔláapuli bɔkɔa lubo a kĩ bɔamɔ finyaa a bɔkɔnamɔ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a kĩ baanyɛ bɛtsa boe a kɔlaa.
45008019	Fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa a flee dzi fɔadzɔlɛ mɔ akũ kasĩ kĩ Baguma ɛnyɛ ye babi ɛtsa.
45008020	Kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa a flee kɔtɔ kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza, nnɛ́ nɛ foe kawɛ akũ, mbom Baguma lɛwɛ kĩ fɔna lɔmɔ. Lɛmɛ kɔnɛte a deĩ kĩ,
45008021	luwi lidi ni, fɔtsa a kĩ bɛbɔa flee aanyɛ foe akũ nɛ tɛsate ɔsum kĩ yabu kade a kamɛ, fɔyaawo nɛ akũ akũ kadzi mɔ kukũkpalɛ a kĩ Baguma aakpa ye babi a kamɛ.
45008022	Kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ kɛyawo nviã lɔkɔ kĩĩ a, fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa a flee abe ayɔlɔhɔ ndɛ ɔmatsɔ̃ kĩ sɛmɛ pi ye aye.
45008023	Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ fɔtsa kĩ bɛbɔa a odi abe ayɔlɔhɔ, mbom boe a kĩ Baguma kpa ye Hũhũ ndɛ ye futetsa fɔtɔnyade a lɛmɛ bɔabe ayɔlɔhɔ nɛ boe kamɛ, kadzɔlɛ Baguma kĩ ɛkɛna boe ye babi a, ɛnyɛ boe kutitse a flee.
45008024	Kitonɛkĩ ade kɔnɛte kĩĩ sũ bɔna katɛ a, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɔamɔ kɔnɛte fɔtsa kɔkɔɛ ni, fubuki fɔnyɛ́ kɔnɛte. Kitonɛkĩ owei akɔa anɛ kate nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ yamɔ a akũ?
45008025	Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe anɛ teĩ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɔámɔ akũ ni, bɔana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kadzɔlɛ foe.
45008026	Ade ayea Hũhũ a lɛmɛ aayabumɔ boe a kĩ bɔdɔ a, kitonɛkĩ bunyína ayekĩ kɛfɛta kĩ bɔabɔa mpaɛ bɔkpa Baguma. Hũhũ mɔawɛ a abe ayɔlɔhɔ kapili boe lɔlɔ nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ mɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩ onukpɛ̃ lɛláapuli ɛlɛ.
45008027	Ade Baguma a kĩ yamɔ bati tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a nyina lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ Hũhũ a adzuni, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a ake Baguma aduli nɛ ye bade lɔlɔ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma awɛ a.
45008028	Bunyina kĩ Baguma akɛna fɔtsa flee fɔaboomu kakɛna fuwĩ kakpa bati a kĩ bawɛ ye kalɛ a, kĩ ɛvɛ nɛ ye nhihiɛ onukpɛ̃ a.
45008029	Bati a kĩ Baguma nyi ɛnyamɛna lɔtɔ a, ɛpau be eyi kĩ bɛyaakɛna ndɛ ye Obi aye, ayekĩ ye Obi a aanya be ɔtɔnyade nɛ bawaɛ̃ pii kamɛ.
45008030	Foesũ bati a kĩ Baguma nyɛ eyi a, ade be ɛvɛ a, ade bikĩ ɛvɛ a, ɛkɛna be bɛkpɔla ade ɛkpa be tsɛfã nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ a.
45008031	Ntɛ bɔkɔna fukĩĩ flee akũ a, litsa bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ? Ntɛ Baguma dzɛ̃ nɛ boe liti a ni, owei aapuli eyidza ɛdza nɛ boe akũ?
45008032	Ntɛ Baguma a kĩ ɛtásĩ ye mɔawɛ Obi kakɔa kakpa, mbom ɛkɔa ye ɛkpa faa nɛ boe flee lɔlɔ a ni, nde fɔ́anya kĩ ɛláakɔa fɔtsa bɛbã flee faa ebu Obi ɛkpa boe?
45008033	Owei aapuli ɛbɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ bati a kĩ Baguma pau a akũ? Baguma mɔawɛ di adansiɛ kĩ bɛtáku kɔtɔ.
45008034	Foesũ owei aakɔ be kɔtɔ? Nnɛ́ Kristo Yesu a kĩ eku ĩye kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ, edzi nkpã nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna, yake ye aduli nɛ boe lɔlɔ a!
45008035	Kekɔ̃ owei ĩye litsa aapuli etsua bɔmɔ Kristo ɔdɔ a kayite? Lubokamɔ aapuli, mbɔɛɛ ɔhau, mbɔɛɛ bati liti katomɛna, mbɔɛɛ kɔlɛkakɔ ĩye ohiã, mbɔɛɛ ɔdzɔ kadzi, mbɔɛɛ wuda libe, mbɔɛɛ kĩ wuda?
45008036	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nɔ sũ, bakɔ boe lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ. Ade babu boe ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛkpã banaakɔ aye.”
45008037	Nɛ fukĩĩ flee kamɛ a, bɔtsã Kristo kĩ yawɛ boe kalɛ a akũ bɔba ayekĩ bɔkɔna malo.
45008038	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ndo kĩ lɛtsama lɛláapuli lɛnyɛ boe nɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo ɔdɔ a kamɛ. Fɔláanya wuda ĩye nkpã, ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ĩye hũhũ kpa kɔbɛ̃ kudi, lɔkɔ kĩĩ ĩye lɔkɔ kĩ laaya,
45008039	katinya kĩ kideĩ nɛ ode ĩye katinya kĩ kideĩ nɛ tite kayɔ ĩye fɔtsa a kĩ bɛbɔa a kamɛ fudima. Lɛtsama koũ lɛláa katinya kamɛ flee kĩ láapuli lɛnyɛ boe nɛ Baguma ɔdɔ a kĩ bɔna bɔtsãmɛna boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu akũ a kamɛ!
45009001	Lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, Kristo ode manɛ ade maáma fɔvã a. Yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa anya ye akũ a akpa yĩ katɛkado kĩ nnɛ́ fɔvã mama.
45009002	Mabe ayɔlɔhɔ, ade ntɛ kalɔɛ kĩ kaádɔ nɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ,
45009003	kakpa yĩ bati a kĩ bɔmɔ be bɔnyɛ sukɛna mɔ babɔanɛ mɔa. Nɛ be sũ maawɛ kĩ Baguma edumu yĩ faa, ɛsɛ̃ bɔmɔ Kristo kayite malo kufɛ.
45009004	Kitonɛkĩ ade be nyɛ Israel ɔmaĩ a kĩ Baguma pau, ɛkɔa ɛkɛna ye bade, ɛnyɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a ɛtsa be a. Esui onukpɛ̃ mɔ be, ɛkpa be ye mbla a lɛmɛ. Be nɛɛ Baguma ɔsum osi wĩ a, ade be lɛmɛ ɛkɛna bɔhɛ ɛkpa a.
45009005	Be kasinu to Hebrifɔ bawanyɔ a kĩ bɛtɛ buĩ a kamɛ, ade be kade kamɛ Kristo lɛmɛ nɛ eto ndɛ otidziwa aye ɛya a. Mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma a kĩ yanya fɔtsa flee akũ daa daa a! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
45009006	Nlámɔ kalɛ kĩ Baguma kalɛkayi a táya nɛ foe kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ bati a kĩ bito Israel a flee nyɛ Israelfɔ kpanunu.
45009007	Ade ayea nnɛ́ Abraham kasinu babi a flee nyɛ Baguma babi. Baguma bi Abraham kĩ, “Isak akũ fɔ́atsã mɔ aana babi mɔ bawa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi a.”
45009008	Foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ nnɛ́ babi a kĩ Abraham ma ndɛ bati ayea nyɛ Baguma babi, mbom bikĩ ɛma nɛ ye bɔhɛ kamɛ a.
45009009	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma bɔhɛ a nyɛ, “Kateliva, lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ a, maamuniki ĩya ade Sara aama obinyole a.”
45009010	Nnɛ́ fukĩĩ odi a. Babinyole nviã a kĩ Rebeka ma a ɔlɛga nyɛ boe ɔwanyɔ Isak.
45009011	-
45009012	Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ babinyole nviã kamɛ ɔmɔa kapau fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ Baguma nhihiɛ onukpɛ̃ sũ ni, Baguma bi Rebeka kĩ, “Obinɔkɔɛ̃ a aasum obisɛ̃de a.” Ebi ye eyi kɔkɔɛ fɔmɔ ɛyama babi a. Foesũ Baguma kapau a kĩ ɛkɛna a lɛdzɛ́ nɛ tuwĩ ĩye tɔkpa a kĩ nta babi a kamɛ odi kɛna a akũ, mbom Baguma kawɛ fɔanɛ.
45009013	Bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Nwɛ Yakob kalɛ, lɛmɛ nkesĩ Esau.”
45009014	Lɔkɔa bɔ́alɛ kĩ Baguma lɛmɛ ládã kpĩĩ? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ kɔlaa.
45009015	Kitonɛkĩ ebi Mose kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ mawɛ kĩ makɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ nkpa ni, ade ye maakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ nkpa a. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ye akũ kɔ yĩ kɔnya ni, maamɔ ye kɔnya.”
45009016	Foesũ Baguma oti kapau lɛdzɛ́ nɛ ye mbɔdibɔ ĩye lɛtsa a kĩ yawɛ a akũ, mbom lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa dzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ odi akũ.
45009017	Kitonɛkĩ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa kamɛ a, Baguma bi Egipte lɛgã kĩ, “Ndzina nɔ lɛgã ayekĩ maatsã nɔ akũ ĩnyɛ yĩ kɔbɛ̃ ntsa, lɔkɔa yĩ dĩ lɛgba nɛ katinya kamɛ flee.”
45009018	Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ yamɔ kɔnya a, ade ye yamɔ kɔnya a, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ ɛna atɔ ɔsĩ a, yafɔ̃ yana atɔ ɔsĩ.
45009019	Mi kamɛ odi aavia yĩ kĩ, “Ntɛ fɔla lɔmɔ a, nde sũ Baguma buki yanyɛ nfumusu kakpa odi? Owei aapuli eyidza ɛdza nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ?”
45009020	Nɔ otidziwa, owei anɛ kĩ akpa Baguma mbuayɛ lɔmɔ? Lubui lávia de ɔmɛnɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ ɔmɛ yĩ lɔmɔ?”
45009021	Fubui ɔmɛnɛ deĩ osi kĩ yakɔa tibute a kĩ enuna ɛbɔa lɔbɔ a ɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ yawɛ. Mbɔɛɛ ɛlá osi kĩ yakɔa tite lɔbɔ mɔapɛ a ɛmɛ fubui nviã? Yaamɛ lɔmɔa kĩ lalɛ kadã eyi ɛkpa fuwi titiliwu, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa te nkaɛ a ɛmɛ lɛbɛbã kĩ laálɛ kadã eyi ɛkpa luwi daa akũ adzuma kakɛna.
45009022	Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna a kayɔ nɛ awĩ a. Ntɛ Baguma wɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye kalɔkpa kanya, ɛfɔ̃ bɛmɔ ye otumi, lɛmɛ ebuki ɛna ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ epini bikĩ be akũ ɛna kalɔkpa, kĩ bidum be bɛkpa kawɔla a ni, litsa odeĩ kĩ aalɛ?
45009023	Ade ntɛ Baguma wɛ lɛmɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye kukũkpalɛ baũ a kĩ biko nɛ boe a kĩ ɛmɔ kɔnya akũ a, boe a kĩ ɛmanɛ eyi ɛkpa ye kukũkpalɛ a,
45009024	kitonɛkĩ boe nyɛ bati a kĩ ɛpau etomɛna Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ a ni, odeĩ kadi kalɛ?
45009025	Ade fukĩĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Hosea ovoli kamɛ kĩ, “Bati kĩ bɛnyɛ́ yĩ ɔmaĩ bati a, maavɛ be kĩ, ‘Yĩ bati.’ Kade a kĩ ntáwɛ ke kalɛ a, maavɛ ke ‘Yĩ ɔdɔ bati.’
45009026	Nɛ kakɔ mɔapɛ a kĩ bibi be kĩ, ‘Minyɛ́ yĩ bati’ a Ade awã baavɛ be kĩ ‘Baguma Kĩ Edzi Nkpã Daa a babi.’ ”
45009027	Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya bɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ nɛ Israelfɔ akũ kĩ, “Ntɛ Israelfɔ nɛ lidede ndɛ mpo abuĩ dã malo ni, be kamɛ bati sukuloo badi aana katɛ,
45009028	kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate aadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ bati pɛpɛɛpɛ mɔatsɛ, etsua lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa lukũ.”
45009029	Yesaya buki ɛlɛ eyi kĩ, “Ntɛ boe Ɔlate Otumifɔ Flee a ɛtatina boe babi mɔ bawa a badi ni, kufɛ bɔdani bɔkɛna ndɛ Sodom, buketimɔ Gomora!”
45009030	Foesũ litsa koũ bɔ́alɛ? Matsa kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Israelfɔ a kĩ bɛtápili kĩ badzi kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ a, bɛkɛna be bati kĩ bɛkpɔla bɛtsãmɛna be katɛkado akũ.
45009031	Ade Israelfɔ a kĩ bɛkawɛ mbla a kĩ yaakɛna be bati kpĩĩ a, tápuli bɛkɛna nɛ mbla a akũ a.
45009032	Litsa sũ bɛtápuli? Kitonɛkĩ bɛtákɔa katɛkado bɛwɛ foe, mbom bɛkɔa anɛ bite nɛ be mɔawɛ mbɔdibɔ akũ. Nɛ foesũ bitula nɛ Kristo kĩ ɛla ndɛ de a kĩ bati atula nɛ de akũ a akũ,
45009033	ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Midã! Nkɔa de lidi mayi nɛ Zion, de kĩ bati aatula nɛ de akũ bɛnɛ bɛtɔ. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo ni, kɔnyɔã lɛláawo ye.”
45010001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ nɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ flee, mɔ mpaɛ kĩ mabɔa nɛ de akũ kakpa Baguma nyɛ kĩ, ɛfɔ̃ yĩ awɛ kade bati bɛna nkpã katɛ!
45010002	Maapuli ndi adansiɛ kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ flee bɛkpa Baguma ɔsum, lɛmɛ binyína ayekĩ basum ye nɛ osi wĩ akũ a kanyina wĩ.
45010003	Bɛtányi osi a kĩ Baguma atsã kabu bati kĩ bidzi kpĩĩ nɛ ye anɛ, foesũ bɛwɛ be mɔawɛ tisi kĩ batsã bɛkɛna fɔtsa biwo Baguma anɛ, ade foesũ bɛtákɔa be akũ bɛkpa Baguma osi a kĩ yatsã kakɛna bati kpĩĩ a.
45010004	Kitonɛkĩ Kristo nyɛ Mose mbla a kawũna, ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo ni, baabu ye oti kpĩĩ.
45010005	Mose tsɛlɛ eyi ɛtsa ayekĩ oti adzi kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ ntɛ edi mbla a akũ. Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ ni, yaana nkpã.”
45010006	Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ nɛ ayekĩ oti aadã kpĩĩ nɛ katɛkado kamɛ nyɛ kĩ, “Tavia nɔ akũ kĩ, ‘Owei aade ɛnaa ode?’ kĩ fɔatsa kĩ ɛnaakpã Kristo eto kanɔkpade ede ɛya.
45010007	Ĩye tavia kĩ, ‘Owei aaka ɛnaa kayɔ?’ Foe nyɛ kĩ owei aanaa kanɔkpade ɛnaakpã Kristo ɛyamɛna.”
45010008	Lɛtsa a kĩ yatsa a nyɛ kĩ, “Baguma kalɛ a fuã nɔ plɛplɛplɛ, kideĩ nɛ nɔ onukpɛ̃ mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.” Ade katɛkado ɔlɛdo a kĩ bɔade lɛtsã nɛ ke akũ a nɛ awĩ a.
45010009	Ntɛ ɔkɔa onukpɛ̃ ɔlɛ kĩ Yesu nyɛ boe Ɔlate, mɔ ɔtɛ odo nɛ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ ni, Baguma aakpa nɔ nkpã.
45010010	Kitonɛkĩ ɔwɔlɛ bakɔa katɛ kado kana kadzi kpĩĩ, ade onukpɛ̃ bakɔa kanyɛ foe kanya mɔ Baguma akpa boe nkpã.
45010011	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo lɛláatɛ kɔnyɔã.”
45010012	Odi nyɛ odi deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ntsitsemu adima lɛláa Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kayite. Baguma mɔapɛ a nyɛ bati flee Ɔlate, ade yakpa akũ kana fɔtsa nhila pii bikĩ babɔa mpaɛ kavɛ ye a.
45010013	Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaavɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ ni, yaana nkpã.”
45010014	Lɛmɛ nde bati aakɛna bɛvɛ oti a kĩ bɛtátɛ ye bido a? Nde baakɛna bɛtɛ oti a kĩ bɛtánu ye fɔlɛtsa a bido? Ade ntɛ bɛtáde lɛtsã nɛ fɔlɛtsa a akũ a, nde baakɛna binu ye dĩ?
45010015	Ade nde baakɛna bide lɛtsã Baguma fɔlɛtsa ntɛ bɛtádo fɔtɔ banyanɛ? Ade foe akũ mɔ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Batɔ a kĩ bɛyaade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ a kaya alɛ kadã paa!”
45010016	Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ bati flee lɛtɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a, kitonɛkĩ Yesaya lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, owei lɛtɛ boe kalɛ a edo?”
45010017	Foesũ katɛkado ato kalɛ a kanu kamɛ, ade fɔlɛtsa a kanu ato lɛtsã kade nɛ Kristo akũ a.
45010018	Lɛmɛ mavia kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ bɛtánu Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kɔlaa? Ɔnɔkɔali binu foe, kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsã badenɛ a odo tsɛna katinya kamɛ flee, ade be fɔlɛtsa a gba fɔnawo katinya kawũnakɔ̃ a flee.”
45010019	Mavia bio kĩ lɔkɔa kanu Israelfɔ a tánu fɔlɛtsa a kayɔ? Mose mɔawɛ lɛnya lɔtɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, Baguma lɛ kĩ, “Maafɔ̃ minɔ lineke mɔ bati kĩ bɛnyɛ́ ɔmaĩ a. Maakɔa ɔmaĩ a kĩ ɛtábinya anɛ a ndo mi kalɔkpa.”
45010020	Ade Yesaya do ɔwɔlɛ ɛba ebi be kĩ, Baguma lɛ kĩ, “Bati a kĩ bɛtáwɛ yĩ liti osi a, ade be lɛmɔ́ yĩ a bati a kĩ bɛtávia yĩ akũ a, ade be ĩnyɛ yĩ akũ ntsa a.”
45010021	Baguma buki ɛlɛ nɛ Israelfɔ akũ kĩ, “Luwi mɔa flee ndzɛlɛ yĩ akpɔ kamɛ nkpa bati a kĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ, kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ lɛmɛ a.”
45011001	Foesũ mavia kĩ Baguma pu ye mɔawɛ bati a flefle? Oowo! Yĩ mɔawɛ Israelni manɛ, ĩnyɛ Abraham kasinu ɔwa, kĩ nto Benyamin katete a kamɛ.
45011002	Baguma tápu ye ɔmaĩ a kĩ ɛpau eyi kito kayɔkayi a. Mbɔɛɛ minyína lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ, awã a kĩ Eliya ke Baguma aduli nɛ Israelfɔ lɔlɔ a? Ɛlɛ kĩ,
45011003	“Boe Ɔlate, bɛkɔ nɔ onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, ade bidzuli nɔ afɔlibɔ tɛtɛnyɛ a. Yĩ odi keĩ lite ade bawɛ kĩ bakɔ yĩ malo a!”
45011004	Lɛmɛ nde Baguma kpa Eliya mbuayɛ? Ebi ye kĩ, “Ntina bati mpim evũkɔnɔ kĩ bɛtásum Baal baviɔ̃ a ĩyi nkpa yĩ akũ.”
45011005	Ade aye fɔla nɛ finyaa lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ malo a. Israelfɔ sukuloo badi te kĩ Baguma mɔ be kɔnya ɛpau eyi a.
45011006	Baguma mɔ be kɔnya, ɛpau be, nnɛ́ nɛ be adzuma a kĩ bɛkɛna a sũ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bati kapau dzɛ̃ nɛ be lɛkɛnana akũ ni, kekɔ̃ ye kɔnyakamɔ a buki kɔnyɛ́ kɔnyakamɔ.
45011007	Foesũ nde? Israelfɔ a tána lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkawɛ a. Lɛmɛ be kamɛ badi sukuloo a kĩ Baguma pau a lɛna foe, ade be nkaɛ kɛna atɔ ɔsĩ nɛ Baguma kavɛ akũ a.
45011008	Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Baguma fɔ̃ be adzuni mɔ be tɔwɔlɛ dɔ kĩ baánu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ, Ade kito nɛ ke kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a, baápuli bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ ĩye binu foe kayɔ.”
45011009	Ade Dawid lɛ kĩ, “Baguma ɛfɔ̃ be kanyakɔ̃ opunu ɛdani kpɛĩ epi be, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ baatula bɛtɔ fɔnya be sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ.
45011010	Ɛfɔ̃ be anɛ eke ɔtũ ayekĩ bɛláamɔ fɔkɔ, ɛfɔ̃ bikũũkũ nɛ be lubokamɔ kayɔ daa daa.”
45011011	Finyaa mavia kĩ, kĩ Yudafɔ tula bɛnɛ bɛtɔ a, bɛkahɔ kɔlaa nɛ awã? Oowo! Ayekĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa sũ ni, nkpã katɛ a ya nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ Yudafɔ a aanɔ be lineke.
45011012	Ntɛ Yudafɔ tɔkpa yamɛna akũ kana nhila baũ nɛ katinya kamɛ, mɔ ntɛ be hũhũ kamɛ katɔ a ma bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a nhila pii ni, kekɔ̃ nhila a aablusu paa ntɛ Yudafɔ a flee dani bɛkɛna Baguma bade.
45011013	Ade mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a mabi fɔlɛtsa finyaa a. Ayekĩ ĩnyɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sũ ni, maapia nɛ adzuma a akũ.
45011014	Ɔsa fɔ́atsã ye kakɛna kamɛ ni, maapuli nfɔ̃ yĩ kade bati lɛnɔ lineke ayekĩ maapuli ntɛ badi nkpã.
45011015	Kitonɛkĩ kĩ Baguma fɔnɛ be awɛ a, ɛkpɔla batidziwa kĩ bɛnyɛ ye bakesĩnɛ a ɛkɛna be ye bakɔba. Foesũ nde fɔ́ana ntɛ Baguma buki ɛtɛ be? Fɔ́ana ndɛ nkpã ɛkpa banɔkpa!
45011016	Ntɛ abodoo sɛkɛ sɛtɔnyade a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkpa Baguma akũ kpalɛ ni, kekɔ̃ ye nkaɛ a lɛmɛ akũ kpalɛ. Ade ayea ntɛ bɛkɔa kutse tunu bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma ni, koe tɛnanɛ a lɛmɛ nyɛ ye tide.
45011017	Bitsua kugua kutse kĩ bidu a tɛnanɛ tidi bɛnyɛ, ade bɛkɔa lupo kamɛ kugua kutsede tɛnanɛ bɛyatalɛ nɛ koe akũ a. Mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a la ndɛ lupo kamɛ kutse tɛnanɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛyatalɛ nɛ kukĩ bidu akũ a, ade finyaa míana kutse a tunu kamɛ funitsã a fudi.
45011018	Foesũ mitasupa bikĩ bitsua bɛnyɛ ndɛ tɛnanɛ aye a. Nde sũ miapia akũ mitsa be? Mite anɛ kĩ tɛnanɛ kɛkɛ mianɛ, nnɛ́ mi nyɛ kutse tunu a, mbom tunu a pini mi.
45011019	Lɛmɛ ɔsa nɔ aalɛ kĩ, “Bitsua tɛnanɛ a bɛnyɛ kĩ yĩ nna nɛ te kadokɔ̃.”
45011020	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Bitsua te kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ bido, ade mina kadzakɔ̃ nɛ mi katɛkado sũ a, foesũ mitapia nɛ foe akũ, mbom mikavila.
45011021	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Baguma támɔ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛla ndɛ kutse kpĩĩ a tɛnanɛ a kɔnya ni, ɔkɔna kĩ yaamɔ nɔ kɔnya?
45011022	Dã ayekĩ Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ, mɔ ayekĩ edeĩ ɔsĩ. Baguma deĩ ɔsĩ nɛ bikĩ bɛnɛ bɛtɔ akũ, lɛmɛ edeĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa nɔ ntɛ osila odzi nɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ a kamɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔtádzi lɔmɔ ni, Baguma aatsua nɔ malo ɛnyɛ nɛ kutse a akũ.
45011023	Ade ntɛ Yudafɔ a muniki bɛyatɛ Baguma bidoi ni, Baguma aakɔa be ɛdzɛla nɛ be kadzakɔ̃ kɔɛ a, kitonɛkĩ Baguma aapuli ɛkɛna foe.
45011024	Mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, mila ndɛ lupo kamɛ kugua kutse tɛnanɛ a kĩ bitsua bɛyatalɛ nɛ kugua kutse wĩ a akũ a aye. Yudafɔ a la ndɛ kugua kutse a kĩ bidu a, foesũ fɔlá ɔsĩ fɔkpa Baguma kĩ yaabuki ɛkɔa kugua kutse mɔawɛ tɛnanɛ a kĩ bitsua bɛnyɛ a ɛtalɛ nɛ kutse mɔawɛ a akũ.
45011025	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa bɛlawa fudi deĩ kĩ mawɛ kĩ minyi, ayekĩ miláabu mi akũ anyansãfɔ. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ Israelfɔ badi atɔ ɔsĩ a aana kɛnaawo kĩ, bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, kakã flee ya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
45011026	Ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ fuyua a lɔkɔa Yudafɔ a flee aana katɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Ɔtɛnɛ a aato Zion ɛya. Yaanyɛ ablɔ fɔtsa flee ɛnɛmɛna nɛ Yakob katete a kamɛ a.
45011027	Maakɛna bɔhɛ kĩĩ mɔ be, ntɛ ĩnyɛ be tɔkpa nnamɛna.”
45011028	Nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ kɔ̃ ni, Yudafɔ a dani Baguma bakesĩnɛ nɛ mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sũ. Lɛmɛ nɛ Baguma be kapau sũ ni, bɛnyɛ Baguma bakɔba nɛ be bawanyɔ sũ.
45011029	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma ládani ye adzuni nɛ oti a kĩ ɛpau ĩye ehila a akũ.
45011030	Kɔkɔɛ a, mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, mitákɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ, lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma mɔ mi kɔnya kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ a na atɔ ɔsĩ.
45011031	Ade ayea kɔnya a kĩ Baguma mɔ mi a sũ ni, finyaa Yudafɔ lɛmɛ lákɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ ayekĩ Baguma aamɔ be malo kɔnya.
45011032	Ayekĩ batidziwa flee sĩ kĩ baátse Baguma sũ ni, ɛfɔ̃ bati flee kɛna fɔkɔ katabu kɔla bawanɛ, ayekĩ yaamɔ be flee kɔnya.
45011033	Baguma akũ kana fɔtsa nɛ lidede paa! Ye nyansã mɔ kadikanyi kamɛ dzũ paa! Owei aapuli ɛnyɛ ye kɔtɔkakɔ kamɛ? Owei aapuli enu ye tisi kayɔ?
45011034	Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Owei nyina boe Ɔlate a adzuni? Owei aapuli ɛkpa ye kɔdɛ?
45011035	Owei lɛkpa Baguma litsedi tɔ̃, ayekĩ yaakɛna ese ye kɔtɔ?”
45011036	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛbɔa fɔtsa flee, ye kɔbɛ̃ akũ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa dzi nkpã, ade ye kamɛ lɛmɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa aawũna a. Obu mɔ kamu nyɛ Baguma fude daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
45012001	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ayekĩ Baguma amɔ boe kɔnya sũ ni, make mi aduli paa kĩ mikɔa mi akũ mikpa Baguma ndɛ afɔliɛ fɔtsa kĩ fudeĩ nkpã, kĩ foe akũ kpalɛ, fɔawo ye anɛ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ ayekĩ miasum Baguma nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ mɔ mi tɔwɔlɛ a.
45012002	Mitadzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ bati adzi nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ a, mbom mifɔ̃ Baguma ɛdani mi adzuni ɛkɛna avɔɛ̃ lɔkɔa midani ɔbla. Fɔ́afɔ̃ minyi Baguma kawɛ, fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnɛnɛ, kĩ fɔawo ye anɛ, fɔkpɔla lɛmɛ a.
45012003	Nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ futetsa baũ a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ sũ ni, mabi mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtabu ye tɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ɛba ayekĩ kɛfɛta. Nɛ foe kadokɔ̃ a, ɛkɔna fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatsa akũ kadɔla, lɔkɔa ɛdzɛmɔ ye akũ ɛdã nɛ katɛkado a kĩ Baguma kpa ye a onukpɛ̃.
45012004	Ayekĩ budeĩ sukɛna fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ pii nɛ oti mɔawɛ a kamɛ, kĩ fɔakɛna tudzuma futefute a,
45012005	ade ayea titɔ kĩ bati pii bɔanɛ malo ni, oti mɔa bɔanɛ nɛ Kristo kamɛ, kĩ bɔtsamɔ akũ ndɛ sukɛna fɔkɔ futefute nɛ oti mɔa kamɛ.
45012006	Baguma mɔ boe kɔnya, ɛkpa boe futetsa futefute, foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔkɛna foe akũ adzuma nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ a onukpɛ̃. Ntɛ boe futetsa nyɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔakɛna nɛ katɛkado a kĩ budeĩ a onukpɛ̃.
45012007	Ntɛ boe futetsa nyɛ kĩ busum bati ni, kɛnɛ kĩ busum be ayekĩ kɛfɛta, ntɛ futetsa nyɛ fɔtsa katsa ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔtsa fɔtsa.
45012008	Ntɛ fɔnyɛ bati ɔwɔlɛ kɔbɛ̃ kado ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna foe. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakpa bati fɔtsa ni, ɛkɛna foe mɔ ɔwɔlɛ faa. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ bati onukpɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna foe mɔ anɛ kakpalɛ.
45012009	Miwɛ akũ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ. Mikesĩ tɔkpa, lɔkɔa mipi fɔtsa wĩ midomɔ akũ.
45012010	Miwɛ akũ akũ kalɛ ndɛ bawaɛ̃ nɛ Kristo kamɛ aye, ade odi nyɛ odi ɛbɔa mbɔdi ɛkɔa obu ɛkpa ɔwaɛ̃ a.
45012011	Mikɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ ade mitana ɔnyɔnɛ a. Misum boe Ɔlate a mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃.
45012012	Mifɔ̃ mi kɔnɛte a kɔkpã mi nɛ kawɔlɛ kamɛ. Mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ nɛ mi ɔhau kamɛ, mikaabɔa mpaɛ daa daa.
45012013	Mibumɔ asɔli bati a kĩ badi ahiã a, ade mitɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ faa nɛ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
45012014	Miwã Baguma kĩ ehila bikĩ bitomɔ mi liti a. Mivia kĩ ehila be, ɛtadum be.
45012015	Mimɔ kawɔlɛ mɔ bikĩ bamɔ kawɔlɛ, ade mibe mɔ bikĩ babe lɛmɛ a.
45012016	Mina nɛ adzuni mɔapɛ kamɛ mikpa odi nyɛ odi. Mitapia akũ, mbom mikɛna tɔkɔba mɔ bikĩ bɛdɔla be akũ kĩ bati lábu nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ a. Mitabu mi akũ kĩ minyina kadi.
45012017	Ntɛ oti odi fum nɔ ni, takɔa tɔkpa ose ye kɔtɔ. Mibɔa mbɔdi mikɛna lɛtsa kĩ odi nyɛ odi abu kĩ lɛnɛnɛ a.
45012018	Ntɛ fɔ́alɛ kakɛna, mɔ fɔ́ato mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, mimɔ odi nyɛ odi midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
45012019	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitakɛna odima tɔkpa mise kɔtɔ da, mbom mifɔ̃ Baguma kalɔkpa kɛkɛna foe. Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, Ɔlate a lɛ kĩ, “Yĩ aavɛlɛ sɔtɔ, yĩ aakɛna nse kɔtɔ.”
45012020	Lɛmɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ kɔlɛ akɔ nɔ okesĩnɛ ni, kpa ye funitsã ɛnya. Ntɛ ɔmɔado akɔ ye ni, kpa ye mui ɛmɔa. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ɔkɛna fukĩĩ ni, aafɔ̃ kɔnyɔã liwo ye paa.”
45012021	Tafɔ̃ tɔkpa lɛnya nɔ akũ, mbom kɔa tuwĩ kanya tɔkpa akũ.
45013001	Kɛnɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi ebu ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ, kitonɛkĩ otumi odima lɛláa kĩ ɛtáto Baguma sɛkɛ̃, ade ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ a kĩ bidzi finyaa a, Baguma lidzina be.
45013002	Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ eyidza ɛdza nɛ ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ otumi akũ a, yidza ɛdza nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ehihiɛ eyi a akũ. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna lɔmɔ a, aavɛlɛ kɔtɔkaku ɛkpa ye mɔawɛ.
45013003	Bati a kĩ bakɛna tuwĩ a, lávila bati akũ banyanɛ, mbom bikĩ bakɛna tɔkpa a avila be. Ɔwɛ kĩ bati akũ ɔnyanɛ ɛtahũnahũna nɔ? Kekɔ̃ kɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ, lɔkɔa yaamu nɔ.
45013004	Kitonɛkĩ bati akũ ɔnyanɛ a nyɛ Baguma ɔsumunɛ kĩ yakɛna adzuma ɛkpa nɔ kalɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔkɛna tɔkpa kɔ̃ ni, kekɔ̃ vila ye, kitonɛkĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yavɛlɛ sɔtɔ ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta. Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ yanɛ, ade yadã kĩ bɛkpa bikĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa a Baguma sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a.
45013005	Nɛ fukĩ sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ oti adɔla akũ ɛkpa ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ a, nnɛ́ nɛ Baguma sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ odi sũ, mbom ayekĩ oti ɔwɔlɛ fɔ̃ enyina tuwĩ a sũ.
45013006	Ade fukĩĩ lɛmɛ sũ miase ɔmaĩ tɔgɔlɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ a akɛna adzuma kakpa Baguma ntɛ bɛkɛna be tudzuma tɛkpɔla.
45013007	Foesũ mise be lɛtsa a kĩ midzimɔ be a. Mise ɔgɔlɛ mɔ dutɛ mikpa bikĩ kɛfɛta. Mivila oti a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bivila a, ade mibu oti a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkpa obu a.
45013008	Mitadzimɔ odima kɔtɔ, kɔtɔ a kĩ miadzimɛna a nyɛ kĩ miwɛ mi akũ akũ kalɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kalɛ ni, ɛkɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a flee akũ.
45013009	Mbla a kĩ Baguma kpa a lɛ kĩ, “Tabɔa adɔpaa, takɔ oti, taye, tayɔɔlɛ anɛ nɛ nɔ ɔkɔba fɔtsa akũ,” mɔ tɛbɛbã a kĩ tibu a flee boomu nɛ mbla mɔapɛ kamɛ kĩ, “Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ kalɛ a.”
45013010	Ntɛ awɛ odi kalɛ ni, ɔláakɛna tɔkpa nɛ ye akũ, foesũ ɔdɔ nyɛ mbla a flee akũ kakɛna.
45013011	Kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna fukĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ mianyinya nɛ tida kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aatɛ boe a nkpã fuã finyaa lɛba lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔnya lɔtɔ bɔtɛ Kristo budo a.
45013012	Lɛnyɛ lɔkɔ tɛ̃ liyua, kade lamɛna kanyina. Mifɔ̃ bɔfɔ̃ ɔtũ kamɛ fɔtsa kakɛna, lɔkɔa bɔbɔɛ kawũ kanɔ fɔtsa bɔbla bɔkpa kanɔ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ.
45013013	Mifɔ̃ bupi boe akũ kapi wĩ ndɛ bati kĩ bidzi nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ. Mitafɔ̃ bɔna nɛ kanya mɔ futo kawɔlɛ mɔ bavɛ kawuga kamɛ, ĩye adɔpaa kabɔa, ĩye ablɔ kadi, ĩye kapaa mɔ anɛngbã kakɛna kamɛ.
45013014	Mbom mibɔɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kawũ fɔtsa mido ndɛ atadiɛ aye, lɔkɔa mifɔ̃ mi sukɛna akũ kadã kakɔna miyaadani se odo fɔtsa akũ bakɛnanɛ.
45014001	Mitɛ oti a kĩ ɛtátim nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a mido nɛ mi kamɛ faa, mitavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ ye nɛ lɛtsa kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna mɔ likĩ kɛtáfɛta kĩ ɛkɛna a akũ.
45014002	Oti odi katɛkado kpa ye osi kĩ ɛnya funitsã fudi nyɛ fufudi, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ ye katɛkado tátim a kɔ̃ anya kɔba kamɛ funitsã odi.
45014003	Oti a kĩ yanya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a, ɛtasupa oti a kĩ yaánya foe. Ade oti a kĩ yanya kɔba funitsã odi a, ɛtadzɛmɔ ekĩ yanya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ Baguma tɛ ye.
45014004	Owei anɛ kĩ adzɛmɔ oti bɛbã ɔsumunɛ? Ye mɔawɛ ɔlate aamɔ ntɛ ɛdzɛ̃ pintii ĩye ɛtɔ. Lɛmɛ yaanya akũ kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate a aapuli ɛkɛna ye ɛdza pintii.
45014005	Oti odi abu kĩ luwi lidi sĩ lɛba fuwi bɛbã a, ade odi lɛmɛ adã kĩ fuwi a flee keti a. Nɛ fukĩĩ odu akũ a, odi nyɛ odi ɛdza pintii nɛ kakɔ mɔa.
45014006	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ebu luwi lidi paa ni, ɛkɛna foe kĩ yado boe Ɔlate a obu. Ade ayea odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaánya funitsã fudi a, kɛna foe kĩ yado boe Ɔlate a obu, ade yanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ foe akũ a.
45014007	Boe kamɛ odima lidzí nkpã ɛkpa ye akũ odi, ade boe kamɛ odima láku lɛmɛ kakpa ye akũ odi a.
45014008	Ntɛ budzi nkpã ni, boe Ɔlate a budzi bɔkpa, ade ntɛ buku a, boe Ɔlate a buku bɔkpa. Foesũ ntɛ budzi nkpã o-o ĩye buku o-o, boe Ɔlate a bade bɔanɛ.
45014009	Ade fukĩĩ sũ mɔ Kristo ku, ade eyidza edzi nkpã ayekĩ yaanya bikĩ bidzi nkpã mɔ bikĩ biku a Ɔlate a.
45014010	Ade nɔ kɔ̃, nde sũ akɔ awaɛ̃ kɔtɔ? Ĩye nɔ malo nde sũ asupa awaɛ̃? Boe a flee bɔ́adza nɛ Baguma anɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa ɛdzɛmɔ boe.
45014011	Kitonɛkĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Ɔlate a lɛ kĩ, ‘Kĩ ndzi nkpã kĩĩ a, odi nyɛ odi aake aduli ɛkpa yĩ, ade odi nyɛ odi aabinya onukpɛ̃ ɛlɛ kĩ yĩ nyɛ Baguma a.’ ”
45014012	Foesũ boe kamɛ odi nyɛ odi aakpa Baguma ye mɔawɛ akũ akunta.
45014013	Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔfɔ̃ akũ akũ kadzɛmɛna, kakɔ kɔtɔ. Fukĩ miakɛna nyɛ kĩ mikɛna adzuma kĩ miláakɛna lɛtsama kĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ awaɛ̃ lɛtɔ ĩye fɔfɔ̃ ɛkɛna tɔkpa.
45014014	Yĩ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu sũ, ntɛ ndo kĩ funitsã fudima nɛ foe akũ akũ lɛnyɛ́ efĩĩ fɔtsa. Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi tɛ edo kĩ funitsã fudi akũ tákpalɛ ni, kekɔ̃ fɔkɛna efĩĩ fɔtsa fɔkpa ye.
45014015	Ntɛ nɔ funitsã kĩ anya sũ awaɛ̃ tɛ kalɔɛ ni, kekɔ̃ nnɛ́ ɔdɔ kamɛ ɔtsɛ̃mɔ ye. Tafɔ̃ funitsã a kĩ anya a lɛwɔla oti a kĩ ye lɔlɔ Kristo ku a.
45014016	Foesũ mitafɔ̃ bati bɛbã lisupa fɔtsa a kĩ mi miakɔna kĩ fɔnɛnɛ a.
45014017	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a lɛnyɛ́ kanya mɔ kamɔa, mbom fɔnyɛ tuwĩ kakɛna mɔ lukudɔ, mɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a akpa a.
45014018	Ade ntɛ odi asum Kristo nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ a, yawo Baguma anɛ ade bati lɛmɛ akpa ye obu a.
45014019	Foesũ mifɔ̃ boe botaɛ ɛnya kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ layamɛna lukudɔ, titiliwu mɔ fukĩ fɔ́abumɛna akũ akũ.
45014020	Mitabula Baguma adzuma kade nɛ funitsã sũ. Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, funitsã flee akũ kpalɛ fɔkpa kanya, lɛmɛ fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ banya lɛtsa kĩ laha odi fɔfɔ̃ ɛkɛna tɔkpa.
45014021	Lɛtsa wĩde nyɛ kĩ taba sɛkɛna ĩye ɔmɔa waĩ ĩye akɛna lɛtsa bɛbã lidima kĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ awaɛ̃ lɛkɛna tɔkpa.
45014022	Fɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔtɛ odo nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ akũ a, fɔna nɛ mimɔ nɔ Baguma odi kayite. Baguma hila oti a kĩ ɛtákɔ ye akũ kɔtɔ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna, ɛmɔ kĩ lɛnɛnɛ a sũ.
45014023	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi anya lɛtsa kĩ ye ɔwɔlɛ tákpa ye osi a, Baguma akɔ ye kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a táto katɛkado kamɛ. Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ oti akɛna kĩ fɔtáto katɛkado kamɛ ni, tɔkpa tanɛ.
45015001	Kɛnɛ kĩ boe a kĩ budeĩ ɔsĩ nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a, bɔabumɔ bati a kĩ be katɛkado lɛlá ɔsĩ a nɛ be ɔhau kamɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ laawo boe mɔawɛ anɛ.
45015002	Mifɔ̃ boe kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ laawo boe bakɔba anɛ ayekĩ fɔ́alɛ fɔkpa be, bitim nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ.
45015003	Kitonɛkĩ Kristo malo tákɛna fɔtsa a kĩ fuwo ye anɛ, mbom ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, Kristo bi Baguma kĩ, “Fuvũnatsa a kĩ bɛta bɛkpa nɔ a, yako nɛ yĩ akũ.”
45015004	Ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a, bɛtsɛlɛ foe batsa boe fɔtsa, kĩ bɔkɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mɔ Baguma fɔlɛtsa bɔdza pintii, budo ɔwɔlɛ bɔna lɛtsa a kĩ bɔadã anɛ a.
45015005	Baguma a kĩ ye nyɛ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kado katokɔ̃ a, ɛfɔ̃ mina onukpɛ̃ mɔa nɛ mi kamɛ, mitomɔ Kristo Yesu osi a kĩ ɛtsa a,
45015006	ayekĩ mi flee míakɔa ɔwɔlɛ mɔa mɔ odo mɔa mimu Baguma, kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga a.
45015007	Foesũ mitɛ mi bawaɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo tɛ mi a, fɔnya obu fɔkpa Baguma.
45015008	Mabi mi kĩ Kristo yakɛna Yudafɔ a ɔsumunɛ, ɛkɔa ɛtsa kĩ Baguma adi ɔnɔkɔali, lɔkɔa ete de nɛ bɔhɛ a kĩ Baguma kɛna mɔ Yudafɔ bawanyɔ a akũ,
45015009	ayekĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ aamu Baguma nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ sũ. Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nɛ foesũ maamu nɔ nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ. Maasã kamu tɔnɔ ndɛla nɔ dĩ nɛ ode.”
45015010	Ade bibuki bɛtsɛlɛ biyi kĩ, “Mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, mimɔ kawɔlɛ mɔ Baguma bade a.”
45015011	Katsɛlɛ bɛbã lɛ kĩ, “Mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a flee mimu boe Ɔlate a. Mi fude fude flee mimu ye!”
45015012	Ade Yesaya lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Isai kasinu a kamɛ obi odi aanɛ ɛta, ye aayanya bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a akũ. Ade ye akũ baakɔa anɛ bite a.”
45015013	Baguma a kĩ ye akũ bɔate anɛ a ɛfɔ̃ kawɔlɛ mɔ lukudɔ lɛtɛ mi kamɛ nɛ mi ye katɛkado sũ, ayekĩ mi kɔnɛte a aakabo anɛ nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ a kamɛ.
45015014	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, yĩ mɔawɛ a ntɛ ndo paa kĩ fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna tɛ mi kamɛkamɛ, ade minyina kadi pii kĩ míapuli midɛ akũ akũ.
45015015	Lɛmɛ nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ a, ndo ɔwɔlɛ ntsɛlɛ fɔtsa fudi faa kĩ mabuki nkɔa nkai mi foe. Ndo ɔwɔlɛ kitonɛkĩ Baguma mɔ yĩ kɔnya ɛkɔa adzuma kĩĩ edo yĩ nɛ awɛ,
45015016	kĩ ĩnya Kristo Yesu ɔsumunɛ nkɛna adzuma nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a. Nkɛna adzuma ndɛ ɔsɔfɔ nkalɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a, ayekĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a aakɛna ndɛ afɔlibɔ wĩ kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kpalɛ ye akũ ɛkpa Baguma.
45015017	Foesũ yĩ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Yesu Kristo sũ ni, maapuli mpia nɛ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna nkpa Baguma a akũ.
45015018	Lɛtsa a kĩ odi maado ɔwɔlɛ nlɛ nyɛ kĩ Kristo tsã yĩ akũ ɛfɔ̃ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ na osetie nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa akũ. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ ɛtsãmɛna yĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ, mɔ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna a kamɛ.
45015019	Fukĩĩ ya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna, nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ a kamɛ. Foesũ ntsã mmini nto Yerusalem nnawo Iliriko tite akũ a, nde lɛtsã nɛ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ntsɛna tɛmatɔ a flee.
45015020	Yĩ kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ nyɛ kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ awã kĩ bati tánu tɔ̃ Kristo dĩ, ayekĩ nlánake nte nɛ litekũ kĩ odi nya lɔtɔ eke a akũ.
45015021	Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Bati a kĩ bɛtábi be kadima nɛ ye akũ tɔ̃ a, aamɔ ye, ade bikĩ bɛtánu tɔ̃ kadima nɛ ye akũ a, aanu foe kayɔ.”
45015022	Ade foesũ nkawɛ lɔkɔ pii kĩ maya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, mɔ ntána osi a.
45015023	Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ ĩyua yĩ adzuma nɛ fuyite kĩĩ, mɔ ayekĩ nkawɛ futeli pii kĩ mayaasɛla mi a sũ ni,
45015024	matɛ kado kĩ maapuli nkɛna foe finyaa. Mawɛ kĩ ntɛ ĩyaatɛ̃ nnnaa Spania, maadza nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ sukuloo budo akũ kawɔlɛ, lɔkɔa mibumɛna minyɛ yĩ osi nnaa.
45015025	Finyaa kɔ̃ ni, manaa Yerusalem nkɔa futelitsa fudi mma Baguma bade a nɛ awã.
45015026	Kitonɛkĩ Makedonia mɔ Akaia tɛsɔli a te fɔtsa faa kĩ bakɔa bibumɛna ahiãfɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Baguma bade a kamɛ nɛ Yerusalem.
45015027	Be mɔawɛ a adzuni fɔanɛ, lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, be adzuma fɔanɛ kĩ bibumɔ be. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a na tsɛfã nɛ Yudafɔ hũhũ nhila fɔtsa a kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ akɔa be akũ kana fɔtsa bibumɛna Yudafɔ a.
45015028	Foesũ ntɛ nkɛna adzuma kĩĩ ĩyua, mɔ nkɔa fɔtsa a kĩ bite a nkpa be ni, maatsã mi sɛkɛ̃ ntɛ̃ nnaa Spania.
45015029	Ĩnyina kĩ ntɛ maya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, maakɔa Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ kamɛ nhila baũ mma mi.
45015030	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nnɛɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo mɔ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ɔdɔ kĩ yakpa a, make mi aduli kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ bɔbɔa mpaɛ mɔ ɔsĩ bɔkpa Baguma nɛ yĩ lɔlɔ.
45015031	Mibɔa mpaɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ yĩ etomɛna bati a kĩ bɛtátɛ bido nɛ Yudea a awɛ. Mibɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ kĩ yĩ kasum a kĩ manaakɛna nɛ Yerusalem a kiwo Baguma bade a anɛ.
45015032	Ntɛ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ ni, maaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔ kawɔlɛ ĩyaadzi nwɛya.
45015033	Baguma kĩ yakpa lukudɔ a, ɛnamɔ mi flee. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
45016001	Mawɛ kĩ mabɔa boe ɔwaɛ̃tsole Foibe kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔsumunɛ paa nɛ Kenkrea asɔli a kamɛ dĩ ntsa mi.
45016002	Mitɛ ye nɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ akũ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔfɛta Baguma bade a aye. Mikpa ye kabumɛna kadi nyɛ kadi kĩ yaasĩ etomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ bati pii mɔ yĩ mɔawɛ malo obumɛnanɛ.
45016003	Mawɔ̃na Priskila mɔ Akwila kĩ bɛnyɛ yĩ bakɔba adzuma bakɛnanɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo adzuma kamɛ.
45016004	Bɛkɔa be nkpã bɛwãnɛ yĩ lɔlɔ. Nnɛ́ yĩ odi anyɛ be kɔlɛ, mbom mɔ tɛsɔli a kĩ tideĩ nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kamɛ a lɛmɛ.
45016005	Mawɔ̃na asɔli bati a kĩ batsɛna nɛ be tɔtɔ kamɛ a lɛmɛ. Mawɔ̃na yĩ ɔwɛnɛ Epaineto kĩ ɛnya oti ɔtɔnyade kĩ ɛtɛ Kristo edo nɛ Asia amantam a kamɛ.
45016006	Mawɔ̃na Maria kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ ɛkpa mi a.
45016007	Mawɔ̃na Androniko mɔ Yunia, yĩ akũ bati, kĩ bɔmɔ be bɔwa kɔla a. Bɛtɛ dĩ nɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ, ade bɛnya yĩ lɔtɔ nɛ Kristo katɛ kado kamɛ a.
45016008	Mawɔ̃na Ampila kĩ mawɛ kalɛ paa, kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna kamɛ mɔ boe Ɔlate a.
45016009	Mawɔ̃na Urbana lɛmɛ, boe ɔkɔba nɛ Kristo adzuma a kamɛ, mɔ yĩ ɔkɔba paa Staki.
45016010	Mawɔ̃na Apele kĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ etim nɛ Kristo kamɛ a. Mawɔ̃na Aristobulo tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a flee.
45016011	Mawɔ̃na yĩ kade oti Herodion mɔ Narkiso tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a kĩ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo a.
45016012	Mawɔ̃na Trifaina mɔ Trifosa kĩ bakɛna boe Ɔlate a adzuma a, mɔ yĩ ɔwɛnɛ Persi kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma paa ɛkpa boe Ɔlate a.
45016013	Mawɔ̃na Rufo kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate adzuma kamɛ a, mɔ ɔma kĩ epi yĩ ndɛ obi aye a.
45016014	Mawɔ̃na Asinkrito, Flegon, Herme, Patroba, Herma mɔ be bawaɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a.
45016015	Mawɔ̃na Filologo, Yulia, Nerea mɔ ye ɔwaɛ̃tsole, mɔ Olipa mɔ Baguma bade a kĩ bideĩ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a.
45016016	Miwɔ̃na akũ mikɛna atuu nɛ Kristo ɔdɔ kamɛ. Kristo tɛsɔli bati a flee awɔ̃na mi!
45016017	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, make mi aduli kĩ mifɔ̃ mi anɛ ɛna nɛ bati a kĩ bayamɛna kasɛ̃, kakpã badi bayɛla be katɛkado a akũ. Mivɛlɛ akũ nɛ be akũ!
45016018	Kitonɛkĩ bati a kĩ bakɛna fukĩnaa bamɛ odu a lásum Kristo, boe Ɔlate a, mbom be mɔawɛ lupu basum. Bakɔa sɛmɛ mɛnɛmɛnɛ mɔ fɔvã fɔlɛtsa kamu bati, ade bakɛ bati a kĩ binyína tɔkpa a adzuni a.
45016019	Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ odi nyɛ odi nu ayekĩ miayi atɔ katse Kalɛ Wĩ a, nɛ foesũ kawɔlɛ ade yĩ paa nɛ mi akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ nyɛ kĩ minyi kadi nɛ lɛtsa wĩ kakɛna kamɛ, lɛmɛ nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, minya bati kpĩĩ.
45016020	Owi lɛláabuna, Baguma a kĩ yakpa lukudɔ a, aabubuli Satana kpɛtɛkpɛtɛkpɛtɛ nɛ mi abɔa kayɔ. Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
45016021	Timoteo yĩ adzuma kamɛ ɔkɔba awɔ̃na mi flee. Ade aye a Lukio lɛmɛ, mɔ Yason mɔ Sosipatro kĩ bɛnyɛ yĩ kade bati awɔ̃na mi a.
45016022	Yĩ Tertio, kĩ ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ nkpa Paulo a, lɛmɛ mawɔ̃na mi nɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ akũ.
45016023	Yĩ tɔtɔ ɔlate Gaio, kĩ ye awã batɛ badonɛ a atsɛna a, awɔ̃na mi. Ade Erasto kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔmatɔ kĩĩ sika ɔkɔlanɛ mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃nyole Kwarto awɔ̃na mi papaapa.
45016024	Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi flee kɔnya. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
45016025	Mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma. Yaapuli edo mi katɛkado kɔbɛ̃ nɛ ayekĩ ɛfɔ̃ nde lɛtsã Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Yesu Kristo akũ a, mɔ ayekĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa bɛlawa a kito anɛ kɔkɔɔkɔɛ a ɛtsa sũ.
45016026	Lɛmɛ finyaa, bɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a na bɛtsa fude flee bɛtsãmɛna Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa katsɛlɛ kayi a kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã daa hihiɛ eyi a, ayekĩ bati flee aatɛ bido, bɛkɛna nɛ ye ɔlɛdo a akũ.
45016027	Baguma a kĩ ye mɔapɛ nyɛ ɔnyansãni a, bɔakpa kamu bɔtsãmɛna Yesu Kristo akũ kanaa daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
46001001	Yĩ Paulo kĩ Baguma vɛ nɛ ye kawɛ onukpɛ̃, kĩ nkɛna Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Sostene sɛkɛ̃ ovoli kĩĩ to.
46001002	Bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ bɔakpa batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Korinto, mɔ bati a kĩ Baguma vɛ kĩ bɛkɛna ye bati kpalɛwa, kĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu a. Bɛvɛ mi bati kĩĩ mɔ bati a flee kĩ basum boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ. Yesu kĩĩ nyɛ be mɔ boe flee Ɔlate.
46001003	Mawã Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kĩ bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
46001004	Luwi daa manyɛ yĩ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ kĩ ɛtsã Yesu Kristo akũ ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
46001005	Nɛ mi ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo sũ ni, mina akũ nɛ fɔtsa flee kamɛ, titiliwu nɛ mi kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ kadikanyi kamɛ.
46001006	Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Kristo akũ a sipi nɛ mi kamɛ paa,
46001007	kĩ foesũ mitɛ hũhũ kamɛ futetsa fudi nyɛ fudi kĩ fusĩ mi, nɛ kĩ midzi miadzɔlɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kaya a.
46001008	Yaapi mi edomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kɛnaawo kawũna, ayekĩ nfumsu adima lɛláana nɛ mi akũ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Luwi a akũ.
46001009	Baguma a kĩ ɛvɛ mi kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye Obi, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo a, nyɛ oti kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali.
46001010	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ndzɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo otumi akũ make mi a flee aduli kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mialɛ a akũ ayekĩ kasɛ̃ lɛláaya nɛ mi kayite. Mina onukpɛ̃ mɔa nɛ mi kakɔna mɔ fukĩ foe akũ mike otse a kamɛ,
46001011	kitonɛkĩ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bati badi to Kloe tɔtɔ kamɛ bɛyabi yĩ pefee kĩ ɔdzɛ deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ.
46001012	Mifɔ̃ nlɛ foe limii, bati a lɛ kĩ mi kamɛ badi alɛ kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃ Paulo ntomɛna.” Ɔbɛbã lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ, “Ntomɛna Apolo.” Odi lɛmɛ bo, “Ntomɔ Petro.” Ade odi lɛmɛ bo, “Ntomɔ Kristo.”
46001013	Mavia mi ni, bɛsɛ̃ Kristo nɛ kutsukutsu kamɛ mbɔɛɛ? Paulo bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ nɛ mi lɔlɔ mbɔɛɛ? Mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɛkɛna mi kamɛ odi mui kawɔla amaniɛ ndɛ Paulo fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ aye?
46001014	Manyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ ntákɛna mi kamɛ odima mui kawɔla amaniɛ kɛba Krispo mɔ Gayo odi pɛ.
46001015	Foesũ odima lɛláapuli ɛlɛ kĩ bɛkɛna ye mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ.
46001016	Nuwĩ mate anɛ kĩ nkɛna Stefana mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati mui kawɔla amaniɛ, lɛmɛ maáte anɛ kĩ nwɔla oti bɛbã odima.
46001017	Kristo tádo yĩ kĩ ĩyaakɛna mui kawɔla amaniɛ nkpa bati. Edo yĩ kĩ ĩyaade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ, kĩ ntákɔa batidziwa kadikanyi nlɛ ke ayekĩ Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ kɔbɛ̃ a lɛláakɛna fɔtsa pupulidza.
46001018	Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ fɔlɛtsa a nyɛ fudzimbitsa fɔkpa bati a kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ kawɔ osi akũ, lɛmɛ boe a kĩ bɛlamɔ katɛ a, bɔmɔ́ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ buyi ɔsũ ndɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ aye.
46001019	Nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa kamɛ a, Baguma lɛ kĩ, “Maawɔla kadi banyinɛ a kadikanyi, ade maanyɛ tuvoli banyinɛ kayɔkanu a ĩyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ a.”
46001020	Foesũ finyaa ndia kadi banyinɛ a dzɛ̃? Ndia tuvoli banyinɛ fɔtsa batsanɛ a mɔ fɔlɛtsa bavɛlɛnɛ a deĩ? Baguma kɔa foe ɛtsa kĩ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kadikanyi nyɛ fudzimbitsa.
46001021	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma nɛ ye kadikanyi onukpɛ̃ ni, ɛkɛna foe kĩ batidziwa bɛtatsã be kadikanyi kamɛ binyi ye. Mbom lɛtsa kĩ bavɛ boe tidzimbi lɛtsã kade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, Baguma kɔa foe ɛnyɛ bikĩ bɛtɛ ye bido a.
46001022	Yudafɔ awɛ awãwã fɔtsa bɛmɔ́, ade Grikifɔ lɛmɛ tomɛna katinya kadikanyi liti a.
46001023	Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ bɔade lɛtsã nɛ Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ. Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ aba Yudafɔ tuwũna, ade fɔnyɛ fɔkɔasiatsa fɔkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
46001024	Lɛmɛ be a kĩ Baguma vɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ, mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ Helafɔ a ni, fɔlɛtsa a nyɛ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ mɔ ye kadikanyi.
46001025	Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔamɔ ndɛ Baguma tidzimbi nhihiɛ a bɛ̃ otidziwa kadikanyi kɔlaa, ade ke awã kĩ fɔkɛna ndɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ dɔ nɛ ye lɛkɛnana kamɛ a, bɛ̃ otidziwa kɔbɛ̃ kɔlaa.
46001026	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mikɔna mi akũ midã ayekĩ mina fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ mi a. Nɛ batidziwa kamɔ onukpɛ̃ ni, mi badi sukuloo nyɛ kadi banyinɛ, ĩye bikĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃, ĩye kĩ mi akũ deĩ obu.
46001027	Baguma bua ɛpau katinya kamɛ fɔtsa kĩ foe akũ lɛlá nfasɔ, kĩ yakɔa foe edo kadi banyinɛ kɔnyɔã, ade ɛpau fɔtsa a kĩ fɔlá akũ ɔsĩ kĩ yakɔa foe edo bikĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ a kɔnyɔã.
46001028	Baguma pau fɔtsa a kĩ bati lábu foe kado nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ, kasupa foe lɛmɛ a, kĩ yakɔa foe ɛwɔla fukĩ bati akɔna kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya a.
46001029	Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ otidziwa odima lɛláapuli epia ye akũ nɛ ye anɛ.
46001030	Lɛmɛ Baguma kĩĩ lɛfɔ̃ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Yesu Kristo, ade ɛfɔ̃ Kristo nyɛ boe kadikanyi a. Baguma tsã ye akũ ɛkɛna boe bati kpĩĩ, ɛkpalɛ boe akũ, ɛfɔ̃ bɔna nkpã.
46001031	Foesũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩ yawɛ kĩ yapia ye akũ ni, epia nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate kɛna a akũ.”
46002001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ade foesũ lɔkɔ a kĩ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩ matsa Baguma ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kɔlawa a, ntákɔa onukpɛ̃ mɛnɛmɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa kalɛ baũbaũ mɔ nyansã dzununuunu ntsa mi foe.
46002002	Kitonɛkĩ kĩ nna nɛ mi kamɛ a, nke otse kĩ manyɛ anɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ mbɔɛntɛ Yesu Kristo mɔ ye wuda nɛ asendua akũ a.
46002003	Foesũ kĩ ĩya nɛ awã a, ndã kpɛtɛɛ, nna nɛ libe mɔ kukũtila kamɛ,
46002004	ade yĩ fɔtsa katsa mɔ yĩ ɔlɛdo a tánya batidziwa kɔdzɛla kalɛ baũ baũ ĩye nyansã tisi akũ fɔlɛtsa, mbom nde lɛtsã a kayɔ kanu a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ a nyɛ ɛtsa a.
46002005	Nɛ foesũ mi katɛkado lɛdzɛ̃ nɛ batidziwa nyansã akũ, mbom kɛdzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ akũ.
46002006	Lɛmɛ made kadikanyi lɛtsã kakpa bikĩ bibo anɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ fɔnyɛ́ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kadikanyi ĩye ke kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kanya katinya akũ. Kɔbɛ̃ a akũ ɔlɔmɛ lamɛna katinya.
46002007	Kadikanyi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ matsa a nyɛ Baguma kadikanyi kɔlawa, kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla batidziwa, lɛmɛ Baguma nyɛ foe eyi ɛkpa boe kadɛla nɛ ode fɔmɔ ɛbɔa katinya malo.
46002008	Katinya kamɛ kĩĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kamɛ odima tányi kadikanyi kĩĩ. Ntɛ kanyi binyi ke kufɛ bɛtábɔa boe Ɔlate kpalɛwa a nɛ asendua akũ.
46002009	Lɛmɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ linebi támɔ tɔ̃, sɔtɔ tánu tɔ̃, lɛtsa a kĩ odima tákɔna tɔ̃ kĩ laapuli lɛya a, ade foe pɛpɛɛpɛ Baguma manɛ eyi ɛkpa bati a kĩ bawɛ ye a.”
46002010	Lɛmɛ ade boe Baguma tsã ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa akũ ɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa a. Hũhũ a awɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ yededeede, ade yafiifii Baguma fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɔla a dzununuunu kamɛ malo a.
46002011	Odima lɛláapuli enyi lɛtsa a kĩ oti bɛbã akɔna mbɔɛntɛ oti a mɔawɛ hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a. Ade ayea odima lɛláapuli enyi Baguma kakɔna mbɔɛntɛ ye mɔawɛ Hũhũ odi.
46002012	Bɔtátɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ hũhũ, mbom bɔtɛ Baguma Hũhũ a kĩ edo a, ayekĩ bɔ́anyi fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma kpa boe a flee.
46002013	Foesũ nnɛ́ batidziwa kadikanyi kĩ batsa bɔnɛɛ bɔalɛ kalɛ, mbom bɔnɛɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a tsa boe a bɔkɔa bɔanyɛ hũhũ kamɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔtsa a katsa bikĩ Hũhũ deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a.
46002014	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ Hũhũ a lɛláa ye kamɛ ni, ɛláapuli ɛtɛ futetsa a kĩ futo Baguma Hũhũ a sɛkɛ̃. Oti a na odu tánu foe kayɔ koũ, fudzimbitsa fɔanɛ fɔkpa ye. Fɔnyɛ fudzimbitsa fɔkpa ye, kitonɛkĩ mbɔɛntɛ bikĩ Hũhũ deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a aapuli binu Hũhũ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ.
46002015	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ Hũhũ a deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ aapuli enu fukĩĩ flee kayɔ. Lɛmɛ odima lɛláapuli ɛdzɛmɔ ye.
46002016	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Owei nyina lɛtsa a kĩ de boe Ɔlate akɔna? Owei aapuli ɛkpa ye kɔdɛ?” Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ Kristo kakɔna a deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ.
46003001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ ntápuli mbi mi fɔlɛtsa ndɛ ayekĩ maabi bikĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ aye, mbom mbi mi fɔlɛtsa ndɛ bati kĩ bidzi nɛ sukɛna kamɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ babisɛ̃ nɛ Kristo katɛkado kamɛ.
46003002	Tɛmɛ mui nkpa mi, nnɛ́ funitsã kɔkɔlɔkɔ kitonɛkĩ mitábo anɛ tɔ̃ kĩ mianya foe. Finyaakĩĩ malo mitáwo tɔ̃ kĩ mianya foe,
46003003	kitonɛkĩ mibuki midzi ndɛ ayekĩ katinya kamɛ kĩĩ bati dzi nkpã. Ntɛ mianɔ lineke, kapaa mɔ akũ ni, nnɛ́ katsa fɔatsa kĩ minyɛ katinya kamɛ bati kĩ bidzi nɛ ke tisi akũ?
46003004	Ntɛ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa lɛ kĩ, “Ntomɔ Paulo,” mɔ ɔbɛbã bo, “Ntomɔ Apolo,” nnɛ́ katsa fɔatsa kĩ miakɛna fɔtsa ndɛ katinya kamɛ bati aye?
46003005	Nɛ foe kamɛ a, owei nyɛ Apolo? Owei lɛmɛ nyɛ Paulo? Baguma adzuma bakɛnanɛ kɛkɛ bɔanɛ, ade mitsã boe akũ mitɛ mido a. Boe kamɛ odi nyɛ odi akɛna adzuma a kĩ Baguma kpa ye a.
46003006	Yĩ lidu kutse libi a, ade Apolo ko de mui a, lɛmɛ Baguma lɛfɔ̃ kutse a bo anɛ.
46003007	Oti a kĩ edu mɔ ekĩ eko de mui a tásĩ. Baguma lisĩ, kitonɛkĩ ade ye lɛfɔ̃ kutse a bo anɛ a.
46003008	Kavɛmɛna kadima lɛláa ekĩ edu mɔ ekĩ eko mui a kayite. Baguma aase be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna onukpɛ̃.
46003009	Boe, buboomu bɔakɛna adzuma bɔkpa Baguma, ade mi nyɛ Baguma kɔba a kĩ koe kamɛ bɔakɛna adzuma a. Minyɛ Baguma kɔla a kĩ bɔake a.
46003010	Nɛ kĩ Baguma mɔ yĩ kɔnya sũ ni, nkɛna adzuma ndɛ kɔla okenɛ wĩ. Ĩyi litekũ lɔyɔde a kayɔ ade oti bɛbã lamɛna kake kadɛla nɛ ode a. Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ ekĩ ɛlamɛna kake kadɛla ɛdã kadã wĩ nɛ ayekĩ yake a akũ.
46003011	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔa Yesu Kristo eyi kɔkɔɛ ndɛ litekũ lɔyɔde kĩ odima lɛláapuli eyi lɛbɛbã kayɔ.
46003012	Badi aakɔa sika ngbã ĩye sika ovoe ĩye boe kĩ bɛtɛ kɔya bike bite nɛ litekũ a akũ, babɛbã aakɔa titse ĩye tuwĩ, ĩye lipili bike bite.
46003013	Lɛmɛ baanyɛ kɔla a kĩ odi nyɛ odi lamɛna kake a kutitse bɛtsa nɛ Kristo Luwi a akũ. Kitonɛkĩ nɛ Luwi a na akũ fi aanyɛ odi nyɛ odi adzuma kĩ ɛkɛna a kanya. Baakɔa fi kĩĩ bɛsɔ tudzuma a bɛdã, fɔtsa te kɔyakatɛ lɛmɛ.
46003014	Ntɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bike bite nɛ litekũ lɛyɔde a akũ puli fɔdza nɛ fi onukpɛ̃ ni, kɔla okenɛ a aana kɔtɔkase.
46003015	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi fɔtsa vio ni, ɛláana kɔtɔkase, lɛmɛ ye mɔawɛ a yaana katɛ ndɛ kalo elo ɛnɛ nɛ fi a kamɛ aye.
46003016	Minyína kĩ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla mianɛ, kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a dzi nɛ mi kamɛ?
46003017	Foesũ ntɛ odi bula Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kade ni, Baguma lɛmɛ aawɔla ye, kitonɛkĩ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla akũ kpalɛ. Ade mi nyɛ ye Asɔli Kɔla a.
46003018	Odima ɛtakɛ ye akũ. Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi kɔna kĩ enyina kadi nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kamɔ onukpɛ̃ ni, kɛfɛta kĩ ɛdani ɛkɛna odzimbifɔ mbom ayekĩ yaakɛna ɔnyansãni nɛ Baguma anɛ.
46003019	Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bati abu ndɛ kadikanyi a ni, fɔnyɛ fudzimbitsa nɛ Baguma anɛ. Ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa lɛ a, “Baguma api anyansãfɔ nɛ be mɔawɛ kadikanyi kamɛ.”
46003020	Ade bibuki bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa kamɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate nyina kĩ, bikĩ binyina kadi a be adzuni nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza.”
46003021	Foesũ kɛtánɛ kĩ odima apia nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bati apuli kakɛna a akũ, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ mi fude.
46003022	Paulo, Apolo, Petro, katinya kĩĩ, nkpã ĩye wuda, lɔkɔ kĩĩ ĩye, likĩ laaya o-o, foe flee fɔnyɛ mi fude.
46003023	Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ minyɛ Kristo bade, ade Kristo lɛmɛ nyɛ Baguma ode a.
46004001	Mibu boe ndɛ Kristo basumunɛ a kĩ be awɛ Baguma kɔa ɔnɔkɔali fɔtsa kɔlawa a edo.
46004002	Lɛtsa kĩ bawɛ bitomɛna adzuma ɔkɛna kĩĩ odu awɛ nyɛ kĩ, yadi ɔnɔkɔali ɛkpa ɔlate.
46004003	Finyaakĩĩ ntsɛ́la kɔlaa ntɛ miadzɛmɔ yĩ, ĩye odi bɛbã adzɛmɔ yĩ. Ade maádzɛmɔ yĩ akũ malo a.
46004004	Yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ, lɛmɛ fɔátsa kĩ tɔkpa lɛláa yĩ akũ, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate nyɛ oti kĩ yaadzɛmɔ yĩ.
46004005	Foesũ odima ɛtadzɛmɔ odi kɛnaawo kĩ lɔkɔ wĩ a wo ɔtɔ. Kɛnɛ kĩ kadzɛ nkaɛ a kɛdzɔlɛ boe Ɔlate a kaya. Ade ye aanyɛ ɔtũ kamɛ fɔtsa bɛlawa mɔ bati kakɔna a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla a kanya a. Ade lɔkɔ a na Baguma aakɔa kamu ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛfɛta ɛkpa kamu a.
46004006	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nɛ mi kalɛ sũ, nkɔa bɔmɔ Apolo fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nkpa nfantuhũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ matsa a akũ, ayekĩ míanu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ balɛ a kayɔ kĩ, “Mitsã nɛ osi kpĩĩ a akũ.” Mi kamɛ odima ɛtapia nɛ oti mɔa akũ lɔkɔa esupa ɔbɛbã.
46004007	Owei lɛkɛna mi bati kĩ bɛtɛ kɔya bɛba babɛbã? Nnɛ́ Baguma lɛkpa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mideĩ a? Lɔkɔa nde sũ miadɛla akũ ndɛ nnɛ́ Baguma lite mi fɔtsa a na?
46004008	Mi awɛ ta lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ mi a kɔkɔɛ mbɔɛɛ? Midani asikafɔ kɔkɔɛ mbɔɛɛ? Midani fɔgã titɔ kĩ boe bɔnyɛ́ fɔgã malo? Awoo. Mawɛ kĩ minyɛ fɔgã lɔkɔa boe malo bɔnya fɔgã bubumɔ mi kufɛ.
46004009	Fɔadã yĩ ndɛ Baguma kɔa boe fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ɛdzɛla nɛ kadzakɔ̃ nkaɛ. Bɔkɛna ndɛ bati kĩ biku kɔtɔ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ be nɛ kanade anɛ, ade bɔkɛna ndɛ fɔtsa dãwa lɛmɛ bɔkpa katinya kamɛ bati mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ flee a.
46004010	Nɛ Kristo sũ bɔnyɛ badzimbifɔ, lɛmɛ mi minyɛ kadi banyinɛ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ! Bɔlá kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ mideĩ kɔbɛ̃! Bati lábu boe kado nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ bakpa mi obu!
46004011	Kito kɛyawo nviã lɔkɔ kĩĩ malo budzi kɔlɛ mɔ ɔmɔado, budeĩ nɛ tɛtadiɛ kpeliwa kamɛ, babo boe, ade bɔtsɛ̃ bɔato katɛ̃ kĩ bɔlá kadzikɔ̃.
46004012	Bɔakɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kaveli akũ. Ntɛ bati dumu boe bɔakpa be nhila, ade ntɛ bitomɔ boe liti bɔado ɔwɔlɛ katɛ foe.
46004013	Ntɛ bivũna boe a, bɔakɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kakpa be mbuayɛ. Bɛkɛna boe ndɛ katinya kamɛ fukluku kĩ bɔnyɛ tite akũ fukluku kawulakɔ̃ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ.
46004014	Maátsɛlɛ mi fukĩĩ kĩ mado mi kɔnyɔã, mbom makɔa foe ndɛ mi ndɛ yĩ babi kĩ mawɛ be kalɛ aye.
46004015	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mideĩ bati mpim ewua kĩ batsa mi fɔtsa nɛ Kristo akũ malo ni, ɔlɛga mɔapɛ mideĩ. Ntsã Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ kamɛ ndani mi ɔlɛga, kitonɛkĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Yesu nɛ mi nkpã kamɛ.
46004016	Foesũ make mi aduli kĩ mikɔlɛ yĩ ɔbla.
46004017	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ mado Timoteo kĩ ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Ɛnyɛ yĩ mɔawɛ obi nɛ Kristo kamɛ, kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ ade ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ ye kadzi kamɛ a. Yaate mi anɛ nɛ tisi vɔɛ̃ a kĩ te akũ ndzi nkpã nɛ Kristo kamɛ a akũ. Ade foe lɛmɛ matsa nɛ tɔsɔli a flee kamɛ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ a.
46004018	Mi kamɛ badi miata akũ, kitonɛkĩ mikɔna kĩ nláabuki ĩyaasɛla mi.
46004019	Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe Ɔlate tunɔ kɔ̃ ni, owi lɛláabuna kɔlaa mɔ maaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Ntɛ ĩya ni, maawɛ kĩ manyi kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ bikĩ bata akũ deĩ, nnɛ́ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ balɛ a odi.
46004020	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a lɛnyɛ́ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kalɛ kɛkɛ, mbom fɔnyɛ kɔbɛ̃ fɔlɛtsa.
46004021	Fɔɔdabe miawɛ? Ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔ katsei, mbɔɛɛ kĩ ĩya nɛ ɔdɔ mɔ akũ kadɔla bɔɛɛ?
46005001	Finyaakĩĩ bɛlamɛna kalɛ kokooko kĩ adɔpaa deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ye odu lɛláa amamufɔ malo kamɛ. Bɛlɛ kĩ onyole odi mɔ ɔlɛga ɔtsɔ̃ dzi.
46005002	Lɔkɔa nde míapuli midɛla mi akũ nɛ ode? Kanɛ kɛnɛ kĩ ayɔlɔhɔ api mi lɔkɔa minyɛ oti a kĩ ɛkɛna fɔtsa kpa kĩĩ odu a nɛ mi asɔli katsu a kamɛ.
46005003	Titɔ kĩ nláa mi kamɛ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ malo ni, ndeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ. Ndzɛmɔ oti a, nkɔ ye kɔtɔ kɔkɔɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ.
46005004	Ntɛ mitsɛna ni, maana nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔana nɛ boe kamɛ a sũ,
46005005	mikɔa oti a mido nɛ Abonsam awɛ lɔkɔa ɛwɔla ye sukɛna a, ayekĩ ye hũhũ a aapuli ɛna katɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Luwi a akũ.
46005006	Fɔnɛ́nɛ fɔkpa mi kĩ miata akũ! Minyina lɛgbã a kĩ, “Oyila kabii nɛ bodobodo mawɛ kamɛ afɔ̃ ye flee yavuya.”
46005007	Minyɛ oyila kɔɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa a nɛ mi kamɛ lɔkɔa mi akũ ɛkpalɛ. Míadani mikɛna onuvoe lɔbɔ vɔɛ̃ kĩ oyila lɛláa ye kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ĩnyina kĩ mila a. Kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Wuda Katɛ̃ kavelibi bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ.
46005008	Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔnya boe Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi a, nnɛ́ mɔ abodoo kĩ edeĩ oyila kɔɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa mɔ ablɔ kakɛna, mbom bɔnya abodoo kĩ ɛlá oyila kĩ ɛnyɛ tuwĩ kakɛna mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kadi.
46005009	Nɛ ovoli a kĩ ntsɛlɛ nkpa mi kamɛ a, mbi mi kĩ mitakɔa akũ mibɔamɔ bati kĩ bideĩ adɔpaa.
46005010	Finyaakĩĩ ni, nnɛ́ amamufɔ a kĩ bideĩ adɔpaa, ĩye bideĩ anɛ ngbã, ĩye baye, ĩye basum baviɔ̃ a malɛ. Ntɛ miwɛ kĩ mianyɛ mi akũ nɛ be flee kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ kɛnɛ kĩ mianɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kɔlaa.
46005011	Lɛtsa kĩ matsa a nyɛ kĩ mitakɔa akũ mibɔamɔ oti kĩ yavɛ ye akũ kĩ ɔtɛ odonɛ lɛmɛ yabɔa adɔpaa, ĩye edeĩ anɛ ngbã, yasum baviɔ̃, ĩye yavɛ bati buĩ kpa, ĩye yawuga bavɛ ĩye yaye. Mimɔ oti a na odu mitado awɛ minya malo.
46005012	-
46005013	Kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ́ yĩ adzuma kĩ madzɛmɔ bikĩ bɛláa asɔli a kamɛ. Baguma aadzɛmɔ be. Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ miadzɛmɔ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mi asɔli a kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Miblɔmɛna oti kpa a nɛ mi kamɛ.”
46006001	Ntɛ ɔdzɛ wo nɛ mi kamɛ odi mɔ ɔkɔba ɔtɛ odonɛ kayite ni, nde sũ yakɔa kalɛ a ɛma amamufɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ, mɔ yaáfɔ̃ Baguma bati lɛdzɛ kalɛ a?
46006002	Minyína kĩ boe a kĩ bɔnyɛ Baguma bati a aayadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ? Ntɛ mi aayadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ a, nde sũ miláapuli midzɛ fɔlɛtsa kubii kubii?
46006003	Minyína kĩ boe aadzɛmɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛmɛ mbɔɛɛ? Lɔkɔa nde sũ mɔ miláapuli midzɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ fɔtsa?
46006004	Ntɛ fɔlɛtsa a na odu ya ni, miákɔa foe mikpa bati kĩ bɛla fɔdzakɔ̃ nɛ asɔli a kamɛ malo kĩ bɛdzɛ foe?
46006005	Kɔnyɔã kuwo mi! Matɛ kado kĩ oti mɔapɛ aye kĩ enyina kadi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ yaapuli ɛdzɛ mi batɛ badonɛ a kayite fɔlɛtsa.
46006006	Kĩ miakɛna foe lɔmɔ mbom a ni, ɔtɛ odonɛ akpã ɔkɔba kanamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ kafɔ̃ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a adzɛ fɔlɛtsa a!
46006007	Kalɛ ɔnɔkɔali a nyɛ kĩ nɛ ayekĩ miti miakɔa fɔlɛtsa kanamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a atsa kĩ, obu salɛ nɛ mi akũ. Fɔláalɛ fɔba ntɛ bɛkɛna tɔkpa nɛ mi akũ lɔkɔa miálɛ kadima? Fɔláalɛ fɔba ntɛ mifɔnɛ be awɛ bisisi mi mbom?
46006008	Lɛmɛ mi mɔawɛ a miakɛna tɔkpa nɛ mi bakɔba akũ, kasisi akũ mɔ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ malo.
46006009	Minyina pefee kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ tɔkpa a na odu lɛláana kanyakɔ̃ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ. Mitakɛ mi akũ, kitonɛkĩ bati kĩ babɔa adɔpaa, ĩye basum baviɔ̃, ĩye banɛ kɔnyɔ mɔ kɔtsɔ̃ liti, batsole kĩ bawamɔ batsole mɔ banyole kĩ bawamɔ akũ,
46006010	ĩye bati kĩ baye, ĩye bikĩ bideĩ anɛ ngbã, ĩye bikĩ bawuga bavɛ, ĩye bikĩ banyɛ bati buĩ kpa ĩye bablɔfɔ bayekpanɛ ni, be kamɛ odima lɛláana kanyakɔ̃ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
46006011	Ade aye mi kamɛ badi mina miyatɛ̃ a, lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ bɛvɔlɛ titikpa nɛ mi akũ. Bɛkɔa mi bido nɛ Baguma awɛ, bɛkɛna mi bati kpalɛwa nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ mɔ Baguma Hũhũ akũ.
46006012	Mi kamɛ badi aalɛ kĩ, “Bɛkpa yĩ osi kĩ nkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.” Oo! Nuwĩ fɔanɛ. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛnɛ lɛkpa oti. Maapuli nlɛ kĩ, “Bɛkpa yĩ osi kĩ nkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.” Lɛmɛ nláafɔ̃ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa lɛnya yĩ akũ.
46006013	Oti bɛbã lɛmɛ aalɛ kĩ, “Funitsã waa fɔkpa lupu ade lupu lɛmɛ waa lɛkpa funitsã a.” Oo! Nuwĩ fɔanɛ. Lɛmɛ Baguma aawɔla foe nviã a. Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔakɔa boe sukɛna bɔkpa linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, mbom kĩ bɔakɔa sukɛna busum boe Ɔlate ade boe Ɔlate lɛmɛ adãmɛna se akũ a.
46006014	Ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma dzɛla boe Ɔlate etomɛna kanɔkpa a, ade ayea yaakɔa ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛdzɛla boe lɛmɛ a.
46006015	Minyina kĩ mi sukɛna nyɛ Kristo sukɛna a sidi. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ makɔa Kristo sukɛna sɛkɛ sidi nkɛna otsole ɔdɔpaani sukɛna sukɛna a sidi? Kɛtánɛ kĩ fɔna lɔmɔ koũ!
46006016	Mbɔɛɛ minyína kĩ ntɛ odi kɔa akũ ɛta otsole kĩ yabɔa adɔpaa ni, bɛmɔ ye bɛkɛna sukɛna mɔa? Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Be bati nviã a baakɛna sukɛna mɔa.”
46006017	Lɛmɛ oti kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛmɛnamɔ boe Ɔlate ni, bɛmɔ ye bɛkɛna ɔmɔa nɛ hũhũ kamɛ.
46006018	Mivɛlɛ akũ nɛ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ tɔkpa ɔwɛ̃! Titikpa bɛbã kĩ oti akɛna látamɔ ye sukɛna, lɛmɛ oti kĩ ɛbɔa adɔpaa titikpa a tamɔ ye mɔawɛ sukɛna.
46006019	Minyína kĩ mi sukɛna nyɛ asɔli kɔla kɔkpa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ Baguma kpa mi, kĩ edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ lɛmɛ a? Foesũ nnɛ́ mi awɛ la mi sukɛna mbom Baguma side sanɛ.
46006020	Baguma se kɔtɔ kpale nɛ mi lɔlɔ, foesũ mikɔa mi sukɛna mido ye obu.
46007001	Finyaakĩĩ maalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mitsɛlɛ mikpa yĩ a akũ. Fɔnɛnɛ ntɛ onyole odi tákɔã ɔtsɔ̃.
46007002	Lɛmɛ nɛ kĩ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ bɔ paa sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ onyole nyɛ onyole ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃, ade kɛnɛ kĩ otsole nyɛ otsole lɛmɛ edzi kɔnyɔ a.
46007003	Kɛtánɛ kĩ onyole ɛkɛna ɔtsɔ̃ be kawa lɔlɔ ɔsĩ, ade ayea kɛtánɛ kĩ otsole asĩ ɔnyɔ sɛkɛ̃ kawa a. Kɛnɛ kĩ bakɛna lɛtsa sĩwa lidi nyɛ lidi bɛkpa be akũ.
46007004	Otsole a sukɛna lɛnyɛ́ ye odi side, mbom ɔnyɔ side sanɛ lɛmɛ. Ade ayea onyole a sukɛna lɛnyɛ́ ye odi side, mbom sɛnyɛ ɔtsɔ̃ lɛmɛ side.
46007005	Ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ɔnyɔ bɛtakɛna be kawa akũ lɔlɔ ɔsĩ, mbɔɛntɛ binu be akũ kayɔ ade bɛwɛ lɛmɛ kĩ bakɔa lɔkɔ lidi bɛkpa mpaɛbɔ. Lɛmɛ ke liti a, kɛnɛ kĩ bamuniki bidzi tɔtsɔ̃ mɔ tɔnyɔ, ayekĩ Abonsam lɛláafɔ̃ biwo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ ntɛ bɛtápuli bɛnya be akũ akũ.
46007006	Nlɛ fukĩĩ ndɛ osi kakpa aye nɛ mi kadzi kamɛ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ mbla yanɛ makpa mi.
46007007	Kufɛ maawɛ kĩ bati flee bidzi ndɛ ayekĩ ndzi a. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi deĩ futetsa fudi kĩ ɛtɛ etomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Odi nyɛ odi fude vɛmɛna nɛ ɔkɔba fude akũ.
46007008	Finyaa, mabi bakutse mɔ bakunawa kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa be fɔbɛ̃ ntɛ bidzi be odi ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ odi ndzi a.
46007009	Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛláapuli bɛnya be akũ kɔ̃ ni, bɛkɔã batsɔ̃ ĩye bidzi fɔnyɔ, kitonɛkĩ kɔtsɔ̃ mɔ kɔnyɔ kadzi nɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ sukɛna kawɛ aakaha be.
46007010	Ndeĩ mbla nkpa batsɔ̃ mɔ banyɔ. Mbla a lɛnyɛ́ yĩ ade, mbom boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃ eto. Ade ye nyɛ kĩ otsole ɛtasĩ ɔnyɔ,
46007011	lɛmɛ ntɛ esĩ kɔnyɔ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ edzi ye odi, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye emuniki ɛnaakpɔla ɔnyɔ a. Ade ayea kɛtáfɛta kĩ onyole lɛmɛ asĩ ɔtsɔ̃ a.
46007012	Mi bati nkaɛ a kɔ̃ ni, yĩ lamɔ be kabi, nnɛ́ boe Ɔlate. Ntɛ okristoni deĩ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔmamuni, kĩ etunɔ kĩ badzimɔ akũ ni, onyole a ɛtasĩ ye.
46007013	Ade ayea ntɛ otsole okristoni dzimɔ ɔnyɔ kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔmamuni, mɔ etunɔ kĩ bɛmɔ ye badzi ni, otsole a ɛtasĩ ye.
46007014	Kitonɛkĩ ɔnyɔ a kĩ ɛtátɛ edo a kɛna oti kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma anɛ, nɛ ayekĩ biboomu a sũ. Ade ayea ɔtsɔ̃ a kĩ ɛtátɛ edo a lɛmɛ kɛna oti kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ ayekĩ bɛmɔ ɔnyɔ a biboomu sũ a. Ntɛ nnɛ́ lɔmɔ ni, be babi a aakɛna ndɛ amamufɔ babi aye. Lɛmɛ nɛ be ɔmɔa kakɛna sũ be babi kɛna bati kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma anɛ.
46007015	Lɛmɛ ntɛ fɔya kĩ be kamɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ edo tátunɔ kĩ yadzimɔ ɔtɔ odonɛ ni, yapuli ɛdzakũ faa. Ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ a ɔtɛ odonɛ a deĩ osi kĩ yabɔɛ ye osi, kitonɛkĩ Baguma wɛ kĩ midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
46007016	Mi batɛ badonɛ batsole a mite anɛ kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ mi akũ mi banyɔ aapuli bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ade ayea mi batɛ badonɛ banyole mite anɛ kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ mi akũ mi batsɔ̃ lɛmɛ aapuli bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.
46007017	Finyaakĩĩ odi nyɛ odi edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate kpa ye, ndɛ ayekĩ ɛna fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye a. Ade mbla kĩ matsa nɛ tɛsɔli flee a kamɛ a.
46007018	Ntɛ oti tsua lɛkpati fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye ni, fɔ̃ ɛna lɔmɔ. Ntɛ ɛtátsua lɛkpati fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye ni, ɛtalɛ kĩ yanaatsua lɛkpati.
46007019	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ otsua lɛkpati ĩye ɔtátsua ni, fɔtsɛ́la. Lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ nyɛ kĩ akɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ.
46007020	Foesũ odi nyɛ odi ɛna ndɛ ayekĩ ɛla fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye a.
46007021	Ɔsate anɛ fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ nɔ? Fɔtsɛ́la. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔna osi kĩ aanyɛ nɔ akũ nɛ tɛsate kamɛ ni tsã ye akũ,
46007022	kitonɛkĩ ɔsate a kĩ boe Ɔlate vɛ a nɛ́ nɛ tɛtsate kamɛ. Ade ayea oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ ɔsate fɔmɔ bɛvɛ ye ni, ye malo ɛdani ɔsate ɛkpa boe Ɔlate.
46007023	Baguma se kɔtɔ kpale nɛ mi lɔlɔ, foesũ mibuki minyɛ́ basate mikpa batidziwa.
46007024	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛna ndɛ ayekĩ ɛla fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye a.
46007025	Finyaakĩĩ, nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mitsɛlɛ nɛ bakutse akũ a ni, ntátɛ mbla ntomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ade yĩ kakɔna a, kitonɛkĩ nɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate mɔ yĩ kɔnya sũ miapuli mitɛ yĩ mido.
46007026	Nɛ yĩ kamɔ onukpɛ̃ mɔ ayekĩ nviã katinya lamɛna ɔsĩ kana sũ ni, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ oti edzi ndɛ ayekĩ ɛla a.
46007027	Ntɛ ɔkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni talɛ kĩ asĩ ye. Ntɛ ɔtákɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, talɛ kĩ awɛ odi ɔkɔã.
46007028	Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni ɔtákɛna titikpa, ade ayea ntɛ odi dzi kɔnyɔ ni, ye malo ɛtákɛna titikpa a. Lɛmɛ ntáwɛ kĩ awo nɛ ɔhau a kĩ ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ɔnyɔ amɔ a kamɛ.
46007029	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa a kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ lɔkɔ pii buki lɛwáa nɛ boe lɔtɔ, foesũ kito finyaa kanaa ni, banyole kĩ bɛkɔã batsɔ̃ bidzi ndɛ bɛtákɔã batsɔ̃.
