46007030	Bikĩ babe ni, bidzi ndɛ bati kĩ be akũ lákɔ kɔnya, bikĩ bamɛmɛ ni, bɛkɛna ndɛ kawɔlɛ láde be. Bikĩ bɛya fɔtsa ni bɛkɛna ndɛ nnɛ́ be la fɔtsa a kĩ bɛya a.
46007031	Bikĩ bitomɛna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa liti kĩ bawɛ kĩ foe flee fɔnya be fude ni, bidzi ndɛ bɛtsɛ́la katinya kamɛ fɔtsa akũ, kitonɛkĩ katinya kĩĩ lɛláana lɔmɔ flee ndɛ ayekĩ kɛla finyaa.
46007032	Maáwɛ kĩ ana nɛ ɔhau odima kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ oti kĩ ɛtákɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, ɛkɔa ye akũ flee ɛkpa Baguma adzuma kakɛna, ade yabɔa mbɔdi kĩ yakɛna adzuma a edo Baguma kawɔlɛ a.
46007033	Lɛmɛ onyole kĩ ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, yakɔna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa akũ, kitonɛkĩ yawɛ kĩ yado ɔtsɔ̃ kawɔlɛ.
46007034	Nɛ foesũ ye adzuni sɛ̃ tisi nviã. Otsole kĩ ɛtádzi kɔnyɔ ĩye oyitsɔ̃ kĩ enyína onyole ni, ɛkɔa Baguma adzuma ete nɛ ye akũ, kitonɛkĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yakɔa ye sukɛna mɔ hũhũ flee edzi nkpã yedede. Otsole kĩ edzi kɔnyɔ ni, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa katinya kamɛ fɔtsa kitonɛkĩ yawɛ kĩ yado ɔnyɔ kawɔlɛ.
46007035	Malɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ flee kitonɛkĩ mawɛ kĩ makpa mi kabumɛna. Ntáwɛ kĩ miana nɛ́ kasuli kamɛ, mbom mawɛ kĩ mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ mɔ likĩ lɛfɛta, lɔkɔa mikɔa mi akũ mikpa Baguma ɔsum, kĩ kavia katse lɛláa foe akũ.
46007036	Ntɛ onyole tinya oyitsɔ̃ mɔ ɛmɔ́ kĩ yaápuli epi ye akũ, ĩye ɛmɔ kĩ lɔkɔ lamɛna katɛ̃ ni, baapuli bɛkɔã akũ. Fɔnyɛ́ titikpa ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ.
46007037	Lɛmɛ ntɛ onyole tinya oyitsɔ̃, mɔ ɛkɔna nɛ ye kamɛ kĩ yaapuli epi ye akũ, kĩ baadzimɔ akũ kokooko ni, ɛkɛna foe kakɛna wĩ.
46007038	Foesũ onyole kĩ ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, ɛkɛna kakɛna wĩ, lɛmɛ onyole kĩ ɛtákɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, ye fude nɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kɔlaa.
46007039	Otsole kĩ edzi kɔnyɔ ni ebuki ɛlá osi kĩ yadzi kɔnyɔ bɛbã. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔnyɔ a ku ni, edeĩ osi kĩ yadzimɔ onyole a kĩ yawɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ onyole a ɛnya ɔtɛ odonɛ.
46007040	Lɛmɛ ntɛ edzi ndɛ okunawa aye ni, yaamɔ kawɔlɛ ɛba. Ade yĩ kakɔna a, ade matɛ kado kĩ ade aye nyɛ Baguma Hũhũ a kakɔna kĩ ɛkpa yĩ a.
46008001	Finyaa, mawɛ kĩ mabi mi litsedi nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mitsɛlɛ nɛ funitsã a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ akũ. Boe flee bɔalɛ kĩ bunyina kadi. Lɛmɛ bunyina kĩ kadikanyi kĩĩ afɔ̃ oti adɛla ye akũ nɛ ode. Lɛtsa a kĩ lakpa boe kɔbɛ̃ nyɛ ɔdɔ.
46008002	Ntɛ odi kɔna kĩ enyina fɔtsa nɛ litsedi akũ paa ni, ɛtámɔ foe kamɔ wĩ ndɛ ayekĩ kɛnɛ kĩ fɔna a.
46008003	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi awɛ Baguma ni, Baguma lɛmɛ nyina ye.
46008004	Foesũ ade lɛtsa a kĩ mabi mi nɛ funitsã kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ akũ a. Bunyina kĩ baviɔ̃ nyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa awɛ bɛmɛ, kĩ fɔlá nkpã, kitonɛkĩ Baguma odi pɛ deĩ nkpã.
46008005	Titɔ kĩ bati alɛ kĩ baviɔ̃ deĩ nɛ ode mɔ tite akũ, kĩ baviɔ̃ kumɛkumɛ kĩĩ mɔ be balate deĩ malo ni,
46008006	boe kɔ̃ bunyina kĩ Baguma mɔapɛ deĩ. Ade ye nyɛ boe Ɔlɛga kĩ ɛbɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade budzi bɔkpa ye a. Boe Ɔlate kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu Kristo mɔapɛ lɛmɛ deĩ. Ade ye akũ Baguma tsã ɛbɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ ye akũ budzi nkpã.
46008007	Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ odi nyɛ odi nyina ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ. Baviɔ̃ akũ fɔlɛtsa nya bati badi kamɛkamɛ limii kĩ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ ntɛ bɛnya funitsã kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ pɛ bakɔna kĩ baviɔ̃ funitsã fɔanɛ. Nɛ kĩ bɛtábo anɛ nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ sũ ni, bakɔna kĩ funitsã a do be efĩĩ.
46008008	Funitsã lɛláapuli fɔlɔla bɔmɔ Baguma kayite. Bɔláayɛla lɛtsama ntɛ bɔtánya ade ayea bɔláana nfasɔ adima ntɛ bɔnya lɛmɛ a.
46008009	Lɛmɛ midã kadã wĩ lɔkɔa mitafɔ̃ mi lɛkɛnana nɛ akũ akũ kadzi kamɛ lɛfɔ̃ bikĩ bɛtábo anɛ nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ liwo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ.
46008010	Bɔɛ foe kĩ oti kĩ ɛtábo anɛ nɛ ye katɛkado kamɛ mɔ́ kĩ nɔ a kĩ onyina kadi a odzi anya nɛ kuviɔ̃la. Nnɛ́ kɔbɛ̃ ado ye kĩ ɛnya funitsã kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃?
46008011	Awaɛ̃ ɔtɛ odonɛ a kĩ ye katɛkado tábo anɛ, lɛmɛ Kristo ku nɛ ye lɔlɔ a ni, yaawɔ nɛ nɔ kadi a kĩ onyina a sũ.
46008012	Miafɔ̃ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛtábo anɛ nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ a, akɛna titikpa nɛ Kristo akũ, kitonɛkĩ miado be kɔbɛ̃ bakɛna lɛtsa kĩ bɛtɛ bido kĩ fɔnɛ́nɛ.
46008013	Foesũ ntɛ funitsã fudi kanya aafɔ̃ nwaɛ̃ lɛkɛna titikpa ni, nláanya funitsã a na da, ayekĩ ɛláawo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ.
46009001	Miakɔna kĩ ĩnyɛ́ oti kĩ edzí ye akũ akũ mbɔɛɛ? Miakɔna kĩ ĩnyɛ́ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ mbɔɛɛ? Miakɔna kĩ ntákɔa anɛ mmɔ́ boe Ɔlate Yesu mbɔɛɛ? Nnɛ́ mi nyɛ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna nkpa boe Ɔlate a foe akũ nfasɔ?
46009002	Ntɛ bati bɛbã támɔ yĩ biyi ɔsũ ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye ni, mi kɔ̃ mitɛ yĩ. Kitonɛkĩ ayekĩ miawɛ midzi nkpã nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a atsa kĩ ĩnyɛ ye fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ.
46009003	Ntɛ bati atɛ yĩ atsindze ni, ade limii manyɛ yĩ akũ onukpɛ̃ a.
46009004	Bɔlá osi kĩ bakpa boe funitsã mɔ mui nɛ adzuma a kĩ bɔakɛna a sũ mbɔɛɛ?
46009005	Bɔlá osi kĩ bakpã boe batsɔ̃ batɛ badonɛ bɔnamɛna osi akũ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛbã, Petro mɔ boe Ɔlate bawaɛ̃ a akɛna mbɔɛɛ?
46009006	Mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔmɔ Barnaba odi pɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna adzuma bɔkɔa bɔdãmɛna boe akũ?
46009007	Sodzani ɔdabe adãmɛna ye mɔawɛ akũ ntɛ edeĩ nɛ kawũkanɔ adzumamu? Okuani ɔdabe anɛ kɔba kĩ yaánya funitsã a kĩ fɔnɛ a? Ĩye owei adɔɔla ɔnantsue kĩ yaámɔa ye tɛmɛ mui badi?
46009008	Maátsa fɔtsa nɛ bati kakɔna onukpɛ̃. Ade aye mbla a lɛmɛ tsa kalɛ mɔapɛ a.
46009009	Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Mose mbla ovoli a kamɛ kĩ, “Mitasui ɔyaɛ kĩ minɛɛ miakɛna adzuma nɛ kɔba a onukpɛ̃.” Baguma tsɛla ɔyaɛ odi akũ mbɔɛɛ?
46009010	Nnɛ́ boe sũ ɛlɛ kalɛ a na mbɔɛɛ? Ɔnɔkɔali ade boe kalɛ sũ bɛtsɛlɛ foe a. Kɛnɛ kĩ ekĩ yadu mɔ ekĩ yakpɔta a flee bakɛna adzuma a mɔ kɔnɛte kĩ baana be tsɛfã nɛ funitsã a kĩ fɔ́anɛ a kamɛ.
46009011	Budu hũhũ kamɛ fɔtsa nɛ mi kamɛ. Ntɛ mi malo mikpa boe katinya kamɛ fɔtsa a ni, miyɛla osi?
46009012	Ntɛ bati bɛbã deĩ osi kĩ bana nfasɔ adi bitomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, kekɔ̃ kɛnɛ kĩ boe bɔana foe butomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃, fublusu malo. Lɛmɛ bɔtákɔa boe osi kawa a na bɔkɛna adzuma. Mbom bɔkɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa bute nɛ boe mɔawɛ akũ ayekĩ lɛtsama lɛláanya mbɛtahu fɔkpa boe nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ nɛ Kristo akũ.
46009013	Minyina yededeede kĩ be a kĩ bakɛna adzuma nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ ana be funitsã katomɛna Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ade bikĩ babɔa afɔliɛ nɛ afɔliɛ de akũ a lɛmɛ ana afɔliɛ fɔtsa a foe tsɛfã a.
46009014	Ade aye boe Ɔlate lɛmɛ lɛ eyi kĩ be a kĩ bade lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa akũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛna be kanya bitomɛna lɛtsã kade a kamɛ.
46009015	Lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ntákɛna osi kĩĩ akũ adzuma, ade nlámɛna mi ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kĩ mikɛna nɛ foe akũ mikpa yĩ a. Ntɛ foe lɔmɔ sũ ni, maaku mbom! Kitonɛkĩ ntáwɛ kĩ odi ɛkɔa lɛtsa kĩ mapia nɛ de akũ a ɛkɛna fɔtsa pupulidza.
46009016	Nlá osi kĩ mapia nɛ kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ sũ. Fɔnyɛ ɔhɛ fɔkpa yĩ kĩ ndɛ lɛtsã a, ade Baguma aavɛlɛ yĩ sɔtɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ntɛ ntálɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a lɛmɛ.
46009017	Ntɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kawɛ onukpɛ̃ makɛna adzuma kĩĩ ni, maadã kĩ bise yĩ foe kɔtɔ. Lɛmɛ makɛna foe ndɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bihihiɛ bɛkpa yĩ kĩ nkɛna, kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ adzuma kĩ Baguma hihiɛ ɛkpa yĩ.
46009018	Foesũ litsa kɔtɔkase maana? Yĩ kɔtɔkase nyɛ kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ faa, ade maáte anɛ kĩ maatsã osi odi akũ nna foe akũ kɔtɔkase kudi a.
46009019	Ndzi yĩ akũ akũ ade ĩnyɛ́ ɔsate nkpa odima a. Lɛmɛ nkɔa yĩ akũ nkɛna oti kĩ yasum odi nyɛ odi ayekĩ maapuli ĩnyɛ bati pii nkpa boe Ɔlate.
46009020	Lɔkɔ a kĩ nkɛna adzuma nɛ Yudafɔ kamɛ a, ndzi nkpã ndɛ Yudani ayekĩ maavɛlɛ be mma boe Ɔlate. Titɔ kĩ nláa Mose mbla kayɔ malo ni, ndzi nkpã ndɛ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mbla kayɔ, ayekĩ maanyɛ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mbla a kayɔ nkpa boe Ɔlate.
46009021	Ade ayea kĩ makɛna adzuma nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kamɛ a, ndzi nkpã ndɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani. Ntákɛna nɛ Yudafɔ mbla akũ ayekĩ maana bati nkpa boe Ɔlate. Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ látsa kĩ mpu Baguma mbla a. Ɔnɔkɔali a nyɛ kĩ ndeĩ nɛ Kristo mbla a kayɔ.
46009022	Ntɛ ndeĩ nɛ bikĩ be katɛkado tabo anɛ kamɛ ni, makɛna yĩ akũ ndɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa aye, ayekĩ maavɛlɛ be nkpa boe Ɔlate. Matsã osi nyɛ osi akũ kakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ odi nyɛ odi ayekĩ maavɛlɛ be kamɛ badi nkpa boe Ɔlate.
46009023	Makɛna fukĩĩ bamɛ flee nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ, ayekĩ yĩ malo maana foe akũ nhila.
46009024	Minyina yededeede kĩ bati pii adã akũ nɛ atsɛ kalo kamɛ, lɛmɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔapɛ anya akũ katɛ foe akũ lɔbɔɛ. Foesũ miwula atsɛ ayekĩ míapuli minya akũ mitɛ foe akũ kɔtɔkase a.
46009025	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmanɛ akũ ɛkpa atsɛ kalo ni, yakɔa ye akũ kado nɛ mbla mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kayɔ ayekĩ yaana lɛgãbɔɛ a kĩ de kɔ̃ laawɔ. Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ bɔamanɛ akũ ayekĩ bɔ́ana lɛgãbɔɛ a kĩ lɛláawɔ da.
46009026	Foesũ mawula atsɛ kanaa kpĩĩ kĩ manaatsua ɔwɛ̃ a. Ade foesũ nla ndɛ fukpeni ɔbɔanɛ kĩ yaáta fukpeni nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ aye aye a.
46009027	Mafɔ̃ fukpeni awo yĩ akũ ayekĩ yĩ sukɛna aapuli sɛdza sɛkpa lubo kamɔ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ kakpa bati bɛbã ni, ntáwɛ kĩ bɛyaanyɛ yĩ nɛ boe a kĩ bɔadã akũ nɛ atse kalo kɔdza a kamɛ.
46010001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mawɛ kĩ mikai lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ boe bawanyɔ a kĩ bitómɔ Mose a akũ. Be flee bɛna nɛ luflututu a kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ ade bɛtsã Mpo Ngbã a kamɛ bɛnɛ yededeede a.
46010002	Baguma kɔa luflututu mɔ mpo mui ɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ ndɛ bati kĩ bitomɔ Mose aye.
46010003	Be flee bɛnya hũhũ kamɛ funitsã mɔapɛ a,
46010004	ade bɛmɔa hũhũ kamɛ bavɛ mɔapɛ a lɛmɛ a. Bɛmɔa mui bitomɛna awãwã hũhũ de a kĩ litomɔ be a kamɛ. Ade de kĩĩ nyɛ Kristo awɛ a.
46010005	Lɛmɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, Baguma támɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ be pii akũ. Nɛ foesũ biku nɛ kɔsa kamɛ.
46010006	Finyaakĩĩ ni, fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee nyɛ nfantuhũ fɔkpa boe ayekĩ fɔ́abɔa boe kɔkɔ, kĩ bɔláatomɔ fɔtsa kpa liti ndɛ ayekĩ bɛkɛna,
46010007	ĩye bɔakɔa boe akũ bɔkpa baviɔ̃ kasum ndɛ ayekĩ be kamɛ badi kɛna a. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Bati a dzi banya luwi, lɛmɛ be kanya mɔ kamɔa dani fɔkɛna bavɛ kawuga, mɔ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ kakɛna.”
46010008	Kɛtánɛ kĩ bakɔ boe kɔtɔ nɛ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ kakɛna kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ be badi kɛna. Nɛ foesũ be kamɛ bati mpim tɛya ɛlalɛ ku luwi mɔapɛ.
46010009	Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔasɔ boe Ɔlate bɔdã ndɛ ayekĩ be kamɛ badi kɛna a, nɛ foesũ bɔɛ dɔ̃ be biku.
46010010	Mitafɔ̃ buyidza bɔdza nɛ Baguma akũ ndɛ ayekĩ be kamɛ badi kɛna, nɛ foesũ Wuda Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ yawɔla be.
46010011	Fukĩĩ bamɛ flee ya nɛ be akũ ayekĩ bati bɛbã aakɔlɛ fɔtsa bitomɛna foe akũ. Bɛtsɛlɛ foe biyi ayekĩ bɔ́akɔa bɔkpã boe akũ, kitonɛkĩ budeĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ katinya kamɛ kawũna fuã kiyua a kamɛ.
46010012	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɔna kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ pintii ni, ɛdã kadã wĩ ayekĩ ɛláatɔ.
46010013	Kasɔ kadã kadi nyɛ kadi kĩ kɛya nɛ nɔ akũ ni, ade foe odu aya nɛ bati bɛbã akũ a. Lɛmɛ Baguma akɛna nɛ ye kalɛ akũ, ade ke ɛláafɔ̃ kasɔ a na lɛba nɔ kɔbɛ̃ a. Nɛ kasɔ a kamɛ ni, yaakpa mi kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ míapuli midza nɛ foe kamɛ, mipuli minya foe akũ lɛmɛ.
46010014	Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mivɛlɛ mi akũ nɛ baviɔ̃ kasum ɔwɛ̃.
46010015	Mabi mi fɔlɛtsa ndɛ bati kĩ binyina kadi, foesũ mikɔna fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a akũ midã.
46010016	Kɔɔpu a kĩ bɔalɛ kanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ a nyɛ boe Ɔlate babɔanɛ. Ntɛ buhila kayei a na, bɔmɔa bavɛ a ni, bɔmɔ Kristo bɔkɛna ɔmɔa. Ntɛ bɔanya boe Ɔlate funitsã kpalɛwa ni, fɔatsa kĩ bɔmɔ Kristo bɔkɛna ɔmɔa.
46010017	Titɔ kĩ bɔpɔnɛ malo ni bɔkɛna oti mɔa, kito nɛ abodoo mɔapɛ a kĩ boe flee bɔsɛ̃ bɔanya a sũ.
46010018	Mikɔna Israelfɔ midã. Be a kĩ bɛnya funitsã a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma a, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Baguma.
46010019	Foesũ katsa matsa kĩ baviɔ̃ ĩye fɔtsa a kĩ bakɔa kabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa be a nyɛ fɔtsa sĩwa fudi mbɔɛɛ?
46010020	Oowo! Lɛtsa a kĩ matsa a nyɛ kĩ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ ni, bɛkɔa foe bɛkpa hũhũ kpa, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ Baguma bɛbɔa bɛkpa. Ntáwɛ kĩ miakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ hũhũ kpa.
46010021	Kɛtánɛ kĩ miamɔa mui nɛ boe Ɔlate kɔɔpu kamɛ lɔkɔa mibuki minaamɔa nɛ hũhũ kpa kɔɔpu lɛmɛ kamɛ, ĩye minya nɛ boe Ɔlate opunu akũ lɔkɔa minaanya nɛ hũhũ kpa opunu akũ lɛmɛ.
46010022	Miawɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate ɛna kalɔkpa, ɛnɔ lineke lɛmɛ mbɔɛɛ? Bɔakɔna kĩ budeĩ kɔbɛ̃ bɔbɛ̃ ye mbɔɛɛ?
46010023	Babɔa lɛgbã kĩ, “Bɛkpa boe osi kĩ bɔkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.” Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛnɛ lɛkpa boe. “Bɛkpa boe osi kĩ bɔkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.” Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa deĩ nfasɔ lɛkpa boe.
46010024	Kɛtánɛ kĩ oti akɔna ye odi kalɛ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ yakɔna bati bɛbã kalɛ akũ.
46010025	Mideĩ osi kĩ mianya sɛkɛna sidi nyɛ sidi kĩ banɔ nɛ kɔyaatɔ. Mitafɔ̃ fɔha mi tɔwɔlɛ ĩye mivia ntɛ se akũ kpalɛ ĩye sɛtákpalɛ.
46010026	Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Baguma la katinya mɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lideĩ nɛ ke kamɛ a.”
46010027	Ntɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ ɔtɛ odonɛ vɛ nɔ kĩ yaanya mɔ́ otunɔ ɔnaa ni, nya funitsã a kĩ ete opunu ɛkpa nɔ a, lɛmɛ tavia ye otse ntɛ foe akũ kpalɛ ĩye fɔtákpalɛ.
46010028	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi bi nɔ kĩ, “Dã, bɛkɔa funitsã a na bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃” kekɔ̃ tanya foe nɛ ayekĩ fɔláaha oti a ɔwɔlɛ.
46010029	Kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ nɔ a kĩ ɔnya a ɔwɔlɛ fɔ́aha, mbom fɔ́aha oti a kĩ ebi nɔ a. Odi aavia kĩ, “Nde sũ ntɛ ndeĩ osi kĩ makɛna litsedi mɔ fɔaha odi ɔwɔlɛ?
46010030	Ntɛ ĩnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ funitsã a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ a akũ ni, nde sũ odi alɛ kɔdzɛla etia yĩ?”
46010031	Lɛmɛ mite anɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ miakɛna, ntɛ fɔnyɛ kanya ĩye kamɔa malo ni mikɛna foe mikɔa mimu Baguma.
46010032	Midzi nkpã ayekĩ miláavɛlɛ ɔhau adima mikpa Yudafɔ ĩye bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ mɔ be a kĩ bɛnyɛ Baguma asɔli bati a.
46010033	Mikɛna ndɛ ayekĩ nlamɛna kakɛna. Mbɔa mbɔdi kĩ makɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa fuwo odi nyɛ odi anɛ. Maákɔna yĩ akũ mbom makɔna bati flee be tuwĩ akũ ayekĩ baana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
46011001	Mikɔlɛ yĩ ɔbla mikɛna ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo makɔlɛ Kristo ɔbla kakɛna a.
46011002	Mamu mi nɛ ayekĩ mite anɛ nɛ yĩ akũ luwi daa mɔ ayekĩ mitomɔ fɔtsa flee a kĩ ntsa mi a.
46011003	Lɛmɛ mawɛ kĩ minyi kĩ Kristo nyɛ lɔlɔ ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi. Onyole nyɛ ɔtsɔ̃ lɔlɔ ade Baguma lɛmɛ nyɛ Kristo lɔlɔ a.
46011004	Foesũ ntɛ onyole kĩ yabɔa mpaɛ ĩye yalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa nɛ asɔli kɔla kamɛ sua ye lɔlɔ ni, edo Kristo kɔnyɔã.
46011005	Lɛmɛ otsole kĩ yabɔa mpaɛ ĩye yalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa nɛ asɔli kɔla kamɛ, tásui duku nɛ lɔlɔ ni, edo ɔnyɔ kɔnyɔã. Ntsitsemu lɛláa bɛmɔ otsole kĩ ɛkpa lɔlɔ tsɔlitsɔli kayite.
46011006	Ntɛ otsole tásui duku nɛ lɔlɔ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ekpeli tɔlɔ. Lɛmɛ nɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ kɔnyɔã ntɛ otsole kpeli tɔlɔ ĩye ɛkpa lɔlɔ sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ esui duku nɛ lɔlɔ.
46011007	Fɔtásĩ kĩ onyole asua lɔlɔ kitonɛkĩ ɛla ndɛ Baguma kutitse mɔ ye kukũkpalɛ. Lɛmɛ otsole kɔ̃ nyɛ onyole kukũkpalɛ.
46011008	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tábɔa onyole etomɛna otsole kamɛ, mbom ɛbɔa otsole etomɛna onyole kamɛ.
46011009	Bɛtábɔa onyole bɛkpa otsole nɛ ye otsole a kalɛ sũ, lɛmɛ bɛkɛna otsole bɛkpa nɛ onyole a kalɛ sũ.
46011010	Nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ otsole esui duku nɛ lɔlɔ ɛkɔa ɛtsa kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔnyɔ kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ.
46011011	Titɔ kĩ fɔla lɔmɔ malo nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate sũ ni, otsole lídzi ye akũ akũ, ade onyole lɛmɛ lídzi ye akũ akũ a.
46011012	Kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛbɔa otsole bitomɛna onyole kamɛ a, ade aye a bɛma onyole bitomɛna otsole kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa to Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
46011013	Mi mɔawɛ mikɔna midã ntɛ fɔnɛnɛ kĩ otsole abɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa Baguma nɛ kanade, kĩ ɛtásui duku nɛ lɔlɔ.
46011014	Ayekĩ Baguma bɔa katinya kamɛ malo atsa boe litsedi kĩ fɔnyɛ kɔnyɔã ntɛ onyole deĩ lɔlɔ tɔlɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ.
46011015	Lɛmɛ tɔlɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ nyɛ akũ obu fɔkpa otsole. Bɛkpa ye tɔlɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ɛkɛɛlɛ ye akũ.
46011016	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi awɛ kĩ yatɛ atsindze nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ ni, lɛtsa a kĩ maalɛ nɛ foe akũ nyɛ kĩ boe ĩye Baguma tɛsɔli a buki tɛlá amaniɛ bɛbã adima.
46011017	Nɛ kɔdɛ a kĩ makpa mi finyaa kamɛ ni, maámu mi kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mikpɔta kĩ miasum Baguma ni, miakɛna mi akũ tɔkpa kaba tuwĩ.
46011018	Kalɛ katɔnyade ni, nnu kĩ ntɛ mikpɔta ndɛ asɔli bati aye ni, miasɛ̃ mi akũ. Ntɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ fudi ndo.
46011019	Fusĩ kĩ kasɛ̃ kɛna nɛ mi kamɛ ayekĩ bɔ́amɔ yededeede bikĩ badi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ mi kamɛ.
46011020	Ntɛ mikpɔta nɛ kakɔ mɔa ni, nnɛ́ boe Ɔlate Funitsã kpalɛwa a mianya.
46011021	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mianya ni, odi nyɛ odi abɔɛ ye funitsã kanya. Fɔfɔ̃ badi lána kanya, ade badi lɛmɛ awuga bavɛ.
46011022	Milá tɔtɔ kĩ mianya mimɔa nɛ te kamɛ mbɔɛɛ? Kawɛ miawɛ kĩ miasupa Baguma asɔli a, mido ahiãfɔ kɔnyɔã lɛmɛ mbɔɛɛ? Litsa miwɛ kĩ mbi mi nɛ fukĩĩ akũ? Miwɛ kĩ mmu mi mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Fukĩĩ kɔ̃ nláamu mi.
46011023	Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ntɛ ntomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃ a, ade foe ntsa mi a. Lɛnyɛ a kĩ ke mɔ bɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu bɛkpa a, ɛbɔɛ abodoo,
46011024	ade ɛnyɛ kɔlɛ, ɛyɛlɛ ye ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ sukɛna kĩ nkɔa mabɔa afɔliɛ nkpa mi a. Mikɛna fukĩĩ mikɔa mikai yĩ.”
46011025	Ade ayea kĩ bɛnya biyua a, ɛbɔɛ kɔɔpu ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɔɔpu kĩĩ nyɛ nhihiɛ vɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa yĩ babɔanɛ bisui. Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ miamɔa bavɛ kĩĩ ni, mikɛna foe mikai yĩ.”
46011026	Fɔatsa kĩ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ mianya abodoo, miamɔa bavɛ nɛ kɔɔpu kĩĩ kamɛ lɛmɛ ni, milamɛna lɛtsã kade nɛ boe Ɔlate wuda akũ, kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ yaabuki ɛya.
46011027	Foesũ ntɛ odi nya boe Ɔlate abodoo, ɛmɔa kɔɔpu kĩĩ nɛ osi kpa akũ ni, baakɔ ye kɔtɔ kĩ efum nɛ boe Ɔlate sukɛna mɔ ye babɔanɛ akũ.
46011028	Nɛ foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi ɛkɔna ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ fɔmɔ yaanya funitsã, ɛmɔa bavɛ nɛ kɔɔpu a lɛmɛ kamɛ.
46011029	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ odi táyi boe Ɔlate babɔanɛ mɔ sukɛna ɔsũ kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔtsa kpalɛwa fɔmɔ ɛnya ĩye ɛmɔa foe nɛ osi kpa akũ ni, ɛvɛlɛ kadzɛ eko nɛ ye akũ.
46011030	Ade foesũ mi pii miasɔ ade milá akũ ɔsĩ a. Mi kamɛ bati pii lɛmɛ ku.
46011031	Ntɛ bɔnya lɔtɔ bɔnaa boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, Baguma lɛláadzɛmɔ boe.
46011032	Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe Ɔlate adzɛmɔ boe, ɛvɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ lɛmɛ ni, yalɔla boe ayekĩ Baguma lɛláakɔ bɔmɔ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a flee kɔtɔ ɛkpɔta.
46011033	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ miyakpɔta kĩ mianya ni, midzɔlɛ mi bawaɛ̃.
46011034	Ntɛ kɔlɛ akɔ odi ni, ɛnya nɛ kɔla ayekĩ ntɛ miyatsɛna nɛ Baguma kɔla kamɛ ni owula lɛláana kadzɛ ɛkpa ye akũ. Ntɛ ĩya ni, maadɛ mi nɛ fɔlɛtsa bɛbã a kĩ fute a akũ.
46012001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, finyaa ni mawɛ kĩ minu Hũhũ kamɛ futetsa a kĩ mitsɛlɛ mivia akũ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ a yededeede.
46012002	Minyina kĩ fɔmɔ midani mikɛna batɛ badonɛ a, mitsã tisi pii akũ ade mikɔa mi akũ mikpa baviɔ̃ kĩ báalɛ kɔdzɛla kasum a.
46012003	Foesũ mafɔ̃ minyi kĩ ntɛ odi kɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ yalɛ kɔdzɛla ni, ɛláalɛ kĩ, “Yesu, kɔa nɛ ke a!” ade odima lɛmɛ lɛláapuli ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yesu nyɛ boe Ɔlate,” ntɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ lɛláa ye kamɛ.
46012004	Futetsa futefute deĩ lɛmɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a lɛkpa foe flee.
46012005	Tisi pii deĩ kĩ te akũ bɔatsã kakɛna Baguma adzuma, lɛmɛ ade boe Ɔlate mɔapɛ a bɔasum a.
46012006	Ade ayea tisi pii deĩ kĩ Baguma atsã kakpa bati kɔbɛ̃ bakɛna fɔtsa, lɛmɛ Baguma mɔapɛ akpa kɔbɛ̃ a flee.
46012007	Baguma kɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛtsã bati akũ bakɛna tuwĩ fɔnɛ libi fɔkpa bati flee.
46012008	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a apuli kakpa oti mɔa kɔbɛ̃ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ nyansã, ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a akpa oti bɛbã lɛmɛ kɔbɛ̃ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kadikanyi a.
46012009	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a akpa oti mɔa katɛkado baũ. Ye mɔapɛ a yakpa oti bɛbã fɔsɔ katsa kɔbɛ̃.
46012010	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a akpa oti bɛbã kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa, odi bɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃. Yakpa oti mɔa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ, ade yakpa odi bɛbã lɛmɛ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yapuli ɛnyɛ tide a kayɔ, oti bɛbã kɔbɛ̃ kĩ epuli enyi ntɛ futetsa kĩĩ to Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sɛkɛ̃ ĩye fɔtáto ye sɛkɛ̃.
46012011	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ kĩĩ a akɛna fɔtsa a flee, ade yakpa odi nyɛ odi futetsa ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ a.
46012012	Otidziwa kutitse a deĩ akũ fɔkɔ futefute, lɛmɛ foe flee fɔnyɛ oti mɔapɛ. Titɔ kĩ kuti a deĩ akũ fɔtsa pii malo ni, foe flee fɔkɛna oti mɔa. Ade aye Kristo lɛmɛ la a.
46012013	Boe badi bɔnyɛ Yudafɔ ade badi lɛmɛ nyɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a. Badi nyɛ basate ade badi lɛmɛ dzi be akũ akũ a. Lɛmɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a wɔla boe flee mui nɛ Kristo kamɛ, bɔkɛna ɔmɔa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a kamɛ. Boe flee bɔtɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a mui bɔmɔa.
46012014	Kitonɛkĩ otidziwa kutitse a lɛnyɛ́ fɔtsa fɔmɔapɛ, mbom kudeĩ fɔkɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ.
46012015	Ntɛ kɔbɔa lɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ awɛ manɛ sũ ĩnyɛ́ kutitse a sɛkɛ sidima” a, foe kalɛ lɔmɔ lɛláafɔ̃ kĩ kɔbɔa buki kɔnyɛ́ kutitse a sɛkɛ sidi.
46012016	Ntɛ sɔtɔ lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ linebi manɛ sũ ĩnyɛ kutitse a sɛkɛ sidima,” foe kalɛ lɔmɔ lɛláafɔ̃ kĩ sɔtɔ buki sɛnyɛ́ kuti a sɛkɛ sidi.
46012017	Ntɛ kutitse a flee nyɛ linebi odi ni, kɔláapuli kunu fɔkɔ. Ntɛ kutitse a flee nyɛ sɔtɔ odi ni, kɔláapuli kɔtɛ fɔtsa nfiã.
46012018	Lɛmɛ Baguma bɔa boe kutitse mɔ foe akũ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ, ade edo fudi nyɛ fudi nɛ awã kĩ yawɛ a.
46012019	Nde otidziwa kuti a aana ndɛ akũ fɔtsa mɔapɛ fɔanɛ?
46012020	Oti akũ fɔkɔ futefute deĩ lɛmɛ kutitse mɔapɛ kɔanɛ.
46012021	Foesũ linebi lɛláapuli libi awɛ kĩ, “Ntásĩ nɔ!” Lɔlɔ lɛmɛ lɛláapuli libi sɛnɛta kĩ, “Ntásĩ nɔ!”
46012022	Oti akũ fɔkɔ a kĩ fɔadã ndɛ fɔlá akũ ɔsĩ a, ade foe mbom akũ lisĩ boe a.
46012023	Ade ke fɔkɔ a kĩ bɔakɔna kĩ fɔtátɛ kɔya a, ade foe bɔakpa obu kaba a. Fukĩ fɔálɛ kadã a, ade foe bɔakɔla kaba a.
46012024	Boe akũ fɔkɔ a kĩ fɔalɛ kadã a tásĩ akũ kadãmɛna. Baguma awɛ boomu akũ fɔkɔ a flee ade edo obu nɛ fukĩ obu lɛláa foe akũ,
46012025	ayekĩ boe kutitse a lɛláasɛ̃ koe akũ. Baguma wɛ kĩ fɔkɔ futefute a fɔdãmɛna fɔkɔba akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
46012026	Ntɛ oti kakɔ kadi asɔ ni, fɔkɔ nkaɛ a lɛmɛ amɔ lubo kabumɔ foe. Ntɛ bido kakɔ kadi anunyam ni, fɔkɔ nkaɛ a lɛmɛ amɔ kawɔlɛ kabumɔ foe.
46012027	Finyaakĩĩ mi a flee mikpɔta minyɛ Kristo kutitse a, ade mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi nyɛ kutitse a sɛkɛ sĩwa sidi a.
46012028	Baguma kɔa badi ɛdzɛla nɛ ye batɛ badonɛ onukpɛ̃. Bɛkɔa kadzakɔ̃ katɔnyade bɛkpa fɔtɔ banyanɛ, kayade bɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, ade kalalɛde a naa fɔtsa batsanɛ sɛkɛ̃ a. Ke liti Baguma kɔa kadzakɔ̃ bɛbã ɛkpa bikĩ bakɛna awãwã fɔtsa, bikĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ batsa fɔsɔ, bikĩ babumɛna bati, bikĩ banya bati lɔtɔ nɛ tudzuma kakɛna kamɛ, mɔ bikĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ.
46012029	Nnɛ́ bati flee nyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ĩye kĩ bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ ĩye fɔtsa batsanɛ. Ade nnɛ́ bati flee deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bakɛna awãwã fɔtsa a.
46012030	Nnɛ́ bati flee deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ batsa fɔsɔ, ĩye balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ĩye banyɛ tide a kayɔ.
46012031	Nɛ foe flee kamɛ a, mitomɔ futetsa a kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya fɔba flee a liti. Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ maatsa mi fukĩ fɔbɛ̃ a flee.
46013001	Ntɛ mapuli kalɛ batidziwa mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ flee tide, mɔ bati kawɛ lɛláa yĩ kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ yĩ kɔdzɛla kalɛ la ndɛ lɔwɔda ĩye ɔdɔũ kĩ yanɛ kɔɔba kasĩna atɔ.
46013002	Ntɛ ndeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ manyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃, ĩye ĩnyina fɔtsa kɔlawa mɔ kadikanyi flee, ĩye ntɛ ndeĩ katɛkado kĩ maapuli ndzɛla ɔtɔ nɛ ye kadzakɔ̃, mɔ́ bati kawɛ lɛláa yĩ kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ ĩnyɛ́ lɛtsama.
46013003	Ntɛ nkɔa yĩ akũ fɔtsa flee nte ahiãfɔ, ĩye ntɛ nkɔa yĩ akũ mbɔa afɔliɛ kĩ bipila mɔ ntɛ bati kawɛ lɛláa yĩ kamɛ ni, nlá nfasɔ adima.
46013004	Ɔdɔ deĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ edeĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ lɛmɛ. Ɔdɔ lɛlá anɛngbã, yaátui ɔwɔlɛ ade yaáta akũ lɛmɛ a.
46013005	Ɔdɔ lákɛna fɔnyɔãtsa, yaáwɛ ye odi fude, yaána kalɔkpa, ade yaápi tɔkpa kado nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.
46013006	Ɔdɔ lámɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ tɔkpa akũ, mbom yamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kamɛ.
46013007	Akpɔ láveli ɔdɔ, yaákpa lɔlɔ nɛ ye katɛkado kamɛ, edeĩ kɔnɛte luwi nyɛ luwi ade yadza pintii nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ a.
46013008	Ɔdɔ lɛlá kawũna da. Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ aayatɛ̃, kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ mɔ kadikanyi deĩ, lɛmɛ lɔkɔ aaya kĩ foe flee fɔ́atsua,
46013009	kitonɛkĩ boe kadikanyi mɔ boe Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ a lɛmɛ tákpɔla fuyua a.
46013010	Lɛmɛ ntɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔkpɔla yawo ɔtɔ ni, futetsa kĩĩ flee aatɛ̃.
46013011	Lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ a, nlɛ kɔdzɛla, mbɔɛ adzuni, mbu lɔlɔ kamɛ ndɛ obisɛ̃ aye. Lɛmɛ kĩ mbo anɛ ndani ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, nfɔnɛ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ fɔtsa flee awɛ.
46013012	Finyaakĩĩ bɔamɔ fɔtsa futufutu ndɛ ayekĩ fɔla nɛ ahuhɔɛ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ ke liti ni bɔ́ayamɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa anɛ mɔ anɛ. Lɛtsa a kĩ ĩnyina finyaa ni, fɔtákpɔla fuyua, lɛmɛ liti maamɔ foe yededeede ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma nyina yĩ a.
46013013	Nɛ foe kamɛ a, fɔtsa ɛlalɛ deĩ kĩ foe kɔ̃ fɔ́awa daa. Ade foe nyɛ katɛkado, kɔnɛte mɔ ɔdɔ, lɛmɛ fukĩ fɔbɛ̃ flee nyɛ ɔdɔ.
46014001	Foesũ ɔdɔ ɛnya fɔtsa a kĩ foe liti míatomɛna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, lɛmɛ miwɛ hũhũ kamɛ futetsa liti osi, titiliwu Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ.
46014002	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ odi deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ni bɛmɔ Baguma odi alɛ kɔdzɛla, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ bɛmɔ bati kitonɛkĩ bɛláanu foe kayɔ. Fɔnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa kĩ futo Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sɛkɛ̃.
46014003	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ni, yabi bati kalɛ ade yabumɔ be, yado be kɔbɛ̃, kadɔla be tɔwɔlɛ lɛmɛ.
46014004	Oti kĩ yalɛ kalɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ bati lánu foe kayɔ ni, ye odi akũ yabumɛna. Lɛmɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ni, yabumɛna batɛ badonɛ a flee.
46014005	Nwɛ kĩ mipuli milɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ mipuli minyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ni fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ odi nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ni, ebumɔ asɔli bati a ɛba odi kĩ yalɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ, mbɔɛntɛ odi bɛbã nyɛ foe kayɔ fɔnya kabumɛna fɔkpa bati a flee.
46014006	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ĩyalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ odima tánu foe kayɔ a ni, nfasɔ wɔdabe deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ fɔkpa mi? Lɛmɛ ntɛ nkɔa kanyɛkatsa kadi, kadikanyi kadi, Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ kadi ĩye kadikanyi, Baguma fɔlɛtsa, fɔtsa katsa fudi mma mi ni, ade foe aakpa mi kabumɛna a.
46014007	Ade aye kagbulɛɛ ĩye ɔsankuo, titɔ kĩ fɔlá nkpã malo ni, foe odo deĩ. Ntɛ bɛtávɔ̃ ĩye bɛbɔa foe nɛ osi odi akũ ni, ndɛ baakɛna biyi odo a ɔsũ?
46014008	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ oti a kĩ yavɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ távɔ̃ ke kavɔ̃ wĩ ni, nde kawũ banɔnɛ aakɛna binyi kĩ bɛpai be bɛkpa kawũkanɔ?
46014009	Ade ayea ntɛ ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ ni, nde bati aakɛna binu nɔ fɔlɛtsa a kayɔ? Fɔatsa kĩ ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ.
46014010	Tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ deĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ, ade te flee tideĩ kayɔ kanu a.
46014011	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi lánu yĩ tide ni, ndani oti kĩ mapɔtɔ nkpa ye, ade ke ye malo ɛdani ɔpɔtɔni ɛkpa yĩ a.
46014012	Nɛ kĩ miawɛ kĩ miana hũhũ kamɛ futetsa mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ sũ ni, mivia Baguma ɛkpa mi fukĩ fɔ́anya kabumɛna fɔkpa asɔli bati a flee.
46014013	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ni, eke Baguma aduli ɛkpa ye foe kayɔkanyɛ kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ, lɔkɔa ɛnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de ɛlɛ a kayɔ yededeede.
46014014	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mbɔa mpaɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ni, yĩ hũhũ kɔ̃ bɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ yĩ adzuni lɛláa foe kamɛ.
46014015	Foesũ litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna? Maabɔa mpaɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ade maabɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ manu foe kayɔ kamɛ a. Maasã tɔnɔ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ade maasã tɔnɔ lɛmɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩ manu foe kayɔ a kamɛ.
46014016	Ntɛ amu Baguma nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ni, nde oti a kĩ ɛtánu nɔ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a aapuli etunɔ kĩ, “Fɔya lɔmɔ” nɛ nɔ kɔlɛ kanyɛ a onukpɛ̃?
46014017	Ntɛ nɔ kɔlɛkanyɛ mpaɛbɔ a nɛnɛ malo ni, fɔtábumɛna oti bɛbã nɛ osi odima akũ.
46014018	Manyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ mapuli kalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ kaba mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi.
46014019	Lɛmɛ nɛ boe katsɛna kamɛ ni, mawɛ kĩ malɛ fɔlɛtsa sukuloo kĩ bati aanu foe kayɔ bɛkɔa bɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa, kɛba kĩ maalɛ fɔlɛtsa pii nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ.
46014020	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitato tibisɛ̃ nɛ mi kakɔna kamɛ. Mikɛna ndɛ babisɛ̃ ntɛ fɔnyɛ tɔkpa lɛmɛ mibo anɛ nɛ kadikanyi kamɛ.
46014021	Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Maalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ yĩ kade bati ntsã bati kĩ balɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ akũ. Ade maabi be kalɛ ntomɛna banɔvɔɛ̃ tunukpɛ̃, lɛmɛ bɛláatse yĩ kalɛ.”
46014022	Foesũ miamɔ kĩ kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ nyɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔkpa bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido, nnɛ́ bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a. Lɛmɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ nyɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni ɛkpa bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a, nnɛ́ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a.
46014023	Foesũ ntɛ asɔli bati flee tsɛna mɔ odi nyɛ odi lamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ, mɔ fɔya kĩ bati pupulidza ĩye bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a, nnɛ́ kalɛ baalɛ kĩ mi fɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade?
46014024	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi nyɛ odi lamɛna Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ mɔ oti pulidza ĩye ekĩ ɛtátɛ edo ya nɛ awã ni, lɛtsa kĩ yanu aafɔ̃ ɛdani ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ yanu a aadzɛmɔ ye,
46014025	ade lɛtsa kĩ ɛkɔa ɛkɔla nɛ ye kamɛ aanɛ fɔwa pefee a. Yaadɔla ye akũ emu Baguma ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali, Baguma deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ nɛ awĩ.”
46014026	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ade fukĩĩ mawɛ kĩ mikɛna a. Ntɛ mitsɛna kĩ miasum Baguma ni, mi kamɛ odi deĩ kĩ yasã ɔnɔ, odi atsa fɔtsa, odi deĩ kanyɛkatsa kĩ futo Baguma sɛkɛ̃, odi alɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ, ade odi lɛmɛ anyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ a kayɔ a. Kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ fɔado asɔli bati a flee kɔbɛ̃.
46014027	Ntɛ odi aalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ ni, bati nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ bɛlɛ bitomɔ akũ, lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ oti bɛbã anyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ a kayɔ.
46014028	Ntɛ odima lɛláa kĩ yaanyɛ foe kayɔ ni, kekɔ̃ oti a kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ a ɛkɛna dĩĩ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla ɛkpa ye akũ mɔ Baguma.
46014029	Bati nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ lɔkɔa bati nkaɛ a bɛsa fɔlɛtsa a kĩ baalɛ a kamɛ.
46014030	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi deĩ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ kĩ ɛtɛ kanyɛkatsa etomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, owula kĩ ɛlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ a ɛfɔ̃ kalɛ.
46014031	Mi a flee míapuli milɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa ɔmɔa ɔmɔa ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi aakɔlɛ fɔtsa ɛkɔa foe edo ye akũ kɔbɛ̃.
46014032	Bikĩ banyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ a bipuli bipi be akũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ balɛ a kamɛ,
46014033	kitonɛkĩ Baguma táwɛ kĩ bɔna nɛ ɔtutũ kamɛ mbom budzi nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ lukudɔ kamɛ. Ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ fɔna nɛ Baguma tɛsɔli a flee kamɛ a.
46014034	Kɛnɛ kĩ batsole bɛkɛna dĩĩ nɛ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃. Bɛtákpa be osi kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla, ade Yudafɔ mbla lɛmɛ tsa kĩ bɛtanya lɔtɔ nɛ adzuma adima kamɛ a.
46014035	Ntɛ bɛwɛ kĩ banyi litsedi kamɛ ni bivia be banyɔ nɛ kɔla. Fɔnyɛ kɔnyɔã fɔkpa otsole kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ batɛ badonɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
46014036	Mi sɛkɛ̃ Baguma kalɛ a nɛ kito mbɔɛɛ? Mbɔɛɛ kĩ mi odi bɛkɔa ke bɛma?
46014037	Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi kɔna kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ, ĩye edeĩ hũhũ kamɛ futetsa ni, enyi kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ntsɛlɛ mamɛna mi a nyɛ boe Ɔlate mbla kĩ ɛkpa.
46014038	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi tátse fukĩĩ ni, mi malo mitatse ye kalɛ.
46014039	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, fɔnya mi kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ mianyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃, lɛmɛ mitasua bikĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ a osi.
46014040	Kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ de osi akũ mɔ obu kamɛ.
46015001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nwɛ kĩ mate mi anɛ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ nde lɛtsa nkpa mi a akũ. Mitɛ ɔlɛdo a mido ade mi katɛkado dzɛ̃ nɛ foe akũ pintii a.
46015002	Ade fɔlɛtsa wĩ a kĩ nde foe akũ lɛtsã nkpa mi a. Míana katɛ ntɛ mipi fɔlɛtsa wĩ kĩĩ midomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, kekɔ̃ katɛ mitɛ mido pupulidza.
46015003	Fɔlɛtsa titiliwu a kĩ ntɛ a, ade foe nkɔa nkpa mi a. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ Kristo ku nɛ boe tɔkpa lɔlɔ, ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a.
46015004	Bibila ye ade ke nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, Baguma dzɛla ye edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a.
46015005	Ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Petro, mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a flee.
46015006	Ke liti a, ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa bikĩ bitomɔ ye kĩ bɛbɛ̃ bati ɔha elo nɛ lɔkɔ mɔa kamɛ, ade be kamɛ badi pii dzi nkpã kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ lɛmɛ be pii tɛ̃ kuwa liti.
46015007	Ɛyanyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Yakobo, ade ke liti ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a flee a.
46015008	Nɛ ke kawũna a, ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa yĩ malo, titɔ kĩ nkɛna ndɛ oti kĩ bɛtáma ye nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ kamɛ.
46015009	Kitonɛkĩ yĩ nyɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ, ade ntáfɛta nkpa kĩ bavɛ yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ malo, kitonɛkĩ ntomɔ Baguma asɔli bati a liti.
46015010	Lɛmɛ nɛ kĩ Baguma mɔ yĩ kɔnya sũ ni, ɛkɛna yĩ oti a kĩ ye manɛ finyaakĩĩ. Ye kɔnyakamɔ kĩĩ tákɛna fɔtsa pupulidza. Nkɛna adzuma paa mba fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛbã a, kĩ nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ nkɔa nkɛna, mbom Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a libumɔ yĩ.
46015011	Foesũ ntɛ fɔlɛtsa a to yĩ sɛkɛ̃ o-o, futo be sɛkɛ̃ o-o, ade foe akũ boe flee bɔade lɛtsã a. Fɔnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mi malo mitɛ mido.
46015012	Finyaakĩĩ boe ɔlɛdo nyɛ kĩ Baguma dzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa. Nde sũ mi kamɛ badi alɛ kĩ bɛláadzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã?
46015013	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ banɔkpa láyidza ni, kekɔ̃ fɔatsa kĩ Kristo táyidza.
46015014	Ntɛ Baguma ɛtadzɛla Kristo eto kanɔkpa ni, kekɔ̃ bɔlá lɛtsama kĩ bɔade lɛtsã nɛ de akũ, ade mi malo lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ miatɛ mido a.
46015015	Lɛtsa a kĩ lɛbɛ̃ nyɛ kĩ fɔadã ndɛ bɔma fɔvã bɔate nɛ Baguma akũ, kitonɛkĩ bɔlɛ kĩ ɛdzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ banɔkpa lɛláayidza ni, kekɔ̃ Baguma tádzɛla Kristo.
46015016	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Baguma ɛtadzɛla banɔkpa ni, ade aye a ɛtádzɛla Kristo lɛmɛ a.
46015017	Ntɛ Baguma ɛtadzɛla Kristo ni, kekɔ̃ mi katɛkado nyɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ fɔtsa ade ke míabuki mina nɛ mi tɔkpa kamɛ a.
46015018	Foe kayɔ lɛmɛ atsa kĩ bikĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido fɔmɔ biku ni, bɛtána katɛ.
46015019	Ntɛ boe anɛ teĩ nɛ Kristo akũ fɔkpa katinya kĩĩ odi kɔ̃ ni, kekɔ̃ boe akũ akɔ kɔnya paa kaba odi nyɛ odi nɛ katinya flee kamɛ.
46015020	Lɛmɛ kalɛ ɔnɔkɔali a nyɛ kĩ Baguma dzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa ade fɔnyɛ kasipi kĩ bikĩ biku a ni, yaadzɛla be malo.
46015021	Kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ wuda tsã oti akũ ɛya nɛ katinya kamɛ a, ade aye bati kayidza kato kanɔkpa lɛmɛ tsã oti akũ a.
46015022	Ndɛ ayekĩ bati flee aaku nɛ kĩ bɛnɛ bito Adam kamɛ sũ a, ade ayea Baguma aadzɛla bati flee nɛ ayekĩ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo sũ a.
46015023	Lɛmɛ Baguma aadzɛla odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi akũ. Kristo nyɛ oti ɔtɔnyade, ke liti lɔkɔ a kĩ yaabuki ɛya a, yaadzɛla bikĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade a.
46015024	Ke liti a, katinya kawũna aaya. Kristo aanya hũhũ flee kɔbɛ̃, katinya kamɛ otumifɔ mɔ bikĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ akũ, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a edo nɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga awɛ.
46015025	Kɛnɛ kĩ Kristo ɛnya lɛgã kɛnawo kĩ Baguma nya bakesĩnɛ flee akũ, ɛkɔa ye abɔa ete nɛ be akũ.
46015026	Okesĩnɛ nkaɛ kĩ Baguma aanya ye akũ nyɛ wuda.
46015027	Kitonɛkĩ bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Baguma fɔ̃ ɛkɔa ye abɔa ete nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ.” Fɔwaa yedede kĩ ntɛ bɛlɛ kĩ “lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa” a, fɔátsa kĩ Baguma awɛ a kĩ ɛfɔ̃ Kristo kɔa abɔa ete nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ a tsɛka nɛ foe kamɛ.
46015028	Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛkɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa bido nɛ Kristo lɛgãkanya kayɔ ni, ye mɔawɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ Obi a, aakɔa ye akũ edo nɛ Baguma a kĩ ɛkɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa edo nɛ ye kayɔ a kayɔ. Baguma aanya lɛgã nɛ fɔtsa flee akũ.
46015029	Finyaakĩĩ, nde nyɛ bikĩ bɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ bikĩ biku lɔlɔ a? Litsa nyɛ likĩ baamɔ nɛ foe kamɛ? Ntɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ ndɛ ayekĩ badi alɛ kĩ Baguma lɛláadzɛla bati bidzi nkpã a, nde sũ bɛfɔ̃ bɛkɛna boe be mui kawɔla amaniɛ?
46015030	Nde sũ boe fɔtɔ banyanɛ a malo budeĩ nɛ nkpã mɔ wuda kayite lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ?
46015031	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ndeĩ nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ luwi daa. Mapia nɛ mi akũ nɛ kĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo sũ. Ade foe lɛfɔ̃ manyɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kanya a.
46015032	Ntɛ fɔnyɛ otidziwa kakɔna onukpɛ̃ sũ mɔ nvũ lɛma mɔ bayaɛ kpa kĩ bɛla ndɛ bati aye nɛ Efeso nɛ awĩ ni, litsa nfasɔ nna? Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛláadzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã ni, kekɔ̃ fuketi mɔ kalɛ a kĩ balɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bɔnya bɔmɔa, kitonɛkĩ kunya bɔ́aku.”
46015033	Mitafɔ̃ bɛkɛ mi. “Tɔkɔbato abula oti kĩ edeĩ ɔbla wĩ kade.”
46015034	Milɔla adzuni wĩ kabɔɛ, lɔkɔa mifɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna. Mabi mi kĩ kɔnyɔã fɔanɛ fɔkpa mi kĩ mi kamɛ badi linyína Baguma.
46015035	Odi aavia kĩ, “Nde banɔkpa aapuli biyidza bidzi nkpã? Sukɛna sɔwɔdabe odu baana?”
46015036	Odzimbifɔ anɛ! Ntɛ odu kutse libi, libi a lɛláamɛ ntɛ lɛtávɔ̃ nɛ tite kamɛ.
46015037	Lɛtsa kĩ odu a nyɛ kutse libi pupulidza, ndɛ ligbanɔbi ĩye fudutsa bɛbã. Fɔnyɛ́ kutse munumunu kĩ ɔbɔɛ odu fɔanɛ.
46015038	Baguma kpa kutse libi a na sukɛna a kĩ yawɛ, ade ɛkpa libi nyɛ libi de sukɛna a.
46015039	Fɔtsa kĩ fudzi nkpã flee lɛlá sukɛna mɔa odu, batidziwa deĩ be sukɛna odu, bayaɛ deĩ be side, kɔvɔlabi deĩ be side, ade kɔfɔabi lɛmɛ deĩ be side a.
46015040	Ode kamɛ fɔtsa deĩ be sukɛna, fɔmɔ tite akũ fɔtsa lɛmɛ deĩ be sukɛna. Ayekĩ ode kamɛ bati alɛ kadã a vɛmɛna nɛ ayekĩ tite akũ bati alɛ kadã a akũ.
46015041	Suwa deĩ se kakpalɛ, odetɔ deĩ ye kakpalɛ. Fusibii lɛmɛ deĩ foe kakpalɛ lite lɛmɛ nɛ foe kamɛ malo fudeĩ foe kakpalɛ futefute.
46015042	Ade limii fɔ́ana ntɛ Baguma aadzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã a. Ntɛ bibila ɔnɔkpa ni, sukɛna a aavɔ̃, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛdzɛla ye ni ɛláabuki eku.
46015043	Ntɛ bibila sukɛna a ni, saálɛ kadã ade sɛlá ɔsĩ a. Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛdzɛla ye ni, yaalɛ kadã, ɛna kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
46015044	Ntɛ bibila ɔnɔkpa ni, ɛnyɛ sukɛna pupulidza, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛdzɛla ye ni, yaana hũhũ kamɛ sukɛna. Fɔwaa pefee kĩ oti sukɛna deĩ ade hũhũ kamɛ sukɛna lɛmɛ deĩ a.
46015045	Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Baguma bɔa oti ɔtɔnyade a kĩ ɛnyɛ Adam ndɛ otidziwa aye.” Lɛmɛ Adam nkaɛ a nyɛ Hũhũ kĩ yakpa nkpã.
46015046	Nnɛ́ hũhũ a lɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya, mbom otidziwa a ya fɔmɔ hũhũ a lɛmɛ yaya.
46015047	Baguma bɔa Adam ɔtɔnyade a etomɛna tite kamɛ, lɛmɛ Adam ɔyade a kɔ̃ to ode.
46015048	Bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ katinya kamɛ bade a la ndɛ oti a kĩ bɛbɔa ye bitomɛna tite kamɛ a. Bikĩ bɛnyɛ ode bade lɛmɛ la ndɛ okĩ eto ode a aye.
46015049	Ndɛ ayekĩ budeĩ nɛ ekĩ bɛbɔa bitomɛna tite kamɛ kutitse odu kamɛ a, ade aye bɔ́ana nɛ Otidziwa a kĩ eto ode kutitse a kamɛ a.
46015050	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ lɛtsa kĩ lideĩ sukɛna mɔ babɔanɛ ni, lɛláapuli lɛna kanyakɔ̃ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ. Lɛtsa a kĩ laaku ni, lɛláapuli lɛna nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔláawɔ a kamɛ.
46015051	-
46015052	Mitse ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kĩĩ kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla boe. Nnɛ́ boe flee aaku, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛvɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ nkaɛ a ni, boe flee bɔ́adani deedimɔapɛ. Fɔ́aya nɛ sinepo kabɔa mɔa kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bɛvɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ a pɛ, Baguma aadzɛla banɔkpa flee lɔkɔa bɛláabuki biku dadaada, yaadani be bɛkɛna bati vɔɛ̃.
46015053	Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa kĩ laabu kade ni, kɛnɛ kĩ lɛdani lɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ lɛláabu kade, ade lɛtsa a kĩ laaku ni, kɛnɛ kĩ lɛdani lɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ lɛláaku.
46015054	Foesũ ntɛ fɔya kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ laapuli libu kade dani lɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛláabu kade ni, lɔkɔa fɔlɛtsa nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Bɛwɔla wuda, bɛnya ye akũ.”
46015055	“Wuda, nde nɔ anunyam a kĩ odeĩ a? Nde nɔ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɔnɛɛ apila boe a?”
46015056	Wuda tɛ ye kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ɛnɛɛ yapila boe a etomɛna titikpa kakɛna kamɛ, ade titikpa kakɛna lɛmɛ tɛ te kɔbɛ̃ titomɛna mbla a kamɛ a.
46015057	Lɛmɛ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ ɛkpa boe anunyam ɛtsãmɛna boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ.
46015058	Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, midza pintii, mitakpã nɛ mi adzuma kakɛna kamɛ. Midanɛ boe Ɔlate adzuma kakɛna, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ adzuma adi nyɛ adi kĩ mikɛna lɛnyɛ́ adzuma pupulidza ɛkpa boe Ɔlate.
46016001	Finyaakĩĩ, nɛ sika a kĩ miawɛ kĩ miate mikɔa mibumɛna Baguma bati nɛ Yudea a akũ ni, mikɛna ndɛ ayekĩ mbi Galatiafɔ batɛ badonɛ kutsu a kĩ bɛkɛna a.
46016002	Ɛkwansieda nyɛ́ Ɛkwansieda ni, mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛmanɛ sika nɛ ye kɔtɔkase onukpɛ̃ eyi, lɔkɔa ntɛ ĩya ni, fɔláasĩ kĩ miate tɔgɔlɛ.
46016003	Ntɛ ĩya ni, maakpa bati a kĩ mite awɛ nɛ be akũ a tuvoli, lɔkɔa bɛkɔa mi futetsa bɛnamɛna Yerusalem.
46016004	Ntɛ fɔ́asĩ kĩ yĩ malo nnaa ni, bɔmɔ be bɔ́atsã kɔbɔa mɔa.
46016005	Maatsã Makedonia kamɛ fɔmɔ maaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ nke otse kĩ maatsã awã lɛmɛ.
46016006	Ɔsa maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ sukuloo nɛ osili lɔkɔ flee a, lɔkɔa ntɛ madzakũ ni, míapuli mibumɔ yĩ nɛ yĩ osi akũ kanaa kamɛ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ.
46016007	Ntáwɛ kĩ yĩ kasɛla a fɔdã lukũ lɔkɔa ntɛ̃ nnaa lɔtɔ. Nwɛ kĩ mana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ ntɛ boe Ɔlate kpa osi.
46016008	Maadzi nɛ Efeso nɛ awĩ kɛnaawo Pentekoste luwi a akũ,
46016009	kitonɛkĩ osi waa paa ɛkpa adzuma sĩwa baũ kakɛna nɛ awĩ, titɔ kĩ bati pii yidza bɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ malo.
46016010	Ntɛ Timoteo ya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, mitɛ ye atuu kitonɛkĩ yakɛna boe Ɔlate adzuma ndɛ yĩ aye.
46016011	Odima ɛtadã ye ndɛ oti kĩ ɛla kadzakɔ̃ kadima, lɛmɛ mikpa ye kabumɛna lɔkɔa ɛnaa ye osi akũ nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ, emuniki ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ madã anɛ kĩ bɛmɔ boe bawaɛ̃ a aamuniki bɛya.
46016012	Finyaakĩĩ, kalɛ nɛ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Apolo akũ nyɛ kĩ, lɔkɔ pii mado ye kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛmɔ bawaɛ̃ bɛbã a bɛyaasɛla mi, lɛmɛ fɔnyɛ́ ye kawɛ kɔlaa kĩ yaya nɛ awã lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ. Ntɛ ɛna osi ni, yaaya ke liti.
46016013	Mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, midza pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Mido ɔwɔlɛ, mido akũ kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
46016014	Mikɛna mi tudzuma flee nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
46016015	Minyina kĩ Stefana mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a nyɛ bati batɔnyade kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ nɛ Akaia, kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa Baguma adzuma kakɛna. Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, make mi aduli kĩ,
46016016	mitomɔ lɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩĩ odu ɔbla liti mɔ bati bɛbã kĩ bakɛna adzuma kabumɔ boe.
46016017	Kawɔlɛ deĩ yĩ kĩ Stefana, Fortunato mɔ Akaiko ya bideĩ nɛ awĩ nɛ mi kadokɔ̃.
46016018	Bido yĩ kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ bido mi kɔbɛ̃ a. Kɛnɛ kĩ buyi bati kĩĩ odu ɔsũ.
46016019	Batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Asia kamɛkamɛ a awɔ̃na mi. Akwila mɔ Priskila mɔ asɔli bati a kĩ batsɛna nɛ be tɔtɔ kamɛ a awɔ̃na mi nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ.
46016020	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awĩ bo nwɔ̃na mi nkpa be tsoo! Mitu miboomu akũ nɛ tɔwaɛ̃ kamɛ.
46016021	Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lɛkɔa awɛ ntsɛlɛ kawɔ̃na kĩĩ.
46016022	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ ni, ɛkɔa nɛ ke a! O boe Ɔlate, ya!
46016023	Boe Ɔlate Yesu kɔnyakamɔ kitomɔ mi.
46016024	Yĩ ɔdɔ ɛnamɔ mi flee nɛ Kristo Yesu dĩ akũ. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
47001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ Baguma pau ndɛ Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ ye kawɛ onukpɛ̃, mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Timoteo sɛkɛ̃. Bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli a bɔama Baguma asɔli a kĩ edeĩ nɛ Korinto mɔ Baguma bade a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Akaia tite flee a akũ.
47001002	Bɔawã kĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, bɛmɔ mi kɔnya bɛkpa mi lukudɔ.
47001003	Mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ Baguma kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga, kĩ yamɔ bati kɔnya, kĩ ye sɛkɛ̃ kabumɛna flee lɛmɛ ato a, kɔlɛ.
47001004	Yado boe ɔwɔlɛ nɛ boe ɔhau flee kamɛ, ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bɔdɔla bikĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔhau adi nyɛ adi kamɛ a tɔwɔlɛ, mɔ kabumna a kĩ boe mɔawɛ bɔtɛ butomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a.
47001005	Ndɛ ayekĩ bɔamɔ lubo beblebee odu a kĩ Kristo mɔ́ a, ade aye fɔtsɛ̃ Kristo akũ bɔana tsɛfã katomɛna Baguma kabumɛna baũ a kamɛ a.
47001006	Ntɛ bɔamɔ lubo ni, fɔnyɛ kabumɛna mɔ nkpã katɛ fɔkpa mi. Ntɛ Baguma bumɔ boe ni, ebumɔ mɔ mi malo, ɛkpa mi kɔbɛ̃ kĩ míapuli mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mimɔ́ lubo odu a kĩ de bɔamɔ a.
47001007	Foesũ boe kɔnɛte nɛ mi akũ dzɛ̃ kpli. Kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ ayekĩ miamɔ lubo ndɛ boe ayea, ade aye mi malo miana kabumɛna a kĩ bɔana a.
47001008	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ minyi ɔhau a kĩ bɔna nɛ Asia kamɛkamɛ a. Fɔlɔtsa a kĩ bite nɛ boe akũ pɔnɛ paa, fɔna ɔlɔmɛ fɔba boe kalɔ kĩ bɔtákɔna kĩ bɔ́abuki budzi nkpã.
47001009	Bɔmɔ́ nɛ boe kamɛ kĩ bɛkɔ boe kɔtɔ bɛkpa wuda. Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ ya nɛ boe akũ ayekĩ bɔláakɔa anɛ bute nɛ boe mɔawɛ akũ, mbom nɛ Baguma kĩ yadzɛla banɔkpa a akũ.
47001010	Ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna wuda tisi kĩ tideĩ libe kamɛ, ade yaabuki ɛnyɛ boe a. Bɔkɔa anɛ bute nɛ ye akũ kĩ yaabuki ɛnyɛ boe,
47001011	ndɛ ayekĩ miabumɛna boe nɛ mi mpaɛbɔ kabɔa kakpa boe kamɛ a. Foesũ fɔ́aya kĩ Baguma aatse mi mpaɛbɔ pii a kĩ mibɔa mikpa boe a, lɔkɔa ehila boe, ade bati pii aakɔa osee bɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ a.
47001012	Lɛtsa mɔa kĩ de akũ bɔapia nyɛ kĩ boe tɔwɔlɛ abi boe kĩ budzi kadzi wĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ, titiliwu nɛ bɔmɔ mi kadzi kamɛ. Bɔkɛna foe nnɛ́ nɛ batidziwa kadikanyi kamɛ, mbom Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ futo.
47001013	-
47001014	Bɔtsɛlɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de míapuli mikã minu foe kayɔ a odi bɔma mi. Lɛmɛ titɔ kĩ finyaa mianu boe kayɔ sɛkɛ mɔ sɛkɛ malo ni, yĩ anɛ teĩ kĩ míayanu boe kayɔ yededeede, ayekĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Luwi a akũ ni, míata akũ nɛ boe akũ ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔ́akɔa mi bupia a.
47001015	Ĩnyina fɔtsa kĩĩ flee yededeede, ade foesũ nkɛna nhihiɛ kĩ maanya lɔtɔ ĩyaasɛla mi kufɛ, ayekĩ míana kasɛla titi nviã kamɛ nfasɔ.
47001016	Kitonɛkĩ nkɛna nhihiɛ kĩ maayasɛla mi ntɛ manaa Makedonia, ade ntɛ mmuniki maya lɛmɛ maatsã awã, lɔkɔa maatɛ osi katsã kabumɛna ntomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ nnaa Yudea.
47001017	Kĩ nkakɛna nhihiɛ kĩĩ a, ntáke otse paa nɛ foe akũ mbɔɛɛ? Mbɔɛɛ kĩ nkɛna nhihiɛ a ni, nkɛna ye nɛ batidziwa kawɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ maapuli nlɛ “Oo” mɔ “Oowo” nɛ lɔkɔ mɔa kamɛ?
47001018	Nɛ ayekĩ Baguma akɛna nɛ ye kalɛ akũ sũ ni, yĩ lɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi nkpa mi a lɛnyɛ́ “Oo” mɔ “Oowo” fɔlɛtsa.
47001019	Kitonɛkĩ Yesu Kristo, Baguma Obi, kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa Sila, Timoteo mɔ yĩ bude lɛtsã a lɛnyɛ́ oti kĩ yalɛ “Oo” mɔ “Oowo” oti, mbom ye nyɛ Baguma a kĩ yalɛ “Oo” lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
47001020	Kitonɛkĩ ade ye nyɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma kĩ yalɛ “Oo” kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ ɛkpa ye fɔlɛtsa flee a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a. Ade foesũ bɔamu Baguma katsãmɛna Yesu Kristo akũ kalɛ kĩ, “Fɔya lɔmɔ” a.
47001021	Baguma mɔawɛ lɛkɛna kĩ bɔmɔ mi nkpã esipi nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna nɛ Kristo kamɛ. Ade Baguma a mɔawɛ lɛpau boe eyi lite,
47001022	eyi boe ɔsũ kĩ ye la boe, ade ɛkɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa edo nɛ boe kamɛ ndɛ kasipi nɛ fɔtsa flee a kĩ yaakpa boe a akũ a.
47001023	Baguma nyɛ yĩ ɔdansini, kitonɛkĩ enyina yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ mmɔ mi kɔnya, ade foesũ ntábuki ĩya nɛ Korinto a.
47001024	Bɔtáwɛ kĩ bɔahɛ mi nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ mitɛ mido a akũ, kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Mbom bɔakɛna adzuma mɔ mi ayekĩ míamɔ kawɔlɛ.
47002001	Nɛ foesũ nkɛna adzuni kĩ nláaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ayekĩ míawo ɔblɔ.
47002002	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ nfɔ̃ miwo ɔblɔ ni, bawei deĩ kĩ baado yĩ kawɔlɛ? Ade mi mɔapɛ a kĩ nfɔ̃ miwo ɔblɔ a.
47002003	Ade foesũ ntsɛlɛ ovoli a na mma mi a. Ntáwɛ kĩ maya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔa mi a kĩ kɛfɛta kĩ mido yĩ kawɔlɛ a miyaafɔ̃ nwo ɔblɔ. Ĩnyina yededeede kĩ ntɛ kawɔlɛ ade yĩ ni, mi malo kawɔlɛ ade mi.
47002004	Ntsɛlɛ ovoli a nɛ ɔhau, ɔwɔlɛ kabubuli mɔ babe pii kamɛ. Nnɛ́ yĩ kawɛ nyɛ kĩ mado mi kɔnyɔã, mbom mawɛ kĩ mimɔ miyi ɔsũ ayekĩ mawɛ mi a flee kalɛ.
47002005	Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti odi fɔ̃ odi wo ɔblɔ ni, nnɛ́ yĩ odi ɛfɔ̃ nwo ɔblɔ, mbom ntɛ nláasɛsɛ foe ni, mi badi kɔ̃ miwo ɔblɔ. Ntáwɛ kĩ mana ɔsĩ beblebee nɛ ye akũ.
47002006	Sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ mi bati pii mikpa ye a kpɔla.
47002007	Finyaakĩĩ ni, mikɔa tɔkpa a mite ye, mido ye kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ ɛláatɛnɛ ɔblɔ kawo beblebee, ɛyaatɔ flefle.
47002008	Nɛ foesũ make mi aduli kĩ mifɔ̃ ɛmɔ kĩ miawɛ ye kalɛ paa.
47002009	Ntsɛlɛ ovoli a na mma mi, kitonɛkĩ nwɛ kĩ manyi ayekĩ midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ mi sɔhuiɛ kamɛ, mɔ ayekĩ miakɛna nɛ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a akũ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
47002010	Ntɛ mikɔa odi tɔkpa mite ye ni, yĩ malo nkɔa nte ye. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ nkɔa oti tɔkpa nte, mɔ fusĩ malo kĩ nkɔa litsedi nte kɔ̃ ni, makɛna foe nɛ Kristo anɛ kamɛ nɛ mi sũ.
47002011	Nkɛna foe ayekĩ Abonsam lɛláakɔa tɛdake ɛnya mi akũ, kitonɛkĩ bunyina ye tisi a flee.
47002012	Kĩ ĩyaade lɛtsã nɛ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ Troa a, mmɔ́ kĩ boe Ɔlate binya osi ɛkpa ye adzuma kakɛna nɛ awã.
47002013	Lɛmɛ fɔha yĩ paa, kitonɛkĩ ntámɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Tito nɛ awã. Foesũ nkla bati a ntɛ̃ nnaa Makedonia.
47002014	Lɛmɛ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ! Kitonɛkĩ nɛ boe ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ ni, Baguma akpã boe ndɛ bati kĩ bipili be ndom aye nɛ Kristo akũ kanya kɔdza kamɛ. Baguma tsã boe akũ ɛfɔ̃ Kristo akũ fɔlɛtsa gba nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ ndɛ ayekĩ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ abɔa kanaa mɔ lugo.
47002015	Kalá bɔla ndɛ fɔtsa mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ Kristo kɔa ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma, ade bɔgba buko nɛ bikĩ bɛlamɛna nkpã katɛ kana, mɔ bikĩ baawɔ a kamɛ a.
47002016	Bɔla ndɛ nfiã kpitii kĩ yakɔ bati a kĩ baawɔ, lɛmɛ bɔla ndɛ ɔlɛ̃ klɔũklɔũ kakpa bikĩ baana nkpã katɛ a. Owei aapuli ɛkɛna adzuma kpale kĩĩ odu?
47002017	Boe kɔ̃ bɔlá ndɛ bati bɛbã pii kĩ bɛnɛɛ Baguma kalɛ a ndɛ kɔyaatɔ fɔtsa kĩ fɔlá kɔya mɔ kanɔ aye. Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ Baguma do boe sũ ni, bɔalɛ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ye anɛ kamɛ, ndɛ Kristo basumunɛ aye.
47003001	Katsa fɔatsa kĩ bubuki bɔapia boe akũ mbɔɛɛ? Kanɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkpa mi boe akũ adansiɛ tuvoli, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔtɛ te butomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ bati badi akɛna a?
47003002	Ade mi mɔawɛ a nyɛ tuvoli kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kĩ odi nyɛ odi aapuli enyi ɛkã lɛmɛ.
47003003	Foe kamɛ kpalɛ kĩ Kristo mɔawɛ lɛtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ ɛkpa boe bɔkɔa bɔma mi. Bɛtákɔa ovoli katsɛlɛ mui bɛtsɛlɛ ye, mbom bɛkɔa Baguma kĩ edeĩ nkpã a Hũhũ bɛtsɛlɛ foe. Bɛtátsɛlɛ ovoli a nɛ sileti akũ, mbom bɛtsɛlɛ ye nɛ batidziwa du akũ.
47003004	Bɔalɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ nɛ Kristo sũ, budeĩ kadzakɔ̃ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
47003005	Lɛtsama lɛláa boe kamɛ kĩ laafɔ̃ bɔlɛ kĩ bɔ́apuli bɔkɛna adzuma kĩĩ. Kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ budeĩ to Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
47003006	Ade ye lɛfɔ̃ kĩ bupuli bɔnya apam vɔɛ̃ basumunɛ, kĩ ɛnyɛ́ mbla a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi a, mbom bɔasum ekĩ Hũhũ kamɛ edeĩ a. Mbla a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ a tsɛ̃mɔ wuda lɛmɛ Hũhũ ade a kɔ̃ akpa nkpã.
47003007	Lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma kɔa mbla a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ nɛ boe tratra akũ yakpa Mose a ni, Baguma nyɛ ye kukũkpalɛ ɛtsa. Mose anɛ kamɛ kata muamua mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, mɔ kukũkpalɛ paa kĩ Israelfɔ tápuli bike anɛ nɛ ye akũ, titɔ kĩ kɔkadĩ malo. Ntɛ mbla a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ wuda a nɛ́ mɔ kukũkpalɛ mɔ ɔsĩ a ni,
47003008	kekɔ̃ ntɛ bɛkɔa Hũhũ a bakpa a, kukũkpalɛ a aana ɔsĩ kɔba paa.
47003009	Ntɛ osi a kĩ batsã ye akũ kana kɔtɔkaku ayamɔ kukũkpalɛ, kekɔ̃ osi a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ nkpã lɛláana kukũkpalɛ baũ ɛba!
47003010	Bɔalɛ foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ finyaa kukũkpalɛ a bɛ̃ kɔtɔnyade a, ade kukũkpalɛ a kĩ kɔna ɔsĩ kɔkɔɛ a yɛla a.
47003011	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ kukũkpalɛ na nɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛtábuna owi akũ ni, kekɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ laawa daa a kukũkpalɛ aana ɔsĩ kɔba.
47003012	Ayekĩ budeĩ kɔnɛte kĩĩ sũ ni, budeĩ ɔwɔlɛ kado paa.
47003013	Boe kɔ̃ bɔlá ndɛ Mose kĩ ɛkɔa lima esua anɛ kĩ Israelfɔ bɛtamɔ ye anɛ kamɛ kata muamua kĩ fɔlamɛna kadĩ a.
47003014	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, be adzuni kamɛ tábinya kɛyawo nviã. Ntɛ bakã tuvoli kɔɛ a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a malo ni, lima mɔapɛ a buki lasua be anɛ. Ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ odi mɔ baanyɛ lima a na.
47003015	Nɛ nviã fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ malo ni, ntɛ bɛkã Mose ovoli kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a, anɛ kasua fɔtsa a buki fɔasua be adzuni.
47003016	Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi muniki ɛya nɛ Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃ ni, baanyɛ limakũ a nɛ ye anɛ.
47003017	Finyaakĩĩ ni, “Ɔlate a” nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ nyɛ Hũhũ a, ade awã kĩ boe Ɔlate Hũhũ deĩ ni, kawɛya lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ awã.
47003018	Foesũ bɛnyɛ limakũ a nɛ boe flee anɛ, ade bɔanyɛ boe Ɔlate kukũkpalɛ a katsa yededeede a. Ɛlamɛna boe kadani kanamɛna ye kutidu odu a kamɛ, ade boe kukũkpalɛ lɛmɛ ade nɛ ode kabu a.
47004001	Ayekĩ Baguma mɔ́ boe kɔnya, ɛkɔa ɔsum adzuma kĩĩ edo nɛ boe awɛ sũ ni, akpɔ láveli boe.
47004002	Bɔfɔnɛ fɔtsa bɛlawa mɔ fɔnyɔãtsa flee awɛ buyi nɛ ɔɔ́wɛ̃. Bɔákɛna lɛtsama nɛ kakɛ osi akũ, ade bɔádani Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kalɛ a. Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, budzi nkpã wĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, ade bɔabɔa mbɔdi kĩ boe kadzi kamɛ kiwo odi nyɛ odi anɛ a.
47004003	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ bɔalɛ a nyɛ fɔtsa kɔlawa ni, fɔnyɛ fɔtsa kɔlawa fɔkpa bikĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ kayɛla osi akũ a.
47004004	Katinya kĩĩ kamɛ oti kpa a kɔ bati a kĩ bɛtátɛ bido a adzuni. Esua be anɛ kĩ bɛtamɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a ɔhaĩ a nɛ Kristo kukũkpalɛ akũ a, kĩ kɔla ndɛ Baguma kutidu pɛpɛɛpɛ a kĩ kɔako nɛ be akũ a.
47004005	Kitonɛkĩ bɔáde lɛtsã nɛ boe mɔawɛ akũ, mbom bɔade lɛtsã nɛ Yesu Kristo boe Ɔlate akũ, ade boe kɔ̃ bɔnyɛ mi basumunɛ nɛ Yesu sũ a.
47004006	Baguma a kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔhaĩ ɛvɔlɛ eto ɔtũ kamɛ” a, ade ye nyɛ Baguma mɔapɛ a kĩ ye ɔhaĩ a ko nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ɛkpa boe kadikanyi kĩ bɔmɔ Baguma kukũkpalɛ nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ a buyi ɔsũ.
47004007	Lɛmɛ boe a kĩ boe kamɛ hũhũ fɔtsa mɔ kɔya kĩĩ deĩ a, bɔla ndɛ tibute fubui aye. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ yatsa kĩ kɔbɛ̃ kpale fle a nyɛ ye Baguma kude, nnɛ́ boe kude kɔanɛ.
47004008	Lɔkɔ pii bawɛ boe kado nɛ ɔhau kamɛ lɛmɛ baánya boe akũ, ade fɔkɔ fudi bakɛna boe adzuni basabasa lɛmɛ akpɔ láveli boe da.
47004009	Bakesĩnɛ pii deĩ nɛ boe akũ, lɛmɛ budeĩ ɔkɔba odi kĩ yaálo kafɔnɛ boe, ade fɔkɔ fudi babɔa boe kamuni kapila boe lɛmɛ baákɔ boe.
47004010	Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ boe sukɛna amɔ lubo ndɛ Yesu wuda tsɛfã a aye, ayekĩ baamɔ ye nkpã kadzi a nɛ boe sukɛna kamɛ.
47004011	Nɛ boe nkpã flee kadzi kamɛ ni, wuda ado boe libe daa nɛ Yesu sũ, ayekĩ baamɔ ye nkpã nɛ boe sukɛna kĩ saaku a kamɛ.
47004012	Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ wuda lamɛna adzuma kakɛna nɛ boe kamɛ, ade nkpã lɛmɛ lamɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ a.
47004013	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nlɛ kɔdzɛla kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ndo.” Nɛ hũhũ mɔapɛ a katɛkado onukpɛ̃ ni, boe malo bɔalɛ kɔdzɛla kitonɛkĩ bɔtɛ budo.
47004014	Bunyina kĩ Baguma a kĩ ɛdzɛla boe Ɔlate Yesu edzi nkpã a aadzɛla boe malo, lɔkɔa ɛkpã bɔmɔ mi lodo ɛnamɛna Yesu anɛ kamɛ.
47004015	Bɔakɛna fukĩĩ bamɛ flee nɛ mi kalɛ sũ. Ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma sɛmɛkalɛ lamɛna bati pii sɛkɛ̃ kawo a, ade aye baakɔa kɔlɛkanyɛ mɔ mpaɛbɔ bɛkpa Baguma nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ kamɛ a.
47004016	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, akpɔ láveli boe dadaada. Titɔ kĩ boe sukɛna kĩĩ lamɛna kavɔ̃ malo ni, boe hũhũ a kɔ̃ ana nkpã vɔɛ̃ luwi daa.
47004017	Lubokamɔ kabii lukũ kĩĩ aakpa boe kukũkpalɛ kĩ fɔláana kawũna da, ade fɔ́aba lubo a kĩ bɔamɔ a.
47004018	Boe anɛ líteĩ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɔamɔ a akũ, mbom futeĩ nɛ fukĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ bɔapuli kamɔ mɔ anɛ waa fɔkpa nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ, lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔláapuli bɔmɔ́ mɔ anɛ a aana daa.
47005001	Kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ ntɛ biveli boe tite akũ lɛpɛ kĩ budzi nɛ de kamɛ, kĩ de nyɛ boe sukɛna a, Baguma aakpa boe kɔla vɔɛ̃ kĩ ye mɔawɛ eke nɛ ode budzi nɛ koe kamɛ daa.
47005002	Finyaa bɔawɛya kake, ade boe kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nyɛ kĩ Baguma ɛkɔa boe ode tɔtɔ sukɛna a esua boe akũ.
47005003	Ntɛ ɛkɔa se esua boe akũ ni, bɔláadzi ɔdzɔ.
47005004	Kĩ budzi nɛ tite akũ lɛpɛ kĩĩ kamɛ sũ ni, bɔawɛya kake kĩ boe fɔlɔtsa tɛ́nɛ ɔlɔmɛ. Nnɛ́ kawɛ bɔawɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ tite akũ sukɛna kĩĩ nɛ boe akũ, mbom bɔawɛ kĩ Baguma ɛkɔa ode side a edo boe ayekĩ sukɛna a kĩ saaku a, aadani flefle sɛkɛna sikĩ saana nkpã.
47005005	Baguma nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛmanɛ boe ɛkpa kadani kĩĩ, ade ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ ɛkpa boe ndɛ kasipi nɛ fɔtsa flee a kĩ ɛmanɛ eyi boe a akũ a.
47005006	Foesũ bɔado boe akũ kɔbɛ̃ luwi daa. Bunyina kĩ ntɛ busila budzi nɛ tɔtɔ kĩ tɛnyɛ sukɛna tɔtɔ kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, bɔvɛlɛ akũ nɛ boe Ɔlate ɔwɛ̃.
47005007	Kitonɛkĩ katɛkado bɔkɔa budzi nkpã, nnɛ́ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔamɔ mɔ anɛ a.
47005008	Budeĩ ɔwɔlɛ, ade bɔawɛ mbom kĩ bɔanɛ nɛ boe sukɛna tɔtɔ kamɛ bɔnaadzi nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃.
47005009	Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛbɛ̃ flee nyɛ kĩ, bɔawɛ kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ laawo boe Ɔlate anɛ, ntɛ budzi nɛ boe tɔtɔ kamɛ nɛ awĩ ĩye bɔnaa ye sɛkɛ̃.
47005010	Kitonɛkĩ boe flee bɔ́anadza nɛ Kristo anɛ kamɛ, ɛdzɛmɔ boe. Odi nyɛ odi aatɛ kɔtɔkase nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a onukpɛ̃, ntɛ fɔnyɛ tuwĩ ĩye tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ ye katinya nkpã kadzi onukpɛ̃.
47005011	Bunyina ayekĩ kɛnɛ kĩ buvila boe Ɔlate, foesũ bɔabɔa mbɔdi kado bati bɛbã kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bivila ye. Baguma kɔ̃ nyina ayekĩ bɔla yededeede, ade matɛ kado kĩ mi malo minyina yĩ nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ fii kamɛ a.
47005012	Bɔlámɛna boe akũ kabuki kamu katsa mi, mbom bɔawɛ kĩ bɔakpa mi osi minyi lɛtsa sũ kĩ mita akũ nɛ boe akũ. Bɔkɛna foe lɔmɔ ayekĩ míapuli mina mbuayɛ mikpa bikĩ badã oti kutitse kapia nɛ ye akũ, kĩ nnɛ́ ye ɔbla badã a.
47005013	Ntɛ bati badi alɛ kĩ boe fɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade ni, Baguma sũ fubu kade. Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe fɔlɔ kamɛ waa yedede ni, mi kalɛ sũ fɔla lɔmɔ.
47005014	Kristo ɔdɔ anya boe akũ, kitonɛkĩ finyaa bɔmɔ́ buyi ɔsũ kĩ oti mɔapɛ liku nɛ bati flee lɔlɔ, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ bati flee liku nɛ ye wuda a kamɛ.
47005015	Eku nɛ bati flee lɔlɔ, ayekĩ bikĩ bidzi a lɛláabuki bidzi nkpã bɛkpa be akũ, mbom baadzi bɛkpa ye odi pɛ a kĩ eku, kĩ bɛdzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ be kalɛ sũ a.
47005016	Foesũ kito finyaa kanaa ni, bɔláabuki bɔdzɛmɔ odima bɔkɔ ye kɔtɔ nɛ otidziwa kakɔna onukpɛ̃. Titɔ kĩ bɔdzɛmɔ Kristo tɔ̃ nɛ bati adzuni onukpɛ̃ malo ni, bubuki bɔákɛna foe.
47005017	Ntɛ odi kɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo ni, ɛdani oti vɔɛ̃, oti kɔɛ a naa, ɔvɔɛ̃ lɛya.
47005018	Baguma lɛkɛna fukĩĩ flee, ɛtsã Kristo akũ ɛdani boe, ye bakesĩnɛ a ɛkɛna bakɔba, ade ɛkpa boe adzuma kĩ boe malo bɔkɛna bati bɛbã ye bakɔba a.
47005019	Boe fɔlɛtsa nyɛ kĩ Baguma tsɛ̃ Kristo akũ yalɔla bɛmɔ batidziwa flee kayite bɛdani ye bakɔba. Baguma tátɛ batidziwa tɔkpa eyi, mbom ɛkpa boe ɔlɛdo kĩ bude lɛtsã kĩ ɛlɔla bɛmɔ batidziwa flee kayite.
47005020	Foesũ bido boe kĩ bɔlɛ kalɛ bɔkpa Kristo. Fɔkɛna ndɛ Baguma awɛ lamɛna bati kadɛ katsãmɛna boe akũ. Bɔake mi aduli nɛ Kristo dĩ akũ kĩ mifɔ̃ Baguma ɛdani mi ndɛ ye bakesĩnɛ a ɛkɛna ye bakɔba.
47005021	Titɔ kĩ Kristo tákɛna tɔkpa tidima malo ni, Baguma fɔ̃ ɛlɔ boe tɔkpa ɛnamɛna ayekĩ ntɛ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye ni, boe malo bɔ́anya bati kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
47006001	Foesũ kĩ bɔmɔ Baguma bɔakɛna adzuma sũ ni, bɔake mi aduli kĩ mitafɔ̃ kɔnya a kĩ Baguma mɔ́ mi a lɛkɛna fɔtsa pupulidza.
47006002	Mitse lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ, “Kĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ mmɔ mi kɔnya a, ntse mi, kĩ luwi a wo ɔtɔ kĩ matɛ mi nkpã a, mbumɔ mi.” Mitse! Ade finyaa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔatɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a, nviã nyɛ luwi a kĩ ɛtɛ boe nkpã!
47006003	Bɔáwɛ kĩ odima amɔ nfumusu nɛ boe adzuma akũ, foesũ bɔáwɛ kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa kpa lidima kĩ laasua odi osi.
47006004	Mbom nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔakɛna kamɛ ni, bɔatsa kĩ Baguma basumunɛ bɔanɛ. Nɛ foesũ bɔado ɔwɔlɛ katɛ ɔhau, kamɔ lubo mɔ ohiã mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ.
47006005	Bibo boe, bido boe nɛ kɔla, bido ɔtutũ nɛ boe kamɛ, bɛfɔ̃ bɔkɛna adzuma bɔtɛ̃ ɔbɛ̃, ade budzi tida katawa mɔ katanya malo a.
47006006	Nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ ni, bɔbɔa mbɔdi kĩ bɔanya bati kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma anɛ. Bɔkɔa boe kadikanyi, ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mɔ boe sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna bɔatsa kĩ Baguma basumunɛ bɔanɛ. Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔ ɔdɔ dzununuunu,
47006007	boe ɔnɔkɔali ɔlɛdo a, mɔ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ abumɔ boe. Bɔnɛɛ kadzi kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ a ndɛ boe kawũkanɔ fɔtsa kĩ bɔkɔa bɔanɔ kawũ, ade bɔakɔa foe bɔapili boe lɔlɔ lɛmɛ a.
47006008	Bakpa boe obu, badi asupa boe, badi avũna boe badi lɛmɛ amu boe. Badi adã boe ndɛ bavãlɛvã bɔanɛ, lɛmɛ bɔalɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a.
47006009	Bakɛna boe ndɛ bati kĩ binyína, lɛmɛ bati flee nyina boe. Babu boe ndɛ bati kĩ bɛlá nkpã lɛmɛ budeĩ nkpã. Titɔ kĩ bavɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ malo ni, bɛtákɔ boe,
47006010	titɔ kĩ bido boe nɛ ɔbɔdɔ kamɛ malo ni, bɔamɔ kawɔlɛ luwi daa. Bɔadã ndɛ ahiãfɔ lɛmɛ bɔafɔ̃ bati pii akɛna asikafɔ. Bɔkɛna ndɛ bɔlá lɛtsama lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ade boe deĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a.
47006011	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Korintofɔ, bubinya boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ mɔ ɔdɔ bɔkpa mi, ade bubi mi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a yededeede.
47006012	Nnɛ́ boe lɛtányɛ boe ɔdɔ kanya, mbom mi lɔkɔa mi ɔdɔ mikɔla boe.
47006013	Foesũ finyaa mabi mi tuwuli ndɛ yĩ babi aye. Minyɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mitsa boe ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔakɛna kakpa mi a.
47006014	Mitakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a. Tuwĩ kakɛna mɔ tɔkpa kakɛna aapuli tɛkpɔta tɛkɛna lɛtsa mɔa mbɔɛɛ? Nde ɔhaĩ mɔ ɔtũ aapuli bidzi bɛkpɔta?
47006015	Nde Kristo mɔ Belial baviɔ̃ a aapuli bɛkɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa? Litsa nyɛ lɛtsa mɔa kĩ lideĩ nɛ ɔtɛ odonɛ mɔ ekĩ ɛtátɛ edo kayite?
47006016	Nde Baguma asɔli kɔla mɔ kuviɔ̃la aapuli bɛkɛna ɔmɔa? Kitonɛkĩ boe nyɛ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a asɔli fɔla! Baguma mɔawɛ lɛ kĩ, “Maake tɔtɔ nɛ yĩ bati sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa maadzi nɛ be kamɛ. Maanya be Baguma lɔkɔa bɛnya yĩ bati.”
47006017	Foesũ boe Ɔlate a lɛ kĩ, “Midzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, minyɛ mi akũ nɛ be kamɛ. Mitakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ tákpalɛ, lɔkɔa maatɛ mi atuu.
47006018	Maanya mi ɔlɛga ade mi míanya yĩ babinyole mɔ babitsole a. Ade aye boe Ɔlate Mɔ Kɔbɛ̃ Flee a lɛ a.”
47007001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ayekĩ bɛkpa boe kɔnɛte nɛ fukĩĩ flee akũ sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔkpalɛ boe akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lado sukɛna mɔ hũhũ efĩĩ a kamɛ. Mifɔ̃ boe kadzi kamɛ flee kɛdã yedede nɛ Baguma kavila kamɛ.
47007002	Minyɛ mi ɔdɔ mitsa boe. Bɔtáfum odima, bɔtábula odima kadzi kamɛ kade, ade bɔtásisi odima lɛmɛ a.
47007003	Ntálɛ fukĩĩ kĩ makɔ mi kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ nlɛ ĩnyamɛna lɔtɔ a, mitɛ kɔya mikpa boe paa kĩ ntɛ fɔnyɛ wuda malo ni, bɔmɔ mi aaku, ade ntɛ fɔnyɛ nkpã lɛmɛ ni, bɔmɔ mi aadzi nkpã.
47007004	Ntɛ mi ndo paa ade mapia akũ nɛ mi akũ lɛmɛ a. Ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi yĩ. Nɛ boe lubo kamɔ flee kamɛ ni, mbuki ndeĩ ɔwɔlɛ paa, ade kawɔlɛ ade yĩ paa a.
47007005	Kĩ bɔyawo Makedonia malo ni, bɔtána kawɛya kadima. Bɔmɔ́ lubo nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, bati do boe tɛdzɛ ade libe na nɛ boe kamɛ a.
47007006	Lɛmɛ Baguma kĩ yado bikĩ akpɔ veli be kɔbɛ̃ a, do boe ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Tito kaya kamɛ.
47007007	Nnɛ́ Tito kaya a odi lido boe ɔwɔlɛ, mbom ye adansiɛ a kĩ edi nɛ mi akũ kĩ mido ye ɔwɔlɛ a lɛmɛ bu. Ebi boe ayekĩ miwɛ paa kĩ miamɔ yĩ, ayekĩ fuwo mi kalɔɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a akũ, mɔ ayekĩ mimanɛ akũ midzi kĩ míadza nɛ yĩ liti mipili yĩ lɔlɔ. Nɛ foesũ finyaa mamɔ kawɔlɛ kaba kɔkɔɛ a.
47007008	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ovoli a kĩ ntsɛlɛ mma mi a fɔ̃ miwo ɔbɔdɔ malo ni, fɔtáwo yĩ kalɔɛ kĩ ntsɛlɛ ye. Fɔ́apuli fuwo yĩ kalɔɛ kitonɛkĩ mmɔ́ kĩ lɔkɔ lukũ odi kamɛ mɔ miwo ɔbɔdɔ.
47007009	Lɛmɛ finyaa, kawɔlɛ ade yĩ, nnɛ́ kĩ ndo mi ɔbɔdɔ a sũ, mbom mi ɔbɔdɔ kawo a fɔ̃ midani mi kadzi kamɛ. Baguma kawɛ fɔanɛ kĩ miwo ɔbɔdɔ, foesũ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔkɛna a nyɛ nfasɔ mbom fɔkpa mi.
47007010	Kitonɛkĩ ɔbɔdɔ kawo a kĩ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ afɔ̃ oti adani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ade fɔakpã ye kanamɛna daa nkpã a kamɛ a. Fukĩnaa láwo kalɔɛ! Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti wo ɔbɔdɔ nɛ katinya kamɛ kawɛ onukpɛ̃ kɔ̃ ni, wuda fɔavɛlɛ kayamɛna.
47007011	Midã ayekĩ ɔbɔdɔ kĩĩ odu, kĩ Baguma awɛ a akɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ! Fɔfɔ̃ miayili akũ kakɛna fɔtsa wĩ, ade fɔfɔ̃ miakpalɛ mi akũ a. Fɔfɔ̃ miana kalɔkpa nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔtákpɔla akũ, fɔfɔ̃ miavila ade fɔfɔ̃ miadã anɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a. Fɔfɔ̃ miana ovio nɛ fɔtsa kakɛna kamɛ, ade miawɛ kĩ bɛvɛlɛ oti a kĩ ɛkɛna tɔkpa a sɔtɔ a. Nɛ foe flee kamɛ ni, minyɛ mi akũ miatsa kĩ mitádi mfumsu nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kamɛ.
47007012	Foesũ titɔ kĩ ntsɛlɛ ovoli a na malo ni, nnɛ́ oti a kĩ efum, ĩye ekĩ ye bifum a sũ ntsɛlɛ ye. Mbom ntsɛlɛ ye matsa ayekĩ miakɔa mi akũ flee kakpa boe a nɛ Baguma anɛ.
47007013	Ade foesũ bɔkado ɔwɔlɛ a. Nnɛ́ ɔwɔlɛ kado odi bɔna, kawɔlɛ de boe baũ nɛ kawɔlɛ a kĩ Tito mɔ́ nɛ mi akũ a sũ, kitonɛkĩ ebi boe ayekĩ mi flee mifɔ̃ ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi ye a.
47007014	Nkɔa mi mpia ntsa ye, ade mitádo yĩ kɔnyɔã lɛmɛ a. Bubi mi ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a, ade ayea kapia a kĩ bupia bɔtsa Tito a lɛmɛ yanya ɔnɔkɔali a.
47007015	Ye ɔdɔ nɛ mi akũ ade nɛ ode kabu, ntɛ ete anɛ nɛ ayekĩ mi flee miwɛ kĩ míakɛna nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa akũ, mɔ ayekĩ mitɛ ye atuu nɛ obu mɔ kukũtila kamɛ a.
47007016	Kawɔlɛ ade yĩ, kitonɛkĩ maapuli nkɔa anɛ nte nɛ mi akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ.
47008001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ minyi lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma tsãmɛna ye kɔnya kamɔ kamɛ ɛkɛna nɛ Makedonia tɛsɔli a kamɛ.
47008002	Bɛsɔ be bɛdã nɛ lubo kamɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kamɛ, lɛmɛ fude be kawɔlɛ baũ, foesũ titɔ kĩ ahiãfɔ banɛ malo ni, bite fɔtsa mɔ kawɔlɛ.
47008003	Maapuli nlɛ pipiipi kĩ bite fɔtsa ndɛ ayekĩ baapuli, malo kɔlaa ni, bite fɔba be kɔbɛ̃. Nɛ be mɔawɛ kawɛ onukpɛ̃ bite fɔtsa faa.
47008004	Bike boe aduli mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɔkpa be osi be malo bibumɛna Baguma bade a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea bakɛna adzuma a.
47008005	Fukĩ bɛkɛna kĩĩ bɛ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ bute anɛ. Lɛtsa lɛtɔnyade nyɛ kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa boe Ɔlate, ade ke liti a, bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa boe nɛ Baguma kawɛ onukpɛ̃.
47008006	Foesũ budo Tito, kĩ ye liyi adzuma kĩĩ kayɔ a kɔbɛ̃, kĩ ɛnaa lɔtɔ mɔ ye adzuma, lɔkɔa ebumɛna mi miwũna ɔdɔ adzuma titiliwu kĩĩ.
47008007	Finyaa minyɛ bati kĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ. Mi katɛkado, mi kɔdzɛla kalɛ, mɔ mi kadikanyi awo anɛ. Miayili akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ ade miawɛ boe kalɛ a. Nɛ foesũ bɔawɛ kĩ minya lɔtɔ nɛ kɔnyakamɔ adzuma kĩĩ lɛmɛ kamɛ.
47008008	Nnɛ́ mbla adima masui nkpa mi, mbom nɛ ayekĩ bati bɛbã lamɛna akũ kayili kĩ bakpa kabumɛna sũ ni, mawɛ ĩnyi ntɛ mi ɔdɔ a kĩ mideĩ a lɛmɛ kpɔla.
47008009	Minyina boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔnya kamɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa boe, ade titɔ kĩ ɛnyɛ osikani malo ni, ɛkɛna ye akũ ndɛ ohiãni nɛ mi kalɛ sũ, ayekĩ yaakɛna boe asikafɔ nɛ ye tihiã a kamɛ.
47008010	Yĩ kakɔna nyɛ kĩ fɔnɛnɛ kĩ miwũna adzuma a kĩ miyi kayɔ katukɔɛ a. Mi nyɛ́ bati batɔnyade kĩ biyi kayɔ, ade minya batɔnyade malo kĩ bitunɔ kĩ baakpa a.
47008011	Finyaa mikɛna adzuma a minamɛna lɔtɔ lɔkɔa miwũna ye! Miyili akũ miwũna ye ndɛ ayekĩ mikɔa miyi ye kayɔ a. Mikɔa futetsa a kĩ mideĩ a mikɛna adzuma a.
47008012	Ntɛ futo odi ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ paa kĩ yaate fɔtsa ni, Baguma aatɛ fukĩ ɛna ɛkpa a, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ fukĩ ɛlá a.
47008013	Nlámɛna bati bɛbã fɔlɔtsa akũ katinya kĩ makɔa ndo mi fude ɔlɔmɛ,
47008014	lɛmɛ ayekĩ mideĩ fɔtsa pii nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ sũ ni, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ miabumɔ bikĩ fusĩ be a. Ke liti ntɛ kɛyaasĩ mi, mɔ bideĩ fɔtsa pii ni, baabumɛna mi. Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ ni, mi akũ kabumɛna a aaketi.
47008015	Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Ekĩ ɛkpɔta fɔtsa beblebee tána fublusu, ade ekĩ ɛkpɔta kabii lɛmɛ tásĩ lɛtsama a.”
47008016	Bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ ɛfɔ̃ Tito bɔa mbɔdi yabumɔ mi ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔawɛ kĩ bɔakpa mi kabumɛna.
47008017	Kĩ bubi ye kĩ ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, etunɔ mɔ kawɔlɛ. Lɛmɛ fɔnyɛ ye kawɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ yaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
47008018	Budo bɛmɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃nyole, kĩ tɛsɔli bati a flee akpa obu paa nɛ ye Baguma fɔlɛtsa kalɛ kamɛ a kĩ etomɔ ye.
47008019	Lɛtsa a kĩ libu nyɛ kĩ tɛsɔli a lɛnyɛ ye, bitunɔ lɛmɛ kĩ ɛtsã etomɔ boe bɔkɛna ɔdɔ adzuma a fudo boe Ɔlate obu, lɔkɔa fɔtsa lɛmɛ kĩ bɔwɛ kĩ bɔakpa bati bɛbã kabumɛna.
47008020	Bɔadã kadã wĩ kĩ odima lɛláayavia boe kadi etomɛna ayekĩ bɔakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ futetsa kĩĩ akũ adzuma.
47008021	Boe botaɛ nyɛ kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, nnɛ́ nɛ boe Ɔlate odi anɛ, mbom mɔ batidziwa lɛmɛ anɛ.
47008022	Foesũ budo boe ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ etomɔ be. Bɔsɔ ye bɔdã lɔkɔ pii ade bɔmɔ́ kĩ yabɔa mbɔdi nɛ fɔtsa pii kakɛna kamɛ a. Ade finyaa, kĩ ɛtɛ mi edo paa sũ ni, akũ asĩ ye paa kĩ yayaakpa mi kabumɛna.
47008023	Tito kɔ̃ ni, ɛnyɛ yĩ ɔkɔba paa kĩ bɔakɛna adzuma bubumɔ mi. Boe bawaɛ̃nyole bɛbã a kĩ bitomɔ ye a kɔ̃ ni, ade be dzɛ̃ nɛ tɛsɔli a kadzakɔ̃ bɛkɔa kamu bakpa Kristo a.
47008024	Minyɛ mi ɔdɔ mitsa be, ayekĩ tɛsɔli a flee aatɛ bido, binyi lɛmɛ kĩ boe kukũpia nɛ mi akũ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
47009001	Fɔtásĩ kɔlaa kĩ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli nɛ futetsa a kĩ miakɔa kama Baguma bade a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea tite akũ a akũ.
47009002	Ĩnyina kĩ miawɛ kĩ miakpa kabumɛna, foesũ nkɔa mi mpia ntsa bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Makedonia tite akũ a. Nlɛ kĩ, “Boe bawaɛ̃ nɛ Akaia tite akũ a manɛ akũ kĩ bakpa kabumɛna anɛ katukɔɛ.” Mi mbɔdi nɛ foe akũ fɔ̃ fi wo nɛ be sɛkɛ mɔa pii kamɛ.
47009003	Finyaakĩĩ mado boe bawaɛ̃ kĩĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ baamɔ kĩ boe kukũpia nɛ mi akũ nɛ futetsa akũ a lɛnyɛ́ kɔdzɛla pupulidza. Lɛmɛ ndɛ ayekĩ mbi be kĩ mimanɛ akũ mɔ mi fubumɛnatsa a, mawɛ kĩ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ lɔmɔ.
47009004	Lɛmɛ ntɛ Makedoniafɔ aatomɔ yĩ bɛyaamɔ kĩ mitámanɛ akũ mikpa futetsa a kɔ̃ ni, kɔnyɔã aawo boe, lɛmɛ kɔnyɔã baũ aawo mi kɔba, kitonɛkĩ baakɔna kĩ bɔtɛ́nɛ anɛ kate nɛ mi akũ.
47009005	Foesũ nkɔna kĩ fusĩ kĩ mapiã boe bawaɛ̃ kĩĩ bɛnya yĩ lɔtɔ lɔkɔa bɛyaamanɛ futetsa a kĩ milɛ miyi kĩ míakpa a. Futetsa kĩĩ aakpɔta ntɛ ĩya, ade fɔ́atsa kĩ mi ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ futo sũ mikpa, fɔnyɛ́ fukĩ bɛhɛ mi kĩ mikpa.
47009006	Mite anɛ kĩ oti kĩ edu funitsã kabii ni, funitsã sukuloo yaana, ekĩ edu funitsã pii aanyɛ funitsã baũ.
47009007	Foesũ odi nyɛ odi ɛkpa ndɛ ayekĩ ɛwɛ futo ye kamɛ, ɛtakɛna foe mɔ kalɔɛ ĩye kĩ fɔnyɛ ɔhɛ kĩ ɛkɛna sũ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma awɛ oti a kĩ yakpa fɔtsa mɔ kawɔlɛ.
47009008	Baguma aapuli ɛkpa mi fɔtsa ɛba fukĩ misĩ, ayekĩ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ míana fɔtsa a kĩ misĩ mikpa mi akũ a, mina fublusu mikɔa mikɛna tudzuma wĩ tidi nyɛ tidi.
47009009	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Yakpa ahiãfɔ fɔtsa faa ade ye sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna waa daa a.”
47009010	Baguma kĩ yakpa okuani fudutsa mɔ funitsã kĩ yanya, aakpa mi fudutsa flee a kĩ misĩ a, ɛfɔ̃ fubo anɛ fɔkpa mi funitsã beblebee ayekĩ míakɔa mikɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ tudzuma pii.
47009011	Baguma aafɔ̃ mina akũ fɔtsa daa, mipuli mikakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, ayekĩ bati pii aanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ futetsa a kĩ bɛtɛ bitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ a sũ.
47009012	Kitonɛkĩ kabumɛna a kĩ mikpa a ni, nnɛ́ Baguma bati a odi kasĩ onukpɛ̃ mipi, mbom fɔfɔ̃ bati pii anyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ paa.
47009013	Lɛtsa a kĩ laato mi ɔsum kĩĩ kamɛ aafɔ̃ bati pii limu Baguma, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a mido, mikɛna nɛ ke akũ, ade mikɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ kĩ mite fɔtsa mikpa be mɔ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ a.
47009014	Foesũ baakɔa ɔdɔ kĩ eto ɔwɔlɛ dzununuunu kamɛ bɛbɔa mpaɛ bɛkpa mi, kitonɛkĩ Baguma mɔ́ mi kɔnya pii.
47009015	Mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ ye futetsa a kĩ ɛkpa boe, kĩ bɔláapuli bɔnyɛ foe kayɔ sũ a!
47010001	Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lamɛna mi aduli kake. Ade yĩ bati alɛ kĩ ĩnyɛ oti dɔwa ntɛ ndeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ nláa mi sɛkɛ̃ kɔ̃ ni, ndeĩ awũni. Ntsɛ̃ Kristo akũ kadɔla mɔ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ kamɛ,
47010002	make mi aduli kĩ ntɛ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, mitafɔ̃ ĩyaana awũni, kitonɛkĩ matɛ kado kĩ maapuli nna awũni paa nɛ bikĩ balɛ kĩ katinya liti katomɛna sũ bɔakɛna adzuma kĩĩ akũ a.
47010003	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ katinya kamɛ budzi, lɛmɛ bɔánɔ kawũ nɛ katinya kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ onukpɛ̃.
47010004	Kawũkanɔ fɔtsa a kĩ bɔnɛɛ bɔanɔ a lɛnyɛ́ katinya kamɛ fude, mbom fɔnyɛ Baguma fude a kĩ fudeĩ kɔbɛ̃, kĩ bɔkɔa bɔabubuli okesĩnɛ fudzikɔ̃ mɔ ɔsĩ a.
47010005	Bɔabula fɔvã kama fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bati avɛlɛ a kade. Bɔawɔla lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ latsa kapia kĩ fɔasua Baguma kanyi osi. Bɔapi adzuni adi nyɛ adi ndɛ ayekĩ bapili bati nɛ kawũ kamɛ kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ Kristo kawɛ akũ.
47010006	Ntɛ mikɔa mi akũ flee mikpa boe, mɔ miatse boe ɔlɛdo ni, boe malo bɔmanɛ akũ bɔkpa kĩ bɔ́avɛlɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna atɔ ɔsĩ a sɔtɔ.
47010007	Miadã oti anɛ kakɛna fɔtsa. Odi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ yabu ye akũ kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo ode mbɔɛɛ? Ntɛ aye ni, mifɔ̃ owula ebuki ɛkɔna ye akũ ɛdã, kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo ode a, ade aye boe malo bɔnyɛ Kristo bade a.
47010008	Kitonɛkĩ kɔnyɔã lákɔ yĩ, ntɛ ntɛ́nɛ kapia beblebee nɛ otumi a kĩ boe Ɔlate kpa boe a sũ. Ɛkpa boe otumi kĩ bɔkɔa bɔdɔɔla mi mibo anɛ, nnɛ́ kĩ bɔkɔa bubula mi kade.
47010009	Ntáwɛ kĩ fɔkɛna mi ndɛ mado mi libe mɔ tuvoli kĩ ntsɛlɛ a.
47010010	Badi aalɛ kĩ, “Paulo tuvoli kamɛ fɔlɛtsa deĩ ɔsĩ, fudeĩ kɔbɛ̃ malo, lɛmɛ ntɛ ye mɔawɛ a edeĩ nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ kɔ̃ ni, ɛlá ɔsĩ ade ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ lɛmɛ lányɛnɛ bati akũ!”
47010011	Bati a na odu binu foe kayɔ, kĩ kavɛmɛna kadima lɛláa lɛtsa a kĩ bɔatsɛlɛ kado nɛ boe tuvoli kamɛ ntɛ budeĩ mɔ lugo, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔ́akɛna ntɛ budeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a kamɛ.
47010012	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, bɔláawɛ kĩ bɔakɔ akũ bɔbɔa mɔ ĩye bɔkɔna mɔ bati a kĩ bamu be akũ beblebee a. Badzimbifɔ paa banɛ! Bideĩ be mɔawɛ tisi kĩ te akũ batsã kakɔna akũ kadã, foesũ badzɛmɔ be akũ nɛ be mɔawɛ tisi a akũ.
47010013	Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ ni, boe kukũpia lɛláanyina ɔbɛ̃. Mbom kɔ́ana nɛ awã kĩ Baguma yi ɛkpa nɛ boe adzuma kakɛna kamɛ, ade boe adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ lɛmɛ bu a.
47010014	Nɛ ayekĩ mideĩ nɛ kakɔ a kĩ Baguma tsua ɛkpa boe a kamɛ sũ ni, kĩ bɔkɔa Kalɛ Wĩ nɛ Kristo akũ a bɔama mi a, bɔtányina bɔnaa tɛbɛ̃ a liti.
47010015	Foesũ bɔápia nɛ adzuma a kĩ bati bɛbã kɛna binyina tɛbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma yi ɛkpa boe a akũ. Mbom bɔadã anɛ kĩ mi katɛkado aabo anɛ, lɔkɔa bɔ́apuli bɔkɛna adzuma baũ bɔnaa lɔtɔ nɛ mi kamɛ, nɛ awã kĩ Baguma kpa boe ekpula a.
47010016	Ke liti a, bɔ́apuli bunyina mi bɔnaade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ fude bɛbã kamɛ, ade fɔláasĩ kĩ bɔapia nɛ adzuma a kĩ bati bɛbã kɛna kɔkɔɛ nɛ be kakɔ akũ a.
47010017	Lɛmɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ odi awɛ epia ni, kɛnɛ kĩ epia nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate kɛna a akũ.”
47010018	Kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ oti a kĩ yamu ye mɔawɛ akũ a nyɛ oti wĩ, mbom oti a kĩ boe Ɔlate amu nyɛ oti wĩ.
47011001	Mawɛ kĩ mina ɔwɔlɛ mikpa yĩ, titɔ kĩ míadã kĩ ndzimbi sukuloo malo. Make mi aduli, mitɛ foe lɔmɔ mi kpa yĩ.
47011002	Manɔ lineke nɛ mi lɔlɔ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma lɛmɛ anɔ lineke a. Mila ndɛ oyitsɔ̃ kĩ enyína onyole kĩ ntinya nkpa onyole mɔapɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo mɔawɛ a.
47011003	Mavila kĩ bati aabula mi adzuni kade ndɛ ayekĩ kɔɛ kɔa tɛdake kɔkɛ Eva, kĩ miláakɔa tɔwɔlɛ kpalɛwa misum Kristo ndɛ ayekĩ mikakɛna a.
47011004	Kitonɛkĩ miatɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yade lɛtsã nɛ Yesu bɛbã kĩ nnɛ́ ye akũ bude lɛtsã bɔkpa mi a mɔ kawɔlɛ mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ. Ade ke miatɛ hũhũ mɔ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔvɛmɛna kɔlaa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ mitɛ mitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ a lɛmɛ a.
47011005	Maábu kĩ mi fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ miakɔna kĩ bɛnyɛ bati titiliwu badi odu a tɛ kɔya bɛba yĩ nɛ osi odima akũ.
47011006	Ɔsa ĩnyɛ oti kĩ yaápuli kalɛ kɔdzɛla kalɛ wĩ, lɛmɛ mabi mi pipiipi kĩ nnɛ́ mɔ kadikanyi kamɛ. Bɔnyɛ foe bɔtsa mi pefee nɛ lɔkɔ a flee kamɛ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ.
47011007	Kĩ ĩyalɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a ntsa mi a, ntátɛ lɛtsama ntomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ndɔla yĩ akũ ayekĩ baadɛla mi nɛ ode. Tɔkpa tanɛ kĩ nkɛna mbɔɛɛ?
47011008	Kĩ nkakɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ a, tɛsɔli bɛbã bati lise yĩ kɔtɔ. Bɔ́abɔɛ foe kĩ nkaye be kĩ makɔa mbumɛna mi.
47011009	Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, ntáha mi mɔ kabumɛna ntɛ nsĩ sika malo. Boe bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bito Makedonia bɛya a lɛma yĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lisĩ yĩ. Ndɛ ayekĩ fɔna kɔkɔɛ a ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ kunya kamɛ lɛmɛ a, kĩ nláakɔa yĩ akũ nkɛna fɔlɔtsa nte nɛ mi akũ da.
47011010	Kĩ Kristo ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ sũ ni, lɛtsama lɛláasua yĩ osi nɛ kakɔma, kĩ ntapia nɛ fukĩĩ akũ nɛ Akaia tite flee akũ.
47011011	Kalɛ nlɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ maáwɛ mi kalɛ sũ mbɔɛɛ? Baguma nyina kĩ mawɛ mi kalɛ!
47011012	Maakakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna finyaa, kĩ nláakɔa yĩ fɔlɔtsa nte nɛ mi akũ, ayekĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ babɛbã a lɛláana osi bipia akũ bɛlɛ kĩ bɔmɔ be akɛna adzuma nɛ osi mɔapɛ akũ.
47011013	Bati a na lɛnyɛ́ fɔtɔ banyanɛ wĩ, mbom bɛnyɛ fɔvã fɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩ bakɛ bati nɛ be adzuma a kĩ bakɛna a kamɛ. Bakɛna be akũ ndɛ Kristo fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔawɛ paa banɛ.
47011014	Fukĩĩ tákɛna wãwã, kitonɛkĩ Abonsam malo apuli kadani ye akũ kadã ndɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ.
47011015	Foesũ fɔnyɛ́ lɛtsa baũ lidima ntɛ ye basumunɛ lɛmɛ dani be akũ bɛkɛna ndɛ Baguma basumunɛ kĩ bakɛna fɔtsa nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ. Nɛ ke kawũna a, baana lɛtsa a kĩ be lɛkɛnana fɛta a pɛpɛɛpɛ.
47011016	Mbuki malɛ kĩ odima ɛtakɔna kĩ ndzimbi. Lɛmɛ ntɛ mibu yĩ lɔmɔ kɔ̃ ni, mitɛ yĩ ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye lɔkɔa yĩ malo mia sukuloo.
47011017	Ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kĩ malɛ kĩĩ lɛnyɛ́ lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate aawɛ kĩ nlɛ. Nɛ kukũpia fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ ni, malɛ kɔdzɛla koũ ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye.
47011018	Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ bati pii apia akũ nɛ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa akũ sũ ni, yĩ malo maakɔa foe mpia.
47011019	Mi mɔawɛ a minyɛ bati kĩ binyina kadi paa, foesũ miana ɔwɔlɛ katɛ bikĩ bidzimbi a nɛ kawɔlɛ kamɛ.
47011020	Ntɛ odi akpã mi nɛ ɔhɛ kamɛ, ĩye yasisi mi, ĩye yadã mi nɛ kayɔ kayɔ ĩye yabalɛ mi nɛ anɛ kamɛ malo ni, miatɛ foe mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ.
47011021	Kɔnyɔã fɔanɛ fɔkpa yĩ kĩ bɔtána ɔwɔlɛ bɔkɛna fukĩna bamɛ odu. Mbɔɛɛ fɔfɛta kĩ bɔkɛna lɔmɔ? Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi do ɔwɔlɛ kĩ yapia nɛ litsedi akũ ni, yĩ malo maado ɔwɔlɛ ndɛ ye aye, lɛmɛ finyaa malɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye.
47011022	Balɛ kĩ Hebrifɔ banɛ. Oo, yĩ malo Hebrini manɛ. Balɛ kĩ Israelfɔ banɛ. Yĩ malo Israelni manɛ. Balɛ kĩ Abraham babi mɔ bawa banɛ. Yĩ malo nto Abraham kasinu a kamɛ.
47011023	Balɛ kĩ Kristo basumunɛ banɛ. Malɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ ɔbɔndamfɔ manɛ, lɛmɛ ĩnyɛ ɔsumunɛ wĩ mbɛ̃ be! Nkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mba be, bido yĩ nɛ kɔla mba be, bibo yĩ mɔ kutsei fɔba be, ade nkawo nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ.
47011024	Titi elo mɔa kĩ Yudafɔ bo yĩ kutsei taalɛ-avedi.
47011025	Titi ɛlalɛ kĩ Romafɔ bo yĩ mɔ mpile ade bɛnɔ yĩ boe deedi a. Ndzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ ɔwɛ bubuli ye, luwi mɔa mɔ lɛnyɛ flee nkahɔ nɛ mui anɛ.
47011026	Nɛ yĩ tisi pii katsã kamɛ ni, tɔwɔ kayili, bayekpanɛ kado yĩ libe ade ayea Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kawɛ kĩ bakɔ yĩ a. Nna nɛ nkpã mɔ wuda kayite nɛ tɛmatɔ tɛkpale tɛkpale kamɛ, nɛ fupo kamɛ, nɛ mpo anɛ mɔ fɔvã lɛtsã badenɛ awɛ kamɛ.
47011027	Ĩyili akũ nkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ, fɔkɔ fudi ndzi kĩ maána tida nwa. Kɔlɛ mɔ ɔmɔado kakɔ yĩ, fɔkɔ fudi ndzi maána funitsã ĩnya nwĩ, ade maána kawakɔ̃ ĩye tɛtadiɛ kĩ mado a.
47011028	Nɛ fukĩĩ flee liti ni, luwi nyɛ luwi tɛsɔli a akũ kakɔna kɛna fɔlɔtsa kĩ futeĩ nɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ.
47011029	Ntɛ akpɔ veli odi nɛ ye katɛkado kamɛ ni, akpɔ aveli yĩ kaba. Ntɛ bɛfɔ̃ odi wo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, mana foe akũ kalɔkpa baũ.
47011030	Ntɛ kɛnɛ kĩ mpia akũ ni, maapia nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatsa kĩ nlá kɔbɛ̃ a akũ.
47011031	Baguma, kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo Ɔlɛga, kĩ bamu ye dĩ daa a, nyina kĩ nnɛ́ fɔvã mama.
47011032	Kĩ nna nɛ Damasko a, Lɛgã Areta fɔ̃ bikĩ badã ɔmatɔ a akũ a dza nɛ ɔmatɔ a seebi kɔbã onukpɛ̃ kĩ bipi yĩ.
47011033	Lɛmɛ bati do yĩ nɛ ɔtsɛtsɛ kamɛ bɛtsãmɛna nɛ seebi nfansili kamɛ bɛkamɛna bɛdzɛla, ade nlo nfɔnɛ ye a.
47012001	Titɔ kĩ nfasɔ adima lɛláa kapia kamɛ malo ni, kɛnɛ kĩ mpia akũ. Lɛmɛ finyaa maalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ mmɔ́ nɛ anɛ ketee fɔda kamɛ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ a akũ.
47012002	Ĩnyina onyole odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo ode. Ade futeli ewua-ana kĩ fɔtɛ̃ kĩ bɛbɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna ode flefle a. Ĩnyína ntɛ sukɛna kamɛ ɛna ĩye nnɛ́ sukɛna kamɛ ɛna, mbɔɛntɛ Baguma odi nyina.
47012003	-
47012004	Mbuki malɛ kĩ ĩnyina kĩ bipi onyole kĩĩ bɛnamɛna Paradiso kamɛ, lɛmɛ ĩnyína ntɛ ɛna nɛ sukɛna kamɛ, ĩye nnɛ́ sukɛna kamɛ ɛna, mbɔɛntɛ Baguma odi nyina. Ade awã enu fɔtsa a kĩ otidziwa lɛláapuli ɛlɛ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtákpa odima osi kĩ ebinya onukpɛ̃ nɛ foe akũ.
47012005	Foesũ maapia nɛ onyole kĩĩ akũ, lɛmɛ nláapia nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ akũ, mbɔɛntɛ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatsa kĩ nlá kɔbɛ̃ a akũ.
47012006	Ntɛ kawɛ nwɛ kĩ mapia akũ malo ni, nláakɛna foe ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye, kitonɛkĩ maakalɛ ɔnɔkɔali a. Lɛmɛ nláapia akũ, kitonɛkĩ ntáwɛ kĩ odima ebu yĩ ɛba ayekĩ enyina kĩ nla a, nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛmɔ́ kĩ nkɛna mɔ likĩ enu kĩ nlɛ a sũ.
47012007	Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ nláadɛla yĩ akũ nɛ ode nɛ awãwã fɔtsa pii a kĩ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ a sũ ni, bido fɔsɔ ndɛ su kĩ sawo paa nɛ yĩ sukɛna kamɛ. Fɔsɔ a kɛna ndɛ Abonsam fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩ fɔkaaha yĩ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ayekĩ nláatɛnɛ yĩ akũ kadɛla nɛ ode.
47012008	Mbɔa mpaɛ titi ɛlalɛ nkpa boe Ɔlate kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔsɔ kĩĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ.
47012009	Lɛmɛ mbuayɛ kĩ ɛkpa yĩ nyɛ kĩ, “Yĩ kɔnyakamɔ nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de osĩ, kitonɛkĩ yĩ kɔbɛ̃ ana ɔsĩ paa ntɛ nɔ ɔlá kɔbɛ̃.” Foesũ kawɔlɛ ade yĩ paa kĩ mapia akũ nɛ yĩ ɔsĩ katana a akũ, ayekĩ maamɔ Kristo kɔbɛ̃ a nɛ yĩ kamɛ.
47012010	Foesũ kawɔlɛ ade yĩ nɛ ɔsĩ katana, fuvũnatsa, lubo kamɔ, liti katomɛna, mɔ ɔhau kamɔ akũ nɛ Kristo sũ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ nlá kɔbɛ̃ ni, Kristo ado yĩ kɔbɛ̃.
47012011	Malɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye, lɛmɛ mi lɛfɔ̃ nkɛna foe, kitonɛkĩ mi nyɛ bati kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bimu yĩ kufɛ. Kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ ĩnyɛ́ lɛtsama malo ni, mi fɔtɔ banyanɛ titiliwu a lɛbɛ̃ yĩ nɛ osi odima akũ.
47012012	Awãwã mɔ kɔbɛ̃ fɔtsa, mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni a kĩ nkɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ nkɛna nɛ mi kamɛ a atsa pefee kĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ wĩ manɛ.
47012013	Nkɛna tuwĩ tidi nkpa tɛsɔli bɛbã a mba mi mbɔɛɛ? Nnɛ́ foe nyɛ kĩ ntákɔa yĩ akũ kadã nte nɛ mi akũ sũ mbɔɛɛ? Make mi aduli kĩ mikɔa mite yĩ, nɛ ayekĩ ntákɛna mi kakɛna wĩ sũ!
47012014	Finyaa ade lɛlalɛde kĩ mmanɛ akũ kĩ mayaasɛla mi a, lɛmɛ nláawã mi lɛtsama. Mi mɔawɛ a mawɛ, nnɛ́ mi sika. Malo kɔlaa ni, nnɛ́ babi kɛnɛ kĩ bɛmanɛ fɔtsa biyi be bamanɛ, mbom bamanɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkpɔta fɔtsa biyi be babi.
47012015	Maamɔ kawɔlɛ ntɛ mbula yĩ kɔbɛ̃ flee a kĩ ndeĩ a kade, nkɔa mbumɛna mi. Ntɛ mawɛ mi kalɛ paa a ni, nde sũ kɛnɛ kĩ mi ɔdɔ a kĩ mideĩ mikpa yĩ a akũ etinya?
47012016	Foesũ mitɛ foe kĩ ntánya fɔlɔtsa nte nɛ mi akũ. Lɛmɛ badi aalɛ kĩ ndeĩ tɛdake, ade nkɛ mi nɛ nyansã kamɛ ntɛ fɔtsa a.
47012017	Ntsã batɔ a kĩ ndo nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a kamɛ odi akũ nsisi mi mbɔɛɛ?
47012018	Nke Tito aduli kĩ ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, ade ndo ɔtɛ odonɛ bɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ etomɔ ye a. Míalɛ kĩ Tito sisi mi mbɔɛɛ? Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ kakɔna mɔapɛ a bɔmɔ ye bɔnɛɛ, bɔtsɛ̃ osi mɔapɛ a lɛmɛ akũ bɔakɛna adzuma?
47012019	Ɔsa miakɔna kĩ nɛ foe kamɛ a, bɔbɔa mbɔdi kĩ bɔapili boe lɔlɔ nɛ mi anɛ. Oowo, fɔlá lɔmɔ! Bɔalɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo awɛ kĩ bɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ Baguma anɛ. Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɔakɛna ni, bɔakɛna foe kĩ fubumɛna mi mibo anɛ nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ.
