47012020	Mavila kĩ ntɛ ĩyawo awã ni, maamɔ mi kĩ miláana ndɛ ayekĩ maawɛ kĩ mina, ade ayea mi malo miláamɔ yĩ ndɛ ayekĩ miawɛ kĩ nna a. Mavila kĩ maayamɔ ɔdzɛ kakɛna, mɔ lineke kanɔ, mɔ kalɔkpa kana mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ, mɔ akũ odi fude kawɛ, mɔ fuvũnatsa, mɔ bati buĩ kanyɛ, mɔ lukũta mɔ onukpɛ̃ mɔa katakɛna nɛ mi kamɛ.
47012021	Mavila lɛmɛ kĩ ntɛ mbuki ĩya ni, yĩ Baguma aadɔla yĩ nɛ mi anɛ, ade maabe nko nɛ bati pii a kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa bɛtɛ̃ a akũ. Kitonɛkĩ bɛtádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ nɛ efĩĩ fɔtsa mɔ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa kakɛna kamɛ, mɔ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ akũ a.
47013001	Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɛlalɛde kĩ maayasɛla mi a. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ bɛbɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ odi akũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ adansifɔ nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ bɛlɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa a deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ fɔmɔ baakɔ ye kɔtɔ.”
47013002	Kĩ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ lɛyade a, ndɛ bati a kĩ bɛkɛna titikpa nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ lɛtɛ̃ kamɛ, mɔ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ. Lɛmɛ maabuki nlɛ foe finyaa, kĩ nláa mi sɛkɛ̃ malo. Ntɛ mbuki ĩya ni, odima lɛláanɛ nɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ kamɛ.
47013003	Míamɔ yĩ kadzakɔ̃ a kĩ miawɛ a, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ Kristo alɛ kɔdzɛla katsãmɛna yĩ akũ a. Ntɛ yakɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ ni, ye kɔ̃ ɛtádɔ, mbom yanyɛ ye kɔbɛ̃ katsa nɛ mi kamɛ.
47013004	Kĩ bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ a, ɛdɔ lɛmɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ fɔ̃ edzi nkpã. Ade ayea boe a kĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo a bɔlá ɔsĩ a, lɛmɛ Baguma aado boe kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bɔkɛna adzuma a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna nɛ mi kamɛ a.
47013005	Minaa mi kamɛ, misɔ mi akũ midã ntɛ midzi nɛ mi katɛkado onukpɛ̃. Mitámɔ miyi ɔsũ kĩ Yesu Kristo deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ mbɔɛɛ? Minyina kĩ edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, mbɔɛntɛ mitákpɔla nɛ mi akũ kasɔkadã a kamɛ.
47013006	Matɛ kado kĩ míayanyi kĩ boe kɔ̃ bɔnya akũ nɛ kasɔkadã a kamɛ.
47013007	Bɔake Baguma aduli kĩ mitakɛna nfumusu adima, nnɛ́ kĩ bati aamɔ kĩ bɔnya akũ nɛ boe akũ kasɔkadã a kamɛ, mbom kĩ miakɛna fɔtsa wĩ titɔ kĩ fɔadã ndɛ boe adzuma kakɛna tákpɔla malo.
47013008	Kitonɛkĩ bɔláapuli bɔkɛna lɛtsama butia ɔnɔkɔali a, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bɔadza pintii bɔkpa ɔnɔkɔali a.
47013009	Kawɔlɛ ade boe ntɛ bɔdɔ, mɔ mi kɔ̃ midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Nɛ foesũ bɔabɔa mpaɛ kĩ mibo anɛ mikpɔla flefle.
47013010	Ade foesũ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli kĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ndzakũ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a. Nkɛna foe lɔmɔ ayekĩ ntɛ ĩyawo awã ni, nláakɔa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ boe Ɔlate kpa yĩ a nvɛlɛ mi mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Ɛkpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ nkɔa ndɔɔla mi mibo anɛ nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ, nnɛ́ kĩ makɔa mbula mi kade.
47013011	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nɛ kawũna ni, midzi kadzi wĩ. Mibo anɛ mikpɔla flefle nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Mibɔa mbɔdi mikɛna nɛ yĩ kɔdɛ a akũ, mikɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa, midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ lɛmɛ. Baguma kĩ yawɛ bati kalɛ, mɔ ye lukudɔ lɛmɛ litomɔ mi flee.
47013012	Miwɔ̃na akũ flee nɛ Baguma lukudɔ kamɛ.
47013013	Baguma bade a flee awɔ̃na mi!
47013014	Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔnyakamɔ, Baguma ɔdɔ, mɔ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ɔmɔa kakɛna a, fɔna nɛ mi flee kamɛ.
48001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ ĩnyɛ Kristo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃. Nnɛ́ batidziwa lɛpau yĩ, ĩye nnɛ́ otidziwa akũ bɛtsã bɛpau yĩ ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye, mbom yĩ kavɛ a to Yesu Kristo mɔ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga a kĩ ɛdzɛla Yesu etomɛna kanɔkpa a sɛkɛ̃.
48001002	Bɔmɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awĩ a, bɔnɛɛ ovoli kĩĩ a bɔawɔ̃na tɛsɔli bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Galatia a.
48001003	Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
48001004	Yesu Kristo kɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ boe tɔkpa lɔlɔ, ayekĩ yaanyɛ boe etomɛna nviã katinya kpa kĩĩ kamɛ, nɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kawɛ onukpɛ̃.
48001005	Mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma kito finyaa kanaa daa! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
48001006	Mi fɔlɛtsa kɛna yĩ wãwã, kitonɛkĩ owi tábuna kɔlaa kĩ mimuniki nɛ oti a kĩ ɛtsã Kristo kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ ɛvɛ mi a liti, ade minaatɛ kalɛ wĩ bɛbã a.
48001007	Lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, kalɛ wĩ bɛbã kadima buki kɛláa, mbom bati badi tsɛ̃ babula mi atɔ kade, ade bawɛ kĩ badani Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a bɛkɛna lɛtsa bɛbã a.
48001008	Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe, ĩye Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi malo to ode ɛyalɛ kalɛ wĩ kĩ kɛvɛmɛna nɛ kikĩ ke akũ bude lɛtsã bɔkpa mi a ni, Baguma edumu ye ɛkpa lubo kamɔ!
48001009	Kalɛ a kĩ bɔlɛ bɔtɛ̃ a, ade ke a finyaa mbuki malɛ a. Nlɛ kĩ ntɛ odi aato ode ɛyaabi mi kalɛ wĩ kĩ kɛvɛmɛna nɛ kikĩ mitɛ a akũ ni, Baguma edumu ye ɛkpa lubo kamɔ!
48001010	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a ni, kalɛ malɛ foe nwo bati ĩye Baguma anɛ mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Kawɛ mawɛ kĩ fuwo Baguma anɛ. Ntɛ mbuki makɛna foe fuwo batidziwa anɛ ni, kufɛ nláabuki ĩnya Kristo ɔsumunɛ.
48001011	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mifɔ̃ mbi mi yededeede kĩ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ ke akũ made lɛtsã a lɛnyɛ́ otidziwa kade.
48001012	Ntátɛ ke ntomɛna otidziwa odima sɛkɛ̃ ade odima lɛmɛ tátsa yĩ ke a, mbom Yesu Kristo mɔawɛ lɛnyɛ ke ɛtsa yĩ.
48001013	Minu ayekĩ ndzi nkpã tɔ̃ a, kĩ mpi Yudafɔ ɔsum a ndomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Minu lɛmɛ ayekĩ nkɔa kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ ntomɛna asɔli bati a liti, mbɔa mbɔdi kĩ mawɔla be dzɔrɔbii.
48001014	Nnaa lɔtɔ mba yĩ bakɔba Yudafɔ pii a kĩ bɔmɔ́ be bɔnyɛ lɛtsã nɛ boe Yudafɔ ɔsum a kamɛ, ade ntomɔ boe bawanyɔ tɛmaniɛ a liti mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a.
48001015	-
48001016	Lɛmɛ Baguma nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ pau yĩ eyi malo fɔmɔ bɛma yĩ, ade ɛvɛ yĩ kĩ ĩyasum ye a. Ade kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yanyɛ Obi ɛtsa yĩ ayekĩ maade lɛtsã nɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, ntánaa otidziwa odima sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛtsa yĩ foe tisi.
48001017	Ntánaa Yerusalem lɛmɛ kĩ manaamɔ bikĩ bɛnya fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛnyaa yĩ lɔtɔ, mbom lɛtalɛta nnaa Arabia tite akũ. Ke liti a, mmuniki nto awã ntɛ̃ nnaa Damasko.
48001018	Futeli ɛlalɛ liti fɔmɔ nnaa Yerusalem kĩ manaamɔ Petro. Ndzi nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ tɛkwansieda nviã.
48001019	Ntámɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ odima kɛba Yakobo, boe Ɔlate ɔwaɛ̃nyole a.
48001020	Lɛtsa a kĩ matsɛlɛ kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Baguma nyina kĩ nnɛ́ fɔvã mama.
48001021	Ke liti a, ndzakũ nnaa fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ nɛ Siria mɔ Kilikia tite akũ.
48001022	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Kristo batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea linyína yĩ anɛ mɔ anɛ.
48001023	Kanu binu nɛ bati tunukpɛ̃ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛkatomɔ boe liti kɔkɔɛ a ni, finyaa kɔ̃ ɛlamɔ lɛtsã kade nɛ katɛkado a kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yawɔla a akũ!”
48001024	Nɛ foesũ bimu Baguma nɛ yĩ sũ.
48002001	Nɛ futeli ewuana liti a, bɔmɔ́ Barnaba bubuki bumuniki bɔnaa Yerusalem, ade nkpã Tito lɛmɛ nnamɛna a.
48002002	Nnaa awã kitonɛkĩ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ nnaa. Nɛ bɔmɔ́ lɔtɔ banyanɛ a odi katsɛna kamɛ ni, nkpalɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ntsa be nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ lɛtsã a kĩ nlamɛna kade kakpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a akũ. Ntáwɛ kĩ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna ntɛ̃ a, mɔ ekĩ makɛna finyaa a, ɛkɛna fɔtsa pupulidza.
48002003	Titɔ kĩ yĩ obumɛnanɛ Tito lɛnyɛ́ Yudani malo ni, odima táhɛ ye kĩ etsua lɛkpati.
48002004	Lɛmɛ bavãlɛvã batɛ badonɛ badi tsã tɛdake osi akũ biwo nɛ asɔli bati a kamɛ kĩ banaĩ bɛmɔ boe akũ akũ kadzi a kĩ bɔna nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu a. Bɛwɛ kĩ bakɛna boe basate bɛkpa be tɛmaniɛ a kĩ bɛnɛɛ a.
48002005	Lɛmɛ ayekĩ bɔwɛ kĩ kalɛ wĩ a ɔnɔkɔali a ɛdza pintii kɛkpa mi sũ ni, bɔtákpa be osi kɔlaa.
48002006	Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ badã ndɛ be nyɛ lɔtɔ banyanɛ a tákpa yĩ kɔdɛ kudima. Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛnyɛ bati titiliwu badi malo ni, yĩ kɔ̃ ntsɛ́la, kitonɛkĩ Baguma ládã oti anɛ. Mbuki malɛ kĩ lɔtɔ banyanɛ a tákpa yĩ kɔdɛ vɔɛ̃ kudima.
48002007	Mbom bɛmɔ́ kĩ adzuma a kĩ Baguma do yĩ nɛ awɛ nyɛ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nkpã bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, ndɛ ayekĩ edo ye nɛ Petro lɛmɛ awɛ kĩ ede lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ɛkpa Yudafɔ a.
48002008	Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsã Baguma kɔbɛ̃ akũ, bɛkɛna yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛkɛna Petro fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛkpa Yudafɔ a.
48002009	Yakobo, mɔ Petro mɔ Yohanes, kĩ bɛkɛna ndɛ lɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ Baguma lido yĩ adzuma pɔtii kĩĩ nɛ awɛ. Foesũ bigua bɔmɔ́ Barnaba bɛkɔa bɛtsa kĩ boe flee bɔnyɛ adzuma mɔa bakɛnanɛ. Bɔkɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa kĩ bɔmɔ́ Barnaba bɔ́akɛna adzuma nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ, lɔkɔa be malo bɛkɛna adzuma nɛ Yudafɔ a kamɛ.
48002010	Lɛtsa a kĩ bivia bitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ nyɛ kĩ bute anɛ nɛ batɛ badonɛ ahiãfɔ a akũ, kĩ fɔnyɛ lɛtsa titiliwu a kĩ fɔasĩ yĩ akũ kĩ nkɛna.
48002011	Lɛmɛ kĩ Petro ya nɛ Antiokia a, ĩyidza ndza nɛ ye akũ nɛ kanade, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ lɛtáfɛta.
48002012	Fɔmɔ batɔ a kĩ Yakobo do a ayawo awã ni, Petro kado awɛ kanya mɔ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a. Lɛmɛ kĩ bati a ya liti a, Petro vɛlɛ ye akũ nɛ be akũ, esĩ kanya mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, kitonɛkĩ evila be a kĩ batsa kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ oti ɛtsua lɛkpati a.
48002013	Yudafɔ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã a do kakɛna awɛ ndɛ babelibe bitomɔ Petro nɛ liti, ade Barnaba malo fɔ̃ libe lɛkɛnana kĩĩ nya ye akũ a.
48002014	Lɛmɛ kĩ mmɔ́ kĩ bɛtsɛ́ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali Kalɛ Wĩ a osi kpĩĩ akũ ni, mbi Petro nɛ bati a flee anɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nɔ a kĩ ɔnyɛ Yudani, odzi nkpã ndɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani a ni, nde sũ mɔ finyaakĩĩ kɔ̃ ahɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ bidzi ndɛ Yudafɔ aye?”
48002015	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Yudafɔ bɔanɛ kito nɛ kama kamɛ, ade ke nnɛ́ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a bɔanɛ.
48002016	Lɛmɛ bunyina kĩ nnɛ́ oti a kĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ nyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ, mbom oti kĩ ɛtɛ Kristo edo. Boe malo bɔtɛ Kristo Yesu budo, ayekĩ bɔ́akpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ kĩ bɔtɛ Kristo budo sũ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ mbla akũ kakɛna sũ. Kitonɛkĩ odima lɛláakpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ, nɛ ayekĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ.
48002017	Foesũ ntɛ bɔabɔa mbɔdi kĩ bɔakɛna bati kĩ bɛkpalɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ boe ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo sũ, mɔ bɛmɔ́ kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bɔanɛ ndɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a aye ni, katsa fɔatsa kĩ Kristo lɛmɛ tomɔ tɔkpa liti? Oowo, fɔlá lɔmɔ!
48002018	Ntɛ mbuki madzɛla mbla a akũ kakɛna a kĩ nfɔnɛ awɛ a ni, ke kɔ̃ ĩnyɛ yĩ akũ kanya ndɛ odi kĩ yaádi mbla a akũ.
48002019	Nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, nku nkpa mbla a, ayekĩ maadzi nkpã nkpa Baguma.
48002020	Bɛbɔa bɔmɔ́ Kristo nɛ asendua akũ. Foesũ finyaa ni, nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ a ndzi nkpã, mbom Kristo dzi nkpã nɛ yĩ kamɛ. Nkpã a kĩ ndzi finyaa nɛ sukɛna kamɛ a, ndzi ye nɛ Baguma Obi a kĩ yawɛ yĩ kalɛ, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ yĩ lɔlɔ a nɛ katɛkado kamɛ.
48002021	Maáwɛ kĩ masĩ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a. Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti akpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ ayekĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla akũ sũ ni, kekɔ̃ fɔatsa kĩ Kristo ku pupulidza!
48003001	Mi Galatiafɔ kĩ minyína kadi! Owei koũ libula mi lɔlɔ kamɛ kade lɔmɔ? Mi mɔawɛ anɛ kamɛ bɛnyɛ bɛtsa mi yededeede ayekĩ bɛbɔa Yesu Kristo nɛ asendua akũ a!
48003002	Mikpa yĩ kalɛ mɔa kĩĩ mbuayɛ. Baguma Hũhũ a kĩ mitɛ a ni, mbla a akũ mikɛna sũ, mbɔɛɛ kĩ Kalɛ Wĩ a mitse, mitɛ mido sũ mitɛ Hũhũ a?
48003003	Nde mitɛnɛ kadzimbi lɔmɔ! Mikɔa Baguma Hũhũ a miyi adzuma kayɔ a ni, finyaakɔ̃ miawɛ kĩ miwũna ye mɔ miawɛ kɔbɛ̃?
48003004	Mbɔɛɛ fɔtsa flee a kĩ foe kamɛ mitsã mitɛ̃ a dani fɔtsa pupulidza? Fɔláanya fɔtsa pupulidza da!
48003005	Ayekĩ miakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ Baguma kpa mi Hũhũ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa nɛ mi kamɛ, mbɔɛɛ nɛ ayekĩ mitse Baguma fɔlɛtsa a mitɛ foe mido sũ?
48003006	Midã Abraham kadzi kamɛ. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Abraham tɛ Baguma edo, ade nɛ ye katɛkado sũ Baguma tɛ ye ndɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla.”
48003007	Foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ mianyi kĩ bati kĩ bɛtɛ bido nyɛ Abraham babi mɔ bawa.
48003008	Bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ biyi kĩ Baguma aakɛna bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a bati kpĩĩ nɛ be katɛkado sũ. Ade foesũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a bi Abraham Kalɛ Wĩ a kɔkɔɛ eyi kĩ, “Baguma aatsã nɔ akũ ehila katinya kamɛ fude flee.”
48003009	Abraham tɛ edo ade Baguma hila ye a. Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ edo ni, Baguma ahila ye ndɛ Abraham aye.
48003010	Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ bipi mbla a akũ kakɛna bido mɔ akũ ni, bidum be, kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaákɛna nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lideĩ nɛ mbla a kamɛ ni, Baguma dumu ye!”
48003011	Nɛ foesũ finyaa foe kamɛ kpalɛ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkɛna oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ mbla a akũ kakɛna sũ. Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛtsã katɛkado kamɛ ɛkɛna oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ a, odi aadzi nkpã.”
48003012	Lɛmɛ mbla a lɛtsɛ́la oti katɛkado akũ. Mbom Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a flee akũ ni, yaatsã foe kamɛ edzi nkpã.”
48003013	Kĩ Kristo yadani fudumutsa nɛ boe lɔlɔ sũ ni, ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna mbla kadumu a kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ bɛvɛla ye nɛ asendua akũ ni, Baguma dumu ye.”
48003014	Kristo kɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ Baguma nhila a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa Abraham a aata mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, ade fɔtsãmɛna Kristo Yesu akũ, bɔ́atsã katɛkado kamɛ bɔtɛ Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a.
48003015	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mawɛ kĩ makpa mi kadzi kamɛ nfantuhũ adi. Ntɛ bati nviã kɛna nhihiɛ adi, mɔ bɛtsɛlɛ ovoli bido awɛ nɛ kayɔ ni, odima lɛláapuli ɛnyɛ lɛtsama ĩye ɛkɔa lɛtsa bɛbã ebu.
48003016	Mite anɛ kĩ Abraham mɔ ye obi Baguma kɛna nhihiɛ ɛkpa. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a tálɛ kĩ, “Abraham babi” kĩ fɔatsa kĩ bati beblebee, mbom ɛlɛ kĩ, “obi” kĩ fɔatsa kĩ oti mɔapɛ. Ade oti kĩĩ nyɛ Kristo a.
48003017	Lɛtsa a kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ Baguma kɛna nhihiɛ ɛkpa Abraham mɔ ye obi, ade eke otse kĩ yaakɛna nɛ ye akũ a. Foesũ mbla a kĩ Baguma kpa Mose nɛ futeli ɔha ɛna mɔ foe taalɛ liti a, lɛláapuli ɛdani ĩye ɛwɔla Baguma nhihiɛ a.
48003018	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Baguma futetsa a tsã mbla akũ ni, kekɔ̃ fubuki fɔtsɛ́ ye nhihiɛ a akũ. Lɛmɛ Baguma mɔawɛ nhihiɛ yanɛ sũ ɛkɔa futetsa a ɛkpa Abraham.
48003019	Kekɔ̃, litsa sũ bɛkɛna mbla a? Bɛkɛna mbla a bibu ayekĩ oti aamɔ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ tɔkpa, ade fɔwaa kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Abraham obi a kĩ bɛkpa nhihiɛ a aaya. Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛkɔa mbla a bɛma oti a kĩ edeĩ nɛ bati mɔ Baguma kayite.
48003020	Lɛmɛ kayite ɔnanɛ tásĩ ntɛ fɔnyɛ kĩ oti mɔapɛ akɛna nhihiɛ, ade Baguma mɔapɛ yanɛ a.
48003021	Katsa fukĩĩ atsa kĩ mbla a tia Baguma nhihiɛ a? Oowo. Fɔlá lɔmɔ! Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ batidziwa tɛ mbla adi kĩ yaapuli ɛkpa oti nkpã ni, kufɛ odi nyɛ odi aapuli ɛkɛna oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, ntɛ ɛkɛna nɛ ye akũ.
48003022	Lɛmɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ katinya kamɛ flee deĩ nɛ tɔkpa kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ, foesũ futetsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi nɛ Yesu Kristo katɛkado kamɛ a waa fɔkpa bikĩ bɛtɛ bido.
48003023	Lɛmɛ fɔmɔ Kristo katɛkado ya ni, mbla a pili boe flee edo nɛ kɔla ndɛ kɔla bawanɛ aye, kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ baanyɛ Kristo katɛkado kĩĩ kanya.
48003024	Foesũ mbla a lɛkadãmɛna boe akũ kɛnawo kĩ Kristo ya, ayekĩ fɔ́atsã boe katɛkado kamɛ bɛkɛna boe bati kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
48003025	Finyaakĩĩ, kĩ katɛkado a yawo boe kamɛ a, mbla a buki ɛnyɛ́ boe ɔdãmɛnanɛ.
48003026	Ayekĩ mi flee mitɛ Kristo Yesu mido sũ ni, mi flee midani Baguma babi.
48003027	Mi a kĩ bɛwɔla mi mui, kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo a, mido Kristo ndɛ atadiɛ aye.
48003028	Nɛ foesũ ntsitsemu adima buki ɛláa Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kayite, mɔ basate ĩye bikĩ bidzi be akũ akũ, mɔ batsole ĩye banyole, mbom mi flee mikɛna ɔmɔa nɛ Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
48003029	Ntɛ minyɛ Kristo bade ni, kekɔ̃ minyɛ Abraham babi mɔ bawa, ade míakɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a banyanɛ a.
48004001	Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ obinyole a kĩ ɛtábo tɔ̃ anɛ kĩ yaanya ɔlɛga adzapadiɛ ni, babu ye ndɛ ɔsate aye, titɔ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ ye fude malo.
48004002	Lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛnyɛ obisɛ̃ a, bati deĩ kĩ badãmɛna ye mɔ ye fɔtsa a akũ kanaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔlɛga yi ɛkpa ye fɔtsa a katɛ.
48004003	Ade ayea boe malo bɔna nɛ hũhũ kĩ yanya katinya kamɛ akũ kayɔ ndɛ basate aye, kɛyawo kĩ bubo anɛ nɛ hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ.
48004004	Lɛmɛ kĩ lɔkɔ wĩ a wo ɔtɔ a, Baguma do ye mɔawɛ Obi ɛya. Ɛya ndɛ otidziwa kĩ otsole ma aye, edzi nkpã nɛ Yudafɔ mbla a kayɔ.
48004005	Baguma do ye kĩ ɛyaase kɔtɔ ɛnyɛ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mbla a kayɔ, ayekĩ bɔ́adani bɔkɛna ye Baguma babi.
48004006	Kĩ Baguma wɛ kĩ yatsa kĩ minyɛ ye babi sũ ni, ɛkɔa ye Obi Hũhũ a edo nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Hũhũ kĩĩ abɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Ao Nda!”
48004007	Nɛ foesũ obuki ɔnyɛ́ ɔsate, mbom ɔnyɛ obi. Kĩ ɔnyɛ ye obi sũ ni, Baguma aakɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa ye babi a ɛkpa nɔ.
48004008	Kɔkɔɛ a kĩ minyína Baguma a, minya basate mikpa fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ́ Baguma.
48004009	Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ minyina Baguma, ĩye maalɛ kĩ Baguma nyina mi a, nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miamuniki minaa hũhũ a kĩ ɛla kɔbɛ̃, kĩ ye akũ akɔ kɔnya a sɛkɛ̃? Nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miabuki mikɛna be basate?
48004010	Minyɛ fuwi fudi, tidetɔ tidi, fɔkɔ́ fudi mɔ futeli fudi koũ miyi miakɛna tɛmaniɛ nɛ foe akũ.
48004011	Mi fɔlɛtsa aha yĩ ɔwɔlɛ paa! Fɔakɛna ndɛ yĩ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna nɛ mi kamɛ a flee kɛna pupulidza.
48004012	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, make mi aduli kĩ midani mikɛna ndɛ yĩ aye, kitonɛkĩ yĩ malo nkɛna yĩ akũ ndɛ mi aye. Mitákɛna tɔkpa tidima nɛ yĩ akũ.
48004013	Míate anɛ kĩ kĩ ĩnya lɔtɔ ĩyade lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a akũ nkpa mi a, nna nɛ fɔsɔ kamɛ.
48004014	Lɛmɛ titɔ kĩ ayekĩ yĩ akũ na a nya sɔhuiɛ baũ fɔkpa mi malo ni, yĩ akũ tákɔ mi kɔwɛ̃ misĩ yĩ katɛ, mbom mitɛ yĩ ndɛ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye, ĩye ndɛ ayekĩ míatɛ Kristo Yesu mɔawɛ a.
48004015	Kawɔlɛ a kĩ mimɔ́ mɔ ɔmɛnɛ a kĩ mido nɛ yĩ akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a ni, nɛ ndia fudeĩ finyaa? Yĩ mɔawɛ maapuli nlɛ kĩ ntɛ kapuli míapuli kufɛ mibɔlɛ mi mɔawɛ banebi malo mikpa yĩ.
48004016	Kadani ndani mi okesĩnɛ finyaa kɔ̃, nɛ ayekĩ mbi mi ɔnɔkɔali a sũ?
48004017	Bati bɛbã kĩĩ a amɔ kawɔlɛ paa nɛ mi akũ, lɛmɛ baákɔna fɔtsa wĩ nɛ mi akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ bawɛ nyɛ kĩ banyɛ mi nɛ yĩ akũ, ayekĩ míadani mimɔ́ kawɔlɛ nɛ be akũ ndɛ ayekĩ be malo bamɔ nɛ mi akũ a.
48004018	Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ bati amɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ mi fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna akũ, ntɛ be botaɛ a nɛnɛ daa, nnɛ́ ntɛ ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ odi.
48004019	Yĩ babi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ! Mbuki manu kalɔɛ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ sɛmɛ api ɔmatsɔ̃ kakpa mi, kɛnaawo kĩ Kristo ɔbla a aatɛ mi kamɛ.
48004020	Nwɛ kĩ mana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ finyaakĩĩ kufɛ, ayekĩ maadɔla yĩ odo nɛ mi akũ ĩnyɛ ayekĩ mila a ntsa. Mi fɔlɛtsa aha yĩ ɔwɔlɛ paa!
48004021	Mi a kĩ miawɛ kĩ mbla a ɛnya mi akũ a, mikpa yĩ kalɛ kĩĩ mbuayɛ. Mbɔɛɛ mitánu lɛtsa a kĩ mbla a lɛ a?
48004022	Ɛlɛ kĩ Abraham ma babinyole nviã, ɔmɔa nyɛ ye ɔsatetsole a obi, ade ɔyade a nyɛ otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ a obi a.
48004023	Bɛma ɔsate obinyole a ndɛ ayekĩ otidziwa ama obi aye, lɛmɛ obinyole a kĩ otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ a ma a kɔ̃ ni, bɛma ye bɛtsãmɛna nɛ Baguma kalɛ kayi a onukpɛ̃.
48004024	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nyɛ nfantuhũ. Batsole nviã kĩĩ dzɛ̃ bɛkpa apam atsu nviã. Be kamɛ ɔmɔa a kĩ ɛnyɛ Hagar dzɛ̃ ɛkpa apam a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Sinai ɔtɔ a akũ a, ade ye babi a kĩ ɛma a nyɛ basate a.
48004025	Hagar dzɛ̃ ɛkpa Sinai ɔtɔ nɛ Arabia tite akũ. Ade ye nyɛ nviã Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a, kitonɛkĩ ye mɔ ye bati a flee buki bideĩ nɛ tɛsate kamɛ.
48004026	Lɛmɛ ode Yerusalem a nyɛ otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ a, ade ye nyɛ boe ɔma a.
48004027	Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nɔ oduko, mɔ kawɔlɛ! Bɔa fɔwɔla, kamɔ kawɔlɛ, nɔ a kĩ ɔtámɔ tɔ̃ kama lubo. Kitonɛkĩ otsole kĩ ɔnyɔ lɛtsɛ́la ye akũ a, babi aapɔ bɛba otsole a kĩ ɔnyɔ deĩ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ daa a bade.”
48004028	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, finyaa ni, mi malo minyɛ Baguma babi nɛ ye nhihiɛ a onukpɛ̃ ndɛ Isak aye.
48004029	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, obinyole a kĩ bɛma ndɛ ayekĩ otidziwa ama obi kɛkɛ a yidza ɛdza nɛ ekĩ bɛma nɛ Baguma Hũhũ kamɛ a akũ. Ade aye fubuki fɔla nviã kĩĩ malo a.
48004030	Lɛmɛ litsa Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ? Kɛlɛ kĩ, “Blɔmɛna ɔsatetsole a mɔ ye obinyole a bɛdzakũ, kitonɛkĩ ɔsate a obi a mɔ otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ obi lɛláasɛ̃ be ɔlɛga adzapadiɛ.”
48004031	Nɛ foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔnyɛ́ ɔsatetsole a babi, mbom otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ a babi bɔanɛ.
48005001	Akũ akũ kadzi Kristo awɛ kĩ bɔna ade foesũ ɛnyɛ boe a. Nɛ foesũ midza pintii ndɛ bati kĩ bidzi be akũ akũ aye, mitafɔ̃ bibuki bɛkɛna mi basate.
48005002	Mitse fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ katse wĩ! Yĩ Paulo mabi mi kĩ ntɛ mifɔ̃ bitsua mi fɔkpati ni, fɔatsa kĩ Kristo buki ɛlá nfasɔ adima ɛkpa mi.
48005003	Mbuki masipi kĩ ntɛ odi tunɔ bitsua ye lɛkpati ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a flee akũ.
48005004	Mi a kĩ miawɛ kĩ miakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ lɔkɔa minya bati kĩ bɛkpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ ni, minyɛ mi akũ nɛ Kristo akũ. Minɛ́ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a kamɛ.
48005005	Boe kɔ̃ ni, kĩ bɔtɛ budo Baguma Hũhũ a sũ ni, bɔna ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kĩ Baguma aakɛna boe bati kĩ bɛkpɔla.
48005006	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu ni, lɛkpati katsua ĩye de katatsua távɛmɛna lɛtsama. Lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ nyɛ kĩ bɔ́alɛ katɛkado a kĩ kakɛna adzuma nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
48005007	Mikabɔa mbɔdi paa kufɛ! Owei lisua mi osi kĩ mitakɛna nɛ ɔnɔkɔali osi a akũ?
48005008	Nnɛ́ Baguma a kĩ ɛvɛ mi a lɛdani mi adzuni.
48005009	Balɛ kĩ, “Fuyilatsa kabii bakɔa kado nɛ mbɔli kamɛ fɔmɔ yayila.”
48005010	Lɛmɛ nɛ boe ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate sũ ni, matɛ kado kĩ miláabuki mitɛ oti bɛbã adzuni kɛba yĩ ade. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛlamɛna mi adzuni kadani a ni, nde eti ɛla o-o, Baguma aavɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ kokooko.
48005011	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, yĩ kɔ̃ ntɛ mbuki made lɛtsã kĩ lɛkpati katsua sĩ ni, nde sũ bati buki biyidza bɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ? Ntɛ fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali ni, kekɔ̃ yĩ lɛtsã kade nɛ Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ a lɛláayamɛna ɔhau odima.
48005012	Mawɛ kĩ bati a kĩ batutulu mi a bipi akũ bɛnaa lɔtɔ bɛnyɛ be akũ tɛsaɛ lɔkɔa kalɛ kiwoli!
48005013	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi kɔ̃ bɛvɛ mi kĩ mina mi akũ akũ kadzi. Lɛmɛ mitafɔ̃ mi akũ akũ kadzi kĩĩ lɛkpa mi osi mikɛna sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa, mbom mikɔa ɔdɔ misum mi akũ akũ.
48005014	Kitonɛkĩ mbla a ɔlɛdo flee nyɛ kĩ, “Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ a.”
48005015	Lɛmɛ ntɛ miakɛna mi akũ awɔda ndɛ bayaɛ kpa aye ni, midã kadã wĩ, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye míawɔla akũ.
48005016	Lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ nyɛ kĩ mifɔ̃ Hũhũ a ɛkpã mi nɛ mi nkpã kadzi kamɛ, ayekĩ miláakɔa akũ mikpa sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa kakɛna.
48005017	Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ oti kutidu awɛ a ayidza kadza nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a awɛ a akũ. Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a awɛ a lɛmɛ ayidza kadza nɛ oti kutidu fɔwɛtsa a akũ a. Fɔtsa nviã kĩĩ akesĩ akũ, ade fɔatsa kĩ miláapuli mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ a.
48005018	Foesũ ntɛ Hũhũ akpã mi ni, mibuki miláa mbla a kayɔ.
48005019	Fɔtsa a kĩ oti kutidu akɛna a anɛ kawa yedede. Ade foe nyɛ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ, fɔtsa a kĩ fɔado akũ efĩĩ, kɔkɔbato,
48005020	baviɔ̃ kasum, mɔ kabɔ katsɔ. Fɔbɛbã nyɛ likesĩ, ɔdzɛ kakɛna, anɛngbã, kalɔkpa kana, yĩ odi fude kalɛ, bati kayalɛ mɔ kasɛ̃ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ,
48005021	lineke kanɔ, bavɛ kawuga, kawɔlɛ kamɔ mɔ kuto kpa katɛ̃ ɔbɛ̃, mɔ fɔtsa bɛbã ndɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ. Mbuki madɛ mi finyaa ndɛ ayekĩ ĩnya lɔtɔ ndɛ mi a, kĩ bikĩ bakɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ odu a lɛláanaa Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
48005022	Lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔanɛ kato Hũhũ a kamɛ nyɛ ɔdɔ, kawɔlɛ, lukudɔ, ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, sɛmɛkalɛ, tuwĩ kakɛna, fɔtsa kakɛna nɛ osi wĩ akũ,
48005023	akũ kadɔla mɔ akũ akũ kanya. Mbla adima lɛláa kĩ etia fukĩĩ flee kamɛ fudima.
48005024	Bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ Kristo Yesu bade a, kɔa be sukɛna bɛbɔa bɛmɛna nɛ asendua akũ, mɔ sɛ fɔwɛtsa mɔ ɔbla kpa flee.
48005025	Ntɛ Hũhũ a akpã boe ni, kekɔ̃ mifɔ̃ ye ɛkpã boe nɛ boe kadzi kamɛ.
48005026	Mitafɔ̃ bɔdɛla akũ nɛ ode, ĩye budo akũ kalɔkpa, ĩye bɔna anɛngbã nɛ boe akũ akũ.
48006001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mi kamɛ odi kɛna tɔkpa tidi ni, mi a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a, mikɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ midɛ ye ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Midã mi mɔawɛ a akũ kadã wĩ ayekĩ mi malo bɛláasɔ mi bɛdã.
48006002	Mibumɛna akũ akũ nɛ ɔhau adi nyɛ adi kamɛ, lɔkɔa nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ ni, míakɛna nɛ Kristo mbla a akũ.
48006003	Ntɛ odi abu ye akũ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti odi odu lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ɛnyɛ́ lɛtsama a, ye odi akũ yakɛ.
48006004	Odi nyɛ odi ɛdzɛmɔ ye mɔawɛ akũ ɛdã. Ntɛ fɔnɛnɛ ni, owula aapuli epia nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a akũ, kɛtánɛ kĩ yakɔa ye fɔkɛlatsa ɛkɔna mɔ oti bɛbã fude.
48006005	Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi aalɔ ye mɔawɛ fɔlɔtsa.
48006006	Ntɛ batsa odi Kristo fɔlɛtsa a ni, kɛnɛ kĩ oti a ɛkpa ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ a ye fɔtsa wĩ flee a kĩ edeĩ a fudi.
48006007	Mitakɛ mi akũ, kitonɛkĩ odima lɛmɛ lɛláapuli ebu Baguma tɛkɔasia. Lɛtsa a kĩ oti du a, ade foe mɔapɛ a yaana a.
48006008	Ntɛ edu fɔtsa nɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kamɛ ni, lɛtsa a kĩ yaana etomɛna foe kamɛ nyɛ wuda. Lɛmɛ ntɛ edu fɔtsa nɛ Hũhũ a fɔwɛtsa kamɛ ni, yaana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a etomɛna ye kamɛ.
48006009	Mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli boe nɛ tuwĩ kakɛna kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ akpɔ táveli boe ni, lɔkɔ aaya kĩ bɔ́ana foe akũ nfasɔ.
48006010	Nɛ foesũ kĩ lɔkɔ buki lideĩ lɛkpa boe sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔkɛna tuwĩ bɔkpa odi nyɛ odi, titiliwu bikĩ bɔmɔ́ be bɛkɛna ɔmɔa nɛ Kristo katɛkado kamɛ a.
48006011	Midã ayekĩ yĩ mɔawɛ nkɔa katsɛlɛ baũ baũ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli finyaa!
48006012	Bati a kĩ bawɛ kĩ bahɛ mi mitsua fɔkpati a nyɛ bikĩ bata akũ, kawɛ kĩ bawo bati anɛ. Lɛtsa a sũ kĩ bakɛna fukĩĩ nyɛ kĩ bɛtáwɛ kĩ bana liti katomɛna nɛ Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ a.
48006013	Bati a kĩ batsua fɔkpati a malo lákɛna nɛ mbla a akũ. Bawɛ kĩ mitsua fɔkpati ayekĩ baapuli bipia kĩ miakɛna nɛ be amaniɛ akũ.
48006014	Lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ni, maapia nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ a odi akũ. Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsã Kristo wuda kamɛ ni, bɛbɔa katinya kamɛ nɛ asendua akũ bɛkpa yĩ, ade nɛ Kristo wuda kamɛ lɛmɛ fɔtsã bɛbɔa yĩ malo nɛ asendua akũ bɛkpa katinya kamɛ.
48006015	Ntɛ bitsua odi lɛkpati ĩye bɛtátsua ye ni, fɔnyɛ́ lɛtsama. Lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ nyɛ kĩ oti a dani ɛkɛna oti vɔɛ̃.
48006016	Baguma ɛmɔ bati a kĩ bitomɔ osi kĩĩ nɛ be nkpã kamɛ a kɔnya, ɛkpa be lukudɔ lɛmɛ. Ɛkɛna foe lɔmɔ lɛmɛ ɛkpa Baguma bati a flee.
48006017	Kito finyaa kanaa ni, odima ɛtabuki ɛkpa yĩ ɔhau odima, kitonɛkĩ fuloi nɛ yĩ akũ a atsa kĩ ĩnyɛ Yesu ɔsate.
48006018	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi hũhũ flee kɔnya. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
49001001	Yĩ Paulo kĩ ĩyadani Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ Baguma kawɛ onukpɛ̃, lɛtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mamɛna mi Baguma bati nɛ Efeso a kĩ miadi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ mi kadzi kamɛ, mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu a.
49001002	Baguma boe Ɔlɛga, mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛmɔ mi kɔnya bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
49001003	Mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga a kɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ nɛ ayekĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo sũ ni, ɛkpa boe hũhũ kamɛ nhila adi nyɛ adi kĩ edeĩ nɛ ode katinya a kamɛ a.
49001004	Fɔmɔ Baguma labɔa katinya malo ni, ɛpau boe eyi kɔkɔɛ kĩ bɔ́anya ye bade fɔtsã ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo akũ, ayekĩ bɔ́akɛna bati kpalɛwa kĩ nfumusu adima lɛláa be akũ nɛ ye anɛ.
49001005	Ayekĩ Baguma awɛ boe kalɛ sũ ni, ehihiɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ fɔ́atsã Kristo akũ yaakɛna boe ye babi. Ade fukĩĩ koũ nyɛ ye kakɔna mɔ kawɔlɛ a.
49001006	Nɛ foesũ mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma, nɛ kɔnya baũ a kĩ ɛmɔ boe faa ɛtsãmɛna ye Obi kĩ yaátunɔ kalɛ a akũ!
49001007	-
49001008	Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsã Kristo babɔanɛ kawula kamɛ sũ ni, bɔna katɛ, ade foe nyɛ kĩ Baguma kɔa boe tɔkpa ete boe. Midã ayekĩ Baguma kɔnya a kĩ ɛmɔ́ boe, ɛkpa boe nyansã mɔ fɔtsa kayɔkanu a pɔnɛ!
49001009	Baguma fɔ̃ bunyi nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna ɛkɔla eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ, kĩ yaawũna ɛtsãmɛna Kristo akũ a.
49001010	Nhihiɛ a nyɛ kĩ ntɛ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ ni, Baguma aakpɔta lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛbɔa nɛ tite mɔ ode a ɛkɔa edo nɛ Kristo kayɔ.
49001011	Baguma fɔ̃ bɛkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ ye kawɛ mɔ nhihiɛ onukpɛ̃. Ade ɛpau boe kĩ bɔnya ye mɔawɛ bati nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ, nɛ ye kawɛ mɔ kalɛkayi, nɛ kayɔkayi a onukpɛ̃.
49001012	Nɛ foesũ mifɔ̃ boe a kĩ bɔnya lɔtɔ bɔadã Kristo anɛ a, bumu Baguma kukũkpalɛ a.
49001013	Ade mi malo, kĩ minu ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a kĩ kɛnyɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a, kĩ kɛma mi nkpã katɛ a, midani Baguma bati. Ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo mido sũ ni, Baguma kɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a eyi mi ɔsũ kĩ minya ye bade.
49001014	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kĩĩ nyɛ kasipi kĩ bɔ́atɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi ɛkpa ye bati a. Kasipi kĩĩ akpa boe anɛ kate kĩ Baguma aakpa bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade a akũ akũ kadzi. Mifɔ̃ bumu ye kukũkpalɛ a!
49001015	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, kito anɛ kĩ nnu kĩ mitɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu mido, miawɛ Baguma bati a flee kalɛ a,
49001016	ntáfɔ̃ Baguma kɔlɛ kanyɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ. Mate anɛ nɛ mi akũ nɛ yĩ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ,
49001017	ade mawã Baguma, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga, kĩ ɛnyɛ kukũkpalɛ flee a, kĩ ɛkpa mi Hũhũ a kĩ yaakpa mi nyansã, ɛnyɛ Baguma ɛtsa mi ayekĩ míanyi ye kanyi wĩ.
49001018	Make Baguma aduli kĩ ebinya mi anɛ mipuli mimɔ ye ɔhaĩ a, ayekĩ míanyi lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ ɛvɛ mi ɛkpa kĩ midã anɛ a. Ye awãwã nhila a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa ye bati a kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ a atɛ kɔya paa.
49001019	Midã ayekĩ ye kɔbɛ̃ kpale a akɛna adzuma nɛ boe a kĩ bɔtɛ ye budo a kamɛ. Kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ kĩ kɔakɛna adzuma nɛ boe kamɛ a,
49001020	ketimɔ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma kɔa ɛdzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa, ɛkɔa ye edzina nɛ ye sɔmɔna nɛ ode flee a.
49001021	Ade awã Kristo anya lɛgã nɛ ode fɔgã flee, bati kĩ bideĩ otumi flee, bati kĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ flee mɔ balate flee akũ a. Ye lɛgã kadzakɔ̃ bɛ̃ lɛgã nyɛ lɛgã kadzakɔ̃ nɛ katinya kĩĩ mɔ kikĩ kaaya a kamɛ.
49001022	Baguma kɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa edo nɛ Kristo abɔa kayɔ ade ɛkɔa ye ɛkpa asɔli a ndɛ ye lɔlɔ nɛ fɔtsa flee kamɛ a.
49001023	Asɔli kĩĩ nyɛ Kristo sukɛna, kĩ sɛfɔ̃ asɔli a kpɔla, ade Kristo mɔawɛ lɛmɛ afɔ̃ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akpɔla nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ a.
49002001	Kɔkɔɛ a, nɛ mi atɔ ɔsĩ mɔ tɔkpa sũ ni, miku nɛ hũhũ kamɛ.
49002002	Nɛ lɔkɔ na kamɛ a, midzi nkpã nɛ katinya kamɛ tisi akũ. Mikɔa akũ mikpa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔanya lɛgã nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ hũhũ a akũ a. Ade koe nyɛ hũhũ a kĩ finyaa yakɛna adzuma nɛ bati a kĩ baátse Baguma ɔlɛdo a kamɛ a.
49002003	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, boe flee bɔna ndɛ be, budzi nkpã nɛ boe sukɛna fɔwɛtsa onukpɛ̃, bɔkakɛna fɔtsa a kĩ boe sukɛna mɔ adzuni awɛ a. Nɛ katinya kamɛ ɔbla kpa a kĩ edeĩ nɛ boe kamɛ sũ ni, Baguma na kalɔkpa nɛ boe akũ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛna nɛ batidziwa kasinu flee a akũ a.
49002004	Lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma deĩ kɔnyakamɔ, mɔ ɔdɔ baũ ɛkpa boe sũ ni,
49002005	titɔ kĩ boe tɔkpa fɔ̃ buku nɛ hũhũ kamɛ malo a, ɛfɔ̃ bɔna nkpã nɛ Kristo kamɛ. Baguma sɛmɛkalɛ odi sũ mina nkpã katɛ.
49002006	Ayekĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Yesu Kristo sũ ni, Baguma dzɛla boe mɔ ye etomɛna kanɔkpa kĩ bɔnya lɛgã mɔ ye nɛ ode.
49002007	Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ kĩ yanyɛ ye sɛmɛkalɛ baũ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa boe nɛ lɔkɔ flee kamɛ a, nɛ ayekĩ edeĩ ɔdɔ ɛkpa boe nɛ Kristo sũ a.
49002008	-
49002009	Baguma sɛmɛkalɛ odi, mɔ mi katɛkado akũ fɔtsã sũ mina katɛ. Nnɛ́ mi mɔawɛ mbɔdi kabɔa kamɛ futo, mbom Baguma futetsa fɔanɛ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkɔa foe epia.
49002010	Baguma lɛbɔa boe mɔ ye mɔawɛ awɛ, kĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu, budzi nkpã bɔkɛna adzuma wĩ a kĩ ye mɔawɛ a ɛkɔa eyi kĩ bɔyaakɛna a.
49002011	Mite anɛ kĩ kɔkɔɛ a, nnɛ́ Yudafɔ babi mianɛ. Yudafɔ a kĩ bitsua fɔkpati a avũna mi kĩ bati kĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati. Lɛmɛ lɛkpati katsua nyɛ sukɛna katsua kɛkɛ, kĩ otidziwa lɛkɔa awɛ ɛkɛna foe.
49002012	Mite anɛ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ na kamɛ a, mina mɔ lugo nɛ Kristo sɛkɛ̃. Minya banɔvɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛtána nɛ bati a kĩ Baguma pau a kamɛ. Mitána nɛ apam a kĩ Baguma kɛna mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa ye bati a kamɛ. Midzi nɛ katinya kamɛ kĩ mitána anɛ kate nɛ lɛtsama akũ, ade mitána Baguma adima a.
49002013	Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ fɔtsã Kristo Yesu wuda kamɛ bɛkpã mi a kĩ mina mɔ lugo a mifuã miyakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo.
49002014	Kitonɛkĩ Kristo mɔawɛ a lɛkɔa lukudɔ ɛma boe, ɛkɛna bikĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a ɔmɔa. Ɛkɔa ye mɔawɛ sukɛna ɛnyɛ likesĩ ndɛ seebi a nɛ be kayite.
49002015	Ɛwɔla Yudafɔ mbla mɔ ye akũ tɛmaniɛ a, ayekĩ yaakpɔta bati kutsu nviã a bɛkɛna oti vɔɛ̃ mɔa mɔ ye, lɔkɔa lukudɔ lɛya.
49002016	Kristo tsã ye wuda nɛ asendua akũ a kamɛ ɛwɔla likesĩ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ be kamɛ a. Eboomu fude nviã a, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa ade bɛdani bɛya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a.
49002017	Foesũ Kristo yade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a lukudɔ akũ ɛkpa bati flee, bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛna mɔ lugo nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a, mɔ Yudafɔ a kĩ bifuã Baguma a.
49002018	Kristo akũ fɔtsã mɔ boe a kĩ bɔnyɛ Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a bɔ́apuli bɔtsã Hũhũ a akũ bɔya nɛ Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃.
49002019	Nɛ foesũ ni, mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a mibuki minyɛ́ basitsãnɛ ĩye banɔvɔɛ̃, mbom finyaa mimɔ Baguma bati a midani kade mɔa bati mɔ Baguma kɔla babi.
49002020	Bike mi malo mite nɛ seebi sɛyɔde a kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a ke a akũ, ade Kristo Yesu mɔawɛ nyɛ́ kɔla a akũ de titiliwu a.
49002021	Ade ye pini kɔla akũ fɔtsa a flee ɛkpɔta a, kafɔ̃ kɔabo anɛ kakɛna ndɛ afɔliɛ kɔla kpalɛwa kakpa Baguma a.
49002022	Nɛ mi ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ a, bɛkɔa mi malo bibumɔ be nkaɛ a bake kɔla a kĩ Baguma aadzi nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ a.
49003001	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, yĩ, Paulo, kĩ bido nɛ kɔla nɛ Kristo Yesu mɔ mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sũ, mabɔa mpaɛ kakpa Baguma.
49003002	Matɛ kado kĩ minu ayekĩ Baguma mɔ́ yĩ kɔnya, ɛkpa yĩ adzuma kĩĩ kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi kalɛ.
49003003	Ndɛ ayekĩ ntsɛlɛ foe lukũ mma mi ĩyatɛ̃ a, Baguma nyɛ ye nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna ɛkɔla a ɛtsa yĩ.
49003004	Ntɛ miakã ovoli a ni, míapuli mimɔ́ ayekĩ nnu Kristo fɔtsa kɔlawa a kayɔ.
49003005	Nɛ kɔkɔɛ lɔkɔ a, Baguma tányɛ nhihiɛ kɔlawa kĩĩ ɛtsa batidziwa, lɛmɛ finyaa ni, Baguma nyɛ foe ɛtsa ɛtsãmɛna Hũhũ a akũ ɛkpa ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ kpalɛwa mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a.
49003006	Nhihiɛ kɔlawa a nyɛ kĩ fɔtsã Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ kɛna ndɛ Yudafɔ aye. Bɛkɛna sukɛna mɔapɛ a bati, kĩ bɛna tsɛfã nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi ɛtsãmɛna Kristo Yesu akũ a kamɛ.
49003007	Baguma tsã ye kɔbɛ̃ akũ ɛmɔ yĩ kɔnya ɛkɔa yĩ ɛkɛna Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ ɔsumunɛ.
49003008	Titɔ kĩ ĩnyɛ obisɛ̃de kɔlaa nɛ Baguma bati a kamɛ malo ni, Baguma mɔ yĩ kɔnya kĩ nkɔa fɔtsa wĩ beblebee a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ Kristo kamɛ, kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya baũ lɛmɛ a nde lɛtsã nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
49003009	Ade edo yĩ kĩ nfɔ̃ bati flee binyi ayekĩ Baguma nhihiɛ kɔlawa a aanɛ kanya ɛkɛna adzuma. Baguma kĩ ye nyɛ fɔtsa flee ɔbɔanɛ a, kɔa fɔtsa ɛkɔla anɛ kɔkɔɛ,
49003010	ayekĩ nɛ finyaa lɔkɔ kamɛ, baatsã asɔli bati a akũ bɛnyɛ Baguma nyansã ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ a bɛtsa fɔgã mɔ otumifɔ a kĩ banya akũ nɛ ode katinya kamɛ a.
49003011	Fukĩĩ nyɛ Baguma nhihiɛ kĩ ɛlá kawũna a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ, ade fɔtsã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ a.
49003012	Ayekĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo, bɔtɛ ye budo lɛmɛ sũ ni, budeĩ ɔwɔlɛ kado kĩ bɔ́apuli bɔnaa Baguma anɛ faa.
49003013	Nɛ foesũ make mi aduli, mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi nɛ lubo a kĩ mamɔ nɛ mi lɔlɔ a sũ, kitonɛkĩ foe flee fɔ́anya mi nfasɔ.
49003014	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, nke aduli mabɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe Ɔlɛga a,
49003015	kĩ ɛla katete kadi nyɛ kadi nɛ tite mɔ ode anɛ. Ade ye ate ke dĩ lɛmɛ a.
49003016	Mabaɔ mpaɛ kĩ Baguma ɛtsã ye Hũhũ akũ edo mi ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kudeĩ nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ beblebee kamɛ a.
49003017	Mabɔa mpaɛ kĩ mi katɛkado kɛfɔ̃ Kristo ɛna nɛ mi kamɛ. Mabɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ kĩ midza pintii nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ,
49003018	ayekĩ mi mɔ Baguma bati a flee míana kɔbɛ̃ minu Kristo ɔdɔ a kadzɛlɛ mɔ ye lugo, ye kade mɔ kadzũ a kayɔ.
49003019	Baguma ɛfɔ̃ miyaanyi Kristo ɔdɔ a, titɔ kĩ otidziwa lɛláapuli enu foe kayɔ dzununuunu eyua malo, ayekĩ Baguma kutidu a aatɛ mi kamɛ flee.
49003020	Baguma a kĩ yapuli kakɛna fukĩ bɔavia a flee mɔ fukĩ bɔakɛna a, nɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔakɛna adzuma nɛ boe kamɛ a,
49003021	ade ye kade nyɛ kamu nɛ asɔli bati a mɔ Kristo Yesu kamɛ, fɔnaa kasinu flee kamɛ, kito finyaakĩĩ kanaa daa daa! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
49004001	Foesũ yĩ a kĩ nwaa kɔla nɛ ayekĩ masum boe Ɔlate sũ a, makpa mi kɔdɛ kĩ midzi nkpã a kĩ yaaketi mɔ ayekĩ Baguma vɛ mi kĩ midzi a.
49004002	Midɔla mi akũ, minya bati dɔwa, mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ. Minyɛ mi ɔdɔ mitsa nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kana kamɛ.
49004003	Nɛ ayekĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Hũhũ a sũ ni, mibɔa mbɔdi mipi ɔmɔa kakɛna midomɔ akũ nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
49004004	Sukɛna mɔapɛ mɔ Hũhũ mɔapɛ deĩ, ade ayea budeĩ kɔnɛte nɛ lɛtsa mɔapɛ a kĩ Baguma vɛ boe ɛkpa a akũ a.
49004005	Ɔlate mɔapɛ mɔ katɛkado mɔapɛ deĩ, ade mui kawɔla mɔapɛ lɛmɛ deĩ a.
49004006	Ade ayea budeĩ Baguma mɔapɛ, batidziwa flee Ɔlɛga kĩ ɛnyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa Ɔlate a. Yakɛna adzuma katsãmɛna boe flee akũ, ade edeĩ nɛ boe flee kamɛ a.
49004007	Boe kamɛ odi nyɛ odi tɛ futetsa pɔtii fudi kĩ fuketimɔ kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ Kristo kpa a.
49004008	Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Kĩ ede ɛnaa ode flee a, ɛkpã bati pii a kĩ bideĩ nɛ ndom kamɛ a ebumɔ ye akũ, ɛsɛ̃ futetsa ɛkpa batidziwa.”
49004009	Finyaa, kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ ede ɛnaa ode flee a ni, foe kayɔ nyɛ litsa? Foe kamɛ kpalɛ kĩ ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛka ɛnaa tite ɔda flee a.
49004010	Foesũ oti a kĩ ɛka ɛnaa tite ɔda flee a, ade ye mɔapɛ a lide ɛnaa ode flee a, ayekĩ yaatɛ katinya flee a kamɛ.
49004011	Ade ye lite batidziwa futetsa, ɛpau bati kĩ bɛnya fɔtɔ banyanɛ, babɛbã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, badi lɛtsã badenɛ, badi bɛnya batɛ badonɛ akũ badãmɛnanɛ mɔ fɔtsa batsanɛ.
49004012	Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ yaalɔla Baguma bati a flee ɛkpa Kristo adzuma kakɛna, lɔkɔa bido Kristo sukɛna a kĩ sɛnyɛ asɔli bati a kɔbɛ̃.
49004013	Foesũ boe flee bɔ́akɛna ɔmɔa nɛ boe katɛkado kamɛ, lɔkɔa bunyi Baguma Obi a lɛmɛ. Fɔ́afɔ̃ bubo anɛ buketi mɔ Kristo, bɔna ye kutitse flee a.
49004014	Lɔkɔa bɔláabuki bɔnya ndɛ babisɛ̃ kĩ bavãlɛvã fɔtsa katsa vɔɛ̃ fudi nyɛ fudi abɔa be katomɛna katɛ̃mɛna ndɛ ɔwɛ aye, ade tɛdake bati akɛ be kado nɛ be adzuni tɔkpa kamɛ a.
49004015	Nɛ foe kadokɔ̃ ni, ntɛ bɔalɛ ɔnɔkɔali nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bubo anɛ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ nɛ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ lɔlɔ a kamɛ.
49004016	Ade ye pini sukɛna fɔtsakɔ̃ fɔtsakɔ̃ mɔ tisĩ fɔatsa mɔ akũ kakɛna adzuma a. Foesũ ntɛ sukɛna kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ akɛna se adzuma ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta ni, oti mɔawɛ a abo anɛ kana ɔsĩ nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
49004017	Foesũ mabi mi nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ kĩ mitabuki midzi nkpã ndɛ bati a kĩ binyína Baguma, kĩ be adzuni adã faa faa,
49004018	ade be lɔlɔ kamɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a. Ayekĩ binyína lɛtsama, bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ lɛmɛ sũ ni, nkpã a kĩ bidzi a táketi mɔ nkpã a kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ ye bati bidzi a.
49004019	Bibuki bɛlá kɔnyɔã nɛ lɛtsama akũ, foesũ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa tɔkpa mɔ fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ a kĩ fɔado akũ efĩĩ kakɛna.
49004020	Midã, nnɛ́ fɔtsa kĩĩ odu mikɔlɛ nɛ Kristo akũ!
49004021	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ minu Yesu nkã, ade ndɛ bati kĩ bitomɛna ye ni, bɛtsa mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a.
49004022	Foesũ mifɔnɛ mi ɔbla kpa kɔɛ a kĩ midzi mitɛ̃ a awɛ. Fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɛ bati libula mi nkpã a kĩ midzi tɔ̃ a kade.
49004023	Midani mi tɔwɔlɛ mɔ mi adzuni kamɛ fɔkɛna fɔtsa vɔɛ̃,
49004024	mibɔa ɔbla vɔɛ̃ kĩ ɛla ndɛ Baguma kutidu a, kĩ yanyɛ akũ katsa nɛ nkpã wĩ kĩ ɛkpalɛ kamɛ a aye. Ɛna nɛ mi akũ ndɛ atadiɛ aye.
49004025	Foesũ mifɔ̃ fɔvã kama! Kɛnɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi edi ɔnɔkɔali ɛkpa ye ɔkɔba ɔtɛ odonɛ, kitonɛkĩ boe flee bɔnyɛ Kristo sukɛna a akũ sɛkɛ sidi.
49004026	Ntɛ mina kalɔkpa ni, mitafɔ̃ kalɔkpa lɛfɔ̃ mikɛna tɔkpa, ade mitafɔ̃ kade lɛdɔ nɛ mi kalɔkpa a akũ.
49004027	Mitakpa Abonsam osi odima.
49004028	Oti a kĩ ɛkaye a ɛfɔ̃ kaye. Ɛkɔa awɛ ɛkɛna adzuma ayekĩ yaana ɛnya nɛ foe kamɛ, ete ahiãfɔ lɛmɛ fɔtsa.
49004029	Mitafɔ̃ tuwuli kpa lɛnɛ nɛ mi onukpɛ̃, mbom milɛ tuwuli wĩ kĩ taabumɔ bati a kĩ batse mi nɛ lɔkɔ a odu kamɛ a, lɔkɔa fɔvɛlɛ nhila fɔma be.
49004030	Mitakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ laawo Baguma Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kalɔɛ, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a Baguma kɔa eyi mi ɔsũ, esipi kĩ Baguma aatɛ mi nɛ Luwi nkaɛ a akũ.
49004031	Mifɔnɛ kako katɛ awɛ, minyɛ kalɔkpa mɔ likesĩ nɛ mi kamɛ. Ade ayea mifɔ̃ awũni mɔ bati buĩ kanyɛ, mɔ adzuni kpa kakɛna nɛ bati akũ a.
49004032	Nɛ foe kadokɔ̃ ni, mikɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mikpa akũ. Mikɔa tɔkpa mite akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma lɛmɛ kɔa ete mi ɛtsãmɛna Kristo akũ a.
49005001	Ayekĩ minyɛ Baguma babi kĩ yawɛ kalɛ sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ miabɔa mbɔdi mina ndɛ ye aye.
49005002	Kɛnɛ kĩ ɔdɔ ɛnya mi kadzi kamɛ akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo wɛ boe kalɛ, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa nɛ boe lɔlɔ ndɛ futetsa mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa bɛkpa Baguma, fuwo ye anɛ.
49005003	Nɛ ayekĩ minyɛ babi kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ sũ ni, kɛtáfɛta kĩ adɔpaa, efĩĩ fɔtsa mɔ anɛngbã lɛkɛnana anɛ nɛ mi kamɛ malo.
49005004	Ade ayea kɛtánɛ kĩ mialɛ okendze tuwuli, tuwuli kĩ taálɛ katse, ĩye kĩ takɔ kɔnyɔã. Nɛ fukĩĩ kadokɔ̃ ni, mikaanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ.
49005005	Minu foe kayɔ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yabɔa adɔpaa, yado ye akũ efĩĩ, mɔ edeĩ anɛngbã, kitonɛkĩ anɛngbã keti mɔ baviɔ̃ kasum a, ɛláana tsɛfã nɛ Kristo mɔ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ da.
49005006	Mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɔa tɔkɔsia tuwuli ɛkɛ mi, kitonɛkĩ ade foe bamɛ sũ Baguma sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aaya nɛ bikĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ a akũ a.
49005007	Foesũ mimɔ bati a na odu mitakɛna ɔmɔa.
49005008	Kitonɛkĩ, mi mɔawɛ a mina nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ tɔ̃, lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ midani boe Ɔlate bati sũ ni, mideĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ. Foesũ midzi nkpã ndɛ bati kĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ,
49005009	kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ nkpã kadzi nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ ayamɛna nyɛ tuwĩ kakɛna, kadzi nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kadi.
49005010	Mibɔa mbɔdi mikɔlɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lawo boe Ɔlate a anɛ.
49005011	Mitado akũ nɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ bati akɛna nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a kamɛ, mbom minyɛ foe miwɛla,
49005012	kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ kɔnyɔã kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bakɛna nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a akũ malo.
49005013	Ade ntɛ bɛnyɛ fɔtsa flee biko nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ ni, bamɔ foe kutidu kamɔ wĩ,
49005014	kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛnyɛ kanya ni, liwo nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ. Ade foesũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nyinya, nɔ kĩ ɔwaa tida a, yidza kato kanɔkpa, lɔkɔa Kristo ɔhaĩ a aako nɛ nɔ akũ.”
49005015	Foesũ midã kadã wĩ nɛ ayekĩ midzi nkpã akũ. Mitadzi ndɛ bati kĩ binyína kadi, mbom midzi ndɛ anyansãfɔ aye.
49005016	Mikɛna osi nyɛ osi kĩ mina finyaa akũ adzuma kakɛna wĩ, kitonɛkĩ budeĩ nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna fuwi kamɛ.
49005017	Nɛ foesũ mitakɛna mi akũ badzimbifɔ, mbom mibɔa mbɔdi kĩ míanu lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate awɛ kĩ mikɛna a kayɔ.
49005018	Mitamɔa bavɛ miwuga, kitonɛkĩ fɔafɔ̃ oti akɛna fɔtsa kpa, mbom mifɔ̃ Hũhũ a ɛtɛ mi kamɛ flee.
49005019	Mikɔa fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ Psalomo Ovoli, asɔli tɔnɔ mɔ hũhũ kamɛ tɔnɔ milɔmɛna mɔ akũ. Misã kamu tɔnɔ mɔ kawɔlɛ tɔnɔ mikpa boe Ɔlate nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
49005020	Minyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kɔlɛ daa nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ.
49005021	Ayekĩ miakɔa obu kakpa Kristo sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ miadɔla mi akũ mikpa akũ.
49005022	Mi batsole kĩ bidzi fɔnyɔ, midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi banyɔ ndɛ ayekĩ miadɔla akũ kakpa boe Ɔlate a,
49005023	kitonɛkĩ onyole nyɛ lɔlɔ ɛkpa ɔtsɔ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo lɛmɛ nyɛ asɔli a lɔlɔ. Asɔli bati a nyɛ Kristo sukɛna, ade Kristo mɔawɛ a nyɛ ye Ɔtɛnɛ a.
49005024	Nɛ foesũ batsole bɛdɔla be akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ bɛkpa banyɔ, ndɛ ayekĩ asɔli bati a lɛmɛ adɔla be akũ kakpa Kristo a.
49005025	Mi banyɔ, miwɛ mi batsɔ̃ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo wɛ asɔli bati a kalɛ, ɛkɔa ye nkpã ɛkpa nɛ ye lɔlɔ.
49005026	Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ yakɔa ɛkpalɛ asɔli bati a akũ, nɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ye kalɛ ɛkpalɛ be akũ, ndɛ ayekĩ bawɔla oti mui a aye.
49005027	Ɛwɛ kĩ asɔli bati a kĩ yaakɔa ɛkpa ye a akũ bɛkpalɛ yededeede, bɛlɛ kadã, ĩye tuduli, ĩye katsĩĩtsĩĩ, mɔ efĩĩ adima ɛtana nɛ be akũ.
49005028	Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ banyole bɛwɛ be batsɔ̃ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ bawɛ be mɔawɛ sukɛna kalɛ a. Onyole kĩ yawɛ ɔtsɔ̃ kalɛ ni, ye mɔawɛ akũ ɛwɛ kalɛ.
49005029	Odima lákesĩ ye mɔawɛ sukɛna, mbom yadɔɔla se, kadã se kadã wĩ, ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo lɛmɛ adãmɛna asɔli bati a akũ,
49005030	kitonɛkĩ ye sukɛna a akũ fɔkɔ fudi bɔanɛ.
49005031	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ onyole aafɔnɛ ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma eyi ɛkɔa akũ ɛmɛna mɔ ɔtsɔ̃, lɔkɔa be nviã a bɛkɛna oti mɔa.”
49005032	Ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ ɛbɛla nɛ Baguma kalɛ kĩĩ kamɛ a dzũ paa. Manu foe kayɔ kĩ Kristo mɔ asɔli bati a ɔmɔa kakɛna balɛ.
49005033	Lɛmɛ fɔatamɔ mi malo. Mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛwɛ ɔtsɔ̃ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ ye akũ kalɛ, ade ayea mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi lɛmɛ ebu ɔnyɔ a.
49006001	Mi babisɛ̃, mibu mi bamanɛ, kitonɛkĩ Kristo kamɛ lɛkɛnana wĩ fɔanɛ kĩ miakɛna.
49006002	Mbla atɔnyade kĩ nfasɔ deĩ nɛ ye akũ nyɛ kĩ, “Bu aga mɔ ama,
49006003	ayekĩ nɔ kadzi kamɛ aalɛ, odzi nkpã gɛlɛɛlɛ nɛ tite akũ.”
49006004	Mi balɛga, mitakado mi babi kalɔkpa, mbom midɔɔla be kadɔɔla wĩ, mivɛlɛ be, mikpa be kɔdɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate osi a akũ.
49006005	Mi basate, mibu mi tite akũ balate nɛ libe mɔ kukũtila kamɛ. Mikɛna foe mɔ mi tɔwɔlɛ flee ndɛ ayekĩ míasum Kristo.
49006006	Mitakɛna foe anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ kasum, ayekĩ baamu mi sũ, mbom ndɛ Kristo basumunɛ aye ni, mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ a futo mi tɔwɔlɛ flee kamɛ.
49006007	Mikɛna mi basate tudzuma nɛ kawɔlɛ kamɛ ndɛ boe Ɔlate miasum, kĩ nnɛ́ batidziwa miasum.
49006008	Mite anɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate aase odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ adzuma wĩ a kĩ ɛkɛna a akũ, ntɛ ɛnyɛ ɔsate ĩye edzi ye akũ akũ.
49006009	Mi balate lɛmɛ, kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna foe lɔmɔ mikpa mi basate, lɔkɔa mifɔ̃ be libe kado. Mite anɛ kĩ mi atsu nviã a flee Ɔlate mɔapɛ mideĩ nɛ ode, kĩ yaadzɛmɔ odi nyɛ odi, ade ɛláadã odima anɛ a.
49006010	Ke kawũna kamɛ a, mi ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate ɛna ɔsĩ ebu, fɔtsã ye kɔbɛ̃ kpale akũ.
49006011	Mibla kawũkanɔ fɔtsa flee a kĩ Baguma kpa mi a, ayekĩ míapuli miyidza midza nɛ Abonsam tɛdake tisi a akũ.
49006012	Kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ bɔmɔ́ batidziwa lamɛna kawũ kanɔ, mbom bɔmɔ́ ablɔ hũhũ kpa kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ, hũhũ kĩ yanya akũ, hũhũ kĩ edeĩ otumi, mɔ hũhũ kpa kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔtũ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ lamɔ kanɔ.
49006013	Foesũ mibla Baguma kawũkanɔ fɔtsa flee a finyaa, ayekĩ ntɛ Luwi kpa a ya ni, míapuli midza minɔ kawũ a minaawũna, mibuki mina kɔbɛ̃ nɛ mi kamɛ.
49006014	Foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, mikɔa ɔnɔkɔali mibɔa abɔsɔ, mikɔa tuwĩ kakɛna misua mi ɔwɔlɛ ndɛ tɔwɔlɛ libĩĩ katɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ aye.
49006015	Ade mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ milɛ lukudɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ kɛnyɛ mi kawũkanɔ tɛpambua kĩ miado.
49006016	Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ni, milɛ katɛkado ndɛ fubĩĩ katɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade foe bɔakɔa budina fubĩĩ mɔ fi a kĩ Okesĩnɛ a atalɛ a.
49006017	Mitsa Baguma nkpã katɛ a ndɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ lɔbɔɛ aye, milɛ Baguma kalɛ a ndɛ lɛpamɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ kĩ Hũhũ a kɔa edo nɛ mi awɛ.
49006018	Mikɛna fukĩĩ flee nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ, mikaavia Baguma kabumɛna. Mifɔ̃ Hũhũ a ɛkpã mi mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ. Nɛ foesũ ni, mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi. Mibɔa mpaɛ daa nɛ bati a kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ a flee lɔlɔ.
49006019	Mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ yĩ malo lɔlɔ kĩ Baguma edo yĩ fɔlɛtsa wĩ nɛ onukpɛ̃, ayekĩ ntɛ maalɛ kɔdzɛla ni, maapuli ndo ɔwɔlɛ ĩnyɛ Kalɛ Wĩ fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa a ntsa bati.
49006020	Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ manɛ sũ, ade foesũ nwaa kɔla malo a. Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa yĩ kĩ mpuli ndo ɔwɔlɛ nlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a ndɛ ayekĩ fɔfɛta.
49006021	Tihiko, boe ɔwaɛ̃ paa, kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate adzuma wĩ ɔkɛnanɛ a, aaya nɛ awã, ebi mi yĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa, ɛfɔ̃ minyi ayekĩ nlamɛna adzuma a.
49006022	Kado ndo ye nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛyaabi mi ayekĩ boe flee bɔlamɛna adzuma nɛ awĩ, lɔkɔa edo mi kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
49006023	Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛkpa boe bawaɛ̃ a flee lukudɔ, ɔdɔ mɔ katɛkado.
49006024	Baguma ɛmɔ be flee a kĩ bɛkɔa ɔdɔ kĩ ɛla kawũna a bawɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kalɛ a kɔnya.
50001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, mɔ Timoteo kĩ bɔnyɛ Kristo Yesu basumunɛ sɛkɛ̃. Bɔtsɛlɛ ye bɔama mi Baguma bade a kĩ mideĩ nɛ Filipi, kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu a, mɔ asɔli banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ babumɛnanɛ a flee.
50001002	Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
50001003	Manyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ nte anɛ nɛ mi akũ,
50001004	ade lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ mabɔa mpaɛ nɛ mi flee lɔlɔ ni, mabɔa ye mɔ kawɔlɛ,
50001005	nɛ ayekĩ mibumɔ yĩ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ kamɛ, kito luwi lɛtɔnyade a kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ.
50001006	Nɛ foesũ matɛ kado kĩ Baguma a kĩ eyi adzuma wĩ kĩĩ kakɛna kayɔ nɛ mi kamɛ a, aafɔ̃ mikɛna ye ɛnaawũna nɛ Kristo Yesu luwi a akũ.
50001007	Yĩ anɛ teĩ nɛ mi akũ daa! Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ nkaakɔna mi akũ lɔmɔ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma mɔ bɔmɔ mi flee kɔnya kĩ miamɔ lubo mɔ yĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nwaa kɔla a. Lɛtsa a kĩ libu nyɛ kĩ mibumɔ yĩ bɔlamɛna Kalɛ Wĩ a lɔlɔ kapili, kĩ kitim lɛmɛ.
50001008	Baguma nyɛ yĩ ɔdansini kĩ ɔnɔkɔali malɛ, kĩ makɔna mi flee mɔ ɔdɔ a kĩ eto Kristo Yesu kamɛ a.
50001009	Mabɔa mpaɛ kĩ mi ɔdɔ a ebu ebo anɛ nɛ kadikanyi mɔ fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu dzununuunu kamɛ,
50001010	ayekĩ míapuli misa fɔtsa wĩ mikpa mi akũ, lɔkɔa míanya bati kpalɛwa kĩ efĩĩ mɔ nfumusu adima lɛláana nɛ be akũ nɛ Kristo Luwi a akũ.
50001011	Mi nkpã kadzi kamɛ aayi mɔ ɔbla wĩ kabɔa a kĩ Yesu Kristo odi aapuli ɛkpa a, fɔnya kukũkpalɛ mɔ kamu fɔkpa Baguma.
50001012	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mawɛ kĩ mianyi kĩ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔya nɛ yĩ akũ a bumɛna Kalɛ Wĩ a kɛnaa lɔtɔ.
50001013	Nɛ foesũ sodzafɔ a kĩ badzɔlɛ lɛgã tɔtɔ akũ a flee, mɔ bati bɛbã a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awĩ a mɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ Kristo sũ mɔ nwaa kɔla.
50001014	Ade yĩ kɔla kawa a lɛmɛ fɔ̃ Kristofɔ pii kɔa anɛ bite nɛ boe Ɔlate akũ, ade bado ɔwɔlɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a mɔ libe katana nɛ foe kamɛ a.
50001015	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, be kamɛ badi ade lɛtsã nɛ Kristo akũ kitonɛkĩ banɔ yĩ lineke kawɛ yĩ sɔwã, lɛmɛ badi kɔ̃ ade lɛtsã a mɔ adzuni wĩ.
50001016	Bati katsu kayade kĩĩ akɛna adzuma mɔ ɔdɔ kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ Baguma lɛkpa yĩ adzuma kĩ mpili ye Kalɛ Wĩ a lɔlɔ.
50001017	Bati bɛbã a láde lɛtsã nɛ Kristo akũ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ, mbom bade de nɛ be odi kawɛ onukpɛ̃. Bɛkɔna kĩ bakɛna foe bɛkɔa bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa bɛkpa yĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nwaa kɔla, lɔkɔa lubo kamɔ lɛna ɔsĩ libu.
50001018	Fukĩĩ lɛnyɛ́ latsama! Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bide lɛtsã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ĩye nɛ fɔvã kama osi akũ malo ni, kĩ Kristo akũ bide lɛtsã a sũ ni, kawɔlɛ de yĩ.
50001019	Kitonɛkĩ ĩnyina kĩ mi mpaɛbɔ nɛ yĩ lɔlɔ mɔ Yesu kabumɛna a kĩ kito Kristo Hũhũ a sũ ni, baanyɛ yĩ nɛ kɔla.
50001020	Yĩ kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ madã anɛ nyɛ kĩ kɔnyɔã kɔtakɔ yĩ nɛ yĩ adzuma kamɛ, titiliwu nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ, mbom nna ɔwɔlɛ ayekĩ maakɔa yĩ sukɛna flee ndo Kristo obu ntɛ ndzi nkpã ĩye nku malo.
50001021	Litsa nyɛ nkpã? Nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ kɔ̃ ni, Kristo ndzi nkpã nkpa, lɛmɛ ntɛ maaku ni, maana foe akũ nfasɔ mba.
50001022	Lɛmɛ ntɛ maadzi nkpã mpuli nkɛna adzuma kĩ edeĩ nfasɔ ni, kekɔ̃ maáti ĩnyi foe kamɛ fukĩ ĩnyɛ ntɛ nkpã ĩye wuda.
50001023	Ndeĩ nɛ fɔtsa atsu nviã kayite. Mawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ manɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ nnaa Kristo sɛkɛ̃, kĩ lɛnɛnɛ lɛbɛ̃.
50001024	Lɛmɛ nɛ mi sũ ni, fusĩ paa kĩ ndzi nkpã nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ.
50001025	Ntɛ fukĩĩ ndo, foesũ ĩnyina kĩ maadzi nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, mbuki nkɛna adzuma mɔ mi flee minamɛna lɔtɔ, mimɔ́ kawɔlɛ nɛ Kristo katɛkado kamɛ.
50001026	Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ kĩ ntɛ mbuki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, míapuli mipia nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu.
50001027	Lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ finyaa nyɛ kĩ, midzi nkpã ndɛ bati kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a, ayekĩ ntɛ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ĩye ntápuli ĩya malo ni, maanu kĩ midzɛ̃ pintii, nɛ hũhũ mɔa adzuni mɔa kamɛ, miapili katɛkado a Kalɛ Wĩ a lɔlɔ.
50001028	Mitavila mi bakesĩnɛ, mbom mido ɔwɔlɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ binyi kĩ Baguma aawɔla be kokooko, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ yaakpa mi nkpã, kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛfɔ̃ minya akũ.
50001029	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kpa mi osi kĩ misum Kristo nnɛ́ nɛ ayekĩ mitɛ ye mido a odi sũ, mbom nɛ ayekĩ miamɔ lubo nɛ ye lɔlɔ a sũ.
50001030	Finyaakĩĩ míapuli minɔ kawũ a mɔ yĩ. Ade kawũ mɔapɛ a kĩ mimɔ́ kĩ nnɔ ntɛ̃ a, ndɛ ayekĩ minu a, ade ke mɔapɛ a nlamɛna kanɔ a.
50002001	Nkpã a kĩ midzi nɛ Kristo kamɛ a ado mi kɔbɛ̃, ade ye ɔdɔ adɔla mi ɔwɔlɛ a. Mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Hũhũ a, ade miakɛna mi akũ sɛmɛ kalɛ, kamɔ akũ kɔnya a.
50002002	Nɛ foesũ mifɔ̃ kawɔlɛ de yĩ paa kĩ mideĩ adzuni mɔa. Miawɛ akũ kalɛ, kakɛna ɔmɔa nɛ hũhũ mɔ adzuni mɔa kamɛ nɛ lɛtsa mɔapɛ akũ.
50002003	Mitakɛna lɛtsama nɛ mi odi kawɛ onukpɛ̃, ĩye miwɛ kĩ miapia akũ. Midɔla akũ mikpa akũ, mibu bati bɛbã kĩ bɛnɛnɛ bɛbɛ̃ mi.
50002004	Odima ɛtakɔna fɔtsa wĩ ɛkpa ye odi akũ, mbom ɛwɛ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ fude.
50002005	Mifɔ̃ ɔbla a kĩ ɛna nɛ Kristo Yesu kamɛ a, ɛna nɛ mi malo kamɛ.
50002006	Titɔ kĩ edeĩ nɛ Baguma kutidu kamɛ malo ni, ɛtákɔna kĩ yakɔa ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛtsa kĩ bɛmɔ Baguma biketi.
50002007	Mbom ɛfɔnɛ ye obu kadzakɔ̃ a awɛ faa, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkɛna osumunɛ. Bɛma ye ndɛ otidziwa aye, ade ɛya nɛ oti kutidu kamɛ a.
50002008	Nɛ foesũ ɛdɔla ye akũ, etse Baguma kɛnawo wuda nɛ asendua akũ.
50002009	Nɛ foesũ Baguma dɛla ye nɛ ode flee, ade ete ye dĩ kĩ lɛbɛ̃ dĩ lidi nyɛ lidi a.
50002010	Foesũ ntɛ bɛbɔa Yesu dĩ ni, kɛfɛta kĩ fɔtsa a kĩ fudzi nkpã nɛ tite mɔ ode, mɔ tite ɔda fɔ́ake aduli.
50002011	Ade foe flee aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ Yesu Kristo nyɛ boe Ɔlate, bɛkɔa bimu Baguma boe Ɔlɛga a.
50002012	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ miatse yĩ ɔlɛdo lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ nna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, ade ayea fusĩ kĩ ntɛ nláa mi sɛkɛ̃ malo ni, miakɛna miba ayekĩ ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a. Mikɔa libe mɔ kukũtila mikɛna adzuma miwũna mitsa kĩ mina nkpã katɛ,
50002013	kitonɛkĩ Baguma lamɛna adzuma kakɛna nɛ mi kamɛ daa ayekĩ míafɔnɛ akũ awɛ mikɛna nɛ ye kawɛ wĩ akũ.
50002014	Mikɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ ĩye fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ fɔtana nɛ foe kamɛ,
50002015	ayekĩ míanya bati kĩ bɛtákɔ be kɔtɔ, kĩ be akũ kpalɛ ndɛ Baguma babi kĩ bɛkpɔla, kĩ bidzi nɛ katinya kpa kĩ kiyi mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ tɔkpa lɛláa mi akũ. Kɛnɛ kĩ miavɔlɛ nɛ be kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ fusibii avɔlɛ nɛ ode,
50002016	ntɛ miatsa be nkpã kalɛ a. Nɛ Kristo Luwi a akũ ni, maapuli mpia nɛ mi akũ kĩ yĩ mbɔdibɔ mɔ adzuma tákɛna pupulidza.
50002017	Lɛmɛ ntɛ baako yĩ babɔanɛ nɛ tite nɛ mi katɛkado akũ ndɛ afɔliɛ fɔtsa aye ni, kawɔlɛ aade yĩ, ade fɔ́anya bɔmɔ mi flee kawɔlɛ a.
50002018	Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ mi malo kawɔlɛ kide mi, mimɔ kawɔlɛ mɔ yĩ a.
50002019	Ntɛ fɔnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu kawɛ ni, matɛ kado kĩ owi lɛláabuna mɔ maado Timoteo nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ mi akũ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ yayabi yĩ a aado yĩ kawɔlɛ.
50002020	Ye odi keĩ nyɛ oti kĩ yanu yĩ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ mɔ oti kĩ mi fɔlɛtsa tsɛla ye.
50002021	Bati bɛbã a kɔ̃ ni, be odi kalɛ liti bitomɛna, kĩ nnɛ́ fukĩ fɔnyɛ Yesu Kristo fude.
50002022	Mi mɔawɛ minyina ayekĩ Timoteo nyɛ oti titiliwu mɔ ayekĩ ndɛ obi mɔ ɔlɛga aye ni, bɔmɔ ye bɔkɛna adzuma nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ kamɛ.
50002023	Foesũ madã anɛ kĩ ntɛ nsila mmɔ́ ayekĩ yĩ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ la ni, maado ye nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
50002024	Matɛ kado nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ kĩ yĩ mɔawɛ a maapuli ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ.
50002025	Lɛmɛ nkɔna kĩ fusĩ kĩ mado boe ɔwaɛ̃ Epafrodito nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ bɔmɔ ye bɔkɛna adzuma, bɔnɔ kawũ, ade ɛnya mi fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ mɔ yĩ obumɛnanɛ a.
50002026	Akũ asĩ ye kĩ ɛmɔ mi flee, ade ewo ɔblɔ kĩ minu kĩ ye fukɛna kamɛ bu kade.
50002027	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ɛsɔ paa kĩ ɛna nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite, lɛmɛ Baguma mɔ́ bɔmɔ ye kɔnya. Ntɛ fɔtana lɔmɔ ni, kufɛ yĩ kalɔɛ aaba yĩ kalɔ.
50002028	Ade foesũ akũ asĩ yĩ kĩ mado ye nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ ntɛ mimɔ́ ye ni, kawɔlɛ aabuki kide mi lɔkɔa yĩ malo yĩ ɔwɔlɛ lɛka edzi yĩ.
50002029	Nɛ foesũ mitɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ ndɛ ɔwaɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ. Mikpa bati kĩ bɛla ndɛ ye aye a obu,
50002030	kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa kĩ yakɛna Kristo adzuma ebumɔ yĩ nɛ mi kadokɔ̃, ade kite sukuloo kufɛ eku nɛ foe kamɛ a.
50003001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nɛ kawũna kamɛ a, kawɔlɛ kide mi kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe Ɔlate a. Fɔtápiã yĩ kĩ mbuki matsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ĩnya lɔtɔ ntsɛlɛ mma mi a mma mi. Ntɛ nkɛna foe lɔmɔ malo ni, fɔ́afɔ̃ lɛtsama lɛláakɛna mi.
50003002	Midã kadã wĩ nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ akũ! Midã kadã wĩ nɛ bakpete a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ mi akũ kĩ mitsua mi sukɛna a.
50003003	Kitonɛkĩ boe a kĩ bɔasum Baguma nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ a, mbom bitsua boe nɛ osi wĩ akũ, foesũ bɔamɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ bɔakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu. Boe kɔ̃ bɔáte anɛ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ tɛmaniɛ akũ.
50003004	Yĩ aapuli nkɔa anɛ ntɛ nɛ tɛmaniɛ a na akũ kufɛ. Ntɛ odi kɔna kĩ yaapuli ɛkɔa anɛ ete nɛ te akũ ni, ndeĩ kadzakɔ̃ kĩ makɔna lɔmɔ mbɛ̃ oti a na kɔlaa.
50003005	Bitsua yĩ lɛkpati kĩ bɛma yĩ ke luwi lɛlɛ̃de a. Israelni manɛ, nto Benyamin katete a kamɛ. Ĩnyɛ Hebrini kpanunuunu, ade ke nɛ Yudafɔ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, Farisini manɛ.
50003006	Mpi mbla a ndo mɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade foesũ ĩyidza ndza nɛ asɔli a akũ a. Ntɛ oti kakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ akɛna ye oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ ni, maapuli nlɛ kĩ nfumusu adima tána nɛ yĩ akũ.
50003007	Lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩĩ bamɛ a kĩ nkɔna kĩ fudeĩ yĩ nfasɔ a, finyaakĩĩ nɛ Kristo sũ mabu foe fɔtsa pupulidza.
50003008	Nnɛ́ fɔtsa a na odi, mbom mabu lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛlá nfasɔ, kitonɛkĩ fɔtátɛ kɔya fuwo Kristo Yesu kanyi ndɛ yĩ Ɔlate. Nɛ ye sũ nfɔnɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa awɛ, ade mabu foe flee ndɛ fukluku, ayekĩ Kristo aanya yĩ ode sũ,
50003009	lɔkɔa nkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye. Ade ke nláabuki nna kadzi kpĩĩ nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ akũ akũ nɛ ayekĩ makɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ, mbom maakɛna oti kpĩĩ nɛ Kristo katɛkado sũ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ kadzi kpĩĩ kĩ kito Baguma sɛkɛ̃ nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a.
50003010	Lɛtsa a kĩ nti mawɛ nyɛ kĩ manyi Kristo, mmɔ́ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔdzɛla ye kutomɛna kanɔkpa a, mmɔ́ mɔ ye lubo, lɔkɔa nkɛna ndɛ ye aye nɛ ye wuda kamɛ,
50003011	mɔ katɛkado kĩ yĩ malo Baguma aadzɛla yĩ etomɛna kanɔkpa ndzi nkpã.
50003012	Nlámɔ kalɛ kĩ yĩ awɛ tá lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ ĩye kĩ nkpɔla kɔkɔɛ. Lɛmɛ nlamɛna kapili mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ yĩ awɛ ɛta fɔtsa a kĩ foesũ Kristo Yesu kɔa yĩ ɛkɛna ye ode a.
50003013	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, maákɔna kĩ yĩ awɛ ta fɔtsa a kɔkɔɛ. Mbom lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna nyɛ kĩ nlɛla fɔtsa a kĩ fɔya fɔtɛ̃ a, lɔkɔa nkɔa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ flee ntomɔ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛwaa nɛ lɔtɔ a liti.
50003014	Ade foesũ nlamɛna atsɛ kawula kɔɔba kĩ maawo akũ kanyakɔ̃ a lɔkɔa ntɛ futelitsa a kĩ Baguma vɛ yĩ ɛtsãmɛna Kristo Yesu akũ kĩ ĩyaatɛ nɛ ode a.
50003015	Kɛnɛ kĩ boe flee a kĩ bubo anɛ nɛ Baguma Hũhũ kamɛ a bɔna adzuni kĩĩ odu. Lɛmɛ ntɛ mi kamɛ badi deĩ adzuni bɛbã ni, Baguma aakpalɛ foe malo kamɛ ɛtsa mi.
50003016	Ntɛ nde aye fɔla malo ni, mifɔ̃ bubuki bɔkɛna nɛ osi a kĩ ye akũ bɔtsɛ̃ kɛyawo finyaakĩĩ a akũ.
50003017	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi a flee midã yĩ ɔbla mibɔa ye odu, midã bikĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ osi wĩ akũ ndɛ ayekĩ budzi bɔtsa mi a.
50003018	Mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɔkɔ pii kɛyatɛ̃, lɛmɛ mbuki malɛ foe finyaa mɔ babe malo. Bati pii deĩ kĩ be nkpã kadzi kamɛ a fɔ̃ bɛdani bakesĩnɛ bɛkpa Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ a.
50003019	Nɛ kawũna kamɛ a, bati kĩĩ aawɔ nɛ fi luwotu kpale kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ be baguma nyɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa kakɛna. Bamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ be fɔnyɔãtsa kakɛna akũ, ade katinya kĩĩ kamɛ fɔtsa odi akũ bakɔna a.
50003020	Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ ni, boe ɔtɔ nyɛ ode, ade budzi bɔadã boe Ɔtɛnɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo anɛ kĩ eto ode ɛya a.
50003021	Yaakɔa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔfɔ̃ yapuli kanya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ a, ɛdani boe sukɛna kĩ sɛlá kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ siketi mɔ ye sukɛna kpalɛwa a.
50004001	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bati kĩ mawɛ kalɛ, kĩ makɔna mi akũ, miado yĩ kawɔlɛ. Ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ midza pintii nɛ mi nkpã kadzi kamɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ akũ a.
50004002	Make Ewodia mɔ Sinteke aduli kĩ bɛbɔa mbɔdi binu akũ kayɔ ndɛ bawaɛ̃tsole aye nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ.
50004003	Nɔ malo yĩ ɔkɔba adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali, mawɛ kĩ bumɛna batsole kĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ be mɔ Klemens mɔ asɔli bati bɛbã a bɛkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ bibumɔ yĩ bɔlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a. Bɛtsɛlɛ bati kĩĩ buĩ bido nɛ Baguma ovoli a kĩ nkpã badzinɛ buĩ deĩ a kamɛ.
50004004	Kawɔlɛ kide mi luwi daa kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe Ɔlate a. Mbuki malɛ kĩ kawɔlɛ kide mi!
50004005	Mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mikpa odi nyɛ odi. Boe Ɔlate kaya wo ɔtɔ kiyua.
50004006	Mitaha akũ nɛ lɛtsama akũ, mbom nɛ mi mpaɛbɔ kamɛ ni, mivia Baguma lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ mi, minyɛ ye kɔlɛ luwi daa.
50004007	Ade Baguma lukudɔ a kĩ lide lɛba otidziwa kayɔkanu a, lɛdãmɛna mi tɔwɔlɛ mɔ adzuni akũ nɛ Kristo Yesu dĩ akũ.
50004008	Nɛ ke kawũna kamɛ ni, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mifɔ̃ fɔtsa a wĩ mɔ fukĩ fɔfɛta kamu fɔtɛ mi adzuni kamɛ. Fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ nyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lideĩ obu, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛtsɛ̃ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ kpalɛ, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lalɛ kadã mɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛfɛta oti.
50004009	Midzi nkpã nɛ yĩ fɔtsa a kĩ mikɔlɛ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, fukĩ mitɛ, fukĩ minu mɔ ɔbla a kĩ mimɔ́ nɛ yĩ akũ a onukpɛ̃. Ade Baguma a kĩ yakpa boe lukudɔ a aadzi nɛ mi kamɛ.
50004010	Nɛ boe Ɔlate a sũ ni, kawɔlɛ de yĩ paa kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ liti a, mibuki mina osi miatsa kĩ miakɔna yĩ akũ. Maátsa kĩ mifɔ̃ yĩ akũ kadãmɛna, mbom kana mitána osi kĩ mianyɛ foe mitsa.
50004011	Ade nlámɛna katsa kĩ nsĩ litsedi, kitonɛkĩ nkɔlɛ nɛ kadzi kadi nyɛ kadi kamɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ndeĩ liwo yĩ anɛ.
50004012	Ĩnyina lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ ohiã ade ĩnyina lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ akũ kana fɔtsa lɛmɛ a. Nɛ kadzi osi nyɛ osi akũ ni, nkɔlɛ ayekĩ kɛnɛ kĩ fɔtsa fuwo yĩ anɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ntɛ fɔnyɛ kɔlɛ ĩye funitsã kabɔ lɔkɔ, ntɛ ndeĩ foe sukuloo ĩye fɔbɔ yĩ malo.
50004013	Maapuli ndza pintii nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ nɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Kristo ado yĩ a akũ.
50004014	Lɛmɛ mikɛna foe kakɛna wĩ paa kĩ mibumɔ yĩ nɛ yĩ kasuli kamɛ.
50004015	Mi Filipifɔ minyina yededeede kĩ ndzakũ nɛ Makedonia nɛ kayɔkayi, kĩ nkade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ a, mi odi nyɛ asɔli bati a kĩ bɛkabumɛna yĩ.
50004016	Lɔkɔ lɔkɔ kĩ nna nɛ Tesalonika malo ni, ntɛ nsĩ kabumɛna miamɛna yĩ futelitsa.
50004017	Nnɛ́ futelitsa mawɛ kufɛ, mbom nfasɔ a kĩ míana mibu mitomɛna mi fɔtsa kate kamɛ a mawɛ.
50004018	Finyaa mise yĩ kɔtɔ minyina malo. Futelitsa a kĩ mimɛna mitsãmɛna Epafrodito akũ a yawo yĩ sɛkɛ̃, foesũ finyaa nna fɔtsa a kĩ fusĩ a flee. Futelitsa a na kɛna ndɛ afɔliɛ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ bɛbɔa bɛkpa Baguma, kĩ fuwo ye anɛ fudo ye kawɔlɛ lɛmɛ.
50004019	Yĩ Baguma a kĩ masum a, aakpa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ misĩ a etomɛna ye kukũkpalɛ beblebee nɛ Yesu Kristo kamɛ a.
50004020	Mifɔ̃ bumu boe Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kito finyaa kanaa daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
50004021	Mawɔ̃na Baguma bati a kĩ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu a. Boe bawaɛ̃ Kristofɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ awɔ̃na mi a flee.
50004022	Baguma bati kpalɛwa nɛ awĩ a awɔ̃na mi, titiliwu bikĩ bideĩ nɛ Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ tɔtɔ kamɛ a lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi flee.
50004023	Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo nhila ɛmɔ mi hũhũ.
51001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ ndani Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ Baguma kawɛ onukpɛ̃, kĩ bɔmɔ Timoteo lɛtsɛlɛ ye bɔama mi.
51001002	Bɔtsɛlɛ ye bɔamɛna boe bawaɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma kpalɛ be akũ, kĩ bideĩ nɛ Kolose, kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye a. Baguma, boe Ɔlɛga ɛmɔ mi kɔnya, ɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
51001003	Ntɛ bɔabɔa mpaɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ daa ni, bɔanyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga a kɔlɛ,
51001004	kitonɛkĩ bunu ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo Yesu mido, mɔ ayekĩ miawɛ Baguma bade a flee kalɛ.
51001005	Kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkɔa ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a, Kalɛ Wĩ a bɛma mi a, minu kɔnɛte a kĩ kudeĩ kɔkpa mi a. Foesũ mi katɛkado mɔ ɔdɔ dzɛ̃ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ miadã anɛ a, kĩ bɛmanɛ biyi nɛ ode bɛkpa mi a akũ.
51001006	Kalɛ Wĩ a lamɛna anɛ kabo kawũ babi wĩ, ade kɛlamɛna kagba nɛ katinya kamɛ flee, ndɛ ayekĩ kɛgba nɛ mi kamɛ kito luwi a kĩ minya lɔtɔ minu ayekĩ Baguma amɔ bati kɔnya, ade minu ke kayɔ kanu wĩ a.
51001007	Epafra lɛtsa mi fɔtsa nɛ Baguma bati kɔnyakamɔ akũ. Ɛnyɛ boe ɔkɔba adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kĩ bɔawɛ kalɛ paa, kĩ yakɛna Kristo adzuma a nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ nɛ boe kadokɔ̃.
51001008	Ye libi boe mi ɔdɔ a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a kɔa edo nɛ mi kamɛ a.
51001009	Nɛ foesũ bɔabɔa mpaɛ daa nɛ mi lɔlɔ, kito luwi a kĩ bunu mi nkã a. Bɔake Baguma aduli kĩ ebinya mi adzuni kamɛ mipuli minyi ye, mina nyansã mɔ fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu flee a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a akpa a.
51001010	Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ mipuli midzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ Boe Ɔlate awɛ, mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ fɔ́awo ye anɛ daa, lɔkɔa mi adzuma wĩ adi nyɛ adi aawũ babi, mibo anɛ nɛ Baguma kanyi kamɛ.
51001011	Baguma ɛkɔa ye kɔbɛ̃ flee a kĩ kuto ye kukũkpalɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kamɛ epi mi, ayekĩ míapuli mido ɔwɔlɛ mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ lɛmɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ.
51001012	Mikɔa kawɔlɛ minyɛ Ɔlɛga a kɔlɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kitonɛkĩ ye lɛfɔ̃ mikpɔla, kĩ mimɔ bati a kĩ Baguma kpalɛ be akũ a, míana tsɛfã nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ.
51001013	Baguma lɛnyɛ boe sɔũ etomɛna ɔtũ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ, ɛkɔa edo nɛ ye Obi kĩ yaátunɔ ye kalɛ a lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
51001014	Obi kĩĩ akũ bɔtsã bɔna akũ akũ kadzi, mɔ tɔkpa kakɔakate.
51001015	Kristo nyɛ Baguma a kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a kutidu. Ade ye nyɛ Baguma Obi ɔtɔnyade kĩ yanya fɔtsa flee a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ katinya kamɛ a akũ a.
51001016	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tsã Kristo akũ ɛbɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lideĩ nɛ tite mɔ ode, fukĩ bɔamɔ mɔ fukĩ bɔámɔ, mɔ hũhũ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃, kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔgã, abãã mɔ otumifɔ. Baguma tsã ye akũ ɛbɔa katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee edo nɛ ye awɛ.
51001017	Kristo deĩ katinya fɔmɔ bɛbɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade fɔtsɛ̃ ye akũ fɔtsa flee akɛna ɔmɔa a.
51001018	Ye nyɛ asɔli a lɔlɔ, ade asɔli a lɛmɛ nyɛ ye sukɛna a. Asɔli a nɛ́ eto ye kamɛ, ade ɛnyɛ Baguma Obi ɔtɔnyade kĩ eyidza eto kanɔkpa, ayekĩ ye odi aanya lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ.
51001019	Kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ kĩ Obi ɛna ye Baguma kutidu a flee odu.
51001020	Baguma tsã obi akũ, ɛlɔla bɛmɔ katinya kamɛ flee kayite. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ ɛtsã ye Obi a kĩ ewula babɔanɛ nɛ asendua akũ a akũ, ɛyamɛna lukudɔ nɛ ye mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ tite mɔ ode a flee kayite.
51001021	Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, mina mɔ lugo nɛ Baguma akũ, ade minya ye bakesĩnɛ nɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ mikakɛna mɔ tɔkpa a kĩ mikakɔna a sũ.
51001022	Lɛmɛ finyaa, nɛ Obi wuda nɛ asendua akũ a sũ ni, Baguma kɛna mi ye bakɔba ayekĩ yaakpã mi ɛyamɛna nɛ ye anɛ ndɛ bati kĩ mi akũ kpalɛ, kĩ nfumusu lɛláa mi akũ, kĩ odima lɛmɛ lɛláapuli ɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ.
51001023	Foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ midza pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ, mitafɔnɛ mi kɔnɛte a kĩ mideĩ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ a kĩ bubi mi minu a awɛ. Ade Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ akũ bide lɛtsã bɛkpa katinya kamɛ flee a. Ade Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ osumunɛ yĩ, Paulo, ndani a.
51001024	Finyaa, kawɔlɛ ade yĩ kĩ mmɔ́ lubo nɛ mi lɔlɔ. Mamɔ lubo nɛ yĩ sukɛna kamɛ nkɔa nwũna lubo a kĩ lite kĩ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ asɔli a lɔlɔ ɛmɔ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ.
51001025	Baguma kɛna yĩ asɔli a ɔsumunɛ, kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nkpa mi, ayekĩ bati flee aanyi Baguma fɔlɛtsa a flee kanyi wĩ.
51001026	Ade fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa kĩĩ Baguma kɔa ɛkɔla batidziwa kasinu flee kito anɛ kɔkɔkɔɛ a. Lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma nyɛ foe kanya ɛtsa ye bati a kĩ bɛtɛ ye bido a.
51001027	Baguma kawɛ nyɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye fɔtsa kɔlawa mɔ kɔya a, mɔ foe kukũkpalɛ a ɛtsa bati flee. Fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa a nyɛ kĩ, Kristo deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, foesũ mideĩ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a kudi.
51001028	Ade foesũ bɔade lɛtsã nɛ Kristo akũ kakpa odi nyɛ odi a. Bɔnɛɛ boe nyansã flee bɔadɛ odi nyɛ odi katsa be fɔtsa lɛmɛ, ayekĩ bɔ́akpã be bɔnamɛna Baguma anɛ ndɛ bati kĩ bibo anɛ bɛkpɔla, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo lɛmɛ.
51001029	Ade fukĩĩ sũ nlamɛna kapili mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kakɛna adzuma a, mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kpale a kĩ Kristo ado yĩ a.
51002001	Mawɛ kĩ minyi adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi, mɔ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea, mɔ bati nkaɛ flee a kĩ binyína yĩ mɔ anɛ a.
51002002	Malɛ fukĩĩ ayekĩ baado ɔwɔlɛ, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ. Fɔfɔ̃ bɛna fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu yededeede a kĩ bike otse nɛ foe akũ a, binyi Baguma fɔtsa kɔlawa a kĩ foe fɔnyɛ Kristo mɔawɛ a. Fukĩĩ nyɛ akũ kana fɔtsa kpale.
51002003	Kristo kamɛ Baguma kɔa ye fɔtsa mɔ kɔya a, kĩ foe nyɛ ye nyansã mɔ kadikanyi a ɛkɔla.
51002004	Foesũ mabi mi kĩ mitafɔ̃ odima kĩ edeĩ sɛmɛ lɛkɛ mi mɔ fɔvã fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanyɛ.
51002005	Titɔ kĩ nláa mi kamɛ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ malo ni, ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ, ade kawɔlɛ ade yĩ kĩ mmɔ́ kĩ mitsɛ̃ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ, ade midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ Kristo katɛkado kamɛ lɛmɛ a.
51002006	Ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo Yesu ndɛ Ɔlate aye sũ ni, mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye nɛ mi nkpã kadzi kamɛ.
51002007	Minɛ tunu nɛ ye kamɛ, midzi nkpã ndɛ ye aye, lɔkɔa midza pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ bɔtsa mi a. Nɛ foe kawũna a ni, mikaanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ daa.
51002008	Foesũ midã kadã wĩ kĩ odima ɛtakɔa katinya kamɛ kadikanyi mɔ kakɛ pupulidza ɛkɛ mi miyɛla osi wĩ a. Kitonɛkĩ kadikanyi a na to batidziwa tɛmaniɛ katsa kĩ bɛnyɛ bitomɛna hũhũ kĩ yanya ɔwɛ akũ a kamɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ Kristo sɛkɛ̃ futo.
51002009	Kitonɛkĩ Kristo kamɛ Baguma kutidu a flee deĩ,
51002010	ade mi ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kpa mi nkpã kĩ ɛkpɔla flee nɛ ye kamɛ a. Kristo deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kpale nɛ hũhũ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi adi nyɛ adi akũ.
51002011	Kristo kamɛ mikɛna ndɛ bitsua mi fɔkpati, nnɛ́ lɛkpati katsua a kĩ batidziwa akɛna mɔ awɛ a, mbom mi tɔkpa a kĩ mikɛna nɛ sukɛna kamɛ a bɛwɔla nɛ mi akũ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɛkpati katsua nɛ Kristo kamɛ a.
51002012	Kitonɛkĩ, kĩ bɛwɔla mi mui a, mimɔ Kristo bibila, ade nɛ mui kawɔla kamɛ a, mimɔ Kristo Baguma dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛdzɛla ye a mido.
51002013	Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, minyɛ bati kĩ biku nɛ hũhũ kamɛ, nɛ mi tɔkpa mɔ ayekĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ kĩ milá mbla a lɛmɛ sũ. Lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma kpa mi mɔ Kristo nkpã, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa boe tɔkpa flee ete boe.
51002014	Baguma wɔla nhihiɛ a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi kĩ esui boe, ɛkɔ boe kɔtɔ nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ a, ade ɛkɔa ɛbɔa nɛ asendua a akũ a.
51002015	Nɛ asendua akũ a, Kristo tɛ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ fɔgã mɔ hũhũ kamɛ batumifɔ a flee awɛ, ade edo be kɔnyɔã nɛ kanade, ade ɛkpã be ndɛ bati kĩ bipili be ndom aye nɛ ye kawɔlɛ kamɛ ɛnamɛna a.
51002016	Foesũ mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkã mi anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mianya ĩye miamɔa a akũ, ĩye luwi kpalɛwa kanya, odetɔ vɔɛ̃ kade fuwi kanya mɔ Kawɛya Luwi kanya akũ.
51002017	Fukĩĩ bamɛ flee nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lideĩ nɛ liti laya a kuyo kɛkɛ. Lɛtsa mɔawɛ a nyɛ Kristo.
51002018	Mitafɔ̃ odima kĩ ɛbɔɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ mi, kitonɛkĩ ɛna kanyɛkatsa titiliwu sũ lɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ, lɔkɔa ɛkɛ mi kĩ midɔla mi akũ nɛ tɛdake kamɛ misum ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ. Oti kĩĩ odu adɛla ye akũ nɛ ode pupulidza, kitonɛkĩ batidziwa adzuni odi edeĩ.
51002019	Oti kĩĩ odu wai akũ nɛ Kristo a kĩ ye nyɛ lɔlɔ a akũ. Lɛmɛ ade Kristo a kĩ ɛnyɛ lɔlɔ a sɛkɛ̃ sukɛna a flee ana funitsã katomɛna a. Ade Kristo pini sukɛna fɔtsakɔ̃ fɔtsakɔ̃ mɔ tisĩ flee ɛkpɔta, fɔabo anɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma awɛ a.
51002020	Ayekĩ mimɔ Kristo liku sũ ni, minɛ́ nɛ hũhũ a kĩ yanya katinya kamɛ akũ a kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ. Lɔkɔa nde sũ midzi nkpã ndɛ katinya kĩĩ bati mianɛ? Nde sũ miadi tɛbla ndɛ,
51002021	“Takɛna fukĩĩ akũ adzuma, tata fukĩĩ onukpɛ̃,” ĩye “takɔa awɛ ɔta fɔbɛbã lɛmɛ”?
51002022	Tɛbla kĩĩ flee nyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔawɔ ntɛ bakɛna foe akũ adzuma, kitonɛkĩ batidziwa tɛbla mɔ fɔtsa katsa fɔanɛ.
51002023	Nɛ kamɔ kamɛ ni, ntɛ odi pi tɛbla kĩĩ edomɔ akũ, ɛdɔla ye akũ, mɔ ɛmɔna ye sukɛna lubo ni, nyansã baũ adi deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ, lɛmɛ fukĩna kakɛna lábumɔ oti yapuli kanya ye sukɛna kamɛ fɔwɛtsa akũ kɔlaa.
51003001	Baguma dzɛla mimɔ Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa, foesũ mikɔa mi anɛ mite nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ode, awã kĩ Kristo dzi nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna a akũ.
51003002	Mifɔ̃ mi adzuni ete nɛ ode fɔtsa akũ, kĩ nnɛ́ nɛ tite kĩĩ fɔtsa akũ,
51003003	kitonɛkĩ kĩ miku a, bɛkɔa mi nkpã mɔ Kristo bɛkɔla nɛ Baguma kamɛ.
51003004	Ntɛ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ mi nkpã a, nyɛ ye akũ katinya ni, mi malo míanɛ kanya mɔ ye, nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.
51003005	Foesũ mikɔ tite akũ fɔwɛtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a. Ade foe nyɛ, adɔpaa kabɔa, fɔtsa kpa kĩ fɔado oti efĩĩ, sukɛna odo fɔwɛtsa kpa, odo fɔtsa kpa mɔ anɛ ngbã. Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, anɛ ngbã nyɛ baviɔ̃ kasum.
51003006	Ade fukĩĩ bamɛ aafɔ̃ Baguma kalɔkpa lɛya nɛ bati a kĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ akũ a.
51003007	Nɛ nkpã kĩ midzi mitɛ̃ a kamɛ a, mi malo mibɔa ɔbla kpa a na odu.
51003008	Lɛmɛ finyaa kɛnɛ kĩ miafɔnɛ fukĩĩ flee awɛ. Ade foe nyɛ kalɔkpa kana, ɔwɔlɛ kahulu, likesĩ, bati kavũna, fubusuotsa mɔ fɔnyɔãtsa kalɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ fukĩĩ flee anɛ nɛ mi onukpɛ̃.
51003009	Mitakama fɔvã kakpa akũ, kitonɛkĩ mifɔnɛ mi tɛbla kɔɛ a awɛ.
51003010	Mibɔɛ ɔbla vɔɛ̃ kĩĩ mido. Baguma lamɛna tɛbla kɔɛ kadani lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ nɛ ye kutidu onukpɛ̃, ayekĩ míanyi ye kanyi wĩ.
51003011	Nɛ fukĩĩ kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, ntsitsemu adima lɛláa Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ, ĩye bikĩ bitsua fɔkpati mɔ bikĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati a kayite. Ade ayea ntsitsemu buki ɛláa banɔvɔɛ̃, bikĩ be anɛ tábinya, mɔ bikĩ bidzi be akũ akũ mɔ basate kayite. Be flee bɛnyɛ ɔmɔa nɛ Kristo kamɛ ade Kristo lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ be flee kamɛ a.
51003012	Kĩ minyɛ Baguma bati kpalɛwa kĩ ɛpau, yawɛ kalɛ lɛmɛ sũ ni, mibɔa ɔbla vɔɛ̃ a kĩ eketimɔ foe a. Ade ye nyɛ oti kɔnyakamɔ, sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna, kadɔ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kana.
51003013	Mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mikpa akũ. Ntɛ odi fum odi ni, miakɔa mite ye ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate lɛmɛ kɔa mi tɔkpa ete mi a.
51003014	Fukĩ fɔbɛ̃ nyɛ kĩ ɔdɔ ɛna nɛ mi kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɔdɔ aboomu fɔtsa flee kakpɔta mɔ fɔakpɔla kakpɔla wĩ.
51003015	Mifɔ̃ Kristo lukudɔ a lɛnya akũ nɛ mi kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade lukudɔ kĩĩ sũ Baguma vɛ mi ɛkpɔta ndɛ oti mɔa aye a. Minya kɔlɛ banyɛnɛ.
51003016	Mifɔ̃ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a, mɔ ke kɔyakatɛ a flee kidzi nɛ mi kamɛ. Mitsa akũ fɔtsa, mikpa kɔdɛ nɛ nyansã flee kamɛ. Misã Psalomo tɔnɔ, asɔli tɔnɔ, mɔ Hũhũ kamɛ tɔnɔ mikɔa minyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ flee kamɛ.
51003017	Foesũ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míakɛna ĩye míalɛ ni, mikɛna foe nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ, mitsã ye dĩ akũ minyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kɔlɛ.
51003018	Mi fɔnyɔ badzinɛ, midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi banyɔ, ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta Kristofɔ.
51003019	Mi batsɔ̃ bakɔãnɛ miwɛ mi batsɔ̃ kalɛ, mitakɛna be aũkani.
51003020	Mi babisɛ̃, mitse mi bamanɛ ɔlɛdo nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade foe awo Baguma anɛ a.
51003021	Mi balɛga, mitado mi babi kalɔkpa, ayekĩ akpɔ lɛláaveli be.
51003022	Mi basumunɛ, mibu mi balate nɛ tite akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, mitakɛna anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa kĩ bati bimu mi. Mbom misum be nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ndɛ bati kĩ bavila Baguma.
51003023	Adzuma adi nyɛ adi kĩ miakɛna ni, mikɛna ye mɔ mi tɔwɔlɛ flee, ndɛ boe Ɔlate miakɛna mikpa, kĩ nnɛ́ batidziwa miakɛna mikpa.
51003024	Mite anɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate aakpa mi ndɛ kɔtɔkase aye, lɛtsa a kĩ ɛmanɛ eyi ye bati, kitonɛkĩ Kristo, boe Ɔlate mɔawɛ a bɔasum.
51003025	Baguma aase tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a tɔkpa a kĩ bɛkɛna a kɔtɔ, kĩ oti anɛ kadã lɛláana nɛ foe kamɛ.
51004001	Mi balate mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛfɛta, mɔ likĩ lɛnɛnɛ lɛmɛ mikpa mi basumunɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ mideĩ Ɔlate nɛ ode.
51004002	Mina nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Ntɛ miabɔa mpaɛ ni, mi adzuni ɛdza nɛ lɛtsa mɔa akũ, mikaanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ luwi daa.
51004003	Mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe malo lɔlɔ, ayekĩ Baguma aabinya osi ɛkpa boe bude lɛtsã nɛ Kristo kalɛ kɔlawa a akũ, kĩ ke sũ finyaa malo nwaa kɔla a.
51004004	Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa yĩ mpuli nkpalɛ fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa kĩĩ kamɛ ntsa yededeede ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta kĩ nkɛna a.
51004005	Minyi ayekĩ míatsã nɛ nyansã kamɛ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ batɛ badonɛ a, lɔkɔa mikɛna osi nyɛ osi kĩ ebinya ɛkpa mi a akũ adzuma kakɛna wĩ.
51004006	Milɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ obu kamɛ, ayekĩ fɔ́alɛ bati katse, lɔkɔa minyi ayekĩ kɛfɛta kĩ miakpa odi nyɛ odi mbuayɛ.
51004007	Tihiko, boe ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ bɔátunɔ kalɛ, aayabi mi yĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa flee. Ɛnyɛ boe ɔkɔba ɔsumunɛ kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ boe Ɔlate adzuma a kamɛ.
51004008	Ade foesũ nlamɛna ye kado nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛyaabi mi boe akũ fɔlɛtsa, lɔkɔa edo mi kɔbɛ̃.
51004009	Onesimo, boe ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali, kĩ ɛnyɛ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa a, aatomɔ ye bɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Baabi mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛlamɛna kaya nɛ awĩ a flee.
51004010	Aristarko, kĩ bɔmɔ ye waa kɔla a, awɔ̃na mi. Ade ayea Marko, Barnaba ɔwaɛ̃nyole lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi a. Ĩnya lɔtɔ nkpa mi kanyi kĩ ntɛ Marko ya ni, mitɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ.
51004011	Yosua kĩ bibuki bavɛ Yusto lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi. Bati ɛlalɛ kĩĩ odi nyɛ Yudafɔ kĩ bɛdani Kristofɔ bakɛna mɔ yĩ adzuma a bɔkpa Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a. Ade ye alɛ kado yĩ a.
51004012	Epafra, Kristo ɔsumunɛ, kĩ ɛnyɛ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa a lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi. Yabɔa mpaɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ luwi daa nɛ mi lɔlɔ kĩ midza pintii, mibo anɛ mikpɔla nɛ katɛkado kamɛ, lɔkɔa mikɛna Baguma kawɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ.
51004013	Yĩ mɔawɛ a maapuli ndi ye akũ adansiɛ kĩ yakɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kakpa mi, mɔ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea mɔ Hierapoli.
51004014	Boe ɔwaɛ̃ Luka, tutsonu ɔkɛnanɛ a kĩ bɔátunɔ kalɛ a, mɔ Dema awɔ̃na mi.
51004015	Miwɔ̃na boe bawaɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea mikpa boe. Ade ayea miwɔ̃na boe ɔwaɛ̃ Nimfa mɔ asɔli bati a kĩ batsɛna nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ a lɛmɛ mikpa boe a.
51004016	Ntɛ mikã ovoli kĩĩ miyua ni, midã kĩ bɛnakã ye bɛkpa asɔli bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea lɛmɛ. Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ mi malo miakã ovoli a kĩ asɔli bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea aakɔa bɛma mi a.
51004017	Nɛ kawũna a, mibi Arkipo kĩ boe Ɔlate ɔsum adzuma a kĩ bɛkɔa bido nɛ ye awɛ a ni, ɛdã kĩ ɛkɛna ye ewũna pɛpɛɛpɛ.
51004018	Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lɛkɔa yĩ awɛ ntsɛlɛ kawɔ̃na fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ. Mite anɛ kĩ mbuki nwaa kɔla! Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a, kitomɔ mi.
52001001	Yĩ Paulo, Silvano mɔ Timoteo, bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ bɔama mi a kĩ minyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bade a nɛ Tesalonika a. Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
52001002	Bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi flee lɔlɔ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ade daa ntɛ bɔabɔa mpaɛ ni, bɔakɔa mi fɔlɛtsa kayi nɛ ye anɛ.
52001003	Bɔálɛla Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kabi ayekĩ mipini mi katɛkado miakɔa kakɛna adzuma. Bɔalɛ lɛmɛ ayekĩ miabumɔ bati nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ, mɔ ayekĩ mikɔa anɛ mite nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
52001004	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bunyina kĩ Baguma awɛ mi kalɛ paa, ade ɛpau mi kĩ minya ye bati lɛmɛ a.
52001005	Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ bɔyabi mi a ni, nnɛ́ kalɛ pupulidza kanɛ, mbom nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ ni, mitɛ foe kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa fɔanɛ. Mimɔ́ ayekĩ bupi boe akũ nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ fɔnya kabumɛna fɔkpa mi.
52001006	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, mitomɔ boe mɔ boe Ɔlate ɔbla a, foesũ titɔ kĩ mimɔ́ lubo pii malo ni, mitɛ kalɛ a mɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ kito Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sɛkɛ̃.
52001007	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, midani nfantuhũ mikpa batɛ badonɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Makedonia mɔ Akaia.
52001008	Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ boe Ɔlate kalɛ kĩĩ odi lɛgba kito mi sɛkɛ̃ kɛnaa Makedonia mɔ Akaia flee, mbom mi Baguma katɛkado lɛmɛ gba nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ. Foesũ fɔtásĩ kĩ bɔlɛ kadi nɛ foe akũ.
52001009	Be mɔawɛ a balɛ ayekĩ mitɛ boe nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, mɔ ayekĩ mifɔ̃ baviɔ̃ kasum, mikɔa mi akũ mikpa Baguma kĩ ye odi dzi nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
52001010	Ade midzi miadzɔlɛ ye Obi Yesu a kĩ ɛdzɛla etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ, kĩ yaabuki eto ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ ɛya a. Ade Yesu kĩĩ odi aapuli ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna kalɔkpa a kĩ Baguma aana nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ flee akũ a kamɛ a.
52002001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, miawɛ minyina kĩ boe kaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a tánya kɔa.
52002002	Minyina ayekĩ bɛmɔna boe lubo, bivũna boe nɛ Filipi fɔmɔ bɔyawo mi sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Tesalonika. Lɛmɛ titɔ kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ boe akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ awã malo ni, Baguma do boe kɔbɛ̃ bubi mi ye Kalɛ Wĩ a.
52002003	Kɔdɛ a kĩ bɔakpa mi a táto bati kakɛ, adzuni kpa ĩye tɛdake tisi kamɛ,
52002004	mbom bubi mi kalɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma wɛ kĩ bɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ ye mɔawɛ a ɛsɔ boe ɛdã, ɛmɔ́ kĩ bɔfɛta bɔkpa ye Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ. Foesũ bɔáwɛ kĩ bɔalɛ bati limu boe, mbom kĩ boe kɔdzɛla kalɛ aawo Baguma a kĩ enyina bati ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a anɛ.
52002005	Minyina pefee kĩ nnɛ́ onukpɛ̃ mɛnɛmɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa bɔkɔa bɔma mi, ade ke bɔtábɛɛlɛ anɛ nɛ odima fɔtsa akũ da a. Baguma odi nyɛ boe ɔdansini.
52002006	Bɔtáwɛ kamu butomɛna mi ĩye bati bɛbã sɛkɛ̃. Titɔ kĩ boe ndɛ Kristo fɔtɔ banyanɛ aye budeĩ osi kĩ bɔavia fɔtsa butomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ malo ni,
52002007	bupi boe akũ nɛ mi kamɛ ndɛ obima kĩ yadãmɛna ye babi akũ aye.
52002008	Nɛ ayekĩ bɔawɛ mi kalɛ paa sũ ni, bɔawɛ kĩ mi malo minu Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ. Ade fɔnyɛ́ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ odi, mbom bɔkɔa boe mɔawɛ akũ bɔkpa mi, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ kɔya mikpa boe paa.
52002009	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mite anɛ ayekĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, bɔkabi mi Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a, bɔkɛna adzuma lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa bɔdã boe akũ, ayekĩ bɔláakɔa fɔlɔtsa fudima bute nɛ odima akũ.
52002010	Mi mɔawɛ a mɔ Baguma míapuli midi boe akũ adansiɛ kĩ, kĩ budzi nɛ mi batɛ badonɛ kamɛ a, bupi boe akũ kapi wĩ. Bɔkɛna fɔtsa wĩ, ade odima támɔ nfumusu nɛ boe akũ a.
52002011	Minyina lɛmɛ kĩ bɔlɛ odi nyɛ odi ndɛ ayekĩ obilɛga alɛ ye babi.
52002012	Budo mi kɔbɛ̃, bɔkadɔla mi tɔwɔlɛ, ade bɔkadɛ mi kĩ midzi nkpã kĩ yaadɔ Baguma sɛmɛ. Ye mɔawɛ lɛvɛ mi kĩ mina nkpã katɛ nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ mɔ kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.
52002013	Ade lɛtsa bɛbã sũ kĩ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ daa nyɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bubi mi Baguma kalɛ wĩ kĩĩ a, mitákɔa ke mikɛna batidziwa kalɛ, mbom mibu ke, mitɛ ke ndɛ Baguma kalɛ aye, kĩ kɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ. Baguma kalɛ kĩĩ akɛna adzuma nɛ mi batɛ badonɛ a nkpã kadzi kamɛ.
52002014	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ mi akũ nɛ awĩ a, ade foe mɔapɛ a lɛya nɛ Baguma bati akũ nɛ Yudea tite akũ a. Lubo a kĩ mimɔ́ mitomɛna mi bati mɔawɛ kamɛ a, ade de Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛtɛ Yesu bido a lɛmɛ mɔ́ bitomɛna Yudafɔ mɔawɛ kamɛ a.
