52002015	Yudafɔ kĩĩ lɛkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, bɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu lɛmɛ, ade be tomɔ boe malo liti a. Be fɔkɛlatsa do Baguma kalɔkpa ade biyidza bɛdza nɛ bati flee akũ a.
52002016	Bɛbɔa mbɔdi kĩ basua boe osi kĩ bɔtabi bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kalɛ wĩ a kĩ kaafɔ̃ bɛna nkpã a kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Nɛ fukĩĩ kakɛna kamɛ ni, bɛkakɛna tɔkpa pii kabu be tɔkpa. Finyaa Baguma kalɔkpa yidza nɛ be akũ.
52002017	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ade fuwi sukuloo kĩ bɔdzakũ bɔfɔnɛ mi a. Titɔ kĩ bɔámɔ akũ anɛ mɔ anɛ malo ni, bɔakɔna mi akũ paa. Bɔwɛ paa ade bɔbɔa mbɔdi kĩ bɔayaamɔ mi a.
52002018	Bɔwɛ kĩ bubuki bɔyaasɛla mi. Yĩ Paulo kɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔali mbɔa mbɔdi pii kĩ maya, lɛmɛ Abonsam tákpa osi.
52002019	Fɔnyɛ yĩ kawɛ paa kĩ ĩyaasɛla mi kitonɛkĩ mi akũ bute anɛ, minyɛ boe kawɔlɛ lɛmɛ. Ade minyɛ boe nfasɔ a kĩ foesũ bɔ́ata akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu aabuki ɛya a.
52002020	Ɔnɔkɔali ni, minyɛ boe obu mɔ kawɔlɛ a.
52003001	Nɛ ayekĩ bɔláapuli bubuki budo ɔwɔlɛ sũ ni, buke otse kĩ bɔakahɔ nɛ Atene,
52003002	ade ke budo Timoteo kĩ ɛyaado mi kɔbɛ̃, ebumɛna mi nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Ɛnyɛ boe ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ yabumɛna boe nɛ Baguma adzuma mɔ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ kamɛ.
52003003	Bɔkɛna foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ bɔtáwɛ kĩ bati liti katomɛna kĩĩ kiveli odima akpɔ. Mi mɔawɛ minyina kĩ bati liti katomɛna kĩĩ waa kɛkpa boe a kĩ butomɔ Kristo.
52003004	Míate anɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, bɔkpa kanyi bɔnyamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ bati liti katomɛna aaya. Ade ndɛ ayekĩ minyina a, fɔya lɔmɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
52003005	Nɛ ayekĩ maápuli mbuki ndo ɔwɔlɛ sũ ni, ndo Timoteo kĩ ɛyaadã ayekĩ mi katɛkado la. Nkavila kĩ ɔsa okesĩnɛ a yasɔ mi ɛdã, lɔkɔa boe adzuma kakɛna a flee kɛna pupulidza.
52003006	Lɛmɛ Timoteo muniki ɛya mɔ kawɔlɛ ɛyabi boe kĩ mi katɛkado mɔ tɔwaɛ̃ kawɛ távɛmɛna. Ɛlɛ kĩ miate anɛ nɛ boe akũ daa, ade miawɛ osi kĩ míamɔ boe ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔawɛ kĩ bɔamɔ mi a.
52003007	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nɛ boe lubo kamɔ mɔ kasuli kamɛ malo ni, mi katɛkado do boe kɔbɛ̃,
52003008	kitonɛkĩ ntɛ midzɛ̃ kɔɔba nɛ boe Ɔlate kamɛ ni, nkpã vɔɛ̃ awo nɛ boe kamɛ.
52003009	Bɔ́apuli bɔnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ fuwo ye anɛ? Kawɔlɛ baũ ade boe nɛ Baguma anɛ, nɛ mi sũ.
52003010	Lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa bɔake boe Ɔlate aduli mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bubuki bɔmɔ́ akũ lɔkɔa bɔkpa mi lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ.
52003011	Finyaakĩĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga, mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu bibinya osi bɛkpa boe lɔkɔa bɔya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
52003012	Boe Ɔlate ɛfɔ̃ mi akũ kalɛkawɛ mɔ bati bɛbã kalɛkawɛ a kide nɛ ode kibu, ndɛ ayekĩ bɔwɛ mi a.
52003013	Fukĩĩ fɔfɔ̃ edo mi kɔbɛ̃, ɛkɛna mikpɔla, ɛkɛna mi bati kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga anɛ, kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu mɔ ye bade a flee kĩ bɛkpalɛ a aabuki bɛya.
52004001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ke kawũna a, mikɔlɛ mitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ ayekĩ míadzi nkpã kĩ yaawo Baguma anɛ. Ade aye midzi kɔkɔɛ a, lɛmɛ bɔado mi fi, nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ kĩ mikɛna fɔba lɔmɔ.
52004002	Minyina fɔtsa a kĩ foe bɔtsa mi nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ a.
52004003	Baguma awɛ kĩ mi akũ ɛkpalɛ nɛ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ akũ.
52004004	Onyole nyɛ onyole enyi ɔtsɔ̃ kapi wĩ nɛ kukũkpalɛ mɔ obu kamɛ,
52004005	ɛtatomɔ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa ɔmɛnɛ liti ndɛ bikĩ binyína Baguma aye.
52004006	Nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ ni, odima ɛtakɛna tɔkpa nɛ ɔkɔba akũ ĩye esisi ye. Bubi mi fukĩĩ tɔ̃, buke mi awɛ nɛ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ boe Ɔlate aavɛlɛ bikĩ bakɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ a sɔtɔ.
52004007	Baguma távɛ boe kĩ bɔnya bati kĩ be akũ deĩ efĩĩ, mbom bɔnya bikĩ be akũ kpalɛ.
52004008	Nɛ foesũ ntɛ odi sĩ nhihiɛ kĩĩ akũ kakɛna ni, nnɛ́ otidziwa esĩ, mbom eyidza ɛdza nɛ Baguma kĩ yakɔa ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kakpa mi a akũ.
52004009	Nɛ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ akũ kalɛkawɛ akũ kɔ̃ ni, fɔtásĩ kĩ matsɛlɛ litsedi nɛ foe akũ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma tsa mi kɔkɔɛ kĩ miwɛ mi akũ kalɛ.
52004010	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ miawɛ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Makedonia flee a kalɛ, lɛmɛ bɔake mi aduli kĩ mikɛna foe fɔba lɔmɔ.
52004011	Mi botaɛ fɔnya kĩ miadzi nkpã nɛ akũ kadɔla kamɛ, odi nyɛ odi ɛdã ye adzuma. Mikɔa awɛ mikɛna mi mɔawɛ adzuma minya ndɛ ayekĩ bubi mi a.
52004012	Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ batɛ badonɛ a lɛkpa mi obu, lɔkɔa miláakɔa anɛ mite nɛ odima lɛtsama akũ.
52004013	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ bɔabi mi lɛtsa kĩ laaya nɛ bati kĩ biku bɛtɛ̃ a akũ, ayekĩ miláadzi nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ kamɛ ndɛ bati kĩ bɛlá kɔnɛte.
52004014	Bɔtɛ budo kĩ Yesu ku ade ebuki eyidza edzi nkpã a. Foesũ bɔtɛ budo kĩ batɛ badonɛ flee a kĩ biku a ni, Baguma aafɔ̃ Yesu lɛkpã be ɛyamɛna nɛ ye kaya kamɛ.
52004015	Lɛtsa a kĩ bɔatsa mi finyaakĩĩ nyɛ boe Ɔlate fɔtsa katsa, kĩ boe a kĩ bɔ́adzi nkpã nɛ luwi a kĩ boe Ɔlate aaya akũ a ni, bɔláanya bikĩ biku a lɔtɔ mɔ ode kanaa.
52004016	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na ni, bɔ́anu boe Ɔlate kaya a mɔ fɔwɔla kɔɔba. Bɔ́anu ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a odo. Baguma kagbulɛɛ aanɛ, lɔkɔa boe Ɔlate mɔawɛ aato ode ɛya. Bati a kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido fɔmɔ biku a aanya lɔtɔ biyidza.
52004017	Ke liti a, Baguma aakpɔta boe a kĩ bute budzi nkpã a ɛnaabumɔ bikĩ biyidza a, bɔnaatsɛlamɔ boe Ɔlate nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ. Lɔkɔa bɔ́adzi nɛ boe Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃ daa.
52004018	Foesũ mikɔa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mikaadɔla mi bawaɛ̃ tɔwɔlɛ.
52005001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, fɔtásĩ kĩ matsɛlɛ lɛtsama mma mi futomɛna lɔkɔ ĩye fuwi a kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ aaya a akũ,
52005002	kitonɛkĩ mi mɔawɛ minyina yededeede kĩ boe Ɔlate Kaya Luwi a aaya ndɛ ayekĩ oyekpanɛ afuta oti mɔ lɛnyɛ.
52005003	Lɔkɔ a kĩ bati alɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa yamɔ lukudɔ mɔ kadzi wĩ a, ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ mɔ baawɔla be deedimɔapɛ a. Fɔ́aya ndɛ ayekĩ sɛmɛ api ɔmatsɔ̃, ade kalo lɛláana a.
52005004	Lɛmɛ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi kɔ̃ miláa ɔtũ kamɛ. Foesũ luwi a na lɛtayaafuta mi ndɛ oyekpanɛ aye,
52005005	kitonɛkĩ mi flee minyɛ ɔhaĩ bati. Ade bɔnyɛ́ bati kĩ bakɛna fɔtsa nɛ lɛnyɛ ĩye ɔtũ kamɛ a.
52005006	Foesũ mitawa tida ndɛ bati bɛbã, mbom mina nɛ kukũmanɛ mɔ kɔnɛte kamɛ.
52005007	Lɛnyɛ bati awa tida, ade bikĩ bavɛ bamɔa kawuga ni, lɛnyɛ bawugɛla be.
52005008	Lɛmɛ kĩ ɔhaĩ kamɛ bati bɔanɛ sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa boe katɛkado mɔ ɔdɔ bɔkɛna ɔwɔlɛ libĩĩ katɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ, mɔ boe kɔnɛte nɛ boe nkpã akũ bɔkɛna sɔbɔtsaɛ lɔbɔɛ.
52005009	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tápau boe kĩ yaakɔa ye kawũnaba a ɛwɔla boe, mbom kĩ bɔ́atsã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ bɔna nkpã katɛ.
52005010	Yesu ku nɛ boe lɔlɔ, kĩ ntɛ budzi o-o, ĩye ntɛ buku o-o, bɔ́adzimɔ ye nɛ ye kabuki kaya kamɛ.
52005011	Nɛ foesũ ni, mikaado akũ fi, mikaabumɛna akũ ndɛ ayekĩ milamɛna kakɛna finyaa a.
52005012	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔake mi aduli kĩ mikɔa obu wĩ mikpa mi lɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bakɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ, kakpã mi nɛ Kristo nkpã kadzi kamɛ a.
52005013	Miwɛ be kalɛ, mikpa be obu paa nɛ adzuma a kĩ bakɛna a sũ. Ade midzi mɔ akũ nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ a.
52005014	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ midɛ banyɔnɛpo, mido bikĩ bideĩ libe a ɔwɔlɛ, mibumɛna bikĩ akpɔ veli be a. Mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mikpa odi nyɛ odi.
52005015	Midã kadã wĩ kĩ odima ɛtakɔa tɔkpa ese tɔkpa kɔtɔ, mbom mibɔa mbɔdi kĩ miakɛna tuwĩ mikpa akũ mɔ odi nyɛ odi.
52005016	Mimɔ kawɔlɛ luwi daa.
52005017	Mikaabɔa mpaɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
52005018	Minyɛ boe Ɔlate kɔlɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade fukĩĩ bamɛ Baguma awɛ etomɛna be a kĩ bitomɔ Yesu Kristo a.
52005019	Mitasua Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ a osi.
52005020	Mitasupa Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a.
52005021	Mbom misɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa midã lɔkɔa mipi fuwĩ a midomɔ akũ.
52005022	Milo nɛ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi ɔwɛ̃.
52005023	Bɔwɛ kĩ Baguma kĩ yakpa boe lukudɔ a, ɛkpalɛ mi akũ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ, ɛdã mi hũhũ, mi tɛkla mɔ mi sukɛna flee. Ɛnyɛ mi nɛ mfumsu flee kamɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kabuki kaya a kamɛ.
52005024	Baguma a kĩ ɛvɛ mi a aakɛna foe, kitonɛkĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali.
52005025	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mikaabɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe malo lɔlɔ.
52005026	Bɔawɔ̃na batɛ badonɛ a flee nɛ ɔdɔ mɔ kawɔlɛ kamɛ.
52005027	Mawã mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔbɛ̃ akũ kĩ mikã ovoli kĩĩ mitsa batɛ badonɛ a flee.
52005028	Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
53001001	Yĩ, Paulo, Silvano mɔ Timoteo, bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ bɔama mi a kĩ minyɛ Baguma mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bade a nɛ Tesalonika.
53001002	Bɔwɛ kĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga, mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
53001003	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ bɔanyɛ ye kɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ mi katɛkado abo anɛ, ade mi bawaɛ̃ akũ kawɛ lɛmɛ lamɛna lɔtɔ kanaa a.
53001004	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bɔapia nɛ mi akũ katsa Baguma tɛsɔli a. Bɔapia lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ mi katɛkado a akũ, titɔ kĩ bitomɔ mi liti ade miamɔ lubo lɛmɛ.
53001005	Fukĩĩ flee atsa kĩ Baguma kadzɛ kamɛ kpalɛ, nɛ foesũ yaamɔ mi kĩ mikpɔla mikpa kadzikɔ̃ nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ de akũ miamɔ lubo a kamɛ.
53001006	Baguma aakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ nɛ de osi akũ, ade yaavɛlɛ lubo kamɔ eko nɛ bikĩ bɛmɔna mi lubo akũ a.
53001007	Yaafɔ̃ mi a kĩ mimɔ́ lubo a, mɔ boe a flee bɔna kawɛya. Baguma aakɛna fukĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ anɛ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ nɛ fi mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ.
53001008	Yaavɛlɛ bati a kĩ binyína Baguma, mɔ bikĩ bisĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a sɔtɔ.
53001009	Boe Ɔlate aablɔmɛna be nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ mɔ ye awã kĩ ye kukũkpalɛ mɔ ye kɔbɛ̃ deĩ a. Yaawɔla be mɔ odu mɔ odu,
53001010	ntɛ ɛya nɛ Luwi kpale a akũ. Yaatɛ obu mɔ kamu etomɛna ye batɛ badonɛ a flee sɛkɛ̃. Mi malo míana nɛ be kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ ye fɔlɛtsa wĩ a kĩ bubi mi a mido.
53001011	Ade fukĩĩ sũ bɔabɔa mpaɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ a. Bɔawã Baguma kĩ ɛfɔ̃ mi kadzi kamɛ kiketimɔ kavɛ a kĩ ɛvɛ mi a. Ye kɔbɛ̃ kɔfɔ̃ mi tuwĩ kakɛna flee nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.
53001012	Fɔ́atsã fukĩĩ akũ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ aade nɛ ode, mi malo mina dĩ kadɛla nɛ ode mitomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Baguma mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔnyakamɔ sũ.
53002001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ bɔabi mi fɔlɛtsa fudi nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kabuki kaya mɔ boe kakpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a akũ.
53002002	Ntɛ minu kĩ boe Ɔlate kaya luwi a ya kɔkɔɛ ni, mitafɔ̃ mi kakɔna litutulu ĩye libe liwo mi. Ɔsa míakɔna kĩ boe lɛlɛ fukĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃, ĩye kĩ bɔlɛ Baguma kalɛ a, ĩye kĩ bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli odi bɔma mi.
53002003	Mitafɔ̃ oti odima lɛkɛ mi nɛ osi odima akũ, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate luwi a lɛláaya mbɔɛntɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bati pii aayidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma akũ a ya, ade oti kpa a kĩ Baguma nyɛ eyi kĩ yaawɔla a aanɛ ɛdza a.
53002004	Oti Kpa a aayidza ɛdza nɛ Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ adi nyɛ adi akũ, ĩye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bati asum akũ, lɔkɔa ɛbɔɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ hũhũ a flee. Malo kɔlaa, yanadzá nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ, ɛkɛna ye akũ kĩ ye nyɛ Baguma mɔawɛ a.
53002005	Miáte anɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a mbi mi fukĩĩ bamɛ?
53002006	Lɛmɛ kɔbɛ̃ kudi sua foe kaya osi finyaakĩĩ. Mi mɔawɛ a minyina lɛtsa kĩ fɔanɛ. Oti Kpa a aanyɛ ye akũ kanya ntɛ ye lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ.
53002007	Tɔkpa kakɛna kɔbɛ̃ lamɛna adzuma kakɛna nɛ kabɛla kamɛ kɔkɔɛ. Lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya a ni, fɔláaya nɛ foe kamɛ tɔ̃ kɛnaawo kĩ Baguma nyɛ oti a kĩ yasua foe osi.
53002008	Fukĩĩ liti ni, Baguma aanyɛ oti kpa a kanya, lɛmɛ ntɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu ya ni, yaakɔa ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ otutuo ɛkɔ ye lɔkɔa ɛkɔa ye kukũkpalɛ ɛwɔla ye.
53002009	Oti Kpa a na aaya mɔ Abonsam kɔbɛ̃, lɔkɔa ɛkɛna awãwã mɔ fɔvã nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ.
53002010	Ade bati a kĩ baya kawɔkɔ̃ a ni, oti kpa a aatsã ablɔ tɛdake tisi nyɛ tisi akũ ɛkɛ be. Baawɔ kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ wĩ a kĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ Baguma lɛkpa be nkpã a bido.
53002011	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, Baguma aakɔa hũhũ kĩ yaafɔ̃ bɛyɛla osi edo nɛ be kamɛ ayekĩ baatɛ fɔvã kama fɔlɛtsa bido.
53002012	Foe kawũna aanya kĩ, Baguma aakɔ be flee kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a bido, mbom bamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna akũ.
53002013	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kɛfɛta kĩ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ daa nɛ mi lɔlɔ, kitonɛkĩ yawɛ mi kalɛ paa. Kito anɛ kayɔkayi a, Baguma nyɛ mi kĩ mina katɛ. Ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛkpalɛ mi akũ nɛ ayekĩ mitɛ kalɛ wĩ a mido sũ.
53002014	Ade fɔtsã Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ bubi mi a akũ sũ ni, Baguma vɛ mi kĩ miyaana tsɛfã nɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.
53002015	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, midza kɔɔba, mipi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔtsa mi nɛ boe fɔtsa katsa, mɔ boe tuvoli kamɛ a midomɔ akũ.
53002016	Bɔawã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, mɔ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kĩ yawɛ boe kalɛ a, kĩ nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ ni, ɛkpa boe ɔwɔlɛ kado mɔ kɔnɛte pii,
53002017	ɛkpa mi kɔbɛ̃, edo mi tɔwɔlɛ fi nɛ kɔdzɛla wĩ kalɛ, mɔ tudzuma wĩ kakɛna kamɛ.
53003001	Yĩ kalɛ kawũnade nyɛ kĩ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a aagba nɛ fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ, lɔkɔa bɛtɛ ke mɔ obu ndɛ ayekĩ fɔna nɛ mi kamɛ a.
53003002	Mibɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna tɔkpa mɔ bati kpa awɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ bati flee lɛtɛ kalɛ a bido.
53003003	Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate nyɛ ɔnɔkɔalini, ade yaado mi kɔbɛ̃, ɛdã mi akũ ayekĩ okesĩnɛ a lɛláanya mi akũ.
53003004	Boe Ɔlate akpa boe katɛkado nɛ mi akũ kĩ míakɛna nɛ fukĩ bɔtsa mi a akũ, ade bɔatɛ kado kĩ míakɛna nɛ foe akũ lɛmɛ a.
53003005	Bɔawã Baguma kĩ ɛkpa mi ye ɔdɔ a kayɔkanu baũ, mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado a kĩ Kristo akpa a.
53003006	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔasi mi mbla nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ kĩ mivɛlɛ mi akũ nɛ batɛ badonɛ banyɔnɛpo a kĩ baákɛna nɛ fɔtsa kĩ bɔtsa mi akũ a ɔwɛ̃.
53003007	Mi mɔawɛ minyina yededeede kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna adzuma ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔkɛna a, kitonɛkĩ bɔtákɛna ɔnyɔnɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a.
53003008	Bɔtákɔa boe kanya bute nɛ odima akũ kĩ bɔtáse kɔtɔ. Mbom bɔkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa ayekĩ odima lɛláabɔa kɔtɔ nɛ boe akũ kadã kamɛ.
53003009	Budeĩ osi kufɛ kĩ bɔakɔa boe akũ kadã bute nɛ mi akũ, lɛmɛ bɔkɛna foe kĩ mikɔlɛ mitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃.
53003010	Míate anɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, bɔkabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ kĩ yaakɛna adzuma ni, ɛtanya lɛmɛ.
53003011	Bɔabi mi fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ kitonɛkĩ bɔanu kĩ banyɔnɛpo badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, kĩ baákɛna lɛtsama kɛba bakɔba akũ fɔlɛtsa katsã kalɛ.
53003012	Bɔasi bati kĩĩ mbla bɔkpa be kɔdɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ, kĩ bidzi kadzi wĩ lɔkɔa bɛkɛna adzuma bɛdã be mɔawɛ akũ.
53003013	Lɛmɛ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi nɛ tuwĩ kakɛna kamɛ.
53003014	Ade ntɛ odi lákɛna nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔabi mi nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ akũ ni, miyi ye ɔsũ lɔkɔa mifɔnɛ ye awɛ, kɔnyɔã kuwo ye.
53003015	Lɛmɛ mitabɔɛ ye likesĩ, mbom midɛ ye ndɛ ɔwaɛ̃ aye.
53003016	Bɔawã boe Ɔlate mɔawɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ lukudɔ oti a, kĩ ɛkpa mi lukudɔ daa nɛ mi kadzi kamɛ. Boe Ɔlate ɛdãmɛna mi flee akũ.
53003017	Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lɛtsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ makla mi. Ade aye mado awɛ nɛ yĩ tuvoli flee kayɔ a, ade aye lɛmɛ matsɛlɛ fɔtsa a.
53003018	Bɔawã kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi flee kɔnya.
54001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ ĩnyɛ Yesu Kristo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, kĩ Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ a pau, mɔ Kristo Yesu kĩ ye akũ budeĩ kɔnɛte a sɛkɛ̃.
54001002	Nkɔa mmɛna nɔ Timoteo, kĩ ɔnyɛ yĩ obi nɛ katɛkado kamɛ. Mawã kĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga, mɔ Kristo Yesu boe Ɔlate bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkɛna mi sɛmɛ kalɛ, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
54001003	Mawɛ kĩ buki kadzi nɛ Efeso ndɛ ayekĩ nwɛ ntomɛna nɔ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ndzakũ manaa Makedonia a. Bati badi deĩ nɛ awã kĩ batsa fɔvã fɔtsa nɛ Kristo katɛkado a akũ, ade kɛnɛ kĩ ate awɛ nɛ be akũ a.
54001004	Bi be kĩ bɛfɔ̃ lɔkɔ kade kabula nɛ atitifɔ fɔlɛtsa mɔ bawanyɔ bawanyɔ kasinu katokɔ̃ fɔtsa katsa awɛ. Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bamɛ katsa ayamɛna fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ nɛ bati kayite. Foe bamɛ lɛnyɛ́ Baguma nhihiɛ kĩ ɛkɛna. Katɛkado odi kamɛ bɔatsã kanyi foe.
54001005	Lɛtsa a kĩ de sũ makpa nɔ mbla kĩĩ nyɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔanyi ɔdɔ a kĩ eto ɔwɔlɛ kpalɛwa, adzuni kpalɛwa mɔ katɛkado wĩ kamɛ.
54001006	Lɛmɛ bati badi muniki nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ liti, foesũ bɛyɛla osi wĩ a, ade bɛkɔa be lɔkɔ bɛkpa fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ mɔ fɔkɔasiatsa kalɛ a.
54001007	Bawɛ kĩ banya Mose mbla fɔtsa batsanɛ. Lɛmɛ baánu be mɔawɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ balɛ, ĩye fukĩ bɛtɛ bido mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a kayɔ malo.
54001008	Boe flee bunyina kĩ Mose mbla a nɛnɛ, ntɛ bɔakɛna nɛ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔfɛta a.
54001009	Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔate anɛ kĩ bɛtákɛna mbla bɛkpa bati wĩ, mbom bikĩ bafum Baguma mbla, bikĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ, bikĩ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ, bikĩ binyína Baguma, mɔ bikĩ tɔkpa yi be kamɛkamɛ. Badi lɛmɛ nyɛ bikĩ bɛláa katɛkado kadima kamɛ, bikĩ bakɔ be balɛga mɔ bama, mɔ awudifɔ.
54001010	Bati bɛbã lɛmɛ nyɛ bikĩ bɛkɔa akũ bɛkpa linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, banyole kĩ bawamɔ akũ, bati kĩ bapili bati kanɔ, bavãlɛvã, bikĩ balɔ fubo kama fɔvã, mɔ be flee a kĩ bitómɔ fɔtsa wĩ a katsa.
54001011	Fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ a deĩ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ bɛkɔa bido nɛ yĩ awɛ kĩ nlɛ a kamɛ. Kalɛ Wĩ a to Baguma a kĩ bɔakɔa obu mɔ nhila kakpa a sɛkɛ̃.
54001012	Nláapuli ĩnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔlɛ nɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ nnɛɛ makɛna adzuma wĩ kĩĩ akũ. Manyɛ ye kɔlɛ kĩ ɛmɔ́ kĩ nkpɔla sũ ɛpau yĩ kĩ nkɛna ye adzuma,
54001013	titɔ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, nsupa ye, ntomɔ ye liti, nvũna ye malo. Lɛmɛ Baguma mɔ́ yĩ kɔnya, kitonɛkĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, ntátɛ ye ndo ade ntányi lɛtsa a kĩ de nkakɛna a.
54001014	Ade boe Ɔlate mɔ́ yĩ kɔnya pii, ɛfɔ̃ nna katɛkado mɔ ɔdɔ kĩ fɔnyɛ boe fude nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
54001015	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ malɛ nɛ awĩ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ paa, kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bati bɛtɛ ke bido. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ Kristo Yesu ya nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kĩ yayaatɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ. Yĩ nyɛ ɔkpade flefle nɛ be kamɛ.
54001016	Lɛmɛ Baguma mɔ́ yĩ kɔnya ayekĩ Kristo Yesu aapuli ɛkɔa yĩ a kĩ ĩnyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ flee a, ɛtsa bati bɛmɔ́ ayekĩ edeĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, lɔkɔa bikĩ bayatɛ ye bido a bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
54001017	Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa obu mɔ kamu bɔkpa boe Lɛgã kĩ edzi kito titiiti a, kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ, kĩ ye odi keĩ nyɛ Baguma a daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
54001018	Yĩ obi Timoteo, kɔdɛ a kĩ makpa nɔ nɛ awĩ a tsɛ̃ nɛ katɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ lɛ nɛ nɔ akũ biyi a akũ. Kɔa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kakɛna ndɛ kawũkanɔ fɔtsa lɔkɔa kanɔ kawũ a kanɔ wĩ.
54001019	Pi nɔ katɛkado nɛ Kristo kamɛ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kakpalɛ kalɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Bati badi tátse be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔdɛ ade bɛyɛla be katɛkado a.
54001020	Be kamɛ badi nyɛ Himenaio mɔ Aleksandro, kĩ nvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ, nkɔa be ndo nɛ Abonsam awɛ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bɛfɔ̃ fubusuotsa kalɛ nɛ Baguma akũ.
54002001	Fɔtsa fɔtɔnyade kĩ mawɛ kĩ mikɛna nyɛ kĩ mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ bati flee lɔlɔ. Mikaavia mi fɔtsa sĩwa mɔ be fude flee katomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃, mikaanyɛ ye kɔlɛ nɛ be flee lɔlɔ.
54002002	Mikaabɔa mpaɛ kakpa fɔgã mɔ bikĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ bati onukpɛ̃, ayekĩ bɔ́adzi kulokulo nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ, lɔkɔa bupuli busum Baguma nɛ obu kamɛ.
54002003	Fukĩĩ nɛnɛ, fɔade Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ a kawɔlɛ,
54002004	kitonɛkĩ yawɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi ɛna katɛ lɔkɔa enu ɔnɔkɔali a kayɔ.
54002005	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Baguma mɔapɛ deĩ, ade ayea lɛmɛ lɛma ɔkplanɛ mɔapɛ deĩ nɛ Baguma mɔ batidziwa kayite a. Ade ye nyɛ Kristo Yesu a.
54002006	Ade ye lɔkɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ bati flee lɔlɔ a. Ade fukĩĩ atsa kĩ lɔkɔ wĩ a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaatɛ katinya kamɛ bati flee a wo ɔtɔ a.
54002007	Ade fukĩĩ sũ Baguma do yĩ ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ mɔ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ katɛkado mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a akũ. Nnɛ́ fɔvã mama, ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ malɛ.
54002008	Nɛ asɔli adi nyɛ adi kamɛ ni, banyole a bɛnya bikĩ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ kĩ baapuli bɛdɛla akpɔ nɛ ode bɛbɔa mpaɛ kĩ kalɔkpa ĩye ɔdzɛ lɛláa be kamɛ.
54002009	Mawɛ lɛmɛ kĩ batsole bɛdɔla be akũ, bidzi tilima nɛ osi kĩ fɔláatsɔlɛ anɛ akũ. Fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ basui tɔlɔ nɛ kahɛhɛ kamɛ, bido sika ngbã mɔ fɔtsa kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya. Bɛtado tɛtadiɛ kĩ tatɛ kɔya lɛmɛ.
54002010	Mbom be fɔtsakɛlawa fɔnya fɔtsa wĩ ndɛ batsole kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa Baguma.
54002011	Kɛnɛ kĩ batsole bɛdɔla be akũ, bitse kulokulo bɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa.
54002012	Ntákpa be osi kĩ batsa banyole fɔtsa ĩye kĩ bɛnya banyole akũ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bisua onukpɛ̃ bidzi kulokulo.
54002013	Kitonɛkĩ Adam Baguma nya lɔtɔ ɛbɔa fɔmɔ ɛyakɛna Eva.
54002014	Ade nnɛ́ Adam Abonsam kɛ, mbom otsole a ɛkɛ ade ɛfɔ̃ efum Baguma mbla a.
54002015	Lɛmɛ otsole aana nkpã nɛ ye kɔma kamɛ ntɛ edzi nɛ katɛkado mɔ ɔdɔ kamɛ, ɛkɛna ye akũ yedede nɛ akũ kadɔla kamɛ lɛmɛ.
54003001	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ ntɛ oti odi awɛ kĩ yanya asɔli lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ni, adzuma wĩ liti etomɛna.
54003002	Kɛnɛ kĩ asɔli lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɛnya oti kĩ nfumusu lɛláa ye akũ, kĩ ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ mɔapɛ, ye adzuni waa yedede, yapi ye akũ ade bati akpa ye obu a. Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ yapuli katɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ ade yapuli katsa fɔtsa a.
54003003	Kɛtánɛ kĩ ɛnya bavɛ owuganɛ ĩye oti kĩ ye anɛ kamɛ tádɔ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ ɛdɔ, kĩ yaákɛna ɔdzɛ, ade ɛlá anɛngbã nɛ sika akũ a.
54003004	Kɛnɛ kĩ epuli ɛdãmɛna ye tɔtɔ akũ kadãmɛna wĩ, lɔkɔa ye babi bibu fɔkɔ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ.
54003005	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ onyole lápuli ɛdãmɛna ye tɔtɔ akũ ni, nde yaapuli ɛkpã Baguma asɔli a?
54003006	Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ ebuna owi nɛ asɔli a kamɛ, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni yaadɛla ye akũ nɛ ode, lɔkɔa fɔtsã lukũta kamɛ ɛyaatɔ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔya fɔkpa okesĩnɛ a.
54003007	Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ batɛ badonɛ a malo abɔa ye dĩ wĩ, ayekĩ ɛláado ye akũ kɔnyɔã lɔkɔa ewo nɛ okesĩnɛ a awɛ kamɛ.
54003008	Ade aye lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ asɔli lɔtɔ banyanɛ babumɛnanɛ a malo banya bati kĩ bideĩ ɔbla wĩ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali a. Bɛnya bati kĩ baáwuga bavɛ ade bɛlá anɛngbã nɛ sika lɛmɛ akũ.
54003009	Kɛnɛ kĩ bapi katɛkado fɔlɛtsa wĩ a kĩ bɛnyɛ bɛtsa a bidomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, bidzi mɔ tɔwɔlɛ kpalɛwa.
54003010	Ade kɛnɛ kĩ basɔ be bɛdã nɛ asɔli tudzuma tidi kakɛna kamɛ. Ntɛ bɛkpɔla ni, baapuli bɛkɛna adzuma ndɛ lɔtɔ banyanɛ babumɛnanɛ aye.
54003011	Kɛnɛ kĩ batsɔ̃ malo bɛna tɛbla wĩ, kĩ bɛtanya bati kĩ balɛ bati akũ fɔlɛtsa. Bɛnya batsole kĩ baámɔa bavɛ kawuga, kĩ badi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kakɛna kamɛ.
54003012	Dã kĩ babumɛnanɛ kĩĩ be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi deĩ ɔtsɔ̃ mɔapɛ, epuli yadãmɛna ye babi mɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee akũ kadã wĩ.
54003013	Babumɛnanɛ a kĩ bakɛna be adzuma kakɛna wĩ a deĩ kadzakɔ̃ wĩ nɛ bati anɛ, ade baapuli bɛna ɔwɔlɛ kɔbɛ̃ bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ be Kristo Yesu katɛkado akũ a.
54003014	-
54003015	Titɔ kĩ matsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mma nɔ malo ni, nlamɛna osi kadã kĩ maayasɛla nɔ nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ matsɛlɛ ye ayekĩ ntɛ nkpa liti ni, aanyi ayekĩ bati bipi be akũ nɛ Baguma asɔli a kamɛ. Ade asɔli a nyɛ bikĩ bɛtɛ Baguma a kĩ edzi nkpã daa bido, kĩ fɔnyɛ luku kĩ lɛnɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔali a.
54003016	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, kalɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla nɛ Baguma ɔsum kamɛ a nyɛ kalɛ kpale kĩ odima lɛláapuli esĩ ke. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ, “Kristo ya nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ otidziwa aye Baguma Hũhũ a nyɛ ɛtsa kĩ oti kpalɛwa yanɛ. Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ́ ye, ade bide lɛtsã nɛ ye akũ nɛ fude fude kamɛ a. Bɛtɛ ye bido nɛ katinya kamɛ flee, ade Baguma bɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode nɛ kukũkpalɛ kamɛ a.”
54004001	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a nyɛ ɛtsa yededeede kĩ, nɛ fuwi nkaɛ a kamɛ ni, bati badi aafɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔali katɛkado kĩĩ awɛ bitse hũhũ kpa a kĩ yakɛ bati, mɔ hũhũ kpa fɔtsa katsa.
54004002	Fɔvã bati kĩĩ aagbamɛna fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ odu. Bɛnyɛ bikĩ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kakɔna ku ndɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ mɔ ovio bɛkɔa bipila te.
54004003	Batsa fɔtsa kĩ kɔtsɔ̃ mɔ kɔnyɔ kadzi lɛnɛ́nɛ. Balɛ lɛmɛ kĩ kɛtánɛ kĩ bati anya funitsã fudi odu. Lɛmɛ Baguma lɛkɛna funitsã a na bamɛ, kĩ bikĩ bɛtɛ bido mɔ binyi ɔnɔkɔali a, bɛbɔa mpaɛ nɛ foe akũ bɛnya.
54004004	Nɛ ayekĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ Baguma bɔa nɛnɛ sũ ni, kɛtánɛ kĩ bati asĩ funitsã fudima, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bɔatɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa mɔ kɔlɛkanyɛ nɛ foe akũ.
54004005	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kalɛ a mɔ boe kɔlɛkanyɛ a akpalɛ funitsã a akũ.
54004006	Ntɛ atsa awaɛ̃ amɛ batɛ badonɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ ni, lɔkɔa aanya Kristo Yesu ɔsumunɛ wĩ, kĩ bɛdɔɔla mɔ katɛkado fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mɔ boe fɔtsa katsa wĩ a kĩ opini a.
54004007	Foesũ vɛlɛ nɔ akũ nɛ atitifɔ katɛkado fɔlɛtsa mɛwa mɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔlá kayɔ ɔwɛ̃. Kɔa hũhũ kamɛ nkpã kadzi kavɛlɛ nɔ akũ. Baguma fɔlɛtsa a, tomɔ foe liti pintii, kadzi nkpã wĩ ndɛ ɔtɛ odonɛ aye.
54004008	Akũ ɔsĩ nɛnɛ kɔ̃, lɛmɛ ayekĩ bakɔlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa mɔ foe akũ kakɛna akpa nfasɔ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa. Kitonɛkĩ fɔakpa nɔ nfasɔ nɛ nkpã kĩĩ kamɛ mɔ nkpã nɛ wuda liti a lɛmɛ kamɛ.
54004009	Ade ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kĩĩ kɛnɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi atɛ edo a.
54004010	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bɔapuli kakɛna adzuma kɔɔba, kitonɛkĩ boe anɛ teĩ nɛ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a akũ. Ye nyɛ bati flee a kĩ titiliwu bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a Ɔtɛnɛ.
54004011	Kɛnɛ kĩ atsa be fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee, ɔdã kĩ odi nyɛ odi kɔlɛ foe.
54004012	Tafɔ̃ oti odima lɛdã nɔ ndɛ obisɛ̃ nɛ ayekĩ ɔnyɛ opopo sũ. Mbom kɔa nɔ akũ kakɛna nfantuhũ wĩ kakpa batɛ badonɛ a nɛ nɔ kɔdzɛla, nɔ ɔbla, nɔ bati kawɛ, nɔ katɛkado, mɔ nɔ kadzi yedede kamɛ.
54004013	Fɔmɔ maaya ni, kaakã Baguma kalɛ a katsa be nɛ asɔli, kakaanyɛ foe kayɔ katsa be, katsa be fɔtsa lɛmɛ.
54004014	Tafɔ̃ hũhũ kamɛ futetsa a kĩ Baguma kɔa edo nɛ nɔ kamɛ a akũ adzuma kakɛna. Bɛkpa nɔ foe bɛtsãmɛna Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ asɔli banɔkɔɛ̃ te awɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a.
54004015	Kɔa nɔ akũ flee kakpa nɛ tudzuma kĩĩ flee kakɛna kamɛ. Pi te kadomɔ akũ ayekĩ bati flee aamɔ nɔ adzuma lɔtɔ kanaa biyi ɔsũ.
54004016	Di nɔ akũ oni nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ atsa a akũ. Pi nɔ adzuma a kadomɔ akũ, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ɔkɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, aatɛ nɔ mɔawɛ a akũ mɔ bikĩ batse nɔ kalɛ a nkpã.
54005001	Tawũni nɛ onyolenɔkɔɛ̃ akũ, mbom dɛ ye nɛ obu kamɛ ndɛ aga aye. Bi bapopo tuwuli ndɛ awaɛ̃nyole amɛ aye.
54005002	Bi batsolenɔkɔɛ̃ tuwuli ndɛ ama amɛ, mɔ bayitsɔ̃ lɛmɛ ndɛ awaɛ̃tsole amɛ nɛ akũ yedede kamɛ.
54005003	Kɔa obu kakpa bakunawa kĩ bɛlá babumɛnanɛ.
54005004	Lɛmɛ ntɛ okunawa odi deĩ babi ĩye bawa ni, babi a bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkɔlɛ be ɔsum kamɛ adzuma kakɛna kakpa be akũ bati, lɔkɔa fɔtsã foe akũ bɛdã be bamanɛ akũ bɛkɔa biyi be ayɛ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lawo Baguma anɛ a.
54005005	Okunawa kĩ ɛlá odima kĩ yadãmɛna ye akũ kɔa ye anɛ ete nɛ Baguma akũ, yabɔa mpaɛ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa kavia ye kabumɛna.
54005006	Lɛmɛ okunawa kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa nkpã kanya ni, eku kɔkɔɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ titɔ kĩ edzi nkpã malo.
54005007	Kpa be kɔdɛ nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ akũ ayekĩ odima lɛláamɔ mfumsu nɛ be akũ.
54005008	Ade ntɛ mi kamɛ odi ládãmɛna ye akũ bati akũ, titiliwu ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bade akũ ni, ade emuniki nɛ katɛkado a liti a. Oti kĩĩ nyɛ oti kpa ɛbɛ̃ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido malo a.
54005009	Takɔa okunawa odima kĩ ɛtátɛ futeli aduesia tɔ̃ dĩ obumɔ bakunawa kĩ bideĩ a. Lɛtsa kĩ libu nyɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ okunawa ɛnya otsole kĩ bɛkɔã deedimɔapɛ,
54005010	ade kɛnɛ kĩ ɛna dĩ wĩ nɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna sũ, ɛnya otsole kĩ ɛdɔɔla ye babi kadɔɔla wĩ, yatɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ lɛmɛ. Ɛnya otsole kĩ yasum ye bakɔba batɛ badonɛ, yabumɔ bati kĩ bideĩ nɛ lubokamɔ kamɛ, ade ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa tuwĩ kakɛna a.
54005011	Takɔa bakunawa kĩ bɛtábo anɛ buĩ odo nɛ katsu a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ kɔnyɔ kadzi kɔ be odo ni, baafɔnɛ Kristo awɛ,
54005012	ade baatu fubo a kĩ bɛlɔ bɛkpa ye a lɔkɔa ɛkɔ be kɔtɔ.
54005013	Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ, babula be lɔkɔ kade, katsã kamini nɛ bati tɔtɔ kamɛ, kadani banyɔnɛpo, kĩ balɛ bati akũ fɔlɛtsa, mɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta kalɛ.
54005014	Foesũ, mawɛ kĩ bakunawa kĩ bɛtábo anɛ a bidzi fɔnyɔ bɛma babi, lɔkɔa bɛdãmɛna be tɔtɔ akũ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bɛláakɛna fɔtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta kĩ fɔ́akpa boe bakesĩnɛ osi bɛkalɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ boe akũ.
54005015	Malɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ bakunawa pii yɛla osi kɔkɔɛ bitomɔ Abonsam.
54005016	Lɛmɛ ntɛ bakunawa deĩ nɛ otsole ɔtɛ odonɛ odi awɛ nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛdã be akũ, ɛtakɔa fɔlɔtsa a ete nɛ asɔli a akũ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ batɛ badonɛ a lɛdã bakunawa a kĩ bɛlá babumɛnanɛ a akũ.
54005017	Kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkpa batɛ badonɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bakpã bati kakpã wĩ a obu mɔ kɔtɔkase kutsu nviã, titiliwu bikĩ bakɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ fɔtsa katsa mɔ fɔtsa kayɔ kanyɛ kamɛ.
54005018	Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Tasui ɔyaɛ kĩ yabumɔ nɔ kamɔnɛ kagɔlɛ onukpɛ̃.” ade, “Kɛnɛ kĩ bise adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kɔtɔ bɛkpa adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a.”
54005019	Ntɛ odi bɔɛ kalɛ nɛ asɔli ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ akũ ni, tatɛ foe ɔkpa ye mbɔɛntɛ otse kalɛ otomɛna adansifɔ nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ sɛkɛ̃.
54005020	Kã bati a kĩ bakɛna tɔkpa anɛ nɛ batɛ badonɛ flee anɛ kamɛ, ayekĩ fɔ́ado babɛbã a libe.
54005021	Ndzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma, mɔ Kristo mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ anɛ kamɛ mabi nɔ nɛ kudulike kamɛ kĩ pi fɔtsa katsa a kadomɔ akũ, tadã oti anɛ nɛ nɔ tudzuma kakɛna kamɛ.
54005022	Tawɛ sɔwa kĩ ate awɛ nɛ odi akũ ɔkpa ye boe Ɔlate adzuma kĩ ɛkɛna. Tado akũ nɛ bati bɛbã tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ. Pi nɔ akũ yededeede.
54005023	Nɛ sɛmɛ kpa kĩ odeĩ sũ ni, takamɔa mui odi mbom kaamɔa bavɛ sukuloo sukuloo fubumɛna nɔ.
54005024	Bati badi titikpa anɛ kanya mɔatsɛ kanya be lɔtɔ kanamɛna kadzɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ badi kɔ̃, liti liti fɔmɔ be tɔkpa anɛ kanya.
54005025	Ade aye a tuwĩ kakɛna lɛmɛ lábɛla a, ade fukĩ fɔbɛla a malo fɔ́anɛ kanya.
54006001	Kɛnɛ kĩ bi batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ basumunɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa obu bɛkpa be balate ayekĩ odima lɛláalɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ Baguma dĩ mɔ boe fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
54006002	Ade kɛtáfɛta kĩ basumunɛ a kĩ be balate nyɛ batɛ badonɛ bɛkɔa be katɛkado kamɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna sũ bisupa be balate a. Mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bisum be kasum wĩ bɛba, kitonɛkĩ balate a kĩ bana be akũ nfasɔ a nyɛ be batɛ badonɛ mɔ bawɛnɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ atsa be ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɔkɔa odo be fi bɛkɛna nɛ foe akũ.
54006003	-
54006004	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatsa fɔtsa kĩ fɔtáketi mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa, mɔ boe katɛkado fɔtsa katsa a ni, oti a naa dɛla ye akũ nɛ ode, ade enyína lɛtsama a. Edeĩ ɔdɔ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ mɔ ɔdzɛ kakɛna mɔ bati akũ. Fukĩĩ ayamɛna lineke kanɔ, ɔdzɛ kakɛna, bati kavũna mɔ adzuni kpa kakɔna nɛ oti akũ.
54006005	Foe lɛmɛ fɔayamɛna fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ. Bati kĩĩ be lɔlɔ kamɛ lɛ́waa yedede ade bɛyɛla ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a lɛmɛ a. Bakɔna kĩ Baguma ɔsum nyɛ akũ kana fɔtsa osi odi.
54006006	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ ntɛ oti yɔɔla anɛ nɛ Baguma liti katomɛna akũ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ edeĩ a fuwo ye anɛ ni, ɛdani osikani,
54006007	kitonɛkĩ awɛ pupulidza bɔkɔa bɔya nɛ katinya kamɛ, ade bɔ́adzakũ mɔ awɛ pupulidza a.
54006008	Foesũ ntɛ budeĩ tilima mɔ funitsã ni, mifɔ̃ fuwo boe anɛ.
54006009	Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ anɛ ayɔɔla be nɛ akũ kana fɔtsa akũ ni, bawo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ ade batɔ a. Fɔkɔasiatsa mɔ fɔwɛtsa kpa tɔwɛ̃ pini be fɔavɛlɛ be kanamɛna lubo kamɔ mɔ kawɔ kamɛ.
54006010	Kitonɛkĩ sika anɛngbã kamɛ tɔkpa kumɛkumɛ flee anɛ kato. Badi tomɔ sika kawɛ liti limii kĩ bɛyɛla katɛkado a, ade biwo nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ pii kĩ ɛfɔ̃ be tɔwɔlɛ tɛ kaakpa kamɛ a.
54006011	Lɛmɛ Timoteo, Baguma oti anɛ sũ vɛlɛ nɔ akũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa kĩĩ flee ɔwɛ̃. Pili kakpa tuwĩ kakɛna, katomɔ Baguma liti nɛ katɛkado, ɔdɔ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado, mɔ akũ kadɔla kamɛ.
54006012	Pili kɔɔba kanya nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a kakpa nɔ akũ. Ade nkpã kĩĩ sũ Baguma pau nɔ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔnyɛ nɔ katɛkado ɔtsa pefee nɛ adansifɔ pii anɛ a.
54006013	Ade makpa nɔ mbla kĩĩ nɛ Baguma kĩ yakpa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nkpã, mɔ Kristo Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ ye katɛkado ɛtsa pefee nɛ Pontio Pilato anɛ kamɛ a dĩ akũ kĩ,
54006014	pi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kadomɔ akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ ayekĩ odima lɛláamɔ tɔkpa nɛ nɔ akũ, kɛnaawo Luwi a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo aabuki ɛya.
54006015	Baguma fɛta ɛkpa obu, yanya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ, ɛnyɛ fɔgã flee Lɛgã. Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa avɛ ye kĩ Baguma Kpale. Ade ye aanyɛ Kristo kanya nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ a kĩ eyi ɛkpa a kamɛ a.
54006016	Ye odi keĩ dzi nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna dadaada, edzi nɛ ɔhaĩ kĩ odima lɛláapuli efuã ɛdã ye a kamɛ. Odima támɔ tɔ̃ ye ade odima lɛláapuli ɛmɔ́ ye da. Ye fude nyɛ kamu, obu mɔ otumi daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
54006017	Dɛ bikĩ bideĩ katinya kamɛ akũ fɔtsa kĩ bɛtapia be akũ, ade bɛtakɔa anɛ bite nɛ akũ kana fɔtsa a kĩ fɔláawa daa akũ, mbom bɛkɔa anɛ bite nɛ Baguma kĩ ye akpa boe lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa mɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ ayekĩ bɔ́amɔ kawɔlɛ a akũ.
54006018	Bi be kĩ bɛkakɛna tuwĩ bɛnya asikafɔ nɛ tudzuma wĩ kakɛna kamɛ, bɛkɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ, bɛkaate ahiãfɔ fɔtsa faa.
54006019	Ntɛ bɛkɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, baakpɔta fɔtsa kĩ fɔáwɔ biyi bɛkpa be akũ nɛ kunya kamɛ, lɔkɔa be awɛ aata nkpã wĩ a.
54006020	Timoteo, dã fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma kɔa edo nɔ nɛ awɛ a akũ kadã wĩ. Tado akũ nɛ kɔlɔmɛna pupulidza mɔ fɔkɔasiatsa kavɛlɛ kamɛ. Ade fukĩĩ badi nɛɛ bakɛ bati kĩ kadikanyi fɔlɛtsa fɔanɛ a.
54006021	Kitonɛkĩ badi bɔɛ be akũ kĩ binyina fukĩna bamɛ, lɛmɛ fɔtsɛ̃ foe akũ bɛyɛla katɛkado osi a. Mawã Baguma kĩ ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
55001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ Baguma kawɛ sũ ĩnyɛ Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃. Bido yĩ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ nkpã a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ budeĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu sɛkɛ̃, mɔ bɔmɔ ye ɔmɔa kakɛna a kamɛ.
55001002	Matsɛlɛ mma yĩ obi Timoteo kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ. Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu bɛmɔ nɔ kɔnya, bɛkɛna nɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ, bɛkpa nɔ lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
55001003	Manyɛ Baguma a kĩ masum mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛwa ndɛ ayekĩ boe bawanyɔ kakɛna a kɔlɛ. Ntɛ mabɔa mpaɛ makai nɔ daa. Manyɛ ye kɔlɛ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa ntɛ nkai nɔ nɛ yĩ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ.
55001004	Mate anɛ nɛ nɔ babe a akũ, ade mawɛ kĩ mbuki mmɔ́ nɔ ayekĩ kawɔlɛ aade yĩ.
55001005	Mate anɛ nɛ nɔ katɛkado wĩ a kĩ odeĩ a akũ. Ade katɛkado kĩ kɛna nɛ nɔ ɔwatsɔ̃ Lois mɔ ama Eunike amɛ kamɛ a. Matɛ kado kĩ ade ke odu nɔ malo odeĩ a.
55001006	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ makai nɔ kĩ pi futetsa a kĩ Baguma kpa nɔ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nte awɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a kɔɔba.
55001007	Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma kpa boe a láfɔ̃ bɔavila, mbom ye Hũhũ a afɔ̃ kɔbɛ̃ awo nɛ boe kamɛ, kawɛ bati kalɛ, kapuli kanya boe akũ.
55001008	Foesũ tafɔ̃ kɔnyɔã lɔkɔ nɔ nɛ boe Ɔlate fɔlɛtsa kalɛ kamɛ, ĩye kɔnyɔã lɔkɔ nɔ nɛ yĩ kĩ nwaa kɔla nɛ Kristo sũ. Mbom nɔ malo dza kɔɔba nɛ lubo kamɔ kamɛ, nɛ boe Ɔlate Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma kpa nɔ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kɛna a.
55001009	Baguma lɛkpa boe nkpã ɛvɛ boe kĩ bɔnya ye bade. Nnɛ́ ayekĩ bɔfɛta sũ, mbom fɔnyɛ ye mɔawɛ nhihiɛ mɔ kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa boe a sũ. Ɛkpa boe kɔnyakamɔ kĩĩ ɛtsãmɛna boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu akũ, fɔmɔ katinya yi kayɔ.
55001010	Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ ni, Baguma nyɛ foe kanya ɛtsa boe pefee fɔtsã boe Ɔtɛnɛ Kristo Yesu kaya kamɛ. Ade ye lɛwɔla wuda kɔbɛ̃ a. Ɛtsã Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ɛtsa boe nkpã a kĩ ebuki ɛlá kawũna dadaada a osi a.
55001011	Baguma pau yĩ ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, mɔ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ.
55001012	Ade fukĩĩ sũ mamɔ lubo kĩĩ a. Lɛmɛ kɔnyɔã lákɔ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ ĩnyina oti a kĩ ye ntɛ ndo. Ade ĩnyina kĩ yaapuli ɛdãmɛna lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɔa edo nɛ yĩ awɛ kɛnaawo Luwi nkaɛ a akũ.
55001013	Pi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ntsa nɔ a kalɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ fɔkɛna lɛtsa kĩ de liti otomɛna. Na nɛ katɛkado kĩĩ mɔ ɔdɔ a kĩ fɔnyɛ boe fude nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu kamɛ pintii.
55001014	Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kudeĩ nɛ boe kamɛ a kudo nɔ kɔbɛ̃, kapi fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ bɛkɔa bido nɛ nɔ awɛ a kapi wĩ.
55001015	Onyina kĩ Asiafɔ batɛ badonɛ a flee dzakũ bɛfɔnɛ yĩ, ade ayea Figelo mɔ Hermogene lɛmɛ dzakũ a.
55001016	Mawã Baguma kĩ ɛmɔ Onesiforo mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati kɔnya, kitonɛkĩ ɛkado yĩ ɔwɔlɛ lɔkɔ pii. Kɔnyɔã tákɔ ye kĩ nwaa kɔla sũ.
55001017	Kĩ esila ewo Roma a, ɛtsã emini ɛwɛ yĩ flee kɛnawo kĩ ɛmɔ́ yĩ.
55001018	Mawã Baguma kĩ ɛmɔ ye kɔnya nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ. Ade nɔ mɔawɛ onyina pefee kabumɛna a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ nɛ Efeso a.
55002001	Yĩ obi, do nɔ akũ kɔbɛ̃ mɔ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu a kĩ bɛkpa boe a kamɛ.
55002002	Kɔa fɔtsa a kĩ onu kĩ ntsa nɛ adansifɔ pii anɛ kamɛ a kado nɛ bikĩ ɔtɛ odo kĩ baapuli bɛtsa bati bɛbã lɛmɛ a awɛ.
55002003	Do ɔwɔlɛ kamɔ lubo ndɛ sodzani wĩ kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ ɛkpa Kristo Yesu.
55002004	Sodzani kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ye adzuma akũ ni, yawɛ kĩ yakɛna fɔtsa fuwo ye lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ anɛ, foesũ ɛláado akũ nɛ adzuma kĩ ɛnyɛ́ sodzafɔ adzuma kamɛ.
55002005	Ade ayea fɔmɔ atsɛ owulanɛ aanya akũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ atsɛ kalo mbla akũ.
55002006	Okuani kĩ yanɛ kɔba mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ni, ade ye anya lɔtɔ kanya funitsã a kĩ fubo a.
55002007	Kɔna fɔtsa a kĩ mbi nɔ a akũ, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate aabumɔ nɔ onu foe flee kayɔ.
55002008	Te anɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ Lɛgã Dawid kasinu obi a kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a akũ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsa a. Ade foe nyɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ ke akũ a.
55002009	Ade Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ malɛ a sũ nlamɛna lubo kamɔ, ade ke bido yĩ nɛ nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ kamɛ ndɛ oti kĩ efum a. Lɛmɛ Baguma kalɛ kɔ̃ bɛtádo ke nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ!
55002010	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ mado ɔwɔlɛ kamɔ lubo nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ nɛ Baguma bati a kĩ ɛpau a sũ, ayekĩ nɛ Kristo Yesu akũ be malo baana katɛ mɔ kawɔlɛ nkpã a kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
55002011	Fukĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa kĩ balɛ, “Ntɛ buku mɔ boe Ɔlate ni, bɔ́adzi nkpã lɛmɛ mɔ ye.
55002012	Ntɛ budo ɔwɔlɛ bɔmɔ́ lubo ni, bɔ́anya lɛgã lɛmɛ mɔ ye. Ade ntɛ busĩ ye ni, ye malo yaasĩ boe.
55002013	Ntɛ boe bɔákɛna nɛ boe katɛkado akũ malo ni, ye kɔ̃ yakɛna nɛ ye kalɛ akũ daa, kitonɛkĩ ɛláapuli esĩ ye akũ da.”
55002014	Te bati a fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ anɛ, lɔkɔa kasi be mbla nɛ Baguma anɛ kĩ bɛtakavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ nfasɔ adima lɛláa foe kamɛ, mbom kabula fɔabula bati a kĩ batse foe a katɛkado kade.
55002015	Bɔa mbɔdi kakɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ayekĩ fɔ́awo Baguma anɛ. Kɛna adzuma ndɛ oti kĩ ye adzuma lákɔ ye kɔnyɔã mbom yatsa Baguma ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a pɛpɛɛpɛ.
55002016	Tado nɔ akũ nɛ kɔlɔmɛna kĩ fɔátsa Baguma kavila kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ fɔakpã bati kanɛlitimɛna nɛ Baguma akũ.
55002017	Fɔtsa katsa a na la ndɛ kaakpa kĩ kasa kaba sukɛna. Bati nviã kĩ bɛtsa foe odu nyɛ Himenaio mɔ Fileto.
55002018	Bimuniki nɛ ɔnɔkɔali osi a akũ, ade badani batɛ badonɛ a badi katɛkado a. Bɛkatsa fɔtsa kĩ banɔkpa kabuki kayidza kadzi nkpã ya kɛtɛ̃ kɔkɔɛ.
55002019	Lɛmɛ, Baguma kɔla kayɔkayi litekũ a kĩ eke a ni, lɛtsama lɛláapuli likuna de. Ade kayɔkayi litekũ kĩĩ akũ bɛtsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate nyina bikĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade a.” ade “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate a ode ni, kɛnɛ kĩ emuniki nɛ tɔkpa liti.”
55002020	Nɛ tɔtɔ kpale kamɛ ni, fɔɔdaɛ mɔ titsensi kumɛkumɛ deĩ. Fudi nyɛ sika ngbã fude, fudi lɛmɛ nyɛ sika ovoe fude. Ade fudi lɛmɛ nyɛ tite ĩye titse fude a. Bɛkɔa fukĩ fudeĩ kɔya biyi bɛkpa fuwi titiliwu kanya, ade bɛkɔa fɔbɛbã biyi bɛkpa luwi daa akũ a.
55002021	Foesũ ntɛ oti odi vɔlɛ ye akũ ɛkɛna ye akũ yedede, ɛnɛ nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, yaanya adzuma titiliwu ɔkɛnanɛ kitonɛkĩ bɛkpalɛ ye akũ ade edeĩ nfasɔ ɛkpa boe Ɔlate a.
55002022	Takɔa nɔ akũ ɔkpa fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ foe kakɛna akɔ bapopo odo. Pili katɛkado, nkpã wĩ kadzi, mɔ bati kawɛ. Mimɔ bati a mikɛna fukĩĩ mɔ kadzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ, mibɔa mpaɛ mivia boe Ɔlate kabumɛna mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ yedede.
55002023	Tado onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ kĩ nyansã lɛláa foe kamɛ. Nɔ mɔawɛ a onyina kĩ fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ naa bamɛ ayamɔ ɔdzɛ.
55002024	Kɛtánɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate ɔsumunɛ akɛna ɔdzɛ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi, ɛnya fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ wĩ kĩ edeĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɛkpa bikĩ bideĩ ɔsĩ a.
55002025	Ade ke kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɛkaanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ katsa bati a kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ kalɛ wĩ a akũ a. Ɔsa Baguma aafɔ̃ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛyaanyi ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a.
55002026	Nɛ foe kamɛ a, be adzuni kamɛ aabinya lɔkɔa bɛnɛ nɛ Abonsam kpeĩ kĩ bɛtɔ a, kĩ ɛkɔa be ɛkɛna ye fɔwɛtsa bakɛnanɛ a kamɛ.
55003001	Te anɛ kĩ nɛ fuwi nkaɛ kamɛ ni, kadzi kamɛ aana ɔsĩ.
55003002	Bati aawɛ be odi kalɛ fɔtsa bawɛnɛ, bɛna sika anɛngbã, bɛkabɔa tɔwɔlɛ, bɛkapia akũ. Baanya bati kĩ be akũ awo be anɛ, kĩ bavũna bati, kĩ baákɔa obu kakpa be bamanɛ. Baanya bati kĩ baáyi bati ayɛ, mɔ bikĩ bɛlá katɛkado.
55003003	Baanya bati kĩ bideĩ sɛmɛ ɔnyɛ, bikĩ baámɔ bati kɔnya, bikĩ bama fɔvã kate nɛ bati akũ, mɔ bikĩ baápuli kanya be mɔawɛ akũ. Baanya bati kĩ bideĩ aũkani, baáwɛ kĩ bakɛna tuwĩ.
55003004	Ade badi lɛmɛ aanya bati liti osi batsãnɛ, bati kĩ baakɛna fɔtsa kĩ badɛla be akũ nɛ ode, mɔ bikĩ bawɛ katinya kamɛ kawɔlɛ kamɔ fɔtsa kaba Baguma kawɛ.
55003005	Bati kĩĩ odu aakɛna be akũ ndɛ bati wĩ, lɛmɛ baasĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔ́akpa be nkpã wĩ kadzi a. Vɛlɛ akũ nɛ bati kĩĩ odu ɔwɛ̃.
55003006	Bati kĩĩ odu kamɛ badi atsã nɛ bati tɔtɔ kamɛ kakɛ batsole kĩ baápuli kapi be adzuni. Be titikpa kĩĩ odu kakɛna fɔ̃ batsole a kakɔna láwa kpĩĩ ade bitomɔ fɔwɛtsa pii liti a.
55003007	Batsole kĩĩ odu akɔlɛ fɔtsa vɔɛ̃ luwi daa lɛmɛ baápuli binu ɔnɔkɔali a kayɔ.
55003008	Ndɛ ayekĩ Yane mɔ Yambi yidza bɛdza nɛ Mose akũ a, ade aye fɔtsa batsanɛ kĩĩ lɛmɛ yidza bɛdza nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a akũ a. Be tɔkpa kakɛna bula be adzuni kade, ade bɛyɛla be katɛkado lɛmɛ a.
55003009	Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ lɛláanaa lɔtɔ mɔ foe kakɛna, kitonɛkĩ be fudzimbitsa a aanɛ fɔwa odi nyɛ odi lɛmɔ. Ade aye pɛpɛɛpɛ fɔya nɛ Yane mɔ Yambi akũ a.
55003010	Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ otomɔ yĩ fɔtsa katsa, yĩ ɔbla, yĩ kakɔna mɔ yĩ katɛkado, yĩ bati kalɛ kawɛ, yĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kana mɔ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kado nɛ lubo kamɔ kamɛ.
55003011	Onyina ayekĩ bitomɔ yĩ liti, bɛmɔna yĩ lubo nɛ Antiokia, Ikonio mɔ Listra, mɔ bati liti katomɛna pii a kĩ mpuli ndza nɛ foe kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate nyɛ yĩ nɛ foe flee kamɛ.
55003012	Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yadzi nkpã wĩ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna nɛ Kristo Yesu kamɛ ni, baatomɔ ye liti.
55003013	Lɛmɛ bati kpa mɔ bati bakɛnɛ kɔ̃ ni, be tɔkpa aakade nɛ ode kaba, ade baakakɛ bati, bati bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛkɛ be a.
55003014	Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ ni, pi ɔnɔkɔali fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɔ, kĩ ɔtɛ odo lɛmɛ a kadomɔ akũ, kitonɛkĩ onyina bati a kĩ be sɛkɛ̃ ɔkɔlɛ foe otomɛna.
55003015	Kito anɛ nɔ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ kĩ bɛtsa nɔ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa, kĩ fɔkpa nɔ kadikanyi a kĩ fɔ́akpa nɔ nkpã ntɛ ɔtɛ Kristo Yesu odo.
55003016	Baguma kɔbɛ̃ liwo nɛ bati kamɛ kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa, foesũ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa fɔtsa katsa, oti anɛ kakã, kɔdɛ kakpa, mɔ oti kavɛlɛ kakpa nkpã wĩ kadzi.
55003017	Bɛtsɛlɛ foe ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yasum Baguma ni, yaakpɔla, epuli ɛna nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ ɛkpa fɔtsa wĩ fudi nyɛ fudi kakɛna.
55004001	Ndzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma mɔ Kristo Yesu kĩ yayadzɛmɔ batidziwa mɔ banɔkpa, mɔ ye a kĩ yayanya akũ ndɛ lɛgã aye a anɛ kamɛ, makpa nɔ kɔdɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ,
55004002	ntɛ odeĩ aya ĩye ɔtána aya malo ni, bɔa mbɔdi kade lɛtsã nɛ fɔlɛtsa wĩ a akũ. Dã kĩ atsa bati a fɔtsa, kakã be anɛ lɔkɔa kakaado be kɔbɛ̃. Na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ katsa bati nɛ fukĩĩ flee kakɛna kamɛ. Tafɔ̃ fɔtsa katsa lɛmɛ.
55004003	Kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ lidi aaya kĩ bati lɛláabuki bitse fɔtsa katsa wĩ kĩĩ a. Mbom baatomɛna be mɔawɛ fɔwɛtsa, ade baawɛ fɔtsa batsanɛ bɛbã kĩ baabi be fɔtsa a kĩ akũ asĩ be kĩ binu a.
55004004	Bɛláawɛ kĩ batse ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a, mbom baayi atɔ bitse fɔlɛtsa mɛwa.
55004005	Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ kɛnɛ kĩ api nɔ akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, kaado ɔwɔlɛ nɛ lubo lidi nyɛ lidi kamɛ. Kɛna Kalɛ Wĩ a ɔlɛnɛ kawũna ndɛ Baguma ɔsumunɛ aye.
55004006	Yĩ kɔ̃ ni, lɔkɔ kpɔla liyua kĩ baakɔa yĩ bɛbɔa ndɛ afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma, ade lɔkɔ lɛmɛ wo ɔtɔ kĩ manɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ a.
55004007	Nvũ lɛma wĩ a kavũ wĩ, nlo atsɛ a flee ĩyua ade mpini yĩ katɛkado a nɛ Kristo kamɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a.
55004008	Ade kito finyaa ni, futetsa wĩ a kĩ bakpa akũ banyanɛ nɛ nkpã wĩ kadzi kamɛ a adzɔlɛ yĩ. Ade futetsa kĩĩ boe Ɔlate kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ wĩ a, aakɔa ɛkpa yĩ nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ a. Ade ke nnɛ́ yĩ odi keĩ aatɛ de, mbom mɔ bati flee a kĩ bidzi nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ badã boe Ɔlate kabu kaya a anɛ.
55004009	Bɔa mbɔdi kaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ,
55004010	kitonɛkĩ Dema dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ yĩ, ɛnɛ etomɛna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa kawɛ liti nɛ Tesalonika. Kreske dzakũ ɛnaa Galatia, ade Tito lɛmɛ naa Dalmatia a.
55004011	Luka odi lite nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃. Kpã Marko kayamɛna kitonɛkĩ yaanya obumɛnanɛ paa ɛkpa yĩ nɛ adzuma a kamɛ.
55004012	Ndo Tihiko ɛnaa Efeso.
55004013	Ntɛ aya ni, bɔɛ yĩ osili atadiɛ wulaa a kĩ nkɔa ĩyi nɛ Karpo sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Troa kama yĩ. Bɔɛ yĩ tuvoli lɛmɛ, titiliwu tikĩ bɛkɛna mɔ ɔyaɛ ovoli a kayamɛna.
55004014	Aleksandro kĩ ɛnyɛ otumfɔ a kɛna yĩ fɔlɔɛwotsa paa. Boe Ɔlate aase ye lɛtsa kĩ ɛkɛna yĩ a kɔtɔ.
55004015	Foesũ dã nɔ akũ kadã wĩ nɛ ye akũ, kitonɛkĩ eyidza ɛdza nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɔatsa a akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
55004016	Kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkpã yĩ bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ anɛ a, odima tátomɔ yĩ, be flee bilo bɛfɔnɛ yĩ. Lɛmɛ mawã Baguma kĩ ɛtase be foe kɔtɔ.
55004017	Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate dza nɛ yĩ liti, edo yĩ kɔbɛ̃ ɛfɔ̃ mpuli nlɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a nɛ awã, ade ɛnyɛ yĩ etomɛna wuda awɛ kamɛ a.
55004018	Boe Ɔlate aanyɛ yĩ etomɛna tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi kamɛ, ade yaakpã yĩ bɔɛɛ bɔɛɛ nnaawo nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ a. Kamu mɔ kukũkpalɛ bɔakpa Baguma kito finyaa kanaa daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
55004019	Mawɔ̃na Priska mɔ Akwila, mɔ Onesiforo tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a flee.
55004020	Erasto kahɔ nɛ Korinto ade nfɔnɛ Trofimo kĩ yasɔ awɛ nɛ Mileto a.
55004021	Bɔa mbɔdi kĩ ayawo yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ fɔmɔ osili lɔkɔ aawo ɔtɔ. Eubolo, Pude, Lino, Klaudia, mɔ batɛ badonɛ, batsole mɔ banyole, flee awɔ̃na nɔ!
55004022	Boe Ɔlate ɛnamɔ nɔ hũhũ. Baguma ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
56001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ ĩnyɛ Baguma ɔsumunɛ, mɔ Yesu Kristo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sɛkɛ̃. Baguma pau yĩ ade edo yĩ kĩ mbumɛna bati a kĩ ɛpau a, ntsa be ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ boe katɛkado ɔsum atsa a.
56001002	Ade ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ nɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a akũ a. Baguma kĩ yaáma fɔvã a mɔawɛ lɛma boe kalɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi fɔmɔ ɛkɛna katinya kamɛ a.
56001003	Nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛpau eyi akũ a, ɛnyɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a kanya nɛ ye kalɛ a kĩ mabi mi nɛ awĩ a kamɛ. Bɛkɔa fukĩĩ bido nɛ yĩ awɛ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ foe akũ nɛ Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ dĩ akũ.
56001004	Yĩ obi wĩ Tito, matsɛlɛ nɔ ovoli kĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɔnyɛ ɔmɔa nɛ boe katɛkado a kamɛ. Boe Ɔlɛga Baguma mɔ Kristo Yesu boe Ɔtɛnɛ, bɛmɔ nɔ kɔnya, bɛkpa nɔ lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
56001005	Nkɔa nɔ ndzina nɛ Kreta ayekĩ aalɔla fɔtsa a kĩ fute a kakɛna. Mawɛ kĩ pau asɔli banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔmatɔ odi nyɛ odi kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ntsa nɔ a.
56001006	Kɛtánɛ kĩ bamɔ mfumsu nɛ batɛ badonɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ akũ. Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ mɔapɛ, ade kɛnɛ kĩ ye babi lɛmɛ bɛnya batɛ badonɛ, bɛtanya bati kĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ ĩye baábu fɔkɔ.
56001007	Nɛ ayekĩ asɔli batɛ badonɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ adã Baguma adzuma akũ sũ ni, kɛtánɛ kĩ bɛmɔ mfumsu nɛ ye akũ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ yata akũ, ĩye ɛkana kalɔkpa mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ, ĩye ɛkamɔa bavɛ kawuga, ĩye ɛnya oti kĩ yadã kitikiti, ĩye ɛyɔɔla anɛ nɛ sika akũ.
56001008	Kɛnɛ kĩ epuli ɛtɛ banɔvɔɛ̃, ɛwɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛnɛnɛ, epi ye akũ kapi wĩ. Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ edeĩ ɔbla wĩ, kĩ efĩĩ lɛláa ye akũ ade yapuli kanya ye akũ lɛmɛ a.
56001009	Kɛnɛ kĩ yapi ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a kĩ bɔtɛ budo a, kĩ fuketi mɔ fɔtsa katsa a ɛlɛ. Ade osi kĩĩ akũ yaatsã epuli ɛtsa fɔtsa wĩ, ɛkado bati bɛbã kɔbɛ̃, lɔkɔa ɛnyɛ bikĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ kalɛ a akũ nfumusu ɛtsa be.
56001010	Malɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ bati pii, titiliwu Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛtɛ bido a, deĩ atɔ ɔsĩ, bɛtsɛ̃ balɛ tuwuli pupulidza, kakɛ bati lɛmɛ.
56001011	Kɛnɛ kĩ asua be osi bɛfɔ̃ foe odu katsa, kitonɛkĩ bɛlamɛna bati adzuni kade kabula nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ. Bɛtsɛ̃mɔ fɔtsa kpa kĩ kɛtáfɛta kĩ bɛtsa a katsa, nɛ sika fuu sũ.
56001012	Kretani odi kĩ ɛnyɛ be onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛlɛ kĩ, “Kretafɔ nyɛ bavãlɛvã bati daa, bayaɛ kpa kĩ bideĩ ablɔ, banyakpanɛ mɔ banyɔnɛpo lɛmɛ.”
56001013	Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Nɛ foesũ kã be anɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ayekĩ baana katɛkado kĩ kideĩ ɔsĩ.
56001014	Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bɛnyɛ atɔ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔlɛtsa mɛwa mɔ mbla a kĩ bikĩ bisĩ kalɛ wĩ a atsa a.
56001015	Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa adã yedede kakpa bikĩ be mɔawɛ tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ, lɛmɛ bikĩ be mɔawɛ akũ tákpalɛ, kĩ bɛtátɛ bido lɛmɛ ni, lɛtsama ládã yedede kakpa be, kitonɛkĩ be adzuni mɔ tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ tákpalɛ.
56001016	Bati kĩĩ odu abɔa ɔwɔlɛ kĩ binyina Baguma lɛmɛ be fɔkɛlatsa atsa kĩ bisĩ ye. Bɛnyɛ bati kĩ be akũ deĩ libe, kĩ baábu fɔkɔ ade bɛtáfɛta bɛkpa lɛtsa wĩ lidima kakɛna a.
56002001	Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ ni, tsa fɔtsa a kĩ fuketimɔ katɛkado fɔtsa katsa wĩ a.
56002002	Tsa banyolenɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bidzi mɔ anɛ yedede nɛ kadikanyi mɔ be akũ kapi wĩ kamɛ. Bɛnya bati kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ pintii nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ, bati kĩ bideĩ bati akũ ɔdɔ mɔ bikĩ bado ɔwɔlɛ.
56002003	Ade ayea batsole banɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛmɛ ni, tsa be kĩ bidzi nkpã kĩ ɛfɛta batsole kĩ be akũ kpalɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ banyɛ bati buĩ, ĩye bɛkawuga bavɛ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bɛtsa bati lɛtsa kĩ lɛnɛnɛ,
56002004	bɛtsa bayitsɔ̃ kĩ bidzi fɔnyɔ ayekĩ baawɛ be banyɔ mɔ be babi kalɛ.
56002005	Kɛnɛ kĩ binyi ayekĩ bapi be akũ, bɛkɛna be akũ ɛkpalɛ lɔkɔa bɛnya batsɔ̃ wĩ kĩ badɔla be akũ kakpa be banyɔ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ odima lɛláalɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ Baguma kalɛ a akũ.
56002006	Ade osi mɔapɛ a akũ atsã ɔdɛ bapopo lɛmɛ bɛnya be akũ akũ a.
56002007	Nɛ foe flee kamɛ a, kɛnɛ kĩ nɔ mɔawɛ a anya oti kĩ ye ɔbla wĩ bati akɔlɛ. Kɔa anɛ ovio katsa fɔtsa nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ.
56002008	Bi bati tuwuli nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ ayekĩ bɛláanyɛ nɔ nfumusu. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ kɔnyɔã liwo nɔ bakesĩnɛ nɛ ayekĩ bɛláana lɛtsa kpa bɛlɛ nɛ boe akũ sũ.
56002009	Bati kĩ basum badi ni, bɛdɔla be akũ bɛkpa be balate, bɛkɛna fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́awo balate a anɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ bakpa onukpɛ̃ bɛkpa be.
56002010	Kɛtánɛ kĩ baye be lɛmɛ, mbom bɛtsa be akũ kĩ bɛnyɛ bati wĩ, ade badi ɔnɔkɔali kĩ baapuli bɛtɛ be bido a. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bɛkɔa obu bɛkpa boe fɔtsa katsa nɛ Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ a akũ.
56002011	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma nyɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa katinya kamɛ bati nkpã katɛ a ɛtsa.
56002012	Kɔnyakamɔ kĩĩ atsa boe kĩ bɔfɔnɛ nkpã kpa kadzi mɔ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa kpa liti katomɛna awɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔadzi nkpã kĩ bɔ́anya boe akũ, budzi nkpã wĩ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ.
56002013	Ade osi kĩĩ akũ bɔ́atsã bɔkadzɔlɛ Luwi kpale a kĩ bɔadã anɛ a. Ade luwi kĩĩ akũ mɔ boe Baguma Kpale, mɔ boe Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo aanɛ nɛ kukũkpalɛ kamɛ a.
56002014	Ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa nɛ boe lɔlɔ kĩ yanyɛ boe etomɛna tɔkpa flee kamɛ, ɛkɛna boe bati kpalɛwa kĩ bɛnyɛ ye odi bade a kĩ bɔawɛ kĩ bakakɛna tuwĩ.
56002015	Tsa fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma kpa nɔ, kado bikĩ batse nɔ a kɔbɛ̃. Kã bikĩ bitómɔ osi kĩĩ akũ a anɛ. Tafɔ̃ be kamɛ odima lɛmɔ nɔ ndɛ oti kĩ ɛtákpɔla.
56003001	Te be anɛ kĩ bɛdɔla be akũ bɛkpa abãã mɔ bati a kĩ banya be akũ a, bitse be kalɛ, bɛna nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ bɛkɛna tuwĩ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ.
56003002	Bi be kĩ bɛtalɛ tɔkpa nɛ odima akũ, mbom bidzi nɛ lukudɔ mɔ tɔkɔba kakɛna kamɛ. Bɛkaakɔa obu kakpa odi nyɛ odi.
56003003	Kitonɛkĩ kɔkɔɛ a, boe mɔawɛ malo bɔkɛna fɔkɔasiatsa mɔ atɔ ɔsĩ, ade bɔyɛla osi wĩ a. Kɔkɔɛ lɛmɛ a sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa mɔ kawɔlɛkamɔ futefute nya boe akũ. Bɔkɔa boe lɔkɔ bɔkpa fɔtsa kpa kakɛna mɔ anɛ kayɔɔla. Bati badi kesĩ boe ade boe malo bukesĩ be a.
56003004	Lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ nyɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ mɔ kawɛ ɛtsa boe a ni,
56003005	ɛtɛ boe nkpã. Nnɛ́ boe tuwĩ a kĩ bɔkɛna sũ, mbom ye mɔawɛ kɔnyakamɔ sũ ɛtɛ boe. Ɛfɔ̃ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa yako nɛ boe akũ, ɛlɔla boe kama, ɛwɔla boe mui ade ɛkpa boe nkpã vɔɛ̃ a.
56003006	Baguma tsã Yesu Kristo boe Ɔtɛnɛ akũ ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ pii a eko nɛ boe akũ,
56003007	ayekĩ nɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ sũ bɔmɔ ye kayite kɛlɛ, lɔkɔa boe malo bɔna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, kĩ ye akũ lɛmɛ budeĩ kɔnɛte a.
56003008	Kalɛ kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali paa. Mawɛ kĩ lɛ kasisa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bamɛ ayekĩ bikĩ bɛtɛ Baguma bido a aakɔa be lɔkɔ bɛkpa tuwĩ kakɛna kĩ fudeĩ nfasɔ fɔkpa odi nyɛ odi.
56003009	Tado onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔkɔasiatsa kavɛlɛ kamɛ, nɛ bati kasinu katokɔ̃ kakã akũ. Tawɛ sɔwa ɔkɛna ɔdzɛ ĩye ɔtɛ atsindze nɛ Yudafɔ mbla a akũ. Foe flee fɔlá nfasɔ adima.
56003010	Ntɛ oti odi ayamɛna kasɛ̃ nɛ bati kamɛ ni, sua ye osi deedi ĩye titi nviã. Nɛ ke liti a, tabuki odo ye onukpɛ̃.
56003011	Nyi kĩ oti a na odu ni, tɔkpa nya ye kamɛkamɛ ade ye titikpa aakɔ ye kɔtɔ a.
56003012	Ntɛ ndo Artema ĩye Tihiko nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ ni, bɔa mbɔdi kayawo yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Nikopoli, kitonɛkĩ ade awã mawɛ kĩ maadzi nɛ osili lɔkɔ a.
56003013	Bɔa mbɔdi kanyɛ Sena kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ a mɔ Apolo osi bɛnaa be osi akũ. Dã kĩ bɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ laasĩ be.
56003014	Kɛnɛ kĩ batɛ badonɛ a bɛkɔlɛ ayekĩ baakɔa be lɔkɔ flee bɛkpa tudzuma wĩ kakɛna, kĩ baapuli bɛkabumɔ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ. Bɛtadzi nkpã kĩ ɛlá nfasɔ.
56003015	Bati flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ a awɔ̃na nɔ! Wɔ̃na batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã kakpa boe. Baguma ɛmɔ mi flee kɔnya.
57001001	Yĩ, Paulo kĩ bido nɛ kɔla nɛ Kristo Yesu sũ, mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Timoteo sɛkɛ̃ ovoli kĩĩ to. Bɔtsɛlɛ ye bɔama nɔ, Filemon boe ɔkɔba adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kĩ bɔawɛ kalɛ paa.
57001002	Bɔtsɛlɛ ye lɛmɛ bɔama batɛ badonɛ a kĩ batsɛna nɛ nɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ, mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃tsole Apia, mɔ boe ɔkɔba paa Arkipo kĩ yakɛna boe Ɔlate adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ndɛ sodzani aye a.
57001003	Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
57001004	Nwaɛ̃ Filemon, lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ mabɔa mpaɛ ni, mate anɛ nɛ nɔ akũ, ade manyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ nɔ lɔlɔ,
57001005	kitonɛkĩ nnu ayekĩ awɛ Baguma bati kalɛ, mɔ ayekĩ ɔtɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu odo a sũ.
57001006	Mabɔa mpaɛ kĩ ɔmɔa a kĩ bɔakɛna ndɛ batɛ badonɛ aye a ɛna ɔsĩ ebu, ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bunu fɔtsa wĩ flee a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kayɔ a dzununuunu.
57001007	Nwaɛ̃, mmɔ́ kawɔlɛ ade ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi yĩ a, kitonɛkĩ nɔ ɔdɔ a kĩ odeĩ ɔkpa Baguma bati a fɔ̃ bɛna kawɛya.
57001008	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, yĩ ndɛ awaɛ̃ nɛ Kristo kamɛ aye a, maapuli nkɔa otumi mbi nɔ kĩ kɛna lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ kɛna.
57001009	Lɛmɛ kĩ mawɛ nɔ kalɛ sũ ni, nkɔa kudulike makpa nɔ mbom. Makɛna fukĩĩ midi kĩ yĩ, Paulo, Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, nwaa kɔla nɛ ye sũ.
57001010	Nɛ foesũ nkɔa kudulike makpa nɔ nɛ Onesimo lɔlɔ. Ɛnyɛ yĩ mɔawɛ obi nɛ Kristo kamɛ. Ndani hũhũ kamɛ kɔlɛga nkpa ye nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nwaa kɔla a.
57001011	Titɔ kĩ ye dĩ kayɔ nyɛ nfasɔ malo a, kɔkɔɛ a, ɔtána ye akũ nfasɔ adima, lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ a, ye akũ deĩ nfasɔ ɛkpa bɔmɔ nɔ flee.
57001012	Nfɔ̃ emuniki yaya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃, ade fɔakɛna yĩ ndɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ flee tomɔ ye a.
57001013	Kĩ nwaa kɔla nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ ni, nwɛ kĩ ɛkahɔ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ kufɛ, ɛkaabumɔ yĩ adzuma nɛ nɔ kadokɔ̃.
57001014	Lɛmɛ ntáwɛ kĩ mahɛ nɔ kĩ kpa yĩ kabumɛna, mbom mawɛ kĩ kɛna foe futo nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Foesũ nláakɛna lɛtsama mbɔɛntɛ otunɔ nɛ foe akũ.
57001015	Ɔsa Onesimo dzakũ nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ, ayekĩ yaabuki emuniki ɛya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ ɛyaadzi flee.
57001016	Finyaakĩĩ nnɛ́ ɔsate odi ebuki yanɛ, mbom ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛbɛ̃ ɔsate kɔlaa. Ɛnyɛ ɔwaɛ̃nyole kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ nɛ Kristo kamɛ. Dã ayekĩ ɛtɛ kɔya ɛkpa yĩ! Lɛmɛ yaabuki ɛtɛ kɔya ɛkpa nɔ ɛba ndɛ ɔsate aye, ade yaabuki ɛnya ɔwaɛ̃nyole nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a.
57001017	Foesũ ntɛ ɔbɔɛ yĩ ndɛ nɔ ɔkɔba adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ aye ni, tɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ ndɛ ayekĩ aatɛ yĩ.
57001018	Ntɛ edi nfumusu adi nɛ nɔ akũ, ĩye edzimɔ nɔ kɔtɔ kudi malo ni, bu foe akũ akunta kakɔa kakpa yĩ.
57001019	Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lɛkɔa awɛ matsɛlɛ kĩ maase nɔ kɔtɔ. Lɛmɛ ntáwɛ kĩ mate nɔ anɛ kĩ nɔ mɔawɛ a odzimɔ yĩ nɔ nkpã kɔtɔ.
57001020	Foesũ nwaɛ̃, mawɛ kĩ kpa yĩ kabumɛna kĩĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate sũ. Nɛ Kristo sũ kɛna foe ayekĩ ɔwɔlɛ aaka edzi yĩ.
57001021	Ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mamɛna nɔ, ade matɛ kado kĩ aakɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mavia nɔ a akũ a. Ĩnyina pefee kĩ aakɛna ɔkpa yĩ fɔba ayekĩ nvia nɔ malo.
57001022	Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ wɛ kɔla kayi yĩ, kitonɛkĩ matɛ kado kĩ Baguma aatse mi flee mpaɛbɔ lɔkɔa etunɔ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
57001023	Epafra, kĩ bɔmɔ ye waa kɔla nɛ Kristo sũ a bo yawɔ̃na nɔ!
57001024	Ade ayea Marko, mɔ Aristarko, mɔ Dema, mɔ Luka, yĩ bakɔba kĩ babumɔ yĩ adzuma kĩĩ kakɛna a, awɔ̃na nɔ.
57001025	Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi hũhũ flee kɔnya.
58001001	Nɛ kɔkɔɛ a, Baguma lɛmɔ boe bawanyɔ a kɔdzɛla lɔkɔ pii nɛ tisi ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ akũ, ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ.
58001002	Lɛmɛ nɛ fuwi nkaɛ kĩĩ kamɛ ni, Baguma lɛmɔ boe kɔdzɛla ɛtsãmɛna ye Obi akũ. Ade Obi kĩĩ akũ ɛtsã ɛbɔa katinya flee, ɛpau ye kĩ ɛnya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ɔlate a.
58001003	Obi a lɛnyɛ ayekĩ Baguma kukũkpalɛ la ɛtsa, ade Baguma kutidu a pɛpɛɛpɛ ye malo edeĩ a. Obi a kɔa Baguma kalɛ a kɔbɛ̃ epini katinya flee. Kĩ ɛvɔlɛ bati tɔkpa eyua a, ɛnadzi nɛ Baguma Kpale nɛ ode flee a sɔmɔna.
58001004	Baguma kɛna ye Obi a ɛbɛ̃ Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a, kitonɛkĩ dĩ a kĩ Baguma te ye a tɛ kɔya lɛba be bade a.
58001005	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tábi ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ odima tɔ̃ kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ yĩ Obinyole. Nviã luwi kĩĩ mma nɔ.” Bio Baguma tálɛ nɛ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ odima akũ kĩ, “Maanya ye Ɔlɛga, ade ye malo ɛnya yĩ Obi a.”
58001006	Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma wɛ kĩ yado ye obinyole ɔtɔnyade nɛ katinya kamɛ a ni, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a flee, misum ye.”
58001007	Lɛmɛ nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a akũ ni, Baguma lɛ kĩ, “Baguma kɛna ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ndɛ ɔwɛ, ade ɛkɛna ye ode basumunɛ ndɛ fi fɔmɛ a.”
58001008	Lɛmɛ nɛ ye Obi akũ ni, Baguma lɛ kĩ, “O Baguma, nɔ lɛgãkanya aawa daa daa. Nɔ bati akũ kanya tsɛ̃ osi kpĩĩ akũ.
58001009	Awɛ tuwĩ kakɛna lɛmɛ akesĩ tɔkpa a. Ade foesũ Baguma, nɔ Baguma a pau nɔ a, ɛkpa nɔ obũ kadzikɔ̃ kĩ kawɔlɛ deĩ kɛbɛ̃ nɔ bakɔba flee kade a.”
58001010	Baguma buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ lɛbɔa tite nɛ kayɔkayi a, ade ɔkɔa nɔ mɔa awɛ ɔkɛna ode lɛmɛ a.
58001011	Fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aawɔ, lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ aana daa, foe flee fɔ́adɛ fɔtsɛ ndɛ tɛtadiɛ.
58001012	Aabuta foe ndɛ atadiɛ, ade fɔ́adani ndɛ tɛtadiɛ. Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ ade ayea aana daa a, ade nɔ nkpã kadzi lɛlá kawũna a.”
58001013	Baguma tábi ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ odima tɔ̃ kĩ, “Dzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna nɛ awĩ, kɛnaawo kĩ nkɔa nɔ bakesĩnɛ nkɛna nɔ abɔa katekɔ̃.”
58001014	Kekɔ̃ baáde nyɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a? Ade be nyɛ hũhũ a kĩ basum Baguma, ade yado be lɛmɛ kĩ bɛnaabumɛna bati a kĩ baana nkpã katɛ a.
58002001	Ade foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔapi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bunu a budomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ayekĩ bɔláayɛla osi.
58002002	Bɛtsa kĩ ntɛ Baguma ɔlɛdo a kĩ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ kɔa bɛma boe bawanyɔ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, mɔ odi nyɛ odi kĩ efum ĩye ɛtákɛna nɛ ye akũ a tɛ foe sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ kĩ sɛfɛta a ni,
58002003	nde bɔ́apuli bulo sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ baakpa boe a, ntɛ bɔtátɛ nkpã katɛ kpale kĩĩ a? Boe Ɔlate mɔawɛ lɛnya lɔtɔ ɛlɛ nkpã katɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ, ade bikĩ binu foe a di adansiɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a.
58002004	Nɛ lɔkɔ mɔapɛ a kamɛ a, Baguma mɔawɛ kɔa nsɛntsɛlɛni mɔ awãwã fɔtsa futefute kakɛna edi adansiɛ nɛ nkpã katɛ a akũ, ade ɛsɛ̃ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa futetsa a ɛkpa bati nɛ ye kawɛ onukpɛ̃ a.
58002005	Baguma tákɔa katinya a kĩ kaaya, kĩ ke akũ fɔlɛtsa bɔlamɛna kalɛ a akũ kanya edo nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a awɛ.
58002006	Mbom bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kakɔ kadi kamɛ kĩ, “Litsa nyɛ otidziwa obi kĩ akɔna ye akũ? Litsa koũ nyɛ otidziwa kĩ api ye kadunamɔ akũ?
58002007	Ɔkɛ́na ye nɛ kayɔ lɔkɔ lukũ lidi ɔba ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a. Lɛmɛ ɔkɔa kukũkpalɛ mɔ obu ɔtsa ye ndɛ lɛgãbɔɛ aye.
58002008	Ade ɔkɛna ye kĩ ɛnya fɔtsa flee akũ a.” Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ ɔkɛna ye kĩ ɛnya fɔtsa flee akũ, foesũ lɛtsama tábuki lite kĩ ɛlá kɔbɛ̃ nɛ de akũ. Lɛmɛ finyaa bɔámɔ kĩ otidziwa deĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ fɔtsa flee akũ.
58002009	Lɛmɛ bɔmɔ́ Yesu a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ kayɔ nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ ɛba ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a, ayekĩ fɔtsã Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ ɛyaaku nɛ odi nyɛ odi lɔlɔ a, finyaa kɔ̃ bɔmɔ́ ye kĩ Baguma kɔa obu mɔ kukũkpalɛ ɛtsa ye ndɛ lɛgãbɔɛ aye, nɛ wuda lubo a kĩ ɛmɔ́ a sũ.
58002010	Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ Baguma kĩ ɛbɔa fɔtsa flee, epini foe a, ɛkɛna Yesu ɛkpɔla ɛtsãmɛna lubo kamɔ kamɛ, ayekĩ yaakpã bati beblebee bɛyaana tsɛfã nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ oti a kĩ yakpã be kanamɛna nkpã katɛ kamɛ a nyɛ Kristo.
58002011	Kitonɛkĩ oti a kĩ yakpalɛ bati akũ a, mɔ bati a kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ a flee deĩ Ɔlɛga mɔapɛ. Ade foesũ kɔnyɔã lákɔ Yesu kĩ yavɛ be ye bawaɛ̃ a.
58002012	Yabi Baguma kĩ, “Maade nɔ dĩ akũ lɛtsã nkpa awaɛ̃ amɛ, ade maasã tɔnɔ mmu nɔ nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a.”
58002013	Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Maakɔa anɛ nte nɛ Baguma akũ.” Ade ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Amɔ yĩ mɔ babi a kĩ Baguma kɔa ɛkpa yĩ a nɛ awĩ.”
58002014	Nɛ ayekĩ babi a kĩ yawɛ a nyɛ batidziwa, kĩ bideĩ sukɛna mɔ babɔanɛ sũ ni, Yesu malo dani ɛkɛna otidziwa, edzi nkpã ndɛ be aye. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ fɔtsã ye wuda kamɛ, ɛwɔla Abonsam a kĩ ye nɛɛ wuda kɔbɛ̃ a.
58002015	Ke liti lɛmɛ, Yesu kɛna fukĩĩ kĩ bati a kĩ wuda kavila nɛ be nkpã kadzi flee kamɛ fɔ̃ bɛdani basate a, bɛfɔ̃ wuda kavila.
58002016	Kitonɛkĩ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, nnɛ́ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a yakpa kabumɛna, mbom Abraham babi mɔ bawa yabumɛna.
58002017	Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɛna ye ndɛ ye bawaɛ̃ aye nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ, ayekĩ yaapuli ɛnya be Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kĩ yamɔ bati kɔnya. Yaakasum Baguma nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ lɛmɛ, ayekĩ yaafɔ̃ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa nɛ bati akũ.
58002018	Nɛ ayekĩ ye mɔawɛ ɛmɔ lubo, ɛtsã sɔhuiɛ kamɛ lɛmɛ sũ ni, yaapuli ebumɔ bikĩ be malo bideĩ nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ a lɛmɛ.
58003001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Kristofɔ, kĩ Baguma vɛ etomɛna ode lɛmɛ a, mikɔna Yesu a kĩ Baguma do kĩ ɛnya Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ katɛkado a kĩ bɔnɛɛ a midã.
58003002	Edi ɔnɔkɔali ɛkpa Baguma a kĩ ye lɛpau ye kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma kĩĩ, ndɛ ayekĩ Mose lɛmɛ di ɔnɔkɔali ɛkɛna adzuma nɛ Baguma tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
58003003	Ndɛ ayekĩ babu kɔla okenɛ kaba kɔla mɔawɛ a ni, ade aye kɛfɛta kĩ Yesu ɛna obu baũ ɛba Mose a.
58003004	Kɔla nyɛ kɔla ni, oti ake koe. Lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Baguma nyɛ oti a kĩ eke fɔtsa a flee.
58003005	Mose di ɔnɔkɔali ndɛ ɔsumunɛ aye nɛ Baguma tɔtɔ kamɛ, ade edi adansiɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma aanyɛ ɛtsa nɛ kunya kamɛ a akũ a.
58003006	Lɛmɛ Kristo kɔ̃ dã Baguma tɔtɔ akũ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ndɛ Obi aye. Boe nyɛ ye kɔla a, ntɛ budo ɔwɔlɛ, bɔna katɛkado nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ boe anɛ teĩ nɛ de akũ a akũ.
58003007	Nɛ foesũ ndɛ ayekĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a, “Ntɛ minu Baguma odo nɛ nviã ni,
58003008	mitakɛna atɔ ɔsĩ, ndɛ ayekĩ mi bawanyɔ kɛna a, kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma akũ luwi a nɛ kɔsa kamɛ, bɛsɔ ye bɛdã a.
58003009	Ade bɛsɔ yĩ bɛdã nɛ awã bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa lɛmɛ nɛ yĩ akũ, titɔ kĩ bɛmɔ́ fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna nɛ futeli tɛna kamɛ a malo.
58003010	Nɛ foesũ nna kalɔkpa nɛ bati a akũ ade nlɛ kĩ, ‘Bafum ade bayɛla osi a, ade bisĩ baákɛna nɛ yĩ mbla a akũ a.’
58003011	Nna kalɔkpa ade nlɔ fubo nlɛ kĩ, ‘Bɛláake kɔbɔa nɛ tite a kĩ kufɛ maakpa be kawɛya a akũ da!’ ”
58003012	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ batɛ badonɛ, midã kadã wĩ kĩ mi kamɛ odima ɛtana ɔwɔlɛ kpa mɔ katatɛkado lɔkɔa emuniki nɛ Baguma a kĩ edzi nkpã a liti.
58003013	Mbom mikaabumɛna akũ akũ luwi nyɛ luwi, kĩ nviã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa kamɛ a tsɛla boe akũ, ayekĩ tɔkpa lɛláakɛ mi, ĩye mina atɔ ɔsĩ. Tsɛla boe akũ.
58003014	Kitonɛkĩ boe flee budeĩ tsɛfã mɔ Kristo ntɛ bupini boe katɛkado mɔ ɔsĩ kɛnawo kawũna a, ndɛ ayekĩ buyi kayɔ a.
58003015	Bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ minu Baguma odo nviã ni, mitakɛna atɔ ɔsĩ ndɛ ayekĩ mi bawanyɔ kɛna a, kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma akũ a.”
58003016	Bawei linu Baguma odo mɔ biyidza bɛdza nɛ ye akũ a? Ade be nyɛ bati flee a kĩ Mose kpã etomɛna Egipte tite akũ a.
58003017	Bawei akũ mɔ Baguma na kalɔkpa futeli tɛna flee? Ade be nyɛ bati a kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa kĩ biku bɛkahɔ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a.
58003018	Bawei akũ Baguma lɔ fubo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɛláake kɔbɔa nɛ tite a kĩ kufɛ maakpa be kawɛya a akũ da”? Ade bati a kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma akũ a.
58003019	Foesũ bɔmɔ́ kĩ bɛtápuli biwo tite akũ, kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ Baguma bido.
58004001	Foesũ kĩ Baguma buki ebinya osi eyi nɛ ye kawɛya a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a kamɛ kawo sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔdã kadã wĩ ayekĩ bɛláamɔ kĩ mi kamɛ odi tápuli ɛna kawɛya a kamɛ kawo.
58004002	Kitonɛkĩ bibi boe Kalɛ Wĩ a ndɛ ayekĩ bibi be malo a. Binu fɔlɛtsa a, lɛmɛ bɛtána foe akũ nfasɔ, kitonɛkĩ kĩ binu foe a, bɛtátɛ foe bido.
58004003	Lɛmɛ boe a kĩ bɔtɛ budo a, buwo nɛ kawɛya a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a kamɛ. Ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nna kalɔkpa ade nlɔ fubo kĩ, ‘Bɛláake kɔbɔa nɛ tite a kĩ kufɛ maakpa be kawɛya a akũ da!’ ” Baguma lɛ fukĩĩ titɔ kĩ eyua ye mɔawɛ adzuma kito lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛbɔa katinya a malo.
58004004	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kakɔ kadi nɛ luwi luvũkɔnɔde a akũ kĩ, “Nɛ luwi luvũkɔnɔde akũ a, Baguma dzi ɛwɛya, ade ɛtábuki ɛkɛna adzuma adima a.”
58004005	Ebuki ɛlɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ a kĩ, “Bɛláake kɔbɔa nɛ tite a kĩ kufɛ maakpa be kawɛya a akũ da!”
58004006	Bikĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ binu Kalɛ Wĩ a tápuli biwo nɛ kawɛyakɔ̃ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ bido, lɛmɛ osi buki ebinya kĩ badi biwo.
58004007	Baguma yi luwi bɛbã kĩ bavɛ Nviã, nɛ futeli pii liti. Ke liti a, Lɛgã Dawid lɛ kɔdzɛla ɛtsãmɛna fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ foe akũ bɔyatɛ̃ a kĩ, “Ntɛ minu Baguma odo nviã ni, mitakɛna atɔ ɔsĩ.”
58004008	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Yosua ɛkpã be ewo nɛ kawɛyakɔ̃ a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a ni, kufɛ Baguma lɛláabuki ɛlɛ kalɛ nɛ kawɛya luwi bɛbã akũ ke liti a.
58004009	Foesũ kawɛya luwi buki lideĩ lɛkpa Baguma bade a, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma awɛya nɛ luwi luvũkɔnɔde akũ a
58004010	kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ewo nɛ Baguma kawɛyakɔ̃ a, aatɛ kawɛya nɛ be adzuma kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma lɛmɛ fɔ̃ ye mɔawɛ adzuma kakɛna, ɛwɛya a.
58004011	Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔbɔa mbɔdi buwo nɛ kawɛyakɔ̃ a kamɛ, ayekĩ boe kamɛ odima lɛláatomɛna be ɔbla kpa a, ɛtɔ nɛ atɔ ɔsĩ sũ.
58004012	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kalɛ a deĩ nkpã ade kɛlamɛna adzuma a. Kideĩ ɔbɔ̃ kɛbɛ̃ atugbe adi nyɛ adi, ade katsɔɛ kanaawo awã kĩ kasɛ̃ ɔkla mɔ hũhũ kayite. Kawo kanaasɛ̃ fɔtsakɔ̃ fɔtsakɔ̃ mɔ fɔtsɔ̃ kamɛ tɔbɔ̃ kayite. Kalɛ a adzɛmɔ oti adzuni mɔ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ fɔwɛtsa yededeede.
58004013	Lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ baapuli bɛkɔa bɛkɔla Baguma, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ɛbɔa nɛ katinya kamɛ waa ɔdzɔ nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ. Ade ye mɔ bɔ́akɛna akunta nɛ boe kadzi kamɛ akũ bɔkpa a.
58004014	Foesũ mifɔ̃ bupi boe katɛkado a kĩ bɔanyɛ katsa a budomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ, kitonɛkĩ budeĩ Yesu, Baguma Obi kĩ ɛnyɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a kĩ ɛtsã ode flee kamɛ ɛnɛ́ edzi nɛ Baguma ɔwɛ̃ a.
58004015	Nnɛ́ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kĩ ɛláapuli enu boe katɛkado onukpɛ̃ kadɔ kayɔ budeĩ, mbom oti kĩ ye malo bɛsɔ ye bɛdã nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ ndɛ boe aye, lɛmɛ ɛtákɛna tɔkpa tidima a budeĩ.
58004016	Foesũ mifɔ̃ budo ɔwɔlɛ bufuã Baguma kɔnyakamɔ lɛgãkpo a, ayekĩ bɔ́ana Baguma sɛmɛkalɛ mɔ kɔnyakamɔ fubumɔ boe nɛ kasĩ lɔkɔ.
58005001	Bapau Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a odi nyɛ odi katomɛna ye bakɔba kamɛ, kate awɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛdza nɛ be onukpɛ̃ esum Baguma. Ye adzuma nyɛ kĩ ɛkɔa bati futetsa ɛkpa Baguma, ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ be tɔkpa akũ.
58005002	Nɛ ayekĩ ye mɔawɛ a ɛlá kɔbɛ̃ nɛ tisi pii akũ sũ ni, yana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kakpa bikĩ binyína kadi mɔ bikĩ bɛyɛla osi a.
58005003	Ade foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛbɔa tɔkpa afɔliɛ nɛ ye mɔawɛ lɔlɔ mɔ bati bɛbã tɔkpa flee lɛmɛ akũ a.
58005004	Odima ládzina ye akũ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kado ye akũ foe obu, mbom Baguma avɛ ye ndɛ ayekĩ ɛvɛ Aron a.
58005005	Ade ayea Kristo lɛmɛ tádo ye akũ obu kĩ yanya Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee, mbom Baguma lidzina ye ebi ye kĩ, “Yĩ Obinyole anɛ. Nviã luwi kĩĩ mma nɔ.”
58005006	Ebuki ɛlɛ nɛ kakɔ bɛbã kĩ, “Aanya ɔsɔfɔ daa, nɛ Melkizedek osi a akũ.”
58005007	Kĩ Yesu dzi nkpã nɛ tite akũ a, ɛbɔa mpaɛ, eke aduli mɔ fɔwɔla mɔ babe ɛkpa Baguma a kĩ ye lipuli ɛnyɛ ye nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ a. Baguma tse ye, kitonɛkĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ɛkpa Baguma ɔsum a.
58005008	Titɔ kĩ Baguma Obi yanɛ malo ni, ɛkɔlɛ osetie etomɛna ye lubokamɔ kamɛ.
58005009	Kĩ Baguma kɛna Yesu ɛkpɔla nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ a, ɛdani oti a kĩ ye akũ bikĩ babu ye a flee aatsã bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
58005010	Ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaanya Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ Melkizedek osi a akũ a.
58005011	Fɔlɛtsa pii deĩ kĩ bɔ́alɛ nɛ fukĩĩ akũ kufɛ, lɛmɛ foe kayɔkanyɛ deĩ ɔsĩ, kitonɛkĩ miápuli kanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ mɔatsɛ.
58005012	Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ titɔ kĩ mɔ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kɛnɛkĩ minya fɔtsa batsanɛ malo ni, mibuki misĩ odi kĩ ɛtsa mi Baguma fɔlɛtsa kayɔkayi fude a. Mila ndɛ akɔkɔa amɛ kĩ bisĩ tɛmɛ mui, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ ndɛ bikĩ bisĩ funitsã kĩ fudeĩ ɔsĩ.
58005013	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yamɛmɛ ni, akɔkɔa ebuki yanɛ, foesũ enyína lɛtsama nɛ tɔkpa mɔ tuwĩ akũ.
58005014	Banɔkɔɛ̃ anya funitsã kĩ fudeĩ ɔsĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɛvɛlɛ be adzuni nɛ fɔtsa pii kamɛ, kĩ foesũ bapuli kamɔ tɔkpa mɔ tuwĩ kayi ɔsũ.
58006001	Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔnaa lɔtɔ bɔkɔlɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fɔtsa katsa, lɔkɔa bɔfɔnɛ kayɔkayi fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɛ Kristo akũ a awɛ buyi. Mitafɔ̃ bumuniki bɔnaayi kayɔ mɔ fɔtsa katsa nɛ ayekĩ bɔdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, bɔfɔnɛ tudzuma kĩ tɛla nfasɔ, mɔ ayekĩ bɔtɛ Baguma budo,
58006002	mɔ fɔtsa katsa nɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ, awɛ kate nɛ bati akũ, kayidza kato kanɔkpa mɔ kadzɛmɛna nkaɛ a akũ.
58006003	Mifɔ̃ bɔnaa lɔtɔ bubo anɛ! Ade lɛtsa a kĩ ntɛ Baguma tunɔ ni, bɔ́akɛna a.
58006004	Kitonɛkĩ nde bati a kĩ bimuniki nɛ be katɛkado liti a, aapuli bibuki bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ? Bɛna nɛ Baguma ɔhaĩ kamɛ tɔ̃ bɛta ode futetsa a onukpɛ̃ bɛmɔ́, bɛna Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ tsɛfã.
58006005	Ade bɛta lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ Baguma kalɛ kamɛ a onukpɛ̃ bɛmɔ́, bɛna katinya a kĩ kaaya a kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ a tsɛfã a.
58006006	Lɛmɛ bimuniki nɛ be katɛkado liti! Bɛláapuli bimuniki mɔ be bibuki bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bibuki babɔa Baguma Obi a nɛ asendua akũ, kado ye kɔnyɔã nɛ kanade.
58006007	Baguma ahila tite a, kĩ tamɔa oni mui kafɔ̃ futse amɛ nɛ te akũ kana nfasɔ kakpa bikĩ be sũ banɛ fɔba nɛ te akũ a.
58006008	Lɛmɛ ntɛ fu mɔ tuwĩ kpa mɛ nɛ te akũ ni, nfasɔ adima lɛláa te akũ. Baguma aapuli edumu te ade nɛ kawũna kamɛ a, baapila te mɔ fi.
58006009	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, titɔ kĩ bɔlɛ foe lɔmɔ malo ni, mi kɔ̃ bɔtɛ budo kĩ minyina fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃, kĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ mina nkpã katɛ.
58006010	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ́nyɛ oti kĩ yaádã kpĩĩ, kĩ yaálɛla adzuma a kĩ mikɛna mɔ ɔdɔ a kĩ minyɛ mitsa nɛ yĩ dĩ sũ. Mibumɛna mi bakɔba Kristofɔ ade milamɛna be kabumɛna finyaa malo a.
58006011	Boe kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ nyɛ kĩ mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi epi ye mbɔdi kabɔa kamɛ lɔmɔ kɛnaawo kawũna, ayekĩ mi awɛ aata lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ miate anɛ a.
58006012	Bɔtáwɛ kĩ mikɛna ɔnyɔnɛ, mbom mikɛna fɔtsa ndɛ bati kĩ bɛtɛ bido, kĩ bideĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, kĩ foesũ bɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa a.
58006013	Kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa Abraham fɔtsa a, ɛtani ye mɔawɛ akũ ɛkpa ye, kitonɛkĩ odima lɛbɛ̃ ye Baguma kĩ yaatani.
58006014	Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Maahila nɔ ade maakpa nɔ babi mɔ bawa beblebee lɛmɛ a.”
58006015	Abraham na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, foesũ ye awɛ ta lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma ke otse kĩ yaakpa ye a.
58006016	Bati atani fɔtsa kavɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛbɛ̃ be a kakɔa katsua fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ a kamɛ.
58006017	Ade foesũ Baguma tani fɔtsa nɛ ye bɔhɛ a akũ a, kitonɛkĩ ɛwɛ kĩ foe kamɛ fɔkpalɛ bikĩ baatɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a kĩ ye nhihiɛ lɛláavɛmɛna da.
58006018	Foesũ Baguma kɛna fɔtsa nviã kĩ fɔnyɛ bɔhɛ mɔ katani, kĩ fɔláapuli fɔdani, ade Baguma lɛmɛ lɛláapuli ɛma fɔvã nɛ foe akũ a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, boe a kĩ bulo bɔnatani ye a bubuki bɔana ɔwɔlɛ, bɔate anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa boe a akũ.
58006019	Budeĩ kɔnɛte kĩĩ bɔkpa boe akũ nɛ boe kadzi kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ kutse tunu api koe kadzɛla kpli a. Kɔnɛte a akpã boe katsãmɛna lima a kĩ litsua kɔla a kamɛ kawomɛna nɛ kakɔ kpalɛwa flee a.
58006020	Ade awĩ Yesu nya lɔtɔ ewo ndɛ boe lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye, ɛdani daa Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ Melkizedek osi a akũ a.
58007001	Melkizedek kĩĩ nyɛ Salem lɛgã, ade ɛnyɛ Baguma Kpale a ɔsɔfɔ a. Kĩ Abraham to kawũ a kĩ ke kamɛ ɛnya fɔgã ɛna akũ yaya a, Melkizedek natsɛlamɔ ye ehila ye.
58007002	Awã naa, Abraham kɔa kawũ kamɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛna a flee katsu kawuade a ɛkpa ye. Dĩ Melkizedek kayɔkanyɛ katɔnyade nyɛ kĩ Lɛgã, fɔtsa kpĩĩ akũ ɔkɛnanɛ. Kayade nyɛ Salem lɛgã kĩ fɔatsa kĩ Lukudɔ Lɛgã.
58007003	Bɛtálɛ lɛtsama nɛ ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma akũ. Bɛtálɛ lɛtsama nɛ ye babi mɔ bawa akũ, bɛtátsa lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛma ye, ĩye lɔkɔ a kĩ eku a. Melkizedek kĩĩ la ndɛ Baguma Obi a ade ɛnyɛ ɔsɔfɔ daa daa a.
58007004	Midã ayekĩ Melkizedek tɛ dĩ! Boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham ndɛ otinɔkɔɛ̃ malo a kpa ye kawũ kamɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛna a kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kawuade a.
58007005	Nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, Levi babi mɔ bawa kĩ banya basɔfɔ a deĩ osi kĩ batɛ fɔtsa kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kawuade nɛ Israelfɔ awɛ, titɔ kĩ be malo bɛnyɛ Abraham kasinu kamɛ babi malo.
58007006	Ade Melkizedek táto Levi kasinu a kamɛ a, lɛmɛ ɛtɛ fɔtsa katsu kawuade etomɛna Abraham sɛkɛ̃, ade ehila ye oti a kĩ Baguma kpa bɔhɛ a.
58007007	Atsindze adima lɛláa foe kamɛ kĩ oti a kĩ yakpa nhila a bɛ̃ oti a kĩ ye bihila a.
58007008	Nɛ basɔfɔ sɛmakɛ ni, batidziwa kĩ baku a atɛ fɔtsa katsu kawuade, lɛmɛ nɛ Melkizedek sɛmakɛ kɔ̃ ni, oti kĩ bidi adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ edzi nkpã daa, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a lɛ a, lɛtɛ fɔtsa a.
58007009	Foesũ bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ malo kĩ, Levi kĩ yatɛ fɔtsa kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kawuade a malo kpa fɔtsa ɛtsãmɛna Abraham akũ,
58007010	kitonɛkĩ bɛtáma tɔ̃ Levi, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɔ́alɛ ni, ɛna nɛ ɔwanyɔ Abraham kate kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Melkizedek natsɛlamɔ ɔwanyɔ a.
58007011	Levifɔ a tɔsɔfɔ kanya kamɛ fɔtsã mɔ bɛkpa Israelfɔ mbla a. Ade finyaa ntɛ Levifɔ tɔsɔfɔ kanya a kakpɔla kɛkpɔla ni, kufɛ fɔtásĩ kĩ ɔsɔfɔ bɛbã ndɛ Melkizedek aye ebuki ɛnɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ Aron kasinu a kamɛ eto.
58007012	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bɛvɛmɛna tɔsɔfɔ kanya a ni, kɛnɛ kĩ kavɛmɛna kɛya nɛ tɔsɔfɔ kanya mbla a lɛmɛ kamɛ.
58007013	Boe Ɔlate kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa bɔlamɛna kalɛ a to katete bɛbã kamɛ, ade ke katete a kamɛ obi odima tánya tɔ̃ ɔsɔfɔ a.
58007014	Fɔnɛ fɔwaa pefee kĩ Yuda katete kamɛ bɛma ye, lɛmɛ Mose tábɔa katete kĩĩ dĩ ɛlɛ tɔsɔfɔ kanya lɛtsama.
58007015	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ kpalɛ fɔba kĩ ɔsɔfɔ bɛbã kĩ ɛla ndɛ Melkizedek aye ya.
58007016	Oti kĩĩ nya ɔsɔfɔ nnɛ́ nɛ batidziwa mbla onukpɛ̃, mbom ɛtsã nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a kɔbɛ̃ akũ ɛya.
58007017	Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ, “Aanya ɔsɔfɔ daa, nɛ Melkizedek osi a akũ.”
58007018	Foesũ bɛnyɛ mbla kɔɛ a biyi nɛ ɔɔ́wɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ ɛtána kɔbɛ̃ ĩye nfasɔ adima.
58007019	Kitonɛkĩ Mose mbla a tápuli ɛkɛna lɛtsama lɛkpɔla. Finyaa budeĩ kɔnɛte kĩ kɔnɛnɛ kɔbɛ̃, kĩ bɔtsɛ̃ koe akũ bɔafuã Baguma.
58007020	Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ Baguma lɔ fubo nɛ tɔsɔfɔ kanya kĩĩ akũ. Kɔkɔɛ a Baguma tálɔ fubo ɛkpa bikĩ bidzina basɔfɔ a.
58007021	Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu yanya ɔsɔfɔ a, Baguma lɔ fubo ɛkpa ye ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate a lɔ fubo ade ɛláadani ye adzuni a, ‘Aanya ɔsɔfɔ daa.’ ”
58007022	Fubo kĩĩ sũ Yesu dani apam a kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ kɔlaa a liti ɔdzanɛ.
58007023	Ntsitsemu bɛbã buki edeĩ. Kɔkɔɛ a basɔfɔ nɛ lidede, kitonɛkĩ bɛkaku mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ kafɔnɛ adzuma a.
58007024	Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu kɔ̃ dzi nkpã daa sũ ni, ye tɔsɔfɔ kanya a lɛláato ye akũ tɛnaa odima akũ.
58007025	Foesũ yaapuli ɛtɛ bati a kĩ batsã ye akũ kaya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kitonɛkĩ edzi nkpã daa, ade yake Baguma aduli kakpa be a.
58007026	Foesũ Yesu nyɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a kĩ busĩ. Ɛnyɛ oti kpalɛwa kĩ nfumusu adima lɛláa ye akũ, ade tɔkpa tidima lɛláa ye akũ a. Bɛnyɛ ye nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kamɛ, ade bɛdɛla ye flee ɛtɛ̃ ode a.
58007027	Yesu lɛlá ndɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nkaɛ a, ade fɔtásĩ kĩ yabɔa afɔliɛ luwi nyɛ luwi nɛ ye mɔawɛ tɔkpa akũ, lɔkɔa ke liti ɛbɔa nɛ bati bɛbã tɔkpa lɔlɔ. Ɛbɔa afɔliɛ deedimɔapɛ ɛkpa fɔkɔ a flee, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ a.
58007028	Mose mbla a apau banyole kĩ badɔ kadzina be basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ flee, lɛmɛ Baguma tsã ye fubo kalɔ akũ nɛ mbla a liti a, ɛpau Obi a kĩ ɛkɛna ye ɛkpɔla a yanya ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ flee daa.
58008001	Kalɛ titiliwu nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔlamɛna kalɛ a kamɛ nyɛ kĩ budeĩ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kĩĩ odu, kĩ edzi nɛ Obu Lɛgã Kpale lɛgãkpo a sɔmɔna nɛ ode.
58008002	Yasum ndɛ ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ aye nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kĩ kɛnyɛ lima patampa wĩ a kamɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ otidziwa lɛbɔa de, mbom boe Ɔlate a lɛbɔa de.
58008003	Badzina ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ flee kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɔa afɔliɛ fɔtsa ɛkpa Baguma ɛbɔa afɔliɛ lɛmɛ, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kĩĩ lɛmɛ ɛna afɔliɛ litsedi ɛkpa Baguma.
58008004	Ade ntɛ tite akũ edzi ni, kufɛ ɛláanya ɔsɔfɔ kɔlaa, kitonɛkĩ basɔfɔ a kĩ be akɔa futetsa kakpa Baguma nɛ Yudafɔ mbla a onukpɛ̃ a deĩ kɔkɔɛ.
58008005	Adzuma kĩ bakɛna ndɛ basɔfɔ aye nɛ kasumkɔ̃ la ndɛ fukĩ fudeĩ nɛ ode a kuyo odi. Ade foesũ kĩ Mose aabɔa Lima Patampa Kpalɛwa a ni, Baguma bi ye kĩ, “Dã kĩ ɔkɛna nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɔ nɛ ɔtɔ akũ a onukpɛ̃.”
58008006	Lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma kpa Yesu ɔsɔfɔ adzuma kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ basɔfɔ a tide kɔlaa, ndɛ ayekĩ apam a kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ Baguma mɔ ye bati kayite a nɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɛna ye nɛ bɔhɛ a kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ a akũ.
58008007	Ntɛ mfumsu adima ɛtana nɛ apam atɔnyade a akũ ni, kufɛ fɔláabuki fusĩ kĩ bakɛna ayade.
58008008	Lɛmɛ Baguma amɔ mfumsu nɛ ye bati akũ kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate a lɛ kĩ, fuwi fudi aya kĩ maakɛna apam vɔɛ̃ mɔ Israel kade a mɔ Yuda kade a lɛmɛ.
58008009	Apam kĩĩ lɛláana ndɛ ekĩ nkɛna mɔ be bawanyɔ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ mpi be nɛ akpɔ nkpã be nnɛmɛna nɛ Egipte tite akũ a. Kitonɛkĩ bɛtákɛna nɛ apam a kĩ nkɛna mɔ be a akũ, foesũ yĩ malo mbɔa kanɛ nkpa be.”
58008010	Ɔlate a buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade apam kĩ maakɛna mɔ Israel bati nɛ fuwi a kĩ fɔ́aya a liti a. Maakɔa yĩ mbla ndo nɛ be adzuni kamɛ, ade maatsɛlɛ ye nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a. Maanya be Baguma, ade be baanya yĩ bati a.
58008011	Odima lɛláabuki ɛtsa ɔkɔba fɔtsa ĩye ebi ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘Nyi Baguma,’ kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi aanyi yĩ kito babisɛ̃ akũ kɛnawo banɔkɔɛ̃ akũ.
58008012	Maamɔ be kɔnya nɛ be ɔbla kpa a kĩ bɛbɔa akũ, ade nláabuki nte anɛ nɛ be tɔkpa akũ kɔlaa a.”
58008013	Kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ apam vɔɛ̃ a, fɔatsa kĩ ɛkɛna atɔnyade a akɔɛ. Ade finyaakĩĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛkɛna lɔkɔɛ ni, owi lɛláabuna mɔ laatɛ̃ lɛnaa.
58009001	Apam atɔnyade a na tɛbla kĩ te akũ batsã kasum, mɔ tite akũ kɔla, awã kĩ basum lɛmɛ.
58009002	Bike patampa bɛkɔa lima bɛsɛ̃ ye kamɛ. Bavɛ kakɔ katɔnyade a kĩ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa, ade awã lɛmɛ bike ɔsɛdza otse mɔ opunu a kĩ ye akũ bate abodoo kakpa Baguma a.
58009003	Nɛ kɔla kamɛ katsua lima a liti ni, patampa bɛbã deĩ kĩ bavɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee.
58009004	Fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ awã nyɛ sika ngbã atɛnyɛ a kĩ ye akũ bate lifii ɔnyɔ, apam adakã kĩ bidue mɔ sika ngbã. Adakã a kamɛ fɔtsa a nyɛ sika ngbã okluwa kĩ funitsã kĩ bavɛ mana deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ, Aron otse kĩ yake katsã, kĩ ɛnyɛ tɔɔta, mɔ boe tratra nviã kĩ be akũ bɛtsɛlɛ mbla ewua a bite a.
58009005	Bɛmɛ Kerubifɔ kutidu bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ adakã a akũ, kĩ banyɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ katsa, ade bɛdzɛlɛ be fupoki bɛtsa awã kĩ bakɔa bati tɔkpa kate a. Lɛmɛ bɔláapuli bɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔtsa a na flee akũ dzununuunu finyaa.
58009006	Ade ntɛ bɛmanɛ fɔtsa a biyi lɔmɔ a, basɔfɔ awo nɛ Patampa atɔnyade a kamɛ kakɛna be tɔsɔfɔ adzuma.
58009007	Lɛmɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a odi awo nɛ kɔla kɔyade a kamɛ deedimɔapɛ nɛ kateli kamɛ. Ntɛ yanaa a, kɛnɛkĩ yalɛ bayaɛ babɔanɛ kĩ yaakɔa ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma nɛ ye mɔawɛ tɔkpa mɔ tɔkpa a kĩ bati kɛna nɛ katanyi kamɛ a lɔlɔ.
58009008	Nɛ nhihiɛ kĩĩ onukpɛ̃ ni, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a nyɛ ɛtsa kĩ, nɛ ayekĩ patampa atɔnyade a buki ɛdzɛ̃ sũ ni, osi tábinya kĩ bati biwo nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kamɛ.
58009009	Fukĩĩ nyɛ nfantuhũ fɔtsa katsa fɔkpa nviã fuwi kĩĩ. Fɔatsa kĩ afɔliɛ mɔ futetsa a kĩ bakpa Baguma a lápuli kafɔ̃ basumunɛ a ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ akpalɛ flefle,
58009010	kitonɛkĩ be ɔsum a manɛ mɔ funitsã, bavɛ mɔ akũ kakpalɛ tɛmaniɛ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ odi. Fukĩĩ flee nyɛ katinya kamɛ tɛbla kĩ bakɛna kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aalɔla foe.
58009011	Lɛmɛ Kristo ya kɔkɔɛ ndɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee ɛkpa fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ fɔya kɔkɔɛ a. Patampa Kpalɛwa a kĩ ye kamɛ yasum a pɔnɛ lububu, ade ɛkpɔla ɛba akɔɛ a. Ade ye kɔ̃ nnɛ́ patampa kĩ batidziwa like ye, ade foe nyɛ kĩ ɛtáto katinya kĩĩ kamɛ.
58009012	Kĩ Kristo wo nɛ patampa a kamɛ ɛnaa Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee kamɛ deedimɔapɛ a, ɛtákɔa kutukpabi mɔ banantsue babi babɔanɛ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ, mbom ye mɔawɛ babɔanɛ ɛkɔa ɛvɛlɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna ɛma boe.
58009013	Kutukpabi, banantsue babɔanɛ mɔ ɔnantsue obi kĩ bipila ye batɔ bakɔa kasã nɛ oti a kĩ efĩĩ deĩ nɛ ye akũ, lɔkɔa ye akũ akpalɛ.
58009014	Ayekĩ fukĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali sũ ni, nde mɔ Kristo babɔanɛ lɛláakɛna fɔtsa kpale kɔlaa? Kristo tsã daa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ akũ, ɛkɔa ye a kĩ efĩĩ adima lɛláa ye akũ a, ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma. Ye babɔanɛ a akpalɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ɛnyɛ boe tɛmaniɛ kĩ tɛlá nfasɔ ayekĩ bɔ́apuli busum Baguma a kĩ edzi nkpã a.
58009015	Ade fukĩĩ sũ Kristo kɛna apam vɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ɔkpɔlanɛ, ayekĩ bati a kĩ Baguma vɛ a, aana daa adzapadiɛ a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a. Fukĩĩ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kitonɛkĩ oti liku, ade fɔnyɛ tɔkpa a kĩ bati kɛna nɛ apam atɔnyade a kamɛ a.
58009016	Awã kĩ adzapadiɛ akũ ovoli deĩ ni, baákɛna ye akũ adzuma ntɛ bɛtámɔ́ foe kamɛ kĩ ovoli a ɔkɔnanɛ ku,
58009017	kitonɛkĩ adzapadiɛ akũ ovoli lɛnyɛ́ lɛtsama ntɛ oti a kĩ ɛkɛna ye a dzi nkpã. Mbɔɛntɛ oti a ku fɔmɔ baapuli bɛkɛna ye akũ adzuma.
58009018	Ade foesũ apam atɔnyade a malo ni, bɛtánɛ babɔanɛ liti bɛkɛna ye adzuma.
