58009019	Mose nya lɔtɔ ede lɛtsã nɛ tɛbla flee a kĩ tideĩ nɛ mbla ovoli kamɛ a ɛkpa bati a. Ke liti a, ɛkɔa mui ɛtsɛka mɔ kutukpabi mɔ banantsue babɔanɛ, ɛkɔa kuveli tɛtsã mɔ tuwĩ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ ɛta ade ɛnyɛ ɛsã nɛ mbla ovoli a mɔ bati a flee akũ.
58009020	Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade apam a kĩ Baguma kɛna mɔ mi a kĩ mikɛna nɛ ye akũ a babɔanɛ nɛ awĩ a.”
58009021	Ade ayea Mose lɛmɛ akɔa babɔanɛ kasã nɛ Patampa Kpalɛwa a mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ foe akũ adzuma bakɛna nɛ kasum kamɛ a flee akũ a.
58009022	Ɔnɔkɔali, bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ kĩ nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, babɔanɛ bakɔa kakpalɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ, ade ntɛ bɛtáko babɔanɛ nɛ tite ni, tɔkpa kakɔa kate láya.
58009023	Foesũ fusĩ kĩ bɛkpalɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔla ndɛ ode fude kuyo a akũ nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ. Lɛmɛ ode fɔtsa a mɔawɛ kɔ̃ afɔliɛ kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ tite akũ ade bɛkɔa bɛkpalɛ foe akũ.
58009024	Kitonɛkĩ Kristo táwo ɛnaa Patampa Kpalɛwa a kĩ batidziwa like, kĩ ɛnyɛ ode fude a odi kuyo a kamɛ. Ewo ɛnaa ode mɔawɛ a, awã kĩ finyaa ɛnanyɛ ye akũ nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ boe onukpɛ̃.
58009025	Lɛmɛ Kristo táwo nɛ awã kĩ yakɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ebuli ndɛ ayekĩ Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a akɔa ɔyaɛ babɔanɛ kawomɛna nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kamɛ kateli nyɛ kateli a.
58009026	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ aye fɔla ni, kufɛ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkaamɔ lubo lɔkɔ pii, kito anɛ katinya kayɔkayi a. Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ katinya anaa kawũna a, Kristo ya deedimɔapɛ kĩ yakɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa.
58009027	Baguma hihiɛ kĩ otidziwa eku deedimɔapɛ, ade nɛ wuda liti a, yaadzɛmɔ ye.
58009028	Ade ayea Kristo lɛmɛ kɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ deedimɔapɛ, ɛnyɛ bati pii tɔkpa a ɛnamɛna a. Yaabuki ɛya lɛyade, lɛmɛ ɛláabuki ɛkɛna lɛtsama nɛ tɔkpa akũ, mbom yaatɛ bati a kĩ bidzi badã ye anɛ a bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
58010001	Yudafɔ mbla a lɛnyɛ́ fɔtsa wĩ a kutidu, mbom ɛla ndɛ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ fɔ́aya a kuyo kɛkɛ. Nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, kateli nyɛ kateli basɔfɔ a abɔa afɔliɛ mɔapɛ a kakpa Baguma. Ade foesũ ntɛ fɔtsã mbla kĩĩ akũ ni, bɛláapuli bɛkɛna bati a kĩ baya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a bɛkpɔla da a.
58010002	Ntɛ bipuli bɛkpalɛ bati a kĩ basum Baguma a akũ deedimɔapɛ ni, kufɛ be tɔwɔlɛ lɛláabuki tɛkakɔ be kɔtɔ bio kĩ tɔkpa deĩ nɛ be akũ, lɔkɔa bɛfɔ̃ afɔlibɔ flee kabɔa.
58010003	Lɛmɛ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔla a, kateli nyɛ kateli afɔlibɔ afɔ̃ bati akai be tɔkpa kɛkɛ,
58010004	kitonɛkĩ banantsue mɔ kutukpabi babɔanɛ lɛláapuli bɛnyɛ tɔkpa da.
58010005	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ kĩ Kristo aaya nɛ katinya kamɛ a, ebi Baguma kĩ, “Aáwɛ afɔlibɔ mɔ futetsa, mbom ɔkɛna sukɛna ɔkpa yĩ.
58010006	Ɔyaɛ kĩ bipila ye lodo nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ akũ ĩye tɔkpa kanyɛ afɔliɛ láwo nɔ anɛ.
58010007	Ade ke nlɛ kĩ, ‘O Baguma, amɔ yĩ nɛ awĩ. Ĩya kĩ mayaakɛna nɔ kawɛ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ yĩ akũ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a.’ ”
58010008	Ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Aáwɛ afɔlibɔ, mɔ futetsa, ĩye ɔyaɛ kĩ bapila ye nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ akũ, mɔ tɔkpa kanyɛ afɔliɛ láwo nɔ anɛ.” Ɛlɛ fukĩĩ titɔ kĩ babɔa afɔliɛ kĩĩ flee nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ malo.
58010009	Ade ke ɛlɛ kĩ, “O Baguma, amɔ yĩ nɛ awĩ. Ĩya kĩ mayaakɛna nɔ kawɛ.” Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ a, Baguma fɔnɛ afɔlibɔ kɔɛ a flee awɛ ɛkɔa Kristo afɔliɛ a edo nɛ te kadokɔ̃.
58010010	Ayekĩ Yesu Kristo kɛna Baguma kawɛ akũ, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ deedimɔapɛ, ɛkpa fɔkɔ flee ɛkpalɛ boe akũ.
58010011	Yudafɔ ɔsɔfɔ odi nyɛ odi akɛna ye ɔsɔfɔ adzuma luwi nyɛ luwi, kabɔa afɔliɛ mɔapɛ a kabuli, titɔ kĩ afɔlibɔ kĩĩ lɛláapuli ɛnyɛ tɔkpa malo.
58010012	Lɛmɛ kĩ Kristo kɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ mɔapɛ nɛ tɔkpa akũ eyua a, ɛnadzi nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna,
58010013	awã kĩ edzi yadzɔlɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aakɔa ye bakesĩnɛ ɛkɛna ye abɔa katekɔ̃.
58010014	Kristo kɔa afɔliɛ mɔapɛ a kĩ ɛbɔa a, ɛkɛna bati a kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ a bɛkpɔla daa.
58010015	Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ adi adansiɛ nɛ foe akũ. Ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛlɛ kĩ,
58010016	“Boe Ɔlate lɛ kĩ, ‘Ade apam vɔɛ̃ kĩ maakɛna mɔ be, nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ laya a kamɛ a. Maakɔa yĩ mbla a ndo nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ade maatsɛlɛ ye nɛ be adzuni kamɛ a.’ ”
58010017	Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nláabuki nte anɛ nɛ be tɔkpa mɔ be ɔbla kpa akũ.”
58010018	Foesũ ntɛ bɛkɔa fukĩĩ flee bite ni, tɔkpa kanyɛ afɔliɛ tábuki esĩ.
58010019	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔtsã Yesu wuda akũ, bɔna osi faa kĩ bɔ́apuli buwo nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kamɛ.
58010020	Ebinya nkpã osi vɔɛ̃ ɛkpa boe ɛtsãmɛna lima a kĩ lɛsɛ̃ patampa kamɛ a kĩ lɛdza lɛkpa ye sukɛna a.
58010021	Budeĩ Ɔsɔfɔ Kpale kĩ ye adãmɛna Baguma tɔtɔ a akũ,
58010022	foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa ɔnɔkɔali ɔwɔlɛ, mɔ katɛkado kĩ kitim, mɔ tɔwɔlɛ kĩ tɛkpalɛ kĩ kɔtɔkaku lɛláa, mɔ sukɛna kĩ bɛwɔla se mui klɛĩklɛĩ bufuã Baguma.
58010023	Mifɔ̃ bupi kɔnɛte fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔanyɛ katsa a budomɔ akũ pintii nɛ boe katɛkado kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɔ́apuli bɔtɛ Baguma budo kĩ yaakɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a akũ.
58010024	Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔna ayekĩ bɔ́ado boe bawaɛ̃ kɔbɛ̃ bibumɛna akũ akũ, bɛwɛ akũ kalɛ, bɛkɛna tudzuma wĩ lɛmɛ.
58010025	Mitafɔ̃ bɔfɔ̃ boe katsɛna kanaa ndɛ ayekĩ mi kamɛ badi akɛna a, mbom mifɔ̃ budo akũ kɔbɛ̃ bubu, kitonɛkĩ mimɔ́ kĩ boe Ɔlate Luwi a lamɛna kafuã.
58010026	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bunyi ɔnɔkɔali a buyua, mɔ bubua pa bɔakɛna tɔkpa ni, afɔliɛ adima buki ɛláa kĩ yaapuli ɛnyɛ tɔkpa.
58010027	Mbom lɛtsa a kĩ lite nyɛ kĩ bɔadzi bɔkadã Kadzɛ mɔ libe a kĩ laaya a anɛ, mɔ fi gɛĩgɛĩ a kĩ fɔ́awɔla Baguma bakesĩnɛ a!
58010028	Ntɛ odi fum Mose mbla a ni, baámɔ ye kɔnya, kakɔ bakɔ ye ntɛ bɛdza nɛ bati nviã ĩye bati ɛlalɛ adansiɛ kadi akũ.
58010029	Kekɔ̃ mikɔna midã ni, litsa sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aaya nɛ oti a kĩ esupa Baguma Obi a, kĩ ebu Baguma apam babɔanɛ a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛvɔlɛ tɔkpa nɛ ye akũ a fɔtsa pupulidza? Litsa lɛmɛ miakɔna kĩ laaya nɛ oti a kĩ yasupa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ yamɔ bati kɔnya a akũ? Mikɔna midã sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ mɔ ɔsĩ a kĩ baakpa ye a!
58010030	Kitonɛkĩ bunyina oti a kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yĩ aavia tɔkpa kɔtɔkase, yĩ aase te kɔtɔ.” Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate a aadzɛmɔ ye bati.”
58010031	Fɔnyɛ libe paa kĩ odi aawo nɛ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a kalɔkpa kamɛ!
58010032	Mite anɛ nɛ fuwi a kĩ fɔtɛ̃, kĩ minya lɔtɔ minyi Baguma laa a. Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, kĩ Baguma ɔhaĩ ko nɛ mi akũ a, mido ɔwɔlɛ mipili mɔ ɔsĩ titɔ kĩ mimɔ́ lubo pii malo.
58010033	Fɔkɔ fudi bavũna mi nɛ kanade, kakɛna mi awɔda. Fɔkɔ bɛbã lɛmɛ miakɔa mi akũ kabumɛna bikĩ bamɔna be lubo kĩĩ odu a.
58010034	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, mimɔ́ lubo ndɛ bati a kĩ bɛwaa kɔla, ade titɔ kĩ bɛkɔa kɔbɛ̃ bɛtɛ mi akũ fɔtsa flee nɛ mi awɛ malo ni, mido ɔwɔlɛ mitɛ foe mɔ kawɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ mibuki mideĩ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ lɛbɛ̃, kĩ laana daa a.
58010035	Foesũ akpɔ ɛtaveli mi, kitonɛkĩ fɔ́ama mi kɔtɔkase kpale.
58010036	Fusĩ kĩ miana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, ayekĩ míapuli mikɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ, lɔkɔa mi awɛ aata lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a.
58010037	Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Kite sukuloo oti a kĩ yaaya a, aaya, ade ɛláabuna owi a.
58010038	Yĩ oti kpĩĩ aatɛ yĩ edo, edzi nkpã. Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi muniki liti ni, ɛláabuki ewo yĩ anɛ.”
58010039	Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ bɔnyɛ́ bati a kĩ bamuniki liti kanaa kayɛla kamɛ, mbom budeĩ katɛ kado ade bɔna nkpã katɛ a.
58011001	Katɛkado nyɛ fɔatsa kĩ nɔ anɛ teĩ nɛ foe akũ a anɛ kadã mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ aámɔ mɔ anɛ a foe katɛkado kĩ fudeĩ.
58011002	Katɛkado akũ fɔtsã mɔ Baguma mɔ́ kawɔlɛ nɛ boe atitifɔ bawanyɔ a akũ a.
58011003	Katɛkado kamɛ fɔtsã mɔ bunu foe kayɔ kĩ Baguma kalɛ a ɛkɔa ɛbɔa katinya, ayekĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔamɔ a, ɛkɛna de etomɛna lɛtsa a kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a kamɛ.
58011004	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Abel bɔa afɔliɛ kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ Kain ade ɛkpa Baguma. Ye katɛkado kamɛ ɛtsã ɛna Baguma adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma mɔawɛ lɛtɛ ye futetsa a. Titɔ kĩ Abel ku malo ni, ɛtsã ye katɛkado kamɛ ebuki yalɛ kɔdzɛla nviã.
58011005	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ bɛbɔɛ Henok bɛnamɛna ode kĩ ɛtáku. Odima tábuki ɛmɔ́ ye, kitonɛkĩ Baguma yabɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode. Fɔmɔ ɛbɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode a ni, Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a di adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa wo Baguma anɛ.
58011006	Ntɛ odi lɛlá katɛkado ni, ye fɔlɛtsa lɛláawo Baguma anɛ, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛna katɛkado kĩ Baguma deĩ, ade ɛnyɛ bikĩ bawɛ ye liti osi a kɔtɔ osenɛ a.
58011007	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Noa tɛ Baguma kɔdɛ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya kĩ ɛláapuli ɛmɔ́ a akũ. Ebu Baguma ade ke ɛmɛ mui anɛ adakã kpale kĩ ɛnyɛ ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ bati a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, ye katɛkado nyɛ kɛtsa kĩ katinya kamɛ bati ku kɔtɔ ade Baguma bɔɛ ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ a.
58011008	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Abraham bu Baguma, kĩ ɛvɛ ye kĩ ɛdzakũ ɛnaa tite a kĩ taanya ye adzapadiɛ akũ a. Ade ɛdzakũ nɛ ye mɔawɛ tite akũ ɛnaa awã kĩ enyína malo a.
58011009	Katɛkado ɛkɔa ɛnanya ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ tite a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi yaakpa ye a akũ. Edzi nɛ patampa kamɛ, ade ayea Isak mɔ Yakob lɛmɛ dzi nɛ tɛpatampa kamɛ a, titɔ kĩ bɛkpa be tite mɔapɛ a bɔhɛ a.
58011010	Abraham kɛna foe lɔmɔ, kitonɛkĩ ɛkadã anɛ kakpa ɔmatɔ kpale a kĩ Baguma awɛ tsua ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ kayɔkayi futekũ mɔ ɔsĩ akũ.
58011011	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Sara lɛmɛ na kɔbɛ̃ epuli ɛtsãmɔ kɔma, titɔ kĩ ɛkɛna katsɔkpa malo, kitonɛkĩ ebu Baguma a kĩ ɛkpa ye bɔhɛ a ɔnɔkɔalini.
58011012	Foesũ kito Abraham mɔapɛ a kĩ eku eyua malo a kamɛ babi mɔ bawa kĩ bɛnɛ lidede ndɛ fusibii, mɔ mpo abuĩ dã kĩ bɛláapuli bɛkã a nɛ́ bito a.
58011013	Bati kĩĩ flee ku nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ, kĩ be awɛ táta lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa be a. Lɛmɛ bɛmɔ́ foe mɔ lugo, bɛtɛ foe mɔ kawɔlɛ ade bitunɔ nɛ foe akũ kĩ banɔvɔɛ̃ mɔ basitsãnɛ banɛ nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ a.
58011014	Kitonɛkĩ bati a kĩ balɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ odu a, nyɛ bɛtsa pefee kĩ bɛlamɔ be mɔawɛ tite kawɛ.
58011015	Ntɛ tite a kĩ te akũ bɛdzakũ a bɛkakɔna ni, kufɛ bɛna osi bimuniki bɛnaa te akũ.
58011016	Mbom bɛkawɛ tite kĩ tɛnɛnɛ tɛbɛ̃, kĩ tɛnyɛ ode tide a lɛmɛ. Nɛ foesũ fɔákɔ Baguma kɔnyɔã kĩ bavɛ ye kĩ be Baguma, kitonɛkĩ ɛlɔla ɔmatɔ kpale odi eyi be.
58011017	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Abraham kɔa ye obi Isak ɛbɔa afɔliɛ, lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma sɔ ye ɛdã a. Titɔ kĩ obi a na Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa Abraham malo ni, etunɔ faa kĩ yakɔa ye obinyole mɔapɛ a ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma.
58011018	Baguma bi ye kɔkɔɛ kĩ, “Isak akũ fɔ́atsã mɔ aana babi mɔ bawa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi a.”
58011019	Abraham kɔna kĩ Baguma aapuli ɛdzɛla Isak etomɛna kanɔkpa malo. Ade foesũ emuniki ɛtɛ ye obi ndɛ wuda kamɛ bɛdzɛla ye bitomɛna a.
58011020	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Isak hila Yakob mɔ Esau nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya a akũ a.
58011021	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ kĩ Yakob aaku a, ehila Yosef babinyole a, ade kĩ ɛkɛna lɔlɔ ete nɛ ye otse kĩ yake katsã akũ a, esum Baguma.
58011022	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ kĩ Yosef aaku a, ɛlɛ eyi kĩ Israelfɔ aadzakũ nɛ Egipte tite akũ, ade ɛtsa ayekĩ bɛkɛna mɔ ye fɔtsɔ̃ a.
58011023	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ kĩ bɛma Mose a, ye bamanɛ kɔla ye tidetɔ ɛlalɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ yalɛ kadã paa, ade bɛtávila mbla a kĩ Egipte Lɛgã si a katu a.
58011024	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ kĩ Mose bo anɛ a, esĩ kĩ bɛtavɛ ye kĩ Egipte Lɛgã obitsole obi.
58011025	Mbom ɛwɛ kĩ yamɔ lubo mɔ Baguma bati kɛba kĩ yamɔ tɔkpa kamɛ ɔmɛnɛ lɔkɔ lukũ lidi.
58011026	Mose kɔna kĩ kɔnyɔã a kĩ baado ye nɛ Kristo sũ tɛ kɔya paa kɔba akũ kana fɔtsa flee a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ Egipte a, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa anɛ ete nɛ kɔtɔkase a kĩ Baguma aakpa ye nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ laaya a akũ.
58011027	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Mose dzakũ nɛ Egipte, kĩ ɛtávila lɛgã kalɔkpa a. Edo ɔwɔlɛ ɛtámuniki liti, ɛkɛna ndɛ yamɔ Baguma a kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a.
58011028	Katɛkado Mose kɔa eyi Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi a, ade ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔa babɔanɛ bikputa nɛ be tunyukpɛ̃ titse akũ, ayekĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a lɛláakɔ Israelfɔ babinyole batɔnyade a.
58011029	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Israelfɔ puli bitsua Mpo Ngbã a binyina ndɛ tite akũ bɛtsɛ̃. Kĩ Egiptefɔ bɔa mbɔdi kĩ be malo banyina a ni, bɛkamu nɛ mui a kamɛ.
58011030	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Yeriko ɔmatɔ foebi a kĩ Israelfɔ tsã bisinya foe fuwi evũkɔnɔ a veliveli.
58011031	Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ bɛtákɔ Rahab ɔdɔpaani a bibumɔ bati a kĩ bɛtábu Baguma a, kitonɛkĩ ɛtɛ Israelfɔ a kĩ bɛbɛla bɛnadã tite a kamɛ mɔ kawɔlɛ.
58011032	Litsa mbuki nlɛ mbu? Lɔkɔ lɛláa kĩ maalɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ Gideon, Barak, Samson, Yefta, Dawid, Samuel mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a akũ.
58011033	Bɛtsã katɛkado kamɛ bɛnɔ mɔ fude pii bɛnya be akũ. Bɛnya akũ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ, ade bɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa be a. Badi sua dzata tunukpɛ̃,
58011034	badi dina fi gɛĩgɛĩ, ade fɔfɔ̃ kĩ badi lo nɛ kawũ onukpɛ̃ a. Katɛkado fɔ̃ bikĩ bɛkɛna kpɛtɛɛ a na kɔbɛ̃, ade bɛna ɔsĩ nɛ kawũ kamɛ bɛnɔ bɛnya banɔvɔɛ̃ kawũ banɔnɛ akũ a.
58011035	Katɛkado kamɛ fɔtsã mɔ batsole tɛ be akũ bati banɔkpa kĩ bɛdzɛla bidzi nkpã. Nɛ katɛkado sũ bati bɛbã kĩ bɛtáwɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ be nɛ kɔla fɔnɛ be akũ awɛ bɛkɛna be awɔda biku, ayekĩ baadzɛla be bidzi nkpã kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ a.
58011036	Bidi badi nsekuo, bibo be mɔ mple, ade bido badi nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ bɛnado nɛ kɔla kamɛ a.
58011037	Bɛtalɛ badi boe, bɛbɛ̃ badi nɛ kayite mɔ ɔsaɛ, bɛkɔ badi mɔ apã. Badi na nɛ baveli ĩye kutukpã tuvoli kamɛ bɛtsã bɛkamini nɛ ohiã kamɛ, bitomɔ be liti ade bɛkɛna be awɔda a.
58011038	Nɛ be kalɛ sũ katinya kĩĩ tákpa be kadzi! Bɛtsã bɛkamini ndɛ bati kĩ bilo kawũ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ, bidzi nɛ tɔtɔ akũ, bɛbɛla nɛ tɔtɔ tɛkɛ mɔ tite fɔkɛ kamɛ.
58011039	Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ flee kĩ be katɛkado di adansiɛ nɛ be akũ malo ni, be kamɛ odima awɛ táta lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a,
58011040	kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɛna nhihiɛ kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ eyi ɛkpa boe. Ye botaɛ nyɛ kĩ ɛláanɛ boe liti ɛkɛna be bɛkpɔla.
58012001	Nɛ foe sũ ni, kĩ budeĩ bati kɔdabu kĩĩ odu kĩ bisinya boe, bado boe kɔbɛ̃ sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ fɔlɔtsa fudi nyɛ fudi kĩ futeĩ nɛ boe akũ, mɔ tɔkpa a kĩ tɛmanɛ nɛ boe akũ buwula, lɔkɔa buwula atsɛ a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ boe lɔtɔ a mɔ kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ.
58012002	Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa anɛ bute nɛ Yesu akũ daa, oti a kĩ ye akũ boe katɛkado dzɛ̃ a, kito kayɔkayi kɛnawo kawũna a. Kĩ enyina kawɔlɛ a kĩ kadzɔlɛ ye a sũ ni, edo ɔwɔlɛ ɛmɔ́ lubo nɛ asendua akũ, ade ɛtábu asendua akũ wuda kɔnyɔã lɛtsama a. Lɛmɛ finyaa ɛnɛ edzi nɛ Baguma lɛgãkpo a sɔmɔna.
58012003	Mikɔna lɛtsa a kĩ de kamɛ Yesu tsã ɛtɛ̃ a, mɔ ayekĩ ɛmɔ́ lubo kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ yidza bɛdza nɛ ye akũ pii a midã. Nɛ foesũ mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi mimuniki nɛ ye liti.
58012004	Kitonɛkĩ nɛ mi kanɔ mɔ tɔkpa kamɛ a, mitánɔ miwo tɔ̃ awã kĩ baako mi babɔanɛ nɛ tite.
58012005	Mbɔɛɛ milɛla ɔwɔlɛ kado fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma abi mi ndɛ ye babi a? Ade foe nyɛ kĩ, “Yĩ obi, ntɛ Ɔlate a vɛlɛ nɔ sɔtɔ ni, tabu foe fɔtsa kabii. Ntɛ ɛkã nɔ anɛ ni, tafɔ̃ fɔha nɔ ɔwɔlɛ.
58012006	Kitonɛkĩ oti a kĩ boe Ɔlate awɛ kalɛ ni, ade ye yavɛlɛ sɔtɔ a. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye tibi ni, yavɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ.”
58012007	Ntɛ miamɔ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ lubo ni, mido ɔwɔlɛ. Mi lubo kamɔ a atsa kĩ Baguma lamɛna mi kavɛlɛ ndɛ ye babi aye. Obisɛ̃ odi deĩ kĩ ɔlɛga lávɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ?
58012008	Ntɛ baávɛlɛ mi ndɛ ayekĩ yavɛlɛ ye babi flee a ni, fɔatsa kĩ minyɛ́ ye babi kpanunu a, mbom minyɛ oti bɛbã babi.
58012009	Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ budeĩ tite akũ balɛga kĩ bavɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ, lɛmɛ bɔakɔa obu kakpa be. Nde sũ bɔláadɔla boe akũ bɔkpa boe hũhũ Ɔlɛga pii fɔba lɔkɔa budzi nkpã?
58012010	Boe balɛga a avɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ lɔkɔ lukũ odi ndɛ ayekĩ fɔnɛnɛ be. Lɛmɛ Baguma kɔ̃ akɛna foe nɛ boe kalɛ sũ, ayekĩ bɔ́anya bati kpalɛwa ndɛ ye aye.
58012011	Ntɛ bavɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ a, fɔawo boe kalɔɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ, ade kawɔlɛ láde boe a. Lɛmɛ ke liti a, fɔafɔ̃ be a kĩ bɛvɛlɛ be a akɛna bati kpĩĩ, kana lukudɔ nɛ nkpã kamɛ.
58012012	Foesũ mido akpɔ a kĩ ɛdɔ a, mɔ mi aduli a kĩ ɛdɔũdɔũ kɔbɛ̃.
58012013	Mikaatsã tisi yedede akũ ayekĩ oti kĩ ɛnɛ lɛkpɛ̃ a kɔbɔa lɛláatɛ̃ ye, mbom kĩ yaana fɔsɔ katsa.
58012014	Mibɔa mbɔdi kĩ míadzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ mɔ odi nyɛ odi, midzi nkpã kĩ ɛkpalɛ, kitonɛkĩ odi kĩ ɛtákpalɛ lɛláapuli ɛmɔ́ɔ boe Ɔlate a.
58012015	Midã kadã wĩ kĩ mitáyɛla Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a. Mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛna ndɛ tuwĩ mɔ ɔnyɛ tibo anɛ, tido ɔhau mɔ efĩĩ nɛ bati pii kamɛ.
58012016	Mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛna adɔpaa, ĩye ɛkɛna oti kĩ enyína Baguma ndɛ Esau, kĩ ɛnɔ ye tibinyole lɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ɛtɛ funitsã sɔɔdaɛ mɔapɛ a.
58012017	Ndɛ ayekĩ minyina a, ke liti a Esau wɛ kĩ ɔlɛga ɛkpa ye nhila a, lɛmɛ ɛtákpa ye, ade titɔ kĩ ɛkɔa kabe ɛwɛ kĩ yadani lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a malo ni, ɛtána foe akũ osi.
58012018	Nnɛ́ Sinai ɔtɔ a kĩ oti aapuli ɛkɔa awɛ ɛta a sɛkɛ̃ miya. Fɔlá ndɛ ayekĩ Israelfɔ mɔ́ fi gɛĩgɛĩ katɛ̃ nɛ ye akũ, kĩ ɔtũ ke, fɔkɛna kusuu, ade ɔwɛ kpale kavũ a,
58012019	mɔ kĩ binu kagbulɛɛ kavɔ̃ mɔ odo a kĩ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a. Kĩ odo a nɛ a, bike aduli kĩ oti a ɛtabuki ɛlɛ kalɛ kadima ebu.
58012020	Kitonɛkĩ bɛtápuli bɛdza nɛ mbla a kĩ bisi a onukpɛ̃ kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔyaɛ malo lɛta ɔtɔ a ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛtalɛ ye boe bɛkɔ.”
58012021	Lɛtsa a kĩ bɛmɔ́ a deĩ libe paa kĩ Mose malo lɛ kĩ, “Libe wo yĩ, nkatila bliblibli!”
58012022	Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ ni, Zion ɔtɔ a sɛkɛ̃ miya, Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a ɔmatɔ kpale kĩ ɛnyɛ ode Yerusalem. Miya nɛ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ mpim mpim a ɔmatɔ kamɛ.
58012023	Miyawo nɛ Baguma babi batɔnyade a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ be buĩ nɛ ode kawɔlɛ katsɛna a kamɛ. Miya nɛ Baguma kĩ ɛnyɛ batidziwa flee fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ, mɔ bati wĩ a kĩ bɛkɛna be hũhũ bɛkpɔla a sɛkɛ̃.
58012024	Miya nɛ Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ apam vɔɛ̃ a ɔkplanɛ sɛkɛ̃, mɔ ye babɔanɛ a kĩ bɛsã a kĩ bɛdza bɛkpa bɔhɛ fɔtsa wĩ kaba Abel bade a.
58012025	Foesũ midã kadã wĩ kĩ mitásĩ oti a kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla a fɔlɛtsa katse. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bikĩ bisĩ bɛtátse oti a kĩ ɛlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa nɛ tite akũ a tápuli bilo a ni, nde bɔ́apuli bulo ntɛ busĩ kĩ bɔátse oti a kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla katomɛna ode a?
58012026	Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, ye odo kuna tite, lɛmɛ finyaa kɔ̃ ɛlɛ eyi kĩ, “Maakuna deedi bio, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ tite odi, mbom mɔ ode lɛmɛ.”
58012027	Fɔlɛtsa “deedi bio” a atsa pefee kĩ yaakuna fɔtsa a kĩ ɛbɔa a, ɛwɔla foe, lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛláakuna a aakahɔ.
58012028	Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ kɔlɛ kĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ kɛláakuna a ta boe awɛ. Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa obu mɔ kavila busum Baguma ayekĩ fɔ́awo ye anɛ,
58012029	kitonɛkĩ boe Baguma a nyɛ fi kĩ fɔawɔla fɔtsa.
58013001	Mikaawɛ akũ kalɛ daa ndɛ Kristofɔ bawaɛ̃ aye.
58013002	Mite anɛ mikaatɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ mi awã. Badi kɛna foe lɔmɔ bɛtɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛmɛ binyína.
58013003	Mite anɛ nɛ bikĩ bɛwaa kɔla a akũ ndɛ mimɔ be waa kɔla. Mite anɛ nɛ bikĩ bamɔna be lubo akũ a ndɛ mimɔ be amɔ lubo.
58013004	Kɛnɛ kĩ mi flee mido obu nɛ kɔtsɔ̃ mɔ kɔnyɔ kadzi kamɛ, ade kɛnɛ kĩ batsɔ̃ mɔ banyɔ bidi ɔnɔkɔali bɛkpa akũ a. Baguma aadzɛmɔ bati a kĩ bɛtsɛ̃mɔ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, mɔ bikĩ babɔa adɔpaa.
58013005	Minyɛ sika anɛngbã nɛ mi kadzi kamɛ, lɔkɔa fɔtsa a kĩ mideĩ fuwo mi anɛ. Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ, “Nláadzakũ nfɔnɛ nɔ, ade nláafɔnɛ nɔ awɛ lɛmɛ a.”
58013006	Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔna ɔwɔlɛ bɔlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate nyɛ yĩ obumɛnanɛ, nláavila. Litsa otidziwa aapuli ɛkɛna yĩ?”
58013007	Mite anɛ nɛ mi lɔtɔ banyanɛ kɔɛ a kĩ bide lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a akũ bɛkpa mi a akũ. Midã ayekĩ be kadzi kamɛ na, lɔkɔa mitomɔ be katɛkado.
58013008	Yesu Kristo mɔapɛ a lɛna kɔkɔɛ, edeĩ nviã kĩĩ, yaana daa.
58013009	Mitafɔ̃ fɔtsa vɔɛ̃ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ katsa lɛkpã mi miyɛla osi wĩ a. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ miatɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ mitomɛna Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ odi, kɛba kĩ míakɛna nɛ funitsã kanya tɛbla akũ, kitonɛkĩ fɔtábumɛna bikĩ bɛkɛna nɛ te akũ a.
58013010	Budeĩ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ kĩ Yudafɔ basɔfɔ a kĩ basum nɛ patampa kamɛ a lɛlá osi kĩ banya ye akũ afɔlibɔ lɛtsama.
58013011	Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a akɔa bayaɛ babɔanɛ kawomɛna nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kabɔa bati tɔkpa akũ afɔliɛ, lɛmɛ bapila bayaɛ sɛkɛna a nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɔbaɛ̃.
58013012	Ade fukĩĩ sũ Yesu lɛmɛ mɔ́ lubo eku nɛ ɔmatɔ a ɔbaɛ̃, ayekĩ yaakɔa ye mɔawɛ babɔanɛ ɛkpalɛ bati akũ.
58013013	Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔnɛ bɔnaa ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ ɔmatɔ a ɔbaɛ̃, bɔnaatɛ kɔnyɔã a kĩ bido ye a kudi.
58013014	Kitonɛkĩ bɔlá ɔmatɔ odima nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ kĩ yaawa daa, mbom ɔmatɔ a kĩ yaaya a liti osi bɔlamɛna kawɛ.
58013015	Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔtsã Yesu akũ bɔkɔa kamu kĩ kɛla ndɛ afɔliɛ aye bɔkpa Baguma luwi nyɛ luwi. Ade foe nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lanɛ kato bikĩ babɔa ye dĩ ndɛ boe Ɔlate ayea tunukpɛ̃ a.
58013016	Mitalɛla fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna mɔ mi bawaɛ̃ fɔtsa kakpa, kitonɛkĩ ade fukĩĩ nyɛ afɔliɛ kĩ yawo Baguma anɛ a.
58013017	Mibu mi lɔtɔ banyanɛ, midɔla akũ mikpa be lɛmɛ. Be adzɔlɛ mi tɛkla akũ daa, ndɛ bati kĩ baakɛna akunta bɛkpa Baguma nɛ be adzuma kakɛna a akũ. Foesũ ntɛ mikpa be obu ni, baakɛna ye mɔ kawɔlɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, baakɛna ye mɔ tuko kabe kĩ fɔláanya libi fɔkpa mi.
58013018	Mikaabɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ. Bɔtɛ budo kĩ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɔawɛ kĩ bɔakɛna fɔtsa wĩ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
58013019	Mibɔa mpaɛ kĩ Baguma ɛfɔ̃ mmuniki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ.
58013020	Baguma, lukudɔ ɔkpanɛ a kĩ ɛdzɛla boe Ɔlate Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ Baveli Bakpãnɛ Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a etomɛna kanɔkpa ɛtsãmɛna apam babɔanɛ vɔɛ̃ a kĩ ɛlá kawũna kamɛ a,
58013021	ɛkɔa lɛtsa wĩ lidi nyɛ lidi kĩ lisĩ mi ɛkpa mi, ayekĩ miakɛna nɛ ye kawɛ akũ. Ade mawã kĩ ɛtsã Yesu Kristo akũ ɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ yawɛ a nɛ boe kamɛ. Kukũkpalɛ kɔnya ye fude! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
58013022	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, make mi aduli kĩ mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mitse kɔdɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ ovoli a kĩ ntsɛlɛ mma mi a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa lɛ́la lugo.
58013023	Mawɛ kĩ makpa mi kanyi kĩ bɛnyɛ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Timoteo nɛ kɔla. Ntɛ ewo yĩ sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ ni, bɔmɔ ye bɔ́ayasɛla mi.
58013024	Miwɔ̃na mi lɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ Baguma bade a flee mikpa boe. Boe bawaɛ̃ a kĩ bito Italia awɔ̃na mi.
58013025	Baguma ɛmɔ mi a flee kɔnya.
59001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Yakobo, Baguma mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɔsumunɛ sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mama Yuda futete ewua-nviã a kĩ bɛgba biko nɛ katinya kamɛ flee a.
59001002	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ miwo nɛ sɔhuiɛ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ malo ni, mitɛ foe mɔ kawɔlɛ baũ,
59001003	kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ ntɛ bɛsɔ mi katɛkado bɛdã ni, fɔafɔ̃ miana kadza pintii mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado.
59001004	Mifɔ̃ mi kadza pintii a kɛnyɛ ke akũ nɛ mi lɛkɛnana kamɛ, ayekĩ míanya bati kĩ be ɔbla kpɔla flee, kĩ bɛláabuki bisĩ lɛtsama.
59001005	Lɛmɛ ntɛ mi kamɛ odi sĩ nyansã ni, kɛnɛ kĩ evia Baguma, yaakpa ye, kitonɛkĩ Baguma akɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ faa kakpa odi nyɛ odi fɔtsa kĩ yaádã oti anɛ.
59001006	Lɛmɛ ntɛ yabɔa mpaɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛtɛ edo, kĩ ɛtatɛ atsindze nɛ ye kamɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatɛ atsindze nɛ ye kamɛ ni, ɛla ndɛ mpo anɛ mui kpale kĩ ɔwɛ abɔa kato katɛ̃mɛna.
59001007	-
59001008	Oti a na odu kĩ ye adzuni adani mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ, kĩ yaápuli kasipi nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ yakɛna a akũ ni, ɛtakɔna kĩ yaana litsedi etomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃.
59001009	Okristoni ohiãni a kĩ Baguma dɛla nɛ ode ni, kɛnɛ kĩ epia ye akũ.
59001010	Ade ayea okristoni osikani kĩ Baguma kɛna nɛ kayɔ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ye malo epia akũ. Kitonɛkĩ osikani nkpã aayatɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔgbangbã akpalɛ katɔ a.
59001011	Ntɛ suwa de sɛta kɔɔba ni, sapila tuwĩ tavɛ, te fɔgbangbã a akpalɛ katɔ lɔkɔa tuwĩ a kalɛ ayɛla flefle. Ade aye osikani lɛmɛ aakapilipili nɛ ye tudzuma kamɛ flee ɛyaaku a.
59001012	Baguma hila oti a kĩ epuli edo ɔwɔlɛ nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ. Ntɛ epuli ɛnya sɔhuiɛ a akũ ni, Baguma aakpa ye nkpã a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa bati a kĩ bawɛ ye kalɛ a.
59001013	Ntɛ odi wo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ ni, ɛtalɛ kĩ, “Baguma sɛkɛ̃ sɔhuiɛ kĩĩ to.” Kitonɛkĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛsɔ Baguma ɛdã kĩ ɛkɛna tɔkpa, ade ye mɔawɛ a lɛmɛ yaásɔ odima kadã a.
59001014	Mbom oti mɔawɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa akɛ ye, kavɛlɛ ye kado nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ.
59001015	Lɔkɔa oti sukɛna fɔwɛtsa a atsamɔ kɔma kama tɔkpa, ade ntɛ tɔkpa a bo anɛ ni, tama wuda.
59001016	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛ mi.
59001017	Futetsa wĩ flee mɔ futelitsa a kĩ fɔkpɔla a fudi nyɛ fudi to ode. Foe flee futo Baguma a kĩ lɛbɔa ode tɛsɛdza a sɛkɛ̃. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yaádani ade lɛtsama lɛmɛ ládani ɔtũ nɛ ye akũ a.
59001018	Baguma kɔa ye mɔawɛ kawɛ ɛtsã ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a akũ, ɛma boe kĩ bɔna ye fɔtsa a kĩ ɛbɔa flee a kamɛ ɔtɔnyade.
59001019	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mite anɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ! Odi nyɛ odi etse fɔlɛtsa mɔatsɛ, lɛmɛ ɛtawɛ sɔwa ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ ĩye ɛna kalɔkpa mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ.
59001020	Kitonɛkĩ oti kalɔkpa láfɔ̃ yakɛna tuwĩ a kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ ɛkɛna a.
59001021	Foesũ mifɔnɛ ɔbla kĩ yado efĩĩ mɔ ablɔ kakɛna flee awɛ. Midɔla mi akũ mikpa Baguma, ayekĩ míapuli mitɛ ye kalɛ a kĩ edu nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a, kĩ kaafɔ̃ mina nkpã katɛ a.
59001022	Mitakatse Kalɛ Wĩ a kɛkɛ mikɔa mikakɛ mi akũ, mbom mikɛna nɛ ke akũ.
59001023	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse kalɛ a lɛmɛ yaákɛna nɛ ke akũ ni, ɛla ndɛ oti kĩ ɛdã ahuhɔɛ kamɛ ɛmɔ́ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛla a.
59001024	Yadã ye akũ, lɛmɛ mɔ ye kadzakũ pɛ ɛla ayekĩ ɛla a.
59001025	Lɛmɛ oti a kĩ yadã mbla a kĩ ɛkpɔla a, kĩ yakpa bati akũ akũ kadzi, mɔ yakɛna nɛ ye akũ a, kĩ ɛnyɛ́ oti kĩ yatse kalɛ a kɛkɛ kalɛla ke a ni, Baguma aahila ye nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ yakɛna a kamɛ.
59001026	Ntɛ odi kɔna kĩ yasum Baguma lɛmɛ yaápuli ɛnya ye sɛmɛ akũ ni, kakɛ ye akũ, ade ye ɔsum a lɛmɛ nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza a.
59001027	Ɔsum a kĩ ɛkpalɛ, kĩ efĩĩ adima lɛmɛ lɛláa ye akũ a nɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga anɛ nyɛ bibumɛna banɔkpabi mɔ bakunawa nɛ be kasĩ kamɛ, kĩ bati bɛnyɛ be akũ nɛ katinya efĩĩ fɔtsa kamɛ.
59002001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ndɛ bati kĩ bɛtɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, kĩ ɛnyɛ kukũkpalɛ Ɔlate a bido sũ ni, mitadã bati anɛ nɛ mi fɔtsa kakɛna kamɛ.
59002002	Mifɔ̃ bɔbɔɛ foe kĩ osikani sua lima wĩ akũ, edo sika lipetia, ɛya nɛ mi katsɛnakɔ̃, ade ohiãni odi lɛmɛ do tɛtadiɛ kpeliwa ɛya nɛ awã a.
59002003	Ntɛ mikpalɛ anɛ mido oti a kĩ edo fɔtsa wĩ, mibi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, yaadzi nɛ awĩ,” lɛmɛ mibi ohiãni a kɔ̃ kĩ, “Naadza nɛ akĩĩ!” ĩye “Kɛna akũ kadzi nɛ ɔda nɛ yĩ abɔa kayɔ!”
59002004	Ntɛ mikɛna foe lɔmɔ a, lɔkɔa fɔátsa kĩ adzuni kpa mikɔa miadzɛ mi fɔlɛtsa, kĩ miado ntsitsemu lɛmɛ nɛ mi kamɛ?
59002005	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mitse katse wĩ! Nnɛ́ kapau Baguma pau katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ahiãfɔ kĩ bɛkɛna katɛkado kamɛ asikafɔ, bɛna kanyakɔ̃ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa bati a kĩ bawɛ ye kalɛ a kamɛ?
59002006	Lɛmɛ mi miasupa ohiãni! Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ asikafɔ amɛnana mi, kavɛlɛ mi kanamɛna fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ anɛ?
59002007	Nnɛ́ asikafɔ alɛ tuwuli kpa kasupa dĩ wĩ a kĩ Baguma te mi a?
59002008	Ntɛ miakɛna nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ mbla a akũ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ miakɛna fɔtsa wĩ. Lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ a nyɛ kĩ, “Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ kalɛ a.”
59002009	Lɛmɛ ntɛ miadã bati anɛ ni, miakɛna tɔkpa, ade mbla a akɔ mi kɔtɔ ndɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a.
59002010	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a flee akũ, mɔ efum nɛ amɔapɛ akũ ni, efum te flee.
59002011	Kitonɛkĩ oti mɔapɛ a kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Tanɛ kɔtsɔ̃ ĩye kɔnyɔ liti” a, ade ye lɛlɛ kĩ, “Takɔ oti” a. Foesũ ntɛ ɔtánɛ kɔtsɔ̃ ĩye kɔnyɔ liti malo, mɔ ɔkɔ oti ni, ofum mbla a.
59002012	Foesũ milɛ kɔdzɛla mikɛna fɔtsa ndɛ bati kĩ mbla a kĩ yakpa boe akũ akũ kadzi a, Baguma aakɔa ɛdzɛmɔ be.
59002013	Kitonɛkĩ nɛ kadzɛ kamɛ ni, Baguma lɛláamɔ okĩ ɛtámɔ ɔkɔba kɔnya a kɔnya. Lɛmɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a lɛláadzɛmɔ ye.
59002014	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mi kamɛ odi lɛ kĩ edeĩ katɛkado mɔ ye lɛkɛnana lányɛ katsa lɔmɔ a, nfasɔ wɔdabe deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ? Ye katɛkado aapuli kɛkpa ye nkpã mbɔɛɛ?
59002015	Mifɔ̃ bɔbɔɛ foe kĩ boe bawaɛ̃nyole ĩye bawaɛ̃tsole badi deĩ kĩ bɛlá tilima ade bɛlá funitsã kĩ banya malo a.
59002016	Ntɛ ɔtákpa bati fɔtsa a kĩ fusĩ be a, litsa nfasɔ deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ ntɛ obi be kĩ, “Baguma ehila mi. Akũ ede mi ovio, mina funitsã minya.”
59002017	Ade ayea ntɛ odi deĩ katɛkado mɔ lɛkɛnana tábumɔ foe a, ye katɛkado a nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza.
59002018	Lɛmɛ odi aalɛ kĩ, “Oti mɔa deĩ katɛkado, ade ɔbɛbã lɛmɛ akɛna adzuma a.” Yĩ mbuayɛ nyɛ kĩ, “Nyɛ nɔ katɛkado a kĩ lɛkɛnana lɛláa foe kamɛ a katsa yĩ. Yĩ malo maatsã yĩ tuwĩ kakɛna kamɛ ĩnyɛ yĩ katɛkado ntsa.”
59002019	Ɔtɛ odo kĩ Baguma odi pɛ deĩ? Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ. Hũhũ kpa lɛmɛ tɛ bido ade bavila katila nɛ ye anɛ a.
59002020	Ɔkɔasia anɛ! Awɛ kĩ ĩnyɛ ntsa nɔ kĩ katɛkado kĩ lɛkɛnana wĩ tábu nɛ foe kamɛ nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza?
59002021	Nde fɔya fɔmɔ Baguma mɔ boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla? Fɔtsɛ̃ ye lɛkɛnana kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa ye mɔawɛ obi Isak ɛnamɛna afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ akũ kĩ yakɔa ye ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma.
59002022	Mimɔ́ foe lɔmɔ? Ye katɛkado mɔ lɛkɛnana a kɛna adzuma fɔkpɔta, ade ye lɛkɛnana a fɔ̃ ye katɛkado a kpɔla a.
59002023	Ade Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Abraham tɛ Baguma edo, ade nɛ ye katɛkado sũ ni, Baguma mɔ ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla.” Nɛ foesũ Baguma vɛ Abraham kĩ ye ɔkɔba.
59002024	Foesũ miamɔ kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ oti lɛkɛnana wĩ kamɛ ade Baguma amɔ ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla, lɛmɛ fɔtsɛ́ ye katɛkado kamɛ odi.
59002025	Ade aye pɛpɛɛpɛ Baguma kɔna nɛ Rahab kĩ ɛbɔa adɔpaa a akũ a. Ɛmɔ́ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpalɛwa nɛ ye lɛkɛnana kamɛ. Lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna nyɛ kĩ ɛtɛ Israelfɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛnabɛla bɛsɛla tite akũ bɛdã a, ade ebumɔ be bɛtsã osi bɛbã akũ bilo a.
59002026	Foesũ ndɛ ayekĩ sukɛna nyɛ fɔtsa kuwa ntɛ kawɛya lɛláa se kamɛ a, ade aye katɛkado lɛmɛ nyɛ fɔtsa kuwa ntɛ lɛkɛnana lɛláa foe kamɛ a.
59003001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi kamɛ bati pii bɛtanya fɔtsa batsanɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ boe a kĩ bɔatsa fɔtsa a ni, Baguma aadzɛmɔ boe mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ɛba bati bɛbã.
59003002	Kitonɛkĩ boe flee bɔakɛna nfumusu pii. Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi táfum nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ ni, ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla ade yapuli kanya ye kutidu a flee akũ a.
59003003	Bɔado ɔpɔnkɔ sɔbɔtsaɛ nɛ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ boe kawɛ akũ, kapuli kafɔ̃ yanaa awã kĩ bɔawɛ a.
59003004	Midã ɔkɔlɔ baũ lɛmɛ. Titɔ kĩ ɛpɔnɛ lububu, kĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ abɔa ye kanamɛna malo a ni, sɔbɔtsaɛ kabii bakɔa kadanidani ye, yanaa awã kĩ ye ɔtanɛ a awɛ kĩ ɛnaa a.
59003005	Ade aye sɛmɛ lɛmɛ la a. Titɔ kĩ sukɛna akũ lɛtsa kabii sanɛ malo a, sapia nɛ fɔtsa baũ baũ akũ. Midã ayekĩ fi kabii kĩ fɔka fɔtɔ nɛ lupo baũ kamɛ apuli kapila de bubloo!
59003006	Sɛmɛ la ndɛ fi. Sɛmɛ dzɛ̃ ndɛ katinya kĩ tɔkpa kakɛna tɛ ke kamɛ. Nɛ sukɛna akũ fɔtsa a flee kamɛ ni, sɛmɛ ado oti mɔa a flee tuduli, kado fi nɛ bati kadzi kamɛ mɔ kĩ futo Abonsam fi luwotu kamɛ a.
59003007	Batidziwa apuli kadɔla bayaɛ, ade bapuli kadɔla lupo kamɛ bayaɛ kpa, kɔvɔlabi, bayaɛ kĩ baboli nɛ tite mɔ kɔfɔabi lɛmɛ a.
59003008	Lɛmɛ sɛmɛ kɔ̃ odima lɛláapuli ɛdɔla se. Sɛmɛ nyɛ lɛtsa kpa kĩ odima lápuli kadɔla, ade otsonu kĩ yakɔ bati yi sɛ kamɛ tɛtɛɛtɛ a.
59003009	Bɔakɔa sɛmɛ kamu boe Ɔlate mɔ Ɔlɛga, se mɔapɛ a bɔakɔa kadumu oti kĩ Baguma bɔa nɛ ye mɔawɛ kutidu akũ.
59003010	Onukpɛ̃ mɔapɛ a kamɛ nhila fɔlɛtsa mɔ fudumutsa flee anɛ kato. Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kɛtánɛ kĩ fukĩĩ fɔna lɔmɔ!
59003011	Mui wĩ mɔ lɛdɛmɛ mui aapuli bɛnɛ nɛ lɔwɔkɛ mɔa kamɛ?
59003012	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, atɔ kutse aapuli kuwũ gowa babi, ĩye akateleku aapuli ewũ atɔ babi, mbɔɛɛ? Ade aye mɔ lɛdɛmɛ mui lɔwɔkɛ lɛláapuli lɛnyɛ mui wĩ a.
59003013	Mi kamɛ owei nyɛ nyansãni, kĩ yanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ? Ɛkɔa ɔbla wĩ ɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa nɛ ye lɛkɛnana kamɛ, nɛ akũ kadɔla kĩ kito nyansã kamɛ.
59003014	Lɛmɛ ntɛ lineke kanɔ, kawũnaba mɔ yĩ odi fude fɔlɛ kawɛya deĩ nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, mitama fɔvã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a akũ, mipia nɛ mi nyansã akũ.
59003015	Nyansã kĩĩ odu táto ode, mbom katinya kamɛ ade yanɛ, ɛnyɛ́ hũhũ kamɛ ade, hũhũ kpa kamɛ eto.
59003016	Awã kĩ lineke kanɔ mɔ yĩ odi fude fɔlɛ deĩ ni, ade awã ɔtutũ mɔ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi kakɛna ana a.
59003017	Lɛmɛ nyansã a kĩ eto ode a, ye lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnya lɔtɔ nyɛ kĩ ye akũ kpalɛ, yawɛ lukudɔ mɔ akũ kadɔla, edeĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ, kakɛna tɔwaɛ̃, yafɔ̃ banu oti kayɔ, yamɔ kɔnya, ade yawũ babi wĩ a. Yaádã oti anɛ, ade yaákɛna anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa a.
59003018	Bati a kĩ balɔla bati kayite ni, badu fudutsa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ, ade foe babi nyɛ nkpã wĩ kadzi a.
59004001	Litsa avɛlɛ kawũ mɔ ɔdzɛ kado nɛ mi kamɛ? Nnɛ́ mi sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ fɔanɔ mɔ a mi kamɛ futo?
59004002	Miawɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔakɔ mi odo, lɛmɛ miláapuli mina foe, nɛ foesũ miawɛ kĩ miakɔ oti. Anɛ ayɔɔla mi mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ fɔtsa akũ, lɛmɛ mi awɛ tata foe, nɛ foesũ miawɛ sɔwã kanɔ kawũ. Miána lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ a, kitonɛkĩ miávia Baguma.
59004003	Ntɛ mivia Baguma fɔtsa ni, miána foe, kitonɛkĩ miavia foe mɔ adzuni kpa. Miavia fɔtsa a kĩ míakɔa mido mi mɔa odi akũ kawɔlɛ.
59004004	Mi bati kĩ miádi ɔnɔkɔali! Minyína kĩ ntɛ mibɔɛ katinya kamɛ tɔkɔba ni, mikɛna mi akũ Baguma bakesĩnɛ? Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yanya katinya kamɛ ɔkɔba kɛna ye akũ Baguma okesĩnɛ.
59004005	Miakɔna kĩ pupulidza bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma do nɛ boe kamɛ a anɔ mɔ boe sukɛna fɔwɛtsa a lineke.”
59004006	Lɛmɛ Baguma amɔ boe kɔnya pii, ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Baguma asua bati a kĩ bata akũ osi, lɛmɛ yamɔ bati a kĩ badɔla be akũ a kɔnya.”
59004007	Nɛ foesũ mifɔnɛ mi akũ awɛ mikpa Baguma. Misua Abonsam osi, lɔkɔa yaalo nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
59004008	Mifuãmɔ Baguma, lɔkɔa ye malo yaafuã mi. Mi tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ, mivɔlɛ awɛ! Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ, mikpalɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
59004009	Miwo ɔblɔ, mitɛ kalɔɛ, mibe lɛmɛ. Mifɔ̃ mi kamɛmɛ kɛdani ayɔlɔhɔ kabe, mi kawɔlɛkamɔ lɛmɛ kɛdani ɔblɔ kawo.
59004010	Midɔla mi akũ nɛ boe Ɔlate anɛ lɔkɔa yaadɛla mi nɛ ode.
59004011	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta nɛ mi akũ akũ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta nɛ ye ɔwaɛ̃ okristoni akũ, ĩye yadzɛmɔ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, yalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta nɛ mbla a akũ, ade yadzɛ mɔ mbla a. Ntɛ ɔdzɛmɔ mbla a ni, obuki ɔnyɛ́ oti kĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ, mbom oti kĩ yadzɛmɔ mbla a.
59004012	Baguma odi nyɛ mbla a ɔkpanɛ mɔ ye fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ. Ye odi keĩ aapuli ɛkpa nkpã ĩye ɛwɔla ye. Owei anɛ kĩ adzɛmɔ nɔ ɔkɔba?
59004013	Finyaa mitse, mi a kĩ mialɛ kĩ, “Nviã ĩye kunya bɔ́anaa ɔmatɔ kpale kĩĩ ĩye okĩ a kamɛ, budzi nɛ awã kateli mɔa bɔnya kɔyaatɔ bɔna nfasɔ.”
59004014	Minyína ayekĩ mi nkpã aana nɛ kunya kamɛ malo! Mi nkpã, litsa yanɛ? Mila ndɛ luflututu kĩ laka kako nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ kabuki kayɛla.
59004015	Lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ mialɛ nyɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ boe Baguma tunɔ mɔ budeĩ nkpã ni, bɔ́akɛna fukĩĩ ĩye fukĩ nɛ akĩĩ.”
59004016	Lɛmɛ finyaa miata akũ kapia akũ. Akũ kata kĩĩ flee nyɛ tɔkpa.
59004017	Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ enyina tuwĩ kakɛna mɔ yaákɛna te ni, fɔnyɛ tɔkpa fɔkpa ye.
59005001	Finyaa mi a kĩ mideĩ akũ a, mibe, mibɔa fɔwɔla nɛ lubo kamɔ a kĩ laya nɛ mi akũ a sũ.
59005002	Mi akũ kana fɔtsa a titi, ade fupuka ba mi tɛtadiɛ a.
59005003	Mi sika ngbã mɔ sika ovoe dzi nkandɔlɔ, ade nkandɔlɔ kĩĩ aadi adansiɛ etia mi, ɛba mi sukɛna ndɛ fi aye a. Mikpɔta akũ kana fɔtsa miyi akũ nɛ fuwi nkaɛ kĩĩ kamɛ.
59005004	Lɛmɛ midã! Mitáse bati a kĩ bɛkɛna adzuma nɛ mi fɔba kamɛ a kɔtɔ kudima. Mitse be kabe! Kɔtɔ a kĩ misisi mitáse apaafɔ a kĩ bɛnɛ fɔba bɛkpa mi mi a lamɔ mi onukpɛ̃ katsua mɔ fɔwɔla. Bati a kĩ bakpɔta mi fɔba kamɛ fudutsa a kabe wo boe Ɔlate Asafu Yehowa atɔ kamɛ.
59005005	Mikɔa fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatɛ kɔya mido mi akũ kawɔlɛ beblebee, midɔli ndɛ bayaɛ aye mikpa luwi a kĩ baakɔ mi a.
59005006	Mikɔ́ oti wĩ a kɔtɔ, ade titɔ kĩ ɛtápili mɔ mi malo a, mikɔ ye.
59005007	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ boe Ɔlate a aaya. Midã ayekĩ okuani a kĩ edzi yadzɔlɛ funitsã mɔ kɔya a kĩ ye tite akpa a, ana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kadzɔlɛ oni kako nɛ kanɔde mɔ kɔtsɛ lɔkɔ.
59005008	Mi malo kɛnɛ kĩ mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ lɔmɔ, mido ɔwɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate kaya luwi a wo ɔtɔ liyua.
59005009	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitakɔa mi ɔhau mite nɛ mi bawaɛ̃ akũ mɔ Baguma aadzɛmɔ mi. Midã Ɔdzɛnɛ a dzɛ̃ nɛ onyukpɛ̃!
59005010	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mikai Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ bide lɛtsã nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a akũ. Mifɔ̃ ayekĩ bido ɔwɔlɛ bɛmɔ́ lubo a fɔnya nfantuhũ fɔkpa mi.
59005011	Bɔabu bati kĩ bado ɔwɔlɛ nɛ lubo kamɔ kamɛ kĩ kawɔlɛ bati. Minu ayekĩ Hiob do ɔwɔlɛ, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna ɛkpa ye nɛ kawũna kamɛ a. Oti fɔlɛtsa api boe Ɔlate a nɛ sɛmɛ, ade yamɔ oti kɔnya a.
59005012	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, yĩ kalɛ titiliwu nyɛ kĩ mitatani fɔtsa nɛ nhihiɛ adi kakɛna kamɛ. Mitatani ode, ĩye tite, ĩye lɛtsama. Ntɛ kalɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali ni, milɛ kĩ, “Oo”, ntɛ kɛnyɛ́ ɔnɔkɔali ni, milɛ kĩ, “Oowo”, ayekĩ Baguma lɛláakɔ mi kɔtɔ.
59005013	Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi deĩ nɛ ɔhau kamɛ ni, ɛbɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa Baguma. Ntɛ kawɔlɛ de mi kamɛ odi ni, ɛsã tɔnɔ emu Baguma.
59005014	Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi asɔ ni, ɛvɛ asɔli banɔkɔɛ̃ a bɛyaabɔa mpaɛ bɛkpa ye, lɔkɔa bɛtsɛla ye kugua nɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ akũ.
59005015	Mpaɛ kĩ bɔbɔa nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a, aafɔ̃ ɔsɔnɛ a lɛsaɛ. Boe Ɔlate a aafɔ̃ ɛna akũ ɔsĩ, ade ntɛ ɛkɛna tɔkpa tidi malo ni, Baguma aakɔa ete ye.
59005016	Nɛ foesũ mibinya mi tɔkpa kamɛ mitsa mi akũ akũ, mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa akũ, ayekĩ míana kasaɛ. Oti kĩ edzi kpĩĩ mpaɛbɔ deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kɔapuli kakɛna fɔtsa pii.
59005017	Eliya nyɛ otidziwa ndɛ boe aye, ade kĩ ɛbɔa mpaɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ oni ɛtako a, oni táko nɛ tite futeli ɛlalɛ mɔ sɛkɛ.
59005018	Ke liti a, ebuki ɛbɔa mpaɛ ade Baguma fɔ̃ oni ko tite nyɛ funitsã a.
59005019	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mi kamɛ odi muniki nɛ katɛkado a liti, mɔ oti bɛbã buki ɛkpã ye ɛyamɛna ni,
59005020	mite anɛ kĩ oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ a nɛ osi kpa akũ, aafɔ̃ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ a nkpã nɛ wuda awɛ, ɛna ye tɔkpa beblebee a kakɔa kate.
60001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Petro, Yesu Kristo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna bati a kĩ Baguma pau, kĩ bɛgba biko ndɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ aye nɛ Ponto, Galatia, Kapadokia, Asia mɔ Bitinia amantam kamɛ a.
60001002	Baguma boe Ɔlɛga pau mi ndɛ ayekĩ ehihiɛ eyi a, ade ye Hũhũ a kpalɛ mi akũ kĩ míakɔa obu mikpa Yesu Kristo, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa ye babɔanɛ ɛvɔlɛ mi akũ. Baguma ɛmɔ mi kɔnya, ɛfɔ̃ lukudɔ lɛpɔ nɛ mi kamɛ daa.
60001003	Mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga a! Nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ beblebee a sũ ɛkpa boe nkpã vɔɛ̃ ɛtsãmɛna Yesu Kristo kadzɛla katomɛna kanɔkpa kamɛ. Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ budeĩ kɔnɛte a kĩ kɔkpɔla.
60001004	Lɛtsa a kĩ boe anɛ teĩ kĩ boe awɛ aata nyɛ adzapadiɛ mɔ kɔya a kĩ Baguma manɛ eyi ɛkpa ye bati nɛ ode, awã kĩ yaávɔ̃, yaábu kade ade yaátsɛ lɛmɛ a.
60001005	Mi a kĩ mitɛ Kristo mido, kĩ bɛkɔa Baguma kɔbɛ̃ bɛmanɛ mi, kĩ Baguma aakpa mi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ akũ a, ade mi lá adzapadiɛ kĩĩ a.
60001006	Mimɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ, titɔ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ malo, míamɔ lubo nɛ sɔhuiɛ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ pii kamɛ,
60001007	ayekĩ baadã ntɛ mi katɛkado a sipi. Sika ngbã kĩ sapuli kawɔ malo, basɔ se kadã nɛ fi kamɛ. Ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ bɛsɔ mi katɛkado a kĩ kɛtɛ kɔya kɛba sika a bɛdã ayekĩ kɛna daa, lɔkɔa baamu mi, bɛkpa mi kukũkpalɛ mɔ obu nɛ Luwi a kĩ Yesu Kristo aaya a akũ.
60001008	Titɔ kĩ mitámɔ ye malo a, miawɛ ye kalɛ, ade kĩ miámɔ ye finyaa malo a, mitɛ ye mido, ade miamɔ kawɔlɛ wĩ kadi kĩ oti lɛláapuli ɛlɛ.
60001009	Ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo mido a sũ, Baguma kpa mi tɛkla nkpã.
60001010	Ade nkpã kĩĩ akũ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a dzi bɛkɔna, bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ yededeede, ade bɛlɛ biyi ayekĩ Baguma aamɔ mi kɔnya, ɛkpa mi nkpã a.
60001011	Bɛbɔa mbɔdi bɛwɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ fɔ́aya mɔ ayekĩ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ a. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Kristo Hũhũ nɛ be kamɛ a katsa ayekĩ Kristo aamɔ lubo, mɔ kukũkpalɛ a kĩ kɔ́atomɔ koe a.
60001012	Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ nnɛ́ be kalɛ sũ bɛkɛna adzuma, mbom nɛ mi kalɛ sũ. Bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ finyaa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a tsã Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma do etomɛna ode a akũ, bide lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ malo wɛ kĩ banu kayɔ kufɛ a.
60001013	Nɛ foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ mikpa adzuma kakɛna, mipi mi akũ kapi wĩ. Mikɔa anɛ flee mite nɛ nhila a kĩ Baguma aakpa mi nɛ luwi a kĩ Kristo aaya a akũ.
60001014	Ndɛ babi kĩ babu Baguma ni, mitafɔ̃ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ fɔna nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ kadikatanyi kamɛ kɔkɔɛ a lɛnya mi akũ.
60001015	Ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma a kĩ ɛvɛ mi a nyɛ oti kpalɛwa a, ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ mi malo mianya bati kpalɛwa nɛ mi fɔtsakɛlawa fudi nyɛ fudi kamɛ a.
60001016	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Minya bati kpalɛwa, kitonɛkĩ oti kpalɛwa manɛ.”
60001017	Ntɛ miavɛ Baguma a kĩ yaádã oti anɛ ade yadzɛmɔ odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye lɛkɛnana onukpɛ̃ a kĩ boe Ɔlɛga nɛ mi mpaɛ kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ miavila ye nɛ mi fuwi nkaɛ kamɛ nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ.
60001018	Kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ nnɛ́ sika ngbã ĩye sika ovoe a kĩ savɔ̃ Baguma kɔa ese kɔtɔ nɛ mi lɔlɔ, ɛnyɛ mi nɛ nkpã pupulidza kadzi a kĩ mi bawanyɔ kɔa biyi mi a kamɛ,
60001019	mbom Kristo babɔanɛ mɔ kɔya paa a ɛkɔa ɛtɛ mi. Kristo la ndɛ kavelibi kĩ kɛkpɔla ade mfumsu lɛmɛ lɛláa ke akũ a.
60001020	Baguma pau ye eyi fɔmɔ ɛbɔa katinya, ade ɛnyɛ ye ɛtsa nɛ fuwi nkaɛ kĩĩ kamɛ nɛ mi sũ.
60001021	Mitsã Kristo akũ mitɛ Baguma a kĩ ɛdzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa, edo ye obu lɛmɛ a mido. Nɛ foesũ mi katɛkado mɔ kɔnɛte deĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ.
60001022	Finyaa kĩ mitɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a, mitsã ke kamɛ mikpalɛ mi akũ, ade miawɛ mi bawaɛ̃ Kristofɔ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ a, kɛnɛ kĩ miakɔa mi tɔwɔlɛ flee miwɛ akũ kalɛ papaapa.
60001023	Baguma kalɛ a kĩ kideĩ nkpã, kĩ kɛlá kawũna a akũ fɔtsã mɔ Baguma kpa mi nkpã vɔɛ̃, mikɛna ndɛ oti a kĩ yaáku a babi. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ ekĩ yaku a babi mianɛ.
60001024	Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Batidziwa flee la ndɛ tuwĩ aye ade be kahɛhɛ flee la ndɛ nhuilɛ a. Tuwĩ avɛ ade te nhuilɛ a awili.
60001025	Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a kɔ̃ waa daa.” Ade kalɛ kĩĩ nyɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ ke akũ bide lɛtsã bɛkpa mi a.
60002001	Nɛ foesũ mifɔ̃ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi odu kakɛna. Mifɔ̃ fɔvã kama mɔ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa kakɛna, mɔ anɛngbã mɔ bati buĩ kanyɛ.
60002002	Miwɛ Baguma ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a ndɛ ayekĩ akɔkɔa awɛ tɛmɛ mui luwi daa, ayekĩ míabo anɛ nɛ mi nkpã katɛ kamɛ.
60002003	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Mi mɔawɛ mita onukpɛ̃ midã, mimɔ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate a deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ.”
60002004	Nɛ foesũ mifuã miya nɛ boe Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃. Ade ye nyɛ nkpã kɔla kake de a kĩ bati sĩ kĩ lɛnyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza, lɛmɛ ade de Baguma nyɛ kĩ lɛtɛ kɔya nɛ ye anɛ a.
60002005	Mi malo mila ndɛ kɔla kake nkpã boe, foesũ miya Baguma ɛkɔa mi eke hũhũ kamɛ afɔliɛ kɔla. Ade kɔla kĩĩ kamɛ míasum ndɛ basɔfɔ kpalɛwa kĩ bɛbɔa hũhũ kamɛ afɔliɛ kĩ yawo Baguma anɛ bɛtsãmɛna Yesu Kristo akũ bɛkpa Baguma.
60002006	Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Midã! Ĩnyɛ kɔla akũ de titiliwu a, nkɔa de mayi nɛ Zion. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo ni, kɔnyɔã lɛláawo ye da.”
60002007	Foesũ mi a kĩ mitɛ mido a ni, de kĩĩ tɛ kɔya paa lɛkpa mi, lɛmɛ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a kɔ̃ ni, binyi kĩ, “De a kĩ kɔla bakenɛ sĩ a, ade de lɛyadani okonto akũ de kĩ lisĩ lɛba flee a.”
60002008	Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a fɔlɛtsa bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Ade de a kĩ laafɔ̃ bati litula a, de kpale kĩ laafɔ̃ bati lɛnɛ bɛtɔ.” Bitula bɛtɔ kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ ye kalɛ a bido. Baguma awɛ lihihiɛ foe lɔmɔ eyi ɛkpa be.
60002009	Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ kade a kĩ Baguma pau, lɛgãkanya basɔfɔ, ɔmaĩ kpalɛwa, mɔ bati kĩ Baguma kɔa ɛkɛna ye bade mianɛ. Baguma vɛ mi etomɛna ɔtũ kamɛ ɛyamɛna nɛ ye awãwã ɔhaĩ a kamɛ, kĩ mide lɛtsã nɛ ye awãwã fɔtsa a akũ.
60002010	Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kĩ lɛtɛ̃ kamɛ ni, mitánya Baguma ɔmaĩ, lɛmɛ finyaa minyɛ ye ɔmaĩ. Nɛ kɔkɔ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, Baguma támɔ mi kɔnya, lɛmɛ finyaa ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
60002011	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ bawɛnɛ, ndɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ mɔ basitsãnɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ni, mitakɛna nɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ fɔakɔ odo kayidza kadza nɛ mi akũ a.
60002012	Mibɔa ɔbla wĩ nɛ amamufɔ a kamɛ, ayekĩ ntɛ bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ mi akũ kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ mianɛ malo ni, ke liti, baamɔ adzuma wĩ a kĩ mikɛna, lɔkɔa baamu Baguma nɛ ye kaya Luwi a akũ.
60002013	Nɛ boe Ɔlate sũ ni, midɔla mi akũ mikpa batidziwa a kĩ bidzina nɛ mbla onukpɛ̃. Midɔla mi akũ mikpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Flefle a kĩ lideĩ otumi lɛbɛ̃ flee a.
60002014	Midɔla akũ lɔmɔ lɛmɛ mikpa abãã banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ a ado kĩ bɛyaavɛlɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a sɔtɔ, bimu bati a kĩ bakɛna tuwĩ a lɛmɛ.
60002015	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kawɛ nyɛ kĩ mikɔa tuwĩ kakɛna midina fɔkɔasiatsa a kĩ bati alɛ nɛ mi akũ nɛ kadikatanyi kamɛ a.
60002016	Midzi nkpã ndɛ bati kĩ bidzi be akũ akũ aye, lɛmɛ mitakɔa akũ akũ kadzi a mikɛna ndɛ tɔkpa kakɛna osi kana, mbom midzi nkpã ndɛ Baguma basate aye.
60002017	Mikɔa obu mikpa odi nyɛ odi. Miwɛ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ kalɛ. Mivila Baguma. Mikɔa obu mikpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Flefle a lɛmɛ.
60002018	Mi basumunɛ, midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi balate, mikɔa obu flee mikpa be. Nnɛ́ mi balate a kĩ bɛdɔ, bideĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ a odi kɛnɛ kĩ miakpa obu, mbom mibu bikĩ bideĩ sɛmɛ ɔnyɛ a lɛmɛ.
60002019	Ntɛ odi lamɔ lubo a kĩ lɛtáfɛta kĩ ɛmɔ kamɔ, lɛmɛ nɛ Baguma sũ edo ɔwɔlɛ ɛmɔ lubo ni, Baguma aahila ye.
60002020	Ntɛ mikɛna fɔtsa kpa mɔ mido ɔwɔlɛ mitɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a ni, kamu kawɔdabe deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ? Lɛmɛ ntɛ mikɛna tuwĩ mɔ mido ɔwɔlɛ mimɔ́ lubo nɛ foe kamɛ ni, Baguma aahila mi.
60002021	Ade fukĩĩ sũ Baguma vɛ mi a, kitonɛkĩ Kristo mɔawɛ a malo mɔ́ lubo nɛ mi lɔlɔ, ɛkɔa foe ɛtsa mi nfantuhũ kĩ míatsã ye abɔa kakekɔ̃.
60002022	“Ɛtákɛna tɔkpa tidima, ade ɛtákɛ odima lɛmɛ a.”
60002023	Kĩ bivũna ye a, ɛtávũna odima ese kɔtɔ. Kĩ bɛmɔna ye lubo a, ɛtáhũnahũna odima, mbom ɛkɔa anɛ ete nɛ Baguma a kĩ yadzɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ a akũ.
60002024	Kristo mɔawɛ lɛlɔ boe tɔkpa nɛ ye sukɛna kamɛ ɛnamɛna asendua a akũ, ayekĩ bɔ́anɛ nɛ tɔkpa kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ, budzi nkpã bɔkɛna tuwĩ. Ɛkɔa fɔɔkpa a kĩ ɛtɛ a ɛtsa mi fɔsɔ.
60002025	Kɔkɔɛ a, mina ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛyɛla osi, lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma muniki mi miya nɛ mi Baveli Ɔkpãnɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ mi Akũ Ɔdãmɛnanɛ sɛkɛ̃.
60003001	Ade ayea mi batsɔ̃ midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi banyɔ, ayekĩ ntɛ be kamɛ badi tátɛ Baguma kalɛ a bido malo ni, mi ɔbla wĩ aafɔ̃ bɛtɛ bido. Ade fɔláasĩ malo kĩ miabinya onukpɛ̃ milɛ kadima,
60003002	kitonɛkĩ baamɔ ayekĩ mi ɔbla kabɔa nɛ Baguma kavila kamɛ kpalɛ mi akũ.
60003003	Mi kalɛkadã kɛtana nɛ sukɛna kalɔla ndɛ tɔlɔ kasui, sika ngbã fɔtsa kado, mɔ tilima kĩ tɛtɛ kɔya kadzi kamɛ.
60003004	Mbom mi kalɛkadã a kɛna nɛ hũhũ kĩ ɛdɔ, yadã dĩĩ kamɛ, ade ɛnya lɛtsa a kĩ lɛláawɔ lɛmɛ a. Tiyitsɔ̃ kĩĩ odu tɛ kɔya paa nɛ Baguma anɛ.
60003005	Nɛ kɔkɔɛ a, batsole kpalɛwa a kĩ bɛkɔa anɛ bite nɛ Baguma akũ a, dɔla be akũ bɛkpa be banyɔ, ade fɔnya akũ kakɛɛlɛ fɔkpa be a.
60003006	Ade aye Sara dɔla ye akũ ɛkpa Abraham a, ade ɛvɛ ye kĩ, “Yĩ Ɔlate” a. Finyaa mi malo midani Sara babitsole, ntɛ miakɛna tuwĩ mɔ miávila lɛtsama.
60003007	Ade aye mi banyɔ lɛmɛ midzi mɔ mi batsɔ̃ nɛ akũ kayɔkanu kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ mi batsɔ̃ lɛlá kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ mi aye. Mikpa be obu kitonɛkĩ mimɔ be flee Baguma mɔ́ kɔnya kĩ míadzi nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna. Ntɛ miakɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, lɛtsama lɛláasua mi mpaɛbɔ osi.
60003008	Nɛ kawũna kamɛ a ni, mi flee mina nɛ adzuni mɔa kamɛ, oti akũ ɛkɔ mi kɔnya, miwɛ akũ kalɛ, mikɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ midɔla akũ lɛmɛ mikpa mi akũ akũ.
60003009	Mitakɔa tɔkpa mise tɔkpa kɔtɔ, ĩye midumu mise kadumu kɔtɔ, mbom mivia nhila mikpa be, kitonɛkĩ kavɛ Baguma vɛ mi kĩ miyaana nhila.
60003010	Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa lɛ a, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ edzi nkpã wĩ ɛmɔ fuwi wĩ ni, tuwuli kpa tɛtanɛ tito ye onukpɛ̃ ade ɛtáma fɔvã lɛmɛ a.
60003011	Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛfɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna, ɛkɛna tuwĩ, ɛbɔa mbɔdi ɛwɛ lukudɔ osi, etomɔ de liti mɔ ye ɔwɔlɛ flee.
60003012	Kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate anɛ teĩ nɛ tuwĩ bakɛnanɛ a akũ, ade ebinya atɔ yatse be mpaɛbɔ a. Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate a abɔa kanɛ liti kakpa tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ.”
60003013	Ntɛ akũ asĩ mi kĩ miakɛna tuwĩ ni, owei deĩ kĩ yaakɛna mi fɔlɔɛwotsa?
60003014	Lɛmɛ ntɛ míamɔ lubo malo nɛ tuwĩ a kĩ miakɛna sũ ni, Baguma ahila mi! Mitavila odima, lɛtsama lɛmɛ lɛtaha mi tɔwɔlɛ.
60003015	Mbom mikɔa obu mikpa Kristo, boe Ɔlate a nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Mimanɛ akũ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kĩ míapuli minyɛ foe kayɔ mitsa odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaavia mi fɔlɛtsa nɛ kɔnɛte a kĩ mideĩ a akũ.
60003016	Lɛmɛ mikɛna foe nɛ obu mɔ akũ kadɔla kamɛ. Mifɔ̃ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ tɛkpalɛ, ayekĩ ntɛ bivũna mi malo ni, kɔnyɔã kuwo bikĩ balɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ ɔbla wĩ a kĩ miabɔa ndɛ Kristo batomɛnanɛ a sũ.
60003017	Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ ni, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ miamɔ lubo ndɛ tuwĩ bakɛnanɛ, kɛba kĩ míamɔ lubo ndɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ.
60003018	Kristo lɛmɛ ku nɛ bati tɔkpa lɔlɔ deedimɔapɛ ɛkpa fɔkɔ a flee. Titɔ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti wĩ malo a, eku nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ lɔlɔ ayekĩ yaakpã mi ɛnamɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Bɛkɔ ye nɛ sukɛna kamɛ, lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ.
60003019	Ɛna nɛ Hũhũ a kamɛ, ade ɛnalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa ɛkpa hũhũ a kĩ ɛwaa kɔla a.
60003020	Ade be nyɛ bati a kĩ bɛtátse Baguma ɔlɛdo, titɔ kĩ Baguma na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɛkpa be malo a nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Noa kamɛ ye adakã kpale a. Ye kamɛ bati sukuloo kĩ biwo be ɛlɛ̃ lɛna nkpã nɛ mui kayili a kamɛ.
60003021	Mui kayili kĩĩ ketimɔ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a kĩ finyaa bɛkɔa bɛtɛ mi nkpã. Nnɛ́ tuduli kavɔlɛ nɛ oti akũ fɔanɛ, mbom fɔnyɛ fubo kalɔ kĩ oti aakɔa ye ɔwɔlɛ flee ɛkpa Baguma. Baguma mui kawɔla a lɛtɛ mi nkpã fɔtsãmɛna Yesu Kristo kayidza kato kanɔkpa a akũ.
60003022	Kristo naa ode, ade edzi nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna, yanya Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ, mɔ ode otumifɔ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ flee akũ a.
60004001	Ayekĩ Kristo mɔ́ lubo ndɛ otidziwa aye a ni, mi malo miakɔa adzuni mɔapɛ a mido mi akũ kɔbɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔ lubo nɛ sukɛna kamɛ ni, yafɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna.
60004002	Foesũ kito finyaa kanaa ni, midzi mi nkpã fuwi nkaɛ nɛ tite akũ a nɛ Baguma kawɛ onukpɛ̃, nnɛ́ nɛ otidziwa fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɔ odo a onukpɛ̃.
60004003	Kɔkɔɛ a, mibula lɔkɔ kade, midzi nkpã mikakɛna fɔtsa ndɛ amamufɔ aye nɛ lɔkɔ pii kamɛ. Nkpã a kĩ midzi tɔ̃ a nyɛ kɔkɔbato kpa kabɔa, sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa liti katomɛna, bavɛ kawuga, anya kpa kanya, futo kpa kato, mɔ baviɔ̃ kasum kĩ fɔláa mbla adima kayɔ.
60004004	Finyaa fɔakɛna amamufɔ a wãwã kĩ mibuki miádo akũ nɛ be nkpã pupulidza kadzi kamɛ, nɛ foesũ balɛ mi akũ tuwuli kpa.
60004005	Lɛmɛ baanyɛ be akũ onukpɛ̃ bɛkpa Baguma a kĩ ɛmanɛ akũ kĩ yaadzɛmɔ bati a kĩ bidzi nkpã mɔ banɔkpa flee a.
60004006	Ade foesũ Kristo de lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ɛkpa banɔkpa a lɛmɛ a. Ade titɔ kĩ Baguma adzɛmɔ be ndɛ kɛfɛta odi nyɛ odi malo ni, Kristo de lɛtsã ɛkpa be ayekĩ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ni, baadzi nkpã ndɛ Baguma aye.
60004007	Fɔtsa flee kawũna lɔkɔ fuã, foesũ mipi mi akũ kapi wĩ, mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, ayekĩ míapuli mibɔa mpaɛ.
60004008	Lɛtsa titiliwu nyɛ kĩ, miwɛ akũ kalɛ mɔ ɔdɔ kĩ eto mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ flee, kitonɛkĩ ɔdɔ afɔ̃ bati akɔa bati bɛbã tɔkpa pii kate.
60004009	Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi nase ɔwaɛ̃ ni, ɛtɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ hũhũhũhũ kakɛna fɔtana nɛ foe kamɛ.
60004010	Mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi tɛ futetsa pɔtii etomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Foesũ ndɛ Baguma futetsa futefute kĩĩ akũ badãmɛnanɛ ni, mikɛna foe akũ adzuma kakɛna wĩ, ayekĩ fɔ́ana libi fɔkpa mi akũ akũ.
60004011	Ntɛ odi alɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa ni, ɛlɛ foe ndɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa aye. Ntɛ odi asum ni, ɛkɔa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma kpa ye a esum, ayekĩ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ ni, bati aatsã Yesu Kristo akũ bimu Baguma. Ye fude nyɛ kukũkpalɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
60004012	Yĩ bawɛnɛ, mitafɔ̃ ayekĩ bɛlamɔ mi kasɔ kadã, milamɔ lubo kamɔ mɔ kalɔɛ lɛkɛna mi wãwã ndɛ lɛtsa vɔɛ̃ kĩ miádã anɛ kɔlaa.
60004013	Mbom mifɔ̃ kawɔlɛ kide mi kĩ miamɔ lubo ndɛ Kristo aye, ayekĩ ntɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛta nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ ni, mi malo míapuli mimɔ́ kawɔlɛ mitu osee.
60004014	Ntɛ bati vũna mi kĩ mi nɛ ayekĩ mitomɔ Kristo sũ ni, kawɔlɛ kide mi, kitonɛkĩ kukũkpalɛ Hũhũ a, kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma Hũhũ a tomɔ mi.
60004015	Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi amɔ lubo ni, fɔtanya kĩ ɛnyɛ owudini, ĩye oyekpanɛ, ĩye fɔtsa kpa ɔkɛnanɛ ĩye kĩ edo onukpɛ̃ nɛ bati bɛbã fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtsɛ́la ye akũ a kamɛ.
60004016	Lɛmɛ ntɛ mi kamɛ odi amɔ lubo kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo ode sũ ni, kɔnyɔã kɔtakɔ ye, mbom emu Baguma kĩ Kristo dĩ teĩ nɛ ye akũ.
60004017	Lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ Baguma aayi bati kadzɛmɛna kayɔ, ade ye mɔawɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ yaanya lɔtɔ ɛdzɛmɛna a. Ade ntɛ eyi kayɔ nɛ boe akũ a, nde fɔ́awũna fɔkpa bati a kĩ bɛtátɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a bido a?
60004018	Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a, “Ntɛ fudeĩ ɔsĩ fɔmɔ Baguma aatɛ bati kpĩĩ bɛna nkpã ni, kekɔ̃ nde fɔ́ana fɔkpa bati a kĩ baávila Baguma mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a?”
60004019	Foesũ bati a kĩ bamɔ lubo ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma wɛ ɛkpa be a bɛkɛna tuwĩ, bɛkɔa be ɔkla flee bido nɛ be Ɔbɔanɛ a kĩ yaápãã nɛ ye kalɛkayi akũ da a awɛ kamɛ.
60005001	Finyaa, yĩ ndɛ asɔli ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ aye ni, mawɛ kĩ madɛ asafu banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a. Yĩ mɔawɛ a mmɔ́ ayekĩ Kristo mɔ́ lubo, ade maana tsɛfã nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kĩ baanyɛ bɛtsa a kamɛ a. Makpa mi kɔdɛ kĩ,
60005002	Mikpã Baguma baveli kɔdabu a kĩ ɛkɔa edo nɛ mi awɛ a kadã wĩ. Midã be akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma awɛ nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ nɛ ɔhɛ kamɛ. Mitakɛna adzuma nɛ kɔtɔkase sũ, mbom mifɔ̃ futo mi ɔwɔlɛ faa kamɛ.
60005003	Mitawɛ kĩ mianya bati a kĩ Baguma kɔa edo mi nɛ awɛ a akũ, mbom mi ɔbla ɛnya nfantuhũ ɛkpa baveli kɔdabu a.
60005004	Ntɛ Baveli Ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a nɛ ɛta ni, míana kukũkpalɛ lɛgãbɔɛ a kĩ de ɔhaĩ a lɛláabu kade.
60005005	Ade ayea mi bapopo lɛmɛ midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi banɔkɔɛ̃ a. Mi a flee midɔla akũ mikpa mi akũ, misum akũ nɛ mi lɛkɛnana lidi nyɛ lidi kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Baguma ayidza kadza nɛ bati a kĩ badɛla be akũ nɛ ode a akũ, lɛmɛ yamɔ bikĩ bɛdɔla be akũ a kɔnya.”
60005006	Nɛ foesũ midɔla akũ mido nɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ awɛ a kayɔ, ayekĩ yaadɛla mi nɛ ode nɛ ye mɔawɛ lɔkɔ wĩ a kamɛ.
60005007	Mikɔa fɔtsa a kĩ fɔaha mi a flee mido nɛ Baguma awɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ye adãmɛna mi akũ.
60005008	Mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, mikaadã kadã wĩ! Mi okesĩnɛ, Abonsam, tsɛ̃ yamini ndɛ Dzata kĩ yakulumɛ, kĩ yawɛ odi epi ɛyɛlɛ ɛba.
60005009	Mikɔa kadza pintii nɛ katɛkado kamɛ misua tɔkpa osi, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ mi bakɔba Kristofɔ nɛ katinya kamɛ flee lamɛna lubo kĩĩ odu kamɔ.
60005010	Lɛmɛ nɛ mi lubo kamɔ lɔkɔ lukũ liti ni, Baguma a kĩ ye kɔnyakamɔ pɔnɛ a, aakɛna mi mikpɔla, edo mi kɔbɛ̃ midza pintii. Kitonɛkĩ ɛvɛ mi kĩ miyaana tsɛfã nɛ ye daa kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ, nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo sũ.
60005011	Ade ye deĩ kɔbɛ̃ daa daa a! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
60005012	Ntsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa lukũ kĩĩ ntsãmɛna Silvano akũ mama mi. Mabu ye ndɛ ɔkɔba okristoni kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali. Mawɛ kĩ mado mi kɔbɛ̃ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ yĩ mɔawɛ mmɔ́ kĩ ade Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a nɛ awĩ a. Midza pintii nɛ ye kamɛ.
60005013	Babilonia asafu a, kĩ Baguma pau ndɛ mi aye a, awɔ̃na mi. Ade aye yĩ obi Marko lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi a.
60005014	Miwɔ̃na akũ nɛ Kristo ɔdɔ kamɛ. Lukudɔ litomɔ mi flee a kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo.
61001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Simon Petro, Yesu Kristo osumunɛ mɔ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna bati a kĩ bɛtsã boe Baguma mɔ boe Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo tuwĩ kakɛna akũ bɛna katɛkado kĩ kideĩ kɔya ndɛ boe kade a aye.
61001002	Baguma kɔnyakamɔ, mɔ ye lukudɔ lɛpɔ nɛ mi akũ, ayekĩ míabuki minyi ye mɔ Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate a mibu.
61001003	Baguma kɔa ye mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ ɛkpa boe lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ busĩ nɛ nkpã kamɛ a faa kĩ bupuli budzi nkpã busum ye kasum wĩ. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ ɛnɛɛ yabumɔ boe kĩ bunyi oti a kĩ ɛvɛ boe kĩ bɔyaana tsɛfã nɛ ye mɔawɛ kukũkpalɛ mɔ tuwĩ kakɛna a kamɛ.
61001004	Baguma tsã osi kĩĩ akũ ete boe fɔtsa kpale mɔ kɔya a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a, ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bɔtsã futetsa kĩĩ akũ bulo nɛ fɔtsa kpa kĩ fɔakɔ oti odo kĩ fɔawɔla oti nɛ katinya onukpɛ̃, lɔkɔa bɔtsã foe akũ bɔna tsɛfã nɛ Baguma kutidu a kamɛ.
61001005	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, mibɔa mbɔdi mikɔa tuwĩ kakɛna mibumɔ mi katɛkado. Ade ayea kadikanyi kibumɔ mi tuwĩ kakɛna,
61001006	akũ kanya kibumɔ kadikanyi, ɔwɔlɛ kado kibumɔ akũ kanya, Baguma kavila kibumɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado.
61001007	Mikɔa tɔwaɛ̃ kakɛna nɛ Kristo kamɛ mibumɔ Baguma kavila, ade mikɔa ɔdɔ mibumɔ tɔwaɛ̃ kakɛna a.
61001008	Ntɛ mideĩ ɔbla kĩĩ mɔ ɛtɛ mi kamɛ flee ni, fɔafɔ̃ mikabɔa mbɔdi, mi akũ lɛna nfasɔ, nɛ ayekĩ minyi boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo sũ.
61001009	Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔbla kĩĩ lɛláa odi kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ eku anɛ eyua, kĩ ɛláapuli ɛmɔ mɔ lugo, ade yalɛla tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna ɛtɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma wɔla nɛ ye akũ a.
61001010	Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mibɔa mbɔdi mɔ ɔsĩ miba kɔkɔɛ, mido akũ ɔsĩ mifɔ̃ kavɛ a kĩ Baguma vɛ mi, mɔ kapau a kĩ ɛpau mi a, fɔnya fɔtsa kɔlɛwa fɔkpa mi. Ntɛ mikɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, miláamuniki nɛ mi katɛkado a liti.
61001011	Ntɛ fɔtsã osi kĩĩ akũ a, baakpa mi osi faa miwo nɛ boe Ɔlate mɔ boe Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ kɛwaa daa a kamɛ.
61001012	Titɔ kĩ minyina fɔtsa kĩĩ kɔkɔɛ, midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ bɔtsa mi a kamɛ malo ni, mawɛ kĩ makate mi foe anɛ luwi daa.
61001013	Mbu kĩ, kĩ ndzi kpã ni, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ nkaanyina mi nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ.
61001014	Ĩnyina kĩ owi lɛláabuna mɔ maaku ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ pefee a.
61001015	Nɛ foesũ maabɔa mbɔdi ntsa mi osi a kĩ nɛ yĩ wuda liti ni, míapuli mite anɛ nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ akũ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
61001016	Nnɛ́ tugu kĩ bɛmɛ nɛ nyansã kamɛ bɔkɔa bɔlɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kaya nɛ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ a bɔtsa mi. Boe mɔawɛ a lɛmɔ ye kɔbɛ̃, obu mɔ kukũkpalɛ a mɔ anɛ.
61001017	Bɔna nɛ awã luwi a fɔmɔ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga a kɔa ye obu mɔ kukũkpalɛ ɛkpa ye, ade odo to ode nɛ Kukũkpalɛ Flee Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ Obi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ a. Yawo yĩ anɛ.”
61001018	Boe mɔawɛ a linu odo kĩĩ kĩ eto ode nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ ɔtɔ kpalɛwa a akũ.
61001019	Nɛ foesũ boe mbom bɔtɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ lɛtsã a kĩ bide nɛ ye akũ a budo bɔba. Mibɔa mbɔdi mipi ɔlɛdo a kĩ ɛla ndɛ ɔsɛdza kĩ yavɔlɛ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a mido mɔ akũ, kɛnaawo odenyinawi kĩ ɔnɔnɛ lisibii a aade lɛvɔlɛ nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
61001020	Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛbɛ̃ foe flee nyɛ kĩ, mite anɛ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛnyɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a kayɔ nɛ ye mɔawɛ akũ akũ.
61001021	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa fudima táto otidziwa kawɛ kamɛ fɔya tɔ̃ da, mbom Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ lɛfɔ̃ bati lɛ Baguma ɔlɛdo a biyi.
61002001	Ndɛ ayekĩ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ nɛ́ nɛ bati kamɛ kɔkɔɛ a, ade ayea bavãlɛvã fɔtsa batsanɛ aanɛ nɛ mi kamɛ a. Baatsã tɛdake kamɛ bɛyamɛna fɔvã fɔtsa katsa a kĩ fɔ́abula bati kade, ade baasĩ boe Ɔlate a kĩ ɛya be ɛtɛ be nkpã a malo. Be fɔtsakɛlawa aafɔ̃ bɛwɔla be mɔatsɛ.
61002002	Bati pii aatomɔ be ɔbla kpa kabɔa a liti, ade nɛ fɔvã fɔtsa batsanɛ a sũ ni, bati bɛbã aalɛ kɔdzɛla kpa bitia ɔnɔkɔali osi a.
61002003	Ayekĩ bavãlɛvã fɔtsa batsanɛ kĩĩ deĩ anɛngbã nɛ sika akũ sũ ni, baatsã tɛdake mɔ fɔvã kamɛ bɛna mi akũ nfasɔ. Lɛmɛ Baguma kɔ be kɔtɔ eyi anɛ kɔkɔkɔɛ, ade Oti a kĩ yaawɔla be a lɛmɛ lanyɛ anɛ nɛ be akũ!
61002004	Baguma támɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa a kɔnya, mbom edo be nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ, ɛta be edo nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ da a kamɛ, awã kĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ badzɔlɛ kadzɛ Luwi a.
61002005	Ade ayea Baguma támɔ atitifɔ katinya bati a kɔnya a. Ɛfɔ̃ mui kayili wɔla bati a kĩ bɛtávila Baguma nɛ katinya kamɛ flee a, mbɔɛntɛ Noa kĩ ede lɛtsã nɛ nkpã kadzi kpĩĩ akũ, mɔ bati evũkɔnɔ bɛbã odi Baguma nyɛ nɛ foe kamɛ.
61002006	Baguma kɔ Sodom mɔ Gomora tɛmatɔ tɛkpale tɛkpale a kɔtɔ, ade ɛfɔ̃ fi wɔla te bubloo tɛdani batɔ nɛnɛ a. Ɛkɛna be kĩ bɛnya nfantuhũ bɛkpa bikĩ baávila Baguma a lɛtsa a kĩ laaya nɛ be akũ.
61002007	Lɛmɛ Baguma nyɛ Lot, oti kpĩĩ kĩ bati ɔbla kpa kabɔa kaha ye ɔwɔlɛ.
61002008	Oti wĩ kĩĩ dzi nɛ be kamɛ, ade be ɔbla kpa a kĩ ɛkamɔ ɛkanu mɔ be titikpa a kaha ye ɔwɔlɛ luwi nyɛ luwi.
61002009	Nɛ foesũ boe Ɔlate nyina ayekĩ yanyɛ bati a kĩ bavila ye a etomɛna be sɔhuiɛ kamɛ, mɔ ayekĩ yafɔ̃ bati kpa aana nɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ kamɛ bɛkɔa bɛdzɔlɛ kadzɛ luwi a.
61002010	Yakɛna foe titiliwu nɛ bati a kĩ bitomɔ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa kĩ fɔakɔ odo liti, kĩ foesũ baábu Baguma otumi kĩ yanya be akũ a kado nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ. Fɔvã fɔtsa batsanɛ kĩĩ deĩ anɛ ɔsĩ, ade badɛla be akũ nɛ ode a. Baákɔa obu kakpa ode bati kpalɛwa a, ade ntɛ balɛ tɔkpa nɛ be akũ malo ni, akũ lányɛnɛ be.
61002011	Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi bɛbɛ̃ fɔvã fɔtsa batsanɛ malo a lákɔa fɔlɛtsa kpa katsua be onukpɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate a anɛ.
61002012	Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ la ndɛ bayaɛ kpa kĩ bɛlá adzuni, kĩ katinya nyɛ be kĩ bati bipili be bɛkɔ. Balɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtánu de kayɔ a akũ. Baguma aawɔla be ndɛ ayekĩ batidziwa awɔla tuwĩ kamɛ bayaɛ.
61002013	Baamɔ lubo nɛ lubo a kĩ bɛfɔ̃ bati mɔ́ a sũ. Be kawɔlɛ nyɛ kĩ bɛkɛna be sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa fudi nyɛ fudi nɛ suwa ketee. Bɛnyɛ kɔnyɔã mɔ tuduli fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ, ade ntɛ mi mɔ be midzi mianya a, bamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ be bati kakɛ tisi a akũ.
61002014	Bideĩ anɛ kĩ yamɔ batsole adɔpaafɔ, ade anɛ a kakɔa kakɛna tɔkpa láplo be a. Bavɛlɛ bati kĩ be katɛkado lɛdzɛ́ pintii kado nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ. Bɛvɛlɛ be akũ bɛkpa anɛngbã. Baguma kadumu tomɔ be!
61002015	Bɛfɔnɛ nɛ osi kpĩĩ a awɛ, ade bɛyɛla osi a. Bɛtsã osi a kĩ Balam, Boer obinyole a tsã a. Balam mɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ sika a kĩ yaana etomɛna tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ a akũ.
61002016	Lɛmɛ Baguma kã ye anɛ nɛ ye tɔkpa a sũ. Ye mɔawɛ aflimu kĩ ɛnɔnɛ lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ oti odo, ade esua onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a fɔbɔdamtsa kakɛna osi a.
61002017	Fɔvã fɔtsa batsanɛ kĩĩ la ndɛ fɔwɔkɛ kĩ fuviɔ̃, ĩye luflututu kĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ abɔa kanamɛna. Baguma manɛ kadzikɔ̃ eyi ɛkpa be nɛ ɔtũ kpli kamɛ.
61002018	Balɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ akũ kata, kalɛ fɔkɔasiatsa lɛmɛ. Bakɔa sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɔ odo kakɛ bikĩ owi tábuna kĩ bilo nɛ amamu kadzi kamɛ.
61002019	Bakpa be anɛ kate nɛ akũ akũ kadzi akũ, lɛmɛ be mɔawɛ a bɛnyɛ ɔbla kpa a kĩ yawɔla bati a basate, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnya oti akũ ni, oti a adani ɔsate ɛkpa lɛtsa a.
61002020	Ntɛ bati tsã boe Ɔlate mɔ Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo kanyi kamɛ bilo nɛ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔado oti efĩĩ sɛkɛ̃, mɔ́ ɔbla a na muniki ewo nɛ be kamɛ ɛnya be akũ ni, bati a na nkpã awũnade a abu kade kaba atɔnyade a.
61002021	Ntɛ kanyi kĩĩ bɛtanyi lɛtsama nɛ kadzi nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ ni, kufɛ fɔnɛnɛ kɔlaa fɔkpa be kɛba kĩ binyi osi wĩ kĩĩ lɛmɛ bibuki bimuniki nɛ mbla kpalɛwa a kĩ Baguma kpa be a liti.
61002022	Lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ be akũ a atsa kĩ fɔgbã kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ, “Okpete amuniki kanaabɔɛ ye mɔawɛ tɛdã,” ade, “Ɔplakuo kĩ bɛwɔla ye mui yededeede amuniki kanaato tɔdɔ̃.”
61003001	Nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, ade ovoli ɔyade kĩ ntsɛlɛ mamɛna mi a. Nɛ tuvoli nviã a kamɛ a, nwɛ kĩ manyina mi adzuni nɛ fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna akũ, ndɛ fɔlɛtsa kakai aye.
61003002	Mawɛ kĩ mite anɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kpalɛwa a lɛ biyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ a, mɔ tɛbla a kĩ mi fɔtɔ banyanɛ a tɛ bitomɛna boe Ɔlate mɔ Ɔtɛnɛ sɛkɛ̃ bɛma mi a akũ.
61003003	Minya lɔtɔ minu foe kayɔ kĩ nɛ fuwi nkaɛ a kamɛ ni, nsekuo badinɛ aaya. Baadzi nkpã nɛ be sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɔ oti odo onukpɛ̃ bidi mi nsekuo.
61003004	Ade baalɛ kĩ, “Ɛlɛ eyi kĩ yaaya. Nde ye? Kitonɛkĩ anɛ kĩ boe bawanyɔ ku kɛyawo finyaa, ade ayea lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa buki lideĩ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔna kĩ Baguma bɔa katinya a!”
61003005	Bibua pa bisĩ ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ anɛ kɔkɔɛ mɔ Baguma kɔa kalɛ ɛbɔa tite mɔ ode. Ɛkɛna tite etomɛna mui kamɛ, tɛdzɛ̃ nɛ mui kamɛ,
61003006	ade mui lɛmɛ, mui a kĩ biyili a ɛkɔa ɛwɔla katinya kɔɛ a.
61003007	Ade Baguma kalɛ mɔapɛ kĩĩ pini tite mɔ ode a kĩ fudeĩ finyaa, ade ɛmanɛ foe eyi kĩ yaakɔa fi ɛwɔla foe a. Baguma manɛ foe eyi ɛkpa kadzɛ luwi a kĩ yaawɔla bati a kĩ bɛtávila ye a.
61003008	Lɛmɛ nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mitalɛla kalɛ mɔa kĩĩ! Ade ke nyɛ kĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃ ni, luwi mɔa la ndɛ futeli apim, ade futeli apim lɛmɛ la ndɛ luwi mɔa a.
61003009	Nɛ badi kakɔna onukpɛ̃ ni, boe Ɔlate lána sɔwa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a kakɛna akũ. Fɔlá lɔmɔ, mbom ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ edeĩ ɛkpa mi, kitonɛkĩ yaáwɛ kĩ odima ɛyaawɔ, mbom yawɛ kĩ bati flee bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
61003010	Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate Luwi a aaya ndɛ ayekĩ oyekpanɛ aya a aye. Nɛ luwi a akũ ni, ode aatɛ̃ ɛnaa nɛ odo kpaa kanɛ kamɛ, ade odetɔ́ kamɛ fɔtsa flee a aatɛ̃ fuvio fɔwɔ, ade tite mɔ te akũ fɔtsa flee lɛmɛ aavio a.
61003011	Foesũ ntɛ baawɔla fɔtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ ni, bati bawɔdabe odu kɛnɛ kĩ mianya? Kɛnɛ kĩ mibɔa ɔbla kĩ ɛkpalɛ, mikɔa mi akũ flee misum Baguma,
61003012	nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ midzi miadzɔlɛ Baguma Luwi a mɔ akũ kasĩ kĩ lɛya mɔatsɛ. Ade luwi a mɔ ode aapi fi evio, ade fi ɔwɛ a aanyinyina odetɔ́ kamɛ fɔtsa flee a.
61003013	Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ nɛ Baguma kalɛkayi onukpɛ̃ ni, bɔadzɔlɛ ode vɔɛ̃ mɔ tite vɔɛ̃, awã kĩ fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna tɛ tɔtɔ.
61003014	Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kĩ miadzɔlɛ boe Ɔlate Luwi a ni, mibɔa mbɔdi kĩ míanya bati kpalɛwa, kĩ nfumusu lɛláa mi akũ nɛ Baguma anɛ, mbom lukudɔ lɛna nɛ mimɔ Baguma kayite.
61003015	Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔabu boe Ɔlate a ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kana kakpa boe a ndɛ osi kĩ ebinya ɛkpa mi kĩ mina nkpã katɛ. Ade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ boe ɔwɛnɛ Paulo malo tsɛlɛ ɛma mi nɛ nyansã a kĩ Baguma kpa ye a onukpɛ̃ a.
61003016	Ade lɛtsa a kĩ yalɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ nɛ ye tuvoli a kamɛ a. Ye tuvoli a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a fudi kayɔ kanu deĩ ɔsĩ. Nɛ foesũ bati a kĩ binyína tuvoli mɔ bikĩ bɛtátim nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ a adani foe kayɔ kanyɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ bakɛna mɔ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa bɛbã a fudi. Fukĩĩ kakɛna aafɔ̃ bɛwɔla be akũ.
61003017	Lɛmɛ mi yĩ bakɔba, minyina fukĩĩ kɔkɔɛ. Foesũ midã mi akũ kadã wĩ ayekĩ bati a kĩ baábu mbla a lɛláanyɛ kudu nɛ mi abɔa kayɔ minɛ mitɔ!
61003018	Mibo anɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate mɔ Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo kɔnyakamɔ mɔ kanyi kamɛ. Ye kade nyɛ kukũkpalɛ kito finyaa kanaa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
62001001	Bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ bɔamɛna mi nɛ Baguma kalɛ a kĩ kakpa nkpã, kĩ kideĩ anɛ kayɔkayi a akũ. Bunu kalɛ kĩĩ, bɔmɔ́ ke mɔ anɛ, nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, bɔmɔ́ ke, ade bɔta ke mɔ awɛ lɛmɛ a.
62001002	Kĩ nkpã kĩĩ nyɛ ye akũ kanya a, bɔmɔ́ ye, foesũ bɔlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye akũ, ade bude lɛtsã nɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, kĩ edeĩ nɛ Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa boe malo akũ a, bɔkpa mi.
62001003	Lɛtsa a kĩ bɔmɔ́, bunu a, ade de bɔabi mi malo a, ayekĩ míayabumɔ boe nɛ ɔmɔa a kĩ bɔkɛna mɔ Ɔlɛga a mɔ ye Obi Yesu Kristo.
62001004	Bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ bɔama mi, ayekĩ boe kawɔlɛkamɔ a aakpɔla.
62001005	Finyaa ni, ɔlɛdo a kĩ bunu butomɛna ye Obi sɛkɛ̃ a, kĩ bɔkɔa bɔade lɛtsã nɛ ye akũ bɔkpa mi a nyɛ Baguma nyɛ ɔhaĩ, ade ɔtũ odima lɛláa ye kamɛ a.
62001006	Foesũ ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ budeĩ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna kamɛ mɔ ye mɔ bubuki bɔtsɛ̃ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ bɔama fɔvã nɛ boe kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ boe fɔkɛlatsa kamɛ.
62001007	Lɛmɛ ntɛ budeĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ye malo edeĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ bɔakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe akũ akũ, ade ye Obi Yesu babɔanɛ a vɔlɛ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi nɛ boe akũ a.
62001008	Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ tɔkpa lɛláa boe akũ ni, kakɛ bɔakɛ boe akũ, ade ɔnɔkɔali a lɛláa boe kamɛ a.
62001009	Lɛmɛ ntɛ bubinya boe tɔkpa kamɛ bɔtsa Baguma ni, ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔalini mɔ oti kpĩĩ kĩ yaakɔa boe tɔkpa ete boe, ɛvɔlɛ efĩĩ adi nyɛ adi nɛ boe akũ.
62001010	Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ bɔtákɛna tɔkpa ni, bute Baguma fɔvã, ade ke ye kalɛ a lɛmɛ lɛláa boe kamɛ a.
62002001	Yĩ babi, nlamɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kamɛna mi ayekĩ miláakɛna tɔkpa. Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi kɛna tɔkpa ni, budeĩ odi kĩ yawãnɛ boe lɔlɔ nɛ Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃. Ade ye nyɛ Yesu Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ a.
62002002	Kristo akũ Baguma tsã ɛkɔa boe tɔkpa ete boe. Nnɛ́ boe odi tɔkpa ɛkɔa ete, mbom ɛkɔa ete batidziwa flee.
62002003	Ntɛ bɔakɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ ni, fɔ́afɔ̃ bɔmɔ́ buyi ɔsũ kĩ bunyina ye.
62002004	Oti a kĩ yalɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyina ye,” lɛmɛ yaákɛna nɛ ye mbla a akũ ni, ɔvãlɛvã yanɛ, ade ɔnɔkɔali a lɛláa ye kamɛ a.
62002005	Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ ye kalɛ a akũ ni, ade ye ɔdɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa Baguma a lɛkpɔla a. Ayekĩ bɔ́akɛna bunyi kĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Baguma nyɛ kĩ,
62002006	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ kĩ edeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu Kristo dzi a.
62002007	Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, nnɔ mbla vɔɛ̃ ntsɛlɛ mama mi, mbom mbla kɔɛ a kĩ bɛkpa mi kito anɛ kayɔkayi a yanɛ. Mbla kɔɛ a nyɛ ɔlɛdo a kĩ minu kɔkɔɔkɔɛ a.
62002008	Lɛmɛ mbla a kĩ ntsɛlɛ finyaa mamɛna mi a nyɛ avɔɛ̃, ade ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a lɛmɛ nyɛ akũ nɛ Kristo mɔ mi kamɛ a. Kitonɛkĩ ɔtũ a lamɛna katɛ̃ ade ɔhaĩ mɔawɛ a lamɛna kavɔlɛ kɔkɔɛ a.
62002009	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ, lɛmɛ yakesĩ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, ebuki edeĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ kɛyawo finyaa.
62002010	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kalɛ ni, edeĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ, foesũ lɛtsama lɛláafɔ̃ ɛkɛna tɔkpa.
62002011	Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakesĩ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, edeĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, ade enyína awã kĩ yakpa, kitonɛkĩ ɔtũ a kɔ ye anɛ.
62002012	Mi babisɛ̃, mi nlamɛna ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kama, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔa mi tɔkpa bite mi nɛ Kristo sũ.
62002013	Mi balɛga, mi nlamɛna ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kama, kitonɛkĩ minyi Kristo a kĩ edeĩ nkpã kito anɛ kayɔkayi a. Mi bapopo, mi nlamɛna ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kama, kitonɛkĩ minya Oti Kpa a akũ.
62002014	Mi babisɛ̃, mi nlamɛna ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kama, kitonɛkĩ minyina Ɔlɛga a. Mi balɛga a, ntsɛlɛ mma mi, kitonɛkĩ minyina Kristo a kĩ edeĩ nkpã kito anɛ kayɔkayi a. Mi bapopo, ntsɛlɛ mma mi, kitonɛkĩ mideĩ kɔbɛ̃, Baguma kalɛ a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, ade minya Oti Kpa a akũ a.
62002015	Mitawɛ katinya ĩye fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ke kamɛ a fudima kalɛ. Ntɛ odi awɛ katinya kalɛ ni, Ɔlɛga a ɔdɔ lɛláa ye kamɛ.
62002016	Kitonɛkĩ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee kĩ fɔakɔ sukɛna odo, ĩye fɔakɔ anɛ odo, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ oti apia nɛ foe akũ a lɛmɛ, fudima táto Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃, mbom katinya kamɛ futo.
62002017	Katinya mɔ ke kamɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔakɔ oti odo aatɛ̃, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ yakɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ a, aadzi nkpã daa.
62002018	Yĩ babi, katinya kawũna a fuã! Ndɛ ayekĩ minu kĩ Kristo okesĩnɛ a aaya a, finyaakĩĩ malo Kristo bakesĩnɛ pii nɛ́ kɔkɔɛ, nɛ foesũ bunyina kĩ katinya kawũna a fuã.
62002019	Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, boe kamɛ bati kĩĩ nɛ́ bito, lɛmɛ bɛláa boe kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ boe kamɛ bideĩ ni, kufɛ bibuki bideĩ nɛ boe kamɛ. Lɛmɛ bɛdzakũ ayekĩ fɔ́anɛ fɔwa pefee kĩ be kamɛ odima lɛnyɛ́ boe ode.
62002020	Lɛmɛ Kristo kɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa eko nɛ mi akũ, ade mi flee minyi ɔnɔkɔali a.
62002021	Nnɛ́ kĩ minyína ɔnɔkɔali a sũ mɔ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli kĩĩ, mbom ayekĩ minyina ɔnɔkɔali a, ade minyina lɛmɛ kĩ fɔvã lɛláa ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ sũ.
62002022	Foesũ owei koũ nyɛ ɔvãlɛvã a? Ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ yalɛ kĩ nnɛ́ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a. Ade oti kĩĩ odu liti ɛnyɛ Kristo okesĩnɛ a kĩ esĩ Ɔlɛga a mɔ Obi a flee a.
62002023	Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ Obi a ni, Ɔlɛga a lɛnyɛ́ ye ode. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Obi ni, Ɔlɛga a nyɛ ye ode.
62002024	Mifɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ minu kito kayɔkayi a fɔna nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ntɛ mipi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ minu a midomɔ akũ ni, míapuli mina nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna kamɛ mɔ Obi a mɔ Ɔlɛga a.
62002025	Lɛtsa a kĩ Kristo mɔawɛ lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa boe nyɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
62002026	Ade bati a kĩ bawɛ kĩ bakɛ mi a akũ fɔlɛtsa nlamɛna katsɛlɛ kama mi a.
62002027	Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ kugua a kĩ Kristo tsɛla mi buki kudeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, foesũ fɔtásĩ kĩ odima abuki ɛtsa mi fɔtsa. Kitonɛkĩ ye kugua katsɛla a atsa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade fɔtsa a kĩ kɔatsa a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ fɔvã lɛláa foe kamɛ. Foesũ mikɛna nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa a akũ lɔkɔa mina nɛ Kristo kamɛ.
62002028	Foesũ finyaa, yĩ babi, midzi nɛ Kristo kamɛ, ayekĩ ntɛ ɛyanɛ ɛta nɛ Luwi akũ ni, bɔ́ado ɔwɔlɛ, kĩ kɔnyɔã lɛmɛ lɛláakɔ boe nɛ ye anɛ.
62002029	Ntɛ minyina kĩ Kristo nyɛ oti kpĩĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ mitɛ mido kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna fɔtsa wĩ ni, Baguma obi yanɛ.
62003001	Midã ɔdɔ a odu kĩ Ɔlɛga a deĩ ɛkpa boe! Yawɛ boe kalɛ paa kĩ bavɛ boe Baguma babi. Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ ye babi bɔanɛ lɛmɛ. Lɛtsa a sũ kĩ katinya kamɛ bati linyína boe nyɛ kĩ bɛtányi Baguma.
62003002	Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, finyaa Baguma babi bɔanɛ. Bɛtányɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de bɔ́adani bɔkɛna a bɛtsa boe tɔ̃, lɛmɛ bunyina kĩ ntɛ Kristo ya ni, bɔ́ana ndɛ ye aye, kitonɛkĩ bɔ́amɔ ye ndɛ ayekĩ eti ɛla a.
62003003	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ kɔnɛte kĩĩ nɛ Kristo akũ ni, yakpalɛ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo nyɛ oti kpalɛwa a.
62003004	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa ni, efum Baguma mbla a, kitonɛkĩ tɔkpa nyɛ Baguma mbla kafum.
62003005	Lɛmɛ minyina kĩ kaya Kristo ya kĩ yayaalɔ boe tɔkpa ɛnamɛna, ade nɛ ye kamɛ ni, tɔkpa tidima lɛláa.
62003006	Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo ni, yaádzi kakɛna tɔkpa, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi yakɛna tɔkpa ni, ɛtámɔ tɔ̃ ye ĩye ɛtányi tɔ̃ ye.
62003007	Yĩ babi, mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛ mi! Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tuwĩ ni, ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo lɛmɛ nyɛ oti kpĩĩ a.
62003008	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa ni, Abonsam ode yanɛ, kitonɛkĩ Abonsam kɛna tɔkpa kito anɛ kayɔkayi a. Lɛtsa a sũ kĩ Baguma Obi a ya nɛ katinya kamɛ nyɛ kĩ yayaawɔla Abonsam fɔkɛlatsa a flee.
62003009	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma obi ni, yaádzi kakɛna tɔkpa, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kutidu a deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ. Ɛláapuli edzi ɛkakɛna tɔkpa kitonɛkĩ Baguma nyɛ ye Ɔlɛga.
62003010	Ntsitsemu a kĩ edeĩ nɛ Baguma babi mɔ Abonsam babi kayite nyɛ kĩ, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaákɛna fɔtsa nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ ĩye yaáwɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kalɛ ni, ɛnyɛ́ Baguma obi.
62003011	Ɔlɛdo a kĩ minu kito anɛ kayɔkayi a nyɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔawɛ akũ kalɛ.
62003012	Mitana ndɛ Kain aye kĩ ɛnya oti kpa a ode, ɛkɔ ye mɔawɛ ɔwaɛ̃ Abel a. Litsa sũ Kain kɔ ye? Ɛkɔ ye kitonɛkĩ ye mɔawɛ a ɛkɛna tɔkpa lɛmɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kɔ̃ kɛna fɔtsa nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ.
62003013	Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, fɔtakɛna mi saa kĩ katinya kamɛ bati akesĩ mi.
62003014	Boe kɔ̃ bunyina kĩ bɔtsã wuda kamɛ buwo nɛ nkpã kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɔawɛ akũ kalɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ oti kalɛ ni, ɛkahɔ nɛ wuda kamɛ.
62003015	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakesĩ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, owudini yanɛ, ade minyina kĩ nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a lɛláa owudini odima kamɛ a.
62003016	Ade limii bɔ́anyi ayekĩ ɔdɔ la a. Kristo kɔa ye nkpã ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ boe malo bɔkɔa boe nkpã bɔbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ boe bawaɛ̃ lɔlɔ.
62003017	Ntɛ odi deĩ akũ fɔtsa mɔ ɛmɔ́ ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ kisĩ ye lɛmɛ fɔtákɔ ye kɔnya kĩ yabumɔ ɔwaɛ̃ a ni, nde yaapuli ɛlɛ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kĩ yawɛ Baguma kalɛ?
62003018	Yĩ babi, mitafɔ̃ bɔkɔa fɔlɛtsa mɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ pupulidza bɔwɛ oti kalɛ, mbom mifɔ̃ boe oti kawɛ kɛna nɛ boe fɔkɛlatsa mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ.
62003019	Fɔtsɛ̃ fukĩĩ akũ bunyina kĩ bɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a bade, ade bɔ́apuli budo ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ a.
62003020	Ntɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kɔ boe kɔtɔ malo ni, bunyina kĩ Baguma bɛ̃ boe tɔwɔlɛ ade enyina lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a.
62003021	Yĩ bawaɛ̃ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, ntɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ lákɔ boe kɔtɔ ni, kekɔ̃ bunyina kĩ bɔ́ado ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ,
62003022	lɔkɔa bɔtɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ buvia a butomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ bɔakɛna nɛ ye mbla akũ, ade bɔakɛna fɔtsa fɔawo ye anɛ a.
62003023	Ye mbla a nyɛ kĩ bɔtɛ ye Obi Yesu Kristo budo, lɔkɔa bɔwɛ akũ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo wɛ etomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ a.
62003024	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ Baguma mbla akũ a, edeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ, ade Baguma lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a. Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma kpa boe sũ ni, bunyina kĩ edeĩ nɛ boe kamɛ.
62004001	Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mitatɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ kĩ Baguma Hũhũ deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ mido, mbom misɔ ye midã ntɛ hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a to Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Kitonɛkĩ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ pii nɛ bɛtsɛ̃ bamini nɛ katinya kamɛ.
62004002	Ade fukĩĩ míakɔa minyi ntɛ Hũhũ a to Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a. Hũhũ adi nyɛ adi kĩ yalɛ kĩ Yesu Kristo ya nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ otidziwa aye ni, eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
62004003	Lɛmɛ hũhũ adi nyɛ adi kĩ yaádi Yesu akũ adansiɛ ni, ɛtáto Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Ade ekĩĩ nyɛ Kristo okesĩnɛ hũhũ a kĩ minu kĩ yaaya a, ade finyaakĩĩ malo ɛya edeĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ kɔkɔɛ.
62004004	Lɛmɛ yĩ babi, Baguma bade mianɛ, ade minya fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a akũ, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a bɛ̃ hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ bati kamɛ a.
62004005	Ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati banɛ sũ ni, fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a alɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa odi akũ, ade katinya kamɛ bati a atse be ɔlɛdo a.
62004006	Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ ni, Baguma bade bɔanɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyina Baguma ni, yatse boe ɔlɛdo, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Baguma ode ni, yaátse boe. Foesũ fukĩĩ bɔ́akɔa bɔmɔ́ ɔnɔkɔali Hũhũ mɔ fɔvã hũhũ.
62004007	Bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mifɔ̃ bɔwɛ akũ kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ɔdɔ to. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ bati kalɛ ni, Baguma obi yanɛ ade enyina Baguma a.
62004008	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ bati kalɛ ni, enyína Baguma kitonɛkĩ Baguma nyɛ ɔdɔ.
62004009	Ayekĩ Baguma nyɛ ye ɔdɔ ɛtsa boe nyɛ kĩ edo ye Obi mɔapɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ, fɔtsɛ̃ ye akũ ni, bɔna nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
62004010	Ade fukĩĩ kamɛ bunyi lɛtsa a kĩ liti lɛnyɛ ɔdɔ a. Nnɛ́ ayekĩ bɔwɛ Baguma kalɛ, mbom ayekĩ Baguma wɛ boe kalɛ, edo ye Obi kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ yaatsã ye akũ ɛkɔa boe tɔkpa ete boe.
62004011	Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, ntɛ aye Baguma wɛ boe kalɛ kɔ̃ ni, kɛfɛta kĩ boe malo bɔawɛ akũ akũ kalɛ.
62004012	Odima támɔ tɔ̃ Baguma. Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɔawɛ akũ akũ kalɛ ni, kekɔ̃ Baguma deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ, ade ɛkɛna ye ɔdɔ a ɛkpɔla nɛ boe kamɛ a.
62004013	Bɔtɛ budo kĩ budeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ, ade ye malo edeĩ nɛ boe kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa ye mɔawɛ Hũhũ ɛkpa boe.
62004014	Bɔmɔ́ fukĩĩ ade bude lɛtsã nɛ foe akũ bɔkpa bati kĩ Ɔlɛga a do ye Obi kĩ ɛyaanya katinya kamɛ Ɔtɛnɛ.
62004015	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ebinya ye kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ Yesu nyɛ Baguma Obi ni, Baguma deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ ade ke ye malo edeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ a.
62004016	Boe mɔawɛ a bunyina ade bɔtɛ Baguma ɔdɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa boe a budo a. Baguma nyɛ ɔdɔ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ bati kalɛ ni, edeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ ade Baguma lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a.
62004017	Ade fukĩĩ kamɛ ɔdɔ a aakpɔla nɛ boe kamɛ ayekĩ bɔ́ado ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ, kitonɛkĩ boe nkpã kadzi kamɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ketimɔ Kristo ade a.
62004018	Libe lɛláa ɔdɔ kamɛ, mbom ɔdɔ a kĩ ɛkpɔla a, ablɔmɛna libe nɛ bati kamɛ. Nɛ foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yavila ni, ye ɔdɔ tákpɔla kitonɛkĩ libe mɔ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ tsɛ̃.
62004019	Bɔawɛ Baguma kalɛ kitonɛkĩ ye lɛnya lɔtɔ ɛwɛ boe kalɛ.
62004020	Ntɛ odi lɛ kĩ, “Mawɛ Baguma kalɛ” lɛmɛ yakesĩ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, ɔvãlɛvã yanɛ. Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ ɔwaɛ̃ a kĩ yamɔ mɔ anɛ kalɛ a, lɛláapuli ɛwɛ Baguma kĩ yaámɔ mɔ anɛ a kalɛ.
62004021	Mbla a kĩ Kristo kpa boe nyɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ Baguma kalɛ ni, ɛwɛ ɔwaɛ̃ lɛmɛ kalɛ.
62005001	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ edo kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a ni, Baguma obi yanɛ. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ obilɛga kalɛ ni, yawɛ ye obi lɛmɛ kalɛ.
62005002	Foesũ ntɛ bɔawɛ Baguma kalɛ mɔ bɔakɛna nɛ ye mbla akũ ni, kekɔ̃ bunyina kĩ bɔawɛ Baguma babi lɛmɛ kalɛ.
62005003	Ntɛ bɔkɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ ni, fɔatsa kĩ bɔawɛ ye kalɛ. Baguma mbla akũ kakɛna lɛlá ɔsĩ ɛkpa boe,
62005004	kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma obi anya katinya kamɛ akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ bɔkɔa bɔnya katinya akũ nyɛ boe katɛkado.
62005005	Owei aapuli ɛnya katinya akũ kɛba oti a kĩ ɛtɛ edo kĩ Yesu nyɛ Baguma Obi a?
62005006	Yesu Kristo nyɛ oti kĩ ɛtsã mui mɔ babɔanɛ kamɛ ɛya nɛ katinya kamɛ. Ɛtáya nɛ mui odi kamɛ mbom ɛya nɛ mui mɔ babɔanɛ kamɛ. Ade Baguma Hũhũ a mɔawɛ adi adansiɛ kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a.
62005007	Adansifɔ ɛlalɛ deĩ.
62005008	Ade be nyɛ Hũhũ a, mui a mɔ babɔanɛ a. Be ɛlalɛ a flee alɛ onukpɛ̃ mɔa.
62005009	Bɔtɛ otidziwa adansiɛ kadi a budo, lɛmɛ Baguma adansiɛ kadi a deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kɛbɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ ye lidi adansiɛ nɛ ye Obi akũ.
62005010	Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Baguma Obi a edo ni, adansiɛ kadi kĩĩ deĩ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ Baguma edo ni, ɛfɔ̃ Baguma dani ɔvãlɛvã, kitonɛkĩ ɛtátɛ adansiɛ a kĩ Baguma di nɛ ye Obi akũ a edo.
62005011	Adansiɛ kadi a nyɛ kĩ, Baguma kpa boe nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, ade nkpã kĩĩ lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ye Obi kamɛ a.
62005012	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ Baguma Obi a ni, edeĩ nkpã kĩĩ. Ade aye odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛlá Obi a ni, ɛlá nkpã kĩĩ.
62005013	Ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mama mi a kĩ mitɛ Baguma Obi a mido, ayekĩ míanyi kĩ mideĩ nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
62005014	Budeĩ ɔwɔlɛ kado nɛ Baguma anɛ kitonɛkĩ ntɛ buvia ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ ye kawɛ onukpɛ̃ ni, yatse boe.
62005015	Ntɛ bunyina kĩ yatse lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔavia ye ni, kekɔ̃ bunyina lɛmɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɔavia ni, bɔatɛ katomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃.
62005016	Ntɛ odi mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa kĩ tɛláakpã ye tɛnamɛna wuda kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ yabɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa Baguma lɔkɔa yaakpa ye nkpã. Bati a kĩ bakɛna tɔkpa a kĩ taávɛlɛ wuda kayamɛna a fɔlɛtsa malɛ. Lɛmɛ tɔkpa tidi deĩ kĩ takpã oti kanamɛna wuda kamɛ, nlámɛna kalɛ kĩ mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa Baguma nɛ te akũ.
62005017	Lɛkɛnana kpa lidi nyɛ lidi nyɛ tɔkpa, lɛmɛ tɔkpa tidi deĩ kĩ taánamɛna oti wuda kamɛ.
62005018	Bunyina kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma obi ládzi kakɛna tɔkpa, kitonɛkĩ Baguma Obi a adãmɛna ye akũ, ade Okesĩnɛ a lɛláapuli ɛkɛna ye ablɔ adima a.
62005019	Bunyina kĩ Baguma bade bɔanɛ, ade katinya kamɛ flee lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ Okesĩnɛ a kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ.
62005020	Bunyina kĩ Baguma Obi a ya, ade ɛkpa boe fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu ayekĩ bɔ́anyi Baguma a kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a. Budzi nkpã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali Baguma a kamɛ, budzi nkpã nɛ Obi Yesu Kristo lɛmɛ kamɛ. Ade ye nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali Baguma mɔ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
62005021	Yĩ babi, mivɛlɛ mi akũ nɛ baviɔ̃ ɔwɛ̃.
