63001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, asɔli lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna boe Ɔma a kĩ Baguma pau, mɔ ye babi a kĩ mawɛ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ a. Nnɛ́ yĩ odi awɛ mi kalɛ mbom bati a kĩ binyina ɔnɔkɔali a flee lɛmɛ,
63001002	kitonɛkĩ ɔnɔkɔali a deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ ade yaana nɛ boe kamɛ daa a.
63001003	Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ Yesu Kristo, kĩ ɛnyɛ Ɔlɛga a Obi a bɛmɔ boe kɔnya, bɛkɛna boe sɛmɛ kalɛ, bɛkpa boe lukudɔ lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali mɔ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
63001004	Kawɔlɛ de yĩ paa kĩ mmɔ́ nɔ babi badi kĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a wɛ etomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ a.
63001005	Nɛ foesũ, boe Ɔma, ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ makpa mi kĩ bɔwɛ akũ akũ kalɛ. Nnɛ́ mbla vɔɛ̃ yanɛ ntsɛlɛ mama mi, mbom mbla a kĩ bɔtɛ kito anɛ kayɔkayi a yanɛ.
63001006	Ɔdɔ a kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa malɛ a nyɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔakɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ. Mbla a kĩ ye mi flee minu kito anɛ kayɔkayi a nyɛ kĩ mi flee midzi nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
63001007	Bati bakɛnɛ pii gba bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ katinya kamɛ, bati kĩ baálɛ kĩ Yesu Kristo ya nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ otidziwa aye. Oti a na odu nyɛ bati ɔkɛnɛ mɔ Kristo okesĩnɛ.
63001008	Foesũ midã kadã wĩ kĩ miláayɛla lɛtsa a kĩ mipili mina a, mbom kĩ míana mi kɔtɔkase lodo.
63001009	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtápi Kristo fɔtsa katsa edomɔ akũ mɔ ɛtsa fɔtsa bɛbã ni, Baguma lɛláa ye kamɛ. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ epi foe edomɔ akũ ni, Ɔlɛga mɔ Obi a flee deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ.
63001010	Nɛ foesũ ntɛ odi ya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔ ɛtákɔa fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ ɛyamɛna ni, mitatɛ ye nɛ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ. Mitatunɔ ye kawɔ̃na titau malo,
63001011	kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ etunɔ ye kawɔ̃na a, na tsɛfã nɛ ye tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna a kamɛ.
63001012	Ndeĩ fɔlɛtsa pii kufɛ kĩ maatsɛlɛ mma mi, lɛmɛ ntáwɛ kĩ mate foe nɛ ovoli akũ. Nɛ foe kadokɔ̃ ni, madã anɛ kĩ yĩ mɔawɛ maaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, bɔlɔmɛna anɛ mɔ anɛ, ayekĩ boe flee kawɔlɛkamɔ a aakpɔla.
63001013	Awaɛ̃tsole a kĩ Baguma pau a babi awɔ̃na mi.
64001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, asɔli lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna Gayo kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, kĩ mawɛ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ lɛmɛ.
64001002	Yĩ ɔkɔba kĩ maátunɔ nɔ kalɛ, mabɔa mpaɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa lɛlɛ lɛkpa nɔ, kana akũ ɔsĩ lɛmɛ. Matɛ kado kĩ nɔ hũhũ lɛmɛ deĩ kadeĩ wĩ.
64001003	Mmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa kĩ boe bakɔba batɛ badonɛ badi yabi yĩ ayekĩ opini ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a ndɛ ayekĩ opi ke kɔkɔɛ a.
64001004	Kĩ nnu kĩ yĩ babi dzi nkpã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a onukpɛ̃ a, mmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa.
64001005	Yĩ ɔkɔba kĩ maátunɔ nɔ kalɛ, adi ɔnɔkɔali paa nɛ adzuma a kĩ akɛna a kamɛ kakpa nɔ bakɔba batɛ badonɛ, titiliwu banɔvɔɛ̃.
64001006	Bɛyabɔa asɔli bati a amaniɛ nɛ ɔdɔ a kĩ odeĩ ɔkpa be a akũ. Make nɔ aduli kĩ bumɔ be ndɛ ayekĩ fɔtɛta nɛ Baguma adzuma kakɛna kamɛ, lɔkɔa bɛnaa lɔtɔ nɛ be osi katsã kamɛ.
64001007	Kitonɛkĩ Kristo adzuma sũ bipi osi ade bɛtátɛ kabumɛna kadima bitomɛna amamufɔ a sɛkɛ̃ a.
64001008	Foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔabumɛna bati kĩĩ odu ayekĩ bɔ́anyɛ bɔtsa kĩ bɔmɔ́ be flee bɔnyɛ bakɔba nɛ adzuma kakɛna kamɛ bɔkpa ɔnɔkɔali a.
64001009	Ntsɛlɛ ovoli lukũ mmɛna asɔli bati a, lɛmɛ Diotrefo kĩ ɛbɔɛ ye akũ ndɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye, tábu yĩ edo nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ.
64001010	Foesũ ntɛ ĩya ni, maavɛlɛ mi adzuni nnamɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ɛkɛna akũ. Maalɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ yalɛ nɛ boe akũ mɔ fɔvã a kĩ yama a! Nnɛ́ foe odi. Esĩ kĩ yaátɛ Kristofɔ a kĩ bayaa nɛ awã a, ade yasua bikĩ bawɛ kĩ batɛ be a osi malo a. Yabɔa mbɔdi kĩ yablɔmɛna bati a nɛ asɔli a kamɛ.
64001011	Yĩ ɔkɔba kĩ maátunɔ nɔ kalɛ, tatomɔ tɔkpa liti, mbom tomɛna fɔtsa wĩ liti. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tuwĩ ni, Baguma ode yanɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa ni, ɛtámɔ Baguma eyi ɔsũ.
64001012	Odi nyɛ odi abɔa Demetrio dĩ wĩ. Ye ɔbla alɛ kalɛ wĩ nɛ ye akũ. Boe malo bɔadi adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ, ade minyina kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔalɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a.
64001013	Ndeĩ fɔlɛtsa pii kĩ mawɛ kĩ mabi nɔ, lɛmɛ nláakɔa fɔtsa katsɛlɛ otse mɔ katsɛlɛ mui ntsɛlɛ foe.
64001014	Lɛmɛ matɛ kado kĩ owi lɛláabuna mɔ maamɔ nɔ, lɔkɔa bɔ́alɔmɛna nɛ foe akũ anɛ mɔ anɛ.
64001015	Lukudɔ lɛna mɔ nɔ. Nɔ bakɔba flee nɛ awĩ awɔ̃na nɔ. Wɔ̃na boe bakɔba a ɔmɔa ɔmɔa nɛ awã kakpa boe.
65001001	Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Yuda, Yesu Kristo ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ĩnyɛ Yakobo ɔwaɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna bati a kĩ Baguma vɛ, kĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga awɛ be kalɛ, ade yadãmɛna be akũ kayi Yesu Kristo a.
65001002	Baguma kɔnyakamɔ, ye lukudɔ mɔ ye ɔdɔ ɛpɔ nɛ mi akũ ebu.
65001003	Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, titɔ kĩ mbɔa mbɔdi kĩ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli nɛ ayekĩ Baguma kpa boe flee nkpã a akũ malo ni, finyaa fɔyasĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ntsɛlɛ mi ovoli mɔatsɛ nkɔa ndo mi kɔbɛ̃ mipuli mipili katɛkado osi a. Ade katɛkado kĩĩ Baguma kɔa ɛkpa ye bati a deedimɔapɛ a.
65001004	Kitonɛkĩ bati kĩ baávila Baguma badi bɛla pɛtɛɛ biwo nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ mi katanyi kamɛ. Bɛdani boe ɔlɛdo a kĩ bɔtɛ nɛ ayekĩ Baguma amɔ oti kɔnya akũ a, batsa fɔtsa bɛbã kĩ fɔkpa be osi bɛbɔa ɔbla kpa. Bisĩ boe Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔapɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ eyi anɛ titiiti kĩ Baguma aakɔ be kɔtɔ lɔmɔ.
65001005	Titɔ kĩ minyina fukĩĩ flee kɔkɔɛ malo ni, mawɛ kĩ makai mi kĩ boe Ɔlate a nyɛ Israelfɔ etomɛna Egiptefɔ tite akũ, lɛmɛ ke liti a, ɛwɔla bikĩ bɛtátɛ ye bido a.
65001006	Mite anɛ kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛtákɛna nɛ otumi a kĩ bɛkpa be a akũ kakɛna wĩ, mbom bɛdzakũ nɛ be mɔawɛ fudzikɔ̃ a, Baguma do be nɛ nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ kamɛ daa nɛ ɔtũ kpli kamɛ, kĩ bɛna nɛ awã kɛnaawo Luwi Kpale a kĩ yaadzɛmɔ be ɛkɔ be kɔtɔ.
65001007	Ade ayea Sodom mɔ Gomora mɔ tɛmatɔ a kĩ tifuã te a, bati kɔa be akũ bɛkpa adɔpaa mɔ ɔbla kpa mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a. Baguma kɔa be edo nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ da kamɛ kĩ fɔnya nfantuhũ fɔkpa bati flee.
65001008	Ade ayea fɔda bawanɛ kĩĩ akɛna tɔkpa nɛ be mɔawɛ sukɛna akũ malo a. Baábu Baguma otumi a kĩ yanya be akũ a, ade balɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ ode fɔtsa a kĩ obu deĩ nɛ foe akũ a akũ.
65001009	Baguma Ode Fɔtɔ Ɔnyanɛnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Mikael malo tákɛna fukĩĩ odu. Kĩ ye mɔ Abonsam bɛvɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ be kamɛ oti a kĩ ye aabɔɛ Mose ɔnɔkpa akũ malo ni, ɛtádo ɔwɔlɛ ɛlɛ tuwuli kpa ɛkɔ Abonsam kɔtɔ, mbom ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔlate a ɛkã nɔ anɛ.”
65001010	Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ alɛ fuvũnatsa nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛtánu de kayɔ a akũ, ade fɔtsa a kĩ binyina bitomɛna be kabɔa kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ tuwĩ kamɛ bayaɛ kĩ bɛlá adzuni a malo nyina a, ade foe mɔapɛ a awɔla be a.
65001011	Bɔbɔɛ makpa be! Bɛtsã osi a kĩ Kain tsã a. Nɛ sika a kĩ baana sũ ni, bɛkɔa be akũ bido nɛ tɔkpa a kĩ Balam kɛna a kamɛ. Biyidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ ndɛ Kora aye, ade ke bɛwɔla be ndɛ ye aye a.
65001012	Ntɛ mikpɔta mianya boe Ɔlate ɔdɔ funitsã a, bati kĩĩ nyɛ efĩĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, awã kĩ baányɔã kanya mɔ kamɔa kpafũũ nɛ Baguma anɛ. Be odi akũ badãmɛna. Bɛla ndɛ luflututu kĩ oni lɛláa de kamɛ, kĩ ɔwɛ abɔa de katɛ̃mɛna. Bɛla ndɛ futse kĩ fɔáwũ babi nɛ kawũ lɔkɔ, ndɛ futse kĩ bɛbɔlɛ mɔ tunu fuku, fuku fubuli.
65001013	Bɛla ndɛ mpo mui kĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ abɔa be bafũ kanyɛ be fɔnyɔãtsa katsa ndɛ mui anɛ kuvũ aye. Bɛla ndɛ fusibii kĩ fɔato katɛ̃, bati kĩ Baguma manɛ kadzikɔ̃ ɛkpa be nɛ ɔtũ kpli kamɛ, awã kĩ baana daa.
65001014	Ade bati kĩĩ akũ Henok kĩ ɛnyɛ Adam kasinu kavũkɔnɔde a oti lɛ eyi kɔkɔɔkɔɛ kĩ, “Ɔlate a mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ kpalɛwa mpim mpim aya,
65001015	ɛyaadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ bati flee. Yaakɔ bati a kĩ baávila Baguma a kɔtɔ nɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ bɛkɛna, mɔ tuwuli kpa a kĩ bɛlɛ nɛ ye akũ a sũ.”
65001016	Bati kĩĩ akɛna hũhũhũhũ daa, kanyɛ nfumusu kakpa bati bɛbã. Batomɛna be mɔawɛ fɔwɛtsa kpa liti, bapia akũ, ade bakɛ bati mɔ sɛmɛ mɛnɛmɛnɛ ayekĩ baana lɛtsa a kĩ de bawɛ a.
65001017	Lɛmɛ mi yĩ bakɔba, mite anɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo fɔtɔ banyanɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ lɛyatɛ̃ kamɛ a akũ.
65001018	Bibi mi kĩ, “Nɛ fuwi nkaɛ a kamɛ ni, bati aanɛ, bidi mi nsekuo, bitomɛna be sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɔ odo liti nɛ Baguma katavila kamɛ.”
65001019	Ade be nyɛ bati kĩ basɛ̃ bati kamɛ a, bati kĩ katinya kamɛ fɔwɛtsa nya be akũ, mɔ bati kĩ Hũhũ a lɛláa be kamɛ.
65001020	Lɛmɛ mi yĩ bakɔba, mi kɔ̃ ni, mikaabo anɛ nɛ mi katɛkado kĩ kɛnyɛ mi fɔtsa kpalɛwa a kamɛ, lɔkɔa mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ.
65001021	Mikɔla mi akũ nɛ Baguma ɔdɔ kamɛ, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ miadzɔlɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ kɔayakpa mi nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
65001022	Mimɔ́ be kamɛ bikĩ bɛtásipi nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a kɔnya.
65001023	Bati bɛbã a kĩ banaa fi kamɛ a ni, miwãnɛ be minyɛ, mitɛ be nkpã. Mimɔ́ bati bɛbã kɔnya lɛmɛ mivila be, lɔkɔa mikesĩ be fɔkɛlatsa ndɛ ayekĩ míawɛ̃ sukɛna tɛtadiɛ kpitii a.
65001024	Baguma a kĩ yaapuli epi mi ayekĩ miláatɔ, ɛkpã mi nɛ kawɔlɛ kamɛ minaawo ye kukũkpalɛ a anɛ, kĩ nfumusu adima lɛláa mi akũ.
65001025	Baguma odi keĩ kĩ ɛtsã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ ɛkɛna ye boe Ɔtɛnɛ a, ade ye mɔ obu, kamu, kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi nyɛ ye fude a, kito anɛ kɔkɔɛ, mɔ finyaa kanaa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
66001001	Ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa nyɛ Yesu Kristo kanyɛ katsa a kĩ Baguma kpa ye, kĩ ɛnyɛ ɛtsa ye basumunɛ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ fɔya nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ a akũ. Kristo tsã ye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ akũ ɛfɔ̃ ye ɔsumunɛ Yohanes nyi fɔtsa kĩĩ flee.
66001002	Yohanes lɛmɛ lɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛmɔ a flee. Edi adansiɛ nɛ Baguma kalɛ a mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a kĩ Yesu Kristo nyɛ ɛtsa ye a akũ.
66001003	Baguma ahila oti a kĩ yakã ovoli kĩĩ, mɔ bati a kĩ batse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi, kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ foe akũ lɛmɛ a, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.
66001004	Yĩ, Yohanes, lamɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kamɛna mi tɛsɔli evũkɔnɔ a kĩ tideĩ nɛ Asia amantam kamɛ a. Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã, kĩ ɛna kɔkɔɛ, kĩ yaaya a, ɛmɔ mi kɔnya, ɛkpa mi lukudɔ. Ade ayea hũhũ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ye lɛgãkpo anɛ a,
66001005	mɔ Yesu Kristo ɔnɔkɔali ɔdansini, kĩ ɛnyɛ bati a kĩ Baguma dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa kamɛ ɔtɔnyade, kĩ yanya tite akũ fɔgã flee akũ a, bɛmɔ mi kɔnya bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ. Yawɛ boe kalɛ ade ɛtsã ye wuda kamɛ ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna tɔkpa kamɛ.
66001006	Oti a kĩ eyi lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ ɛkpa boe kĩ bɔnya basɔfɔ busum ye Baguma mɔ Ɔlɛga a, ade ye mɔ mikɔa kukũkpalɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ mikpa daa daa! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
66001007	Midã, ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ luflututu akũ yaya! Odi nyɛ odi aamɔ ye, ade bati a kĩ bɛtsɔɛ ye lɔtsɔɛ nɛ sɛklabi a lɛmɛ aamɔ ye. Tite akũ bati flee aawula babe yoo nɛ ye akũ! Ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ fɔna a! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
66001008	Boe Ɔlate, Baguma Kpale, kĩ edzi nkpã, kĩ ɛna kɔkɔɛ, kĩ yaaya a, lɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ Ɔtɔnyade mɔ Owũnade.”
66001009	Yĩ, Yohanes, mi ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ bɔmɔ́ mi bɔtsã butomɛna Yesu a, ĩnyɛ mi ɔkɔba kĩ bɔdɔla boe akũ, bɔmɔ́ lubo a kĩ laya kakpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ ye ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ bade a. Bɛkɔa yĩ bɛnadzina nɛ tite nɛ mui kayite a kĩ bavɛ Patmos a akũ, kitonɛkĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ Baguma kalɛ a, mɔ ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ Yesu nyɛ ɛtsa a akũ sũ.
66001010	Nɛ boe Ɔlate Luwi a akũ ni, Hũhũ a tɛ yĩ kamɛ, ade nnu odo kɔɔba kĩ ɛnɛ́ ndɛ kagbulɛɛ aye, ade ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ yĩ liti a.
66001011	Odo a lɛ kĩ, “Tsɛlɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔmɔ́ a kayi, lɔkɔa kakɔa ovoli a kamɛna tɛsɔli a kĩ tideĩ nɛ tɛmatɔ tɛkpale tɛkpale evũkɔnɔ kĩĩ kamɛ. Ade te nyɛ Efeso, Smirna, Pergamo, Tiatira, Sardis, Filadelfia mɔ Laodikea a.”
66001012	Ndani anɛ kĩ madã oti a kĩ ɛlamɛna yĩ kalɛ kabi a, ade mmɔ́ sika ngbã ɔsɛdza titse evũkɔnɔ a.
66001013	Litsedi kĩ lɛla ndɛ Otidziwa Obi aye kĩ edo atadiɛ wulaa kĩ ɛka eko nɛ ye fɔnɛta, ade ɛkɔa sika ngbã abɔsɔ ɛbɔa nɛ ɔwɔlɛ a.
66001014	Ye lɔlɔ tɔlɔ voe fitaa ndɛ kuveli tɛtsã ĩye ndɛ lɛdãglɛglɛ aye, ade ye banebi ata ndɛ fi luwotu aye a.
66001015	Ye fɔnɛta ata ndɛ kɔɔble kĩ bɛvɔlɛ nɛ fi kamɛ, ade ye odo anɛ ndɛ ɔwɔ mui kĩ baka kato ɔtɔ akũ kako waa nɛ lutubu kamɛ a.
66001016	Ɛnɛɛ fusibii evũkɔnɔ nɛ ye sɔmɔna awɛ, ade atugbe mɔ ɔbɔ̃ lɛmɛ nɛ eto ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a, ade anɛ kamɛ amɔanɛ ndɛ suwa ketee aye a.
66001017	Kĩ mmɔ́ ye a, nnɛ́ ntɔ nɛ ye abɔa kamɛ ndɛ oti kĩ eku, ade ɛkɔa ye sɔmɔna awɛ ete nɛ yĩ akũ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Tavila! Yĩ nyɛ Ɔtɔnyade mɔ Owũnade,
66001018	mɔ oti a kĩ edzi nkpã! Nku tɔ̃ lɛmɛ finyaa ndzi nkpã daa. Wuda mɔ kanɔkpade tɛsafi deĩ nɛ yĩ awɛ.
66001019	Foesũ tsɛlɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɔmɔ́, fukĩ fudeĩ finyaa mɔ fukĩ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ ke liti a kayi.
66001020	Kalɛ kɔlawa kĩ kideĩ nɛ fusibii evũkɔnɔ a kĩ ɔmɔ́ nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna awɛ, mɔ sika ngbã ɔsɛdza titse evũkɔnɔ a kayɔ nyɛ. Fusibii evũkɔnɔ a nyɛ tɛsɔli evũkɔnɔ a ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ, ade ɔsɛdza titse evũkɔnɔ a lɛmɛ nyɛ́ tɛsɔli evũkɔnɔ a.”
66002001	“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kama Efeso asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a. i Ade oti a kĩ epini fusibii evũkɔnɔ nɛ ye sɔmɔna, kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ sika ngbã ɔsɛdza titse evũkɔnɔ kayite a ɔlɛdo nɛ awĩ a. i
66002002	Ĩnyina nɔ adzuma flee mɔ ayekĩ ɔbɔa mbɔdi odo ɔwɔlɛ ɔmɔ́ lubo. Ĩnyina kĩ aáwɛ bati kpa fɔlɛtsa kalɛ. Ɔsɔ bati a kĩ bavɛ be akũ kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛmɛ bɛnyɛ́ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ɔdã, ade ɔmɔ́ oyi ɔsũ kĩ bavãlɛvã banɛ a.
66002003	Ĩnyina ayekĩ ɔna ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɔmɔ́ lubo nɛ yĩ sũ, lɛmɛ akpɔ táveli nɔ. i
66002004	Lɛmɛ ndeĩ kalɛ kadi nɛ nɔ akũ. Ade ke nyɛ kĩ aáwɛ yĩ kalɛ finyaa ndɛ ayekĩ ɔnya lɔtɔ ɔwɛ yĩ kalɛ a.
66002005	Nɛ foesũ ni, te anɛ nɛ nɔ kadzakɔ̃ a kĩ ɔdza oto ɔtɔ a akũ! Dani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa kakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ ɔnya lɔtɔ ɔkɛna a. Ntɛ ɔtádani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, maaya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ ĩyaabɔɛ nɔ ɔsɛdza otse a nɛ ye kadzakɔ̃.
66002006	Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ odeĩ kĩ lawo yĩ anɛ nyɛ kĩ akesĩ Nikolatiafɔ fɔkɛlatsa ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo kakesĩ foe a. i
66002007	Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli a kabi, i Oti a kĩ ɛnya akũ ni, maakpa ye nkpã kutse a kĩ kɔdzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma kɔbã a kĩ bavɛ Paradiso a kamɛ babi badi ɛnya.”
66002008	“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kama Smirna Asɔli ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a. i Ade ɔlɛdo kĩ eto oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ Ɔtɔnyade mɔ Owũnade, oti a kĩ eku lɛmɛ ebuki edzi nkpã a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ a. i
66002009	Ĩnyina nɔ ɔhau flee. Ĩnyina kĩ ohiãni anɛ lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, osikani anɛ! Ĩnyina tuwuli kpa a kĩ bikĩ bavɛ be akũ Yudafɔ lɛmɛ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, alɛ nɛ nɔ akũ. Bɛnyɛ Abonsam katsu a kamɛ bati.
66002010	Tavila lubo lidi nyɛ lidi kĩ laaya nɛ nɔ akũ a kamɔ. Dã! Abonsam aafɔ̃ bipili mi kamɛ badi bido nɛ kɔla ɛsɔ mi ɛdã, ade míamɔ lubo fuwi ewua a. Di ɔnɔkɔali kakpa yĩ ntɛ fɔ́anya wuda malo, lɔkɔa maakpã nɔ nkpã ndɛ akũ kanya lɛgãbɔɛ aye. i
66002011	Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli bati a kabi! i Bati a kĩ baanya akũ ni, wuda ayade a lɛláatamɔ be.”
66002012	“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kama Pergamo Asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, i Ade oti a kĩ ɛnɛɛ atugbe mɔ ɔbɔ̃ a fɔlɛtsa nɛ awĩ a. i
66002013	Ĩnyina nɔ kadzikɔ̃ nɛ awã kĩ Abonsam lɛgãkpo a deĩ a. Opini yĩ dĩ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkɔ Antipa, yĩ ɔdansini mɔ ɔnɔkɔalini nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awã kĩ Abonsam dzi malo ni, ɔtámuniki nɛ yĩ liti, mbom ɔtɛ yĩ odo. i
66002014	Lɛmɛ ndeĩ nɔ akũ fɔlɛtsa sukuloo. Bati badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ bitomɔ Balam fɔtsa katsa. Ade Balam kĩĩ lɛtsa Balak tisi ɛkpã Israelfɔ edo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ, ade ɛfɔ̃ bɛnya funitsã kĩ bɛtɔ bɛkpa baviɔ̃, ade bɛbɔa adɔpaa a.
66002015	Ade ayea odeĩ bati badi nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ bitomɔ Nikolatiafɔ fɔtsa katsa liti a.
66002016	Finyaa, dani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ! Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, maaya nɛ nɔ akũ mɔatsɛ nkɔa lɛpamɛ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ yĩ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a nnɔ mɔ bati a. i
66002017	Oti kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli bati a kabi. Oti a kĩ ɛnya akũ ni, maakpa ye mana a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla a adi ɛnya. Bio maakpa ye de fitaa kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ dĩ vɔɛ̃ bite nɛ de akũ. Odima linyína dĩ a, mbɔɛntɛ owula a kĩ ɛtɛ de a odi.”
66002018	“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛna Tiatira Asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩ, i Ade fɔlɛtsa a kĩ futo Baguma Obi, kĩ ye anɛ atɛ̃ ndɛ fi luwotu aye, ade ye abɔa lɛmɛ amɔanɛ ndɛ kɔɔble kĩ bɛvɔlɛ tsɔlitsɔli a nɛ awĩ a. i
66002019	Ĩnyina nɔ adzuma a kĩ ɔkɛna. Ĩnyina nɔ ɔdɔ, nɔ katɛkado, nɔ ɔsum, mɔ ayekĩ odeĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ. Ĩnyina kĩ ɔlamɛna adzuma kakɛna finyaa kaba ayekĩ ɔkɛna nɛ kayɔkayi a. i
66002020	Lɛmɛ kalɛ a kĩ ndeĩ nɛ nɔ akũ a nyɛ kĩ ɔkpa otsole Isabel a kĩ yavɛ ye akũ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ osi, kĩ yatsa yĩ basumunɛ fɔtsa, ade yakɛ be kĩ bɛbɔa adɔpaa, bɛnya funitsã kĩ bɛtɔ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ a.
66002021	Nkpa ye lɔkɔ kĩ ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ yaáwɛ kĩ yafɔ̃ adɔpaa kabɔa.
66002022	Foesũ maafɔ̃ ɛkahɔ nɛ ɔkɛna akũ, awã kĩ bɛmɔ bikĩ babɔa adɔpaa a, ntɛ bɛtádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ finyaa ni, baamɔ lubo mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
66002023	Maakɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a flee lɔkɔa asafu a flee linyi kĩ yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ enyina oti ɔwɔlɛ mɔ ye lɔlɔ kamɛ yededeede. Maase mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a onukpɛ̃. i
66002024	Lɛmɛ mi Tiatira bati nkaɛ a kĩ mitátɛ Isabel fɔtsa katsa a, mɔ mi a kĩ mitákɔlɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bavɛ Abonsam kadikanyi dzununuunu a kɔ̃ ni, minu kĩ nláalɔla mi fɔlɔtsa bɛbã.
66002025	Lɛmɛ mipi lɛtsa a kĩ mideĩ a mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kɛnaawo kĩ maaya. i
66002026	-
66002027	Oti a kĩ epi yĩ adzuma a kĩ mawɛ edomɔ akũ kɛnawo kawũna, mɔ ɛnya akũ ni, maakpa ye otumi a kĩ ntɛ ntomɛna Nda sɛkɛ̃ a. Maakpa ye otumi nɛ fude fude akũ, ɛkɔa sɔbɔtsaɛ otse ɛkpã be, lɔkɔa ebubuli be ndɛ ayekĩ babubuli lubui a.
66002028	Ade maakpa ye odenyinawi lisibii a. i
66002029	Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli bati a kabi.”
66003001	“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛna Sardis Asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, i Oti a kĩ ɛnɛɛ Baguma Hũhũ evũkɔnɔ mɔ fusibii evũkɔnɔ a fɔlɛtsa nyɛ fukĩĩ, i Ĩnyina nɔ adzuma a kĩ ɔkɛna a. Ĩnyina kĩ ɔtɛ dĩ kĩ odzi nkpã, lɛmɛ oku.
66003002	Nɛ foesũ nyinya, kado lɛtsa a kĩ lite nɛ nɔ kamɛ a kĩ laaku a kɔbɛ̃. Kitonɛkĩ mmɔ́ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔkɛna a tákpɔla tɔ̃ nɛ yĩ Baguma anɛ.
66003003	Foesũ te anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɔ, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ onu a akũ, kakɛna nɛ foe akũ, kadani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ntɛ ɔtányinya ni, maayawo nɛ nɔ akũ ndɛ oyekpanɛ aye, ade ɔláanyi lɔkɔ a kĩ maawo nɛ nɔ akũ a malo a.
66003004	Lɛmɛ mi kamɛ badi sukuloo deĩ nɛ Sardis kĩ bɛtádo be tɛtadiɛ tuduli. Baado tɛtadiɛ ovoe bɔmɔ be bɔtsã, kitonɛkĩ bɛkpɔla bɛkpa foe.
66003005	Owula a kĩ ɛnya akũ ni, yaado ye tɛtadiɛ ovoe lɔmɔ, ade nláawɔla ye dĩ ĩnyɛ nɛ nkpã badzinɛ ovoli a kamɛ. Maanyɛ ye ntsa nɛ kanade nɛ Nda mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ anɛ kĩ yĩ ode yanɛ. i
66003006	Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli bati a kabi.”
66003007	“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kama Filadelfia Asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a. i Ade fɔlɛtsa a kĩ futo oti kpalɛwa mɔ ɔnɔkɔalini a kĩ ɛnɛɛ Lɛgã Dawid safi a nɛ awĩ a. Ntɛ ebinya kɔla ni, odima lɛláapuli ɛbalɛ koe, ade ntɛ ɛbalɛ koe lɛmɛ ni, odima lápuli kabinya koe. i
66003008	Ĩnyina nɔ adzuma a kĩ ɔkɛna a. Mbinya opunu ĩyi nɛ nɔ lɔtɔ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛbalɛ ye. Ĩnyina kĩ odeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kabii, lɛmɛ otomɔ yĩ fɔtsa katsa, ade ɔtámuniki nɛ yĩ liti a.
66003009	Dã! Bati katsu kadi deĩ kĩ kɛnyɛ Satana kade, bavãlɛvã a kĩ balɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ lɛmɛ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a. Maafɔ̃ bɛyaake aduli nɛ nɔ anɛ, lɔkɔa be flee binyi kĩ mawɛ nɔ kalɛ.
66003010	Nɛ ayekĩ odo ɔwɔlɛ ɔkɛna nɛ yĩ kalɛ akũ, ɔmɔ lubo sũ ni, yĩ malo maanyɛ nɔ ntomɛna sɔhuiɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ laaya nɛ katinya kamɛ flee, kĩ baasɔ bati flee bɛdã a. i
66003011	Maaya mɔatsɛ. Pi lɛtsa a kĩ lideĩ nɛ nɔ awɛ a mɔ kɔɔba, ayekĩ odima lɛláatɛ nɔ akũ kanya lɛgãbɔɛ a nɛ nɔ awɛ.
66003012	Maakɛna oti a kĩ ɛnya akũ a ndɛ luku ɛdza nɛ Baguma Asɔli kɔla a kamɛ. Yaadza nɛ awã daa kĩ ɛláabuki ɛnɛ́ nɛ awã da. Maatsɛlɛ yĩ Baguma dĩ, mɔ yĩ Baguma ɔmatɔ dĩ kĩ lɛnyɛ Yerusalem vɔɛ̃ a kĩ ɛka eto ode a nte nɛ ye akũ. Maatsɛlɛ yĩ mɔawɛ dĩ vɔɛ̃ lɛmɛ nte nɛ ye akũ. i
66003013	Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli bati a kabi.”
66003014	“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kakɔa kamɛna Laodikea Asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, i Ade oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ Fɔya lɔmɔ, kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali ɔdansini wĩ a, kĩ ye nyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa katokɔ̃ a fɔlɛtsa nɛ awĩ kĩ, i
66003015	Ĩnyina nɔ adzuma a kĩ ɔkɛna a. Ĩnyina kĩ ɔtádɔ, ĩye ɔlá ovio. Mawɛ kĩ adɔ, ĩye ɔna ovio kufɛ!
66003016	Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ adã blɔblɔ, kĩ ɔtádɔ ĩye ɔlá ovio lɛmɛ sũ ni, maatua nɔ ntomɛna yĩ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ nwula!
66003017	Alɛ kĩ, ‘Nna akũ, ndeĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade ntásĩ lɛtsama lɛmɛ a.’ Lɛmɛ onyína ayekĩ ɔkɛna pasapasa, mɔ ayekĩ nɔ akũ akɔ kɔnya. Ɔnyɛ ohiãni, odzi ɔdzɔ, ade ɔnyɛ ɔnɛkunɛ a.
66003018	Foesũ madɛ nɔ kĩ ya sika ngbã kĩ binyinyina nɛ fi kamɛ katomɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ aadani osikani. Ya lima ovoe lɛmɛ kasua akũ, ayekĩ bɛláamɔ nɔ kɔnyɔã ɔdzɔ a. Ya anɛ kugua kado nɛ banebi kamɛ, ayekĩ aamɔ fɔkɔ.
66003019	Bati a kĩ mawɛ kalɛ a ni, makã be anɛ, ade mavɛlɛ be sɔtɔ a. Foesũ mibɔa mbɔdi midani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
66003020	Mitse! Ndzɛ̃ nɛ onyukpɛ̃ mabɔa awɛ. Ntɛ odi nu yĩ odo mɔ ebinya kɔla a ni, maawo nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɔmɔ ye bɔnya, ade ye malo yaanya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ a.
66003021	Oti a kĩ ɛnya akũ ni, maafɔ̃ edzi nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃ nɛ yĩ lɛgãkpo akũ, ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo ĩnya akũ ndzi nɛ Nda ɔwɛ̃ nɛ ye lɛgãkpo akũ a aye. i
66003022	Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli a kabi!”
66004001	Fukĩĩ liti a, nna kanyɛkatsa bɛbã kadi ade mmɔ́ kĩ bibinya opunu odi biyi nɛ ode a. Odo a kĩ ĩnya lɔtɔ nnu ndɛ kagbulɛɛ aye a, kĩ ebi yĩ tuwuli tɔ̃ a lɛ kĩ, “De kaya nɛ ode nɛ awĩ, lɔkɔa ntsa nɔ fɔtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ fukĩĩ liti a.”
66004002	Deedimɔapɛ Hũhũ wo nɛ yĩ kamɛ. Nɛ ode naa, mmɔ́ kĩ bike lɛgãkpo lidi kĩ odi dzi nɛ de akũ.
66004003	Lukpo a akũ odzinɛ akũ ata muamua ndɛ ahuhɔɛ boe bawovoe mɔ bangbã kĩ bɛtɛ kɔya, ade odetɔ́ kamɛ sinigbɛnɛ kĩ se kalɛkadã la ndɛ tɔɔta gɔ̃ sinya lɛgãkpo a.
66004004	Fɔgãkpo tɛya-ana bɛbã keni fusinya lɛgãkpo a, ade banɔkɔɛ̃ tɛya-ana kĩ bido tɛtadiɛ ovoe, bɛtsa sika ngbã fɔgãbɔɛ dzi nɛ foe akũ a.
66004005	Ɔdetɔ́ kamɛ kamɔanɛ, ɔplala kakpɛnɛ, mɔ fɔwɔla kɔɔba kanɛ kato lɛgãkpo a kamɛ. Tibia evũkɔnɔ kĩ tatɛ̃ dzɛ̃ nɛ lɛgãkpo a anɛ kamɛ. Ade te nyɛ Baguma Hũhũ evũkɔnɔ a.
66004006	Litsedi kĩ ladã ndɛ mpo kĩ bɛkɔa ahuhɔɛ bɛkɛna deĩ nɛ awã nɛ lɛgãkpo a anɛ kamɛ. Ye kamɛ kpalɛ klɛĩklɛĩklɛĩ. Fɔtsa ɛna kĩ fudzi nkpã, kĩ fudeĩ banebi nɛ liti mɔ lɔtɔ tsua fusinya lɛgãkpo a nɛ fɔkɛ ɛna a akũ.
66004007	Fɔtsa a kĩ fudzi nkpã a fɔtɔnyade a la ndɛ dzata, fɔyade a la ndɛ ɔnantsuenyole, fɔlalɛde a deĩ anɛ ndɛ otidziwa, ade fɔnade a anɛ la ndɛ ɔkɔliɛ kĩ yayidza a.
66004008	Fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a fudi nyɛ fudi deĩ fupoki evũ, ade banebi tsɛna foe kamɛ mɔ foe akũ flee a. Baáfɔ̃ tɔnɔ kasã lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate Baguma Kpale, nɔ akũ kpalɛ! Nɔ akũ kpalɛ, nɔ akũ kpalɛ! Ɔna anɛ kɔkɔɛ, odeĩ finyaa, ade aabuki ɔya a.”
66004009	Fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a sã kamu, obu, mɔ kɔlɛkanyɛ tɔnɔ kakpa oti a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo akũ, kĩ edzi nkpã daa daa a. Ntɛ bɛsã te lɔmɔ a,
66004010	banɔkɔɛ̃ tɛya-ana a atsa anɛ nɛ tite nɛ oti a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo akũ a anɛ kamɛ, kasum ye a kĩ edzi nkpã daa a. Banyɛ be fɔgãbɔɛ kayi nɛ lɛgãkpo a lɔtɔ kalɛ kĩ,
66004011	“Boe Ɔlate mɔ boe Baguma! Nɔ kĩĩ kukũkpalɛ, obu mɔ otumi fɛta fɔkpa, kitonɛkĩ nɔ lɛbɔa fɔtsa flee. Ɔbɔa foe ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ a, ade fudzi nɛ nɔ kawɛ onukpɛ̃ a.”
66005001	Fukĩĩ liti a, mmɔ́ ovoli butawa odi nɛ oti a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo akũ a sɔmɔna awɛ. Bɛtsɛlɛ fɔtsa nɛ ye kamɛ mɔ liti ade bɛkɔa kɔma fɔtsa evũkɔnɔ bɛtalɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a.
66005002	Mmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ odi kĩ ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba nɛ ode, evia kĩ, “Owei lɛkpɔla kĩ yaapuli ɛwai kɔma a, ebinya ovoli butawa a?”
66005003	Lɛmɛ odima lɛláa nɛ ode, nɛ tite akũ, ĩye nɛ tite ɔda kĩ yaapuli ebinya ovoli a, ĩye ɛdã ye kamɛ.
66005004	Mbe paa, kitonɛkĩ bɛtámɔ odima kĩ ɛkpɔla kĩ yabinya ovoli a, ĩye ɛdã ye kamɛ.
66005005	Ade banɔkɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ɔmɔa bi yĩ kĩ, “Fɔ̃ kabe! Dã! Dzata a kĩ eto Yuda katete kamɛ a, kĩ ɛnyɛ Dawid kasinu kamɛ obi a nya akũ, kĩ ɛkpɔla kĩ yawai kɔma fɔtsa evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛtalɛ ovoli a onukpɛ̃, ebinya ye lɛmɛ.”
66005006	Kĩ ndã a, mmɔ́ Kavelibi kadi kĩ kɛdzɛ̃ nɛ lɛgãkpo a kayite nɛ fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a kamɛ, ade banɔkɔɛ̃ tɛya-ana a sinya ye a. Fɔdã ndɛ kakɔ bɛkɔ Kavelibi a. Kavelibi a deĩ tɛlɛ evũkɔnɔ mɔ banebi evũkɔnɔ kĩ fɔnyɛ Baguma hũhũ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ edo nɛ tite flee akũ a.
66005007	Kavelibi a naa kɛnatɛ ovoli a etomɛna oti a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo a akũ a sɔmɔna awɛ.
66005008	Kĩ yatɛ ovoli a, fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a, mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ tɛya-ana a tsa anɛ nɛ tite nɛ Kavelibi a anɛ kamɛ. Be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi nɛɛ ɔsankuo mɔ sika ngbã lɔɔda kĩ biyula mɔ titsonu mɔ ɔlɛ̃, kĩ fɔnyɛ bati a kĩ Baguma kpalɛ be akũ a mpaɛbɔ.
66005009	Bɛsã ɔnɔ vɔɛ̃ odi kĩ, “Nɔ kĩĩ lɛkpɔla kĩ atɛ ovoli a lɔkɔa ɔwai kɔma evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛtalɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a. Kitonɛkĩ nɔ bɛkɔ, ade ɔkɔa nɔ babɔanɛ, ɔya bati ɔkpa Baguma a. Bati kĩ bito fude nyɛ fude, tide nyɛ tide, ɔmaĩ nyɛ ɔmaĩ kamɛ, mɔ batidziwa ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ a kamɛ.
66005010	Ɔkɛna be lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ basɔfɔ kĩ bisum boe Baguma, ade baanya fɔgã nɛ tite akũ a.”
66005011	Ade kĩ mbuki ndã a, nnu ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ mpim mpim kĩ bɛláapuli bɛkã odo. Bɛdza bisinya lɛgãkpo a, mɔ fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a, mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ tɛya-ana a.
66005012	Ade bɛsã ɔnɔ kɔɔba kĩ, “Kavelibi a kĩ bɛkɔ a, lɛkpɔla kĩ katɛ otumi, mɔ akũ kana, mɔ nyansã, mɔ kɔbɛ̃, mɔ obu, mɔ kukũkpalɛ mɔ kamu!”
66005013	Adeke nnu kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa nɛ tite mɔ ode, mɔ tite ɔda, mɔ mpo kamɛ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ foe kamɛ a flee lamɛna ɔnɔ kasã kĩ, “Kamu, mɔ obu, mɔ kukũkpalɛ mɔ otumi fɔna daa fɔkpa, oti a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo akũ a mɔ Kavelibi a!”
66005014	Ade fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a tɛ futunɔ kĩ, “Fɔya lɔmɔ!” Ade banɔkɔɛ̃ a tsa anɛ nɛ tite bisum Baguma mɔ Kavelibi a.
66006001	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ kĩ Kavelibi a wai kɔma evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛtalɛ ovoli a foe fɔtɔnyade. Ade nnu kĩ fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a kamɛ fɔmɔa lɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ ɔplala lɛkpɛnɛ kĩ, “Ya!”
66006002	Ndã fɔkɔ ade mmɔ́ ɔpɔnkɔ ovoe odi a. Oti a kĩ edzi nɛ ye akũ a nɛɛ kɔta nɛ awɛ, ade bɛkpa ye lɛgãbɔɛ lidi a. Edzi ye ɛnɛ ndɛ kawũ akũ ɔnyanɛ aye kĩ yanaanya akũ.
66006003	Ke liti a, Kavelibi a wai kɔma kɔyade a, ade nnu kĩ fɔtsa a kĩ fudzi nkpã a fɔyade a lɛ kĩ, “Ya!”
66006004	Ɔpɔnkɔ bɛbã kĩ ɛyɔɔlɛ nɛ́. Bɛkpa oti a kĩ edzi nɛ ye akũ a kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ɛnyɛ lukudɔ nɛ tite akũ, lɔkɔa bati bɛkɔ be akũ akũ. Bɛkpa ye kɔpã kpale kudi.
66006005	Kavelibi a wai kɔma kɔlalɛde a, ade nnu kĩ fɔtsa a kĩ fudzi nkpã a fɔlalɛde a lɛ kĩ, “Ya!” Kĩ ndã fɔkɔ a, mmɔ́ ɔpɔnkɔ tũũtũ odi. Oti a kĩ edzi nɛ ye akũ a nɛɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ a kĩ bakɔa kakali fɔtsa a nɛ awɛ.
66006006	Nnu odo odi kĩ ɛnɛ́ eto fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a kayite ɛlɛ kĩ, “Kamɔnɛ lɔɔda mɔa lɛtɛ luwi mɔa kɔtɔkase, ade fugbanɔ tsensi futukũ ɛlalɛ fɔtɛ luwi mɔa kɔtɔkase, lɛmɛ mitabula kugua mɔ waĩ kade!”
66006007	Ke liti a, Kavelibi a wai kɔma fɔnade a, ade nnu kĩ fɔtsa a kĩ fudzi nkpã a fɔnade a lɛ kĩ, “Ya!”
66006008	Kĩ ndã fɔkɔ a, mmɔ́ ɔpɔnkɔ odi kĩ ye akũ la ndɛ batɔ aye. Oti a kĩ edzi nɛ ye akũ a dĩ nyɛ Wuda ade Kanɔkpade tomɔ ye nɛ liti a. Bɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ nɛ katinya kamɛ kasɛ̃ kanade a akũ, kĩ bɛkɔa kawũkanɔ, kɔlɛ, fɔsɔ kpa mɔ bayaɛ kpa bɛkɔ bati.
66006009	Kĩ Kavelibi a wai kɔma kulode a, mmɔ́ bati a kĩ bɛkɔ, nɛ ayekĩ bide lɛtsã nɛ Baguma kalɛ a akũ, mɔ ayekĩ bidi adansiɛ nɛ ke akũ sũ a tɛkla nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a kayɔ.
66006010	Bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Baguma Kpale, oti kpalɛwa mɔ ɔnɔkɔalini anɛ! Lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe koũ aadzɛmɔ tite akũ bati, lɔkɔa ɔvɛlɛ bikĩ bɛkɔ boe a sɔtɔ?”
66006011	Bɛkpa be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi atadiɛ ovoe wulaa ade bibi be kĩ bibuki bidzi bɛwɛya sukuloo kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ baakɔa be bakɔba basumunɛ mɔ be bawaɛ̃ a kĩ baakɔ ndɛ be aye a lidede bibumɔ be, ayekĩ kakã a onukpɛ̃ aakpɔla.
66006012	Mmɔ́ Kavelibi a kĩ ɛwai kɔma kuvũde a. Tite kuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ade suwa dani ndɛ lima ɔɔwɔ tsutsulitsui, odetɔ lɛmɛ dani gbãã ndɛ babɔanɛ aye a.
66006013	Fusibii ka fɔtɔ nɛ tite ndɛ ayekĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ awili kutse babi bũũ kawula a.
66006014	Odetɔ́ kamɛ yɛla ndɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kĩ bibuta aye, ade bɛbɔlɛ tɔtɔ mɔ tite kĩ mui sinya a tidi nyɛ tidi nɛ te kadzakɔ̃ a.
66006015	Tite akũ fɔgã, abãã banɔkɔɛ̃, sodzafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃, asikafɔ, otumifɔ, bati flee, basate mɔ bikĩ bidzi be akũ akũ a, bɛla nɛ tite tɛkɛ mɔ tɔtɔ akũ boe tɛkɛ kamɛ.
66006016	Ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla bibi tɔtɔ a kĩ, “Midzuli miko nɛ boe akũ, lɔkɔa mikɔla boe nɛ oti a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo akũ a anɛ, mɔ Kavelibi a kalɔkpa onukpɛ̃.
66006017	Kitonɛkĩ be kalɔkpa luwi mɔ libe a wo ɔtɔ. Owei aapuli ɛdza nɛ de onukpɛ̃?”
66007001	Fukĩĩ liti a, mmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ɛna kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ tite tukontoũ ɛna a akũ. Bisua tite akũ ɔwɛ fɔkɔ ɛna a osi, kĩ ɛtavũ nɛ tite akũ, ĩye mpo akũ, ĩye nɛ kutse kudima kamɛ.
66007002	Ade mmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã kĩ eto suwa kadekɔ̃ yaya, kĩ ɛnɛɛ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a ɔsũkayi fɔtsa a nɛ awɛ. Ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛvɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ɛna a kĩ Baguma kpa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɛna tite mɔ mpo awɔda a,
66007003	ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitakɛna tite, mpo ĩye futse lɛtsamanɔ kɛnaawo kĩ bɔ́akɔa ɔsũkayi fɔtsa buyi boe Baguma basumunɛ a ɔsũ nɛ be nnyɛ.”
66007004	Ade nnu kĩ bati a kĩ biyi be ɔsũ mɔ Baguma ɔsũkayi a kĩ bito Israelfɔ futete ewua-nviã kamɛ a lidede nyɛ bati mpim ɔha tɛna-ana (144,000).
66007005	Nɛ Yuda katete a kamɛ biyi bati mpim ewua-nviã ɔsũ. Ruben katete kamɛ bati mpim ewua-nviã. Gad katete kamɛ bati mpim ewua-nviã.
66007006	Aser katete kamɛ bati mpim ewua-nviã. Naftali katete kamɛ bati mpim ewua-nviã. Manase katete kamɛ bati mpim ewua-nviã.
66007007	Simeon katete kamɛ bati mpim ewua-nviã. Levi katete kamɛ bati mpim ewua-nviã. Isakar katete kamɛ bati mpim ewua-nviã.
66007008	Zebulon katete kamɛ bati mpim ewua-nviã. Yosef katete kamɛ biyi bati mpim ewua-nviã. Ade nɛ Benyamin lɛmɛ katete kamɛ biyi bati mpim ewua-nviã ɔsũ a.
66007009	Fukĩĩ liti a, mmɔ́ bati kɔdabu baũ kudi kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkã. Bito batidziwa ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ a, kade nyɛ kade, ɔmaĩ nyɛ ɔmaĩ, mɔ tide nyɛ tide flee kamɛ, ade bɛdza bɛtsɛlamɔ lɛgãkpo mɔ Kavelibi a. Be flee bido tɛtadiɛ ovoe wulaa, ade bɛnɛɛ tukuo nɛ awɛ a.
66007010	Bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Nkpã katɛ a to boe Baguma a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo a akũ, mɔ Kavelibi a sɛkɛ̃!”
66007011	Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a flee dza bisinya lɛgãkpo a, mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a, mɔ fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a, ade bɛka bɛtsa anɛ nɛ tite nɛ lɛgãkpo a anɛ bisum Baguma,
66007012	bɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔya lɔmɔ! Kamu, mɔ kukũkpalɛ, mɔ nyansã, mɔ kɔlɛkanyɛ, obu, kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi nyɛ boe Baguma fude daa daa! Fɔya lɔmɔ!”
66007013	Banɔkɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ɔmɔa odi via yĩ kĩ, “Bawei nyɛ bikĩ bido tɛtadiɛ ovoe wulaa kĩĩ a? Nɛ ndia bito?”
66007014	Nkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ Ɔlate, ĩnyína. Nɔ nyina.” Ade ebi yĩ kĩ, “Ade be nyɛ bati a kĩ bɛtsã lubo kamɔ kpale kamɛ bɛnɛ sɔũ a. Bɛvɔlɛ be tɛtadiɛ tivoe fitaa nɛ Kavelibi babɔanɛ a kamɛ.
66007015	Ade foesũ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkpo a anɛ basum ye lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee nɛ ye Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a. Oti a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo a akũ a, aafɔ̃ lɛtsama lɛláakɛna be nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ.
66007016	Kɔlɛ ĩye ɔmɔado lɛláabuki ɛkɔ be da. Suwa lɛláapila be ĩye ovio libuki ɛkɔ be da.
66007017	Kitonɛkĩ Kavelibi a kĩ kideĩ nɛ lɛgãkpo a kayite a nyɛ be ɔkpãnɛ. Yaakpã be ɛnamɛna awã kĩ nkpã mui anɛ kato a, ade Baguma aayɔ babe flee nɛ be anɛ a.”
66008001	Kĩ Kavelibi a wai kɔma kuvũkɔnɔde a, ode kɛna dĩĩ fɔ́ana ndɛ dɔũhuilɛ sɛkɛ.
66008002	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ evũkɔnɔ kĩ badza nɛ Baguma anɛ a, ade bɛkɔa kugbulɛɛ evũkɔnɔ bido be nɛ awɛ a.
66008003	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã kĩ ɛnɛɛ sika ngbã ɔnyɔ kate lubui a nɛ́ ɛyadza nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a ɔwɛ̃. Bɛkpa ye tutsonu mɔ ɔlɛ̃ beblebee kĩ ɛkɔa ebumɔ Baguma bati flee mpaɛbɔ, ɛkɔa ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ sika ngbã afɔliɛ atɛnyɛ a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ lɛgãkpo a anɛ a akũ.
66008004	Tutsonu a kĩ bite fi a ɔnyɔ, mɔ Baguma bati mpaɛbɔ a nɛ́ nɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ a awɛ fude fɔnaa Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
66008005	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a nyɛ fi nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a kamɛ eyula ɔnyɔ kate lubui a, ade ɛta foe eko nɛ tite akũ a. Ɔplala kpɛnɛ kɔɔba, odetɔ́ kamɛ mɔanɛ ade tite kuna a.
66008006	Ade ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛnɛɛ kugbulɛɛ a manɛ akũ kĩ baavɔ̃ be kugbulɛɛ a.
66008007	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔtɔnyade a vɔ̃ ye kagbulɛɛ a. Lɛtalɛta lɛdãglɛglɛ mɔ fi kĩ babɔanɛ tsɛka nɛ foe kamɛ ka fɔyako nɛ tite akũ. Tite kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde vio, tite akũ futse foe kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde vio mɔ tuwĩ gɔ̃ flee vio.
66008008	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔyade a lɛmɛ vɔ̃ ye kagbulɛɛ a. Bɛta litsedi kĩ ladã ndɛ ɔtɔ kpale kĩ ɛkatɛ̃ mɔ fi bido nɛ mpo kamɛ, ade mpo a kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde dani babɔanɛ a.
66008009	Fɔtsa a kĩ fudzi nkpã nɛ mpo kamɛ a foe kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde ku, ade tɔkɔlɔ a kĩ titeĩ nɛ mui anɛ a te kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde bu kade a.
66008010	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔlalɛde a vɔ̃ ye kagbulɛɛ a, ade lisibii kpale kĩ latɛ̃ ndɛ ɔbia aye to ode lɛyatɔ nɛ tɔwɔ kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde mɔ mui kanɛkɔ̃ kamɛ a.
66008011	Bavɛ lisibii kĩĩ kĩ tuwĩ mɔ ɔnyɛ, ade mui kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde a dani mɔ ɔnyɛ mɔ ɔnyɛ, ade bati beblebee ku a, kitonɛkĩ mui a dani otsonu kpa.
66008012	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔnade a lɛmɛ vɔ̃ ye kagbulɛɛ a. Deedimɔapɛ bɛbɔa suwa kasɛ̃ kamɛ kalalɛde, odetɔ kasɛ̃ kamɛ kalalɛde mɔ fusibii kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde a. Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ kade kanyina kasɛ̃ kamɛ kalalɛde mɔ lɛnyɛ kasɛ̃ kamɛ kalalɛde tána ɔhaĩ.
66008013	Ke liti a, ndã fɔkɔ ade nnu ɔkɔliɛ odi kĩ ɛlamɛna kayidza nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ flee ɛlɛ mɔ odo kɔɔba kĩ, “Bɔbɔɛ, bɔbɔɛ, bɔbɔɛ makpa bati a kĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ tite akũ ntɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ɛlalɛ a kĩ bite a yavɔ̃ be kugbulɛɛ a.”
66009001	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ olode a vɔ̃ ye kagbulɛɛ a. Mmɔ́ lisibii lidi kĩ lɛka lɛtɔ nɛ tite akũ, ade bɛkɔa lɛkɛ dzununuunu a safi bido nɛ ye awɛ a.
66009002	Lisibii a binya lɛkɛ dzununuunu a ade ɔnyɔ tugbluu ndɛ fi luwotu kpale kamɛ ɔnyɔ a nɛ́ eto de kamɛ a. Ɔnyɔ nɛ lɛkɛ dzununuunu a kamɛ fɔ̃ suwa anɛ mɔ odetɔ́ kamɛ ke ɔtũ.
66009003	Koolo nɛ́ eto ɔnyɔ a kamɛ ɛyako nɛ tite akũ, ade bɛkpa koolo kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kakpɔ̃na deĩ a odu.
66009004	Bibi be kĩ bɛtabula tuwĩ, futse ĩye tuwĩ blɔblɔ tidima kade, mbom bɛkɛna bati a kĩ Baguma ɔsũkayi lɛláa nɛ be nnyɛ a ablɔ.
66009005	Bɛtákpa koolo a osi kĩ bɛkɔ bati kĩĩ, mbom kĩ bɛkɛna be awɔda tidetɔ elo. Ntɛ bɛta oti a, fɔawo ndɛ ayekĩ kakpɔ̃na kata aye.
66009006	Nɛ tidetɔ elo a na kamɛ ni, bati aawɛ wuda, lɛmɛ bɛláana ye, baawɛ kĩ baku lɛmɛ wuda aalo be.
66009007	Koolo a la ndɛ bapɔnkɔ kĩ bɛmanɛ be bɛkpa kawũkanɔ. Litsedi teĩ nɛ be fɔlɔ ndɛ sika ngbã lɔbɔɛ aye, ade be anɛ la ndɛ otidziwa ade aye a.
66009008	Be tɔlɔ la ndɛ batsole tide, ade be adɔ̃ la ndɛ dzata ade a.
66009009	Bɛkɔa litsedi kĩ ladã ndɛ babĩĩ katɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ bɛtsa nɛ tɔwɔlɛ. Be fupoki kamɛ kakuna atunɔ ndɛ ayekĩ bapɔnkɔ mɔ kawũkanɔ tihilili beblebee wula atsɛ banaa kawũ a.
66009010	Bideĩ tɛkã mɔ fubĩĩ ndɛ kakpɔ̃na aye, ade be tɛkã kĩĩ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ baakɔa bɛkɛna bati awɔda a deĩ a.
66009011	Bideĩ lɛgã kĩ lanya be akũ. Ade ye nyɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ yadãmɛna lɛkɛ dzununuunu a akũ a. Ye dĩ nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ nyɛ Abadon, ade bavɛ de nɛ Hela tide kamɛ kĩ Apolion.
66009012	Lubokamɔ kpale lɛtɔnyade a yatɛ̃, lɛmɛ lubo kamɔ nviã buki fɔaya.
66009013	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ovũde a vɔ̃ ye kagbulɛɛ a, ade nnu odo odi kĩ ɛnɛ́ eto sika ngbã afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma anɛ a atɔ ɛna a kamɛ a.
66009014	Odo a bi Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ovũde a kĩ ɛnɛɛ kagbulɛɛ a kĩ, “Wũnya Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ɛna a kĩ bisuli bɛdzɛla nɛ Frat ɔwɔ kpale abuĩ a!”
66009015	Ade biwũnya Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ɛna a, kĩ bɛmanɛ biyi badzɔlɛ ɔdɔũ a, mɔ luwi a, mɔ odetɔ a, mɔ kateli a kĩ bɛkɔ batidziwa be kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde a.
66009016	Bibi yĩ kĩ bapɔnkɔ badzinɛ a lidede nyɛ mpim mpim ɔha nviã.
66009017	Ade ayekĩ mmɔ́ bapɔnkɔ mɔ be badzinɛ a nɛ kanyɛkatsa kamɛ a nɛ awĩ a. Bɛbla ɔwɔlɛ babĩĩ katɛ fɔbɔtsaɛ kĩ fɔadã gbãã ndɛ fi katɛ̃ aye, fubuki fɔadã ndɛ safir de aye, fɔyɔɔlɛ lɛmɛ ndɛ sulfa de aye. Bapɔnkɔ a fɔlɔ la ndɛ dzata fɔlɔ aye, ade fi, ɔnyɔ mɔ fukpokpo gɛĩgɛĩ nɛ́ futo be tunukpɛ̃ kamɛ a.
66009018	Bɛkɔa lubo kamɔ fɔtsa ɛlalɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ fi, ɔnyɔ, mɔ fukpokpo gɛĩgɛĩ kĩ futo bapɔnkɔ a tunukpɛ̃ a bɛkɔ batidziwa kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde.
66009019	Kitonɛkĩ bapɔnkɔ a kɔbɛ̃ deĩ nɛ be tunukpɛ̃ mɔ tɛkã kamɛ. Be tɛkã a la ndɛ bɔɛ aye, kĩ tideĩ fɔlɔ. Ade te bakɔa kakɛna bati ablɔ a.
66009020	Bati a kĩ bite bidzi nkpã a flee, kĩ bɛtákɔ be nɛ lubo kamɔ kĩĩ kamɛ a, támuniki nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ be mɔawɛ bɛkɔa awɛ bɛmɛ a kasum liti. Bɛtáfɔ̃ hũhũ kpa, baviɔ̃ kĩ bɛkɛna mɔ sika ngbã, sika ovoe, kɔɔble, de, ĩye otse, kĩ fɔámɔ, fɔánu ĩye fɔátsã a kasum!
66009021	Bɛtádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ nɛ bati kakɔ, kanɔkɔnɛ kadã, linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, mɔ kaye kamɛ.
66010001	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ bɛbã odi kĩ eto ode yaka. Edeĩ nɛ luflututu kamɛ, ade sinigbɛnɛ sinya ye lɔlɔ a. Ye anɛ ata ndɛ suwa aye, ade ye abɔa la ndɛ fi fɔmɛ fuku aye kĩ fɔade nɛ ode a.
66010002	Ɛnɛɛ kavolibi kadi kĩ bibinya a nɛ awɛ. Ɛkɔa ye sɔmɔna kɔbɔa eke nɛ mpo akũ ade ɛkɔa sɛba kɔbɔa lɛmɛ eke nɛ tite akũ a.
66010003	Ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ndɛ dzata amɛ kaklumɛ aye. Kĩ ɛbɔa fɔwɔla a, ɔplala evũkɔnɔ a nyɛ tunukpɛ̃.
66010004	Kĩ ɔplala evũkɔnɔ a nyɛ tunukpɛ̃ a, nwɛ kĩ matsɛlɛ fɔtsa ĩyi, lɛmɛ nnu odo odi kĩ eto ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Talɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔplala evũkɔnɔ a lɛ a onukpɛ̃, tatsɛlɛ foe oyi.”
66010005	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ mmɔ́ kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ mpo mɔ tite akũ a dzɛla ye sɔmɔna awɛ nɛ ode,
66010006	ɛlɔ fubo nɛ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã daa a, kĩ ɛkɛna tite mɔ te akũ fɔtsa, ode mɔ ye kamɛ fɔtsa, mpo mɔ ye kamɛ fɔtsa a dĩ akũ kĩ, “Liti kakpa lɛláabuki lɛna!
66010007	Lɛmɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ovũkɔnɔde a aavɔ̃ ye kagbulɛɛ ni, Baguma nhihiɛ kɔlawa a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛnyɛ ɛtsa ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ basumunɛ a.”
66010008	Ke liti a, odo a kĩ nnu ntomɛna ode a buki ebi yĩ kĩ, “Naatɛ kavolibi a kĩ bibinya a nɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ mui mɔ tite akũ a awɛ.”
66010009	Nnaa ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃ mbi ye kĩ ɛkɔa kavolibi a ɛkpa yĩ. Ebi yĩ kĩ, “Tɛ ke kaba ke. Fɔ́akɛna mɔ ɔnyɛ mɔ ɔnyɛ nɛ nɔ lupu kamɛ, lɛmɛ fɔ́ana ɔmɛnɛ nɛ nɔ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ ndɛ kɔsã aye.”
66010010	Ntɛ kavolibi a nɛ ye awɛ mba ke. Fɔna ɔmɛnɛ ndɛ kɔsã aye nɛ yĩ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ, lɛmɛ kĩ mmɛna foe a, fɔna ɔnyɛ nɛ yĩ lupu kamɛ.
66010011	Ke liti a, ebi yĩ kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ abuki ode lɛtsã Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ bati, tɛmaĩ, tide mɔ fɔgã pii akũ.”
66011001	Ke liti a, bɛkɔa otse kĩ ɛla ndɛ fɔtsa kakɔna otse bɛkpa yĩ, ade bibi yĩ kĩ, “Naakɔna yĩ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a mɔ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a, kakã bati a kĩ basum nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ lɛmɛ.
66011002	Lɛmɛ takɔna ablanda nɛ Asɔli Kɔla akũ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔa awã bɛkpa amamufɔ. Ade be aasumini Ɔmatɔ Kpalɛwa a nɛ tidetɔ tɛna-nviã kamɛ a.
66011003	Maado yĩ adansifɔ nviã kĩ bidzi nɛ tikpekpe tilima kamɛ, bɛyaade lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa akũ nɛ fuwi apim mɔa mɔ ɔha nviã mɔ aduesia kamɛ.”
66011004	Adansifɔ nviã kĩĩ nyɛ kugua futse nviã mɔ ɔsɛdza titse nviã a kĩ tɛdzɛ̃ nɛ tite Ɔlate a anɛ kamɛ a.
66011005	Ntɛ odi wɛ kĩ yakɛna foe ablɔ ni, fi anɛ kato foe tunukpɛ̃ kamɛ kawɔla be mɔ bakesĩnɛ a. Ntɛ odi wɛ kĩ yakɛna be ablɔ ni, baakɔ ye.
66011006	Bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ basua ode osi kĩ oni ɛtako nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bade lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa akũ a kamɛ. Bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ kĩ badani mui bɛkɛna babɔanɛ, ade bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bayamɛna lubo kamɔ lidi nyɛ lidi nɛ tite akũ nɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ bawɛ.
66011007	Ntɛ bide lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a akũ biyua a, ɔyaɛ kpa a kĩ eto lɛkɛ dzununuunu kamɛ ɛnɛ a, aanɔ kawũ mɔ be. Yaanya be akũ, ɛkɔ be.
66011008	Be banɔkpa aawa nɛ ɔmatɔ kpale a ɔblɔnu akũ nɛ awã kĩ bɛbɔa be Ɔlate nɛ asendua akũ a. Ɔmatɔ a dĩ kɔlawa nyɛ Sodom ĩye Egipte.
66011009	Bati aato ɔmaĩ nyɛ ɔmaĩ, kade nyɛ kade, tide nyɛ tide mɔ katinya kamɛ bati flee kamɛ bɛyaadã banɔkpa a nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ mɔ sɛkɛ kamɛ, ade bɛláakpa osi kĩ bibila be a.
66011010	Tite akũ bati flee aamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ bati nviã kĩĩ wuda akũ. Baanya luwi bɛmɛna akũ futelitsa kitonɛkĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ nviã kĩĩ vɛlɛ lubo kamɔ baũ bɛma batidziwa.
66011011	Fuwi ɛlalɛ mɔ sɛkɛ a liti a, nkpã kawɛya to Baguma sɛkɛ̃ kɛyawo nɛ be kamɛ, ade biyidza bɛdza a. Libe paa wo bati a kĩ bɛmɔ́ be a flee.
66011012	Adeke Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ nviã a nu odo mɔ ɔsĩ odi kĩ eto ode ebi be kĩ, “Mide miya nɛ awĩ!” Kĩ be bakesĩnɛ a dza bɛkadã a, bide bɛnaa ode nɛ luflututu kamɛ.
66011013	Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ a, tite kuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ɔmatɔ kpale a ye kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kawuade a bubuli bubloo, ade bati mpim evũkɔnɔ ku a. Libe wo bati nkaɛ a, ade bimu ode Baguma a.
66011014	Lubokamɔ mɔ libe lɛyade a yatɛ̃, lɛmɛ fɔlalɛde mɔ libe a aaya finyaa.
66011015	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ovũkɔnɔde a vɔ̃ ye kagbulɛɛ a, ade tido kɔɔba nɛ́ nɛ ode tɛlɛ kĩ, “Katinya kamɛ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a dani boe Ɔlate mɔ ye Kristo a fude, ade yaanya akũ daa daa a!”
66011016	Adeke banɔkɔɛ̃ tɛya-ana a kĩ bidzi nɛ be fɔgãkpo akũ nɛ Baguma anɛ kamɛ a, ka bɛtsa anɛ nɛ tite bisum Baguma,
66011017	bɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate otumifɔ, kĩ edeĩ, kĩ ɛna anɛ kɔkɔɛ. Bɔanyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ kĩ ɔtɛ nɔ otumi kpale a, oyi lɛgãkanya a kayɔ!
66011018	Amamufɔ na kalɔkpa, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ kĩ anyɛ nɔ kalɔkpa ɔtsa. Lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ adzɛmɔ banɔkpa. Lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ ase nɔ basumunɛ onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kɔtɔ, mɔ nɔ bati kpalɛwa a kĩ bakpa nɔ obu, mɔ bati a kĩ bavila nɔ dĩ a, banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ babisɛ̃. Lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ, kĩ awɔla bati a kĩ babula tite akũ kade a!”
66011019	Ke liti a, bibinya Baguma Asɔli Kɔla nɛ ode a biyi, ade bɛmɔ́ ye apam adakã a nɛ koe kamɛ a. Deedimɔapɛ, odetɔ́ kamɛ mɔanɛ, tido nɛ́, ɔplala kpɛnɛ, tite kuna ade oni ko mɔ fɔdãglɛglɛ baũbaũ a.
66012001	Ke liti a, nsɛntsɛlɛni kpale adi nɛ́ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ. Otsole odi kɔa suwa esua akũ ndɛ atadiɛ aye. Odetɔ deĩ nɛ ye abɔa kayɔ, ade ɛtsa lɛgãbɔɛ kĩ bɛkɔa fusibii ewua-nviã bɛkɛna de nɛ ye lɔlɔ a.
66012002	Ɛtsɛ̃mɔ kɔma. Ade kĩ sɛmɛ pi ye sũ a, ɛkatsimtsim akũ mɔ fɔwɔla kɔɔba nɛ foe kawo sũ.
66012003	Nsɛntsɛlɛni bɛbã nɛ́ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ. Dã, fɔnyɛ kɔɛ kpale ngbã, kĩ kudeĩ fɔlɔ evũkɔnɔ, mɔ tɛlɛ ewua, ade kɔtsa fɔgãbɔɛ evũkɔnɔ nɛ fɔlɔ a akũ a.
66012004	Kɔkɔa koe ɔkã kɔlɔ fusibii kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kalalɛde a kutomɛna odetɔ́ kamɛ kɔta kuwula nɛ tite akũ. Finyaa kɔɛ kpale a yidza kɔdza nɛ ɔmatsɔ̃ a kĩ sɛmɛ pi ye a anɛ kamɛ, kĩ ntɛ esila ɛma pɛ kɔ́abɔɛ obisɛ̃ a kɔmɛna.
66012005	Otsole a má obinyole kĩ yaakɔa sɔbɔtsaɛ otse ɛnya fude fude bati flee akũ. Lɛmɛ bɛbɔɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a lɛtalɛta bɛnamɛna Baguma mɔ ye lɛgãkpo a sɛkɛ̃.
66012006	Otsole a lo ɛnaa kɔsa kamɛ, awã kĩ Baguma manɛ eyi ɛkpa ye kĩ bɛdã ye akũ fuwi apim mɔa, ɔha nviã mɔ aduesia.
66012007	Ke liti a, kawũ nɛ́ nɛ ode. Mikael mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ nɔ kawũ mɔ kɔɛ kpale a, ade kɔɛ a mɔ koe fɔtɔ banyanɛ a nɔ bɛtsɛlamɔ be a.
66012008	Lɛmɛ bɛnya kɔɛ kpale a akũ, ade bɛtákpa koe mɔ koe basumunɛ a osi kĩ bibuki bidzi nɛ ode a.
66012009	Bɛta kɔɛ kpale a bimuni nɛ tite akũ. Ade koe nyɛ anɛ kɔkɔɛ kɔɛ a kĩ bavɛ kĩ Abonsam ĩye Satana, kĩ kɔkɛ katinya kamɛ bati flee a. Koe mɔ koe fɔtɔ banyanɛ a flee bɛta bimuni nɛ tite akũ.
66012010	Ke liti a, nnu odo kpaa odi nɛ ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Finyaakɔ̃ Baguma oti katɛ ya! Baguma nyɛ ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛtsa ndɛ Lɛgã aye! Finyaa ye Kristo a nyɛ ye otumi kanya! Kitonɛkĩ ɛta oti a kĩ ɛdza nɛ Baguma anɛ ɛkatsua boe bawaɛ̃ onukpɛ̃ kakpa Baguma lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa a emuni.
66012011	Ade be lɛtsã Kavelibi a babɔanɛ, mɔ ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bidi adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ a bɛnya ye akũ. Bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔa be nkpã bɛkpa faa ntɛ fɔ́anya wuda malo.
66012012	Nɛ foesũ ni, kawɔlɛ kide mi ode, mɔ mi a kĩ mideĩ nɛ awã a flee! Lɛmɛ tite mɔ mpo, bɔbɔɛ makpa mi, kitonɛkĩ Abonsam duma ɛya nɛ mi kamɛ mɔ kalɔkpa, ade enyina kĩ fuwi sukuloo lite ye.”
66012013	Kĩ kɔɛ kpale a mɔ́ kĩ biɛta koe bimuni nɛ tite akũ a, kutomɔ otsole a kĩ ɛma obinyole a liti.
66012014	Lɛmɛ bɛkpa otsole a ɔkɔliɛ kpale fupoki nviã a eyidza ɛnaa awã kĩ Baguma manɛ eyi ɛkpa ye nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a. Baadãmɛna ye akũ nɛ awã futeli ɛlalɛ mɔ sɛkɛ, lɔkɔa ɛwɛya nɛ kɔɛ kpale a awɛ kamɛ.
66012015	Ade kɔɛ kpale a vũma mui kĩ bitini ndɛ ɔwɔ kutomɛna koe onukpɛ̃, bitomɔ otsole a kĩ bɛbɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna.
66012016	Lɛmɛ tite bumɔ otsole a. Tite binya onukpɛ̃ tɛmɔa mui a kĩ kɔɛ kpale a vũma etomɛna otsole a flee.
66012017	Kɔɛ kpale a na kalɔkpa mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ otsole a akũ, ade kɔdzakũ kĩ kɔnaanɔ kawũ mɔ ye babi mɔ bawa nkaɛ a. Ade be nyɛ bati a kĩ bakɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ, kĩ bipini ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu nyɛ ɛtsa lɛmɛ a.
66012018	Ade kɔɛ kpale a nɛ́ kɔnadza nɛ mpo abuĩ a.
66013001	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ ɔyaɛ kpa odi kĩ ɛnɛ yato mpo kamɛ. Edeĩ fɔlɔ evũkɔnɔ mɔ tɛlɛ ewua, ade lɛgãbɔɛ tsanɛ nɛ ɔlɛ odi nyɛ odi akũ a. Bɛtsɛlɛ mbusuo dĩ kĩ lasupa Baguma bite nɛ lɔlɔ lidi nyɛ lidi akũ.
66013002	Ɔyaɛ kpa a la ndɛ dzakpa aye. Ye abɔa la ndɛ kalikii abɔa, ade ye onukpɛ̃ lɛmɛ la ndɛ dzata onukpɛ̃ a. Kɔɛ kpale a kɔa ye mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃, ye lɛgãkpo mɔ ye lɛgãkanya otumi kpale a ɛkpa ɔyaɛ kpa kĩĩ.
66013003	Fɔdã ndɛ ɔyaɛ kpa a lɔlɔ mɔa tɛ wuda kaakpa nɛ de akũ, lɛmɛ kaakpa a ku. Fɔkɛna katinya kamɛ bati flee wãwã, ade bitomɔ ye a.
66013004	Bati flee sum kɔɛ kpale a, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛkpa ɔyaɛ kpa a. Bisum ɔyaɛ kpa a lɛmɛ bɛlɛ kĩ, “Owei la ndɛ ɔyaɛ kpa kĩĩ? Owei aapuli ɛnɔ kawũ mɔ ye?”
66013005	Bɛkpa ɔyaɛ kpa a osi kĩ ɛlɛ kukũpia mɔ fubusuotsa pii ɛnya akũ tidetɔ tɛna-nviã.
66013006	Eyi kayɔ mɔ Baguma, mɔ ye dĩ, mɔ awã kĩ edzi, mɔ bati flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ ode a kadumu.
66013007	Bɛkpa ye osi kĩ ɛnɔ kawũ mɔ Baguma bade a ɛnya be akũ, ade bɛkpa ye otumi lɛmɛ nɛ fude nyɛ fude, ɔmaĩ nyɛ ɔmaĩ, tide nyɛ tide mɔ tite bati flee akũ a.
66013008	Tite akũ bati flee aasum ye, mbɔɛntɛ bikĩ be buĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Kavelibi a kĩ bɛkɔ a nkpã ovoli kamɛ, kito anɛ kĩ bɛbɔa katinya a.
66013009	Foesũ oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse!
66013010	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ bihihiɛ biyi kĩ bipi ye ndom ni, baapi ye ndom, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ bihihiɛ biyi kĩ yaatɔ nɛ kɔpã onukpɛ̃ ni, yaatɔ nɛ kɔpã onukpɛ̃ kokooko. Ade fukĩĩ kamɛ mɔ kɛnɛ kĩ Baguma bade a bɛna ɔwɔlɛ kado mɔ katɛkado a.
66013011	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ ɔyaɛ kpa bɛbã kĩ ɛnɛ́ eto tite kamɛ. Edeĩ tɛlɛ nviã ndɛ kavelibi aye, ade yalɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ kɔɛ kpale a.
66013012	Ɛkɛna kɔbɛ̃ kpale a kĩ ɛtɛ etomɛna ɔyaɛ kpa ɔtɔnyade a sɛkɛ̃ a akũ adzuma nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ. Ɛhɛ tite mɔ te akũ bati flee kĩ bisum ɔyaɛ kpa ɔtɔnyade a kĩ ye kaakpa ku a.
66013013	Ɔyaɛ kpa ɔyade kĩĩ kɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii. Ɛfɔ̃ fi malo nɛ futo ode fɔyatɔ nɛ tite akũ nɛ bati anɛ.
66013014	Ɛkɛ tite akũ bati flee mɔ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkpa ye osi kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ ɔyaɛ kpa ɔtɔnyade a anɛ sũ. Ɔyaɛ kpa a bi be kĩ bɛmɛ ɔyaɛ kpa a kĩ bipila mɔ kɔpã a lɛmɛ ebuki edzi nkpã a kutidu bɛdzɛla.
66013015	Bɛkpa ɔyaɛ kpa ɔyade a osi kĩ ɛwɛya nkpã edo nɛ ɔyaɛ kpa ɔtɔnyade kutidu a kĩ bɛmɛ a kamɛ, ayekĩ yaapuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla, ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ bati a kĩ baasĩ kĩ bɛláasum ye a.
66013016	Ɔyaɛ kpa kĩĩ hɛ bati flee, babisɛ̃ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃, asikafɔ mɔ ahiãfɔ, basate mɔ akũ akũ badzinɛ, kĩ bite sɔkpɔ̃na nɛ be sɔmɔna kɔkpɔ ĩye nɛ be nnyɛ.
66013017	Odima lɛláapuli ɛya fɔtsa ĩye ɛnɔ lɛtsama ntɛ sɔkpɔ̃na kĩĩ liteĩ nɛ ye akũ. Sɔkpɔ̃na kĩĩ nyɛ ɔyaɛ kpa a dĩ, ĩye kakã katsɛlɛ kĩ fɔdzɛ̃ fɔkpa dĩ a.
66013018	Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ kakɔna sĩ nyansã. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ enyina kadi aapuli ebu ɔyaɛ a dĩ kakã katsɛlɛ a akũ akunta, enu foe kayɔ, kitonɛkĩ kakã katsɛlɛ a dza fɔkpa oti dĩ. Ye kakã katsɛlɛ a nyɛ ɔha evũ mɔ taavũ-evũ (666).
66014001	Ke liti a, ndã fɔkɔ ade mmɔ́ Kavelibi a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ Zion ɔtɔ a akũ a. Bati mpim ɔha tɛna-ana (144,000) kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ Kavelibi a dĩ mɔ Ɔlɛga a dĩ bite nɛ be nnyɛ a dzɛ̃ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awã.
66014002	Ade nnu odo odi kĩ ɛnɛ́ eto ode kĩ ɛla ndɛ ayekĩ mui ato ɔtɔ akũ kaka kako, ĩye ndɛ ayekĩ ɔplala kakpɛnɛ aye. Odo a buki ɛla ndɛ tɔnɔ kĩ babɔa nɛ tɛsankuo akũ.
66014003	Bati mpim ɔha tɛna-ana a dza bɛkasã ɔnɔ vɔɛ̃ nɛ lɛgãkpo a, mɔ fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a, mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a anɛ. Otidziwa odima lɛláapuli ɛkɔlɛ ɔnɔ a na, mbɔɛntɛ bati mpim ɔha tɛna-ana a kĩ be odi lɔlɔ kɔtɔ bise nɛ tite akũ a.
66014004	Ade be nyɛ bati a kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ, kĩ binyína batsole, bɛnyɛ badedzaa. Ade be atomɔ Kavelibi a kanaa kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ yanaa a. Ade be lɛmɛ nyɛ bati a kĩ bise be lɔlɔ kɔtɔ nɛ batidziwa kasinu a kamɛ, bɛkɛna be bati batɔnyade lɛmɛ bɛkpa Baguma mɔ Kavelibi a.
66014005	Bɛtámɔ tɔ̃ kĩ bɛma fɔvã, ade nfumusu adima lɛmɛ lɛláa be akũ a.
66014006	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã kĩ yayidza nɛ tite mɔ ode kayite. Ɛnɛɛ Kalɛ wĩ a kĩ kɛlá kawũna a, kĩ yaade lɛtsã nɛ ke akũ ɛkpa tite akũ bati, batidziwa ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ, fude nyɛ fude, tide nyɛ tide mɔ ɔmaĩ nyɛ ɔmaĩ.
66014007	Ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mivila Baguma, mikpa ye obu, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ yadzɛmɔ batidziwa. Misum ye a kĩ ɛkbɔa tite mɔ ode, mpo mɔ mui kĩ banɛ nɛ tite kamɛ a!”
66014008	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔyade tomɔ ɔtɔnyade a ɛkalɛ kĩ, “Ɛtɔ o-o! Babilonia a kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ a tɔ tsoo! Ɛfɔ̃ fude fude flee mɔa ye waĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a kĩ fɔnyɛ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ a!”
66014009	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔlalɛde a tomɔ be nviã a ɛkabɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Ntɛ odi sum ɔyaɛ kpa mɔ ye kutidu a kĩ bɛmɛ a, mɔ ɛtɛ ye sɔkpɔ̃na nɛ ye nnyɛ ĩye kɔkpɔ ni,
66014010	yaamɔa Baguma kawũnaba waĩ a kĩ ɛkɔa eko nɛ ye kalɔkpa kɔɔpu kamɛ a. Bati flee a kĩ bɛkɛna fukĩĩ odu a, Baguma aamɔna be lubo nɛ fi mɔ fukpokpo gɛĩgɛĩ kamɛ nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ kpalɛwa a mɔ Kavelibi a anɛ kamɛ.
66014011	Be lubo kamɔ fi ɔnyɔ a aakade nɛ ode daa daa. Bati a kĩ basum ɔyaɛ kpa a mɔ ye kutidu a kĩ bɛmɛ a, mɔ bikĩ ye dĩ sɔkpɔ̃na a teĩ nɛ be akũ a, lɛláana kawɛya lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa da.”
66014012	Ade awĩ mɔ Baguma bade a kĩ bakɛna nɛ ye mbla a akũ, bɛtɛ Yesu bido lɛmɛ a, sĩ ɔwɔlɛ kado a.
66014013	Ke liti a, nnu odo odi kĩ eto ode ɛkalɛ kĩ, “Tsɛlɛ kayi kĩ, Kito finyaa kanaa ni, Baguma hila bati a kĩ biku nɛ Kristo katɛkado kamɛ a!” Hũhũ a tɛ etunɔ kĩ, “Nuwĩ, Baguma hila be! Baawɛya bitomɛna be lubo kamɔ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ be tudzuma kakɛna tomɔ be!”
66014014	Ke liti a, ndã fɔkɔ ade mmɔ́ luflututu fitaa lidi, kĩ litsedi ndɛ otidziwa aye dzi nɛ de akũ. Ɛtsa sika ngbã lɔbɔɛ, ɛnɛɛ lɛsɛga mɔ ɔbɔ̃ nɛ awɛ.
66014015	Ade Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã nɛ́ eto Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ebi oti a kĩ edzi nɛ luflututu akũ a kĩ, “Kɔa nɔ lɛsɛga a kanɛna fudutsa, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ, tite akũ fudutsa bo fɔkpa kakpɔta!”
66014016	Ade ke oti a kĩ edzi nɛ luflututu akũ a wũnya ye lɛsɛga nɛ tite akũ ɛkpɔta fudutsa a flee a.
66014017	Ke liti a, mmɔ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã odi kĩ ɛnɛ́ eto ode Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Ye malo ɛnɛɛ lɛsɛga mɔ ɔbɔ̃ lidi.
66014018	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã odi kĩ edeĩ otumi nɛ fi akũ a nɛ́ eto afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a kamɛ a. Ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ebi ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ ɛnɛɛ lɛsɛga mɔ ɔbɔ̃ a kĩ, “Kɔa nɔ lɛsɛga a kakpalɛ waĩ babi a nɛ tite akũ kɔbã a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ waĩ babi a yɔɔlɛ!”
66014019	Foesũ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a wũnya ye lɛsɛga a nɛ tite akũ ade ɛna waĩ babi a nɛ tɔwɛ̃ akũ a. Ɛta be eko nɛ waĩ kakã lɛkɛ kpale, kĩ lɛnyɛ Baguma kalɔkpa a kamɛ.
66014020	Binuna waĩ babi a mɔ fɔnɛta nɛ ɔmatɔ a ɔbaɛ̃, ade babɔanɛ tini bito waĩ kakã lɛkɛ a kamɛ a, bɛtɛ̃ ndɛ ɔwɔ a. Babɔanɛ a kadzũ kamɛ aana ndɛ fɔnɛta elo ĩye ɔpɔnkɔ akũ kadzɛla, ade bitini bɛnaa ndɛ fusikũ ɔha nviã a.
66015001	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ awãwã fɔtsa kpale bɛbã kĩ fɔanyɛnɛ akũ paa nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ. Ade foe nyɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ evũkɔnɔ kĩ bɛnɛɛ lubokamɔ evũkɔnɔ a. Lubokamɔ kĩĩ nyɛ nkaɛ flee a kĩ foe aanyɛ Baguma kalɔkpa nkaɛ a fɔtsa.
66015002	Ade mmɔ́ litsedi ndɛ mpo kĩ ladã ndɛ ahuhɔɛ kĩ fi tsɛka mɔ ye. Mmɔ́ bati a kĩ bɛnya ɔyaɛ kpa, mɔ ye kutidu a kĩ bɛmɛ́, mɔ ye kakã katsɛlɛ dĩ akũ a, kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ahuhɔɛ mpo a abuĩ, bɛnɛɛ tɛsankuo kĩ Baguma kpa be.
66015003	Bɛkasã Baguma ɔsumunɛ Mose mɔ Kavelibi a ɔnɔ kĩ, “O boe Ɔlate Baguma Kpale, nɔ tudzuma pɔnɛ, ade takɛna wãwã a! Nɔ fude fude flee Lɛgã, Nɔ tisi adã kpĩĩ, ade tɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a!
66015004	O boe Ɔlate, owei koũ lɛláavila nɔ? Owei aasĩ kĩ ɛláado nɔ dĩ obu? Kitonɛkĩ nɔ odi nyɛ oti kpalɛwa, fude fude flee a aayasum nɔ, kitonɛkĩ bɛnyɛ nɔ fɔtsa kakɛna kpĩĩ a bɛtsa bati flee.”
66015005	Ke liti a, ndã fɔkɔ ade mmɔ́ kĩ bibinya Asɔli Kɔla nɛ ode a kĩ Lɛpɛ Kpalɛwa a deĩ nɛ koe kamɛ a biyi.
66015006	Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛnɛɛ lubo kamɔ evũkɔnɔ a nɛ́ bito Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Bido aklala fitaa kĩ yata muamua tɛtadiɛ, ade bɛkɔa sika ngbã abɔsɔ bɛbɔa nɛ tɔwɔlɛ a.
66015007	Ade fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a kamɛ fɔmɔa kɔa sika ngbã tɔkɔɔpu evũkɔnɔ kĩ tiyi tsɔnɔnɔɔnɔ mɔ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã daa a kalɔkpa, ɛkpa ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ evũkɔnɔ a.
66015008	Ade ɔnyɔ a kĩ eto Baguma kukũkpalɛ mɔ ye kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ a yi Asɔli Kɔla a flee kamɛ a. Odima tápuli ewo nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ kɛnawo kĩ lubo kamɔ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ evũkɔnɔ a yamɛna a onukpɛ̃ tsua.
66016001	Ade nnu odo kɔɔba odi kĩ ɛnɛ́ eto Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ɛkabi ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ, “Minaatsokui Baguma kalɔkpa nɛ tɔkɔɔpu kamɛ a miko nɛ tite akũ!”
66016002	Adeke Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔtɔnyade a natsokui ye kɔɔpu kamɛ fɔtsa a eko nɛ tite akũ a. Bati a kĩ bite be ɔyaɛ kpa sɔkpɔ̃na a, mɔ be a kĩ bisum ye kutidu mɛwa a nɛ́ fɔɔkpa kĩ fɔawo, kĩ fɔakũ lɛmɛ nɛ akũ.
66016003	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔyade a naa ɛnatsokui ye kɔɔpu kamɛ fɔtsa a eko nɛ mpo kamɛ a. Mui a dani ndɛ ɔnɔkpa babɔanɛ aye, ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lidzi nkpã nɛ mpo kamɛ a ku a.
66016004	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔlalɛde a lɛmɛ tsokui ye kɔɔpu kamɛ fɔtsa a eko nɛ tɔwɔ mɔ mui kanɛkɔ̃ kamɛ, ade mui a dani babɔanɛ a.
66016005	Nnu kĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ yadãmɛna mui akũ a lɛ kĩ, “O Oti Kpalɛwa, nɔ kĩ odeĩ daa, kĩ ɔna anɛ kɔkɔɛ a, akɔ ɔtɔ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ!
66016006	Bati kĩĩ ko Baguma bade a mɔ ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ babɔanɛ nɛ tite, nɛ foesũ ɔkpa be babɔanɛ kĩ bɛmɔa. Nuwĩ, sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ kĩĩ fɛta be!”
66016007	Ade nnu odo odi kĩ ɛnɛ́ eto afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a kamɛ kĩ, “O boe Ɔlate Baguma, nɔ otumifɔ adi ɔnɔkɔali, ade akɔ kɔtɔ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ a.”
66016008	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔnade a tsokui ye kɔɔpu kamɛ fɔtsa a eko nɛ suwa akũ, ade bɛkpa se osi kĩ sipila bati mɔ se fi a.
66016009	Fi a otutuo mɔ ɔsĩ a pila bati ade bɛlɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Baguma a kĩ ye deĩ otumi nɛ lubo kamɔ kĩĩ akũ a, lɛmɛ bisĩ kĩ baádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ bimu ye.
66016010	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ olode a tsokui ye kɔɔpu kamɛ fɔtsa a eko nɛ ɔyaɛ kpa a lɛgãkpo akũ. Adeke ɔtũ ke nɛ ɔyaɛ kpa a lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a, ade bati dɔ̃ fɔmɛ nɛ ayekĩ fɔawo be a sũ.
66016011	Nɛ foesũ bɛlɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Baguma kĩ edeĩ nɛ ode a akũ. Titɔ kĩ fɔɔkpa a kĩ bɛnɛ́ a awo be malo ni, bisĩ kĩ baádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ nɛ bɛ fɔtsa kpa kakɛna kamɛ.
66016012	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ovũde a tsokui ye kɔɔpu kamɛ fɔtsa a eko nɛ Frat ɔwɔ kpale a kamɛ a. Ɔwɔ a viɔ̃ ade ɛnyɛ osi ɛkpa fɔgã a kĩ futo suwa kadekɔ̃ a.
66016013	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ hũhũ fĩĩ ɛlalɛ kĩ bɛla ndɛ fɔpɔtrɔlɔ, bɛnɛ bito kɔɛ kpale a onukpɛ̃, mɔ ɔyaɛ kpa a onukpɛ̃ mɔ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a onukpɛ̃ kamɛ.
66016014	Be nyɛ hũhũ kpa a hũhũ kĩ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa a. Hũhũ ɛlalɛ kĩĩ anɛ kanaa katinya kamɛ fɔgã flee sɛkɛ̃, kakpɔta be kakpa kawũkanɔ nɛ Baguma Otumifɔ Flee Luwi kpale a akũ.
66016015	“Mitse! Maya ndɛ oyekpanɛ aye! Baguma hila oti a kĩ esi lipe yadãmɛna ye tɛtadiɛ akũ, ayekĩ ɛláatsã ɔdzɔ, kɔnyɔã liwo ye nɛ kanade!”
66016016	Ade hũhũ kpa a kpɔta fɔgã a nɛ awã kĩ bavɛ nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ Armagedon a.
66016017	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ovũkɔnɔde a natsokui ye kɔɔpu kamɛ fɔtsa a eko nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ. Ade odo kɔɔba odi nɛ́ eto lɛgãkpo a nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ kĩ, “Fuwoli!”
66016018	Ade odetɔ́ kamɛ kamɔanɛ, tido mɔ ɔsĩ kanɛ, ɔplala kakpɛnɛ kɔɔba, ade tite lɛmɛ kuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a. Kito anɛ kĩ otidziwa nɛ katinya ni, tite tákuna mɔ libe lɔmɔ tɔ̃. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ tite kakuna kĩ kiwo libe kɛba flee a!
66016019	Ɔmatɔ kpale a bɛ̃ nɛ fɔkɛ ɛlalɛ kamɛ, ade fude flee tɛmatɔ tɛkpale tɛkpale bubuli a. Baguma te anɛ nɛ Babilonia kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ a akũ, ade ɛfɔ̃ ɛmɔa ye kalɔkpa waĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a nɛ ye kɔɔpu a kamɛ a.
66016020	Tite a kĩ mui sinya te a flee yɛla, ade tɔtɔ flee lɛmɛ buki tɛláa kĩ bamɔ a.
66016021	Fɔdãglɛglɛ baũ baũ kĩ lidi nyɛ lidi ɔlɔmɛ aana ndɛ kilo taalo to ode fɔyawula nɛ bati akũ. Ade bɛlɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Baguma akũ nɛ foe kawo a sũ a.
66017001	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛlɛ tɔkɔɔpu evũkɔnɔ a kamɛ ɔmɔa ya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ebi yĩ kĩ, “Ya, ntsa nɔ ayekĩ bɛvɛlɛ adɔpaani a kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ, kĩ edzi nɛ tɔwɔ pii akũ a sɔtɔ.
66017002	Tite akũ fɔgã bɔa adɔpaa mɔ ye, ade ye adɔpaa kabɔa waĩ a wugɛla tite akũ bati a.”
66017003	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kpã yĩ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ɛnamɛna kɔsa kamɛ. Nɛ awã mmɔ́ otsole odi kĩ edzi nɛ ɔyaɛ kpa ngbã odi akũ. Bɛtsɛlɛ mbusuo buĩ kĩ basupa Baguma bite nɛ ɔyaɛ a akũ flee, ade edeĩ fɔlɔ evũkɔnɔ mɔ tɛlɛ ewua a.
66017004	Otsole a do atadiɛ ngbã mɔ fɔwɔwa ntsɛkantsɛka, ade ɛhɛhɛ akũ mɔ sika ngbã fɔtsa, boe mɔ kɔya, mɔ fulitsa mɔ kɔya a. Ɛnɛɛ sika ngbã kɔɔpu kĩ eyi mɔ efĩĩ mɔ kɔwɛ̃ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛna etomɛna ye adɔpaa kabɔa kamɛ a nɛ awɛ.
66017005	Bɛtsɛlɛ dĩ kĩ de kayɔkanyɛ bɛla bite nɛ ye nnyɛ kĩ, Babilonia kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ, Adɔpaafɔ mɔ tite akũ fubusuotsa flee ɔma.
66017006	Otsole a kĩ mmɔ́ a wuga Baguma bade a, mɔ bikĩ bidi adansiɛ nɛ Yesu katɛkado akũ sũ a babɔanɛ. Kĩ mmɔ́ ye a, fɔkɛna yĩ wãwã paa.
66017007	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a via yĩ kĩ, “Nde sũ fɔkɛna nɔ wãwã? Maabi nɔ kalɛ nɛ otsole a, mɔ ɔyaɛ a kĩ edeĩ fɔlɔ evũkɔnɔ mɔ tɛlɛ ewua, kĩ ye akũ edzi a fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa.
66017008	Ɔyaɛ kpa a kĩ ɔmɔ́ a dzi nkpã tɔ̃ lɛmɛ finyaa eku. Yaanɛ eto lɛkɛ dzununuunu a kamɛ ɛyaatɛ̃ ɛnaa bɛwɔla ye. Fɔ́akɛna bati a kĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ tite akũ, kĩ bɛtátsɛlɛ be buĩ bido nɛ nkpã ovoli a kamɛ, kito anɛ kĩ bɛbɔa katinya a wãwã ntɛ bɛmɔ́ ɔyaɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ oti kĩ edzi nkpã tɔ̃, finyaa ɛláa, lɛmɛ yaabuki ɛya.
66017009	“Fukĩĩ sĩ fɔkpa nyansã mɔ fɔtsa kayɔkanu mɔ nyansã. Fɔlɔ evũkɔnɔ a nyɛ kɔtɔbii evũkɔnɔ, awã kĩ otsole a adzi a.
66017010	Fubuki fɔnyɛ fɔgã evũkɔnɔ, kĩ foe elo tɔ kɔkɔɛ, lɔmɔa anya akũ finyaa, ade de nkaɛ a táya tɔ̃. Ntɛ lɛya ni, kɛnɛ kĩ lɛnya akũ lɔkɔ lukũ odi.
66017011	Ɔyaɛ kpa a kĩ edzi tɔ̃, lɛmɛ ebuki ɛláa a nyɛ lɛgã lɛlɛ̃de, kĩ lɛnyɛ fɔgã evũkɔnɔ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ laanaa bɛwɔla de.
66017012	“Tɛlɛ ewua a kĩ ɔmɔ́ a nyɛ fɔgã ewua kĩ bɛtádo tɔ̃ fɔgã kanya awɛ, lɛmɛ bɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ kĩ baanya fɔgã dɔũhuilɛ mɔa mɔ ɔyaɛ kpa a.
66017013	Fɔgã ewua kĩĩ flee deĩ botaɛ mɔapɛ, ade baakɔa be kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi bɛkpa ɔyaɛ kpa a.
66017014	Baanɔ kawũ mɔ Kavelibi a, lɛmɛ Kavelibi a aanya be akũ, kitonɛkĩ ye nyɛ balate flee Ɔlate, fɔgã flee Lɛgã. Bɛmɔ ye bade a kĩ ɛvɛ, ɛpau, mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ a, aanya akũ mɔ ye.”
66017015	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a buki ebi yĩ kĩ, “Mui a kĩ ɔmɔ́ kĩ ɔdɔpaani a dzi nɛ be akũ a nyɛ ɔmaĩ nyɛ ɔmaĩ, fude nyɛ fude, batidziwa flee mɔ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ.
66017016	Tɛlɛ ewua a kĩ ɔmɔ́ a mɔ ɔyaɛ kpa a aakesĩ ɔdɔpaani a. Baatɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ ye awɛ bɛfɔ̃ edzi ɔdzɔ. Baaba ye sɛkɛna bido ye fi evio.
66017017	Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛkɔa foe edo nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ nhiɛhiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi a akũ, fɔfɔ̃ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa bɛkɔa be kɔbɛ̃ bɛkpa ɔyaɛ kpa a ɛnya akũ, kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a ya nɛ foe kamɛ.
66017018	“Otsole a kĩ ɔmɔ́ a nyɛ ɔmatɔ kpale a kĩ yanya tite akũ fɔgã akũ a.”
66018001	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã kĩ eduma eto ode yaka. Edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ paa, ade ye akũ ɔhaĩ kpalɛ tite flee akũ a.
66018002	Ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɛtɔ o-o! Babilonia ɔmatɔ a kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ a tɔ tsoo! Ɛdani hũhũ kpa mɔ hũhũ kĩ efĩĩ deĩ nɛ ye akũ, mɔ efĩĩ kɔvɔlabi, mɔ kɔvɔlabi kĩ bakesĩ a kadzikɔ̃.
66018003	Kitonɛkĩ fude flee mɔa ye adɔpaa akũ kalɔkpa bavɛ a. Tite akũ fɔgã bɔa adɔpaa mɔ ye, ade katinya kamɛ fɔyaatɔ banyanɛ tsã ye anɛngbã kana kamɛ bɛdani asikafɔ a.”
66018004	Ade nnu odo bɛbã kĩ eto ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yĩ bati, minɛ́ nɛ ye kamɛ! Kɛtánɛ kĩ miakɛna tɔkpa a na odu, ade kɛtánɛ kĩ miana ye sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a na odu a.
66018005	Kitonɛkĩ bɛtɛɛtɛɛ ye tɔkpa tide tɛnatamɔ ode, ade Baguma te anɛ nɛ ye tɔkpa akũ a.
66018006	Mikɛna ye ndɛ ayekĩ ye malo ɛkɛna mi a. Mise ye foe titi nviã nɛ fukĩ ɛkɛna a onukpɛ̃. Miyula bavɛ mɔ ɔsĩ tɛkɔɔpu nviã mikpa ye, nɛ amɔa a kĩ ɛkpa mi a onukpɛ̃!
66018007	Mimɔna ye lubo, ebe kɔnya ayekĩ kɛfɛta fuketimɔ ayekĩ edzi nɛ akũ kahɛhɛ mɔ nkpã kanya kamɛ a. Kitonɛkĩ yabi ye akũ daa kĩ, ‘Ndzi nɛ awĩ ndɛ lɛgãtsole aye! Nnɛ́ okunawa manɛ, ade nláabe ayɔlɔhɔ da a!’
66018008	Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, nɛ luwi mɔapɛ kamɛ, lubo kamɔ kĩ fɔnyɛ, wuda, fɔsɔ, kɔnya kabe mɔ kɔlɛ aaya nɛ ye akũ. Baapila ye mɔ fi evio gbunugbunugbunu, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate Baguma a kĩ ɛkɔ ye kɔɔtɔ a nyɛ ɔbɛlɛbɛ.
66018009	“Ntɛ tite akũ fɔgã a kĩ bɛbɔa adɔpaa mɔ ɔmatɔ a, bɛnya nkpã mɔ ye a, mɔ́ fi a kĩ fɔapila ye ɔnyɔ a yade ni, baabɔa fɔwɔla bibe ye.
66018010	Baadza mɔ lugo nɛ ye lubo kamɔ kavila a sũ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Ao! Ao! Nɔ, ɔmatɔ kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ! Nɔ, Babilonia kĩ odeĩ kɔbɛ̃! Dɔũhuilɛ mɔapɛ kamɛ bɛkɔ nɔ kɔtɔ!’
66018011	“Tite akũ fɔyaatɔ banyanɛ a lɛmɛ aabe biwo ɔblɔ mɔ ye, kitonɛkĩ odima buki yaáya be fɔtsa.
66018012	Kɔyaatɔ fɔtsa a nyɛ sika ngbã, sika ovoe, boe mɔ kɔya, fulitsa mɔ kɔya, aklala, tilima ngbã, tilima ɔɔwa, tilima plɔplɔ, titse kĩ tabɔa mɔ ɔlɛ̃, kunu adɔ̃ fɔtsa, mɔ titse mɔ kɔya, kɔɔble mɔ sɔbɔtsaɛ ɔɔwa fɔtsa, mɔ kɔla kake boe kĩ bɛtɛ kɔya.
66018013	Fɔbɛbã nyɛ futse fɔkpã mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ bavɛ sinamɔn mɔ kutu ɔlɛ̃ kado fɔtsa, lifii mɔ klubɔũ, bavɛ mɔ kugua kĩ bakɔa katɔ, onuvoe kpɛtɛɛ mɔ fɔwã, kugua kĩ batsɛla, banantsue mɔ baveli, bapɔnkɔ mɔ tihilili, basate mɔ batidziwa kĩ baya kɔkɔ malo.
66018014	“Fɔyaatɔ banyanɛ a aalɛ kĩ, ‘Futse babi a kĩ fɔakɔ nɔ odo a aalo fɔfɔnɛ nɔ. Nɔ akũ kana fɔtsa flee mɔ nɔ akũ kahɛhɛ a yɛla nɛ nɔ akũ, ɔláabuki ɔmɔ́ foe da!’
66018015	Fɔyaatɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛnya kɔyaatɔ fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ kamɛ mɔ ɔmatɔ a bɛdani asikafɔ a, aadza mɔ lugo, nɛ lubo kamɔ kavila sũ. Bibe, biwo ɔblɔ,
66018016	bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Ao! Ao! Ɔmatɔ kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ! Ɔmatɔ kĩ bɛhɛhɛ ye mɔ aklala fitaa, tilima ngbã, tilima ɔɔwa, sika ngbã fɔtsa, boe kĩ bɛtɛ kɔya mɔ fulitsa mɔ kɔya!
66018017	Dɔũhuilɛ mɔapɛ kamɛ ye akũ kana fɔtsa a flee bu kade pasaa.’ “Ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ flee, mɔ ɔwɔ akũ basitsãnɛ, ɔkɔlɔ batanɛ a mɔ bati bɛbã a kĩ batsã mpo akũ kanya kɔyaatɔ a dza mɔ lugo,
66018018	bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛmɔ́ ɔmatɔ a kĩ ɛlamɛna kavio a ɔnyɔ a kĩ, ‘Ɔmatɔ kpale kĩĩ odu nɛ́ katinya tɔ̃?’
66018019	Bifila kudu biko nɛ be fɔlɔ kamɛ ade bibe mɔ kɔnya bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Bɔbɔɛ bɔbɔɛ bɔakpa ɔmatɔ kpale kĩĩ! Ɔmatɔ kpale kĩ ye kamɛ futima balate na akũ bitomɛna ye akũ kana fɔtsa kamɛ bɛdani asikafɔ. Kitonɛkĩ nɛ dɔũhuilɛ mɔapɛ kamɛ bɛkɛna ye bubloo!
66018020	O ode, mɔ mi Baguma bade a, mɔ mi fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a, mimɔ kawɔlɛ! Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔ ye kɔtɔ ɛkpa mi nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna mi a sũ!’ ”
66018021	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ odi bɔɛ de kĩ lɔpɔnɛ lububu ndɛ kɔwɔlɛ ade ɛta edo nɛ mpo kamɛ, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade aye baabɔɛ Babilonia ɔmatɔ kpale a bibo mɔ fɔkɔ, ade bɛláabuki bɛmɔ́ ye da a.
66018022	Bɛláabuki binu tɔwɛ̃ tɛsankuo, tifluti mɔ kugbulɛɛ tido nɛ nɔ kamɛ da. Bɛláabuki bɛmɔ́ awɛ adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ odima lɛmɛ nɛ nɔ kamɛ da, ade ayea lɛmɛ bɛláabuki binu fɔtsa kawɔlɛ nɛ kɔwɔlɛ akũ nkã da nɛ nɔ kamɛ a!
66018023	Bɛláabuki bɛmɔ́ ɔsɛdza katɛ̃ nɛ nɔ kamɛ da, ade bɛláabuki binu olitsɔ̃ mɔ obolitsɔ̃ nyɔ tido nɛ nɔ kamɛ da a. Nɔ kɔyaatɔ banyanɛ a nyɛ katinya kamɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ banɔkɔɛ̃, ade ɔkɔa nɔ kanɔkɔnɛ kadã ɔkɛ katinya kamɛ bati flee a.
66018024	Bɛvɛlɛ Babilonia sɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ ye kamɛ bɛmɔ́ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ mɔ Baguma bade a babɔanɛ. Nnɛ́ be odi bade bɛmɔ́, mbom mɔ bati a kĩ bɛkɔ nɛ tite akũ a babɔanɛ bɛ́mɔ nɛ ye kamɛ.”
66019001	Fukĩĩ liti a, nnu litsedi ndɛ bati kɔdabu baũ odo nɛ ode, ɛkalɛ kĩ, “Mimu Baguma! Nkpã katɛ, kukũkpalɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ nyɛ boe Baguma fude!
66019002	Yadzɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ, ade yakɔ kɔtɔ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ a. Ɛkɔ ɔdɔpaani kpale a kĩ ɛkɔa ye adɔpaa ebula katinya kamɛ kade a kɔtɔ. Baguma vɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔ́ ye basumunɛ a.”
66019003	Bibuki bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Mimu Baguma! Ɔnyɔ a kĩ yanɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a ade nɛ ode daa.”
66019004	Banɔkɔɛ̃ tɛya-ana, mɔ fɔtsa ɛna a kĩ fudzi nkpã a ka bɛtsa nɛ tite bisum oti a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo akũ, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔya lɔmɔ! Mimu Baguma!”
66019005	Ade odo odi nɛ́ eto lɛgãkpo a kamɛ kĩ, “Mimu boe Baguma, mi flee a kĩ mi ye basumunɛ mɔ ye bati flee, banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ babisɛ̃ a kĩ miavila ye a.”
66019006	Ke liti a, nnu odo odi ndɛ bati kɔdabu baũ fɔwɔla kabɔa ĩye ndɛ ato ɔtɔ akũ mui kaka kako nɛ lutubu kamɛ, ĩye ɔplala kakpɛnɛ mɔ ɔsĩ aye. Odo a lɛ kĩ, “Mimu Baguma! Kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate Baguma Kpale anya Lɛgã!
66019007	Mifɔ̃ bɔmɔ kawɔlɛ, butu osee budo ye obu. Kitonɛkĩ Kavelibi a obolitsɔ̃ kapi luwi a wo ɔtɔ, ade ye obolitsɔ̃ a manɛ akũ ɛkpa foe a.
66019008	Bɛkɔa aklala fitaa, kĩ yata muamua lima bɛkpa ye kĩ edzi.” Aklala fitaa kpalɛwa a nyɛ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ Baguma bade a kɛna.
66019009	Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi yĩ kĩ, “Tsɛlɛ kayi kĩ bihila bati a kĩ bɛvɛ kĩ bɛya nɛ Kavelibi a obolitsɔ̃ kanyakɔ̃.” Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa pɛpɛɛpɛ nyɛ fukĩĩ.”
66019010	Ade ntɔ nɛ ye abɔa kamɛ kĩ masum ye a, lɛmɛ ebi yĩ kĩ, “Takɛna foe! Bɔmɔ nɔ mɔ awaɛ̃ amɛ a kĩ bidi adansiɛ nɛ Kristo akũ a kamɛ ɔmɔa manɛ. Ke aduli kakpa Baguma odi!” Kitonɛkĩ adansiɛ a kĩ Kristo di a ado Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔbɛ̃.
66019011	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ kĩ ode binya ɛwaa, ade mmɔ́ ɔpɔnkɔ ovoe odi kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ a. Oti a kĩ edzi nɛ ɔpɔnkɔ a akũ a dĩ nyɛ Oti Kpĩĩ mɔ Ɔnɔkɔalini. Yadzɛ fɔlɛtsa kanɔ kawũ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ.
66019012	Ye banebi la ndɛ fi sɛmɛ aye, ade fɔgãbɔɛ beblebee tsanɛ nɛ ye lɔlɔ a. Bɛtsɛlɛ dĩ lidi bite nɛ ye akũ, kĩ odima linyína de kayɔ, mbɔɛntɛ ye odi.
66019013	Edo atadiɛ kĩ bisi bido nɛ babɔanɛ kamɛ. Ye dĩ nyɛ Baguma Kalɛ a.
66019014	Ode sodzafɔ kɔdabu kɔdabu do aklala ovoe fitaa tɛtadiɛ, bidzi nɛ bapɔnkɔ ovoe akũ bitomɔ ye.
66019015	Lɛpamɛ mɔ ɔbɔ̃ nɛ́ lito ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ, kĩ yaakɔa ɛwɔla fude akũ. Yaakɔa sɔbɔtsaɛ otse ɛnya be akũ, ade yaasumini Baguma Kpale kalɔkpa mɔ ɔsĩ a ɛnyɛ ye waĩ kanunakɔ̃ a.
66019016	Dĩ a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ ye atadiɛ wulaa mɔ lutolo akũ a nyɛ Fɔgã Flee Lɛgã mɔ Balate Flee Ɔlate.
66019017	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ suwa akũ. Ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ebi kɔvɔlabi a kĩ kɔayidza nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ a kĩ, “Miyaatsɛna minya Baguma olobe funitsã kpale a.
66019018	Miyaatsuli fɔgã, sodzafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃, sodzafɔ, bapɔnkɔ mɔ bapɔnkɔ badzinɛ sɛkɛna, akũ akũ badzinɛ, banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ babisɛ̃ flee sɛkɛna!”
66019019	Adeke mmɔ́ kĩ ɔyaɛ kpa a, mɔ tite akũ fɔgã a kpɔta be sodzafɔ kɔdabu a kĩ banɔ kawũ mɔ oti a kĩ edzi nɛ ɔpɔnkɔ akũ a mɔ ye sodzafɔ flee a.
66019020	Bipi ɔyaɛ kpa a, mɔ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa nɛ ye anɛ a. Ade awãwã fɔtsa kĩĩ ɛkɔa ɛkɛ bati a kĩ bɛtɛ ɔyaɛ kpa a sɔkpɔ̃na mɔ bikĩ bisum ye kutidu kamɛ a. Bɛta ɔyaɛ kpa a mɔ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a ɔgɔ̃ bido nɛ fi lutubu kĩ latɛ̃ gɛĩgɛĩ a kamɛ.
66019021	Bɛkɔa oti a kĩ edzi nɛ ɔpɔnkɔ akũ a lɛpamɛ a kĩ lɛnɛ lito ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a bɛkɔ bati nkaɛ, ade kɔvɔlabi flee yatsuli be sɛkɛna ayekĩ kɔ́apuli a.
66020001	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi kĩ eto ode yaka, kĩ ɛnɛɛ lɛkɛ dzununuunu a safi mɔ nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ kpale adi nɛ awɛ.
66020002	Epi kɔɛ kpale a, kĩ kɔna kɔkɔɔkɔɛ a, kĩ bavɛ Abonsam ĩye Satana a, esuli koe eyi ɛkpa futeli apim mɔa.
66020003	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kɔa ye edo nɛ lɛkɛ dzununuunu a kamɛ ɛbalɛ de onukpɛ̃, ɛtalɛ de lɛmɛ ayekĩ ɛláapuli ebuki ɛkɛ fude fude bati kɛnaawo kĩ futeli apim mɔa a yatɛ̃. Lɛmɛ nɛ foe liti a, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ sukuloo.
66020004	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ fɔgãkpo fudi, ade bati a kĩ bidzi nɛ foe akũ a, bɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛdzɛ fɔlɛtsa. Mbuki mmɔ́ bati a kĩ bikpeli be fɔlɔ, nɛ ayekĩ bidi adansiɛ nɛ Yesu ɔnɔkɔali, mɔ Baguma kalɛ a akũ sũ a tɛkla. Ade be lɛtásum ɔyaɛ kpa ĩye ye kutidu a kĩ bɛmɛ a, ĩye bɛtɛ ye sɔkpɔ̃na nɛ be nnyɛ ĩye nɛ awɛ a. Biyidza bibuki bidzi nkpã bɛnya lɛgã mɔ Kristo futeli apim mɔa.
66020005	Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ banɔkpa kayidza kadzi nkpã atɔnyade a. Banɔkpa nkaɛ a kɔ̃ táyidza bidzi nkpã kɛnawo kĩ futeli apim mɔa a aatɛ̃.
66020006	Baguma hila bati a kĩ bɛna tsɛfã nɛ banɔkpa kayidza katɔnyade kĩĩ kamɛ a, kĩ ɛkpalɛ be akũ lɛmɛ a. Wuda ayade a lɛlá kɔbɛ̃ nɛ be akũ, baanya Baguma mɔ Kristo basɔfɔ, ade baanya fɔgã mɔ ye futeli apim mɔa a.
66020007	Ntɛ futeli apim mɔa wũna a, baanyɛ Satana nɛ kɔla,
66020008	ade yanaa ɛnaakɛ fude fude kĩ fudeĩ nɛ katinya tukontoũ ɛna a kamɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ Gog mɔ Magog, ɛkpɔta be ɛkpa kawũkanɔ. Be lidede aana ndɛ mpo abuĩ dã.
66020009	Bɛtsã tite dzɛlɛwa a akũ bɛnadza bisinya Baguma bade a kadzikɔ̃ mɔ ye ɔmatɔ kpale a kĩ yawɛ kalɛ a. Lɛmɛ fi to ode fɔyawɔla be flee.
66020010	Ade bɛta Abonsam a kĩ ɛkɛ be a bido nɛ fi lutubu mɔ fukpokpo gɛĩgɛĩ a kamɛ, nɛ awã kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛta ɔyaɛ kpa mɔ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a bido a. Baamɔna be lubo lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa daa daa.
66020011	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ lɛgãkpo kpale ovoe lidi mɔ oti a kĩ edzi nɛ de akũ a. Tite mɔ ode lo nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ, ade bɛtána kakɔma bɛkpa te a.
66020012	Ade mmɔ́ banɔkpa, banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ babisɛ̃ kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ lɛgãkpo a anɛ a. Bibinya tuvoli biyi, ade bibinya ovoli bɛbã odi lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ nkpã ovoli a. Bɛdzɛmɔ banɔkpa nɛ be fɔkɛlatsa onukpɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi nɛ tuvoli a kamɛ a.
66020013	Mpo nyɛ banɔkpa a kĩ bideĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a ɛkpa, ade wuda mɔ kanɔkpade lɛmɛ nyɛ banɔkpa a kĩ bɛnɛɛ a bɛkpa a. Ade bɛdzɛmɔ be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye fɔkɛlatsa onukpɛ̃ a.
66020014	Ke liti a, bɛta wuda mɔ kanɔkpade biwula nɛ fi lutubu baũ a kamɛ. Fi lutubu baũ kĩĩ nyɛ wuda ayade a.
66020015	Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ bɛtámɔ ye dĩ nɛ nkpã ovoli a kamɛ ni, bɛta ye bido nɛ fi lutubu baũ a kamɛ.
66021001	Ke liti a, mmɔ́ tite vɔɛ̃ mɔ ode vɔɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ tite tɛtɔnyade a mɔ ode ɔtɔnyade a yɛtɛ̃, ade mpo lɛmɛ buki ɛláa a.
66021002	Ade mmɔ́ Ɔmatɔ Kpalɛwa, Yerusalem vɔɛ̃ a, kĩ eto ode nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ yaka. Bɛhɛhɛ ye ndɛ obolitsɔ̃ kĩ bɛmanɛ bɛkpa ɔnyɔ aye.
66021003	Ade nnu odo kɔɔba kĩ ɛnɛ eto lɛgãkpo a kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Finyaa kɔ̃ Baguma kadzikɔ̃ deĩ nɛ batidziwa kayite! Yaadzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, ade baanya ye bati a. Baguma mɔawɛ aadzi nɛ be kamɛ, ade yaanya be Baguma a.
66021004	Yaayɔ ɛnyɛ babe nɛ be anɛ kamɛ. Wuda lɛláabuki ɛna. Ade ayea ayɔlɔhɔ, kabe mɔ kalɔɛ lɛláabuki fɔna a, kitonɛkĩ kɔkɔɛ fɔtsa a yatɛ̃.”
66021005	Ade oti a kĩ edzi nɛ lɛgãkpo akũ a lɛ kĩ, “Dã, finyaa nkɛna fɔtsa flee fɔvɔɛ̃!” Ebi yĩ lɛmɛ kĩ, “Tsɛlɛ fukĩĩ kayi, kitonɛkĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ baapuli bɛtɛ foe bido.”
66021006	Ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Biyua, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa! Yĩ nyɛ ɔtɔnyade mɔ owũnade, kayɔkayi a mɔ kawũna a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɔmɔado akɔ ye ni, maakpa ye osi ɛmɔa mui etomɛna nkpã lɔwɔkɛ kamɛ faa.
66021007	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnya akũ ni, yaana fukĩĩ etomɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃. Maanya ye Baguma ade ye malo yaanya yĩ obi a.
66021008	Lɛmɛ babelibe, bati abɔa banyɛnɛ, kɔwɛ̃ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ, awudifɔ, adɔpaafɔ, kanɔkɔnɛ badãnɛ, baviɔ̃ basumunɛ mɔ bavãlɛvã flee a, aana be tsɛfã nɛ fi lutubu baũ a kĩ latɛ̃ mɔ fukpokpo gɛĩgɛĩ a kamɛ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ́ wuda ayade a.”
66021009	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛnɛɛ tɔkɔɔpu evũkɔnɔ a kĩ tiyi mɔ lubo kamɔ evũkɔnɔ nkaɛ a, kamɛ ɔmɔa ya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, ade ebi yĩ kĩ, “Ya, ntsa nɔ Obolitsɔ̃ a kĩ ɛnyɛ Kavelibi a ɔtsɔ̃ a.”
66021010	Hũhũ a wo nɛ yĩ kamɛ, ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bɔɛ yĩ ɛnamɛna ɔtɔ geĩ odi kalete a. Ɛtsa yĩ Yerusalem, Ɔmatɔ Kpalɛwa a, kĩ ɛka eto ode nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ yaya a,
66021011	ade ɛkata mɔ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a. Ɔmatɔ a kata la ndɛ de kĩ lideĩ kɔya, fɔla lɛmɛ ndɛ yaspa de kĩ de kamɛ kpalɛ ndɛ ahuhɔɛ aye.
66021012	Bike seebi kpale gɛlɛlɛɛlɛ bisinya ye ade bɛnyɛ tunyukpɛ̃ ewua-nviã kĩ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã dzi nɛ te tunyukpɛ̃ a. Bɛtsɛlɛ Israel futete ewua-nviã a buĩ bite nɛ tunyukpɛ̃ a akũ.
66021013	Tunyukpɛ̃ ɛlalɛ deĩ nɛ sɛkɛ sidi nyɛ sidi akũ, te ɛlalɛ deĩ nɛ suwa kadekɔ̃, te ɛlalɛ deĩ nɛ kayɔ, te ɛlalɛ deĩ nɛ nyangɛ, ade te ɛlalɛ deĩ nɛ suwa katomukɔ̃ a.
66021014	Bike ɔmatɔ a seebi a nɛ kayɔkayi futekũ boe ewua-nviã akũ, ade Kavelibi a fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a buĩ teĩ nɛ be akũ a.
66021015	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ bɔmɔ ye bɔlɛ kɔdzɛla a nɛɛ sika fɔtsa kakɔna otse, kĩ yaakɔa ɛkɔna ɔmatɔ a, ye tunyukpɛ̃ mɔ seebi a.
66021016	Ɔmatɔ a deĩ fɔkɛ ɛna, kĩ ye lɛsa mɔ ye lugo kamɛ keti. Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kɔna ɔmatɔ a mɔ ye fɔtsa kakɔna otse a. Ɛmɔ́ kĩ sɛkɛ mɔa tɛ fusikũ apim mɔa mɔ ɔha elo (1,500). Ɔmatɔ a lɛsa, ye lugo mɔ ye akũ kadzɛla flee keti.
66021017	Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kɔna seebi a lɛmɛ, ade se akũ kadzɛla nyɛ fɔnɛta ɔha nviã mɔ ye ewua-avũ (216) nɛ ye fɔtsa kakɔna otse a onukpɛ̃ a.
66021018	Bɛkɔa boe kĩ bavɛ Yaspa bɛkɔa bike seebi a, ade bɛkɔa sika ngbã kĩ se kamɛ kpalɛ ndɛ ahuhɔɛ aye bitsua ɔmatɔ mɔawɛ a.
66021019	Bɛkɔa boe ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kĩ bideĩ kɔya bɛhɛhɛ ɔmatɔ a seebi kayɔkayi futekũ boe a. Litekũ lɛtɔnyade a nyɛ ahuhɔɛ de kĩ bavɛ yaspa, lɛyade nyɛ safir, lɛlalɛde nyɛ yalkedon, lɛnade nyɛ smaragdo,
66021020	lilode nyɛ sardonik, livũde nyɛ sardis, livũkɔnɔde nyɛ krisolit, lɛlɛ̃de nyɛ beril, livedide nyɛ topas, liwuade nyɛ krisopras, liwua-odide nyɛ hiakint, ade liwua-nviãde a nyɛ ametist a.
66021021	Tunyukpɛ̃ ewua-nviã a fulitsa bowa ewua-nviã. Litsabi bowa mɔapɛ bɛkɔa bɛkɛna onyukpɛ̃ odi nyɛ odi. Ɔmatɔ a ɔblɔnu nyɛ sika ngbã, kĩ se kamɛ kpalɛ ndɛ ahuhɔɛ aye.
66021022	Ntámɔ asɔli kɔla nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate Baguma Kpalɛ mɔ Kavelibi a nyɛ ye asɔli kɔla.
66021023	Ɔmatɔ a tásĩ suwa kĩ sɛta ĩye odetɔ kĩ ɛvɔlɛ nɛ ye kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kukũkpalɛ nyɛ́ ye ɔhaĩ ade Kavelibi a lɛmɛ nyɛ́ ye ɔsɛdza a.
66021024	Katinya kamɛ bati aatsã ye haĩ kamɛ, ade tite akũ fɔgã aakɔa be akũ kana fɔtsa bɛyamɛna nɛ ye kamɛ a.
66021025	Bɛláabalɛ ɔmatɔ a tunyukpɛ̃ mɔ suwa da, kitonɛkĩ kade lɛláadɔ nɛ awã da.
66021026	Baakɔa fude fude akũ obu fɔtsa mɔ akũ kana fɔtsa bɛyamɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
66021027	Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ tákpalɛ lidima lɛláawo nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna fɔnyɔãtsa ĩye ɛnyɛ ɔvãlɛvã lɛmɛ lɛláawo nɛ awã, mbɔɛntɛ bati a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ be buĩ bido nɛ Kavelibi a nkpã ovoli a kamɛ aawo nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
66022001	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a tsa yĩ nkpã ɔwɔ kĩ ye mui akpa nkpã. Ye mui a kamɛ kpalɛ ndɛ ahuhɔɛ aye, ade bɛkanɛ kato Baguma mɔ Kavelibi a lɛgãkpo a kamɛ,
66022002	ade batɛ̃ nɛ ɔmatɔ a ɔblɔnu kayite a. Nkpã kutse a dzɛ̃ nɛ ɔwɔ a futuni nviã akũ. Kɔawũ babi titi ewua-nviã nɛ kateli mɔa kamɛ, nɛ odetɔ mɔa kamɛ deedi. Koe tɔɔta bakɔa katsa fude fude bati fɔsɔ.
66022003	Bɛláabuki bɛmɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma dumu lidima nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Baguma mɔ Kavelibi a lɛgãkpo aana nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ade ye basumunɛ aasum ye a.
66022004	Baamɔ ye anɛ ade ye dĩ aana nɛ be nnyɛ a.
66022005	Kade lɛláabuki kɛdɔ ade bɛláasĩ ɔsɛdza ĩye suwa, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate, Baguma aanya be ɔhaĩ, ade baanya akũ ndɛ fɔgã aye daa daa a.
66022006	Ke liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi yĩ kĩ, “Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali ade baapuli bɛtɛ foe bido a. Boe Ɔlate, onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ Hũhũ Baguma a lido ye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩ ɛyaanyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ laaya mɔatsɛ a ɛtsa ye basumunɛ.”
66022007	Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Midã! Maya mɔatsɛ! Baguma hila bati a kĩ bakɛna nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a akũ!”
66022008	Yĩ, Yohanes, nyɛ́ oti a kĩ ye linu, ɛmɔ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee a. Kĩ nnu fukĩĩ, mmɔ́ foe a, nke aduli nɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa yĩ a anɛ kĩ masum ye.
66022009	Lɛmɛ ebi yĩ kĩ, “Takɛna foe! Basumunɛ bɔmɔ́ nɔ, mɔ awaɛ̃ amɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, mɔ bati a kĩ bakɛna nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa akũ a bɔanɛ. Sum Baguma odi!”
66022010	Ade ebi yĩ kĩ, “Takɔa fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ a ɔkɔla, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ fuã kĩ foe flee fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.
66022011	Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa ni, ɛdanɛ tɔkpa kakɛna, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yado akũ efĩĩ ni, ɛdanɛ akũ efĩĩ kado. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tuwĩ ni, ɛdanɛ tuwĩ kakɛna, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpalɛwa ni, ɛdanɛ oti kpalɛwa kanya.”
66022012	Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Maaya mɔatsɛ! Maya mɔ yĩ kɔtɔkase, nkpa odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye lɛkɛnana onukpɛ̃.
66022013	Yĩ nyɛ Ɔtɔnyade mɔ Owũnade, Kayɔkayi mɔ Kawũna a.
66022014	“Bihila bati a kĩ bɛvɔlɛ be tɛtadiɛ wulaa tɛnɛ fitaa a, kĩ nɛ foesũ bideĩ osi kĩ banya nkpã kutse a babi, kĩ bideĩ osi lɛmɛ kĩ batsã tunyukpɛ̃ a kamɛ biwo nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
66022015	Lɛmɛ ɔmatɔ a ɔbaɛ̃ badzinɛ nyɛ́ fɔnyɔãtsa bakɛnanɛ ndɛ bakpete aye, kanɔkɔnɛ badãnɛ, bikĩ bɛtsɛ̃ mɔa linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, awudifɔ, baviɔ̃ basumunɛ mɔ bikĩ bawɛ fɔvã, kama fɔvã lɛmɛ.
66022016	“Yĩ, Yesu, lido yĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩ ɛyaadi adansiɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ ɛkpa mi nɛ tɛsɔli a kamɛ. Ĩnyɛ Dawid onu mɔ ye kasinu a kamɛ obi, ade yĩ lɛmɛ nyɛ ɔnɔnɛ lisibii a kĩ lavɔlɛ a.”
66022017	Hũhũ a mɔ Obolitsɔ̃ a lɛ kĩ, “Ya!” Odi nyɛ odi kĩ enu fukĩĩ ni, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ya!” Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɔmɔado akɔ ye ni, ɛya. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ nkpã mui ni, ɛyaatɛ be faa.
66022018	Yĩ, Yohanes, mabi odi nyɛ odi kĩ enu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a, kĩ bide foe lɛtsã nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ a kĩ ntɛ odi kɔa litsedi ebumɔ foe ni, Baguma aakɔa lubo kamɔ a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ a ebumɔ ye sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ.
66022019	Ade ayea ntɛ odi nyɛ litsedi nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ a kamɛ ni, Baguma aanyɛ ye tsɛfã nɛ nkpã kutse libi a kamɛ, ade ɛláana tsɛfã nɛ Ɔmatɔ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ kamɛ a.
66022020	Oti a kĩ yadi adansiɛ nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee akũ a lɛ kĩ, “Oo, maaya mɔatsɛ!” Fɔya lɔmɔ. Boe Ɔlate Yesu, ya!
66022021	Boe Ɔlate Yesu kɔnyakamɔ kɔtamɔ odi nyɛ odi.
